content: This is a test story from Mawphor website.
title: Test Story

content: Nongstoiñ, Ïaiong 01: Hadien ki bun phew tylli ki snem naduh ba la seng ïa ka skul St Mary’s ha ka shnong Maweit kaba dei kawei na ki shnong kaba dang sahdien ha ka thaiñ jong ka West Khasi Hills District, ha ka sngi nyngkong jong ka taiew katei ka shlem ka la ïoh ban lum lang ïa ki khynnah samla kiba la pass bad kiba dang ïai bteng ki jingpule ha katei ka shlem kumjuh ruh ïa ki nonghikai kiba rim kum ka jingïakynduh lang ïa kaba la tip ruh kum ka Alumni Gathering.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban plie paidbah biang sa shisien ïa ka Ïing skul barim kaba la ïoh ban pynkylla noh mynta tang sha ka primary. Katei ka Shlem ka dei kaba la seng naduh u snem 1992 lyngba ka kynhun I Sister Helen bam kwai ha ïing u Blei bad mynta ka la don la ka ïing paka kaba heh bad kaba bit kaba biang haduh class X.Ka dei ruh kawei na ki skul kaba la pynmyntoi shibun ïa ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka thaiñ, kaba la sei ruh bun ki soh kynthup haduh 2 ngut ki nongïasaid aiñ, 17 ki shipai bad pulit, 30 ngut ei ei ki nonghikai kynthup kiba hikai ha ki skul sorkar, ki Nurse, ki Missionary, kiba treikam sorkar bad kiwei kiwei.U bah Sahitbor Diengngan Branch Manager ka HDFC Bank Nongstoiñ, u la long u kongsan ryngkat u bah Orius Thongni kum u symbud kongsan, nalor u Liavi David Principal ka St. Mary’s bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah jong ka thaiñ. U kongsan haba ai jingkren u la ong dei namar ki nonghikai mynshuwa ba la long kumne kumba long mynta. Kumta ka dei ka kamram ki khynnah Alumni ban wad ïa la ki nonghikai kiba la pynlong ïa ka mynta. U la ong ruh ban kynmaw ruh ban ym klet ïa la ka tynrai kum u jingthung Biskot ban pur kat shaba poi ban soh tangba dei ban tip ïa la ka tynrai hangno ka don.
title: Kum u biskot dei ban pur kylleng da kaba skhem ha la ka tynrai : Sahitbor Diengngan

content: Mawkyrwat, Ïaïong 01: Ki nongkhmih ne ki Expenditure Observers (EO) na ka bynta ka ilekshon sha ka Lok Shabha ka ban sa long ha une u bnai na ka bynta ka 1- Shillong (ST) Parliamentary Constituency ba kynthup ïa u Satyapal. S. Meena, IRS bad u Kamlesh Kumar, IRS mynta ka sngi ki la wan jngoh ïa ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat ryngkat ka jingpynlong jingïalang ha kamra jong u District Election Officer, Mawkyrwat ban khmih bniah ne pynkhreh ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki komiti bapher bapher na ka bynta ka ilekshon Lok Sabha Parliamentary Elections, 2024.Ha kane ka jingïalang, u Satyapal. S. Meena, IRS u la ai ka jingbthah kaba shai ha kaba ïa dei bad ki bynta ne ki kam ba dei ban leh ha kaba ïa dei bad ka kynhun ba dei peit ïa ka Expenditure Monitory ha kaba u la kyrpad ïa u Assistant Expenditure Observer (AEO) ban pynbit pynbiang ïa ki report ha ka por ba biang.Ha kane ka sngi ka la don ruh ka jingïaphylliew bad ki Nodal Officers jong ki kynhun bapher bapher ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpynkhreh bad ka kam jong ki kynhun ba dei peit ha kane ka ilekshon kum ban peit ïa ki jingpyndonkam pisa, kyiad namar ka aiñ ne ki hukum ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) bad ka jingpynlut jong ki kyrtong bad ki party bapher bapher.U la ong ruh ba ka donkam na ka bynta kine ki kynhun ban ïathuh ne pyntip ha u Deputy Commissioner ne Nodal Officer lada don kano kano ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka MCC lane kino kino ki jingeh ba ki ïa kynduh.Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïadonlang u bah T. Lyngwa, IAS, District Election Officer, South West Khasi Hills District, u bah L.T. Tariang, MCS, Assistant Returning Officer (ARO), South West Khasi Hills District bad kiwei.
title: Na ka bynta ka MP ilekshon 2024, wan jngoh ki EO ha South West Khasi Hills District

content: Mawkyrwat, Ïaïong 01: Ka long kaei kaei ka jingduh nong kaba khraw namar da ka jingwan jong ‘erïong ‘erlang tharai ha ka miet jong ka 31 tarik u Lber, 2024 kiba bun tylli ki longïing ki la shah ktah bad shah pynjulor.Ha ka tyllong khubor ba la ïoh lyngba ka ophis jong u District Disaster Management Office (DDMO), South West Khasi Hills District la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingwan jong ka phria ryngkat ka ‘erïong ‘erlang tharai ki don haduh 68 tylli ki longïing kiba la shah ktah jur na ka jingshah shoh phria ïa ki tnum ïing bad 39 tylli pat kiba la shah ktah tang malu mala bad kine ki longïing ki dei ha ka thaiñ Warsan Lyngdoh kiba hap hapoh jong ka Mawkyrwat Block South West Khasi Hills District.Shuh shuh la ïathuh ba ki shnong kiba la shah ktah na ka jingwan ka ‘erïong ‘erlang tharai ki long ka shnong Mawjaraiñ, Nongrim Mawpat, Pynden umjaraiñ, Umsaw, Nongtynñiaw, New Mawjai, Nongpuiñskei, Mawnore, Mawhiangrnga, Mawkhlaitngap, Mawpat, Rangmaw, Mawsaw, Manad, Phlangdiloiñ, Wahkaji.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia, ha kajuh hi ka miet jong ka 31 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024 da ka jingwan u slap bad lyer kaba jur kawei ka skul kaba kyrteng ka Vesto Upper Primary School kaba don ha shnong Rangjadong ka la shah lit noh ki tin sop bad la don ki ïing briew bad ki dukan kiba la shah pynjulor malu mala.Shuh shuh la ïathuh ruh ba ha kine ki jingjia ym shym la don mano mano ruh ba mynsaw.
title: Julor 68 ki longïing na ka jingwan lynshop u phria ha ka thaiñ Warsan Lyngdoh

content: Nongstoiñ, Ïaiong 01: Da ki phew tylli ki Ïing bad bun tylli ki Shnong ka thaiñ Ri-Muliang, West Khasi Hills, ki la shah ktah jur ha ka eriong erngit kaba wan ban lynshop kynsan kynsan ha ka janmiet sngi U Blei ka 31 tarik Lber 2024.Kane ka eriong kaba la wan ha ryngkat u slap u ba jur, ka la pynjulor buh eh ha ka thaiñ Langpih, Tynghor, Umyiap bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong ba marjan. Ki khubor ki ïathuh ruh ba ka eriong ka la pynkhyllem ruh ïa ki post bording bad ki dieng ki siej ha ka thaiñ. La ong ba ki don ruh katto katne ki briew kiba la mynsaw na kane ka jingjia.Ha ka jingïakren bad u President ka HYC Ri-Muliang Pyllun samla Distarbor Wanniang, u la ong ba ka seng ka dang pyrshang ban lum jingkheiñ mynta ïa ki jingpynjulor jong kane ka eriong ha ka thaiñ baroh kawei.U la ïathuh ruh ba tang ha ka shnong Tynghor, ki la don haduh 15 tylli ki Ïing kiba la shah pynjulor bad shah jynrat ka tnum ha kane ka eriong. Kumta ym lah satia ban tip lut ïa ka jingshah pynjulor jong ki ïing ki sem ha kiwei kiwei pat ki shnong ba marjan.
title: Julor jur ki ïing ki sem ha thaiñ Ri-Muliang ba lynshop ka ‘eriong

content: Nongpoh, Ïaïong 01: Da ki phew tylli ki Ïing ki sem ha ka thaiñ khappud Block II ha Ri Bhoi ki la shah punjulor ha ka erïong kaba la wan lynshop ha ka janmiet Sngi U Blei kumba ha ka por 4 baje janmiet.Kumba la ioh lum jingtip la ong ba kane ka erïong bajur ka la lynshop ym tang ïa ki ïing ki sem ha kitei ki thaiñ khappud Block II bad danki phew tylli ki Ïing ha ka thaiñ Jirang ruh ki ïing ki sem ki la shah punjulor bad ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka dong Ri BhoiHaba phai sha ka jingjoa ha ka thaiñ Block II bad hap ha ka Raid Nongtung ha Ri Bhoi, ki lai tylli ki Shnong ki la shah kthah bha ba kynthup ïa ka Shnong Ummat I, Ummat II bad ka Shnong Nongsder ha kaba 28 tylli ki ïing ki la shah punjulor ha ka erïong erngit ha kitei ki 3 Shnong.Halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih bun ruh ki longïing ki la kylla khlem ïing khlem sem ha kaba katei ka erïong bajur ka la wan ban punjulor ïa ki ïing ki sem bad baroh ki jingdon jingem jong ki hapoh ki ïing ki sem.La ong ruh ba kane ka eriong ym tang ba ka punjulor ïa ki ïing ki sem, hynrei bun ki jingthung jingtep ruh ki la julor ba la don ruh ka jingïap phria ha ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi.Haba ioh ban ïa kren bad u Bah Blikshon Sohtun, President ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Border Area ka Raid Nongtung, u la ong ba kane ka jingwan lynshop kynsan ka erïong ka la ktah shisha ïa kiba bun ki Longïing longsem ha katei ka thaiñ bad ki la kylla long khlem ïing khlem sem ba ka eriong ka la pynjot pynpra ïa ki ïing ki sem jongki.Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka jingjia kum u nongïalam katei ka thaiñ u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia ban iohi ba ki longïing ki la shah ktah jur bad don ruh kiba la hap ban wad jaka riehtngen shipor namar ba ka ïing jongki kam long shuh ban shong ban sah na ka jingwan lynshop katei ka eriong bajur.Namar kata na ka liang ka Synjuk bad ki nongïalam Shnong ki la buh ïa ka jingkyrpad sha ka bor sorkar ba kin phah ban wan jurip mardor ïa ki longïing kiba shah ktah bad ha kajuh ka por ban thaw lem ïa ki lad jingïarap na ka sorkar sha kitei ki lanot kiba la shah ktah jur ha katei ka erïong, u la bynrap.
title: Da ki phew tylli ki ïing ki sem pynjulor ka ‘er-ïong ha khappud Block II ha Ri Bhoi

content: Nongpoh, Ïaïong 01: Kumba bun tylli ki longïing ha ki shnong ba hap ha ka Jirang Constituency ki la shah ktah jur bad don ruh kiba la kylla khlem ïing khlem sem na ka jingwan lynshop ka erïong bajur hynnin ka janmiet jong ka sngi u Blei, u MLA ka Jirang Constituency, u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun u la phah ïa ka jingkyrpad kaba jur sha ka sorkar jylla ba kan pynsted ïa ki lad jingïarap na ka bynta kito ki longïing kiba la shah ktah jur.Kum ban pynkynmaw, hynnin ka janmiet kiba bun ki shnong ba hap ha ka Jirang C&RD Block ki la shah ktah jur ha ka erïong, kaba dei hadien ba ka eriong bajur ka la wan ban lynshopki ban pynjulor naduh ki ïing ki sem bad ruh wat ki jingthung jingtep jong kiba bun tylli ki shong ha ka thaiñ Jirang.Haba la ïa kren bad ki Nongtho Khubor, u MLA ka Jirang u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih ba ka eriong erngit ka la wan ban lynshop naphang ïa ki ïing ki sem bad ruh ki jingthung jingtep kaba la long ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ïa kito ki lanot ba la shah ktah bad kaba kham sngewkhia ka long ba la don ruh ki longïing kiba la shah ktah jur ha kaba ki la hap ban riehtngen shipor ha ki ïing Dorbar bad ki skul, kaba dei hadien ba ka eriong ka la pynjulor ïa ki ing ki sem jongki.U la ïathuh ruh da ki phew tylli ki shnong kiba la shah ktah hapoh ka Jirang Constituency kiba kynthup kum ka shnong Pamumsylliang, Umshalini, Rani, Gonpati, Jalpaham, Matang, Jirang, Umsohpai bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong kiba la pyntip bad kiba la ioh ban ïa kren lyngba ki telephone.U la pynpaw ruh kaba sngewkhia ka long ym tang ba ka eriong ka la pynjulor lut ïa ki ïing ki sem bad ka eriong ka la pynjulor naduh ki diengkwai, ki diengjri (rubber) bad kiwei kiwei ki jingthung jingtep kiba la ktah shisha ïa ki longïing kiba la ngat ha kane ka lanot eriong.Kum u Nongmihkhmat paidbah u la ïathuh ruh naduh hynnin ka sngi tang mar ïa ioh jingtip u la dep ban kren naduh u BDO ka Jirang Block C&RD Block kiba la phah ïa ki briew ban leit jurip ryngkat bad ma u kum u Ophisar bad ruh u la kren sha u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi ba un shim khia khamtam ban pynpoi ïa ki lad jingïarap sha kaba kham kloi sha kito ki lanot kiba la shah ktah jur.Shuh shuh, u la ong ruh namar ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih ïa kiba bun ki longing longsem, kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah u la pyntip ruh sha u Symbut myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Bah Prestone Tynsong ba ka sorkar jylla kan pynsted ban pynpoi ïa ki lad jingïarap (Relief Fund) sha kito ki longing ba shah ktah jur bad ruh ba ka sorkar kan pyrkhat kyrpang ba kan nym ktah ïa kito ki longïing kiba la duh ïa ki ing ki sem na ka jingwan lynshop katei ka eriong bajur, u la bynrap.
title: Sha ka sorkar kyrpad u MLA Jirang ban pynsted ki lad jingïarap sha ki lanot eiriong ha thaiñ Jirang

content: Jowai, Ïaïong 01: Ka Seiñ Raij Jowai kumba long manla u snem kan pynlong ïaka ‘Shad Sukra’ ka ban sdang haka 6 bad pynkut haka 7 tarik u Ïaïong, 2024 kane ka Shad Sukra ka long shi bynta ka jingainguh ïa ka mei mariang hashwa ban leit hiar rep sha ki hali ki pynthor.Ha kane ka snem yn wan ïadonlang da ki waheh wasian jong ki 12 tylli ki dong, ki kyntoid, kynthup ïa ka Sengtyllilang jong ka Seiñ Raij Ummulong bad Seiñ Raij Shillong. Na ka liang u Vice Chancellor jong ka skul bah NEHU un long kum u kongsan, ha ryngkat ka kong Silbi Passah kaba la ïoh ïa ka Padma Shri award nalor kiwei kiwei de.Ha ka por mynstep 10 waje jong ka 7 tarik kan don ka jingthang ïaka sharak ha Mynkoi Pyrdi Iongpiah nangta kin leit sha madan Biar ka Blai bad leit mih sha Iawmusiang ban pynlong ka jingshad Sukra ha ryngkat ki riam tynrai. Katba ha ka por janmiet kan don ka shad “per syntu pyllah” ha kaba ki dong bapher bapher kin ïashim bynta lang.U Chairman ka Arts & Culture ka Seiñ Raij Jowai ma Chandlok Dkhar ula ong ïa ka Shad Sukra la ju pynlong naduh ki por ki longshwa manshwa ha ryngkat ka ñiam ka rukum kaba don shwa ïa ka Thoh Lyngdoh.Ula ong lyngba ka riam ki beit jong ki nongïashim bynta ha ka Shad Sukra ka lah ban pynpaw pyrthei ïaka jingriew spah ka riti dustur la jong.Ha kane ka Shad Sukra haka sngi nyngkong 6 tarik kan don ka jinglehkai Drama ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki sap ki phong ïa kaba yn pynlong ha Tpep-Pale Jowai.Ka phang jong kane ka Shad Sukra mynta u snem ka ong ‘kiba tip ban kohnguh ïa ki adong Blei ka long ka luti ka jingsuk ha sla pyrthei’. Ka Seiñ Raij Jowai ka kyntu kumjuh ïa ki paidbah ban wan biang por haka step jong ka 7 tarik ha kaba yn don ki jingkren na ki riew rangbah bad ki jingshad bapher bapher.
title: 6 bad 7 tarik u Ïaïong ka Shad Sukra ka Seiñ Raij Jowai

content: Nongstoiñ, Ïaïong 01: Ha ka step jong ka lah sngi u Blei ha ka por kumba shiphew baje ei ei mynstep, kawei ka kali Swift rong saw kaba don ïa u registration No ML 07 B kaba la ñiah da u Nebelnes na ka shnong Umsaw, kaba dang mih na shaphang Nongstoiñ hynrei haba la poi ha Porsohsat hajan ka ophis jong ka tnad Fisheries, la leit ban tynrah ïa kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u Registration number ML 07 A 6276 kaba la ñiah ñiah da u bah F.Nongsiej na ka shnong Sohpian West Khasi Hills.Ha katei ka jingïa tynrah jong kitei ki kali u nongñiah jong katei ka swift u la mynsaw jur na ka jingsangah ha u steering na ki bynta ka shadem haduh ba u la prie snam na shyntur. Ha katei ka kali Swift ki don lai ngut kiba shong tang ki shynrang suda uwei u ba shong ha khmat u la mynsaw malu mala.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u bah F.Nongsiej u ba ñiah ïa katei ka trok pat, u la ong ba u nongñiah jong katei ka kali Swift u la pynher sted bha bad ha ka por ba u la kiar sharud shu ïoh sngew kynsan jraiñ na ka shaka ba shadien ha kaba katei ka Swift ka la sied shadien kumba san mitar ei ei. Hadien katto katne por la wan poi ki pulit hynrei tang shiphang ki la leit noh katba ïa kitei kiba mynsaw la pynkit noh sha hospital na ka bynta ban phah sumar.
title: Tynrah ka Swift ïa ka trok mynsaw jur u nongñiah

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) Amlarem Unit ka la khot bad wer ïa ki nongkyrshan jong ka UDP ba kin ïawer lem ïa ki paralok ba kin ym don ka jingsngew pher party hynrei ban ai jingkyrshan pura ïa u kyrtong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long dang shen ha ka shnong Pdengshakap u MLA ka UDP na Amlarem Constituency Bah Lahkmen Rymbui uba dei ruh u President u la kyrpad ban pynjop ïa u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin khnang ba kan pynsuk ban treikam ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam pynroi bapher bapher hapoh ka Amlarem Constituency.U MDC barim Bah Lamdibok Sumer uba long u Vice President jong ka UDP Amlarem Circle Unit bad u Bah Medling Swer uba long u Working President ki la pynsngew hakhmat ka jingïalang ïa ki thong treikam jong ka party bad kumjuh ruh ka jingpyntyllun ïa ki kam nangne shakhmat ban pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha.U Adviser jong ka UDP Amlarem Unit Bah Kolmen Pohshna u la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ka Amlarem Constituency ba kin ïasnohkti lang kumba la paw ha kine ki san snem ba ladep lyngba ka jingtrei shitom jong u MLA ban wanrah ïa ki song pynroi bad ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingwanrah ïa ki Govt. LP School Building, ka umbam umdih, ka ïohkam ïohjam, ki lynti ki synkien bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam jong u paidbah.“Nga kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin klet ïa kino kino ki jingsngew party bad ban ai jingkyrshan pura kumba la bthah da u MLA khnang ba u kyrtong ka RDA un long u MP uba lah ban wanrah ki jingkylla ha ka Jylla hi baroh kawei,” u la ong.’“U Bah Robert June Kharjarin u dei u kyrtong uba dang thymmai bad u bym pat don ïa kano kano ka dak thohbria long u Candidate ba dang thymmai u bym pat don kano ka jingthoh bria,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ka RDA ka la jied ïa u kyrtong uba kynsai bad uba la don ka jingnang jingstad bad ka jingshemphang uba lah ruh ban ïasaid ïa ka khia ka shon jong ka jylla ha Parliament.”
title: Kyrpad ka UDP Amlarem ban kyrshan pura ïa u kyrtong rda

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Wat hapdeng ka jingeh kaba bun hynrei kine kim pynleh nohei ïa ka por kaba ki la ïoh ïa ka jingkhamti.ïa kane ka kam lap ha kine ki sngi ba dang step la ïohi ba ki la don kumba 2 ngut ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board kiba dang sar ïa ka surok ha Motphran.Lyngba ka jingïohi ba ki la hap ban sar ïa katei ka Nala la sngewthuh shai ba ki mad ka jingeh na kadaw ba ki don ki jaka ba dang shah bad lehse ka donkam ka jingïatreilang ban pynkhuid ïa ki jaboh hapoh ka thaiñ Motphran.Kumba la ju ïohi man la ka sngi kine ki nala ha ka por mynstep ki la dap da ki ñuit kiba la bret hapoh ki bad kum ïa kine ïano kynnoh namar kane kadei ruh ka jaka kaba ju ïaid ruh da ki briew bad kiba shong dukan ha madan.Lah ban ong ba ki don bun ki jaka ha kane ka thaiñ Motphran kaba ïa kynduh palat ïa ka jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jaboh pathar, kumta ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam la ïohi shisha ïa ka jingdon kam ïa ki briew ba tip ïa ka lehkhuid bad kiwei ki kam ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingleh khuid leh suba.
title: Wat ba la bun kiba bret ñuit dang don kiba pynkhuid

content: Shillong, Lber 31: u Superintendent ki pulit jong ka Ri Bhoi District u la pyntip ba ka tnat pulit ka la buh ar tylli ki nombar ba ki paidbah ki lah ban ujor ha kaba ïadei bad ka MP ilekshon lada don kano kano ka jingujor hapoh ka District.Ki nombar kiba la buh da ki pulit ba ki paidbah ki lah ban ujor lada ka don kano kano ka jingujor ki ki nombar phone ki long Mobile No: 8730940080 bad 9856084514 kine ki dei ki nombar kaba ki paidbah kila ban phone lada don kano kano ka jingujor haba ïadei bad ka ilekshon.Kane ka dei na ka bynta kane ka ilekshon MP sha Lok Sabha na ka bynta ka 1- Shillong (ST) Parliamentary Konstitwensi bad kitei ka nombar kin long beit tang na ka bynta jong ka Ri Bhoi District.
title: Buh nombar ka ophis u SP lada don kiba kwah ujor ilekshon

content: Shillong, Ïaiong 01 : Ka Indian academy of Pediatrics (IAP) ka la pynbna paidbah ïa ka jingsdang ba nyngkong eh jong ka ïa ka “IAP KI BAAT, COMMUNITY KA SAATH” ha ka Ri India baroh kawei, Ka jingthmu ba kongsan tam jong kane ka long ban ïa kren bad ïatai sani bniah shaphang ki mat baktah ïa ka koit ka khiah ki khunlung, ki khynnah.Kane ka long kum ka jingpyrshang ban ïateh kti bad ïasnoh lang bad ki paidbah ba bun balang ban pynphriang bad ai jingtip ba kham bniah shaphang ki jingpang ba ïadei bad ki khunlung, khynnah ha kine ki 2 snem(2024-2025), kaba long kawei ka mat treikam jong ka IAP ha kine ki snem.Ki jingpang ba kynthup ïa ka Obesity ( jingsngaid palat) ,Measles (Niang Pyrsit) Autism, Down Syndrome bad Thalassemia (jingpang duna snam). Lyngba kane ka sienjam, ka IAP ka thmu ba ki jinghikai bad jingpynbna kiba ïadei bad ka koit ka khiah, kin poi sha baroh ki nongshong shnong bad kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ka imlang sahlang baroh kawei .U Dr. G.V.Basaravaja u National IAP President 2024, u kren bad ïai ban khia ba kane kalong kum kawei ka por jingïaleh (Campaign) da kaba ong “Ka Kamram ba kongsan jong ngi ka IAP, ka long ban aibor ïa ka imlang sahlang sawdong jong ngi, ban ai jinghikai da ki jingtip ba ïar bad ba janai shaphang ka koit ka khiah ki khunlung khynnah. Namar ka Jingtip bad jingstad ka long kum ka jingkieng ban sngewthuh shaphang ki jingpang bad kumno ban ïaleh bad tehlakam ïa ki, bad da kaba leh kumne,khatduh ngin lah ban ai ka lawei ba suk, bad ba koit ba khiah ïa ki khun ki kti jong ki.Ha ka sngi World Autism Day, u Dr Vasant Khalatkar (National IAP President 2025) u kwah ïa ngi ba ngin ai jinghikai ba kyrpang ban pynphriang bad pynsngewthuh shaphang ka Autism Spectrum Disorder, da kaba ban khia, ba “Ka jingtip shaphang ka Autism, ka jingai jingsumar ha ka por ba biang bad ba dang lung ka long ka mat bahalor tam na ka bynta ka manbha manmiat jong kiba shah ktah ha kane ka jingpang.Ka jingthmu ba kongsan jong kane jingïaleh ka long ban ai jinghikai, ban Aibor ban ïarap lang ïa ka imlang sahlang, kumno ban ithuh bad ai jingkyrshan ïa u/ka khynnah ba shah ktah ha ka AUTISM.Ka mat ba kyrpang jong ka IAP shaphang ka AUTISM ka long ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah shaphang ka AUTISM, bad pynshlur kumno ban im adkar bad kumno ban pynsngewthuh shaphang ki jingngeit bieit shaphang ka Autism.Te kumta, Ngi khot ngi wer sngewbha ïa phi iwei pa iwei ban ïasnoh kti lang ha ka ban ai jingsumar bad jingkyrshan ïa u/ka khynnah ba shah ktah ha ka AUTISM, khnang ba ma ki ruh kin ïoh lang ïa ka lawei ba phyrnai.
title: Mih ka IAP ban ïa syllok shaphang ki jingpang jong ki khunlung khynnah

content: Shillong, ïaïong, 01: Ka United Hynñiewtrep Movement (UHM) ka la pynrem jur ïa ka jingkynthoh bad jingkynnoh ba khlem nongrim jong ka Coordination and Welfare Com-mittee (CWC) pyrshah ïa ka KSU halor ka jingshah pynïap klep ki arngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati ha ka janmiet jong ka 27 tarik, Lber, 2024.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka UHM Bah Charlie J Rani, u la ong, “ka seng ka maham jur ïa ka CWC ban shu padiah khlem nongrim ïoh lyngba kane ka jingpadiah kulmar kane ka CWC kan poi pynban sha ka thma kaba heh.”“Ka seng ka sngew ban buh jingkylli na ka Sorkar Jylla hato kito ki mynder kiba shim ïa ka jingim jong u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta (bam kwai ha dwar U Blei) ki lah shah pynsajia neem katkum ka aiñ nalor ba la tip thikna ba dei ma ki kiba leh ïa ka kam bymman. Hato ka Sorkar ka la ïohkem neem ïa u Vicky Dey uba la byrngem ïa ka KSU kumjuh ïa ka jaitbynriew Hynñiewtrep ban pynïap klep ïa ngi,” la ong une u nongïalam ka UHM.“U kyrwoh ba shai lyngba ka UHM sha ki bar jylla bad khamtam kane ka CWC ba wat pynbor ïa ngi ki dkhot ka jaitbynriew Hynñiewtrep ba ngin shim ïa ki sienjam ba tyngeh lyngba kane ka jingtei pop ïa ka KSU bad kumjuh ïa ki dkhot ka jaitbynriew jong ngi haba ka aiñ ka don ban bishar sngewbha wat padiah kulmar,” la maham u Bah Rani.Haba maham ïa ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Forum (MLMF) ka UHM ka la ong “ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Forum ka dei ban sangeh mardor halor ka jingthmu ban shong kyllaiñ myngor ha Khyndailad namar kane kan long pynban kumba theh umphniang ïa ka ding ba dang klang mynta bad lada ka Sorkar kan ailad ïa kum kine ki jingthmu jong ka MLMF kan sa poi sha ka jingïapher jaitbynriew bad kan sa mih ruh ka jingïapyni bor bad lada jia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih lyngba kane ka Sorkar kan hap shim hi ïa ka jingkit khlieh.”Ka Seng ka pynrem jur ïa ka Sorkar Kmie halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) bad kumba ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei ka pyrshah kumta ka Seng ruh kan ïai pyrshah ïa kane ka aiñ ïakjakor. Ka Seng ka dawa ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban shimkhia ïa kane ka mat ban pynsngew ruh sha ki tyndong shkor jong ka Sorkar Kmie ba kam dei ban pyntreikam ïa kane ka aiñ hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya ba ha ka jaka jong kane ka dei ban pyntreikam noh mardor ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), ka jingpynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India bad ban pynthikna ïa u pud u sam uba biang.
title: Maham ka UHM ïa ka CWC ban ym padiah kulmar ïoh poi sha ka thma ba heh

content: Shillong, ïaïong, 01: Ka Jaintia Students Union (JSU) ka lah maham tyngeh ïa u Gopal Deu bad ïa ka Committee jong u ba kim dei ban pynshit lane kynnoh kulmar ïa ki dkhot ka KSU ba ki dei kiba donkti ban pynïap ïa ki ar ngut bar jylla ha ha Ichamati .“U Gopal Dey um dei ban shu kynnoh kulmar bad ka seng ka lah ong ba ki bor Pulit ki dei ban pynngat bad shitom hapoh ka aiñ ïa u kum kine ki briew kiba kynnoh khlem ki sabut satar ba biang,” la ong ka seng ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President u Bah Jersom Shylla.“Lada jia eiei ïa ki bar jylla la shu kynnoh beit ïa ki dkhot sengbhalang na ka por sha ka por bad ka seng ka maham ruh ïa u Gopal Dey ba um dei ban shu kynnoh khlem ka sabut bad ka kynhun tohkit ki Pulit ki la leh la ka kamram,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ka seng ka dawa ruh ïa ki bor synshar distrik bad ïa ka sorkar ba da leilei ym dei ban ailad ban pynlong jingïalang ki ne ki kynhun poiei ka CWC namar kan nang pynshit ïa ki dkhot ka jaitbynriew bad kan nang wanrah shuh shuh ïa ka jingsngew pher jaitbynriew bad ïa umsnam,” la ong ka Seng.“Ka seng ka buh jingkylli ruh na ka Sorkar Jylla ba ïa ki bar jylla thrang snam kiba dkhat bad pynïap ïa ka mynsiem ba lui lui jong u samla Lurshai Hynniewta ha Ichamati, hato la ïohkem neem ïa ki bad haei lah set ïa ki ? Ka JSU ka lah dawa na ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban sei madan ïa ka case bad ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa kito ki bar jylla kiba dkhat bad pynïap ïa ka jingim u samla jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: Shaei jah ka Committee u Gopal Dey haba shah pynïap u Lurshai : JSU

content: Shillong, Ïaiong 01 : Ka Sankardev College Shillong ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai Lber ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïakob shut jabieng (Inter-College Quiz competition) ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ka sorkar jylla hapoh ka CMYDS 2022-2023 na ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka jingïakob la wan ïa shimbynta da ki phra tylli ki College kiba don ha Shillong. Ha ka jingïakob, ka Sanjana Rani bad u Niyazul Rehman kiba mihkhmat na St. Edmund’s College ki la khur ïa ka nam lahduh bad khur ïa ka song pisa kaba 5,000 tyngka ryngkat ka syrnod.Ïa ka kyrdan ka ba-ar la ïoh rah da ka Diya Sinha bad u Rajesh Barman na Raid Laban College, bad khur ïa ka song pisa ba 4000 tyngka ryngkat ka syrnod. Ïa kyrdan kaba lai pat la ïoh da ka Jennifer R Marak bad ka Christina Themsingphi AS na St Anthony’s College bad khur ïa ka song pisa kaba 3,000 tyngka.Ïa ka jingïakob ha kane ka sngi la pynïaid da u Babu Batskhem Rapsang, Assistant Teacher jong ka KJP Girls Higher Secondary School kum u Quiz Master.
title: Pynlong jingïakob shut jabieng ka Sankardev College na bynta ki College

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Arphew san tylli ki longïng na ka shnong Lawbyrwa Ri-bhoi district, kila dawa ïa u Syiem ka Raid Mawbuh ban phiah shnong bad ban ai Rangbah Shnong thymmai ïa ki nongshong shnong ka Lawbyrwa namar ka jingkynnoh leh donbor u Rangbah Shnong thymmai bah Rijied Kharkrang.Ha kaba iadei bad kane haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah David Kurbah uwei na ki nongshong shnong ka Lawbyrwa, u la ong ba kane ka jingïakynad hapoh ka shnong la kynnoh ba ka la mih naduh ba shimti u Bah Rijied Kharkrang kum u Rangbah shnong thymmai.U la pynshai ruh ba ka jingkam u Rangbah Shnong ba ki don tang 5 tylli ki longïing ka long kaba bakla namar ki don haduh 25 tylli ki longïing kiba kwah ban ïoh ïa la ka jong ka shnong ban lait na ka kynrum kynram.U la kynnoh ruh ba une u Rangbah Shnong u la leh donbor da kaba rat wat ïa ki pipe JJM na kine ki longïing bad byrngem ruh ban pynduh ïa kane ka scheme nalor ban pynduh ruh ïa ka Certificate shnong.“U Rangbah Shnong thymmai u Bah Rijied Kharkrang u shun bha iaki 25 tylli longiing naduh ba u jop iaka ilekshon Rangbah Shnong daka ba kynnoh ba ngim pdiang ia u ban long nongialam shnong bad ula kynnoh ruh ba ngi ki 25 ing ngi dei ki Sohlah pyut, u dieng pynkiang bad u maw jingthut” kila kynnoh.
title: Dawa phiah shnong ki 25 tylli ki longïing na u Syiem Raid Mawbuh

content: Shillong ïaïong, 01: Ban rakhe ïa u mawmer jong ka jingdap 3 snem jong ka seng, mynta ka sngi ka 1 tarik u Ïaiong 2024, ka Seng Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ka la pynlong ïa ka jingai jingsumar ei ïa ki khynnah khunswet kiba don ha ka God’s Dream Home ha Pynthorbah.ïa kane ka jungai jingsumar mynta ka step la plie da u Pastor C. Marbañiang ha ka jingiadon lang ki Doktor, ki Nurse, bad ki nongïalam jong ka seng HITO.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u President ranghah ka Seng u Bah Donbok Dkhar u la ong, ba ka jingwan ka Seng ban ïadonlang ha kane ka sngi kadei shibynta ban rakhe ïa u mawmer jong ka jingdap 3 snem ba la seng ïa ka.Ka seng ka la mut ban rakhe ha ka 3 tarik jong mynta u bnai ïaïong hynrei namar ba ka dei ka por long skul bad ka ïatyngkhuh bad ka sngi longskul ki khynnah, kumta ka seng ka la ïadonlang noh mynta ka sngi namar kadei ka sngi shuti kaba ki ong ka “Easter Monday ” kum ka dak ban noh synñiang sha ki khynnah, la bynrap u Bah Donbok.U Bah Donbok u la bynrap ruh da kaba ong, ba ka jingpynlong ïa kane ka jingai jingsumar ei ïa ki khynnah ka long shibynta ban ïarap ïa ki.
title: Ban rakhe ka jingdap 3 snem, pynlong ka seng HITO ïa ka jingai sumar ei ïa ki khynnah

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Ka nong Meghalaya Kong Alicia Bakor Phanwar ka la jop ïa ka ENBA Gold Award kum ka News Producer bat bit tam (English) ha ka Exchange4media News Broadcasting Awards (ENBA) ba la pynlong ha Imperial Hotel, New Delhi mynha ka 30 tarik Lber.Kane ka khusnam ka pyni ïa ka jingithuh ïa kiba tbit tam ha ka News broadcast ki lad pathai khubor hapoh Ri India.Ha ka rta ba 26 snem, ka dei ka samla ba khynnah tam ha ka kam ba ka shimti kum ka shift superviser jong ka India Today TV newsroom.Ka kong Alicia ka dei kawei na ki producer ba lamkhmat ha ka India Today dow ‘News Today at 9” bad u Rajdeep Sardesai, ïa kaba ka la ïoh ïa ka ENBA Gold Award.Ka dei ruh ka producer ba lam khmat ha ka “Mission 2024” bad ka Preeti Choudhry, kaba la ïoh ruh ïa ka gold award ïa ka best early prime time show nalor kiwei kiwei ki khusnam.Ha shuwa ban trei bad ka India Today TV, kane ka samla ka dei ka news producer jong ka Republic TV u Arnab Goswami bad ruh ka CNN-News18.
title: ïoh khusnam ka kong Alicia kum ka News Producer ba tbit tam ha ka English

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Ka seng kaba la ïalam ïa ka sorkar hapoh ka jylla ka National People’s Party (NPP) ka la ther tyngeh ïa ka jingkular ba la pynpaw da ka seng Voice of the People Party (VPP) ba ka la ong ba kan sa thaw ïa ka lawei hynrei ka khlem pyni ïa ki rukom treikam sha ki paidbah.U Nongai ktien ka NPP u Bah HM Shangpliang haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba dei ka sorkar hapoh ka jingïalam jong ka seng NPP ka sorkar MDA kaba la dep ban ïathuh lypa ïa ki nongshong shnong ka jylla shaphang ka roadmap ne ki rukom treikam kumno ban tei ïa ka lawai jong ki samla.“Ka long kaba suk ban pynthikna sha ki briew da kaba ong ban tei ïa lawei hynrei khlem da batai kumno ban leh ïa kata,” ong u Bah Shangpliang.U la ong ba ka sorkar MDA ka la wanrah bun ki jingsdang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbha jong ka lawei ki samla ha ka jylla la ka long ha ka sengkam lajong bad kiwei ha ka jylla.Haba ong ba ka PRIME ka la dei kawei na ki kam kiba bha hapoh ka ri India kaba la dep ban pyllait da ka sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Shangpliang u la ong ba hapoh ka PRIME, ki la don kumba 5,500 ngut kiba la seng kam la jong kiba kiba la ïoh ïa ki lad jingkyrshan kaba la long ka jingïarap ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyrduh kam kyrduh jam ha ka jylla.U Bah Shangpliang u la pyntip ruh ba ki la don haduh 20,000 kiba la seng kam kiba la ïoh ka jingkyrshan CM ELEVATE.U Bah Shangpliang u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la thaw ïa ka Shillong Tech Park ka la dei ka kaba la ïarap ha ka ban sengkam la jong.“Kine ki la dei ki jingsdang kiba la dei ki nongrim kiba donkam ïa ka lawei jong ki samla ban shim kabu ïa ki lad jingïarap ba la ai da ka sorkar,” ong u nongaiktien ka NPP.
title: Ka VPP ka ong ba kan sa thaw ïa ka lawei ka Jylla, hynrei kam pyni ïa ka Road Map: HM Shangpliang

content: Shillong, ïaïong, 01: U Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) Dr BDR Tiwari ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la lum jingïalang ïa ki nongïalam jong ki seng saiñpyrthei bapher bapher na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, ïaïong.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Dr Tiwari u la ïathuh, namarba ka aiom lyiur ka la wan, la bthah ïa ka tnat Pule Puthi bad ïa ka tnat Revenue and Disaster Management ba kin buh jingmut lypa ban long kiba la pynkhreh namarba bun na ki Polling Stations ki dei kiba yn sa buh ha ki skul.“Ngi kwah ban pynthikna ba ka leit ka wan kin ym shah ktah bad ki jaka rieh slap bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam dei ban pynbiang ha ki Polling Station (na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ki nongthep vote ha ka sngi thep vote),” u la bynrap.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka jingdon jong ki Polling Station ka la kiew na ka 3512 sha ka 3482 ha ka elekshon MLA ba ladep long ha u snem 2023.U la ong ba ka tnat ka la kut jingmut ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah bad khamtam ïa ki samla ba kin mih shakhmat ha ka sngi thep vote.“Na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ki paidbah ha sor bad kumjuh ruh ki samla ka dei ka jingshah tynjuh kaba khraw ha ka por elekshon. Ngi la pyntreikam da ki lad ki lynti ha ki Booth Level bad bun na ki Polling Station ki duna bha ka jingpoi jong ki nongthep vote ha ka sngi thep vote, hynrei mynta ngi la shim da ka sienjam kumno ban leh katkum ka jingdon jong ki Polling Booth bad ki jingdon jong ki district. Ngi la ïatreilang bad ki dorbar shnong, ki skul, bad kiwei kiwei ki shlem ai jinghikai ban pynurlong ïa ka thong,”la ong u Tiwari.Ha kajuh ka por, u CEO u la pyntip ba ka Meghalaya nalor ba ka dei ka jaka ba kham jyrngam ki khlaw ki btap, ka Election Commission ka la rai ban pynlong ïa ka Green Election.“Mynta ka jinglong jingman jong ka suiñ bneng ka biang bha ban thung jingthung bad ngi la shim ïa ka rai ban pynlong ïa ka jingthung dieng khnang ban pynsah jingkynmaw ïa ka elekshon. Ha manla ki Polling Station, ngin sa thung ïa ki tynrai dieng bad ki ban ïoh thung ïa ki tynrai dieng kin dei ki nongthep vote shynrang bad kynthei kiba poi nyngkong eh ban thep vote ha ki Polling Station,” u la bynrap.
title: Pynthikna u CEO ban ym shah ktah ki Polling Station ha ka aïom lyiur

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma u la ong ba ki Liang pyrshah kila ong ba ka kynhun synrop jong ka sorkar kan neh tang 2 bnai, hadien 6 bnai, hadien shisnem hynrei ngi la lah ban pyndep ïa ka samoi ba pura.“Ha u 2023, ki paidbah ka Meghalaya kila ai biang ka jingshaniah ha ngi bad ngi la lah ban thaw ïa ka Sorkar bad ngin sa pyndep ruh ïa kane ka samoi ryngkat ka jingjop,” ula ong daba bynrap, “Hadien bun phew snem, ka la don ka Sorkar kaba skhem hapoh ka Jylla bad ki dang don shibun ki kam kiba hap leh na ka bynta ka jylla bad ki briew jong ngi”.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jinglong jingman bad ka suk ka saiñ ha Jylla, u Myntri Rangbah u ong, “Ha kiba bun ki khep, ngi la mad ïa ki jingeh na ki jingmih ki jingkulmar hynrei ngi la lah pat ban tem ïa ki. Ngi don bun ki jaitbynriew hangne ha Jylla bad kam long kaba suk ban donlang baroh hynrei ngi la pynthikna ban bat ïa ka bha ka miat ki briew jong ngi bad ban ai ka jingsynshar kaba biang”.Ha kane ka prokram kaba dang ïaid bha ka jingïakren bad ha kajuh ka por ba ki riew ngeit Muslim ki dang mane Adhan ha ka Mosque ba marjan, kaba pynlong ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingkren haduh ban da dep ka Adhan (Azan).Haba bteng ïa ka jingkren u Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh shaphang New Shillong Township, ula ong ba shuwa jong ka ilekshon, ka Sorkar NPP ka la pynbna ïa ka song pisa ba T. 10,000 klur ban shna ïa ki surok, pynbiang umbam umdih, ki ophis treikam bad ka Knowledge city ha New Shillong Township.Haba kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin vote ïa ka kyrtong ka NPP Dr M Ampareen Lyngdoh, ula ong, “Ka Kong Ampareen ka dei ka kyrtong kaba biang eh ban mihkhmat ïa ka Jylla ha Parliament. Kan sa kren na ka bynta ki briew jong ngi. Ka Sorkar NDA kan wan biang ha ka bor ha Delhi bad ka long kaba kongsan ba ngin don ka kyrtong NDA ban shah jied napoh ka Jylla. Ka NPP ha ka Jylla bad ka NDA ha ka Sorkar Pdeng, kan pynlah ïa ki ban treikam ryngkat ryngkat bad pynthikna ïa ka roi ka san jong ka Jylla”.
title: Watla ki Liang Pyrshah ki ong ba ka sorkar kan ym neh, hynrei ngi la pyndep pura ïa ka samoi : Conrad

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Kumba 40 pyrton ki pulit jong ka sorkar pdeng kin sa ka wan ban pahara hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya ban pynthikna ba kan don ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynlong ïa ki Lok Sabha election, ka ban long ha ka jylla ka ban sdang naduh ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai.ïa kane la ïathuh da u chief electoral officer (CEO) ka jylla u Dr BDR Tiwari, uba la ong ba ka jylla ka la ïohpdiang kumba 40 pyrton ki pulit napoh ka sorkar pdeng ki ban pahara na ka bynta ka ilekshon ne ki Companies of central armed police forces (CAPFs).Na kine, kumba san pyrton jong ki pulit CAPF ki la dep don lypa ha ka jylla, da kaba ong ba ïa kiwei pat yn sa pynpahara katkum ka rukom pyrkhat kam kaba la dep pynbeit lypa.Na ka liang u Tiwari u la ïathuh ba baroh ki kam la dep ban pynbeit kiba la long katkum ka aiñ kiba la dep ïoh ruh ïa ki jingpyntip katkum ki jingdonkam jong ka kam.“Ngi la dep ruh ban shim khia ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam khappud ha shwa ban pynlong ïa ka election. Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka la dep ruh ban pynmih ïa ki jingbthah kiba donkam sha ki jylla kiba marjan jong ka jylla,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba kumba long haduh mynta ki la don kumba 2 tylli ki jingujor ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka model code of conduct.
title: 40 pyrton yn phah ka ECI ban pahara ilekshon ha Meghalaya, ong u CEO

content: Shillong, ïaïong, 01: Ka Hynñiewtrep A`chik National Movement (HANM) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la ujor da ka ejahar sha u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills District pyrshah ïa u Gopal Dey uba kam ïalade kum u President jong ka Coordination And Welfare Committee (CWC), na Shella-Bholaganj bad dawa ruh ïa ki Pulit ban kem mardor ïa u Gopal Dey.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Asst. Secretary ka HANM u Bah Wyraiwan Sohtun u la ïathuh ba ka seng ka la mudui da ka ejahar pyrshah Gopal Dey halor ka shithi ba u la phah sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka 29 tarik, Lber, 2024 uba kam ïalade kum u President jong ka Coordination and Welfare Committee, Shella Bholaganj Block and Adjoining Area bad ong ruh ba ka seng kam lah satia ban pdiang ïa ka jingteipop pyrshah ïa ka KSU halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka 27 tarik, Lber, 2024 ha ka shnong Ichamati.“Ngim don kano kano ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingphah ïa ka shithi sha u Myntr Rangbah. Manla ki nongshong shnong ki don ka hok ban pynpaw ïa ki jingeh ki jong ki, hynrei katba ka tnat Pulit ka dang pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia bad kum kine ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa ka KSU ka long ka bym lah satia ban pdiang bad kane kan wanrah ïa ka jingbym ïasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki nongshong shnong ka jylla,” u la ong.“Namarkata, ki Pulit ki dei ban pynshitom ïa u Gopal Dey halor kine ki jingkynnoh katkumk ki kyndon jong ka aiñ. Ka Seng ka shaniah tylli ïa ka ain bad ïa ka tnat Pulit ha kaba ki nongleh kam bymman ki dei ban shah kem bad ban shah pynngat hapoh ki kyndon ain jong ka ri,” la bynrap u Bah Sohtun.U la ong ruh ba ka seng ka pynrem jur halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ishan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta ha ka shnong Ichamati ha ki runar.“Ngi kyrmen ba ka tnat Pulit kan ym pynslem ban lap ïa ki runar kiba leh ïa kane ka kam bymman lada dei mano mano ruh bad ai ba ka aiñ kan leh la ka jong ka kamram,” ong shuh shuh u nongïalam ka HANM.“Ngi Kyntu ruh ïa ka tnat Pulit ban kem ïa ki briew kiba pynsaphriang ha ka Social Media ïa ka shithi ba khlem don jingsoi kaba byrngem ïa ka KSU, namarba kane ka shithi ka dei kaba la phah sha u President bad sha u General Secretary ka Khasi Students Union. Ïa ki briew kiba donkti dei ban kem bad ban pynshitom,” la dawa ka HANM.
title: Mudui ejahar ka HANM pyrshah ïa ka CWC ha u SP, dawa ban kem ïa u Gopal Dey

content: Shillong Lber 31: Ka khubor ba la ïoh na ki pulit la ïathuh ba uwei u nongshong kaba hab hapoh ka Upper Lachumiere, Shillong u la phah ïa ka jingujor ba ha ka 13 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 ha ka por kumba 11.30 baje mynstep, uwei u ba kyrteng u Deo Kumar Rai u la shim wai ïa ka kali Hyundai Verna jong u da kaba kular ban wanrah biang hapoh ka 2 kynta hynrei u khlem da lah ban pynpoi ha katei ka por. Ha kaba ïadei bad kane na ka liang ki pulit ha ka 15, tarik mynta u bnai ki la ïoh bat ïa katei ka kali ha ryngkatlang bad uba la shah kynnoh ha Polo, Shillong. kham hadien utei uba la shah kynnoh u la kynnoh kylla ïa utei uba la ujor.
title: Ujor ba shah shim wai ka kali na Upper Lachumiere

content: Mairang, ïaïong, 01: Ka jingkhie kynsan ka eriong erngit ha ka miet sngi u Blei ha kylleng ka Jylla ka la wanrah ïa ka jingïam kthang jong kawei ka longing ha ka shnong Mawroh Laitdom, Eastern West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u khun shynrang uba dang kumba 3 snem tam ka rta u la khlad noh hadien ba ka eriong kaba jur ka la jynrat ïa ka ing kaba ki shong ki sah bad bret ïa ki briew sha surok.Ka kmie jong une u heprit uba la tip kyrteng kum u Wiki Lawriniang, ka la ïathuh ba ki la thmu ban pynkit noh ïa u sha Tirot Sing Civil Hospital, Mairang hynrei namar ka jingkhyllem jong ki dieng hapdeng surok ka la pynlong ïa ki kali ba kim lah shuh ban ïaid bad kumta ki la hap ban shu pynkit noh sha Laitdom PHC hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba une u heprit u la khlad noh ha kane hi ka hospital.Katkum ka khubor ba la ïohlum, la ïathuh ba ki don haduh palat 80 tylli ki iing kiba la julor bad ki don ruh ki jingri kum ki sniang ki bym lah ïaid shuh namar ka jingshah ban ha ki synrum ba la pynkhyllem da ka eriong.
title: Jynrat ka erïong ïa ka ïing ha Mawroh Laitdom, khlad u heprit ba dang 3 snem tam

content: Shillong, Ïaiong 01 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la ïathuh ba u la dep bthah ïa ki Deputy Commissioner ba kin pynstet ïa ki lad ai jingïarap sha ki lanot ba ngat ha ki jingshah lyngshop mariang la kumno kumno hapoh 24-48 kynta.Kane ka jingbthah ka la mih hadien ka jingwan lyngshop kynsan ki bor ka mariang ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka jylla ha kane ka sngi U Blei.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba u Chief Secretary u la dep ruh ban buddien halor kane ka jingshah lyngshop mariang.“Ngi la kyntu ba ha ki 24-48 kynta, kaba ngi khmih lynti ba ki DC kin lah ban pyndep ïa kine ki lad ai jingïarap sha ki longiing kiba kynduh ïa kine ki jingjia ba shah ktah ha ki bor ka mariang,” u la ong.Nalorkata, u Myntri Rangbah u la pyntip ruh ba ka sorkar jylla ka la dep ruh ban mynjur ïa ka polisi ban aibor ha kito kiba dei peit na ka bynta ban ai ïa ki lad jingïarap ba kyrkieh sha ki lanot naduh u snem ba la dep.“Kumta, mynta ki DC kim donkam shuh ban da ïoh jingbit na ka sorkar jylla na ka bynta kino kino ki lad ai jingïarap hynrei ki lah ban shim hi ka rai ha ka bor jong ki ban pynpoi ïa ki lad ai jingïarap kynthup wat ban sam ïa ki tiar ban shna iing kum ki tin sopiing. Ïa kane ka rai laitluid la dep ban ai ha ki Deputy Commissioner,” u la ong.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ha ka sngi U Blei, ka lyer kaba jur ryngkat u slap ka la pynjulor ïa bun bha ki iing ha Meghalaya kaba la antad kumba 200 tylli ki longiing ki la duh noh ïa ki iing ki sem jong ki.Ha kane ka jingjia, don ruh kiba la mynsaw bad bun ki jaka kiba la shong khlem bording na ka daw ka jingkhyllem ki dieng ha kiba bun ki jaka. Kane ka eriong ka la pynjot ruh wat ia ki jingthung jingtep ha kiba bun tylli ki shnong.Lada shu khein kyllum tang na kiba ïoh jingtip, la kumno kumno ki iing kiba shah pynjulor ha kane ka jingwan syllad ka eriong ki la kot sha kumba 150 tylli ei ei ne kumba hapoh 200 tylli.Tang ha Ri Bhoi District, da ki phew tylli ki longiing ki la julor ha ki thain khappud jong ka Block – II ha ka jingwan syllad ka eriong ha ka sngi U Blei ha ka por 4baje ei ei.Haba phai sha ka jingjia ha ka thaiñ Block II bad hap ha ka Raid Nongtung ha Ri Bhoi, ki lai tylli ki Shnong ki la shah kthah bha ba kynthup ïa ka Shnong Ummat I, Ummat II bad ka Shnong Nongsder ha kaba 28 tylli ki ïing ki la shah pynjulor ha ka erïong erngit ha kitei ki 3 Shnong.Kane ka eriong ka la leit ruh ban syllad ïa ki iing ki sem ha ka thain Jirang nalor kiwei kiwei ki shnong kiba don ha ka thain Ri Bhoi. Halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih bun ruh ki longïing ki la kylla khlem ïing khlem sem ha kaba katei ka erïong bajur ka la wan ban punjulor ïa ki ïing ki sem bad baroh ki jingdon jingem jong ki hapoh ki ïing ki sem.La ong ruh ba kane ka eriong ym tang ba ka punjulor ïa ki ïing ki sem, hynrei bun ki jingthung jingtep ruh ki la julor ba la don ruh ka jingïap phria ha ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi.Ha South West Khasi Hills pat la ïoh jingtip ba ka jingshah pynjulor ki iing ki sem ka la kot sha ki 68 tylli bad ki don pat kumba 39 tylli kiba shah pynjulor malu mala. Kine ki jaka ba syllad ka eriong ki kynthup ha ki thain jong ka Warsan Lyngdoh, Mawjaraiñ, Nongrim Mawpat, Pyndenumjaraiñ, Umsaw, Nongtynñiaw, New Mawjai, Nongpuiñskei, Mawnore, Mawhiangrnga, Mawkhlaitngap, Mawpat, Rangmaw, Mawsaw, Manad, Phlangdiloiñ, Wahkaji.Kane ka eriong ka la pynjulor jur ruh ïa ka skul Vesto Upper Primary School kaba don ha shnong Rangjadong ka la shah lied noh ki tin sop bad la don ki ïing briew bad ki dukan kiba la shah pynjulor malu mala.Ha West Khasi Hills ruh kumjuh ki la don da ki phew tylli ki shnong kiba la ngat lang ha katei ka apot ha ka miet 31tarik u Lber ha ka thain Ri Muliang kum ha Langpih, Tynghor, Umyiap bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong ba marjan.
title: Pynstet ki lad jingïarap sha kiba shah lyngshop mariang, bthah u CM ïa ki bor distrik

content: Khliehriat Lber 31 : Ki nongïalam jong ka United Democratic party lem bad ki nongïalam ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) hapoh ka lama jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance na ka bynta kane ka MP election, ha kane ka sngi Saitjaiñ ryngkat u kyrtong MP jong ki, Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin ki la hiar sha Khliehriat, East Jaiñtia Hills District ban ïalap election na ka bynta kane ka election MP ka ban sa long ha u bnai ïaïong.Na ka liang u MLA ka thaiñ, Bah Kyrmen Shylla haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u la kyntu ïa ki nongkyrshan jong u da kaba ong ba kumba ki pynjop donburom ïa u ki elekshon MLA ba la dep ba kin kyrshan kumjuh ïa u kyrtong ka RDA u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin uban ïa ai reng ha kane ka elekshon MP.Katba na ka liang u kyrtong, u Bah Robertjune u al ong ba ynda la jop u don shibun ka thong ban trei da kaba trei ryngkat ryngkat bad ki MLA kum ki jong u Bah Kyrmen Shylla na ka bynta ka roi ka par hapoh ka thaiñ ryngkat ka jingkyrshan lang u President ka Party, ki MLA bad MDC kiba don ha ka lama jong ka RDA.“Kaba donkam eh mynta ka dei ban ïatylli lang na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew namar ka Parliament ka lah ban ai ïa ka hok ban mane blei laitluid bad ka lah ban shim pat ïaka lada ka mon, ka lah ban ai ïa ka Sixth schedule ban ïada ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ka lah ban shim noh ïa ka lada ngi bakla, to ngin ïa sngew khia lang na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar India ka ai shibun bah ki lad pynroi ïa ki shnong ki thaw u la kyntu ïa baroh ki paidbah ban shim khia ban leit sha ki jaka thep vote da kaba buh hakhmat eh ïa ka ishu jong ka Jaidbynriew bad ka imlang sahlang kaba ka RDA ka don ïa ka thong.Haba kren shaphang ka jingïakynnoh jingïakynthoh iwei ïa iwei utei u kyrtong jong ka RDA u la ong, “Kum ka jaitbynriew tipbriew tipblei nga sngew ban ong ba ka long kaba sang ban shu ïakynnoh bad kynthoh klumar da kumne da kumtai, to ngin ïa treilang ban ïoh ïa ka synshar kahdar kaba khuid bad ai ba ngin sdang ïa kane na lade hi da ki kam ba ngi long kiba khuid ba suba, don ki briew kiba sngew khuid haduh katta katta bad ki pyrshang ruh ban pynshisha ïa kata da kaba shu beiñ bad kynnoh ïa kiwei pat ba ki dei ki nongtuh, ki nongbamsap bad ki nongbam klop. Ki ong lada jied ïa ki kin wanrah ïa ka synshar khadar kaba khuid hynrei ka ktien kaba ki kren bad ki kam ba ki leh ka la dei lypa ka bym khuid naduh ba sdang, namar ban shu kynnoh ïa kiwei khlem ka sakhi satar khlem jingpynshisha ka long kaei kaei ka bym khuid naduh ba sdang, hato phi shaniah kum ïa kita?Ngi kum ka RDA ngi kular ban wanrah ïa ka synshar khadar kaba khuid ka long da kawei na ki kam kaba ngan leh lada nga jop kum u MP jong phi bad kata ka long ba ha man la ki district ngin buh ïa ki kynhun ba hakhmat eh da ki riew paidbah ki ban peit ïa ki MP skim jong nga bad nga pyntina ba kan nym don ka jingbakla hangno hangno ruh, ngam beiñ ngam kynnoh ngam kynthoh ïano ïano ruh, rangbah ba donburom kam dei ka burom ka akor ïa ngi kum ki rangbah ban shu kynnoh klumar to da ïa tyngkan ïa ka ktien ka thylliej namar ha kawei ka por para khasi khara para Hynñiewtrep ngi hap ban ieng lang ha kawei ka sngi ban ïada ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew jong ngi” ong u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin.Utei u kyrtong u la kren ruh shaphang ka direct Funding kumba ïoh lem ki jylla kiba ha ki ri thor, kiba la lah ban pyntrei ïa ki kam pynroi ha ki shnong ki thaw jong ki, ki nongsynshar shnong ruh ki ïoh jingsiew, katba ka jylla Meghalaya pat kam pat shym la ïoh ïa kane ka direct funding, ki rangbah shnong bunsien ki hap ban pynlut pisa na pla ban pynïaid ïa ki kam ki jam hapoh shnong, u la ong ba lada u jop kum u MP un ïakren halor kane ka direct funding khnang ba ki shnong ki thaw kin ïoh ïa ka roi ka par bad ki rangbah shnong kin ïoh ïa ki jingsiew bapher bapher.U la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngew khia halor ka jingshah thombor ki nongrep ha ka dor ka mur, u la ong ba ki nongrep ki mad jingeh, ki donkam ïa ka jingïarap jong ka sorkar ban wanrah ïa kata ka minimum support price, u kular ruh ban ïakren halor ki jingeh jong ki nongtrei Asha, ki Aganwadi, ki nonghikai skul bad ki kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei kiba mad jingeh.U la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban don ka jingsngew thaiñ, sngew niam, sngew balang bad ong ba kim dei ban ïa pharia para ma ki. “Ngan burom ruh ïa baroh ki jingngeit, lada poi sha ka thong ngin ïakren bad ka sorkar India ba ki niam trai ri jong ngi, seng ki Seiñ Raij kin ïoh noh ïa ka minority status ha ka ri India, kum ka RDA ngi ieng halor ka nongrim ban ïada ïa ka jingmane Blei laitluid ha ka ri India, ngi la ïohi ïa ka jingshah thombor ki niam kristan kum ha Manipur, ha Assam bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka.“Ngi pyrshah ïa ka jingphah kren Hindi jubor, ïa ka jingpynbor ban pdiang tang ïa kawei ka niam, ka jingkhang ban bam doh masi bad kiwei kiwei ki kyndon kiba ngim sngew ïahap, nga kular ban ieng ban ïada ïa ka riti ka dustur bad jinglong kyrpang ka ri bad jaitbyniew” u la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngew khia ba ha kine ki sngi ki la don ki kynhun kiba la sdang mutdur ban pynduh pyndam ïa ki riti ki dustur.U la ong ruh ba lada u poi sha ka thong kum u MP, un kren halor ka mat ban ïada ïa ki nongtih mar pohkhyndew, ban long trai halor ka khydew ka shyiap ban ïasaid ruh ban weng noh ïa ka MMDR Act na ka jylla Meghalaya ban pyntikna ba kum kine ki aiñ kiba ïatyngkhuh ïa ka jinglong trai halor ka khyndw ka shyiap dei ban pynbeit noh ïa kata ka jingeh.
title: Hiar ki nongïalam ka UDP bad HSPDP sha Khliehriat ban ïalap elekshon ïa u kyrtong RDA  Khliehriat Lber 31 : Ki nongïalam jong ka United Democratic party lem bad ki nongïalam ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) hapoh ka lama jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance na ka bynta kane ka MP election, ha kane ka sngi Saitjaiñ ryngkat u kyrtong MP jong ki, Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin ki la hiar sha Khliehriat, East Jaiñtia Hills District ban ïalap election na ka bynta kane ka election MP ka ban sa long ha u bnai ïaïong. 	Na ka liang u MLA ka thaiñ, Bah Kyrmen Shylla haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u la kyntu ïa ki nongkyrshan jong u da kaba ong ba kumba ki pynjop donburom ïa u ki elekshon MLA ba la dep ba kin kyrshan kumjuh ïa u kyrtong ka RDA u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin uban ïa ai reng ha kane ka elekshon MP. 	Katba na ka liang u kyrtong, u Bah Robertjune u al ong ba ynda la jop u don shibun ka thong ban trei da kaba trei ryngkat ryngkat bad ki MLA kum ki jong u Bah Kyrmen Shylla na ka bynta ka roi ka par hapoh ka thaiñ ryngkat ka jingkyrshan lang u President ka Party, ki MLA bad MDC kiba don ha ka lama jong ka RDA.  	“Kaba donkam eh mynta ka dei ban ïatylli lang na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew namar ka Parliament ka lah ban ai ïa ka hok ban mane blei laitluid bad ka lah ban shim pat ïaka lada ka mon, ka lah ban ai ïa ka Sixth schedule ban ïada ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ka lah ban shim noh ïa ka lada ngi bakla, to ngin ïa sngew khia lang na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew,” u la ong. 	U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar India ka ai shibun bah ki lad pynroi ïa ki shnong ki thaw u la kyntu ïa baroh ki paidbah ban shim khia ban leit sha ki jaka thep vote da kaba buh hakhmat eh ïa ka ishu jong ka Jaidbynriew bad ka imlang sahlang kaba ka RDA ka don ïa ka thong. 	Haba kren shaphang ka jingïakynnoh jingïakynthoh iwei ïa iwei utei u kyrtong jong ka RDA u la ong, “Kum ka jaitbynriew tipbriew tipblei nga sngew ban ong ba ka long kaba sang ban shu ïakynnoh bad kynthoh klumar da kumne da kumtai, to ngin ïa treilang ban ïoh ïa ka synshar kahdar kaba khuid bad ai ba ngin sdang ïa kane na lade hi da ki kam ba ngi long kiba khuid ba suba, don ki briew kiba sngew khuid haduh katta katta bad ki pyrshang ruh ban pynshisha ïa kata da kaba shu beiñ bad kynnoh ïa kiwei pat ba ki dei ki nongtuh, ki nongbamsap bad ki nongbam klop. Ki ong lada jied ïa ki kin wanrah ïa ka synshar khadar kaba khuid hynrei ka ktien kaba ki kren bad ki kam ba ki leh ka la dei lypa ka bym khuid naduh ba sdang, namar ban shu kynnoh ïa kiwei khlem ka sakhi satar khlem jingpynshisha ka long kaei kaei ka bym khuid naduh ba sdang, hato phi shaniah kum ïa kita? 	Ngi kum ka RDA ngi kular ban wanrah ïa ka synshar khadar kaba khuid ka long da kawei na ki kam kaba ngan leh lada nga jop kum u MP jong phi bad kata ka long  ba ha man la ki district ngin buh ïa ki kynhun ba hakhmat eh  da ki riew paidbah ki ban peit ïa ki MP skim jong nga bad nga pyntina ba kan nym don ka jingbakla hangno hangno ruh, ngam beiñ ngam kynnoh ngam kynthoh ïano ïano ruh, rangbah ba donburom kam dei ka burom ka akor ïa ngi kum ki rangbah ban shu kynnoh klumar to da ïa tyngkan ïa ka ktien ka thylliej namar ha kawei ka por para khasi khara para Hynñiewtrep ngi hap ban ieng lang ha kawei ka sngi ban ïada ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew jong ngi” ong u bah Robertjune  Kharjahrin. 	Utei u kyrtong u la kren ruh shaphang ka direct Funding kumba ïoh lem ki jylla kiba ha ki ri thor, kiba la lah ban pyntrei ïa ki kam pynroi ha ki shnong ki thaw jong ki, ki nongsynshar shnong ruh ki ïoh jingsiew, katba ka jylla Meghalaya pat kam pat shym la ïoh ïa kane ka direct funding, ki rangbah shnong bunsien ki hap ban pynlut pisa na pla ban pynïaid ïa ki kam ki jam hapoh shnong, u la ong ba lada u jop kum u MP un ïakren halor kane ka direct funding khnang ba ki shnong ki thaw kin ïoh ïa ka roi ka par bad ki rangbah shnong kin ïoh ïa ki jingsiew bapher bapher. 	U la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngew khia halor ka jingshah thombor ki nongrep ha ka dor ka mur, u la ong ba ki nongrep ki mad jingeh, ki donkam ïa ka jingïarap jong ka sorkar ban wanrah ïa kata ka minimum support price, u kular ruh ban ïakren halor ki jingeh jong ki nongtrei Asha, ki   Aganwadi, ki nonghikai skul bad ki kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei kiba mad jingeh. 	 U la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban don ka jingsngew thaiñ,  sngew niam, sngew balang bad ong ba kim dei ban ïa pharia para ma ki. “Ngan burom ruh ïa baroh ki jingngeit, lada poi sha ka thong ngin ïakren bad ka sorkar India ba ki niam trai ri jong ngi, seng ki Seiñ Raij kin ïoh noh ïa ka minority status ha ka ri India, kum ka RDA ngi ieng halor ka nongrim ban ïada ïa ka jingmane Blei laitluid ha ka ri India, ngi la ïohi ïa ka jingshah thombor ki niam kristan kum ha Manipur, ha Assam bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka. 	“Ngi pyrshah ïa ka jingphah kren Hindi jubor, ïa ka jingpynbor ban pdiang tang ïa kawei ka niam, ka jingkhang ban bam doh masi bad kiwei kiwei ki kyndon kiba ngim sngew ïahap, nga kular ban ieng ban ïada ïa ka riti ka dustur bad jinglong kyrpang ka ri bad jaitbyniew” u la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngew khia ba ha kine ki sngi ki la don ki kynhun kiba la sdang mutdur ban pynduh pyndam ïa ki riti ki dustur. 	U la ong ruh ba lada u poi sha ka thong kum u MP, un kren halor ka mat ban ïada ïa ki nongtih mar pohkhyndew, ban long trai halor ka khydew ka shyiap ban ïasaid ruh ban weng noh ïa ka MMDR Act na ka jylla Meghalaya ban pyntikna ba kum kine ki aiñ kiba ïatyngkhuh ïa ka jinglong trai halor ka khyndw ka shyiap  dei ban pynbeit noh ïa kata ka jingeh.

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 31: Ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM), East Jaiñtia Hills District hapoh ka jingïalam u samla Comingsoon Dkhar bad u Vice President, u samla Bormi Ryngkhlem myn ha ka miet jong ka 29 tarik u lber ki la ioh bat ïa ki nongñiah trok kiba ñiah ïa ki kali ba kit Gas (LPG Gas) katba ki dang pyndap lyer (Gas) ha ki tyndong Gas ha rud ka surok National Highway 6 ha Tuber Tahkhniang, East Jaiñtia Hills District bad ong ba kane ka jingleh kitei ki nongñiah trok LPG ka long kaba beaiñ bad kaba buh jingma ïa ka jingim briew.La ong ba ki la don haduh san tylli ki trok ba kit LPG kiba ieng ha Tuber Tahkhñiang kiba die beaiñ ïa ki Gas sha ki briew.Kitei ki nongïalam jong ka seng lem bad ki dkhot kiba la ïa don lang ha katei ka miet, ki la pynpaw ka jingsngew khia halor kane ka jingleh beaiñ kitei ki nongñiah trok LPG kiba dei ruh ki ar jylla, namar lada shu pyndap lyer kumne ka lah ban buh jingma bha ïa kito kiba pyndonkam ïa ki tyndong lyer ba shet jingshet bad lehse ioh kam wanrah ruh kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih.Ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka seng ki kyntu jur ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei da lei lei ruh ban thied beaiñ ïa ki Lyer ne Gas na ki kali ba kit LPG namar kane ka buh jingma ïa ka jingim briew.Ka seng ka maham jur ïa baroh ki nongñiah kiba ñiah ïa ki trok ba kit LPG Gas ba kim dei da leilei ruh ban shu die beaiñ ïa ki LPG Gas ha surok bad lada lap biang sa shisien ka seng kan leh da kaba tyngeh bad kan aiti ruh sha ki bor jong ka aiñ bad ruh lada jia kano kano kaba sngewsih kiba ñiah trok LPG Gas kiba die beaiñ ïa ki Gas ki dei ban shim îa ka jingkitkhlieh.
title: Bat ka HANM ïa ki nongñiah trok kali kit LPG kiba die be-aiñ ïa ki tyndong Gas

content: Jowai, Lber 31: Ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) West Jaiñtia Zone ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la beh krad syndon ïa ki 7 ngut ki bar jylla kiba wan ban ñiat rong ha kawei ka Petrol Pump By-Pass kaba don ha Khleihtyrchi West Jaiñtia Hills District.U Publicity ka seng u samla Salmon Rymbai ha u kyrwoh u la ong ba kane ka jingleit beh ïa ki bar jylla ka dei na ka daw ba kim biang satia ïa ki kot ki sla ban pynshisha halor ka jingïoh jingbit jong ki ban wan trei shapoh ka Jylla.
title: Beh ka HNYF ïa ki bar jylla ba ñiad rong ha Petrol Pump

content: Nongpoh, Lber 31: Ka jingangnud jong uwei u samla naka thaiñ Umroi ban seng kam bad ban ïeng hala ki jong ki kjat, ka dei ka khubor kaba ai mynsiem ïakiba bun ki khun samla ha kane ka juk ba mynta ba kim dei ban duh jingkyrmen than haka jingim namar ka lad ka lynti hi ka wan lada u briew u trei shitom bad minot.Une u dei u samla Pynhun Rynghang naka shnong Umroi Nongrah, da ka jingïai shah bad ka jingtrei shitom utei u samla u la lah ban plie paidbah syndon da kawei ka iing basa kaba u la ai kyrteng Red Rose Resort kaba don haka shnong Umroi Umden Umsaitprah, ha syndah jong ka kad liengsuiñ Umroi Airport bad ïa katei ka ïing basa la wan ban plie da u Bah RR Kharbuki MDC ka Umroi.Na ka liang u samla Pynhun Rynghang u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw ba u la lah ban pynurlong ïaka jingangnud jong u kaba la slem ban plie ïa katei ka iing basa kaba long ruh ka jaka kaba u lah ban aikam ïa kiba bun ki khun samla.“Mynshuwa nga dei u nongwad kam hynrei mynta lyngba ka jingkyrkhu u Blei nga la lah ban ieng hala ki jong ki kjat bad ioh ruh ban ai kam kylla ïaki para samla ha kane ka juk kyrduh kam” la ong u Samla Pynhun da kaba bynrap ruh ba ha katei ka Red Rose Resort ki don ruh ki samla kiba la trei shabar ka jylla kum ka Oberoi Hotel ban sah jngai nala iing hynrei mynta kim donkam shuh ban leit phai sha ri thor bad ban leit jngai hynrei ka long ka lad ïaki ban trei hala ka jong ka jaka. Ha kane ka jaka ki don ki jaka sah naka bynta ki longiing, ki jaka bam, jaka jngi bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Mynshuwa nga dei u nongwad kam mynta nga la lah ban ai kam pynban ïa ki khun samla

content: This is a test post.
title: Test Post

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 31: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council West Khasi Hills District ha ryngkat ka HYC Ri Muliang Circle, hapoh ka jingïalam u samla Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh President HYC West Khasi Hills District, ki nongïalam ka Circle samla Disterborlin Waniang President bad samla Shaiñborlin Syiemlieh General Secretary, ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ki la hiar ha ka shnong Langja ban ïarap ïa u Heprit Isboklang Waniang 12 snem ka karta na katei ka shnong.Utei u Heprit u la shah bat ha ki waïar light line heh ha katei ka shnong ha ka 23 tarik u Lber 2024, ha ka por ba u leit siat sim ha khlaw hapoh shnong, namar ki wire ki ïajan palat ha u maw u ba ki khynnah ki ju kiew. Hateng Hateng ki tbian eh ka sa poi ha uta u pud bad mynsaw jur ha ki bynta jong ka kti, kjat bad khlieh utei u khynnah.Ha ka jingleit sngew lem da ka seng, la ïoh ban pynlong ka jingïalang lyngkot ha katei ka Ïing ka kmie utei u khynnah, ka kong Ribelti Waniang bad la pynïaid da u samla Disterborlin Waniang President katei ka Circle, u ba la ong ka seng ka dap da jingsngewdiaw haba ïohi ïa kane bad kan sah leh kaba donkam.U samla Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh President HYC West Khasi Hills District, u la ong, “Mar ïa ïoh jingtip ïa kane nga la duh thiah duh dem shisha bad lyngba ka jingplie lad u Blei, ngi wan mynta ban ïarap ïa phi da ka ba ïa lum u synñiang na ki para dkhot ka seng. Kumba ong ka ktien u Blei ka dei ka hukum U Blei ban ïarap lem ban ieid paralok, khamtam ïa ki paradoh parasnam. Ka ktien U Blei ka ong Jeremaïah 33:6 ‘Ha khmih ngan wallam ha ka, ka jingkoit jingkhiah bad ngan pynkhiah ïa ki’.“Ngi ka HYC ngi wan hangne ban kitbok ïa phi hep, phin ïoh jingïarap na U Blei ngi shu ïarap kum ka dak kaba rit eh bad ngin ïai duwai lem, ba phin ïoh ka met kaba koit khiah noh kaba U Blei un ïarap”, u la ong.U la ong ruh, “Ngi ka HYC ngi kyrpad ruh ïa ka tnad bording MePDCL ban ïarap lem ïa utei u khynnah rit bad ban peit bha ïa baroh ki wire khnang ban leit na ka jingsngewsih ki doh ki snam jong ngi”.
title: Leit sngew lem ka HYC ïa u heprit ba shah bat bording ha Langja

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 31: U Bah Nondi Diengngan MDC barim bad ba nyngkong eh na ka seng Congress ha Nongstoiñ, u la phai biang sha ka party hadien 26 snem tam ba um don shuh bad ka seng.Ïa ka jingwan phai biang jong u sha ka Congress, la pdiang sngewbha da ki nongïalam ba hakhmat ka party ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Congress Bhavan Nongstoiñ ha ka sngi saitjaiñ.Haba ai jingkren ha ka jingïalang pdiang burom u Bah Nondi Diengngan u la pynpaw ba ka jingwan phai jong u sha ka Congress, kam dei satia na ka bynta kano kano ka myntoi shimet lane ban don da kino kino kiwei pat ki jingthmu. Hynrei, naduh ba u la long u MDC na kane ka party bad hadien ki 26 snem tam jong ka jingïaid lynti, u ïohi ba dei tang ka Congress party kaba lah ban ai ka jingshakri kaba hun sha ki paidbah.“Ngam shym rung sha ka party da ka jingmut ban ïoh ei ei, hynrei haba nga peit bad pynshong nongrim bha, nga ïohi bad sngewthuh shai ba dei tang ka Congress hi kaba lah ban ai ka jingshakri kaba pynhun ïa baroh ha baroh kawei ka ri”, u la ong.“Lada phai sha ka shongsuk shong saiñ khamtam eh dei tang ka Congress hi kaba lah ban ai jinghun sha ki nongshong shnong ka ri. Lada ngin ïakren ïa ka niam ka rukom bad jingmane Blei, ka riti dustur, ka jinglong tynrai bad jinglong kyrpang, dei tang ka Congress kaba ai laitluid khlem ñiew shilliang khmat”.“Dei lyngba ka jingïalam bad jingsynshar ka sorkar Congress ba ngi ïoh ïa la ka Jylla ha ka por ka (L) Mrs Indira Gandhi. Ngi ïoh ïa ka District Council ruh lyngba ka sorkar Congress ha ka por jong u (L) J.J.M Nichols Roy. Nangta ki matti ba khraw kum ka NEIGRIHMS, ka NEHU bad kiwei kiwei ruh, dei lyngba ka sorkar jong ka Congress ba ngi ïoh”, u la ong.“Lada ngi phai sha baroh ki seng saiñ pyrthei, dei tang ka Congress kaba pynïoh ha ngi ïa ka jinglaitluid ba shisha. Dei halor kine ki nongrim ba nga phai biang sha ka party da ka jingkyrmen bad jingtrei shitom ban pynïoh pat ïa ka burom jong ka party”, u la ong.U Bah Gabriel Wahlang MLA ba nyngkong eh na ka party Congress ha Nongstoiñ, u ba bat ruh mynta kum u MDC, haba ai jingkren pdiang burom, u la pynpaw ïa ki kyntien sngew burom jingai khublei kyrpang bad kyrmen ba kane ka jingwan pynïasoh biang jong u ne u rangbah, kan nang ai mynsiem ïa u kum u MLA bad ïa ka party hi baroh kawei, ba kin lah ban trei bha na ka bynta ka Constituency baroh kawei.“Nga ngeit skhem ba kane ka jingwan pynïasoh jong phi ka long ka dak jingkyrmen ba ngin lah ban pynjop don burom ïa I Bah Vincent Pala ha kane ka elekshon MP. Ka jingjop I ma Pala kyrmen ba yn ïoh ban synshar noh ïa ka ri da ka Congress, khnang ba ka shong suk shong saiñ kan wan phai bïang bad ka ban long ruh ka jingkyrmen khamtam ïa ngi ki rit paid”, ong u Bah Gabriel.Kiwei kiwei kiba donlang ha kane ka jingïalang ki long Bah N.Nongdkhar MDC barim ka Nongstoiñ u ba pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang, Bah Bormanding Nonglang District President, ki riew rangbah nongïalam ba hakhmat jong ka party, I kong Lila Nongkhar iwei na ki nongïalam na ka liang ki kynthei, nangta ki nongïalam jong ki samla Congress na Nongstoiñ bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Hadien 26 snem kyrtiang dien biang u MDC barim ka Nongstoiñ sha ka Congress

content: Shillong, Lber 31 : U Returning Officer jong ka Shillong Parliamentary constituency, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la pynbna paidbah ïa ka shap (symbol) jong ki arngut ki kyrtong shimet kiba aireng ha kane ka elekshon MP na kane ka constituency nalor kiwei ki kyrtong ba aireng na ki party ba la ithuh da ka Election Commission jong ka Ri.U Prof Lakhon Kma u la ïoh da ka shap jong u shang soh (basket containing fruits) katba u Bah Peter Shallam pat u la ïoh da ka shap jong u Mawlynnai (Diamond).Ki shap jong kiwei pat ki kyrtong ki kynthup ïa ka Dr. M Ampareen Lyngdoh jong ka NPP ha ka shap jong ka ‘kot’, nangta u Dr. Ricky A Syngkon na ka VPP ha ka shap jong u ‘prah’, u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin jong ka UDP ha ka shap jong ka ‘bom’ bad u kyrtong ka Congress Bah Vincent H Pala ha ka shap jong ka ‘kti’.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka tarik ba khatduh ba ki kyrtong ki lah ban weng kyrteng kadei ha kane ka sngi Saitjain, ka 30tarik u Lber hynrei ym shym la don u/kawei ruh ki kyrtong ban weng kyrteng.Haba phai pat sha ka elekshon ha Tura Parliamentary constituency, ki don saw ngut ki kyrtong, kynthup naduh ka kyrtong jong ka NPP ka Agatha Sangma, nangta u kyrtong jong ka Congress, u Saleng A Sangma, u kyrtong ka TMC u Zenith Sangma bad u kyrtong shimet, u Labenn Ch Marak.
title: Da u ‘mawlynnai’ bad u ‘shang’ ioh ki kyrtong shimet ha ka elekshon MP

content: Nongpoh, Lber 31 : Kum shi bynta na ka jingrakhe ïa ka World No Tobacco Day ban ïalap sha ki paidbah na ka jingma jong ka jingdih duma ne bam duma, ka St. Paul’s Higher Secondary School Nongpoh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynlong da ka jingïaid paidbah na St. Paul’s School sha Pahamsyiem bad pynkut biang ha phylla jong ka skul na ka bynta ban ïalap halor ka jingktah jong ka jingdih duma ne bam duma.Shuwa ban pynlong ïa ka jingïaid paidbah ki bor pynïaid skul ki la pynlong shuwa ïa ka prokram ai jinghikai sha ki khynnah skul halor ka jingma jong ka jingdih duma bad bam duma ha phyllaw jong ka skul ba la ai jingkren da ki nonghikai bad hadien kata ki la bteng da kaba ïaid paidbah ban rah la ki placard, ki banner bad ryngkat ki jingthoh kiba pyrshah bad pynsngew sha ki paidbah ba u duma u dei uwei na u jingdih ba sniew kaba ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah.Na ka liang ki khynnah skul, haba ïaid paidbah ha ka surokbah ha Nongpoh ki la pyrta shla lyngba ki jingtoh bapher bapher bad khamtam ka kyntien ba ngim dei ban dih ne bam duma, naba kane ka ktah shisha ïa ka koit ka khiah jong u briew ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka met.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi, u Babu David Muktieh, Assistant Teacher katei ka skul, u la ong ba ki bor pynïaid ka skul ki la pynlong ïa kane ka jingïaid paidbah ka long ban ïalap pyrshah halor ka jingma jong ka jingktah u duma bad kum ki bor pynïaid skul ki la pynsgewthuh sha ki khynnah skul bad kumjuh ruh sha ki paidbah kaba long ruh shi bynta ka jingrakhe ïa ka World No Tobacco Day.U la kren ruh ba ka jingdih duma ne bam duma ka ktah shisha ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki briew bad dei namar kane ka daw kum ka skul ka ïalap pyrshah ïa u duma bad da kaba kyntu ruh ïa ki khynnah ba kim dei ban ktah ïa u duma ne kiwei kiwei ki jingdih kiba sniew namar kane ka ktah ïa ki ym tang ha ka koit ka khiah bad kumjuh ruh ha ki liang baroh.Shuh shuh, kum u nonghikai skul u la kyntu ruh ïa ki khynnah ba ki dei ban long ki nongrah khubor bad ruh ki nongpynsaphriang ïa ka khubor halor ka jingma jong ka jingdih ne bam duma, namar kine ki ktah ym tang ïa kito kiba dih nem bam duma bad ka ktah ruh ïa kiwei kiba ym dih duma ba kum ki khynnah skul ki hap ban bteng ban ïalap halor ka jingktah u duma ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ngi, u la bynrap.
title: Da ka rally ïalap ki Khynnah skul ka St. Paul’s HSS ïa ka jingma na ka jingdih bad bam duma

content: Shillong, Lber 31: Ka khubor ba la ïoh na ki pulit la ïathuh ba ka Kong Sanmillian Mawrie ka la phah ïa ka jingujor ba ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 2.30 mynstep, ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la tuh ïa ka thuk thuk jong ka kaba don u nombar ML-05W-9257 napoh ka jaka sah jong ka kaba ha Laitkor Kseh Bilat, Shillong.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba u Fr. Genesius Wanñiang u la phah ïa ka jingujor ba ha ka 25 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 10.30 mynmied, ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la prong jubor hapoh ka jaka ba dang shna ïa ka ïing kaba hapoh ka BOSCO Integrated Development Society (BIDS) ha Nongthymmai, Shillong bad ki la tuh ïa ki wire bad ki tiar wiring kiba shongdor kumba T. 1 lak.
title: Shah tuh ka thuk thuk bad tiar na BIDS

content: Shillong, Lber 31: Ka ding kaba lah Klang jur bha ka la bam duh ïa kawei ka Ïing hapoh ka shnong Kuliang ha ka 30 tarik mynta u bnai haduh ba kan da kylla Dpei lut.Ka khubor kaba lah ïoh la ïathuh ba kadei ka ïing jong u Bah Wanmon Pohshna bad uba dang don ruh ki khun kiba dang rit kumba 5 ngut bad iwei ba dang shibnai shiteng ka rta.Shuh shuh ka khubor ka ïathuh ruh ba kane ka jingjia pluh ïing ka la jia ha ka por kumba 1.30 baje nohphaisngi ha kaba ym don mano mano ruh ha ïing.La ong ba baroh ki jingdon jingem kiba don hapoh ka ïing ki la ingkhong lut ba kynthup ïa ki marrep ba dei u kwai.Na ka liang jong u ula kyrpad ïa kiba don ka mon babha ba kynthup ïa ka sorkar bad kiwei ban ïarap lem ïa u khnang ba un ïoh ban shna biang ïa ka ïing kaba u la duh noh.
title: Bamduh ka ding ïa kawei ka ïing ha Kuliang

content: Shillong, Lber 31: Ki Pulit ka North Garo Hills haka miet 30 tarik mynta u bnai, ki la ïoh ban pyllait im ïa uwei u nongbylla sngi uba shah rahbor ha ka kynhun ki runar.ïa une u nongbylla ba shah rahbor la tip kum u Leeku G Momin 26 snem ka rta bad la rahbor ïa u katba u dang ïoh thiah ha ka ïing ha Nokpante ha kaba kumba 7-8 ngut ki runnar kila rung bad rahbor ïa u.Haba ïoh jingtip ïa kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ka North Garo Hills haka jingïatreilang bad ki CRPF jong ka 120 Bn kila pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra haki katto katne jaka.Ki Pulit kila lah ban tip ïa ka jaka ba u shah rahbor bad kila ïoh pyllait ïa u na kawei ka khlaw kaba don ha ka shnong A’brong.“Ka jingthwet ban lap ïaki ba donkti ba rahbor ka dang ïaid shaid shaid bad ym lah ban kyntait ba ka lah ban don ka jingïashun hapdeng u lanot bad kiba rahbor. Ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid” la ong u Bruno A Sangma u superintendent of police ka North Garo Hills.
title: ïoh pyllait im ki pulit ïa uwei u nongbylla ba shah rahbor

content: Mynsngi Saitjaiñ 30 tarik u bnai Lber nga la long kaba donbok eh ban ïoh ïa don bynta bad ka riti shad kaba na ka Dorbar Raij Nongpoh ïa kaba la ai kyrteng ka Shad Sajer. Kane ka jingshad la pynim biang hadien 20 snem namar ba ym don shuh ki longshuwa ki ban leh niam leh rukom da ka jingkñia jingkhan kumba ju leh naduh mynhyndai.U Lyngdoh kane ka Raij U Rangbah Linus Lyngdoh u la batai ba hadien ba la bun kiba long niam Kristan ym don shuh kiba nang ban duwai ban phirat kumba dei ban leh bad dei namar kata ka daw ba la shu dam noh ka jingshad Sajer.Haba la kylli bha na ki rangbah, khamtam kito kiba lah kham heh ka rta kiba batai ba kane ka jingleh kmen da ki jingshad bun rukom bad ki riam kiba ishongkun haduh katta katta na ki 7 dorbar kiba hapoh ka raij Nongpoh ka dei kaba ju pynlong haba kut ka tlang bad sdang ka pynrem khnang ban ainguh ïa U Blei nongbuh nongthaw bad ïa ka Mei Mariang ruh na ka bynta u soh nyngkong lane ki mar rep kiba kheit bad ot nyngkong eh. Kane ka jinglong ban sngewnguh ïa ka mei mariang na ka bynta ka jingseisoh ka bri ka patha kba ka long kaei kaei kaba tehsong ïa ngi kum ki Khasi ka bri u Hynñiewtrep.Sngewsih ba kane ka jingïadei kaba jan eh bad ka Mei Mariang imat ka la dkut noh hadien ba la long niam Kristan bad namar ki jinghikai kiba ong ba lada ngi dang ïaleh niam leh rukom kaba katkum ka riti ka dustur (cultural practices) kata ka mut ba ngi mane ïa ka mariang ne ïa kiwei pat ki blei. Tip kumno mangi ngi shah ïalam bakla ba dei ban iehnoh ïa ka jingngeit kaba la hiar pateng na ki longshuwa manshuwa shisien ba lah long niam.Toi ka niam ka dei ka jingngeit shimet jong u ne ka briew. Ka niam aïu aïu ruh ka ïarap ban pynïajan ïa u briew bad u Blei. Ki riti ki dustur jong ngi pat ki dei kiba tehsong ïangi kum ka jaitbynriew. Lada ngi iehnoh ban bud ïa ki riti ki dustur ïa kaba ngi khot ka kolshor (culture) kiba hikai ïa ngi shibun eh ki jinghikai kiba nylla tang namar ba lah kylla Kristan te ka long kaba bakla. Kum kaba dei na ka thymmei jinglong Khasi nga burom ïa ki jinghikai ki longshuwa manshuwa wat la nga long Kristan namar kine ki jinghikai ki dei kiba batai ïa ngi kumno ban im ïa ka jingim kaba bha bad kaba lait na ki kam sniew bad kam dusmon ïa ki para briew.Ka nongrim jong ka jinghikai ba ngi ïoh na ki longshuwa manshuwa jong ngi ka ong ba ngi dei ban ieid ïa la ka jong bad burom ïa ka jong kiwei. Kawei ka jinghikai kaba kongsan tam ka long ba ngi im ha kane ka pyrthei ban kamai ïa ka hok lane ban kamai hok. Ban kamai hok ka mut ban bam tang ïa kata kaba ngi kamai da ka umsyep la jong. Hynrei mynta pat ngi shem ba kiba bun ki tuh na ka sorkar ha ki bun rukom. U kontrak u ai da ka jingkheiñ kaba la shu pynheh namar u hap siew pisa ïa u engineer bad ïa u minister PWD. Namarkata ki surok bad ki lynti ki syngkien ki jot ki pei haduh ba ym lah batai shuh. Ka niam aïu lane ka riti ka dustur aïu eh kane kaba hikai ïa kiba bun ba kin shu im suk da kaba kamai tang da ka jingbamsap? Ka jinghikai jong u Khasi hyndai ka ong ba uba bam ïa ka umsyep kiwei un shah kyrtoh kylla.Hynrei mynta ka jingbam sap ka la kiew haduh u ñiuhmat bad ym I lah shuh ban pynduh ïa kane ka bih kaba la bam kruiñ ïa ka jaitbynriew Khasi.Bunsien haba ngi pynlong ïa ki jingshad bad jinglehkmen kiba dei shibynta bad ka ka riti ka dustur Khasi, ngi pynleit jingmut palat tang ha ka riam ka beit bad ka shad ka kmen. Hooid kine ki long kiba donkam ban tyngkai khnang ban im ka burom bad sah ka nam ba ngi long ka jaitbynriew kaba riewspah ha ka liang ka kolshor hynrei kaba kham kongsan ka long ban tih bad wad ïa ki jinghikai ki longshuwa manshuwa. Aïu ki don ban kyntu ïa ngi ba ngin im hok im sot ban lait na ka raibi?Ka jingeh ka long ba kine ki jinghikai baroh ki don tang ha ki kyntien ïa kiba ngim shim ka jingbuh jingthoh namar ba ngi dang ïoh ïa u dak thoh tang ha u snem 1841 hadien ba la pynmih ïa ki da u sahep Thomas Jones uwei na ki nongïalap niam Kristan uba shitrhem bha.Katba ngi da sdang ban thoh bun na ki riewstad Khasi jong ngi ki la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei. Ka histori kaba ngi don ka dei kaba la thoh da ki phareng hadien ba ki wan sha kine ki lum Khasi jong ngi hadien u snem 1826 hadien ba ki la pynrem thma ïa ki nong Burma. Ka jaitbynriew Khasi ka la don lypa ha kane ka pyrthei lah palat 57,000 snem mynshuwa. Naduh kita ki por hato ngim don ki riewstad kiba ai ha ngi ïa ka riti ka dustur kaba ngi dang ïai bud haduh kine ki sngi?Ka long kaba bakla ban ong ba dei tang kiba dang bat ïa ka niam Khasi paka kiba dei hok ban kam trai ïa ka riti ka dustur Khasi. Ki don bun ki Khasi kiba ym don hapoh ka Seng Khasi namar ba ki Khasi naduh hyndai hynthai kim don satia ka kynhun niam (religion). Ki mane ïa u Blei kumba ki sngewthuh da kaba khan ba kñia ha lum ha wah. Ka Seng Khasi ka dei kaba dang sdang ha u snem 1899 bad la seng ïa ka da u Babu Jeebon Roy Mairom khnang ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka riti ka dustur Khasi namar ba la don ka jingma na ka jinghikai niam Kristan ba dei ban iehnoh ïa ki riti ki dustur kiba ngi bat katba ngim pat long Kristan.Hooid ym lah ban len ba ka jingwan ki mishonari Kristan ka la ïarap ha ka ban tei ïa ki skul bad jaka sumar kiba biang ha ka por ba ym pat don ki skul sha kine ki lum jong ngi. Wat kiba dei na ka niam tynrai ruh ki bun kiba ïoh jinghikai na kine ki skul. Te ïa kane ngi sngewnguh ïa ki mishonari Kristan hynrei ngi la dei ban phai biang sha ka riti ka dustur kaba hikai bad kyntu ïa ngi ban tyngkai ïa ka mariang namar ka dei kaba ai jingim, ai mynsiem ïa ngi. Ka jinglong Kristan I kumba ka la pyndkut noh ïa kane jingïadei kaba jan eh jong ngi ki briew bad ka mariang. Lada ka mariang ka ïap mangi ruh ngin ïap lang noh. Kan myntoi aïu kata ka jinglehniam kaba ym kheiñ kor shuh ïa ka riti ka dustur kaba la pynshong nongrim barabor ha ka khyndew ka shyiap, ki lum ki wah, ki mrad ki mreng bad ki syntiew ki skud.Ka por ka la dei eh ba ngin ïa phai dien noh sha la ki jong ki riti ki dustur ha man la ki raij bad haba ngi pynim ïa ka shad ka kmen ai ba ngin da kynmaw de ïa ki jinghikai kiba long ki mawlynnai kiba ki longshuwa ki la ieh na ka bynta jong ngi ki longdien.
title: Ka Riti Ka Dustur bad Ka Niam

content: Jowai, Lber 31: Ka tnad treikam jong ka District Tuberculosis Officer, West Jaiñtia Hills ha kane ka 28 tarik u Lber ka la kynmaw burom ïa ka World Tuberculosis Day haka jingïalang ba la pynlong ha District Library Auditorium, Jowai halor ka phang ba ong “Yes! We can end TB” ha ka jingdon lang u Deputy Commisssioner, u B.S. Sohliya kum u kongsan.Halor kane u kongsan ula ai jingïaroh ïa ki Doctor kumjuh ïa ki nongtrei kiba ïaleh ban pynduna ïa ki briew ba don TB, bad ban ïaleh ban poi sha ka thong ban pynduh jait syndon ïa ka jingpang TB hapoh ka District. Shuh shuh ula sngewnguh ruh ïa kiwei kiwei kiba trei shitom ban bud dien ban wad ïa kiba ïoh pang TB da kaba ai mynsiem ïa ki ban treilang khnang ban poi sha thong.U Deputy Commissioner ula pynlait paidbah ruh ïa kawei ka Music Video kaba ai jingpynsngewthuh paidbah shaphang ka jingpang TB, kumno ban ïada bad kamjuh ban sumar.Na ka liang ka Dr. Evalyneda B V Laloo, District Medical Health Officer kaba long kum ka District Tuberculosis Officer bad DACO bad ka Dr. Dasngewhun Shadap, MOTC Jowai TU kila ban jur ïa ka thong bad ong “Yes!
