We can end TB” kaba mut lah ruh ban pynduh jait ïa ka jingpang TB.Ka Dr. Evalyneda kala ong ban kynmaw burom ïa ka World Tuberculosis Day dei ban ïaleh ban ïa kren ïa kaei ba la lah ban pyntreikam bad ban pynduh ïa ka jingpang TB bad lah ruh ban ïada kumjuh ban sumar pynkhiah lada ki kloi ban pyni sha Doctor.Ha kane ka jingïalang la sam ruh ïa ki khusnam ban pynithuh ïa kito kiba trei shitom ban ïada pynshah ban pynduh jait ïa ka jingpang TB bad kumjuh ruh ïa kane ka khusnam la kynthup ïa ka TB Free Village Award, SNC Certificate/Mementos, ka Nikshay Mitra Certificate, Best Treatment Supporter, Best lab Technicians, Best Performing ASHA bad Media Engagement.Ha shwa kane la don ruh ka jingïalehkai Sports na ka bynta ki khynnah skul LP bad UP bad la sam ruh ïa ki khusnam sha kiba jop ha kane ka jingïalang. Ha ka por mynstep la sdang ïa ka jingïaid kjat da ki khynnah skul bad la rah ruh ïa ki Placard ban pynsngewthuh paidbah kumno ban ïada na jingpang da kaba leit lynti na Ladthadlaboh, Newhill, Ïawmusiang, DC Office, Stand War bad la pynkut sha duh District Library Mynthong, Jowai.
title: Ïaroh u DC ïa ki nongtrei ka koit ka Khiah ba ïakhun pynduhjait ïa ka TB

content: Shillong, Lber 31:Ki samla pule jong ka Shillong Law College (SLC) kila ïa wan ai jingpyntip bad jingpynsngewthuh (awareness) shaphang ka Child Rights ha St. Mary’s Higher Secondary School, ha ka 26 tarik u Rymphang (February) 2024 bad ha St. Anthony’s College ha ka 6 tarik u Lber (March) 2024.Ka jingai jingtip ka la long kaba seisoh ha ka ba bun bah ki khynnah ki lah ïoh jinghikai bad jingtip halor ki hok bad ki aiñ kum ka United Nations Convention on the Rights of a Child (UNCRC) 1989, Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act 2012 bad ka Juvenile Justice (JJA) Act 2015.Ki nongai jingkren ha kito ki sngi ki long I Samla Clara Jones Jala, Samla Christina Bareh, Samla Kyrshan Lating, Samla Aiborlang G Marbaniang, Samla Shanbor Syiem, Samla Gulzar Borbhuiya, Samla Nagma Khatoon bad Samla Pynbhalang Nongsiej.Ha kine ki program ba la pynlong da kane ka College ka la nang ai mynsiem ïa ki khynnah ban tip shuh shuh shaphang ka hok bad ka bor kaba ki don ha ka imlang ka sahlang.Namar ki khynnah ki long ka lawei jong ka imlang ka sahlang, ki lah kloi ban ïarap ïa la ki jong ki hynmen, ki para, ki paralok ne kino kino kiba shah ban beiñ ha kiwei ne kibym don ka jingshemphang halor ka aiñ jong ki khyllung khynnah kiba hapoh ka 18 snem ka rta. Ki hi ki la long kiba kloi ban ïarap lem ïa kiba shem kum kine ki jingjia khamtam ha kaba ki khynnah kynthei/shynrang ki shah ktah kti. Kane ka la long ka kabu ksiar na ka bynta jong ki khnang ba kin sngewthuh kham bha shaphang kine ki aiñ.Kumno yn lah ban ïada lane sumar ïalade ne ïa kiwei ruh haba ki ngat ne shem kum kine ki jingjia? Ka Legal Care and Support Centre kaba don ha Shillong Law College ka ai jingïarap ei na ka liang ka aiñ (Free Legal Services) ïa ki khynnah, ki kynthei bad kino kino ki baduk, kiba shem lanot, kiba donkam ïa kine ki jingïarap.Ki lah ban wan sha college ban ïoh ei ïa ka jingïarap na ka liang ka aiñ bad kumjuh ruh ka jingïarap ban kyrpad nongïasaid aiñ (Free legal aid) na ka bynta ki mukotduma ha ki ïingbishar bapher bapher. Ki lah ban ïoh ka jingïarap kaba pura da kaba phone ha une u number +9197741 24283 /+919863665161 lane ha ka email shillonglawcollege@yahoo.comKa awareness program ka la long kaba jop shisha ha kaba bun ki lah ïoh ka jingmyntoi kaban ïarap ïa ka imlang ka sahlang bad kiwei kiba ïadon ka jingïadei bad ki. Ki ruh kin lah ban ai kajuh ka jingtip sha kiwei kiba donkam ïa kine ki aiñ.
title: Lada ki nongshong shnong kiba donkam nongsaid aiñ, ka law college ka kloi, ong ki samla ka SLC

content: Nongpoh, Lber 31: Ha kawei na ka jingjia ïa tyngkhuh kali kaba la jia mynta ka sngi u Blei, ar ngut ki samla ki la duh noh ïa la ka jingim, kaba dei hadien ba ki la leit tynrah ïa kawei ka kali Eon bad leit tynrah pat sa ïa Shaka jong kawei ka Trok.Kitei ki ar ngut ki samla bad kiba la duh noh ïa ka jingim ki kynthup ïa u Khrawbor Pakma bad u David Sajem kiba dei na West Jaintia Hills.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum na ki bor Pulit, la ong ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 3.30 eiei janmiet ha ka surok Shillong By-pass kaba don hajan Tyndai Resort.La ong ruh ba ki pulit kiba la ioh jingtip ïa kane ka jingjia, ki la hiar mardor sha katei ka jaka bad haba poi ha katei ka jaka la lap ba kawei ka Scooty kaba don ïa u number ML05 AB 5721, ba la ñiah da u Khrawbor Pakma na ka shnong Mynso, West Jaintia Hills, bad uba shong nadien u David Sajem, na ka shnong Ioksi, West Jaintia Hills, ki la ngat ha katei ka apot ïa tyngkhuh kali katba ki dang thmu ban kiew sha Umiam ban pyrshang buddien ïa kawei ka kali.Ka tyllong khubor na ki Pulit ka ong ruh, ba kane ka jngjia ka la jia ka dei namar ba katei ka Scooty ba la shong da kitei ki ar ngut ki thmu ban knieh ban ïaid shakhmat ïa kawei ka kali Hyundai Eon kaba don ïa u number ML 05 K 2600, ba la ñiah da u Bah B. Marbiangbor Thangkiew, na Nongkseh, Upper Shillong bad ha ka jingpynher ïa ka Scooty ki la leit ban tynrah kylla ïa kane ka kali kaba la long ka daw ka jingjia jong kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih.Ki Pulit ki ïathuh ruh ba hadien katei ka Scooty ka la leit ban tynrah ïa katei ka Kali Hyundai Eon ka la leit ruh ban tynrah ïa ka shaka jong kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u Number ML 11 8622,ba la ñiah da u Iohbor Lapasam na ka shnong Shangpung, East Jaintia Hills, ba kine ki ar ngut ki la shah iuh syndon na ki bynta jong ka khlieh haduh ba ki la duh syndon ïa la ka jingim.Shuh shuh, la ong ruh hadien ba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit ki bor pulit ki la rah noh ïa ka met jong kitei ki ar ngut sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh ban pyndep ïa ka Post mortem examination bad ruh ban leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: Khlad hashen ar ngut ha ka jingtyngkhuh Kali ha surok Shillong By-pass

content: Shillong, Lber 31: Ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) ka la ther tyngeh ïa ka Coordination and Welfare Committee (CWC) namar ka jingpynlong kam ïapher jaitbynriew halor ka jingshah pynïap ki arngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati.Ha ka kyrwoh, u President ka HNYF Bah Sadon Blah ula ong, “Katba ki Pulit ki dang tohkit ïa kane ka jingjia, kumno ka Coordination and Welfare Committee ka la shu kdew kti beit da kaba pynïasnoh ïa ka KSU bad ka jingpynïap ïa u Esan Singh bad Sujit Dutta”.“Kane kum ka HNYF ngi sngew ba ka dei ka jingpyrshang jong ki ban wanrah ïa ka jingïa kynad pher jaitbynriew bad jing huri hura kaba ngin ym ailad satia,” ula bynrap.U Bah Sadon ula ther tyngeh ruh ïa ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Forum (MLMF) namar ka jingai umphniang ïa ka ding da kaba pynbna paidbah ban pynlong ïa ka jingïashong kyllaiñ myngor halor ka jingshah pynïap kine ki arngut, kaba ha ryngkat bad ka CWC kila shim ïa ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingïakynad jaitbynriew na ki kam bymman kiba shu jia ryngkhat.“Kumta, ka HNYF ka pyrshah jur ïa kano kano ka jingpyrshang jong kum kine ki kynhun ban aiding ïa ka jingïakynad jaitbynriew hapoh ka Jylla da kaba leh ïa ki kam sngew ïapher jaitbynriew ki bym donkam satia, ïa kiba ka jaitbynriew Khasi ka la ïai long kaba jai jai pyrshah ïa ka jingshah pynïap ki briew jong ngi la ka dei ha khappud, sha siat ïap ha ki BSF ne ka jingshah bomïap u (L) Lurshai Hynñiewta,” ula ong.“Ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïa ka jingïashong kyllaiñ myngor paidbah da ka Meghalaya Linguistic Forum ka dei ka jingkob pylleiñ pylleiñ ym tang ïa ka HNYF hynrei ïa ki paid riewlum trai ka Jylla. Kumta, ngi la rai ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih ha ka 7 tarik ïaïong, 2024 pyrshah ïa ka jingkynnoh ba ngi ki paid riewlum ka Jylla ngi dei ki nongpynïap ïa ki bar jylla,” ong u Bah Sadon.
title: Da ka jingïakhih yn pynlong ka HNYF ha ka 7 tarik u ïaïong

content: Shillong Lber 31: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation hynne ka sngi ka la phah da ka dorkhas sha u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills, ba um dei ban ai jingbit ïa ka MLMDF ba kan pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih da kaba ïashong kyllaiñ myngor ha nongbah Shillong.U President ka HITO Bah Donbok Dkhar ha ka kyrwoh khubor ula pynpaw ba ka seng ka pyrshah jur ban ai jingbit ïa ka MLMDF hapoh ka jingïalam u SK Choudhary, ban pynlong ïa ka jingïashong kyllaiñ myngor halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati, Shella.“Watla ka dei ka hok jong ki paidbah ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih, hynrei ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih kaba jai jai ha kum kane ka por ka lah ban nang ai ding bad kan pynmih ïa ka jingsngew ïapher jaitbynriew ha ka jaka ka jong ngi,” ula ong.“Ngi kyntu ïa ki jaitbynriew ki bym dei Khasi ba ki dei ban sngewnguh ïa ka jingshisha ba ki paid Khasi kila ïai bteng ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka hok ka jongki mynta la palat 76 snem (1948-2024) ha kaba kila mad ïa ka jingeh na ka jingshah knieh ïa ka khaïi pateng bad ka kam saiñ hima sima ha ki briew kiba nabar bad na ka jingbym pynurlong ïa ka jingkular ka ri ïa ka jingïatehkular ha kaba ïadei bad ka Annexed Agreement hapoh jong ka jingbuh ïa ki kyndon jong ka Instrument of Accession kaba la ïasoi bad mynjur da ka sorkar India bad ki paid Khasi mynta la 76 snem,” ong u Bah Dkhar.Ula ong, ba ka National Commission for Schedule Tribes (NCST) ha u ïaïong 2012 ka la phah ïa ka jingbthah ïa ka Ministry of Home Affairs bad Ministry of Tribal Affairs jong ka Sorkar India ban pynrung ïa ki kyndon jong ka Annexed Agreement ha ka riti synshar ka ri hynrei haduh mynta la kyntait ban leh ïa katei da ka sorkar pdeng bad sorkar jylla bad kila pynlong kamkai ïa ka Article 338A jong ka riti synshar ka ri India.Ka jingbym pyndep ïa katei ka jingïatehkular ka la wanrah ïa ka jingbym shngaiñ ïa ki paid riewlum Khasi bad kumta ki ïai bteng ban pynlong ïa ki jingïakhih bad ban bteng ban ïakhun ha ka lynti jong ka ri synshar paidbah.“Ka HITO kam pyrshah ïa ka MLMDF ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih bad kadei ka hok lyngba ka riti synshar ka ri ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih kaba jai jai halor kano kano ka mat, hynrei lada ailad ba ka MLMDF ban pynlong ïa katei ka jingïakhih, ngi ki HITO ngi kwah ban pan jingbit lang ban ïalum ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih kaba jai jai ban dawa ïa ka hok halor ka jingshah pynïap u (L) Lurshai Hynñiewta ha katei kajuh ka sngi bad ka juh hi ka jaka kaba pynlong da ka MLMDF ha Shella, Sohra ne Shillong,” la ong u Bah Donbok Dkhar.Ka HITO ka pyrshah jur bad pynrem jur ïa ka jingkynnoh ka CWC pyrshah ïa ka KSU, katba ki pulit kim pat ïoh ïa ki sakhi ne sabut ka long kaba kloi eh ban kynnoh ba ki riewlum kila leh ïa katei ka kam thombor kiba la jia ha kylleng ka jylla pyrshah ïa ki jaitbynriew Bengali, ym lah ban tip ba ka lah ban dei ruh ka kam kaba la leh da kiwei pat ban pynjah burom ïa ka jaitbynriew Khasi, Jaiñtia bad ki Garo.
title: Wat ai jingbit kyrpad ka HITO ïa u DC ban shong kyllaiñ myngor ka MLMDF

content: Shillong, Lber 31 : Ka Meghalaya sa shisien pat ka la paw biang ha ka jingdon ïa ki mar rep bad ki tiar ba kyrpang ba ka pynmih da ka jingïoh jingithuh ba la tip kum ka Geographical Indication tag ba ju tip lyngkot kum ka ‘GI tag’ haduh saw tylli ki tiar bad ki mar rep.Kine ki kynthup ïa ka Garo Textile, Lyrnai Pottery, Meghalaya Chubitchi bad u shynrai Lakadong. Kine ki tiar bad ki mar rep ym tang ba ki pyni sha ka pyrthei ïa ka jingriewspah jong ka Meghalaya haka kolshor hynrei ki long ruh shi bynta ka jingïarap ban kyntiew ïa ka kamai kajih jong kumba 30,000 ngut ki longiing longsem kiba don bynta ha katei ka kam.Ka jingai ïa katei ka GI tag ka pyni ruh ïa ka jingkordor ka jingpynneh pynsah ïa ka jingstad tynrai nalor ka jingpynkhlain ïa ka kamai kajih bad kyntiew ruh ïa ka ïoh ka kot ha ka thain.Dei ha ka 30tarik mynta u bnai, ka Registrar of Geographical Indications, Chennai, ka la pynbna bad pynkup da ka jingithuh ne ka Geographical Indication tag No. 741 na bynta u shynrai Lakadong lyngba ka Journal No 185 Part 1 jong ka Government of India.Kane ka la rah ïa ka burom ka jylla bad khamtam ïa ki nongrep ïa u shynrai Lakadong naba katei ka shnong ka la ïoh ïa ka jingithuh kum ka thymmei kaba pynmih ïa u shynrai uba bha tam ha ka pyrthei.Ki lai tylli kiwei pat ki GI Tag ki dei ïa ka Garo Dakmanda (Meghalaya Garo Textile), Larnai pottery, bd ruh ka Garo Chubitchi kiba la ïoh jingithuh lyngba ka journal No 185 Part 3.Kumban shu kdew hangne, u shynrai Lakadong u la wanrah ka jingkylla ïa ka jingim jong kumba 12,000 ngut ki nongrep bad kumba 20 tylli ki kynhun nongrep.
title: Ïoh ‘GI tag’ sa saw tylli ki tiar bad mar rep ba mih na Meghalaya

content: Shillong, Lber 31: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU)-Mawprem Circle ha ka sngi U Blei, ka la leit ban khang khyrdep ïa ki Bank kiba don ha ka thaiñ, namar ka jingpynlong trei ha kane ka sngi kyntang jong ki paid riewngeit Khristan kaba la tip kum ka Easter Sunday ne ka Sngi U Blei Paskha.Ka KSU hapoh ka jingïalam u Organising Secretary u samla Banshan Lyngdoh, ka la lap ba baroh ki bank kila pynlong trei khlem da burom shuh ïa kane ka sngi khuid, sngi kyntang jong ki riewngeit Khristan hapoh ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep.Halor kane ka jingshem, ka KSU ka la phah khang mardor ïa ki baroh ki bank bad hukum ba kim dei ban ïaleh pyrshah ne kheiñ dewthala ïa baroh ki sngi kyrpang jong ki kynhun niam kiba ki Khun Hynñiewtrep ki mane bad bud.Ha kajuh ka por, ka KSU ka pynpaw ïa ka jingbitar halor ka jingkynnoh leh bym suitñiew ka Sorkar Jylla bad Sorkar India ban ai shuti ha kane ka sngi Kyntang bad sngi Khuid jong ki paid riewngeit Khristan.Ka la ong ba ha kiwei ki jylla kum ka Manipur, Mizoram bad kiwei ki jylla shatei sha thaiñ lam mihngi ki ïoh shuti ha kum kane ka sngi kyrpang khlem da ai daw ïa kata ka Financial year.Ha kaba khatduh na ka liang ka KSU ka kren da kaba shai sha baroh ki Bank bad ki Financial Institution ba kim dei ban kheiñ dew thala ïa ki sngi kyrpang u Hynñiewtrep bad ïa ki sngi kyntang jong ki Khristan khun Hynñiewtrep bad kiba leh pyrshah ïa kane ka Seng kan dang ïai mih madan ban ai shuti hi da kaba khang da ka bor.Kane ka jingleit khang ka Khasi Students’ Union ka long pdeng ïa baroh lada ki leh pyrshah ïa ka jingsngew jong u Paid ka Bri Hynñiewtrep ngin ym aili da leilei ruh, ong ka KSU.Ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka KSU ha ka 31 tarik u Lber 2024 ka la leit ban pynai shuti hi ïa ki Bank bad kiwei kiwei kiba pynlong trei ha kane ka sngi kaba dei ka sngi kyntang jong ki Khun Kristan katta ka Easter Sunday.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang jong ka KSU ka la lap ba jan baroh ki Bank ki pynlong trei khlem da burom ïa kane ka sngi kyrpang, ha katei ka jingleit jurip na ka liang ka KSU ka la phah khang shi syndon ïa ki bank kiba plie. Ka Seng ka la maham ruh ïa kitei ki Bank ba kim dei ban ïaleh pyrshah ne kheiñ dew thala ïa ki sngi kyrpang jong ki Khristan.Na ka Liang ka Seng ka pynpaw ba dei ka jingleh bym suidñiew ka Sorkar MDA lane NDA ïa ki paid riewngeit Kristan hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya. Katba ha kiwei pat ki jylla kum ka Manipur, Mizoram bad kiwei ki jylla shatei thaiñ lam mihngi ki ïoh shuti ha kum kane ka sngi kyrpang, watla ka dei kata ka Financial year.Kane ka jingleit khang khyrdep jong ka KSU ïa ki Bank ka kynthup naduh Mawïong, Mawprem, Stand Jeep, Garikhana, Upper Shillong, Mawkhar, Khyndai Lad, Barik, Malki, Laitumkhrah, Nongmensong bad ha kylleng ka Bri U Hynñiewtrep hi baroh kawei.
title: Bym burom ïa ka Easter Sunday leit ka KSU ïa ki bank ha kyllenhg ki jaka

content: Nongpoh, Lber 31: Ka eriong kaba jur ryngkat u slap bad u phria ka la khyrwit mynta ka sngi ha kiba bun ki bynta jong ka Ri-Bhoi bad ka thaiñ Jirang ka dei kawei na ki jaka kaba shah ktah jur kaba la wanrah ruh ka jingshah rat jong ki iing ki sem bad ki jingthung jingtep.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum ka shnong Umsaliang bad ka shnong Umsalani ki dei ki shnong ba shah ktah jur haduh ba kawei ka longkmie ba la tip kyrteng kum ka Khuni Killing ka la mynsaw jur ha katei ka jingjia bad kumba 44 tylli ki longiing ki la shah ktah bad shah rat.U nongthoh khubor u la ioh ruh ban ïakren bad u BDO ka Jirang Block u Dr Pabitra R Hajong ha kaba u la pyntip ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por kumba 4 baje eiei ha ka janmiet Sngi u Blei haduh ba ki iing ki sem ki la shah rat lut bad ki dieng ki la khyllem hapdeng surok bad khang sbak ïa ka lynti ïaid. U BDO, ryngkat ki Pulit ka Rani Border Out Post ki la leit marmar sha kane ka jaka hynrei ki la sahkut ha lynti ban leit sha katei ka shnong namar ka jingkhyllem ki dieng.U la ong ba u la bthah ïa ki nongshong shnong ban shong rieh shipor ha ki iing skul bad ha ka iing dorbar ha kane ka shnong ban lait na u slap bad ka lyer katba ka Sorkar ka dang wad ki lad jingïarap.Kat haduh ba la thoh ïa kane ka khubor la ioh jingtip ruh ba ki dang don kiwei kiwei ki shnong kiba shah ktah jur ha ka eriong bad u phria kum ka shnong Nongrim Jirang bad kiwei bad na ka liang u BDO u dang lum jingtip ïa ki shnong ba shah ktah ha ka eriong bad ha u phria.
title: Syllad ka erïong ha thaiñ Jirang, mynsaw ka longkmie, julor phew tylli ki ïing

content: Khliehriat, Lber 31 : U President Rangbah jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP), Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei shuh ban pharia ïa ka jaibynriew ha ki rynsan bapher bapher tang na bynta ban pynksan ïa ki nongrim la jong.Ïa kane u la kren ha ka jingïalang ïalap elekshon na bynta u kyrtong MP ba pynieng da ka Regional Democrativc Alliance (RDA) ba kynthup ïa ka UDP bad HSPDP, ha ka jingïalang paidbah kaba long hynne ka sngi ha Khliehriat.“Baroh shi katta ki nongïalam ki ïai pyrta da kaba ong ynnai pharïa shuh la biang katto. Kumta nga ruh nga kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei shuh ban pharia ïa ka jaidbynriew namar ka jaidbynriew jong ngi kam dei ka jaidbynriew heh paid,” u la ong da kaba kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin ailad mynta ka kynti ïa u kyrtong jong ka RDA ban long kum u MP ba thymmai ka Shillong Parliamentary constituency, Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin.U Bah Metbah u la pynshai ruh ba dei na kane ka daw ba ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kiba dei ki party riewlum kiba la rim ki la wan lang ha kajuh ka rynsan ban ïa tylli ha kane ka elekshon MP da kaba sei tang uwei u kyrtong monlang.Da kaba ai khublei ïa ki paidbah ka Khliehriat constituency kiba la pynjop ïa u kyrtong jong ka party ha ka elekshon MLA ba dei ruh u Myntri ha ka sorkar jylla mynta Bah Lahkmen Rymbui, na ka liang u President u la ong, “La arsien phi la pynjop donburom ïa u Bah Kyrmen Shylla kumta mynta ka kynti ruh to ailad ïa u kyrtong jongngi da kaba kyrshan ïa u ha kane ka elekshon sha ka Lok Sabha.”Ha kajuh ka por u Bah Metbah u la kren ruh halor ka jingmih jong kiwei pat ki party riewlum kiba tang shipor ki la jah noh. U ong ruh ba kim tip wat kine ki party ba thymmai ruh katno kin neh. “Kam dei kaba suk ban thaw party thymmai donkam ban don ka nongrim bad haduh mynta ym pat don ka party thymmai kaba la don lypa ïa ki mat ba ynda ki la jop aiu kin leh hynrei ka RDA ka la don lypa ia ki mat treikam ba ynda ka la jop bad poi sha ka thong,” u la ong.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren na kiwei pat ki nongïalam ka party kynthup naduh ki MLA, MDC ka party kynthup naduh u Bah Kyrmen Shylla, Bah Jemino Mawthoh, Bah Lasky Rymbai, MDC Mookaiaw, u Bah W.G.Sungoh, ki MDC barim, u Bah Joinriwell Pyrtihm u bah Helping Phawa, u President HSPDP Youth Wing, u Bah Pynshairiwell Dkhar, u CEM barim u Bah Titos Chyne, u Bah Radiuis Lapasam bad kiwei kiwei, ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u MDC Khliehriat, u bah F.Bareh.
title: Elekshon MP: Sangeh noh ka jingpharia ïa ka Jaidbynriew : Ong u President ka UDP

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Ka lahduh jong ka samoi ba ladep ka lympung SSA Shillong Premier League Division, ka Mawlai SC ka ïai bteng ban pynpaw ïa ka jingkhlaiñbor da kaba pynliem kput ïa ka Sawmer SC da 7 – 2 kol ha ka jingïalehkai kaba long hynne ka sngi ha SSA Stadium, Polo.Ha kane ka jingïakhun, u Donlad Diengdoh u la kylla long u namtam da kaba khyrwit lai kol na bynta ka kynhun kaba dei artad ka hat trick kaba ar mynta ka samoi, katba u Fairming Suting-u wei pat u rangïalehkai ka Mawlai- u la ïoh ban thep ar kol.Haba phai sha ka jingïakhun, dei ka Sawmer SC kaba la sdang pynkhihjar nyngkong lyngba u Diego Khriem tang hadien 10 minit ba la ïaid ka por, hynrei ka Mawlai ka la jubab da kaba pynïakhaid lyngba u Donlad Diengdoh ha ka minit kaba 20 shuwa ba un thep ïa ka kol lamkhmat ha ka 24 minit.Ha ka 34 minit ka Mawlai SC ka la ïoh ban thep ïa ka kol kaba lai na u Robert Khongriah ban lamkhmat ïa ka kylla step da 3-1 kol.Lah ban kdew ba ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla miet ka Mawlai ka la nang ïohbor bad dei ha ka minit ba 57 ba u Donlad Diengdoh u la ïoh ban thep ïa ka hat trick kaba la nang ai jingkyrmen ïa ka kynhun ban khur ïa ka jingjop.Wat hadien ba ka kynhun ka la kyrmen ban khur pura ïa ki lai point hynrei pynban ka la bteng ban pynkhih sa lai tylli ki kol kiba la wan lyngba u Fairming Suting ha ka 73 bad 86 minit nangta na u Kevin Rymbai ha ka 75 minit.Shuwa ban khylliap ïa ka por ka Sawmer SC ka la ïohlad ban pynphai shi kol na u Russel L Nongkynrih ha ka 88 minit, hynrei kane kam shym la lah ïarap pyllait ïa ka kynhun na ka namrem.Lyngba kane ka namjop ka Mawlai ka shong ha ka kyrdan ba nyngkong ryngkat ki 7 point naki 3 sien ïakhun bad kam pat shym la shah rem naba jop ar sien bad ïakhaid shi sien, katba ka Sawmer na ki 3 sien ïakhun kam pat shym la khur wat tang shi point kaba la pynlong ïa ka kynhun ban hiar sha traiduh ka miej.Mynta ka sngi yn bteng biang ïa ka wat balai ka SPL, bad ka jingïakhun kan long hapdeng ka Nangkiew Irat SC pyrshah ïa ka Langsning FC ha ka por 3 baje nohphaisngi ha madan SSA Ground, Polo.
title: SPL 2023 : Jemkhnap ka Sawmer ha ka Mawlai, khyrwit hat trick u Donlad Diengdoh

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Ka Laitjem ryngkat bad ka Pomshutia ki la jop ïa ki jingïalehkai hynne ka sngi jong ka lympung 3rd District League T20 Cricket Tournament 2024 ba la pynïaid da ka East Khasi Hills Cricket Association.Ha ka jingïalehkai ba nyngkong, ka Nongdawah CC ka la tied nyngkong bad kamai 116 ron, hap baroh 10 hadien 18.2 Over, u Moonlight War u la tied 29(22), katba u Pynbhalang Kharsati u la khur 4/10 naki 3.5 Over.Haba jubab ka Laitjem CC ka la tied 120 ron naki 15.1 Over hap tang 5 ngut ban jop da 5 wicket. U Marken B Kharkongor u la tied 26 (23), katba ïa ka nam Player of the Match la khur da u Pynbhalang Kharsati.Ka jingïakhun ba ar, ka Pomshutia CC ka la buh thong 143 ron , hap 6 naki 20 Over, u Aristerwell Suting u la tied 44 ron. U Raymond Thabah u la khur 3/23 naki 4 Over.Haba pyrshang ban beh ïa ka thong, ka Smit CC ka la kynjoh tang 140 ron, hap 8 ngut naki 20 Over. Ka Pomshutia CC ka la jop da 3 ron bad ïa ka nam Player of the Match la khur da u Aristerwell Suting u ba la seisoh ha ka tied.
title: 3rd District League T20 CT 2024:

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs jong ka sorkar jylla ka la pynbna ba ka Cash Award Scheme na bynta ki nongïalehkai Sports (sportsperson) ha u snem 2022 ka long kum ka atiar ban pynshlur ïa ki nongïalehkai (athlete) bad ki coach kiba la seisoh ha ki kyrdan ïalehkai jong ki. Naduh ba la pyntreikam, palat 3500 ngut ki nongïalehkai Sport kumjuh ruh ki coach na ki 30 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai (Sporting Discipline) ki la ïohpdiang ïa kane ka khusnam, ha kaba ka jinglut ka la kot 6 klur.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkynthoh ba la wan na katto katne ki dkhot Associations, na ka liang jong ka Directorate of Sports & Youth Affairs ka la pynbna ba kan ïai bteng ban wan jingmyntoi bad lad jingïarap sha ki nongïalehkai lyngba kane ka Scheme.Shuh shuh, na ka liang jong ka Department ka la shimti ban khmnih bñiah khang ban pynthikna ïa kiba dei hok ban ïoh khnang ban long kaba ïaid beit watla don katto katne ki application kiba la phah sha ka Department. Tang ha u Rymphang 2024, palat 1300 ki khusnam pisa (cash award) ba la kot haduh 2 klur la ïoh ban pynlut, kynthup ruh ïa ka jingsam khusnam ba dang shen ha ka 14 tarik u Lber, 2024. Kin nang don shuh kum kine ki rynsan ki ban sa pynbna ha kine ki bnai ban wan na bynta ban pynkup burom ïa baroh ki kyrteng kiba la shah jied.Kane ka Cash Award Scheme ka dei na bynta ki Athlete bad ki Coach jong ka jylla Meghalaya kiba la jop takma ha ki kyrdan lehkai hapoh ka State, Regional, National, lane International Events.Kane ka Cash Awards ka dei ka jingsiew kaba tang shi sien, bad kumba 75 Lak na bynta kiba khur takma ksiar ha ka Olympic. Nangta kane ka Cash Award ka ïapher ha ka jingïoh katkum ki kyrdan: kiba khur takma ha ka Senior, Junior, bad Sub- Junior, ka rukom kaba man ki jylla ki bud ryntih haba sam ïa ki Cash Award katkum ka polisi na ka Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports.Nalor ka Cash Awards Scheme, ka Sports Scholarship Scheme kadei kawei pat ka atiar kaba ka sorkar ka la shim ban pynshlur ïa ki khynnah ïalehkai ka jylla Meghalaya. Lyngba kane, la mang 60,000 shi snem (Rs. 5000 shi bnai). Kumba 350 ngut ki nongïalehkai Sport ka jylla ki la ïoh jingïarap lyngba kane ka Scholarship na bynta u snem 2024-25.La pyntip ruh ba ki nongïalehkai ki lah ruh ban leit phah ïa ki application sha ka Directorate of Sports & Youth Affairs lyngba ki kyrteng ba la dep register ha ka Sports Association for training/travel/logistics funding support.Na ka liang jong ka tnat ba dei khmih ïa ka Sport ka kyntu ïa ki nongïalehkai ki sport bapher bapher kumjuh ruh ki coach jong kiba bun ki sports association ba kin wad jingtip ba kham bñiah bad ban phah ïa ki application sha ki ophisar ka association/district sports ban pynthikna ba baroh kin ïoh jingïarap lyngba kane ka scheme.
title: Ka Cash Award Scheme ka atiar ban pynshlur ïa ki nongïalehkai

content: Ka mynsiem ka pang bad ka dohnud ka mong bym lah shuh ban syrdep, haba ki ïing ki sem ki mad ia ka jingiap ba khlem dei por ki baieit ba thoiñ, khamtam lei lei haba ki ngat ne ïa tyngkhuh kum ha ki akisden kali. Ha kane ka jylla, kiba bun naki jingïap mynta ki wan ha kum ki aksiden kali, kaba teng teng ka dei namar ka jingñiah thurmur da lade, ne don pat ruh na ka rukom niah thurmur ki nongniah.Haba kren shaphang ka rukom ban ñiah ïa ki kali khamtam eh ha kine ki kali arshaka mynta, ym lah ban khlem da buh ïa ka jingkylli, kiba bun na ki nongñiah nangno bad kumno sha ki la ioh ban bat ha ki ïa ka driving licence, namar wat hapdeng kiba la ïoh ban bat ïaka, hynrei ka rukom ñiah kali ka jong ki, kam kdew pat sha katta ka phang ba kidei kiba la ïoh hok shisha ïa ka licence ñiah kali ka jong ki.Toi man la ka step don kiba bun ki briew ki bym pat ban nang ñiah ia ki kali, ki pynlut ïala ka por ka jong ki ban hikai, hynrei ngi tip ba kum kine ki briew kiba da ïaid da ka lynti ban shah hikai, suki pa suki ki nang bad ki kham tip ïa ki aiñ ki kanun ban ñiah iaka.Hynrei, ha kiba bun ki aksiden, lehse don ruh ki nongñiah ba shu nang malu mala, pynban khlem jingtieng ne smiej ki shu kurup ruma la kum kiba nang eh, hynrei haba la bang lei lei sa ka rukom ban pynher sted, tang katta ki thung khohmoh ne ba kin thung bajli bad ki syllad shisha kat shaba shah, bad ha kaba kut, poi pat sha ka jingjia ba sngewsih wat haduh u pud sha ka lynti jong ka jingïap.Kaba kham ima eh ïa ka rukom ñiah kali dei na ki khun samla kiba dang shu sdang ban khie, kaba haki, ka snam kumba ong ki riew tymmen ka dang khluit bha, katno tam lei lei haba ïoh ban rah ïa ki kali ba kham remdor, pynher jong ngi la kum ki bym lap lieng shuh, hynrei kaba kut, haba ym lah shuh ban teh lakam, poi beit beit sha ka aksiden.Nalor ba pynher sted, trei ruh sa ka dih ka bam, ka leh shongshit tem pynheh bha ïa ki sur jingrwai, kaba da shisha ym tang ba ka wanrah ïa ka jingma ïa kiba shong ne ïa u nongñiah, hynrei wat ia ki briew kiba ïaid ha ki lynti ki syngkien, kaba teng teng shu shah syllad ei bad kylla dkoh ka kti ka kjat tang namar ka jingleh shongshit kaba shi khyllipmat ka wanrah pat ïa ka jynjar trah kaba shi rta ïa ki briew ba ïaid ba ïeng.Hangne la donkam shisha ba ki bor ba dei khmih kin hap ban thaw noh ïa ki aiñ ki kanun, ba ka rukom ban ai ïa ka licence niah kali, kam dei shuh ban shu ai klumar ïaka, hynrei donkam shisha ban pyrkhing, ne haba ai ruh donkam ban da ïoh ïa ki kot ki sla naki skul ai jinghikai ñiah kali ba la ithuh daka bor ba dei khmih. Pynban lada shu ai kumba ai ha kine ki sngi kumba ai mynta, da lei lei yn nym lah satia ban tem ïa ki jingjia aksiden kiba sngewsih, bad kaba kut ka shu sah khana ei pateng ïa kaei kaba la jia baroh.Shi ban ki lad jingpyrkhing ba la shim khia da ka tnat Pulit ka la lah ba kan kham teh lakam bha ïa ki briew shoh khawiang kiba mlien ban shang kylleng sawdong ka sor man la ka miet. Ka jinglah ban talasi bha ki bor pulit ryngkat bad ka kuna ba ki shaiñ, ka la teh bha ïa u lakam ïa kito ki riew shang miet ñiah kali pat ha ka por ba ki la shoh bha u khawiang, namar kiba bun na ki jingjia ha ki por mynmiet, lada wad bniah bha ïaka daw, dei namar ba ka jabieng kam treikam shuh, katba ka kali pat ka la her sted shaba palat u pud tad haduh bym lah shuh ban tehlakam ïaka, ha kaba kut, tynrah beit kat shaba poi.Shuh shuh, ka aksiden ka kham jia ruh haba ïa beh ïa ka por, haba ong beh por, ka kynthup naduh ka beh kam beh jam, leit jingleit sha jngai, hangne ruh, kum ki briew, ban lait na ka jingma, kan kham bha ban mih kham kylluid ka por, khampher wat lada dei ban poi kham kloi, hynrei ha kaba kut, ka mynsiem ka ïoh ba kan shong palei bad ym don jingeh ban ïoh ban pyndep ïa ki kam ha ka por kaba la buh.Kumta, ban lah ban kham tyngkan ïa ki aksiden kali, kaba nyngkong eh, donkam shwa ban ïa sdang nalade, da kaba long adkar bha ha ka rukom ban ñiah kali, kiar naka bam ka dih, kiar ruh na ka kren mobile bad kaba kham kongsan lei lei ka long ba wei haba la kiew ha ka kali haba thmu lei lei ban ñiah hi dalade, ka mynseim kan hap ban ïai long kaba palei, kaba pynleit jingmut shwa ban niah tikna ïaka tad haduh bña la poi ha ka jaka ba la dei ban ïeng, hadien kane la lah pat ha kaban phrang pat ïala ka jong ka bor jabieng sha ki kam kiba dei ban leh.Ha kaba kut donkam ruh ban kohnguh, spel lyndet ruh ïa ki dak ki shin kiba juh kdew ha ka por ba ñiah ïa ki kali, namar teng teng kum ki briew, klet ïa kaei kaba la thoh ha shi lynter lynti, hynrei haba long adkar, kiei kiei kiba sñiew kham niar ba kin jia thala, toi kampher ba ha ka jinglong briew da shisha ym lah ban ïai biang, hynrei haba phikir, ki jingsñiew da lei lei kim juh kham wan thala ha ka jingim jong u briew.
title: Haba Phi Husiar Ïalade Bunsien Ym Ju Ngat Aksiden Thala

content: Shillong, Lber, 30: Ka Meghalaya People’s United Front, Sengkmie ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynskhem ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka Shillong Unit ha kaba u President rangbah ka seng u Bah Dawanpoimi Laloo, u President ka MPUF East Jaiñtia u Bah Kyrshan Blah bad u President jong ka MPUF Ribhoi u samla Jackson Sohtun ki la sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi kynthup ruh u Woring President jong ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah uba la long kum u kongsan ha kaba u la pynskhem ïa ki 24 ngut ki dkhot ba thymmai jong ka MPUF Shillong Unit. Ïa ka kam President jong ka MPUF Shillong Unit la bynshet ha u samla Eric Sawlyer bad ïa ka kam General Secretary la pynkhamtai ha u samla Ador Susngi.
title: Pynkha ka MPUF ïa ka shnat treikam Shillong Unit

content: Shillong, Lber 30: Ka prokram kolshor kaba pynpaw ïa ka jinglong kyrpang jong ka jylla Rajasthan la pynlong ha Raj Bhavan, Shillong da ka jingrakhe ïa ka 75thFoundation Day jong ka Rajasthan.ïa kane ka prokram la pynlong hapdeng ka jingpynïaid jong u Chief Secretary jong ka sorkar Rajasthan, u Sudhansh Pant, IAS.Ha ka jingkren u Sudhansh Pant u la pynpaw ïa ka jinghiar pateng jong ki nong Rajasthan bad u la kren shaphang ka jingriewspah jong ka jinghiar pateng ka riti dustur bad ka jingkiew sted ha ka ïoh ka kot.U la pyntip ba ka Rajasthan ka don ka jingshna ïa ka bording lyngba ka sngi, u la ong ruh ba ka jylla ka la dei ka jylla kaba lamkhmat hapoh ka ri India napdeng ki 5 tylli ki jylla kiba la buh ïa ki bording na ka lyier. Ka jylla Rajasthan ka la wan kaba 5 ha ka ri haba ïadei bad ki kam tih ïa ki marpoh khyndew bad kaba long kaba 7 ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkiew ka GDP, u la bynrap.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingdonkam jong ka “Ek Bharat Shreshtha Bharat” kaba la sdang da ka sorkar India, u Pant u la ong ba ka jingsdang kaba kum kane kan ïaid ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingïadei bad ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng kiba bun ki jylla bad ki jylla ka ri kiba hab hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka sorkar pdeng.Ha kane ka prokram ka khubor na u Lat ka Rajasthan, u Kalraj Mishra bad ka jingpyni ïa ka foundation day video ha Rajasthan kaba la pyni ruh ïa ki jingshad tynrai bad kiwei ki prokram ba la pynlong na jylla Rajasthan, Assam bad Meghalaya.
title: Rakhe ka Raj Bhavan Shillong ïa ka sngi seng ïa ka Rajasthan

content: Shillong Lber 30: Kumba ju long manla ka por na ka liang ki shipai jong ka Border Security Force (BSF) Meghalaya Frontier, ka la pynlong ïa ka “Seema Darshan Programme”, ha ka sngi Ba-ar na ka bynta ki samla pule bad ki nonghikai jong ka Commerce College Shillong ha Border Out Post Barmanbari kaba dei ka jaka jong ki shipai.Ha katei ïa ka prokram la ai ka jingbatai kaba bniah ïa ki samla pule shaphang ka rukom treikam kaba kongsan jong ki shipai BSF ha ki kam ïada ïa ki jaka khappud jong ka ri.La pdiang sngewbha ïa ki samla pule bad ki nonghikai da u Rajiv Kumar uba long u Commandant jong ka 193 Bn BSF ha ryngkat ka jingdon ki ophisar bad ki shipai BSF.Ki BSF kila pyni ïa katei ka kynhun ïa ki tiar siat bad ïa ki tup ki man kaba ki shipai ki pyndonkam ha kaban ïada ïa ka ri bad kane ka jingpyninam ka long ruh kum ka lad ban pynsngewthuh khambha ïa ki samla shaphang ki shipai ïada khappud bad ïa ka jingkloi ban len ïa la ka jingim ban ïada ïa ka ri.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka prokram na ka liang ki nonghikai bad ki samla pule kila pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa ka BSF kaba la pynlong ïa kane ka prokram bad kumjuh ban sngewthuh ïa ka rukom pynïaid ia ka Border Haat, Balat kaba don ha khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh.
title: Da ka Seema Darshan prokram pynlong ki shipai BSF

content: Mawkyrwat, ïaïong 01: Kum shibynta ban kyntiew ïa ka kam ïalehkai hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, ha ka 30 tarik u Lber, 2024 la plie paidbah ïa ka K&K Football Arena kawei na ki madan jingïalehkai Futsal ha Shnong Nonglang, South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u bah Jesland Roy Nongsiej u la long kum u kongsan.Ïa kane ka madan ïalehkai la pyntrei da ki ar ngut ki samla kiba la buh ïa ka kyrteng ‘K&K’ ha ka jingmang pisa kaba 50 lak ei ei bad ba la plie paidbah da u bah Jesland Roy Nongsiej kum u kongsan ryngkat ka jingïadon lang u bah P. Wanniang kum u symbud kongsan.Shuh shuh ïa kane ka madan la ai kyrteng K&K Football Arena kaba mut ‘Ken & Ki’ ha ka jingsien kyrteng bad kiba ka kyrteng pura jong ki ka long u Cannyson Nikton Marbaniang bad u Banshanboklang Khardewsaw kiba long ruh ha kajuh ka por k um ki trai jong ka madan.U bah Jesland Roy Nongsiej haba kren kum u kongsan u la pynpaw ka jingaikhublei na ka bynta ki ar ngut ki samla jong ka dong ka thaiñ kiba la buh da ka kyrteng “K&K” kiba la don shisha ïa ka jingïohi jngai ban leh ei ei na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki nongïalehkai khamtam eh ka ban long ruh ka jingaimynsiem ruh wat ïa kito ki rangbah kiba la sdang ban noh ka met ba kin ïoh biang ka lad ka lynti ban ïalehkai lyngba ka jingshna jong ki samla ïa ka madan ïalehkai Futsal.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba kine ki ar ngut ki “K&K” ki la thaw ruh ïa ka history hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District kaba ma ki ki la shna ïa kane ka madan ïalehkai Futsal ha kane ka jaka kaba hap ha Shnong Nonglang. Namarkata, u la ong ruh ba kum ka sorkar ka dei ban ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ïa kum kine ki samla kiba don shisha ka jingthmu ba bha ban kyntiew ïa ka dong ka thaiñ lyngba ki bynta bapher bapher katkum ka jinglah jong ki.“Ha kano kano ka jingjop jong u briew don ka longkmie bad kumta ruh ha kano kano ka jingjop jong u khun ne ka khun don ki kpa kiba kyrshan na sha lyndet”, pynkynmaw u bah Jes bad kumta ruh ha ka jingjop jong ki ar ngut ki “K&K” ka long da shisha ka jingkyrshan ba rad bah jong ki kpa jong ki. U la ong ruh ba lyngba ka jingpyni lynti jong kine ki ar ngut ki “K&K” kan sa pynpyrkhat ruh ïa kiwei ki samla kiba la nang la stad bad kiba biang ka kamai ka kajih ba kin leh ei ei ïa ka dong ka thaiñ lyngba da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti kiba khambha.U don ruh ka jingkyrmen ba lyngba kane ka madan Futsal kan sa long ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki khunsamla jong ka dong ka thaiñ bad kham kyrpang ïa kito ki samla kiba la sdang ha ki jingmlien kiba sniew namar lada ma ki kin mih shakhmat ban wan kilanmet lyngba ki jingïalehkai kan sa long kawei ka lad ba ma ki kin lait na ki jingsniew ba bun jait.Kiba ïa donglang ha kane ka sngi ki long naduh u bah P. Wanniang, General Secretary ka MDSA kum u symbud kongsan, kiba ha ïing jong ki ar ngut ki samla kiba la pyntrei ïa ka madan, bad ki ‘riew rangbah kiba la shah khot sngewbha. Ka jingrwai kyrpang na u samla Valdony Mawlot bad kumjuh ruh ka jingïalehkai paralok.Ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u bah Downingstar Marweiñ bad ka jingkren khublei na u bah Cannyson Marbaniang.
title: Na ka pynthor ktieh sha ka madan ïalehkai, pynkylla ki ar ngut ki samla

content: Jowai, Lber 31: Ka lympung ïalehkai phutbol kaba la tip da ka 10th Secondary School Football Tournament 2023-24, ba la pynlong daka Dorbar Shnong Pdengshakap, ha kane ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taïew bala dep ka la ïoh ban pyndep ïa ka jingïalehkai Semi-Final ba khatduh hapdeng ka YFC Trangblang pyrshah ïaka Thun FC, ha kaba ka Thun FC ka la khur ïa ka jingjop da 2-1 kol.Haba phai sha ka jingïakhun, dei ka YFC Trangblang kaba la ïoh pynkhihjar nyngkong lyngba u Joseph haka minit ba 40 bad ban lamkhmat ruh ïa ka jingïalehkai ha ka kylla step.Hynrei tang kumba katto katne por ba la ïaid ki minit ha ka kylla miet, ka Thun FC kala ïoh pynphai lyngba u F. Syndai haka minit kaba 65 shuwa ba u Zaza un thep ïa ka kol pynjop ha ka minit ba 69.Kumta lyngba kane ka namjop ka kynhun Thun FC kala ïoh ban buh jaka ïalade ha ka final jong kane ka Tournament. Lah ban kdew hangne ba ki kynhun ban ïaknieh ïa ka namlahduh ha kane ka Tournament ki long hapdeng ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC bad ka Thun FC.La pyntip ka jingïalehkai Final jong kane ka Tournament kan long haka 20-4-2024 haka por 1 baje nohphai sngi hapdeng ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC pyrshah ïaka Thun FC.Naka liang jong ka Tournament Committee Pdengshakap lyngba ka kyrwoh bala phah da u Sports Secretary bah Oriswell Khyriem sa shisien ka khot bad wer lang ïa baroh ki pait ieit football jong ka thaiñ ban wan sakhilang ïakane ka jingïalehkai Final.
title: Yn ïaknieh namlahduh ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah bad ka Thun FC haka Tournament Pdengshakap

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber, 30 : Kum shibynta ban wanrah ka jinglaitluid, ka jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih bad ka jingshongsuk jingshong shngaiñ ha ka sngi thep vote sha ka Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik u bnai Ïaïong, 2024.U Deputy Commis-sioner (Excise) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat hapoh ka kyndon aiñ 135 (c) jong ka Representation of People Act 1951 ula pynbna ba ha ka 17, 18 bad 19 tarik u Ïaïong, 2024 kaba hap ha ka por kaba kynthup ïa ka 48 kynta ka ban neh haduh ka kynta ba khatduh ba pynkut ïa ka sngi thep vote kum ki sngi tyrkhong kyiad.U la pynbna ruh ïa ka sngi jingñiew vote ka 4 tarik u Jylliew, 2024 kum ka sngi tyrkhong kyiad ha baroh kawei ka South West Khasi Hills District. Da kane ka hukum la khang ba baroh ki dukan kyiad ba kynthup ïa ki Bars/canteens, kiba ju die madan kin khang khyrdep ha kitei ki tarik. Kino kino kiba pynkheiñ, kin shah pynshitom katkum ka Excise Rules & Acts.
title: Naduh 17 tarik-19 tarik Ïaïong yn tyrkhong kyaid ha SWKH

content: Shillong, ïaïong 01: Ka kynhun ki nongïalehkai Wushu hapoh ka lama jong ka Meghalaya Wushu Association (MWA) ka la ïoh ban wanrah kawei ka takma ba la khur na ka 23rd Sub Junior National Wushu Championship ba la long ha Indoor Hall Bhagwati Nagar, JammuUniversity.Ha kane ka kynti, ka jylla ka la phah hynriew ngut ki nongïalehkai ba kynthup kawei ka kynthei bad san ngut ki shynrang: Ethan Nongdhar, Daomanmi Mynsong, Steven K.Thabah, Pyniohnam Marboh, Bishar Lyngdoh Nongpiur bad ka Siselia Dkhar hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Niawki Lakai NS NIS Wushu Coach jong ka MWA na looksi, West Jaintia Hills District.Baroh hynriew ngut ki la leit ban ïashimbynta ha rynsan ïakhun jong ka 23rd Sub-Junior National Wushu Championship bad ka Junior Khelo India Women’s League ba la pynlong ha Indoor Hall Bhagwati Nagar, ba la sdang naduh 26 tarik haduh 31 tarik u Lber, 2024.ïa kane ka lympung la pynïaid da ka J&K WUSHU Association hapoh ka jingkhmih jong ka WUSHU Association of India (WAI), ha kaba ka jylla ka la ïoh ban khur kawei ka takma rnong ba la jop da u Ethan Nongdhar na ka shnong Lumparing, Shillong u ba dei u khynnah ba shah hikai ha u Bah Pynshai Mawri (Coach-State Wushu) na Mawlai Phudmawri.U Pyniohnam Myrboh na Kharang, u Daomanmi Mynsong na Jongksha bad u Steven na Madanrting ki la shah pynliem noh ha ka jingïakhun Quarter Final, katba ka Siselia Dkhar na East Jaintia Hills District, ka ruh ka la liem noh ha ka jingïakhun Quarter Final ha ka Khelo India Women’s league.
title: Khur takma ka MWA na ka 23rd Sub-Junior National Wushu Championship

content: Shillong, Lber, 30: Ha ka step jong ka sngi Thohdieng ar ngut ki heprit kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Banphiralang Thongni bad u heprit Synsharlang Thongni kiba na ka shnong Kynsohsan, South West Khasi Hills District ki la ïoh ban pyllait im ïa kawei ka sim dkhoh bad ïa kane ka sim la aiti noh sha ki nongtrei jong ha ka tnat Wildlife.Kine ki arngut ki heprit ki la ïathuh ba ki la lap ïa kane ka sim ha ka por ba ki dang mareh step bad dei ynda ki la poi hajan ka ophis jong ka tnat Forest, Mawkyrwat, ki la lap ïa shi kynhun ki ksew kiba la kthong ban bam doh ïa kane ka sim hynrei ha ka jingkloi noh jong ki ban kem ïa ka sim, kane ka sim ka la lait im hynrei ka la shu mynsaw na ki bynta ka thapniang na ka jingshah kthong ha ki ksew. Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ki nongtrei ka tnad Wildlife, kine ki jait sim Dkhoh Saw ki dei ki sim kiba la sdang ban duhjait bad na ka liang jong ka tnad Wildlife ka la kyrpad ïa ki nongshong shnong ba lada ki lap ïa kum kine ki jait sim kin sngewbha ban pyllait im lane ban aiti noh sha ka tnat wildlife bad kumjuh ïa kiwei de ki mrad.Ïa kane ka Dkhoh la aiti noh sha ki nongtrei ka tnat Wildlife ha ka 30 tarik, Lber 2024 ryngkat ka jingdon lang jong u Vice President ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawkyrwat u samla Skhembor Nongrum.
title: Pyllait im ki heprit ïa ka sim Dkhoh Saw ba la jan duhjait

content: Shillong, Lber 30: Wat hadpeng ka jingpykhreh ban rakhe ïa ka sngi burom kaba kyntang jong ki riew Khristan ka Paskha, na ka liang ki paid riewngeit katholik ha ka sngi saitjaiñ kila tep don burom noh ïa ka Sr. Rosario Lopez Herraria ha St Xavier’s Convent Chapel, Tura.La ong ba ka Sister. Rosario kaba la don 94 snem ka rta, kadei kaba na ka ri Spain bad ka la khlad noh ha ka sngi Palei ha Nazareth Hospital, Shillong.U Rt Rev. Bishop Andrew R Marak ula ïalam ïa ka jinglehniam tep ïa ki riewniam ha kaban leh burom khatduh ïa kane ka Sr. Rosario ïa kaba la wan ban ïashimbynta da bun ngut ki briew na kylleng ki jaka bad kiba don ha ki kam ki bapher bapher bad ki paralok ba ïa ithuh ithaw ïa ka.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ka Sr Rosario ka la pynlut da ki phew snem ha rilum Garo ban ïarap kyrpang eh ïa ki khynnah, ki rangbah bad ïa ki longkmie bad la seng ruh ïa kawei ka jaka kaba heh kaba long kyrpang na ka bynta jong ki, kaba la tip kum ka Bethany Society ha Tura.Ka Sister Rosario kadei ruh ka dkhot jong ka Missionaries of Christ Jesus (MCJ) bad kadei ka mishonari kaba la pawnam bha ha kylleng ka rilum Garo kaba la ïalam ban tei ïa ka ïing na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba don jingïapher ha ka dkhot met bad ban ai ïa ki ïa ka jingnang jingstad kaba paka lyngba ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka Braille bad Sign Language, katba ïa ki rangbah bad ki longkmie la ai jinghikai ha ki kam thaiñ jingthaiñ bad ka kam rep kam riang kaban ïarap ïa ki ba kin khlaiñ ha ka ïoh ka kot.La ong ruh ba ka Sister Rosario ka la ïoh pdiang ruh ïa ka Meghalaya’s Pa Togan Nengminja Award halor ki jingnoh synniang ki jong ka sha ka imlang sahlang.
title: La tep don burom ïa ka Sister kaba la ïohpdiang ïa ka Patogan Award

content: Shillong, Lber, 30: Ki Pulit ka Madanriting Police Station, ha ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ki la leit ban shimti ïa kawei ka metïap jong kawei ka kynthei kaba la sahkut ha ki maw jong ka phud Umkhen kaba hap hapoh ka Dorbar Shnong Mawshbuit ha ka Dong Kharkamni.Ïa kane ka metïap jong kane ka kynthei kaba la lyngkhuid, la lap na sharum ka Wei Thangdkhar, jong ka Wah Niamra, Mawshbuit da ki lai ngut ki khynnah rit kiba leit kai sha kane wah.Kine ki khynnah, tang shu ïohi ïa kane ka metïap da ka jingsheptieng ki la mareh bran bran ban leit pyntip sha ki nongïalam shnong.Na ka liang jong ki nongïalam shnong tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, ki la pyntip marmar sha ki Pulit jong ka Madanryting Police Station.La suba ba kane ka kynthei ka dei kaba la shah rong ha ka umsaw na ka thaiñ ka Wah Umkhen.Katkum ka jinglap ki Pulit la sakhi ba kane ka briew kam don shuh ki jaiñ phong ha ka met jong ka bad na ka liang jong u Rangbah Dong Bah Faster Field Nongdhar u la ong ba kane ka briew kam dei satia kaba napoh ka shnong Mawshbuit namarba kam shym la don ka jingjah briew hapoh ka shnong.Kat haduh ba la thoh ïa kane ka khubor, ki Pulit ki la register case halor kane ka jingjia bad ka jingtohkit ka la ïaid shakhmat.
title: Lap ki khynnah ïa ka metïap kynthei ba lyngkhuid na Wah Niamra

content: Shillong, Lber, 30: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ka la bthah ïa ki dkhot jong ka Coordination & Welfare Committee (CWC) Shella Bholaganj & Adjoining Areas ban mih markhmat ym ban shu jler bad jaw ummat kuratia hakhmat ka Sorkar bad ka pyrthei lyngba ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka jingpharep pyrshah ïa ki dkhot ka KSU da kine ki poiei lyngba ka CWC ka pyni dak ba kine ki briew ki kob pyrshah ïa ka KSU da kaba ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah khlem ki sakhi satar kiba paka. Ka KSU ka kob ïa uta u Gopal Dey ba lada u nud un wan mih markhmat bad ki dkhot ka seng ban pyni ïa ki sabut ba u don halor ka jingkynnoh jingpharep jong u pyrshah ïa ki samla ka seng. Mano uta u Gopal Dey?,” la byrthen ka KSU ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ lyngba u General Secretary u samla Donald V. Thabah.“Une u briew bad kiwei ki la mih ha ki lad pathai khubor ha u snem 2020 hadien ba ki jaidbynriew ki jong ki, ki la hiar thma kynsan ïa ka jingïalang pyrshah CAA bad dawa ILP jong ka KSU ha kaba da ki phew ngut ki dkhot ka seng ki la shah tied shah bom ha kine ki poiei da ki tiar ïaleh tad haduh ba la pait ka khlieh bad lyngkien ka snam ha surok bad kumjuh ruh ka jingbthat jubor ïa ka jingim ba kordor u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta, u dkhot ka KSU Sohra Circle. Halor ka jingujor ejahar bad pynher shithi sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, ha kaba ki poiei lyngba ki CWC ki la kynnoh laiphew jait ïa ka seng bad ki paid Khasi. Ka KSU ka pynsngew sha baroh kito ki poiei kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka CWC ba kin tyngkan la u thylliej ïoh poi sha ka mynsaw namar ka seng kan ym shong kli kti bad sngap kuman ïa ka jingber bih kine ki poiei nalor ba ki thom naphang ïa ki Khasi trai Ri trai muluk,” la ong ka KSU.“Ka seng ka sngew ba lada kita ki poiei ka CWC ki sngew kutlad palat ha jylla Meghalaya ki dei ban leit phai noh mardor sha shnong trai jong ki, ka Bangladesh bad sa leh katba ki sngewmon ha ri lajong. Tangba katba ki dang sah ha meiramew u Khasi kan bha shibun ïa ki bad ki jaidbynriew jong ki ban ym mushlia lane tuklar ïa ki aiñ ki kanun Khasi, ka khyndew ka shyiap u Khasi, ka khaii pateng u Khasi bad ka ïaid ka ieng u Khasi,” la ong ka seng.Ka KSU sa shisien ka pynsngew ba nalor ka jingdawa ïa ka ILP, ka Article 371, ka jingpynkup bor shuh shuh ïa ki District Councils ka dawa ruh ba ka Cut-off Date lane tarik ot kyrteng ïa ki nongshong shnong ba pura ka jylla Meghalaya kan dei beit 24 tarik u Lber 1971 bad ïa kito kiba wan kiew na East Pakistan/Bangladesh hadien kane ka tarik dei ban bret noh ïa ki sha la ka ri, kata, ka Bangladesh.“Kyntang ïa wai ka KSU ka kyntu ïa ki para Khasi ba kin ym ngop lane shah ïalam bakla ha ki khubor hamsaïa ki poiei lyngba ki lad pathai khubor lane social media namar kane kan pynpait bad pharia ïa ka Jaidbynriew rit paid Khasi. Ka buit sianti ki poiei ka long ban pyni ba ki shah thombor (playing the victim card) katba napoh napoh dei ma ki kiba sdang ban kynshoit ban thombor ïa ki Khasi kumba dang shu jia shen ha Keatinge Road bad NEHU,” la ong ka KSU.“Kum ka Jaidbynriew ngi dei ban ïatylli ban ïa ryntih ha kum kane ka saw ka sian ha kaba ka umsaw kaba shyrkhei ka ap ban tap lup ïa ka Jaidbynriew rit paid Khasi. Ka KSU kan ym ailad da leilei ruh em ïa ki poiei shi sngi ban leit trai khlieh ha Ri Khasi. Kam pher lada shah bom shah tied, shah set along ne wat ban ïap ruh, hynrei ki dkhot ka seng ki tur beit da ka jingshlur ban ïada ïa la ka jaidbynriew ba la suit la shor da u mynbarim,” ong shuh shuh ka KSU. “Ka KSU ka maham ba lada kata ka Meghalaya Minority Linguistic Development Forum kan pynlong jingïakhih ha Bri i Hynñiewtrep, ka KSU ruh kan ïakhih lang halor ka jingshah pynïap klep bad jingshah thombor ki Khasi na ka por sha ka por ha ki bar jylla,” la ong u General Secretary ka KSU.
title: Wat shu jler bad jaw ummat kuratia hakhmat ka Sorkar, maham ka KSU ïa ka CWC

content: Shillong, Lber, 30: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo Peoples (FKJGP) ka la maham jur ïa u Gopal Dey uba kam ïalade ba u dei u General Secretary jong ka Coordination And Welfare Committee na Shella-Bholaganj, ba um dei ban kynnoh ïa ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki barjylla ha ka shnong Ichamati.“Kane ka kam dei ka jong u hynrei ka dei ka kam jong ki Pulit ban wad ïa ka jingshisha,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary General ka FKJGP (Seng Kmie) Bah Eldie N. Lyngdoh sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ki Pulit haduh mynta kim pat lap mano kita ki briew ba pynïap ïa u dkhot ka KSU u Lurshai Hynniewta ne ïa uta u Pulit ba siat ïap ïa u Bah Cheristerfield Thangkhiew. Ngi kwah ban buh jingkylli ruh shaei u (Gopal Dey) jah une u briew ha ka por ba shah pynïap u Bah Lurshai Hynniewta. Haba mynta u (Gopal Dey) dawa ban kem mardor ïa kita ki briew ba donkti ban pynïap ïa kine ki bar jylla u la dei ban dawa ruh ban kem mardor ïa kito ki riew thrang snam ba pynïap ïa u Bah Lurshai,” ong u kyrwoh na ka FJKGP.“Kum ka seng ngi maham ruh ba une u Gopal Dey um dei ba ai ding halor ka jingjia ha Ichamati. Lada une u briew u dang ïai bteng ban pynshit, ngi, kum ka seng FKJGP ngin mih paidbah ha ka 7 tarik, Ïaiong ka sngi ba kine ki poiei, hapoh ka shatri ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Development Forum ki mut ban shong kyllaiñ myngggor ha Khyndailad,” la ong ka Seng.“Lada ka Sorkar ka sngap ïa ki poiei ki mynder ka mut ka sur ka paid ka Bri u Hynñiewtrei ka la shah taplup noh bad ban pynim biang ngin shim da ki sienjam kiba tyngeh,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: Wat kynnoh ïa ka KSU, maham ka FKJGP ïa u Gopal Dey

content: Shillong, Lber, 30: Ka Coordination and Welfare Committee (CWC) Shella Bholaganj Block kaba long ka kynhun ba la thaw da ki bar jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la ujor sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla dang shen ha ka shnong Ichamati.Ha ka ujor ba la soi da u President ka CWC, Shella Block, Gopal Dey u la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban kem mardor ïa ki briew kiba donkti ban pynïap ïa u Ishan Singh bad ïa u Sujit Dutta ha Ichamati ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai bad dawa ruh ban aiti ïa ka jingtohkit sha ka CBI/NIA, ban siew bailutksasn sha ki bahaing hasem jong kine ki arngut kiba la shah pynïap bad ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki bar jylla Hindi kiba buhai shnong ha Ichamati bad ha ki shnong bamarjan.Ka CWC ka la phah ruh ïa kane kajuh ka jingujor sha u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri Narendra Modi bad sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing Amit Shah bad sha u Lat ka Meghalaya u Phagu Chauhan.Lyngba kane ka ujor, ka CWC, Shella Block ka la teipop ba dei ki dkhot runar jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) kiba la pynïap ïa u Ishan Singh bad ïa u Sujit Dutta.Haba buh jingkylli ïa ki bor synshar, ka CWC ka la ong, “ka Ichamati, ka dei ka shnong kaba hap hapoh ka East khasi Hills District jong ka jylla Meghalaya kaba la pyllait na ki kyndon jong ka CAA namarba ka hap hapoh ka Sixth Scheduled, ka dei ruh ka jaka kaba ka Khasi Students Union ka la pynlong ïa ka jingpyrshah ïa ka CAA kaba lam sha ka jingshah pynïap jong u Ishan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta. Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ka jinglong jingman kaba ngi mad ïa ka jingim kaba syier bad ka jingartatien, ngi kwah ban buh jingkylli, kumno la ailad ban pynlong ïa ka rally ha Ichamati? haba ka (Model) Code of conduct ka la treikam?”Ka CWC ka la buh jingkylli da kaba ong, “shano ki Pulit ki don haba ki dkhot jong ka KSU ki wan da ki kali ha Ichamati bad thombor ïa ki bar jylla kaba wanrah ïa ka jingkulmar bad ka jingsahh pynïap uwei u Bengali bad uwei u Adivashi kiba dei ki nongbylla kit maw.”“Hato ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei tang ka Sorkar tang jong kawei ka jaidbynriew? Hato ki bym dei ki riewlum kim dei ki nongthep vote/ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya? Hato ka Sorkar kam lah ban leh eiei pyrshah ïa ki kynhun shitkhlieh ka Jylla Meghalaya.? Sa katno ngut ki ban duhei ïa ka jingim ba ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng kin ïohsngew ïa ka jingud jingïam jong ki bymdei riewlum ha Meghalaya? la buh jingkylli shuh shuh ka CWC.“Hato u kpa uba duhei ïa la u jong u khun tang na ka daw ki runar ka KSU un ïoh ïa ka hok? la kylli shuh shuh ka CWC.Ka CWC ka la kam ba ka jingjia ka la jia hadien ba ka rally pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Act ba la pynlong da ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) bad kiwei kiwei ki sengbhalang ha Ichamati, katkum ki khubor jong ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka jingïaumsnam ha ka jingïakhih pyrshah ïa ka CAA kaba ladep ka la jia ha ka shnong Ichamati kaba poi haduh u pud ba ki bar jylla kiba sah ha kane ka thaiñ kim lah mutdur. Wat hadien ba la sakhi kum kine ki jingjia ha u snem 2020 ha ka jingïaumsnam ha Ichamati, balei ki bor synshar district ki dang ai jingbit ïa ki kynhun ban pynlong ïa ka rally ha kajuh ka jaka?” la kynthoh ka CWC lyngba u Gopal Dey.“Nga phah ïa kane ka jingthoh sha phi ban dawa ïa ka hok jong ki arngut kiba la khladnoh bad ki bahaing hasem jong ki bad baroh ki khun shynrang bad kynthei ka Meghalaya kiba shah ibeiñ ha kawei ka liang tang namarba kim dei na kajuh ka jaidbynriew heh paid. Nga phah ïa kane ka jingthoh ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia jong nga halor ka jingjia ba dang shen jong ki briew ki bym dei ki riewlum ha Meghalaya. Ki aiñ bad ki kyndon ka jylla kiba la thmu ban ïada ïa ki trai jylla, hynrei ki la long pynban ki mawsiang ba ïatakhuh ïa ki nongshong shnong bar jylla. Bun tylli ki jingshah typyrkhing, bun tylli ki Rul, bun tylli ki aiñ (kiba treikam tang ïa ki bar jylla ka Meghalaya) ki la buh jingeh ïa ki bym dei ki trai jylla ban shong ban sah bad ban kamai kajih ha ka jylla, shah khanglad ha ka ïoh ka kot, ka kamai kajih, ka jinglaitluid, bad wat ha ka jingim,” la kynnoh u Gopal Dey.“Sa kawei ka jingeh ba la mad da ki bym dei ki trai jylla ka dei ka jingbym don ïa u nongmihkhmat. Ka saiñpyrthei kaba dei beit thik tang ïa ki trai jylla ha Meghalaya bunsien ka la khñoit ïa ka sur jong ki bym dei ki trai jylla, ka la buh jingeh ïa ki ban kren haba wanrah ïa kino kino kino ki rai kiba ktah ïa ka jingim jong ki,” kynnoh shuh shuh u Dey.“Shuh shuh, ki bar jylla kiba sah ha Meghalaya, bunsien ki mad ïa ka jingshah ibeiñ bad shah kiar, kaba ktah pat ïa ka jingim kaba marïaryngkat watla ki shong ki sah hapoh ka jylla. Kane ka jingshah ibeiñ ka lah ban ktah ha kiba bun rukom, kynthup ïa ki ing ban shong ban sah, ka pule puthi, ki lad ïohkam ïohjam bad kaba kham shyrkhei ka dei ka jingduh ei ki nongkynti bad ka jingim. Ka long kaba donkam ban ithuh ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya, khlem da kheiñ kyrdan riewlum, dei ban niew lang bad ban ai ïa ka hok ba mar ïa ryngkat,” ong shuh shuh u Dey.”“Namarkata, nga kyntu ïa ki bor ba dei peit ba kin pdiang ïa ki jingai jingmut khnang ban kan pynjanai ïa ka im, ka shong ka sah jong ki bym dei ki riewlum ha Meghalaya da kaba kem mardor ïa ki runar kiba donkti ban pynïap ïa ki bar jylla khnang ba ka shongsuk shongsaiñ kan don hapoh ka Jylla. Lada ki bor pulit kim lah ban kem ïa ki nongleh kam bymman hapoh shitaiew, ïa ka jingtohkit dei ban aiti noh sha ka CBI/NIA,” la dawa ka CWC.“Dei ban pynthikna ba ki bym dei ki riewlum ki dei ban ïoh jingïada na ki kam bymman bad ban ïada na ki jingshah pynmynsaw bad na ki kam runar da ki kynhun shitkhlieh ka Meghalaya pyrshah ïa ki ritpaid (bar jylla) jong ka jylla Meghalaya. Ban buh ïa ka Permanent Security Outpost/ CRPF/ ne kino kino ki Para-military Camp ne Post ha ki jaka kum ha Bholaganj bad Ichamati,” dawa ka CWC.Ka CWC ka la kynnoh ba bun na ki sengbhalang naduh ba la pynkha ki dei kiba donkti ban pynphriang ïa ka jingisih pyrshah ïa ki bar jylla ritpaid ha Meghalaya bad niew ruh ïa ki bym dei ki riewlum kum ki “Bar Jylla”. Ha kawei pat ka liang ne ka jingbym leh eiei jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka pynlong ïa ki runar jong kynhun sengbhalang ban ngeit ba ki dei kiba kham halor jong ka aiñ. Namarkata, dei ban thaw ïa ka aiñ kaba pyrkhing khnang ba ka Sorkar kam lah ban shu bret ïa ka jingkitkhlieh bad ïa ki nongleh kam bymman dei ban kem bad ym ba kin shu ïai sah ha ki kot tang kum ki “runar bym ithuh durkhmat.”Ka CWC ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban tem ïa ka jingibeiñ bad ban wanrah ïa ka jingïalong kawei hapoh ka jylla khnang ba ki trai jylla bad ki bar jylla kin im suk im saiñ hapoh ka jylla bad ha kajuh ka por kane ka kynhun ka la dawa ban ai jingkyrshan bad ai jingïarap sha ki jaidbynriew bar jylla khnang ban kyntiew ïa ka bha ka miat ka jong ki hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.
title: Teipop ka CWC ïa ka KSU halor ka jingshah pynïap arngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati

content: Shillong, Lber, 30: Ha kawei na ki jingjia basngewsih u wei u heprit uba la 12 snem ka rta na ka shnong Langja West Khasi Hills District u la ngat ha ka jingmynsaw kaba jur hadien ba u la kum leit tyngkhuh ïa ki sainar ding ilektrik hapoh ka khlaw kaba don ha kane ka shnong.Une u heprit u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Isboklang Wanniang bad na kane ka jingjia une u heprit u la mynsaw jur na ki bynta jong ka kti, ka kjat bad ka khlieh bad ïa mynta u don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ha la ïing.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïohlum la ïathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka 23 u Lber 2024 ha kapor ba une u heprit u dang leit siatsim sha khlaw bad kumno re kumno khlem poi pyrkhat katba u dang kiew ha uwei u maw u la kum leit tyngkhuh ïa ki sainar iletrik kiba la noh bha sha tbian.Ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council, West Khasi Hills Distirct Unit bad ka HYC Ri Muliang Circle ha ka 30 tarik u Lber, 2024 ki la leit jngoh ïa une u heprit bad ai mynsiem ruh ïa ki bahaïing hasem ryngkat ki jingduwai bad ka jingnoh jingïarap sha ki bahaïing jong une u heprit.
title: Mynsaw u heprit na Langja ba tyngkhuh ïa u sainar ilektrik ba la noh rynjaiñ

content: Shillong, Lber 30 : U National President ka NPP ba dei ruh u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la lum ïa ka jingïalang bad ki heh nongïalam ka BJP ha nongbah Shillong na ka bynta ban ïa kren halor ka elekshon MP khnang ba ki kyrtong jong ka party kin ïoh ïa ka jingjop na Shillong bad kumjuh na Tura Parliamentary seat.Ha kane ka jingïalang u Conrad u la ong ruh ba ki kyrmen ba kum ka kynhun NDA kin ïoh ban khur ïa ka jingjop ha baroh ar tylli ki seat ha kane ka elekshon MP.U Conrad u la ong ruh ba kadei ka kamram jong ka NPP ban ïa kynduh ïa baroh ki party kiba ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka party ban ïa kren halor ka elekshon MP kaban long shen.“Nga la kyntu ïa ki nongïalam ka BJP ba kin kyntu ïa ki nongtrei ka party bad ki nongïalam jongki mandal na bynta kane. Nga pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewnguh na bynta ka jingkyrshan jong ki ïa ki kyrtong jongngi bad kyntu ruh ïa ki ba kin trei shitom shuh shuh khnang ba ki kyrtong jong ka party kin ïoh ïa ka jingjop,” u la ong.Halor ka jingkylli la ki nongïalam ka BJP kin wan neem ban ïalap elekshon ha Meghalaya, u Conrad u la ong ba ïa mynta um pat lah ban ong ei ei la kin wan ne kim wan hynrei u ong pat ba kaba kongsan ka long ïa ki nongïalam na ki shnong ki thaw bad naka thain kiba lah ban trei bad wanrah ka jingkylla.Shuh shuh u pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingkmen ba bun ki nongïalam ka BJP na rilum Khasi bad Jaintia ki wan sha katei ka jingïalang bad pynpaw ka jingsngew jong ki.
title: Kynjut kti u Conrad bad ki heh BJP na bynta ka elekshon MP

content: Shillong, Lber 31: Ka Jongksha Social Cultural and Sports Club ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taïew ba dang shu dep, ka la pynkut noh ïa ka First Quarter Football Tournament 2024 ha madan ïalehkai jong ka shnong Jongksha.Ïa kane ka football tournament ba la bei tyngka da ka Yess Meghalaya kaba la sdang ha ka 28 tarik Lber bad kaba la pynkut noh ha katei ka sngi ka 30 tarik Lber 2024 la wan ban plie pyrda da u Bah T Mynsong Sordar Shnong Umtong bad ba la pynhap pyrda noh da u Bah T. Pohshna Chairman ka Block Mawkynrew kiba la long kum ki Kongsan.Kumba ju long ba ha ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol naduh ka World Cup bad ki lympung ïalehkai kiba heh, ki player ki ju btin ïa ki khynnah rit ha madan shuwa ban sdang ka jingïalehkai, hynrei kane ka lympung ka long kaba kham pher bad kaba i shongkun bha ha kaba ki kmie ki kpa ki la wan synran bad btin hi ïa la ki khun hapdeng madan.Ha kane ka jingïalehkai, ki kynhun kiba la poi sha ka final ha ka U-12, ka Inter Miami SC ka ïakhun pyrshah bad ka Real Madrid FC bad ha ka U-10 ka Sevilla FC pyrshah ïa ka Manchester United FC.Ha ki jingïalehkai ba itynnad bad ba pynshohbiej bha da ki heprit, ka Inter Miami ka la pynliem noh da 2-0 kol pyrshah ïa ka Real Madrid FC ba la thep da u heprit Banteibor Songthiang bad da u Ronishan Marboh. Katba ha ka U-10, ka Sevilla FC ka la pynliem da 2-0 kol ïa ka Manchester United FC. Bad ïa kitei ki ar kol la thep da u heprit Jingtreikamlang Suting bad u heprit Ialanius L Nongbri.Ha kaba kut jong ka jingïalehkai la sam ïa ki khusnam lyngba da ki takma bad la sam ruh ïa ki khusnam shimet lyngba da ki trophy sha ki rangap kol jong ki team kiba khur jingjop.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh jingkren na ki Kongsan kiba la ïaroh ïa ka Jongksha SC&SC hapoh ka jingïalam u Bah H. Suting uba la pynbit pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam ban pynlong ïa katei ka jingïalehkai.Ki la kyntu kynpham ruh ïa ki heprit ba kin pyndonkam hok ïa ka sap ba ki don, ban kohnguh sneng, ban long kiba smat ba sting, ban kiar na ki jingmlien ba sniew bad ban long barobor kiba biang por.La ïoh ruh ka jingkren na ka liang ki kmie kpa kiba la ai ka jingïaroh bad nang ai mynsiem ïa ka Jongksha SC&SC kiba la plie lad plie lynti ïa ki khun jong ki ba kin pyntbit ïalade ha kaba kum kane ka jingïalehkai.La pynshongshit ha kane ka sngi lyngba da ki jingshad na ki arngut ki coach jong ka Jongksha Grassroots Center. Ki team kiba ïashim bynta ha kane ka sngi kidon baroh 8 tylli.
title: Ka phutbol ba kham phylla, btin hi ki kmie kpa ïala ki khun ha madan shuwa ba kin ïalehkai

content: Ka mat kaba lah ïakren bad kaba lah khluid ka long ka jingkren jong u MLA ka Congress u Saleng A Sangma uba lah rah ïa ka mat hapoh Ïingdorbar Thaw Aiñ ba dang shudep shen ha kaba u kyntu ïa ka sorkar ban weng kam noh ïa ki pulit kiba sngaid, kiba la tymmen.Kane ka mat ka sngew ïahab bha namar ïa ka kam pahara bad ban ai jingshngaiñ ne ka shongsuk shongsaiñ kumba long mynta ban leit tem da kiba lah tymmen kam long kaba suk namar ka kam ki pulit kadei ban long ïa kiba dang khlaiñ bad kiba dang jawan kaba mut ban tem ïa ki jingïakhih ne wat ban mareh.Kane ka jingkren ka la mih ruh ha ki lad pathai khubor ba uwei na ki heh Pulit la kynnoh ba u la ktah kti ïa ki Nongïalam ki sengbhalang ha Pynursla bad kane ka pynmih ïa ka jingpuson ba la kham lah uba buaid ne uba la tymmen ne uba sngaid ban ai jingshngaiñ kaba dei ka mat kaba kongsan bha ba ki heh Pulit ki la dei ban pyrkhat noh kham jngai ne ïohi jngai.La ju ïohsngew ruh manla ka por ba ki don katto katne haba ïatyngkhuh bad ki jingïakhih hapdeng ki riew paidbah bad ki katto katne ki pulit ha ka por mynmied ka jingujor ka long ba ki don ki bym biang shuh ban ïapynbeit kam.Lada katei ka jingkren u MLA kadei kaba shisha na ka liang ka tnat pulit kadei ban shim khia ban tehlakam lane ban syntiat ïa ki pulit jong ka, kiba dih kiad bad kiba pynsniew dur ïa ka tnat pulit bad kaba ktah ruh ïa ka Koit ka Khiah jong ki namar ki la don ruh kiba la khlad noh na ka jingdih kiad.Katkum ka juk thymmai mynta ki la don bun ki teknologi kiba lah ban pynraikhoh ïa uba sngaid, ïa uba sniew lah ban pynbha bad ki lah ruh ban shim ïa ki lad kilan met bapher bapher kiba lah ban ïarap ïa ki, lah ruh ban pynrung kam da kiba dang kham samla kiba lah ban kiar na ka dih, hynrei namarba tang shu la buaid ka klumar lut ka kam ka jam bad lah ban ong ba kidei kitei kiba shait shem ba lada don kiba dih ha ka por kamram kan mih beit ka hura huri.Lehse ka kynta treikam jong u pulit la kadei katno katno kynta u dei ban treikam beit katkum ka por la jong ne ban shong slem ha jaka treikam haba ka por treikam ka la kut.Lehse lah ruh ban thaw ki lad ba un ïoh ka por khambun ban ïashong Kai bad ki khun ki kti ne ka kurim bad ban ïoh ruh ka lad ban leit sha ki jingïaseng ba un lait na katei ka kam dih kiad kaba ki don katto katne kiba ju ngat ha katei ka jingdih kiad kaba sniew jan manla ka sngi, kumta la sngew ïahab ban ai jingmut ïa ka tnat pulit ban long kiba peitngor bha ruh halor ka koit ka Khiah khnang ban ïarap ïa ki pulit na katei ka kam.Kumba la ong utei u MLA napoh ka ka thaiñ Garo ka por ka la dei mynta wat ban buh pahara ha kum ki jaka kiba bun paid kum ki jaka ba long ñew ruh da ki pulit kiba dang biang ka rta, wat haba ong kumne kam mut satia ban kheiñ beiñ ïa ki pulit kiba long ha katei ka dur jong ka jinglong ka met ne ka kam kaba ki la shah teh kynjri hynrei ka la donkam ruh ïa ka tnat pulit ba kum ïa kitei pat ruh ki jait nongtrei kiba ka rta kam ïahab shuh ba kin dang leit pahara la kumno kumno ka la dei ka por ba kin shu treikam beit napoh ka ophis khnang ba ki kam kin long kiba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.Lah ban ong ruh ba ka jingong jong utei u MLA kan ym lah ruh ban ong ba u la shu kren ne kheiñ troiñ ïa ki pulit ka jylla, hynrei la sngewthuh ruh ba u la kren hadien ba u la lap ha ki katto katne ki jaka, bad ym lah ruh ban shu kynnoh ba baroh ki pulit ki dei kiba la noh ka rta, ne kiba pher ha ka jinglong ka bor met ne kiba dih kiad hynrei ki don ruh shisha kiba shakri bha ïa ka kam la ka long ha kano kano ka rukom kaba ki trei la kidei ban leit shajngai ne wat ha Shillong.La sngewthuh ruh ba ka kam ba ki pulit ki ai ka jingshakri ne kaba ki trei kam dei satia eh than kaba suk hynrei kadei kaba kham eh haba ïanujor bad kiwei pat ki jaitkam.
title: Lah dei ban thaw dur thymmai noh ïa ka tnat pulit ha ka jylla Meghalaya

content: Shillong, Lber 27 : U Nongialam ka United Democratic Party bad Myntri Sorkar jylla U Bah Paul Lyngdoh ula ong ba ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) ka kham don ka lad ban jop na Shillong parliamentary seat ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ban wan namar ka Congress ka dei ka bym larkam shuh bad ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka dei ka party ba kut tang ha kawei ka District kata tang ha East Khasi Hills.Haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi Balang, u Bah Paul ula ong ba ka Shillong constituency ka ju dei ka ktem jong ka Congress hynrei ka saiñ pyrthei ha India kala kylla bak ly bak bad kane kan iarap ia ka party kum ka UDP bad ka kynhun synrop kum ka RDA.“Kane ka long namar ha kawei ka liang, ka don ka jingbym kwah ïa ka BJP. Ka jingshisha ba ki khlem pynïeng kyrtong na Meghalaya ka pyni ba ki tip ba kam don jingmyntoi ïa ki ban pynïeng kyrtong. Mynta, ka don ka jingbym kwah ïa ka BJP bad ka Congress ka dei ka bym larkam shuh, kumta ki paidbah kin vote shano?” ula ong.U Bah Paul ula ong ba ka VPP ka dei ka party ba dang mih thymmai ha ka kam saiñ pyrthei bad kam don satia ïa ki ktem hangno hangno ruh lait tang ha East Khasi Hills District ka Meghalaya.“Napdeng ki 12 tylli ki District ka Meghalaya, kane ka party VPP ka don ki nongmihkhmat tang ha kawei ka District kata hangne ha East Khasi Hills , kumta ym lah ban khot ïa ka kum ka seng riewlum, kam dei ruh ka party ba la pdiang hapoh ka Jylla, ka dei ka party tang jong kawei ka District” ong u Bah Paul haba bynrap “Kumta phi sngewthuh ïa kane ka jingkren, ngi ïakhun ha ka jylli kaba ka National Party ka BJP ba ialam ia ka jingsynshar kam ïakhun ïa ka elekshon, hynrei ka ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka NPP , ka Meghalaya kala ju vote pyrshah ïa ka BJP, ka Congress ka dei ka bym larkam bad ka VPP kaba don tang ha East Khasi Hills, mynta, mano ba don lad bha ban jop, ka shong ha phi ban kheiñ jingkheiñ”.Haba pynpaw ba ka UDP ka dei ka party ba lamkhmat ha Ri-lum Khasi Jaintia, u Bah Paul ula ong “Ka jingshisha ba ngi don haduh 12 ngut ki MLA ka UDP bad 2 ngut ki MLA ka HSPDP bad ngi la jop na bun eh ki constituency ka Ri-lum Khasi Jaintia. Ha kawei ka por, ka UDP kala jop 7 na ka 7 tylli ki constituency ka Ri-lum Jaintia, lada phi ïa nujor bad ka NPP, ka NPP ka jop khyndiat eh ki seat bad nalor kane, wat ha ki ADC, ka dei ka UDP kaba jop bun hynrei namar ka jingbym treikam ka Tenth Schedule, ka la mih ka jingkynthih seng sha ka NPP kaba ïalam mynta ïa ka EC ha KHADC bad JHADC”.
title: Ka VPP kam pat dei ka Seng Riewlum, ka dei ka seng kaba ïoh jingkyrshan tang ha East Khasi Hills: Paul

content: Shillong, Lber 29: Ka ophis Sub Divisional Magistrate ka Sohra Civil Sub Division, ka la pynjari da ka kyndon 144 CrPC ba khang ba ïalum briew ba 4 ngut ne palat, ban rah tiar pynmynsaw bad kren ïa ki ktien ba pynshit hapoh ka Sub Division.Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la phah ïa kane ka hukum la pynjari namar ka jingsyier ïoh mih ka jingthud ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha Sohra Sub Division na ka daw ka jingshah pynïap ki arngut ki bar Jylla kaba jia ha shnong Ichamati bad Dalda ha ka janmied 27 tarik Lber.Ka hukum ka ong ba ki don ki jingsngewkhia halor ka jingshngaiñ ki paidbah bad ka jingïada ïa ki bad kumta la donkam ban shim ïa kane ka sienjam ban nym don shuh ka jingduh ki mynsiem briew bad ban tehlakam ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka thaiñ.Ïa kane hukum la pynmih da SDM Sononi Verma, bad kan treikam ha baroh kawei ka Sub Division naduh ka sngi Palei tad haduh da pynmih da kawei pat ka hukum.Ka hukum ka ong ba ym shah ban ïalum paidbah, jingïalang ne ïashong palat 4 ngut ki briew ha kino kino ki jaka paidbah ba hab hapoh ka Sohra Sub Division tad haduh da pynmih da kawei ka hukum. Kane ka hukum ka kynthup ïa ki rally, ki tamasa bad baroh ki jingïalang ba ïalum paidbah.La pyllait pat tang ïa ki jingïalang jingïaid paidbah ba ïadei bad ka ilekshon Lok Sabha, 2024 hynrei kane ruh ka dei hadien ba la ïoh jingbit na ka Ophis SDO (Election) Sohra.Ka hukum ka ong ruh ba la mana ïa baroh ki briew hapoh ka Sohra Sub Division ba kim bit ban kren ïa kino kino ki ktien kiba pynshit, pyrta slogan, phah khubor da ka ktien ne ki kor electronic kiba lah ban pynshit lane aiding ïa kane ka jingjia.La khang ruh ïa ki briew, ki seng, ki kynhun ha Sohra ba kin pyndonkam ïa ki tynghung, amplifier lane kino kino ki tiar hapoh lane ha ki kali shimet lane ki Ïing ki sem lane jaka paidbah lada kim ïoh jingbit na ki bor khmih.Ka hukum ka ong ba kino kino kiba pynkhreh ïa kane ka hukum kin shah pynsajia kat kum ka kyndon 188 jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC).
title: Pynjari Section 144 CrPC ha Sohra Sub Division

content: Shillong, Lber 31: Ka hat-trick na u Andy Mawthoh, kaba dei ruh kaba nyngkong mynta ka samoi, ka la pynïoh ïa ka Ryntih SC ïa ka jingjop da kaba pynliem ïa ka Nongthymmai SC da 5-0 kol ha ka jingïakhun ka lympung Shillong Premier League 2023 ha madan SSA Stadium- First Ground, Polo, hynnin ka Sngi Saitjaiñ.Ha kane ka jingïalehkai, u Andy u la ïoh ban pynkhihjar ha ka 25, 64 bad 68 minit, katba ki ar kol kiba tam pat la thep da u Banehskhem Khongsdam (75′, 90’+4). Kane ka dei ka jingjop kaba bun kol tam mynta ka samoi bad ka sien kaba nyngkong ïa ka Ryntih ban nym shah thep (clean sheet).Kane ka lympung kaba la jam mynta sha ka wat ba lai (3rd round) katba ka Ryntih ka dang ïakhun ban khur ïa ka jingjop kaba nyngkong hadien ba ïakhaid bad ka Mawlai SC ha ka jingïakhun ba nyngkong shuwa ban shah rem ha ka Shillong Lajong FC dang ha ka taïew ba ladep. Katba ka Nongthymmai, ka la dep ban ïoh khur 3 point hadien ba jop ïa ka Nangkiew Irat SC ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei jong ka taïew ba ladep.Ka Nongthymmai ka la ïaleh ban bteng khur jingjop ha kane ka jingïakhun bad ïoh ruh katto katne ki kabu hynrei tang khyndiat eh kiba la wanrah jingma ïa ka liang pyrshah. Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka Ryntih, ka la sdang suki suki shuwa ba kan ñion.Dei tang hadien ba la ïaid 20 minit ba ka Ryntih ka la sdang ban ñion da kaba bteng ban pashat bol shakhmat ka phyllaw kol jong ka liang pyrshah. Ka kol kaba nyngkong ka la wan hadien ba u Wanshan Dkhar u la ïoh ban pashat ïa ka bol sha u Andy, u ba la ïoh ban khyrwit jlang ïa ka bol shapoh kol, khlem da ailad ïa u rangapkol ka Nongthymmai- u Senapati Mandal ban ïada ïa ka bol.Ki la don ruh katto katne ki kabu na bynta ka Ryntih shuwa ban kut ka kylla step – hynrei baroh kine ki kabu ki la sepei namar ym shym la don ba lah ban pynurlong bad ka kylla step ka la kut da 1 kol ka Ryntih katba ka Nongthymmai 0 kol.Ka Ryntih ka la bteng ban tehlakam ïa ka jingïakhun wat ha ka kylla miet, bad kumba katto katne por u Andy u la ïoh ban thep sa ïa ka kol kaba ar ha ka 64 minit shuwa ba un khyrwit ïa ka hat trick ha ka 68 minit.Ha ka 75 minit u Banehskhem u la ïoh ban pynbud ïa ka kol kaba saw, nangta shuwa ban kut ka minit pynjlan ïa ka por ïalehkai, u la ïoh sa ban thep ïa ka kol kaba ar (90+ 4 minit) kaba dei ka kol kaba san ïa ka kynhun.Lyngba kane ka namjop, ka Ryntih na ka kyrdan ba hynriew ka la kiew kyrdan ba lai ha ka miej kheiñ point ka SPL 2023. Ka ïaryngkat bad ka Mawlai da 4 point hynrei ka ïoh ban lamkhmat lyngba ka jingïapher kol (goal difference) (+3 to +1), katba ka Mawlai ka dang ïalehkai tang 2 sien.Ka jingïakhun mynta ka sngi kan long hapdeng ka Mawlai pyrshah ïa ka Sawmer SC ha ka por 3 baje nohphaisngi, ha SSA Stadium, Polo.
title: Shillong Premier League 2023: Da 5 kol pynliem ka Ryntih SC ïa ka Nongthymmai SC

content: Shillong, Lber 31: Ki ar kynhun ba kynthup ïa ka Laitjem CC bad ka Lumpaia Avengers CC ki la khur jingjop na ki jingïakhun ba la long hynnin ka Sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka lympung 3rd District League T20 Cricket Tournament 2024 ba la pynïaid da ka East Khasi Hills Cricket Association.Ka jingïakhun kaba nyngkong ka la long hapdeng ka Cricket Smit CC pyrshah ïa ka Laitjem CC. Ha kane ka jingïakhun ka Laitjem ka la jop suk da 8 wicket.Haba phai sha ka jingïalehkai, ïa ka toss la jop da ka Laitjem CC bad jied ban bol nyngkong, bad haba ka Cricket Smit CC ka la shimti ïa ka pali tied nyngkong ka la ïoh ban buh thong 120 ron haduh kaba kut jong ka 20 over bad la buh bad hap 8 ngut ki wicket.U Elbrenroy Mawthoh u la lah ban ïalehkai bha napdeng ki rangtied da kaba khyrwit 60 ron naki 60 bol. Katba u Manchester Pathaw, rangkawangbol ka liang pyrshah u la ïoh ban khur 3/15 naki 4 Over.Haba shimti ïa ka pali tied, ka Laitjem CC ka la lah ban tied tam da 121 ron, hap tang 2 naki 17.1 Over.U Raymond Thabah rangkawangbol ka liang pyrshah u la ïoh ban khur 1/30 naki 3 over hynrei kam pat shym la biang ban pyllait ïa ka kynhun na ka namrem.U Poilangson Thawmuit u la khyrwit haduh 63 ron naki 56 bol kaba la ïarap ïa ka Laitjem CC ban khur ïa ka jingjop da 8 wicket bad ha kajuh ka por ban khur syndon ïa ka khusnam Player of the Match.Haba phai pat sha ka jingïalehkai kaba ar, ka Lumpaia Avengers CC ka la khur jingjop hadien ba ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Thynroit CC da 6 wicket.Ka jingïakhun ka la sdang ha kaba ka Thynroit CC ka la jied ban tied nyngkong hadien ba jop ïa ka toss. Kane ka kynhun ka la ïoh ban kynjoh tang 75 ron shuwa ba baroh 10 ngut kin shah pynkhyllem tang hadien 17 Over namar ka jingtbit ki rangkawangbol ka liang pyrshah.Dei tang u Darikupar Warjri u ba la ïohlad ban kynjoh sha ka phew ron na bynta ka kynhun, kata da 12 ron naki 8 bol. U Bryan Mac Millan Marbañiang u la long u namtam napdeng ki rangkawangbol ka Lumpaia Avengers da kaba khur haduh 4/14 naki 3 Over.Haba dei sa ka pali tied jong ka Lumpaia Avengers, kane ka kynhun ka donkam tang 9.4 Over ban kynjoh 77 ron, hap 4 ngut ban khur ïa ka jingjop da 6 wicket.U Ralphy Diengdoh u la ïoh ban tied 30 ron naki 18 bol na bynta ka kynhun, hynrei ïa ka nam Player of the Match la khur da u Bryan Mac Millan Marbañiang u ba la seisoh ha ka bol ban khur haduh 4 wicket.
title: Khur jingjop ka Laitjem CC bad ka Lumpaia Avengers

content: Shillong, Lber, 29: Ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills District kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ki la sdang ban lap ksai ïa ki briew kiba donkti ban pynïap ïa ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati, kaba hap hapoh ka Sohra Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills District.“Ngi la ïoh ksai halor ki katto katne ki briew kiba ngi suba ba ki dei kiba donkti ha ka kam bymman ha ka shnong Ichamati. Hynrei, haduh mynta ngim pat kem satia ïano ïano ruh. Ngi dang pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ha lyndet ka jingthmu jong kane ka kam bymman,” ong u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei.“Ngi kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ban burom ïa ki kyndon jong ka aiñ,” la ong u SP.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ar tylli ki metïap jong bar jylla la lap ha ka janmiet sngi Ba lang ha ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda kaba hap hapoh ka Shella Police Station, East Khasi Hills District. Kine kiba la shah pynïap ki long u Esan Sing bad u Sujit Dutta bad ïa ka met ïap jong kine ki arngut la lap na ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda.Kane ka la jia ryngkat, ha kane ka sngi ba ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha ka por mynsngi ban pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rule, 2024.La suba ba ki runar ki la shim kabu ha kane kajuh ka sngi ban dkhat jubor ka jingim jong ki arngut ki bar jylla.Ïa ka met jong kine ki arngut la leh ïa ka post mortem ha Shillong Civil Hospital ha ka sngi Palei.Ki ar ngut ki para jong ki ar ngut ki bar jylla kiba la shah pynïap ha Ichamati ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei katba ki dang ap ïa ka jingleh Post Mortem ha Civil Hospital, Shillong ki la ïathuh ba ki la ïoh jingtip ïa ka jingïaklumar ha iew Ichamati kaba la sdang ha ka por kumba 4:00 baje nohphai sngi hynrei ki la ïoh jingtip ïa ka jingkhlad kine ki arngut ka dei ha ka por premmiet.Uwei na ki para jong uba la shah pynïap u la ïathuh ba u hymmen jong u, u dei uba ju bylla thep maw bad katba u dang thmu ban wan phai sha la ing bad ha shi teng lynti u la ngat pynban ha ka tyrsim jong ki runar kiba la tangon ïa u haduh ba un da ïap bad ïa ka met jong u la lap narud surok.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ka Sohra bad Shella bad kynthup ruh ki Pulit na Shillong ki la hiar sha ka shnong Ichamati, ka shnong kaba don ha khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahara bad ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.Kumba ka long mynta, ka jinglong jingman ha ka shnong Ichamati ka la pynsyier mynsiem ïa ki nongshong shnong khamtam ïa ki bar jylla.
title: Sdang lap ksai ki Pulit ïa ki briew kiba pynïap ïa ki bar jylla ha Ichamati

content: Ha kine ki sngi la ïohi ba ka kam politik ka kylla long kawei na ki kam khaïi kaba heh tam ha kaba ki heh spah kim lah ban lait na ka jingpynshoi ban ai ai reng ne ban bei pisa na ka bynta kiwei pat ki kyrtong. La iohi ba bun ki heh spah ki la kylla long ki MP/MLA/MDC bad la ju ïa theh tyngka laki laka na ka bynta ban ïoh ia ka mon jongki paidbah ban jied ïa ki ne ia ki kyrtong jong ki.
