Kane baroh hato kam dei ka jingthrang bor, ym lah lait hi jan baroh ngi iïa thrang ia ka bor hynrei hato ym don mo u pud ïa kiei kiei baroh. Jan man la ki Election ki paidbah ki ïohi shibun ki tamasa jong ki riew thrangbor kiba ïa aireng. Kam long kaba bakla ban jop ne shah jied ban long ki nongmihkhmat paidbah, hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ki don napdeng jong kiba kum kitei kiba ym salia wat ban pyndonkam bakla ïa kata ka bor kaba ki paidbah ki ai ïa ki, khamtam lei haba don kiba shu ñiew ba ka bor kaba ki ïoh ka dei kaei kaei kaba ki shu thied rem da ka dor jong ka pisa. Kane ka Politik hakhmat ki nongkhaii shano kein kan ïalam ia ka jylla bad ia ka ri hi baroh kawei?Ka Politik hakhmat jong kiba bun ki riew paidbah ka dei tang kawei na ki kam kaba kim da ñiew than eh ba ka long kaba donkam, hynrei ym lah pat ban len ba ka dei kaba donkam tam namar ba ka dei kaba peit ia ka kam synshar khadar. Ka politk ka ïoh jaka ha ka synshar khadar dei lyngba ki aiñ kiba la thaw lyngba jong ka. Ki ong ba ka politik ka dei ka bor kaba lah ban pynlong ïa kiwei pat ban leh ia kaei kaba ki i donkam ba dei ban leh. Ha ki snem kiba la leit noh la iohi ba bun ki briew kiba la iadon bynta ha kane ka kam politik ki dei hi ki riew paidbah kiba bun na ki, ki shu kylla long ki nongmihkhmat paidbah ne ki Politician tang hadien ba ki lah ban jop ia ka Elekshon. Kham ñiar eh ban don kito kiba la pynkyrpang ïa lade na ka bynta ka kam politik naduh ka por ba ki dang pule. La iohi ruh ba ki don ki nongmihkhmat paidbah kiba wan ka kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka jingshakri paidbah kum ki Doktors bad ki Engineers, ki Contrators, ki nongkhaïi heh spah bad kiwei kiwei de bad kane ka dei na kawei ka daw kaba kongsan jong ka jingthrang bor jingthrang burom.Kham ñiar ban ïoh sngew na ki shyntur jong ki kmie ki kpa ba kin ong ba ki phah skul ia ki khun jong ki ba kin long Politician, hynrei kiba bun hi ki ong ba kin long heh longhain, kum ki Doktor, ki Engineer, ki IAS, IPS ,MCS, MPS, ki Bank Officers bad kumta ter ter. Ka long kaba shisha ba kum ki Officer bad ki heh sorkar ba kito ki samla ki la ioh kyrdan hadien ka jingminot jong ki ha ka jingpule ka la biang ïa ki ba kin hun ia ki kam kiba ki shakri paidbah, hynrei ym lah lait ba ki don kiwei pat kiba kham ikwah da ka kam politik kaba don ïa ka bor ban khyrwait shabi ia ki heh sorkar ne ki Officers. Na kiba bun ki kam shakri paidbah ba la kdew haneng kiba la ia rung bha sha ka kam politik ki dei ki doktor sumar briew namar ba ki don lypa ia ka kam shakri kaba iadei marmet bad ki paidbah bad ki kham don ka jinglah ban shah ha kaba iadei bad ki kam paidbah.Ha kawei ka liang ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba la dep ban pule ha ki lain hapher bapher ha ka politik ka ïarap hi ban tip kham bniah ia ka tynrai jong ka jingshaki. Kum ki doktor kiba jop ha ka elekshon bad shah jied Myntri ki shemphang kham bha ha kaba ïadei bad ka koit ka khiah. Kane ka long ruh kumjuh ïa kiwei pat. Ha ka jingshisha kat kum ka thymmei pyrkhat ka long kaba leh nohei shibun ba hadien ba la pule shitom ban long doktor ban ai ka jingshakri ïa ka jingim briew tang hapdeng khyndiat por ki la brai noh ban rung politik bad hap ban iadon bynta noh ha ki kam thaw ain.Niuma lah ban ong ba lah ban shakri paidbah khambha lyngba ka kam politik ban ïa ka kam sumar briew. Hynrei ym lah ban len ia ka jingshisha ba kaba trei na ka bynta ka mynsiem briew ka kham donkam shibun ban ia kaba don ha ka kam thaw ain. Bun ki kylli “kumno ba bun ki phah noh sha ka kam politik” hato ka long mo kaba biang ban jubab ba dei beit ka jingkwah brai ban ïoh ia ka bor, ka spah bad ka burom!.Ka long shisha kaba eh ban pynbeit pat ne phah pat ia kitei ki briew sha ka kam kaba ki la jied ban shakri na ka bynta ki paidbah. Hynrei lada ki pyrkhat bad puson ha lade lehse kan lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla bad yn lah ruh ban pynïoh ïa ka jingshakri kaba bha tam na ka bynta ki paidbah. Ka jingiehnoh jong ki shiteng ban shakri ia ki paidbah ka long ka jingduhnong ïa ki paidbah hi.
title: Ka Politic ba la pynlong mar khaïi shano kan ïalam!

content: Nongpoh, Lber 30 : Kum ka jingangnud ban ai ka jingsumar na ka bynta kiba pang kiba shitom hapoh ka jylla bad wat kiwei ki jylla shatei Lam Mihngi ka ri India, ki bor pynïaid jong ka ARHI Multi Super Specialty Hospital mynta ka sngi ki la plie paidbah noh ïa katei jaka ai jingsumar kaba don ha ka Shnong Mawsmai kaba ha khappud Meghalaya bad ka Assam.Ha kane ka sienjam la plie ïa katei ka jaka ai jingsumar da u Bah A.L Hek, uba dei u Myntri sorkar ka Meghalaya kaba dang dei tang ha ka OPC Block bad ruh ba la wan ban sakhi lang da u MLA ka Jirang u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, u Dr. Aman War, DHS barim ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawsmai bad ryngkat kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah bad ki nongshong shnong katei ka shnong Mawsmai.Kum ban pynpaw paidbah, kane ka ARHI Multi Super Specialty Hospital yn pynïaid bad khlieh duh da u Bah A.L Hek ryngkat ka jingdon lang u Aibansharai Nongsiej, u Dr. Mahamaya Prasad Singh, Dr. Sandeep Rai Das, u Dr. Jadunarh Burogohain, u Dr. Rubaiya Anam, u Dr. Simranjeet Singh, u Dr. Firoz Ahmed, u Kamal Goyal, u Parag Chutiya.Haba plie ruh ïa kane ka jaka ai jingsumar la wan ban ai ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh bad kyrkhu kyrpang ïa kane ka jaka ai jingsumar kaba don 200 jingthiah da u Fr. Kmenlang Nongrum parish priest ka Byrnihat Parish uba la ai ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ryngkat ka jingduwai ba kyrpang ba kane ka jaka ai jingsumar kan ai shisha ka jingshakri na ka bynta kiba pang ba shitom hapoh ka jylla bad kiwei kiwei ki jylla ba marjan.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi kum u kongsan, u Bah A.L Hek u la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ba la lah ban plie ïa kane ka jaka ai jingsumar bad khamtam ba ka jingthmu ban pynïar ïa ka jingshakri na ka bynta kiba pang ba shitom ka la dang urlong kumba u don kata ka mynsiem ban shakri na ka bynta ka imlang ka sahlang.U la ong ruh ba ïa mynta ka dang don tang haduh 200 jingthiah nalor kiwei kiwei ki lad ai jingsumar sha kiba pang ba shitom bad u khmih lynti ruh ba lyngba ki bor pynïaid ki dang pynjanai ïa ka jingshakri ba kane ka jaka ai jingsumar kan ai ka jingshakri kaba bha tam ha ka pang ak shitom ym tang ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad nak ki jylla shatei lam mihngi ka ri India ba ki angnud ban kane ka jaka ai jingsumar kan long kawei na ka jaka ai jingsumar kaba paw bad kaba biang tam ha ki jylla shatei lam mihngi ka ri India. Shuh shuh, u Bah A.L Hek u la ai khublei kyrpang ruh ïa baroh ki nongtrei hapoh kane ka jaka ai jingsumar bad kyntu ruh ba kin dei ban don ïa ka mynsiem ban shakri hok na ka bynta kiba pang ba shitom, namar ka jingthmu jong u ka long ba ka jingdon kane ka ka jaka ai jingsumar kan long shisha ka jingkyrkhu na ka bynta kiba pang ba shitom ba kin ioh shisha ïa kata ka jingsumar kaba paka tam ha ka pang ka shitom, u la bynrap.
title: La plie ïa ka jaka ai jingsumar ka ARHI Multi Speciality Hospital ha Mawsmai ha Ri Bhoi

content: Jowai, Lber 30 : Ka Kiang Nangbah Government College Student’s Union (KNGCSU) Jowai ha ka sngi Ba lang ka la ïakynduh ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ban pynkynmaw biang ïa ki mat jingdawa kiba ka Union ka ladep ban pynsngew sha ka Sorkar ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingdonkam kyrkieh jong ka College.U President ka Union, samla Evermore Rymbai ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor ula ong ba ka Union ka la aiti ïa ka dorkhas ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah tang kum ka jingpynkymmaw ïa ki mat jingdawa kiba ka Union ka ladep ban pynsngew naduh ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai.Ki mat jingdawa kiba ka KNGCSU ka la buh hakhmat eh ki long halor ka jing dawa buh ïa ki Security Guard ha ki Hostel jong ka College,, ban don ïa ki jaiñ ‘Personalized Graduation Gowns’ kiba pyndonkam ha sngi ba la pynkup burom ïa ki samla pule ne Graduation Day namarba bunsien ki samla pule ki hap ban siew da ka pisa bad kane kam sngew ïahap satia ïa ki nongïalam ka Union.Ka Union ka la dawa ban don ïa ki Lecturer ha ka Subject Khasi namrba haduh mynta ka College kam don nonghikai ha ka sobjek Khasi bad kane kaba la buh jingeh ïa ki samla pule khamtam ïa kito ki samla pule kiba shim Major ha ka Subject Khasi.Ka Union ka la dawa ban don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba katkum ka juk ba mynta hapoh ka Library jong ka College, naduh ki por mynshwa haduh mynta ki kot hapoh Library ki dei ki juh beit khlem don jingkylla, la ong utei u President.Nalor kine ki hangne, ka Union ka la dawa ban pynheh ïa ka Boys’ Hostel jong ki Shynrang kaba pdiang tang kumba 25 ngut ki samla pule shynrang. Kumba long mynta ki samla pule jong ka College ki don haduh 3,618 ngut bad ki shynrang ki don mar shiteng bad kane ka la dawa eh ïa kito ki samla shynrang kiba wan pule na ki shnong kiba jngai.U samla Rymbai u la ong hadien ha ka jingïakren bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ula pynsngew ba ïa kine ki kam kiba ka College ka dawa ki la ïaid shakhmat mynta bad ka Sorkar ka dang ap ban kut shwa ka Election MP 2024.Shuh shuh u la ong kum ka Union ki la pyrshang ban wanrah ïa ki kam pynroi hapoh ka College bad mynta ka kynti ka College ka la ïoh ïa ki lynti ïaid kjat ha ki bynta jong ka College bad ka jingpyni tynnad ïa ka phyllaw jong ka College ha kaba ka kam ka dang ïaid shakhmat ha ka jingtrei bad mynta sa ka jingai rong ïa ka College yn sa leh noh da ka jingkular lang jong u MLA ka Jowai Constituency Bah Wailadmiki Shylla.
title: Pynkynmaw ka KNGCSU ïa u Dy. CM ïa ki jingdawa ka Kiang Nangbah Govt. College

content: Nongpoh, Lber 30 : Da ka jingthmu ban dang pynneh pynsah ïa ka riti ka dustur bad ïa ka niam ka rukom tynrai ka Raid Nongpoh ba hap ha ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship, ka Raid Nongpoh mynta ka sngi ka la pynim biang ïa kawei na ka lehniam tynrai ba la tip ku ka shad Sajer ha u lum Wortoh ba dei ka jaka kyntang ba ju leh ïa ka kñia ka khriam naduh ki longshuwa ki man shuwa.Ïa kane ka lehniam Shad Sajer ka Raid Nongpoh la wan ban shim bynta da u Commissioner Secretary ka tnad Arts and Culture ka sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Fedrict Kharkongor kum u kongsan bad ka Editor ka Kot Khubor Shillong Times ka Kong Patricia Mukhim kum ka symbut kongsan.Nalor ki khun ki hajar ka Raid Nongpoh, la pynphuh pynphieng ruh ïa kane ka lehniam shad Sajer da ka jingdon lang u Lyngdoh ka Raid Nongpoh u Bah Linus Lyngdoh, u Lyngdoh ka Raid Nonglyngdoh, u Bah S. Lyngdoh, u Secretary ka Nongpoh Town Committee u Bah Rayonald Kharkamni, ki nongïalam seng bhalang na KSU, RBYF bad HNYF bad kynthup ruh ki longsan ki mansan bad ki riew rangbah na ka them Ri Bhoi.Lyngba jong kane ka sngi, ka Raid Nongpoh wat la kam ju pynlong shuh ïa kane ka lehniam Shad Sajer la 2o snem kynthih, hynrei ki rang bad ki thei na ka Raid Nongpoh bad na kiwei ki raid ba hap ha ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship ki la mih madan ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki jingshad tynrai, ka put ka tem bad ka rwai ka siang ba long tynrai shi bynta ban pynim biang ïa kane ka lehniam Shad Sajer ka Raid Nongpoh.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi kum u kongsan, u Bah Fedrict Kharkongor u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa ka Raid Nongpoh kaba la lah ban shim biang ïa kane ka sien jam ban pynim biang ïa kane ka shad Sajer kaba long shi bynta ban pyneh pynsah ïa ka riti ka dustur bad ka jinglong kyrpang ki khun ki hajar ha ka riti ka dustur kaba ngi donkam ban pynneh pynsah khanng ban nym ïap ka jaid bynriew.U la ong ruh ba ka tnad Arts and Culture jong ka sorkar jylla ka pyrshang ban plie lad plie lynti da ki lad jingïarap bapher bapher sha ki shnong ki thaw, ki Raid ki hima na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki riti ki dustur namar kum ka jaid bynriew ka donkam ban don la ka riti ka dustur kaba long ka jingïada ïa ka jaid bynriew jongngi.“Ka jingpynlong ïa kane ka Shad Sajer kam dei ruh tang ba ki rang bad ki thei ki ioh lad ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki riti ki dustur lyngba ka put ka tem ka shad ka mastih, hynrei haba ngi pynlong ïa akne ka rynsan ka long ruh ba ngi pynim ïa la ka riti ka dustur jongngi” ong u Bah Kharkongor bad bynrap ruh da kabba ong ba ka tnad Art and Culture ruh kan dang ïai ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka Raid Nongpoh ba ha ki snem ban sa wan ka jingpynlong ïa kane ka Shad Sajer ka long kaba phuh ba phieng bad kaba ai jingmyntoi ruh ïa ngi ban gin lah ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki riti ki dustur” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh, u la pynpaw ruh da kaba ong ba ka UNESCO ruh ka ju ai ki jingïarap ba kyrpang na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah sha ki jaid bynriew bapher bapher hapoh ka pyrthei bad ka daw hi ka long ba ka kwah ban pynnah pynsah ïa kiti ki riti ka dustur la ka long na kano kano ka jaid bynriew hapoh ka pyrthei.Na ka liang ka Kong Patricia Mukhim Editor ka Shillong Times haba kren ha kane ka sngi ka la I khublei kyrpang ïa ka Raid Nongpoh ba ka la pynlong ïa kane ka Shad Sajer ba la pynim biang hadien 20 snem bad ka la ong ruh ka jingpynlong ïa kane ka shad Sajer ka dei shi bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki riti ki dustur bad lada ngi kwah shisha ban pyneh ïa ki riti ki dustur ngi donkam ruh ban buh da ki jingthoh jingtar khnang pateng la pateng ka riti ka dustur jongngi kan im kan sah, ka la bynrap.
title: Pynim biang ka Raid Nongpoh hadien 20 snem ïa ka Shad Sajer ha Lum Wortoh ka jaka kyntang ka Raid

content: Shillong, Lber, 30 : Ka ophis jong ka Central Bureau of Communication, Field Office, Nongstoin hapoh ka tnat Information & Broadcasting, Sorkar India ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram ai jingtip halor ka Systematic Voter’s Educationa & Electoral Participations (SVEEP) hynnin ka sngi ha Nongstoin Kolej, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka tnat Election, Ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner, Sorkar Meghalaya, West Khasi Hills Distrik.U kongsan, Bah H. Kerwood Thabah, ADC, West Khasi Hills u la ong ba ka jingai jingtip ïa ki nongjied nongmihkhmat bad ka jingïashim bynta jong ki ha kane ka kam jied nongmihkhmat ka long kaba kongsan ha ka synshar paidbah bad u la ong ba ka long kaba donkam bha ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingkordor jong ka jingïashim bynta ha ka jingjied nongmihkhmat, khamtam da ki samla. U la kyntu ruh ïa baroh ba kin ïashim bynta ha kane ka elekshon ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik u Ïaiong ha Meghalaya.U Resource Person, Bah P T Blah, Deputy Labour Commissioner uba dei u nongai jinghikai jong ka Tnat Elekshon WKHD, Nongstoin, u la pyni ïa ka rukom treikam ka kor EVM bad ka kor VVPAT. U la batai ïa ki briew shaphang ka rukom ïashim bynta kaba khuid bad ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka teknoloji kum ki kor Electronic Voting Machine (EVM) bad ki kor Voter-Verified Paper Audit Trail (VVPAT). La pynlong ruh ïa ka jingïakop quiz halor kane ka phang ha kane ka sngi. La pynlong ruh ïa ki jingïakhun thoh slogan bad ki jingïakhun ai jingkren halor kane ka phang. La sam ruh ïa ki certificate bad song tyngka sha ki nongjop.Ka Kong Delicia Jyrwa, Field Publicity Asst, CBC Nongstoin ka la pynkut ïa ka jingïalang da ka jingkren ai jingkhublei.
title: Pynsngewthuh ka CBC Field Office ïa ki samla ha ka kam jied nongmihkhmat

content: Nongpoh, Lber, 29: Ka jingpynmih jong ka sorkar India ïa ka rule jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019, ka la pynlong ïa ka seng KSU ban nang pynjur ïa ka jingpyrshah ïa katei ka aiñ ïakjakor bad na ka liang ka KSU North Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi ka la thang syndon ïa ki kyndon aiñ jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 hadien ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ïew Mawlong bad na ka liang ka seng ka la kren shai ba kan nym pdiang da lei lei ruh ïa katei ka aiñ ban pyntreikam ha ka jylla bad ban pyrshah haduh ba kut.Ha katei ka jingïalang ban pyrshah ïa ka CAA la don lang naduh u Bah Ferdinald Kharkamni President, Samla James Hitler Mawphñiang General Secretary, Bah Lambok Rymbai Vice President ka KSU North Khasi Hills District, kynthup ruh kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam sengbhalang, ki nongïalam shnong bad ki riew rangbah.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi na ka liang ki nongïalam ka KSU ki la kren shai sha ka sorkar ba kum ka seng kan nym pdiang da lei lei ruh ïa katei ka aiñ bala pynbeit thymmai da ka sorkar BJP kaba long ka jingkhang bah khamtam ïa ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi ban khot nongshong shnong ïa ki jaitbynriew na ka niam Hindu, Sikh, Buddhist, Jain, Parsi bad ki khristan na ka Ri Bangladesh, Pakistan bad Afghanistan.Ki la ong ruh ba ka daw bah ba kum ka seng ka pyrshah jur ïa kane ka aiñ ka long namar ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka don markhap bad ka ri Bangladesh bad haduh mynta ka jylla kam pat don kano kano ka aiñ kaba ïada na ka jingwan rung kyrthep jong ki mynder watla na ka liang ka sorkar ka la pynksan ba katei ka aiñ kan nym treikam satia ha ki jaka ba hap hapoh ka sixth schedule, hynrei kum ki nongïalam ka seng ki sngew ba kane ka long ka jingplie lad ïa ki jaitbynriew heh na ka ri Bangladesh ban wan tur bad tyllep ïa ka jylla rit paid jong ngi kaba don tang shi troh ki nongshong shnong namar ka ka Sixt Schedule kam lah ban tehlakam satia ïa ka jingwan rung ki mynder bad bar jylla sha kane ka jylla.Ki la pynkynmaw ruh ba na ka liang ka seng ka la pan bad dawa ïa ka ILP ha ka jylla hynrei haduh mynta ka sorkar India ka dang buh sha kyndong almari jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs ïa ka Resolution bala mynjur da ka iing dorbar thawaiñ ha u Nohprah jong u snem 2019.Ki la ong ruh ba kum ka seng kam kwah ba ka jaitbynriew jong ngi kaba don tang shi troh kan shah tyllep noh ha ki mynder, bad kam kwah ba ki trai muluk kin long tang ki nongtong um bad nongthohdieng jongno re jong no kumba la kren da u Soso Tham naduh ki por ba mynshuwa hynrei kum ka seng kan pyrshah ïa katei ka aiñ bala lam khmat da ka NESO ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi baroh kawei ba ka mukotduma ka dang ïaid mynta ha Supreme Court.Namarkata na ka liang ka seng ka la kyrpad sha ki paidbah ban ai ka kti kadiang ka mon ban pyrshah ïa katei ka aiñ ba da lei lei ym dei ban pyntreikam ha ka jylla namar tang ki nongshong shnong bala don lypa ka sorkar kam pat lah ban pynbiang mynta pat ka thmu ban wanrah sa ki nongshong na kiwei kiwei ki ri.
title: Tang ki samla ba la don lypa ha ka ri ym lah pynbiang, thmu ka Sorkar ban pdiang na kiwei ki ri: KSU

content: Mendipathar, Lber 29 : U National President ka NPP bad Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma, ula pynbna ba ka Agatha K Sangma ka MP Lok Sabha na Tura kum ka Nonglamktien ne ‘Ambassador” ka Jylla Meghalaya’ sha Parliament ban tynruh bad ïasaid ïa ki mat kiba ïadei bad ka roi ka par bad ka jingkiew shaphrang jong ka Jylla.Haba ïalap elekshon ha ka ktem ka NPP ha North Garo Hills, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong “Baroh ki Jylla ki ju phah ïa ki jing tyrwa sha Delhi, kumjuh ruh, ka Meghalaya ka ju leh lang, hynrei kine ki jingtyrwa ki donkam ïa ka ban buddien, bad ka MP jong ngi ka Agatha K Sangma ka ju bunkam ban ïakren bad ki nongïalam ha Delhi ban pynthikna ba ngin ïoh bun eh ka bhah. Kum ka Nonglamktien ka Meghalaya, ka la ïakren ïa ki jingtyrwa jong ngi (Meghalaya) bad u Myntri Rangbah Duh, ki Myntri Sorkar bad ki Heh Ophisar ha Delhi, ban pynthika ba kin lait noh”.U Conrad ula ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka Agatha halor ka jingpyllait ïa ki project ba kot da ki hajar klur ïa ka Meghalaya hapoh ka PM-DevINE, PMGSY, PMAY, MGNREGS, bad kiwei kiwei, kiba la syniang sha ki jingkylla kiba paw hapoh ka Jylla.“Ka long kaba kongsan ba ngi jied ïa ki MP, kiba lah ban treikam ha ryngkat bad ka Sorkar Jylla. Ka long kongsan ruh ba ngi don ïa ka MP, kaba don ka jingïadei bad ïajan ha Delhi. Ka MP ba mynta jong ngi ka dei kaba la shemphang bad ka la trei la lai samoi bad nga kyrpad ïa ki nongthep vote ba kin ai rai biang sha ka khnang ba kan lah ban bteng ha ka ban trei bad ka Jylla ban pyntyllun shaid shaid ïa ka roi ka par.
title: Ka Agatha ka dei ka nonglam ktien ka jylla sha Parliament; pynbna u Conrad

content: Shillong, Lber, 29: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la rai ban ai jingkyrshan ia ki kyrtong jong kiwei ki seng saiñpyrthei ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong watla ka party kam shym la lah ban pynïeng kyrtong ha kane ka kynti.U Working President ka KHNAM Bah Thomas Passah haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ong ka daw ba ka party kam shym pynïeng ïa la u jong u kyrtong ka long namarba ka KHNAM ka kwah ban pynleit jingmut ha ka Elekshon MDC ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).“Kam don jingmut bad ngi la don ka jingïakren ban pyrkhat tang na ka bynta ka elekshon MDC,” la ïathuh u Bah Passah.Haba kylli, “ngin sa pynlong shwa da ka jingïalang ha kine ki taïew ban sa wan na ka bynta ban shim rai ïano ka party kan ai jingkyrshan bad kum ka seng ngin hap hap ban peit shwa kiei ki mat treikam jong ki seng saiñpyrthei ne jong ki kyrtong ha kaba ïadei bad ki mat kiba ïatyngkhuh bad ka jylla khamtam kiba ïadei bad ki ritpaid riewlum.”“Ngi ladep ban pynlong shisien ïa ka jingïalang halor kane hynrei ngim pat rai pat shim rai ïano ngin ai jingkyrshan hynrei ha kane ka taïew ban sa wan, ngin sa pynlong jingïalang bad ngin sa shim ïa ka rai,” la ïathuh u Bah Passah.U la pynpaw ruh ba ka KHNAM ka kwah da ka Sorkar ka bym dei kaba synshar da ka Bharatiya Janata Party(BJP) hapoh ka Sorkar Pdeng namarba lada ka BJP kan dang ïai wan ha ka bor synshar, kan sa pyntreikam ïa ka Citizenship Registration Certificate Register, nangta sa ka National Population Register (NPR), sa ka National Register of Citizens (NRC) bad kine kin buh jingeh ïa ki ritpaid hapoh ka Ri India, u la bynrap.“Na ka bynta ka jingshngaiñ jong ngi, ngi hap ban pyntikna ba ngin ïaid da ka Sorkar ka bym don ka BJP,” u la ong shuh shuh.U la ïathuh ruh ba ki don ki seng saiñpyrthei kiba la phah shithi ban pan jingkyrshan hynrei ka party kam pat shim satia ïa kano kano ka rai. “Ngi hap ban pyrkhat bha nadong shadong hashwa ba ngin shim ïa ka rai,” u la ong.
title: Elekshon Lok Sabha: Rai ka KHNAM ban kyrshan ïa kiwei ki party

content: Shillong, Lber 29: U doktor radiologist jong ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS) u la ïoh khusnam da ka Royal College of Radiology (FRCR) da ka Royal College of Radiology (RCR) kaba ha London.Dr Humsheer Singh Sethi, uba dei u Senior Resident, u la long uwei napdeng ki doktor radiologist u ban ïohpdiang ïa kane ka khusnam na shabar ri. ïa ki eksam FRCR la ithuh kum kawei na ki lai tylli ki eksam kiba la ithuh ha ka pyrthei baroh kawei kaba dei kaba la ithuh da ki doktor radiologist kiba trei ha United Kingdom.Na ka liang Dr. Sethi u la leit kiba bun ki jingshah hikai hapoh ka Royal College na ka bynta ki 2 snem. Haba shim ïa kane ka lad na ka liang u Dr. Sethi u la jied ban shim ka lad ban trei National Health Service (NHS) hapoh ka ri UK bad u la aiti ban shakri ïa ki briew jong ka Meghalaya ha NEIGRIHMS.Na ka liang u Medical Superintendent bad u HoD, Radiodiagnosis, NEIGRIHMS, Prof. C. Daniala la ong, “Kane ka kam ba u la ïoh ka pynpaw ïa ka jingaiti jong u shimet ban trei hapoh ka jaka sumar NEIGRIHMS. Nga ai khublei ïa u Dr. Sethi halor kane ka jingïoh jingithuh bad kaba long riewshem phang ha kaba ïadei bad ki lad ai jingshakri ha ka koit ka khiah.”U Prof. Nalin Mehta, Director, NEIGRIHMS u la ong, “U la long uba shah jied na kiba khyndiat eh kum u doktor ka radiologist bad u ban ïoh ïa ka khusnam ha ka pyrthei kane ka la wanrah ka jingsarong ym tang ïa ka NEIGRIHMS hynrei ïa baroh kawei ka kynhun ki nongsumar kiba don ha Meghalaya.”
title: ïoh khusnam u Doktor Radiologist na ka FRCR, London

content: Shillong, Lber, 29: Ki shipai BSF jong ka 172 Battalion, Meghalaya kiba la pynlong ka jingpynap shrip ki la ïohbat ïa kawei ka kali kaba kit ïa ka shini ba la thmu ban khaii beaiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh bad kem ruh arngut ki nong India na khappud Kuliang kaba hap hapoh ka East Jaiñtia Hills District.Lyngba ka jingïoh jingtip kaba bniah, ki shipai BSF ki la ïohbat ïa ka kali kaba kit hduh 35,000 kilor ka shini katba ka dang wan na ka thaiñ Ladrymbai ban leit sha ka shnong Kuliang.Ha ka jingtohkit, u nongñiah bad u nongbud kim shym la lah satia ban pyni ïa kino kino ki dulir halor ka jingkit ïa ka shini.Ïa ka kali, ka shini bad kynthup ïa ki arngut kiba la shah kem la aiti noh sha tnat Custom ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: Kurup ki BSF 35 hajar kilo ka shini, shah kem arngut

content: Shillong, Lber 29: Ka Shillong Press Club (SPC) kala ther ïa u President ka VPP bad MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit halor ka jingkynthoh kaba pynjahburom ïa ka burom ka ijot jong ki Nongthoh khubor ka Jylla khamtam kiba don ha Ri-lum Khasi Jaiñtia.“U Bah Basaïawmoit ula shu kynthoh pathar khlem ki nongrim bad ki sakhi kiba biang kiba ktah ïa ka jingtrei hok jong baroh ki Working Journalist kiba la kitkhia ïa ka kam wat hapdeng ki jingeh, ki jingduna bad ki jingtynjuh bad kila pyrshang katba lah ban trei ïa ka kam thoh khubor ban kyrshan ïa ka jinglaitluid ban kren bad pynpaw kumba la pruid dak da ka Riti Synshar ka Ri,” ong u Bah David Laitphlang, President ka SPC ha ka kyrwoh.U Bah David ula ong ba kane kam dei ka sien kaba nyngkong ba u Ardent ula kren tohmet ïa kaba u tip kham bha ma u ïa ki daw, ïa kino kino ki briew kiba pynpaw ïa ka jing bym sngew ïahab bad ka pyrkhat, ka pyrdaiñ, ka jinglong bad ka jingkren jong u.“Ka Shillong Press Club ka pynrem ïa kane ka jingleh riewkhlaw jong une u briew ïa uba ngi ngeit ba u dei uba don ka kyrdan ha ka imlang sahlang. Namar kata, kan bha shibun eh ïa u ban shu ‘boycott’ ïa ki lad pathai khubor khnang ba un nym buh ïalade bad ïa ka Party VPP ha ka jinglong jingman ka bym sngewtynnad ha ka jingpyrshang ban shakri ia ka bha ka miat ki paidbah ka Meghalaya,” ong u Bah David.“Ban dawa panmab na kum une u riewstad kan dei tang ka jingpynsyrwa kai ïa ka por bad ka pyrkhat pyrdaiñ bad kumta, ka Shillong Press Club ka ieh ha ka jingstad jong ki nongpule bad ki nongpeit khubor ba kin rai mano, mynno, kumno bad hangno ba ngi ki leh ïa kaba bakla,” ula ong.“Ban pynrem ïa kaei kaba tei ka dei kaba ngi pdiang sngewbha namar ka ïarap ïa baroh ban pynbha ïalade, hynrei ban shu hylla da ka jingsngewskhem halor ki kam ba um tip, ka dei ka lynti kaba bakla ban shakri ïa ki para briew. Haba kut, ngi hap kynmaw ba ngim dei ban bishar bym hok ïano ïano ruh, namar baroh ngin sa shah bishar ha kawei ka sngi,” ula bynrap.
title: Ym lah pdiang ka SPC ïa ki jingkynthoh u Nongïalam ka VPP

content: Shillong, Lber 30: Ha kawei na ki sienjam ba dang shu pynmih shen, ka Lakshmi Ramamurthy, Hon. Trustee, Centre for Public Policy Research ka la pynpaw ïa la ka jingsngew ba halor kumno ban khanglad ban pynduna ïa ka jingma na u duma ha ka ri.Ka la kdew ruh ba ka India, ka la pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ ban nym shah shuh ban pyndonkam ïa ki e-cigarette ha u snem, hynrei kane kam shym la urlong satia halor ka jingshna bad pynmih ïa kine ki jingdih duma. Ka finance bill u snem 2021, ka sorkar ka la pyntip ïa ka jingpynïapher ïa ka khajna hapdeng ki cigarette trai shnong, e-cigarette bad HTP hynrei kane ka jingpynïapher kam shu la treikam halor ka jingkhang ïa ki e-cigarette.Ka Panama ka la pynlong da ka Conference of the Parties tenth session (COP10) ha u Rymphang. Ka COP10, hapoh ka Framework Convention for Tobacco Control (FCTC) ka WHO, ka la shimkhia na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah ha ka pateng ban wan.Ka FCTC ka la pashat jingmut ruh ïa ki laitylli ki mat ban ïada ïa ka jingdih duma- kata ban pynduna ïa ka jingpynmih, pynduna ïa ka shalan bad pynduna ïa ka jingma.ïa mynta ka Conference ka la pynsngew ba donkam ïa ka FCTC ban don ïa ki kor ki bor ban khanglad ïa ka jingma ka jingdih duma.Ha kajuh ka por ka la dei ïa ki aiñ ban ai ka jingpynsaja ïa ka karkhana pynmih duma sla. Ka COP10 ka la pynbna ruh ba ka thong ka long nyngkong eh ïa ka koit ka khiah u paidbah.Shibynta ban ïada ïa ka jingma ki jingdih duma, bad ka jingpyndonkam ïa u duma ïa ki sikret, bun ki ri ka pyrthei ki la pyndonkam noh da ki electronic cigarette (e-cigarettes), kum ki vape, bad kiwei pat ki Electronic Nicotine Delivery Systems (ENDS). Ha ka jingwadbniah kiba bun ki ri ki pynkut ba ki e-cigarette ki khamduna ka jingma ban ïa kiwei pat ki jait cigarette.Ha ka jingwadbniah da ka Public Health England la kdew ba kito kiba pyndonkam ïa ki e-cigarette ki kham lait jingma. Wat hapdeng ka jingwadbniah bad ki jingshisha halor ki e-cigarette, ka Finance Ministry of India ka la pynbna ba ka la ñiewbeaiñ noh ïa ki e-cigarette ha u snem 2019, bad la mana bym bit shuh ban shna, shalan, wanrah nabar, die bad kiwei kiwei ïa ki e-cigarette.Ka jingkhang ïa ki e-cigarette ka la ong ba ha baroh ki liang kynthup ïa baroh ki Electronic Nicotine Delivery Systems (ENDS), heated tobacco products (HTP), e-Hookahs, bad kiwei kiwei ki jait tiar.Ka rai ban khang khyrdep ïa ki e-cigarette, HTP, bad kiwei pat ka long khlem da pule bniah ne wadbniah. Watla mynta la arphew snem ka jingïakhun ban ïada ïa ka jingma na u duma, hynrei la sakhi ïa ka jingïap kaba dang bteng haduh mynta.Ka India kum ka dkhot ka FCTC, ka la ïakhun dohïap ban pynduna ïa ka jingdon ki nongdih duma namar ka dei ka ri kaba ar ha pyrthei ban don bun tam ki nongdih duma, kumba 100 million (GATS 2017). Ka ICMR ha ka Cancer Registry Programme ka shem ba ka cancer na u duma ka la jan kot kumba (48.7%) ha ka ri ha u snem 2021.Halor kane ka jingma, ka India ka la pynleit jingmut ban pynduna noh ïa ka jingpynmih ïa u duma da kaba pynheh ïa ka khajna, buh kyndon kiba kham eh bad pynlong ïa ka jingïalap paidbah halor ka jingma u duma.Pynban wat hapdeng kine ki jingïakhun, ym pat ïohkheit satia ïa u soh jingjop. Ka jingïakhun ban pynduna ïa u duma khlem pep kan pynduna ïa ka jingpang bad ka jingïap.Ha India, ka jingdih ïa u duma ka dei ruh kawei na kiba bun jingma ïa ka koit ka khiah ki paidbah. Kumba 5.3% la pynlut ïa ka pisa tang ha kaba sumar ïa ki jingma kiba ïadei bad u duma bad ha u snem 2023 ka jinglut ka kot kumba ?13,500 klur kaba long 1.04% ka jinglut ha ka GDP.Ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki jingdih duma bad bam duma ka buh jingma ïa ka koit ka khiah ki paidbah ha India. Kumba palat shi million ki riewrangbah ha India ki duh ei ïa la ka jingim manla u snem namar u duma, kaba long 9.5% na ka jingïap briew bad kane ka pynpaw shai kdar ba u duma ka dei ka dawbah ka jingbun ki briew ba ïap ha ka ri. Ban pynduna ïa ka jingma u duma ka India ka donkam ban pynlong ïa ka prokram pynsngew thuh paidbah halor ka jingma u duma.Ka India ka hap bud ïa ka nuksa kiwei pat ki ri kum ka United States, United Kingdom, New Zealand, Sweden, Japan, bad Canada ban pyndonkam ïa ka jingpyndonkam duma.
title: Ka jingïakhun kumno ban khanglad ïa ka jingma u duma ha India

content: Shillong, Lber 29: “Kane ka Sngi Thohdieng Bakhuid ne ka Good Friday ka pynkynmaw ïa ngi ba ngi donkam ïa U Nongsiewspah u ban pynim ïa ngi namar ba ngi dei ki nongpop,” ong u Parish Priest ka Mary’s Help of Christian ka Cathedral Parish ha Laitumkhrah u Rev. Fr Bernard Laloo ha ka lehniam Sngi Thohdieng Bakhuid.Haba sneng bad kraw ïa ki para bangeit u la ong ba donkam ban pdiang ïa ka diengphna jong ka jingkylla bamut bad donkam ruh ban puson ha kane ka Sngi ba kyntang bad ka Sngi ba shah sah Narphna u Trai Jisu Khrist bad ong ruh ba u Jisu Khrist u la ïap khlem leh pop u la shah shitom na ka bynta ki briew.“Dei na kane ka daw ba ngi donkam ïa ka diengphna bad ïa u Nongsiewspah u ba la shah sah Narphna na ka bynta jong ngi namar ngi dei ki nongpop bad ngi donkam ïa u nongpynim ban siew spah ïa ngi,” u la ong.U la ong ba ka niam Khristan khlem ka diengphna ka long ka niam kaba khlem Nongsiewspah kan shu long tang ka kynhun khlem Nongsiewspah.“U Jisu hi u lah ong ba jar kiba kwah ban long synran u hap shim bad kit ïa ka diengphna bad bud nadien jong u, ka diengphna ha shwa ka jingshah ïap u Jisu ka lah dei ka jingtieng bad jingma bad baroh ma ngi ngin hap Bah ïa ka diengphna bad ka diengphna kaba kumno pat ngin hap ïa bah,” buh jingkylli u Lyngdoh Sohblei ïa kiba ngeit ha ka jinglehniam.U la ong ba ka jingthmu jong ka jingsah Narphna la leh ïa kito kiba ïaleh pyrshah ne kiba pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon, hynrei ïa u Jisu pat la kynnoh ba u la leh pyrshah.“Kumta ngi donkam ban jied ïa ka diengphna jong ka jingkylla kaba mut ban phai sha U Jisu bad ban leh ïa ki kam ba bha ban duwai bad ban leh ïa ki kam kylla na kaba sniew sha ka babha,” u la ong.
title: Ngi donkam ban bah ïa ka Diengphna jong ka jingkylla bamut: Rev Fr Laloo

content: Nongpoh, Lber, 29: Ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kyrtong MP na ka party NPP mynta ka sngi ka la hiar sha ki thaiñ Mawhati ban sakhi hi dalade ïa ka jingeh jong ki paidbah sha katei ka thaiñ, ban ïakynduh ïa ki nongshong shnong ki nongïalam shnong, kaba dang donkam shibun ki kam pynroi ha katei ka thaiñ.Ha kane ka jingleit hiar ka kong Ampareen sha ka thaiñ Mawhati la sdang naduh Umsiang ba la wan ban pynshngaiñ lang da ki nongïalam ka NPP Ri-Bhoi naduh u Bah Clement Mawlong President, Bah RM Mukhim Working President, Bah Shemphang Lyngdoh President NPP Mawhati Block bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam ba la wan pynïasoh sha ka party NPP.Na ka liang ki nongïalam shnong ki ba la ioh lad ban kren ha kane ka sngi bad ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ki la pynpaw ka jing sngew kmen ba dei tang ka kong Ampareen ka kyrtong ka nyngkong ka ba wan ban kynduh ïa ki paidbah kane ka thaiñ ban sngap ïa ki jingeh ki jong ki, khamtam ba kum ki paidbah ki la angnud palat ban ioh noh u surok ba paka nalor kiwei kiwei ki jingeh ba la pynsngew hakhmat jong ka bad kular ruh ban kyrshan ïa ka NPP da ka jingngeit skhem ba katei ka jingangnud jong ki kan urlong.Haba kren sha ki paidbah na ka liang ka kong Ampareen ka la ong “Ngam dei tang ka nongïalam ha ka saiñ pyrthei hynrei nga dei ruh ka briew kaba trei ha ki kam treimon sngewbha bad kim don ki ban pynsngap ïa ki mat ki ba kongsan ki ban kyntiew ïa ka shnong ka thaw hynrei dei manga ka ban leh ïa kita, ka ban sngap ïa ki jingeh bad ka ban kyntiew ïa ki shnong ki thaw, nga trei da kaba buh ïa ka thong ha khmat”, ong ka kong Ampareen.Ka la ong ruh, ngam tip ba phi la ju ïohi ne em ïa ki MP ha ka shnong jong phi, bad ki la don kiba ong ba kim pat ju iohi ïa ki MP ha ki sngi ki ba la leit, ka la pynpaw ruh ba ka don ïa ka jingthrang ban wan rah ïa ki jingkylla ha kine ki sngi ki ban wan, ka la kular ruh ba hadien ba la dep ka jingjied MP kan sa wan ban pynlut por bad ki nongshong shnong ban sngewthuh ïa ki jingeh jong ki briew shnong.Shuh shuh ka la ong, ba kam dei kaba suk ban long kum ki nongïalam, hynrei ka la kular ban trei shitom ban wan rah ïa ki jingkylla ha katei ka thaiñ lyngba ki kam pynroi.
title: Hiar ka Dr. Ampareen sha Mawhati ban pan jingkyrshan, ud ki paidbah ïa ka jingdonkam surok

content: Shillong, Lber, 29: Ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong bad kiba bun na ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Mawlai Syllaikariah, kaba hap hapoh ka Mawlai Constituency ki la rai ban ‘boycott’ ne ban ym ïashim bynta ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024.U Rangbah Shnong jong ka Mawlai Syllaikariah Bah C. Shullai ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei u la ïathuh ba ka jingshim rai jong ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka long halor ka jingleh mynthi jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ka bym shym la sngap ïa ka jingkyrpad ban maramot ïa ka surok PWD bad ïa ki surok shnong bad lynti ïaid kjat hapoh ka shnong ba ka tnat PHE ka la tih bad thep ïa ki pipe um mynta la shi snem tam.U la ïathuh ba u Additional Chief Engineer jong ka tnat PHE u la wan peit hi dalade bad u la ong ba un sa bthah ïa u Kontraktor ban shna noh ïa ka surok bad ïa ki lynti shnong ba ladep tih hynrei la jan shi snem la shu ieh beit kumto.“Dang lai bnai duna ngi ladep ai ïa ka jingthoh da ka kti ha ka Ophis PHE hynrei ka long kumba ibeiñ ïa ka shnong ba ki iehsat kumne,” la ïathuh u Bah Shullai.“Ha u snem 2022 ka tnat PHE ka la wan buh ïa ki pipe um ban ai um ïa ka shnong lyngba ka Greater Shillong Water Supply Scheme (GSWSS). Ki la sdang ban tih ïa ka surok PWD, ïa ka surok shnong bad ïa ki lynti ïaid kjat naduh u snem 2022 hynrei ynda ladep tih, ki shu ieh noh kumto. Ha ka por ba slap, da ki bnai ngi (hap ban) ïaid nalor ka ktieh. Ha ka por ba rang u pumpum u rung sha ki ing jong ki briew,” ong u Bah Shullai.U la ïathuh ba ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka la kyrpad ïa u Kontraktor ban tap bad ban leh bha noh bad shipor u la sdang ban leh bad u iehnoh bad u la sdang biang bad iehnoh. “Bun ki briew ki la mynsaw ha ka por ktieh ba slap. Ngi la kyrpad rit ïa u kontraktor hynrei u shu ong toto bad shu kut tang ka ktien,” la ong u Rangbah Shnong.“Shipor u la sdang biang (ban trei) bad u la iehnoh shiteng. Ki don ki jaka kiba hap ngi ban shna hi da ka shnong bad ngi la hap ban pynlut da ka pisa shnong kumba 15 hajar haduh 20 hajar ba ki nongleit nongwan kin suk bad ki kali kin suk ïaid. Ki don ki jaka ba ki kali kim long shuh wat tang ban ïaid,” u la bynrap.“U Kontraktor u la sdang trei bad la wan noh u slap u iehnoh. Shipor ngi la ïaishah namarba la hap u slap bad hadien kata ngi la kyrpad biang ban pyndep noh ïa ka kam ba ki paidbah kin suk ka leit ka wanm” u la ong shuh shuh.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Rangbah Shnong, ki don leilei ki jaka ba ki briew haba ki ïaid mynmiet ki hap hapoh ki thliew. Ki la don arngut ki khynnah rit kiba hap ha kine ki thliew ki la mynsaw. I don iwei ruh i longkimie ba dang armet i la liat ha kane kajuh ka thliew bad i la mynsaw bad donbok ba dang don kiba lap ban sei ïa i na thliew.“Ha ka khongdong ha lailad, kiba ñiah Scooty mynmiet ki ur, ki hap bad ki mynsaw bad bun ruh ki Scooty ki la sniew. Ngi la kyrpad ïa ka tnat PHE bad ngi la ai ruh da ka jingthoh hynrei kam leh eiei,” u la ong.“Ngi la khot ïa u MLA u ong ba um lah ban leh eiei namarba ka dei ka kam jong ka PHE bad u MDC ruh kumjuh u ong ba dei ka kam jong ka PHE um lah ban leh eiei. Ngi la thoh da ka shithi sha ka tnat PHE ruh ki sngap manman khlem ai jubab haduh mynta,” u la bynrap.U la ïathuh ba ha ka taiew ba ladep, kum u Rangbah Shnong u la phah noh da ka ujor lyngba ka Public Grievances Complaint sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla hynrei mynta la jan shitaiew ym don satia ba jubab eiei halor kane ka jingai ujor.“Ym don ba salia haba ngi shem jingeh. Ngim don lad shuh bad ka lad mynta ka long sa tang ba ngin ym ïashim bynta shuh ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha namarba ngim i myntoi. Ngi jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat ba kin dup lah ban ïarap ha ki kam pynroi bad ki jingeh ba ka shnong ka ud ka nam ban pynsngerw sha ka Sorkar hynrei ka shu kut noh kumto,” ong u Bah Shullai.“Haba ngi jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat ngi mut ba kin mihkhmkat ïa ngi ki paidbah bad ban rah ïa ki jingeh jong ngi sha ka Sorkar pynban ngi sngew ba kam don jingmyntoi,” la kren diaw u Bah Shullai.“Ka Executive Committee ka la rai ba ngin ym ïashim bynta ha ka elekshon Lok Sbha namarba ka Sorkar kam leh eiei. Kam don jingmyntoi lada ngi thep vote. Bun ki nongshong shnong ki ong ba ngin ym thep vote. Hynrei ka shong pat ka mon shimet jong kito kiba kwah ban thep vote hynrei kiba bun hi ki ong ban ym thep vote,”la ïathuh u Bah Shullai haba pyntip ïa ka jingshim rai jong ka Dorbar Shnong bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong.“Ngin ym shim jingkitkhlieh shuh ban pynïaid beit ïaid ryntih ïa ki Polling Station bad ngin ieh beit ba ka Sorkar kan leh katba ka sngewbit hynrei ka shnong kam don jingkitkhlieh. Lada ka Sorkar kam ïohi bad kam shimkhia ïa kane ka jingeh kaba ngi la pynpaw shwa ka Elekshon MP ngi kum ka shnong ngin ym ïashim bynta eiei,” la bynrap shuh shuh u Bah Shullai.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Rangbah Shnong, ki nongthep vote ha ka shnong Mawlai Syllaikariah ki don 1500 ngut bad lah ruh ban tam namarba ki don kiba dang shu pynrung kyrteng thymmai ha ka Electoral Roll.
title: Rai ka EC ka DS Mawlai Syllaikariah ban “boycott” ïa ka Elekshon Lok Sabha

content: Shillong, Lber 29: Palat 79 hajar kiba pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon ilekshon ba la lap lyngba ka C-Vigil app jong ka Election Commission of India. La lap ba naduh ba la pynbna ïa ka ilekshon 2024, lah palat 79,000 ki jingujor la lah ban ïohpdiang.ïa kane la ïathuh da u Anuj Chandak, ECI Joint Director (Media) ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ki la don haduh palat 99% ki jingujor kiba la dep ban pynbeit bad jan 89% na kine ki jingujor la dep pynbeit hapoh ka 100 minit.La palat ban ïa ka 58,500 tylli ki jingujor (73% na baroh ba la ïohpdiang kidei kiba la pynïeng beaiñ ïa ki jingtah poster bad ki banner. Palat 1400 ki jingujor la ïohpdiang ha kaba ïadei bad ka pisa, ki jingai sngewbha bad kaba sam kiad.Lah jan kumba 3% jong ki jingujor 2454 kadei kaba la leh ha ki jaka jong ki jingdon jingem, na ka 535 ki jingujor la ïohpdiang bad ki pyni ïa ki tiar pynmynsaw, bad na kine kumba 529 lah dep ban pynbeit.Kumba 1000 ki jingujor la lap ba ki la pynkut shaba palat ka por ban pyndonkam ïa ki kor pynsawa.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la pynbna ïa ka General Election 2024, u Chief Election Commissioner u Rajiv Kumar u la kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong ban long kiba peitngor bad ban pyndonkam ïa ka app ban pyntip lada don kiba pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon ilekshon da kiba bun ki kam.U la ong ba ka C-Vigil ka dei kaba biang ban pyndonkam bad kaba suk ban pyndonkam ban pynïasoh ïa ki nongshong shnong da ka District Control Room, Returning Officer bad ki Flying Squad Team.Da kaba pyndonkam ïa kane ka app, ki nongshong shnong ki lah ban pyntip mardor ïa ki jingjia leh be-aiñ bad ban leit bran bran sha ki ophis returning officer.Kiba bun ki lad kiba lah ban pyndonkam da ka C-VIGIL kaba lah ban long kaba jop. Ki nongpyndonkam ki lah ban ring sur, ki dur bad ki video ha ka por kaba dei.Da kane ka mut ba ki flying squad kin tip ïa ka jaka kaba la pynkheiñ aiñ, bad ki dur ba la shon da ki nongshong shnong lah ban pyndonkam kum ki sakhi ha ka aiñ.
title: Palat 79 hajar kiba la pynkheiñ kyndon ilekshon ba ïoh pdiang lyngba ka C-Vigil APP

content: Shillong, Rymphang 19 : U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la pyntip ba la mang haduh 344 klur tyngka na ka bynta ban ïada ïa ki ar tylli ki tyllong um ba kongsan tam jong ar tylli ki kwah, kata ka wah Umïew ha East Khasi Hills bad ka wah Ganol kaba don ha rilum Garo.Haba pyntip ïa kane ha Iing Dorbar, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba dang ha ka taïew ba la dep ki la pyllait paidbah ïa ki projek na ka bynta katei hi ka phang.“Kane kadei ka sienjam kaba kongsan tam ban ïada bad pynneh pynsah ïa ki tyllong um jong ka wah Umïew bad ka wah Ganol,” u la bynrap biang.Shuh shuh u la pyntip ba ka Meghalaya kadei ka jylla kaba nyngkong ban don ïa ka State Water Policy bad ki don ruh bun tylli ki projek ban ïada ïa ki tyllong um ha ka jylla.“Ngi dei mangi na ki katto katne ki jylla kiba treilang bad ka North Eastern Space Application Centre (NESAC) bad ngi la dep ban buh dak ruh kumba 50,000 tylli ki umpohliew,” u la ong.Nalorkata, u ïathuh ruh ba ka sorkar jylla ka dang trei ruh na ka bynta ban don haduh 400 – 500 tylli ki jaka pynlang um ha ka jylla.U Myntri Rangbah u ong ruh ba ka ishu ba ïadei bad ka um kadei ka mat kaba ki la shimkhia hynrei kam dei satia pat ka kam kaba suk namar ka tyngkhuh bad ka jingkylla ka suiñbneng.Shwa kane, u Nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah, Bah RV Lyngdoh u la kyntu ïa ka sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban ïada ïa ka tyllong um jong ka wah Umïew kaba la nang ring tyrkhong na ka daw bym don ka jingïada kaba biang.Shwa kane, u Myntri ka tnad PHE, Marcuise N Marak u la ong ba da ka thong ban ym shaniah than eh ïa ka um kaba wan tang na ka wah Umïew ha Mawphlang kaba dei ka tyllong jong ka Greater Shillong Water Supply Scheme, kawei pat ka tyllong kaba tyrwa mynta ban bsa ïa ka New Shillong kadei ka wah Umkhen.U ong ruh ba ka sorkar mynta ka shim bun ki lad ki lynti ban pynkhie im ïa ki tyllong um bad haba ïadei bad ka JJM ki la leh ruh ïa ka geo-tagging ïa baroh ki tyllong um khnang ba yn lah ban ïada ïa ki.U Myntri u Myntri ruh ba haduh mynta kam shym la don kano kano ka por ba la buh haba ïadei bad ka JJM hynrei ka thong hi ka long ban pyndep ïa ka jingpyntrei kam ïa ka ha shwa u Lber 2024.
title: Ban ïada ïa ka tyllong um Wah Umiew bad wah Ganol pyntip u CM ba la mang haduh 344 klur tyngka

content: Shillong, Rymphang 19: U Bah Adelbert Nongrum, MLA ka VPP na North Shillong mynta ka sngi, u la kren da ka Ktien Khasi ha ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla, ban pynpaw ka jingbym sngew ïaiap halor ka jingkren lamphrang u Lat da ka Ktien Hindi bad ka kumjuh ruh ïa ka jingbym kren ne pule lut jong u ïa ki mat treikam jong ka sorkar.Hadien ba la ïoh jingbit na u Shongknor ha ïingdorbar, namar ba ka lynti ka shah, u Bah Adelbert, u la ong ba ka Seng VPP bad kiba bun hi ki paidbah ka jylla kim pdiang satia ba u Lat un kren da ka ktien Hindi, namar ba ka Hindi kam dei ka Official Language jong ka jylla, wat lada kadei ka Official Language jong ka sorkar pdeng.U la kynthoh ruh ïa ki katto katne, kynthup ïa ki riew pawkhmat kiba la ong ba ka Hindi kadei ka National Language. “Ym shym don hangno hangno ruh ki jingthoh ha ka Riti Synshar jong ka ri India ka ban ong ba ka Hindi kadei ka National Language”, la ong u Bah Nongrum. Kumta, u la ong ba ka jingkren jong ki kadei kaba ïalam bakla.U la pynpaw ruh ka jinglyngngoh balei ba u Lat, u Phagu Chauhan um shym la kren ne pule lut ïa ki mat treikam jong ka sorkar. U la ong ba kaba kum kane ka jia tang ha ki jylla, ha kaba kam don ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng u Lat bad ka sorkar jylla ne hapdeng ka sorkar jylla bad ka sorkar pdeng kumba ka la jia ha West Bengal bad ha Tamilnadu.
title: Kren u MLA North Shillong da ka Khasi bym sngewtynnad ïa ka jingkren Hindi u Lat

content: Shillong, Rymphang 19 : U Myntri Rangbah barim ka Jylla Dr Mukul Sangma mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei ula kyntu ïa ka Sorkar MDA ba kan sangeh noh na kaba leh politik ïa ka aiñ Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act (MRSSA), kaba dei ka aiñ ba la wanrah kyrpang da ka jingthmu ban tehlakam ïa ka jingwan rung kyrthep ki bar jylla bad poi wir shapoh ka Jylla.Haba ïashim bynta ha ka jingïatai ïa ka jingkren u Lat, u Dr Mukul ula ong ba ka MRSSA ka dei kawei na ki aiñ ba biang bha kaba don ha kane ka pyrthei ban tehlakam ïa ka jingrung kyrteng ki bar jylla bad ki poi wir shapoh ka jylla. La mynjur lang ïa ka da ka ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ ha ryngkat ka jingïadon bynta lang jong ki kynhun bapher bapher ha ki snem bala leit noh.“Kiba bun ki ri kynthup ka USA, UK ki dang wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kumno ban tehlakam ïa ki poiwir namar ba kim don satia ïa ka aiñ kum kane” ula ong haba bynrap “Nga kwah ban kyntu ïa baroh kynthup ka Sorkar ba kan kheiñ kongsan ïa kane ka aiñ ba donkam, kaba la wanrah na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ka Jylla. To ngin ym ïaleh politik ïa kane”.Une u Myntri Rangbah barim ula kynnoh ba ïa kane ka aiñ la set ha ka duli pjah naduh u snem 2018 namar “Ngi rai ban ïaleh politik bad kane ka aiñ, kaba ktah ïa ka bha ka miat jong u paidbah”.Nalor kane, une u Myntri Rangbah barim ula maham ïa ka Jylla ba ka bamsap ka dei kaba kham shyrkhei bad ktah ban ïa ki kam lehnoh, kaba lah ban ïalam sha ka lawei ka jingjot.Haba kren halor ka jingtih dewiong beaiñ bad khaïi beaiñ, ula buh jingkylli la ka Sorkar ka nud ne em ban thung ïa ka jingtohkit ba laitluid bad ong ba ka jingleh bym hok kat kane ba jia mynta kan ym jia satia khlem ka jingtip jong ki briew kiba don ha ka bor.
title: Kyntu u Dr Mukul ïa ka sorkar ban ym leh politik ïa ka aiñ MRSSA

content: Shillong, Rymphang 19 : U Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi, ula ïathuh ha ïingdorbar thaw aiñ ba ka Sorkar kala buddien khlem shongthait bad ka Sorkar Pdeng na ka bynta pynrung noh ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka khyrnit ba phra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.“Haduh phra tylli ki shithi ngi la phah sha ka sorkar pdeng ba kan mynjur ban pynrung noh ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar ka ri India”, la ong u Conrad, hab ajubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka VPP na Mawryngkneng, u Bah HS Kharpran.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba kam don kano kano ka kyndon ne ka jingbuh kyndon ban ithuh ïa kano kano ka ktien ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra. U la ïathuh ruh ba kam shym la don ka jingpynshai ne ka jingbatai bniah kaba wan na ka Sorkar India halor ki daw ba slem ban pynrung a kine ki artylli ki ktien ha ka khyrnit ba phra.Wat la katta ruh, u la ïathuh ba ka sorkar kan dang iai buddien ïa kane ka kam bad ka Sorkar pdeng bad kan ym shongthait tad haduh ba kine ki artylli ki ktien kin ïoh rung ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri.Haba pynpaw ba ka dei ka Sorkar MDA-I, kaba la shim ïa ka sienjam ban mynjur ïa ka resolution ha u Nohprah 2018 bad ong, “Kane ka dei naduh kaba sdang naduh ka samoi treikam jong ngi bad ka pyni ïa ka jingkut jingmut bad ka jingkitkhia ban lah pynrung noh ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka khyrnit ba phra”, la ong u Conrad.Nalor kane, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ki dei napdeng ka thup jong ki 38 tylli ki ktien kiba dang sahkut bad ka MHA, haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli jong u MLA ka Congress na Mawhati Bah Charles Marngar uba la ong ba hato ka jingpynslem ka MHA ban shim rai ka dei namar ka daw ba ka Sorkar kala phah ïa ka jingtyrwa ha kajuh ka por ban pynrung lang ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo.U Bah Charles ula ai nuksa ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ha u 2003 kala ai jingithuh tang ïa ka ktien Bodo watla ka Sorkar Assam kala phah ïa ka jingtyrwa ban pynrung lang ïa ka ktien Karbi”.
title: Haduh 8 tylli ki shithi la phah ka sorkar jylla sha Delhi ban ïoh jingithuh noh ka Ktien Khasi bad Garo

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber, 29: Ha ka sngi palei, ki nongïalam jong ka All India Trinamool Congress hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Macmillan Kharbani kum u president, ki la leit ban pynïasoh noh ïalade sha ka seng National People Party, hadien ba ki la khylliap lama noh ïa ka TMC ha Nongstoiñ namar ka jingsngewthuh ba ki briew jong ka thaiñ kim pat pdiang satia ïa katei ka seng.Ki nongïalam ka TMC Nongstoiñ ba kynthup ïa u Bah Macmillan Kharbani, Bah Hubert Kharbani bad Bah Paskal Nongrum, haba ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi ki la pynpaw ba hadien ba ki la rai ban iehnoh noh ïa ka party TMC, ki la pyrkhat shano kin ïaid.Hadien ba la pyrkhat sani bha, da kawei ka jingmut ki la sngew dei ban pynïasoh noh sha ka party NPP, namar ki la ong ba kane ka party ka don ïa u nongïalam u ba shisha bad hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Macmillan Byrsat ex MLA, kiba bun ki matti kiba u la leh na ka bynta ka dong ka thaiñ bad haduh mynta ki kam kiba u la wanrah ki dang ïaid bad sdang trei shait shait.Ki la pynpaw ba ka jinglah jong une u MLA barim ka Nongstoiñ ban pyni da ki kam, ka la pynlong ïa ki ban wan pynïasoh noh bad ka NPP. Ki la kular ruh ban ai ka jingïatreilang na ka bynta ban nang pynbha shuh shuh ïa ka dong ka thaiñ nangne shakhmat.Ha katei ka sngi la pdiang sngewbha ïa kitei ki nongïalam ka party TMC da u Bah Macmillan Byrsat, President ka NPP West Khasi Hills ryngkat ki nongïalam ka NPP Nongstoiñ Block hapoh ka ïing sah jong u kaba don hapoh ka shnong Pyndengrei, Nongstoiñ.U Bah Macmillan Byrsat haba pdiang burom ïa ki nongïalam ka TMC, u la kyrpad ban ïa klet noh ïa kaei kaba ladep bad nangne shakhmat yn peit kaei kaba donkam ban leh na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka Constituency.
title: Khylliap lama ki nongïalam ïa ka TMC ha Nongstoiñ, leit pynïasoh sha ka NPP

content: Shillong, Rymphang 19 : U State President jong ka National People’s Party (NPP) Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la ong ba kane ka elekshon MP kadei ka jingtynjuh ïa ka party bad na kata ka daw kin hap ban ïakhun tyngeh ban pyntikna ba ka kyrtong MP jong ka party na Shillong kan ïoh ïa ka jingjop.“Kane kadei ka jingtynjuh ïa ngi ha kane ka elekshon MP kumta ngi hap ban jop beit. Watla ka khubor ba ngi ïoh ka long kaba sngewtynnad hynrei kam long pat ban kheinsting hynrei ban trei shitom shuh shuh,” u la ong haba kren ha ka jingïalang pdiang burom ïa ki arngut ki MDC Congress kiba wan pynïasoh sha ka NPP.Kitei ki arngut ki kynthup ïa u MDC ka Mawkyrwat Bah Carnes Sohshang bad u MDC ka Mairang Bah Batskhem Ryntathiang nalor u MDC barim ka Sohra Bah Donevan Kharwanlang.Shuh shuh u ong ba watla ki don ki nongïalam kiba buh jingkylli ïa ka NPP ha ka jingtreikam hynrei kim tip ba ka NPP ka ieng na ka bynta ka jingïatylli ki rit paidbah ym tang ha Meghalaya ne ha North East hynrei ha ka Ri baroh kawei.U ong ruh ba kane ka pynlong wat ïa u Modi ruh ban tieng ïa kane ka party.Ha kajuh ka por u Bah Prestone ba dei ruh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u la pynshlur ba dei ban nang bun ki jait Ktien ym dei eh tang ka Ktien Khasi. “Nga babe ba ngam nang Ktien Hindi nga kwah ban nang pule tangba sniewbok katba nang pule katta nang king ka jabieng,” u la bynrap shuh shuh.Kumta, u la ong ba u kwah ban pynshlur ïa ki khun samla ba ki dei ban kren Hindi nalor kiwei kiwei ki jait ktien. Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u ka la long ka burom kaba khraw ïa ka Jaidbynriew ban don haduh arngut ki riewshemphang kiba nang haduh palat 12 tylli ki jait Ktien. U ong ba kine ki kynthup ïa u Archbishop Dominic Jala ba la khlad noh bad u Rev SD Lakiang.“Don ki party ba ong ba ym long ban nang kren Garo kumta shu buh lada don pat ki nongïalam na Garo kiba ong ba ym long ban kren Khasi kaei pat kaban jia,” u la ong.Shwa kane na ka liang u National President Conrad K Sangma ba dei ruh u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u la ong ba lada ïaid katkum ka jingïoh vote ki MLA ha ka elekshon ba la dep ka party ka la ïoh palat 3.18 lak vote.Kumta u ong ba da ka jingwan pynïasoh jong u Bah Carnes bad Bah Batskhem khlem artatien ka jingïoh vote ha kane ka elekshon MP ban sa long shen kan kot sha ka 3.50 lak vote.U Conrad u la kyntu ruh ïa ki nongïalam ka party ba kim dei satia ban kheiñ sting ïa ka elekshon hynrei ba kin trei borbah khnang ban ïoh ïa ka jingjop.“Kaba sah mynta ka long kumno ban ïoh biang ïa ka vote kaba ïoh kumba long ha ka elekshon MLA bad lada khein lang bad ka vote ba ïoh Bah Carnes bad Bah Batskhem ngin kot beit sha ka 3.50 lak vote,” u la bynrap biang.Nalorkata u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka elekshon MP kam slem shuh kumta ki khmih lynti ba la kumno kumno ha shwa ka 10 ne 15 tarik u Lber lah ban pynbna noh ïa ka elekshon MP kaba mut ba sa tang kumba 45 sngi ba ka elekshon kan sa poi.Na ka liang u National Finance Secretary ka party Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la ong ba katba nang bun kiba beiñ ïa ka NPP hynrei katta pat nang bun ki nongïalam kiba wan Ïasoh sha ka party.“Tangba lada ym don kiba kren bein kan ym pynlong ïangi ban trei shitom shuh shuh,” u la ong.Ha kane ka sngi ïoh ruh ka jingkren na ki nongïalam ka party kynthup naduh ka kyrtong MP bad ruh nalor ki lai ngut kiba wan ban pynïasoh thymmai.
title: Kadei ka jingtynjuh, long katba long ngi dei ban jop ha ka elekshon MP : Prestone

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : Ka Lawsohtun SC ka la ïoh ban pynliem haduh 4-2 kol ïa ka Umphyrnai SC ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka SSA 1st Division Football League 2023-24 kaba long hynne ka sngi ha madan SSA, Polo.Ïa ki kol jong ka Lawsohtun ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ban thep da u Joinbor Nongspung tang ha ka minit kaba 9 jong ka kylla step bad pynbud sa shi kol pat ha ka minit ba 67 jong ka kylla miet.Katba ïa ki ar tylli kiwei pat ki kol la ïoh ban thep da u Rangdajied Rynjah ha ka minit kaba 65 bad minit ba 79 jong ka kylla miet.Haba phai pat sha ka Umphyrnai, katei ka kynhun tang ha ka minit kaba 37 ka la ïoh ban pynïakhaid noh ïa ka jingïakhun lyngba ka kol na u Ridingstar Kharkongor bad kumta tad haduh ban da kut ka kylla step ka jingïakhun ka la neh da ka jingkhaid mar 1-1 kol.Hynrei wat hadien ba ka Lawsohtun ka la ïoh ban lamkhmat biang sa ar kol kata ha ka minit kaba 65 bad 67, pynban ka Umphyrnai ka dang ïoh ban pynphai biang sa shi kol lyngba u Damanglang Kharbangar ha ka minit kaba 77.Watla ka la Umphyrnai ka shah lamkhmat da 3-2 kol hynrei ka ïakhun tyngeh ban ïoh pynïakhaid biang pynban dei ha ka minit kaba 79 ka Lawsohtun ka la ïoh biang sa shi kol ban pynskhem artad ïa ka jingthep kol da 4-2 kol bad khur suk ïa ka jingjop ha katei ka janmiet. Ka jingïakhun ha ka sngi Balang 21-02-2024 pat kan long hapdeng ka Malki SC pyrshah ïa ka Mylliem SC ha ka por 2:45 PM nohphaisngi.
title: Liem ka Umphyrnai SC ha ka Lawsohtun ha ka phutbol 1st Division

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : Ka lympung ïalehkai jong ki skulbah ba la tip kum ka Khelo India University Games (KIUG) 2023 ka la sdang ha kane ka sngi Ba-ar ha skulbah NEHU, Shillong.Ïa kane ka lympung ïalehkai la wan ban plie da u Myntri ka tnad Ïalehkai ka sorkar jylla, Bah Shakliar Warjri ha ka jingïalang kaba long ha SAI, NEHU Campus Shillong ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills Kong RM Kurbah, nangta u DGP Meghalaya u Dr. LR Bishnoi, Prof. D .K Nayak Acting Vice Chancellor NEHU kynthup naduh ki nongïalehkai bad ki nongpynïaid ïa ki jingïalehkai.U Myntri haba kren sha ki nongïalehkai ha kane ka sngi, u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la trei ryngkat ryngkat bad ka sorkar pdeng naka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ki kam ïalehkai ha ka Ri. U ong ruh ba ka Khelo India University Games 2023 ka long ban kyntiew ïa ki kam ïalehkai ha ki jylla bad ruh ha ka Ri. “Ka Meghalaya ruh ka pyrshang ban kyntiew ïa ki kam ïalehkai ha ki samla jong ka jylla da kaba pynlong ïa bun ki lympung ïalehkai. Ha kawei ka sngi ngin sa ïohi ba ki samla jongngi kin sa pawnam,” u la ong.Nalorkata, u ong ruh ba ki samla jong ka Ri ki don bun bha ka sap bad ka talen, kumta u ong ba ha kawei ka sngi, kin sa don ki nongïalehkai kiba aireng ha kum kine ki lympung kiban ïoh mihkhmat pat ïa ka jylla bad ruh ïa ka ri ha ki lympung kiba heh.U Myntri u la pyntip ruh ba ki la don kumba 33 tylli ki skulbah kiba shim bynta ha katei ka Games kaba long ha ka jylla.Na ka liang u Myntri ka tnad Ïalehkai ka sorkar pdeng, u Anurag Thakur haba kren ha ka jingïalang plie pyrda ha ka sngi Nyngkong ha nongbah Guwahati u la ong ba katei ka lympung kan plie lad ïa kum ba 4,544 ngut ki samla pule na kylleng ki skulbah jong ka Ri ban mih madan bad ïakhun ha ki 18 tylli ki jaka bapher bapher jong ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei-lammihngi jong ka Ri, kata ha Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Sikkim, Nagaland bad ha Tripura.Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba ha kane ka lympung ki la don haduh 20 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai kynthup naduh ki athletics, rugby, swimming, badminton, hockey, football, lem bad kiwei kiwei. U la pyntip ruh ba kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka Fit India, ka sorkarka la kynthup lang ruh ïa ka yoga bad ki jingïalehkai tynrai.
title: Sdang ka tamasa Khelo India University Games ha NEHU, 33 tylli ki skulbah ba aireng

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Meghalaya ka la mad ïa ka jingshah rem da ki san wiket ha ka Hyderabad ha ka final jong ka Ranji Trophy (Plate Group) kaba long ha kane ka sngi Ba-ar ha Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium, Hyderabad.Haba bteng biang ïa ka jingïakhun da ki 71/1 ha ka por mynstep da kaba donkam sa 127 ron ban jop, ka Hyderabad ka la duh haduh saw wiket hynrei ka la lah pat ban pyndep ïa ka thong lyngba ka hynriew ron na u Chandan Sahani.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ki rangkawang bol jong ka Meghalaya ki la ïalehkai bha ha kane ka sngi ban tehlakam ïa ka jingïoh kamai ron suk ki rangïalehkai ka Liang Pyrshah. Hynrei ka jingdon jong u rangïalehkai Indian Premier League (IPL) u Tilak Varma ban kamai haduh 64 ron na ki 50 bol ka la pynlong ïa ka kynhun trai jaka ban khur ïa ka jingjop.Ïa ka wiket jong u la ïoh ban pynkhyllem da u Raj Biswas uba la khur shi wiket bad ai kamai pat 49 ron katba u Chengkam Sangma uba khur lai wiket bad ai kamai 47 ron u la dei u rangkawang bol ba kynsai tam ka Meghalaya nalor u Aryan Borah uba khur shi wiket la 13 ron.“Ka MCA ka sngew sarong na bynta ka kynhun ïalehkai Ranji baroh kawei na bynta kane ka samoi,” on gu Secretary ka Meghalaya Cricket Association, u Bah Gideon Kharkongor. Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba kane ka aiom kadei ka aiom ïalehkai kaba itynnad tam ïa ka kynhun naduh u snem 2018 ba ki pynïasoh bad ka BCCI.Shuh shuh la ong ba watla ha kane ka samoi ka kynhun ka mad bun ki jingeh, kata lai tylli ki jingjop ha ka round robin stage ka mad pat ar tylli ki jingshah rem bad bud sa ka jingjop ha ka semi final. Kane baroh ka jia hadien ba ki bor pynïaid jong ka MCA ki la shim ïa ka rai ban ym sei ïa ki rangïalehkai ba shu khot na shabar jylla ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh hynrei ban shaniah beit ha ki rangïalehkai trai jylla.Kumta, hadien ba la poi sha ka final, baroh ar kynhun kata ka Hyderabad bad ka Meghalaya ki la ïoh pat ban rung sha ka kylla kaba bud jong ka samoi ban wan ha ka thup Elite Groups jong ka Ranji Trophy.Ka jinglah jong ka Meghalaya ban ïalehkai bha ka la pynlong ruh wat ïa ki bor pynïaid jong ka Hyderabad Cricket Association bad kumjuh na ka North East Cricket Development Committee ban ai jingïaroh ïa ka kynhun ïalehkai ka jylla.
title: Da ki san wiket shah rem ka Meghalaya ha ka final Ranji Trophy

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : Ki 13 ngut ki nongïalehkai Mixed Martial Arts ka jylla na ka kynhun jong ka Team Revolution ki la ïoh ban khur takma na ka rynsan ïakhun ba la pynlong da ka Rhino Martial Arts & Fitness Club Sivasagar ha ka 18 tarik mynta u Rymphang.Ha kane ka kynti, ka Team Revolution ka la ïoh ban khur haduh 10 tylli ki takma ksiar bad lai tylli ki takma Rupa, napdeng ki shynrang kiba la ïoh ban khur takma ki long 11 ngut bad kynthei marwei.Kiba la ïoh ban khur takma ksiar ki kynthup ïa u Kitbhahmi i Wann, u Fedrick khongsit, u Adarsh tamang, u Dharmo chakma, u Bryan Suting, u Jefferson Lyngdoh Kynshi, u Thomas Suchiang, u Synrop Wahlang, u Bantiplang Khongwirbad ka Daniella I Wanda mylliemnngap.Kiba la ïoh ban khur takma rupa ki kynthup ïa u Obadaia kelphung, u Durash Borgohain bad u ïarapbor Nongrum.
title: Khur takma ka Team Revolution na ka rynsan ïakhun jong ka Rhino Martial Arts & Fitness Club

content: K a jingtih pathar ïa u maw bad u shyïap kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya kan sa buh ïa kane ka jylla bad ki briew jong ka ha ka jingeh kaba bun. Kaba nyngkong eh ka long bad ki tyllong um baroh kin sa sdang ban rngad lut noh kawei hadien kawei.Wat ki nongwan jngoh kai ïa kane ka jylla jongngi ruh ki la sdang ban kren bynnïaw haba ki ïohi ïa kane ka jingtih pathar ïa ki lum ki wah jongngi bad bun na kita ki jaka ki dei kiba ju don ki khlaw ki btap. Mynta lah pom lut shuwa ïa ki khlaw ki btap bad sa sdang sa ka jingtih par maw par shyïap. Bun na uta u maw u leit khaïi sha Bangladesh. Ka jingkylli kaba mih ka long – hato ngi lah mo ban shu khlong lut ïa ki maw ki shyïap na ka marïang khlem da pyrkhat shuh ïa ka lawei? Hato ha ka pateng jong ki khun ki ksiew jongngi kan long kaba kumno? Ngi ju ïa pyrkhat lem mo ïa la lawei? Ne ngi pyrkhat tang ïa ka mynta?Kawei kaba sngewphylla ka long ba ka sorkar MDA dang ha kine ki sngi ka la pynbna ba kan shna kumba 100 tylli kita ki pung um ha kylleng ka jylla bad kan pynlut haduh 400 klur tyngka na ka bynta kane ka kam. Ka jingkylli ka long hato ka sorkar ka donkam ban pynneh pynsah shuwa ïa ki pung, ki wah bad ki wahduid kiba la don lypa ne ka donkam ban tih thymmai da kiwei? Bad lada ym don khlaw, don btap shuh bad ka jingtih par maw ka ïaid shaid shi shaid khlem jingsangeh hato ki tyllong um jongngi kin dang don?Kawei na kita ki wah kaba don hapdeng ka jingma ka dei ka Wah Nïangleng don hapdeng ar tylli ki shnong – ka Shnong Khat-ar Mer hajan Mylliem bad sha shilïang pat ka don ka shnong Laitkroh. Ka Wah Nïangleng ka hap hapoh ka Sohra konstituwensi katba ka Laitkroh pat ka hap hapoh ka Mawphlang konstituwensi. Ka Wah Nïangleng ka tuid sha ka dam ha Mawphlang kaba sam um ïa ka sor Shillong baroh kawei. Lada ka Wah Nïangleng bad kiwei kiwei pat ki nan bad ki pung heh kiba tyngkai ïa ka um bam um dih jongngi ki shah hïar thma ha ki nongtih par maw hato ka jingma kam ap ïangi? Naei pat ngin ïoh um lada lah rngad lut kine ki wah, ki pung, ki nan baroh?Ha kine ki por mynta naduh kumba saw snem eiei ngi ïohi ba ka sorkar kmie ka pyntrei jubor ïa ka skim Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM) kaba thmu ban wanrah ïa ka um bam um dih ha man la ka thliew iing. Ki pipe lah sïang shaid shi shaid hynrei kaba ma ka long ba lehse ha kito ki pipe yn wan pynban tang da ka lyer ha ka jaka ban wan da ka um. Ha ka jingshisha ïa kum kane ka skim ki nongpynïaid shnong ki la dei ban kitkhïa bha bad kim dei satïa ban ai ïa kata ka dulir sha ki riew shimet ba kin tih bad khlang ïa u mraw ban shalan sha Bangladesh. Hynrei sngewsih ban ong ba ka nongpynïaid shnong Laitkroh ki la kubur ban ai tih maw ïa ki riew shimet kiba khaii ïa uta u maw bad shyïap sha Bangladesh.Haba kylli na ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher kum ka State Pollution Control Board, ka Forest Department, Ka Directorate of Mineral Resources bad wat ka Khasi Hills District Council ruh kim don ba tip mano ba la ïa jingbit ïa uta/kata ki nongkhaii maw. Hynrei da ka lïang kitei ki tnad sorkar bad ka KHDC ruh ki la ong ba kin sa wad bnïah ïa katei ka jingtih maw halor ka nan Wahnïanglieng kaba lah ban pynrngad syndon ïa kata ka nan.Sawdong jong kane ka nan Wahnïangleng ki don ki khlaw bad ïa kita ruh la pynsyllen lut baroh namar ba kata ka khlaw ka long ka jong ki riew shimet. Haba ïa kane ka imlang sahlang Khasi jongngi lah ju ong ba ki khlaw ki btap, ki um ki wah, kim dei ki jong ki riew shimet hynrei ki dei kiba ngi ïa long trai lang baroh (common property resources) ïa kiba ngi dei ban ïa pynneh pynsah. Hynrei mynta pat lah kylla khongpong lut kata ka kolshor Khasi. Ka la don sa tang ka jingmyntoi shimet katba kiba bun balang ki hap ha ka lanot.Lada ka Khasi Hills District Council kam lah ban teh lakam ïa kine ki jingleh mon ki trai khyndew bad lada kam pynsangeh ïa ka jingtih maw bad khur shyïap na ki wah baroh, ka nemsniew ka ap ïangi. Wat mynta ruh ngi la ïohi ïa ka jingkylla ka jinglong jong ka marïang (climate change) hynrei ngim don kano kano ruh ka jingpyrkhat sani lane ka jingsngew khuslai halor kine ki mat ki phang. Shu ïa beh spah haduh ba I kum bym don shuh ka lashai.Ngi kyrmen ba ka KHADC bad kiwei pat ki tnad trei kam ka sorkar kin the lakam ïa kane ka jingleh dusmon ïa ka marïang. Lym kumta te kam myntoi eiei ruh ka jingdon jong ka District Council kaba dei ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka spah marïang nalor kiwei pat ki kam.
title: Ka jylla ha ka jingma na ka jingpynjulor pathar ïa ka Marïang

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 20: Ka Ri Bhoi Youth Federation (RBYF) Sengkmie mynta ka sngi ka la mih shakhmat ban ai ka jingïaroh kaba khraw ïa u MLA ka Umsning, u Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh, kaba dei halor ka nongrim ba kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah u la pyni ïa ka jinglong nongmihkhmat ban dawa syndon na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban ai noh ïa ka madan Artificial Turf ha Ri Bhoi District.Kane ka jingïaroh ka RBYF ïa u MLA ka Umning, u Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh, ka dei hadien ba mynta ka sngi ha ka dorbar mang tyngka ha ïing dorbar thaw aiñ, u la la mih shakhmat ban kren bad ban dawa mardor na ka sorkar MDA-2 ba ka dei ban phai khmat kyrpang sha ka Ri Bhoi ban ai noh ïa ka madan Artificial Turf ha Ri Bhoi, nalor kiwei kiwei ki jingdawa kiba u la kren na ka bynta ka dong Ri-Bhoi.Haba ïa kren bad u President ka RBYF, u Bah Bipul Thangkhiew, u la ong ba kum ka seng kaba ïeng ban shakri na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki paidbah ha Ri Bhoi ka sngewsarong ban mih kum une u nongmihkhmat uba nud ban kren ïa ki jingdonkam ka District bad kumba u la pynpaw da kaba dawa ïa ka madan Artificial Turf ha Ri Bhoi la da kam dei ha Umsning ba u don ha ka liang pyrshah, la dei ban ai ha madan Kurkalang ne ha Nongpoh ba don ki MLA kiba don ha ka sorkar, la dei ban ai jingïaroh kaba khraw ïa u kum u MLA uba kren shisha na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki khun samla.U la ong ruh ka seng RBYF ruh ka mynjur ïa ka jingdawa u MLA ka Umsning ba la dei ban don noh ka madan Artificial Turf ha Ri Bhoi, namar kumba long ha ka jylla, ka Ri Bhoi District ka dei kawei na ka District kaba pynmih shibun ki khun samla ba don sap ha ki kam ïalehkai sport bad kumba dang shen ruh ha ka Khelo India bad wat ha ka Meghalaya Game kiba bun na ki samla na Ri Bhoi ki la wan rah ïa ka burom ïa ka jylla da kaba khur bun ïa ki nam jop kaba long ka burom ym tang ïa ka Ri Bhoi bad wat ïa ka jylla hi baroh kawei.“Ka Ri Bhoi ka la donkam shisha ban don noh ka Madan Artificial Turf ban kyntiew ïa ki khun samla ha ki kam ïalehkai sport bad nalor ka madan Artificial Turf ka Ri Bhoi ka la donkam ruh ban don noh ka Multi Sport Complex kaba dei kawei na ka lad ban kyntiew shisha ïa ki samla ka Ri Bhoi kiba don sap ha ki kam ïalehkai sport” ong u Bah Bipul Thangkhiew, bad bynrap ruh kum ka seng ka ai jingïaroh ïa u MLA ka Umsning uba la kren ïa kane ka phang ka jingdonkam ki samla bad kumba la pynpaw da u MLA ka seng ka kloi ba pdiang ba ka sorkar ka dei ban wan rah noh ïa ka madan Artificial Turf la ka long ha kano kano ka bynta jong ka Ri Bhoi District” u la bynrap.U la kren shai ruh da kaba ong ba ka Ri Bhoi District kaba ju pynmih bun ki rang bad ki thei ïalehkai sport kiba la wan rah burom ïa ka jylla ka la donkam ban don noh kawei ka Multi Sport Complex khamtam ka Madan Kurkalang kaba don ha syndah ka Umroi Airport ka la don hok ban ioh shuwa ïa ki Stadium kiba paka bad ba la ju pynsngew ruh sha ka sorkar la slem bah, hynrei kaba sngewlyngngoh pat ba ki stadium ki poi shwa sha Ampati bad sha Tura ban ïa katei ka madan Kurakalang kaba la don hok shisha ban ioh ïa ki stadium kiba paka, u la bynrap.Shuh shuh, ha kawei ka bynta, ka RBYF ka ai jingaroh ruh ïa u MLA ka Jirang Constituency, uba la shim khia ban pynioh ïa ka Mini Stadium ha Byrnihat kaba ki dang pyntrei shaid shaid mynta bad kane ka jingioh ïa ka Mini Stadium ha Byrnihat ka long shisha ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki khun samla ha ka thaiñ Byrnihat bad ha ka Ri Bhoi hi baroh kawei.
title: Ïaroh ka RBYF ïa u MLA ka Umsning ba dawa ïa ka madan Artificial Turf ha Ri Bhoi

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang 20: U Additional Deputy Commissioner jong ka South West Khasi Hills District u la ai ki jingkyntu ïa ki paidbah jong ka distrik ba kin long kiba phikir lada wan ka jingtied u pyrthat, thaba ka lei-lieh, jur ka lyer, wan u slap bad jinghap phria.Halor kane ka bynta, u la ai ruh ki katto katne ki jingbthah ba ki paidbah ki dei ban leh kata ban sangeh ban mih na ïing ha ka por ba jur slap bad lyer, laitnoh ki kam ba kyrkieh, phikir ha ki jaka madan, trai dieng bad ki nar ha ka por ba tied pyrthat, wad ïa ki jaka rieh kum hapoh ïing bad ha ki ïing baskhem.Nangta, wat pyndonkam ïa kino kino ki tiar electronics ne ki pipe um ha ka por ha thaba ka lei-lieh, peit ne pynskhem bha ïa kino kino ki jingtei ba la sator, wat buh ïa ki kali ha trai dieng, post light bad kiwei kiwei ki jingtei namar ki lah ban kyllon ha ka por ba jur lyer.Ym tang kata, la bthah ruh ba kin shongkhop hapoh ïing bad jngai katba lah na ki jingkhangïit ha ka por ba jur lyer, phikiar ban nym ïaid ha ki jaka ba lang um ki surok ne ki jaka them, shongkhop hapoh ïing ne ha ki jaka ba skhem ha ka por ba jur phria bad kaba kyrpang ka long tyngkai ïa ki jingbam na ka bynta ki jingdonkam kyrkieh kum ki bam ba tyrkhong, ka um kaba khuid bad ki dawai dashin.
title: Long kiba phikir lada wan lynshop ki bor ka mariang

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 20: Ka West Khasi Hills District, ka dei ka District kaba heh tam hapoh ka jylla bad ka dei ruh ka District kaba ki surok kali kiba bha ki dang duna shaba palat, ha kaba ki paidbah, ki kynhun pahara shnong, ki seng samla shnong, ki seng longkmie bad ki rangbah shnong ki shem jingeh ban pynjan ïa ka jingïatreilang bad ki bor ka aiñ.Haba phai ha ka jinglong jingman hapoh ka District ha kine ki sngi ki snem, la donkam ba ka sorkar kan buh shuh shuh ïa ki ktem pulit kiba thymmai, kum ha Maweit, Rambrai bad Nongshillong. Nalor kitei ki lai tylli ki ktem, ka shnong Kyrshai ka dei ka shnong kaba don kam kyrkieh ïa ka ktem pulit kaba khlaiñ, namar ba ka dei ka shnong kaba don ha khappud bad ka Assam.Ha Kyrshai ka dang don tang ka ktem pulit kaba shi por bad wat ka jaka sah ba thikna ruh kim pat don haduh mynta. Hynrei ki dang shu sah ha kawei ka ïing skul kaba rim kaba la ai jingbit da ka shnong. Nalorkata, ki pulit kiba don ha katei ka jaka ruh ki don tang kumba shiphew haduh khat ar ngut ei ei.Uwei u heh pulit Inspector jong kane ka District u bym kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng ïalade, u la ong ba lada ka sorkar ka lah ban buh sa lai tylli ki ktem pulit ha West Khasi Hills, ki kam sniew kum ka jingkhaïi drok bad ka jingdih dih drok ki khynnah, nangta ki kam beaiñ, kam thom bor ïa ki kynthei khynnah, ki kam tuh kam thiem bad wat ki kam ïa kajia majia ruh kin kham duna shibun. U la ong ba wat ki mokotduma ruh kin ym sahteng palat, hynrei kumba ka long mynta bun bah ki mokotduma wat kiba rit ba ria ruh ki sah kut namar ka jingkhia palat ka kam.Haba phai sha ki jingsniew ba bun jait, ym lah ban len ba ha kine ki sngi ka kam khaïi droks bad jingdih drok ka la kynrei haduh katta katta man ki jaka khamtam eh ha ki jaka sor. Hynrei ki pulit hapdeng ka jingpyrshang na ka por sha ka por, pynban ki shem shitom ban ïakhun tyngeh namar ka jingkhia palat kiwei pat ki kam ha ka Headquarter jong ka District.Nalorkata, ka jingduna Ophisar hapoh Headquarter kaba don ha Nongstoiñ, ki pulit ophisar naduh ki kynthei bad shynrang ruh ki shem shitom bha khamtam eh ba hap ban bishar bniah bha ïa ki mokotduma shuwa ban phah sha ka Kashari jong ka District.Kumta lada ka sorkar ka sngew donkam ba ki paidbah ka District kin don ka shong suk shong shngaiñ bad ka jingbit jingbiang ha baroh ki liang, ka la dei ban pynurlong ïa katei ka kam.
title: Dang donkam shuh ki ktem pulit ha WKH ban shakri ïa ki paidbah

content: Jowai, Rymphang 20: U Chief Executive Officer, Jowai Municipal Board, Jowai ula pyntip ba ka ophis Jowai Municipal Board kala dep pyndait ïa ki saw (4) tylli ki CCTV Camera haki bynta ka Thomas Jones Synod College, ha Iawmusiang bad ha u surok Jowai (Main road).La pyntip ka jingpyndait ïa kitei ki CCTV Camera ka long shi bynta ban ïada na ka jingbret pathar ïa ki ñiut ha kylleng sawdong kiba lah ruh ban wan rah ïa ka jingjaboh.Na ka liang u CEO ula pyntip ba ki trok kit ñuit jong ka Jowai Municipal Board ki leit lum ïa ki ñiut na ki jaka ba juh ïeng manla ka sngi naduh ka por 5 waje mynstep haduh 8 baje janmiet lait na ka sngi u Blei.
title: Da ki CCTV yn pyndait ka Jowai Municipal Board

content: Jowai, Rymphang 20: Ïa u dewïong uba la dep kurup haduh 1615.49 MT uba don ha Shkentalang katkum ka Court Order. Dt 02-02-2024 bala passed da i Special Judge (MMDR Act.) Jowai Court katkum ka order sheet ha Amlarem PS case No. 11/ (11)2023 U/S 188/34 IPC RW Section 21(5) MMDR ACT la pyntip ba yn die lilam noh ïa utei u dewïong.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane na ka liang u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ula pyntip kino kino kiba don jingmut ban thied da kaba pynbiang katkum ki kyndon aiñ kilah ban thied ïa utei u dewïong katkum ka dor bala buh ha ryngkat ki kot ki sla ba donkam.
title: Yn die lilam ïa u dewïong 1615.49 MT ha Shkentalang

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang 20: Ka jingjia mynta ka sngi ka la jia ha shnong Kenïong ha kaba kawei ka trok ka la noh sha riat kaba kynjang kumba 120 phut ei ei bad u nongñiah ha kane ka jingjia u la mynsaw jur.Ha ka tyllong khubor ba ki pulit la ïathuh ba katkum ka jingïoh jingtip jong ki ha ka por 9:30 mynstep ba ka la don kawei ka jingjia ha kaba kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u number ML 12 – 2702 ka la noh sha riat ha lynti sha Kenïong, South West Khasi Hills District ba la ñiah da u Splendar Snaitang, 25 snem karta na ka shnong Kenïong. Ha kane ka kali la donlang ruh u Fairlyson Thyrniang, 23 snem na ka shnong Nongnah, South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba ïa une ruh la rah sha Mawkyrwat CHC ban shah sumar na ki jingmynsaw ba malu mala katba ïa u nongñiah pat la pynkit noh sha Shillong na ka bynta ki jingsumar kiba khambha.Halor kane ka juh ka jingjia katkum na ka jingïathuh jong ki paidbah jong ka shnong Kenïong ki lap ba ha kane ka trok la kit ïa u marbam (piat) bad kane ka kali ka dei mih na Nongstoiñ.
title: Noh ka trok sha riat mynsaw jur u nongñiah

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 20: Kiba bun ki shnong nongkyndong ha West Khasi Hills haduh kine ki sngi, ki dang pyndonkam ban kit jingkit da ki kulai na ki steshon kali ban pynpoi shaduh sha ki shnong ki thaw jong ki. Ka daw ka dei namar ka jingbym pat don ïa ki surok kali kiba biang kiba lah ban poi sha ki shnong ki jong ki.Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ha ka jingleit jurip jong u nongthoh khubor ïa ki shnong ha ka thaiñ Ri Lyngngam, la lap ba ki dang don bun tylli ki shnong ha katei ka than ki bym pat don surok bad ïa ki marbam mar dih kum u khaw, shini, mluh bad kiwei kiwei la pynpoi sha ki shnong da kaba kit da ki kulai. Nalorkata la lap ruh ba ki don ki shnong kiba la don ki surok, hynrei tang shu wan u slap ki kali kim lah shuh ban ïaid, namar ka jingsniew ba palat liam.Haba ïakren bad ki katto katne ki nongshong shnong, ki la ïathuh ba teng teng ki don ki kali kiba shu ïaid jubor, hynrei ki hap ban khreh lypa la ki nar lyngka, mohkhiew ban khyllie maw bad tih khyndew, na ka bynta ban pyndap ïa ki thliew ki syar tang ban pynpoi sha ki jaka ba ki mut ban leit buh bad pynpoi ïa ki mar bam mar dih bad kiwei kiwei.Kiba bun ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la ong ba na ka liang jong ki, ki la leit ud leit nam man ka por sha ki Nongmihkhmat, ba kin kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba kan ïarap lem ban pynbha ïa ki surok, khnang ba ki paidbah kin ym jynjar sah, hynrei ka jubab jong ka sorkar ka long ba kam don pisa.Ki paidbah nongkyndong ki la pynpaw ba imat kata ka sorkar ka kham duk ban ïa ki paidbah nongkyndong ka thaiñ Ri Lyngngam. Hynrei ki la dawa ruh ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynshai balei ba kam don pisa. Lada dei ba ka sorkar na Delhi kam ai pisa shuh ruh, ka dei ban pynshai lada dei ba ka ai khyndiat eh ruh ka sorkar ka dei ban pan na ka bynta ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki paidbah.
title: Dang bun byllai ki shnong kyndong ki bym pat ïohi surok haduh mynta

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang, 20: Ka jingkharoi jong ki Youtube Channel bym ithuh ithaw haki rynsan Social Media kiba leh mynleh kum ki nongpathai khubor kala long pynban ka jaka pynthohbria bad ïalam bakla ïa kiba bun ki paidbah ha kane ka juk ba mynta lyngba ki khubor thok bad kiba lamler bad kawei ka Youtube Channel bala ai kyrteng 7trep TV dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi kala pynmih kawei ka khubor kynthoh pyrshah ïa u Pynïaid Sing Syiem da uwei u rangbah ba khlem da pynpaw kyrteng, da kaba pynmih ruh da ka dur jong u Bah BB Makdoh nongïalam ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong ha Ri-Bhoi District kaba dei ka khubor kaba thok bad bym don nongrim.Na ka liang ki Rangbah Shnong jong ki shnong bapher bapher ka Ri-Bhoi District mynta ka sngi kila pynlong da ka jingïakynduh ba kyrkieh hadien ka jingmih jong katei ka khubor haka rynsan Youtube kaba la ktah ïaka burom bad ka longrynieng jong u bah BB Makdoh Chairman ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri-Bhoi namar um shym la kren ne kynthoh eiei pyrshah ïa u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem CEM ka KHADC ha kaba ïadei bad ka elekshon ha Mawryng-kneng Consti-tuency.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor naka liang u Bah BB Makdoh Chairman ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong u la pynshai ba katei ka khubor ka dei kaba shu thok bad lamler ha kaba katei ka Youtube Channel bala ai kyrteng 7trep TV kala pynmih ïaka khubor kaba la thoh caption “Khyrwit tangeh u wei u rangbah ia u Bah Pyniaid N Syiem ba kren kulmar ïaka VPP, ngap phin sa sam…” da kaba kynthoh ruh ba ka jingjop u prah ha Mawryngkneng Constituency ka dei ka jingïarap ka TMC, watla katei ka channel ka khlem pynpaw kyrteng hynrei kala thep pat da ka dur jong u.U Bah BB Makdoh u la kren shai ba katei ka khubor bala pynmih da katei ka channel kam dei satia kaba kren ma u bad la tip shai ba kadei ka khubor kaba lamler bad kaba thok kaba la ktah ïaka dur ka dar ka jong u.Kum u Chairman ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong u la pynshai ruh ba ngim ju donpor ban kren pyrshah ïa kiwei bad kaei kaba ki trei ka dei beit thik naka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki shnong bad ka dong Ri-Bhoi bad ka jingkynduh ïaki myntri sorkar ka dei beit naka bynta ka jingeh jong ki paidbah ka dong Ri-Bhoi, dei namar kata ka daw ba ki nongpynthoh bria k ki shim kabu da kaba shim da ka dur jong u, bad u la pynshai ruh ba katei ka dur bala thep ha katei ka channel ka dei kaba u kren halor ka ishu casino ha Ri-Bhoi
