naduh 2 snem mynshuwa.Une u rangbah bad ka kynhun ki Rangbah Shnong na Ri-Bhoi mynta ka sngi kila leit ban ujor syndon da ka ejehar halor katei ka jingshah pynthohbria ha Nongpoh Police Station bad kumjuh ruh kila leit ban ïakynduh ïa u SP ka Ri-Bhoi ba un shmkhia ïa katei ka kam namar kum ka synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong kam kwah ba kum kitei ki channel kiba ïalam bakla ïaki paidbah kin kharoi na ka por shaka por.
title: Mudui ejahar ka SRSRB ba shah pynthohbria ka dur u Bah BB Makdoh ha YouTube

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 20: Ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri-Bhoi District mynta ka sngi kala mih shakhmat ban pynpaw ïaka jingeh ban pyntrei ïaka skhim MNREGA haki shnong bapher bapher ha Ri-Bhoi District namar ba kim ioh satia ïaki maw ki shyiap namar ba ka sorkar kala khang lut ïaki par maw bad ki jaka tih shyiap.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor naka liang u Bah BB Makdoh Chairman ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri-Bhoi District u la ong ba kum ki Rangbah Shnong ba peit ïaki kam shnong kam thaw ki shem jingeh shisha ban pyntrei ïaka skhim bylla 100 sngi ne ka MNREGA namar ba kim ioh satia ïaki maw ki shyiap naduh bala khang ka sorkar namar baroh ki jingtrei u maw bad u shyiap ki dei kiba donkam hakhmat eh.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka ai ïaki work order ban pyntrei ïaki jingtrei katkum ka por bala buh, hynrei ka jingeh jong ki paidbah pat ka sorkar kam tip da kaba pynpaw ruh ba mynta u maw u shyiap ba ju ioh ban thied naki jaka ba jan kim ioh shuh namar bala khang lut ïaki par maw bad ki jaka tih shyiap, te ka long shisha ka jingeh kaba khraw khamtam ki shnong kiba jngai ban leit thied maw bad shyiap shaduh ki thaiñ Killing kam dei kaba suk namar ka mang tyngka ruh ka dei kaba rit.U la ong ruh ba kum ka synjuk kala buh ruh da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri ba dei peit u AT Mondal ba kum ka sorkar ka dei ban pyrkhat sani bha halor ka jingkhang dam syndon ïaki par maw bad ki jaka tih shyiap bala pynduh kam ruh ïakiba bun ki samla hakane ka jylla, u la bynrap.
title: Khang lut ka Sorkar ïa ki par maw bad shyiap, kumno khmih lynti ban pyndep kloi ïa ki skhim Sorkar?

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 20: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ha ka sngi Baar u la kular ba ka Sorkar kan sa shong bishar halor ka jingtyrwa ban wanrah ïa ka Minimum Support Price (MSP) ne ka dor kyrshan na ka bynta u kwai.U Sangma u la ong ba ka dor jong u kwai la die ha ka dor ba palat shiphew shah bad bynrap, “namarkata, ka dor bynrap ka long tang ka lad ban pyntyllun shakhmat.”U Sangma u la ai ïa kane ka jubab halor ka jingkylli jong u MLA ka UDP na Amlarem Constituency u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui, uba la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban thaw lad da kaba wanrah ïa ka Minimum Support Price na ka bynta u kwai.U Bah Rymbui u la ong ba ka dor jong u kwai ka la hiar bha haduh katta katta bad kane ka pynlong ïa ki nongrep ban pynmih bun bha ïa u kwai katba ka dor pat ka la nang hiar arsut.Kane ka jingkylli jong u Bah Rymbui ka long da kaba kdew ïa ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar India ha u snemn 2020 kaba buh ïa ka dor kyrshan (Minimum Support Price) na ka bynta u kwai ha ka dor T. 200.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewhun halor ka jubab jong u Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Rymbui u la kyrpad ba ka Sorkar ba kan buh ruh ïa ka Processing Unit ha ka shnong Amlarem ban kyntiew ïa ka jingpynmih ïa u kwai bad ban pynïaid iew ïa une u mar rep.U Sangma u la pyntip ba ki don ar tylli na ki 46 tylli ki Processing Unit ba la buh ha Amlarem. U la ïathuh ruh ba jin haduh T. 41 lak la pynlut nalor ka T. 1 klur kaba ladep pynlut.”Shwa kane, ka Myntri kaba khmih ïa ka tnat Rep ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ïathuh ba ki don 46 tylli ki Processing Unit kiba don ruh ïa ka sem treikam, ki mashin khoh snep kwai, ki sem pynrkhiang kwai (solar tunnel dryer), bad ki Soaked Pit ba la buh ha ki 21 tylli ki Block jong ki 10 tylli ki District. Ka dor ba la thied ïa kine ki tiar ka long T. 14.06 klur.34 Unit ki dei kiba la shna pyndep bad sa 12 Unit kiba dang sah yn sa pyndep ha ki bnai ban sa wan.Ka Dr. Ampareen ka la ong ba u kwai u dei uwei na ki mar rep ba ka tnat Rep ka la phaikhmat bha ha ki snem ban sa wan haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la buh da u MLA ka UDP na Mawkyrwat Constituency u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, uba kwah ban tip hato ïa u kwai la ñiew neem kum u mar shalan.
title: Hap shong bishar ka Sorkar ïa ka jingdawa ban kyntiew ïa ka dor u kwai

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba khmih ia ka Tnad Transport Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u la ïathuh ha ïingdorbar ba na ka liang ka DC ka East Khasi Hills u la phah ïa u CE ka tnad PWD (R) ban jurip ïa ka jingkieng ha Umrynjah la ka ka biang ne em ban ïaid ki trok ba kit palat 9 ton. Hadien kane na ka liang ki bor District kin sa pynmih da ka hukum kaba biang.Kane ka jingïathuh u Myntri ka long halor ka Call Attention Motion ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Mawlai, u Bah Brigthstarwell Marbañiang, halor ka jingmih khubor hau Mawphor ïa ka jingujor ka Synjuk ki san Shnong.Kane kala mih hadien ba ka Synjuk ki San Dorbar Shnong ka Mawlai, kila leit ujor sha ka Deputy Commissioner myn ha ka 12 tarik Rymphang, ba pyntip ia ka jingwan iaid ki trok ba kit palat pud na jingkieng Umrynjah ha ka por mynmiet. Ka Synjuk ka pynpaw ba ka jingiaid jong kine ki trok ka lah ban pynsniew ia ka jingkieng kaba dei tang ma ka, ka lad pyniasoh sha ki shnong ki thaw.Haba wanrah ïa kane ka Motion, u MLA Mawlai u la kdew ruh ïa ka jingma kaba ap na ka jingïaid kine ki trok na jingkieng Umrynjah ter ter sha Umden shaduh Mawsiatkhnam shaduh ki shnong kiba hap sha Mawlai da kaba ong ba ka jingmoramot ïa ka jingkieng ha Umiam, ka la pynlong ïa ki kali wat ïa kiba kit palat pud ban pyndonkam ïa kane ka jingkieng kaba la rim bad sator. “Kane ka surok kaba nga ong kadei kam dei kaba la shna na ka bynta ban ïaid ki trok ne ki kali kiba kit palat pud”, la ong u Bah Marbañiang, da kaba bynrap ruh ba ki don ki bynta kiba long thiep bha bad ki trok kiba kit palat pud kin shem jingeh ban ïaid bad ka buh jingma ruh ïa ki paidbah.
title: Ha ïingdorbar rah u MLA Mawlai ba ïaid ki trok heh na jingkieng Umrynjah

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20: Ka Myntri ka tnad Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh mynta ka sngi Baar, ka la ïathuh ba ka Geographical Indication (GI) Tag kaba la ai ïa u Shynrai Lakadong ka ïeng ban ïada ïa ka hok long trai bad tynrai jong ka rukom pynmih bad ka jingnang jingtip ban pynthikna ba tang ki nongrep bad ki nongthung katei ka thaiñ ne Geographical Area, kiba lah pyndonkam ïa ka GI tag.“Ka dei ka Tag ne ka shap kum ka jingpynithuh ïa ka hok long trai bad ban lah pynïaid ïew bha ïa ki mar bad ki nongdie ba kin lah ban pynïapher ïa u mar ha ki ïew ki hat” ong ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh haba jubab ïa ka zero hour notice kaba la wanrah da u MLA ka VPP na Nongkrem u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit hapoh ka ïing dorbar.Hadien ba la pynlong bunsien ïa ka jingsngap ïa ki jingpynsngew bad ki jingpynshai, ka Registrar jong ka GI ha Chennai kala pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna ba la ai ïa u GI Tag nombar 741 ïa u shynrai Lakadong na East Jaintia Hills bad West Jaintia Hills District ha ka 29 tarik u Naiwieng 2023.ïa katei ka aplikeshon la phah da ka Lakadong Turmeric Cooperative Union Limited, Jowai lyngba ka jingkyrshan lang jongka Directorate of Horticulture, Department of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare.Ka Dr Ampareen kala pyntip ba bun jait ki nongthied ki la don bynta ha kaba thied ïa u symbai Lakadong na ka bynta ban thung bad ban pynmih ha ki jylla jongki bad kumjuh ban die ïa u kum u ‘Lakadong Turmeric’ bad kane kala pynklumar khlieh ïa ki nongthied bad pynthohbria ïa ka dur ka jingbha bad ïa ka jinglong kyrpang jongu shynrai Lakadong. Kumta kane ka lah ban pynduh noh ïa une u mar bad ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ha ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongrep Lakadong hapoh ka jylla.“Da kaba shim khia ïa kane ka mat, la pynmih ïa ka notification da ka tnad bad la mana jur ban die ïa u symbai Lakadong na ka bynta ban pynmih ïa u shabar jongka rilum Jaintia,” kala ong bad ka bynrap ba kine ki jingtuklar ki la ïarap shibun ban kyntiew ïa ka jingrep ïa u Lakadong da 13 shah ïa ka jingdon ki nongrep ha ka kam rep Lakadong.Kane ka jingshim khia ka long kaba ïaid ryngkat lang bad ka jingangnud jong ki nongrep ban kyntiew arshah ïa ka jingïoh ka jongki bad ban plie lad ïa ki nongrep ban buh dor hi ïa u shynrai Lakadong.“Kumta ka long kaba donkam ban ïada ïa ka jinglong trai ïa u Lakadong bad ban ai jingmyntoi ïa ki nongrep ïa kaba ka sorkar kala shim ïa ki sienjam kat kiba lah” kala ong.Nalor kane, ka Dr Ampareen ka la ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka ïengskhem ha ka ban kyntiew bad ban pynïaid ïew ïa une u jingthung uba mih napoh ka jylla bad kan ïaid shakhmat ruh ha ka ban pynïoh ïa ka GI Tag na ka bynta kiwei kiwei ki mar ruh.“Kane kan plie lad ïa ka jylla ban pynmih ïa kiei kiei kiba long tynrai ban tyrwa ha ki rynsan kiba don ha kylleng ka pyrthei ka ban ïarap ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongrep bad ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot ha ka ïmlang sahlang” kala ong.
title: Ban ïada ïa ka hok long trai u Lakadong yn buh da ka GI Tag: Ampareen

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la mang pisa haduh 338 klur tyngka ban pyntrei ïa ka Tura Smart Town bad ka la mang ruh ïa ka pisa ba tang 79 klur tyngka na ka bynta ka sor Jowai.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli jong u MLA ka Nongstoin Bah Gabriel Wahlang, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K Sangma ula ong ba ki artylli ki Smart Town ka Jylla ki dei ka Tura bad ka Jowai.U Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ba ka pisa baroh ba la mang ïa ka sor Tura ka long 338 klur tyngka katba ïa ka Jowai la mang tang 79.8 klur tyngka.Haba wanrah ïa ka jingkylli bynrap. U Bah Gabriel ula kyntu ïa u Myntri Rangbah ban kynthup lang ïa ka Nongstoin hapoh ka Smart Town Project.U Conrad ula pyntip ba ka Sorkar ka angnud ban kynthup ïa baroh ki nongbah jong ki District hapoh ka Smart Town Project bad ïa kane yn sa leh da ki pali pali watla kam pat don satia ka plan ïa kane.
title: Ban pynkylla Smart Town mang ka Sorkar 338 klur ïa ka Tura, 79 klur ïa ka Jowai

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : U Myntri ka Tnad Pule ka Jylla Rakkam A Sangma ha ka sngi Ba-ar, ula pyntip hapoh ka ïing Dorbar ba ka jingtei jong ka Science & Commerce College ha Mawphlang la buh thong ba yn sa pyndep noh ha u bnai Jylliew mynta u snem.Haba jubab hapoh ïing Dorbar, u Rakkam ula ong “Ka jingshim klas kan sdang hadien ba la pyndep ïa ka jingtei bad ka jingthung ïa ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei”.U pyntip ba ka jingtei mynta kala ïaid kumba 72 percent. ïa kane ka project la mang pisa T.36.55 klur ha ka 30 tarik u Jylliew 2017 bad haduh mynta la pynlut kumba T.14.815 klur sha ka project.U MLA ka Mawphlang u bah Matthew B Kurbah ula buh jingkylli la ka long kaba lah ban pyndep ïa ka project ha u Jylliew naba ym shym la paw ba ïaid ka kam ha kane ka jaka. Ula kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pynkloi ïa ka jingpyllait ïa ka pisa ban lah pyndep noh mar mar ïa ka project.Halor kane, u Rakkam ula ong ba shuwa kane, ïa kane ka project la buh ban pyndep hapoh u snem 2020 hynrei la pynslem noh ïa ka namar ka jingslem ban aiti ïa ka jaka bad ka jingpyllait ïa ka 2nd installment bad kumjuh ruh ka jingwan ka khlam Covid-19.Hynrei ula pyntip ba dang hynnin ka sngi, la pyllait ïa ka 2nd installment sha ka agency ba pyntrei ïa kane ka project ba kan lah pyndep noh. “Namar kata, ngi la khmih lynti ban pyndep ïa ki kam hapoh ka por bala buh”.
title: Buh thong ka Sorkar ban pyndep ïa ka Mawphlang Science & Commerce College ha u Jylliew

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : U Myntri ka Tnad Public Health Engineering (PHE) u Marcuise N Marak mynta ka sngi Ba-ar ula ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM) ha Meghalaya ka long kaba biang bha, da ka jingnang kiew ha ka jingdon ki longïing ba la ïoh kor um ha ki jaka Nongkyndong kaba long naka 4550 (0.7%) sha ka 4,85,927 (74.60%).Hynrei, ban kynjoh ïa kane ka thong kam shym la long kaba suk khlem ki jingtynjuh kiba bun khamtam eh ha ka liang ka jinglum jingkheiñ bad ai jingtip, ong u Marak haba jubab ïa ka short duration discussion ba la wanrah da u MLA ka VPP na North Shillong Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ.Ula ong ba ka kam ban lum jingtip bad pynrung kyrteng ïa ki jingtip ba bniah jong palat shi million ki longïing ha baroh ka Jylla bala ïoh ïa ka JJM,ka dei ka kam kaba bam por bad ka bym lah ban leh ïa ka jingbunkam ki nongtrei nalor ka jingdon kam ban pynshisha da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki Aadhar Card lane Voter ID kaba la nang pynjyrwit jyrwat.Nalor kane, ka jingkyntait jong ki briew ban ai ïa ki jingtip ba shimet kala nang pynsyllang shuh shuh ïa ka kam, ha kaba don ki khep la hap pan ïa ki jingïarap na ki dkhot jong ka Village Water & Sanitation Committee (VWSC).
title: Ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka JJM ha ka jylla ka long kaba biang bha: Myntri PHE

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20: Ki dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah bad ka Liang Synshar mynta ka sngi, ki la ïasnohkti lang lang ban kyntu ïa ka sorkar ban pyllait ïa ki paidbah kiba im ja na kaba tih shyiap bad tih maw na ka jingkhang ka tnad Forest jong ka sorkar jylla.Kane ka jingïasnohkti lang ka long halor ka Motion ba la wanrah da u Bah Ardent Basaïawmoit, MLA Nongkrem uba la wanrah ïa ka mat jingïakren ban kyntu ïa ka sorkar ban thaw ki lad ki lynti, khnang ba ka tnad ba ki paidbah kiba la trei ïa kane ka kam lah da ki phew snem kin nym shah pyndik ha ka tnad Forest kaba ju ai Notice na ka por sha ka por ba kidei ban khang noh ïa ki jaka tih shyiap bad tih maw jong ki.“Ka long kaba isynei ïa ki paidbah bapli, namar ka kam tih shyiap tih maw kadei kaba ki la ju trei da ki phew snem, hynrei ka tnad Forest ka pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ jong u snem 2016 ban khang wat lada kine kiba tih shyiap ne tih maw kidei kiba tih ha ki jaka iba rit bad kim dei ki jaka ruh ba rep ba riang ne ki jaka ba mih ki dieng ki siej”, la ongu Bah Ardent.U nongïalam ka VPP, u la sot ruh na ki rai jong ki ïingbishar ha ki snem kiba ladep, ha kaba u la ong ba ka sorkar ka lah ban pyndonkam da kine ki rai ban shna ïa ki kyndon khnang ba ki paidbah kin nym shah ktah bad kin tih katkum ki kyndon. Ym dei ban shu khang beit sbak.Shuh shuh u Bah Ardent u la ong ruh ba kine kiba tih shyiap ne tih maw ym dei ba ki pyndonkam da ki kor ki bor ban shalan shabar jylla ne shabar ri, hynrei ki tih na ka bynta ka jingdonkam hi ha ki shnong ki thaw la jong.Ïa kane ka Motion la kyrshan ruh da u Bah Matthew Kurbah, MLA ka UDP na Mawphlang, uba la ong ba ki paidbah ha Mawphlang ruh ki mad ïa kane kajuh ka jingeh kumba la kdew da u MLA jong ka Nongkrem, ha kaba ki la duh kam duh jam bad ki don hapdeng ka jingtieng jingsmiej namar ka jingai Notice kaba man la ka por da ka tnad Forest. “Kiba bun kiba im ja na kaba tih shyiap bad tih maw ki la ud ba kim lah shuh ban phah skul ïa ki khun k kti namar ka jingshah khang ka kam bylla na ka jingtih shyiap bad tih maw”, u la ong. U la kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba kan peit lem halor kane.U MLA ka Congress na Nongstoiñ, u Bah Gabriel Wahlang ruh u la kyrshan ïa ka Motion da kaba ong ba hadien ba ki briew ki la duh bylla na ka jingkhang pomdieng ha u snemj 1996 bad khang tih dewïong ha u snem 2014, ka kam tih maw tih shyiap kadei ka lad kamai bad trei bylla jong ki. Hynrei mynta pat sa ka tnad Forest ka khang ïa ki ïa kane ka kam. “Haba la khang lut kumne da ei ki briew kin trei kin ktah”, la ong u Bah Gabriel. U la iathuh ba ha Nongstoiñ ki don ki jaka kiba ki briew ki shu tih maw da ki tiar ba ju pyndonkam naduh mynshuwa kum ki lyngka, ki mohkhiew, hynrei ïa kine ruh la khang. “Nga kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba kan peit ba ka jingïada ïa ka mariang kam dei pat ban ktah ïa ka jaka kpoh jong ki briew”, la ong u MLA Nongstoiñ.U Rupert Momin, MLA ka NPP na Kharkutta, haba kyrshan ïa ka Motion jong u Bah Ardent, u la ong ba ha Garo Hills kiba bun ki samla ki la pan laisen ban ïoh khat shyiap na ki wah kiba don ha Garo Hills, hynrei kim shym la ïoh satia, katba ka Assam pat ka khat suk ïa u shyiap uba tuid na Meghalaya. “Ki surok sha ki thaiñ Dudai ki sahkut kali tang na ka daw jong ki trok kit shyiap kiba wan ïaid na ki bynta ka Garo Hills. “Ka long kaba sngewsih ba ki briew na Assam ki ïoh khat suk ïa u shyiap ba na Meghalaya, katba ki briew jong ngi pat ki shu peit jaw dud”, la ong u MLA ka Kharkutta.
title: Snohkti lang ki Liang Pyrshah bad Liang Synshar ban kyntu pyllait ïa ka Sorkar

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20: Ka ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka la kyntait ban ïatai ïa ka Amendment Bill ba la wanrah da u Bah Adelbert Nongrum, MLA ka VPP na North Shillong na ka bynta ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingtreikam ka Lokayukta.Ka ïingdorbar ka la kyntait ban ïatai lyngba ka voice vote ne da ka sur ka jingbun briew ka liang synshar ha Assembly, namar kane kadei ka Private Member’s Bill ba la wanrah da u dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah.Ha shuwa jong kane, u Bah Adelbert haba wanrah bad batai lyngkot ïa kane ka Bill, u la ong ba ka Amendment Act ha u snem 2021, ka la ktah shibun ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka Lokayukta, kaba ha ka jingshisha ki paidbah ki peit sha kane ka bor treikam ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki kam bamsap ha ka jylla. Haba pan jingkyrshan halor kane ka Bill, u Bah Adelbert u la ong, “Nga kyrpad ïa ka ïingdorbar ban ïakyrshan lang, namar ba ki paidbah ki peit sha kane ka ïing ban long kum ka nonglam lynti ha ka thma pyrshah ïa ka bamsap”.U la kdew ruh ha kane ka Amendment ban wanrah biang ïa ka aiñ ha ka rukom kumba la shna da ka Parliament na ka bynta ka Lok Pal ha sorkar pdeng bad ka Lokayukta ha ki jylla kata ha u snem 2013, ïa kaba ha Meghalaya la pyntreikam ha u snem 2014.Hynrei u MLA ka North Shillong um shym la ïohlad ban batai khambha shuh shuh ne kiwei pat ki MLA ka VPP bad kumjuh ruh ki dkhot ka ïing kim lah ban ïashim bynta, namar ba ka ïingdorbar kam aiald ban ïatai haba kane ka Amendment Bill ka la shah rem noh ha ka Voice Vote.
title: Kyntait ka Ïingdorbar ban ïatai ïa ka Amendment Bill ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka Lokayukta

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ba khmih ïa ka Tnad Transport u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar mynta ka sngi Ba-ar, ula ïathuh ba dang donkam sa 68 acre ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka Baljek Airport kaba treikam bad ka jingpynkhreh ka sorkar ban shimti ïa ka jaka ka la ïaid shakhmat.Haba jubab hapoh ïing Dorbar, u Ma Sniawbha ula ong “Ngi dang pynkhreh mynta ïa ki jingdonkam ban thied sa 68 acre ka jaka”.U ïathuh ba kane ka long hadien ba ka Airport Authority of India (AAI) kala pan shuh shuh ïa ka jaka ban pynlong ïa kane ka kad liengsuiñ ne airport kaba treikam.Ia mynta, ka Baljek Airport ka don ha ka jaka ba 120 acre.U Ma Sniawbha u pyntip ba ka pisa ba 3 klur tygnka la dep ban mang ha ka kylla kaba ar ban thied ïa ka jaka.Kat kum ka jingong jong u, ka runway jong kane ka kad ka donkam ban hap pynheh naka 110 meter sha ka 1750 meter ban lah hiar ki liengsuin ART.U pyntip ruh ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ula dep thoh shithi sha ka AAI hynrei sngewsih ba ka jubab ba ïoh ka long ba ym don satia ki kompani kiba kwah ban pynïaid ïa ki liengsuiñ kiba rit na kane ka kad.
title: Dang pynkhreh ka Sorkar ban shimti sa 68 acre ka jaka ban pynheh ïa ka Kad Liengsuin Baljek

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 20: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la kut jingmut ban pynbeit noh ïa ka jingïakajia pud bad ka Sorkar Assam.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Assam ba kan tuklar ban weng noh ïa ka ejahar ba la mudui pyrshah ïa ki saw ngut ki nongshong shnong ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah pynpra u mawnongrim katkum ka jingbthah jong ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) ha ka shnong Jatalong kaba hap hapoh Block-II.Ka Sorkar ka la kular ruh ban leh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ïa ka jingkhrong khajna be-aiñ hapoh u pud u sam jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Congress na Mawhati u Bah Charles Marngar, u Sangma u la ong, “nga kwah ban ïaiban kumba la jia ha ki por ba la leit noh bad ngi la pyni ïa ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar MDA-1 ha ki san snem baldep, ngi la kut jingmut ban ïaid beit shakhmat bad ban wanrah ïa ka jingpynkut bad ban weng noh shisyndon ïa ka jingïakajia pud. Na ka bynta kata, ngi donkam ïa ka jingïatreilang bad ban shimkhia ha ka rukom kaba dei.’Halor ka jingjia ha ka shnong Jatalong, u Sangma u la ong ba ïa ka ejahar la mudui da u Ranger jong ka KAAC hynrei ym da ka Sorkar Assam.“Ka don ka jingthmu ban kem (ïa ki saw ngut ki nongshong shnong). Hynrei, u Chief Secretary u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Chief Secretary jong ka Sorkar Assam ban kyrpad ba ïa kane ka Case pyrshah ïa ki saw ngut ki nongshong shnong yn weng noh da kaba sdang ïa ka jingïakren………Dalade hi nga la kren ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam bad dalade hi nga la kyrpad ïa u katba ki jingïakren ki dang tyllun shakhmat, katba ngi dang pyrshah ban jam shakhmat ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ïa kum kine ki jingjia kaba lah ban pynheh shuh shuh ïa ka jinglong jingman, katba lah ngin pyrshang ban ïakren sngewthuh bad u la mynjur ruh ba un sa peit ïa kane ka kam bad ngi la ïatreilang ryngkat bad nga kwah ban pyntip hangne ba ngi la ïohi borabor ïa ka jingshahskhor na ka Sorkar Assam bad khamtam eh u Myntri Rangbah,” u la ong haba pynpaw ïa ka jingkyrmen ba ïa kane ka kam yn sa lah ban pynkut noh kham kloi.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkhrong khajna be-aiñ, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ki jingkhrong khajna kim jia satia hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Meghalaya namarba ka jylla ka la ñiew ïa u synsar kum u mar rep.“Ha ka jingshisha, ïa kane ka rai, ka Sorkar MDA-I ka la ïarap shikatdei eh ïa ki nongrep bad ka jingkylli kaba mih halor ka jingkhrong khajna be-aiñ hapoh u pud synshar ka Meghalaya yn ym shah daleilei ruh em bad lada ka don kum kata, ngin hap ban leh eiei mardor,” u la ong.U Sangma u la ong ruh ba kum kine ki jingjia, ki jia tang ha ki jaka ba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka KAAC.“Lada ka don kum kata, ngin hap ban ïakren bad ka Sorkar Assam,” u la bynrap.
title: Kut jingmut ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban pynbeit ïa u pud u sam bad ka Sorkar Assam

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 20: Ki nongtrei iing briew kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka All Meghalaya Domestic Workers Association (AMDWU) ha ka sngi Baar ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew bynñiaw halor ka jingleh bym patiaw jong ka Sorkar Jylla la 12 snem tam halor ka jingdawa ban ithuh noh da ka aiñ ïa ka kam kaba ki trei.“Ngi la phah la bun tylli ki dorkhas sha u Myntri Rangbah hynrei haduh mynta kam don kano kano ka jingai jubab na ka liang jong ka Sorkar,” la ong ka Vice President ka Union ka Kong Elbina Nongkhlaw ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Nalor ba ngim dei ki briew kiba duk, ngi ïoh ïa ka jingsiew kaba rit ban pyndap ïa ka ïing ka sem bad ban trei bun kynta. Nalor ba ngi shah khate ka jingsiew bainong haba ngi pep bylla. Ngi dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pyntreikam da ka Welfare Scheme na ka bynta jong ngi,” la ong ka Kong Nongkhlaw.“Watla ka dor ka mur ki marbam mardih ki kiew ne ki hiar, ka long beit kumjuh bad kiba ïap dei ma ngi kiba duk kiba shu bylla im kamai jakpoh da kaba leit bylla ha ïing ki briew,” ka la ong.Haba kylli, ka la ong, “ngi dawa ïa ka Sorkar ban ai jingïada da kaba buh ïa ka dor trei da kaba pyntreikam ïa ka Welfare Board. Dei ban kynthup lang ïa ki nongtrei ing briew ha ka thup ki nongtrei katkum ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih ha ka Minimum Wages Act, 1984, bad ban pyntreikam ruh ïa ka dor bylla sngi.”“Lyngba ka Welfare Board ngi kwah ïa ka Sorkar ban lum jingkheiñ ïa ka jingdon jong ki nongbylla iing briew, ban ai jingïarap haba ki ïakynduh ïa kino kino ki jingjia ha ka jingim jong ki, ban ai jingïarap ha ka pang ka shitom na ka bynta ka bai sumar, ban ïa ka jingïarap haba kha khunlung bad kiwei kiwei. Dei ban thaw ruh da ki kyndon ïa ki kam ban trei bad ban pyntreikam ïa ka jingsiew katkum ka Minimum Wages Act,” la ong ka Kong Nongkhlaw bad bynrap, “ki aiñ ïada ïa ki nongbylla (Labour Laws) kim ai jingïada satia ïa ki nongtrei ha ki ing briew.”Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ka Vice President ki don palat lai hajar ngut ki nongtrei ing briew kiba la rejister kyrteng ban long ki dkhot jong ka AMDWU.Halor ka jingshah thombor ka longryngieng jong ki nongtrei ing briew, ka President jong ka Union ka Kong Patrisha Riahtam, ka la kam ba ka Union ka la ïoh ujor la bun tylli kum kine ki jingjia.“Haba don ki jingshah thombor ki dkhot jong ka Union ngi ju shimkhia kum ka Union. Ki la don teng ki jingjia haba ki nongtrei ing briew ki shah leh be-ijot bad shah pyndik laiphew jait bad mar mar ka Union ka ju pan jingïarap na ki bor Pulit,” la bynrap ka Kong Riahtam.“Namarkata, ngi dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla bad ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kin wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban wanrah da ki polisi bad wanrah da ka aiñ ka ban ïada ïa ki nongtrei ing briew,” ong ka ong Riahtam.
title: 12 snem ym patiaw ka Sorkar ïa ka jingdawa ki nongtrei ïing briew

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : Ka Sorkar Jylla kala rai ban pyllait ia ki artylli ki Autonomous District Council(ADC) kata ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) bad ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) ban lait na ka jingtyrkhong pisa, kaba la poi shaduh u pud ba kim lah shuh ban siew ïa ka tulop jong ki nongtrei la bun bun bnai mynta.Haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi Ba-ar, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ba khmih ia ka Tnad District Council Affairs (DCA) u Bah Prestone Tynsong ula ong ba ka Sorkar ka kloi ban kyrshan ïa ka GHADC bad JHADC ban lait noh na ka jingtyrkhong pisa bad ban lah siew ïa ka tulop ki nongtrei jongki.Kine ki artylli ki District Council kim shym la lah ban siew tulop ïa ki nongtrei. Ka GHADC marwei ka khlem lah ban siew tulop ïa ki nongtrei mynta la lai snem.“Ngi la pyrshang ban leh eiei na ka liang ka Sorkar. Nga la dep ïakren bad u Myntri Rangbah bad u Myntri Rangbah un sa kren (halor kane ka rai) ha kane ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka ba mynta” ong u Bah Prestone.La ki artylli ki ADC ki ïoh ïa ki bhah khajna na ki marpoh khyndew, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ula ong “Kine ki dei ki kam kiba dang pynïaid bad kam dei eh ba ha man ba kut u snem mang tyngka, phi hap ban siew pynkhuid ïa ki. Ka shong ha ka jingïoh lum bad hadien ka jingkhate bad ka jingpynbiang hangne hangtai, yn sa pyllait ïa ka pisa sha ki District Council”.
title: Pynkhreh ka Sorkar ban pyllait ïa ka GHADC bad JHADC na ka jingtyrkhong pisa

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20: Ha ka kynta jingkylli mynta ka sngi hapoh ïingdorbar, u MLA jong ka Mylliem u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdo, u la ong ïa u Bah AL Hek, Myntri ka tnad Animal Husbandry and Veterinary ba un pan pisa na u Myntri Rangbah duh ka ri u Narendra Modi na ka bynta ban shna Hospital ban sumar ïa ki mrad khamtam ïa ki sniang bad ki masi.Kane ka jingong u Bah Ronnie kadei ha ka por ba u ïashim bynta ha ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Congress na Mawhati, u Bah Charles Marngar, uba la kylli la ka sorkar kan ai jingïarap ne em ïa ki nongri sniang, kiba la ïap noh ki sniang ba la sam da ka sorkar?. U Bah AL Hek, u la jubab ba kam don satia ka jingïarap, hynrei ha ka skhim la buh ka kyndon ba ka don ka insurance kaba saw hajar tyngka uwei u sniang.Haba u Bah hek u la jubab shuh shuh ba haduh ym don ka Hospital ban sumar ïa ki mrad kiba pang ne ba shitom, u Bah Ronnie, u ba long ruh u nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah, u la ïeng ban ong, “Bah Hek phi u nongïalam ba hakhmat ka BJP bad uba ïajan bad u Modi, balei phim pan pisa na u ban shna Hospital ïa ki mrad?”.U Bah hek u la jubab ba ka na ka liang jong u, u sngew ïahap ïa kane ka jingong u MLA ka Mylliem.Hadien pat la ïeng ïarap pynshai da u Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad Sangma, uba la ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka la thoh sha ka sorkar pdeng ban pan pisa 30 klur tyngka na ka bynta ban shna Hospital ïa ki mrad ha Upper Shillong lyngba ka skhim Prime Minister’s Development Initiative for North-East Region (PM-DevINE).
title: Bah Hek phi ba ïajan bad u Modi te pan pisa na u ban shna Hospital ïa ki mrad : Ronnie

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang,20: Ha kawei ka jingjia ba sngewngiew bad pynpar ñiangkhriat ïa kiba bun balang, uwei u heprit uba dang 10 snem ka rta na ka shnong Umtangar ha Ri-Bhoi u la shah pynïap dusmon ha ki runar bym lah satia ban ithuh ha kawei ka jaka ba long khlaw hajan kane ka shnong.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum, la ong ba kane ka la jia ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai bad la lap ruh ïa ka met jong u ha ka por 7:00 baje eiei janmiet ha kaba ki runar khlem jingisynei ki la dkhat jubor ïa ka jingim jong u heprit.Ia u heprit ba la duh noh ïa la ka jingim la tip kyrteng kum u Kitborlang Marbañiang uba dang pule ruh ha ka Class-II ha kawei ka LP School ha ka shnong Umlur bad u dei ruh u khun basaw napdeng ki 7 ngut ki khun jong u Bah Synshar Nonghyndah bad ka Kong Diona MarbañiangU Kpa jong une u heprit u la ïathuh ba u heprit Kitboklang u la mih na la iing ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ bad ki paralok hynrei um shym la wan phai iing shuh hynrei dei tad haduh ka sngi u Blei ba la lap ïa ka met jong u na kawei ka khlaw hajan ka shnong ryngkat ki dak mong ha ka durkhmat.Ki Pulit ka Patharkhmah Police Station tang shu ioh jingtip ki la leit marmar sha ka jaka ba la lap ia ka met jong u heprit bad ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit. Hadien kane, la rah noh ïa ka met jong u sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh ban pyndep ïa ka Post-mortem bad la aiti noh ïa ka met sha ki bahaiing hasem ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei na ka bynta ban pyndep ïa ka jinglehñiam ba khatduh.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki kmie ki kpa ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha Patharkhmah Police Station bad ki Pulit ki sdang ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah lap ksai ïa ki runar kiba donkti ha kane ka kam pyniap briew.
title: Shah pynïap dusmon u khynnah skul ha Umtangar Ri-Bhoi, lap ïa ka met na khlaw

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 20: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la rai ban pynbun shuh shuh ïa ki Police Outpost bad ki Border Outpost khamtam ha shilynter ka khappud jong ka jylla da kaba thungkam palat lai hajar ngut ki Pulit.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli, ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Congress na Mawhati Charles Marngar, halor ka jingshah pyndik ki paidbah khamtam ha ki jaka ba don ka jingïakajia pud hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam, u Sangma u la ong, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka tnat Pulit khamtam da kaba buh ïa ki Border Outpost bad ïathuh ruh ba la nang pynbun shuh shuh ïa ki nongtrei ha ki Border Outpost barim bad bun tylli ki Border Outpost ba thymmai ladep ban pynkha khnang ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshong shngaiñ jong ki paidbah ha khappud.U Sangma u la ïathuh ba ha ki khyndiat bnai baladep, ka Sorkar ka la pyndep ai ka jingthungkam haduh 996 ngut ki Pulit, tang ban phah sha ki Border Outpost, watla ki don ki kam ba la mang, hynrei ïa ka jingpynrungkam ym pat lah ban pyndep bad mynta ki dang sah thylli.U la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la rai ban pynlong noh ïa ka jingthungkam na ka bynta 3,108 ngut ki Pulit.“Kine ki kam (ba dang thylli) ha ki Outpost ba la don lypa bad ha ki Border Outpost. Tang shu dep ka jingthungkam ïa ki 3108 ngut ki Pulit, yn sa aikam ïa ki bad ha kata ka por ngin sa ïohi ïa ka jingkhlaiñ ki bor pahara jong ka tnat Pulit,” la ong u Sangma.U la ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la leh bin pa bin da kaba sdang shwa na ka Engineering Wing hapoh ka tnat Pulit“Kane ka la ai laitluid ïa ki SP bad ban pynlut na ka bynta ki Outpost bapher bapher bad ban shna ïa ki ing treikam khlem da donkam shuh ban leit shwa na ka Engineering Wing jong ka tnat PWD lane na kino kino ki Agency,” u la bynrap.
title: Yn pynkhlaiñ ka sorkar ïa ki Police Out Post ha khappud hadien ba thungkam 3000 ngut ki pulit

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21: Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Malli SC ka la khur ïa ka jingjop ha ka lympung lehkai Shillong Cricket League 1st Division hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem kput ïa ka Young Guns CC haduh 137 ron ha ka jingïakhun kaba la long hynne ka sngi.Haba phai sha ka jingïalehkai, ïa ka toss la jop da ka kynhun Malki SC kaba la jied ban tied nyngkong, bad na ka liang jong ka kynhun ka la ïoh ban buh thong haduh 268 ron, bad shah pynhap tang 3 ngut haduh kaba kut jong ka 40.0 over.Napdeng ki rangtied ka kynhun u Ronnie M. Nongbri u la long u ba seisoh tam hadien ba u la khyrwit palat ïa ka spah ron, kata haduh 114 ron naki 116 bol. Katba na ka liang jong u Sylvester Mylliempdahu la ïoh ban tied 57 ron naki 54 bol.Haba phai pat sha ki rangkawangbol ka Young guns CC, bun naki kim shym la lah ban ïalehkai bha, bad kiba la ïoh khur wicket ki kynthup tang ïa u Ankit Tamang u ba la kawang 8 over, shah tied 45 ron bad khur 2 wicket, nangta u Mickey Lyngdoh, u ba la kawang 8 over, shah tied 55 ron bad khur 1 wicket.Haba pyrshang ban beh ïa katei ka thong ba la buh, ka Young guns CC ka la shah pynkhyllem noh baroh 10 ngut da tang 131 ron naki 32.1over. Ki rangtied ka kynhun kiba la kamai bun ron i long u Aditya Singh (40 ron naki 48 bol) bad u Rudra s Rathor (23 ron naki 31 bol), hynrei kane kam shym la ïarap ban pyllait ïa ka kynhun na ka namrem.Haba phai pat sha ki rangkawangbol ka Malli SC kiba la seisoh tam ki long u Mickey marngar u ba la kawang 8 over, shah tied 35 ron bad khur haduh 5 wicket, nangta u Nick Dann u ba la kawang 5 over, shah tied 22 ron bad khur 3 wicket.ïa ka namtam ha kane ka jingïakhun lane Player of the match la khur da u Ronnie M. Nongbri u ba la khyrwit spah ron (114 ron naki 116 bol) kaba la ïarap ïa ka Malli SC ban jop kput haduh 137 ron.
title: SCL 1st Division: Jop kput ka Malli SC ïa ka Young Guns CC

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21: Ka Malki SC ka la khur jingjop ha ka jingïakhun kaba long pyrshah ïa ka Mylliem SC ha ka lympung phutbol 1st DIVISION Football League 2023-24 ba la pynïaid da ka Shillong Sports Association hynne ka sngi ha madan SSA Ground, Polo, por 2:45 baje nohphaisngi.Ka kynhun Malki SC ka la pynliem da 3 – 1 kol ïa ka Mylliem SC ban khur ïa ka jingjop.Haba phai sha ka jingïakhun, dei ka Mylliem SC kaba la ïoh ban pynkhihjar nyngkong lyngba u JanHameshwa Marngar ha ka 11 minit jong ka kylla step, hynrei ka Malki SC ka la ïoh ban pynïakhaid na u Maxcimilando Tariang ha ka 27 minit shuwa ba u PynKhlain Nongrum un thep ïa ka kol kaba ar ha ka minit ba 35.Ban pynthikkna ïa ka namjop, u Maxcimilando Tariang u ba la ïoh ban pynïakhaid na bynta ka Malki, u la pynbud sa ïa ka kol kaba lai ha ka 40 minit.
title: SSA 1st DIVISION: Pynliem ka Malki SC ïa ka Mylliem SC

content: Ka pyrshang jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban kit noh ïa ki khynnah skul da ki Bos STEM ban weng ïa ka jingdheng kali kam shym la lah satia ban weng ïa u sohkyrdot namarba ka jingkhapngiah ha ka thaiñ Laitumkhrah ha ki kynta ba dang long skul bad ha ka por wai skul ka long beit kumjuh bad mynta leilei ka jingdheng kali ka la nang ban ar shah na ka daw ka jingkharoi ki kali bad ki Scooty ar shaka.Ka long kaba i sangsot ban peit ïa ki nongleit nongwan kiba hap ban ïaid lyngba ka nongbah Shillong khamtam eh naduh ki thaiñ Umshyrpi ter ter, nangta na ki thaiñ Mawkhar, Laitumkhrah, Nongthymmai, Khyndai Lad, Polo, Jaïaw, naduh ka por 8 baje mynstep ter ter haduh 10 baje bad ha ka por mynsngi naduh ka por 1:00 baje ter ter haduh 4:00 baje eiei, namar ka jingjur palat ka dheng kali kaba la ingiah ban peit.Ban shu peit kum ki riewpaidbah ym lah satia ban tip nangno ka dheng kali ka sdang khamtam eh haba naduh ki thaiñ Barik ter ter haduh Dhanketi bad Laitumkhrah ba ki kali ki la shu ieng beit hajuh tang shu poi kitei ki por. Tang shu dap 9 baje ter ter, ka jingdheng kali ha surok Shillong-Jowai ka long shaba palat liam. Teng teng la i synei ban peit ïa ki Pulit kiba pynïaid kali, ki bapli ki la shu phuh syep hi puk tangba ki hylla bad kynhied ïa ki nongñiah kali tamsneng watla ki ïohi ba ka la don lypa ka jingdheng kali hynrei ki dang tynruh rak rak da ka jingkhlem akor. Kaba kham i sangsot ka long ba poi haduh u pud ba wat ki heh Pulit ruh ki hap ban mih lang ban pynïaid kali kumba la ju ïohi ha Barik Point ha Rilbong Point, ha Dhankheti manla ka por, kaba dei ka pdengbah jong ka dheng kali ha ka nongbah. Khlem artatien, ki Pulit ki don la ki jong ki jingai jingmut na ka bynta kine ki jingeh kaba ki ïakynduh kaba pynktha khlieh bad pynsniew mynsiem ïa ki tang shu poi ki aiom long skul.Ïa ka dheng kali yn ym lah shuh ban pynduna namarba ki surok ki ïai sah kumjuh katba ki kali ki nang kharoi manla ka sngi.Ka jingwanrah jong ka Sorkar da ki Bos ban leit on bad ban leit shaw ïa ki khynnah skul kam shym la weng satia ïa ka dheng kali namar kiba bun hi ki kmie ki kpa kim da mon eh ban phah ïa ki khun da kine ki Bos ba la ai sngewbha da ka Sorkar namarba ki dang kwah ban pynkjeh bad pynleh khunlung.Jin lada baroh ki kmie ki kpa kiba phah skul ïa ki khun ha ki skul kiba don ha ka thaiñ Laitumkhrah ban phah noh da ki skul Bos kan jin da la weng khyndiat ïa ka jingdheng kali ha ka thain Laitumkhrah kaba long ka daw ka jingdheng kali sha Lachaumiere, Dhankheti, sha surok Shillong-Jowai, Barik, Malki Point. Lada kawei ka bus kan kit ym duna 40 haduh 50 ngut ki khynnah lehse ka la ïarap shikatdeh ei.Kumta lada shu kheiñ, lada kawei kawei ka skul ka don kumba 800 ngut ki khynnah skul ka mut kin don beit ym duna ïa ka 500 ne 600 tylli ki kali rit kiba la ieng laiñ lypa ha shi lynter ka surok ba don kito ki skul naduh ka por ba ki wan buh haduh ka por ba ki wan shaw skul.La ju ïohi ba ka surok kali naduh Barik ter ter haduh Laitumkhrah ka dei ka surok kaba don beit ka dheng kali. Kumta ka shong mynta ha ka jingstad jong ka Sorkar ban tehlakam, namar ban pynheh ïa ka surok ym donlad shuh hynrei ka dei beit sa tang ban pyndonkam da ka jabieng ban pynduna ïa ka dheng kali, lym kumta ki jingeh ki la nang ïai mih bad ka dheng kali kan kham nang jur shuh shuh.Ka ladei ruh ka por ba ki bor pynïaid skul kim dei ban ap ïa ka Sorkar namar bunsien hi ki polisi treikam jong ka Sorkar ki dei kiba suki, kumta donkam ïa ki ban leit ai jingmut ïa ki ophisar lane beit beit sha u Myntri Rangbah ne Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnad pule puthi ne Transport khnang ba ka kam kan ïaid kham stet.Kam myntoi ïa ki kmie ki kpa ban khñium, ban kynthoh ïa ki Pulit pynïaid kali lane ïano ïano lada kim tip ïa ka daw tynrai baroh halor ka jingdheng kali. Ki bor pynïaid skul ki la dei ruh ban kyndit bynriew naduh mynta namar katei ka dheng kali kan poi haduh u pud ba ki khynnah skul ki la hap ban mih lypa ar kynta shwa ka por, khamtam ha ka por ba long eksamin. Ym tang katta, kane kan ktah ruh ïa ka por haba ki khynnah skul ki leit phai sha iing.
title: Ki Bos STEM kim pat pynduna satia ïa ka dheng kali

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang, 21: Hadien ka jingtrei shitom ki bor pulit ban wat ïa u trai jong ka YouTube Channel bala ai kyrteng “7Trep TV” kaba la thep da ka dur jong u Bah BB Makdoh Chairman ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri-Bhoi District ha kawei naki video bala pynmih ha katei ka channel bala kynnoh ba u kren pyrshah ïa u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kaba dei tang ka khubor thok bad ïalam bakla ïaki paidbah, ki pulit kila lap noh ïa u trai jong katei ka channel bad kumjuh ruh uwei u paralok ba donkti lang.Katei ka jingpyrshang jong ki pulit ban wad ïa u trai ba pynmih ïa katei ka video ka dei hadien ba naka liang ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri-Bhoi District hynnin ka sngi kila leit ban ujor da ka ejahar ha Nongpoh Police Station pyrshah ïa katei ka channel hadien ba la pynmih da ka dur u Bah BB Makdoh watla khlem pynpaw kyrteng kaba la ktah ruh ïaka dur bad ka longryngieng jong utei u nongïalam shnong.Kitei ki arngut kiba donkti haka jingpynsaphriang ïaka khubor lamer la tip kum u samla Fernando Diengdoh, u trai jong ka Youtube channel “7Trep TV” u ba la pynmih ïa katei ka khubor bad u ba shong ba sah ha Kynshi bad u samla Neverson Marbaniang ba pule ïa katei ka khubor “Voice Over” ba shong ba sah haka Shnong Erpakon, Ri-Bhoi District.Na ka liang kitei ki 2 ngut ba pynmih ïaka video bad kumjuh ruh ka jingkren ha katei ka video kila wan mih mynta ka sngi ha Nongpoh Police Station ban ïakren ruh markhmat bad u Bah BB Makdoh ryngkat ki nongïalam ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong ban pan map hakhmat kitei ki nongïalam, bad naka liang kitei ki nongïalam kila sneng bad kyntu ba kim dei ban mlien ban leh kum kitei ki kam ban kwah kamai pisa da kaba thad ïaka longrynieng jong kiwei khamtam ba kim dei satia ki nongthoh khubor kiba la ithuh da ka sorkar ha kaba kila kyrpad ruh ba kidei ban wan pan map ryngkat bad ki bahaiing hasem lashai ka sngi.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor naka liang u Bah BB Makdoh, u la ïathuh ba tang hadien 3 kynta ba ki la wan ban ujor ejahar pyrshah ïa katei ka YouTube channel ha Nongpoh Police Station, naka liang ki bor pulit ki la lap noh ïa kitei ki arngut kiba la donkti ha katei ka kam ban pyn saphriang ïaki khubor lamler, bad u la ai khublei ïaka tnad pulit bala shimkhia ïa ktei ka kam khlem pynslem.U la ïathuh ba kum ki nongïalam jong ki shnong bapher bapher kim shym la don kano kano ka daw bad kitei ki arngut ki samla bad u la ong ruh ba ki long kloi ban ïa map hynrei kitei ki arngut kin hap ban wan mih biang ha Nongpoh Police station lashai ka sngi ha ryngkat bad ki Kmie ki kpa lane bahaïing, khnang ba ki bahaïing jong ki ruh kin tip ïa kaei kaba ki khun jong ki, ki leh.Shuh shuh u Bah BB Makdoh u la maham ruh ïa kitei ki arngut bad kumjuh ïa kiwei kiwei ki YouTube channel kiba kharoi ha kine ki sngi ba kim dei ban pynmih kum kine ki khubor thok ki khubor lam ler kaba lah ban ktah ïaka long rynïeng jong u briew bad ïalam bakla ruh ïa ki paidbah.
title: Tang hapoh 3 kynta lap ki Pulit ïa u trai ka 7trep TV, hap panmab na u Chairman ka SRSRB

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang 21: Ka long kaei kaei kaba pynsngewkmen ïa ki paidbah jong ki saw tylli ki konstitwensi ka Mawphlang, Mawsynram, Mawkyrwat bad Ranikor bad kiwei kiba ju pyndonkam ban ïa ka surok kali ha kaba mynta ïa ka surok ba dei ïaid na Mawphlang sha Weiloi la paw ki dak ki shin ban kham pynheh ïa ka da kaba shna da ka Intermediate Road (Phase – I).Lah ban ong ba ka surok ka dei u budlum jong ka ïoh ka kot bad ka pynsuk ruh ha ka leit ka wan na ka bynta ki paidbah nongshong shnong bad nongleit nongwan hynrei lada ki surok ki long kiba sniew bad lada ki jingpyntrei ki long ym katkum ka jingong, “ba ka surok ka dei u budlum jong ka ïoh ka kot”, kan sa long leh noh ei.Haba ïa kren pat ïa ka phang jong ka jinglong jingman ka surok Mawphlang sha Weiloi haduh mynta ka la long kaba sniew shaba palat bad katkum ka jingkylla ka por ka lah sdang ban khapngiah bad donkam ban pynheh noh ïa ka, namar ka jingkiew ki kali kiba ïaid lyngba katei ka surok ka long da ki spah tylli bad lah ban poi ruh sha ki hajar namar ym tang ki kali kiba mih na Weiloi hynrei na kane ka surok kiba pyndonkam ban ïaid ruh na ki saw tylli ki konstitwensi.Namarkata, ka long kaba donkam ba haba la sdang ban paw ki dak ki shin jong ka jingpynheh ne jingpyntrei ïa ka surok, ki nongpyntrei ne ki contractor ki dei ban trei kham stet ym ban pyrkhat tang ka ma-lade namar ka myntoi tang ïa lade ka buh jingeh pat ïa ki nongïaid nongïeng hangta kam don jingmut. Shuh shuh la ïohi ruh ba ïa kane ka surok Mawphlang – Weiloi la sakhi ruh ba mynta naduh Mawphlang sharum ki la sdang ban siang rong bad la sdang ban jam ïa ka them jong Lyngïong, hynrei kane ruh kam pat da biang lut.Ha kawei pat ka liang lah ban ong ba ka jingsdang bun ki kali kiba ïaid na kane ka surok bah Mawphlang – Weiloi ka la sdang ban wanrah ïa ka jingkhapngiah bad buh jingma ruh ïa ki nongleit nongwan khamtam ïa ki heprit kiba ïaid lynti ha katei ka surok. Ngi ïohi ïa ka jingpynpaw ka sorkar ban pynheh bad pynbha noh ïa katei ka surok ka thaiñ naduh Mawphlang shaduh Mawsynram, ngi kyrmen ba katei ka jingthmu kan pynurlong ïa ka jingthrang ki paidbah ka thaiñ kiba ju ïa kren na ka por sha ka por ba lah donkam ban pynheh bad pynbha noh ïa katei ka surok.Ym tang kata, ïa ka surok Weiloi – Mawkyrwat ruh ka la don mynta ha ka jingïakren bad ki la sdang ban pynkhreh shait shait, namarkata ka jingkyrpad na ki paidbah ba bun balang ba ka sorkar Meghalaya lyngba ka Public Works Department (PWD) Road ba kim dei ban pynslem hynrei ki dei ban ïaleh katba lah ban pynbiang ne shna ha ka por kaba biang khnang ba ka jingdonkam bad jingkwah jong ki paidbah kan urlong.Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka phang, ki nongñiah kali kiba ju pyndonkam ïa ka surok Mawphlang – Weiloi haba pynpaw ha u nongthoh khubor, ki la pynpaw ka jingkmen ban ïohi ba ïa kane ka surok la sdang ban pynheh kumba la mang da kaba shna da ka Intermediate Road hynrei ka suki palat ka jingpyntrei kumta ki la buh ka jingkyrpad ïa ka Public Works Department (PWD) Road ba ka dei ban ai jingbthah ïa ki nongpyntrei ba kin leh kham stet namar kumba ka long mynta haba ïaid na kane ka surok lada dei ha ka por tlang ka don ka jingpum-pum kaba la palat bad mynta lei ka lyiur ka la jan kumta ka um ktieh ka la ap lypa ïa ngi, ong ki nongñiah kali.
title: Kyntu ïa ki Kontraktor ban shna pynstet ïa ka surok Mawphlang-Mawkyrwat

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 21: Namar ka jinglah jong ki rangbah shnong Tiehsaw ban teh lakam bad pynjai jai ïa ki paitbah shnong, ba kin ym pynmynsaw ne shim ïa ka aiñ ha la ka kti wat hapdeng jong saw ka sian ka jingkhih bitar ka bym lah shuh ban batai, hadien ba ki la ïoh ban bat ïa u Biangkupar Nongsiej na ka shnong Lawse, uba la pynïap dusmon ïa ka kong (L) Wansaralin Wanñiang hapoh ïng kaba dei ka kurim jong u bad kaba dang armet, na ka liang ki pulit ka West Khasi Hills District ki la ai burom na ka bynta ka shnong baroh kawei.Ki heh pulit dalade naduh u Superintendent of Police ki la ai ka jingïaroh shikatdei bad mynta ka janmiet sngi balang, ki la leit ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha ïing dorbar jong katei ka shnong na ka bynta ban pynkup burom ïa ka dorbar bad ki paitbah shnong.Ïa katei ka jingïalang pynkup burom la pynlong ha ïing dorbar jong katei ka shnong, ha kaba la pynïaid da u bah M.Dkhar sordar jong ka shnong, ha ryngkat ka jingïadon lang jong ki dkhot ka Executive Committee, ki riew rangbah shnong, kiba ha ïing ha sem jong ka kong (L) Wansaralin Wanñiang, ki volunteer jong ka shnong bad ki paitbah.Na ka liang ka tnad pulit la don lang da u Bikram D.Marak uba dei u Superintendent of Police West Khasi Hills, u bah Hubert Kharkongor MPS Additional Superintendent of Police, u bah Steven Kharmyndai Officer Incharge ka Nongstoiñ Police Station, ka kong Wanñiang Officer Incharge Women Police kaba dei peit ïa ki Crime against women & children ryngkat ka team bad kiwei kiwei .Ha shuwa ban pynkup burom bad ai ïa ka khusnam sha ka dorbar shnong, la ïoh ïa ka jingkren na u Dr P.Lyngkhoi Director barim ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, ha kaba u la ong ba ha ka por ba ki rangbah shnong ki la ïoh ban bat ïa u Biangkupar Nongsiej, ki paitbah jong ka shnong ki la ïoh jingtip ki la wan poi kynsan puk ryngkat ka jingbitar shla ka bym lah shuh ban ong ha ryngkat ka jingkhihwin kaba shyrkhei.Hynrei, ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong, u kpa jong katei ka longkmie bad u sordar shnong kim shym la ailad bad ki la ïaleh katba lah ban tem bad pynjai jai ïa u paitbah, da kaba pynshai ba kim dei ban shim ïa ka aiñ hala ka kti, namar ka long ka bym dei.U Bikram D.Marak Superintendent of Police West Khasi Hills, u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki rangbah jong ka shnong Tierhsaw bad u la ong ba ka jingleh jong kitei ki rangbah, ka long ka nuksa kaba bha tam ïa kiwei pat ki shnong hapoh ka jylla, namar bunsien haba kiba kum kitei ki jingshah leh dusmon ki jia khamtam eh haba ki paitabah ki ïoh bat ïa ki nongleh kam sniew, ki paitbah ki ju shim ïa ka aiñ ha la ka kti, da kaba ki bom ki tied haduh ba ki nongkleh kam sniew kin da khlad. Lada ki leh kumtei ki bor ka aiñ ki hap ban trei ïa la ka kam bad kiba jynjar ki dei hi ki nongïalam shnong.U la ong ruh ba ka jingïatreilang jong ki rangbah bad ka dorbar shnong Tiehsaw, ka pyni ruh ba ka jingïatreilang jong ki bad ki pulit yn lah ban pynsajia ïa utei u Biangkupar Nongsiej ha ka rukom kaba dei. U la kyntu ruh ïa ki rangbah bad ki nong sakhi ba haba ka Ïingbishar ba don burom kan khot ban sakhi bad pynshisha ïa katei ka kam bymman ba shyrkhei ba u Biangkupar Nongsierj u la leh ïa la ka kurim, ki dei ban ïeng skhem bad ïathuh hok kumba ka la jia.Na ka liang u Superintendent of Police u la aiti ïa ka syrnod sha u sordar kum ka dak jong ka jingpynkup burom.
title: Pynkup burom ka tnad Pulit ïa ka DS Tiehsaw ba kem ïa u runar ba pynïap ïa ka kurim ba dang armet

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi Balang ula pynpaw ka jingkyrmen ba ka jingtih dewiong da ka buit stad saian kan sdang noh naduh mynta u snem.Haba jubab ïa ka jingïatai halor ka jingkren u Lat, u Conrad ula ong ba ki jingpynkhreh ïa ki kam ki jam ban sdang ïa ka jingtih dewiong da ka jingstad saian ka dang shu sdang mynta.“Ngi dang ap ïa ka environment clearance, ka jingpynlong ïa ka public hearing kaba dei ban long hapoh ka 45-60 sngi” ula ong.“Ngi la thikna bha ba ha une snem mang tyngka ban wan, ngin sa ïohi ïa ka jingsdang jong ka jingtih dewiong da ka jingstad saian” bynrap u Myntri Rangbah.
title: Kyrmen u MR ban sdang noh ka jingtih dewïong da ka buit stad saïan naduh mynta u snem

content: Khliehriat Rymphang 21: Ka Mihmyntdu Community Social Welfare Association (MCSWA) hynnin ka sngi ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram ai jingpynshai halor ka jingshyrkhei u drok bad kino kino ki jingkyrni kiba pyn buaid, kane ka prokram ka dei shibynta jong ka campaign, ka Nasha Mukti Abhyan kaba la pyllait da ka sorkar India kaba don ka thong ban pynlong ïa ka ri India kaba lait na ki jingdih pyn buaid khamtam kaba lait na ka jingkyrni ïa u drok, ïa ka prokram la pynlong ha Dkhiah Secondary School East Jaiñtia Hills District.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, ka Master Volunteer, kaba dei ruh ka Manager jong ka MCSWA, ka kong Rinibet Patlong ka la kren bad pynshai shaphang ka jingktah bad ki jingsniew kiba mih na ka jingdih drok, la ong ba ka jingdih drok ka ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah, ïa ka jingmut jingpyrkhat, ka ktah ïa ka im lang ka sah lang , ka ktah ruh ïa ka ioh ka kot namar na ka daw u drok bunsien ki ju mih bun jait ki kam sniew kiba ju pynshong syier ïa ka im lang ka sah lang, kiba pyndonkam drok ki kylla long mraw ha u drok, haba la kyrni ka pynlong ïa u briew ban ioh ïa u khñiang jingpang HIV bad lada shim sting ban shim ïa ki lad jingsumar kan kylla sha ka jingpang AIDS kaba pyntlot ïa ka bor met bad thaw ïa ki jingpang ba bun jait ha ka met.Ka kong Patlong ka la batai ruh kumno ban iada ban lait na ka jingsaphriang u khñiang HIV, ka la ong ba dei ban kiar na ka shongkha pathar, ban kiar na kaba pyndonkam da u juh u thyrnia injek, ka kyntu jur ïa ki khynnah samla ba ki dei ban kiar na ka jingdih drok bad ba ym dei da lei lei ruh ban ngop ha ka jingdih drok namar shi sien ba la ngop ka long kaba eh ban lait, ka kyntu ruh ïa ki khynnah ba ki dei ban long kiba khlaiñ ha ka bor jingmut jingpyrkhat bad ban don ka jingmut kaba skhem ban ong Em ïa u drok bad ruh ban kiar na kaba shongkha pathar.Ka la kren ruh halor ka jingsniew kiba mih na u drok, bunsien na ka daw u drok ki mih bun jait ki kam sniew ba pynshong syier ïa ka imlang ka sahlang, u drok u ktah ruh ïa ka shong suk shongsaiñ ha ka imlang sahlang.Kane ka campaign, ka Nasha Mukti Abhyan ka dei kaba la pyllait paidbah da ka sorkar pdeng lyngba ka Ministry Of Social Justice & Empowerment bad ha East Jaiñtia Hills District la pyllait da u myntri ka sorkar jylla, u bah Kyrmen Shylla myn ha ka 2 tarik u bnai jylliew 2023, naduh kane ka sngi bad haduh mynta ka kynhun jong ka MCSWA ka khlem shong kli kti hynrei ka la pynlong ïa ki prokram ai jingpynshai sha ki shnong bapher bapher bad sha ki skul bapher bapher kiba don hapoh ka district ban ialap paidbah shaphang ka jingshyrkhei u drok bad ka jingpang AIDS bad ruh ban iakhun ban poi sha ka thong ban pynlong ïa ka ri India kaba lait na u drok bad ki jingkyrni ha kaba dih pyn buaid.Ia katei ka prokram la pynïaid da ka Principal jong ka Dkhiah East Secondary School, ka kong Luciana Nongtdu bad la ïa don lang ruh ki khynnah bad ki nonghikai jong katei ka skul, ïa kaba kum kane ka prokram ka MCSWA kan nang iai bteng na ka por sha ka por.La pynlong ruh ïa ka jingiakop dro dur bad la ioh ruh ban sam ïa ki prize sha kito ki khynnah kiba jop ha ka jingiakop.
title: Pynshai ka MCSWA ïa ka jingshyrkhei u drok bad ka Nasha Mukti Abhyan

content: Jowai, Rymphang 21: Ka Seiñkur Tang Pyllun kala pyntip ba ka Dorbar Pyllun (General meeting) kaba ar kan long haka 24 tarik mynta u bnai Rymphang, 2024 haka shnong Mowtyrshiah, West Jaiñtia Hill District naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep.Ka Seiñkur ka khot sngewbha ïa baroh ki khun ka Kur kiba don na kylleng sawdong jong ka jylla bad na kiwei de ki jaka ba kin wan sha kane ka Dorbar Pyllun.Ha kane ka Dorbar Pyllun ki nongïalam ba hakhmat ka Kur bad ki riew rangbah kin ai ki jingsneng jingkhraw bad ha ka juh ka por yn pynkup burom kumjuh ïa ki samla pule jong ka kur kaba la tip kum ka ‘Academic Award’ khamtam kito kiba la ïoh 75% shaneng haka SSLC, HSSLC bad haka kyrdan Doctorate.Kan don ruh ka jingpynkup burom ïa ki riew tymmen jong ka Kur kiba la kynjoh sha ka rta 80 snem shaneng.Na ka liang ka Kur ka buh ka jingkyntu ïa baroh ki para Kur ba kin ïapoi sha katei ka Dorbar kaba ar, pynkut ka kyrwoh bala phah da u ma A. Tang uba dei Secretary ka Seiñkur Tang Pyllun.
title: Yn pynlong ka Seiñ kur Tang ïa ka Dorbar Pyllun ha Mowtyrshiah

content: Khliehriat, Rymphang, 21: Dang myn ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai rymphang, ki paidbah jong ka shnong Umrasong bad shnong Nongsning, East Jaiñtia Hills District ki la mih paidbah bad pyrshah ïa ki karkhana coke kiba don hajan kiba dang pyntrei shaid shaid mynta bad ka jingpyntrei ïa kine ki karkhana ka la ktah ïa ki tyllong umbam umdih kiba don hajan, kumta halor kane, ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement Jaiñtia Zone ruh ka pyrshah jur bad ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ïa kitei ki ar shnong.Na ka liang ki nongialam ka HANM Jaiñtia Zone, ba kynthup u President u bah Mihsalan Thoo, u Vice President, u bah Robel Pakma bad u General Secretary, u bah Wankishwa Mawlong ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingshah ktah ki tyllong um kiba don hajan ka shnong Nongsning bad shnong Umrasong bad ki la kyntu ïa ka sorkar, ïa ki bor district ba ki dei ban peit bniah bha halor kane ka jingshah ktah ki tyllong um bad jingshah ktah ka mariang bad ong ruh ba lada ka sorkar kam leh eiei ka seng kan mih madan ryngkat bad ki nongshong shnong ban ieng pyrshah ïa ki coke kiba dang pyntrei mynta.Kum ban shu phai dien, ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai u Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Nongsning bad Umrasong ki la leit iakynduh ïa u Member Secretary jong ka Meghalaya State pollution Control Board bad pynpaw ka jingpyrshah halor ka jing ai laisen ïa san tylli ki Coke Plant kiba kyrteng ka M/S M M Minerals, M/S Unique Industry (2nd Chimney), M/s Presidium Breez, M/s Magic Coke bad ka M/S Ioanis Industries Private Limited (Chimney 2) kiba don hajan jong kine ki shnong khamtam ha ka iadei bad kawei na ki coke plant kaba kyrteng M/S Presidium Breez kaba la pynjulor ïa ka tyllong um jong ka shnong Nongsning.Ka dorbar shong Nongsning kaba la dep ban buh ïa ki jingujor lah bun bun sien naduh u snem 2022 sha u Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat ba dei khmih ïa kane ka kam bad kyntu jur ba ym dei ban ai laisen ïa ki coke plant namar ki pynjakhlia ïa ka ka lyer bad mynta ki pynjot sa ïa ki tyllong um kiba don hajan.
title: Kyrshan ka HANM ïa ki shnong kiba pyrshah ïa ki karkhana Coke

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 21: Ki shipai BSF ha ki jingleit khynra ha kiba bun ki jaka, kaba la pynlong ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024, ki shipai ba la peitngor bha ki la lah ban pynpulom ïa ki jingpyrshang ban khaïi beaiñ ha u pud u sam jong ka India bad Bangladesh ha kaba ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa ka dawai Phensedyl bad ka shini kaba la mut ban khaïi beaiñ sha Bangladesh.Hadien ka jingïoh jingtip kaba thikna ki shipai ba la pahara bha jong ka kynhun 172 Bn BSF Meghalaya ki la ïoh ban kurup haduh 200 bitor ka dawai jyrhoh ka Phensedyl katba dang thmu ban khaïi beaiñ sha Bangladesh lyngba u pud u sam ka ri na East Jaiñtia Hills Meghalaya.Ha kawei pat ka jingleit khynra ba la pynlong da ki shipai BSF Meghalaya, kumba 3 ngut ki nong India ki la shah bat ha ki BSF bad la kurup ruh na ki ïa ka shini kumba 6,800 Kilo na ki thaiñ khappud bapher bapher jong ka Meghalaya. Ïa kitei ki dawai bad shini ba la kurup la aiti sha ka ophis Custom bad ka thanat pulit ban leh ïa ki kam katkum ka aiñ.
title: Kurup dawai jyrhoh bad shini ki shipai BSF

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 21: U State Vice President jong ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit u Bah Wankitbok Pohshna ha ka sngi Balang u la ong ba ka BJP kam dei satia ka NPP.‘Dang shen ngi la ïohi ha ki kotkhubor bad ïohsngew sharum shaneng ba ka BJP bad ka NPP ki dei kijuh. Kane ka jingpyniasriem ia ka BJP bad ka NPP ka long tang ka jingpynthame ban ialam bakla ia ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya,” ong u Bah Pohshna ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Baroh ki tip ba ka BJP ka dei ka National Party ba la seng hadien jong ka Jan Sangha ha ka 4 tarik u Iaiong 1980 bad ka nongrim jong ka seng ka dei halor ka ktien Intergral Humanism kaba la wanlam da u khrawpyrkhat u Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhaya. Ka dei ka party kaba burom ia ka kolshor jong ka ri, kaba phaikhmat sha ki jingdonkam ban kyntiew ia ki jylla katkum ka rukom im jong ki nongshong shnong bad kaba lamkhmat ban kyntiew ia ka roi ka par jong ka ri. Na ka bynta ka BJP ka ri ka wan hakhmat duh bad ka trei borbah ban ai jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah,” u la ong.“Lah ban sakhi ia kita baroh lyngba ki skhim ba ka sorkar BJP ka la wanlam sha ki paidbah kum ka Ujjala, Vishwakarma, PMAY, Atal Pension Yojana, Jan Dhan Yojana, Ayushman Bharat, Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana, Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana bad kiwei kiwei. Kino kita kiwei ki party kiba la lah ban wanrah ia ki jingmyntoi shibun na ka bynta ki paidbah? Ym don wat ka NPP ruh kan nym lah? Ong u Bah Pohshna.“Ka BJP mynta ka synshar ha ki 18 tylli ki jylla ha ka ri bad ia ka Sorkar Kmie ruh la synshar da ka BJP bad ban shu nujor ka NPP tang ha kane ka thain Shatei Lam mihngi ruh kam pat da don kyrteng klet noh sha kiwei ki jylla shabar ka thain. Ka NPP ka dei kaba la mih na ka NCP kaba la pait na ka seng Congress ha kito ki snem,” u la ong.“Da kaba ong ba ka BJP ka dei ka NPP, ki klet ba ka pyrthei baroh ka tip ba u President rangbah ka BJP dei u Jaggat Prakash Nadda bad u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri dei u Narendra Modi bad ym don uwei ruh u dkhot ka NPP uba lah ban tuklar ha ki kam pohiing jong ka BJP. Ka NPP ka dei tang ka dkhot ha ka NDA ka Sorkar Synrop ba la thaw ha ka por ba la long Myntri Rangbahduh u Atal Bihari Vajpayee ba la khladnoh. Ha kane ha jylla, ka BJP ka shu ai jingkyrshan ia ka Sorkar Synrop ba la lamkhmat da ka NPP kumba leh lang kiwei,” la pynshai u State President.“Kaei kaba pyniapher ia ka BJP na kiwei pat ki party dei ba ka iengskhem ha ka nongrim ban pyrshah ia ka bamsap, ka shahliang bad ban kyntiew ia kawei ka longing ha ka sain hima sima (dynastic politics). Ym pat don ba lah ban mih bujli ia u Narendra Modi bad um salia iano iano kiba kren pyrshah bad kam pher la ki dei na ka jylla ne na kiwei ki party,” ula ong.“Ngi iaiban ia kane kawei ba ka BJP ka iakhun hi marwei ha ki elekshon bad kam ju donkam ban iasynroplang bad kiwei. Ka party ka la long kaba la khreh lypa ban wan biang sha ka bor synshar ha ka ri ynda la dep ka elekshon MP bad hadien ka jingwanphai na ka lympung iakynduhlang jong ka party kaba dang shu dep shen ha nongbah New Delhi ka BJP Meghalaya ka la nang iaid shakhmat ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon MP da kaba pynkhlain ia ki tnat hangne ha jylla bad ka la sdang ban pyntyllun ia ki prokram ‘leit sha ki shnong’ bad ‘kynduh ia ki paidbah’ ki ban long ki lad ban kynduh ia ki nongthep vote ban pynshai halor ki kam jong ka seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u president ka seng u Rikman Momin,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba katkum ka rukom ka Central Parliamentary Board jong ka party kan sa ai ia ka rai khatduh halor ki kyrtong ki ban ïoh ia ka tiket jong ka party na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura.
title: Ka BJP kam dei ka NPP, ong u State Vice President ka BJP Meghalaya

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 21: Kum shibynta na ka jingrakhe ïa ka National Science Day 2024, ka State Council of Science Technology & Environment, Meghalaya ha ryngkatlang bad ka Shillong Science Centre ki la pynlong lang ïa ka Science programme kaba shi taïew kaban sdang naduh ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai haduh ka 3 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024.Ha kane ka prokram kaba shi taïew kan don ka jingmareh ïakob marathon ne ka Open to All Run for Science (Marathon) Competition ka ban long ha ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024 ha ka por 6:15 mynstep. Kan don ka jingpynrung kyrteng ha ka jaka naduh ka por 5:45 baje mynstep. Ka jingmareh kan sdang na Polo Parking Lot sha Golflinks-Mawroh-Sanker-Shillong Science Centre.Kiwei pat ki prokram ki long ka jingleit jngoh ïa ki jaka bapher bapher, ka jingpeit ïa suiñbneng ha ka por mynmied ne ka night sky observation, ki workshop bad seed ball plantation ha kylleng ka jylla.Ka prokram kaba kham kongsan kan long ha ka 28 bad 29 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024 ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ha kaba kumba 400 ngut ki nongïashimbynta kin shimbynta. Ha ki prokram ba ar sngi kin don bun ki kam ba kynthup ïa ka exhibition da ki seng ba ïadei bad ka saïan (Scientific Organizations), ki jingkren na ki riewshem phang, ban ïoh shimbynta ha ki science experiment, science model exhibition da ki School Eco-Club, ka video screening halor ki tiar trai ri trai muluk (indigenous technologies), ki science skit, puppet show bad kiwei pat ki jingïakob kum ka painting, extempore speech, open quiz, bad kiwei.
title: Yn don bun ki prokram ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka Science Day

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21 : U Myntri ka Tnad Pule Puthi u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka sngi Balang, ula pyntip ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynïaid shaid shaid ïa ki jingpynkhreh baroh ban pynlong ïa ka Captain Williamson Sangma State University ka ban treikam.Haba jubab hapoh ïing Dorbar, u Rakkam ula ong ba ka Sorkar ka la pynkhreh mynta ban mang sa 100 tylli ki kam nonghikai ha Tura bad 6 tylli ha Shillong Campus.Ka jingmang pisa ban pynlut ïa kane ka long T.45.7 klur shisnem.Ula pyntip ba ka kam ban thung ïa u Vice Chancellor jong ka State University ka la jan poi ha ka bynta kaba khatduh eh. U ong ba ka jingthmu hi ka long ban pynlong ïa kane ka State University kaba treikam noh hapoh u 2024.Hynrei, namar ka jingwan jong ka elekshon Lok Sabha, lada ym lah ban thungkam ïa baroh ki nonghikai kane ka State University kan hap sdang treikam noh naduh u 2025.Nalor kane, u Myntri ula pyntip ba ka pisa ba 16.96 klur tyngka la dep ban pynlut haduh mynta halor ka jingpyntrei ïa ki jingtei jong kane ka University.Ula ïathuh ba ka jingtei ïaka Administrative Block bad Academic Block nalor ka jingtei ïa ki Hostel ki Shynrang bad Kynthei kila dep mynta.Haduh mynta, 56 tylli ki kam la dep ban mang ba kynthup ïa u Vice Chancellor bad Registrar. U pyntip ba ka Sorkar kala dep mang ruh ban shna ïa ka surok shapoh ka University lem bad ka jingpynpoi ïa ka umbam umdih.“Ngi la dep thung ïa ka Board of Governors. Ka jingïalang ba nyngkong jong ka Board of Governors ka la long ha ka 14 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2022 bala pynïaid da u Myntri ka Tnad Pule Puthi” ula bynrap.
title: La nang ïaid ki jingpynkhreh ban sdang noh ïa ka University jongka jylla: Rakkam

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 21: U Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng ba khmih ïa ka Health and Family Welfare, u Dr Mansukh Mandaviya da ka ktien u la plie ïa ka “Regional Consultative Workshop on Research Priority for Providing Accessible and Affordable Healthcare for the Northeastern States of India” ha Nongbah Shillong ha ka sngi Balang.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang u Dr Mandaviya u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka kwah ban pynthikna ba baroh manla uwei pa uwei kin lah ban ïoh ïa ki lad sumar kiba ïa ryngkat khlem kano kano ka jingpynïapher hapdeng uba riewspah bad uba tlot ha ka ïoh ka kot.Halor ka jingangnud jong ka sorkar pdeng na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi u Dr Mandaviya u la ong, “ha kine ki 10 snem ba la leit, la don ki jingpyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka sha ka rynsan kaba ïa ryngkatlang hapoh ka ri da kaba pynïasoh ha baroh ki liang la ka dei ha ka ïoh ka kot, ka Koit ka Khiah ki surok,lyngba ka rel, ki I-Ways, ki lad lyngba ka wah bad ki Ropeway nalor kiwei pat. Ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ha ka ri la ïohi ïa ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi ba ka la sdang ban ïohi ïa ka roi ka san kum ka engine jong ka ri India. U la ong ba ki lad sumar mynta ki la lah ban don bad ïoh ha kane ka thaiñ baroh kawei.U Myntri ka sorkar Pdeng u la ïathuh ba palat 31 klur ki briew ki la ïoh ïa ki Ayushman card ban ïoh ki lad sumar ha ki hospital ha kaba ïa ki longïing ki la ïoh ka lad sumar khlem siew eiei haduh T. 5 lak kaba la ai ha ka shisnem, 11,000 ka Jan Aushadhi Kendras ka la plie ha kaba 50-80 percent ka dor kaba tad jong ki dawai kiba la lah ban ïoh, palat 1.64 lak ka Ayushman Arogya Mandirs ki la mih, kiba la kheiñ bad pyrkhat kum ka Health Gate Keeper jong ki nongshong shnong ka India bad ka complete Health Surveillance System bad ka kawei ka jingsdang ka jingsumar kaba la pyntreikam na ki 48 ki BSL Lab”.Ha kane ka prokram na ka liang ka Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng u la plie ruh ïa ka jaka ïew bad plie ïa ka Master Program on Health Economics and Technology Assessment (MPHETA) ha ka IIPH, Shillong ha ka jingïadonlang Myntri khynnah ka sorkar Pdeng ba khmih ïa ka Health and Family Welfare, ka Dr Bharati Pravin Pawar bad ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka sorkar jylla ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh.Kham hadien na ka liang u Myntri khynnah ka Sorkar Pdeng ba khmih ïa ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr Bharati Pravin Pawar ha ka por ka jingïasyllok bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la ong ba ka jingïohi jngai jong u Myntri Rangbah duh ka Ri u Narendra Modi, ka India ka la kiew bha la ka dei ha ka ïoh ka kot ha kine ki thaiñ ba kyndong jong ka ri.Ka la ong ba kane ka thaiñ ka la ïoh ki jingmyntoi na ki skhim kum ka Ayushman Bharat Health and Wellness Centers bad kiwei.Na ka liang Anu Nagar, Joint Secretary, ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah halor ka Health Research, U Sampath Kumar, Principal Health Secretary, Meghalaya bad kiwei ki heh ophisar na sorkar Pdeng bad sorkar jylla ki la ïadonlang ha ka workshop kaba ar sngi ba la pynlong lang da ka Tnat Health Research, Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, ka sorkar India; Indian Institute of Public Health, Shillong bad ka Indian Council of Medical Research – Regional Medical Research Centre, Dibrugarh.
title: Plie u Myntri ïa ka Workshop ba ar sngi ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21 : U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi Balang u la pynbna ïa ka skhim kaba thymmai ba ka sorkar kan pyntreikam ban ïarap ïa ki samla pule ha ki kyrdan ba shalor.Haba ai jingkren halor ka Mang Tyngka jongka sorkar jylla u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba yn sa pyntreikam noh da ka Chief Minister’s Scholarship Scheme naduh u snem 2024-2025 na ka bynta kito ki samla pule kiba pass bha shakhmat ha ki kyrdan Class XI bad XII. “ Ka sorkar kan pyntreikam ruh ïa ka prokram kaba thymmai ban ïarap ïa ki samla pule kaba la jer kyrteng ka MPOWER da kaba la mang ruh 380 klur tyngka na ka bynta kane” ong u Myntri Rangbah.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba ka sorkar la la leh da ka pali ban pynbha ïa baroh 2044 tylli ki skul sorkar lynba ka Umbrella of Mission Education ha ka jinglut kaba 326 klur tyngka.U la ïathuh ka jingpynbha bad pynthymmai la lah ban pyndep ha ki 220 tylli ki Secondary bad Higher Secondary School bad ka jingtrei mynta ka dang ïaid ha ki 100 tylli ki skul.Nangta u la ïathuh sa kumba 1,725 tylli ki skul ka jingpyntrei ka dang ïaid ha la ki bynta bynta.” Kan long kaei kaei kaba sngewtynnad ba la kumno kumno ruh haba kut jong u snem ban wan baroh ki skul sorkar kin biang lut nadong shadong” ong u Conrad.U la pynbna ba yn sa pyntreikam ruh ïa ka Mission Education 2.0 ha u snem 2024-2025 bad ka thong ka long ban pynbiang naduh ka bording, ka umdih, ki painkhana bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam ha ki skul sorkar. Khnang ban khring ba pynbyrngia ïa ki samla pule, ki khynnah skul bad kiba la pule ha ki kyrdan ba shalor ruh ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh ïa ka projek ba kyrpang ban tei ïa ki Library na ka bynta jongki bad ïa kine yn tei ha ki 750 tylli ki shnong ha ka jingmang tyngka kaba 162 klur.Lyngba ka Early Childhood Development Mission u myntri rangbah u la ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka la mang ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa ki 2148 tylli ki Anganwadi Centre bad ban plie ruh ïaki Centre kiba thymmah ha ki 1500 tylli ki shnong. La mang 500 klur tyngka na ka bynta kane hapoh kine ki san snem ban wan.
title: Da ka skhim ba thymmai pynbna u CM ban ïarap ïa ki samla pule ha ki kyrdan ba shalor

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21 : U MLA ka Congress na Umsning u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Balang ula buh jingkylli la ki Judge bala shongthait ki dang bteng ban long ki VVIP hapoh ka Jylla.Haba wanrah ïa ka jingkylli bynrap ha ïing Dorbar, u Dr Celestine ula ong ba daw ba pynlong ïa ki ban kylli ïa kane ka jingkylli ka dei namar haba ki leit sha Meghalaya House, la ju pyntip sha ki ba ïa kata kata ka kamra la buh na ka bynta ki Nongbishar bala shongthait.Ula ai jingmut ruh ba donkam ban bishar thymmai ïa ki jingmyntoi ba la ai sha ki Nongbishar bala shongthait. Kat kum ka jingong jong u, kan long ka jingkit kaba khia ïa ka Jylla ba rit kum ka Meghalaya lada ka ai ïa ki juh ki jingmyntoi wat sha ki Nongbishar ba wan tang lai bnai bad mih noh na ka jingshakri ha ka High Court ka Meghalaya.Haba jubab ïa kane, ka Myntri ka Tnad Aiñ ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong “Baroh kine ki jingmyntoi ba la ai sha ki Nongbishar ki dei kiba la buh da ki aiñ ka Parliament. Ngi hap ban bud ïa kine ki kyndon bad ruh ïa ki katto kane ki hukum jong ka Supreme Court kaba la ai jingmut ïa kine ki jingmyntoi”.Shuwa kane, ka Myntri ka pyntip ba ka Secretariat Assistance bad Domestic Help Allowance sha ki Chief Justice ba la shongthait ka long T. 50,000 bad ki Judge ba la shongthait ka long T. 40,000.Kat kum ka jingong jong ka, ki juh ki jingmyntoi bala ai da kiwei ki Jylla ka Ri sha ki Justice bad Judge ba la shongthait ba sah satang lai bnai ha ka jingshakri, yn ai ïa ki juh ki jingmyntoi.
title: Hato ki Nongbishar ba la shongthait ki dang ïoh ïa ka kyrdan VVIP, kylli ka Liang Pyrshah

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 21: U Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka sngi Balang u la pyntip ba ki don 1241 ngut ki nongtrei hapoh ka SSA program ha Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynlut pisa T. 12.72 klur ha ka shisnem ban siew tulop.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit halor ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar ban pynkiew ïa ka tulop jong ki nongtrei hapoh ka SSA program ha Meghalaya, u Myntri u la ïathuh ba ka pisa ba la mang na ka bynta ka tulop la siew da ka Management Monitoring Evolution and Research (MMER) jong ka Ministry of Education ka Sorkar India.“Ka mang tyngka ba la mynjur da ka Plan Approved Board jong ka Ministry of Education ka Sorkar India bad ka pisa kaba hapoh kane ruh la kynthup lang bad kiwei kiwei ki kam kum ha kaba siew ïa ka bai leit bai wan, ka jingshim wai ïa ki kali, ka jingwad bniah, ka jingpynlut na ka bynta ki jingïalang ha ophis bad kiwei kiwei ki jingpynlut nalor kaba siew tulop ïa ki nongtrei,” u la ong.U la bynrap ba ka MMER ka la ai pisa ha u snem 2022-2023 bad 2024 ka long T. 27.49 klur bad ka jingpynlut baroh ïa ka pisa haduh mynta ka long T. 12.46 klur.Ka Tnat Pule Puthi ka sngewthuh ïa u synñiang u bynhei jong ki nongtrei ka SSA bad ka jingjop jong ki prokram ka SSA ha ka Jylla. Ka jingaiti lut bad ka jingtrei shitom ka la pyntyllun sani bha ïa ka pule ka puthi ha ka jylla, la bynrap u Sangma.U la ong ba ka tnat ruh ka mynjur ban ai jingithuh ïa ka jingtrei shitom da ki nongtrei ka SSA bad ka jingpynkiew ïa ka tulop kan long ka thong khnang ba ki nongtrei kin kham trei smat bad ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa kane ka prokram.U ïathuh ba ka jingpynkiew tulop ïa ki nongtrei jong ka SSA ka long ha u snem 2016, bad ha ka 12 tarik, Ïaiong, 2023 ka executive committee hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Chief Secretary ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la mynjur ïa ka jingtyrwa ba ïa ka jingpynkiew tulop dei ban ïasyllok shwa bad ka tnat Pla Tyngka bad kiwei kiwei de ki Society bad ki tnat sorkar.“Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ka tnat Pule Puthi ka la pynkhreh ïa ka Matrix bad ka ladep aiti sha ka Sorkar Jylla na ka bynta ban ai jingmynjur bad ban buh ryntih ïa ka jingsiew tulop sha ki nongtrei katkum ka Meghalaya Fifth Pay Commission,” u la ong.“Da kaba pynshong nongrim na ka mang tyngka kaba shi snem la siew tulop T. 12.46 klur bad ka Revised Annual Budget ka long T. 23 crore, kaba pyni ïa ka jingïapher kaba T. 10.22 klur, ka Sorkar ruh ka la shimkhia bha ïa kane ka jingtyrwa bad dang ap ïa ka jingmynjur,” la ong u Sangma.
title: 12.72 klur shi snem pynlut ka Sorkar Jylla ban siew tulop ïa ki nongtrei SSA

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Balang ula pynpaw ïa ka jingbym kot bor jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban thied jaka ha ka ban ai jingïada ïa ki khlaw ba hap hapoh ki Catchment Area ne ki jaka ba ki tyllong umdih ki don.Haba jubab ïa ka jingïatai halor ka jingkren u Lat, u Conrad ula ong “Watla ka jingtyrwa ban thied ïa ki ki jaka ha ki catchment area ka dei kaba biang eh hynrei ka jingdonkam pisa ka long kaba bun bah bad ngi lehse ngim ym lah ban leh ïa kane”.U Conrad ula pyntip ruh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka la mang 344 klur tyngka hapoh ka Megh-Arise ban ïada ïa ki catchment area ha Shillong bad ha Tura.“Namar kata, ngin pyrshang ban buria ïa ka jinglutksan ki trai jaka naba ka dor ban thied ïa ka jaka ka long kaba heh bha” ula ong.Halor ka jingkynrei u droks, u Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ba haduh 696 tylli ki case la dep ban chargesheet bad palat 14000 gram u heroin bad 2700 gram u opium la ïoh ban kurup.“Khnang ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingwan rung u droks, ngi lah thaw ïa ka DREAM Project ban leh eiei halor kane ka kam” ula ong.Haba kren halor ka jingjaboh ka lyer ha Byrnihat, Ri-Bhoi, u Conrad ula ong ba ka jingpynduh noh ïa ki licence ka lah ban nym dei ka lynti ban ïaid shakhmat namar ka Jylla ka dang phaikhmat sha ka jingwan seng kam hynrei ka sorkar ka lah ban pyntreikam da ka jingdaiñ kuna ïa kito kiba pynkheiñ aiñ.Ula kular ruh ban sa shimkhia mardor ïa ka jingujor halor ka jingsam ïa u khaw tad dor sha ki paidbah.U Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ruh ba ka song pisa ba T.5000 klur bala tyrwa ban pynlut sha ka New Shillong Administrative City khlem pep kan pynkylla dur ïa ka Nongbah jong ka Jylla.
title: Ym kotbor ka Sorkar ban thied jaka ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki dieng ha ki tyllong umdih

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21 : U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ba peit ia ka tnad Commerce & Industries, Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka sngi Balang u la pyntip ba ka sorkar jylla kan sa shim ia kai kaba khatduh hapoh ki hynriew bnai la kan khang khyrdep noh neem ia ka Mawmluh Cherra Cements Limited (MCCL).Haba jubab ia kane halor ka jingkylli ba wanrah da u MLA ka VPP na Nongkrem Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba ka mat na ka bynta ban shim ia katei ka rai ka don mynta hapdeng ka jingbishar bniah jong ka sorkar.La iathuh ruh ba ka ka MCCL ka don haduh 278 ngut ki nongtrei bad naduh u snem 2020 ka la sangeh treikam.“Hapoh ki hynriew bnai ngin sa sa lah ban shim rai halor kane,”ong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah. Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba ka sorkar kan sa shim lang ia ka jingsngew jong baroh kiba don bynta ha shwa ba kin shim ia ka rai ba khatduh.“Nga kular ba ngin sa shim ia ka rai ba khatduh kaba dei bad yn ymdon mano manor uh ban shah ktah,” u la ong.Haba jubab pat halor ka jingkylli ba wanrah da u MLA ka Nongthymmai,Bah Charles Pyngrope, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba kin sa shim ia ki sienjam ban peit na bynta ki nongtrei jong katei ka karkhana pynmih dewbilat lada jia ba ka sorkar ka thmu ban khang noh ia ka.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ia mynta hi, ka sorkar ka la siew katto katne sha ki nongtrei katkum ka jingdon pisa.Shwa kane, u Nongialam ka Liang Pyrshah, Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la pynpaw lang ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka rukom siew sha ki nongtrei jong ka MCCL.Na ka liang u MLA ka Sohra, Bah Gavin Mylliem pat u la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan pynstet ban shim ia ki sienjam da kaba syllok lang bad kito kiba don bynta bad buh hakhmat eh na bynta ka bit ka biang jong ki nongtrei.
title: Hapoh ki 6 bnai yn shim rai khatduh ka Sorkar halor ka MCCL

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 21: Ka Iewduh, kaba long kawei na ki iew sahnam bad ka kad khaii kaba heh tam ha kane ka jylla, shen kan sa kylla long kum kawei na ki iew ba thymmai ka ban khring ruh ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei ynda ka Sorkar ka la mang pisa T.50 klur, la ïathuh u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K. Sangma haba ai jingkren halor ka mang tyngka ha ka sngi Balang.U la ïathuh ba ka jingshna pynbha ïa ki surok kaba jrong 10-kilometre ha dohnud ka sor Shillong bad ka jingshna pynbna ïa ki 20 tylli ki khongdong surok la mang pisa palat T. 50 klur.U Sangma u la ong ruh ba ka Comprehensive Mobility Plan na ka bynta ka Shillong bad ka Tura ka dang don hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh. Ïa ka Shillong Urban Mobility Policy ladep mynjur. Ban bud ïa ka State’s Electric Vehicle Policy 2021, haduh 100 tylli ki Electric Bus yn sa pynïaid ha Shillong bad ha Tura.U la ong ruh ban weng ïa ka jingpynieng kali harud surok, ka Sorkar ka la pynkha 1,250 jaka ieng kali ha Shillong bad 150 tylli ha Tura, bad 100 ha Jowai ha kaba ka jinglut kan kot T. 150 klur.Shuh shuh u Sangma u la pyntip ba ki projek bapher bapher hapoh ka Shillong Smart City ki dei kiba la jan dep. Ka Integrated Command and Control Centre bad ka Shopping Complex ha Polo ba la tei ha ka jinglut kaba T. 214 bad bad T. 100 klur yn sa pyndep noh hapoh une u snem.
title: 50 klur yn pynlut ka Sorkar ban pynbhabriew ïa ka ïewduh

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21 : Ka jingpep khah khah jong ki MLA ka Liang Pyrshah ha kane ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka ka ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ ka la wanrah ka jingsngew artatien namar kum ki Nongmihkhmat Paidbah ka kamram jongki ka long ban pynsngew ïa ka sur jong u paidbah hapoh ka ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ.Ha ka sngi ba saw jong ka Dorbar Mang tyngka, u Lamphang ka ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ u Thomas A Sangma, ula kheiñ iap noh ïa ka jingkylli ba la buh ha ki (starred Question) jong u Myntri Rangbah barim bad MLA ka Songsak Dr Mukul Sangma namar ka jingpep jong u ban wan sha ka Dorbar.U Dr Mukul u dei ban buh ïa ka jingkylli hakhmat u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma haba ïadei bad ka jingthungkam jong ka Sorkar ïa ki Chairman/Co Chairman/Vice Chairman bad ter ter (political appointment) haduh kine ki sngi ba mynta.Ha ka sngi kaba lai, u Lamphang ula kheiñ iap ruh ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka North Shillong Bah Adelbert Nongrum namar ka jingjah noh na ka Dorbar. U Bah Adelbert u khlem pep satia ha shilynter jong ka Dorbar hynrei ula mih noh napoh ka ïing Dorkar hashuwa ban poi ka pali ba un wanrah ïa ka jingkylli kaba ula buh.Ka jingkylli kaba u dei ban wanrah kum u MLA ka VPP ka ïadei bad ka jingkynnoh thombor ki Pulit ïa u MLA ka VPP na Mawlai Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang ha ka jingïakhih ba dang shen jong ka VPP, kaba pyrshah ïa ka jingwengkam ïa ki Ophisar ka Meghalaya Lokayukta.Kaba thamula, ki MLA ka VPP kila ju buh jingkylli bha halor ka jingbuh duna palat ïa ka por pynlong ïa ka Dorbar, kaba la pynbor ïa ki ban hap mih sha surok ban pynsngew ïa ki ishu ba ki don hakhmat u paidbah.Dang shen, ha ka jingïalang ha Mawlai, u MLA ka VPP Bah Adelbert Nongrum ula pynpaw paidbah ïa ka jingkwah jong u ban wanrah hapoh ka ïing Dorbar ïa ka jingjia kaba la jia ha u MLA ka Mawlai (ba kynnoh thombor ki Pulit). Hynrei, haba ka pali jong ka jingkylli kala wan ban ïatai, une u MLA ula jied ban jah napoh ka ïing Dorbar.Kiba bun ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingïapait ïapra jong ka Liang Pyrshah.
