Ha ka por ba u Bah Adelbert u wanrah ïa ka Bill shimet ban pynkylla ïa ka Meghalaya Lokayukta Act, jan shiteng na ki dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah bad arngut ki MLA ba rangbah ka VPP kynthup u President Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit bad MLA ka Mawryngkneng Bah Heaving Stone Kharpran, ki la jah napoh ka ïing Dorbar.U Nongialam ka Liang Pyrshah Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, hashuwa ban sdang ka Dorbar Mang tyngka, ula thoh shithi sha baroh ki Party kiba don ha ka Liang Pyrshah ba kin ïatreilang ha ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka. Hynrei, ka VPP kala jied ban trei la ka jong bad kan ïatreilang bad kiwei ki dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah tang ha ki katto katne ki ishu.
title: Wanrah te wanrah jingkylli, ynda la poi ka pali, jah rngai ki MLA na Assembly

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21: u Myntri Ranghah ka jylla, u Conrad Sangma, u la ïathuh ba ka sorkar bad kumjuh ruh ki Pulit ki la trei borbah ha ka thma pyrshah ïa ka jingsniew jong u drok.Haba jubab ïa ka jingïatainia halor ka jingkren lamphrang u Lat, u Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ba ki Pulit haduh mynta ki la la oh kem palat 1600 ngut ki briew kiba donkti kam khaïi drok. La register case palat 800 tylli bad la chargesheet palat 696 tylli. Nangta la ïoh kurup palat 40 hajar Gram u Ganja, Palat 11 hajar Gram u Opium. Nangta la ïoh kurup ruh 323 tylli ki kali, nangta ki mobile phone bad kumjuh ruh la kurup palat 1 Klur tyngka ka pisa.Kane ka pyni ba haduh katno na ka liang ka tnad pohïing bad ki Pulit ki la trei shitom ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa u drok. Hynrei ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba kam long kaba suk ban ïakhun pyrshah kine ki jingsniew, namar kadei ka kam kaba pynïohnong shibun ïa ki briew bad ki briew kin ïai leh bad ïabeh sha kane ka kam kamai.U la ong ruh ba ka jingïaleh pyrshah ïa u drok kam kut tang ha kaba kurup bad kem, hynrei dei ka bynta ruh jong ka jingïasyllok, ka jingthaw thymmai ïa kito kiba donkti bad kiwei kiwei de ki prokra. Dei namar kane ka daw ba ka sorkar ka la pyntreikam ïa ka Dream Project, ha kaba yn lah ban ïalam lynti ïa ki samla bad kito kiba ngop ha ki kam dih drok ba kin ïoh ïa ka jingim ba thymmai.
title: La kem 1600 ngut, kurup 323 ki kali, kurup palat klur ka pisa ha ka thma pyrshah Drok

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 21: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pan jingïarap pisa na ka Sorkar Pdeng na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka Administrative City bad ïa ka Knowledge City ha New Shillong Township (NST).Haba kren ha ka jingwanrah ïa ka mang tyngka ha ka sngi Balang, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ïa ka jaka kaba heh 232 akar la aiti na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki building ha New Shillong Administrative City, ka ban don ïa ka Administrative Complex kaba heh ha kaba yn buh lang ïa ka Secretariat building bad ïa baroh ki ophis treikam jong ki Directorate.Ka jingtei ïa kane ka Integrated Administrative complex la khmih lynti ba ka jinglut kan kot haduh T. 550 klur.“Yn tei ruh ïa ka Unity Mall ha ka jinglut kaba kot kumba T. Rs 220 klur. Ka Administrative bad shlem treika ki Pulit yn sa tei lang haduh, ryngkat bad ki jaka ïalehkai sports, bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam ha kaba ka jinglut kan kot T. 1,200 klur,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, ka Administrative City kan long beit thik tang na ka shlem treikam jong ka Sorkar, katba ka Knowledge City yn sa tei ha Mawkhanu-Mawpdang ha ka jingheh ka jaka kaba 808 akar ba la ïoh da ka Sorkar. Ka New Shillong Knowledge City kan long beit thik tang na ka bynta ka Sports, IT, Tourism bad ka Agro-logistic.“Ïa ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) na ka bynta ban tei ïa kine ki shlem treikam ka ban kot haduh T. 5,400 klur ladep aiti sha ka Sorkar Pdeng,” u la ong bad bynrap ba ka jingshna ïa ki projek bapher bapher ha kine ki City yn sa bei da ka Sorkar Jylla, ka Sorkar India bad lyngba ki jingbei pisa na ki kynhun shimet.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kine ki ar tylli ki nongbah ba thymmai kin pynkha 50,000 hajar tylli ki kam.Ïa ka surok kaba pynïasoh ïa ka Shillong bad ka Administrative City ha Umsawli bad hapdeng ka Administrative City bad ka Knowledge City ha Mawkhanu la mang pisa kumba T. 520 klur, u la ong bad ïathuh ruh ba ka jingmang pisa kaba kot T. 365 klur la bynta na ka bynta ki projek bapher bapher ha Administrative City bad ha Knowledge City na ka bynta u snem 2024-25.
title: Pan jingïarap pisa ka Sorkar Jylla na ka Sorkar Pdeng ban tei ïa ka Administrative City

content: l La mang ba ka jingmih kan long 23,545 Klur Tyngka. Ka jingpynlut pat 25,574 klur. Kaba mut ka Mang tyngka ka duna 2,029 klur.l Ka thong jong ka mang tyngka ka long ban poi sha ka 10 US Dollar Economy ha u snem 2028 ne kata ka ïoh ka kot kaba 10 Billion Dollar ha u snem 2028.l Ka mang tyngka thong ruh ban pynmih kam ne ai jam ïa kumba 5 lak ngut ki briew hapoh u snem 2028.l La mang ban pynlut 1200 klur na ka bynta ka New Shillong, ha kaba yn tei ïa ka Administrative Complex kaba kynthup lang ïa ka Secretariat ba thymmai, ki ophis jong ki Directorate. La mang 550 klur na ka bynta kane. Kan don ruh ka Unity Mall kaba 220 klur. Ka jaka treikam jong ki Pulit ryngkat ki jaka ïalehkai Sports bad kiwei kiwei de.l Lyngba ka State Electric Vehicle Policy 2021, yn pynïaid 100 tylli ki Electric Bus ha Shillong bad Tura. Yn shna ruh 1250 tylli ki jaka pynïeng kali ha Shillong, 100 tylli ha Jowai bad 150 tylli ha Tura ha ka jinglut kaba 150 klur.l Yn tei sa ïa ka Second Phase jong ka Shillong Tech Park ha ka jinglut kaba 121 klur ka ban ai kam kumba 20 hajar ngut ki briew. Yn tei ruh ïa ka Tura Tech Park ha ka jinglut kaba 127 klur.l Yn tei Meghalayan Age Experimental Centre ha Mawmluh, Sohra ha ka jinglut kaba 150 klur.l Pynpoi um sha Shillong lyngba ka New Shillong Water Supply Scheme kaba la mang ban pynlut 1,650 klur ban shna lyngba ki ar tylli ki Stage ha Wah Umkhen.
title: ki pasoh na ka mang tyngka 2024-’25

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21: U Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Balang, ula wanrah ia ka mang tyngka kaba duna 2,029 klur tyngka(deficit budget), hynrei u la kop pat ba kane ka mang tyngka kan long ruh kum ka thong ban poi sha ka 10 Billion Dollar Economy bad ka ban pynïoh kam kumba 5 lak ngut ki briew haduh u snem 2028.“Kine ki thong baroh artylli kin long ruh kum ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 10 snem ka sorkar MDA ha u snem 2028”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah uba bat ruh ïa ka Pla tyngka jong ka jylla.“Ka Sorkar jong ngi kan pyrshang kat kaba lah ban pynurlong ia ka. Ka Meghalaya kan synniang sha ka thong jong ka ‘Viskit Bharat’ da kaba pynkiew iala ka GDP sha ka 10 billion US dollar hapoh u 2028″, la ong u Conrad haba wanrah ïa kane ka mang tyngka.Kane ka mang tyngka kaba duna 2,029 Klur tyngka kadei namar ba ka jingpynlut kan long 25,574 Klur tyngka, khlem da kheiñ ïa ki ram bad kiwei pat ki jingsiew ba dei ban pynlut, katba ka jingioh ne ka jingioh lum khajna khlem da kheiñ ïa kaba ïoh na ki ram ne kiwei pat ki jingïoh ka long tang 23,545 Klur tyngka.Ka jingiohlum pisa baroh lang ka long T. 27,072 klur, ha kaba la mang ba ka revenue receipt kan long T. 23,515 klur bad ka capital receipt ka long T. 3,557 klur, ong u Conrad ha ka jingkren halor ka mang tyngka.Haba pyllait noh ia ka jingshim ram ba T. 3,527 klur, ka jingioh lum pisa bala mang kan long T. 23,545 klur, ula ong haba bynrap ba ka jingmang ban pynlut ka long T. 27,072 klur, ia kaba ka revenue expenditure la mang T. 19,653 klur bad ka capital expenditure kan long T. 7,419 klur.Ula ong ba ka jingsiew ia ka sut jong u snem 2024-2025 la mang ban long T. 1,236 klur bad ka jingsiew ia ka bai bam tynmen ka long T. 1,865 klur.“Nga kwah ba baroh ki dkhot jong kane ka Iingdorbar bad baroh ki Nongshongshnong ba kin kynmaw ia kane ka mang tyngka kum ka ‘Mission 10’-ka plan ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot ka Jylla sha ka 10 billion US dollar. Ka jingkynjoh ia ka ‘Mission 10’ ha u 2028 kan iatyngkhuh bad ka jingdap 10 snem jong ka Sorkar MDA” ula ong.U Myntri Rangbah ula kam ruh ba ka thong jong ka Jylla ka long ba kan dei kawei na ki 10 tylli ki Jylla ba hakhlieh duh jong ka Ri haba phai sha ka thong jong ka GDP bad SDG hapoh u snem 2032, kaba dei ka jingangnud bad kaba lah pat ban pynurlong.Shuh shuh ha kane ka mang tyngka, u Conrad u la ban ruh na ka bynta ka jingtei ïa ka New Shillong Township ha kaba ka jingmang tyngka kan poi sha ka 1200 Klur tyngka, kynthup ha kaba shna ïa ka Secretariat kaba thymmai, ki iing ophis, ki jaka ialehkai Sports, ki jaka jngohkai, ki shopping mall bad kiwei kiwei.Ula ong ba ka thong ban pynlong arshah ia ka GSDP bad pynlong ia ka Meghalaya ka 10 million US Dollar economy ka dei kaba la buh ia ka GSDP u snem 2022-2023 kum u snem sdang ia ka jingianujor, haba ka GSDP jong ka Jylla ka dang dei INR 42,697 klur lane 5.3 million UD dollar.“Ka GSDP u snem 2024-2025 la antad ba kan kot T. 52,973 klur lane 6.6 billion US dollar. Ka jingnang kiew ba manla u snem hapdeng u snem 2023-2025 kala kot ia ka 11.4%. Kine ki jingkhein kila nang ai mynsiem bad pyni ba ka Jylla ka don ha ka lynti iaid kaba dei ban kynjoh ia ka thong 10 billion US dollar economy” bynrap u Conrad.U Myntri Rangbah ula wanrah ruh ia gender budget bad ai ia ka mang tyngka ba T. 5,271 klur na ka bynta u snem 2024-24. Ka jingbhah pisa sha ki kam halor ka jinglong jingman ka mariang ka long T. 4,501 klur.U Conrad ula ong ba ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ki samla kaba kynthup ia baroh ki kam ki ban leh na ka bynta ki samla kan long T. 2,853 klur.Haba khein kongsan duh ia ka kam pule dangle, u Conrad ula ong “Nga la ai T. 3,539 klur ban pynkhlain ia baroh ki sienjam bala shim ha ka kam pule dangle ba kynthup ia T. 1,335 klur kum ka jingsiew tulop grant-in-aid”Ula ai ruh T. 1,970 klur ban pynkhlain ia baroh ki lad ai jingsumar ha Jylla ba kynthup ia ka mang pisa ba T.173 klur na ka bynta ka MHIS.U Myntri Rangbah ula air uh ia ka mang pisa ba T. 2709 klur sha ka kam shna surok bad ki jingtei, ka bording T. 1558 klur, ka primary sector-T. 1,670 klur, Urban sector-T.934 klur bad ka Drinking water sector-T. 905 klur.U Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ha une u snem ba mynta, ka pisa bala mang ban phah na ka SorkarPdeng ba kynthup ia ka bhah jong ki khajna ka Sorkar Pdeng, Fifteenth Finance Commission Grant bad ka bhah na ki Central Sponsored Scheme la khmih lynti ba kan kiew sha ka T. 18,168 klur na ka jngmang pisa ba T. 15,467 klur.“Ka bhah jong ka khajna na ka Sorkar Pdeng la khmih lynti ba kan kiew sha ka T. 9,355 klur na ka bynta u snem 2024-2025 na ka revised estimate ba T. 8,471 klur jong une u snem, kaba pyni ia ka jingkiew ba 10%” ula ong haba pyntip ba ka jingpynmih pisa hi n aka Sorkar ha une u snem ka long T. 3,262 klur, kaba kiew haduh 23% na ki snem bala leit noh.
title: Da ka mang tyngka ba duna T. 2,029 Klur wanrah u Conrad, phai khmat sha ka 10 billion dollar economy

content: Ka jingkyrni ha kino kino ki kam khamtam haba ïadei bad ki jingmlien ba sniew ka dei ka mat kaba baroh ki longiing longsem ki mad lut la ka long naduh kiba don ïa ki khun kynthei lane kiba don ïa ki khun shynrang. Kane ka jingkyrni kam thew ruh tang ïa kiba dang khie samla hynrei wat ha kito ki longiing kiba don tang kiba heh suda.Kum ka nuksa, ka jingkhlaiñ ki social media ha kane ka juk ka la teh mraw bad long thik kumba teh da u kynjri ïa ka jingim jong baroh khlem mab shuh la ka long naduh kynthei ne shynrang ne naduh kiba dang rit haduh kiba la ïaw. Kane kam kut tang hangne ka jingkyrni ki khynnah ba dang khie ha ki jait games khamtam ki shynrang ka la ktah ym tang ïa ka bor pyrkhat jong ki hynrei ka pynjaituh bad ka pynlong ïa ki ban thait wat ban pynleit jingmut ha ki jingpule.Kawei pat kaba ktah ïa ki ka long ba kim don por bad kim kwah wat ban don lang bad ki kmie kpa ne hynmen para pynban ki pynleit jingmut ha ki jingïalehkai jong ki. Kane ka pynlong ïa ki ban long kum kito kiba shu pang lynter taid nalor ba kim long pariah ne smat ban kren bad khana. Kane baroh kadei namar ka jingpynleit jingmut da ki kynta khamtam ha k apor miet bad teng teng haduh mynstep ha ki games jong ki.Kaba kham i ma ka long ba kito kiba kyrni kim dei shuh tang kito kiba la kham heh hynrei wat kito kiba dang 9 snem ne 10 snem ruh ki la ngat lang hajuh ka shangkhawiah namar ki la ïohi ne kumba ïoh jinghikai na ki hynmen para ne ki paralok. Ka daw tynrai hi kadei naduh ba wan ka khlam COVID ba ki kmie ki kpa ki hap ban ai ïa ki mobile ïa ki khun ban leh ïa kita ki online class ka la long kumba hikai ïa ki kumno ban pyndonkam wat ïa kiei kiei kiba dei shabar jong ka jingpule. Teng teng ki kmie ki kpa bym da tip bha ïa ki social media ki nang kmen ban ïohi ba ki khun ki pynlut por ha ki mobile da ka jingtharai ba ki pule ïa ki jingthoh ba ai ki nonghikai phewse ka long markhongpong namar ki pynlut por ha ka peit phlim.Nalor kine, ka jingmih bun ki rynsan social media ka khring ruh ïa ki khun samla ba dang khie wat ban ym lehraiñ shuh ïa la ka longrynïeng hynrei tang ban ïoh bun kita ki nongpeit lane kita ki follower ki leh shongshit lang. Haba phai pat sha ki samla shynrang, kaba kham i shyrkhei ka long ha ka jingleh shongshit ban ïa kynthoh ne ïa comment pathar ha ki rynsan social media khlem da pyrkhat arsien ïano kan ktah, shaei kan poi hynrei tang namar ka jingshongshit paralok la shu ïa leh kyndeh lang.Ha kawei pat ka liang na ka bynta kito kiba kham duna ka ïoh ka kot, lehse ki khun ki hap ban pyrshang bun ki lad ki lynti tang kumno ban ïoh recharge khnang ba kin ïoh ban ïalehkai Games bad ruh ban ïoh pynlut por ha ki social media. Hynrei na bynta kiba kham biang ka ïoh ka kot, ka jingpyndait da ki wifi ka la nang pynsniew shuh shuh namar la shu ïohei beit ïa ka internet khlem da donkam khuslai mano ban siew.Kaba kham i ma ka dei ruh ka jingbym don por shuh ki kmie ki kpa ïa la ki khun. Don ki longiing kiba ïa kynduh khun tang por bamja miet lane tang ha ki sngi Saitjaiñ bad sngi U Blei. Ka daw ka long ba ki khun ba leit skul ha sor naduh dang step ki la mih bad hadien ba wai skul ki hap beh sa ki jingleit tuition bad kat ba kin da poi iing la kot sha ka phra baje. Don ki khep ba ha kito ki longiing ba ïa trei lut bad Kmie bad kpa, la shu shaniah ha ki nongtrei ban pynbiang bam ne pynsong ja skul ïa ki khun namar kat ba kin khie thiah ki khun la poi sha skul. Kane ruh kadei shi bynta ba ki khun kim ïoh por shuh bad ki kmie ki kpa bad bun na ka por jong ki la pynlut ha skul nangta ha ki jaka leit khreh kot bd ruh bad ki paralok.Dei ruh ha kum kine ki jingjia ba ki kmie ki kpa ki ai pahuh ka bai thep pla ïa ki khun ba kin bam kin dihsha ha ki dukan khnang ba hadien ba la wai skul kin leit beit sha jaka khreh kot. Lada jia ba dei khynnah tipsngi ka pisa kan ym bakla lynti hynrei lada jia pat ba ngat ha kiwei kane kan pynkylla khongpong bad pynjot thiaw ïa ka jingim jong u khynnah skul bad ka lah ban poi haduh u pud ba kin ngop ha kiwei ki jingdih kiba sniew kiba kynrei ha kum kine ki por mynta kum u drok, ki biri sikret lane wat ha ka kyiad ruh.Ka lawei nangne shakhmat ka dang kham shyrkhei shuh shuh da ka jingnang syrtok ka jingkyrduh kam bad lada jia lei lei ba ym don sa ki lad ki lynti ban ïakhun ïa kane, ka lawei ki samla ka don hapdeng ka jingma kaba khraw kaba kin kham bun ka por bad ki paralok bad ha ka jingkhluit ka snam lada don ïa bun ki lah ban leh ruh bun ki jait kam nalor ba ki kloi ruh ban ngop ha bun ki jingsniew.
title: Ka jingkyrni ha social media ka jingma ïa kiba dang khie?

content: Khliehriat, Rymphang 22 : Na ka daw ka jinghap, ka la don ka jingtwa khyndew ha surok bah national highway ha Sonapyrdi East Jaintia Hills District , myta ka sngi ha ka por kumba 11 baje mynstep, kumta ka la don ka jingsahkut ki kali ha ka jingdheng kali bad hadien katto katne kynta ynda la pynkhuid ïa ka khyndew ki kali ki la sdang ban lait suki suki.Kumjuh ruh na ka daw ka jingdap um ka surok ha kiba bun ki bynta ha katei ka surok national highway bad ka jingsniew palat ka surok ha ka thaiñ Narpuh, ka la wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur bha ha shi lynter ka surok, kiba bun ki kali kynthup ki kali rit bad ki kali heh ki la sahkut ha ka jingdheng kali ha ka thaiñ kaba ju jia khah khah, kane ka la buh jingeh haduh katta katta ïa ki nongleit nongwan kiba iaid lyngba na katei ka surok, namar ka jingdap um ha ki thliew ki syar kiba don ha surok ka buh jingma ruh ia ka jingim briew namar ym lah ban tip ki kali ki lah ban kylla ha surok ha kano kano ka por khamtam ki kali heh kiba kit jingkit.Ki briew jong ka thaiñ Narpuh, naduh Lumshnong ter ter shaduh Malidor, ki dap da ka jingsngew bynñiaw bad sah ha ka umdum namar ka jingbym shim khia ka sorkar bad ka NHAI ban maramot ïa katei ka surok kaba la jot rathai kaba la i kum ka surok khlaw, ym lah ban len ba kaba kum kane ka jinglong jingman ka surok shisha ka buh jingeh bad buh jingma ïa ki nongleit nongwan khatam haba lap ka pang ka shitom haba ki donkam ban leit phah surmar ne leit shim dawai sha ki jaka ai jingsumar sha Khliehriat, Jowai bad Shillong, ki paidbah ki mad tang ka khyndew pum pum ha ka por ba rang ba rkhiang bad ha ka por ba hap slap ki mad tang ka ktieh ba jyrsieh, la sngewthuh ba lada ka sorkar hi kam phah shna bha bad maramot bha ïa katei ka surok, kan buh jingeh shuh shuh ïa ki paidbah nongleit nongwan ynda la poi ka aiom lyiur ba jur bha u slap.
title: Ba twa khyndew bad ba sniew palat ka surok, jur ka dheng kali ha surok NH-6 Narpuh, East Jaiñtia Hills

content: Jowai, Rymphang 22: Ka ophis jong ka State Council of Science, Technology & Environment, Meghalaya ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ki bor District ka West Jaiñtia Hills, Jowai kin pynlong ïaka jingïamareh ‘National Science Day Run– 2024’ shi bynta ban rakhe ïaka National Science Day 2024 halor ka phang kaba ong “Indigenous Technologies for Viksit Bharat”.La pyntip ha kane ka jingmareh lah ban ïashimbynta naduh ki shynrang bad kynthei (Open Category) ka ban long haka 26 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 haka por 6 baje shiteng mynstep.Yn sdang ïa ka jingmareh naduh Main Gate Kiang Nangbah Stadium (Starting point) da kaba ïaid lyngba u surok Ladthadlaboh Main Road – Jowai Public School – Gate Polytechnic – Kshaid Rymphum – Salaroh – Dulong Poh-hali Road – Dulong – Pamhadem – Panaliar (Civil Hospital) – Iongpiah – Mission Compound – H.K. Singh School – D.C Office – New Hill – National Highway bad pynkut ha Kiang Nangbah Indoor Stadium (Finishing point).Ha kajuh ka por yn sam ruh ïa ki ‘Special Prizes’ bad ki Syrnot sha baroh ki nongjop ha ka National Science Day Run – 2024, ha kaba yn sam ei ruh ïa ki T-Shirt sha baroh ki nongïahsim bynta.Halor kane na ka liang u District Sports Officer, West Jaiñtia Hills District, Jowai ula kyntu ïa baroh ki District Association, ki Sports Club, ki School bad Colleges napoh ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ba kin wan ban ïashim bynta katkum katei ka tarik bala kdew haneng.Ïa ka jingshim kyrteng (Spot Registration) ïa baroh ki nongïashim bynta kan long ha katei hi ka sngi 26-Rymphang-2024 ha Kiang Nangbah Indoor Stadium, Jowai, bad ka por ban kyntiew kyrteng kan sdang naduh 6 baje mynstep.
title: Yn pynlong ïa ka National Science Day Run – 2024 ha Jowai

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 22: Ki 3 seng ba kynthup ïaka KSU, RBYF bad FKJGP mynta ka sngi kila mih shakhmat ban pynrem jur ïaki riew thrang snam ba donkti pynïap ïa u heprit Kitborlang Marbaniang haka shnong Umtangar, ha kaba kila buh jingkylli ruh kaei ka pap ka sang ba u tei u heprit u la leh haduh ban shim ïaka jingim jong u na kane ka sla pyrthei.Naka liang kitei ki 3 seng hapoh ka jinglam khmat u Center Doloi President ka FKJGP Western Border Area, Bah Receive Pator President ka KSU Western Border Area, Samla Rishan Nongtri President ka RBYF Patharkhmah Circle mynta ka sngi kila leit ruh ban ïakynduh bad u Officer In charge ka Patharkhmah Police Station ba kum ki bor pulit ki dei ban shimkhia ban thwet bad ban kem ïaki runar ba donkti ha katei ka kam ha kaba naka liang ki bor pulit haduh mynta kim pat shongthaid ban thwet ïaki runar bad sdang ruh ban ioh ksai ïaki runar ba donkti ha katei ka kam.Naka liang kitei ki 3 seng kila leit ruh ban ïakynduh ïa u sordar bad ki kmie ki kpa jong utei u heprit ba shah pyniap haka shnong Umtangar bad ioh ruh ban leit sngewlem ryngkat ka jingïarap kaba rit khamtam ban tip ïaka jingjia kaba bñiah naki kmie ki kpa ha kaba kum ki 3 seng kin nym shongthaid katba ka aiñ kam pat lah ban ai ka jingbishar kaba hok naka bynta u heprit Kitborlang.Naka liang ki nongïalam kitei ki 3 seng kila pynrem jur ïa katei ka jingjia ba ki riew thrang snam kin shim syndon ïa ka jingim jong u heprit ba dang 10 snem ka rta u ba dang shong ruh tang haka klas II, ba kum ki bor pulit ki dei ban shimkhia ïa katei ka kam ban thwet bad ban kem ïaki riew thrang snam, kiba ym don shuh ka mynsiem briew haduh ban da shim ïaka jingim jong u heprit bad ban pynioh ka jingbishar ba hok ïaka iing ka sem jong utei u heprit khnang ba kum kitei ki jingjia kim dei ban nang jia nangne shakhmat.
title: Pynrem jur ka RBYF, KSU bad FKJGP ïa ki riew thrang snam ba donkti pynïap ïa u heprit ha Umtangar

content: Khliehriat rymphang 22: Ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement Jaiñtia Zone, hynin ka sngi ki la ioh bat ïa ki briew bad la suba jur ba ki dei ki dkhar na Bangladesh kiba la wan rung beaiñ sha East Jaiñtia Hills District, ka seng ka suba namar kitei ki briew kim tip wat tang ïa ka jaka shong jaka sah ruh, kim don ruh ki kot ki sla kiba biang ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nong India.Ki nongialam ka HANM Jaiñtia Zone kynthup u President, u bah Mihsalan Thoo, u General Secretary, u bah Wankishwa Mawlong, ki ong ba halor kane ka jingioh rung kine ki briew, ka seng ka pynrem jur ïa ka jingtlot treikam ki khyrdop talasi mynder, ki Infiltration Check Gate kiba na ri Bhoi District bad na Ratacherra East Jaiñtia Hills Ditrict bad kyntu jur ba ki dei ban shim khia ban peit bha ïa ka jingrung jingmih ki mynder ba kaba kum kane kam dei shuh ban dang jia nangne sha khmat.Ha kajuh ka por, ka seng ka ong ba ha shwa ban aiti ïa kine ki briew sha thanat, ka seng ka kwah ban pynsngew ba ka seng ka pynrem jur ïa ka company Dalmia kaba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills District kaba wanrah ïa ki nongtrei ki bym biang ki kot ki sla kiba lehse ki lah ban dei ki nong Bangladesh “Kine kiba wan rung beaiñ ki wan knieh ïa ka hok, knieh ïa ki kam ki jam jong ki trai shnong” ong ki nongïalam ka HANM-JZ.Na ka liang ka seng ka kyntu jur ïa ka sorkar ba ka dei ban peit bha ïa baroh ki company kiba don hapoh ka district ba kiba wan trei na bar ki dei ban biang ki kot ki sla bad lada ka sorkar kam shim khia ka seng kan leh da kaba tyngeh bad leit ban khynra hi ïa ki kot ki sla jong baroh ki nongtrei bar jylla kiba trei ha company Dalmia ha Thangskai.
title: Ïoh bat ki HANM-JZ ïa ki briew ba suba nong Bangla ba trei ha company Dalmia

content: Jowai, Rymphang 22: U Deputy Commissioner & Chairman District Disaster Management Authority West Jaiñtia Hills District, Jowai ula pynbna ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ba kidei ban long kiba phikir bha haka por bajur lyer ban lait na kano kano ka jingmynsaw khamtam ha ba ïadei bad ka jingpluh ding bad ruh ban peit bha ïa ki wire tan ding elektrik ha ïing.La kyntu jur ban khmih bad pynskhem bha ïa ki tiar ki tar kiba lah ban shah rong ha ka lyer kum ki thup dieng, ki tin sop lane mawit ba shong synjor, ki tin/ sop theh ñuit, ki sign board bad kiwei kiwei ki mar kiba lah ban shah rong ha ka por bajur lyer.Lada ka jingba leilieh ka long kaba jur bad neh slem kan bha shibun ban nym pyndonkam ne ban pynmeh ïa ki tiar elektrik kum ki mobile, isteri, radio, telebision bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar kiba pyndonkam da ka bor elektrik.
title: Ka jingmaham naka bynta ka jingjur lyer bad thaba leilieh

content: Nongpoh Rymphang 22: Ka ophis u District Planning Officer ka Ri Bhoi ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ka State Council for Science Technology & Environment, Meghalaya Shillong ki la rai ban pynlong ïa kawei na ka jingïamareh thong ba la tip kkum ka ‘Run For Science’ ba la ai ailad na ka bynta ki samla kynthei bad shynrang kiba la kynjoh sha ka 14 snem shaneng.Kane ka Run For Science kan long ha ka 26 tarik u Rymphang 2024 ka ban sdang na Dulongnar sha NSCA Indoor Stadium naduh ka por 6 baje mynstep.Na ka liang katei ka ophis kum ka jingpynshlur ïa ki samla ba wan ban shim bynta ki la pynkhreh ruh ïa ki khusnam ha kaba kiba wan nyngkong kin ioh rah ïa ka song pisa kaba T.7000, kiba wan ba ar kin ioh khur ïa ka song pisa kaba T. 5000 bad kiba wan ba lai kin ioh khur ïa ka song pisa kaba T. 3000. Na ka liang katei ka ophis trei kum shi bynta ban pynlong ïa kane ka Run for Science ka la khot la wer ïa baroh ki samla kynthei bad shynrang kiba kwah ban shim bynta ki dei ban poi ha katei ka sngi bad ka jingwan shim bynta shitrhem ki samla kan pynlong ruh ïa kane ka sngi kaba jop halor ka jingpynlong ïa ka ne ka Run For Science.
title: Yn pynlong ka ophis u DPO da ka Run for Science

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 21: Namar ka jingjur palat kiba thang ïa ki lum ha kine ki sngi, ka seng ki Nongrep ka Hills Farmer Union West Khasi Hills District hapoh ka jingïalam u Bah Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh General Secretary West Khasi Hills District, ha ka jingsynran ki para nongrep bad u General Secretary ka HFU Sengkmie Bah Alfonbirth Kharsyntiew, ha ka sngi balang ka la leit ïakynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hill District Sahep Garod LSN Dykes.Ki nongrep lyngba ka Hills Farmers Union West Khasi Hills District, ka kyntu na u khlieh ka District ban ïarap lem, lada ka don ka jingpyrkhing katkum ka aiñ, namar kane ka jingjur kiba thang lum ka la ktah eh ïa ki nongrep kiba thung dieng bad ruh na ka bynta ka lawei ki khun ki kti.Kum ban shu kdew, na ka liang ki nongrep na thaiñ Mawlangkhar, Mawpun, Area Nongkhnum bad kiwei ki jaka, ki la sdang thung dieng khamtam kito kiba don jaka ban thung dieng ne lum syllen. Hynrei sngewsih pat ki riew pynjot mariang ki bym don ka jingtip lem ïa ki para briew, ki la thang kat ban pynjot ïa ka jingtrei shitom ki nongrep kaba la long ka jingduhnong ïa ki nongrep bad jingtrei shitom ka la duhei.Na ka liang ka u DC u lah kular ban ban shimkhia bad u la ong ban pynjari 144 CRPC ban khanglad bad ban bthah ïa ki shnong lyngba ki BDO ba dei ban peit bha. Lada don dei ban aiti ha ka kti ki pulit ban leh kaba donkam. Lada lap ïa ki ba thang lada ïoh kem kan sa pynduh jait ïa kitei ki jait briew.“Na ka liang ngi ka seng nongrep ngi ai khublei shibun ïa u DC ba u la shimkhia. Ngi ngeit nangne shakhmat kan ai mynsiem ïa ki nongrep ban thung dieng, lada ngi ïoh ki Officer kiba ïarap ban don ryngkat bad ki paitbah nongrep. Kane ka kam thang lum ka long kham palat ban ïa kaba shah tuh ïa ki nongrep”, ong u Bah Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh General Secretary HFU West Khasi Hills District.
title: Kham palat ka kam thang lum ban ïa kaba shah tuh ki nongrep : HFU

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 22: Ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) bad ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) ki la shah ktah bha haduh katta katta na ka daw ka jingkhang ban tih dewiong thliewkhnai ha Meghalaya, la ong u Myntri Rangbah ha ka sngi Palei.“Namar ka jingkhang tih dewiong dang shen ka la ktah bha i aki bad mynta ngi dang ap ban pynsdang noh ïa ka jingtih dewiong katkum ki kor ki bor ka juk stad saïan, dei namarkata, ka jingmih ka duna bha. Ka jingbym ïohlum khajna ka la hiar arsut namar ki daw bapher bapher kiba ngi mad na ki kyndon tih deiwong bad kiba shah ktah bha mynta ki dei ki Council, kane ka dei ka jingeh kaba ki mad bha mynta,” ong u Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Haba kylli hato ka Sorkar kan lah neem ban weng ïa ka jinghiran pisa jong kine ki ar tylli ki ADC, namarba kim pat lah ban siew ïa ka tulop da ki snem, u Sangma u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka don ban ïarap bad ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki district councils hynrei kam lah ban shim lut ha lade ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban siew ïa ka tulop.“Ngi long kiba kloi ban ïarap bad ban ai jingkyrshan hynrei ngim lah ban shim lut ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban ai sa ka tulop. Ngi la pyrshang ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki, ïa kane ka kam ngi dang bishar bniah. Ngin sa peit kaei kaba ngi lah ban leh,” la ong u Sangma.“Hynrei ka jingkitkhlieh ka dei beit jong ki Autonomous District Council ban pynïaid ïa ka pisa pilaiñ,” u la bynrap.U la ong ruh ba ka GHADC bad ka JHADC mynta ki mad ïa ka jinghiran pisa ban ïa ka KHADC bad mynta ki la hap kiar na kaba thung nongtrei thymmai. Ka GHADC ka la pyrshang ban pynduna ïa ki nongtrei na ka 2100 ne 2300 sha ka 1500 ngut.Ka Non Gazetted Employees’ Association (NGEA) jong ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council ka la aipor khatduh 7 sngi ban pyllait ïa ka tulop kaba dang sahteng haduh 32 bnai jong ki nongtrei.
title: Dei ka jingkhang tih dewïong kaba pynhiran pisa ïa ka GHADC bad JHADC: CM

content: Shillong, Rymphang 22 :U MLA ka Congress na Umsning, Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Palei u la kyntu ïa ka sorkar jylla ba kan kyrpad ïa ka Regional Institute of Medical Sciences, Imphal ba kan mang katto katne ki tnad kum ka Radiology na bynta ki jingpule pyntbit ïa ki doktor na Meghalaya.Kane ka jingkyntu jong u, kadei hadien ba ka Myntri ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ka jylla, Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pyntip ba ka Bhaitbari CHC kam pat biang satia ki tiar treikam na ka daw ba ym don ki doktor kiba la pyntbit ban pyndonkam bad peit ïa ki tiar sumar.Halor kane, u Dr. Celestine u la ong ruh ba bun tylli ki jylla ha ka thaiñ shatei lam-mihngi jong ka Ri ki pyndonkam ïa ka RIMS, Imphal na ka bynta ki jingpule pyntbit. Hynrei u ong pat ba bunsien katei ka jaka pule doktor ka ju mang ïa ki tnad kiba ki doktor ka Meghalaya kim donkam.“Kumta, ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ka lah ban kyrpad ïa u Director ka RIMS, Imphal ban mang katto katne ki tnad ha kaba ngi donkam ïa ki specialist kham kyrkieh kum ha ka Radiology khnang ba ngin lah ban phah ïa ki doktor kiba don ha ka kam ban pyntbit ïalade,” u la ong.Na ka liang ka Myntri haba jubab halor kane, ka la kular ba kan bishar bniah ïa ka jingai jingmut jong utei u nongmihkhmat.Ha kajuh ka por ka Myntri ka la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka buh thong ban don ïa ki X-ray bad USG na bynta ka Bhaitbari CHC ha shwa ban kut jong u snem 2024. Ka pyntp ruh ba ki doktor mynta ki dang shah pyntbit da ka jingïarap jong ka sorkar Tamil Nadu ban leh ïa ka ultrasound sonography.
title: Kyntu u Dr. Celestine ïa ka Sorkar ban ïakren bad ka RIMS na bynta ki doktor Meghalaya

content: Jowai, Rymphang 22: Ki dkhot ka Scouts-Guides Movement kiba don ha kylleng ka Ri jong ka pyrthei ha kane ka 22 tarik u Rymphang kila kynmaw burom ïa ka ‘World Thinking Day / Founder’s Day’, na ka liang ki bor pynïaid jong ka Bharat Scouts and Guides, West Jaiñtia Hills mynta ka sngi kila pynlong ïa ka prokram ïakynduh lang ha ophis treikam ka District Association kaba don ha Jowai.Ha ka jingïalang leh burom la pynïaid da ka C. D. Laloo, District Commissioner Guides, MBSG-WJHD, ha kaba ka Dolly Lamare, District Organiser Guides WJHD kala ai ki kyntien lamphrang halor ka thong jong kane ka prokram kaba dei ka sngi kha u Lord Baden Powell bad ka Agnes Baden Powell kiba long ruh ki nongseng jong ka Scouting ha u snem 1907 bad ka Guiding ha u snem 1910.U DE Pariat, Commis sioner MBSG, kam u symbud kongsan jong kane ka prokram ula ai ki kyntien shaphang kane ka sngi da kaba ai mynsiem ïa ki dkhot ka Movement ba kin trei ïa ka kam na ka bynta ka jingbha jingmiat haka imlang ka sahlang katkum ka thong bad ka nongrim jong ka Scouts – Guides Movement.Shuh shuh la ai ka jingkren naka S. Tariang, Vice-President MBSG-West Jaiñtia Hills, kaba la pynsngew ba kane ka jingïakynduh lang mynta ka sngi kan wanrah ïa ka jingïalong kawei, ka jingïatylli bad ka jingïaburom mar kylliang, khnang ba yn lah ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa ki kam khlem kano kano ka jingïapher jingmut.Halor kane ka phang kaba ong “Our World, Our Thriving Future: The environment and Global poverty”, na ka liang ka S. Tariang kala buh ka jingkyntu ïa ki dkhot ba kin wad ki lad ki lynti ban rat diengkhong ïa ka jingduk, kala kyntu ban kyntiew ïa ka pule ka puthi bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jonglong kyrpang jong ki sawsong sawkun jong ka mei mariang.Ha kane ka sngi la pynlong ruh ka jingsam ïa ki Syrnot sha ki ar ngut ki Scouts Master kiba la pyndep ïa ka HWB Course na Assam kiba kynthup ïa u Adiam u Bthuh, District Secretary MBSG-WJHD bad u Pet Dhar, District Commissioner Scouts, WJHD. Katba ïa ki kyntien ai khublei la ïoh na u C. Gassah, District Organizer Scouts, WJHD.
title: Kynmaw burom ka Bharat S&G WJH ïa ka ‘World Thinking Day/Founder’s Day’ ha Jowai

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang 22: Ka long kaei kaei kaba pynkmen shibun ïa ki nongpynïaid skul bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki nonghikai ba ki khynnah ki don mynta ban ïa beh sha ka thong jong ka jingnang jingstad ha kiba kum kine ki sngi jong ka jingïakop ha kiba bun ki liang, ha kaba la sakhi mynta ha kawei ka skul kaba don ha kawei ka shnong ba kham kyndong kaba jngai kumba 16 km ei ei na Mawkyrwat.Haba phai pat sha ka ‘Pyndenlyngdoh Pres. Lower Primary School’ kaba dei kawei na ki skul ba don ha shnong Pyndenlyngdoh, South West Khasi Hills District kaba la seng naduh u snem 1960 bad kaba la ïaid mynta la kumba 64 snem ei ei bad mynta u snem ka la shem jingeh shibun ban pdiang ïa ki khynnah nongwan rung skul namar ka jingbym biang shuh ki kamra klas.Namarkata, ha kaba ïa dei bad kane, u nongthoh khubor haba ïoh ban ïa kren bad ki nonghikai kumjuh ruh bad ki kmie ki kpa ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih namar ka jingbym biang bad jingkhapngiah ki kamra klas ka la pynlong ïa ka Managing Committee ban kan shim kyrkih ban pynkha kamra klas tang ban ym pynduh shong skul ïa ki khynnah rit. “Ha kane ka ‘Pyndenlyngdoh Pres. Lower Primary School’ ka don tang 3 tylli ki kamra klass bad kawei ka ïing trep ba shu shna kyrkieh da ka Managing Committee bad 7 ki klas, na ka bynta 2 ngut ki nonghikai”, la ïathuh u nonghikai.Shuh shuh ki nonghikai ki la pynpaw ruh ba ha une u snem 2024 haba ïa nujor bad snem 2023 ka jingdon ki khynnah skul ruh ka la kiew sha ka 80 ngut kata 130 ngut ha u snem 2023 bad mynta pat ki la don haduh 210 ngut ki khynnah kiba wan pule. Kumta ki la pynpaw ba lada ym pdiang shuh shuh ruh kat kum ka hok ban ïoh ka jingnang jingstad ne ka Right to Free Education kam shah ban kyntait namarkata, ym banse ban pdiang bad lada pdiang ruh kumno yn leh namar la khap-ngiah.Haba phai ha ki jingïarap ha kane ka skul kaba la palat 60 snem naduh ba la sdang ïa ka, kam pat ju ïoh ei ei la ka long ha ka liang ki infrastructure na ka tnad pule puthi jong ka sorkar Meghalaya, hynrei kiei kiei baroh la hap ban kit-khlieh hi da ka Managing Committee bad na ki nonghikai.Namarkata, ki nonghikai bad ki kmie ki kpa ki la buh ka jingkyrpad ïa ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad pule puthi ba kam dei ban shu sngap halor kane bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki MLA ne ki MP ba ki kular jingïarap tang shwa ka elekshon hynrei kin sngewbha ban phai khmat noh mynta mynta sha kane ka skul namar ka la donkam kyrkih eh khnang ba kan ym long ka jingduh nong ïa ki khynnah rit kiba don ka jingthrang ban wad ïa ka jingnang jingstad naduh ba ki dang rit karta.
title: Bym shimkhia ki bor sorkar, hap kit khlieh hi ka Managing Committee ban shna kamra skul

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang, 22: Ka tnad shipai jong ka ri India ka pynbna sha baroh ki samla shynrang bad kynthei jong ka West Khasi Hills District, kiba la kynjoh khathynñiew shiteng haduh arphew wei snem ba kin rung sha ka kam shipai.Ka jingpynrung kam kan long katkum ki kyrdan kata naduh kiba la pyndep ïa ka klass kaba phra (VIII) X bad XII. Ki kam kiba lait ki long na ka bynta kiba la pass 10+2, ki dei ki kam Agniveer Technical (All Arms) Agniveer Adm Asst (Clerk) Store keeper Technical (All Arms). Ki kam na ka bynta kiba la pyndep ïa ka klass X ki long shipai Agniveer General duty (All Arms).Na ka bynta ki kynthei pat Agniveer General duty (Women Military Police) Agniveer Trades man (All Arms) kiba la pyndep ïa ka klass VIII pat na ka bynta ki shipai Agniveer Tradesman (All Arms). Ki samla kiba kwah ban aplai ki lah ban shu applai online lyngba kane ka website www.joinindianarmy.nic.in bad lah ban peit nuksa kumno ban pyndap ïa ki jingdonkam.Ka jingpdiang ïa ki online registration la dep pdiang lypa naduh ka taïew ba ar jong une u bnai Rymphang. Ïa ki jingtip ba bniah lah ban wad ruh lyngba ka Recruiting Office Headquarter kaba don ha Shillong da kaba phone ha une u number 03642504177 lane lyngba kane ka email rohgshillong@ gmail.com lane na ka ophis jong ki Deputy Commissioner jong baroh ki District.
title: Khot rung kam ka tnad shipai ïa ki samla shynrang bad kynthei na WKH

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 22: Ki paidbah na ka shnong Umtangar bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong ba marjan naduh ki riew rangbah, ki longkmie bad ki samla, ryngkat ki khynnah skul na ki skul bapher bapher da ka jingsngewsih mynta ka sngi kila mih shakhmat ban pynlong da ka jingïaid paidbah naduh Umlur sha Umtangar ban pynrem jur ïa ka jingshah pynïap dusmon jong u heprit Kitborlang Marbaniang ha ki riew thrang snam hadien bala lap ïa ka met jong u ha ka janmiet jong ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai na kawei ka kper kaba don harud kane ka shnong.Kum ban shu pynpaw hangne ba u heprit Kitborlang Marbaniang ba dei u khun ba 4 jong u Bah Synshar Nonghyndah bad ka Diona Marbaniang u la mih nala iing ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai, ban leit pynshngaiñ bad la ki paralok khynnah rit ban ap ïa u synsar ha kawei ka sem kaba jngai tang kumba katto katne na ka jaka ing ka jong u hynrei u khlem wanphai iing shuh tad haduh bala lap syndon ïa ka metïap jong u ha ka janmiet jong ka 18 tarik kaba dei ka sngi U Blei na kawei ka kper ki para marjan ryngkat ki dak mong ha ka durkhmat.Ha kane ka jingïaid paidbah kila mih ruh shibun ki sur pynrem ïa katei ka jingshah pynïap dusmon jong u heprit Kitborlang lyngba ki placard bala rah da ki paidbah bad khynnah skul kiba la dawa ruh ïa ki bor ka aiñ ba ki dei ban shimkhia ban tih bñiah ban pynlong ka jingtohkit bad ban kem mardor ïa ki riew thrang snam ryngkat ki jingthoh bad byrngem “Wat ai jamin ïa u nongpynïap” “Lada ki briew jong ka aiñ kim lah ban ioh kem ïa ki briew beaiñ ngin shim hi ïa ka aiñ ha kti” namar ka jingbitar.Hadien ka jingïaid paidbah la pynlong ruh ka jingïalang lyngkot ha ka shnong Umtangar ha ka jingdonlang naduh ki nongïalam ka Western Ri-Bhoi Dorbar, nongïalam ka Hima Jirang, ki nongïalam seng bhalang bapher bapher, ki nongïalam shnong bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah.Haba ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi na ka liang ki nongïalam shnong, sengbhalang na ka thaiñ Western Ri-Bhoi mynta ka sngi kila pynrem jur ïa katei ka jingjia ryngkat ka jingdawa ba ki bor jong ka aiñ ki dei ban shimkhia ban kem mardor ïa ki runar ba donkti ha katei ka kam pyniap briew bad shim ïa ka jingim ba lui lui jong u heprit ryngkat ka jingpynsajia kaba tyngeh.Ki la ong ruh ka daw aiu ba utei u heprit u la leh tad haduh ban da shim syndon ïa ka jingim na kane ka sla pyrthei ha ka rta kaba dang 10 snem bad ki la pynpaw ruh ba kine ki kam pynïap kam dei shuh ka jingjia kaba nyngkong hynrei ka la don ruh ka jingshah pynïap jong ki riew rangbah, ki kynthei bad kumjuh ki khynnah ha katei ka shnong, hynrei ki khlem paw pyrthei satia kaba la wanrah ka jingsyier bad ka jingtieng jingsmiej khamtam ïa ki kynthei khynnah.Katto katne na ka liang ki longkmie kila pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw ba watla kane kam dei ruh ka sien ba nyngkong ba jia ki kam pynïap ha katei ka shnong hynrei ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong ki paidbah naduh ki longkmie, ki rangbah ki nongïalam shnong ryngkat ki khynnah skul ki mih paidbah ban pynrem ïa kum katei ka jingjia kaba pynpar ñiangkhriat ïa kiba bun ba lang ym tang ha katei ka shnong hynrei wat sha kiwei kiwei ki jaka ha kaba la kyrpad ruh ïa ki bor ka aiñ ba dei ban shimkhia ïa katei ka kam ban kem ïa ki runar ba donkti khnang ba kum kitei ki kam kin nym jia shuh nangne shakhmat.
title: Wat ai jamin ïa u nongpynïap, ïaid rally ki paidbah, khynnah skul bad sengbhalang

content: Shillong, Rymphang 22: U MLA ka Congress na Umsning, u Dr. C. Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Palei, u la dawa ban thung da ka jingtohkit ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka skhim Jal Jeevan Mission(JJM) ne ka skhim ai um sha ki ïing briew ha nongkyndong.Haba wanrah ïa ka Resolution hapoh ïingdorbar, u Dr Lyngdoh, u la ong ba ka jingmut jong kane ka skhim ba la bei pisa da ka sorkar pdeng ka long ban pynïoh um sha ki ïing briew, hynrei ha kiba bun tylli ki shnong ba la lap ba wat lada ki kor um ki la poi ha ïing ruh, pynban ka um ka ju poi ne mih satia na kine ki kor um. Nangta u la ong ruh ba ki don bun ki jaka kiba ka jingtreikam kam long satia kaba i hun bad kam don ka jingtreikam kaba pynhun ïa u paidbah.U la ong ruh ba ka JJM kadei ka skhim kaba bun bah ka pisa bad ka donkam ban thung da ka jingtohkit kaba khlaiñ, khnang ban lap ïa ka jingbym biang ka rukom treikam. U MLA Umsning, u la kdew ruh halor ka jingmih khubor ïa ka jingshahleh shiliang u MLA ka Mawlai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa kane ka skhim, ha kaba ym shym la khot satia ïa u ha ka por ba pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha Mawlai ban ïakren ïa kane ka skhim. “Hato kane ka jingbym khot lang ïa u MLA ka Mawlai kadei ka jingthmu ban set na u ne ban un nym tip ba kam don ka jingtreikam kaba beit ha kaba ïadei bad ka skhim JJMï”, u la ong. U Dr. Lyngdoh, u la ong ba mynta ka jia ïa u MLA ka Mawlai, lashai kan jia sa ïano pat ym lah ban tip. “Ngim dei ban ailad ïa ki rukom leh kiba kum kine”, u la ong.Ïa kane ka Resolution la kyrshan ruh da u bah Ronnie Lyngdoh, MLA ka Congress na Mylliem, uba la kdew ïa kiba bun ki jingbym biang ha ka jingpyntreikam ïa kane ka skhim, ha kaba u la lap dalade hi ha kiba bun tylli ki shnong ïa ka rukom trei ka bym biang satia.
title: Dawa tohkit u MLA Congress ïa ka jingtreikam ka JJM

content: Shillong, Rymphang 22: U Bah Adelbert Nongrum, MLA ka VPP na North Shillong, mynta ka sngi u la wanrah da ka Privilege Motion ha ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah kyntait ka Special Motion jong u ban ïakren halor ka CAG Report.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka CAG Report, kadei ka Report jong u Comptroller and Auditor General of India halor ki jingkheiñ jingdiah jong ki tnad treikam sorkar bapher bapher ha ka jylla. Ïa kane ka report la ju wanrah man la ka snem ha ïingdorbar thawaiñ jong ka jylla.U Bah Nongrum, u la ong kane ka jingbym pynrung u Lamphang ka ïingdorbar ïa kane ka Special Motion jong u, kadei ka jingshah pynduh ïa ka hok jong u kum u nongmihkhmat ba la jied da ki paidbah ban kren ha ïingdorbar. Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ka jubab kaba u la ïoh na ka ophis jong u Lamphang, ka long ba u Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad Sangma, u la pyntip ba ïa ka CAG Report mynta ka dang don hapoh ka jingpeit bad jingbishar bniah jong ka Public Account Committee (PAC) kaba dei ka rukom ba ju leh haba wanrah ïa ka CAG Report.Da kaba kdew ruh ïa ki kyndon bapher bapher jong ka rukom pynïaid ïingdorbar, u MLA ka VPP u la ong ba kam don ha kano kano ka kyndon ba ym lah ban ïakren hapoh ïingdorbar halor ka report jong u CAG. Hynrei tang ka rukom ne kata ka convention. “Ngam lah ban sngewthuh kumno ka rukom ba ju leh kan kham lah ban ïa ki rukom ba ju leh”, la ong u Bah Adelbert.Hadien kane, na ka liang u Lamphang, u la tyrwa hakhmat jong ka ïingdorbar la kan pdiang ne em ban ïatai ïa ka Privilege Motion. Na ka liang ka ïingdorbar ka la kyntait lyngba ka voice vote.
title: Da ka Privilege Motion ujor u Bah Adelbert bym ïoh ïatai ïa ka CAG Report

content: Shillong, Rymphang 22: Ha Meghalaya, ka jylla kaba don tang 60 ngut ki MLA bad tang 12 ngut ki Minister, hynrei ki Chairman pat ki don haduh 175 ngut. Kane ka long katkum ka jingkheiñ ba la pyntip da ki bor sorkar na Secretariat.Kine ki 175 ngut kiba bat kam Chairman kidei na ki Political Party kiba pynlong ïa ka sorkar MDA-2, kata na ka NPP,UDP, HSPDP,BJP bad Independent bad kidei kiba bat ïa ki shuki Chairman, Co- Chairman, Deputy Chairman, Vice Chairman.Hynrei haba ïakren bad u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad Sangma, u la ong ba wat lada ki don haduh 175 ngut ki Chairman pynban u ong ba ka dang biang, namar ka jinglut haba siew ïa ki ha long tang 12 lak tyngka shi bnai. U la ong ruh ba ha ka jingsynshar paidbah donkam ïa ki briew kiban ïatreilang bad ki paidbah ha ki bynta kiba kham shapoh jong ka jingsynshar.U Conrad u la ong ruh ka jingbun ki Chairman kam da dei eh kaba donkam, hynrei kaba donkam ka long ka jingtreikam jong ki Chairman kiba don ha ki Corporation, ki Board bad kiwei kiwei ki bor treikam. “Kaei kaba donkam ka long ba kine ki boe treikam kidei ban treikam bad wanrah ïa u soh bad ka jingmyntoi ïa ka jylla”, la ong u Conrad.U la ïathuh ba dang shen u la ïoh ïa ka jingïalang bad ka Employment Generation Council ha kaba u la bthah ïa ki ba kin leh home work ban treikam na ka bynta ka jingdonkam khamtam eh kaba wanrah ïa ki jingai jingmut ban sha ka sorkar.Hynrei ka tyllong khubor ba la ïoh da u nongthoh khubor ka ong ba kane kaba kdew u Myntri Rangbah ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsiew sha ki Chairman kadei tang ka Honorarium, khlem pat kheiñ pat ïa kiwei pat ki jingsiew ba ki ju ïoh.
title: Haduh 175 ngut ki Chairman, dang biang ong u CM

content: Shillong, Rymphang 22 : U Myntri ka tnad Bording ka sorkar jylla u Abu Taher Mondal ha ka sngi Palei u la kular ba ka sorkar kan siew ïa ka bai luksan sha ki bahaiing jong u nongap pahara ka tnad uba la duh noh ïa ka jingim na ka jingshah bat bording ha sub-station kaba don ha Umïam.“Dalade hi nga la shimkhia ïa kane ka kam bad ka MeECL bad nga kular ba ka bai luksan yn ai sha ki bahaiing jong utei u lanot,” ong u Myntri haba jubab halor ka call attention notice ba wanrah da u MLA ka Mawlai, Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang ha Iing Dorbar.La ïathuh ba utei u rangbah ba tip kyrteng kum u Kyrshanborlang Muktieh, uba dei u nongap pahara miet u trei bad ka M/s ITD Cementation India Limited u la shah bat bording ha ka 29tarik u Kyllalyngkot hadien ba u la tyngkhuh bad u sainar bording uba wan na u transformer katba u dang rung sha katei ka sub-station.U Myntri u la ithuh ruh ba une u rangbah ba kynduh ïa kane ka jingjia u trei kum u nongap pahara bad katei ka kompeni kaba peit na ka bynta ka jingtrei ïa ka wah Umïam Stage I kaba dang ïaid mynta shaid shaid.Halor kane, la ïathuh ba la dep ruh ban ujor da ka FIR sha Mawlai Police Station ba haduh mynta ki dang ap ïa ka report.U la ïathuh ruh ba katkum ka Accident Report kaba 29tarik Kyllalyngkot, la phah sha u Senior Electrical Inspector ka sorkar jylla ban pynlong da ka jingtohkit khnang ban lap ïa ka daw tynrai halor kane ka jingjia.La ong ruh ba ka report jong u Senior Electrical Inspector ka kdew ba ïa u Muktieh la lap da ki pulit ba u thiah khlem tip briew shuh hapoh ka distribution sub-station, kiba dang pyndep ïa ka kamram ha katei ka main bad kumta mar mar la pyntip noh sha ki bor pynïaid jong ka ITD Cementation India Ltd.Shuh shuh la ong ba ka report katkum ka enquiry report la lap ba u Bah Muktieh u la pyndep ïa ka kamram ha ka sentry post, Umïam hapoh ka kompeni ITD Cementation (India Limited) bad hadien kane u rung pat sha sub-station. Hynrei la ong pat ba ïa ka daw tynrai jong ka jingïap jong u yn sa lah ban pynshisha tad haduh ban da ïoh ïa ka report na ki pulit bad na ki medical officer.Na ka liang u Myntri u la ïathuh ruh ba ka MeECL ka la kyntu ïa ka kompeni M/s ITD Cementation ba kan pyllait noh kham kloi ïa ka jingkyrshan pisa kum ka EPF bad ka insurance sha ki bahaiing hasem jong utei u rangbah ba khlad ha katei ka jingshah bat bording namar ba u ïap ha ka por ba u don ha ka kam.La ïathuh ruh ba la bthah ïa u kontraktor ba un pynïaid shakhmat ïa ka kam katkum ki kyndon ba la don.
title: Yn siew bailutksan sha ki lanot ba ïap bat bording, pyntip u Myntri ha ïingdorbar

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 22: U Myntri ka tnad kam jngohkai pyrthei u bah Paul Lyngdoh haba jubab ha ka kynta kylli jingkylli ïa ki jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA jongka North Shillong Constituency u bah Adelbert Nongrum, u la ïathuh ba kiba wan poi sha ka Cherry Blossom naduh ka 17 tarik haduh ka 19 tarik Naiwieng 2023 ki la kot sha ka 72,1699 ngut bad na kine tang kiba wan kyrpang na shabar ne ki nongwan jngohkai kyrpang sha kane ka tamasa kata kynthup na kiwei ki jylla ka ri India bad wat na shabar ri ruh ki la kot sha ka 23 hajar ngut.U la ïathuh ïa kane ka jingwan kiba na shabar la ïoh jingkhein na kiba pynïaid ïa ki Hotel naduh ki Hotel kiba heh, kiba pdeng haduh kiba kham rit.Kiba sah ha ki Hotel ba heh kum ka Vivanta, Mariot, Ri Kynjai ki la kot sha ka 1269 ngut, kiba sah ha ki Hotel ba kham pdeng kum ka Poinisuk, M Crown, Tripura Castle bad kiwei kiwei ki la kot sha ka 15205 hajar ngut bad kiba sah ha ki Guest House bad Home Stays ki la kot sha ka 6,517 ngut.U bah Paul u la ïathuh lyngba kane ka tamasa ka sorkar kala ïoh lum khajna haduh 1.44 klur kata tang ha u bnai Naiwieng 2023. Lada ïa nujor bad ka khajna ba la mih na ki Hotel ha u bnai Risaw 2023 ka long tang 1.36 klur tyngka.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ka Cherry Blossom ka dei ka tamasa ba shisien shisnem ba ju pynlong ha u bnai Naiwieng bad ha u 2023 ruh ka long naduh ka 17 tarik haduh ka 19 tarik Naiwieng ha madan Kurkalang, Bhoirymbong harud ka surok Shillong Bypass. Ha kane ka tamasa la pynlong ïa ka rwai ka put ka tem ka shad, ki jingïakob rang bad thei bhabriew, jingdie ïa ki bam tynrai, ki tiar tynrai, ki mar rep bad bun kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka tamasa ba la dep la wanrah ïa ki nongrwai da ki nongpynïaid ka Rockski EMG kum u Ronan Keating, U DJ bad Music Producer u Jonas Blue, SANAM bad kiwei kiwei. La wan rwai ruh da ki nongrwai ba pawnam ka jylla kum u bah Lau Majaw, Blue Temptation, Meba Ofillia bad kiwei kiwei.Na kane ka daw kane ka tamasa ka khring bha ïa ki nongwan jngohkai na shabar ri, shabar jylla bad ïa ki rang bad thei samla napoh ka jylla bad kane ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi ka ri India.
title: Palat 72 hajar kiba poi sha ka Cherry Blossom: Paul

content: Shillong, Rymphang 22 : U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla kam lah satia ban shu pyllait kumto ïa ka rukom tih maw tih shyiap ba ju leh ha ki por mynshwa khlem da don ïa ka quarry permit lane ka lease.“Kam don satia kano kano ka kyndon ban pyllait ïa ka rukom tih shyiap, tih maw ba ju leh ha ka por mynshwa hapoh ka Meghalaya Minor Minerals Concession Rules (MMMCR), 2016 lane hapoh ka Mines and Minerals (Development and Regulation) (MMDR) Act, 1957, ka sorkar jylla kam lah satia ban pyllait ïa kane ka jingtreikam khlem da don ïa ka quarry permit lane ka lease ba la poi hapoh ka kyndon jong ka MMMCR, 2016,” ong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla haba jubab ha Iing Dorbar.Kane ka jingpynshai na u Myntri Rangbah kadei halor ka motion ba la wanrah da u MLA ka VPP na Nongkrem, Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit halor ka jingeh ba ki nongtih maw tih shyiap jong ka jylla ki kynduh.Tangba, u Myntri Rangbah u la pynpaw ba ki lah pat ban pynstet ban ai ïa ki jingai jingbit sha kito kiba pan jingbit na ka tnad halor kane.Nalorkata, u ong ba kin don ki nongtrei ka tnad kiban ïarap ruh ïa kito ki paidbah ban pyndap ïa ki kot ki sla ban aplai bad ban batai ïa ki kyndon kiba ïadei na ka bynta ban aplai ïa kitei ki permit.La ïathuh ba ki kyndon ka MMMCR ka kdew ïa ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka mining plan, ka environment clearance, ka pollution clearance hapoh ka Air bad Water Acts bad ruh ka jingbit na ka District Council.U Myntri Rangbah u ong ruh ba katkum ka rai jong ka Supreme Court ha ka 03tarik Naitung 2019 ka ong ba ka kyndon Mines and Minerals (Development and Regulations) Acts, 1957 ka treikam lang ha ki jylla jong ka Sixth Schedule kynthup ïa ka Meghalaya bad ïa kino kino ki rukom khlong marpoh khyndew ha Meghalaya bad kiwei ki jylla ba don ïa ka Sixth Schedule ba kin bud katkum ki kyndon jong ka MMDR Act, 1957.Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba mynta, na ka bynta ban ïarap ïa kito kiba aplai ban tih shyiap, ka Rule 4 jong ka MMMCR, 2016 la dep ban pynkylla da ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka notification kaba 4tarik Naitung, 2022.
title: Ym lah ban pyllait ïa ki nongtih maw tih shyiap khlem da don ïa ka permit

content: Shillong, Rymphang 22: Ka mat jingïatai halor ka Lokayukta kaba la wanrahd a u bah Adelbert Nongrum, MLA ka VPP na North Shillong ka la shah kyntait ha ka sien kaba ar hapoh ïingdorbar ka jylla ha ka sngi Palei.Kane la long hadien ba ka Resolution ba la wanrah da u Bah Adelbert ka la shah kyntait ban pynlong ka jingïatai lyngba ka voice vote.Lah ban kdew hangne ba u MLA ka North Shillong ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai, u la wanrah da ka Private Member’s Amendment Bill na ka bynta ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingtreikam ka Lokayukta Act, kaba u ong la pyntlot noh da ka amendment kaba la wanrah ha u snem 2021. Hynrei kane ka Amendment Bill ka la shah kyntait khlem da ïoh ban ïatai lyngba ka voice vote, wat haba u Bah Adelbert u ladep ban batai ïa ka jingthmu kane ka Amendment Bill jong u.Hadien ka jingshah kyntait ka Amendment Bill, u MLA ka North Shillong u la wanrah da ka Resolution ban pynpaw hi ïa kajuh ka jingthmu kumba u la pynpaw ha ka por ba u wanrah ïa ka Bill.U Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad Sangma, haba pynshai ïa kane ka Resolution, u la ïathuh ba kaei kaba ka sorkar ka la wanrah ha ka snem 2021 lyngba ka amendment ka long ban ailad ïa ka Lokayukta ban treikam, ha ha kaba la ailad ia u Chairman bad kiwei pat ki dkhot ban treikam, wat lada ki dkhot baroh kim don ruh, ym kum ka aiñ jong u snem 2014, kaba bthah badei ban don lut ki dkhot baroh.
title: Arsien arwat shah kyntait ka mat ïakren ka VPP halor ka Lokayukta

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 22: Hadien ka jingtrei shitom jong ki pulit ban pynlong ka jingtohkit ban buddien bad ban thwet ïa kiba donkti pynïap ïa u heprit ha ka shnong Umtangar ha Ri-Bhoi District, ki pulit ka Ri-Bhoi kila ioh ban kem noh ïa 2 ngut ki briew ba suba donkti ha katei ka kam.Na ka liang u heh pulit ka Ri-Bhoi u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la pyntip ba tang hadien bala la lap ïa ka met jong u heprit Kitdorlang Marbaniang ha ka janmiet jong ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai ki pulit kim shym la shongthaid ban buddien ïa katei ka kam bad la register mukotduma ha Patharkhmah Police Station katkum ka Case No. 01(2)2024 U/S 302 IPC bad la kem ruh 2 ngut ki briew ba suba donkti ha katei ka kam.Kitei ki 2 ngut bala shah kem ha ki pulit ki kynthup ïa u Pynshailang Warjri (32) na ka shnong Umtangar Ri-Bhoi bad u Banshngai Tynshong (28) na Nongthymmai, Lapalang East Khasi Hills District bad u ba shong ba sah mynta ha Umtangar Ri-Bhoi bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban lap ïa ka daw ba ki pynïap ïa u heprit bad ban lap shuh shuh kiwei kiwei ba donkti ha katei ka kam.
title: Kem ki Pulit ïa ki ar ngut ba suba donkti ban pynïap ïa u heprit ha Umtangar

content: Shillong, Rymphang 22: U MLA jong ka TMC na Nongthymmai, u Bah Charles Pyngrope ha ka sngi Palei, u la rah da ka Zero Hour Notice ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah kren beiñ bad shah pynhiar na Bus kawei ka Sister ha ka por ba la mih na Dudhnoi ban leit sha Goalpara, Assam.Kane ka jingrah u Bah Charles ha Iingdorbar ka long katkum ka jingmih khubor ha kawei na ki kot khubor Khasi.Katkum kum ka jingpyntip jong u Auxilliary Bishop ka Tura Diocese, ka Sr. Rosemary, kaba trei ha St. John’P parish, Siju, West Garo Hills ka la mih na Dudnai sha Goalpara ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai bad ka la kiew da ka Bos ha ka por 11.00 baje mynstep na Dudnai bad siew ruh ia ka bai bos haduh Goalpara.Hynrei tang hadien katto katne por u nongbud jong ka Bos bad ki katto katne kiba shong hapoh ka Bos ki la sdang ban kren da ki ktien ba khlemakor ia ka bad ia ka jaiñ riewniam ba ka phong bad ia ka jingngeit niam jong ki. Hadien katto katne, ki pynsangeh ia ka Bos ha kawei ka jaka ba kham kynjah bad phah hiar da ka bor na ka Bos. Kane ka jingjia ka la ktah ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat bad shah leh bym hok jong ka Sr. Rosemary kum ka kynthei bad kum ka riewniam. Da ka jingiarap jong ki katto katne ki briew, ka Sr. Rose ka la kiew noh da kawei ka Bos ban leit sha Goalpara.U Auxilliary Bishop u la kyntu ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan shimkhia mardor halor kane ka jingjia da kaba iakren bad ka Sorkar Assam khnang ba kum kine ki jingjia kin ym jia shuh hadien habud.“Ban shu pyndik ia ki briew tang namarba ki phong ia ka riam kaba kyrpang lane ba ki phong ia ki jaiñ niam ka long kaba sngewkhia bha, ka bym pat ju iohsngew bad kaba ym lah satia ban pdiang. Kine ki jingjia, ki jia tang namarba ka don ka jingialam bakla bad ka jingpeit shiliang khmat kaba pynsaphriang pyrshah ia kano kano ka jait niam,” la ong u Bah Pyngrope bad kyrpad ia ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban shimkhia mardor ia kane ka jingjia da kaba ong, “nga sngew ba kane ka sorkar ka dei ban shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban pyrkhing bha kum ia kine ki jingpeit shiliangkhmat.”Ha kajuh ka por u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh, MLA ka Congress na Mylliem, uba long ruh u nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah u la ai da ka jingujor lyngba ka jingthoh sha u Myntri Rangbah lyngba ka ïingdorbar.Haba ai jubab halor kane ka jingjia, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba u la ioh jingtip bad mar mar u la pynsngew ia kane ka jingjia ha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingioh lum jingtip kam pat biang satia satia ban buddien ia kane kam.“Ngi dang ap ia ka jingpyntip kaba thikna namarba ia mynta ka jingtip kaba ngi ioh ka long ia ka tarik, ka por bad ka jaka ba ka (Sr. Rose Mary) leit jingleit, hynrei ngim pat ioh lum jingtip u nombar kali jong ka Bos lane kano kano ka sakhi kaba pynlah ia ngi ban lapdien ia kiba donkti,” u la ong.U la kular ruh ba un sa shimkhia bha khnang ba kum kine ki jingjia, kin ym jia shuh hadien habud ha kano kano ka bynta jong ka ri.U Sangma u la ong ba un sa ai jubab tang shu ioh ka jingtip kaba bniah halor kane ka jingjia.U Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma uba mihkhmat na Rongara-Siju u la pynrem jur ïa kane ka jingjia bad kyntu ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ban tuklar lem halor ka jingshah kren beiñ ka Sister Rose bad shah pynhiar shiteng lynti na ka bos ha ki katto katne ki nongleit jingleit ha Assam.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Myntri Rangbah, u Rakkam u la ong, “da kaba shim ïa ka jingkhia jong ka jingjia, nga kyntu ïa phi ban pynshitom ïa kiba donkti, ïa u nongniah kali bad ïa baroh ki briew kiba donkti bad nga kyrpad ruh ïa phi ba phin ïakren ïa kane ka kam bad ka Sorkar Assam na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah baroh.
title: Ujor u MLA TMC bad Congress ba shah kren beiñ ka Sister na Garo Hills

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 22: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la kular ban buddien na ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pynbna ïa ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS) kum ka Institute of National Importance (INI).U Sangma u la ong ba naduh ka por ba u JP Nadda u dang long u Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah u ladep ban pynsngew ïa kane ka mat.“Ngi kyrmen ba kane ka sienjam ka long kaba ïaid shakhmat namarba ladep rah ruh ban ïatai hapoh ka Parliament bad ngi dang ïai buddien ruh na ka liang jong ngi,” u la bynrap. U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kam pat long kaba dei na ka liang jong u ban ai ïa kano kano ka jubab namarba kane ka kam ka dang don ha ka kti jong ka Sorkar Pdeng.Shwa kane, u Nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la kyntu ïa u Myntri Rangbah ban buddien na ka Sorkar Pdeng halor ka jingai kyrdan INI ïa ka NEIGRIHMS khnang ban weng ïa ka jingduna doktor bad ka jingmih noh jong ki doktor ha kiwei kiwei ki jylla.U la ong ba ïa u Neurosurgeon la pynkynriah na NEIGRIHMS Hospital sha kawei ka Private Hospital kaba don ha Guwahati.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka Dorbar, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong ba u sngewhun ïa ka jingkular jong u Myntri Rangbah ban buddien ïa kane ka kam na ka Sorkar Pdeng.Haba kylli, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong, “kam dei tang ban shu ïoh ïa ka jingithuh kum ka Institute of National Importance. Kaba kongsan eh ka long lada ka la ïoh jingithuh kum ka Institute National Importance baroh ki doktor, ki paramedical, ki staff nurse kiba trei ha NEIGRIHMS Hospital kin ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi kumba ka long ka AIIMS.”“Naduh ba la pynkha (ïa ka NEIGRIHMS) la ïathuh ïa nga ba kam don ka jingbishar halor ka jingthung nongtrei hapoh kane ka shlem ai jingsumar. Ka jingbishar halor ka jingthung briew kan pynïohnong hi ïa ki briew kiba trei ha NEIGRIHMS. Hynrei kane kam shym la don satia mynta la bun bun snem kaba mut ba ka jingsiew ba ïaryngkat kam don satia,” u la ong bad bynrap kane ka dei ka daw kaba pynlong ïa ki doktor ban mih noh na NEIGRIHMS.Ha 18 tarik Risaw, 2023 u Bah A.L Hek u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng ba khmih ïa ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah u Dr Mansukh Mandaviya katkum ka shithi No ALH/M/PER/1/2023/123 ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïa ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS) kum ka AIIMS ha kaba u Dr. Mansukh u la pyntip sha u Bah Hek ba kam don satia ka jingtyrwa ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa ka NEIGRIHMS kum ka AIIMS hynrei ka jingpynkhreh ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa ka kum ka Institute of National Importance (INI) ka dang ïaid shakhmat.Kane ka shithi kaba la phah da u Dr Mansukh sha u Bah Hek ka long naduh ka 29 tarik, Naiwieng 2023 katkum ka shithi No D.O.No.Z-11011/14/2023-NE ha kaba u la ong, “la pyntip sha phi ba ïa mynta kam don kano kano ka jingtyrwa ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa ka NEIGRIHMS sha ka AIIMS hynrei ka don tang ka jingtyrwa ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa ka NEIGRIHMS kum ka INI bad halor kane ka jingbishar bniah bad jingpynkhreh ka dang ïaid shakhmat mynta.”U Bah A.L Hek u la phah kopi ruh ïa kane ka shithi sha u Director ka NEIGRIHMS ba un tip bad buddien ïa kane ka kam.
title: Ban pynbna ïa ka NEIGRIHMS kum ka INI, yn buddien u CM na ka Sorkar Pdeng

content: Shillong, Rymphang 23: Ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol ba la rangbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya, sa shi sien ki la mad biang ïa ka namrem ha kawei na ki jingïalehkai na bynta ka 77th National Football Championship jong ka lympung Santosh Trophy 2023-24 pyrshah ïa ka Assam na ka thup ïakhun jong ka Group-A.Ha kane ka jingïakhun ka Meghalaya ka la shah pynliem da 2-1 kol ha ka Assam kaba ïalehkai da tang shiphew ngut ki player ha madan phutbol kaba ha Itanagar hynne ka sngi.Baroh kine ki lai kol (kynthuplang jong baroh ar kynhun) ki la wan ha ka jingïakhun jong ka kylla step, ha kaba ka Assam ka la ïoh ban lamkhmat nyngkong lyngba u Milan Basumatary tang hadien 8 minit ba la ïaid ka por.Hynrei ka jylla ka la wanphai ban pynïakhaid lyngba u Sheen Sohktung ha ka minit ba 32. Shuwa ban sa khylliap ïa ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla step, u Joydeep Gogoi u la buh biang ïa ka Assam hakhmat da kaba thep ïa ka kol kaba ar ha ka 45 minit.Haduh kaba kut jong ka por ka Assam ka la lah ban ïada na ka jingshah thep ban pynthikna ïa ka namjop.Watla ka kynhun ka la mad ïa ka namrem, hynrei lah ban kdew ba ka Meghalaya ka la long ka kynhun kaba khlaiñbor haba nujor ïa ka rukom lehkai hynrei kam shym la lah ban pynurlong ïa kiba bun ki kabu ba ka la ïoh ha kane ka jingïakhun.shiphew minit hadien ba la ïaid ka kylla miet, u Birkhang Daimary, rangapkol ka Assam, u la shah sei da ka red card hadien ba u la kum ktah ïa ka bol shabar jong ka phyllaw kol (box) kaba la pynlong ïa ka Assam ban shah pynduna da 10 ngut ki player.Hynrei watla ka kabu ka long ïa ka jylla na ka jingduna player u wei ka liang pyrshah, ka Meghalaya kam shym la ïohlad ban pynkhihjar.Da ar tylli ki namrem, ka Meghalaya ka dang ïaineh sha ka kyrdan ba khadduh na ka Group, katba ïa ka Assam kane ka dei ka namjop kaba nyngkong.Ka Meghalaya kan sa ïalehkai biang pyrshah ïa ka Kerala la Sngi U Blei ha ka por 2:30 baje nohphaisngi.
title: Ar sien lynter mad namrem ka M’laya ha ka Santosh Trophy 2024

content: Lah ban ong haduh kine ki sngi kiba bun ki paidbah ha ki jaka khappud ka Meghalaya ki hap ban mad ïa shibun ki jingeh nalor ka jingeh ba ki ïa kynduh ha kaba ïa dei bad u pud u sam ba ki ar jylla haduh mynta kim pat lah ban pynbeit ïa u pud u sam ba la palat 50 snem tam ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la ïoh la ka jong ka jylla. Ka long ruh kaba sngewsangsot tang namar u pud u sam ngi la duh noh ïa bun ki mynsiem ba kordor namar bad mih bun ki jingïakynad haduh ba hap ban ïaleh pyrshah bad ban pyndonkam da ki wait ki sum kaba long ka jingeh shisha ïa ki paidbah ha khappud. Lada phai sha ki jaka khappud ka Meghalaya lah ruh ban sakhi haduh mynta kiba bun ki shnong kim don satïa ïa ki lynti ki synkien kiba bit babïang bad don ruh ki shnong kiba hap ban pyndonkam da ki surok jong ka Assam namar ba ka sorkar Meghalaya haduh mynta kam pat lah ban shna la ki jing ki surok ban pynsuk ïa u paidbah ha ki jaka khappud.Ka long ruh kaba sngewsangsot nalor ba ki paidbah ki ïa kynduh ïa ki jingeh ba dei na ka daw u pud u sam, hynrei haba phai ruh sha ki kam pynroi kiba bun ki shnong ha ki jaka khappud ki dang sahdien shisha ha ka lïang ki kam pynroi.Ynnai ïa kren ïa kata ka kam pynbeit pud pynbeit sam ba ka jylla ka la ïaid lynti mynta la san phew snem tam, hynrei kaba kham sngewkhïa shuh shuh ka long ba tang ki kam pynroi ba u paidbah u dei ban ïoh ruh kiba bun ki shnong ha ki jaka khappud ki dang shah iehnoh bein haduh mynta. Lada phai sha ki shnong ha ki jaka khappud, naduh ki shnong ba hap ha ki khappud ka Jaintïa Hill, West Khasi Hill bad Ri-Bhoi District bad wat ha Garo Hills ruh ka long kumjuh. Kiba bun ki shnong ki hap ban sah ha ka jingsohsat bad ka jingeh kaba ym lah ban tip da mano mano ruh, hynrei lait noh tang kito ki paidbah khappud kiba la mad ïa ka jingdung u shïah ha ki kjat jong ki.Ki shnong ha khappud ki ïa kynduh jingeh ym tang ba kim don ïa ki surok kiba bit babïang, hynrei naduh ka umbam ka umdih, ka pule ka puthi, ka koit ka khïah namar ba ka sorkar haduh mynta kam don satïa ïa ka thong kumno ban kyntiew ïa ki paidbah ha khappud.Ka long ruh kaba sngewphylla tang ban kyntiew ïa ki paidbah ha ki jaka khappud bad ban nym shah klun ïa ki jaka ki puta ha ki jaka khappud, ka sorkar Assam ka don ïa ka mat treikam ba kyrpang kumno ban kyntiew ïa ki paidbah ha khappud bad ki da shim khïa ruh ban wan rah ïa ki skhim pynroi bapher bapher, hynrei haba phai pat sha ka sorkar Meghalaya la kut tang ka jingïakren bad ka kular, khlem da lah ban pyntreikam da ki kam kumba leh ka sorkar Assam. Ka jingkylli ka mih ruh hangne, lada ki paidbah ha khappud ki dang shah iehnoh bein ha baroh ki lïang jong ki kam pynroi mynta ba la ïaid lynti la sawphew snem tam, lano pat kin kiew ha ka roi kapar lada kum ka sorkar kaba long ka kmie kam phai ïa ki khmat ban peit kyrpang ha ki jaka khappud. Kum ka sorkar kaba long ka kmie ka la dei ban phai khmat kyrpang noh ïa ki paidbah ha khappud kata ban peit kyrpang naduh ki jingdonkam ha ki lynti ki synkien, ki umbam ki umdih, ki bording ilektrik, ka pule ka puthi, namar lada ka don ka kam pynroi ha ki jaka khappud ka long ruh shi bynta ba ka sorkar ka lah ban ïada ïa u pud u sam bad kumjuh ruh ba ki paidbah kin dangroi ha ka ïoh ka kot, ka pule kaputhi bad ha baroh ki lïang jong ki kam pynroi ba u paidbah u donkam.Na ka por sha ka por ruh ka sorkar ka ju pynbna paidbah ba kan shim khïa kyrpang na ka bynta ki paidbah ha khappud, hynrei kumba long haduh mynta kata ka thong ba la buh da ka sorkar ka la kut tang ha ka jingïakren bad khlem da leh da ki kam. Ban roi jylla bad ka ri, ka sorkar ka donkam ban phai khmat kyrpang na ka bynta ki paidbah ha ki jaka khappud bad lada kum ka sorkar ka kloi ban kit ïa ka eh ka shon bad ka jingsahdien jong ki paidbah, khlem pep kan long ruh ka jingkyrkhu ïa ka jylla ka ban lah ban kiew sted ha ki kam pynroi kumba kiwei kiwei ki jylla jong ka ri ki la kiew sted bah ha ka laing ka roi ka par bad ka ïoh ka kot. Ka la dei ruh ka por ba ym tang ka sorkar kan phai khmat ïa ka jingeh ki paidbah ha ki jaka khappud, hynrei naduh ki nongïalam seng bhalang, ki riew rangbah ba paw khmat ka jylla ruh ki dei ban noh synnïang da kaba ïa trei lang bad ka sorkar shi bynta ban kyntiew noh ïa ki shnong ki thaw kiba dang sahdien ha ki jaka khappud.
title: Sa katno snem yn mad jingeh ki paidbah khappud?

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 23: Ka seng Hynñiewtrep National Youth Movement Mawshynrut Pyllun hapoh ka jingïalam u bah C. Sohshang President bad u bah B. Marthong Secretary Mawshynrut pyllun, mynta ka sngi ka la leit ban ai da ka jingthoh ha u Branch Manager jong ka State Bank of India jong ka Riangdo Branch, halor ka nongrim ka jingujor ki paidbah kiba la ong ba ha katei ka bank, la ju shah ban plie account tang kumba lai ngut ha ka shi sngi.Ki nongïalam ki la ong ba ka jingleh jong ka Bank, ka la long ka jingduhnong kaba khraw haba ki paidbah ki mih na la ïing ban pynlut por, pynlut bai kali khnang ban leit pyndep ïa ki jingdonkam ha katei ka Bank. Phewse bun na ki, ki la hap ban phai thylli namar ka jingshah tang khyndiat ngut ban plie account.Hadien ka jingïakren jong ka seng bad u Roshan Singh Nongthongbam u ba dei u Branch Manager jong katei ka Bank, lem bad u nongthoh khubor, la ïoh ban kylli pyrthew ïa utei u Manager bad u la jubab da kaba u la ong kam dei kaba ka Bank ka buh kyndon ban pyrkhing thik ban shah plie account tang lai ngut ha ka shi sngi.Hynrei, dei namar ba ha ka Bank don tang uwei u nongtrei u ba leh ïa ki kam shaphang ki account, ban ai pisa, shim pisa, passbook bad kiwei kiwei ki kam. Kumta haba don ka por la shah ïa ki paidbah ba kin plie account katba lah teng teng wat 10 haduh 20 ngut ruh.Haba bun kam bun sien la ailad tang kumba lai ne saw ngut namar ym lah ban pyndep ïa ki kam baroh tang da uwei u nongtrei ryngkat ma u kum u Manager. Ka tnad ruh kam lah ban buh bun ki nongtrei lada ka Bank kam don ka jingïohnong kaba kham bit.Pynban wat la katta ruh na ka liang jong utei u Manager u la kular ban shimkhia ïa katei ka phang bad ban phah ha ki bor ki ba halor ba kin khmih lem ïa ki mat jingdonkam jong ka thaiñ.
title: Tang lai ngut shi sngi lah ban plie Account ha SBI Mawshynrut, bitar ki paidbah

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 23: Ki 3 tylli ki kynhun sengbhalang ba kynthup ïaka KSU, FKJGP Western Border Area bad ka RBYF Patharkhmah Circle kila shim da ka sienjam ban pynlong da ka jingthang mombati haka 24 tarik (Sngi Saitjaiñ) ha ïew Patharkhmah naduh ka por 2 baje nohphai sngi kum ka dak ka jingsngewlem bad ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingshah pynïap dusmon jong u heprit Kitdorlang Marbaniang haka 18 tarik mynta u bnai haka shnong Umtangar ha Ri-Bhoi.Naka liang ki nongïalam kitei ki seng naduh u Bah Receive Pator President KSU, Center Doloi President FKJGP Western Border Area bad u Samla Rishan Nongtri President ka RBYF Patharkhmah Circle kila pynpaw ba kum ki seng bhalang na katei ka thaiñ kim lah khlem da pynrem ïaki riew thrang snam ba donkti pynïap ïa u heprit ba dang 10 snem ka rta bad kaei ka daw ba u la leh tad haduh ban hap shim syndon ïaka jingim jong u.Kila pynpaw ruh watla ki bor pulit kila ioh ban kem noh ïaki runar ba donkti, hynrei kum ka bor jong ka aiñ ka dei ban ai ka jingbishar kaba hok bad ban pynngat ruh ïakitei ki runar ba donkti da ka jingpynsajia kaba tyngeh.Kumta naka liang kitei ki 3 seng ki khot bad wer ïaki paidbah kiba don ka jingsngewkhia halor ki kam pynïap dusmon khamtam ka jingshah pynïap utei u heprit ba kin wan ban snohktilang ha katei ka jingthang mombati ban pynpaw ka jingsngewsih bad ban dawa ka jingbishar kaba hok naka bynta u heprit Kitdorlang Marbañiang.
title: 24 tarik yn thang mombati ki 3 seng ha ïew Patharkhmah ban dawa ïaka jingbishar ka hok

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 23: Naduh ba ki skul ki la sdang ban plie, ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah ki la sdang ban durut ha kaba leit sha ki skul ban pynrung ïa ki khun jong ki ha ki klass bapher bapher nalor kata ha ki la ïabeh ruh ban leit sha ki ïew ki hat na ka bynta ban thied ïa ki kot pule na ka bynta la ki jong ki khun.Haba peit ïa ki dukan die kot ha sor Nongstoiñ khamtam ha ki sngi ïew, ki paitbah naduh ki longkmie haduh ki khynnah ki hap ban ïeng da u lain bad ki dukan ki shu dap briew baroh shi sngi khlem kut. Haba ïakren bad ki longkmie kiba ïeng laiñ ban thied kot, ki la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ïa ki kot lah ban ïoh na ki skul ruh, hynrei ym lah pat ban ïoh lut ïa baroh kata naduh ki kot pule haduh ki kopi kumta kat ïa kiba lah ban ïoh na ki dukan die kot ki hap ban shu leit thied. Nalor kata ki la ong ruh ba ha kiwei kiwei ki snem ka jingpoi jong ki kot sha ki skul bad ha ki dukan die kot ka kloi bha, hynrei mynta u snem pat ym tip na ka ei ka daw ba ka jingpoi ki kot sha ki skul bad sha ki dukan die kot ka suki bha.Haba kylli, ki longkmie ki la ong ruh ba ka dor jong ki kot pule te ka long kumba ju long lait noh ki kopi te ki kham kiew tang kat ban biang ym dei kat haduh ban ong ba ki rem than. Ha kajuh ka por ki la ong ba ki skul ki la dep ban plie naduh ka taïew ba la dep, kumta ki nongpynïaid skul ki la dei ban pynkynmaw sha ki bor ba dei peit ïa ka pule puthi ba kin kham pynkloi ban pynpoi ïa ki kot sha baroh ki skul kiba dei ban ïoh, khnang ba ki nonghikai kin lah ban pynderp kham kloi ban hikai ïa ki course na ka bynta ki khynnah.Ki la ong ruh ba lada ka jingpynpoi ïa ki kot sha ki skul ka shim por slem, kan wanrah jingeh ym tang ïa ki khynnah hynrei wat ïa ki nonghikai ruh namar ba kim don por shuh ban hikai bniah khnang ba ki khynnah kin sngewthuh bha bad kin lah ban khreh bha ïa ki lynnong.
title: Da ki kynta ïeng laiñ ki paitbah ha man la ki dukan die kot hynrei bun ba ym ïoh

content: Jowai, Rymphang 23: Ka Social and Economic Life Development Committee (S.E.L.D) jong ka Mowkaiaw Presbytery, kala ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka Awareness program halor ka phang ‘Violence Against Women’ ha ka shnong Khatkasla West Jaiñtia Hills ha ka 21/3/2024.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ïa ka jing pynshai bad ka jingai mynsiem ïa ki kynthei ba shah thombor (Abuse) Lyngba ka jing kren na ki Resource Person kiba kynthup ïa ka kong R. Passah- (DSWO, WJH), ma S. Ksoo ( Lawyer OneStop), kong L. Ksoo ( OneStop Centre Manager) bad u ma F. Hujon ( Finance Empowerment for Women through SHG.La pynlong ïa ka jingmareh thong ïa ki kynthei da kaba teh khmat (Blindfold) bad ruh la ai ïa ki khusnam sha ki nong jop.Ka kong R. Passah kala mait phang halor ki scheme bapher na ka bynta ki kynthei ha ka imlang ka sah lang. Kaba la ai ka jingkyntu ïa ki khynthei ban wan sha khmat lada shah thombor hano hano, na ka bynta ka hok jong ki.U ma S. Ksoo Kum u Pleader/Lawyer ula mait phang halor ki hok jong ki kynthei kat kum ki aiñ jong ka sorkar Lada Shah thombor. Ka kong L. Ksoo kala mait phang holor ki lad jingïarap ba ka ONE STOP ka ïada bad ka ai na ka bynta ki kynthei ba shah thombor.Katba na ka liang u ma F. Hujon ula mait phang halor ki jingïarap ïaki ki kynthei ba shah thombor ba ki lah ruh ban ïoh ki jingïarap lyngba ki S.H.G kiba don ha la ki jong ki jong ki shnong khamtam ïa kito ki kynthei kiba lehraiñ ban pyntip paidbah shaphang ka jingshah banbeiñ ïa ki.
title: Da ka prokram ai jinghikai pynlong ka SELD shaphang ka hok ki kynthei

content: Khliehriat Rymphang 23: Ka Meghalaya Joint Action Committee, ka pynpaw ka jingsngew khia halor ka jingleh ki trai jong ki karkhana dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills District bad ong ruh ba ki trai kharkhana kim ju kham wan jngoh ïa ka East Jaiñtia Hills District hynrei ki khmih beit khmang tang ïa ki mar poh khyndew kiba don hapoh ka district “Kan sa poi ka por ba ka district kan nym don eiei shuh (Have Not) ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdon ki mar poh khyndew bad ha kaba kum kata ka por, kynmaw ïa ki kyntien jong ngi ba ki trai karkhana kin nym tip bad kim nym ithuh shuh kaei kata ka Shillong khlem da kren shuh ïa ka East Jaiñtia Hills District lei” ong ka MJAC.Shuh shuh ka Meghalaya Joint Action Committee ba la lam khmat da u General Secretary, u bah Enrico.D.Pasi bad u Chairman, u bah Biangshwa Shylla ki la pynpaw hakhmat u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma da kaba ong “ Ka jingtan tyllai, lah ma phi ne lah ma nga ka long kaba donkam ba kane ka sorkar jylla kam dei ban shu pynsngewbha ne pynsngewtynnad than tang ïa kita ki karkhana dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills District bad ki khajna (royalty) dei beit ban lum na kito ki mar poh khyndew ba phah ne khaiï sha ki karkhana bad dei ruh ban don ne buh ïa kita ki khyrdop lum khajna ha ki lynti ban leit sha ki karkhana dewbilat na ka bynta ban lum ïa ki khajna na kito ki trok kiba rung sha ki karkhana, la kumno kumno haduh 800 tylli ki trok kit maw shun bad 130 tylli ki trok kit dewïong kiba ju rung sha ki karkhana man ka sngi kiba pynpoi ïa kitei ki mar poh khyndew sha ki karkhana dewbilat bad ki trok ki ju kit palat pud haduh lai shah na kaba dei ban kit”.“Kumba ju long, ka sorkar jylla ka ju ai ki jingiarap bapher bapher (subsidies) ïa ki karkhana dewbilat, te ka la dei bha ka por ba mynta ka sorkar ka dei ban pyrkhat ruh na ka bynta ki paidbah ban wanrah ïa ka roi ka kiew, ban buh shwa ïa ka jylla hakhmat eh bad buh noh shwa hadien ïa ki karkhana, lyngba kane yn sa lah ban kyntiew ïa ka jinglong jingman ki briew hapoh ka jylla”Lada shu buh jingkheiñ lada 25MT u dewïong ha ka shi trok man ka sngi kan long 1,186,250 MT ( Shi million shi spah phra phew hynriew hajar ar spah san phew metric ton) u dewïong ha ka shi snem, kane ka pyni ruh ba ka sorkar jylla bad ka sorkar pdeng ka duhnong haduh katta na ki khajna na u dewïong uba poi sha ki karkhana dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.Kumjuh ruh ha kaba iadei bad u mawshun uba pynpoi sha ki karkhana dewbilat, lada 30MT u mawshun ha ka shi trok man ka sngi , lada ha ka 365 sngi ka long 8,760,000 MT, (Phra milion hynniew spah hynriew phew hajar Metric Ton) ha ka shi snem, kane ka jingleit u mawshun kaba khlem ka khajna ka wanrah jingduh nong ïa ka sorkar jylla bad ka sorkar pdeng ha kaba iadei bad ka khajna na u maw shun uba na East Jaiñtia Hills District uba pynpoi sha ki karkhana dewbilat kiba don hapoh ka district.Ka MJAC ka bynrap shuh shuh ba na kitei ki jingiohnong kiba deibhok ban ioh hynrei kiba khlem poi satia sha ka pla tyngka jong ka sorkar, kiba dei ban wan lyngba ki khajna na ki mar poh khyndew, ka lah la kumno kumno ban shna haduh 100 kilo kimtar ka surok kaba bha man la u snem ha East Jaiñtia Hills District kaba long na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang ki paidbah.Ka Committee ka kynthoh jur da kaba ong ba kane ka sorkar pat ka leh matlah bad leh bym salia ha kaba iadei bad ka jingduhnong ka sorkar na u dewïong bad u mawshun ba pynpoi sha ki karkhana dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills District, lada ka sorkar ka lum ïa ki khajna ka lah ruh ban pyn hiar dor wat ïa ka umphniang petrol bad umphniang Diesel hapoh ka jylla.Ha kajuh ka por haba ka sorkar ka lah ban ai jingiarap (Subsidies) ïa ki karkhana dewbilat, ka la dei ruh ban ruh ban wanrah ia ki policy ban ïada ïa ki nongkhaiï , ka dei ruh ban don ka jingiateh kular kaba paka ban ailad shwa ïa ki nongkhaiï kiba dei ki trai jylla ba kin khaiï bad pynpoi ïa ki mar poh khyndew sha ki karkhana dewbilat bapher bapher, namar kumba long mynta ki nongkhaiï kiba na bar jylla kum na Punjab, na Jamu and Kashmir bad na kiwei kiwei ki jylla ki iohlad bha pynbab ban khaiï ha ki karkhana dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills District ha katba ïa ki nongkhaiï kiba napoh ka jylla pat ki buh shwa sha rud bunsien. Ha kajuh ka por ka Meghalaya Joint Action Committee ka kynthoh jur ruh ha ka shithih ujor ba la buh hakhmat u Conrad Sangba halor ka jingduna bha ka jingthep kam ïa ki trai jylla hapoh ki company dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.
title: Ki trai karkhana dewbilat kim ju wan jngoh ïa ka EJHD hynrei ki khmih khmang tang ïa ki mar poh khyndew kiba don hapoh ka district:MJAC

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 23: Ha ka por ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la maitphang ban pynmih ka Stamp ha ka nam jong u Tirot Sing Syiem lyngba ka Postal Department ka Sorkar Pdeng la sngew donkam ban ïoh ïa ka durkhmat ba shisha jong u Tirot Sing Syiem, wat lada khlem lap ksai ïa kano kano ka tyllong. Kumta la pyrshang ban aiti ha ki barikor jong ka jylla bad na baroh ki ba la pyrshang la jied ïa u Bah Bashai Rai Dohling bad u Bah Marius Main Sing Shanpru.
