Baroh arngut ki dei ki ba trei ïa ka kam thohdur ha ki tnat sorkar, u Bah Bashai Rai Dohling u dei u barikor (animation artist) jong ka Directorate of Film Division, Ministry of Information & Broadcasting, Government of India ha Bombay, katba u Bah Mainsing Shanspru u dei u barikor ha Directorate of Information & Public Relations, Government of Meghalaya. Baroh arngut ki la pynkhreh la ka rukom mutdur ïa kata ka dur jong u Tirot Sing Syiem, khlem da iit bniah na ki tyllong jingtip ba dei ban wad. Na ka daw ba la kyrkieh ka kam, u Bah Bashai Rai Dohling u la tehkam ha la ka shlem treikam bad u la aiti noh ha u barikor khynnah u ba dei u dkhar na dewbah India. Kumta ka dur ym da ïahap than bad la kyntait noh bad la jied da ka durthoh ba la pynkhreh u Bah Main Sing Shanpru.Ka la jia ryngkhat ba u Bah Raphael Warjri, u dei u synran hikai thohdur jong u Bah Maiñ Sing Shanpru bad la ïohlad ban sakhi ïa kata ka dur jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ka ba paw kum u tymmen rangbah, katba ha ki khanamynnor la tip ba u la ïap ha ka ryta ba dang kumba laiphew snem tam. Kumta la kynthoh mardor ban pynbeit ïa kata ka dur, hynrei na ka daw ba la kyrkieh than ka sorkar, ym banse ban aiti noh kumba ka long haduh ba la shon shab na ka bynta kata ka Stamp ha Ri India lyngba ka Postal Department. Wat lada u Bah Raphael Warjri u dang khynnah samla, kane ka jingjia ka ba long thurmur ka la ktik ïa u ban thwet thikna shaphang ka dur ba biang jong u Tirot Sing Syiem. La jia ryngkhat ba u la mar mlien ruh ha ka kam shondur bad u ïoh jingtip ba thikna ba la shem ïa ka kor shondur dang tang ha u snem 1839, kata ka mut hadien ba la ïap u Tirot Sing Syiem. Ym tang katta ka kor shondur ka dang poi sha Ri India ha u snem 1855 bad ym pat don lynti ban ïoh ka dur shon jong u Tirot Sing Syiem. Wat lada ha kata ka juk la ju don ki barikor ki ba ruiddur ïa ki kynja kynrem lyndan phareng, hynrei ym lah ban khmih lynti ba yn don ba ruiddur ïa u Tirot Sing Syiem, khamtam ba u dei u koidi sorkar ba la shah set byndi na ka daw ba ïaleh thma pyrshah ïa ka sorkar Bilat.Kumta ha ka jingpyrshang ban thwet ïa ka durkhmat jong u Tirot Sing Syiem, u Bah Raphael Warjri u la poi ryngkhat sha ka shlem pathai khubor naduh ki snem 1990 ter ter bad la ïashem bad u Bah Skendrowell Syiemlieh, u myllung kaitor bakhraw bad kumjuh ruh ïa u Bah Kitdor Syiem, u myntri sorkar u ba dei na ka jait syiem na Mairang. Ha ka ba ïa pur khana bad u Bah Skendrowell la ïa kynduh ïa u Syiem Hima Nongklhlaw, Bah Phrestar Syiemlieh u ba dang long syiem haduh mynta mynne. Ha kata ka khep la pynkhreh da ka durim dulir halor ka jingïakhun ki Khasi pyrshah ïa ka sorkar Bilat, ha kaba u Tirot Sing Syiem u dei u khlawait ba ïalam ha phrang. Phewse kata ka khlem la urlong, wat lada ka Dorbar Hima Nongkhlaw bad u Bah Kitdor ki la aiktien ban kyrshan ïa kata ka kam. Kham hadien kata u Dr David R Syiemlieh u la lap ïa ka sngi ïap ba shisha jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ha u snem 1988, bad mar mar la pyrshang ban tohkit na u Dr David R Syiemlieh shaphang ka dur jong u Tirot Sing Syiem. Ka ba sngew bynñiaw ka long ba ym shem kaiphot ne nathi wat ïa ka met jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ba la pynkhuid da ka ba tep ne ka ba thang ruh, sa ïa ka durkhmat te ym lah ban khmih lynti da lei lei.Hadien kata ka la don ka jingthmu jong ka Dorbar Hima Nongkhlaw ban tei da u durmot jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ha Mairang ha ka jaka ba la don lypa u mot sahnam. Na ka liang jong u Bah Raphael Warjri, la ai jingmut ban tei syndon da ka shlem sahnam rikynti (heritage monument) kat ba shah ka jaka bad la pynkhreh nadong shadong ki jingdonkam ryngkat ki dur ki dar ba kynsai halor ka thma ba la khie ha ka 4tarik Ïaiong 1829 haduh u Risaw 1833 ba la shah set byndi u Tirot Sing Syiem. Kata ruh ka khlem la urlong namar ka don ka jingkylla hadien ba la la tuklar da kiwei pat bad khatduh la aiti ha u nongkhaïi ban tei ïa uta u durmot u ba khlem ïahap bad ka kyrdan longsyiem jong u Tirot Sing Syiem bad ka ba la pynhiar dor ym tang ïa ka rngiew u Tirot Sing Syiem, hynrei la pynjem rngiew ïa ka jaitbynriew Khasi baroh kawei. Ha ka jaka jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ba khiathew la shna da u tymmen ba phong ka riam bym ïahap, ka boh kum kharmali, u kpieng kuboit barit rïa bad ka dur jong ka wait ym dei ka waitlam Khasi.Hadien ba ka sorkar jylla ka la aiti ha ka synjuk Riti Academy na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka khilon bad ka motdur ha khyrdop jong ka State Central Library ki ba phalang ïa ka rikynti jong ka jylla, u kher rangbah jong ka tnat Deiriti bad Mattithaw (Arts & Culture Department), u Bah F R Kharkongor u la kynjoh ktien ïa u Bah Raphael Warjri na ka bynta ban tei ïa ki motdur jong ki khlawait ïaleh laitluid ka jylla, kata u Tirot Sing Syiem, u Kiang Nangbah bad u Pa Togan Nengminza Sangma. Katkum ba la kdew lynti bad maitphang da u Bah Sanbor Shullai, Myntri sorkar jylla la aiti ha u Bah Raphael Warjri ban pynkhreh na ka bynta ban tei ïa kita ki motdur ba shirynñieng. Mar mar la pynkhreh da ka ba tih sani bad wad bniah ïa baroh ki jingdonkam na ka bynta kita ki khlawait, kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka lyngkhuh snem ba hynñiewphew san jong ka Ri India ba la jer da ka Azaadi Ki Amrit Mahotsav. La plie paidbah da u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K sangma ïa kitei ki durmot jong ki khlawait ka jylla ha u snem 2022 ki ba jrong kumba khatsan pruh eiei.Ka long ka ba donkam ban batai sani ïa ka rukom pynkhreh jong ki barikor ka Riti Academy na ka bynta ban tei ïa kita ki durmot jong ki khlawait ka jylla. Ha kaba ïadei bad u Tirot Sing Syiem, nalor ki jingtip ba la lum naduh ki snem ba la leit, la nang thwet shuh shuh ki jingtip kum ha kaba ïashem bad ka longiing longsem jait syiem Hima Nongkhlaw na ka kpoh ba hiar pateng u Raja Kine Sing bad u Kedro Manik Syiem bad na kiwei kiwei ki tyllong. Kumta la ringdur na ka rengmat jong ki pateng longsyiem kumba la jer bad la thaw ka dur ka ba syriem tam katkum ka pateng jong ka kpoh long syiem bad kumjuh ruh ban ïahap bad ka ryta ba shisha shwa ban khlaw u Tirot Sing Syiem ka ba long kumba laiphew snem tam ka ryta. Nalor kata la jurip sani halor ka spong khor bad ka boh khaila kum u syiem, u paila ksiar ba kieng na tyrpeng sha synmgkai, ka jymphong syiem, ka waitlam ka stieh, ka ryntieh ki khnam ha ryngkap bad kiwei kiwei ki jnit ki jnat kat ka maiñ long syiem jong u Tirot Sing Syiem.Nalor ka dur ka dar bad ka raim ka beit jong u syiem long syiem la wanlam ruh ïa ka pyrkhat Khasi katkum ka jingshisha ha kata ka juk. La shna da u syiem u ba ïakhun ban ïada ïa la ki khun ki hajar bad ïa la ka hima sima, ym dei u ba shla pyrshah ban kput da ka ba bitar. La shna da ka dur u syiem u ba peit jylliew ha ka thong ban ïakhun kheiñduh, ba bat skhem triang ïa ka waitlam bad ka stieh bad u ba la pynkhreh ban len lade na ka bynta ka Ri bad ka jaitbynriew. Kumta khlem pyrthuh bud ban shna da u durmot u ba ieng kynthuit ban pyneh shadem lane kum u kaikhlaw ba tur ruma da jingbitar ïa u nongshun, bad ka ba isaitmet tam ka long ba ym dei da ki dohksah ba phyllung kum ki ba kilan met ha ka juk mynta, hynrei kum ki khlawait jong kata ka juk ki ba ïa kynduh bad ka mariang, la ha ka ryngkang rynsied ne ka trei ka beng ha shnong ha thaw, ha lyngkha risai ne ha khlaw ha btap. Kine kiei kiei baroh ki mir katkum ka saiñpyrkhat tynrai ki Khasi.Ha kane kajuh ka rukom la pynkheh ka thwet ka tih sani shaphang u Kiang Nagbah ruh kumjuh. Katkum ka khana mynnor la shem ba ki phareng ki la sni ïa u Kiang Nangbah bad ïa ka kur Nangbah haduh ba ki la kthong ïa ki samla bad rangbah na ka kur haduh ba ki la iehnoh ïa ka nongrim iing ha Wah Nangbah ha dong Tpeppale bad phet sakma sha kylleng ka Ri Khasi. Ym shym lap ksai shuh ïa ki kur Nangbah ha kata ka por bad hadien la tip ba ki don ki ba na shnong Jaraiñ bad Lamin ki ba dei na ka pateng jong u Kiang Nangbah. Kumta ha ba la wad bniah la shem ba ka longiing jong u Bah Barnabas Nangbah ha Shillong ki ba dei trai shnong na Lamin ki dei ki ba hiar pateng na kpoh ka kmie u Kiang Nangbah. Kumta katkum ba la shim nongmuna ïa u Tirot Sing Syiem, kumjuh ruh la shim ksai na ka rengmat ka longiing u Bah Barnabas Nangbah ban shna thymmai ïa ka durkhmat jong u Kiang Nangbah. ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong u Kiang Nangbah la ïoh jingtip ruh kum na u Ma R Tokin Rymbai, Ma S Quotient Sumer, Ma Lakhon Shullai, Bah H.H Mohrmen bad kiwei kiwei. Ha kajuh ka rukom la buddien na ka bynta ka pateng bynriew jong u Pa Togan Nengminza Sangma, hynrei ym shym la lap ksai than lait tang katto katne ki bynta jong ka riam ka beit ki jynkieng jyndeng jong ki khlawait Garo ba la ai jingtip da u barikor Arak Sangma bad ka Sahana P Marak, ka ba dei teng ka kher rangbah jong ka sorkar jylla bad ki ba tip thikna shaphang ka riti dustur Garo.Halor ki kynrum kynram hamsaïa ki ba la pynkulmar jingmut ïa ki paidbah ha ka ba ïadei bad u durmot Tirot Sing Syiem ha Dhaka, la pynshai ba ka sorkar jylla ha ka ba sdang la phah shna da u durmot shiteng ba na shadem shaneng. Hynrei ynda la leit khmih sha Dhaka ha u bnai Risaw 2023, la shem ba ym ïahap namar ba u durmot u rit than. Kumta katkum ba la tuklar da ki kher ki mer jong ka sorkar khamtam u Bah F. R Kharkongor ha ryngkat ka ba ïa syllok bad ka synjuk Riti Academy, kumta la pyrkhat thymmai bad rai ban shna da u durmot ba haduh syngkai namarba ka jaka ha Dhaka, hadien ba la khmih ka khim bad ym shah jaka ban shna da u ba shirynñieng.Khatduh ïawai la shna kat ban biang ha ka jaka jong ka Indira Gandhi Cultural Centre, Indian High Commission, Dhanmundi, Dhaka, Bangladesh ba la buhti da u ba kot tang ha syngkai shaneng. Ha ka ba ïadei bad ka durkhmat, kumba la kdew ha shwa ka dei ka ba la jurip thikna lyngba ki tyllong ki ba biang bad la bishar katkum ka pateng bynriew na ka kpoh long syiem ba hiar pateng u Tirot Sing Syiem. Haba la bishar sani lah ban pdiang ba ki khun ba mih pateng na ka kpoh longsyiem kin ïa syriem katkum ka dur ka dar jong ki pateng ba mynta kum ba long lem ka pyrthei salonsar. Ha kane ka rukom la pynbiang ha kiwei kiwei ki jingteinam kum ha iing u Lat ha Raj Bhavan bad kiwei kiwei ki shlem pyninam.Na kata ka daw kam long kaba shongnia ban nujor bad kiwei pat ki jingpyrshang ba thurmur ha ki snem ba la leit, namar ba ka Riti Academy ha ryngkat ka Sorkar jylla ka la don ka rukom pynkhreh ka ba sani bha ka ba lah da ki katto katne snem ban ïasyllok bad ka Indian High Commission ha Dhaka. La prat lynti ha kane ka bynta da u kher rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u Bah F R Kharkongor haduh ba ym dei tang u durmot ba la buhnam, hynrei la buhnam ruh ka nongmuna jong ka Stamp, nangta ka Map Hima Nongkhlaw kaba rim ba la pynkhreh ka sorkar Bilat ba la ai da u bah David R Syiemlieh, nangta ki dur ki dar ba kdew ïa ka khana jong ka ba ïaleh laitluid ba la thohdur da u Bah Raphael Warjri bad kiwei kiwei ki atiar kordor jong ka jaitbynriew Khasi ban pyninam ha ka Ri Bangladesh. Ka long kaei kaei kaba donkam ba ka iktiar sorkar kan shimkhia ïa kane ka bynta ban pynthikna ïa ka dur ba janai jong u Tirot Sing Syiem, lada dei ban pynneh da ka ba rim ba la don lypa da ki phew snem lane ban pdiang da ka ba thymmai ka ba la tih sani bad wad bniah katkum ka jingtbit ba paka bad pura.Shuh shuh, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Myntri Mattithaw bad Deiriti u la lam khmat na ka bynta ban leit khmih ïa ka phatok Dacca Central Jail ha ka ba u Tirot Sing Syiem u la shah set byndi. Ha ka por ba dang ïa khmih bad ki heh ka phatok, la don ka jingïakren na ka bynta ban buhti ïa ka shlem pyninam ha ka nam u Tirot Sing Syiem ha Dhaka Cental Jail ha ryngkat ki myntri bad ki kynrem lyndan. Ha ka jingïatai la don lang u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, Symbud Myntri Rangbah, Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh, Myntri Pathai Khubor, bad u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Myntri Mattithaw bad Deiriti, ba la ïa shim bynta ruh da u Dr David R Syiemlieh, Bah F R Kharkongor ha ka ba ïa don ryngkat u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, Titos Starwell Chyne, Hamlet Dohling bad Teibor Pathaw. Ka Sorkar jylla ka la pynkhreh na ka bynta kata khnang ban lah ban pynurlong ïa ka jingthmu.
title: Ka jingshna ïa u durmot u Tirot Sing ha Dhaka

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 23: Ka ophis ka Deputy Commissioner (Supply), East Khasi Hills District ka la pyntip ba u khaw reshon uba hap hapoh ka NFSA (AAY bad PHH) bad Non-NFSA ba kynthup ruh ïa u Ata na ka bynta u bnai Rymphang ladep ban pyllait bad sam lyngba ki dukan sam reshon bapher bapher.Ka dor jong u khaw ba la bhah hapoh ka AAY yn sam kumba 35 kilo ha ka shi Card bad ïa u khaw hapoh ka bhah PHH yn sam kumba 5 kilo shi khlieh briew khlem donkam siew pisa.Katba u khaw hapoh ka Non-NFSA yn sam kumba 7.105 kilo shi ïing ha ka dor kumba T. 12.70 haduh T. 13.00 shi kilo.Ïa u ata yn sam kumba 5 kilo shi card ha ki thaiñ Sor bad kumba 3 kilo shi card ha ki thaiñ nongkyndong ha ka dor T. 10.50 shi kilo.Ka ophis ka la bthah ïa ki nongïohbhah ba ki dei ban ujor lada kam don ka jingsam kaba thikna ne ka jingsam kaba duna kilo lane ka jingshim palat ïa ka dor ba la buh bad kumjuh ruh ïa u khaw ba la sniew bad ïa kane ki nongïoh jingmyntoi kin ujor sha ka ophis Deputy Commissioner (Supply), East Khasi Hills District, Shillong.
title: Pyllait ka DC-EKH ïa u khaw bad Ata

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 23: Ki shipai BSF ha ka jingïatreilang bad ki pulit ka jylla ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024, ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa shibun ka shini bad u kwai ba la shongdor kumba T.20 lak. Ïa kitei ki tiar ba la kurup la thmu ban khaïi beaiñ sha Ri Bangladesh napoh ka khappud kaba don ha South Garo Hills.Hadien ka jingïoh jingtip kaba thikna ki shipai jong ka 200 Battalion ki BSF Meghalaya, ha ka jingleit khynra lang bad ki pulit ka jylla ki la kurup ïa katei ka shini bad u kwai ba la dep thad tyrkhong. Ïa ka shini bad u kwai la lap napoh kawei ka Ïing kaba la shu ieh shrah kaba don ha khappud kaba hajan ka shnong Rongra kaba ha thaiñ South Garo Hills. Ïa kitei ki tiar ba la ïoh kurup la aiti noh sha ka thanat pulit jong ka PS – Rongra ban leh ïa ki kam katkum ka aiñ.
title: Kurup shini bad kwai ki pulit bad shipai BSF

content: Shillong, Rymphang 23 : U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba khmih ïa ka Tnad kam Pohïing u Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka sngi Thohdieng ula ong ba ki briew kiba shong ba sah ha Maxwelton Estate kin hap pynkhreh ban mih na katei ka jaka lada ki dei kiba shu sah beain.Haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, u Bah Prestone ula ong “Nga la thikna bha ba ka Aiñ kan ïeng rasong bad ka aiñ kan shim ïa la ka jong ka lynti bad lada ki dei shisha kita kiba sah beaiñ, haba kut hi kin hap pynkhreh ban mih noh na kane ka jaka”.Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ka la ïai dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban kyndang mardor ïa ki nongshong beaiñ hapoh ka Maxwelton Estate kaba heh kumba 9 acre ka jaka bad kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka Kenches Trance Oxford, Rilbong.Haba kylli, u Bah Prestone ula ong “Em ka mukotduma ha ïing Bishar ka dang ïaid. Kata ka dei kaba nga ong, namar kata ngi hap ban ap bad na kata ka daw kaei kaba nga pyrshang ïathuh ïa phi ka long ba to ngin ap bad peit, ai ba ka aiñ kan ïaid hala ka jong ka lynti”.
title: Lada dei kiba sah beaiñ kin hap mih noh na Maxwelton Estate : Dy CM

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 23: Ka seng Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Ri-Bhoi District mynta ka sngi kala ther tyngeh ïaka sorkar Meghalaya bad kumjuh ruh ka sorkar Assam halor ka jingshah pyndik jong ki paidbah ba shong ba sah haka thaiñ khappud Block II naka por shaka por kiba hap ban im hapdeng ka jingsyier bad ka jingrit mynsiem, watla kitei ki 2 jylla ki dang don hapdeng ka lynti ban pynbeit noh ïa u pud u sam ba thikna.Naka liang ka seng HYC kum ka jingpynrem ïaka sorkar Meghalaya bad Assam mynta ka sngi kala pynlong da ka jingïaid paidbah naduh Umlyngkdait haduh Nongpoh ryngkat ki placard ban pynrem jur ïaka mynthi ka sorkar halor ka jingeh jong ki paid khappud kiba ju shah pynthud bad pyndik naka por shaka por haki pulit ka Assam.Hadien ka jingïaid paidbah naka liang ka seng kala pynlong ruh ka jingïalang ba lyngkot hakhmat ka Nongpoh Town Shopping Complex ba kum ki nongïalam ka seng naduh u Samla Enlang Sawian Education Secretary ka Sengkmie, Samla Hercules Suting President ka HYC Ri-Bhoi District, Samla Tony Shylla General Secretary, u Samla Jackson Sohtun President ka MPUF Ri-Bhoi District kila ai ka jingkren ban pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia bad pynrem jur halor ka jingmutlop jong ka sorkar ban peit bad khmih ïaka jingeh ki paidbah ha khappud.Kum ban shu pynpaw hangne ba naka liang ki pulit ka Assam dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi kila leit ban thwet biang ïa 4 ngut ki briew naka shnong Jatalong bala kynnoh pynpra ïa u mawnongrim bala tei da ka Assam, katba ka sorkar Meghalaya kam nud ang eiei lada wan pynpra ka Assam khamtam ïaka skul SSA kaba la shah pynpra naduh u snem 2018 haka shnong Khlieh Umwang hynrei haduh mynta ym shym la lah shuh ban shna.Kitei ki nongïalam seng kila ong ruh ba hadien ka jingioh ïakren bad katto katne ki nongïalam naka thaiñ khappud katno ka mynsiem ka dap da ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur ban iohsngew ba kim ioh thiah suk bad im hapdeng ka jingtieng jingsyier naka jingwan pyndik ki pulit Assam naka por shaka por ba haduh mynta ki pulit ka Assam ki dang bteng ban thwet bad ban kem ïaki briew ba kynnoh donkti ban pynpra ïa u mawnongrim ka Assam.Kitei ki nongïalam kila ther ruh balei ka sorkar Meghalaya ka sngap jar halor ka jingwan pynpra ka sorkar Assam ïaka skul SSA ha Khlieh Umwang, ka jingshah pyndik ka rep ka riang ka kit ka bah ïaki mar rep watla ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya kim ju don kano kano ka jingkyntur pud hynrei dei ka Assam kaba ju wan ban mushlia bad kyntur pud naka por shaka por.Shuh shuh kila ong ruh ba kane ka jingïaid paidbah mynta ka sngi ka dei tang ka jingsdang ba ka sorkar ka dei ban shimkhia ban pynthikna ba ki paidbah ba shong ba sah ha khappud ki dei ban ioh ka jingshngaiñ khamtam ban pynbeit noh mardor ïa u pud u sam, bad lada ka sorkar ka sngap mynthi naka liang ka seng kala pynkhreh ruh da ki jingïakhih ba tyngeh ha nongbah Shillong, kila bynrap.
title: Da pynpra ka Assam balei ka sorkar M’laya ka sngapjar, pynthikna ka suk ka saiñ ki paidbah ha khappud dawa ka HYC

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 23: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la dawa ïa uwei u briew uba kynthoh pyrshah ïa ka seng ha ka Facebook Page ba la ai kyrteng ‘Lympung ki Khun ka Ri’ ba u dei ban panmap hapoh 24 kynta hynrei lym kumta ka Seng kam banse ban mudui da ka ejahar sha ki bor jong ka aiñ.Katkum kane ka jingkynthoh ha kane ka Facebook page, u nongkynthoh uba la paw kyrteng kum u HBK Lyngdoh u la kynthoh pyrshah ïa ka seng da kaba ong ba ka jingpynlong ka HANM ïa ka jingïakhih ha Jantar Mantar ha nongbah Delhi ha ka 3 tarik Naiweing 2023 ka dei kaba la bei pisa da ka National People’s Party (NPP).Haba kyntait ïa ka jingshah kynnoh, u Vice President ka HANM Bah Bawan Nongsiej u la pynshai ba ka jingïakhih jong ka seng ka dei na ka bynta ki dawbah jong ka jaitbynriew na ka bynta ban pynurlong ïa ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri India kumba la mynjur da ka Iingdorbar Thawain ka Jylla ha ka 27 tarik Nailur 2018.U nongkynthoh HBK Lyngdoh u kynthoh kumne: “Kawei na ki sengbhalang kaba leit pynthud ïa ka jingdawa pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka 8th Schedule ka dei ka HANM. Kane ka Seng ka la leit sha Delhi ban dawa pynrung lang ïa ka ktien Khasi bad ka ktien Garo. Ka ktien Garo kam pat long qualified ban rung ha ka 8th Schedule te da dawa pynrung lang ha kajuh ka por ka ktah ïa ka ktien Khasi kaba lah long qualified ban rung ka hap ap haduh da ki phew snem shuh shuh ban ïa rung ryngkat bad ka Garo haduh ban da long qualified ka Garo.”“Lehse ban leit pynthud kumtei dei ba sponsor da ka npp.”
title: Hapoh 24 kynta dawa panmap ka HANM ïa uba kynthoh ha Facebook Page

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 23: Ka Meghalaya Joint Action Committee (MJAC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ujor sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Sorkar Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki bor pynïaid jong ki Karkhana kiba don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ki khaïi beaiñ ïa u dewïong bad ïa u mawshun sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills.U Secretary General ka MJAC u Bah Enrico D. Pasi ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha nongbah Shillong u la kam ba ki don la kumno kumno haduh 800 tylli ki trok kit mawshun bad 130 tylli ki trok kit dewïong kiba ju rung sha ki Karkhana manla ka sngi kiba kit ïa ki marpohkhyndew sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat ha East Jaiñtia bad ki trok kiba ju kit palat pud haduh lai shah na kaba dei ban kit.“Ngi dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan buh noh da ka Integrated Check Point khnang ban tehlakam ïa ka jinglait ei ka khajna namarba ka jingbym don jong ka Revenue Checkpoints ne ki Checkgates shwa ba ki trok kit dewiong bad ki trok kit mawshun kin rung sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat ha East Jaintia Hills,” u la ong.“Kane ka jingkhaïi be-aiñ ïa ki marpohkhyndew kum u mawshun bad ïa u dewïong sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat ba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills ki la ïaid lait ban siew ïa ka khajna sha ka Sorkar Jylla namar ka jingbym don ki khyrdop talasi jong ka DMR, ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) ban thew ïa ki mar ba la kit shapoh ki Karkhana,” ong u Bah Pasi.U la kynthoh ruh nalor ba ki bor pynïaid jong ki Karkhana ki trei hi ïa ki kam ba ki trai jylla ki lah ban leh bad wat ka dor jong ka dewbilat ka tat bha haba ïanujor ïa ka bai dewbilat ha Khliehriat bad ha Assam.“Ka jylla jong ngi ka dei kaba dang sahdien bha ha ka khaiï ka pateng, ka dei ruh ka jylla ka bym pat lah ban pyndap da lade ïalade, haba ka Sorkar kam shimkhia ban lum ïa ka khajna kan sa nang wanrah jingeh shuh shuh ïa ki paidbah. Ka jinglait ei jong ka khajna ka la nang pynduhnong bun shah ïa ka Sorkar nalor ba ka jylla ka la nang hiran ha ka ïoh ka kot naduh ba la khang ka jingtih bad shalan ïa u dewiong da ka National Green Tribunal (NGT,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Pasi.“Jin lada ka Sorkar ka la peitngor ban buh ïa ki khyrdop lum khajna ïa ki marpohkhyndew ha shwa ban pynrung sha ki Karkhana ka Sorkar kan jin da la ïohlum ïa ka khajna ban shna ïa ki surok, ki skul, ki hopsital bad kan long ruh ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki paidbah,” u la bynrap.
title: Kynnoh ka MJAC ba khaïi dewïong bad mawshun be-aiñ ki karkhana ha EJH

content: Shillong, Rymphang 23: Ka Myntri ka tnad kam rep kam riang ha ka jylla ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh mynta ka Sngi Thohdieng ka la pyntip ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka don jingthrang ban pynkylla ïa palat 1 lak hectare ka jaka ban rep khlem ai dawai sboh kat kum ka Meghalaya State Organic Mission 2024-2028.Haba jubab hapoh ïing Dorbar, ka Dr Ampareen ka la ong “Ka Meghalaya State Organic Mission 2024-28 ka dei kaba la thaw bad pyllait ha ka 15 tarik Rymphang 2024, da ka thong ban pynkylla palat 1 lak hectare ka jaka kum ka jaka rep ba khlem ai dawai sboh hapoh ka National Programme for Organic Production (NPOP).Ka pyntip ba hynriew ngut ki service provider la ithuh ban pynkloi ïa ka jingai syrnod bad pyntreikam ïa ka mission.Ka pyntip ruh ba la dep ban thaw ïa ka Organic Society ba la ai kyrteng ka Meghalaya Natural and Organic Society for Livelihood and Innovation in Agriculture (MEGNOLIA) ka ban pyntreikam ïa ki prokram rep khlem ai dawai sboh hapoh ka Jylla.Ka Sorkar Jylla ha u snem ba la lah, ka la wanrah ïa ka Meghalaya State Organic and Natural Farming Policy 2023.
title: Thrang ka sorkar ban pynkylla 1 lak hectare ka jaka rep ban rep khlem ai dawai sboh

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 23: U Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng uba peit bad khmih ïa ka Tnat Ports, Shipping & Waterways bad Ayush, Sarbananda Sonowal ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la plie paidbah ïa ki projek bapher bapher ban kyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha North Eastern Institute of Ayurveda and Homoeopathy (NEIAH) ha phyllaw jong ka, kaba don ha Mawdiangdiang ha ka nongbah Shillong.Utei u Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng uba khmih ruh ïa ka tnat Ayush u la plie ruh ïa ka Guest House bad buh mawnongrim na ka bynta ka Administrative Building, Pharmacy Building, kumjuh ruh ka kynroh bad ka surok kynthup ki khyrdop ban rung bad mih ha katei ka prokram.Haba ïadei bad kane haba ai jingkren ha ka jingïalang, u Myntri Sorkar Pdeng, Sarbananda Sonowal u la ong ba lyngba ka jingkyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH, kin don ka lad kaba kyrpang ban ïoh jinghikai, ïatreilang bad kyntiew ïa ki bor haba ïaleh ban wanrah ka jingpynshisha ïa ki rukom ai jingsumar tynrai lyngba ka jingsakhi jong ka jingstad saïan.“Ka long ka khyllipmat jong ka jingsngewthuh kaba khraw ba ka institute ka la dep ai jinghikai pyntbit jan shi hajar ngut ki riew shemphang ha ka Ayurveda bad Homoeopathy. Kane ka la kyntiew bha ïa ka rukom ai jingsumar ha ka thaiñ, khamtam ha Meghalaya, haba ngi ïaid shaphrang ban pynurlong ïa ka thong jong u Myntri Rangbah duh jong ngi, Narendra Modi na ka bynta ka Swastha Bharat,” u la ong.U la ong ba kane ka kynhun ba thymmai jong ki nongai jingsumar, kiba don ka atiar jong ka jingai jingsumar Ayush kin ïarap ïa ki briew ban ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi.U la ong ruh ba ki don ïa ki jingïa Ki janbha bad ki rukom ai jingsumar tynrai ba hyndai kiba da ki hajar snem, hynrei mynta lyngba ki jingai jingsumar ba la pynshisha da ka saïan ban sumar ïa bun ki jingpang. Ka jingkoit ha India, ka jingïoh jingkoit na India ka long ka jingthmu jong ka jingkhie im biang ka Ayush.La ong ba ka Guest House kaba la plie thymmai ka don ha ka jaka kaba 1780.56 SqM ka ban ai jaka sah bad kaba don ki lad ban pynlong jingïalang. Ïa kane ka jingtei kaba la pyndep kadei kaba ïahab bad ka mariang bad ka don lut baroh ki jingdonkam katkum ka juk mynta.Ka Administrative Building ban dang shna jong ka NEIAH, ha ka jingheh kaba 3160 SqM kan don kawei ka building (G+3) ryngkat artylli ki mala kaba sha trai duh, kynthup kawei ka hall. Ka jinglut ba la mang na ka bynta kane ka jingtei ka long T. 27.30 klur. Ïa ka building jong ka pharmacy yn shna ha ka jingbei tyngka kaba T. 15.33 klur na ka bynta ka G+3 building kaba 1833 SqM. Ïa ka kynroh bad ka surok kaba la pynshai sharak ba kynthup ka khyrdop ban rung bad mih la shna ha ka jinglut kaba T. 12.72 klur.Na ka liang u Sarbananda Sonowal u la ong, “Ka sorkar ba ïalam u Narendra Modi ka thmu ban ïarap bad pynkupbor ïa ki rukom sumar tynrai jong ngi ba kin saphriang palat ïa ka imlang sahlang bad u pud u sam bad ïarap ïa ki briew ban im ka jingim kaba koit ba khiah bad wanrah ïa ki jingpyn ïaid ïew na ka bynta ka thaiñ.”Katba ki jingdon jingem ki long kiba kongsan na ka bynta ki jingseisoh ba kham biang ha ka jingwad bniah bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ki kam, kan jingkyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH, kan pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingkhie im biang jong ka rukom ai jingsumar tynrai hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri Rangbah duh, Narendra Modi.“Ka sorkar ka la kut jingmut ban kyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH khnang ba kan long ka jaka kaba don ïa ki briew kiba la tbit bha ha ka kam jong ka Ayush ha ka ri. Ha ka shi snem ba la leit, ka sorkar Modi ka la bei tyngka palat T. 145 klur ban kyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH. Ka jingmang tyngka na ka bynta ka projek ban kyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH kaba long T. 217. 02 klur,” ong u Myntri.U Myntri Ayush u Sarbananda Sonowal u la pynbna ruh ba ki jingshakri OPD kin sdang ha Smit, East Khasi Hills district ka ban long ka jingmyntoi ïa 40,000 hajar ngut ki briew kiba sah ha 20 tylli ki shnong. U Myntri u la pyntip ruh ba ka NEIAH ka la sdang ïa ka Swarnabindu Prashan Sanskar (Ayurvedic Immunno Modulation in Children) ha ka Ayurveda Hospital jong ka.Lyngba kane ka prokram, ka sorkar ka ïarap ïa ki nongpang lyngba ki lad jingsumar Ayurvedic ban sumar ïa ka jingpang Iron Deficiency Anemia (IDA) ha ki longkmie riewlum kiba hapdeng 18 bad 45 snem ka rta ha Mawpat bad Mylliem Block jong ka East Khasi Hills district hapoh ka AYURSWASTHYA Yojana.U la ong ba ka NEIAH ka la ïarap ïa ki nongpang lyngba ki lad jingsumar kum ka Panchakarma, Ksharasutra, Uttarabasti bad Yoga ban kyntiew ïa ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong ki.“Katba nang bun ki samla pule ki la ïoh jinghikai pyntbit ha kine ki rukom jingsumar, ba kynthup ka specialised Panchakarma Technician programme, ngi khmih lynti ba ka rukom sumar Ayush kan nang paw shuh shuh, bad kan kham suk ban ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi kaba ai ha ka koit ka khiah.Ka India hapoh ka jingïalam ba tbit jong u Myntri Rangbah duh Narendra Modi ka la rah ïa ka jingsumar tynrai sha ka jingkhie im biang ha ka pyrthei. Ka Ayush kaba la ïoh bor biang ka la ïarap ban kyntiew ïa ka bor jong ki hajar snem ki rukom sumar tynrai haba ka bteng ban sdang ïa kane ka jingïaid lynti kumba long mynta,” u la ong.U la ong ba kane ka long da kaba wanrah ïa ki dawai tynrai shakhmat hapoh jong ka da ka jingthmu ban tei ïa ki lad ai jingsumar ba la pynshisha da ka saïan ban kyntiew ïa ka jingim jong ki briew, ban don ka met kaba khlaiñ bad ki jingmut jingpyrkhat kiba kmen.Ha kane ka prokram la donlang u Secretary jong ka Ayush, Vaidya Rajesh Kotecha; Vice Chancellor jong ka Northeast Hill University (NEHU), Prof PS Shukla; Joint Secretary, Tnat Ayush, BK Singh; lem bad u Director, NEIAH, Prof Neeta Maheskar.
title: Pynshlur u Sonowal ïa ki rukom sumar tynrai lyngba ka Aayush, Homeopathy

content: Shillong, Rymphang 23 : U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la kular ba un bishar bniah hi dalade ïa ki aplikeshon jong ki san tylli ki karkhana coke kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingbit da ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board (MSPCB) bad ong ba un leh da ka kam lada lap ba la pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon.Hynrei, u la ong pat ba kan long kaba bakla lada ong ba ki karkhana coke lane ki karkhana ba kim long, naba ka jylla ka donkam na bynta ka jingkiew ha ka ïoh ka kot da kaba wanrah ïa kum kine nalor ba ki ai kam ai jam ïa ki paidbah.Kane ka jingkren jong u Myntri Rangbah kadei halor ka zero hour notice ba la wanrah da u MLA ka UDP na Mookaïaw, u Bah Nujorki Sungoh ha kane ka sngi Thohdieng ha Iing Dorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla.Shwa kane, u Bah Nujorki u la pynpaw ka jinglyngoh halor ka rai jong ka MSPCB ban ai jingbit thymmai (CTE) sha ki san tylli ki karkhana coke ha East Jaintia. U kynnoh ba kham mynshwa, kajuh ka MSPCB ka la kyntait ïa ka aplikeshon jong ki lai tylli na ki san tylli ki karkhana coke da kaba ong ba ka jaka kam ïahap.Da kaba kdew ruh ïa ka jingktah jong kitei ki karkhana ïa ka mariang, u Bah Nujorki u la ong, “Khlem lyngoh, ngi la shah ñiew kum ka nongbah ba jur bampong (cancer capital).”Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah haba jubab shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ki don ki kyndon kiba hap ban bud bad kam don satia ka jingkylli mano ba pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon, hynrei lada ki leh pat kumta, yn hap ban leh katkum ba shah ka kam bad katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.“Nga kular ha u dkhot ka Iing ba ïa kane ka phang, kaba dei ka nga sngewtynnad eh ba ngan sa peit hi ïa kine ki ishu bad ngan sa peit bniah ïa kawei pa kawei ka aplikeshon dalade bad ban wad kiei ki kyndon. Ngan sa khot ruh ïa ka jingïalang bad ka MSPCB bad ngan sa pyntip ïaphi halor kane,” u la ong.Tangba u ong pat ba lada ki kyndon ki biang kin ym lah ban khanglad ïano ïano ba kin leh ïa ki kam khaïi jong ki hynrei lada lap pat ba la pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon, kin sa leh kumba shah ka kam.Nalorkata u ong pat ba um ïahap satia ba tang ba don ki karkhana yn shah kynnoh noh ba dei ka nongbah bampong ha ka ri. Katkum ka jingong jong u, ki don bun ki kam kiba dei ha lyndet ka jingbun kiba pang bampong ha ka jylla.
title: Ba wanrah u MLA ha Iing Dorbar, kular u CM ban peit bniah hi dalade halor ki karkhana coke

content: Shillong, Rymphang 23 : U MLA ka Congress na Gambegre, Saleng A Sangma ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ong ba watla ki pulit ki trei borbah ban pyndep ïa ka kamram hynrei don ki jaka sah (quarter) ki bym long satia ban wah lang bad ki bahaiing ha sem.Haba rah ïa kane ka mat hapoh Iing Dorbar, utei u MLA u la ong ruh ba ki don ki jaka kiba long kum ki trep. “Ïa kiba kum kine lada lah ban maramot lane ban pynbha,” u la ong.Haba jubab halor kane ka mat hapoh Iing Dorbar, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la mang 50 lak na bynta baroh ki distrik na ka bynta ban maramot ïa ki jingtei kiba dei ki quarter ne barrack jong ki pulit.“Ngi dang peit ïa ki jingtei kiba la julor bad ha kane ka snem mangtyngka, ka sorkar jylla ka la mang 50 lak tyngka na ka bynta man ka distrik ban pynbiang ïa kitei ki jingdonkam,” u la ong.Nalorkata, u ong ruh ba u kular ha Iing Dorbar ba kin pynkhlaiñ bad pyntikna ba ka jaka sah jong ki pulit kan long kaba i kob.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ha kane ka snem ki la don bun ki jingpynbha ha ka tnad pulit. “Hadien ba la dep ban peit bad ïohi ba la donkam ban leh, ngi la thaw la ka jong ka engineering wing, kaba la treikam mynta shaid shaid,” u la ong.
title: Ha Iing Dorbar rah u MLA Congress ba donkam maramot ïa jaka sah ki pulit

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 23: Arngut ki briew kiba la shah halor ka jingpynïap dusmon ïa uwei u heprit uba dang shiphew snem ka rta ha ka shnong Umtangar, Ri Bhoi ki la phla ba ki la leh ïa kane ka kam runar tang namarba une u heprit u la pyrshang ban phet da kaba rah ïa ka kiad ba dang sah shi bilor kaba dei ka jong uwei na kine ki arngut ki runar.U Pynshailang Warjri, 32 ka rta na Umtangar bad u Banshngaiñ Tynsong 28 na Pynursla ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit ha ka sngi Palei.“Ha ka jingtohkit ïa kine ki arngut, la lap ba u lanot u la sah ha ka sem jong uwei na kiba la shah kem ha ka janmiet jong ka 17 tarik, Rymphang. Ha ka step jong ka 18 tarik, Rymphang, u lanot u la pyrshang ban rah ïa u bilor ba dang don bad ka kiad kaba dei jong uwei na kiba la shahkem. Ha ka jingbitar, u Banshngaiñ Tyngsong bad u paralok ki la beh thong ïa u nadien bad ki la pynïap ïa u da ka tangon da ka pla na ki bynta ka durkhmat,” la ïathuh u SP ka Ribhoi Jagpal Singh Dhanoa.“Hadien kata, ki la buhrieh ïa ka met hajan kawei ka lawbniap bad ap haduh ban da kem iongreiñ ka bneng ban kit pat ïa ka met jong u lanot sha ka kper jong u Bah Comand Nongrah. Ïa uba donkti lang ruh ngi la kem,” u la ong.U SP u la ong ba ka jaka ba la jia ka jingshah pynïap yn sa tohkit shuh shuh khnang ba kin nongleh kam bymman kin da phla lut halor kane ka kam runar.
title: Tang na ka bynta shi bilor ka kiad, pynïap ki arngut ïa u heprit

content: Shillong, Rymphang 23 : Ka sorkar ka la siew bailutksan haduh 96,72,640 lak tyngka sha kito baroh kiba la iap shah bat bording ilektrik ha kine ki 10 snem ba la leit noh.ïa kane la pynpaw ha ka jubab jong u myntri ka tnad pynmih bording ka jylla u Abu Taher Mondal ba la wanrah hapoh ka ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ ka jylla.Haba batai kumno ba kito kiba ngat ha ka apot ki ïoh ïa kane ka jingsiew na ka tnad pynmih bording u Mondal u la ïathuh ha ka jubab ba hadien ba la ïoh jngtip halor ka jingjia mar mar u Assistant Executive Engineer uba dei peit u leit sha ka jaka ba la jia ban jurip da lade kumno ka jia bad hadien kane un sa ai ïa ka kaiphod halor ka jingjia sha u Senior Electrical Inspector bad ujor ruh da ka ejahar ha ka Police Station ba ka jaka ba jia ka hap. Nalor kane la pyntip ruh sha ki Deputy Commissioner bad ki Superintendent of Police jong ki district ba ka jingjia shah bat bording ka jia.Hadien kane na ka liang u Senior Electrical Inspector un tohkit bniah ban lap ïa ka daw ba shah bat bording bad pynkhreh ïaka kaiphod ban ai sha ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited ryngkat ki jingai jingmut. Ka dor ban siew bailutksan kan long kat kum ka jingpynbna ba la dep pynbna da ka tnad pynmih bording jongka jylla.
title: 96.72 lak tyngka siew ka sorkar sha kiba iap shah bat bording electrict ha ki 10 snem

content: Shillong, Rymphang 23 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ula ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la buddien bad ka Sorkar Pdeng ha ka ban pyntreikam ïa ka Reservation Policy hapoh ka Eklavya Model Residential Schools (EMRS) hapoh ka jyllaHaba jubab ïa ka mat ïatai ba la wanrah da u MLA ka VPP na Nongkrem, u Conrad ula ong ba ha ka jingïakynduh, u Myntri ka Tribal Affairs ula pynpaw ba yn sa mynjur ïa ka jingpyn treikam ïa ka Reservation Policy ha ki skul EMRS kiba don hapoh ka jylla.“Hooid, ngi khlem ïoh jingkular da ka jingthoh. Kumta, ngi dang buddien ïa kane ka kam bad ka Sorkar Pdeng, namar da ki hajar ki kam kin mih da ka jingseng ïa ki skul EMRS” ula ong.Hynrei u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka jingpynsangeh ïa ka jingïaid ka jingtrei ka lah ban ktah ïa ka kam ha ka jingïakren jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng.Shuwa kane, haba jubab ha ka kynta kylli jingkylli halor kane kajuh ka kam, u Myntri ka Tnad Pule Puthi Rakkam A Sangma ula ong ba ka Reservation Policy kan ym treikam satia ha ki skul EMRS. “Hynrei, ngin sa buddien ïa ka kam bad ngi la dep thoh la ka Reservation Policy ka lah ban treikam ne em tangba ngim pat ïoh jubab na ka Sorkar pdeng”.Haba jubab bynrap, u Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ba ula dep ïakren bad u Myntri ka Tnad Tribal Affairs ba ka jingpyntrei ïa ki EMRS hapoh ka Jylla ki long kiba ïaid suki bha.Ula ai jingmut ia u Myntri halor ka jingdonkam ban ailad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla bad ïa ki agency jong ka, ba kin pyntrei ïa ki project namar kan kham bha shibun khamtam ha ka ban weng ïa ki jingeh ba ïakynduh bad ki trai shnong.ïa mynta, ki project ki dei kiba la pyntrei da ki artylli ki agency ba la jied da ka Sorkar Pdeng lyngba ka jingkhot tender.“Kumta, ngi dang ïai bteng ban buddien ïa kane ka kam bad ngi kyrmen ba ngin ïoh ïa ka jubab kaba bha” ong u Conrad.Halor ka jingslem ban pyndep ïa ki jingtei jong ki EMRS, u Myntri ula ong ba ka jingpyntrei ïa ki project ha kiba bun ki block ka long kaba jynjar bha namar ka jingeh ha ka jaka khamtam ba don ka kyndon jong ka Ministry ba ong ba ïa ka jaka dei ban ai ei khlem kano kano ka jingsiew.“Ka jingeh ban ïoh jaka ka dei kaba don ha kiba bun ki block. Hadien ka jingïalang bishar kam, ngi la lah ban ïohi ïa katto katne ki sngi kiba la sdang pyntrei bad ngi khmih lynti ba yn pyndep noh kloi ïa ki” ula bynrap.
title: Kular u MR ban bud dien sha Delhi ban pyntreikam ïa ka Reservation Policy ha ki skul EMR

content: Shillong, Rymphang 23 : U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba khmih ïa ka Tnad kam Pohïing Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ula ong ba ki Bor Pulit ka jylla kin ym ailad da lei lei ruh ban khie im biang ka seng Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA) ha Ri-lum Garo.Kane kala mih hadien ba ka GNLA Re-group (GNLA-R) kala pynmih ïa ka kyrwoh halor ka rai ban pynkhie im bad thaw kynhun namar ki ishu bapher bapher jong ka Ri-lum Garo.“Ki Bor Pulit kila trei khlem shongthait bad ngin pynthikna ba ka jingkhie im kan ym jia da lei lei ruh” ong u Bah Prestone haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor.Ula ong ba ki Pulit kin dang tohkit ban tip la kane ka kyrwoh ka GNLA-R ka dei kaba shisha ne kaba lait. “Hynrei kaei kaba nga mut ban ong ïa phi ba long ba baroh arphew saw kynta ha ka shisngi, ki Pulit ki long kiba la khreh ïa kum kine kiei kiei”.“Lehse dei ki katto katne ki briew lane ki khynnah kiba kwah ban im pahuh pahai da ka jingthaw kynhun. Ngi la peit pyrman bha bad ngim ym thiah bad ngin pynthikna ba ka jingpynkhie im ïa ka kynhun kan ym jia satia” ula ong.Ula pyntip ba ka Tnad kala pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jinglum khubor syntiat bad ong “Sngewbha ïeh ha ngi..ai ba ngan kular ha phi ba ka jingpynkhie pat kan ym jia bad ngin ym ailad satia ïa kata”.
title: Ki Bor Pulit kin ym ailad da lei lei ruh ban khie im biang ka GNLA : Dy CM

content: Kalyani, Rymphang : Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Shillong Lajong FC ka la ïoh ban pynliem noh da 2-1 kol ïa ka TRAU FC ha ka jingïakhun kaba itynnad bha.Ha ka jingïalehkai dei ka TRAU kaba ïoh ban pynkhih jar nyngkong hynrei tang hadien katto katne minit ka Lajong ka la ïoh ba pynphai bad ïoh ruh ban khyrwit ïa u namtam ha kane ka janmiet.Ka jingïakhun ka la kut da ka jingïakhaid ha ka kylla step hynrei dei ha ka kylla miet ba ka TRAU ka la ïoh ban pynkhih jar ha ka minit kaba 47. Hynrei dei tang ha kaminit kaba 59 ka Lajong lyngba u Allen Lyngdoh da ka jingbakla u kol ka la ïoh ban pynïakhaid noh. Bad ïa ka kol jop na bynta ka kynhun la ïoh ban thep da u Marcos Rudwere ha ka minit kaba 72.Da katei ka jingjop ka Lajong ka don mynta ha ka kyrdan kaba san jong ka miej ïa kheiñ poiñ.
title: Kiew ka Shillong Lajong sha kyrdan ba san

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25: Ha ka sien ïakhun kaba lai ka kynhun phutbol jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka la ïoh ban khur ïa ka shi point ha ka jingïalehkai ka lympung 77th National Football Championship na bynta ka Santosh Trophy 2023-24 hadien ba ka la ïakhaid da mar kawei bad ka Kerala ha Itanagar hynne ka sngi.Na ka liang jong ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ban kyntiew ïalade sha ka kyrdan ba 5 na ka thup jong ka Group A naba rem ha ki ar sien ki jingïalehkai ba hashwa, katba na ka liang jong ka Kerala ka la ïoh ban khur mynta 4 point na ki 3 sien ïakhun bad ka shong ha ka kyrdan ba lai jong ka Group.Hashwa ba ka kynhun kan jam sha kane ka jingïalehkai, u Coach- Bah Khlain Pyrkhat Syiemlieh u la wanrah jingkylla ha katto katne ki bynta hadien ba rem ha ka Assam ha kine ki ar sngi ba ladep. U Siwel Rymbai u la mih bujli kum u rangapkol ha jaka u Lionel Rymmei, katba kiwei pat ki player kiba la bujli ki long u Damonlang Pathaw, Dawanplielad Myrchiang, Kitboklang Pale bad Nelson Rymbai. Kiba shong ben ki long u Lukas Syngkli, Baiaikara Swer, Chesterpaul Lyngdoh bad Shaiborlang Kharpan.Haba phai sha ka jingïakhun, ka Kerela ka la ïoh ban pynkhihjar nyngkong tang hadien saw minit ba la ïaid ka por lyngba u Naresh Bhagyanathan. Bad naduh kane ka por ka Meghalaya ka la ïakhun dohïap ban ïoh pynïakhaid, ïa kaba ka kynhun ka la lah ban pynurlong ha ka kylla miet.Ka jingtrei shitom jong ka Meghalaya ban thaw ïa ki lad da kumno ban ïoh pynkhihjar kam shym la long kaba sepei hadien ba u Sheen Sohktung u la lah ban pynurlong ïa ka jingangnud ka kynhun ban pynphai ïa katei ka shi kol ha ka 77 minit hadien ba u bak ka Kerela-u Sarath KP u la pynur ïa u Sheen ha phyllaw kol (box). Ka la don ka jingartatien shipor hadien ba u Azhar (rangapkol ka Kerela) u la ïoh ban da ïa ka bol da ka kti na ka penalty ba la shut da u Sheen hynrei u ne u rangïalehkai khmat ka Meghalaya u la pynkloi ïalade ban mareh sha ka bol bad thep ïa ka jlang shapoh kol ban pynïakhaid.Haduh kaba kut ym shym la don shuh ba lah ban pynkhihjar kaba la pynlong ïa kine ki ar kynhun ban ïasam mar shi point na ka kane jingïakhun.Ka Meghalaya kan ïakhun biang sa ha ka 28 tarik mynta u Rymphang bad ha katei ka sngi kan long pyrshah ïa ka Goa ha ka por 7 baje jan miet.
title: Santosh Trophy 2024: Khur ka Meghalaya ïa ka shi point naba ïakhaid bad ka Kerala

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25: Ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol jong ka Laitkor SC hynnin ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ka la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka Nongrim Hills da 4-1 kol ha ka jingïaknieh ïa ka burom jong ka lympung phutbol kyrdan 1st Division ba la pynïaid da ka Shillong Sports Association ha madan First Ground, Polo, ban khylliap syndon ïa ka aïom lehkai mynta u snem kum ka lahduh.Kumba ka paw naduh ba sdang ka Nongrim Hills ka la bteng ban bat hi dalade ïa ka kyrdan ba nyngkong ha ka miej kheiñ poiñ hynrei hadien ba ka la mad namrem ar sien lynter ka la pynlong ïa ka kynhun ban hiar sha ka kyrdan ba ar shadien ka Laitkor.Shuwa ban jam sha kane ka jingïakhun final, na ka liang jong ka Nongrim ka donkam satang ban pynïakhaid ïa ka jingïalehkai namar ha ka bun kol (goal difference) ka la tam lypa ïa ka Laitkor.Haba phai sha ka final, ka jingïakhun ka la long kaba itynnat bad kaba ïakhaid, bad haduh kaba kut ka 45 minit jong ka kylla step ym shym la don satia ba lah ban pynïakhlad ïa ka jingïakhaid.Dei hadien katto katne minit ba la ïaid ka kylla kaba ar ba ka Laitkor ka la sdang ban pynkhihjar lyngba u Evangel Kharkongor (49′ minit). Nangta ka kynhun ka la nang pynskhem shuh shuh ïa ka jingkyrmen ban rah namlahduh da kaba pynbud sa lai kol kiba la thep da u Sondy F Kharkongor (63′ minit), u Risuklang Malngiang (66′ minit) bad na u Ryngkat Yanni Ryngksai (79′ minit).Na ka liang jong ka Nongrim Hills ka la ïoh ban pynphai shi kol na u Justerwell Tham (79′ minit) hynrei ka por ka la lyngkot eh ïa ka kynhun ban pynphai haduh lai kol ban ïakhaid ha kaba ka la shah rem noh da 4-1 kol.Watla kata ruh, baroh ar kynhun kiba la wan kyrdan hakhmat jong ka miej ki la pynthikna ïalade ban shah kyntiew kyrdan sha ka lympung lehkai jong ka Shillong Premier League. Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka Umphyrnai SC bad ka Mawkhar SC, ki ar kynhun ba don shatraiduh jong ka miej, ki la shah pynhiar sha ka kyrdan Second Division ha ka samoi ban wan.Ka kynhun ba la ïohrah ïa ka namlahduh ka la ïohpdiang ïa ka song-tyngka kaba haduh 1 lakh katba ka kynhun ba wan kyrdan ba ar ka la ïohpdiang 50,000 tyngka.Haba phai sha ka Laitkor, la ar sien lynter ka la lah ban kyntiew kyrdan ïalade. Kumban shu pynkynmaw, kane ka kynhun ka la ïohrah ïa ka burom kum ka lahduh ha ka Second Division ha u snem 2022 bad ka la bteng ban rah sa ïa ka burom ha ka kyrdan ïakhun 1st Division. Kaba dangsah mynta ka long tang ïa ka SPL, ka ban dei ruh ka samoi ba nyngkong ïa kane ha kane ka lympung.Katba na ka liang jong ka Nongrim Hills, kan sa ïoh biang ban wanphai sha ka kyrdan ïakhun SPL – ka lympung ba ka kynhun ka la ïohrung teng ha u snem 2019 hynrei shah sloit noh tang hadien ba la kut ka samoi.
title: Rah nam lahduh ka Laitkor ha ka 1st Division ka SSA da kaba pynliem ïa ka Nongrim Hills

content: Man ba leit sha ki shnong kiba kham pajih na ka sor Shillong kawei kaba paw shai kdar ka long ka jingduna ki jaka pule khamtam na ka bynta ka Klas 11 bad 12. Wat haba don ki skul haduh Klas 10 ruh ki don bun ki jingduna. Don ki skul kiba ïoh jingsiew katto katne na ka sorkar khnang ban siew tulop ïa ki nonghikai. Don kiwei pat ha kiba ki nongpynïaid shnong ki hap khrong na man la ka dpei ïing ban ïoh siew tulop ïa ki nonghikai. Ynda ki khynnah pule ki la lah pyndep ïa ka Senir School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) lane ka matrik ki hap ban bteng ka jingpule jong ki sha sor Shillong lane ki hap ban ïaid kjat da ki phew mer ban poi sha ka skul Higher Secondary (10+2) kaba jan tam. Bun ki kmie ki kpa kim kot bor ban phah pule ïa ki khun jong ki sha sor Shillong namar ba hap ban wai ïing sa bad kiwei ki jinglut jingsep. Te haba kumta shu kut noh ha kaba pep skul shiteng samoi. Kito kiba na ka ïing ka sem kaba kham biang ki phah pule ïa ki khun jong ki sha Shillong. Kiwei pat ki shu kut noh ka jingpule.Dei namar ban ai jinghikai ïa kiba pep skul shiteng por ba ka sorkar kmie ka pynmih ïa ka polisi trei kam ha ka liang ka pule puthi ïa kane la khot ka New Education Policy (NEP) lane ka rukom pyrkhat thymmai ha ka rukom ai jinghikai ha ki skul, kolej bad skul bah (university). Ka jingthmu jong ka NEP ka long ba lada ki don ki khynnah kiba na kano kano ka daw ki hap ban pep skul noh namar kim lah ban pyndep ïa ka jingpule jong ki, te kin ïoh noh da ka jinghikai kumno ban trei ïa kiwei pat ki jait kam. ïa kane la khot ka skill education lane ka vocational education kaba mut ka jingai jinghikai ban trei da ka kano kano ka kam kaba u lane ka khynnah ki don ka sap trei.Katkum ki khubor kiba mih na ka por sha ka por la kdew ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka long kaba sah dien tam napdeng ki para jylla shatei lam mihngi ha ka jingpule puthi. Ngi ïa ryngkat bad ka Bihar – ka jylla kaba naduh kham mynshuwa ka long kaba shadien bha ha kiba bun ki jingthew. Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ngi la ïohsngew ruh ba ka don ka report kaba ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka long kawei na ki jylla kiba duk tam ha ka ri India. Kaba sngew diaw ka long ba ïa kine ki report ym don ba rah jingkylli ha ka dorbar thaw-aiñ. Ki MLA na ka liang pyrshah ki lah dei ban kylli balei ka jylla ka hiar haduh katne ha kine ki khyndiat snem mynta. Kat kiei kiei ki jingtei ngi ïohi tang ha sor Shillong lane ha ki sorbah distrik (district headquarters). Tang shu la ïaid kham pajih na kitei ki jaka ngi shem ia ki jingeh har rukom.Ka jingeh kaba hakhmat eh mynta ki long ha ka liang ka pule-puthi bad ka jingpep skul shiteng por ki khynnah (drop out). Kane ka la nang kiew katba nang ïaid ki snem. Haba ki khynnah samla rit bad kiba lah kam heh ruh ki pep skul noh namar ba ym lah kyrshan shuh na ïing ka jingkylli ka long – hato ka sorkar ka sngewkhia ïa kane? Hato u/ka MLA ki sngewkhia jingmut ne em ban ïohi ba ki khynnah ha ka jaka ba kin don ha skul ki hap leit ap blang, ap masi pynban? Kane ka dei ka juk stad kaba tyllun stet bha. Hato kine ki heprit kiba pli kiba lah pep skul noh tang shiteng por kin lah hi mo ban ïabeh lem bad kiwei pat kiba ïoh lad ban pyndep ïa ka jingpule jong ki?Kawei ka apot kaba wan hap khamtam ïa ki khun kynthei samla jongngi ka dei kata ka jingïoh khun khynnah (teenage pregnancy) ïa kaba ki stad kot ki batai ba ka long kawei na ki daw jong ka jingduk tasam ha kane ka jylla jongngi. Bunsien kine ki samla rit kiba dang 14-15 snem ka rta ngi ïohi ba ki la bah khun ha ka jaka ba kin dang bteng ïa ka jingpule jong ki. Kat ban dap 20 snem ka rta ki la ïoh 4 lane 5 ngut ki khun bad bunsien u tnga uba ki ïashong dang kham khynnah u lah ïehnoh ïa ki. Bun na kine ki longkmie khynnah ki hap ha ka apot ha kaba ki ïoh lok biang sa da uwei bad ki khun ki ïoh kpa-nah. Kane ka wanrah shibun bah ka kynrum kynram ha ki longïing longsem. Bad ka jingduk ka nang ban namar ka jingïoh kaba duna bad ka jinglut ha ka ban pynheh pynsan ïa ki khun pat kaba khia.Bunsien ha ka imlang sahlang jongngi ngi ïa pynshlur ïa ki kynthei ba kin kha khun shibun ngut bad ngi da ong ruh ba uwei pa uwei u khun lane ka khun kin wanrah la ujong u khaw. Kine ki jingkren kim ïahap shuh mynta ha kane ka juk ha kaba nalor ka bam ka dih ba dei ban pynbiang ïa ki khun ba kha, kaba kham kongsan ka long ban tei ïa ka lawei jong kine ki hep rit da kaba ngi ai ïa ki ka jingtei jong ka jabieng lyngba ka pule puthi. Ka jingpule ka dei ka spah bah ha kane ka juk namar ka ïarap ïangi ban sngewthuh ïa ka eh ka shon bad kumno ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa kane. Kane ka dei ka juk “technology” lane kaba trei kam da ki mashin bad ki kor kiba har rukom bad ruh ka juk komputor. Khlem kine wat ka rep ka riang ruh kam seisoh namar ym lah ban pynïaid ïew ïa ki jingmih na lyngkha.Dei hangne keiñ ba ka jingpule ka long kaei kaei kaba kongsan tam. Bad dei hangne ba ki nongjied MLA ki dei ban kylli na u/ka MLA ba ki la leh aiu ban wanrah ïa ka pule puthi kham jan sha ki shnong khnang ba yn ym don shuh kiba sahdien (no one should be left behind) ïa kiba ka United Nations lane ka sorkar kaba la thaw da ki ri ka pyrthei baroh ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ki briew kylleng sawdong ka peit pyrman bha. ïa kita ki jingthew ïa ka longbriew manbriew lyngba la khot ki Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) lane ki thong kiba ki sorkar jong ki ri ka pyrthei baroh ki dei ban buddien khnang ban lah ban ïai don ha kane ka pyrthei khlem da pynjot pynjulor ïa ka. Kawei na kine ki 17 tylli ki thong ka long ban ai ïa ki lad jingpule ïa baroh. Sngewsih ban ong ba ki MLA jongngi kim salia bad kim shim khia ïa kane ka thong kaba hakhmat tam. Bunsien ki kham kloi ban wad tang ïa ki kam pynroi kum ka ban shna surok lane ban pynpoi um ha ki shnong khnang ba kin ïoh ai kontrak ïa kita ki nongkyrshan jong ki.Haduh mynta ym don u MLA uba shim khia ban wanrah ïa ki skul khamtam ha ki nongkyndong. Imat ki sheptieng ïoh ki nang ki stad noh ki khynnah bad samla bad ki buh ïa ki jingkylli hakhmat jong ki. Ka jingbym lah jongngi ban buh jingkylli na u MLA bad ban kheiñ ïa ki kum ki kynja syiem ba dei ban shu ai burom man ka por ka la pynjot ïa ka synshar khadar ha kane ka jylla bad ka la pynsah dien bad pynsah duk ïangi khamtam ha ki nongkyndong. Lano keiñ ngin ïa kyndit thiah?
title: Balei ki MLA kim shim khia ïa ka pule puthi ha ka jylla?

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25: Ka jingïakop siat Khnam kaba dei kawei na ki bynta jong ka Khelo India University Games (KIUG) 2023 kaba la sdang naduh 20 tarik mynta u Rymphang ha nongbah Shillong la pynkut noh hynnin ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ha kaba ïa ka namlahduh la ïohrah da ka Lovely Professional University Punjab ha baroh ki liang jong ki Kynthei & Shynrang.Ha katei ka sngi pynkut ïa ka ïakop siat khnam la ïadonryngkatlang ka Kong Matsiewdor War Nongbri-President jong ka Archery Association of Meghalaya, nangta u Rama Shankar Ram General Manager BSNL Meghalaya, u Raj Kumar Giridhari Singh Finance Officer NEHU lem bad kiwei kiwei kiba la ïoh bynta ban sam khusnam sha ki nongjop.Kane ka jingïalehkai kaba la bteng saw sngi lynti ka long ka jingsah jingkynmaw ïa ki nongïakop siat khnam kiba la wan na ki thaiñ bapher bapher. Ka jingïakop ka la ïaid beit ïaid ryntih watla ki la don ki sngi ba theh u slap hynrei kam shym la pynthut satia ïa ka jingïalehkai ban ïaid shakhmat.Ha ka 23 tarik u Rymphang la pynlong ïa ka final na bynta ka thup ïakop jong ka Compound Men Individual ha kaba u Chirag Vidyarthi jong ka Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya u la ïoh ban khur ïa ka takma ksiar, katba u Adiya Dnyandev Gadadhe na ka Savitribai Phule Pune University MS u la khur ïa ka Rupa bad u Harpreet Singh Maan na ka Chandigarh University u la jop takma Rnong. Ha ka Compound Women Individual ka Mahel Pathan na ka Savitribai Phule Pune University MS ka la jop takma Ksiar, nangta bud sa ka Sunainadevi na ka Lovely Professional University Punjab kaba jop takma Rupa, bad ka B Manasa Nayana na ka Lovely Professional University ka la khur Rnong.Ha ka Compound Mix Team, ka Savitribai Phule Pune University ba la mihkhmat da u Parth Sunil Korde bad ka Mahek Pathan ki la jop takma Ksiar, ka Lovely Professional University Punjab ba la mihkhmat da u Vikas bad Sunainadevi ki la jop Rupa, bad ka Guru Nanak Dev University Amritsar ba la mihkhmat da u Sangarsh Dev Singh & Kiran ki la jop takma Rnong.Ha ka Compound Women team, ka Lovely Professional University ba la mihkhmat da ka Sunainadevi, B Manasa Nayana, Krati Swami, bad Khushboo ki la jop takma Ksiar, katba ka Guru Nanak Dev University ba la mihkhmat da ka Kiran, Somanshi , Medatwal, Khusi Sharma bad ka Anjali ki la jop Rupa. Ka Savitribai Phule Pune University ba la mihkhmat da ka Mahek Pathan, Vaishnave evishwambhar Ubale, Hrutuja Vinay Gate bad Divya Sampat Gavhane ki la jop takma Rnong.Ha ka Compound Men team, na ka Lovely Professional University la mihkhmat da u Vikas, Deepak Kumar, Vishesh Vaidwan bad Deepak ki la jop takma Ksiar, katba ka Guru Nanak dev University Amritsar ba la mihkhmat da u Sangarsh, dev Singh, Hirtik Sharma, Amit Thakur bad Mohd Shavej ki la khur Rupa, bad ka Savitribai Phule Pune University ba la mihkhmat da u Parth Sunil Korde, Aditya Dnyandev Gadadhe, Soumitro Satyabhataghosh bad Anuj Sanjay Patil ki la khur Rnong.Hynning ka Sngi Saitjaiñ (24 tarik Rymphang) la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka final jong ka Recurve Men individual, ha kaba ka Punjab University Patiala ba la mihkhmat da u Pawab ka la jop ksiar, u Mrinal Chauhan na ka Lovely Professional University Punjab u la jop Rupa bad u Jaswinder Singh na ka Punjab University Patiala u la jop takma Rnong.Ha ka Recurve women Individual, ka takma ksiar la khur da ka Somya Negi jong ka Lovely Professional University Punjab, ka Hemchandracharya North University Gujarat ba la mihkhmat da ka Bhagaviben Vargishkumar ka la jop Rupa bad ka Ranchi University Jharkhand ba la mihkhmat da ka Sabitri Kumari ka la khur Rnong. Ha ka Recurve Mix team, ka Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya ba la mihkhmat da u Amit Kumar & Kratika Bichpuriya ki la jop Ksiar, ka Kurukshetra University Haryana ba la mihkhmat da u Shivam Kumar & Ridhi ki la jop Rupa, nangta ka Maharaja Ganga Singh University ba la mihkhmat da u Anuj Bhambhu & Pariksha ki la jop Rnong.Ha ka Recurve Men team ka Lovely Professional University, Punjab ba la mihkhmat da u Mrinal Chauhan, Aditya Chaudhary, Santosh Dutta bad Jashandeep ki la jop takma ksiar. Ka Punjab University Patiala ba la mihkhmat da u Jaswinder Singh, Robin , Pawan, bad Daleep Bregar ki la jop Rupa bad ka Savitribai Phule Pune University MS ba la mihkhmat da u Kunal Vinayak Pawar, Ritesh Narendra Deshmukh, Lakhan Rajendra Bhoi, bad Om Bhupal Vinchu ki la jop Rnong.Ha ka Recurve Women Team ka Guru Jambheshwar University of Sci and Tech Hisar ba la mihkhmat daka Avani, Ravina, Preeti, Dikshu ki la jop Ksiar, ka Lovely Professional University Punjab ba la mihkhmat da ka Tisha Punia, Dikshanayak, Somya Negi bad Veerpal Kaur ki la jop Rupa, ka Punjab University of Patiala mihkhmat da ka Harpreet Kaur, Tanishaverma, Gurmeharkaurgrewal, bad Shweta Singh ki la khur Rnong.
title: Lahduh ka Lovely Professional University ha ka ïakop siat-khnam jong ka KIUG

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25 : U Myntri Rangbah Duh, Narendra Modi ryngkat bad ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka jylla, Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka sngi U Blei ki la plie paidbah ia ki kali ban test ia ki marbam ba la tip kum ki Mobile Food Testing Laboratory, (FSW) ha State Central Library, Shillong.Ia kine ki kali u Myntri Rangbahduh u la plie lyngba ki kor ka juk stad mynta na ka jingialang kaba long ha Rajkot, GujaratKine ar tylli ki lad jong ka Food Safety Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) ban test ia ki mar bam ki dei kiba tip kum ka Food Safety on Wheel (FSW).Kane ka dei ruh ka sienjam ban pynthikna ia ka jingshngain ki mar bam ha baroh ki jaka.Katkum ka kyrwoh la ong ba kine ki FSW kiba la pynbiang lut ki jingai jingshakri bad kiba don ki nongtrei kiba la tbit ha ka kam, kin kyntiew ia ki lad leh test bad kin ai jinghikai ruh shaphang ia ki rukom kiba kyntiew ia ka jingshngain ha ki mar bam.Kin pynsaphriang jingtip ha ki paidbah da kaba poi sha ki jaka ba kyndong tam jong ka jylla.Ka jingwanrah ia kine ki ar 2 tylli ki FSW ha Meghalaya ka wan ruh ha ryngkat ka projek kaba kot sha ka 0.95 klur. La don lang ruh ha kane ka sngi naduh u Commissioner, Food Safety, Meghalaya Dr Joram Beda bad ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District, R.M Kurbah, bad kiwei kiwei ki la iashim bynta ha kane ka prokram.
title: Ryngkat bad u PM Modi plie ka Myntri ïa ki kali ban test mar bam

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25 : Ka KSU Mawthadraishan lyngba ka Education Cell ka la kitbok ïa baroh ki samla pule kiban ïakhun ïa ki eksam bapher bapher kynthup naduh ka SSLC bad HSSLC kaban long ha u Lber, 2024.Ka Seng ha ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u samla Spehsylli Thabah, Education Secretary, la ong, “Lyngba ka jingtrei minot jong phi, kan long ka pansngiat ïa ki kmie ki kpa kiba la trei shitom ban ai ka lawei ba phyrnai ïaphi baroh.”
title: Kitbok ka KSU ïa ki samla pule

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 25: Ka jingmlien kaba sinew ban thang bad wiang ding ïa ki lum bad ki khlaw ki btap ka ktah ïa ka mariang, ki sawdong sawkun, ki mrad ki mreng, ki jingthaw kiba im bad ha kajuh ka por ka pynjakhlia ruh ïa ka lyer, ka buh jingma ruh ïa ka jingim jong ki briew, ki mar ki mata, ki jingri jingdup bad la lap khah khah ba ki briew ki mlien bha ban wiang ding ïa ki lum bad ki khlaw ki btap kiba don hapoh West Khasi Hills District kum ka Mawlangkhar, Mawpun. Nongkhnum bad kiwei pat ki jaka.Kumta, khnang ban teh lakam ïa kane ka jingmlien kaba sinew bad ban ïada ïa ka mariang, u District Magistrate West Khasi Hills District Nongstoiñ, Bah. Garod L.S.N. Dykes, IAS, hapoh ka kyndon144 CrPC, u la pynmih ïa ka hum ban mana bad khang pyrshah ïa ka jingwiang ding ïa ki lum bad thang ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ki jaka rep ki jaka riang, ki park bad kiwei kiwei de ki jaka kiba don hapoh West Khasi Hills District.Kane ka hukum kan treikam beit kumne tat ynda la pynbna da kumwei pat. Lada lap ïa kiba ïaleh pyrshah ïa kane ka hukum kin sa shah pynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: Pynjari 144 Crpc u DC ba jur palat ka jingthang ïa ki khlaw

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25 : U MDC ka BJP na Tura, u Bernard N Marak u la kyntu ïa u Myntri ka tnad PHE u Marcuise N Marak ban peit halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Jal Jeevan Mission ha rilum Garo kynthup ïa ki shnong kiba hap ha ka constituency jong u Myntri.Ha ka shithi sha u Myntri, u Bernard u la ong ba ki shnong ha rilum Garo ki la mad bun ki jingeh ban ïoh ïa ka umbam umdih kaba biang kaba long ka jingdonkam kaba kongsan tam na bynta ki paidbah.U ong ruh ba ka JJM kadei ban pynbiang ïa ka umbam umdih kaba biang sha baroh ki longïing hynrei u la kynnoh pat ba bun na ki kam jong ka JJM la ieh shiteng ha kiba bun ki shnong namar ka kam ba trei da ki kontraktor kam long satia nalor ba don ïa ki top bad ki pipe ki bym treikam.“Kane ka long kum ka jyrsieh kaba da ki klur tyngka ba la mang da ka sorkar pdeng kum ka skim da ka thong ban pynpoi umbam umdih kaba biang sha baroh ki longïing,” u la kynnoh.U MDC u la ong ruh ba la dep ai da ka RTI sha baroh ki distrik lyngba ki Deputy Commissioner da kaba kyntu ïa u Myntri ba un bthah ïa ka tnad PHE ba kan ai ki jingtip kiba bniah khnang ba kan don ka jingtreikam kaba khuid bad kaba shai ka bym don ka jingleh thok.U ong ruh ba ki shnong kin sa phah ïa ki jingujor sha ki SDO/Executive Engineer kaba ïadei bad kane nalor ba kin sa phah ruh sha u kum u Myntri ban tuklar lang.La kynnoh ruh ba ha kiba bun ki shnong la shu pynbor ban soi kyrteng ba la dep ïa ka kam ha kaba ym baroh ki longïing ki la ïoh ïa ka um.“Ki longïing ki khlem ïoh ïa ka um kaba kylla long pynban ka jyrsieh ha jaka ka skim. Kumta, lah ban pynkut ba ka don ka jingpyrshang ban pynduh noh ïa ka thong kaba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka Ri u Narendra Modi u thrang ban pynpoi umbam umdih sha baroh ki longïing,” ong u MDC.
title: Kyntu u MDC ka BJP ïa u Myntri PHE ban peit ïa jingpyntrei ïa ka JJM ha rilum Garo

content: Jowai, Rymphang 25: Ka All Garo Cook Cum Helpers Association hapoh ka jingïalam jong ka Jakme Sangma kum ka President bad u Maltin Momin kum u General Secretary kila wan shakhmat ban ïa snohkti bad ban kyrshan ïa ka Union of Cook Cum Helper PM Poshan Meghalaya Shillong bad ban kyrshan ïaki jingdawa ne kyrpad jong ka sha ka Sorkar pdeng ïa ki jingeh jong ki Nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul kiba don ha Jylla Meghalaya bad ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi jong ka Ri India.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ka 23 u bnai rymphang jong une u snem 2024 kaba la long ha ka Sorbah William Nagar kaba dei ka Head Quarters jong ka East Garo Hills Districts, ha kane ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u Paul D Sangma.La ïa donlang ki Cook kiba Marjan bad ka William Nagar ha kane ka jingïalang ki Cook ki ïa don kumba 600 ngut eiei bad napdeng kine kumba 360 ngut tam ki dei ki nongkitkam bad ki nongïalam jong ki tnat treikam baroh ki District jong ka Ri-Lum Garo kila wan ïashim bynta da ka jingshitrhem.Ha ka jingïadonlang ki nongkitkam jong ka UCCH PM Poshan Meghalaya Shillong kila wan naduh u Adviser ma K. L. Pariat bad ka President kong Banalis Syiem, Assistant Secretary bah Charles Shongwan bad kiwei de ki nongkitkam ba ha khmat jong ka central body.La ïoh ka jingkren na i President kong Banalis Syiem kum ban pynsngew ïa ki Cook baroh kiba don ha ki thaiñ Garo ba kin ïa tylli lang kawei kum ki nongshong shnong jong ka Jylla Meghalaya hi ban wan sha khmat ban kyrpad ïa ka sorkar ban pynurlong ïa ki jingangnud jong ki Cook baroh shi katta.La ai ruh ka jingkren na u Adiver uba la pynsngewthuh halor ki mat ba ka UCCH PM Poshan kala wan sha khmat ban kyrpad na ka sorkar ïa ka ban pynkiew ïa ka Honorarium, ka Meternity leave, ban ïoh ïa ka bainong na ka bynta 12 ha ka shi snem, ba don ïa ki tyngdong LPG ha manla ki karma shetja PM Poshan bad ula pynsngew ïa ki kam kiba ka Union kala trei baroh shi katta.
title: Kyrshan ki nongshet ja sngi na Garo ïa ka UCCHPMPM

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25 : Ka NEIGRIHMS ryngkat bad ka Zublee Foundation, & North Eastern Development Finance Corporation (NEDFi) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ki la pynhap pyrda noh ïa ka Workshop halor ka phang ‘Deceased Organ Donation’ ne ka jingnoh synñiang ïa ki dkhot met ynda iap.Ha katei ka Workshop kaba ar sngi la wan ban ïashim bynta da palat 200 ngut ki nongïashim bynta kiba kynthup ïa ki bor pynïaid hospital, ki doctor, ki Nurse bad ki nongtrei jong ka NEIGRIHMS ban pynsngewthuh bad ban ai jingtip ïa ki shaphang jong ka jingsynñiang ïa ki dkhot met ynda la iap (Deceased Organ Donation) bad ka jingpyn bujli dkhot met (Transplantation).Ka jingseisoh jong kane ka prokram ka dei lyngba ka jingïatreilang jong u Prof. Ranendra Hajong, Department of General Surgery, NEIGRIHMS bad u Nodal Officer, SOTTO Meghalaya bad ka Priyanka Borah, CEO jongka Zublee Foundation bad ka kynhun ka jong ki.U Prof. (Dr) C. Daniala, Medical Superintendent, NEIGRIHMS, ula ong, “Ka NEIGRIHMS ka ïeng skhem ban pynurlong shisha ïa ka jingnoh synñiang ïa ki dkhot jong ka met na ka bynta kito kiba donkam bha. Ngi ngeit ba kane ka sienjam ka don ïa ka lad ban ïada ïa ka jingim jong kiwei pat ha ki snem ban wan”.Katba u Prof. Nalin Mehta, Director ka NEIGRIHMS, ula ong, “Kane ka workshop ka la long ka rynsan kaba biang bha ïa kiba don bynta ha ka ban ai jingsumar, ki samla pule bad ïa ki nongtrei ban ïoh ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah bad ban shim khia ïa kino kino ki bynta kiba ïadei bad ka jingnoh synñiang ïa ki dkhot met ki jong ki”.“Nga ngeit ba kane ka sienjam kan ïarap shibun ha ka ban pynsngewthuh bad ban pynshlur ban don ïa ka jingïakren ban noh synñiang ïa ki dkhot met hapoh ka imlang sahlang jong ngi. Khamtam eh ha Meghalaya, ha kaba ka jingpynsgewthuh paidbah ïa ka jingnoh synñiang ïa ki dkhot met ka long kaba dang duna bha bad kum kine ki workshop ki long kiba kongsan ban ai jingtip bad ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah bad ban weng ïa ka jingbym ngeit ka jongki bad ïa ki jingsngewthuh bakla hynrei ban pynshlur ïa ki paidbah ba ka jingnoh synñiang ka jongki kan long pat ka jingïada ïa ka jingim jong kiwei pat” ula bynrap.
title: ïamir ka NEIGRIHMS ban pynshlur ïa ki paidbah ban synniang ïa ki dkhot met ynda la iap

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 25: Ka jingpynkylla jong ka tnad ka pule puthi ïa ki kot pule jong ki khynnah skul, ka la ktah jur ïa ki kmie ki kpa ba kin leit ban wad kot na ki dukan. Namar bun kim ju ïoh ha ki por kiba dei biang bad bunsien la shu phai thylli namar ka jingbym ïoh.Ki katto katne ngut ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah, ki la pynpaw ba ki da syllang ban wad kot na ka bynta ki khun wat haba ki ju leit man la ka sngi ruh, khamtam kiba wan na ki shnong nyngkyndong lei lei ki la ud la nam, namar kim lah ban wan man ka sngi na ka daw ka jingbym don kali. Pynban wat haba ki ïoh ïa ka lad ban wan khnang man ka sngi ïew phewse ki ïoh tang wei ne ar tylli bad don ruh ki por kiba ki hap ban phai thylli.Shuwa ban pynkylla ha ka jingshisha lah dei ban pynbiang lupa ong ka kong M.Marshillong kaba la wan khnang naduh ka shnong Riangpoit kawei na ki shnong kaba na ka thaiñ Maweit ka shnong kaba ju don kali tang ha ki sngi ïew.Uwei u rangbah u la ïathuh ba ki don ki nonghikai kiba pynshitom ïa ki khynnah skul lada kim rah ïa ki kot, hynrei haba ki kot kim don ha ki dukan ïew balei ki nonghikai ki pynshitom ïa ki khun.U Bah S.Marweiñ u ba ju die kot skul la kumba 20 snem ei ei, u la ong ka daw bym ïoh kot ka long naduh ka kudam na sor Shillong. Kane ka ktah shisha ïa ki kmie ki kpa bad ïa ki khynnah skul, don ki por la ïoh tang 100 tylli bad tang shiphang lah lut.
title: Trud khlieh ki kmie ki kpa ba pynkylla kot skul

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 25: Kiba bun ki nongshong shnong ha ki nongkyndong haduh kine ki sngi ki kyshan ïa ki ïing ki sem da kaba rep ba riang, ri jingri kum ki syiar, ki sñiang, ki blang, ki masi bad kiwei. Na ki kam ri jingri, ki syiar Khasi ki dei ki jingri kiba kawei pa kawei ka longïing ha ki nongkyndong ka don beit bad ki dei ruh ki jingri kiba suk tam bad ki bym da donkam eh ban sharai kum ïa ki masi, ki blang.Ha kine ki sngi pat ka jingri syiar Khasi ha ki nongkyndong kam long shuh kaba shngaiñ, namar ka jingkynrei ka jingpang khlam kaba la sar naphang ïa ki syiar ha kaba da ki hajar ki syiar ha ki shnong bap her bap her ki la ïap lut khoit.Ka kong P.Syiem na ka shnong Mawïawet, ka la ong ba ha ka shi snem ka ju kamai palat phew hajar tang na kaba die syiar bad mynta u snem ka jingwan lynshop ka khlam kaba la sdang ha ka taïew ba nyngkong jong une u bnai Rymphang, ka la sar lut plaiñ ha kaba palat shispah tylli ki syiar bad ba lah heh bad kiba dang rit ki la ïap lut khoit.Katei ka long kmie ka la ong ruh ba katei ka khlam ka la sdang nyngkong na ki ïing kiba marjan bad haba ka la ithuh ba ki syiar ki la sdang kem shitom, ka la pyrshang ban ai dawai hynrei kam ïarap satia bad haduh kine ki sngi ym don shuh wat tang iwei ruh.Ka la ong ruh ba ki don hynriew tylli ki ïing jong ki paramarjan kiba ri da ki spah tylli ki syiar. Hynrei ka jingwan jong ka khlam ka la bam duh hi plaiñ ïa ki syiar jong baroh hynriew tylli ki longïing. Haba phai ha ka jingpang khlam jong ki syiar la ju lap ba shisien ba la kem pang uwei u syiar napoh ka sem, ym ju kham don koit kiba dang lait na ka jingïap wat lada ki don da ki hajar ruh.Ha kaba ïadei bad katei ka jingpang khlam jong ki syiar Khasi haduh mynta ym pat lap ïa ka tynrai na kaei ka daw ba ki syiar Khasi ki ïoh jingpang khlam. Wat na ka liang ki tnad treikam jong ka sorkar kaba dei peit ïa ka kam ri jingri, kam pat lah ban pynshai da kano ka lad lah ban ïada ïa ka jingpang khlam jong ki syiar Khasi.Kumba ka long hi ka tnad ba dei peit ïa ka kam ri jingri ka tip bad shimkhia tang ïa kito ki nongri syiar khlem kpa (broiler) bad (curoiler), namar ki nongri ïa kito ki jait syiar ki hap ban leit thied symbai na ki Agent kiba la ïadon bynta bad pynïadei bad ki Farm jong ka sorkar, hynrei ïa ki nongri syiar Khasi (Local chicken) pat haduh mynta ka sorkar kam pat ithuh ba ki dei ki nongri jingri.Nalor kata kam don jingïapher ei ei ruh ba ïa ki nongri masi khuti kiba ri da ki spah tylli ki masi, ka tnad sorkar ba peit ïa ka kam ri jingri kam ithuh satia.Hynrei ïa ki nongri masi khem dud kiba ki na ka skhim Sorkar wat lada ri tang uwei ruh, ka Sorkar ka la ithuh kum u nongri masi. Lada kan long kumne ïa kito ki nongri syiar curoiler ne broiler hapoh shnong, ym dei shuh ban dang ailad hynrei ki dei ban wad da ki jaka kiba jngai bah na ki shnong ki thaw.
title: Syllad ka jingïap khlam ki syiar ha WKH, duhnong ki nongri jingri ha nongkyndong

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25 : Ka A.Chik Holistic Awakening Movement (AHAM) ka la ai ka jingujor pyrshah sha ka Deputy Commissioner (DC) jongka East Khasi Hills ka kong R.M Kurbah halor ka jingkhaïi beaiñ ba jur ïa u mawshun sha Bangladesh lyngba ka Bholaganj, Majai East Khasi Hills.Lyngba kane ka jingujor ka AHAM ka pyntip ruh ba ym tang ba khaïi beaiñ ïa u mawshun hynrei la pynkheiñ ruh im im peit peit ïa ki kyndon aiñ khamtam ha ka jngkit palat pud ïa u mawshun.La ïathuh na kal iang ka Directorate of Mineral Resources (DMR) ka la shah ban kit tang 12 ton katba ki bor synshar shnong, Syiem, Myntri jongka Hima Sohra ki la shah ban kit ki trok haduh 25-26 ton.Nalor kane la pynpaw ruh ba ka khajna ba la lum ka long bun bun shah ïa ka khajna ba la buh da ka sorkar, ka sorkar ka buh 200 tyngka shiton katba ki khyrdop lum khajna bad ki weighbridge ki lum haduh 17,000 shiton kaba long pyrshah ïa ka hukum jongka sorkar.Kumta na ka liang ka AHAM kum ka jingpyrshah jur halor kine ki kam beaiñ ka dawa ba ki bor ba dei peit ki dei ban pynsangeh noh shisyndon ïa kine ki jingkhaïi beaiñ ïa u mawshun sha Bangladesh bad dawa ruh ba ka DC ka dei ban shim khia kyrkieh ïa kane ka kam.U Lobius Arengh President ka AHAM East Khasi Hills Zone bad u Crownbetter T Sangma President ka South West Khasi Hills Zone ki pynrem jur ïa kane ka kam beaiñ bad kyntu jur ïa ka DC ban leh da kaba tyngeh ïa kiba donkti ha kane ka kam beaiñ.Na ka liang ka AHAM ka la phah kopi ruh ïa kane ka jingujor sha ka ophis DMR, SDO Sohra ban leh ïa kane donkam.
title: Ujor ka AHAM sha ka DC EKH ba jur ka jingkhaïi beaiñ ïa u Mawshun sha Bangladesh

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 24 : Uwei u rangbah briew u ba la tip kyrteng kum u Dominik Marweiñ u ba shongkha ha ka shnong Proiñ ha ki thaiñ jong ka Mawshynrut Block, la ong ba u la kam ïalade kum u ba lah ban pynïoh kam sorkar ïa u bah Sunday Rimait da kaba u la shim ruh ïa ka pisa haduh 20 hajar tyngka.Haba ïadei bad katei ka jingjia, u bah Sunday u la leit ban ujor sha ka seng HNYM bad ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u bah Tailan Lyngkhoi President HNYM West Khasi Hills District, ka la leit mar mar ban wad ïa utei u briew ha ïing sah jong u bad la ïoh ban kem ïa utei u briew.Mar ia poi ka seng utei u bah Dominik u la sdang ban kren kyllaiñ, hynrei tang hadien katto katne por utei u briew u la pyndem tdong bad u la phla noh ïa ka jingshisha ba u la shim ïa ka pisa na u bah Sunday.U la kular ruh ban siew noh hapoh ka shitaïew da kaba ïa kular ruh lyngba ki jingïathoh soskular bad u la soi ruh ïa la ka kyrteng ban pynshisha ha khmat jong ka seng HNYM West Khasi Hills.Ka seng ka la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah ba kin long kiba husiar na ki briew kiba kular ïa kiei kiei bad ban shu ngeit khlem da wad bniah la ka long ne em kaba shisha.
title: Kem ka HNYM ïa u rangbah na Mawshynrutba kular thok ban pynïoh kam Sorkar

content: Khliehriat, Rymphang, 25: Ki thylliej ding barhem ki la bamduh ïa ka ïingsah jong ka Kong Ribiang Phawa ha ka shnong Tuberkmaishnong, East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi u Blei.Watla kane ka ïing ka la pluh ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje mynstep hynrei donbok ba ym shym la don ba mynsaw.“Baroh ki jingdon jingem hapoh ka ïing ki la kylla dpei lut namar ka jingklang jong ki thylliej ding bad bam duh ploiñ ïa ka ïing ka sem bad ki jingdon jingem baroh kiba don hapoh ïing,” la ïathuh u Waheh Shnong ka Tuberkmaishnong Bah Miki Lyngdoh.“Ka ding ka la sdang ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje mynstep hynrei ym shym la don kano kano ka jingjia basngewsih ha kane ka jingpluh ïing hynrei tang ka jingduh noh ïa ki tiar kiba don hapoh ïing,” ula ong.Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Tuberkmaishnong khot bad wer ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong ba kin mih shakhmat ban ïarap lem ïa kane ka longiing jong ka Kong Ribiang Phawa kaba la ngat ha kane ka apot pluh ïing.Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia mar mar ki dkhot ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President Bah Streamly S. Suchen bad u Finance Secretary Bah Shaniahskhem S.Dkhar ki la leit ban ai jingïarap ïa ka longïing jong ka Kong Ribiang PhawaKa KSU ka la kyrpad ruh ïa ki paidbah lane ki riewshimet ba kin don ïa ka mynsiem ban ïarap ïa kiba ngat ha ki jingjia bapher bapher da kaba wan shakhmat ban ïarap lem ïa ki.
title: Bamduh ka ding ïa ka ïing ha Tuberkmaishnong

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 25: Kawei ka Auto Truck bad ka JCB ba pynieng ha phyllaw ïing ki la jan ingkhong ha ka ding, kaba dei hadien ba ki runar ki la leit ban kawang da u Petrol Bom bad ha kane ka jingjia donbok noh ba la lap kloi noh da ki trai ing kiba la pynlip kloi noh ïa ka ding da kaba theh um mardor ban lait ka jingpluh jong katei ka Auto Truck bad ka JCB.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia mynta ka step ha ka por 1.20 mynstep, ha kaba la ong ba ki runar kiba ym lah ban tip ne ithuh dur khmat ki la wan ban kawang da u Petrol bom ha katei ka jaka ba la pynieng ïa ka Auto Truck bad ka JCB, ba hap ha ka phyllaw ïing jong u Bah Lovercuf Nongshli ha ka Shnong Umsning Patarim ba hap ha ka Umsning Police Outpost ha Ri Bhoi District.Kumba la ïoh lum jingtipla ong ruh ba katei ka Auto Truck kaba don ïa u number ML 10 A – 4205 ka dei jong uwei u bar jylla ba la tip kyrteng kum u Horander Prasad, ha kaba u ju pyndonkam ban kit ïa ki mar, hynrei ki runar ki la wan ban kawang da u petrol bom ba la ïoh ban pynlip kloi noh ïa ka ding khlem da don kano ka jingjia ba snewsih.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki pulit ka Ri Bhoi tang mar ïa ïoh jingtip ki la hiar mardor sha katei ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ha ka jingtohkit la lap ba ym don kano kano ka jingjia ba sgewsih lait noh ka jingjulor ba malu mala katei ka Auto Truck.Ban lap dien ïa ki runar kiba don kti ha kane ka kam ban kawang petrol bom, na ka liang ki bor pulit ka Ri Bhoi ki la pyntip ruh ba ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba jur ban lap ksai ïa ki runar kiba don kti ha kane ka kam beaiñ bad ki runar kiba don kti ha kane ka kam lada lap kin nym lait na ki kyndon jong ka aiñ, ong u heh pulit ka Ri Bhoi.
title: Kawang petrol bom ki runar ha ka jaka pynïeng kali ka longïing ha Umsning Patarim

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang 25: Ki nongïalam ba hakhmat bad ki nongkyrshan jong ka Indian National Congress (INC) hapoh ka Mawkyrwat Block Congress Committee (MBCC) ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taïew ki la ïoh ban lum ka jingïalang ba nyngkong ha Mawkyrwat la ban long kum kawei na ki jingïalang ban jied thymmai ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka INC Mawkyrwat Block Congress Committee.Lah ban ong ba ka jingpynlong jong ka MBCC ïa ka jingïalang ka long kum shibynta ban jied ïa ki nongïalam ne ki nongkitkam jong ka INC ha Mawkyrwat Block namar ka jingleit snoh noh jong u bah Carness Sohshang, MDC ka Mawkyrwat Constituency ryngkat ki katto katne ki nongïalam sha ka National People’s Party (NPP) ha kine ki khyndiat sngi.Shuh shuh ym tang kata ha kane ka jingïalang, watla ki nongkitkam jong ka INC ki la nangleit shakhmat sha kiwei pat ki party hynrei kum ki nongïalam barim jong ka INC kiba dang sah mynta ki la ïoh ban pdiang sngewbha ïa ka jingwan pynïasoh sha ka congress bad kita ki dei na ka Peoples Democratic Front (PDF) jong ka Mawkyrwat Zonal ba ka lamkhmat da u President barim ka PDF, South West Khasi Hills District.Hadien ka jingïalang ka la don ruh ka jingpynthymmai ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka Indian National Congress (INC) Mawkyrwat Block ha kaba la jied President ïa u bah N. Tympuiñ, Vice-President ïa u bah Kyntiew Nongsiej, General Secretary ïa u bah Andreas Kharkongor, Chief Organizer ïa u bah Kynphamlin V. Kharlyngdoh, Chief Adviser ïa u bah Valentine Thyrniang bad kiwei ki nongkitkam ba hakhmat.Ïa ka jingïalang ha kane ka sngi la pynïaid da u President u bah N. Tympuiñ, ka jingkren pdiang na u bah P. Wanniang, bad ki jingkren lyngkot na u Chief Adviser u bah Valentine Thyrniang, na u Chief Organizer u bah Kynphamlin V. Kharlyngdoh, na u bah Manuel Badwar, Secretary jong ka MPCC bad ka jingkren khublei na u bah Andreas Kharkongor, General Secretary jong ka INC MBCC.
title: Mar ïa phet u MDC sha ka NPP, jied thymmai ka Congress ïa ki nongïalam ha Mawkyrwat

content: Shillong, Rymphang 25 : Dei ka khun u Chowkidar ka Shillong Bar Association u Bhola Yadav kaba ïohi nyngkong ïa ka jingsdang klang ka ding ha ka miet Sngi Saitjain ha ka por 10.15 baje ei ei mynmiet. Mar ïa ïohi ka la ïathuh ha u kpa bad u kpa mar mar u la pyntip sha Fire and Emergency Services hynrei namar ba ka dei ka ïing dieng kaba la rim bha bad ba dap ruh da ki kot ki sla kumta wat la ki pulit pynlip ding ki la wan poi kloi ha katei ka jaka ruh ka ding kaba ïeng klang ka la bamduh ïa katei ka shlem saiñdur jongki Muktiar jong kane ka nongbah.Kane ka shlem saiñdur ki Muktiar ne ka Shillong Bar Association ka la palat ïa ka 100 snem ei ei. Hooid ïa ka Shillong Bar Association la seng nongrim ha u snem 1913 hynrei ïa kane ka ophis treikam jongki la shna kham hadien. Kane ka ophis treikam ki Riewsaid aiñ ka la kylla dpei ha ka miet Sngi Saitjain ha ka ding kaba klang kaba la bam duh lut khait ïa ki kot ki sla, ki uniform jong ki riewsaid aiñ, ïa ka library bad baroh kat kiba don ha katei ka ïing ophis.Wat la ym pat tip ïa ka daw tynrai jong ka jingkem ding kane ka jaka shong ki riewsaid aiñ hynrei la suba jur ba ka dei na ka bording electrict hi.
