U Bhola u la ïathuh nyngkong la wan kawei ka kali pynlip ding bad pyrshang ban pynlip ïa ka ding hynrei namar ba ka ding ka la klang palat kumta ka la ïoh ban bam duh ïa katei ka ïing ophis.Ki riewsaid aiñ ne ki muktiar ki ïathuh ba da ki hajar tylli ki kot ki sla kiba don la palat spah snem ki la ingkhong khait lut.U President ka Shillong Bar Association u HR Nath u la pynpaw ka jingkyndit bad sngewsih kaba khraw halor kane ka jingjia bym poi pyrkhat. “Kane ka dei ka ïing kaba la rim bha bad ngi la ïai pyrshang ban bud dien ban buh ïa ki record ha ki kor digital hynrei ym pat ïoh pyndep ïa kane la jia noh kane ka jingpluh bad baroh ki kot ki sla ki la kylla dpei lut” ong Nath.Na ka liang u IG jongka Meghalaya Fire and Emergency Services u bah Francis H Kharshiing u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki pulit pynlip ding kiba la trei shitom bad lah ban tem ïa ka ding hapoh ar kynta bad ka la lait ban pur sha kiwei ki ïing ophis ba mar jan.“ Kat kum ka record ba ngi la ïoh jingpyntip ka long ha ka por 10.15 Pm bad mar mar la phah ïa ki kali pynlip ding na Iewduh. Nga ruh tang hapoh phra minit ka la poi ha katei ka jaka bad ngi la pyrshang katba lah ban tem ïa kane ka jingklang ka ding” ïathuh u bah Francis.Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, Chief Secretary bah D.P Wahlang bad kiwei kiwei ki ophisar sorkar ki la ïa poi hynnin hi ka miet sha katei ka jaka ban leit peit da la ki jong ki khmat ïa ka jingshah bamduh katei ka shlem saiñdur jong ki Muktiar ha ki tylliej ding.“ Nga la leit jngoh ia katei ka Shillong Bar Association da lade ban ïohi ïa ka jingjia ba sngewsih hynrei tang kawei kaba nga sngew kmen ka long ba ym shym la don ka jingiap ha katei ka jingkem ding jong katei ka ïing. Nga sngewsih jur haduh katta katta ïa ka jingduh noh jong ki paralok Nongsaid aiñ ïa katei ka ïing bad ka sorkar kan sa shong pyrkhat halor kane” ong u Myntri Rangbah.
title: Dei ka khun u Chowkidar ba ïohi ïa ka jingsdang klang ka ding ha Shillong Bar Association

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26: Ka long ka jingsarong bad ka burom ïa ka jylla bad ka jaid bynriew hadien ba kawei na ki khynnah samla jong ka thaiñ kaba la tip kyrteng da ka Bonifila Shullai ka la mih kyrteng ha ka thup ki 23-ngut ki player ban mihkhmat ïa ka ri sha ka SAFF U16 Women’s Championship ka ban long ha Lalitpur, Nepal ka ban sdang naduh 1 tarik haduh 10 tarik u Lber.Dang shen, ka Bonifilia Shullai ka paw kyrteng ha ka thup jong ki 30 ngut kiba la pynbna dang ha mynta u bnai shuwa ban pynthikna pura ïa ki kyrteng jong ki 23 ngut ki thei ïalehkai ban mihkhmat ïa ka ri sha katei ka lympung.Ka jingpynbna ïa ka thup kyrteng ba khadduh la jied napdeng ki thei kiba la shah jied ban kilanmet ha Goa.Kumban shu pynkynmaw, ka India ka la ïoh ban rah ïa ka namlahduh ha ka U-15 ha u snem 2018 bad 2019, hadien ba la pynliem ïa ka Bangladesh ha ka jingïakhun final. Bad kane kan dei ka sien kaba nyngkong ban pynlong ïa ka lympung ha ka kyrdan U16.Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka ri kan sa mih ban leit sha Nepal mynta ka sngi shuwa ka jingïalehkai kaba nyngkong ka ban long pyrshah ïa ka Bhutan (Lber 1 tarik), bud sa ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Bangladesh (5 tarik Lber) bad ïa ka Nepal (7 tarik Lber).Ki kynhun ba wan hakhmat ha ka round-robin stage kin ïakhun ïa ka final, bad ki jingïalehkai yn pynlong ha Chyasal Stadium ha Lalitpur.Kynhun U-16 jong ka India:Goalkeepers: Konjengbam Tamphasana Devi, Munni, Surajmuni Kumari.Defenders: Amrita Ghosh, Bonifila Shullai, Divyani Linda, Elizabed Lakra, Gauri, Rheanna Liz Jacob, Rupashree Munda, Sarangthem Alena Devi.Midfielders: Anita Dungdung, Anushka Kumari, Anwita Raghuraman, H Yashica, Longajam Nira Chanu, Ritu Badaik, Shveta Rani, Thanda Moni Baskey.Forwards: Gurleen Kaur, Gurnaz Kaur, Neha Saji, Pearl Fernandes.
title: Shah jied ka Bonifila Shullai ha ka thup ki 23-ngut na bynta ka SAFF U-16 Women’s C’ships

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 26: Ka Ri-Bhoi People’s Council sengkmie mynta ka sngi kala leit ban ïakynduh syndon ïa u Chancellor ka skulbah University of Science and Technology Meghalaya, namar ka jingbym ioh jingtip ki samla wad kam naka jylla kumba bun naki khubor laitkam lane ki jingpynbna la ai beit tang haki kot khubor sha ka jylla Assam katba ki samla haka jylla Meghalaya kim ioh jingtip lane bna eiei kumba la sakhi ruh bun naki kot khubor ba don ha katei ka skulbah ki dei beit tang ki kot khubor na Assam.Naka liang ka seng kala pynsngew ruh ka jingsngewkhia hakhmat u Chancellor ka skulbah USTM halor ka jingpynlong ïaki interview thepkam haka sngi u Blei kaba dei ka sngi kyntang jong ki khristan bad bun naki samla ki hap ban leit sha ki iingmane lane ki jingïaseng bapher bapher.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor naka liang u Samla Jayson Lennox Nongrum President u la ong ba kum ka seng mynta ka sngi kala ioh ban ïakynduh bad u M Hoque Chancellor ka skulbah USTM ban aiti ruh da ka jingthoh halor ka jingsngewkhia ba bun naki samla ka jylla kim tip ba lait kam ha katei ka skulbah USTM namar baroh ki jingpynbna bad ki khubor laitkam la shaniah beit tang haki kot khubor naka jylla Assam katba ki samla wadkam naka jylla Meghalaya kim tip ne bna eiei namar bun ki nongthep kam hi ki dei beit na AssamU la ong ruh ba kat katei ka skulbah kaba ieng hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya kala dei ban phaikhmat ruh haka iohkam ka iohjam ki samla pule naka jylla Meghalaya namar ki bun ki samla kiba la pyndep ïaki kyrdan bapher bapher kim pat ioh kam da kaba ai ruh ki jingpynbna haki kot khubor ka jylla Meghalaya ym ban shaniah tang sha Assam.Kum ka seng kala pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingpynlong ïaki Interview haka sngi u Blei kaba dei ka sngi burom bad sngi kyntang jong ki khristan, hynrei ba kin pynlong pat ha kiwei kiwei ki sngi pohïa.Shuh shuh u Samla Jayson Nongrum u la ong ruh ba kum ka seng ka sngewkhia ruh halor ka jingpyndonkam katei ka skulbah da ki jaiñ Gamosa jong ki Assamese hynrei ban pyndonkam lang ruh da ki jaiñ Ryndia bad naka liang u M Hoque Chancellor ka USTM u la kular ban shimkhia bad ban pdiang ïa katei ka jingai jingmut jong ka seng.
title: Bun ki samla ka jylla kim tip ba lait kam ha USTM, la pynbna beit tang haki khubor ka jylla Assam

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26: Kum shi bynta ban pynkhreh bad jied ïa ki nongïalympat ban mihkhmat ïa ka jylla sha ka 3rd North East Olympic Games 2024 ha Nagaland, ka Wrestling Association of Meghalaya ka la sdang ban pynlong ïa ka jingpyrshang jied nongïalympat ha jaka kilanmet jong ka Happy Red Rooster gym kaba ha Laitumkhrah hynnin ka Sngi Thohdieng.Lah ban kdew ba ka 3rd North East Olympic Games 2024 ka ban long ha Nagaland kan sdang naduh 18 tarik bad kut haduh 23 tarik u Lber, bad kin don haduh 16 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai ba la kynthup.Na ka liang jong ka WAM ka la trei shitom katba lah ban pynkloi ïa ka jingjied ïa ki player shuwa ban pynlong sa ïa ka prokram ai jinghikai ban pyntbit shuh shuh lane coaching camp na bynta kito kiba la shah jied.Ka WAM ka la pyntip ba kan phah ar ngut ki nongïalympat ki ban aireng ha ar tylli ki kyrdan ïakop– ba kynthup ïa ka belt wrestling bad ka freestyle wrestling.Haba phai sha ka Belt wrestling, ka jingïalehkai kan kynthup ïa arngut ki nongïalympat kiba hap ban bat skhem ïa u belt jong u wei pat ha ka jingpyrshang ban pynkyllon lane lympat u wei ïa u wei. Katba ka freestyle wrestling ka dei ka jait ïalympat kaba ju ïohi barabor ha ki rynsan Olympic Games.Kiba la wan ban shimbynta sha kane ka selection trial ki kynthup ïa kiba jop takma na ka 5th Meghalaya Games, kaba la long ha u bnai ba ladep ha Tura.Na ka liang jong ka WAM kam pat shym la pynbna ïa ka thup kyrteng jong kitei ki nongïalympat, bad ka synjuk ka dang ap ruh ïa ka jingbthah ha kaba ïadei bad ka mang tyngka na bynta ban pynlong ïa ka coaching camp bad ruh ban leit sha Nagaland na ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association bad ka Department of Sports & Youth Affairs.
title: Sdang ka WAM ban pynkhreh jied nongïalympat na bynta ka NE Olympic

content: Ka jingioh kem ki pulit ka jylla ïa kiba bun ki nongkhaïi drok ha kine ki khyndiat sngi bad ka jingïoh kurup ïa uba bun bah ki drok ka long kaei kaei kaba pyndiaw, pynsngewsih bad pynsngewkhia mynsiem shibun ïa ki kmie ki kpa bad ïa ki paidbah ruh baroh. Ym pat ju don ka jingïoh kurup droks kaba jur haduh katne katne ha ka jylla,wat lada ki Pulit ki ju ïoh kurup drok ha ki por kiba la leit ruh.Kane ka jingbun ka jingïoh kem droks ka pyni ba kiba dih ruh ki la bun bha, namar lada ym don ki nongdih, kumno pat ki nongkhaïi kin bun. Kane kadei ka por ba ka imlang sahlang, ki kmie ki kpa, ki bor shnong, ki Balang haduh ki bor sorkar kidei ban shong pyrkhat khia bha ïa kane ka kam, namar ka don ka jingima kaba jur haduh katta katta.Ki Pulit kiba ïohkem ïa ki nongkhaïi droks, kim dei ban kut tang ha ka jingpynshitom katkum ka aiñ, hynrei ki dei ban pynïar ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki da kaba thaw ki lynti kumno ban ïasyllok bad ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam.Kawei na ki lad kiba donkam bha ban leh, ka long ka jingïasyllok nyngkong eh ha ïing hasem, ha kaba ki kmie ki kpa kin hap shim ka jingkitkhlieh kaba khraw bha halor kane, namar ba ka por kaba bun eh kaba ki khun ki kti ki pyllut por ka dei bad ki kmie ki kpa. Ki kmie ki kpa kidei ban don ka por kaba kylluid na ka bynta ki khun,khamtam haba ki la sdang ban khie samla bad sdang ban ïa ïaid paralok bad kiba bun. Kane kadei ka por kaba ki khun ki ngat ruh ha kiba bun ki jingpynshoi na ki paralok bad ka dei ruh ka por ba ki dang shongshit bad kwah ban mad ïa kiei kiei kiba pynsngewtynnad ïa ka jingim jong ki. Kane kadei ruh ka por kaba ki kmie ki kpa kin hap ban ïalong paralok bad ki khun khnang ba kan wanrah ka jingïajan.Ka jingpoi kiba bun ki samla sha ka jingdih droks ka dei namar ba ki kmie ki kpa kim don por ban ïashongkai ne ban ïakren ïakhana bad ki.Kine ruh ki dei ki sngi ha kaba ki samla ki don hapdeng ka jinglynga bad ka jingpisa kaba jur ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ki.Ka jingbym ïohkam ïohjam, ka jingbym don ki opportunities ha ka jingim jong ki.Kiba bun ki samla kiba don jingkyrmen ban ïoh ka kam ka jam kaba biang hadien ba ki la dep ka jingpule, ki ngat ha ka jingdih droks, namar ka jingangnud bad ka jingkhmih lynti jong ki kam poi shano shano ruh. Ka rukom thungkam thungjam ha kine ki sngi ba mynta ka ïaid da ka lynti kaba kynriang, kiba dei hok ban ïoh kim ïoh bad ki bym dei hok ban ïoh ki ïoh. Dei ha kaba kum kane ka khep ba ki samla ki duh jingkyrmen bad ki phai sha u Droks.Nalor ki kmie ki kpa, ki bor shnong, ki bor Balang ruh kin hap ban shimlang ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ki samla.Ki bor shnong kin hap ban pyrkhing bad long phikir bha ïa ka ïaid ka ïeng bad ka rung ka mih ki samla hapoh shnong. Kam kut tang ha kaba buh ki adong ba ym bit ban shongmiet ha ki surok, ym bit ban shongkai ha ki jaka ba dum bad kumta ter ter.Hynrei donkam ban don ka jingpeitngor shisien ba ïohi ïa ka jingpher ha ka ïaid ka ïeng jong ki samla.Ki bor Balang lei lei ki don ka bynta kaba kongsan bha, namar ka jingsdang dih droks ka mih na ka jingpyrkhat ba bakla jong ki samla. Ki bor Balang ki don ka bor ha kaba ïasyllok ne ka Counselling ïa kiba bun ki samla kiba don hapoh ka Balang. Dei ban don ki topic halor ka jingsniew jong u droks ha ki lynnong Skul pynpaw ne ki Sunday School, khnang ban lah ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki.Nangta ki skul ki kolej, kidei ban don ka jingpeit kaba jan bha ïa ki khynnah skul ne kolej, namar kaba bun ka por ki don ha ki jaka pule. Ki bor skul kim dei ban riej ne sheptieng ban pyntip sha ki bor ka aiñ haba ki don ka jingsuba ïa ki samla kiba kum kine.La ïohi ba kiba bun ki Awareness Programme lapynlong halor ka jingsniew jong u droks bad kaei kaba la ïohi ba ha kiba bun ki prokram kiba kum kine, la pynlong ryngkat bad ki Concert ki jingshad jingbatai bad ter ter. Kaei kaba la ïohi ka long ba kane kam shym la ïarap satia.Lehse ka por ka la dei ban pynkylla noh ïa ka rukom ïalap halor ka jingsniew ki droks.
title: Donkam ban ïa treilang da baroh ban rat dyngkong ïa u drok

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 26: Ka seng Ri Bhoi People’s Council ryngkat bad ka Meghalaya People’s Social Organisation kila pynbna syndon da ka jingïakhih da kaba shong kyllaiñ mungor haka 4 tarik Lber 2024 hakhmat ka Indoor Stadium kaba don ha Umlyngkdait namar ka jingpynslem jong ka sorkar ban pynmih ïaka resol jong ka District Selection Committee ha Ri Bhoi District.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Samla Jayson Lennox Nongrum President ka RBPC u la ong ba kum ka seng kala ïaid da ka miej jingiakren ha kaba kala leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u chairman, member secretary ka District Selection Committee ka Ri-Bhoi District hynrei i kumba katei ka jingleit kynduh kam poi shaei shaei ruh ba haduh mynta ym pat iohi ïa u soh bad ka sorkar ka shu sngap mynthi haduh mynta.U la ong ruh ba ka DSC ka long kum ka lad iohkam ïaki samla ha kum kane ka juk hiran bad kyrduh kam, hynrei watla ki samla kila pyndep ïaki eksam bapher bapher haki snem bala leit noh hynrei haduh mynta ka sorkar kam pat lah ban pynmih ïaka resol kaba la wanrah shibun ka jingpyrkhat ïaki samla wad kam.Dei halor katei ka nongrim ba kum ka seng kala shim ïaka sienjam ban pynlong da ki jingïakhih da kaba shong kyllaiñ mungor ryngkat ka jingkyrpad ïa baroh ki samla wadkam kiba dang ap result, ki kynhun sengbhalang ki kmie ki kpa kiba sngewkhia ïaka lawei jong ki khun ba kin mih bad snohkti lang ha katei ka sngi khnang ba ka sorkar kan sngew bad pynsngap ïaka jingdawa ban pynmih noh ïaka resol DSC kaba la dep thoh exam naduh u snem 2021-22.
title: 4 tarik yn shong kyllaiñ mungor ka RBPC, MPSO ba slem pynmih resol DSC ha Ri Bhoi

content: Jowai, Rymphang 26: Ka Jaiñtia Women Awakening Movement (JWAM) Sengkmie kala ïoh lad ban pynlong ïaka ïakop shad lane ka Dancing Competition kaba shisngi ïaka ba la pynlong ha District Library Mynthong Jowai haka 24.2.2024.U Bah, Niman N Shadap u Director jong ka Khasi Indigenous Foundation La ïoh ruh ïaka jingkren na ka Kong Ribiangki Siangshai, u bah B. Samaiang, Chairman Jaiñtia Careers Coaching Center bad na u Kongsan.Na ka bynta ki nongjop ba wan haka kyrdan ba nyngkong dei i Miss, Man-iwa pyntngen Sana, i la ïoh ïaka song pisa Rs. 10,000 tyngka bad ka syrnod, ka kyrdan ba ar Miss, Dariïung Dkhar ka la ïoh ïaka song pisa Rs. 7000 tyngka bad ka syrnod, balai Mr, Riata M Langdoh ula ïoh ïaka song pisa Rs. 5000 tyngka bad lai tylli ki consolations prizes la ïoh da Miss. Nakita Shylla, Miss. Ranika Dkhar bad i Miss. Hanlada bad Jazzmine Langdoh da ka pisa Rs. 2000 marwei bad ki syrnod.
title: Da ka jingïakop shad ba shisngi pynlong ka JWAM

content: U dak jingkylli (???) uba heh u long: Hato kum ki trai jylla ngi long ki briew kiba kumno ha ka jingñiewkor ïa kano kano ka kam kaba ngi trei ngi ktah ne im ja. Kane ka dei ka jingpynsngew ba ngi donkam ban puson haba ngi pule ia ka history ka jingïaid ka por namar kane ka dei ka jingkylli ban ïatei na bynta ka jingshngaiñ ka imlang sahlang jong ngi kum ka Jaidbynriew bad ki trai jylla.Ngi sakhi ïa ka jinglynga bad jingïaksaid ki khun samla jong ngi ban ïada ïa ka jaidbynriew bad jylla na ka jingshah tyllup ha kiwei ki jaidbynriew heh paid na kiwei ki jaka. Kaei kaba ngi ïohi ka long ba katba ngi dang ïa ksaid ban ïada na ka jingshah tyllup ha kiwei ki jaidbynriew hynrei katta nang jyllei ka jingtuid kiwei ki jaidbynriew sha kine ki lum baieit bathiang jong ngi.Kaei ka daw kaba pynlong ba i kumba ngi dang ngam pynban katba dang ïa ksaid. Napdeng kiba bun ki daw, lehse ngi lah ban ong ba kawei na ki daw ka jingïai tuid kiwei ki jaidbynriew sha kine ki lum baieit jong ngi ka dei ka jingkheiñ sting jong katto katne napdeng jong ngi, ba ngim ñiewkor satia ïa ka kam kaba ngi trei ne im ja ban minot thob manla ka sngi, katba kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew ki minot thob ban trei shitom ïa kano kano ka lad kamai kajih ba ki ïohlad namar ka jingkyrduh kam ha ki jaka ne shnong trai jong ki. Kane ka plie lad ba kin ïoh bat lut ïa baroh ki jingtreikam bad ngi sa ong pat ba ngi kyrduh kam.Ngi ju ïohsngew ïa ka jingïakren na ka por sha ka por da kiba pyntrei ïa ki kam tei iïng tei sem bad kiwei kiwei ki jingtreikam ïa ka jingkheiñ sting ki katto katne ki nongtrei haba ai kam ïa ki. Kane ka jingbym tista ne ñiewkor ïa ki kam ba trei ha ka jingtreikam ba man la ka sngi ka ktah ïa ka jingïoh ban pyndep ïa ki jingtrei ha ka por kaba biang bad pynlong ïa kiwei ki Jaidbynriew ban ïoh phrung khlieh ha ki jingtreikam bapher bapher.Kane keiñ ka dei ka jingdkoh bad ka dawbah ba sa jyllei ki briew na shabar ka jylla ban ïoh kam ïoh jam bad klun ïa bun ki lad kamai ha kine ki lum baieit jong ngi bad buh jingeh kylla pat ïa ki khun samla jong ngi kum ki trai jylla.Lada ngi kwah ba ki briew na shabar kim dei ban ïoh kam ïoh jam ne rung khlieh ha kine ki lum baieit jong ngi, ngi dei ban kyndit bynriew ba ki briew jong ngi ki dei ban minot tista khlem da pep trei than da ki bun sngi ne taïew bad ñiewkor ïa ka kam ba ki trei ne im ja, khnang ba ki jingpyntrei ïa ki kam bapher bapher kin ïaid beit ïaid ryntih khlem thut satia.Lada ngi hi iwei pa iwei ngi pyndep hok bad janai ïa kano kano ka kam ba ngi trei, ngim donkam ban da beh ïa kiwei ki Jaidbynriew na kine ki lum jong ngi, hynrei da lade hi kin phet haba kim ïoh kam ïoh jam ban im ja.Ngi sngewkmen ba bun na ki briew jong ngi ki lah sngewthuh ïa kane ka bynta bad ñiewkor ban pyntyllun ha ka rukom kaba janai ïa kano kano ka kam ba ki trei, hynrei dang don sa katto katne ki bym pat sngewthuh pura halor kane ka bynta ban ñiewkor ïa ka kam ba ki trei la ka long kaba rit ne kaba heh.Ka por ka la dei ba baroh na ngi, ngin kyndit bynriew halor kane ka bynta, namar ngi im ha kine ki sngi jong ka jingpur sted ki lad pathai khubor ban saphriang lyngba ka social media bad ktah kylla ïa ka jaidbynriew bad jylla lada ka sienjam ba ngi shim ban ïada ïa la ka jaidbynriew ha ka jingsngew jong ngi ka long kaba dei, hynrei kiwei pat kin pyrshang ban ïalam bakla da kumwei pyrshah ïa ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ryngkat ki jingkynnoh ba ngi isih ïa kiwei.Ngi im ha ka juk shai bad ngi hap ban ïaid katkum ka jingkylla ka por.Kumta ban ïada ïa la ka Jaidbynriew bad jylla ka dei sa tang ka jingñiewkor, burom bad minot tista ka jong ngi iwei pa iwei ïa kano kano ka kam ba ngi trei da kaba pynduna ïa ka jingpep trei palat ne leh bym suidñiew ïa ki nongai kam khnang ba ki nongai kam kin shaniah ïa la ki briew la jong, lym kumta ngin nym poi shano shano hynrei ngin nang ïai ngam katba dang ïakhun ne ïaksaid ban ïada ïa ka imlang sahlang ka Jaidbynriew bad ka jylla.
title: “Hato kum ki trai jylla ngi ñiewkor ïa ka kam ba ngi trei ne im ja?

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 26: Satang kumba katto katne sngi la jam sha u bnai Lber bad ka jingrang tyrkhong jong ka mariang bad ka jingshit kan sa khyrwit tyngeh bad dei ha u bnai Lber ba ki paitbah jong kawei pa kawei ka shnong ki mad ïa ka jingkyrduh um.Ha u bnai Lber ki paitbah jong kawei pa kawei ka shnong ki mad ym tang ïa ka jingkyrduh um, hynrei man la u snem ki don ki nongshong shnong kiba duh noh ïa ki ïing ki sem bad ki jingdon jingem, namar ka jingbam duh jong ki thylliej ding na ka jingthang pathar jong ki riew shim kabu ïa ki khlaw ki btap bad ki lum. Nalor kata ha une u bnai ki um ha ki wah ki la rit haduh katta katta namar ki tyllong umpohliew ki la rngad lut.Ha kine ki sngi lajan baroh ki paitbah nongshong shnong ki ud ki nam bad ki jynjar jingmut. namar ka jingkyrduh ha kaba wat tang ka umbam um dih ruh kim ïoh pahuh pahai shuh. Hynrei kaba lyngngoh ka long ba haba ki bnai kyrduh um ki la poi, ki paitbah ki kynnoh bad tim ïa ka sorkar ba kam lah ban pynbiang umbam umdih.Ka jingkylli kaba mih ka long hato ka sorkar ka lah mo ban shna umï mano ba pynrngad khlem dei por ïa ki tyllong um kiba ka sorkar ka la ai skhim ban shna ïa ki dam bad pynpoi ïa ka umbam umdih sha ki shnong lyngba ki pipe line kiba la buh naduh ki dam pynlang um haduh ki shnong ki thaw wat lada ka jingngai ka long da ki phew kilomitar ruh.Haba phai ha ka jingrngad ki tyllong um bam ym lah ban len ïa ka jingshisha ba da ki phew snem, ki paitbah jong palat phew tylli ki shnong kiba hap ha Mawthadraishan Block bad Nongstoiñ Block, ki ïoh pahuh ka um bam na ki tyllong um kiba la ring na ki wahduid kiba mih na ki lynter lum Mawthadraishan. Hynrei naduh u snem 2022 ka jingpom pathar ïa ki khlaw ha shilynter jong utei u lum na ka bynta ban thang rnga ka jingkyrduh um ka la sdang. Lada ka jingpom pathar ïa ki khlaw ha shilynter jong utei u lum kan dang bteng baroh ki tyllong um kin sa rngad lut.Ym lah ruh ban len ba ki don palat phew tylli ki pung kiba heh bha ha baroh shilynter jong ki kliar lum Mawthadraishan kata naduh ka shnong Domkseh, Mawphanlur, Mawkyrtung, Lawdisai bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong. Hynrei lada ki paitbah ki dang bteng ban pom pathar ïa ki khlaw, ha kawei ka sngi kitei ki pung ki lah ban don um tang ha ka por lyiur, hynrei ha ki aïom tlang kin kylla tyrkhong kum ki khyndew shrah bad dei hangta ba ki longïing ki hap ba thied wat ïa ka um sait paiñkhana ruh.
title: Ka sorkar kan ym lah ban pynbiang um lada ki paidbah kim tyngkai ïa ki khlaw

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 26: Ka jingpynsahteng jong ki kontraktor kiba pyntrei ïa ka surok naduh u snem 2021-22, shuwa ba ka Balang Presbyterian Nongkhlaw West Khasi Hills kan pdiang ïa ka Jingïaseng Samla KJP Synod sepngi ha u snem 2023, ka la pynbitar ïa ki paitbah nongshong shnong katei ka thaiñ, namar ki kontraktor kiba pyntrei ïa katei ka surok kaba hynriew kilomitar, kim shym la pyndep ha ka por kaba biang bad ki la shu ieh khongreng palat marshiteng kata kumba lai kimlomitar tam.Halor kane, ki nongïalam jong ka FKJGP Lai Lyngdoh Unit mynta ka sngi ryngkat u bah George Kharbani Headman jong ka shnong Nonglwai II, lem bad katto katne ki rangbah ba la synran lang da ki nongïalam ka FKJGP West Khasi Hills, ki la hiar ban leit jurip ïa katei ka surok bad la lap ba ïa ka surok kaba na Nongkhlaw shaduh Nonglwai II, u kontraktor u ba pyntrei u dang pyndep ban siang rong tang kumba shi kilomitar, katba kaba ka bynta ba dang sah baroh ka dang dei kaba khohruh khohram bad kaba sniew bha.U bah George Kharbani Headman jong ka shnong Nonglwai II haba ai jingkren ha ki lad pathai khubor, u la ong ba ha shuwa ban pyntrei ïa katei ka surok ka tnad PWD ka la kular ba kan bthah ïa ki kontraktor ba kin pyndep ha shuwa ban long ka jingïaseng samla KJP Synod Sepngi bad ki trai jaka ki la shah sngewbha ban tih ïa katei kia surok khlem dap hah siew ïa ka bai khyndew.Kaba lyngngoh ka long ba mar shu kut ka jingïaseng Synod Samla, ki kontraktor ruh ki la shu sangeh ban iehnoh kumto haduh mynta ba kawei pat ka jingïaseng Synod Samla ka la kut ruh kim pat lah ban pyndep.U la ong ba lada katei ka surok ka dei tang na ka bynta ka Jingïaseng Samla KJP Synod Sepngi, ka sorkar ka dei ban siew noh ïa ka bai khyndew sha baroh ki trai jaka.Hynrei lada ka dei ka surok na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paitbah nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ, ka sorkar ka dei ban hukum ïa ki kontraktor ba kin pyndep noh kloi katba lah khnang ba ki paitbah kin ym ïakynduh jingeh ha ka leit ka wan. Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynsahteng jong ki Kontraktor ban siang rong ïa katei ka surok, u bah Nistor Nongkseh president ka FKJGP Lai Lyngdoh area unit, u la ong ba hadien ba ki paitbah jong katei ka thaiñ ki la pynsngew sha ki nongïalam ka seng, na ka liang jong ki lyngba ka RTI ki la leit ban buh da ka jingthoh sha ka ophis jong u Executive Engineer bad hadien ba ki la ïoh ïa ka jubab ki la hiar ban leit jurip ban lap ïa ka jingshisha.U la ong ruh ba ha ka jingleit jurip jong ki ryngkat ki rangbah shnong ki la lap ba ka jingpyntrei jong ki kontraktor ka dang long tang kumba shi pawa katba kaba ka bynta kaba kim pat pyndep ka dang kham bun.Utei u nongïalam u la ong ruh ba na ka liang ka seng ka kyntu ïa ki kontraktor ba ki dei ban pyndep noh kloi kloi kat ba lah, namar ka jingbuh por jong ka sorkar ban pyndep ïa katei ka surok ka la palat.Lada ki kontraktor kim lah ban pyndep ha ka por kaba biang, na ka liang ki nongïalam ka seng kin sa leit ban ïakynduh biang ïa u EE ka tnad PWD, ban kyntu ïa u ba u dei ban leh ïa kaba donkam na ka bynta ki kontraktor ki bym lah ban pyndep hok ïa ka jingtrei kat kum ka por ba la buh da ka sorkar.
title: Khlem pyndep shuh ki kontraktor ïa ka surok jingïaseng Synod ha Nongkhlaw

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 26: Kiba bun naki nongdie kot ha ïew Nongpoh, kila shim kabu shaba palat ha kum kane ka por sdang skul ban die tam naka dor bala buh kaba la buh jingeh ïa kiba bun ki longiing ba duk ba rangli.Halor katei ka jingshim kabu ki nongdie kot ha ïew Nongpoh naka liang ka seng Khasi Student Union, Nongpoh Circle haka sngi Saitjaiñ kaba dei ruh ka sngi ïew Nongpoh kila leit ban jurip hi ïaki dukan kot ban lap ïaka jingshisha hadien bun ki jingujor naki paidbah bad ki kmie ki kpa bad kum ka seng kala lap ba ki nongdie kot ki shim tam naka dor bala buh haduh 10 bad 20 tyngka na kawei ka kot da kaba aidaw ba ki lut bun ka bai rong bai rah ïaki kot.Shuh shuh naka liang ka seng mynta ka sngi hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Samla Baiashanlang Kharshanlor Secretary ka Nongpoh Circle, Samla Saiñkupar Syngkli Education Secretary, Samla Iabhalang Nongrum President ka Nongpoh Town Unit ryngkat ki dkhot kila leit ban ujor syndon sha u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi District u Arpit Upadhyaya ba un shimkhia ïa katei ka jingshim kabu ki nongdie kot khamtam ka jingeh jong ki longiing ba duk ba rangli.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor naka liang u Samla Baiashanlang Kharshanlor u la ong ba kum ka seng ka dap da ka jingsngewkhi kaba jur halor ka jingshim kabu palat ki nongdie kot nalor ba ki kren heh ïaki nongleit thied nalor ka jingdie haka dor kaba rem, bad dei halor katei ka nongrim ba kum ka seng hadien bun ki jingujor kala leit ban jurip hi ïaki dukan die kot ha ïew Nongpoh ha kaba la lap shisha ba ki shim kabu ban die tam shibun shah naka dor bala buh.U la ong ruh hadien ka jingïakynduh bad u DC ka Ri-Bhoi naka liang jong u u la kular ban shimkhia ban pynlong ka jingtohkit ïa katei ka kam khnang ba ki dukan kim dei ban shim kabu palat hynrei ban die katkum ka dor bala buh ban lait shah ktah ki kmie ki kpa bad ki khynnah skul.
title: Shim kabu ki nongdie kot ha ïew Nongpoh, die tam ïa ka dor bala buh, sha u DC ujor ka KSU

content: Shillong, Rymphang 24 : Ka ïing Bishar High Court (HC) jong ka jylla ka la bthah ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban bud ïa ki kyndon treikam kumba la bthah ban lah wanrah jingkhuid ïa ka pung Umiam.Ha ka hukum ba pynmih ha ka 19 tarik Rymphang haba pynwai noh ïa ka PIL, ka Division Bench ba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice S Vaidyanathan bad Justice W Diengdoh la ong, “Kumta, ia ka PIl No.10 ba 2019 la pynwai noh da kine ki kyndon harum, kiba dei ban bud da ka Sorkar Jylla kumba ki long”.Ka ïing Bishar ka la maham “Lada don ka jingbym bud kyndon na ka liang ki Ophisar kiba dei ban pyntreikam ïa ki kyndon haneng, dei ban ai ka jingpynshitom ïa ki bad ban pynrung ruh haka service register ban pynduh lad ba kin kiew kyrdan”.Ki kyndon ki ong “Lada don ki nongkynti paidbah ba la ithuh ne ym pat don kano kano ka rai halor ki mukotduma,da kane ka ïing Bishar la dei ban pynïeng noh da ka sign board steel ba don ïa ki bar code & case number ha ka jaka ba kyndiang bha”.Ka ong ba ïa kine ki jaka bala ithuh dei ban pynmih ha baroh ki website ka Sorkar khnang ban khanglad ïa kiwei ba kin nym kyntur sha ki nongkynti paidbah.Ka kyndon ka ong ruh “Ym dei ban ailad ïa ka jingbuh dukan madan bad pynïeng kali ha kine ki jaka paidbah lait noh kiba ïaid kat kum ki kyndon aiñ. Ym dei ban ai jingbit ban pyndonkam ïa kine ki jaka kum ki jaka ïeng Auto/Taxi, kaba pynthut ïa ka ïaid ka ïeng ki paidbah bad ki kali lait noh kiba la ïoh jingbit”.Ka ong ruh “Ym don mano mano ruh ba lah ban pynïeng ïa ki jingtei ba shipor ne ba shirta ha kine ki jaka ne ha ki lynti ïaid, lada don, khlem da ïoh jingbit na ki bor ba dei khmih. Lada don kino kino ki jingtei ba khlem ïoh jingbit, ki bor khmih ki dei ban leh eiei mar mar ha ka ban pynpra noh ïa ki”.
title: Hukum ka Iing Bishar HC ia ka Sorkar ban pynneh jingkhuid ia ka pung Umiam

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : U Myntri ka Tnad Civil Defence & Home Guards u Ma Comingone Ymbon ha ka sngi Nyngong ula ong ba ka Home Guards ka dei ka Voluntary Organization bad ka jingthung ïa ki Home Guards Volunteer ka dei da ka mon sngewbha bad ki home guards volunteer kim lah ban kam thungkam pura lane pynneh shirta ïa ka jingshakri jong ki.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba wanrah u MLA ka VPP na Nongkrem, u Bah Comingone ula ong ba ka jingthung kam ba la kot bun snem kam ai satia ïa ka hok ïa ki home guard volunteer ba kin bat sah ïa ka kam bad ai ïa kano kano ka hok halor ka jingthungkam ba shipor ne shirta bad ki agency ba thung ïa ki.Ula ong ba ka Tnad Civil Defence & Home Guards ka dei tang ka Agency jong ki Home Guards Volunteers ba la thung da ki Agency bapher bapher. Nalor kane, ki home guards volunteers ki dei kiba shah pynïaid kat kum ki rules bad ki kyndon bala buh da ki agency ba aikam ïa ki.Ka kamram ban siew tulop/allowance sha ki home guard volunteer ruh ka shong ha ki agency ba aikam ïa ki, ula ong haba bynrap ba baroh ki kam ba ïadei bad ka jingshakri jong kine ki volunteer kum ka jingpynsangeh aikam noh ïa ki, ka jingthungkam biang, bad kiwei kiwei, ka shong ha ka bor jong ki agency kiba siew ïa ki jingsiew baroh.U Myntri ula ong ba ka Tnad kala pyrshang ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kumno ban leh eiei halor ki jingud jingnam jong ki Home Guards.
title: Ki Home Guard kim lah ban kam thung kam pura ong u Myntri

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26: U Myntri ka tnat bording u A.T Mondal ula pyntip ba ha ki sngi ban wan ka tnat kan sa pynmih da ka jingbthah lane Circular sha baroh ki ophis treikam jong ki tnat Sorkar ban peitngor haba ïadei bad ki waiar bording lane ki tiar ba pyndonkam bording.Kane ka wan hadien arsngi ba pluh ka ophis treikam Shillong Bar Association (SBA) ïa kaba la suba jur ba ka jingpluh ka dei na ka jingthut jong ki wire bording.Haba pyntip ïa kane u Mondal u la pyntip ba ki don ki jingbthah naka MeECL haba ïadei bad ki sienjam ban shim naka bynta ban ïada na ka jingpluh ding kaba lah ban wan jia namar ka jingthut ka bording lane Short Circuit.“Ngi la shim ïa ka rai ban pynmih da ka jingbthah lane Circular sha baroh ki tnat treikam ba kin pyrkhing bha ïa ki Wire bad kiwei ki tiar bala rim ba pyndonkam bording ïoh don kano kano ka jingthut lane Short Circuit” la ong u Mondal.U Mondal u la pyntip ba kane ka Circular kan dei ruh naka bynta baroh ki ïing shimet ha baroh kawei ka Jylla.U la ong ba ki Wire bad ki tiar ba pyndonkam bording ki don ka snem ba kut ban pyndonkam bad ki paidbah ruh ki dei ban peitngor ban kylla ne bujli noh lada ki la rim.
title: Yn bthah ka Sorkar ïa ki Tnad sorkar ban peitngor ïa ki waiar bording

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : Ka Sorkar Jylla mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la ai jingmynjur ïa ka draft Meghalaya Power Policy 2024, ka ban plie lynti ïa ka jingpyntrei ïa ki project pynmih bording lyngba ka hydro, thermal, pumped storage, solar, wind bad kiwei kiwei, ha ka lynti kaba janai bha.ïa kane la pyntip da u Myntri ka Tnad Bording u Abu Taher Mondal hadien ka jingïalang jong ka kynhun Myntri bad ong “Ngi la ïakren sani bha ïa kane ka Policy ba thymmai bad ka Kynhun Myntri ka la ai jingmynjur ïa ka”.Ula pyntip ba ka power policy kaba rim, ka dei kaba la shna ha u 2010. “Khatsaw snem ka la ïaid ka por bad kam shym la don ki jingkylla kiba heh ha ka jingpynmih bording..kumta ngi donkam ïa ka power policy ba thymmai” ula bynrap.Kane ka policy barim kam shym la kynthup satia ïa ka bynta kaba ïadei bad ka pumped storage project, ïa kaba la kynthup lang mynta.Ka kynhun Myntri ka la rai ruh ban pynkylla ïa ki kyndon jong ka kam pynmih bording na ka sngi (solar energy) haba phai sha ka kam ban thied ïa ki tiar ki tar ban lah pynmih bording na ka sngi.U Myntri ula ong ba kane ka Policy thymmai kan pynshlur ruh ïa ki nongsengkam ba kin wan sha ka Jylla khnang ba kin lah ban pyntrei ïa ki project pynmih bording ha Jylla.Ula pyntip ba baroh ki kam pynmih bording kila shah kynthup lang ha kane ka Power Policy ba thymmai. “Kane ka policy ka dei ka jingbtin lynti ba kumno yn sdang ïa ki project pynmih bording” ula ong.U Myntri ula ong ba ka jingthmu ba hakhmat eh jong ka Policy ka long ban wanrah ïa ki Pumpeed Hydro Power Project hapoh ka Jylla, ban khring ïa ki nongkynshew kam shimet, ban pynmih khajna ïa ka Sorkar bad ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ka Jylla.Nalor kane, ula ong ba ka Policy ka thmu ruh ban wanrah ïa ka thermal power project ba lah ban pynmih bording haduh 250 MW.
title: Mynjur ka Kynhun Myntri ïa ka Meghalaya Power Policy 2024 ban pynkhlain pynmih bording

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : Ha ka sienjam kaba nyngkong kaba kum kane, ka Election Commission of India (ECI) mynta ka sngi ka la ïasoi ïa ka Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) bad artylli ki kynhun, ka Indian Banks’ Association (IBA) bad ka Department of Posts (DoP) ban kyntiew ka jingai jingtip sha ki nongthep vote jong ka bad ki sienjam ai jinghikai hashuwa ka elekshon Lok Sabha ban wan mynta u snem. Kane ka sienjam ka dei ka jingbteng ïa ki sienjam jong ka ECI ban kyntiew ka jingai jingtip shaphang ka elekshon ha ka ri.Kum ban shu kdew, ka ECI dang shen ka la ïasoi MoU bad ka Tnat Pule Puthi jong ka sorkar pdeng ban pynïasoh ïa ka jingnang jingtip shaphang ka elekshon bad ka pule puthi ha ki skul bad ki kolej. La ïasoi ïa ka MoU mynta ka sngi ha ka jingdonlang u Chief Election Commissioner Rajiv Kumar bad u Election Commissioner Arun Goel. U Vineet Pandey Secretary, Department of Posts, u Sunil Mehta, Chief Executive, IBA bad kiwei kiwei ki heh ophisar na ka Tnat Posts, IBA bad ECI ki la ïadonlang ha kane ka jingïalang.Ka MoU bad ka IBA & DoPKum shi bynta ka MoU, ka IBA & DoP lem bad ki dkhot jong ka bad ki kynhun kiba ïasoh bad ka kin ai jingkyrshan ban kyntiew ïa ka jingai jingtip ïa ki nongthep vote lyngba ki rynsan ba ïar jong ki khlem da shim jingsiew ei ei, da kaba wanrah ïa ki prokram bapher bapher ban pynkup bor ïa ki nongshong shnong da ka jingtip shaphang ka hok thep vote jong ki, ki kam bad ki sienjam ban kyntiew kyrteng bad thep vote.Ki Mat ba kongsan jong ka MoU ki kynthup:Ki dkhot bad ki kynhun ba ïasoh kin buh ïa ki khubor ai jinghikai ha ki website jong ki,kiba bthah ïa ki briew ban ïoh jingtip shuh shuh shaphang ka kam jied nongmihkhmat.Ka bynta jong ka jingai jingtip ïa ki nongthep vote kan long ka jingpynsaphriang lyngba ki lad bapher bapher kum ka social media bad ki rynsan jong ki kynhun ba ïatrei lang, da kaba pynthikna ka jingïoh jingtip hapdeng kito kiba don bynta bad ki paidbah.Yn buh ïa ki khubor ai jingtip ïa ki nongthep vote ha ka dur jong ki poster, flex, bad ki hoarding ha ki phyllaw jong ka ophis ha ki jaka ba kongsan, ban poi sha ki briew .Baroh ki kynhun ba long dkhot hapoh ka IBA & DoP kin plie ïa ka Voter Awareness Fora ban kynthup ïa ki nongtrei bad ki briew ha ki jingïamir jingmut bad ki sienjam ba ïadei bad ka jingai jingtip ïa ki nongthep vote.Ka jingai jingtip shaphang ka jingai jinghikai halor ka SVEEP ha ki prokram ai jingtip jong ki nongtrei jong ka IBA & DoP.Ka Tnat Posts kan buh ïa ka stamp kaba kyrpang (ba don ki khubor ba ai jinghikai ïa ki nongthep vote) ha ki mar ba phah lyngba ki post office.Hapdeng ka jingjop ka jingpynïaid bad pynlong elekshon ka Election Commission ha kine ki snem ha ka rukom kaba shai bad kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih ryngkat bad ka jingkiew ka jingïashim bynta jong ki nongthep vote, ka don ruh ka jingsngewkhia ba kumba 30 klur ki nongthep vote (na ka 91 klur), kim shym la wan ban thep vote ha ki elekshon sha ka ïing dorbar thawaiñ Lok Sabha ha u snem 2019. Ka percentage jong ka jingdon ki nongthep vote ka long 67.4%, kaba la Commission ka la shim kum ka thong ban kyntiew ïa ka.Kane ka jingïatreilang bad ka IBA bad ka Department of Posts, ka pyni ïa ka sienjam ba kongsan sha ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ka synshar paidbah da kaba pynkup bor ïa ki nongshong shnong bad ka jingai jingtip shaphang ki hok thep vote jong ki bad ki jingkitkhlieh. Lyngba ki sienjam ba tyngeh, baroh ar ki kynhun ki kut jingmut ban kyntiew ïa ka jinglong kaba don jingtip bad ka jingïashim bynta shitrhem ha ki kam jied nongmihkhmat.Ka Nongrim : ïa ka Indian Banks Association (IBA), la seng ha ka 26 tarik Nailur, 1946, ha kaba la sdang da 22 ngut ki dkhot bad mynta ka don ka rynsan kaba khlaiñ kaba kynthup 247 ngut ki dkhot ha kylleng ka ri. Ki Public sector bank ki long kiba hakhmat da kaba don 90,000 tam ki tnat bad 1.36 lak ki ATM bud sa 42,000 tam ki tnat jong ki Private Sector Bank bad 79,000 tam ki ATM. Ki Regional Rural Bank ki noh synniang 22,400 tam ki tnat, katba ki Small Finance & Payment Bank ki don kumba 7000 tylli ki tnat bad 3000 tam ki ATM. Ki Foreign Bank ki don 840 tylli ki tnat bad 1,158 tylli ki ATM, bad ki Local Area Bank ki don 81 tylli ki tnat. Ka jingdon ki tnat baroh kalong 1.63 lak tam bad 2.19 lak tam ki ATM ha kylleng ka ri.Palat 150 snem, ka Department of Posts (DoP) ka la long u budlum jong ki lad ïakren jong ka ri bad ka don ka bynta ba kongsan ha ka jingkiew ka imlang sahlang bad ka ïoh ka kot jong ka ri. Palat 1,55,000 tylli ki post office, ka DoP ka don ka rynsan kaba heh tam ha ka pyrthei kaba ïadei bad ki kam post office.
title: Yn ïarap ki Bank & ki PO ïa ka ECI ban ai jingtip sha ki nongthep vote shuwa ka elekshon Lok Sabha

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26: U MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ba mihkhmat ïa ka Nongkrem Constituency ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la ong ba ha ka history jong ka synshar khadar ym pat ju don koit ka sorkar kaba bamsap bad ba ap kmang ban pynhiar kput ïa ki MLA ka Liang Pyrshah kum kane ka sorkar kaba mynta.Haba shim bynta ha ka mat ïatai (motion) ïa kaba la wanrah da u MLA ka Congress na Nongstoiñ u Bah Gabriel Wahlang halor ka jinglong nongwei ki riewlum trai muluk na ka daw ba kim don wat tang i lyngkhot khyndew ba rit eh, u Bah Ardent u la ong ba kane ka jingeh kaba ki nongshong shnong ka jylla ki mad ka dei na ka daw ba la synshar ka bamsap bam klop ïa ka jylla.U Bah Ardent u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la kdiah ïa ki bniat ka Meghalaya Transfer of Land Regulations Act da kaba bsut ïa ki amendment ka dei kawei na ki lad kaba ki bym dei ki riewlum trai muluk bad ki briew kiba na bar ban ïoh jaka puta ha ka jylla katba ki trai muluk pat kim ïoh khyndew satia.U la ong ruh ba kaba kham shyrkhei mynta ka dei ka jingthied khyndew da ki riewlum na uwei pat u riewlum na bynta ban ïoh die pateng sha ki bym dei ki riewlum.“Ka jingwanrah ïa ka amendment ha ka Land Transfer Act ka la pyntlot haduh katta katta ïa ka aiñ teh lakam thied ne die kyndew ha ka jylla ha kaba ki briew kiba na bar ki ïoh thied khyndew ha ka kyrteng ka Power of Attorney, ka roi ka par lyngba ki company, ki niam bad kiwei kiwei ki rukom katba ki trai muluk pat ki nang kiew ha ka jingbym don khyndew (landlessness),” u la ong.“Ha ka jingshisha ngi ki riewlum trai muluk ngi la don ki aiñ kiba bun ban ïada ïa ngi, ngi don ki Autonomous District Council, ka Land Transfer Act, ka Prevention of Benami Transaction Act, hynrei balei ka don beit ka jingrit mynsiem ha ngi, ka daw hi lada ngi tih sani ka dei ka jingjur palat ka bamsap bad lada ngi leh klet ïa kane ka daw ka jingeh kaba kham khraw ka nang ap shuh shuh,” u la bynrap.U la ong ba u Myntri Rangbah u la kam ba ka jingpynkylla ïa ka Meghalaya Lokayukta Act ka dei ba kane ka bor tohkit bamsap kan treikam pura, ‘ka jingkylli mynta kaba mih ka long la hato ka ïoh ne em pat ban treikam laitluid’, ong u Bah Ardent.U la ong ruh ba ka jingpynksan u Myntri Rangbah ïa ka jingweng ka sorkar ïa ki ophisar tohkit ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ka dei ka kam kaba i samut ban peit, “La pynshai sha ngi ba la weng ïa kine ki laingut kkt ophisar tohkit ban lait ka lut phut lada thung beit da kiba dang trei ha kane ka kam ha jaka ban thung da kito kiba la shongthait bad ka long kaba i thamula ba udei u juh pat u Myntri Rangbah uba pynksan ïa ka jingpynlut ban siew ïa ka tulop ki 175 ngut ki Chairman bad Co-chairman, Vice Chairman bad Deputy Chairman,” u la ong.“Hana la ïathuh ïa ngi ruh ba ka sorkar ka bakla thung ïa kine ki ophisar tohkit naduh kaba sdang, sngew samut ban sngap ïa kane ka jingai daw namar ngi tip shai ba la weng na ki daw kiba baroh ngi la tip bad kane ka dei ka khubor kaba shai sha ki ophisar ba lada ba lada phi trei hok ïa ka kam kiba kum kine kiei kiei kin jia,” u la bynrap.Haba kren halor ka jingbym treh ka sorkar ban mynjur ïa ka kyrteng ki dkhot ka Block Development Monitoring Council (BDMC) u Bah Ardent u la ong ba kane ka dei ka kam bamsap kaba khraw, ‘namar haba ngi ong bamsap kam thew tang ïa ka kam pisa tyngka hynrei ka kynthup ïa ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka bor bad ka jingïaid lait na ki kyndon bad ki rukom ba dei ban ïaid,’ u la ong.“La shisnem tam ki MLA kiba thymmai kane ka ïingdorbar ki la shimti na ki MLA kiba rim hynrei sngew lyngngoh ba ki dkhot ha ka Block Development Monitoring Council ki briew kiba ki MLA kiba la rem ki thung dkhot ki bteng haduh mynta katba kat kum ki rukom ka dei ba ynda la kut ka samoi san snem ki MLA kiba thymmai ki ju phah ïa ka kyrteng ki dkhot kane ka committee sha ka sorkar hynrei tad haduh mynta kiba bun ki MLA na ka liang pyrshah ki dkhot kiba ki la phah kim pat ïoh jingmynjur haduh mynta, lada ka sorkar kam mynjur kloi lan ïa kane ngim banse ban mih surok ban pynbor ïa ka sorkar halor kane bad ban sei madan ruh ïa ki kam buit tuh ka sorkar bad ruh ka jingpeit poh ïa u paidbah ba la jied ïa ngi”, kynthoh u Bah Ardent.“Lehse kum ki dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah bad ka sorkar ngi lah ban ïa sei ki jingpyni nia ha ïingdorbar hynrei ka sorkar ka dei ban sngewthuh ba kam dei ba ngi ïania shimet hynrei ka dei ka jingpyni nia halor ki mat bad policy treikam jong ka sorkar,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u la ong ba kane ka jingleh ka sorkar ka dei ka jingpynhiar kput (vindictive) ïa ngi kiba ha Liang Pyrshah bad “Ym ju don koit ka sorkar ka kum kane” u la ong.
title: Ym pat ju don koit ka sorkar ba bamsap bad ba kput kum kane kaba mynta: Ardent

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26: Hadien ka jingap ba palat shi taiew ïa ka jingshimkhia jong ki bor halor ka jingshah set tulop, ki nongtrei ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) ki la mih da ki spah ngut ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih ba lai sngi ka ba la sdang mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei.Hapoh ka lama jong ka Non Gazetted Employees Association, ki nongtrei ka GHADC kila ïalum ha madan Tura Government College ha Teteng A’ja ban sdang ïa ka jingïakhih.Ha ryngkat ki Banners bad Placards, ki nongtrei ki la dawa ban pyllait noh ïaka tulop jong baroh 32 bnai bad naka liang ki nongïalam ka NGEA kila pynpaw ba la bun bun sien ki la ju pynsngew sha ka Executive Committee (EC) jongka GHADC halor ka tulop hynrei haduh mynta ki khlem pat ïoh kano kano ka jingkular kaba la pynlong ïa ki ban sdang noh daka jingïakhih naduh mynta ka sngi.U President ka NGEA u Brithin M Sangma haba kren sha ki para nongïakhih ula ong ba ki long kiba la kloi ban ïakren lada ki shah khot ha ki bor ka GHADC naka bynta ban ïakren halor ka tulop.Ki nongtrei kila sdang ïa ka jingïakhih naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep haduh 4 baje janmiet. Kane ka jingïakhih ki nongtrei kan ktah bad ka pyndkoh ïa ki kam ki jam hapoh ka district council bad mynta ka sngi la sakhi ka jingthylli ki kamram treikam bad ki miej treikam ka ban ktah ïaka ïoh ka kot jong ka Council.Naka liang ki nongtrei ka GHADC ki la pynlong ka jingïakhih hapoh ka madan jong ka College namar ki bor district ki la mana ban pynlong ka jingïakhih ha phyllaw treikam ka council.
title: Sdang ka ïakhih ki Nongtrei GHADC bym ïoh tulop la 32 bnai

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26: U MP ka Congress na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency u Ma Vincent H Pala, la kynnoh ba u khlem khot pynlong ïa ka jingïalang jong ka DISHA ha East Khasi Hills bad Ri-Bhoi District ha kine ki shisnem bala leit noh.ïa kane la pyntip da u Myntri ka Tnad Community & Rural Development u Abu Taher Mondal haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli hapoh ka Dorbar Mang tyngka hynne ka sngi Nyngkong.Halor ka jingkyrpad jong u MLA ka VPP na Mawryngkneng bad MLA ka UDP na Nongpoh ban kyntu ïa u MP ba un khot ïa ka jingïalang jong ka DISHA, u Mondal ula ong “Ngan sa pyntip ïa u MP ba un khot ïa ka jingïalang jong ka DISHA”.Kat kum ka jingong jong u, ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingïalang jong ka DISHA ka shong ha ka bor jong u MP bad ka dei ka jingïalang ban shong bishar kam halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ki flagship programme bapher bapher ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ruh ban khmih ïa ki jingeh ba mad da ki nongïoh jingmyntoi.Haba jubab bynrap, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ula ong ba ka DISHA kam dei satia ka prokram jong ka Sorkar Jylla.“Kam dei ka kamram jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang. Ka Sorkar India ka peitngor(ïa ki skhim ka Sorkar Pdeng) lyngba ki MP bad ki MP jong kato ka Constituency ki don ïa ka bor ban khot ïa ka jingïalang namar ka dei ka kam ba long beit tang hapdeng ki Tnad sorkar bad u MP bad u MP u dei ruh u Chairman ban khot ïa ka jingïalang”ula ong.
title: Dei u ma Vincent uba khlem khot pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ka DISHA ha East Khasi bad Ri Bhoi : Mondal

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang, 25: Kum u riew rangbah ha kaba wat lada um don ïa ka jingnang jingstad kaba u hap ban pyndap jakpoh tang da ki kam bylla, hynrei ka kam kaba u trei la dei ban ai jingïaroh ha kaba ym tang ba u ïoh kam ïoh jam bad u long ruh uwei na u nongshong shnong uba don bynta ha kaba ïada kyrpang ïa ka mei mariang.Une u samla rangbah la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Arjun Nongshli bad u shong u sah ha ka Shnong Pahamsyiem ha Ri Bhoi.Haba phai sha ka jingim jong une u rangbah, kiba bun lehse ki nongshong shnong kim poi pyrkhat ba u leh ïa kawei na ka kam kaba khraw kaba u dei ban ïoh ïa ka jingïaroh, hynrei bun ki klet namar ba u dei u rangbah uba duna ha ka jingnang jingstad bad u pynim jakpoh ïa lade tang ka kam bylla sngi.Kumba la lap da u Mawphor, u Bah Arjun Nongshli, u dei uwei na u rangbah uba trei shitom bad uba pynim jakpoh ïa lade tang da ki kam bylla sngi. Nalor ka ka bylla sngi kaba u la ju trei baroh shi katta, kawei na ka kam ba dei ban ai jingïaroh ka long ba u la sdang pat da kawei ka kam kata ban tam ïa ki bitor um, ki bitor kyiad ha kylleng ki jaka ka thaiñ Nongpoh, kaba long shi bynta ban ïada ïa ka mei maraing.Haba trei ïa kane kam ban tam ne lum kyrpang ïa ki bitor um, ki bitor kyiad ba ju bret pathar da ki riew bym don jingkitkhklieh ïa ka mariang, u Bah Arjun Nongshli u la shna kyrpang syndon da ka Kali Thela (Tri-cycle) ban pyndonkam ha kaba lum ïa kitei ki bitor um bad ki bitor kyiad bad ïa kane ka Thela la ai sngewbha ruh da u MLA ka Nongpoh, u Bah Mayral Born Syiem ba un pyndonkam na ka bynta ka kam kaba u trei ha kaba lum ïa kitei ki bitor ha kylleng ki jaka paidbah ha ka thaiñ Nongpoh.Haba kren halor ka khuid ka suba, lah ban ong ba bun haduh kine ki snig kim pa don lang kata ka jingkitkhlieh ban wan rah ïa ka khuid ka suba ha ki jaka paidbah, ha kaba bun ki dang bret pathar ïa ki jaboh khamtam ki botor um, ki bitor kyiad ha ki jaka paidbah bad une u rangbah pat u dei uwei na u nonglum nonglang ban lum ïa kitei ki jaboh kaba long shi bynta ban ïada ïa ka mei mariang.Kumba la ïathuh da u Arjun Nongshli, u la ong ba u la sdang ïa kane ka kam la kham slem hadien ba u la iehnoh noh ïa ka kam bylla sngi bad phai noh sha kane ka kam bad da ka jingtrei shitom u shang kylleng ki shnong bad ki jaka paidbah ha ka thaiñ Nongpoh ban lum ïa ki bitor um ne ki bitor kyiad ba bret ki riew paidbah bad hadien ba u la lum u sa leit ban die kylla na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka bainong trei jong u.Haba kren halor ki kam ba la trei da une u rangbah, ki bor shnong, ki bor sorkar ki la dei ban ai jingïaroh ïa u ha kaba wat la um dei u briew uba la don ka jingnang jingstad bad phewse u trei pat ïa ka kam kaba ai nuksa sha baroh ki nongshong shnong ba kim dei ban bret pathar ïa ki jaboh bad ki dei ban don lang kata ka mynsiem jong ka jingïatrei lang na ka bynta ka khuid ka suba bad ruh ban ïada kyrpang ïa ka mariang, namar ka jingbret pathar ïa ki jaboh khamtam ki bitor, ki plastic bad ki bilor kyiad ka ktah shisha ïa ka mei mariang.
title: Watla um don jingnang jingstad da ka nuksa pyni u rangbah ban ïada mariang

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la ong ban thaw da kawei pat ka tnad ban peit kyrpang tang na ka bynta ka jingpynbha ïa ki surok kan sa ktah ïa ka pla tyngka jong ka sorkar.Haba jubab halor ka motion ba wanrah da u MLA ka UDP na Mawkyrwat, Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “Ban thaw da kawei pat ka tnad ba thymmai lane don la ka jong ka agency ban peit ïa ka jingpynbha ïa ki surok kan sa ktah jur ïa ka pla tyngka jong ka sorkar namar ïa ka Agency Charge ruh hap ban pynrung ha ka mangtyngka.” U ong ruh ba lada leh kumta, kan sa long kumba knieh noh ïa ka kam ba la aiti ha kito ki engineer kiba la don ha ka department.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka sorkar ka la nang pynkhlain bad pyndonkam shwa ïa ki nongtrei kiba la don lypa ha ka tnad, u ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka la nang kyntiew mynta ïa ka mangtyngka man u snem ban ïakhun ïa kitei ki jingeh.U ong ruh ba ïa ka Monitoring and Evaluation Branch jong ka tnad Public Works Department (Roads) la pynkupbor ban ïarap bad treilang haba ïadei bad ka kam ban pynbha ïa ka RAMS.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka pisa ba la mang na byna ban pynbha ïa ka surok na bynta ka samoi treikam 2023-24 katkum ka mang tyngka ka long 414.213 klur kynthup ïa ka 75 klur hapoh ka Central Road Fund, 6.00 klur na bynta ban pynphah ïa ki National Highways bad 50.00 klur ban pynbha ïa ki surok PMGSY.Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba na kane ka pisa, kumba 113.21 klur yn pynlut na ka bynta ka tulop ïa ki nongtrei bad ki muster roll. Kumta, u ong ba ka pisa kaba sah na bynta ban pynbha ïa ki surok ka long sa 170 klur tyngka.U ong ruh ba ka jingdonkam pisa na bynta ban pynbha ïa ki surok katkum ki kyndon jong ka Ministry of Road Transport & Highway ka long 484 klur tyngka katba ka pisa kaba don na bynta ka samoi treikam jong u 2023-24 ka long tang 170.00 klur tyngka.Nalorkata, u ong ruh ba ka jingbym dap ka pisa ka khanglad ïa ka tnad ban pynthymmai ïa ki surok ban pyntikna ba kin kham neh slem.Haba ïadei pat bad ki jingkieng dieng (semi permanent timber bridge) u la ong ba ka long kaba donkam ban leh kyrkieh noh khnang ban khanglad ïa ka jingthut ka leit ka wan ki kali.Nangta u ïathuh ba ka jingmaramot ïa ki surok na ka bynta ban pyntikna ïa ka jingshngain ïa ka jingim bad ka jingdon jingem ki nongshong shnong bad ruh ba kan ym don ka jingthut ia ka leit ka wan ka la dei ka dawbah ba ki sahkut khlem pat lah siew haduh 582.00 klur tyngka ka bill jong ki kontraktor haduh ka 01.07.2023.
title: Ba ka ktah ïa ka pla tyngka ym lah ban thung da kawei ka tnad kyrpang ban peit tang ïa ki surok

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Nyngkong, ula pyntip ba ka Sorkar kala ïoh pdiang palat laiphew hajar tylli ki aplikeshon lynga ka skim CM-Elevate tang hapoh ka arbnai.Ïa kane, u Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip hapoh ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka jylla ha ka sngi nyngkong, haba jubab ïa ki jingkylli jong ki dkhot ka liang pyrshah.Haba u MLA ka UDP na Mawkyrwat Bah Renikton L Tongkhar u kwah ban tip ïa ki subsidy ba ai ïa ka kam ri jingri jingdup, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ïa ka prokram ka dei kaba dang shu sdang ha u snem bala leit noh ha kaba ka Sorkar kala sam ïa ki khun sniang, khun syiar sha ki nongrep bapher bapher.Ula ong, kawei na ki prokram ba kongsan eh ka dei ka CM-Elevate, ha kaba ka Sorkar kala ai ïa ka subsidy kaba heh duh khamtam sha ki kam ri jingri jingdup kaba long haduh 50%.Halor ka jingkylli balei ka Sorkar kam ai lang kajuh ka jingmyntoi bala ai hapoh ka Industrial Policy sha ki nongri jingri, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong “Ka daw hi ka long ba ka kam ri jingri ka dei ka kam ri jingri bad ka kam karkhana ka dei ka karkhana kat kum ki jingbatai bad kumta, ym lah satia ban pynïakhleh”.Hynrei ula pyntip ba ka Sorkar kala ai ïa ki jingkyrshan kiba bun ïa ki nongrep hapoh ka Jylla. Ula pyntip ba palat 100 tylli ki pickup truck la ai ban pynkit ïa ki marrep jong ki nongrep. “Ngi kwah ban ai biang sa 500 tylli ki kali ha kine ki san snem ban wan” ula ong.
title: Palat 30 hajar tylli ki aplikeshon la ioh pdiang ha ka skhim CM Elevate

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Nyngkong, ula pyntip ba shen ka Sorkar kan sa pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna halor ka jingpynjlan ïa ka rta thungkam ha ki saw tylli ki tnad treikam ka Sorkar.Kine ki kynthup ia ka Home (Police), Execise Registration, Taxation and Stamps, Home Guards bad Civil Defence lem bad ka Tnad Forest & Environment.Haba jubab ïa ka mat ïatai ba lyngkot ba la wanrah da u MLA ka VPP na Mawlai, u Conrad ula ong “Ka kynhun Myntri kaba shong jingïalang ha ka 24 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ka la mynjur ïa ka jingtyrwa ban buh noh da u pud ba rit eh bad ba heh duh ka rta ha ka jingthungkam ha ki 4 tylli ki tnad. ïa ka jingpynbna paidbah yn sa pynmih noh shen”.Ula ong ba kat kum ka office memorandum ba 11 tarik Jylliew 1973, ka rta ba heh duh ban rung kam Sorkar ba la kyntiew na ka 25 sha ka 27 snem la nang pynjynsur shuh shuh sa 5 snem na ka bynta ki nongwadkam kiba dei ki Scheduled Tribe bad Scheduled Caste.U Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka Sorkar na ka por sha ka por ka la ïoh ïa ka jingtyrwa ban kyntiew ïa ka rta thungkam na ki tyllong bapher bapher bad haba shong bishar bha, ka Tnad Personnel & AR (A) lyngba ka Office Memorandum ba 3 tarik Rymphang 2022, ka la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna ban pynheh ia ka rta ba hehduh ban ïoh kam Sorkar na ka 27 sha ka 32 snem bad pynjlan sa 5 snem ia ki nongwadkam kiba dei ki Scheduled Tribe bad Scheduled Caste.
title: Shen yn pynmih ka sorkar ïa ka jingpynbna halor ka jingpynjlan ïa ka rta thungkam

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : U MLA ka Nongpoh, Bah Mayralborn Syiem ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la kyntu ïa ka sorkar jylla ba kan pyntreikam noh da ki kyndon na ka bynta ban tehlakam ïa ki youtuber kiba pynphriang ïa ki khubor ba bakla da ka jingthmu ei ei sha lyndet.Ïa kane u MLA u la pynpaw haba wanrah da ka zero hour notice ha Ïing Dorbar halor ka jingjia shah pynthohbria jong u nongïalam ka Synjuk Ki Rangbah Shnong Ri Bhoi (SRSRB), Bah BB Makdoh ha kawei ka youtube channel kaba ai da ka khubor bym dei.“Nga kyntu ïa ka sorkar jylla ba kan pyntreikam noh da ki kyndon ban aibor ïa ka sorkar ban tehlakam ha ka rukom ai jingtip kiba bakla sha ki paidbah khnang ba kum kito ki youtuber kiba don ka jingthmu ba sha lyndet bad kito ki briew kiba shna ïa ki khubor bym dei kin ngat,” u la ong.Shuh shuh da kaba ong ba katei ka zero hour notice kam dei ban pynjah burom ïano ïano, u MLA u la ong ba la ïohi mynta ïa ka jingmih ki youtuber kum ki tit. “Ka jingjïa pyrshah ïa u chairman kam dei satia ban jia. Ka long kaba sngewsih ba ïa ka burom jong u briew yn pynthohbria da kane ka rukom,” u la bynrap shuh shuh.Nalorkata, u Bah Mayral ula ong ba ki don ar jait ki youtuber, kata kiba pyndonkam hok ban ai ka jingtip kaba shisha sha ki paidbah kaba long ka jingïarap na bynta jong ki bad don pat ki jait youtuber kiba pyrshang ban shim kabu ïa ki jingjia tang ban pynsngewbha ïano re.“Ka long kaba sngewsih ban ïohi mynta ki por, ngam ong ïa baroh hynrei ki don khyndiat kiba la tam pud tang na bynta ka khubor ba ïoh jingsiew, ki klet noh ba ka don ka pyrthei shabar ka social media, youtube. Don pat kiba trei na bynta jongno re ban pynjah burom.”Haba jubab halor kane, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ïa kito kiba leh ïa kane ka kam ki la shah khot hajri ha Nongpoh Police Station bad ïa ka video la dep ban weng noh na youtube.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba ha ka juk social media lah ban pynïasoh bad ka pyrthei baroh kawei hynrei ka long ruh kum ka rynsan ban pynphriang ïa ki khubor lamler, ne ki jingthoh ba ïalam bakla kaba la pynlong ïa ka tnad pulit ban sngewkhia bha.La ïathuh ruh ba ka la thaw Cyber Crime Wing ban ïakhun ïa kane bad ban peitngor ïa ki kam leh thok lyngba kine ki kor ki bor ka juk mynta bad ruh ban ai jinghikai ïa ki paidbah ha kane ka juk internet.U Myntri Rangbah u la pyntip ruh ba naduh u snem 2019 haduh u Kyllalyngkot 2024 ki la don haduh 42 tylli ki jingjïa ba la rejistar ha ka cyber crime police station.U kyntu ruh ïa nongpyndonkam ïa ki social media ba ki dei ban da pyntikna ïa ka tynrai ha shwa ba kin thep ha ki rynsan social media.Shuh shuh u la ong ba u la shim ruh ïa ka jingai jingmut jong u MLA ban don noh da ki kyndon ban teh lakam ïa kine baroh.
title: Donkam ban don ka aiñ ban tehlakam ïa ki youtuber ba ïalam bakla bad pynthohbria : MLA Nongpoh

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : U Myntri ka tnad Pule Puthi ka sorkar jylla, Rakkam A Sangma ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la pyntip ha Ïing Dorbar ba ka tnad pule puthi kum shi bynta ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka National Education Policy (NEP) 2020 ka la bthah ïa ki skul ba ha ki sngi ba la buh , ki khynnah ki lah ban leit sha skul khlem donkam rah ïa ki pla kot.Haba jubab halor ka call attention ba wanrah da u MLA ka VPP na Shillong North, Bah Adelbert Nongrum na ka liang u Myntri ula ong ba ha kitei ki sngi, ki khynnah ki lah ban shim bynta bad nang ïa kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka jingpule.U ong ruh ba la ai bor ha ki skul ïa ka thup jong kita ki ‘10 sngi ban ym rah pla kot’. Mynta ka shong ha ki skul ban rai ha kano ka sngi ba ki kwah ban bud ïa kine ki sngi.“La khot ruh ïa ka jingïasyllok ba ka jingpan jingmut halor kane. Ka jingai jingmut ba ïoh na kane ka long ba ha ka snem long skul dei ban pyllait lang ïa kane kham hashwa khnang ba ki skul kin lah ban pynkhreh. Kumta, ïa ka snem long skul jong u 2025 (school calendar 2025) yn sa pynbna noh ha u Naiwieng jong une u snem hi,” u la ong.U ong ruh ba ka school calendar ka long ban long ban long salonsar lut haba ïadei bad ka jingsdang ïa ki skul bad ka jingpynkut ïa ka snem long skul kumba la kdew katkum ka RTE Act.Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba ka jingtip kiba bniah na ka bynta ki kyndon (SoP) ban pyntreikam ïa ki sngi ban ym rah pla kot sha skul yn sa kdew lang ha ka notification.Nalorkata, u Myntri u la ong ruh ba ka tnad ka pynshlur ruh ïa ki skul ba kin shim ïa ki sienjam ban pyntikna ban jam shakhmat katkum ba la kdew ha ka NEP 2020.Haba kren halor ka jingkiew bai skul ha ki skul sorkar ne ki skul ba kyrshan da ka sorkar, u Myntri u la ong ba ki la don ki kmie ki kpa kumjuh ki khynnah kiba wan ban ïa kren halor kane.“Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la thaw ïa ka Meghalaya State Education Commission bad ka dang bishar bniah ïa kine baroh. Kane ym dei tang ha ki skul hynrei ha ki kyrdan kiba kham heh kum ha ki college, ki university kiba ka jingsiew ka ïapher bha,” u la bynrap shuh shuh.U Myntri u ong ruh ba ka sorkar kan sa thaw ïa ka komiti ban peit bniah halor kane bad mynta ki dang ap shwa ïa ka Education Commission ban ai ïa ki jingai jingmut bad ki jingbthah halor kane.“Ka sorkar kan sa bishar bniah ïa kane ha ki lai bynta jong ki skul, kata ha ki skul sorkar bad ha ki skul ba kyrshan da ka sorkar,” u la bynrap shuh shuh.
title: Ym donkam rah pla kot sha skul ha ki sngi ba la pynbeit : Jubab u Myntri ha ïing Dorbar

content: Jowai, Rymphang 27 : U Hony. General Secretary ka West Jaiñtia Sports Association, Jowai u ma Lammat oo Laloo ula pyntip ba ka Association ka khot ïa baroh ki Waheh Shnong, Secretary, Sports Secretary, ki Affiliated Club hapoh ka ka West Jaiñtia Sports Association, Jowai ba kin wan ban pynthymmai noh (Renewal) na ka bynta une u snem 2024.La pyntip ba ka Executive Council kaba la long haka 24 tarik u Rymphang kala shim ïa ka rai ban khot noh ïa ka jingpynthymmai (Renewal) ïa baroh kiba pynïasoh bad ka WJDSA, ka tarik ba khadduh ban pdiang kan long ha lane shwa ka 31.03.2024 da kaba pynpoi sha u Hony. General Secretary ka seng u ma Lammat oo Laloo, kiba wan pynpoi palat ïa katei ka tarik bala buh yn ym lah ban pdiang shuh ïaki.Na ka bynta kito ki Club kiba don ha ki Division kiba don shaeng na ka 3rd Division lada kim wan ban pynthymmai hapoh une u snem kin hap ban sdang pat ha ki snem ki ban wan. Ka bai Renew kan long Rs. 1,000/- Shi hajar tyngka.Shuh shuh ka Association kala pyntip ïa ka Dorbar Kut Snem kaba thmu ban long haka 27.02.2024 ym lah satia ban pynlong namar bym pat pyndep ïa ka Audit Report.
title: Baroh ki Club ne Kynhun ba pynïasoh bad ka WJDSA kin hap wan pynthymmai

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang 27 : Kum ka dak jong ka jingburom ïa ki nongïalehkai volleyball jong ka South West Khasi Hills District kiba la mihkhmat ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 kaba la long dang shen ha Tura, na ka liang ka South West Khasi Hills District Volleyball Association (SWKHDVA) ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram pynkup burom ïa ki hapoh ka Community Hall, Mawkyrwat ha kaba u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency u la long kum u kongsan.Lah ban kdew ba ha kane jingïalehkai volleyball jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 na ka liang ki kynthei ki la rah ïa ka nam jop ryngkat ka khusnam da ka takma ksiar katba ki shynrang pat ki ïoh rah ïa ka khusnam da ka takma rupa.U bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar haba kren kum u kongsan u la ong ba ha ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher, marwei u ‘rangïalehkai un nym poi shaei shaei hynrei kaba donkam ka long ka jingïakyrshan lang jong ki nongïalehkai hapoh ka kynhun. Haba kren ha kaba ïa dei bad ki sap ki phong ba U Blei U ai, u bah Renikton u la ai mynsiem ïa ki nongïalehkai kiba don shisha ïa kata ka sap kyrpang ba U Blei U ai ba kim dei ban pynleh noh ei hynrei ki dei ban pyndonkam hok ïa ka khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ha ka jingim jong ki.U la ong ruh ba watla ka dang long ka distrik kaba rit, hynrei ha kaba ïa dei bad ki jait jingïalehkai pat ki khun samla ki la sei shisha ïa kita ki sap jong ki ban mih sha lympung ban ïa khun bad ha kane ka jingïalehkai volleyball watla ka dang long kaba nyngkong ha kane ka Meghalaya Games hynrei ki samla shynrang bad kynthei ki la pyni bad ïalehkai bha da kaba ki la wanrah ruh ka jingjop.“Nga la kren ruh hapoh Assembly ba ka South West Khasi Hills District ka dei kawei na ki distrik kaba ju pynmih ïa ki nongïalehkai kumta ka don hok ruh mynta ban don noh ïa ka Sports Complex kaba pura khnang ba kan long ka jingïarap ïa ki nongïalehkai”, pynpaw u bah Renikton da kaba kular ruh ba ym tang ba u kren tang da ka ktien hynrei un sa bud-dien ba ka jingthmu baroh kan urlong.Namarkata, lyngba ka jingkren jong u, u la ai mynsiem ïa samla kiba don ki nongïalehkai ba kin pyrshang ban don ha baroh ki jait jingïalehkai khnang ba kan long ka jingïarap namar kumba ka long haduh mynta kum ka South West Khasi Hills District ka don tang 11 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai.U la pynkut ïa ka jingkren da kaba ula ai ka jingkitbok kit-rwiang ïa ki ‘rang bad ki ‘thei ïalehkai volleyball kiba la wan rah ka nam ka burom ïa ka distrik ba nangne shakhmat kin sa nang ïalehkai kham bha shuh shuh ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ki hi bad kumba ka long mynta haduh 5 ngut na kane ka South West Khasi Hills District ki la shah jied ban leit sha ka jingkilanmet da ka Meghalaya State Volleyball Association (MSVA).Ki nongkren ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ïa u bah Y.G. Lyngdoh, Working President jong ka Mawkyrwat District Sports Association (MDSA), ka kong Insyrpaihun Kharlyngdoh kawei na ki ‘thei ïalehkai Volleyball bad na u bah Elevenson Wanniang, President ka Volleyball Association.Lah ruh ban kdew na ka liang ka Meghalaya State Volleyball Association (MSVA) ka la jied ruh ïa ki ‘rangïalehkai kiba na kylleng ki distrik hapoh jong ka Meghalaya ha kaba 5 ngut na ki ki dei napoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District kita ki long u Pynsuklang Lartang, u Ksankupar Wanniang, u Hillarius Shylla, u Banteilang Wanniang bad u Wadborlang Mylliem.La pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u bah Forwardman Nongrem, Vice President jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Volleyball Association (SWKHDVA) bad uba la ai ruh ki kyntien pdiang sngewbha bad ka jingkren khublei na u bah Downing Marweiñ, Finance Secretary jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Volleyball Association (SWKHDVA).
title: Ba wanrah burom ïa ka distrik, pynkup burom ka SWKHDVA ïa ki ‘rang bad ki ‘thei ïalehkai volleyball

content: H a ki snem kiba mynshwa kata 15 ne 20 snem mynshwa, ban ïoh laisen ñiah kali ka long kaba eh bad jynjar haduh katta katta namar ki ophisar kiba dei peit ïa ka District Transport Office (DTO) ki long kiba pyrkhing bad kim ju ailad satia da lei lei ruh ba ki paidbah kin ïoh ïa ka laisen lada kito ki nongwan pan kim pat lah bha ïa ki kyndon ñiah kali.Nalorkata, wat hadien ba kito kiba wan pan laisen ki la nang ban ñiah ïa ka kali hynrei lada kim pat tip pat ïa ki jingkdew (signal) bapher bapher kin hap shwa ban lah lyndet bad hadien ba la pyntikna ba ki la lah shisha, kin sa ïoh ïa ka laisen, kata ruh khlem da donkam BAISHA.Hynrei ka long kaba sngewsih ba ha kane ka pateng ba mynta, don ruh kiba ïoh laisen kiba tang ka kali ruh kim pat nang ñiah bha. Hato balei kine baroh ki jia?. Lehse dei namar la suk palat ban ïoh ïa ka laisen tang namar ba biang ka BAISHA (kaba ki ju ong hynrei kaba palat pat wat ïa ka bai bam shibnai) kaba ki ju pynkham ha kito ki ‘dalal’ kiba ju don ha ki phyllaw jong ki DTO. Kane ka jingïoh license pathar pat ka buh ïa ka jingim briew ha ka jingma namar bunsien jia ki aksident, ki jingkylla kali bad duh ei ki mynsiem briew dei namar ba ki nongniah kim pat dei kiba la tbit bha ban niah la shu niah katba lap ba shem da kaba shu pynher shongshit ïa ka kali khlem da pyrkhat ïa ki mynsiem briew ba ki kit ne kiba ïaid ha surok ruh.Kaba kham i ma eh kadei ba bun ki draibar kim ithuh ïa ki zebra crossing lane ki jaka ba la ruid bha ha pdeng surok bah na ka bynta ki paidbah ba kin kam sha shilliang. Kane kam jia tang ha nongkyndong hynrei ka khamjur pynban ha nongbah Shillong. Man ka sngi naduh ki riew paidbah haduh ki nongtrei ophis kiba don ha ki bynta jong ka Additional secretariat bad ruh ha Main Secretariat ki hap ban ap slem slem ban ïoh kam sha shilliang tang na ka daw ba ki draibar kim ithuh ïa u zebra crossing.Ki don ruh ki khep ba ki paidbah ki la thmu ban kam sha shilliang hynrei ka jingbym ithuh jong ki draibar ïa kitei ki jingkdew, ki paidbah ba pli ki la hap ban kynthih biang shadien da ka jingtieng ïoh mynsaw ei khamakha. Ka jingbym teh pyrkhing ha ka rukom ai laisen kadei ruh ka dawbah ba ka tnad pulit ka kynduh jingeh bha bad kane kadei ruh ka dawbah kaba pynlong ïa ka jingdheng kali ha kiba bun ki jaka namar bun kim pat tip satia wat tang ïa ki kyndon ba hap ban burom ne ailad ïa ki nongïaid lynti lyngba kitei ki Zebra Crossing.Hato haduh katno kein ki pulit pynïaid kali kin don por ban hikai naduh A-Z ïa ki nongñiah kali ba kin tip ïa ki kyndon ñiah kali baroh. Katei hi ka pawshai ba na ki DTO ki shu ai pathar ïa ki laisen kaba poi haduh u pud ba ki nongñiah kali kim tip shuh wat ïa kaei ka bym dei ban leh bad kaei kaba kidei ban leh haba ki don ha kali.Lah ban ong ruh ba dei na ka daw ka jingai laisen pathar ba ki pulit ha ki snem ba la lah ki la buddien ïa ka bamsap ha ka ophis District Transport Office bad pynpaw pyrthei syndon ïa ka jigdonkti lang ki nongtrei jong ka bad kito ki dalal ban pynïoh laisen, permit bad kiwei kiwei.Ka la dei ruh ka por ba ki heh pulit ka Jylla kin treilang bad ka Transport Department khnang ban teh lakam ïa ka rukom ai laisen khnang ba kito kiba pan kin hap ban da pynbiang tikna thik pa thik ïa ki jingdonkam baroh shwa ba kin ïoh. Namar la ju ïohi ruh na ka por sha ka por bad lah ban ong ba ka jia ruh jan man ka sngi ki pulit ki ju ïoh dain kuna ïa ki kali. Lada dei ba ki tip aiñ lehse katei kan ym jia.Ka tnad pulit kumjuh ka ophis Transport lyngba ki ophis DTO ki la dei ban tohkit ruh la ka jingbun ki jingjia aksiden kiba jia kylleng kylleng ïoh ki lah ban dei na ka daw ba kito ki draibar ki dei ki bym pat biang ka jingtbit ban ñiah kali.
title: Ka jingsuk ban ïoh Licence ka buh ïa ki mynsiem briew ha ka jingma pat

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26: U Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad Sangma, u la ïathuh ha ïingdorbar Thawaiñ mynta ka sngi, ba ka sorkar ka la pynmih haduh 2.3 lak tylli ki kam tang ha kine ki lai snem bala leit noh bad ka don jingthmu ban pynkha sa 1 lak tylli ha kine ki shisnem ban sa wan.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba ka jingbym ïohkam ha Meghalaya mynta ka long 3%, kaba duna ïa ka National average ba kpt 4.7%.Ula ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla kala pyntreikam ïa ki skhim/prokram bapher bapher ban plie lad ïa ka ïoh kam ïohjam ïa ki nongshongshnong. Kine ki kynthup ïa ka MGNREGS, CM-Elecvate, PRIME Program, FOCUS, FOCUS+, ki Mission ha ka rep ka riang, ka Meghalaya Grassroot Music Project, Chief Minister’s Youth Centre, National Rural Livelihood Mission bad ka Skill Meghalaya.Haba pynpaw ba ka Sorkar kala buh ïa ka thong ban pynkha haduh 5.5 lak ki kam ha kine ki san snem ban wan, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong “Lada shu khein malu mala, ngin pynkha kumba 1 lak ki kam ha une u snem ban wan”.Nalor kane, u Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ba palat 3000 tylli ki kam la pynkha ha ki kam Sorkar bad kine ki kynthup ïa 500 tylli ki kam doktor bad 30 ki nos bad technical staff lah dep ban thung hapoh ka Tnad ka Koit ka Khiah, 1000 tylli ha ka tnad Pulit bad 1000 tylli ha ka kam nonghikai.Hynrei ula ong ba nalor kane, la pynkha ruh ïa ki kam ha ki District hynrei ym don jingkhein pat katno tylli ki don.Nalor kane, u Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ba ka Sorkar kala buh ïa ka thong ban pynkha ïa palat 2.5 lak ki kam ha ka kam rep kam riang ha kine ki 4-5 snem ban wan.Ula ong ba ka NRLM kala dei ka model ba jop ha kine ki san snem bala leit noh ha kaba ka Sorkar kala lah ban pynkha ïa 1 lak ki kam na ka bynta ki kynthei bad kan pynkha ruh sa 1 lak ki kam ha kine ki 4 snem ban wan bad bynrap ba ha ka Skill Meghalaya, 1.2 lak ngut ki briew kila ïoh jinghikai pyntbit ha kaba 50% kin sa ïoh kam.Ula ong ba ka kam jngoh kai ruh kan aikam ai jam ïa kumba 50,000 ngut katba ka CM-Elevate kan pynkha ïa palat 50,000 tylli ki kali bad ka IT kan pynkha 20,000 ki kam. Sa 10,000 tylli ki kam kin long ha ki prokram bapher bapher ka Sorkar.“Kumta, ngin sa kynjoh ïa ka 5.5 lak ka jingpynïoh kam ha kine ki san snem ban wan” bynrap u Conrad.Kane ka jingïathuh u Conrad ka long halor ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Congress na Nongstoiñ, u Bah Gabriel Wahlang.Haba ïadei bad ka jingthungkam da ki District Selection Committee (DSC), u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba kam long satia kaba shisha ba ki DSC kin shym la khot thep kam namar kila pynïaid beit ïa ka jingthungkam watla kam dei eh kaba bun.
title: Palat 2 lak tang ha ki 3 snem pynmih kam ka sorkar, kam u Myntri Rangbah

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang, 27: Ka Nongpoh Area Women Welfare Association (NAWWA) kum kawei na ka kynhun ki Seng Longkmie ha Ri Bhoi ki la mih shakhmat ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingkynrei u drok bad ruh ka jingpang ñiangkulia (HIV/AIDS) ba la donkam ban don ka jingïatrei lang na ka bynta ban tehlakam ban pynduna ïa ka jingkynrei u drok bad ruh katei ka jingpang ñiangkulia ha Ri Bhoi bad wat ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Kum ban pynkynmaw, ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha Ri Bhoi lyngba ka Meghalaya Control AIDS Society dang shen ki la pyntip paidbah ba ha Ri Bhoi District ki la don haduh 536 ngut kiba la shah ktah ha ka jingpang ñiangkulia, ha kaba kane ka la buh jingkylli ïa kiba bun balang bad ruh ka jingma lada ym lah ban shim ïa ki lad ban ïada na ka jingpud sted katei ka jaid jingpang.Haba ïa kren bad ki Nongthoh Khubor, ka Kong Meristela Lamare, President ka Nongpoh Area Women Welfare Association ka la ong ba kane ka kynhun ki Longkmie ha Nongpoh ka dap da ka jingsngewkhia ha kaba ym dei tang ka jingpur sted u jingpang ñiangkulia ha Ri Bhoi bad u drok ruh u la rung ha manla ki shnong ba la donkam ban don noh kata ka jingtehlakam ha kaba pynduna ïa kane ka jaid jingpang bad ruh ïa ka jingkynrei jong u drok.Ka la ong ba ka NAWWA na ka por sha ka por ka la ju pynlong ïa ki jingai jinghikai halor ki lad jingïada na ka jingpang HIV/AIDS bad ruh ka jingktah jong u drok ïa ki khun samla ha kane ka juk ba mynta, hynrei lada ym don hi kata ka jingïatrei lang ka long kaba eh ban pynduhjaid ïa u drok bad ruh ïa katei ka jaid jignpang kaba bit sha kiwei tang ki kam shongkha pathar khlem jingïada bad ruh ka jingpyndonkam ban dih drok da kab pyndonkam da ujuh u thyrnia.
title: Khot ka NAWWA ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka HIV/AIDS bad u drok

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 27: Ka jingtih shyiap beaiñ na ka wan Umïam ba hap ha u pud u sam ka Shnong Amphreng ha Ri Bhoi District ka la dang ïaid bteng haduh kine ki sngi, kaba dei wat hadien ba ka KSU Umden Circle bad u trai jaka ki la dep ban ujor sha u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi ban tuklar halor ka jingtih shyiap na katei ka wah umïam kaba don hapdeng u pud u sam ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam.Kum ban pynkynmaw, u trai jaka bad uba dei ruh u Rangbah Shnong ka Shnong Amphreng, u Bah Minus Sakra ryngkat ka KSU ki la dep ban ujor sha u deputy commissioner ka Ri Bhoi ban dawa tuklar bad ba dei ban phah sangeh ïa ka jingtih shyiap beaiñ ha ka wah Umïam, hynrei kumba ka ioh lum jingtip ki briew na Assam kim salia bad ki dang ïai bteng ban tih ïa u shyiap na katei ka wah.Kumba la lap ruh da ka KSU dang shen ha ka jingleit jurip, ki briew na Assam ki la wan kyntur pud ruh sha u pud u sam ka Meghalaya ba hap ha katei ka wah Umïam bad kaba ktah shuh shuh ïa ka jingjot ka wah ka dei kaba ki la pyndonkam da ki kor puh shilum ban tih shyiap na katei ka wah.Haba buddien ïa kane ka jingtih shyiap ki briew na Assam ha katei ka wah Umïam ba hap ha u pud u sam ka Shnong Amphreng ha ki thaiñ khappud, la ong ba ka jingtih shyiap ka la long shaba palat ban pynjot ïa katei ka wah, namar ki briew ki la pyndonkam da ki kor ki bor naduh ki kor puh shilum bad ki trok ban kit shyiap na katei ka wah, kaba dei kawei na ka wah kaba don ha khappud ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam.Haba ioh ban ïa kren mynta ka sngi bad u trai jaka bad uba dei ruh u Rangbah Shnong ka Amphreng, u Bah Minus Sakra u la ong ba ki briew na Assam haduh kine ki sngi ki dang bteng ban tih shyiap ha katei ka wah, wat la ki bor ba dei peit na ka tnad Forest ki la wan ban jurip ïa katei ka jingtih shyiap ha ka wah Umïam.Shuh shuh, u la ong ruh haduh kine ki sngi ki briew na Assam ki dang pyndonkam da ki kor puhshilum ban tih shyiap ha katei ka wah bad nalor kata ym tang ba ki pynjot ïa katei ka wah bad ki la wan kyntur pud ruh sha shilang ka wah ba la hap ha u pud u sam ka Meghalaya da kaba tih jubor ïa u syiap bad ruh ban shna lynti ïa ka um da kaba pynïaid na ka jaka ba la hap sha Meghalaya, u la bynrap.
title: Dang bteng ki briew na Assam ban tih shyiap beaiñ ha ka wah Umïam ha ka shnong Amphreng

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang, 27: Ki nongrep synsar ha ki thaiñ 5 shnong ba kynthup ïa ka shnong Mawbidong, Manad, Pyndenlyngdoh, Pyndensohlang bad Mawbri kiba hap hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ha kine ki sngi ki la mat shibun ki jingeh tang namar ka jinghiar dor jong ki mar rep jong ki.Na ka liang ki nongrep haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih bad ka jingsngewdiaw namar ka jinghiar kynsan jong ka dor u jong u synsar ha kaba ïa nujor ki snem ba la dep namar ka dor ka long T. 150/- tam shi kilo hynrei ha une u snem 2024 pat ka dor u synsar ka poi tang T. 30/- tyngka shi kilo bad wat haduh T. 40 tyngka bad kane ka wanrah shisha ka jingduhnong kba khraw ïa ki nongrep bad ki don ruh ki nongrep kiba la pynpaw ba kim kwah shuh wat tang ban leit lum ïa ki synsar na ki jaka rep ki jong ki.“Ngi sa ong kumtei namar ki jaka rep jong ki jngai na ka shnong bad ba ki hap ban ïaid kjat haduh 2 kynta ei ei ym tang katta, ngi hap ban ai bylla sngi ruh ha ki briew kata naduh por ba pynkhuid, por kheit haduh ka kit ka bah ha ki lynti kiba eh, kat haduh ba kin da poi ha ki jaka ban thew ban ïoh ban die ïa u synsar haba kheiñ ïa ki jinglut baroh ka la long shisha ka jingduhnong kaba khraw, ngi hap ruh ban buria ban sei na la ka jong ka pla ban siew ïa ki bai bylla baroh bad ngi khlem ïoh ei ei shuh katkum ka dor u synsar mynta u snem”, la pynpaw ki nongrep.Kum ki nongrep kim hap ban ieh sha khlaw ïa u synsar kim sngewdon jingmyntoi ei ei shuh ban leit lum leit lang ïa ki mar rep bad wat kiba ki la dep ban lum ha ïing ha sem ruh ki la duh jingkyrmen ban pynïaid ïew ïa u synsar jong ki, ïa kane ka pynpaw da u bah Phranstarwell Khyllem Kharai, u bah Sandarlin Khyllem Kharai, u bah Thonding Jyrwa kiba dei ki nongrep na kane ka thaiñ jong ka shnong Pyndenlyngdoh.Ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingithuh jong ka sorkar ïa u synsar kum u mar rep, ki nongrep haba kren ha ki nongthoh khubor ki pynpaw ba ban kyntiew ïa ki nongrep ha ka ïoh ka kot, ka kamai kajih jong ki nongrep kum ha kane ka rukom kam don jingmut shisha namar lada phai ha une u snem ba mynta ki ïa kynduh ki jingeh shibun tang namar ba hiar dor u mar rep jong ki. “Bun na ngi, ngi shaniah ïa ki kam pynbiang ha ïing ha sem ha ka rep ka riang kum kaba ban phah skul ïa ki khun la ha shnong bad shabar ki shnong, hynrei haba ka long kumne ka dor ka mur ngi mat jingeh shibun”, ki la pynpaw bad ka jingthmu jongki ban phah pyndep ïa ki khun ki kti ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher katkum kane ka juk ba mynta ymtang kan nym poi shuh sha ka thong.Namarkata, kum ki nongrep ki da buh ka jingkyrpad ïa ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad ba dei peit ïa ki rep ka riang ba kin thaw ki lad thaw lynti ban pynneh ïa ka dor jong ki mar rep kumba long ha ki snem ba la leit kham tam ïa u synsar namar kiba bun hi ki shaniah ha une mar rep bad ïa baroh ki jingdonkam ha ïing ha sem, watla ki don kiwei ki mar rep kum u sohmarit, bad u sla tyrpad khnang ba ki nongrep kin ym mad ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw hadien ba ki la theh ia ka sye ka syar ban rep baroh saw aiom.
title: Kynduh jingeh ki nongrep ba hiar dor ki mar rep ha ka thaiñ Manad

content: Shillong Rymphang, 27: Ka Sorkar Jylla kala pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingjur palat ka jingpluh ïing namar ka jingthut ki wire bording elektrik bad kut jingmut ba kan leh eiei noh khnang ban lah tehlakam ïa kine ki jingjia.ïa kane la pynpaw da u Myntri ka tnad Bording Abu Taher Mondal mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei haba bynrap ba kam long ka ba suk ïa ka Tnad ban leit jngoh ïa ki lain bording ha man ki thliew ïing namar ki wire bording ki ïaid hapoh ïing.Hynrei, ula ong ba ka Tnad ka don jingthmu ban leh noh da ka audit ïa ki wire bording jong ki ïingdieng ba la rim bha, kiba don ha nongbah Shillong.Ula pan ïa ka jingïatreilang jong ki paidbah ba kin pyntip ïa ki jingsngewkhia ba ki don haba ïadei bad ki laiñ bording sha ka Tnad.Ula kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah ba kin phikir bha bad ban nym ailad ïa ka over loading ha ki ïing ki sem jong ki.“Lada don kaei kaei ba ïadei bad ka bording, ka Corporation kan pynbeit mar mar ïa ki khlem kano kano ka jingeh” ula bynrap.Haba kylli ïa ki post elektrik ba sarang bad ki wire ba ïatakhuh ba la sakhi ha kylleng ki jaka jong ka Nongbah, ula ong ba ka Corporation kan sa bujli noh mardor ïa kine ki post elektrik haba don kano kano ka jingujor.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka ïingdieng ba palat 111 snem jong ka Shillong Bar Association ka la kylla dpei na ka jingbam duh ki thylliej ding, ïa kaba la suba jur ba dei na ka jingthut jong ki wire bording.
title: Yn leh eiei ka Sorkar halor ka jingjur ka jingpluh ding na ka bording ong u Mondal
