content: Shillong, Rymphang 27: Kum shibynta ban pynshlur ïa ki samla pule college ban mihkhmat ïa ka jylla ha ki jingïakhun bapher bapher, ka ophis treikam jong ka District Youth officer, Nehru Yuva Kendra Shillong ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang ka tnat Sports ka sorkar pdeng, ka la pynlong da ka jingïakop kren paidbah dang shen.Ha kane ka jingïakhun state level la jied tang 8 ngut ki samla pule kiba la dep ban ïaleh ïa ka district level Youth Parliament na ki district bapher bapherka jylla, da ka jingbishar da ki san ngut ki nongbishar.Napdeng kine, u James Dhar u la shah jied ha ka kyrdan ba nyngkong, u Trebokmi Talang ha ka kyrdan kaba ar bad ka Sachitra Syrti ha ka kyrdan ka ba lai.Na kiba jop ha ka state level, uba nyngkong un ïoh mihkhmat ïa ka jylla bad ki arngut kiba wan ha ka kyrdan kabaar bad kaba lai kin leit ban synran kum ki nongai mynsiem ha ka rynsan jong ka Ri ha ka prokram kaban long ha ka 5tarik bad 6 tarik Lber, 2024.
title: Pyn ïakob kren paidbah ka NYK Shillong ïa ki samla pule

content: Jowai, Rymphang, 27: Ïa ka jaka ot doh (masi bad shniang) kaba la tip kum ka ‘Modern Bi-Species Abattoir’ Demthring West Jaiñtia Hills District ïa kaba la dep plie paidbah da u bah A.L. Hek (MLA) uba dei ruh u myntri ka tnad AH & Veterinary ha ka 19 tarik u Nohprah 2023, ka la sdang treikam mynta ka sngi 27 tarik u Rymphang da kaba ai ka jinghikai ïa ki nongot doh.Kane ka rukom ot doh katkum ka juk ba thymmai la leh mynta ka sngi da ki nongot doh, ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki doctor na ka tnad Veterinary West Jaiñtia Hills, ki nongïalam ka seng nong ot doh ka Jaiñtia Livestock Butcher Welfare Association (JLBWA) bad ki dkhot ka Khasi Jaintia Butcher Welfare Association, Shillong kila la wan khnang ban ai jinghikai kyrpang ïa ka rukom ot doh hapoh kane ka ïing ot doh kaba don ha Demthring.Naka liang ka Dr. Weimanhi Tyngkan ba dei khmih kum ka Mobile Veterinary Dispensary Amlarem kala ïathuh kum ki doctor na ka tnad Veterinary kin wan jurip shwa ïa ka jinglong jingman bad ka koit ka khiah jong ki mrad (masi bad sniang) hashwa ban ot doh ïa ki.Kum ki doctor kin peit ruh naduh ka jingïaid jingïeng jong ki mrad, ki jingmih jong ki ummad na ki khmat bad ki khmut bad ka jingshit ha ka met, hadien ba ki mrad ki long kiba khoit ka khiah la shah ban ot doh ïa ki hapoh kane ka jaka.Shuh shuh kala ong hadien ba la dep ot doh, kin sa leh sa ka post mortem kata ban jurip bniah ïa ki dohjem kum ki klong snam, ki khyllai bad lada ym shem lap kino kino ki jingpang ka jingot ïa ka doh kan ïaid beit shakhmat haduh ban da pynïaid ïew ïa ka doh.Kala pyntip na ka liang ki Doctor jong ka tnad Veterinary kin don beit manla ka por ba ot ïa ka doh ha kane ka jaka khnang ban ïoh jurip shwa ïa ka koit ba khiah jong ki mrad.Na ka liang ki nongïalam ka seng die doh ka Jaiñtia Livestock Butcher Welfare Association kata naduh u President ma Limba Dkhar, u Vice President ma Livis Pyrtuh bad u Secretary ma D. Ryngkhlem kila pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh kaba khraw eh ïa ka sorkar kala la wanrah ïa kum kane ka projek ot doh kaba long katkum ka juk ba mynta.Kiba pynsngew ka jingdon jong kane ka jak ot doh hapoh ka West Jaiñtia Hills District kan ïarap shibun eh ban pynkloi ïa ka rukom ot doh haka jingkhuid jingsuba, da ka jingkyrmen skhem ba ïoh pynpoi ïa ka doh sha ki paidbah nongbam haka rukom kaba khuid ba suba.U President ka Khasi Jaintia Butcher Welfare Association bah Generos Warlarpih ha ka jingkren sha ki lad pathai shubor ula pynsngew kum ka kynhun kaba la shimti da ka sorkar ban pynïaid ïa ka jaka ot doh ha Shillong, mynta ka sngi kila wan khnang sha kane ka jaka ha Demtriang ban ai jinghikai ïa ki nong ot doh katkum ka juh ba mynta.Ula ong kane ka jaka ka long kaba biang eh ban ot doh ym kumba long ha ki por mynshwa kaba ïapher nadong shadong, u kyrmen lyngba kane ka jaka ot doh ki paidbah kin ïoh ban bam ïa ka doh kaba biang tam, namar ym shem la ïoh shuh ban ot katba mon ïa ki mrad da ka jingdonlang ki Doctor.Ha kane ka sngi la donlang naduh SDBO ka Amlarem ma G. L Niang, u Executive Engineer Veterinary Jowai bah K. Mawlong nalor kiwei kiwei de.Ïa kane ka jaka ot doh jong ka tnad Animal Husbandry & Veterinary, ka sorkar jylla la pyntrei da ka Chennai Abattoir Pvt. Ltd. & Rishan Rapsang, kaba la bei pisa da ka sorkar kmie haka jingkot kaba T.7.83 klur tyngka. Ha kane ka jaka lah ban ot kumba 50 tylli ki Masi bad 100 tylli ki Sniang haka shi sngi.
title: Hadien phra sngi ba plie paidbah, sdang treikam ka jaka shohdoh ha Demthring

content: Jowai, Rymphang, 27: Mynta ka sngi ka 27 tarik u Rymphang 2024 ka Jaiñtia National Council JNC – Western Zone hapoh ka jingïalam u President bah Leo Ferdinand Dhar bad u General Secretary Bah Heibormi Lyngdoh kila leit jurip ïa ka jaka ban shna ïa ka Mini Secretariat ha Jowai bad ha kane ka jingleit jurip la shem ba la sdang ban shna noh ïa ka Mini Secretariat.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ha u bnai September 2023 ka seng ka la dep ban ïakynduh markhmat bad u Dy CM Sniawbhalang Dhar ban dawa shna noh ïa ka Mini Secretariat.Ka seng ka ai khublei ïa ka Sorkar baka la shimkhia halor kane ka kam kaba long ruh ka shlem ai jingshakri kaba jan naka bynta ki nong Jaiñtia bad la kyrpad ruh ïa ka Sorkar ba ym dei ban ieh ka jingshna tang ha shiteng lynti hynrei dei ban pyndep kumba lah angnud da ki Paidbah.Ka seng ka kyntu ruh ïa ka sorkar ba kumba la thmu ban shna ha Tura kumba la ong u Chief Minister ban wanrah kita ki large investment bad bun ki administrative reforms kumta thik dei ruh ban wanrah ha Jowai khnang ba kan nym long ka jingtheh shiliang ha ka liang ka roi ka par.Ka seng kala ban jur ruh badei ban sdang noh ïa ka jingshna pyndep ïa ka Iawmusiang building complex namar ba wat ïa ka revised estimate ruh lah dep ban pynkhreh, namar ka dei ruh ka ïew bala shañiah bad ba bsa ruh ïa ki spah ngut ki nongdie haduh 600 tam bad kan wanrah hi ruh ïa ka jingmyntoi naka bynta ki Paidbah.Khatduh ka seng ka kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba dei ban revised ne phai da kawei ka resolution ha ka jingïadei bad ka Smart Town ha Jowai namar ka jingïoh ka long kaba theh shiliang haba nujor bad ka Tura bad la kyrpad ïa ki nongmihkhmat ka Jaiñtia khamtam u local MLA ka Jowai u Wailadmiki Shylla ba u dei ban shimkhia halor kane ka bynta.
title: Ka roi ka par ha Tura bad Jowai ka dei ban long kumjuh: JNC Western Zone

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 27: Kum shibynta na ki kam ïasnohkti lang ban kyrshan ïa ki nongshong shnong na ka liang ki shipai BSF kila pynlong ïa ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta ki khynnah skul jong ki phra tylli shnong kiba don ha khappud bad ka Bangladesh ka Cheragaon, Rongdusora, Naosora, Bagli, Kachusora, Garobita, Majhesora, bad Khunjoy kiba hab hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ na ka liang jong ki shipai BSF kim shym la pynkut tang ha ka jingpynlong ïa ki jingïalehkai ïa ki khynnah skul na katei ka thaiñ hynrei kila pynlong ruh ïa ka jingai dawai ei na ka bynta kitei ki shnong ha kaba palat 200 ngut ki nongshong shnong kila ïoh jingmyntoi.Nalor ka jingai dawai ei, la sam ruh sha ki khynnah skul bad ia ki nongshong shnong, ki jingai jingïarap ki kynthup ïa ki tiar kum ki kor suh jaiñ, tiar ïarap ban ïaid, ki miej, ki shuki ki tiar kynjat ball na ka bynta ki khynnah baroh ki tiar kiba pynlut ban thied ka long T.2.95 lak tyngka.Ha kane sngi la don lang ki Rangbah shnong, ki nongkitkam shnong, ki nonghikai khynnah skul bad ki nongshong shnong, na ka liang ki rangbah shnong kila ai khublei ïa ki BSF kiba la ïarap na ka bynta ki shnong kiba sah ha ki thaiñ ha khappud.
title: Ai jingsumar ei bad sam tiar ïalehkai sports ki BSF sha ki khynnah skul

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27: U Myntri Rangbah, Conrad K Sangma ula ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka dang ap ïa ka jingtohkit balei ba pluh kynsan ka jaka treikam jong ka Shillong Bar Association.Haba ai ïa ka Suo Moto Statement ha Ìingdorbar mynta ka sngu, u Conrad u la ïathuh ba ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ban lap ïa ki daw tynrai halor ka jingpluh ding, kaba bamduh ïa ka jingtei ba 111 snem jong ka Shillong Bar Association myn ha ka miet 24 tarik Rymphang.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ba ka ding ka la pynjulor ïa ki jingdon jingem, ki kot ki sla bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdon jingem jong kane ka ïing.Ula pyntip ba ka District Magistrate ka East Khasi Hills kala thung ïa ka jingtohkit Magistrate halor kane ka jingjia pluh ding.U Myntri Rangbah ula ïathuh ba ki Pulit kila ïoh khubor na ka Control Room, Shillong ha ka por 22.15 baje eiei ha ka miet 24 tarik, ba pyntip ïa ka jingpluh jong ka jaka treikam jong ka Shillong Bar Association, kaba don ha lyndet ka Ophis ka DC, East Khasi Hills, Shillong.Halor kane, ka kali pynlip ding ba nyngkong na Barabazar F&ES kala mih ha ka por 22.16 baje bad ka kali kaba r kala mih ha ka por 22.20 baje. Haba poi ha kane ka jaka, la shem ba ka jingtei baroh kawei kala kem ding. Namar kane, la wanrah ruh ia ki kali pynlip ding na Shillong F&ES bad na ki Fire Station kiba don marjan.Hadien ka jingpoi u IGP (F&ES) Meghalaya, Shillong, la shim jingkhein ïa ka jinglong jingman naba ka ding kala klang bha bad buh jingma ïa kiwei pat ki jingtei jong ka CJM Court, PHQ, Engineering Wing ka PHQ, bad hapoh 4 kynta ka jingïakhun, la lah ban tem ïa ka jingpur jong ka ding.U pyntip ba haduh 6 tylli ki kali pynlip ding kila ïakhun ïa ki thylliej ding bad artylli ki kali kit um jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) kila wan ban ïarap lang. Kumba 45 tank ka um la pyndonkam ha ka jingïakhun ïa ka ding.“Kat kum ka jingtohkit ba malu mala, la suba ba ka jingpluh ka lah ban dei na ka bording elektrik” ong u Myntri Rangbah haba bynrap ba kat kum ka jingïathuh u peon jong ka Shillong Bar Association, ula ïohi ïa ki waïar elektrik kiba la um bad noh rynjub. Hynrei, ym nang pat ban ong ïa ka jingkhein sting jong ki briew ba treikam ha kane ka Ophis.Ula bynrap ba ha ka jingtohkit, la shem ba ym shym la don satia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih ne jingmynsaw na kane ka jingpluh ding.La pyntip ba u Myntri Rangbah, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba khmih ïa ka kam pynroi sor, u Chief Secretary, u DGP, ka DC, u SP, kila ïapoi sha kane ka jaka ban khmih ïa ka jinglong jingman ha kane ka miet ba pluh kane ka jaka treikam.
title: Dang ap ïa ka jingtohkit balei ba pluh kynsan ka Ophis SBA

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27: U Bah Kyrmen Shylla, Myntri ka tnad Revenue, u la ïathuh ba ki don palat 2400 ngut ki briew kiba la ïoh sah ha ki jaka jong ka sorkar.U Bah Kyrmen u la ïathuh ïa kane ha ka iingdorbar mynta ka sngi haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit.Shuh shuh halor kiwei pat ki jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA Nongkrem ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbna ba ki don ki briew kiba shong ba sah ha Refugee Colony ha Rynjah, kiba la die noh ïa ki jaka jong ki wat lada ka jaka ba ki sah h kadei ka jaka jong ka sorkar u Bah Kyrmen u la ïathuh ba ki don kiba kum kine tangba um lah ban ïathuh namar ba um don ki record kiba biang bad u la pan por na ka ïingdorbar.
title: Palat 2400 ngut kiba ïoh sah ha ki jaka sorkar

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 27: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la mang pisa T. 5,50,00,000 klur na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ïa ka Chief Minister Youth Development Scheme ha u snem 2023-2024.Ïa kane ka pyntip da u Myntri ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs Bah Shakliar Warjri haba jubab ha Assembly ha ka sngi Baar.U la pyntip ba T. 30 lak la bhah sha ka ophis Deputy Commissioner jong ka Shillong bad Tura katba T.17 lakh la mang na ka bynta ki 10 tylli ki district.U MLA ka Congress na Mawhati Bah Charles Marngar u la buh jingkylli, hato ka Sorkar ka don jingthmu neem ban pyrkhat biang ban bhah pisa hapoh kane ka skhim katkum ka jingdon jong ki Constituency, u Myntri u la jubab ba ka jingmang pisa ka long katkum ka jingdon jong ki kynhun ne ki klob ba ladep pynrung kyrteng hapoh ka ophis Deputy Commissioner hynrei ym ha ki Constituency.Haba u MLA ka VPP na Nongkrem Bah Ardent Basaïawmoit u la pan jingtip lada ïa kane ka skhim lah ban ïoh lyngba ki MLA, u Myntri u la ong ba ïa kane ka skhim la ai lyngba ki Deputy Commissioner bad ka Directorate of Sports and Youth Affairs.
title: 5.50 klur mang ka Sorkar ban pyntreikam ïa ka CMYDS

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei ula pyntip hapoh ka ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla ba ka Sorkar ka la ïoh pdiang palat 30,000 tylli ki aplikeshon ban seng kam seng jam lajong kat kum ka skhim CM-Elevate tang hapoh ka arbnai.“Ngi la ïoh pdiang palat 30,000 tylli ki aplikeshon ïa ka CM-Elevate hapoh ka 2 bnai. Na kine, 20,000 ki dei jong ka kam ri jingri jingdup. Hapoh ka CM-Elevate, ka Sorkar ka la ai 50% ka subsidy” ong u Conrad haba jubab hapoh ka Dorbar Mangtyngka ka Jylla.Ha kajuh ka por, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ïa mynta hi, ka kam ri jingri jingdup kam pat dei kaba la kheiñ ha ka thup ki karkhana (industry) hynrei ki food processing ki dei ki kam karkhana (Industry).Haba u MLA ka UDP na Mawkyrwat Bah Renikton L Tongkhar u kwah ban tip ïa ki subsidy ba ai ïa ka kam ri jingri jingdup, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ïa ka prokram ka dei kaba dang shu sdang ha u snem ba la leit noh ha kaba ka Sorkar kala sam ïa ki khun sniang, khun syiar sha ki nongrep bapher bapher.Ula ong, kawei na ki prokram ba kongsan eh ka dei ka CM-Elevate, ha kaba ka Sorkar ka la ai ïa ka subsidy kaba heh duh khamtam sha ki kam ri jingri jingdup kaba long haduh 50%.Halor ka jingkylli balei ka Sorkar kam ai lang kajuh ka jingmyntoi bala ai hapoh ka Industrial Policy sha ki nongri jingri, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong “Ka daw hi ka long ba ka kam ri jingri ka dei ka kam ri jingri bad ka kam karkhana ka dei ka karkhana kat kum ki jingbatai ki ain ki kanun bad kumta, ym lah satia ban pynïakhleh”.Hynrei ula pyntip ba ka Sorkar ka la ai ïa ki jingkyrshan kiba bun ïa ki nongrep hapoh ka Jylla. Ula pyntip ba palat 100 tylli ki pickup truck la ai ban pynkit ïa ki marrep jong ki nongrep. “Ngi kwah ban ai biang sa 500 tylli ki kali ha kine ki san snem ban wan” ula ong.
title: Hapoh 2 bnai ïoh pdiang ka Sorkar 30 hajar ki aplikeshon na kiba kwah sengkam

content: Khliehriat, Rymphang, 27: Ka Balang Presbyterian Moolang, East Jaiñtia Hills District kaba don tang153 ki ïing kiba dei na ka Balang Presbyterian bad kynthup 855 ngut ki dkhot ka Balang, tang hapoh hynriew bnai da ka mynsiem kaba kmen bad ka mynsiem sngewnguh eh ïa u Blei, ki la pynkhreh ban pdiang sngewbha ïa ka jingïaseng Synod Mihngi jong ki samla.U Secretary ka Synod Committee, u Bah Harvest Siangshai bad u dkhot jong ka Committee Synod u samla Jespar.L.Pyrtuh, na ka Balang Presbyterian Moolang, ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Blei halor ka jinglah jong ka Balang ban pdiang ïa ka Jingïaseng Synod Samla hapoh ka Balang ha Moolang bad ki la ong ruh ba ka balang ka pdiang sngewbha bad pdiang kylluid ruh ïa baroh ki nongwan jingïaseng ki ban wan naduh ka sngi thohdieng, ka 1 tarik haduh ka sngi u Blei ka 3 tarik u bnai Lber 2024.Ki la ong ba ka Balang kan ym shah ïano ïano ban die ïa kino kino ki jait jingidie kum ki kot niam, ki dukan bam ne kino kino ki dukan hapoh shnong ha ka sngi u Blei ban long jingïaseng paidbah, namar ki longiing jong ka Balang ki la pynkhreh kylluid ïa ki jingbam na ka bynta kiba wan sha katei ka Jingïaseng.U Bah Siangshai, u la ong “ngi dpiang ïa kane ka jingiaseng da ka jingsngewrit, u Blei un leh ïa ki kambah na ka bynta ka burom jong u,” bad bynrap ba ka jingpdiang ïa ki Delegate kan long naduh ka 1 tarik ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi ha phyllaw ïingmane.Na ka bynta ka Jingïaseng ha ka sngi u Blei, ïa ka jingiaseng yn pynlong ha madan Football kaba don ha ka dong Wahshnong, la khmihlynti ba kan nym don kano kano ka jingdheng kali namar ka balang ka la pynkhreh 7 tylli ki jaka ieng kali kiba heh hapoh shnong, kine ki jaka ieng kali ruh ki don hajan ka jaka ban longjingiaseng “Ki don ar tylli ki surok, kawei na Ladrymbai ban poi sha shnong Moolang kaba jngai kumba 5 kilo mitar na Ladrymbai bad sa kawei pat na kaba bynta kito kiba wan na ka lynti na Rymbai,Suchen Bataw, na Khliehriat bad lada jia ba don ka jingdheng kali ha Ladrymbai ki lah ban wan na ka surok na Lumshken ban poi sha jaka long jingiaseng kaba jngai kumba 15 km, tangba la sngewthuh ba kan nym don hi ka jingdheng kali ha ka sngi u Blei” ong u bah Harvest.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Balang Moolang, ka ai ka jingkhublei sngewnguh ïa ka tnat pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District kaba kloi ban ai ka jingiatreilang bad ka balang, ki pulit ki la wan ban jurip ïa ki jaka ieng kali bad kiba kloi ruh ban iarap lem ha kaban pyniaid ïa ki kali ha ka sngi u Blei, ka balang ka kyrpad ruh ïa ki nongwan jingiaseng ba ki ai ka jingiatreilang bad ka balang kumjuh ruh bad ki pulit ba pyniaid kali khnang ba kan nym don ka jingdheng kali bad ka balang ka kyrmen ba baroh kin iaidbeit iaid ryntih.U dkhot jong ka Synod Committee, u samla Jasper.L.Pyrtuh u pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Blei ba ka balang ka lah ban pdiang ïa kane ka Jingïaseng synod mynta u snem 2024 bad ong ruh ba ka Balang kan sa rakhe ruh ïa ka juli (Platinum Jubili) jong ka jingdap 75 snem ka Balang Moolang ha u snem 2025, u pynpaw ka jingkmen ba ka Balang shen kan sa kynjoh sha u maw jam jong ka jingdap 75 snem ka balang .“Na ka liang ka Jingiaseng Samla Balang Moolang ruh ngi pdiang sngewbha ïa phi baroh ki ban wan sha kane ka jingiaseng Synod samla bad kyrmen ba phin poi da kaba suk kaba kmen, ngi pdiang kylluid ruh ïa phi sha ki ïing ki sem jong ngi ba phin pynjahthait ba phi bam bad phim dei ban tieng ne buh kano kano ka jingsngew namar ka shnong Moolang ka dei ka shnong kaba khuid ka bym don kano kano ka dak sniew ha ka bam ka dih,” ong u samla Jasper Pyrtuh.
title: Pdiang ka Balang Presbyterian Moolang ïa ka Jingïaseng Synod Samla

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27: Ka North East Students’ Organization (NESO) ka la pynrem jur ïa ka jingpynbthei bom kaba la jia ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ba phyllaw jong ka AII Manipur Students’ Union (AMSU) kaba don ha DM University Campus, Thangmeiband, Imphal, kaba lam sha ka jingkhladnoh jong uwei u samla uba la tip kyrteng kum u Oinam Kenejy,uba pule ha DM College katba uwei pat uba la mynsaw jur uba la tip kyrteng kum Salam Michael uba pule ha DM College.Ha u kyrwoh, u Chairman jong ka Organisation u Bah Samuel Jyrwa u la ong ba ka NESO ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor kine ki jingjia khamtam hadien ka jingshah wiang ding jong ka ophis treikam UCM kynthup ïa ka Macha Leima School, ka jingpynjulor ïa kiwei kiwei ki ophis treikam jong ki kynhun sengbhalang, ka jingpynjot bad pynjulor ïa ka ingsah jong u Sinam Prakash uba dei u Advisor jong ka NESO.U la ong ba ka AMSU ka dei kaba kiar ïalade ban ïadon bynta bad ka saiñpyrthei bad kam pat ju don bynta ruh ha kano kano ka jingïaumsnam la ka long ha kano kano ka dur.“Ha kum kane ka por, ka long kaba donkam ïa ki paidbah ban kdew lynti bad ban pynthikna ba ka AMSU kan ïai bteng ban long ka kynhun ka bym don bynta ha ka saiñpyrthei hynrei ban pynlong ïa ki jingïakhih ki bym ïaumsnam. Kine ki jingjia, ki la pynkulmar jingmut bad pynsyier mynsiem ruh ïa ki samla pule bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki paidbah,” ong u Bah Jyrwa.U la ong ba ka NESO, ka khot bad wer ban wanrah biang ïa ka jingshongsuk bad ha kajuh ka por u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan shimkhia ïa kine ki jingjia bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ban kem ïa ki nongleh kam bymman.“Naor kata, ka Sorkar ka dei ban bteng ban wanrah ïa ka shongsuk bad ha kajuh ka por ban shimkhia ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakren bad baroh ki seng kieng atiar khnang ban ïada ïa ki jaidbynriew ritpaid jong ka jylla Manipur ba ka jingsuk kan long kaba neh junom,” ong u Chairman ka NESO.Ha u snem baladep, ka NESO ka la pynsdang ïa ka mishon jingsum ha ka jingïaumsnam ha Manipur, bad kan, dang ïai bteng ïa kane ka mishon da ka jingshimkhia lang jong ki kynhun bapher bapher na ka bynta ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka jylla Manipur..
title: Pynrem ka NESO ïa ki runar ba kawang bom ïa ka jaka treikam ka AMSU

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27: Ka Tnad Meghalaya Police kala register haduh 42 tylli ki case jong ka cyber crime hapoh ki Cyber Crime Police Station tang ha kine ki san snem bala leit.“Naduh u snem 2019 haduh ka 31 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024, haduh 42 tylli ki case la register hapoh ka Cyber Crime Police Station, kiba ïadei bad ki cyber crime” ong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma hapoh ka ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ ha ka sngi Ba-ar.Ula jubab ïa kane ha ka zero hour notice bala wanrah da u MLA ka UDP na Nongpoh Bah Mayralborn Syiem kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynmih khubor thaw hi jong kawei ka YouTube Channel ba pynthoh bria ïa u Chairman ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong ka Ri-Bhoi Bah BB Makdoh, kaba la pynmih ha ka 19 tarik Rymphang.U Conrad ula ong, khnang ban tehlakam ïa ka jingpynmih ïa ki khubor lamler lane ki cyber crime hapoh ka Jylla, ka tnad Pulit kala thaw ïa ka Cyber Crime Wing kaba treikam hapoh ka Criminal Investigation Department.Ki unit jongkane ka Wing ki kynthup ïa ka Cyber Crime Police Station, ka Cyber Forensic Training Facility (CFTF) bad ka Cyber Assistance Cell & Monitoring Cell.Ka bynta jong ka Cyber Crime Police Station ka long ban tohkit ïa ki kam bymman lyngba ki kor internet, khanglad ïa ki kam bymman na ki kor internet bad ai jinghikai ïa ki paidbah ban nym ngop ha kine ki kam bymman.U Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba nalor kine ki case bala register, ka Cyber Crime Wing kala pynlong ruh ia 20 tylli ki prokram ai jinghikai bad ruh haduh 55 tylli ki prokram pynsngewthuh paidbah ha ki skul, ki college bad ki jaka pule bapher bapher.
title: 42 tylli ki case cyber crime rejister ki pulit ha ki san snem : CM

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : U Myntri ka tnat Tourism bad uba khmih ruh ïa ka Tnat Arts and Culture u bad Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ïa ka ïew ki mynbarim kaba don ha ka shnong Nongkseh Upper Shillong yn pynïasoh noh da ki Cable Car.Haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba hadien ba ka tnat Tourism ka la ïoh jingtip kaba thikna ba ka don ka ïew kaba ki mynbarim ki la ju pynlong ïew ha ki por hyndai hynthai hapoh ka shnong Nongkseh Upper Shillong kaba long trai ruh da ka kur Thangkhiew kumta ha kane ka sngi na ka liang jong u bad u Chairman ka MTDC u Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ryngkat ki ophisar ki Engineer u Rangbah Shnong u Bah A Thangkhiew ka shnong Nongkseh ki la leit ban jurip ïa katei ka ïew kaba la pynlong ïew lyngba ka jingdon jong ki Mawbynna bapher bapher.Haba ïohi ïa ka jingpynsah nam bad pynneh pynsah ïa ki kam ki mynbarim bad hadien ka jingjurip na ka liang u Myntri u la pynbna syndon ruh ba ïa katei ka jaka ïew ba kan long noh kum ka Heritage site, ne ka ïew kaba dei ban sumar bad pynneh pynsah bad ban sumar bha ïa ka.Lah ban ong ba ha katei ka jaka ki kur Thangkhiew, ki la don ki Mawbynna babun tylli kiba la don la ki jong ki jong ki basa kaba ki ju pynlong ïew ha ki por Hyndai hynthai bad kaba dang ïaisah haduh mynta mynne.Halor kane u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba hadien ba la ïohi da la ki jong ki khmat la sngewdei ban pynbna ïa kane ka jaka ka Heritage site ha kaba kan don ka jingker, ka jingsumar bad ba kan ym jot noh hynrei kan dei ban long ka jingmyntoi jong ki nongshong shnong.U la ong ba na ka liang ka tnat Arts and Culture kan wad ki lad ki lynti la kane ka jaka ka long ne em ban pynïasoh ïa ka Nongkseh bad ka Shillong, ka Mawprem bad ka Mawlai da ki Cable Car kaban khring ruh ïa ki nong jngohkai pyrthei.“Kaba nyngkong ka dei na ka bynta ki nong jngohkai pyrthei bad kaba ar kan pynsuk ïa ki nongleit nongwan ha jaka ba kin shong bus ne taxi kin pyndonkam noh da ki Cable Car bad kan long ruh kum ka jingplie bad aikam aijam ïa ki nongshong shnong,” ong u Bah Paul.U la ong ba na ka liang ka Tourism bad ka Meghalaya Age Limited kin sa pynkhreh ïa ka report la kane ka jaka kan long ne em ban ïaid shakhmat ban pynïasoh da ki Cable Car namar kane ka projek kadei kaba lah dep don lypa halor ka jingthmu ban shna ïa ki Cable Car na Laban kaba dei ka view point sha Shillong bad tang lah sdang ïa kane kawei ka kam kane ruh kan sa ïaid lang shakhmat ban ïoh ban pyndep kumba la angnud.Kane ka jaka ka long kaba itynnad bha bad nalor ki Mawbynna, na kane ka jaka lah ruh ban ïohi kyndiang ïa ki shnong bapher bapher ka Nongbah Shillong nalor ka jingdon ka Kshaid kaba itynnad kaba la wan tuid na ka wah Umshyrpi sha ka Kshaid Bidon Bishop Falls.
title: Da ki Cable Car yn pynïasoh ïa ka Ïew Nongkseh bad ka Shillong, ong u Myntri ka Tourism

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 27: U Myntri Rangbah barim u Dr. Mukul Sangma uba dei ruh u MLA ka TMC na Songsak ha ka sngi Baar u la takraiñ tyngeh ïa ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingpynmih hukum ban pynkynriah kam ïa u Deputy Commissioner jong ka North Garo Hills hadien ba u la hukum ban thung ïa ka jingtohkit halor ka jingwanrah be-aiñ ïa u kwai tyrkhong na ka ri Bangladesh bad kumjuh ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshalan ïa u dewïong.Haba ïashim bynta ha ka jingïathir ïatai halor ka Mang Tyngka, u Dr. Mukul u la ong ba ïa ka hukum ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit da u Deputy Commissioner la pynmih ha ka 4 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024.“………hynrei kaei kaba la jia ka Sorkar ka ïada ïa kiba dei ban ai jingïada, ha ka sngi kaba bud (ha ka 5 tarik Kyllalyngkot) ka hukum pynkynriahkam ka la mih bluit………ha kaba u DC u la shah pynkynkynriah kam. Mynta, nga kwah ban tip na ka Sorkar hato hadien ka jingpynkynriah kam ïa u DC ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid neem shakhmat, lane, don mano mao bym shym leh shuh ïa kata, namarba ka hukum jong u DC ka dei ban ieng,” u la ong.H a kawei pat ka liang, u Dr. Mukul u la dawa ba dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit halor ka jingshah kawut lathi ki dkhot ka HYC ha u Pulit Ophisar hapoh Pynursla Police Station.“Nga la ïoh ïa kiwei ka jingpyntip na ka HYC, kaba ïadei bad kawei ka jingjia ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba ki sengbhalang ki la leit pyntip sha ki Pulit ka Pynursla shaphang ka jingshalan tuh ïa ki muid. Hynrei kaei kaba la jia ka la pynkyndit, ha ka jaka ba ki Pulit kin pyndep ïa ka kamram halor ka jingujor ki la leh donbor pynban, nga kwah ban thung jingtohkit halor kane,” u la ong.
title: Takraiñ u Dr. Mukul ïa ka Sorkar ba pynkynriah kam ïa u DC ka North Garo Hills

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 27: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ha ka sngi Baar ka la pan jingpynshai na ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhreh ban aiti ïa u dewïong ba ladep tih sha ka Coal India Limited (CIL) na ka bynta ban die lilam ba ladep pynbit pynbiang nadong shadong da ka tnat Mining and Geology bad ïa ka jingdie lilam yn pynlong ha ki district bapher bapher.Ha ka shithi sha u Director ka Minerals Resources (DMR), u President ka HITO Bah Donbok Dkhar u la ong ba ka seng ka kwah ban ïoh jingtip ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingithuh bad ka jingpynbna ïa ki Designated Depot na ka bynta ka jinglum jingkheiñ ïa u dewïong ban die lilam, ka jingshna ïa ki Depot, ka jingkitkhlieh halor ka kit ka bah ïa u dewïong sha ki Designated Depot, ka rukom ai ïa ka Transit Pass na ka bynta ka jingpynkit ïa u dewïong sha ki Designated Depot bad ki khyrdop mih, ka rukom pynkit ïa u dewïong da ki trai dewïong bad ki nongthied ïa u dewïong ba la lilam na ki Designated Depot hadien ba la aiti ïa ka Transit Pass, ka jingpynshisha ha Designated Depot, ka rukom die lilam bad ka buh jingkheiñ ïa ka pisa bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Seng ka la pan jingtip ruh halor ki rukom siew ïa ki Royalty, ka GST, CESS bad kiwei kiwei de ki rukom siew ba dei ban siew ïa ki nongshalan dewïong lane da ki nongthied dewïong kiba la ïoh ïa ka Challan/Transit Pass ban kit ïa u dewïong ba la ai da ka tnat Mining and Geology Department lane da ka Coal India Limited.“Hynrei ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ki don katto katne ki nongthied ïa u dewïong ba ka ophis jong phi kam shym la ai ïa ka NOC ban kit ïa u dewïong wat hadien ba ki la pyndep ban siew lut baroh ki jingsiew katkum ka lynti kaba dei. Ka don ruh ka jingujor ba u Director um trei ban soi ïa ka NOC katba um pat ïoh ïa ka jingbthah ne u kyrwoh na ki bor bahalor jong u. Ngi kwah ban tip mano kita ki bor bahalor ban ai ïa ka Challan ban kit ïa u dewïong lada kam dei hapoh ka bor jong u Director? la buh jingkylli u Bah Dkhar.“Ka pynlyngngoh ïa ngi ka long balei yn dang don sa kawei pat ka jingpynbeit haba baroh ki jingsiew ladep ban siew lut nadong shadong bad wat ïa ka Royalty bad ka Tax ruh ladep ban siew bad ki nongthied ïa u dewïong ki la bud ryntih ïa ki jingbthah jong ka Ingbishar bad ki bor ba dei peit,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Donbok ha ka shithi.
title: Pan jingshai ka HITO na ka Sorkar halor ka jingpynkhreh ban lilam ïa u dewïong

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27 : Ka Myntri ka tnad kam rep kam riang ha ka Jylla ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ïathuh ba ka Tnad ka la ïoh jingtip ba ka don ka jinghiar jong ka dor u synsar hapoh ka Jylla.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ha ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ, ka Myntri ka la ïathuh ba ka daw ka long ba ki Jylla ba marjan kata ka Assam, Mizoram, Tripura bad Arunahcal Pradesh kila pynkiew bha ïa ka jingpynmih synsar ha la ki jong ki Jylla ha kine ki 2-3 snem.Ka pyntip ba ka jingeh jong ka jaka rep synsar ha Meghalaya ruh kala nang kiew. Ka jingkynshew (stock) synsar ba naduh u snem bala leit, ka dang don ha ki kudam. Ka jingkiew ka jingpynmih synsar na ki Jylla ba marjan kala nang pynbun ïa ka mar ha ïew, kaba la lam pat sha ka jinghiar dor u synsar”.Halor ki sienjam bala shim ban leh eiei halor kane ka jinghiar dor, ka Myntri kala ïathuh ba ka Mawiong Wholesale Market ka don ïa ki kudam ba ngiam ban thep palat 21,000 MT. Bun na kine ki kudam la pyndonkam ban buh ïa ki synsar bala thad ha ka por ba hiar dor u synsar, kumta kala plie lad ïa ki nongrep ba kin ïoh kham heh ka dor”.Ka jingpoi mar manla ka sngi bad ka dor ïew jong u synsar la ju thep ha ka AGMARKET portal bad MEGAMB portal kaba lah ban ïohi lut da ki paidbah/nongrep ba kin tip ïa ka dor ka mur.
title: ïoh jingtip ka tnad ka rep ka riang ba hiar dor u Synsar ha ka jylla

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 27: U MLA ka BJP na South Shillong Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ka sngi Baar ula aiti da ka shithi ha u State President ka BJP u Rikman G. Momin da ka jingkyntu ba ka party kan mynjur ïa ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait kum ka kyrtong na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen.U Bah Shullai u la kyrpad ruh ïa u Bah Alexander L. Hek, uba dei ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla bad u MLA ka BJP na Pynthorumkhrah, ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Dr. Nonglait bad ha kajuh ka por u la kyrpad ruh ïa u State President barim ka party Bah Ernest Mawrie ban weng noh ïa ka jingpan tiket bad ban ai ka jingïatreilang.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u State President, u Bah Shullai u la ong, “nga la wan lang bad ki nongkitkam jong ka South Shillong Mandal ban aiti ïa ka shithi ha u State President ban pynpaw ïa ka rai ba ngi la shim ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait. Ngi kyntu ruh ïa ka party ba kan pdiang ïa ka (Dr Nonglait) kum ka kyrtong jong ka party ban ïakhun na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.”“Ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait ka dei ka Gold Medallist ha ka Law. Ka jingnang jingstad ba ka la don kan long kum ka jingmihkhmat ïa ka imlang ka sahlang jong ngi kaba aijait sha ka kmie. Nalor, ba ka long ka briew kaba khuid bad ka jingtuklar biang por ïa ki jingeh kan ïarap ïa ngi ban ïoh ïa ka vote na ki thaiñ nongkyndong ruh,” u la ong.U Bah Shullai u la ïathuh ruh ba ïa ka shithi ba la aiti sha u National Vice President In-charge Meghalaya u Dr Chuba Ao, sha u National General Secretary bad Coordination ki Jylla ka North East u Rituraj Sinha kum ka jingpyntip.U Bah Shullai u la ïathuh ba u la ïakynduh ïa u Bah Hek ban ïakren sani halor kane ka kam mynta ka sngi.“Ngam shym ïohlad ban ïakynduh ïa u (Hek) namarba um shym la wan sha Assembly. Dang mynta hi ka sngi nga ïoh jingtip ba um lah ban ïaid namarba u shitom. Ngan sa ïakynduh ïa u bad ngan sa ïakren markhmat khnang ba ma gni arngut ki MLA ngin kyrpad ïa ka High Command jong ka Party ban mynjur ïa ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait kum ka kyrtong na Shillong Seat,” u la ong.“Nga ladep ïakren ruh bad u Bah Ernest Mawrie (bad kyrpad ïa u) lada u la lah ban weng noh ïa ka rai khnang ba ngin dup lah ban ïatreilang,” ula ong bad ïathuh ba u Bah Mawrie u la ong ba un ap shwa ïa ka rai jong ki nongïalam bahalor jong ka party.Shuh shuh u Bah Shullai u la ong ba ki paidbah ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia ki la babe ba ki la jied ïa u Bah Vincent H Pala. “San snem ha Parliament, u Bah Pala u la shu pynlut por tang ha kaba bam sohot,” la kynnoh u Bah Shullai.U Bah Shullai u la shah rem ha ka jingïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha kaba la long ha u snem 2019. U la kam ba u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing u Amit Shah u ladep ïakren bad u lyngba ka telephone bad kular ruh ba yn thung ïa u kum u Myntri ka DoNER lada u jop ha ka elekshon 2019.“Ka jingkyrpad jong nga sha ki paidbah ka long ba ki dei ban long kiba ïohi jngai bad ban ai ïa ka vote na ka bynta ka BJP. Kan long ka jingkyrkhu lada ka party ka ai tiket ïa ka Kong Fenella bad lada ka jop khlempep kan ïoh ïa ka shuki Myntri bad ha kata ka por kan wanrah ïa ka dud bad ka ngap sha ka Jylla, kan wanrah shibun ki kam pynroi ban pynkha ïa ki lad ïohkam ïohjam sha ki paidbah ka jylla,” u la ong.“Lada ki samla ki kwah ïa ka kam ki dei ban ai ïa ka vote sha ka BJP. Ailad shisien ïa ka BJP,” la kyrpad u Bah Shullai.
title: Pynsngew u Bah Sanbor ha ka BJP ban ai tiket MP ïa ka Dr. Fenella Nonglait

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27 : Ka All India Trinamool Congress lane ka TMC ka la rai ban ym pynïeng kyrtong na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ha kane ka election MP Lok Sabha ka ban long ha u bnai Iaiong ne Jymmang 2024.U President ka TMC u bah Charles Pyngrope u la pyntip ïa kane sha ki nongïalam ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) ha Kolkata dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi.Ha kaba ïadei na ka bynta ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency ka TMC kan sa shim ïa ka rai tad haduh ba ka la dep ban lum jingtip na kylleng ka Constituency hapoh kane hi ka taiew.Haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u bah Charles u la ong “Ka daw ba la shim ïa ka rai ban ym pynïakhun kyrtong na kane ka Shillong Seat ka dei hadien ba la lum jingkheiñ bad lap ba ka jingïoh vote jongka party ha ka election MLA kaba la dep ka duna palat bad kumta kan buh jingeh bha ïa ka party ban ïoh ïa ka jingjop wat la ka pynïeng kyrtong ruh”.Ka TMC kum shi bynta ka jingïadon lang ha ka INDIA Block ka lah ban ai ka jingkyrshan ïaka Congress hangne ha ka Shillong Seat.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingwan jong u nongïalam ka AITC u Derek O’Brien sha ka nongbah Shillong dang shen, u bah Charles u la ong “Kat kum ka jingai jingmut jong u ka long ba ka party ka dei ban pynïakhun kyrtong beit na Tura bad dei halor kane ngi la pan por ban lum jingtip shwa na baroh kawei ka constituency khnag ban sngewthuh la ka party ka dang ïoh ne em kajuh ka jingkyrshan kumba ïoh ha ka election MLA ba la dep”.
title: Rai ka TMC ban ym pynïeng kyrtong na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 27: Arngut ki snar nongkhaii drok ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei katba ki dang pynlong ïa ka jingtalasi ïa ki kali kiba wan na Kalain, Cachar, Assam.U Superintendent of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hills District Giri Prassad ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar u la pyntip ba ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingtalasi kali ha Umkiang ha ka por kumba 10:00 mynmiet ki la bat ïa kawei ka kali Tata truck 1512 kaba don ïa u nombar AS 28 AC -1046 katba ka dang wan na Kalain, Cachar Assam bad rung sha Lumshnong, Meghalaya.Ha ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la lap ar tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba la suba ba la thep ïa u drok na ka met jong u Dony Paya Mulieh uba la 19 snem ka rta uba sah ha Khliehshnong, Lumshnong, East Jaintia Hills bad na u Langki Rymbai uba la 23 snem ka rta uba sah ha Dongdukan Lumshnong.Ha ka jingleh tes ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki riewpaidbah la pynshisha ba u dei u drok ‘Heroin’. Hadien ba la thew, u drok u don ka jingkhia kaba 34.44 gram.Ïa u drok bad ar tylli ki mobile phone la kurup noh na kitei ki arngut bad ki Pulit ki la register case ha Lumshnong Police Station hapoh ka Section 21(b)/29 NDPS Act. Ka jingtohkit ïa kine ki arngut mynta ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: 34.44 gram u drok kurup ki Pulit EJH, shah kem arngut

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 27: U Myntri Rangbah barim ka Jylla u Mukul Sangma ha ka sngi Baar u la wanrah ïa ka Point of Order pyrshah ïa ka jingbym lah jong u Myntri Rangbah bad ki Myntri jong u ban don hapoh ka Ing ha ka jingïathir ïatai halor ka Mang Tyngka.Haba ïoh ïa ka jingthylli kreng kreng ki shuki ha ka Treasury Bench, u Dr. Mukul u la wanrah ïa ka Point of Order bad ong ba ka Rule ka kdew, “u Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnat um dei ban mih na ka ing khlem ka jingbit jong u Lamphang.”“(Hynrei), ngam ïohi satia uno uno ruh u Myntri, lymne ïa u Myntri Rangbah ne ïa kiwei kiwei ki Myntri ba la kham rangbah. Tang uwei u dkhot ka Kynhun Myntri (Rakkam A. Sangma), uba shong bad u bym bat satia ïa ka tnat (ba la ïatai). Namarkata, nga kwah ban kyntu ïa phi Symbud Lamphang ban pyntreikam da ka kyndon jong ka Procedure and Conduct of Business ha ka por kaba dei,” u la ong. Haba u Mukul u la kylli shaphang ka iktiar jong u shongknor halor kane kam, u Symbud Lamphang u Timothy D Shira u la jubaba da kaba ong, “ngan pyntip ïa ki (Myntri) ba kin wan.”
title: Sangah u Dr. Mukul ba jah u CM bad ki Myntri katba dang ïatai halor ka Budget

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27: U Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma ula kular ba ka sorkar kan trei katba lah ka bor na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingshngaiñ bad jingïada na ka bynta ki paidbah kiba shong sah ha ki jaka khappud bad ka Assam namar ka jingle donbor ki riew shitniam Hindu ïa ki skul Missionary ha Assam.Ïa kane u Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh haba jubab ïa ka zero hour notice bala wanrah da u MLA ka UDP na Nongpoh Bah Mayralborn Syiem halor ka rai jong ki kynhun shitniam Hindu kiba la leit tah poster kylleng ka Assam ba bthah ïa ki skul Missionary ban weng lut ïa baroh ki mot niam bad ki Iingmane na ki jaka jong ki bad ban sangeh pyndonkam ïa ki jaka pule na ka bynta ka niam.“Ngin sa pyntip ïa ki SP bad ki DC ba kin pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingïaid pahara ka ban pynthikna ba ki paidbah kin ïoh ïa ka jingshngaiñ bad ba kin ïoh ruh ïa ki jingïada lada dei ban mih kano kano ka jingjia” ula ong.Tangba u Conrad u la ong ba kam dei pat ïa u ban leh eiei khlem da wad ïa ka jingshisha. bad donkam ban pynshisha shuwa ïa kane ka khubor bad ki jingtip shuwa ban leh eieiNalor kane,u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba u ju ïakren borabor bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam Himanta Biswa Sawma bad kumjuh ruh hapdeng ki Chief Secretary jong ki ar Jylla.
title: Kular u CM ban shimkhia ha khappud ba pynma ki shit niam Hindu ha Assam

content: Shillong, Rymphang 27: Ha ka sngi ba kut ka dorbar mang tyngka mynta ka sngi, ki dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah ha Meghalaya Legislative Assembly mynta ka sngi, ki la mih jyndat noh na ìingdorbar shuwa ba u Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad Sangma un jubab ïa ka jingïatainia halor ka mang tyngka.Kane ka jingmih jyndat da ki MLA ka Congress, TMC bad VPP ka long ban pyrshah ïa ka Voting of Demand for Grant shuwa ba u Myntri Pla Tyngka un jubab ïa ka jingïatai ïa ka mang tyngka.Haba wanrah ïa ka Point of Order ha ka sngi kut jong ka Dorbar mang tyngka, u MLA ka Congress na Umsning Dr Celestine Lyngdoh ula ong ba ka jingkren u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma, uba khmih ruh ïa ka pla tyngka, ba ka Voting on Demand for Grant ba ladep leh ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka dei na ka bynta ka Supplementary Demand, ka dei kaba bakla namar ïa ka Supplementary Demand ladep leh naduh ka 21 tarik Rymphang.“Lada ngi ong ba ka Voting for Demand for Grant lah ban leh shuwa ka jubab u Myntri Pla Tyngka, ka mut ba kane ka jubab u Myntri haba kut jong ka jingïatai ïa ka mang tyngka kam don jingmut shuh,” ula ong.U Dr. Lyngdoh u la ong ba kum u dkhot jong ka ìingdorbar, u kwah ba ka ïingdorbar ba kan bud ïa ki Rule. “Lada ka ïing kam bud ïa ki Rule, kaei ka jingmut ïa ngi ban shong hangne bad ban sngap,” la ong u MLA ka Umsning.U Dr. Celestine ula kyrpad ïa u Lamphang ban weng noh ïa ki kyntien ba ula pyndonkam ba ki la shu pynsyrwa kai ïa ka por bad ban pynbeit da kaba pynbeit ïa ka jingkren ba ïalam bakla jong u Myntri Rangbah ba ong ba ka sngi Thohdieng ka dei kaba Vote ïa ka Supplementary Demand ka long kaba bakla bad kaba hap ban pynbeit.“Lada ki dei ban vote ïa ka mang tyngka jong une u snem ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ka mut ba ngi la ïaid palat ïa ki kyndon jong ka rules”, la bynrap biang u MLA ka Congress na Umsning.Ïa kane ka point of order u Dr. Celestine la kyrshan da ka All India Trinamool Congress (TMC) bad ka Voice of the People Party (VPP).Haba ai ïa ka rai, u Lamphang Thomas A Sangma ula ong, “ngam don jingmut satia ban ong ba kane ka Iing ka la shu pynsyrwa kai ïa ka por. Ha ka jingshisha namar ka jingduna palat ka por, nga la bthah ban nym kren ïa ki kam ki bym donkam bad ban kren beit thik tang ïa ka mat. Hynrei, nga pynbeit noh ïa ka jingkren jong nga bad ïa ka kyntien pynsyrwa kai ïa ka por yn weng noh na ka jingïakren jong ka ïing”.Hynrei, u la ong pat ba ïa ka ishu kaba ar, ki sngi pynlong ïa ka dorbar (calendar) ka dei kaba la rai hapoh ka BAC bad la buh ruh hakhmat ka ïing ha ka sngi sdang jong ka Dorbar myn ha ka 16 tarik Rymphang bad la ïa mynjur ruh da ka Iing. Katkum ka Rule, ka jingpynsangeh shipor ïa ka Rule lah ban wanrah da ka Parliamentary Affairs hynrei naba nga ladep ban ai ïa ka rai, kumta ka rai jong nga ka dei kaba kut” ula ong.Namar ka jingbym hun ïa kane ka rai jong u Lamphang, ki Dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah na baroh lai tylli ki seng sain pyrthei, kila mih jyndat noh napoh ka Iingdorbar ban pyrshah ïa ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar ban pynbeit ïa ki jingbakla.Haba ïeng ïada ïa ka Liang Synshar, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba khmih ïa ka Parliamentary Affairs Bah Prestone Tynsong ula ong ba ka rai jong u Lamphang ka long kaba shai bha. Naduh ka sngi nyngkong la wanrah (calendar) hapoh ka BAC bad hapoh ka ïing bad ka ïing la ai ka jingmynjur.Haba u Dr Mukul Sangma ula ïeng ban ïasnohkti lang bad kiwei ki dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah bad ong ba ka jingmih jyndat ka dei kum ka jingpyrshah bad jingbym mynjur ïa kaei kaba ka Sorkar kaba leh, u Bah Prestone ula kynthoh “Ka Liang Pyrshah ka la pynman kale ïalade. Kane ka calendar (sngi shong dorbar) ka dei kaba la mynjur da ka Iingdorbar ha ka sngi sdang jong ka dorbar, kumno yn phai dien biang ïa ka.Haba kdew ba kane ka jingleh ka Liang Pyrshah kum ka kam ka bym ïahap, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K Sangma ula ong ba ki dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah ki la shu pynlong ishu khlem daw ha kaba ma ki hi dalade ki la ïadonbynta haba shim rai ha ka por ba ka Iingdorbar ka pdiang ïa ka calendar (sngi shong dorbar) ba la tyrwa da ka BAC.U la kynnoh ruh ïa ka Liang Pyrshah ba kam kwah ban sngap ïa ka jubab halor ka jingïatai ïa ka mang tyngka hadien ka jingïohi ïa ki jait kam kiba la pyntreikam hapoh ka Jylla.“Na kaei kaba nga sngewthuh, ki la waddaw ban ym sngap ïa ka jubab bad kumba nga ong, kine ki dei ki kam kiba kongsan namar ka jingkren halor ka mang tyngka bad ka jubab kan dei kaba phaikhmat sha kiba bun ki kam, hynrei yn ong kumno, ka dei ka rai jong ki bad ka Jylla baroh kawei ka peit ïa kane,” ong u Myntri Rangbah.
title: Bym hun ïa ka jingleh u Speaker, mih jyndat ki Liang Pyrshah na Ìingdorbar

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28: Ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol jong ka Meghalaya kam don jingkyrmen shuh ban ïohrung sha ka quarterfinal ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka 77th National Football Championship na bynta ka Santosh Trophy 2023-24 hadien ba ka la ïakhaid ha bad ka Goa ha ka jingïakhun na ka thup jong ka Group A kaba la long ha Itanagar, hynne ka janmiet.Kumban shu pynkynmaw, kaMeghalaya ka la wan kyrdan ba ar ha u snem ba ladep ha ka Santosh Trophy, hynrei mynta ka kynti ka la ïoh ban khur tang 2 point hadien ba ïakhaid bad ka Kerala bad ïa ka Goa hynne ka janmiet. Shuwa ban jam sha kane ka jingïakhun, ka kynhun Goa ka ladep ban pynthikna ïalade ban rung quarter final, katba ka Meghalaya ka donkam ban jop khnang ban pynneh ïa ka jingkyrmen ban ïohrung sha ka wat ba bud bad ïaknieh bad ka Assam.Ha kane ka jingïakhun, na ka liang jong u Bah Khlain Pyrkhat Syiemlieh-Head Coach ka kynhun, u la wanrah jingkylla tang ha ar tylli ki bynta jong ki player. Ha kaba u la wanrah biang ïa u Lionel Rymmei ha jaka jong u Siwel Rymbai ban ap kol, katba u Banskhemlang Mawlong u la shim ïa ka bynta jong u Overkindness Lyngdoh Mawnai.Haba bishar ïa ka jingïalehkai, lah ban kdew ba ka Meghalaya ka la ïalehkai bha khamtam ha ka kylla step, ha kaba ka la ïoh ruh katto katne ki kabu na u Sheen Sohktung ïa kiba u khlem shym la lah ban pynurlong.Hynrei haba jam sha ka jingïakhun jong ka kylla miet, dei ka Goa kaba la ïoh ban tehlakam bun shah ïa ka bol, bad ka la ïoh ruh shibun ki kabu ba ka la shna hynrei ki la long kiba sepei namar ym shym la don ba thep ïa ki. Watla ka Goa kam shym la lah ban pynkhihjar ha kane ka jingïakhun hynrei ka la biang pat ïa ka kynhun ban bteng ïa ka lynti ïaid khlem ka namrem.Nalor ka Goa, na ka Group A ka Services bad ka Kerala ki la pynthikna ban rung quarterfinal hadien ba pynliem ïa ka Assam bad Arunachal Pradesh da 2-0 kol.Ka Meghalaya kan ïalehkai khadduh pyrshah ïa ka Arunachal Pradesh ha ka 1 tarik u Lber por 7 baje janmiet.
title: Santosh Trophy 2024: Naba ïakhaid, ym don jingkyrmen shuh ka M’laya ban rung quarter final

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District  Council kaba la buh hakhmat eh ïa ka thong ban wanrah ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba ha ki shnong ki thaw kiba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Council ka la pan jingkyrshan na ka World Bank ban shna ïa ki Resource Recovery Centre da kaba sdang nyngkong eh na ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka East Khasi Hills District. Ka District Council ka la buh hakhmat eh ïa ka thong ban wanrah ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba ym tang ïa ki shnong ki thaw, hynrei wat ïa ki sawdong sawkun jong ka meimariang bad ïa ki um ki wah.Ka buit ban shna ïa ka Resource Recovery Centre ka dei kawei na ki lad kaba lehse lah ban ong ba kan long ka jingkyrkhu ruh ha kawei ka liang namarba lyngba kane ka Centre yn pynïakhlad ïa ki niut kiba pyut ban pyndonkam biang bad ïa ki bym pyut ïa kiba yn dup lah ban pynïaid kam da kawei pat ka rukom. Kane kan long ruh ka lad ban pynkylla pisa ïa ki ñuit ba la bret na ki thliew iing jong ki briew.Ki wahduid bad ki wah bah ki shu kylla sohpdung ei ha ka jingleh sat jong ki paidbah ki bym don shuh ïa ka mynsiem ïatiplem bad haba tih bniah ïa ki daw ka long ba ki paidbah kim kheiñ kordor ïa ka mariang kaba ai ïa ka lyer kaba khuid bad ka mariang kaba pyngngad. Ka jingbym biang jong ki jaka bret ñiut, ka pynlong ïa ki paidbah ban shu bret ïa ki jaboh jabaiñ kat shaba lap ba shem. Wat ka jingpynjari jong ka Sorkar ïa ki kyndon aiñ ba la mana ban daiñ kuna ïa ki nongpynkheiñ aiñ hynrei kam pynsheptieng satia. Kito kiba ju mlien ban pynkheiñ aiñ kin ïai leh kajuh shi kajuh ka kam tad haduh ba ka aiñ hi kan da leh da kaba tyngeh.Shabas! Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, kaba mih shakhmat ban pyntreikam ka Resource Recovery Centre, lyngba ka Solid Waste Management Programme. Ka jingpan jingkyrshan na ka Hima Mylliem kan ïarap shikatdei eh ban wanrah biang ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba jong ka Iewduh kaba long ka kad khaii kaba heh tam ha kane ka Jylla Meghalaya. Ka jingbret pathar ïa ki jaboh jabaiñ kyndong jong ka surok ïaid kjat ha Motphran kaba long ka iitkhmih jong ka Iewduh ka la wanrah ïa ka jingsma iwtung bad ka jingijli ban peit ïa ka jingbym sngewthuh jong ki briew ïa ka jingkordor jong ka jinglehkhuid.Sa kawei pat ka long ba ka District Council ka dei ban buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban pynkhuid sa ïa ka wah Umkhrah bad ka Wah Umshyrpi namarba kine ki dei ki ar tylli ki Wah kiba tuid na ka dohnud jong ka sor Shillong bad kiba long ruh ka iitkhmih jong ka nongbah. Ka jingjaboh jong kine ki ar tylli ki wah kumba ka long baroh shikatta, ka dei hi na ka jingbym kheiñ snep jong ki paidbah ïa ka jingmyntoi jong kine ki ar tylli ki wah. Jin lada ka Wah Umkhrah bad ka Umshyrpi kin long kiba khuid khlir khlir khlempep kin don bun ki lad ban kamai pisa da kaba shna ïa ki jaka ban khring ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei kumba long sha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.Ka District Concil hi marwei kan ym lah ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingthmu, lymda ki bor Hima, ki bor shnong bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong kim ai ka jingïatreilang. Ka jingpynjari kyndon jong ki bor sorkar kin ym don jingmut lada ki paidbah hi kim don ka jingangnud naduh mynsiem bad ka jingkitkhlieh ïa ka jinglong bakordor jong ka meimariang.
title: Ka jingangnud ka KHADC ban wanrah jingkhuid lyngba ki RRC

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28: Ka Madan Heh FC ka la ïoh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 50 hajar tyngka hadien ba ka la ïoh rah ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol ba 9 ngut shilliang kaba la tip kum ka 1st Knockout Football Tournament 9 Aside ba la pynïaid da ka HANM Mawlai Syllaikariah Unit.Ka Madan Heh FC ka la jop da kaba pynliem noh da 5-2 kol ïa ka Mawlai Impact FC ha ka jingïakhun phainal ha ka sngi Balang ha Madanlyngkhuid Block 8, kaba don ha Mawlai Nongkwar.Ha kane ka sngi la ïadonlang u Bah Wanseng Jyrwa u riew rangbah jong ka Mawlai kum u kongsan, Bah Lamphrang Kharbani President ba rangbah ka seng HANM kum u symbud kongsan, Bah Nelson Kharbani, Bah Bawan Nongsiej kiba dei ki vice president, Bah Venus, ki nongkitkam ka HANM Mawlai Syllaikariah Unit bad ki paidbah nongpeitkai.Haba phai sha ka jingïalehkai phainal ka long kaba itynnad bad ïakhaid bha. Ka kylla step ka la kut da kaba ïathep mar shi kol. Dei ha ka kylla miet ba ka jingïalehkai ka la sdang ban kylla, ha kaba ka Madan Heh FC ka la ïoh ban thep ia ki saw kol kynthup ka shi kol ba la ïoh thep ei, katba ka Mawlai Impact FC ka ïoh ban pynshai tang shi kol.Ha kaba kut jong ka jingïalehkai la sam ïa ki khusnam sha baroh ar ki kynhun ha kaba ka Madan Heh FC ka ïoh khur ïa ka song pisa ba 50 hajar tyngka ryngkat ka trophy bad ki takma katba ka Mawlai Impact FC ka ïoh 25 hajar tyngka ryngkat ka trophy bad ki takma.U Bah Lamphrang Kharbani haba ai jingkren u la ong ba ka seng HANM ka ju pynlong ia kiba kum kine ki jait jingïalehkai ban pyllait ïa ki samla na ki jingmlien ba sniew khamtam na ki jingdih pynbuaid.U Bah Wanseng Jyrwa haba kren kum u kongsan u la ai khublei ïa ka HANM kaba la pynlong ïa kane ka jingïalehkai kaban ai ka jingmut jingpyrkhat kaba khlaiñ, ka met kaba koit ba khiah bad ban pyllait na ki jingsniew kiba bun.U la kyntu ïa ki samla ba kin pyndonkam hok ïa ka sap kaba U Blei U la ai khnang ba kin ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam ka burom ïa ka ïing ka sem bad ïa ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.Ha kane ka sngi shuwa ban sdang ka jingïakhun phainal la ïoh ban pynïalehkai paralok hapdeng ka HANM seng kmie pyrshah ïa ka HANM Mawlai Syllaikariah Unit.
title: Khur ka Madan Heh FC ïa ka song pisa ba 50 hajar na ka lympung 1st Knockout FT ka HANM Mawlai Syllaikariah Unit

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 28: Ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ban pynpoi bording electric lyngba ka skhim RGVVY kaba la bei pisa da ka sorkar pdeng, ban pynpoi sha ki lai tylli ki shnong kiba don ha ki thaiñ Langpih ba kynthup ïa ka Mawdiangsnam, Umyiap bad Miangbyrkong, ka la sah kut naduh ba la sdang ban pyntreikam.Katei ka jingsahkut ban pynpoi bording sha kitei ki shnong ka dei hadien ba u Kontraktor u la sdang ban pyntrei, hynrei na ka liang ka sorkar Assam ka la bthah ïa ki pulit kiba don ha Langpih ba kin pynsangeh ïa katei ka jingtrei. Ki nongtrei ïa katei ka projek ruh ki la hap ban sangeh noh, namar ba ki pulit Assam kim shah satia da kaba ong ïa ki ba lada ki dang bteng ban trei, kin kem bad rah sha thanad ban set along ïa ki.Haduh kine ki sngi haba ïaid lyngba ïa katei ka lynti, la lap ba ki post electric kiba la pynïeng naduh Langpih haduh Mawdiangsnam ki la shu sah khong reng bad sarang lut. Don ruh bun tylli kiba la shu buh kai harud lynti.Haba pyrshang ban twad jingmut na ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka thaiñ, ki la ïathuh ba ka long kaba shisha ba ki pulit Assam, kim shym la shah satia ban trei bad ki da byrngem byrsit ruh ïa ki nongtrei bad ban kem wat ïa ki nongshong shnong ruh lada katei ka jingtrei kan bteng hadien ba ki la pynsangeh.Ki la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ka sorkar Assam, ka la dei ban burom ïa ka soskular ne ka Status Quo kaba la ïa mynjur lang hapdeng ki ar sorkar, ba ym dei ban khanglad ïa ka jingpyntrei ïa ki kam pynroi lada pyntrei na Meghalaya ne na ka Assam.Hynrei ka sorkar Assam ka pyntrei shait shait ïa ki kam pynroi kum kaba pynbha ïa ka surok na Mawsikar haduh Kamphaduli lyngba ki shnong Khasi naduh Mawsikar, Umwali, Umwahsiang, Langpih ter ter ha kaba na ka liang ki Khasi kim shym la khanglad satia ban pyntrei ïa katei ka surok. Ka sorkar Assam ka la dep ban siang rong ïa ka surok PMGSY naduh Langpih haduh Mawkoibari, hynrei ym shym la don ba pynwit satia.Na ka liang ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka thaiñ, ki la kyntu ïa ki bor ba halor khamtam ka sorkar MDA 2 ba ïalam da u Conrad K Sangma, ban tuklar lem bad ban ïa kren sngewthuh jingmut bad ka Assam, ba kam dei ban khanglad ïa ka jingpynpoi bording sha kitei ki lai tylli ki shnong, khnang ba ki paidbah kin ïoh jingmyntoi lang kumba ïoh kiwei pat ki para nongshong shnong ha ka Jylla.
title: Sa haduh katno snem ba ki lai shnong ha Langpih kin ïoh bording RGVVY ?

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28: Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Shillong Lajong SC ka la duh ei ban khur ïa ki lai point ba kongsan na ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Rajasthan United kaba la long hala ïing, kata ha SSA Stadium-Polo jong ka lympung I-League hadien ba katei ka liang pyrshah ka la lah ban pynphai shuwa ban kut ka por haduh 2 kol tang hapoh 2 minit ban pynïakhaid ïa ka jingïalehkai hynne ka jan miet.Ha kane ka jingïakhun, ka Lajong ka la lamkhmat lypa da 4-2 kol hynrei shuwa ban kut artad ka por ba la pynjlan ïa ka jingïalehkai ka Rajasthan ka la ïohlad ban thep haduh 2 kol ban pynthikna mar shi point na kane ka jingïakhun.Ka jingïakhun ka long kaba shongshit bad kaba itynnat bad dei ka Rajasthan kaba la ïoh pynkhihjar nyngkong lyngba u R. Gupta ha ka minit ba 12 jong ka kylla step, hynrei ka Lajong ka la ïoh ban pynphai ha ka 25 minit na ka kol ba la thep da u K. Lhuid.Shuwa ban sa khylliap ïa ka por jong ka kylla step ka Lajong ka la ïoh thep ïa ka kol kaba ar na ka penalty ba la shut da u D. Tardin, kaba la pynlong ïa ka kynhun ban lamkhmat ïa ka jingïakhun.Tang hadien katto katne ba la ïaid ka kylla miet, ka Lajong ka la shah pynduna shiphew ngut ha madan naba ïoh red card noh u A.Lyngdoh (49 minit) shuwa ba u R. Gupta jong ka Rajasthan un pynïakhaid ïa ka jingïakhun da mar 2 kol ha ka minit ba 50.Watla ka kynhun ka la hap ban bteng ïa ka jingïakhun da tang shiphew ngut hynrei kam shym la kynrandien satia bad dei ha ka minit ba 80 ba u Goncalves u la thep ïa ka kol kaba lai, nangta bud sa ka kol kaba saw na u Phrangki Buam ha ka 85 minit kaba la pynshongshit ïa u paid nongkyrshan.Hynrei hashwa ban kut artad ka por pynjlan ïa ka jingïalehkai ka Rajasthan United lyngba u Denzell (90+4 minit) bad na u Chhangte (90+6 minit) ka la ïoh ban pynïakhaid ïa ka jingïalehkai ban khur mar shi point.Da kane ka jingïakhaid ka Lajong ka hiar sha ka kyrdan ba hynriew da 26 point naki 16 sien ïakhun, katba ka Rajasthan United ka dang ïaineh ha ka kyrdan ba 9 da 17 point naki 16 sien ïakhun.Ka Lajong kan sa ïakhun pat ha ka 4 tarik u Lber pyrshah ïa ka Churchill Brothers shabar nala ïing, ha ka por 7 baje jan miet.
title: I-League: Hapoh ar minit 2 kol pynïakhaid ka Rajasthan ïa ka Lajong

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : Kum ka dak ka jingai burom bad ban kynmaw ïa ka jingwan sah jong u Rabindranath Tagore hangne ha Nongbah Shillong ha ki shi spah snem mynshwa na ka liang u Myntri ka tnat Arts and Culture bad uba khmih ruh ïa ka Tourism ha ryngkatlang bad u Chairman ka MTDC bad u Myntri barim ka arts and Culture u Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ryngkatlang bad ki heh ophisar ki Engineer ki la leit ban jurip ïa ka Rabindranath Tagore Cultural Complex kaba don marsyndah bad ka State Assembly kaba ha Rilbong Shillong ha ryngkatlang ïa ka Surok kaba don ha kane ka Complex kum ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa kaei kaba la sdang.“Ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingjurip ka long ban shna ïa ka Museum, ka Cafe, ka parking lot, ha kajuh ka por ban pynbna ruh ïa kane ka jaka kum ka Heritage Building kaba u Rabindranath Tagore u la sah ha kane ka jaka kaba la palat spah snem ha ki por ba u Tagore u la wan sha Shillong,” ïathuh u Myntri haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Nyngkong.U la ïathuh ruh da kaba ong ba ïa kane ka projek kaba la sdang da u Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ka por ba u la long u Myntri ka art and Culture mynta ka la poi ha ka kyrdan ban jam shakhmat bad ïa kane ka kam kan long hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka art and Culture bad ka PMC bad ka HLCS bad kane ka projek la mang kumba T. 15 klur kaba sah mynta ka long ban buh noh ïa u mawnongrim ha ka 9 tarik u bnai Lber bad hadien kane ynsa sdang ban pyntrei noh ïa ka kam.U la ïathuh ruh ba ïa ka tender lah dep khot bad ka jingaiti ban pyntrei ïa ka kam ka la ïaid bad ban ai ïa ka kontrak.Halor kane u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ïathuh ba u Tagore u la wan laisien sha Shillong bad ka don ruh kawei ka kamra thiah kaba u la ju pyndonkam ban thoh ruh ïa ki 3 tylli ki kot ha Nongbah Shillong ha kitei ki sngi ba u la sah ha Shillong.“Ngi sngewtynnad ruh ba mynta ka Sngi ngi la lah ban pynbeit ïa kane ka kam bad ha shwa ban sdang ïa ka kam ngin sa buh noh ïa u mawnongrim ha ka 9 tarik u bnai Lber,” ong u Bah Paul da kaba bynrap ruh ba ynda la dep ïa kane ka kam kan sa lah ban long ka jaka ka ban khring ïa ki nong jngohkai pyrthei.
title: Da ka Museum yn shna ban pynsah nam ïa u Rabindranath Tagore

content: Jowai, Rymphang 27: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Laskeiñ Block Circle hapoh ka jingïalam u Vice President samla Ioowanlam Sayoo ryngkat bad u Secretary samla Shadapstar Hadem, kila ïoh ban leit ïa kynduh bad u Executive Engineer PWD Road Shangpung Division, halor ka jingpynslem ban pyntrei ïaka surok Laskeiñ sha Barato bad Raliang shaduh Sahsniang.Na ka liang ha ka jingïakren bad utei u sahep (E.E) ula pynshai ba mynta ka sah sa tang ban pyntrei da ki Contractor kiba dei ban trei ïa ka kam.Ka seng ka kyntu bad kyrpad jur ïa kitei ki Contractors ban pyntrei kloi kloi ïa katei ka surok, namar kumba long mynta ki paidbah kiba dei ïaid lyngba kane ka surok ki shem shitom haduh katta katta namar ka jingsniew palat kane ka surok khamtam la jan dei ka por lyiur. Pynkut ka kyrwoh na u Publicity samla Moredan Ryngki.
title: Kynduh ka HYC ïa u EE PWD halor ka surok Laskeiñ-Barato-Raliang shaduh Sahsniang

content: Nongstoiñ Rymphang 28: Ka Nonglang Pungsier Angler Associtiation (NPAA) kadei ka synjuk jong ki rawon kaba kynthup ia ki samla bad ki rangbah na ka shnong Nonglang bad ki shnong ba mar jan kum ka Umwhlang,Mawsyrpad, Langja bad kiwei kiwei kaba ïaleh ban ïada bad pynneh pynsah ïa ki doh um doh wah ha shilynter ka wah Tyrsung bad ki shnat jong ka. Katei ka seng ka la trei kam la palat arphew snem tam haduh mynta ban pahara ïa ka wah Tyrsung bad ki shnat jong ka. Naduh da kaba pynlong ïa ka jingpahara da ki dkhot kiba la phiah ha ki group kat kum ki por.Ki dkhot jong katei ka seng haduh mynta ki la don palat shispah ngut .U bah K.B.Syiemlieh secretary katei k haba ïakren bad u nongthohkhubor u la ong ba haduh kine ki sngi ka seng ka dang ïaibteng ban pahara ïa katei ka wah naduh u bnai Nohprah manla u snem khamtah eh haduh u bnai Jymmang hynrei naduh u bnai jymmang lei lei habaroh shilynter katei ka wah bad ki shnat jong ka da ki phew ngut ki rawon ki don man la ka sngi ym tang ki shynrang hynrei wat ki kynthei ruh da ki phew ngut manla ka sngi ki don.U bah Syiemlieh u la ong ruh bat eng teng ki ju pynlong ïa ka jingïakop khwai paralok khlem da pynlong kino kino ki jingpynbna paitbah bad ki ju ai da ka buskit kaba heh kumba leh kiwei pat ki ba pynlong ïa ki ïakop khwai dohkha ha ki pung,hynrei ki shu pynlong tang kum ka jingïalehkai sngewbha bad ba ki rawon kin pyni ïa ka sap khwai kaba ki don.U la ong ruh ba mynta u snem katei ka seng ka la nang pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ki kyndon treikam ban pyrkhing ïa ka jingpynïap pathar ïa ki doh um ha katei ka wah bad ki shnat jong ka.U bah Sevenstar Syiemlieh uwei na ki dkhot jong katei ka seng u la ong ba da ka jingtrei shitom bad ka jingïatylli jong ki dkhot la lah ban khanglad ïa shibun ki riew shim kabu kiba thmu ban wan ban pynïap dohkha da kaba siat bom,ai dawai bih bad khang jar,U la ïathuh ruh ba ha u snem ba la dep bun tylli ki jarkhang la lap ha katei ka wah hynrei ym shym la lap satia ïa ki briew ha kaba ki dkhot ka seng ki la pynjot noh ïa baroh ki jar.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba na ka liang jong u u kwah ba ym dei ban ïada tang ïa ki doh um hynrei ïa ki mrad ki mreng ,ki sim ki doh bad baroh ki jingthaw ba im. U la ïathuh ba ha kine ki snem ki mrad khlaw kum ki skei,ki sniang khlaw,ki diengkhied,ki syiar khlaw bad kiwei kiwei ki la sdang roi sted bha hynrei ki don pat ki briew na kiwei pat ki shnong ba marjan kiba ju wan beh thong man ka por bad don teng teng ba ha ka shisngi ki ioh haduh ar bad lai tylli ki skei.Khatduh eh u la ong ba ka jingïada ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki mrad ki mreng ,ki sim ki doh ka la don kam eh ha kane ka pateng ba mynta bad ka awareness programe ne ka jingai jinghikai ïa ki paitbah ba kin sngewthuh ka la don kam kyrkieh ha kine ki sngi ha man la ki jaka.U la kyntu ruh ïa ki bor synshar shnong bad ki paitbah ba kin smgewbha ban kiar raimaw rai dieng ban pynïap p;athar ïa ki mrad ki mreng,ki sim ki doh bad kiwei kiwei ki jingthaw ba im namar lada ym don ki mrad ki sim ki doh bad kiwei kiiwei ki jigthaw ba im wat ka mariang ruh ka long suda bad ka kynjah hynrei da ka jing don jong ki sim ki doh bad kimrad ki mreng ka pyn sngewtynnad lyngba ki sur ba ki pah ki rwai ha ki khlaw ki btap.
title: Maham jur ka NPAA ban pynïap pathar ïa ki doh um ha wah Tyrsung

content: Khliehriat rymphang 28: Ka Jaiñtia Youth Federation East Jaiñtia Hills, mynta ka sngi hapoh ka jingialam u President u bah J..Pala, ka la buh da ka jingthoh ha u Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills District bad ka seng ka la dawa ba dei ban thung Junior Engineer noh ha ophis jong u Boder Area Development Office ha Khliehriat, namar kane ka ophis kam don JE shuh mynta la bun bnai bad ki kam ki jam kiba iadei bad ki shnong ha ki thaiñ khappud ki la shu sahkut bad sahteng lut.Na ka liang ki nongïalam jong ka JFY na East Jaiñtia Hills ki la dep ïakynduh ruh ïa u heh sorkar uba dei u Officer Incharge bad hadien ka jingiakren u Officer u la kular ba un shim khia ïa kane ka kam ban pynsngew sha ki bor ba halor ban thung Junior Engineer ha katei ka tnat treikam ha Khliehriat khnang ban dup lah ban shna ïa ki mang tyngka ne ki estimate budget na ka bynta kito ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ki thaiñ khappud, la ong ruh ba ka shem jingeh ban pyntrei ïa kano kano ka project lada khlem don u nong planning uba dei u Junior Engineer, ha ka juh ka por ruh u BADO u la ong ba kane ka post ka dei ka la ju don ha ka office trei jong u, hynrei sngew lyngngoh ba naduh ba u wan shimti ïa ka kam kum u officer incharge yn don Junior Engineer bad mynta la jan don kumba shi snem.Ka seng ka la pynsgew ruh ha u Deputy commissioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ïa kane ka mat namar ba kito ki shnong kiba don ha ki thaiñ khappud ki mad jingeh ha ka jing iadei bad ki skim pynroi bapher bapher ba ki dei hok ban ioh na kane ka office trei jong u Border Area Development officer, hynrei tang na ka daw ba ym don u Junior Engineer ba shna ïa ka plan estimate budget, ki kam ki sahteng, halor kane na ka liang u DC ruh u la kular ban tuklar ba ki paidbah kiba don ha ki khappud kin ioh jingmyntoi na kane ka ophis kaba dei peit ïa ki thaiñ khappud.Ka seng ka kyntu jur ïa ka sorkar hapoh ka jingialam u Conrad K Sangma kum u myntri rangbah ka jylla ba dei ban shimkhia halor kane ka kam bad kum juh ruh ïa ki nongmihkhmat jong kine ki na East Jaiñtia Hills District, i kong Santa Mery Shylla bad kum juh u bah Kyrmen Shylla ba kin shimkhia lem halor kane khnang ba kan nym long ka jingduh jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah ka thaiñ.
title: Sateng ki kam namar bym don JE ha ophis ba dei peit ïa ki thaiñ khappud ha EJHD

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 28: Ka jingpynshlur jong ka sorkar ïa ki paitbah ban thung ïa ki jait dieng soh, kam don jingmut khamtam ïa u sohplom bad sohñiamtra, namar ynda ki dieng ki la san bad ki la soh kim long satia ban bam, ong ka kong M.Parïong kawei na ki nongrep dieng soh na ki thaiñ Rambrai.Katei ka longkmie haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, ka la ong ba ha ki snem ba kham mynshuwa ka la ïoh jingïarap na ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad ba peit ïa ka rep ka riang, da ki spah tynrai ki dieng sohplom bad ka la kyrmen ba ynda kitei ki dieng ki la heh bad la ïoh ban kheit soh, kan long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ïa ka ïing ka sem lyngba ka jingmih na kaba pynïaid ïew ïa kitei ki soh. Hynrei, ynda ki dieng ki la heh bad biang ka por ban soh pynban ynda pyrshang ba bam kiba kthang suda.Ka la ong ruh ban a ki spah tylli ki tynrai dieng soh tang katto katne tynrai kiba long ban bam. La ong ruh ba hadien ba ka la lap ïa ka jingshah shet shukor ha ka sorkar, ka la leit ban ai sha u ophisar da kitei ki soh ba la kheit na ki dieng ba ka la ioh jingïarap na u ba un lap ïa ka jingshisha.Nalor kata ym tang u soh plom u ba long kumta, hynrei wat ki symbai dieng sohñiamtra ba ka sorkar ka ai sha ki paitbah da ka skhim ruh ynda la thung bad ki la heh ka jingsoh te ka bym ithuh ithaw shuh, hynrei ban bam te ym long. Ïa ki sohñiamtra kiba long kumta ki paitbah ki ju khot ba ki dei ki dieng soh ba wan pyn thung da ka Soil Conservation.Ka kong M.Parïong ka la ong ruh ba ka don sa kawei pat ka jingpynshlur jong ka sorkar ïa ki paitbah, kata ka dei ka kam ri ngap. Ha katei ka kam ri ngap ruh ka la shah shet shukor kumjuh, namar ha ka por ba ka la pan jingïarap ban ri ngap, ka sorkar ka la ai da ki spah tylli ki ksing ngap.Haba ka la ïoh ïa kitei ki ksing, ha ka por synrai ka la phah bun ngut ki nongshong shnong, ba kin leit wad kiaw ngap na khlaw bad ka shim por da ki bnai ban ïoh ngap ban buh ha kitei ki ksing, hynrei ynda la khlong ïa ka um ngap ym don ba thied. Ka la ong ruh ba ka la pyrshang ban leit ïakynduh ïa ki ophisar hapoh Horticulture ban phah wad ïew na ka bynta ban die ïa ka umngap hynrei ym don ïew satia. Ha kaba ïadei bad kitei ki jingeh, katei ka long kmie ka la ong ba ka jingpynthame jong ka sorkar ïa ki paitbah kam dei tang da kitei ki ar tylli ki mat.Hynrei kumba la ïoh sngew na ka por sha ka por ba kiwei pat ki jingpynthame kum ka aqua mission lane ka jingpynshlur ban ri dohkha, haduh mynta kam shym pat la ai jingmyntoi ïa ki paitbah khamtam ha West Khasi Hills, namar kumba ka long haduh mynta ha baroh ki bynta jong ka West Khasi Hills, dang lah ban ïoh tang da ki dohkha kiba wan rah na shabar ka jylla.Nalor kata ka piggery mission kaba dei ka jingpynshlur ban ri sñiang, ka kylla long pynban ka jingpynduhnong kaba khraw ïa ki nongri sñiang. Namar na kito ki khun ñiang ba ka sorkar ka la wan sam sha ki paitbah ha u snem ba la dep hashuwa ka elekshon, na ki shispah tylli kiba im kim don wat tang marshiteng ruh. Kumta nangne sha khmat ka sorkar ka la dei ban da bishar bniah ïa kino kino ki jait jingthung bad ki jait symbai ha shuwa ba kan ai sha ki paitbah lymda kumta kan ym wanrah kano kano ka jingmyntoi.
title: Bun ki jait dieng soh ba ïoh symbai na ka sorkar ki bym long bam: Kong M.Parïong

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: U President ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit u samla Reebokstar Diengdoh ka sngi Balang u la khot bad wer ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Elaka Mawlong ban mih ryntih ha ka sngi ba ka seng kan leit khyndang ïa ka jingpynkha iew be-aiñ ha Kalibari, da ki bar jylla kiba sah ha Ichamati bad ha ki shnong bamarjan.Kane ka jingkhot jingwer jong une u nongïalam ka seng ka long hadien ba la ïoh jingtip ba ki bar jylla kiba ju leh ïa ka khaïi ka pateng hapoh ka shnong Ichamati mynta ki la kynriah jaka ban seng da ka iew thymmai ha ka shnong Kalibari.Ïa kane u samla Reebokstar Diengdoh u la pynpaw haba kren ha ka jingïalang kynmaw buromk ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap kaba snem snem jong u (L) Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta ha ka shnong Pyntha-umdan (Ichamati) kaba dang hap hapoh ka Sohra Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills district.Une u nongïalam ka KSU u la ong ruh ynda ka seng ka la leit ban kyndang ïa ki bar jylla kiba seng iew be-aiñ Kalibari ka da kwah eh ïa ki durkhmat jong ki paidbah ka shnong Mawlong ba kin synran lang seng namarba ki sheptieng ïoh ba shisien ka sngi kin sa shah taplup ha ka jingjyllei jong ki bar jylla.“Ngi sngewlem ngi pyrkhat lem na ka bynta jong phi, lashai ynda la dap lut da ki dukan jong kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew phin trei da kaei pat kam,” ong u President ka KSU.“Mynta ngi wan beh ïa ki bar jylla ki bym don kot don sla ba shong dukan phim ai ka jingkyrshan, kan sa poi ka por ba ngin da la thait na ka liang jong ka seng kan dap da ki dukan jong ki bar jylla phin sa wan pan jingïarap na ka KSU. Ngi lei ngim don dukan hangne ha Pyntha-umdan, jar la katta ngi hap ban wan hiar na Sohra ban wan beh lut ïa ki bar jylla kiba la syrtap lut shisien ka sngi. Ngi donkam ïa ka jingkyrshan jong ki paradoh parasnam,” u la ong“Nga kwah ba ki longkmie ki longkpa, ha ka sngi ba ngi hiar sha Kalibari ban kyndang ïa ki bar jylla kiba pynlong iew be-ain nga kwah ban ïohi ïa ka durkhmat jong ki trai shnong na Mawlong ba kin mih. Lada shah knieh ka jaka ha Kalibari phi dei ban sngewthuh ba ma phi kiba dei ban ïoh kynti kiba sah ha ka Elaka Mawlong,” la ong shuh shuh une u nongïalam ka KSU.
title: Wan pyni durkhmat ha ka por ba ngi leit kyndang ha Kalibari, ong u President KSU

content: Jowai, Rymphang 28: Kum shibynta ban pynshlur ïa ki samla bad ki longkpa ha ka kam mistery dieng, ka Jaiñtia Hills Development Society (JHDS) ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) ki la pynlong ïaka jingai jinghikai ba 60 sngi halor ka Basic Carpentry lane mistery dieng.Ïa kane ka training la sdang naduh ka 4th December 2023 bad la pynkut noh ha ka 23rd February 2024. Ïa ka certificate la sam mynta ka sngi kata 28th February 2024 da u Asst. General Manager ka NABARD u Bah. Greville Kharlukhi ha ka jingïadonlang u Director ka JHDS u Fr. Manbha Pakem, U coordinator ka JHDS u bah Denis Kurkalang bad kiwei de ki staff jong ka JHDS.La pynïaid ïa ka prokram ba lyngkot da u Ma Francis Langlein, Field Programme Associate ka JHDS bad la sam ïa ki certificates ryngkat ba ki Almari sha ki 20 ngut ki nongshah hikai ha kane ka training.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi pynkut, u Director ka JHDS u la kyntu bad pynshlur ïa kine kiba la shah hikai ba kin pyndonkam hok ïa ka sap bad ka jinghikai ba ki la ïoh khnang ban wanrah ïa ka ïoh ka kot hapoh ka ïing ka sem jong ki. U la ong ruh ba na ka liang ka JHDS kan pyrshang katba lah ban pynioh ruh sa ia ki tiar ba donkam (Start-up tools) khang ban kyrshan ïa kito kiba don jingthmu ban seng kam lajong.U Asst. General manager ka NABARD U Bah Greville Kharlukhi u la kyntu bad ai mynsiem ïa kine kiba la pyndep ïa ka training ba kin pyndonkam hok ïa ka skill ba ki la ïoh ha kane ka training na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ïalade shimet.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba kino kino kiba kwah ban aplai subsidy lane loan na ki Bank ki lah ban wanmih sha ka Ophis treikam jong ka NABARD.
title: Ai jinghikai ka JHDS bad NABARD haduh 60 sngi haka kam mistery dieng

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: Kan long kaei kaei kaba phylla bad ka khubor kaba ai mynsiem ba kum ka jaitbynriew Khasi ki dang don na ki longïing longsem kiba dang don ïa ki jaka puta kiba la sumar bha da ki mynbarim na ka bynta ka pateng kaba bud nadien jong ki.Nalor ka jingriewspah ka Ri Khasi lyngba ka jingdon ki marpoh khyndew, ne ka jingitynnad jong ka Mei mariang bad ka jingdon ki lum ki wah bad ki Kshaid ne ki dew lynnong, hynrei ki Matti ba la pynneh pynsah da ki longshwa manshwa ne ki riew hyndai hynthai ki la ïarap pat ban pynneh ïa kane ka jingriewspah jong ka jaitbynriew Khasi lyngba ki kam ki riew hyndai hynthai.Lah ban ong ba ki la don bun ki ïew ki hat ha ki katto katne ki shnong bapher bapher bad kiba la pawnam bha naduh ki por ba dang synshar ki phareng, hynrei ka ïew kaba don ha ka shnong Nongkseh Upper Shillong ka la long kaba sngew sarong bha ha kaba ki pateng jong ki mynbarim ki la ïai bteng ban sumar sukher bad ban pynneh pynsah haduh kine ki sngi ban long ka jingmyntoi ïa kane ka pateng.Kawei na ki jaka kiba mynta ka la sdang ban paw pyrthei kadei ka ïew ki mynbarim kadei ka jaka ba la long trai da ka kong Minorica Thangkhiew kaba dei kawei na ki jaka ha kaba ki mynbarim Hyndai hynthai ki la pynlong ïew bad ban don ruh ïa la ki jong ki Basa lyngba ki Mawbynna kiba don ha katei ka jaka kaba ka Kong Minorica ka la sumar sukher bha haduh mynta.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ha ka jingleit jurip kaba dangshen jong u Myntri ka tnat Arts and Culture uba dei ruh u Myntri ka tnat Tourism u Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad u Chairman ka MTDC uba long ruh u Myntri barim ka tnat Arts and Culture u Bah Sanbor Shullai la sakhi ba katei ka jaka kaba itynnad bha ka lah ban long sa kawei pat ka jaka ka ban khring ïa ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei.Halor kane, na ka liang ka Kong Minorica Thangkhiew kaba la long trai ïa kane ka jaka ka la lah ban ri ban sumar sukher bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa kane ka jaka jong ka, kumba ka la long naduh ki por hyndai hynthai bad kaba la ïai bteng ban sumar ïa kane ka jaka ba pawnam.Halor ka jinglong trai ïa kane ka jaka bad ban pynshai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jinglong trai ïa kane ka jaka na ka liang ki katto katne ki nongthoh khubor ki la ïoh ïa ka jingpynthikna ba katei ka jaka kadei hi kaba la long trai da ka Kong Minorica Thangkhiew ym ba la long trai da ka Kur Thangkhiew kumba la mih ha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi ba leit jurip u Myntri ka Sorkar jylla u Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad u Chairman ka MTDC u Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka jingïadonlang ki heh ophisar sorkar.Ha kane ka jingjurip ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jaka jong ka Kong Minorica Thangkhiew lah ban ong ba na ka liang u Myntri u la ong ba na ka liang ka tnat kaba u la khmih kan sa wad ïa ki lad ki lynti bad ban dang pynlong ruh ïa ki jingïasyllok ha baroh ki liang ha shwa ban pynbna ïa ka kum ka Heritage site ne ka jaka kaban ïoh ki lad jingïada, ban sumar sukher bad ba kin ym jot ne shah pynjulor khnang ba ynda ki kam bad ki kaiphod ki la dep kan sa long sa kawei pat ka jaka ka ban khring ïa ki nongjngoh kai bad kan sa plie lad ha ka ïohkam ïohjam.
title: Da ka jingsumar ka Kong Minorica, paw ka ïew u mynbarim ha Nongkseh

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ha ka sngi Balang ka la sdang ban lum ïa ki jingai jingmut na ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla ïa kaba yn sa kynthup ha ka Manifesto ne mat ka treikam jong ka party na ka bynta ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen.Ïa kane ka prokram la sdang ha ka sngi Baar ha kaba u President ka party u Rikman G. Momin u la thep nyngkong eh ïa ka jingai jingmut jong u.Ka party ka wer ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla ba kin phah ïa ki jingthoh jong ki sha ka NaMO app ne da kaba shu ai Miscall ha u number 909090 2024.Ki seng trei monsngewbha bapher bapher ruh ki lah ban phah ïa ki jingai jingmut jong ki da kaba ai ïa ka jingthoh sha ka ophis treikam jong ka party ha ki district ne ha ka jylla.U President ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit u la banjur ba ka BJP ka ngeit ba ha ka synshar paidbah ki nongshong shnong ki dei ban mih shakhmat ban pynsngew ïa ki jingsngew jong ki bad khamtam ïa ki jingangnud bad ka BJP kum ka seng saiñhima sima ka pdiang ïa kita baroh bad dei tang ka BJP ha baroh kawei ka ri kaba ïaid ryngkat lang bad ki paidbah ban shna ïa ki mat treikam jong ka.Lyngba kane ka prokram ka Party ka kwah ban trei da kaba ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur na ki paidbah. Bunbah ki jingangnud jong ka jylla bad ka BJP ka ailad ïa iwei pa iwei i nongshong shnong ban phylliew.Ka seng ka la buh jingthmu ban pynpoi haduh 5000 tylli ki jingthoh halor ki mat bapher bapher kum ka jingithuh ïa ki ktien ka jylla ha ka Khyrnit Baphra, ka jingseng ïa ki Medical College, ka jingpynkiew ïa ki lad ai jingsumar, ka jingpynkha ïa ki kam ki jam na ka bynta ki khun samla bad kumta ter ter.
title: Pan jingmut ka BJP na ki paidbah ka jylla shwa ban pynmih ïa ka Menifesto

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: Ki nongrep synsar kiba dei na ka thaiñ Mawsynram bad kumjuh ruh na Ri Bhoi bad na kiwei ki jaka kiba dap da ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jinghiar dor kynsan kynsan jong u synsar hapoh ka jylla ha ka sngi Balang ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongïalam ka Hill Farmer Union (HFU) ki la tur sha MECOFED, Mawiong ban wad jingtip halor ka dor ka mur jong u synsar.“Ka jinghiardor jong u synsar ka la pynïap nong shibun ïa ki nongrep. Ki nongrep synsar na ka thaiñ Riwar bad na kiwei kiwei ki jaka ki ïoh ban kyrshan skul ïa ki khun ki kti bad ban pyndap ïa ka ing ka sem lyngba ka kam rep synsar. Ki la don ki nongrep synsar kiba la pyntip sha ngi, ba kim ïoh shuh wat tang ban siew ïa ka baikot na ka bynta ki khun khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba la plie ki skul,” la ong u President ka HFU Bah Commander Shangpliang ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Hadien ba jingïakren bad ki nongkhaii synsar, ngi sngewthuh ba ki don ka bor ban tehlakam ïa ka dor jong u synsar la ka long ki nongkhaii na kane ka jylla lane ki nongkhaii kiba nabar ka jylla,” la ong u Bah Shangpliang.U la ong ba ki nongkhaii ha MECOFED ki la kam ba ka jinghiar dor jong u synsar ka dei namar ka jingbun u mar. “Ki (nongkhaii) ong ba ka jinghiar dor ka dei namarba u bun u mar, hynrei ïa kata ngim tip ïoh lehse ka dei tang ka buit jong ki bad ngi la kren da kaba shai ba kin (nongkhaii) pynkiew beit ïa ka dor ïa kaba ki nongkhaii ki la kyntait mardor,” la bynrap u Bah Shangpliang.U la ïathuh ba ka Union kan sa leit ban ïakynduh ïa ka Myntri kaba khmih ïa ka tnat ka Rep ka Riang ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ban ïakren halor ka dor ka mur jong ki mar rep bad ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka Minimum Support Price (MSP).Shuh shuh u la kam ba ki nongkhaii ki la leh da kiba bun ki buit tang ba ïoh khñiot ïa ka dor.“Nalor ba ki nongrep ki hap ban trei shitom baroh shisnem, ki nongkhaii kim dei ban khñiot ïa ka dor namarba ka wanrah ïa ka jingduhnong kaba khraw. Ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka Minimum Support Price (MSP) kaba ki nongrep ha ka ri baroh kawei ki dawa. Ngi iengskhem ym dei tang ïa u synsar hynrei wat ha kiwei kiwei ki mar rep ruh ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka Minimum Support Price (MSP),” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Shangpliang.“Ngin ym lah ban kynjoh sha kata ka thong 10 billion Dollar ba la buh da ka Sorkar, lada ki nongrep jong ngi ki dang hiar arsut,” la kynthoh u Bah Shangpliang.Uwei na ki nongrep ka thaiñ Mawsynram u la ong, “ha u snem baladep ngi dang lah ban die ïa u synshar ha ka dor T.120-130 bad ka la ïarap khyndiat ïa ki nongrep ha ka jylla baroh kawei hynrei mynta u snem ka dor jong u synsar ngi dang ïoh ban die na ki shnong ha ka dor T.70 ha ka sien banyngkong hynrei mynta ha kine ki sngi ka dor ka hiar haduh T.40 haduh T. 30 bad kane ka pynsngewsih ïa ngi namarba ngim sngewmyntoi shuh ban dang rep.”“Ki marwari ki la ai jingmut ïa ngi ban leit ïakren bad ka Sorkar ba kan buh da ka Minimum Support Price khnang ki nongrep kin ym duhnong,” u la ong.“Ka Sorkar ka wanrah bun tylli ki mishon na ka bynta ki nongrep hynrei na ka bynta ki nongrep synsar ka long kaba sngewsih ba ka pynïap dor ïa ngi namarba ha iew ka dor ka hiar palat mar shiteng,”u la ong.
title: Tur ki nongrep sha MECOFED ba hiar dor u synsar, synran lang ka HFU
