content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: Ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Student Union, South Khasi Hills District Unit ha ka sngi Balang ki la hiar sha ka shnong Ichamati kaba hap hapoh ka Sohra Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills district ban pynlong ïa ka jingkynmaw burom ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ba saw snem jong u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta uba la shah ïap na ka jingshah bom shah tied ha ki bar jylla ha kane ka shnong Pyntha-umdan (Ichamati) ha ka 28 tarik, Rymphang, 2020.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta u la shah tangon ha ki bar jylla kiba la rah da ki tiar pynmynsaw ha ka sngi ba ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha iew Ichamati ban pynshai paidbah bad ban pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB) kaba la kylla long mynta ka aiñ. U Bah Lurshai u la khladnoh ha Sohra CHC hapdeng ka jingshitom kaba jur.Ha ka jingleh kynmaw burom ïa une u dkhot ba la khladnoh jong ka seng, ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit ba la lamkhmat da u President u samla Reebokstar Diengdoh ryngkat ka kurim ka Balawanrisha Khongshei bad ki saw ngut ki khun ki la buh ïa ki syntiew hakhmat u durmot ba la tei da ka KSU ha u snem 2021.Katba ka KSU ka dang pynlong ïa kane ka jingkynmaw burom ïa u Bah Lurshai, la sakhi ruh ba ki dukan jong ki bar jylla ha Iew Ichamati ki la khang khyrdop bad kim shym la nud satia ban plie tad hadien ba la kut noh ka jingïalang leh burom.Na ka shnong Ichamati, ki dkhot ka KSU ki la kiew sha Sohra ban pynlong sa ïa ka jingai khusnam ïa ki samla pule jong ka thaiñ Sohra da ka 4th Maitshaphrang Academic Award kaba la long ha St John Bosco Boys Higher Secondary School, Sohra.Ki samla kiba la shah pynkup burom ki kynthup naduh na ka shnong Umtyngngar ter ter shaduh ka shnong Shella bad ha kane ka jingpynkup burom ki don 11 ngut ki samla pule ha kaba ha ka SSLC la shim ïa kiba ïoh 85% shalor, ha ka HSSLC 80% shalor bad 75% shalor ïa ki kyrdan pule Degree bad PhD.La sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi, da u President ka KSU Seng Kmie u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar uba la long u Kongsan ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Principal ka St John Bosco Boys Higher Secondary School, Sohra u Fr. Alphonsius Rongrinkum u symbud kongsan, u Vice Principal ka skul u Dr. Eligius Sawian, u Rangbah Shnong ka Pdengshnong, Sohra bad kiwei kiwei kynthup ka kurim bad ki khun jong u (L) Bah Lurshai Hynniewta.
title: Hiar ka KSU sha Ichamati ban kynmaw burom ïa ka sngi ïap u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28 : Ka Sorkar Meghalaya mynta ka sngi Balang, ka la ïasoi ïa ka Memorandum of Understanding (Mou) bad ka 1 Million for 1 Billion Foundation (1M1B) ban seng ïa ka Green Skills Academy kaba ar ha India bad ba nyngkong ha Jylla, na ka bynta ki samla ha Shillong.Kane ka Green Skills Academy ka dei kaba la shna kyrpang na ka bynta ki samla pule college kiba la palat 18 snem ka rta bad ka thong jong ka project ka long ban aibor ïa ki samla ba kin lah kynjoh ïa ka sap treikam kaba pura da ka jingkyrshan ruh ïa ka koit ka khiah bad ka bha ka miat, ka ban pynthikna ïa ka jingroi jingpar kaba bteng hapoh ka Jylla.Ka thong ka long ban ai jinghikai haduh 1 lak ngut ki samla halor ka Green Skill napoh ka Jylla ha kine ki san snem ban sa wan bad kan jied ruh ia 10 ngut kiba wan shakhmat ba kin ai jingkren ïa ka kam ba ki trei hapoh ka 1M1B summit ka ban long ha United Nations ha New York.ïa kane ka MoU la ïasoi hapdeng ka Meghalaya Multisectoral Project for Adolescent Wellbeing Empowerment and Resilience (MPOWER) – Planning, Investment, Promotion and Sustainable Development Department, ka Tnad Pule Puthi, Information Technology & Communication (IT&C), Meghalaya State Skills Development Society, ka Jylla bad ka 1M1B Foundation.ïa kane ka soskular la ïasoi ha ka jingïadonlang u Sampath Kumar, Development Commissioner & Principal Secretary, bad u Pravin Bakshi, Commissioner & Secretary, Information Technology, & Communication (IT&C) lem bad ka Deepika Venkatesh, Program Manager- Green Skills & Sustainability, 1M1B ha ka jingïalang ba long ha Additional Secretariat, Shillong.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingshaniah ïa ka sap ba ki samla ka Jylla ki don, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ula ong “Ka long kaba sngewtynnad ban ïatreilang bad ka 1M1B ha kaban seng ïa ka Green Skill Academy hangne ha Meghalaya ka ban nang pynkloi ïa ka jingnang jingtip halor ka green skill hapdeng ki samla pule college ka Jylla”.
title: ïasoi MoU ka sorkar bad ka 1M1B ban seng ïa ka Green Skills Academy ha Shillong

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28 : U Myntri ka tnad pule puthi jongka jylla u Rakkam A Sangma u la pyntip ba ka sorkar ka dang pynkhreh ki lad ki lynti bad ka dang bishar bniah ruh ba lyngba ka Meghalaya State Education Commission (MSEC) yn pynïaid ryntih ïa baroh ki skul hapoh ka jylla.Ym tang ka jingpynïaid ryntih ïa ki skul bapher bapher hynrei yn bishar bniah ruh ïa ka rukom thung ïa ki nonghikai kat kum ka jingdon ki khynnah skul, ong u Rakkam haba jubab ha ka unstarred question ba la wanrah hapoh ka ïing dorbar.U la ïathuh kumba long mynta ka sorkar ka don hynriew tylli ki College, 40 tylli ki Grand-in aid College bad 31 tylli ki private college bad ïa mynta kine ki college ki la biang ban ai jinghikai ïa ki samla pule sha ki kyrdan ba kham shalor hapoh ka jylla.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka sorkar haduh mynta kam pat ïarap pisa ïa ki community bad private college bad na kata ka daw ka jingsiew ïa ki nonghikai ka duna bha lada ïa nujor ba ki deficit government college. Ka daw ka dei namar ba ka sorkar ka duna fund bha mynta.Hynrei wa tla katta ruh ka sorkar ka dang pyrshang hi ban thaw ki lad ki lynti ban ïoh ïarap pisa ïa ki private college bad na kata ka daw ruh ha kine ki lai snem ba la dep la pynkylla haduh 21 tylli ki private college kum ki people’s college.
title: Lyngba ka Education Commission bishar ka Sorkar ban pynïaid ryntih ïa baroh ki skul

content: Khliehriat, Rymphang, 27: U Branch Manager jong ka Canara Bank Khliehriat Branch, u Hemkholen Touthang hynnin ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la aiti ïa ka Cheque kaba T 20 lak ha ka Principal jong ka skul Saraswati Vidya Mandir (SVM), Kongong East Jaiñtia Hills District ka Kong Jandashisha Sungoh.Kane ka jingnoh jingïarap ka dei lyngba ka Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) jong ka Canara Bank.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, u Hemkholen Touthang, u la ong ba kane ka jingnoh jingïarap kaba T20 lak ka dei na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki lai tylli ki kamra klas ha ka skul kaba don ha Kongong, East Jaiñtia Hills District.U la ong ka pule puthi, ka jingnang jingstad ka dei kaba donkam bha ban kyntiew ïa ka ri, ki khynnah ki dei ka lawei jong ka ri, ka dei ïa ngi ba ngin don ka jingkitkhlieh ban ïada bad ban kyntiew ïa ki khynnah.U la kren ruh halor ka jingdonkam ban don ki nonghikai kiba tbit ban dup lah ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka imlang ka sahlang, ban wanrah ki jingkylla, ban pynurlong ïa ki jingthmu ba bha jong ki khynnah ban saiñdur ruh ïa ka longbriew man briew jong ki khynnah.
title: 20 lak synñiang ka Canara Bank ban shna ïa ki kamra klas ha SVM Kongong

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 28: Ka long ka jingkmen bad ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw ïaka shnong Umsaw Nongbri ha Ri-Bhoi District hadien ba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong mynta ka sngi u la leit ban buh mawnongrim ban siang rong noh ïaka surok shnong ba 1km kum ka jingpynkhreh bad pynitynnad ïaka shnong shuwa ka jingrakhe ïaka jingdap 50 snem ne Golden Jubilee ka Pastorate ha u snem 2025 bala mang pisa ruh haduh 90.61 lakh.Ha katei ka jingbuh mawnongrim ban siang rong ïa u surok shnong la wan ban sakhi da ka jingdonlang u Bah Mayralborn Syiem MLA ka Nongpoh, Bah Balajied Ranee MDC ka Nongpoh, Bah K. K Mawa Secretary jong ka Tnad PWD, Raja Brahma ADC Ri Bhoi, Bah D Langstang CE PWD, Bah U. Kurbah Executive Engineer jong ka PHE, bah BD Mawphniang Rangbah Shnong Umsaw Nongbri, ki pastor bad tymmen basan ka Balang Presbyterian Umsaw Nongbri, lem bad kiwei kiwei ki ophisar bad ki riew rangbah.Kum ban shu kdew hangne ba ka Reception Committee jong ka Balang Presbyterian Umsaw Nongbri kala leit mih sha u Bah Prestone Tynsong ban ïarap kyrpang ïa katei ka shnong naka bynta ka jingdonkam ba kyrkieh khamtam u surok ban pynsuk ïaki paidbah haka leit ka wan bad khamtam ban pynitynnad ïaka shnong shuwa ka jingrakhe ïaka jubili ksiar.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi naka liang u Bah KK Mawa Secretary ka tnad PWD u la ong ba katei ka surok yn siang rong thymmai da kaba pynïasoh na u surok PMGSY ba dang bha ha katei ka shnong bad yn pynbha ruh ïaki kynroh, ki nala ban pynitynnad ïa katei ka shnong.Naka liang u Bah Prestone Tynsong haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la pynthikna ba katei ka kam kan sdang noh shaid shaid ha kine ki khyndiat sngi bad khmih lynti ruh ba yn pyndep ïaka haka por kaba biang naka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ka leit ka wan ki paidbah khamtam ka jingpynkhreh ïa katei ka jingrakhe jubili ksiar jong ka Pastorate ha katei ka shnong.U la ong ruh kumba ka shnong kala buh ruh ka dorkhas ban peit ruh ïa kiwei kiwei ki surok ba donkam ban pynïasoh na katei ka shnong sha kiwei ki bynta khamtam ka surok na Umsaw Nongbri lyngba ka Umphing ban mih sha Umden ha kaba naka liang u Bah Prestone u la bthah ïaki Engineer ka PWD ban leh ïa kaba donkam ba shen yn sa sdang noh ïaka kam.U Bah Prestone u la ong ruh ba kane ka sorkar mynta kan dang pynjanai shuh shuh ïaka rukom treikam ban dang wanrah ki kam pynroi kumba ka dorbar mang tyngka ba dang shu dep la buh thong ïaka tnad pule puthi hakhmat eh bud pat sa ki kam pynroi surok bad ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha kaba u la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka don ka thong ba hakhmat eh ban pynpoi surok sha man la ki shnong bad ba ki paidbah kim donkam shuh ban ïaid da ki kjat hynrei baroh ki surok ki dei ban long kiba ïaid kali.
title: Yn siang rong bad pynitynnad ïa ka shnong Umsaw Nongbri shuwa ka jingrakhe Golden Jubili ka Pastorate

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: Ha ka sien kaba nyngkong u Myntri uba khmih ïa ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma u la phah ïa u kyrwoh kitbok kitrwiang sha ki khynnah skul ki ban sa ïakhun ïa ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) bad ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ki ban sdang naduh u bnai Lber, 2024.Lyngba ki lad pathai khubor, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la kyntu ïa ki khynnah skul ba kin klet shwa ïa mynta shipor ïa kino ki kam sngewbha bad khamtam eh ïa ki jingpynbyrngia ha ka Mobile Phone bad ban pynleit jingmut shwa ban minot tang ha ka kot namarba kine ki ar tylli ki eksamin ki dei kiba kongsan tam ha ka jingim jong ki khynnah skul bad kiba rai ruh ïa ka lawei ka jong ki nangne shakhmat.Ki don haduh 55,189 ngut ki khynnah ki ban iakhun ia ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) bad 34,335 ngut ki ban iakhun ia ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ka ban sa long ha ka 1 tarik bad 4 tarik, Lber.Ki don haduh 108 tylli ki centre thoh eksamin jong ka HSSLC bad 159 tylli na ka bynta ka eksamin SSLC ha ki 12 tylli ki districts ka jylla.
title: Kitbok u Myntri ïa ki khynnah skul ban ïakhun eksamin

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: U nongïalam ka Congress legislature party (CLP) Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Balang u la kynthoh tyngeh ïa u MLA ka BJP na South Shillong u Bah Sanbor Shullai da kaba kynnoh ba um ju kren eiei wat shikyntien ruh ha Assembly.Kane ka jingkynthoh, ka long hadien ba u Bah Sanbor u la kynnoh ba u Sitting MP ka Congress na Shillong u Bah Vincent H Pala um ju leh eiei ïa ka constituency hynrei, ‘u shu pynlut kai ïa ka por ha kaba bam sohot san snem kynthih ha Parliament.”“Wad ma phi, katno sien u Bah Sanbor Shullai u leit sha Assembly. Katno sien u la kren ha Assembly?” la ong u Bah Ronnie Lyngdoh ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Halor ka jingtreikam jong u Bah Pala, nga tharai ba bun ki kam u la leh. U dei u briew uba jar jar. Um ju pynpaw paidbah kumba leh katto katne ki politishian. Bun ki kam kiba u la leh na ka bynta jong ngi bad nga tharai bun ki projek kiba la wanrah sha ka Jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka jingtrei shitom jong u,” u la ong.“Hynrei ka jingkynnoh jong u Bah Sanbor ka sting kdor kdor namarba ïalade lei um ju kren hi ruh hapoh ka Ingdorbar bad um ju kham poi sha Ingdorbar. Hato phi la ju ïohsngew ba un kren hapoh ka Ingdorbar? Ban shu wan sha Ingdorbar bad ban ym kren eiei kan bha ba u shong ha ing. Namarkata ka jingkynnoh jong u ka sting kdor kdor namarba um shym la bud ïa ki kyndon pynïaid kam jong ka Parliament ha kaba u Bah Vincent Pala uba dei u MP na Shillong u ju ïashim bynta hapoh ka Ingdorbar ban kren ïa ki mat kiba ïadei bad ka Jylla Meghalaya,” u la bynrap.Halor ka jingkynnoh ba u Bah Pala um ju pynlong ïa ka jingïalang jong ka DISHA ha ka Constituency, u Bah Ronnie u la ong ba ngi dei ban sngewthuh ba ha ki 2-3 snem ba ladep, ka don ka khlam jingpang Covid-19 bad ki don bun ki skhim kiba ka Sorkar India kam shym la pyllait. U la kdew ruh ba ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ka MGNREGS and bad na ka bynta ki kam pynroi sha ki nongkyndong ki la shah khate lut.“Ban shu pynlong tang ïa ka jingïalang khlem don eiei ban ïakren, kam don jingmut eiei,” u la ong.
title: U MLA ka South Shillong um ju kren wat shi kyntien ruh ha Assembly: Ronnie Lyngdoh

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28: Na kajuh ka jaka kaba la sdang ïalap elekshon MLA ha u snem 2023, ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) mynta ka sngi ruh ka la sdang ïa ka jingïalap elekshon MP bad kane ka jaka kadei ha ïew Smit.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka VPP ka la pynbna paidbah ïa u Symbol jong ka Party (U Prah) ha kane hi kajuh ka jaka ha shuwa ban sdang ka jingïalap elekshon MLA 2023.Ryngkat u paidbah uba da ki hajar ngut, u Bah Brighstarwell Marbañiang, MLA Mawlai, u la ong ba ka VPP ka kwah ba ka elekshon MP kan sdang jong ka jingjop ka ban bud sa ka MDC Elekshon bad kaba khatduh kan dei ban kurup noh ïa ka bor ha u snem 2028, namar ba la sngewlehraiñ wat ban leit shabar ruh, haba ki briew ki ong ‘phi wan na ka jylla kaba bamsap bad kaba duk tam mo’.“Kum u nongshong-shnong kane ka jylla teng teng la sngew lehraiñ shabar jylla namar ki briew ki ong phi wan ka jylla kaba bamsap tam, kaba duk tam mo”, la ong u MLA Mawlai.Namarkata u wer ïa ki paidbah ban tre shitiom ban pynjop noh ïa ka VPP da kaba sdang naduh ka elekshon Lok Sabha, nangta bud sa ka elekshon MDC bad haduh ha ka elekshon MLA ha u 2028.U Dr. Ricky Syngkon, General Secretary bad kyrtong MP ka Party, u la ong ba don ki briew kiba ong ïa u, balei ba u ïalap niam ha ka rynsan saiñpyrthei ruh. Hynrei u la ong ba ka VPP ka la ju ong ba ka saiñ hima sima kadei ka kam kaba kyntang kaba la buh beit buh ryntih da U Blei bad kum u briew uba thrang ban wanrah ïa ka synshar ka khadar kaba khuid, donkam ban pynshong nongrim ruh katkum ka jingbuh beit U Blei lyngba ka Ktien kaba khuid jong U.“Hato ban hikai ïa ki briew ban kylla na kaba sniew sha kaba bha, kadei ka jingïalap kaba ïalam bakla, hato ban hikai ïa ki briew ban im ka jingim kaba bha, kadei kaba ngi ïalap ïa kaba sniew seh?”, la ong u kyrtong ka VPP.U Dr. Syngkon, u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingsahdien jong ka jylla, wat hadien 52 snem ba ka la ïoh la ka jong ka jylla bad ki paidbah ki mad jingeh namar ba kim ïoh ïa ki jaka sumar kiba biang, ki samla ki mad jingeh namar ba kim don ki jaka pule kiba biang. “Kum ka Party ngin ïai trei na ka bynta ban wanrah ka jingkylla ha ka imlang sahlang, ha ka jingim jong ki briew shimetm ha ki shnong ki thaw, ha ka Balang bad kumjuh ruh ha ka synshar ka khaddar”, la ong u Nonghikai jong ka NEHU.U Bah Ardent ha ka jingkren jong u, u la ong ba namar ba ki paidbah kiba bun mynta ki la phai khmat lut sha ka VPP, shen kan da don ka jingpynbit ktieh ïa ki nongïalam jong ka Seng. Hynrei u la ong, ba ka VPP ka don pat ïa ki paidbah kiban ïarap ban pynñiad bad ban pynkhuid ïa kane ka ktieh.Da ki jingai nuksa kiba u ju ai ban pynsngewtynnad ïa ki paidbah, u Bah Ardent u la ong, “Mynta te phi ïohi u Bah Ardent bad ki nongïalam ka VPP ki khuid bad itynnad bha, hynrei satang katto katne por kin sa shah pynbit ktieh baroh shi rynïeng, hato phin kiar noh na ngi tang shu ïohi ba ngi bit ktieh? ne phin ïarap ñiad bad pynkhuid ne?”, u la ong. Ki paidbah ruh ki la pyrta, “Ngin pynkhuid”.U Nongïalam ka VPP u la kren bynñiaw ïa ka jingpynbiej ka sorkar ïa ki paidbah da ki skhim bapher bapher kum kata ka CM Elevate, ka skhim Kali ban kit tourist, hynrei u la ong pat ba ki paidbah kim dei ban bieij, namar kine ki jingiarap ba ka sorkar ka ai kidei da kaba ka shu shimram, kaban nang pynkit ram shuh shuh ïa ka jylla. “Hato ngi kmen, ngi hun ba ka jylla kan shu kit beit da ka ram baroh shi lynter?”, u la ong da kaba ïatuh ruh ba ka ram jong ka jylla mynta ka la kot sha ka 13 hajar klur tam.Hynrei wat hapdeng kane ka jingkitram, dang don pat ki nongmihkhmat paidbah kiba ïathuh khyllew ba ki wan shangkai sha bar ri, katba ki paidbah ka jylla pat ki im hapdeng ka jingduk jingkyrduh.U la kdew ruh ïa ki kam pyllut phut da kaba thungkam Chairman da ki spah ngut, nangta ka jingpynlong ïa ki tamasa kiba pher bapher, ka jingthied kali rem dor bad kiwei kiwei.Namarkata ka daw u ong ba ki paidbah ym dei ba kin pynjop ïa ka VPP tang ha ka elekshon MP ne MDC, hynrei ban tei shitom lypa na ka bynta u 2028, namar ba lada kam wan ka jingkylla ha u 2028 ka jylla kan mad ïa ka jingeh kaba khraw.U Bah Ardent u la pynpaw ruh ka jinglyngngoh ïa ka jingnud thok ki briew wat hapdeng ka juk jingtip bad ka juk shai kaba kat kane ruh, namar don kiba ong ba uta u MLA VPP u ïaleh aiu ha Assembly um ju ïakren eiei, katba ha surok pat u shu ïahylla pynshongshit.“Ngam da donkam ban batai ngi kren aiu ha Assembly ba dang shu dep, phi ki paidbah phi ïa ïohi lut ha ki lad pathai khubor”, u la ong, da kaba kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban shah pynbieit bad shah pynngop ha ki jingïalam bakla ne ki kam thok.
title: Na ka jaka ba sei ïa u Prah, sdang ïalap elekshon MP ka VPP, ther u Bah Ardent ïa ka Sorkar MDA

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: Ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) ha ka sngi Balang ka la maham ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Jylla Meghalaya ban long kiba husiar bha ïa ka BJP bad ong ruh ba kim dei ban shah pynngop ha ki jingpynbiej jong ka BJP.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha nongbah Shillong u Northeast Media Coordinator ka AICC u Matthew Anthony u la ong ba ka Congress ka la ïohi ïa ki jingleh bymhok jong ka Sorkar NDA ba ïalam da ka BJP naduh u snem 2014, kaba wanrah ïa ka jingkiewdor jong ki marbam mardih, ka jingshah leh bymhok ki jaidbynriew Schedule Caste, Schedule Tribe bad ïa kiwei ki jaidbynriew kiba dang sahdien.U la ong ba ka jingshah leh beijot jong ki kynthei ka la nang ïai jia manla ka sngi ha kine ki 10 snem ba la synshar da ka BJP.Haba mynjur ïa ki jingleh bakla jong ka Congress ha ki snem baladep, u Anthony u la ong ba ka party ka la pynbeit ïa ki jingbakla bad pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingshaniah ha ki paidbah ba kin ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Congress khnang ban pynkut noh ïa ki jingshah leh bym hok.U Anthony u la kdew ruh ïa ka jingbym ïohkam ïohjam ha ri India khamtam ki samla kiba la nang la stad.U la buh jingkylli ruh ïa ka rukom synshar ka BJP ha kine ki 10 snem khamtam eh ïa ka jingïaumsnam ha ka jylla Manipur.Une u nongïalam ka AICC u la kam ruh ba 386 tylli ki ingmane Blei ki la shah pynpra bad 70,000 hajar ngut ki paidbah ki la kylla phetwir bad nalor kata, ka Sorkar u Narendra Modi kam shym la ai jingmynjur shuh ïa ka Foreign Contribution (Regulation) Act, 1976 kaba ki shlem treikam jong ki Khristan ha ka thaiñ North East ki ju ïoh ïa ki lad jingïarap pisa.U la kynthoh ruh ïa ka jingïaumsnam ha ka jylla Manipur kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingïap briew kaba la kynjoh sha ka 170 ngut ha kine ki khyndai bnai ha kaba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u donpor ba leit ïakren ïasuk ha ka ri Ukraine bad u donbor ban leit shang suwari kylleng ka pyrthei hynrei um don por satia ban shimkhia ïa ka jingïaumsnam ha ka jylla Manipur.
title: Wat ngop ha ki jingpynbiej ka BJP, kyntu ka Congress ïa ki paidbah Meghalaya

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28 : Ka seng Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) hadien ba ka la mih noh na ka miej jingïakren ïasuk mynta ka la sdang ban phah ïa ki shithi dawa pisa sha kiba bun ki briew khamtam sha ki heh saipan hangne ha ri lum Khasi bad Jaintia bad ka jingdawa ka long 20 lak tyngka shaneng kaba ka seng ka ong ba ka dei kata ka “Income Tax”.Kat kum ka khubor ba la ïoh ba ki don kiba ïoh pdiang da ka shithi dawa pisa ka seng bad ki don pat kiba ïoh pdiang lyngba ka WhatApp ruh bad kiba phah ki pyndonkam da u number Phone Bangladesh.ïa kine ki shithi dawa pisa bad WhatApp la phah da u Finance Secretary ka HNLC u M.Rynjah bad la pynpaw ba ka dei ka income tax bad ka dor ka long 20 lak tyngka shaneng. La mana ïa kito kiba ïoh pdiang ïa ki shithi dawa pisa ba kim dei satia ban pyntip da lei lei ruh sha ki bor pulit.Ka tyllong khubor ka ïathuh ba kumba 60 ngut ki briew ba ïoh pdiang ïa ki shithi dawa pisa ki dei kiba na Ri Bhoi District, 40 ngut na Jaintia Hills bad 25 ngut hangne ha nongbah Shillong, East Khasi Hills. “ La ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki briew kiba la siew ïa kane ka jingdawa ka seng HNLC lyngba ki briew kiba la ai bor da ka HNLC ban leit lum pisa.Kane ka jingdawa pisa jongka seng HNLC ka la jur hadien ba ka la weng na ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka sorkar jylla bad sorkar pdeng. Ka seng HNLC ka la kynnoh ba ka sorkar kam shym la shim khia halor ki san tylli ki mat jingdawa ba la buh da ka seng khamtam ban map lut ïa baroh ki jingshah pynngat kyndon jong ki nongïalam bad dkhot ka seng.Na ka liang ka sorkar na ka por sha ka por ka ïai kyntu ïa ka seng HNLC ban bishar bniah bad wan biang sha ka miej jingkren ïasuk hynrei kat haduh mynta ka seng HNLC ka dang sngap man man bad kam pat ai kano kano ruh ka jubab.
title: Sdang dawa pisa ka Seng HNLC 20 lak shaneng kum ka ‘Income Tax’ na ki heh saipan

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang 28: Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba kdup ïa ki ar tylli ki party ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hills State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) mynta ka sngi ka 28 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 ki la pynlong ka jingïalang paidbah ban pynshai ïa ki mat ki jura shwa ban poi ka MP Election ha Ïew Umdohlun, South West Khasi Hills District.U bah Robertjune Kharjahrin kum u kyrtong MP na ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat, haba kren ha ka jingïalang paidbah ha Ïew Umdohlun u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep ba haba jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat kim dei da lei lei ban jied da kaba leh shongshit hynrei da kaba puson bad pyrkhat sani bha namar ka jingjied ïa ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly ne hapoh ka Lok Sabha ka long kaba donkam ha kaba ma ki kin long ki nongïasait ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki paidbah.U la ong ruh ba ka jingïeng jong nga ban ïa khun ïa kane ka elekshon ka long da kaba ïa sngewthuh jingmut ki ar tylli ki party kata ka UDP bad ka HSPDP da kaba ïeng ha ka nongrim ban ïada ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew ha ka ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka khyndew ha shyiap, ïa ka riti ka dustur bad ïa ki snap kyrpang jong ngi ka jaidbynriew bad ïa ka ban kyntiew ka jaidbynriew na ka por sha ka por.U la pynpaw ruh ba ha shwa ba un shim ka rai ban ïeng ïaleh ïa kane ka elekshon sha ka Lok Sabha, u kynmaw ïa kawei ka kyntien kaba ong, “ka shait poi ka por ha u briew ba ngi hap ban jied tang kawei kata ka long ban jied ïa ka lynti ban pyndem tdong lane jied ban ïeng rasong”, ong u bah Robert.U la ong ruh ba ki shait don ki briew kiba ong ba ka politik ka long kaba jakhlia, kaba ïa pait ïa pra, ka bym biang, ka kam jong ka pyrthei ba ymdei ban pynïakhleh bad ka hynrei u la pynpaw ka jingnguh ïa U Blei ba U la pynsngew ha u ban ïeng rasong ban ïa khun bad ban pynbha bad pynjanai ïa ka synshar ka khaddar.“Haba nga ruh nga wan na ka longïing kaba duk, nga sngewthuh biang biang ruh ïa ki jingeh ba ki paidbah ki mat ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ki bad khamtam eh ha kaba ïa dei bad ki nongrep ba u mar rep kum u synsar u hiar ka dor ka mur”, u la ong. Namarkata, haba u ïoh ïa ki jingeh jong ki paidbah um lah ban shu hun da kaba shongkli kti hynrei u la shim ka rai ban trei met bad mynsiemmynsiem, trei shitom ha kaba la dei ka mon jong U Blei ma u kum u kyrtong uba poi sha ka thong un sa leit ban pynsngew ïa ki jingeh jong u paidbah hapoh Parliament.U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ki MLA ki la dep ban phah ïa ka jingrai (resolution) ban dawa ïa ka ILP bad ban pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo hynrei haduh mynta ka dang jah rngai bad kumjuh ruh ban nym pyntreikam ïa ka MMDR Act hynrei ïa kane ruh dang sngap man man khlem ong ei ei. Shuh shuh u la pynsngew ba kiwei ki party ki ong ba lada jied ïa ki kin wanrah ïa ka dud bad ka ngap, hynrei u bah Robert u kren da kaba shai ba ym donkam dud ym donkam ngap hynrei kaba donkam ka dei ka aiñ ka ban ïada ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriewjaidbynriew kumta kaba donkam ka long ba ngi dei ban trei shitom ban synsar da lade ïa lade.U bah Robertjune Kharjahrin u la pynkynmaw ruh ba ki don kiba kren beiñ ïa ka party riewlum ba ki kut tang hapoh Khanapara hynrei haba pule bha ïa ka khana pateng jong ka mynnor, ki nongïalam kiba dei na ka party riewlum ki don haduh lai ngut ki MP bad uwei na ki u dei na West Khasi Hills District. Namarkata, u la kyntu ba ki paidbah kim dei ban shu kren kulmar, hynrei ki dei ban pyrkhat biang biang ba kin synshar da lade ïa lade.Kiwei ki nongkren ki long u bah Jeslan Roy Nongsiej kum u Secretary jong ka RDA, South West Khasi Hills District, u bah Tirotsing Suchiang, Joint Secretary UDP Central Body, ka kong Badarity Lyngdoh Nonglait ka khun pyrsa jong u bah Hopingstone Lyngdoh (bam kwai ha dwai U Blei) bad u bah Pius Marweiñ, MLA ka Ranikor Constituency bad kum u Chairman RDA, South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Jied nongmihkhmat da kaba puson ym da kaba leh shongshit: Robertjune Kharjahrin

content: Khliehriat rymphang 27: Ka ophis jong u General Manager, District Commerce & Industries Centre (DCIC), East Jaiñtia Hills District, hynnin ka sngi ka la jingpynlong ïa ka ïew pyni nam kaba yn pynlong ar sngi lynter, ka District Level Industrial Exhibition, ïa kane ka ïew pyni nam la pynlong ha Khliehriat East Parking Lot, ha kaba la wan ban plie da u Deputy Commissioner, East Jaiñtia Hills District, u A. Baranwal, IAS.Haba kren kum u kongsan u Deputy Commissioner, u la ai ka jingkhublei kitbok kitrwiang ïa ka ophis jong u General Manager, District Commerce & Industries Centre (DCIC), Khliehriat kaba la lah ban lum ban lang ïa ki nongkhaiï kiba na ka thaiñ kaba long ka lad ka lynti ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki sap ki phong ba ki don, u kyntu ïa ka tnat bad kumjuh ruh ïa kito ki briew ba don sap ba ki dei ban shim khiah shuh shuh ban treishitom ban shna ïa ki tiar ki tar ban kyntiew ïa ka ïew ka hat jong ki bad ruh ban lah ban iatynjuh bor bad kiwei kiwei kiba na kiwei kiwei ki jylla.U la ong ruh ba na ka liang ka sorkar ka ai ki jingkyrshan ban kyntiew ïa ki briew don sap ban ieng hala ki jong ki kjat, u la ai mynsiem bad pynshlur ruh ba ki dei ban da pyndonkam hok ïa ki jingai jingkyrshan kiba na ka sorkar ban dup lah ban pyniaid ïew ïa ki tiar ba ki shna.U General Manager, District Commerce & Industries Centre (DCIC), East Jaiñtia Hills, u bah H.N Kharpuri, u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka prokram exhibition ne ka ïew pyni nam ka long ban plie lad bad ruh ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki tiar ki tar ba la shna da ki riew don sap bad kane ka dei ruh ka rynsan ba ki lah ban die ïa ki tiar ba ki shna hi bad ruh kane ka dei kata ka rynsan ba ki iakynduh lang, ha kaba ki riew don sap ki lah ruh ban ioh jingmut shuh shuh bad ioh ïa ki jingtip ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshna ïa ki tiar shna hi.Kiba la ai jingkren ki kynthup ruh u Functional Managers, DCIC, u bah G. Pala bad u bah P. Suja, bad uwei na ki nongioh jingmyntoi na ka skim PMEGP, u bah Danosha Tlang.Hadien ka jingialang u Deputy Commissioner lem bad ki heh sorkar ki la leit ban jngoh ïa ki 30 tylli ki stall kiba don ha katei ka ïew pyni nam.
title: Ka ïew pyninam jong ka DCIC ka long ka rynsan ban kyntiew ia ki ‘riew don sap ha ki kam shna jingshna

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28 : U Myntri ka tnad pynmih bording ka jylla u Abu Taher Mondal ha ka Sngi Ba Ar u la ong ba jylla Meghalaya ka don ka bording kaba lah ban pynmih haduh 3000 MW hynrei kat haduh mynta dang lah ban pynmih bording tang 367.50 MW kaba long dang tang 11.8 % na ka jingdon ka bording hapoh ka jylla.ïa kane u la jubab ha ka Unstarred Question kaba la wanrah hapoh ka ïing dorbar ha ka Sngi Ba Ar. U la ïathuh ka sorkar jylla ka pyrshang ban ïoh ïa ki skhim na ka tnad Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) na ka bynta ban tei bad sorjamin na ka bynta ki Hydro Project kiba rit hapoh ka jylla.U la ïathuh ia ka Lakroh Small Hydro Project, Ganol Small Hydro Project bad Riangdo Small Hydro Project la tei lyngba ka jingïoh jingïarap na ka tnad MNRE.Kumba long mynta ki don haduh 15 tylli ki Small Hydro Project kiba la dep pynkhreh ïa ka Detailed Project Report bad shen yn sa ïoh jingïarap na ka tnad MNRE ban ïoh sdang ka jingpyn trei ïa ki.U Mondal u la ïathuh ruh kumba long mynta ka MePGCL kam pat don ki projek ban pymih bording na ka Lyer (Wind) ne na ka Sngi (Solar Power) Na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka la ïasoi ïa ka MoU bad ka National Thermal Power Corporation Limited (NTPC) ha ka 10 tarik u bnai Naitung 2023 bad kumjuh ruh bad ka ONGC Tripura Power Company Ltd (OTPC) ha ka 10 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024 ban sorjamin bad bishar bniah ha kino ki jaka ba lah ban tei ia kine ki projek pynmih bording ha ka jylla.
title: Ka jylla ka don haduh 3000 MW ka bording hynrei mynta dang lah ban pynmih tang 367.50 MW

content: Khliehriat rymphang 29: Ka Rymbai Government Secondary School, ka la ioh ïa ka ïing skul kaba thymmai ha kaba mynta ka sngi la wan ban plie da u myntri ka sorkar jylla uba dei ruh u MLA ka thaiñ, u bah Kyrmen Shylla, la ïa don ryngkat lang ruh u Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills District, u Abhilash Baranwal, IAS, u MDC ka thaiñ, u bah F. Bareh, ka Additional Deputy Commissioner, ka kong J.U.Kharpuri, u Joint Director of School Education and Literacy, Government of Meghalaya, u bah L.S Lyngdoh, ka In Charge District School Education Officer, East Jaiñtia Hills District, ka kong P. Dkhar,ki nonghikai bad ki khynnah skul.Haba kren kum u kongsan, u bah Kyrmen Shylla u la pynpaw ka jingkmen ba kane ka skul ka la ioh mynta ïa ka ïing skul kaba thymmai, u la ai ka jingkitbok kitrwiang ruh ba ka skul kan nang iaid shaphrang na ka por sha ka por, u ai khublei ruh ïa ka School Managing Committee, ki nongïalam shnong, ki contractor kiba shna ïa ka skul , u la ong ruh ba u dang bud dien ban pynurlong ïa kane ka skul ban kyntiew kyrdan sha ka higher secondary.U kongsan u la kren ruh shaphang ka jingkyrduh kam, halor kane u kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban phai khmat than tang sha ki kam sorkar hynrei ban wad ki lad ki lynti ban seng da ki kam la jong ruh lyngba ki skim bapher bapher, u pynshlur ruh ba ki dei ban shim ïa ka kam ri jingri, ka kam rep, ban kyntiew ruh ïa ki kam jngohkai pyrthei, ki kam ialehkai sport bad kiwei kiwei ki jait kam ki ban kyntiew ïa ka ioh ka kot.U Deputy Commissioner, East Jaiñtia Hills District, u pynpaw ka jingkmen ba kane ka skul ka la nang kiew na ka por sha ka por, u la kular bad pyntikna ba na ka liang ki bor district ruh ki ai lem ki jingkyrshan katba lah ban kyrshan lem ïa kane ka skul khnang ba kane ka skul kan nang kiew shuh shuh.. Ka Head Mistress jong ka Rymbai Government Secondary School, ka kong Y. Lamare, ka la pynsngew ïa ka history jong ka skul naduh ka por ba seng kata naduh u snem 1960 haduh mynta ha ka jhuh ka por ka la aiti ruh ïa ka memorandum ha u myntri ka sorkar jylla, kane ka memorandum ka dei halor ka jing pan ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïa ka skul sha ka higher secondary, ban ai ïa ka hall (multi-purpose hall) bad ban shna ïa ka madan ialehkai basketball ha skul.
title: Ïoh ïing skul thymmai ka Rymbai Gov’t Sec. School

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 29: Ar snem mynshwa ka sorkar MDA ka la kular ban shna noh ïa ka surok na Nonglang sha Mawrok, hynrei haduh mynta ym pat ïohi dak ei ei”, ong u bah Phransis Wanniang uwei na ki riew rangbah na ka shnong Kyndongei.U bah Wanniang haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la ong, “na ka bynta katei ka surok, ka sorkar ka la phah ruh ïa ki briew ba kin leit sorbe bad la ïoh jingtip ruh ba ka phase ba nyngkong ba la dep ban sorbe ka dei kumba shiphew kilomitar kata na Nonglang sha madan Umit”.Nalor kata u la ong ruh, “ki la don kiba ïathuh ha u ba la dep mang pisa ruh kumba arphew klur tam na ka bynta ban shna ïa katei ka surok, hynrei ym tip balei ba ka sorkar ka la shu sngap jar jar haduh mynta”.U bah Wanniang u la ong ruh ba ha ka jingshisha katei ka surok ka dei kaba donkam haduh katta katta, namar na Rambrai sha Mawrok ka la don ka surok PMGSY bad lada la don sa ka surok na Nonglang sha Mawrok, ka la long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ïa ki paitbah ha ka leit ka wan ka kit ka bah. Kumba long mynta ki nongshong shnong naduh Nonglang Langja, Kyndongei, Mawkapiah, Kyrdum, Umwahlang, Mawsikar haduh Langpih, ki don kiba haïing hasem ha Mawrok, Rambrai, Mawkhiat haduh Mawdoh. Hynrei haba ki leit donkam ki hap ban leit shuwa sha Nongstoiñ sha hiar sha Rambrai, Mawrok, Mawkhiat haduh Rynñiaw.Ka jingjngai na Nonglang sha Mawrok lyngba ka Nongstoiñ bad Rambrai ka la poi hynriew phew lai kilomitar. Katba lada don surok Nonglang sha Mawrok pat ka jingjngai ka long tang kumba khat lai kilomitar ei ei. Kumta ka sorkar ka la dei ban pyrkhat lem na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paitbah.
title: Hato shu kular kai ka sorkar ban shna surok na Nonglang sha Mawrok

content: Khliehriat rymphang 29: ka ophis jong u District Transport Officer, East Jaiñtia Hills District, ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka bor district kumjuh ruh bad ka tnat ka koit ka khiah mynta ka sngi ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram National Road Safety Week 2024 ha Ladrymbai, kane ka prokram ka don ka ktien phira ““Be a Road Safety Hero”Haba kren ha ka jingialang u Motor Vehicle Inspector, u bah H. Dkhar u la pynshai halor ki aiñ ñiah kali khnang ban dup lait na kano kano ka jingiatyngkhuh kali , u la ong ruh ba kane ka prokram ka dei ruh kum shibyntta ban ai jingpynshai ïa ki paidbah ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshngaiñ ha ka leit ka wan namar hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya don tang ki surok rong ba ïaid kali ym don da kiwei pat na kata ka daw ki nongñiah kali ki dei ban sngewthuh bha ba ki dei ma ki kiba kit ïa ki mynsiem briew, ki dei ma ki ki ban hap ban don ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ïa ka jingim briew ym tang ïa ka jingim la jong hynrei ïa kiba shong kali ruh kumjuh.U Sub-Inspector uba na ka tnat pulit, u bah E. Sohshang, u la pynpaw ka jingsngew khia halor ki jingjia aksident ne iatyngkhuh kali man la u snem kiba ka tnat pulit ka la ioh lum lyngba ki ejahar bad ong ba kane baroh ka dei manar ka jingbym shim khia ban bud ïa ki kyndon ñiah kali bad kiba pynkheiñ ïa ki aiñ ñiah kali, u kyntu ïa kiba ñiah kali khamtam eh ki samla kiba ñiah kali ba ki dei ban kiar na ki jingdih pynbuiad ha ka por ba ki ñiah kali ha kajuh ka por u kyntu ruh ïa kito kiba iaid da ka kjat ha lynti ne ha surok ba ki dei ban long phikir bha ban bud ïa ki kyndon ban lait na kano kano ka jingma, jingmynsaw ne ki jingjia ba sngewsih.Kiba la ai jingkren ki kynthup ruh u Dr. D. Sayoo, u President, Local Taxi Association, East Jaintia Hills District, u bah T. Rymbai bad u President, Tourist Taxi Association (Lad Rymbai- Jowai), u bah S. Ryngkhlem.
title: La pynlong ïa ka National Road Safety Week 2024 ha Ladrymbai

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 29: Kumba mynta ka sngi la rakhe ha kylleng ka ri ïa kata ka sngi ba la tip kum ka National Science Day, ka Alpha English Higher Secondary School mynta ka sngi ka la rakhe ïa kane ka National Science Day ba la shim bynta da ki samla pule jong ka Class-X.Ïa kane ka National Science Day la pynlong ha phyllaw katei ka skul, ha kaba la wan ban shim bynta lang naduh u District Science Supervisor, u Bah S. Blah, ka Principal ka Alpha English Higher Secondary school, ka Kong W.K Blah, u Vice Principal ka Alpha English Higher Secondary School, u Pastor B. Kharbteng, ki nonghikai bad kiwei kiwei ki bor pynïaid jong katei ka skul.Kumba la pynpaw da ki bor pynïaid katei ka skul, kane ka skul ka la rakhe ïa kane ka National Science Day ka long shi bynta ban ailad ïa ki samla pule ba kin don bynta shaphang ka jingstad science kaba long katkum ka juk stad ba mynta. Ha kawei ka bynta ka don ruh ka thong ban kyntiew ïa ki samla pule ba kin tip bñïah shaphang ka jingstad science kaba long hi ka jingkyntiew na ka bynta ka lawei ki samla ha kum kane ka juk stad ba mynta.Ha kane ka sngi, la iohi ruh ba ki khynnah skul ka Alpha ki la pyni paidbah ruh ïa ki bynta bapher bapher (Science exhibition) da kaba batai ruh shaphang ka jingstad science, kaba long ka jingai mynsiem ïa ki samla pule ba kin kham phai khmat bha shaphang ka jingstad science.
title: Ryngkat ki khynnnah skul, rakhe ka Skul Alpha ïa ka National Science Day

content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 29: Kum shi bynta ban ai ka jingshakri kaba bit ba biang na ka bynta ka jingdonkam sha ki paidbah jong ka West Khasi Hills District, ka Industrial Development Bank of India (IDBI Bank) ka la plie ha ka sngi balang jong ka taiew ïa ka tnad treikam thymmai jong ka hapoh sor Nongstoiñ.Ïa katei ka bank thymmai la plie paidbah da u bah H.K.Thabah MCS Additional Deputy Commissioner kum u kongsan, ha ryngkat ka jingïasynranlang u bah T.Diengngan Block Development Officer ka Nongstoiñ C&RD Block kum u symbud kongsan.Kiwei pat kiba la don ban sakhi lang ïa kane ka sngi sah kynmaw ki kynthup ïa u Bah Srally Rashir rangbah shnong ka New Nongstoiñ, kong Badari Wankhar Branch Manager ka IDBI Nongstoiñ Branch bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong.“Ka jingpynïar jong katei ka bank ïa la ki shnat treikam ha ka thaiñ, kan long shisha ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw ïa ki paidbah. Namar katba nang tyllun ki sngi ki por, ka jingbun paid ka la sdang roi bad tang da ki bank kiba la don lypa, kim lah shuh ban ai ïa ka jingshakri kaba kham biang pura kat haduh mynta mynne”, ong u kongsan.U Bah Thabah kum u kongsan, u la kyntu jur ïa katei ka bank ba kan pynjynsur ruh ïa ka rukom ai ram ïa ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ. U la ong ruh ba ka dei ban pynpynïar shuh shuh ïa ka tnad sha ki thaiñ Nongkyndong kum sha Shahlang, Riangdo, Rambrai, Maweit bad kiwei kiwei de ki bynt jong ka District.Katei ka bank kaba thymmai kaba la tip kum ka IDBI Bank ka don mar pyrshah bad ka ophis treikam jong ka PWD Nongstoiñ ha ka shnong New Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills District.
title: Plie ka IDBI Bank ïa ka shnat treikam ha Nongstoiñ ban shakri paidbah

content: Kadei ka jingmlien jong ki paidbah ka jylla ba kano kano ka jingbakla ne ka jingthut ha ka rukom treikam la ka long ha ki kam pynroi lane ha ki kam bhalang ba kin kynnoh beit ïa kiwei hynrei kim ju pyrkhat satia pat ba ki ruh kum ki nongkynnoh ki la dei ban pyrkhat 100 sien shwa ba kin kdew kti tang ïa kiwei. Bunsien la ju ïohsngew beit ba ki paidbah ki kynnoh tang ïa kita ki nongmihkhmat paidbah lada jia ba ka shnong ka sahdien, lane bym don ki lynti syngkien ha ki shnong ki thaw, nangta bym biang ka umbam umdih lane ki jaka pule bad jaka sumar. Hynrei kim ju tih pat ïa ka jingshisha kaei ka daw kaba pynlong ïa ka shnong ka thaw ban mad ïa kine kiei kiei baroh. Hato ki la ju kylli ba mano ba long ka daw jong kine, hato kadei tang ka jingkitkhlieh jong ki nongmihkhmat lane ki bor sorkar ne kadei ruh ka jingbym shim lang ka jingkitkhlieh jong ki nongshong shnong.Don ki jaka ba ki paidbah ki thrang dik dik ban ïoh ïa ki jaka ai jinghikai lane ki skul kiba bha ban wan ha ka shnong ka thaw pynban haba la poi kum kitei ki skul don pat kiba pyrshah, hato kum ïa kine ïano yn kynnoh? Don pat ki jaka kiba thrang dik dik ban ïoh ïa ki surok kiba bha hynrei ynda la wan kum kata ka surok don kiba pyrshah ne pyneh ban ai ïa ka jaka. Ha kum kine ki khep ruh ïano yn kynnoh. Hato kadei ka jingbakla jong ka sorkar lane ka jingkitkhlieh lang jong baroh.Ha kawei pat ka liang ymdei ba bein ïa kitei kiba pyneh ban ai jaka ne kiba pyrshang ban wan kum kitei ki kam pynroi namar lehse ki don la ka jong ka daw ba ki pyrshah, ka lah ban dei ba ka lah ban ktah ïa ki jaka rep lada wan kum kitei ki projek lane ïoh ka bai luksan kaba ki dei ban ïoh kam poi sha ki bad bun kiwei kiwei ki daw. Tangba kadei pat ka kamram jong ka bor shnong ruh ban tuklar lang khnang ba ka jingmyntoi kan long salonsar ym dei tang ïa kito kiba kyrshan bad pynduh noh ïa kiba payrshah.Lada kren pat ïa ka ishu kaba bun ki sngewtynnad bha ban kren, kata shaphang kata ka bamsap kaba dei ka kyntien kaba khor bha bad kaba jylliew bha ka jingmut jong ka, don kiba pyrkhat ba dei tang ka bor pisa kaba dei ka daw jong ka bamsap hynrei hangne ruh ka don bun rukom kaba pynlong ïa ka roi ka pa ne ka ïoh ka kot ba kan neh hajuh khlem poi shaei shaei. Katno ngut kita kiba sngewthuh ïa ka jingmut jong ka kam bamsap la ka long ha ka jylla ne wat ha ka ri? Kane ka kyntien kadei kaba ki paidbah na ka por sha ka por ki ju ïakren shaphang kata ka kam bamsap bampong la ka long ha ki shnong ki thaw, ha ki District ne wat ha ka jylla ne ka ri, hynrei bunsien ka jingïakren ka la shu kut tang ha ka lyer bad kim sngewthuh pat ïa ka jingmut ba shisha jong ka kam bamsap.Haba kren shaphang ka kam bamsap bunsien ruh ka ju mih kata ka jingkynnoh tang ïa ki nongmihkhmat (MLA &MDC) bad ïa ki ophisar sorkar, hynrei haba bishar bniah pat ïa kane ka kam bamsap mynta ka la rung lut ha baroh ki bynta kata naduh ki kam shnongkam thaw, ki kam ing kam sem, kam seng bad kiwei kiwei, kaba la pyntroiñ shisha ïa longbriew manbriew ha ka jylla bad ka thaiñ hi baroh kawei.Katei ka jingsahdien hi kadei namar ka don ka daw tynrai, kata ka bamsap ha ki bun rukom, da ka pisa, da ki kam, da ki jingïa pyrshah bad kiwei kiwei kiba long thik kum ki thliem kiba kjit bad bam klop ïa ka hok jong u paidbah ba ka sorkar jylla ne sorkar pdeng ka la ju ïarap kyrpang lyngba ki kam pynroi jong u paidbah. Ha kawei ka bynta, ka jingkren ba sahdien ki kam pynroi ka dei na ka daw ka jingdon jong ka kam bamsap ka long kaba don nongrim, hynrei ban ong pat ba ka dei 100 persen tang na ka daw ka bamsap ka dei ka kam ka bym lah ban pdiang namar bunsien wat ki paidbah ruh ki ngop ha ka kam bamsap ha kaba kim ju pyrkhat ïa lade ba ki bamsap hynrei ki kloi ban kdew pat ïa ki nongmihkmat bad ki ophisar sorkar.Lah ruh ban kdew shai hangne ba ka kam bamsap mynta ka la rung ha man la uwei pa uwei u briew khamtam ha ka por elekshon ba ki paidbah ki ju biej ïa ki sbai rupa kaba ki ju ïoh tang ha ka shi khyllipmat jong ka por elekshon hynrei ynda la kut katei ka aïom ksiar pat ki ju lynñiar ba duna kane katai kaba dei na ka jingleh bakla khlem da bishar bniah shuwa ban kner ïa ki Kti.Hap ruh ban kynnoh ba ka kam bam sap mynta ka la rung ha man la uwei pa uwei u briew kaba ym da donkam ban shu kynnoh ne ban pynkitpap tang ïa kiwei bad lada ki paidbah ki sngewthuh shisha ba ka kam bam sap ka ktah ïa ka imlang ka sahlang bad ka roi ka par upaidbah ka la dei ka por ba ki hap ban ïa pyrkhat arsien na ka bynta ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh hynrei ki dei ban pyrkhat ba ïa katei ka kam donkam ban rat dyngkhong shuwa ïa lade shimet bad nangta sa peit ïa kiwei.Kumba ong ka ktien riewstad, “ wat peit ïa u thngiat kiwei, hynrei peit shuwa ïa u khung…..” bad dei hangta ngin sa lah ban pynduh pyndam bad ban pynduh jait ïa ka kam bamsap bampong ha ka imlang ka sahlang, ha ka ri ka raid bad ha ka jylla bad ka ri hi baroh kawei.Ym lah ruh ban len ba wat ha kane ka juk jong ka jingbamsap, hynrei dang don pat kiba khuid bad kiba kwah shisha banpynduh jait ïa ka kam bamsap ha kaba la donkam ban ai ruh ban ai ïa kajingïaroh. Ka jingkylli pat ka dang mih shuh shuh ba la jin ba man la uwei pa uwei u nongshong shnong u khuid ka mynsiem bad u don ïa ka jingïohi jngai na ka bynta ka bha ka miat, ka roi ka par jong ki paidbah, kam don jingeh satia ban pynduh jait ïa ki kam bamsap kiba long ki kruiñ kiba ktah ïa ka kam ïap kam im jong ki paidbah.Lada ngi kwah ba ka imlang ka sahlang kan long kaba khuid to ngin ïa phai khmat khyndiat kiei ki jingjot ba wan rah ha ka imlang ka sahlang da ka jingdon ka kam bamsap. Khlempep ka jingjot kaba wanrah na ka jingbam sap ka ktah lut ba baroh ki bynta jong ka imlang ka sahlang ha kaba lada phai sha kino kino ki bynta ruh ngi la long lypa kita kiba shah knieh jubor ne knieh jyndat ïa ka hok kaba ngi dei ban ïoh. Bad dei namar kata ba ki shnong ki thaw, ki ri ki Raid bad ka jylla ka dang sahdien ha baroh ki liang kiba dei ki daw tynrai ba mih na ka jingdon ka jingbamsap bam phong.
title: Peit shwa ïalade bad pyrkhat bunsien shwa ban kynthoh ïa kiwei…

content: Nongstoiñ Rymphang 29: Ka aïom tlang ka la sdang ha man la ki jaka ki lum ki la sdang ban kum da ka rong ïong namar ki riew shim kabu ki la sdang ban wiang ding pathar kat haba lap ha kaba katei ka jing wiang ding pathar ka buh ha ka jingma ïa ki ing ki sem kiba doh ha rud shnong ha ki jaka ba kham pajih na surok.Ha kaba ïadei bad katei ka jingwiang ding pathar u bah Pherikstone .Lyngdoh Marshilong uwei na ki riew rangbah na ka thaiñ Seiñduli haba ïa kren bad u nongthohkhubor u la ong ba man la u snem da ki ju don ki jingpluh ïng ha kylleng ki shnong na ka daw jong ka jingpur ding haduh ba ki la don ki ïing ki sem jong ki nongshong shnong kiba la shah bam duh ha ka thylliej ding na ka jingthang pathar jong ki riew shim kabu.U la ong ruh ba ka shem jingeh pat ban lap ïa kitei ki briew kiba mlien ban wiang ding ïa ki lum bad ki khlaw namar shuwa ba kin sei jigpruid kid a peit bha ha baroh saw dong ïoh don ki briew kiba ïohi .U la ong ruh ba ka jingwiang ding pathar ka wanrah ruh ïa ka jingtyrkhong ka khyndew namar haba la hap slap ka kum ka kit lut ïa ka sboh.U bah Lyngdoh u la ong ruh ba shisien ba ki lum bad ki khlaw ki la shah wiang ding ki dieng ba bun jait kiba dang sdang ban mih bad khie lung ki ing lut khait bad ki jaka ki kylla synlen.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba lada ïad lyngba ki jaka ba bun ki diengkseh ha kine ki sngi lah ban ïohi da ki phew hjar ki dieng kiba dang rit kiba jrong tang kumba hynriew haduh shiphew inshi bad tang shu wiang ding baroh ki ïap lut khoit.U la ong ruh ba lada peit nuksa ha shilynter ka surok bah National Highway Shillong Tura ha ki jaka ym pluh ding da ki hajar ki ding lieng bad ki dieng kseh ki mih bad ki san bha katba ha ki jaka ba ka ding ka poi ki lum ki synlen lut.U bah Lyngdoh u la ong ruh ba halor ka jingwiang ding pathar wat ki bor sorkar ruh ki pyrkhing bha hynrei haduh mynta ym pat ju ïoh sngew ba ki ba don kti ha kaba thang pathar ïa ki lum ki shah kem ha ki bor ka aiñ namar ba ym ju don ba lap ïa ki.Halor katei ka mat u la ong ba ka por ka la dei ba ki rangbah shnong , ki bor ka aiñ bad ki paitbah ki la dei ban ïatrei lang bad ban pynlong ruh da ki prokram bapher ba pher ban pynsgewthuh ba ka jingthang pathar ïa ki lum ,ki khlaw ki btap ka dei ka kam kaba long pyrshah ïa ka mariang bad k imlang sah lang.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba lada ki paitbah ki nang ban tyngkai ia ki lum bad ki khlaw ki btap kan long ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw ym tang ia u khunbynriew hynrei ïa kiwei pat ki jingthaw ba im kum ki sim ki doh ki khñiang ki ksiah bad k mrad ki mreng kiba pynsngewtynnad lyngba ki sur ba ki pah ha ka por mynsngi bad mynmiet.U la ong ruh ba kaba kham kongsan eh ka long ba ka jingdon jong ki dieng ba bun jait ka pyntngen ïan ka khyndew bad ka pynneh ïa ki tyllong um hynrei lada ki lum ki synlen bad ym don ki dieng wat ki wah duid ruh ki rngad noh ha ka por tlang.Khatduh eh u la kyntu ïa kito kiba ju mlien ban wiang ding pathar ha ki lum ba kin sangeh noh bad ki pyrkhat bha namar tang da iwei i kyndok jingpruid ka la pynjot lut ïa ki lum ki wah bad ka buh ïa ka lawei ha ka jingma.
title: Kyntu ki rangbah ka shnong Seiñduli ïa ki paitbah ban kiar na ka jingwiang ding pathar

content: Jowai, Rymphang 27: Ka Jaiñtia Fishing and Environmental Protection Association (JFEPA) kum shi bynta ban pyndep ïa ki kam sahteng kaba la slem bha na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingsuk ïa ki nongkhwai dohkha bad ïaki trai hali kba na ka por sha ka por bad ban pynitynnat ruh ïaki bynta ka Wah Myntdu ha Ram pyrthai .Ka Association hadien ka jingïoh jingbit na ka tnad PHE lyngba ophis jong u Executive Engineer PHE Electrical Division naduh hynnin ka sngi ha ka por mynstep kila pyrshang ban ban sei ïa ka lieng jong ka PHE kaba la sah hapoh kane ka thwei la kumba 39 tylli ki snem hynrei mynta ka sngi 29 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 la lah ban sie noh ïa katei ka lieng sarang da kaba pyndonkam daka puh shilum (JCB).Kane ka jing pyrshang jong ka seng ban sei ïa katei ka lieng ka long shi bynta ban ïarap kat ka bor halor kiba bun ki jingkyrpad ba la ïoh na ki trai hali bad kumjuh na ki nongkhwai kaba la wan sha ki tyndong skor ka seng na ka por sha ka por,.Ïa katei ka lieng la sei da ka jingïarap lang u u Side Engineer ba pyntrei ïa ki In-Situ dam kiba don ha baroh ki liar kiba tuid sha ka Wah Myntdu lyngba ka jingbthah jong ka NGT.Halor kane ka JF&EPA lyngba u President bad u Secretary kila buh ïa ka jingkyrpad rit ïa baroh ban long kiba ïatreilang bad ka seng, naka bynta ka bha ka mait jong ki doh um doh wah kiba don haka Wah Myntdu baroh kawei khnang ba kan wanrah ïa ka jingsngewtynnad ïaki paidbah jong ki Shnong kiba don ha sawdong ka sor Jowai.
title: Ïoh sei ka JF&EPA ïa ka lieng ba sahkut 39 snem ha Ram Pyrthai

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 29: Hadien bun tylli ki snem ka jingap khmih lynti ban ioh noh ka iing Dorbar kaba paka, ka shnong Nongkhrah ha Ri-Bhoi mynta ka sngi kala ioh ban plie paidbah noh syndon ïaka iing Dorbar ba paka naka bynta ban pyntyllun ïaki kam shnong kam thaw.Ïa katei ka ïing Dorbar la tei haka jinglut ba 10 lakh lyngba ka skhim SRWP haka por jong u Dr DD Lapang bad ka Grand In Aid naka tnad Urban lyngba ka Nongpoh Town Committee bala wan ban plie paidbah mynta ka sngi da u Bah Prestone Tynsong Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla haka jingdonlang u Raja Brahma ADC ka Ri-Bhoi, S Langstieh District Urban Officer, BB Makdoh Chairman Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong, Bah CB Syiem Adviser ka Nongpoh Town Committee, Bah Rayonald Kharkamni Secretary ka Nongpoh Town Committee bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah ryngkat ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka shnong Nongkhrah.Haba kren ha katei ka jingialang, naka liang ki nongïalam Shnong ki la ai ka jingkhublei kaba kyrpang ïaka sorkar kaba la sngap ïaka jingdonkam jong ka Shnong bad lyngba ka jing ïoh ban plie noh ïa kane ka ïing Dorbar kaba thymmai kan long ka jingkyrkhu ïaki nongshnong shnong ba kin dang lah ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïaki kam Shnong kam thaw.U Bah Prestone Tynsong haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw ba ka shnong Nongkhrah hadien bun tylli ki snem kala ioh noh ïaka iing Dorbar kaba paka ban ioh ban pyntyllun ïaki kam shnong kam thaw bad u la ong ruh kane ka jingïoh ban plie noh mynta ka sngi ïaka Ïing Dorbar ba thymmai ka long kum kawei na ki kam pynroi bad lyngba kane ka Ïing Dorbar ki nongïalam shnong kin ïoh ban saiñ dur ïaka shnong ka thaw.U Bah Prestone u pynpaw ruh ka jingïaroh ïaka sorkar jylla kaba la lam khmat da u Myntri Rangbah la Jylla u Conrad Sangma, ba dei lyngba ka jingstad bad ka jingshemphang jong ki Myntri kiba don haka sorkar la lah ban wan rah shibun ki kam pynroi hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei bad ka sorkar kan pynthikna ba baroh ki shnong kin ioh ïaki kam pynroi.
title: Plie u Bah Prestone Tynsong ïaka iing Dorbar ka shnong Nongkhrah, yn pynthikna ki kam pynroi sha ki shnong

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 29: Ka ophis jong ka District Tuberculosis Officer, Ri Bhoi District mynta ka sngi ka la sam da ki marbam bad ki jngbam tei met hapoh ka Pradhan Mantri TB Mukt- Bharat Abhiyan sha ki 36 ngut ki nongpang TB naka thaiñ Byrnihat kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ba la noh synñiang da ki 3 tylli ki kharkhana bala tip kyrteng kum ka Shyam Ferrous Century Pvt Ltd, ka Maithan Alloy Pvt Ltd, ka Pioner Carbide Pvt Ltd lem bad u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun MLA ka Jirang bad kane ka jingkyrshan marbam ïa ki nongpang TB kan long na ka bynta 6 bnai kum ki Nakshay Mitra bad ïa katei ka jingïalang la pynlong ha Byrnihat PHC.Ka District TB Officer, Ri-Bhoi ka Dr. E. Kalwing haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang ka la ïathuh shaphang ki sienjam jong ka Sorkar India halor ka Pradhan Mantri TB Mukt Bharat Abhiyan, ka skhim ba thymmai kaba ai jingïarap marbam sha ki nongpang TB kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar lyngba ka jingkyrshan jong ki riewshimet bad ki kynhun bapher bapher bad kumba long mynta ki don haduh 447 ngut ki nongpang TB ha Ri-Bhoi bad 174 ngut ki dei kiba ïoh jingïarap bad kiba sah ki dei ki bym pat ïoh jingïarap.Kala ong ruh ba haduh mynta ki don kumba 21 ngut ki nongpang TB kiba la khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei, bad ka sorkar mynta ka dang buh thong ban rat diengkhong ïa katei ka jingpang bad ban pynjait syndon bad ban dang ïoh shuh shuh ki jingïarap naki kynhun bapher bapher.Ha katei ka sngi la sakhi ruh da ka jingdonlang u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun MLA ka Jirang ka Dr TS Momin DMHO, ka Dr E Kalwing District Tuberculosis Officer lem bad ki nongmihkhmat nakitei ki karkhana, ki samla pule BSw jong ka Women’s College Shillong bad kiwei kiwei ki ophisar naka tnad ka koit ka khiah.U Bah Sosthenes Sohtun MLA ka Jirang haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la ai ka jingïaroh ïaka sorkar kaba la buhthong ban rat diengkhong ïa katei ka jingpang lyngba ka Pradhan Mantri TB Mukt- Bharat Abhiyan ba kino kino ki kynhun lane ki riew shimet ki lah ban ïarap ïakitei ki nongpang kiba bun napdeng jong ki ki dei kiba wan naka longiing ba duk ba rangli bad shem jingeh shisha ban ïoh ïaka bam ka dih kaba biang bad kaba thikna namar kum ki nongpang kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ki donkam ïaka bam ka dih kaba biang ban ïoh koit kloi na katei ka jingpang nalor ka jingdih dawai.
title: Kyrshan jingïarap mar bam ki karkhana bad u MLA Jirang ïa ki nongpang TB ha Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong, Rymphang 29 : U MLA ka BJP na Shillong South Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ka sngi Palei u la kam ba kan sepei ïa ki paidbah ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia ban phah da ki MP na kiwei pat ki party namar ba ha Delhi ka BJP kan dang wan biang ha ka bor synshar.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka la dei ka por ba ki nongthep vote ka Khasi bad Jaiñtia ban ai lad ïa ka BJP ha kine ki san snem.U Bah Sanbor u la kynnoh ruh ba u MP ba mynta na ka Congress u la pynlut kai ka por jong u ha Parliament naba duna bha ki kam pynroi ba wan sha ka jylla.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Sanbor u la ong, “Sepei ban phah da kiwei pat ki party. Ki nongshong shnong ka India ki tip bad ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ruh ki tip ba khlem artatien kane ka kynti ïa ka sorkar yn thaw biang da ka BJP hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Narendra Modi. Peit ha ka elekshon ba la dep ka BJP tang marwei ka la jop haduh 333 tylli ki seat.”U la kam ruh ba ki paidbah ki jied ïa ka BJP namar ka jinglah jong ka ban treikam bha haba ïadei bad ki kam pynroi bad ki skim kiba kyntiew ïa ka rukom im jong ki paidbah khamtam eh ha ki nongkyndong. U ong ruh ba ka sorkar u Modi ka la thaw bun ki skim na bynta ki nongrep bad ki longiing longsem.“Dei na kane ka daw nga kyntu ïa ki paidbah ka rilum Khasi bad Jaintia ba kim dei ban pynsepei ïa ka por, kim dei ban phah da kiwei ki kyrtong lym kumta san snem ngin sa babe bïang,” u la bynrap biang.Nalorkata u ong ba lada phah MP na ka BJP na Shillong, u ne ka sa ïoh ïa ka shuki Myntri ryngkat ki tnad kiba biang ba biang nalor kiba bun ki skim ban kyntiew ïa ka ïohkam ïohjam na bynta ki samla.Ha kajuh ka por u ong ruh ba ka Congress mynta katba nang ïaid ka por ka la nang ngam hadien ba bun ki nongïalam ki la phet noh na ka party bad ïasoh sha ka BJP.
title: Sepei ban phah da kiwei namar yn dang synshar biang da ka BJP ha Delhi : Bah Sanbor

content: Shillong, Rymphang 29 : Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka jingïalam khmat u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem uba dei u Deputy Chief Executive Member ka Council, hynne ka sngi Palei ka 29 tarik Rymphang 2024, ka la leit ban jurip ïa ka jingpynkhreh ban pynlong ïa ka Monolith Festival-2024 ha Mawphlang, ka ban sdang naduh ka 7, 8 bad 9 tarik Lber 2024.Ha kane ka sngi la ïadon ryngkatlang ruh u Bah Titostarwell Chyne nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah, ki MDC, ki dkhot ka Executive Committee, ki Myntri bad kiwei kiwei de.U Bah Pynshngaiñ haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor u la ong ba ka jingpynkhreh mynta ka la ïaid shad shaid bad ka long kaba jop namar na ka 100 percent la dep kumba 95 pcent bad ym slem shuh yn sa pyndep noh baroh khnang ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka Monolith Festival kan long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.U la ïathuh ba katei ka tamasa ka long ban pyni nam ïa ki jingshad tynrai, ka rwai ka siaw jong u Khasi, ka jingpyninam ïa ki soh ki pai, ki doh thad tyrkhong, ki tiar ba shna u Khasi, ki jait jingbam bapher bapher bad u dohsnam ba paw bha na Laitlyngkot yn pyni bad die ha kitei ki lai sngi lynter bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingpyninam.
title: Leit jurip ki MDC ïa ka rukom pynkhreh ïa ka Monolith Festival

content: Jowai, Rymphang 29: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (Jowai Circle) hapoh ka jingïalam jong Vice President Samla Morning Pasi, u General Secretary Samla Nidapoi Shadap, u Education Secretary Samla Conard Sana jong ka Jowai Circle, ka President KSU Girls’ Wing & Education Secretary (War Jaiñtia Circle), oa Samla Ladaplin Hayong lem bad ki Dkhot jong ka Jowai Circle, ki la ïoh ban leit jurip ïa ka Govt Girls’ Hostel kaba don ha Mynthong, Jowai.Ha kane ka jingleit jurip la ïoh ban kynduh ïa ka Principal jong ka Govt Girls H.S. School bad ka la ïathuh ba katei ka Hostel ka long ka bym long shuh ban sah ki khynnah namar ka long kaba la jot rathai bad ki kynroh ki biar ki la sdang orpait bad ka long kaba buh jingma ïa ki khynnah lada pynsah ïa ki.Shuh shuh katei ka Principal kala ïathuh ruh ba na ka Liang ka School ki la dep buh shibun ki jingthoh sha ka sorkar ba dei ban peit khmih hynrei na ka liang ka sorkar ka dang wan tang shisien ha u snem 2023 ban leit jurip bad la ïathuh ruh ba katei ka Hostel kam long shuh kaba dang lah ban pynshna maramot (Repair).Ka seng hadien ba la ïoh ban leit peit ïa ka jinglong (condition) jong katei ka Hostel la lap shisha ba katei ka Hostel kam long shuh ban sah ki khynnah. Na ka liang ka Seng kan ïai buddien ïa kane ka kam sha duh ki bor ba halor jong ka sorkar khnang ba katei ka Hostel kan long kaba treikam.La ptnsngew ka jingdon jong ki Govt Hostel kan pynsuk shibun bha ïa ki khynnah kiba wan pule sha Jowai kiba na ki shnong ba jngai na Jowai.La ïathuh ruh ba katei ka Hostel ka lah ban ngiam haduh 80 ngut ki khynnah skul. Hynrei na ka daw ka jingsniew jong katei ka Hostel, la hap ban khang noh ïa ka ha u Snem 2018. Pynkut ka kyrwoh na u samla Nidapoi Shadap General Secretary Jowai Circle.
title: Ym long shuh ban pyndonkam ïa ka Hostel ki kynthei, lap ka KSU

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 29: Ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ha ka sngi Palei ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha u Superitendent of Police (SP) ka East Khasi Hills District halor ka jingbym pyndem jong uwei u briew uba kynthoh pyrshah ïa ka HANM ha ka Facebook Page ba la ai kyrteng ‘Lympung ki Khun ka Ri’, wat hadien ba ka jingaipor kaba 24 kynta ka la kut.Katkum kane ka jingkynthoh ha kane ka Facebook Page, u nongkynthoh uba la paw kyrteng kum u HBK Lyngdoh u la kynthoh pyrshah ïa ka seng da kaba kynnoh ba ka jingpynlong ka HANM ïa ka jingïakhih ha Jantar Mantar ha nongbah Delhi ha ka 3 tarik Naiweing 2023 ka dei kaba la bei pisa da ka National People’s Party (NPP).U nongkynthoh HBK Lyngdoh u kynthoh kumne: “Kawei na ki sengbhalang kaba leit pynthud ïa ka jingdawa pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka 8th Schedule ka dei ka HANM. Kane ka Seng ka la leit sha Delhi ban dawa pynrung lang ïa ka ktien Khasi bad ka ktien Garo. Ka ktien Garo kam pat long qualified ban rung ha ka 8th Schedule te da dawa pynrung lang ha kajuh ka por ka ktah ïa ka ktien Khasi kaba lah long qualified ban rung ka hap ap haduh da ki phew snem shuh shuh ban ïa rung ryngkat bad ka Garo haduh ban da long qualified ka Garo.”“Lehse ban leit pynthud kumtei dei ba sponsor da ka npp.”U nongïalam ka Seng u Bah Wyraiwan Sohtun ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “katkum ka hok ban kren, phi don ïa ka hok ban kren, ban pynsngew hynrei phim lah patde ban kren shaba palat pud kaba lah ban pynjah burom bad ba phin shu thaw da ki lad ki lynti ban pynjah burom bad ban pynduh mynsiem ïa kaei kaei kaba ki briew ki trei shitom na ka bynta ki jingbha jong ki paidbah.”“Lada phi kwah ban tip ïa ka jingshisha phi lah ban wan sha ka ophis treikam jong ka HANM ngin ai ïa ka jingshisha bad phim lah ban shu kynnoh ïa ngi ïa kaei kaba phim lah ban pynshisha,” la ong u Bah Sohtun.“Katkum ka hok ba la ai da ka Article 19 (1) A phim lah ban shu pynjah burom lane ban shu bein shu khoh haduh ba kiwei kiwei kin sngew ba ka jingtrei shitom jong ki ban wanrah ka jingbha bad ka jingsuk kan shu duhei noh,” u la ong.U Vice President ka seng u Bah Bawan Nongsiej u la ïathuh ba mynta ka shong sa ha ki bor jong ka ain ban leh ïa kaba donkam namar ba ka seng ka ladep ban ujor sha ki Pulit.Haba kyntait ïa ka jingshah kynnoh, u Vice President ka HANM Bah Bawan Nongsiej u la pynshai ba ka jingïakhih jong ka seng ka dei na ka bynta ki dawbah jong ka jaitbynriew na ka bynta ban pynurlong ïa ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri India kumba la mynjur da ka Iingdorbar Thawain ka Jylla ha ka 27 tarik Nailur 2018.
title: Bym panmab, mudui ejahar ka HANM ha u SP ïa uba kynthoh ha FB

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28 : U MLA ka BJP na Shillong South ha ka sngi Palei u la ong ba shen un sa leit sha Delhi ban ïa kren bad ka sorkar pdeng ba kan pyllait ïa ka Meghalaya na ki kyndon jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA). “Shen ngan ssa leit sha Delhi ban kren ïa kane ka ishu bad ki nongïalam ka sorkar pdeng,” ong u Bah Sanbor haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Nalorkata, u ong, “Ngi dawa ha kato ka por ban pyllait pura ïa ka Meghalaya na ka CAA, namar kadei ka jylla riewlum.”Kumba long mynta, la ong ba dei tang ki jaka ba hap ha ka Khyrnit ba Hynriew kiba la lait na ki kyndon treikam jong ka CAA.
title: Bad ka sorkar pdeng yn kren u MLA ban pyllait ïa ka Meghalaya na ka CAA

content: Shillong, Rymphang 29 : Ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ka la bthah ïa u Superintendent of Police (SP), ka East Khasi Hills District ban phah ïa ka kaiphod kaba bniah hapoh ka 15 sngi halor ka jingkynnoh shah shoh u President ka HYC, Riwar Mihngi da u 2nd OC jong ka Pynursla Police Station.Katkum ka jingpylait khubor na u Secretary ka MHRC ha kane ka sngi Palei la ong, “La dep ban phah da ka jingthoh (Notice) sha u SP ka East Khasi Hills District, ban phah ïa ka kaiphod kaba bniah sha ka Commission hapoh ka 15 sngi.”Ka MHRC ka la shim ïa kane ka sienjam hadien ba ki nongïalam jong ka HYC Seng Kmie ki la ujor halor katei ka jingjia.Dei ha ka 26tarik u Rymphang ba ka HYC ka la ujor sha ka MHRC pyrshah ïa u 2nd OC jong ka Pynursla Police Station da kaba kynnoh ba u la ktah kti ïa ki dkhot ka seng kiba kwah ban ujor pyrshah ïa ka jingkhaii beaiñ ïa ki masi sha Bangladesh.Ïa kane ka jingujor, ki nongïalam ka Seng ki la ujor ruh sha u SP ka East Khasi Hills District.
title: Bthah ka MHRC ïa u SP EKH ban phah ïa ka kaiphod ba bniah halor jingkynnoh shah shoh ki HYC

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 29: Ki nongrep, ki nongthaiñ jaiñ, ki nongshna tiar kti lem bad ki samla kiba seng kam lajong mynta ka sngi kila pyninam ïala ki jong ki tiar ki tar, ka bam ka dih bad ki mar rep haka 28th District Level Industrial Exhibition bala pynlong da ka District Commerce and Industries Center (DCIC) Ri-Bhoi District ha Byrnihat.Ïa katei ka ïew pyninam ba 2 sngi lynter la wan ban plie paidbah mynta ka sngi da u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun MLA ka Jirang kum u kongsan haka jingdonlang u I.Z. Wreang, Deputy Director Industries, Bah E. Dkhar, BDO Umling, Bah H. Decruse, GM, DCIC, Nongpoh, Bah G.S. Langstieh, Functional Manager DCIC, Nongpoh bad kiwei kiwei ki ophisar sorkar.Ha katei ka ïew pyni nam la wan ruh ban shim bynta da kumba 40 ngut ki samla, ki longkmie kynthei bad shynrang kiba seng kam lajong lyngba ka sap bapher bapher kaba ki don na kylleng ki jaka jong ka Ri-Bhoi District.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi naka liang u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun MLA ka Jirang u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ban ïohi ba ki khun samla kila kiew sted haka sengkam seng jam lajong lyngba ka sap bapher bapher ba ki don bad kane ka long ka jingai mynsiem ïa kiba bun ki khun samla ha kane ka juk ba mynta.U la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewkmen ba ki dukan baroh ki dap da ki tiar ki tar lyngba ka jingtrei shitom ki paidbah bad kane ka dei ka kabu kaba ki khun samla ki dei ban shim ha kum kane ka juk kyrduh kam kyrduh jam ban pyndonkam hok ïaka sap bad ka jingangnud ka jongki lyngba ka jingïarap jong ka sorkar naka tnad DCIC.
title: Pyninam ki nongrep, nongthaiñ bad ki nongshna tiar ha Byrnihat

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 29: U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Paul Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Myntri ka tnat Aiñ ka Dr. M Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Palei ki la pyllait paidbah ïa ki “Ki kyndon Aiñ” jong ka POCSO Act, 2012 ba la pynkylla sha ka ktien Khasi ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Pinewood Hotel, Shillong.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ngi la ïatreilang na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki parabriew bad ban lehkmen ïa ka jinglong khynnah, haba ngi peit shakhmat sha ki sngi jong ki samla, ki rangbah, hynrei ka aiom ksiar ha ka jingim ka dei ka jinglong khynnah.U la ong ba ym baroh ki don ban sam ïa ka jingkmen, ka jingkmen ha ka jingim, dei na kata ka daw ka long kaba donkam ba kum ki nongthaw aiñ bad kum ki kynhun ki la ïatreilang ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki kam bymman kiba thombor ïa ka longryngieng jong ki khynnah rit.U Bah Paul shuh shuh u la ong ba kane ka sngi, kan long ka sngi kaba jop namarba ha ka sien banyngkong eh hadien ba la pynmih ïa ki dak thok Khasi ha u snem 1841, mynta ka sngi ngi la lah ban ïoh ha ki dak thoh Khasi ïa ki kyndon jong ka Ain POCSO kaba la dap mynta shiphew snem.U la ong ruh ba u sai sharak ba ngi la thang um long tang kum ka shab hynrei ai ba kito ki sharak rit kin meh ha ka dohnud jong ngi iwei pa iwei, khnang ba naduh ki nongthaw aiñ haduh ki nongpynkylla ktien, ki kmie ki kpa, ki nongïalam niam, ai ba ka jingshai jong ka sharak kan meh ha iwei pa iwei na ki khnang ba kin shim halade ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki khynnah ha baroh kawei ka jylla Meghalaya.U la ong ruh da ka jingkyrshan jong ka imlang ka sahlang, yn sa lah ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa kine ki kam bymman bad da ka jingwanrah ïa kane ka aiñ ha ka ktien Khasi kan pynthikna ba kan rung sha manla ki thliew iing jong ki shnong ki thaw, bad yn ym wat tang uwei ruh mynta uba lait na ki kynjri jong ka aiñ.U la kyntu ïa baroh kiba mihkhmat ha kane ka jingïalang ban shim ïa ka jingsmai ba ngi don hangne da kawei ka jingmut ban pynim biang ïa ka imlang ka sahlang bad ban pynim biang ïa ka jingduh jingkyrmen.Ha kane ka sngi, ka Meghalaya State Commission for Protection of Child Rights ka la pyllait paidbah ïa ka Almanak bad ka kaiphod halor ki POCSO Cases ha ki Kashari ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: Hadien 10 snem pynmih ka Sorkar ha ka Khasi ïa ki kyndon Aiñ ka POCSO Act, 2012

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 28: Ka Students Wing jong ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ha ka sngi Palei ka la maham ban leh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ïa kino kino ki kynhun kiba pyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngew ïapher jaidbynriew hapoh ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep bad ïa kino kino ki kynhun shitniam kiba pyndik ïa ki skul ba la pynïaid da ki Balang Khristan hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ki nongïalam jong kane ka kynhun ki la tah da ka notis jingmaham ha ka kynroh jong ka ophis treikam ka Assam Sanatan Dharma Sabha (ASDS) ban pyrshah bad ban maham halor ka jingkynnoh ba kane ka kynhun ka la dawa ïa ki bor pynïaid skul ban weng lut ïa ki dur niam bad ïa u stashu Jisu na ka Sacred Heart Secondary School, Marmaiñ, Ribhoi District.“Ngi la wan ban tah da ki notis jingmaham ha ki kynroh bad ki biar jong kane ka ophis ka Assam Sanatan Dharma Sabha ban pyrshah bad ban maham tyngeh ruh ïa ki halor ka jingleh jong ki ha ka thaiñ Marmaiñ kaba don ha khappud jong ka Ribhoi Distirct, Meghalaya bad ka Assam. Ka jingleh jong ki, ka long da kaba tah notis ha ki skul ba la pynïaid da ki mishoneri da kaba maham lada kim weng ïa ki dur jong ki riewkhuid bad ïa u stashu Jisu kaba long kum ka jingibeiñ ïa ki nongpynïaid skul jong ki Phadar,” ong u Vice Chairman jong ka Student’s Wing ka HITO u Samla Kitshemphang Warjri ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha u nongthoh khubor.“Ngi ruh ngi lah ban tah ïa ki notis bad ngi lah ban maham tyngeh ïa ki namarba ka jingleh jong ka pynduh ïa ka jingmane Blei laitluid ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya. Ngim sngewtynnat bad kaei kaba phi leh ngim sngewtynnat,” la phah kyrwoh une u nongïalam ka HITO sha ka Assam Sanatan Dharma Sabha (ASDS).“Ngi maham ïa kino kino ki seng shitniam Hindutva lada ki leh ïa kine ki jait kam ban tah ïa ki notis ngin leit ban ïakynduh markhmat bad ngin ym shah daleilei ruh bad ngin ai da kaba tyngeh bad ngin rah ïa ki bor ba dei peit. Kane ka jingleh jong kine ki seng (Assam Sanatan Dharma Sabha) ka buh jingkylli ïa ngi balei phi donkam ban phin leh ïa kumne ki kam. Lada phi kwah ban leh kumta balei kim leit ïakynduh ïa ki bor ba dei peit,” kynthoh u samla Warjri.“Me donkam aiu ma me ban wan leh kumne ha kane ka khyndew jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep. Ngim pat ju pynthud ïa kano kano ka jaitniam ha kane ka Jylla. Lada kiwei ki leh kumne balei ngin shu sngap,” ong shuh shuh u Vice Chairman ka Students’ Wing ka HITO.“Lada ka RSS ka lah ban dei ka Hindu Extremist Group bad kiwei kiwei ki lah ban dei ki Hindu Extremist Group, ngi, ngi lah ban dei ka Christian Extremist Group. Ngim salia ïa kata, ngi ïakhih ïa kaba dei, ngim sngew eiei, ngin tur shaphrang,” la maham u Samla Warjri.
title: Maham ïa ki shitniam kiba pyndik ïa ki skul Khristan ha Meghalaya

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 29: Ka Joint Action Committee, Umden Area ba kynthup ïaka seng RBYDSO, RBYF, HYC, HITO bad AMKA lem bad ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Marmaiñ Area mynta ka sngi kila leit ban ujor syndon sha u DC ka Ri-Bhoi halor ka jing don ka jingbyrngem ban wah ne buh ïa ki dur Jisu ne kino kino kiba pynpaw ïaka niam khristan haka skul Sacred Heart Secondary School Marmaiñ kaba dei kawei naki skul ba don hajan khappud ka Assam bad kumjuh ruh ki skul Mission ha katei ka thaiñ.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor naka liang ki nongïalam ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong, Marmaiñ Area naduh u Bah Diren Kleiñ, Bah Bistocan Timung Secretary ka All Meghalaya Karbi Association (AMKA), ki la ïathuh ba katkum ka jingtip jong ki na ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul kiba leit skul haka skul Sacred Heart secondary School Marmaiñ, ka la don ka jingkynduh jong kawei ka kynhun bala tip kum ka Karbi Traditional Faith Association kaba la lum da ka jingïalang haka 25 tarik u Rymphang ha khappud ka Assam, bad kala don ruh ka jingbyrngem ba baroh ki dur jisu ba kynthup ruh ïa u Statue Jisu ba don hakhmat katei ka skul ba dei ban weng noh lym kumta kin sa leit ban pynpra hi.Halor katei ka jingdon ka jingbyrngem bad ka jingpur sted ruh ki poster haki social media lyngba ki whatsapp da kawei ka seng kaba la tip kum ka Sanmilita Sanatan Samaj ha katei ka thaiñ kala wanrah ka jingsngewkhia ïa kiba bun ki nongïalam shnong bad ki paidbah khamtam ki kmie ki kpa kiba phah skul ha katei ka skul Sacred Heart Secondary School Marmaiñ kaba ktah ruh ïaka shongsuk shongsaiñ ki paidbah kiba ju im suk baroh shi katta watla ka dei ka thaiñ khappud bad ka Assam.Dei halor katei ka Nongrim naka liang kitei ki kynhun mynta ka sngi kila leit ban ïakynduh syndon ïa u DC bad SP ka Ri-Bhoi ban pynthikna ba kum kitei ki riew shitniam kim dei ban mih pyrthei ban pynthud ïaka shongsaiñ jong ki paidbah, hynrei ba ki bor jong ka aiñ ki dei ban pynlong ka jingtohkit bad ban nym ailad ba ka huri hura kan mih ha katei ka jaka bad kiba thmu ban pynthud ïaka suk ka saiñ ki paidbah namar ka jingthmu hi jong ki ka long ban pynthud ïaka jingshakri Blei.Kila ong ruh ba baroh shi katta ki paidbah haka thaiñ Marmaiñ bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong khappud ki shongsuk shongsaiñ bad kane ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong ba kum katei ka jingjia kan wan jia ha katei ka thaiñ bad naka liang u DC ka Ri-Bhoi u la kular ban shimkhia ïa katei ka kam bad ban phah ki bor pahara ba ki paidbah ki dei ban shongsuk shongsaiñ kumba ju long
title: Ba don ka jingbyrngem wah dur Jisu ha ki skul khappud, ujor ka JAC ha u DC

content: Mawkyrwat, Rymphang 29: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) jong ka Mawkyrwat Circle mynta ka sngi ka leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO), South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat ban kylli bniah halor ka jingjah rngai ki katto katne ki kam ne advertisement post hapoh ka 10 Bedded Integrated Ayush Hospital, Mawkyrwat.Ha ka shithi ba ki la phah ha u District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO), South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat kum ka seng pdiang kylluid mynsiem ïa ka jingthmu jong ka National AYUSH Mission ban pyntreikam pura noh ïa ka 10 Bedded Integrated Ayush Hospital kaba don ha Mawkyrwat bad kyrmen ruh ba kane ka shnat treikm ban ai jingsumar kan long ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki paidbah ka thaiñ hi baroh kawei.Hynrei kaba sngewsih pat ka long ba kumba la lah ban sakhi na ki lad pathai ba ka jingkhot pynrungkam (Advertisement Notice) lyngba ka ophis DM&HO kaba ïadei bad kane ka Ayush Hospital jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, la ïohi ba ka jingkhot thep lam ne advertised posts ka long tang ïa ki 24 tylli ki post na ki 40 tylli kumba ka dei ban long katkum ka mang ba pura bad ki jah haduh 16 tylli.Namarkata, ka KSU ka buh jingkylli halor kane bad ha kajuh ka por ruh ka kyntu ïa ka ophis DM&HO ba kane ka jingkhot pynrungkam lane ka Advertisement kan long beit pura na ka bynta baroh ki post ha dei ban pyllait kata, baroh 40 tylli ym ban pynjah rngai. Kumta, ïa ki post ba dang sah ruh dei ban pynbna noh khnang ba ki samla wad kam na ka thaiñ kin ïoh ban pyrshang thep noh katkum ka jingibit jong ki.Ym tang kata, ka seng ka ban jur ïa kane ka mat khnang ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingleh shilliang bad ban pyntikna ruh ba ka rukom thung kam thung jam kan long kaba khuid ba suba.Haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang ki nongïalang ka KSU ba kynthup ïa u bah Plosborlin Kharjahrin bad u bah Forwardman Nongrem ki la pynpaw ba kane ka jingjah kyrteng ïa ki 16 tylli ki post ka don lypa kaei re kaei sha lyndet. Kumta ka jingkyrpad na ka liang ka KSU ka long ba haba la bhah 40 tylli ki kam na ka bynta ki samla kiba don jingthmu ban thep, dei ban pyni paidbah baroh 40 tylli ym ban buh rieh ïa ki.“Kiba jah na ki 40 tylli ki post ki long ka ‘Office Assistant cum DEO, Ward-Boy, Ward-Girl, Sweeper, Cook, Chowkidar, Peon bad Jamadars’’ bad kane i mat ka don ei ei shalyndet da kaba thmu ban thung lyndet ïa ki briew jongno re jongno, ong u bah Forwardman Nongrem. Namarkata, kaba kum kane ka jingleh kum ka seng ka sngewbha pyrshah bad ka dawa ruh na ka ophis DM&HO, ka ophis jong u Director bad kumjuh ruh ïa u Deputy Commissioner jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ba u dei ban tuklar mardor halor kane ka bynta khnang ba ki samla thep kam thep jam jong ka distrik kin ïoh ka lad ban thep bad kin ïoh ka lad ban ïakhun. “Kam pher lah mano, kam pher ïoh mano hynrei kaba dei ban leh ka long dei ban pyni paidbah ne advertise bad pdiang ïa ki samla kiba wan ban thep.Ïa kane ka jingleit ban ïakynduh ïa u District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO), South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat la don lang naduh u bah Rutherford Lyngdoh, President bad u bah Plosbor Kharjahrin, General Secretary jong ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle, u bah Forwardman Nongrem, President ka KSU South West Khasi Hills District lem bad kiwei de ki para dkhot.
title: Ba jah rngai 16 tylli ki post, kynduh DM&HO ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 29: Wat lada ka Seng Congress na Ribhoi District ka don tang 2 ngut ki MLA, kata u Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh, MLA ka Umsning bad u Bah Charles Marngar, MLA ka Mawhati, hynrei ka mynsiem pat ka rhem na ka bynta ban pynjop ïa u Bah Vincent H. Pala kum u MP na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.Kane ka la paw ha ka jingïalang ba la khot da ka Ri Bhoi District Congress Committee ïa ki nongkitkam na ki Block bapher bapher jong ka District kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha phyllaw ïing u MLA ka Umsning, ha Umsaitsning.Ha kane ka jingïalang la don lang ruh u kyrtong ka Party na ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat u Ma Vincent H Pala, u nongialam ka liang pyrshah u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, u President ka RBDCC u Bah Charles Marngar, u MLA ka Umsning Konstituensi u Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh, u MLA ka Nongstoin u Bah Gabriel Wahlang lem bad kiwei kiwei ki nongialam ba hakhmat ka party Congress Ri Bhoi District.Haba kren ha kane ka jingialang, ki nongkren ki la pynshai ïa ki nongrim treikam kiba ka party ka la buh hakhmat ban ïoh ïa ka jingjop ha kane ka ileksion MP kaban sa wan, ha kaba baroh ki la pynpaw ruh ia la ki kam ba la shakri paidbah khamtam ba kum ka party hi ka la noh synñiang sha ka imlang ka sahlang, ha kaba la bynrap ruh, ba kum ka party ha ka jingpynkreh ia kane ka ileksion kin hap ban ia mih madan ban pynkhlain bad tehsong ia ka party.Ki nongkren, ki la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw, ba u Ma Vincent Pala kum u MP ha kine ki saw term u la lah shisha ban ïeng na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya khamtam ia ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat lyngba ka jinglah ban iatai bad ban pan ïa ki kam pynroi bapher bapher ban kyntiew ïa ki shnong ki thaw haph kane ka Shillong PS ia kiba la nang donkam ia u briew u ba la mlien ban kren bad ban treikam hapoh ka Parliament ban nang neh bad ban wan biang kum u MP na kane ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat.Haba kren kum u kyrtong ka party INC na ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat, u Ma Vincent Pala, u la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ban sakhi ba da ki spah ngut ki nongtrei ba hakhmat ka party Congress na Ri Bhoi District ki ïa tylli mlon bad ki nang treishitom ban pynkhlain ia ka party Congress watla don MLA 2 ngut hynrei la sakhi pat ïa ka jingnang khlaiñ ka party na kawei ka sngi sha kawei pat na ka jingtrei jong ki nongialam ha baroh ki Block, ki Circle bad kumta terter khamtam ruh na ka jingsngewthuh ki paidbah ia ki kam bad jingshakri ba ka party Congress ka noh synniang na kawei ka sngi sha kawei pat.U la ong ruh, ba kum u kyrtong MP na kane ka party u dang don shibun ki jingangnud ban nang trei ban wanrah shuh shuh ia ki jingkylla ha kiba bun ki liang, kumta un nang ïai treishitom ban pynkhlain bad ban wanrah shuh shuh ïa ki kam pynroi ha kane ka jylla khamtam ha kane ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki nongïalam ka party ban nang ïoh ïa ka jingshaniah na u paidbah.“Ki ishu kiba bun, ki jingkylli kiba bun, kaei ka CAA, kaei ka UCC bad kiwei kiwei ki bill kiba pass ha Delhi ki long kiba pyrshah ïa ka mon jong ngi”,la ong u Bah Pala, da kaba bynrap ba ïa ka CAA la pass ha Parliament la san snem hynrei ym pat ban pyntreikam, ka CAA mynshwa ka dei ka CAB ha kaba la phah sha u President ka Ri India bad lada pass da u President lashai kane ka kan sa kylla na ka Bill sha ka Act bad kiwei kiwei kiba la ktah shikatdei ïa ka mon ba laitluid jong ki nongshong shnong ka ri India”, pynpaw u Ma Pala.U la ong ruh, ba ka jingpyrshah ïa ka CAA, khamtam ha Meghalaya kaba don marsyndah bad ka Bangladesh, Myanmar bad kiwei kiwei ki ri kiba shem jynjar ha ka shong ka sah lada kine ki wan sha Meghalaya hano kumno ngin lah ban beh ia ki namar ka don ka ain ban iada ia ki, ha Meghalaya ngi don kumba 35 lak eiei ki nongshong shnong hato, lada wan kiew ki briew nabar ka ri ban shongshnong shane kan buh jingma shikatdei ia ngi ki rit paid kiba don la ka jong ka riti ka dustur.
