Ngin phaikhmat ha ka thma ha Myanmar, ha Manipur ki dei ki sakhi ba shai ba kaei kan jia lada wan buhai shnong sa kiba nabar jylla lane bar ri kumta kane ka CAA kan sa long shisha ka nongshun kaba khraw tam ia ngi.Haba ïa dei bad ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) la pass ha Uttarkhand bad mynta sa ha Assam katba ha Parliament pat pass hynrei ki la khreh hynrei la don ka jingkhreh hynrei ki tieng ioh ka ktah ia ki katto katne ki Hindu, te mynta Uniform kaba mut kaba long salonsar, te mynta ngi bud ia ka code jong no, ka code jong u Hindu ne Muslim ne Sikh ne Khristan, haba ngi don la ka riti ka dustur, ka riam ka beit, la ka jong ka mane Blei bad ka hiar pateng te ban pynlong uniform lane kajuh ia baroh iano ngin bud, ka Hindu ka long majority te ngin bud ia u Hindu ka bym lah ban long, kumba long mynta baroh ki kyntien thylliej khamtam ha Parliament mynta ki bill la pynkylla Hindu lut ka CPC, ka CrPC mynta kim kyrteng shuh da ka English hynrei da ka Hindi haba wat ia ka kyrteng India ruh la thmu pynkylla Bharat te ngeit shano haba la tip ïa ka ri India kum ka ri kaba ïatylli wat hapdeng kiba bun ki jingïapher, hynrei ka jingleh donbor jong ka party BJP ka long shisha ka jingma ia baroh ki nongshong shnong kiba im hangne ha India bad ka jingsynshar paidbah kan don ha ka jingma kaba khraw.
title: Watla don tang 2 ngut ki MLA, hynrei rkhem mynsiem ki Congress Ribhoi na ka bynta ka elekshon MP

content: Shillong, Rymphang 29: Ha Meghalaya haduh kaba kut jong u snem 2023, ki la don haduh 2,566 ki case kiba ïadei bad ka jingshah lehbor ki khunlung ki khynnah ba la rejistar katkum ka POCSO Act 2012. Na kine, 1984 tylli ki case kidei ki dang sahkut ha ka jingbishar jong ki ïingbishar ha ki District bapher bapher. Ka jinglah ban pynkhuid ne rai pynrem ka long tang 22.68%. Kine ki jingkheiñ ki long katkum ka report ba la pyllait ha ka sngi Palei da ka Meghalaya State Commission for Protection of Child Rights (MSCPCR).Napdeng ki District kiba khlaiñ bha ka rai pynrem kadei ka  Ri Bhoi District ha kaba la don 50 ngut ki runar kiba shah rai pynrem. Kaba bud kadei ka West Khasi Hills District 31 ngut bad bud sa ka East Khasi Hills District 30 ngut kiba shah rai pynrem.Ka South Garo Hills bad South West Garo Hills kam don kino kino ki case ba shah rai pynrem imat na ka daw ba kam don Special Public Prosecutor (SPP) ki ban ïasaid ïa ki mukotduma. Ka South West Garo Hills District, wat lada ka don ka POCSO Court ba la sdang naduh u snem 2017 kam don satia kano kano ka case ba la rai pynrem.
title: Haduh 2566 ngut ki Khynnah ba shah leh bor ha Meghalaya

content: New Delhi, Lber 01: U synbud kapten jong ka kynhun lehkai hockey ka India-u Hardik Singh u la pynpaw ba ka kynhun ka khmihlynti ban ïada ïa ka Asian Champions Trophy namar kane ka long kaba kongsan ïa ka ban shah kynthup kum ka kynhun ba khlaiñbor ha ka pyrthei.Ka Asian Hockey Federation ha ka 28 tarik Rymphang ka la pynbna ba ka lympung Men’s Asian Champions Trophy 2024 kan long ha Hulunbuir City, Inner Mongolia, China naduh 8 tarik u Nailur haduh 17 tarik Nailur.Ki kynhun kiba la pynthikna ïalade ha kane ka lympung ki long ka China, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, bad ka lahduh ka ban ïada ïa ka burom-ka India.Haba ai jingkren ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhreh ïa kane ka lympung, na ka liang jong u Hardik u la ong: “Ka Asian Champions Trophy ka dei ka lympung kaba shongshit ha kaba ki kynhun ki ïakhun ban ïaknieh ïa ka trophy bad ruh ban kylla long ka kynhun ba tbit duh na dewbah Asia. Ka thong ka long ban poi sha ki kyrdan ba hakhmat ha ka pyrthei, bad kaba donkam ka long ban ïada ïa ka trophy bad ban nang pynskhem ïa ka kyrdan kaba ngi don kum ka lahduh jong ka dewbah Asia.”Kumban shu pynkynmaw, ka Indiaka la ïohrah ïa ka namlahduh ha ka Asian Champions Trophy 2023, kaba la long ha Chennai naduh 3-tarik Nailar haduh 12 tarik Nailar. Ki la wan hakhmat na ka Pool da 4 sien jop bad ïakhaid shi sien, ka jingïakhaid ka long pyrshah ïa ka Japan. ha ka semifinal, ka la ïakynduh pyrshah ïa ka Japan bad jop da 5-0.Ha ka final, ka India ka la shem ïalade hapdeng ka jingeh hadien ba shah lamkhmat da 3-1 haba kut ka kylla step, hynrei ka kol na u kapten ka kynhun-u Harmanpreet Singh, Gurjant Singh, bad na u Akashdeep Singh ka la pynthikna ïa ka India ban khur ïa ka namlahduh.
title: ‘Ka long kaba kongsan ïa ka ri ban ïada ïa ka Asian Trophy’- ong u Hardik Singh

content: K a jingnang jah ka riam tynrai bad tynneng ïa ka riam ka beit kiwei katba nang ïaid ki sngi bad ki por ka buh ïa ka jinglong tynrai ka jaidbynriew ha ka jingma namar lada long kumne kan sa poi ka por ba ngin ym nang shuh ban riam ïa ka riam tynrai lajong bad haba la klet ïa ka jinglong tynrai tang katta ka jaidbynriew ka la nang jah rngai.Ka jingduk kam dei tang ha ka liang ka spah ka phew hynrei ka dei ha ka liang ka akor ka burom kaba phalang ha ka riam tynrai la jong. Kiwei kiba nabar kim lah satia ban ithuh ïa ki samla khasi namar ba la i beit kum ki nongshong shnong jong ka Asia ba shathie (south asia) ha ka riam ka beit jong ki. Ki samla ki lah lehse ban sngew sarong bad kham sngew kyntnied ban ïoh riam pyrthuh nongwei, hynrei ka dak jong ka jinglong tynrai ka la nangjah rngai katba nangmih ki sngi. Shano keiñ kane kan ïalam, ñiuma ka Globalisation ne kata ka jinglong kawei ka pyrthei ka la treikam, hynrei ka jaidbynriew ka la nangtlot bad nangduk katba nangmih ki sngi. Lah ban ong ba mynta hi ym lah shuh ban ïohi ïa ka lawei ka jaidbynriew hapdeng ki samla lait noh tang ki longkmie ba la kham rangbah, wat na kine ruh la bun kiba ïatynneng nongwei lut.La jia aiu ïa ka akor ka burom kaba la ïaroh eh hapoh ka ri India bad ruh hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya. Hapdeng ki ri ka pyrthei la ithuh ïa ka India kum kawei na ki ri kaba don burom kumjuh ruh ka jylla Meghalaya bad khamtam ka jaidbynriew Khasi la tip kum ka jaidbynriew tip briew tip blei. Hynrei kane rynjaiñ mynta pat ka dap tang da ki kam leh jubor khamtam eh ïa ki kynthei, khynnah bad ruh ki longkmie kumjuh. Ka long kaba isaitmet ban ïohi ïa ka jingkiew stet jong kane ka kam sniew bad katkum ka National Crime Record Bureau (NCRB) ha India , la shem ba tang hapoh 60 minit 2 ngut ki kynthei ki shah leh beijot bad ka jingkiew ka long 7.2 % haba ïa nujor bad ki snem ba la leit noh.Kum shi bynta ban phai dien pat sha ka jingshah lehbeiñ jong ki kynthei la ïohi ba ha ki snem baladep kitei ki kam leh jubor ki la jyllei shisha haduh ba ki la pynsuhjer ïa ki kynthei. Ha ka jaidbynreiw Khasi ka jingshah lehbeiñ jong ki kynthei ka dei hi ka jingshah lehbeiñ jong ka jaidbynriew, namar ba ki kynthei la ñiew ïa ki ba ki dei ka burom ka ijot jong ka jaidbynriew.Ka la don ka jingïamir jingmut kaba jur bha jong ki kynthei bad wat ki riew aiñ hapoh ka ri halor jong kum kitei ki jingjia bad kumno ban wanrah ïa ki lad ki lynti ban teh lakam ïa ka. Haba ïanujor bad kiwei pat ki jingjia ha kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka ri ne ki jylla, ym lah ban len ka jylla Meghalaya kaba dang don tang shi troh ka jingbun briew ka la roi bha ha kine ki kam sniew. Kumta ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad pulit ka donkam bah thaw shisha ïa ki aiñ kiba kham khlaiñ na ka bynta ban ïada na ka jingshah thombor beiñ jong kiba lui lui. Hynrei ha ka juh ka por ka imlang sahlang ka dei pat ban long kaba peitngor. Ban tip khambha ïa ka jingroi palat jong kane ka kam ka long kaba donkam ban ïit bniah ne survey ïa kiei ki daw kiba la kha roi.Hooid ki kynthei ki sngewthuh eh ïa ka jinglong ba kyrpang bad ba laitluid jong ki ha ka imlang sahlang, hynrei lada ïit ïa ka tynrai tharai ki shynrang kin lah ban ai ïa ka jubab kaba kham paka kaei ka daw kaba la pynlong ban pynjia ïa ki kam leh jubor. Ym lah ban len hi ruh ba ka rukom im briew man briew ha kine ki sngi katba nangstad katta ka nang synjor bad ba ka akor ka burom ruh ka nanghiar. Katba nang pyrthuh bud ïa ki nongsepngi kumta ruh ki kam sniew ki nangroi kum sha ri sepngi. Ki bor kiba peit ïa ka aiñ kum ki pulit kiba donhok ban tohkit halor ki jingjia kin lah ban batai khambha ïa kaei ka daw kaba kito ki nongleh kam sniew ki shlur ne ki brai ban leh ïa ki kam pohjait. Hato ka dei ka riam ki kynthei kaba pynbrai, ka jingpeit phlim palat, ka jingpeit ïa ki kot khlem akor, ka jingkyrni dih drok, ka jingsynjor ka jinglongshynrang, ka jinglehkput ne kiwei pat ki daw.Kiba bun balang kiba sngewkhia ïa ka jingkynrei ki kam leh beijot ki la pynpaw ba ka riam jong ki samla kynthei ka dei kawei kaba i mutsniew (suspect) ba kadei kawei na ki jingkhang sha katei ka kam. Kiba riew spah ki riam bad kiew beit ha ki kali la jong ban leit ban wan. Kiba hapdeng ruh ki riam bad kiba duk eh ruh ki riam bad ki ïaid laitlan kum ki paidbah hi. Hynrei kaei kaba sngewsih ka long na kum kine ki jingmutsniew (suspect), kiba ngat pat ha ka apot ki dei kito kiba lui lui kiba ym don ki lad jingïada. Hooid sngewtynnad ban ïohi ïa ka jingïamir jingmut jong kito kiba la nang la stad halor katei ka phang, hynrei ka don ruh kaba donkam ban shim lang ïa ka jingai jingmut jong ki longkmie kiba ieit ïa ka burom ka akor Khasi la jong. Ha kaba kut ka riam khyllah than ym tang ba ka wanrah ïa ki soh pyut, hynrei ka wanrah ruh ïa ka jinglong duk jong ka jinglong tynrai ne ka Identity jong ka jaidbynriew.Dei namar kane ka daw, lah ban ong ba ka jinglong batynrai jong ka jaidbynriew khasi ym slem kan sa jahrngai na kane ka sla pyrthei lada kan ïai long ha kane ka dur kaba ki samla ha kane ka juk kim don mon shuh ban ri bad burom ïa ka lariti bad ka dur ka dar jong ka jaidbynriew lajong.
title: Ka jingtynneng ïa ka riam ka beit kiwei ka buh ïa ka jaidbynriew ha ka jingma

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 01: Ka ophis jong u District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat u la ai kane jingpynbna paidbah ba kan don ka jingai dawai polio ïa ki khynnah kiba hapoh 5 snem ha baroh kawei ka South West Khasi Hills District.Namarkata, na ka liang ka ophis ka la dep ruh ban pynbeit ïa ki tarik kata ban sdang naduh ka 4 tarik haduh 6 tarik u Lber, 2024. “Ha ka tarik ka jingai dawai polio kan dei ha shnong ha thaw ba la dep pynbeit lypa ha ki shnong ki thaw katba ha ka 5 bad 6 tarik ka dei ka jingleit rung ïing ïa ki bym ïoh ban ai ha u 4 tarik”.Kumta ki bor ba dei peit ia ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ki la khot bad wer ïa baroh ki kmie ki kpa kiba don ïa ki khunlung bad ki khun kiba dang hapoh 5 snem ka rta ba kin ai ka jingïasnohkti lang bad ka ophis da kaba wanrah ïa ki khun ha ki jaka ba la pynbeit ha ki shnong ki thaw na ka bynta ka jingai dawai Polio.Ka jingai jong ki paidbah ïa ka kti kamon kti kadiang kan pynlong ïa ka program kaba jop, la ong shuh shuh ki bor ba dei peit ka Koit ka Khiah khnang ban rat dyngkhong ia ka jingpang Polio.
title: Yn ai dawai polio ha South West Khasi Hills

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 29: Ka Khasi Students Union, Laban Circle ka la rai ban sa leit wad jingtip na ka tnat Election jong ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingïoh ïa ka Election Photo Identity Card (EPIC) da ki briew kiba sah be-aiñ ha Maxwellton Estate, ka jaka Sorkar kaba hap hapoh u pud treikam jong ka Kench’s Trace, Oxford, Rilbong (KOR).Kane ka jingthmu ban wad jingtip ka long hadien ba ka Seng ka la shna da ka ïing hapoh ka Maxwelton Estate ha ka step sngi Palei hadien ba la kut ka jingaipor khatsan sngi ïa ki bor synshar district ban kyndang ïa ki briew kiba sah be-aiñ ha kane ka jaka da kaba ri ïa ki masi bad pyntuid jakhlia sha ka wahduid kaba don marsyndah bad ka Estate.Kawei na ki banner ba la wah da ka KSU ha kane ing la thoh, “ka KSU kan ym ailad ïa ka Maxwelton Estate ban long ka Them Metor 2.0”.Ha ka por 7:00 baje mynstep, ki dkhot jong ka KSU Laban Circle bad ki nongïalam ka KSU Seng Kmie ki la rah ïa ki tum ki tam bad ïa ki tiar ki tar ban shna da ka ing tap shiliang ïa ki para Khasi ba kin sah ha Maxwelton Estate. Tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ladep shna ïa ka ïing, la plie paidbah da u General Secretary ka KSU u samla Donald V. Thabah bad hadien kane ki dkhot ka seng ki la bamja kiew iing ruh ha kane ka jaka.Katba ki dkhot ka KSU ki dang shna ïa ka ing, la wan poi u Magistrate bad ki Pulit kiba la tohkit halor ka jingshna jong ka seng ïa kane ka ïing ha kaba ka seng ka la pynphai nia ba ïa kane ka ing yn sa ai sha ki Khasi kiba kwah ban sah wai ha kane ka jaka.Tang ha ka por noh sngi, ka Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District Kong RM Kurbah ka la khot ïakren ïa ki nongïalam ka KSU, Laban Circle ban pynsngewthuh ba ka Maxwelton Estate ka dei kaba dang don hapdeng ka jingïaleh mukotduma bad kyntu ruh ban ym shim ïa kano kano ka sienjam kaba lah ban ktah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.U President ka KSU Laban Circle u Samla Reuben Najiar ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong katba nangmih ki sngi ki bar jylla kiba sah be-ain ha Maxwelton Estate ki la nang jyllei hynrei wat hadien ba ka Seng ka ujor sha ki bor sorkar ban kyndang hynrei ka Sorkar ka shu sngap jar.“Ka seng kam lah shuh ban shu ïai sngap kumne shi kumne ban ailad ïa kiwei ki jaidbynriew ban shna iing hangne bad kum ka jingpyrshah ka seng ka la shna shwa tang kawei ka ing ban ai sha ki Khasi namarba ki bar jylla kiba sah ha kane ka jaka ki shong ki sah khlem siew baiwai bad ki ïohei lut nadong shadong. Ki Khasi jong ngi, ki bun kiba sahwai, kiba wan pule bad kim don ïa ki jaka sah kiba biang bad ki bun kiba duk bad ki bym don ïa ki jaka sah. Ka seng ka phah kyrwoh sha kino kino ki samla pule ki bym don jaka sah, ka seng kan pynshna shwa ha Maxwelton Estate bad kumjuh ruh ïa kiwei ki nongshong shnong kiba kwah ban ri jingri kin sngewbha ban wan sha ka ophis jong ka seng ban pynshna katkum ki jingdonkam,” u la ong.“Lada ki bor synshar district kim leh ïa kaba donkam nangne shakhmat, manla ka taiew, manla u bnai nangne shakhmat ngin pyni ba lada kiwei ki lah ban sah be-ain hangne ngi ruh ngin hap leh be-ain ba ngi sah ha kane ka jaka jong ka Sorkar,” u la ong.Haba kynthoh ïa ka jingkren jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tynsong ba kane ka jaka ka dang don hapdeng ka jingïaleh mukotduma, u samla Najiar u la ong, “kam mut tangba ka dang don ka jingïaleh mukotduma ba kin shu aidaw ba ka dang don ka mukotduma hynrei kim lah ban peit pat mano ba wan bad mano ba sah.”“Na ka por sha ka por, ki kam awria, ki kam khaii drok, ki long ka jingma ïa ki nongshong shnong,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ka sorkar ka pynlut da ki klur tyngka ban wanrah ïa ki projek ban ïada ki tyllong um hynrei kan myntoi aiu ban pynlut pisa katba ïa kine ki briew kiba pyntuid jaboh sha wah ka Sorkar kam lah ban khang.”“Kane ka dei ka sienjam banyngkong bad lada ka Sorkar kam leh eiei wat lada poi haduh u pud ban mih madan ruh ngin hap ban mih,” u la ong.U la kam ruh ba ki don kiwei ki kynhun niam kiba bei pisa ïa ki briew kiba sah beain ha Maxwelton Estate. “Lada kita ki lah ban bei pisa jingïarap ban sah ha kane ka jaka, ngi ruh kum ka seng ngi lah ïarap ïa ki paradoh parasnam kiba duna ka ïoh ka kot ngin pynshna da ka ing ba kin wan sah hangne,” ong shuh shuh u samla Najiar.“Ngi la ïaid da ka lynti jong ka aiñ namarba ngi la ïoh ka jingjia ha Them Metor bad ngim kwah shuh ban ïaid da kawei ka rukom ïoh ba ka pynslem bad ka Sorkar kan sa ai jingïarap bad kin sa nang skhem shuh shuh. Ngim kwah ïa kata, bad ngi kwah ïa kine baroh ba kin mih katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.” la bynrap u samla Najiar.Haba kylli, u la ïathuh ba ki bar jylla kiba sah ha Maxwelton Estate kiba bun ki dei hi ki jaidbynriew Bihari, Nepali bad kiwei kiwei.“Lada ki bor synshar district ki pynpra ïa ka ing ba la shna da ka KSU, ka seng kan sa shim da ki sienjam ban pynpra ïa kiwei ki ing (kiba don ha Maxwelton Estate,” la ong u samla Najiar.Hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa ka DC, u samla Najiar u la ong namaba ka Maxwelton Estate ka hap hapoh ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) bad ka shah teh ha ki kyndon jong ka Municipal, namarkata, ym lah ban ri ïa ki jingri jingdub. Ka DC ka la bthah ïa ka SMB ban phah ïa ka notis bad lada kim ai jubab ka SMB kan hap ban leh da kaba tyngeh,” u la ong.Haba kylli, une u nongïalam ka KSU u la ong ba ka DC kam don jingkhein satia katno ngut ki briew kiba sah beain ha Maxwelton Estate bad kane kan buh jingman ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka KOR bad ïa ka nongbah Shillong.U la ong ruh ba ka DC ka la pyntip sha ka seng ba ka Revenue Department kan sa leh ïa ka jingsorjamin bad ban phah ïa ka kaiphod. “Namarkata, ka Union ha ki sngi ban sa wan kan sa phah shithi ban pynthikna ba ka jingleh sorjamin dei ban wad bniah mano ban la sah slem bad mano kiba shu wan buhai shnong dang shen,” ula ong.
title: Pynibor ka KSU ïa ka Sorkar Jylla da kaba shna ïing ha Maxwelton Estate

content: Nongpoh, Lber 01: Hadien bun tylli ki snem ka jingap khmih lynti ban ïoh noh ka iing Dorbar kaba paka, ka shnong Nongkhrah ha Ri-Bhoi mynta ka sngi kala ïoh ban plie paidbah noh syndon ïaka iing Dorbar ba paka naka bynta ban pyntyllun ïaki kam shnong kam thaw.Ïa katei ka ïing Dorbar la tei haka jinglut ba 10 lakh lyngba ka skhim SRWP haka por jong u Dr DD Lapang bad ka Grand In Aid naka tnad Urban lyngba ka Nongpoh Town Committee bala wan ban plie paidbah mynta ka sngi da u Bah Prestone Tynsong Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla haka jingdonlang u Raja Brahma ADC ka Ri-Bhoi, S Langstieh District Urban Officer, BB Makdoh Chairman Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong, Bah CB Syiem Adviser ka Nongpoh Town Committee, Bah Rayonald Kharkamni Secretary ka Nongpoh Town Committee bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah ryngkat ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka shnong Nongkhrah.Haba kren ha katei ka jingialang, naka liang ki nongïalam Shnong ki la ai ka jingkhublei kaba kyrpang ïaka sorkar kaba la sngap ïaka jingdonkam jong ka Shnong bad lyngba ka jing ïoh ban plie noh ïa kane ka ïing Dorbar kaba thymmai kan long ka jingkyrkhu ïaki nongshnong shnong ba kin dang lah ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïaki kam Shnong kam thaw.U Bah Prestone Tynsong haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw ba ka shnong Nongkhrah hadien bun tylli ki snem kala ïoh noh ïaka iing Dorbar kaba paka ban ïoh ban pyntyllun ïaki kam shnong kam thaw bad u la ong ruh kane ka jingïoh ban plie noh mynta ka sngi ïaka Ïing Dorbar ba thymmai ka long kum kawei na ki kam pynroi bad lyngba kane ka Ïing Dorbar ki nongïalam shnong kin ïoh ban saiñ dur ïaka shnong ka thaw.U Bah Prestone u pynpaw ruh ka jingïaroh ïaka sorkar jylla kaba la lam khmat da u Myntri Rangbah la Jylla u Conrad Sangma, ba dei lyngba ka jingstad bad ka jingshemphang jong ki Myntri kiba don haka sorkar la lah ban wan rah shibun ki kam pynroi hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei bad ka sorkar kan pynthikna ba baroh ki shnong kin ïoh ïaki kam pynroi.
title: Plie u Dy. CM ïa ka iingdorbar ka shnong Nongkhrah ban pynpoi ïa ki song pynroi sha ki shnong ki thaw

content: Jowai, Lber, 01: Ka Elaka Labang Nangphyllut ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka Cultural Program kaba shisngi ha ka shnong Lamarang kaba hap hapoh Block-1 haka 29 tarik Rymphang 2024 daka jingïatrei lang bad ka Labang Nangphyllut Pangam Raliang Area Committe (LNPRAC).Ha kane ka program la ïadon lang ruh u Pa’iem ka Hima Mylliem U Laborious Manik Syiem kum u kongsan bad ka Dr. Fenella Lyngdoh Nonglait kum ka symbud kongsan. U Bah, Benjamin Thabah u SP ba dei peit ïa ka kam Border, U Bah Army Lipon – President Synjuk Waheh Chnong Ri Jaiñtia, Bah , Aibor Shadap MDC – Barato Mukroh, Bah M.M Thaiang – Secretary Labang Nangphyllut Pagam Raliang Council Bah, Chandame Sungoh – Chairman Hynñiewtrep Border Disputed Redressal Forum (HBDRF) kum ki nong shah khot sngewbha lane ki invitees. U Acting Doloi ka Elaka Labang Nangphyllut, U Prolin Samaïang ki Waheh Chnong bapher bapher jong ka Elaka Labang Nangphyllut bad kiwei kiwei de ki riew pawkhmat jong ka thañ.Ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da U Bah Comingson Dkhar u Chairman jong ka LNPRAC, U paiem L.M. Syiem haka jingkren jong u kum u Kongsan u la ïathuh ïa ka tynrai jongka jait bynriew Hynñiewtrep ka jingriew-spah ka riti ka dustur, ka ktien ka thylliej bad ka jingdonkam ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka. U kular ruh ban ïakren bad ka sorkar Meghalaya ban wanrah biang ïa ka Block-1 sha Meghalaya.Ka Dr. Fenella Lyngdoh Nonglait ka ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki paid nongshong shnong jong ka ne ka thaiñ ba wat ha pdeng ki jingeh kiba bun ba ki ïajynduh ruh kim klet ïa ka riti ka dustur, ka ktien ka thylliej. Ka kular ruh kum ka nongsaid aiñ ba kan ïasaid ha Supreme Court na ka bynta ki jingeh jong ki paid nongshong shnong ka Labang Nangphyllut lada ka dei ban ïa said ha Court ruh. Ka ong ruh ba lada ka ïoh ticket te kan ïakhun beit ïa ka MP Election bad ka rung sha ka BJP na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ki pait nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya.U Bah B. Thabah kum u heh pulit u kular ban wanrah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ban ïatrei lang bad ki Dorbar Shnong na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ. U Bah A. Lipon u kular ban ïatrei lang bad ki Waheh Chnong na ka bynta ka hok bad ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki paid nongshong shnong jong ka Labang Nangphyllut.Ki nongkren baroh ki kyntu ïa ki paid nongshong shnong ka Elaka Labang Nangphyllut ba kin long kiba ïaineh ïaishah kiba shlur khang ba kin ïoh ïa ki hok jong ki, ba kane ka Elaka kan wan biang sha Meghalaya.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ïa ki jingshaad tynrai na ki paid nongshong shnong jong kane ka Elaka ka shad Pastieh na ka shnong Lamarang, ka shad pliang na ka shnong Lamarang, ka shad laho na ka shnong Kya- rabon. Ka shad ñiam Tre na ka shnong Madan Nangkylla ka phawar Laho na ka Raid Labang bad kiwei.
title: Pynim ka Elaka Labang Nongphyllut ïa ka lariti ha ka shnong Lamarang

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 01: Ka Bureau jong ka Indian Standards (BIS), Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution jong ka sorkar India ryngkat bad ka District Rural Development Agency (DRDA), South West Khasi Hills District lem bad ka ophis jong u Block Development Officer (BDO), Mawkyrwat C&RD Block ki la pynlong ïa ka prokram ban pynsngewthuh paidbah halor kumno ban tip bad ithuh ïa ki mar ki mata kiba thok bad kiba shisha naduh ki marbam mardih, ki tiar lait bad kiwei de.Ha kane ka sngi kiba la wan ban pynshai ki long da u Subham Sanu bad ka Barisha Jyoti Baishya kiba dei ki Standard Promotion Consultant ka BIS ha ka jingdonlang u bah K. Snaitang, District Program Manager (DPM) jong ka DRDA bad kiwei.Haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingpynshai paidbah, ka Barisha Jyoti Baishya kiba dei ki Standard Promotion Consultant ka BIS ka la ong ba kum kine ki jait prokram ki long kiba donkam bad kongsan ha kane ka juk kaba mynta ba bun na ki mar thok ki jur ha ki ïew ki hat ba ki paidbah ki donkam ban husiar bad ban tip ïa ki tiar kiba shisha bad kiba thok lyngba ki hallmark, ki license no. bad kiwei kiwei ba ki paidbah ki lah ruh ban peit lyngba ka BIS Care App ban pynthikna ïa ki mar kiba thok bad kiba shisha.Ka la ong ruh ba ka jingthmu jong katei ka prokram ka long ban ai jinghikai sha ki paidbah ba kim dei ban ngop ha ki mar thok, hynrei ki dei ban tip ïa ka hok jong ki bad ka jinglong thikna ki mar ki mata kiba ki thied bad bam man ka sngi ha kaba ki paidbah ki lah ruh ban ujor lada ki lap ïa ki mar ba suba sniew lyngba katei ka app ha ki mobile phone.Ïa katei ka prokram la pynlong ha Conference Hall jong ka ophis jong u Block Development Officer (BDO), Mawkyrwat C&RD ha kaba ki nongwan ïashimbynta ki long naduh ki nongïalam shnong na kylleng ki jaka jong ka Mawkyrwat C&RD Block.
title: Pynshai ka BIS ban ym ngop ha ki tiar ki tar ba shu thok

content: Nongpoh, Lber 01: Ki dkhot jong ka District Selection Committee, Ri-Bhoi District mynta ka sngi kila pynshai paidbah halor ka jingslem ban pynlait ïa ka Result DSC jong ki post bapher bapher wat hadien bala dep ban pynlong ïa ka eksam thungkam ha u snem 2021-22.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Bah WS Ryntathiang Vice Chairman ka DSC haka jingdonlang u Bah Pullstar Nongrum bad u Bah Marcus Lapasam kiba dei ki Member DSC u la ong ba ïa ka jingpynbna ne Advertisement halor ki post bapher bapher jong ka DSC la pynbna ha u snem 2020 hynrei namar ka jingwan lyngshop jong ka khlam Covid-19 la lah ban pynlong ïa ka eksam thungkam haduh u snem 2021 bad 2022 bad tang hadien ba ki samla thepkam kila dep ban thoh eksam ka la mih sa kawei ka Court Order bala bthah ba dep ban pyntreikam ïa ka Roster System.U la ong ruh ba hadien ka jingmih katei ka order la hap ban pynsangeh biang namar ka DSC kam don bor ban shna ïa ki Roster hynrei ki tnad sorkar ne line department kiba dei ban leh ïa katei ka kam bala bthah ruh ïa ki hadien bala dep pynlong da ka jingïakynduh (meeting) bad kumjuh ruh ki jinghikai (training) kumno ban pynkhreh lane ban shna ïa ka Roster, hynrei haduh mynta ym pat don kawei ruh ka tnad sorkar kaba la dep ban pynkhreh ïa ka Roster.U la ong ruh ba na ka liang ka DSC kam shym la shongthaid ha kaba ïadei bad ka result DSC bad ka la phah ruh da ki jingpynkynmaw la kumba 4 sien sha ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher hynrei haduh mynta ym pat ïoh pdiang wat tang kawei ruh kaba dei ka daw ka jingpynslem ban pynmih ïa ka Result DSC, bad lada ki tnad sorkar lane line department kila la dep ban pynkhreh pynkhrum bad ban pynbiang ïa ka Roster kam don jingeh ban pynmih kloi ïa ka Result, ha kaba u la kyntu ruh ïa ki tnad sorkar ba don kumba 24 tylli ba kin pynkhreh bad ban pynbiang noh ïa ka Roster khnang ba yn lah ban pynmih kloi ïa ka Result bad lada ki don kano kano ka jingleh ki lah ruh ban leit mih sha DSC na ka bynta ki jingïarap.Kum ban shu kdew hangne ba ki don haduh 108 ki post bapher bapher bala dep ban pynbna ha u snem 2020 bad ba ki samla kila dep ban thoh eksam ha u snem 2021-22, hynrei haduh mynta ym pat lah ban pynmih ïa ka Result na ka daw jong ka Roster System ha kaba na ka liang ki kynhun seng bhalang ba kynthup ïa ka Ri-Bhoi People’s Council bad ka MPSO kila rai ban ïakhih da ka ba shong kyllaiñ mungor haka 4 tarik ha Nongpoh ban dawa ba dei ban pynmih noh ïa ka result DSC ha Ri-Bhoi.
title: Dei bym pat phah ki tnad Sorkar ïa ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka Roster

content: Shillong, Lber, 01: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Laban Circle ka ai ïa ka jingkyrshan bapura ïa ka jingdawa jong ka KSU, Laban Circle ban kyndang mardor ïa ki briew kiba sah bad shong be-ain ha Maxwelton Estate.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka HYC ka pynrem jur ïa ki bor Sorkar kiba ïada dohïap dohim ïa ki nongwei kiba shongthap ha ki jaka jong ka Sorkar la ka long ïa kiba sah ha Them Metor ne ïa kine kiba sah ha Maxwelton Estate.Ka Seng ka maham ruh ïa ki bor Sorkar ba kim dei ban shim sting bad ap haduh ban pynkylla ïa kane ka jaka kum ka Them Metor 2.0 bad kut tang ha ka jingthung ïa ki “High Level Committee” ban pynbiej ïa u paidbah ki bym ai pat ïa uno uno u soh namar ki shu kut tang ha ka jingshong jingïalang bad ai khubor na kawei ka por sha kawei pat.“Kumba, lah kren da ki nongïalam ba hakhlieh jong ka seng ba ka Sorkar kam dei ban klet ba dang don shibun ki paradoh parasnam ki jong ngi ki bym don ïa ka jaka tang ban shna ïa shi nongrim ka iing bad lada ïa kiwei ka Sorkar ka lah ban ai mon ba kin shong kin sah ei ha ki jaka jong ka Sorkar. Ka seng kan shim ïa ki sienjam ban ïalam ïa ki paradoh parasnam ban buhai shnong bad shna ing ha ki jaka Sorkar kylleng ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep bad khamtam eh hangne ha Shillong,” la ong ka seng.“Ka seng ka kwah ruh ban kren da kaba shai sha baroh kiba peit khmat bha ïa ka jinglong jong ka jaidbynriew ka jong ngi ba ngi lah ban don ha ki lama ki bapher bapher hynrei ha kaba ïadei bad ki mat kiba ïa tyngkhuh bad kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew ne ki bor ba don jingthmu basniew ïa ka jaidbynriew ka jong ngi khamtam ki nongbuhai shnong be-aiñ, ngi long kawei ka jingmut bad ka jingthmu bad “kata ka long ban ïada bad pynneh pynsah ïa la ka jaidbynriew,” la bynrap ka HYC.
title: Kyrshan ka HYC ïa ka jingdawa ka KSU ban kyndang ïa kiba sah ha Maxwelton Estate

content: Nongpoh, Lber 01: Ka District Legal Service Authority (DLSA) Ri-Bhoi District, hapoh ka jinglam khmat ka National Legal Services Authority haka sngi palei ka la lah ban pynlong ïa ka prokram ai jinghikai sha ki paidbah halor ka jingdonkam ka pule ka puthi bad ka jingplielad ïa ki khynnah ba kim dei ban pep skul shiteng por haka shnong Umkei Ri-Bhoi District.Ha katei ka prokram la wan ruh ban shim bynta da ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Umkei bad la wan ruh ban mihkhmat da ka kong DMKS Shadap MJS, Secretary DLSA, Kong M Namsaw bad ka kong Q Mawphñiang kiba dei ki Legal Aid Counsel bad kiwei kiwei ki ophisar na ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher.Na ka liang ka kong DMKS Shadap haba kren ha katei ka sngi ka la pynshai ba ka jingthmu jong ka DLSA ban pynlong kum katei ka jait prokram ka long ai jinghikai sha ki paidbah ba kin tip ïa ka hok bad kino kino ki nongshong shnong kin nym shah ieh shadien la ka long da kano kano ka daw hynrei dei ban long salonsar kumjuh.Na ka liang ki nongkren ha katei ka sngi kila pynshai sha ki paidbah halor ka jingeh ba mad da ki khynnah bad ruh ka jingdonkam ban ïada bad ban ai ka hok haki bad ki skhim bapher bapher na ka bynta ki khynnah ba kim dei ban duh ïa ki jingpule bad ban pep skul shiteng por khamtam ka hok ba ki khynnah ki dei ban ïoh ka jingpule ei katkum ka Right to Free and compulsory education act 2009.
title: Ai jinghikai ka DLSA halor ka pule ka puthi bad ka jingpep skul shiteng por ki khynnah

content: Shillong, Lber 01 : U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi Thohdieng, ula leit bud dien bad ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka Sorkar Kmie uba khmih ïa ka koit ka khiah ban dawa ban pynlong noh ïa ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS) Shillong kum ka Medical Centre kaba kongsan tam ha baroh kawei ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi.U Conrad Sangma ula shim khia ban tynruh na ka sorkar pdeng ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïa ka NEIGRIHMS sha ka jaka pule kaba kongsan hapoh ka ri.Ha ka Shithi, kaba u Myntri Rangbah ula phah sha u Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah u Dr Mansukh Mandaviya ha ka 1 tarik u Lber, ula ban jur ba ka NEIGRIHMS ka la long ka jaka ai jingsumar kaba kongsan tam ïa ka jylla Meghalaya bad kaba ai jingkyrshan ruh ïa kiwei pat ki jylla kiba don marjan ha ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi.“Ka NEIGRIHMS ka don jingthmu ban pynïar, da kaba buh ïa ki jingmut jingpyrkhat ban pynïar ïa ka jingai jinghikai ïa ki samla pule ha ka Medicine, Nursing bad kiwei kiwei ki Course kiba ïadei bad ka koit ka khiah. Kane ka jingpynïar, ka ïaid ryngkat bad ka mishon ka jong ngi ban kyntiew ïa ki lad ha ka pule puthi ha Meghalaya. Ha kane ka khyllipmat kaba kongsan, ka sorkar Meghalaya ka ai ka jingtyrwa ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïa ka NEIGRIHMS sha ka jaka pule kaba kongsan tam. Kane ka sienjam ka ban shim, ka bat ïa ka jingkular ban wanrah ïa ka jingriewspah kaba ïar ha kane ka jaka pule ka ban long ka jingsngew sarong ïa ka jylla Meghalaya” ong u Myntri Rangbah.U Myntri Rangbah ula pynpaw ruh ba kane ka jaka ai jingsumar bad jaka ai jinghikai kan wanrah ïa ka jingkylla, ka ban ai jingmyntoi ïa ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya bad ïa ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi jong ka ri India.U Conrad ula pyni ruh ïa ka histori jong ka NEIGRIHMS kaba la tei hapoh jongka Meghalaya Registration of Society Act 1983 da ka Sorkar India ha u snem 1987 bad ka ïeng kum ka Autonomous Institute ha nongbah Shillong.
title: Leit bud dien u Myntri Rangbah sha Delhi halor ka jingkyntiew kyrdan ïa ka NEIGRIHMS

content: Shillong, Lber 01: Ka jingud jingnam ki nongkhaïi synsar ka la wan na kylleng kylleng ki jaka jong ka Ri Khasi Jaiñtia, namar ha ka por ba ki la dei ban die noh ïa u synsar ba ki la rep, jraiñ raiñ raiñ hiar ka dor bad kiba bun mynta ki la shu ïam kthang, namar kam mynroi shuh ban die, haba wat tang ka bai trei ruh kam mih shuh.Ki nongïalam jong ka Hill Farmers Union (HFU) ki la ïathuh ba ka daw jong ka jinghiar dor u synsar kadei namar ka jingbun palat u mar, ha kaba wat uba mynshem snem ruh um pat lut bad mynta ka snem ruh u bun bha.Na ka liang ki nongïalam ka Seng hynnin ka sngi ki la leit ban ïakynduh ïa ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, Myntri ka tnad kam rep ban ïakren ïa kane ka jingeh ba ki nongrep synsar ki ïakynduh.La ïathuh ba mynshem snem ka dor u synsar ka long haduh 150 shi kwintal, hynrei mynta tang 50 tyngka ruh um poi shuh.Ki nongrep na ki thaiñ Kynrud kaba long kawei na ki jaka ba ju rep synsar bad khamtam kadei ka jaka ba kham jngai, ki la ud la lynñuar namar kane ka jinghiar dor, ha kaba ki la ïathuh ba wat tang ka bai trei ruh ym mih shuh. Ban kit sha ki jaka ban die ruh um nud namar ba rem ka bai kali nalor la hiar lypa ka dor die. “Ngin phah skul shuh kumno ïa khun, haba ngi la shaniah beit na ka jingïoh die ïa u synsar na ka bynta ban pyndap ïa ka bai skul, bai kot, bai uniform bad kiwei kiwei de ki jinglut.Ki nongïalam ka HFU ki la ïathuh ba ka Myntri ka la pyntip ba kan sa lum ïa ka jingïalang bad ki nongkhaïi synsar ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai ban ïakren halor kane ka jinghiar dor khnang ban lah ban weng ïa jingeh jong kito kiba la ju im ja na kaba thung synsar.
title: Yn die synsar kumno tang bai trei ruh ym mih, 12 tarik yn lum ka Myntri ïa ki nongkhaïi

content: Shillong, Lber 01: : Ka Myntri ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ka sorkar jylla, Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la kyntu ïa ki kmie ki kpa ba kin pyndonkam hok ïa ka jaka sumar kaba la kyntiew kyrdan na ka Sawsymper Sub-Centre sha ka Primary Health Centre, na bynta ka jingkoit jingkhiah ki khun ki kti jong ki hi.Ïa kane ka myntri ka la kren ha ka jingïalang buh mawnongrim ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïa kane ka sub centre sha ka Sawsymper PHC kaba long ha kane ka sngi Ba-ar ha Sawsymper.Ha kane ka sngi la donlang ruh naduh u MLA ka Mawsynram MLA, Bah Ollan Singh Suin, DHS (MI) Dr R Lyngdoh, DMHO East Khasi Hills District Dr S.A Lyngdoh nalor ki ophisar bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Myntri ka la kular ruh ha ki paidbah ba ka sorkar kan kyrshan na bynta ki jingdonkam la ka long naduh ki nongtrei, ki tiar ki tar bad ka jaka sah na bynta ki doktor bad ki nongtrei.“Ka sorkar ka don ka thong ban pynbiang ïa ki jaka sumar kiba paka na bynta ki nongshong shnong khnang ba kin ïoh ïa ka jingkoit jingkhiah kaba biang. Ka PHC kadei ruh ka sakhi ban pynshisha ïa ka jingai ka jingshakri kaba bha tam sha ki nongshong shnong la ka long ha sor haduh nongkyndong,” ka la long.Ha kajuh ka por ka la ai khublei ruh ïa baroh kiba donkti ha kaban pynurlong ïa katei ka jaka sumar kaban pynmyntoi ïa ka Sawsymper bad ki jaka ba marjan.Ka Myntri ka la kyntu ruh ïa ki nongïalam shnong ba kin trei ryngkat ryngkat bad ka tnad bad ong ba ka tnad ruh ka don ka jingkhmih lynti ba kin treilang la ka long naduh ka jingsoi bad ka jingaiti ïa ka jaka.
title: Wer ka Myntri ïa ki longkmie ban pyndonkam ïa ka jaka sumar thymmai ban myntoi ki khun

content: Shillong, Lber, 01: Ka Central Bureau of Communication (CBC), Tnat Information and Broadcasting, Sorkar India, Regional Office, (MT Region), Shillong ka la pynlong ïa ka Photo Exhibition & ka jingai jingtip kaba ar sngi halor ki nongïakhun jinglaitluid jong ka thain shatei lammihngi bad ka bam kaba tei ha Ramakrishna Mission Higher Secondary School, Mylliem.Ha kane ka exhibition la pyni ïa ka jingïakhun jinglaitluid jong ka India lyngba ka jingpyni ïa ki dur. Ka jingai jingtip ka thmu ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka bam kaba tei bad pyni ïa ki sienjam jong ka sorkar ban ïakhun ïa ka jingduna ka bam kaba tei da kaba kyntiew ïa ki rukom bam kiba tei.Ka DHEO, East Khasi Hills, Kong O Summer ha ka jingai jingkren jong ka, ka la batai sani shaphang ka bam tynrai na ka bynta ka jingtei ïa ka met, ka jingsan ka jabieng bad ka jingïakhun ïa ka jingduna snam (anaemia). Ka la ban jur halor ka jingkyntiew ïa ki jingtei met bad ka jingbam ïa ka bam kaba bha. Ka la ban jur ruh halor ka jingïadei jong ka bam bad ki jingpang bapher bapher bad ka rukom bam kaba dei. Ka la pynkut ïa ka jingkren jong ka da kaba pynshlur ïa ki khynnah pule ban dih shisien shi taiew ïa u dawai Folic Acid bad ïa u dawai Albendazole arsien ha ka shi snem khnang ban pynduh jait ïa ka jing duna snam.Ka Kong Icydora Nongrum, Principal jong ka skul ka la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh jong ka ïa ka CBC, Shillong kaba la pynlong ïa ka exhibition bad ka ong ba kane kan ïarap ban ai jinghikai ïa ki briew, bad khamtam ki khynnah pule, shaphang ka jinglenlade kaba khraw jong ki Nongïakhun jinglaitluid na ka bynta ka ri. Ka la ong shuh shuh ba lyngba ki dur ba la buh ha kane ka exhibition ki khynnah pule ki ïoh jingtip shaphang ki riewshlur ki bym shym la paw pyrthei jong ka thain shatei lammihngi kiba la nohsynniang sha ka jinglaitluid jong ka ri. Haba kren shaphang ka bam kaba tei, ka la kyntu ïa baroh ki khynnah pule ban pynneh ïa ka rukom bam kaba ryntih bad ban pynthikna ba ki bam kumba 5 jait ki bam ha ka shi sngi ba kynthup ïa ka carbohydrate, ki protein, ki shana dai, ki jingbam ba shna na ka dud, ki jhur jyrngam.La pynlong ïa ki jingïakop bapher bapher hapdeng ki khynnah pule jong ka skul ha kane ka prokram kaba ar sngi. La sakhi ruh ïa ka jingïashim bynta shitrhem ha ka jingïakop rwai, quiz, bad ka jingdro dur. La sam ïa ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka jingïalang pynkut ba la pynlong mynta ka sngi.
title: Lyngba ki dur pyntip paidbah ka CBC Shillong ïa ki nongïaleh laitluid ka North East

content: Shillong, Lber 1 : U Chief Information Commissioner (CIC) jongka jylla u bah H.Nongpluh u la ïathuh ba ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Right to Information (RTI) ha ka jylla Meghalaya ka biang palat namar ka don ki First Appellate Authority (FAA) bad Public Information Officials (PIO) kiba tbit.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi hadien ka jingïalang halor ka RTI Act Programme, u bah Nongpluh u la ïathuh ba kham niar ba ka Commission kan ïoh ïa kino kino ki jingujor ne case namar la dep pynbeit bad pynkhuid ïa ki case ha ki kyrdan jong ki PIO bad FAA.“ Kumta nga lah ban ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka RTI ha ka jylla Meghalaya ka long kaba biang namar kat haduh mynta kham niar ba ki case kin poi shaduh ka Commission namar la pyndep ne pynkhuid beit ïa ki ha ki kyrdan jong ki FAA bad PIO bad kane ka pynpaw ba ki pyndep hok ïa la ka jongka kamram ba la bynshet ha ki” ong u bah Nongpluh.U bah Nongpluh u la ong ba ka RTI ka dei ka aiñ kaba la pyntreikam ha u 2005 kaba la pynkup bor ïa ki paidbah ban wad ïa ki jingshisha bad lyngba kane ka aiñ kiei kiei ki paw shai kdar lut namar ki paidbah ruh ki ïoh jingtip bniah beit halor kino kino ki kam ba ki wad jingtip lyngba ka RTI.U la ïathuh ba ka Section 4 ka dei ka kyndon kaba aibor ïa ki tnad sorkar ba kin ai ka jingpynshai halor kino kino ki kam bad dang shen ka ïing bishar Supreme Court ka la pynmih ka hukum ba baroh ki tnad sorkar ki dei ban ai jingtip shai kdar hi sha ki paidbah.Ha kawei pat ka bynta u bah Nongpluh u la ong ba tang kawei kaba sngewkhia jur ka long ba kane ka aiñ ka khlem kren ei ei pyrshah ïa ki briew kiba pyndik ne pynshitom ïa ki ophisar.U la ong ba kam don ei ei ha kane ka aiñ kaba kren shaphang ka jingshah nion ne shah thombor ki ophisar bad dang shen ha ka conference jongki CIC la ïakren halor kane ka mat bad la rai ruh ba ym dei da lei lei ruh ban ailad ïa kiba kum kita kin jia.“ Dang shen ha Gujarat nga tharai ki don haduh palat 1000 tylli ki aplikeshon kiba la shah kyntait namar ki tip shai ba ïa uta u briew la nion beit kylleng kylleng bad don ruh kiba shim kabu ban ïoh pisa na kane ka aiñ. Nga tharai ki Commissioner ki dei ban kynmaw bha ïa kane bad kumjuh ruh wat ki PIO bd FAA ruh. Wat la kam pat don kano kano ka kyndon hynrei ngi la ïa mynjur lang ba baroh ki ophisar kim dei ban shah nion khamtam da kata ka jingthmu ban pyndonkam bakla ïa ka aiñ” pynkut u bah Nongpluh.
title: Biang palat ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka RTI ha Meghalaya : CIC

content: Nongpoh, Lber 01: Ha kawei ka jingjia aksiden uwei u nongñiah jong kawei ka trok u la khlad noh hashen hadien ba u la leit tynrah nadien ka trok ha surokbah National Highway ha Mawdiangum.Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha ka por 4:15 baje eiei mynstep ha kaba kawei ka trok kaba la ñiah sted bha kaba don ïa u number AS 01 RC 1762 ka la leit ban tynrah beit nadien jong kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u number ML 11 A 1440 haduh ba u nongñiah jong ka trok kaba don ïa u Number AS 01 RC 1762 ba la tip kyrteng kum u Joynal Abdin Laskar na Assam u la sahkut shipor hapoh ka trok.Wat pynher sted ne overtake, bthah ka Balang Laitryngew ïa kiba wan SynodSohra, Lber 01: Ka Balang Presbyterian Laitryngew, Sohra Presbytery, kan pdiang ïa ka jingïaseng KJP Synod Sepngi naduh ka 7 haduh ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai.Na ka bynta kane ka jingïaseng kaba shisien shisnem jong ka Synod Sepngi, ka Balang lyngba u Chairman u T.Bn KS Marbañiang bad u Secretary, u T.Bn MK Rymmai, phah ïa kane ka kyrwoh ka ban long kum ka jingbthah na ka bynta ki Dkhot, ki Delegate bad ki riewngeit ki ban wan sha kane ka jingïaseng.Ka Balang ka ong ba, Ka shnong Laitryngew ka don ha ka lynti Shillong-Sohra bad ka jngai tang 43 kilometers na Shillong. Nangta ka ong ruh ba ka shnong Laitryngew ka long ka shnong kaba khriat. Kumta la kyrpad ïa ki Dkhot bad ki Delegate ba kin sngewbha ban wanrah ïa la ki jong ki jaiñkup thiah.Kiwei pat ki jingbthah ki long, ba namar ba ka surok Shillong-Sohra ka long tang kawei, la kypad ïa ki nongñiah kali ba kin sngewbha ban pynkohnguh ïa ka jingpynbeit jong ki Traffic Police bad ki Volunteer. Ka kyrpad ia baroh ba kin ym pynïeng kali harud shilynter ka surok na Umtyngngar sha Laitryngew khnang ban lait na ka jingdheng kali.Na ka bynta ka jingshngaiñ ha ka leit ka wan bad ban lait na ka jingdheng kali, la kyrpad ïa ki ñongñiah kali baroh ban ym ïa pynher stet ïa ki kali, ban nym Overtake bad ban ym kit tam palat (Overload).Ki nongñiah kali, lada long kaba lah, kin sngewbha ban tah ia ki mobile number jong ki ha ki kali jong ki khnang ban pynsuk ïa ki volunteer.Ki jaka pynieng kali ki don sawdong jong ka madan ba pynlong jingiaseng bad ki long kiba heh bad kiba kylluid. Kumta phim dei ban don kano kano ka jingkhuslai ha kaban ioh ia ki jaka pynieng kali.Ki kali kiba poi hapoh ka 10:00 AM ha ka Sngi U Trai, kin rung beit lyngba ka shnong sha ki jaka parking kiba don ha ka lynti ban leit sha Mawdohnud (Laitmawsiang).Namar kiba bun ki jaka kiba heh phlang, ki nongwan jingïaseng kin sngewbha ban leh sumar ban ym bret pathar ïa ki kyndok, biri/sikret, khnang ban lait na kano kano ka jingpluh ding.Ki nongwan jingïaseng kin sngewbha ban ym bret pathar ïa ki kot, ki plastic, ki foil song ja bad kiwei kiwei ha shilynter ka surok bad kumjuh ha ki jaka parking bad jaka shong jingïaseng; hynrei ban sumar khuid ia ki sawdong sawkun baroh.Ki nongwan jingïaseng kin sngewbha ban wanrah bad la ki jingsiang shong na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki hi.Ki bor Pulit jong ka Nongpoh Traffic, mar mar ki la leit sha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ban sei ïa u nongñiah napoh ka trok bad pynkit mar mar sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh hynrei namar ka jingshitom kaba jur u la khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.
title: ïap hashen u nongñiah ha ka jingjia aksiden ha Mawdiangum

content: Nongpoh, Lber 01: U Bah Prestone Tynsong Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la ong ba u surok Nongpoh Umden Sonapur u dei ka surok ba donkam eh jong ki phew tylli ki shnong haka thaiñ Umden u dei kaba pynduh thiah pynduh dem ïa u ba haduh mynta u tei ka surok ka dang don hapdeng ka jingïakhun ban siang rong noh ïaka ban pynsuk ïaka leit ka wan ki paidbah bad ïakitei ki ktien u Bah Prestone u la kren haka jingïalang plie mawnongrim ban siang surok haka shnong Umsaw Nongbri ban rakhe ïaka Golden jubilee jong ka pastorate.“Ngi kwah ba kawei pa kawei ka shnong kan poi surok bad ban pynïasoh sha kiwei kiwei ki shnong bad ka sorkar ka don ïaka thong ba ki paidbah kim donkam shuh ban ïaid kjat, hynrei baroh ki surok kin long kiba long ban ïaid kali” la ong u Bah Prestone da kaba bynrap ruh ba ka sorkar dang haka dorbar mang tyngka kaba dang shu dep kala buh thong ïaka tnad pule puthi hakhmat eh bud pat sa ka tnad PWD bad ka tnad ka koit ka khiah.Ha kaba ïadei bad u surok Nongpoh Umden Sonapur u bah Prestone u la kular ba shen ïa u surok NUS yn siang rong noh katkum ka Standard National Highway bala mang pisa shuwa kumba 25 klur haka wat ba nyngkong (First Phase) lyngba ka Ministry of DoNER bad kaba dang sah yn mang pisa lyngba ka World Bank.
title: Pynduh thiah ka surok Nongpoh-Umden Sonapur ïa nga, yn mang pisa 25 klur: DyCM

content: Delhi, Lber, 01: Da kaba peit ïa ki jingjia jong ki jinghiar ki jingai jingkren ha ki kam sain pyrthei ha ki elekshon ba dang shu long, ka Election Commission of India ka la bthah ïa baroh ki kynhun sain pyrthei ba kin bat ïa ka burom bad ban long kiba husiar ha ki jingai jingkren paidbah bad ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka jingai jingkren ha ki kam sain pyrthei katkum ‘ki mat’.Ka Commission ka la batai ruh ïa ki nongai jingkren bad ki kyrtong shaphang ki nuksa ba mynshuwa ïa kum kine ki jingpynkhein da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki rukom treikam ban kiar na ki kyndon MCC. Ka ECI kan peit ïa kano kano ka jingpynkhein ïa ka MCC katkum ka jingai jingmut kaba ryntih lang ïa baroh ban peit biang ïa ki jingai jingpyntip ban pyllait ha kaba ïadei bad ka por bad ki kam ha kane ka elekshon ban wan. Na ka bynta ka elekshon sha ka iing dorbar thawain Lok Sabha bad ka elekshon sha saw tylli ki Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain ha ki Jylla, baroh ki bynta bad ki jaka jong ki elekshon kin long ka nongrim ban peit ïa ki jingpynkhein.Da kaba pdiang ïa ka jingdonkam ban don ka jingryntih ha ka jinglaitluid ha ki jingkren bad ka jingryntih ha ka jingïaleh, ka jingai jingmut ka la ong ba ka Commission ka la shim ïa ka rukom treikam kaba jai jai naduh ki elekshon ba la dep, da kaba khmih lynti ba ka jingai jingmut jong ka kan wanrah ïa ka jingbahkhleih da ki kyrtong bad ki nongai jingkren. Ïa ki hukum ba la ai da ka Commission la saindur da ka jingpeit bniah ban pynthikna ba ym don ka jingktah kaba jur ïa ki kam khring nongthep vote ban ïa kaba tehlakam. Hynrei, ka jingthmu ban peit ïa ka jingai jingkren, da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki jingai jingtip MCC ha ka rukom kaba ryntih, kam dei ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngewthuh bakla ha kaba la leh biang kumjuh ha ki por ban wan. Shuh shuh, ka jingai jingmut ka la pdiang ïa ka jingkylla ha ki kam information technology bad ki rynsan social media kiba la wanrah ïa ka jingbym shai hapdeng ka por shuwa ka MCC bad ki 48 kynta ba dei ban ym ai jingkren, kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingpynsaphriang ïa ki jingkyntu ïa ki nongthep vote ha ki por bapher bapher.Ka jingai jingmut ïa ki kynhun sain pyrthei, ki kyrtong bad ki nongai jingkrenYm dei ban ai jingkyntu ha ka nongrim jong ka caste/ ki jingsngew pher jait bynriew jong ki nongthep vote. Ym dei ban pyrshang ïa kano kano ka kam kaba pynheh ïa kano kano ka jingïapher lane kaba wanrah ïa ka jingisih hapdeng ki briew lane kaba wanrah ïa ka jingïathut hapdeng ki caste/jait bynriew/ki kynhun katkum ka jingngeit/ ka ktien ka thylliej.Ki kynhun sain pyrthei bad ki nongïalam kim dei ban ai jingkren ba ïalam bakla ïa ki briew khlem da don ka nongrim ha ki jingkren jong ki. Ka jingkren pyrshah ïa kiwei kiwei ki seng sain pyrthei ne ki nongtrei jong ki kiba don nongrim ha ki jingkynnoh bym don nongrim ki dei ki ba hap ban kiar.Ym dei ban bein ïa kano kano ka bynta jong ka jingim shimet, ka bym don jingïadei bad ki kam paidbah, jong ki nongïalam ne ki nongtrei jong kiwei kiwei ki seng sain pyrthei. Ym dei ban kren ha ka rukom ban pynduh burom ïa kiba ïakhun pyrshah.Ym dei ban pyndonkam ïa kino kino ki jaka mane Blei ban ai jingkren shaphang ki kam jied nongmihkhmat. Ym dei ban don ki jingkren kiba bein ïa ka jingïadei jong ki nongmane bad ki Blei bad ym dei ban mana shaphang ka jingpynshitom ha ki Blei.Ki seng sain pyrthei bad ki kyrtong kin kiar na ki kam bad ki jingkren kiba ktah ïa ka burom jong ki longkmie.Ym dei ban pyllait ïa ki jingpynbna ba ïalam bakla ha ki media.Ym dei ban ai jingpynbna ha ka rukom jong ka khubor.Ym dei ban post lane pynsaphriang ïa ki social media post kiba bein ïa kito kiba ïaleh pyrshah lane ki post ki bym ïahap.Ka Commission ka la kyntu ruh ïa baroh ki seng sain pyrthei, ki nongïalam bad ki kyrtong ba kin bat ïa ka Model Code of Conduct bad ki bynta jong ka ain. La ban jur bha ba kano kano ka kam kaba pynkhein ïa ka MCC lane kaba pynhiar ïa ka kam khring nongthep vote kan long kaba shah pynshitom da ka Commission.Katto katne ki rukom pynkhein ïa ka MCC ba la ïohi ha ki elekshon ba la dep ki long kumne harumKa jingpyndonkam ïa ki ktien ki bym ïahap pyrshah ïa ki nongai jingkren jong kiwei kiwei ki seng sain pyrtheiKi jingkynnoh kiba bakla, ki bym lah ban batai shai, ki bym lah ban pynskhem, kiba bakla,Ki jingkren ar jingmut kiba ong ba yn don ka jingpynshitom na ki Blei / jingpynksan ïalade,Ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki social media post kiba bein ïa kiweiKa jingpyni ïa ki social media post ha ka rukom bym ïahap bad ka jingshisha da kaba thmu ban pynsaphriang ïa ka jingïalam bakla ne ka jingai ïa ka jingtip kaba bakla.Ki jingpynbna kiba ïalam bakla bad kiba mih ha ka rukom jong ki khubor kiba pynthut ïa ka jingryntih ha ki sngi shwa ban thep voteKa jingkren pyrshah shimet ïa ki nongïaleh pyrshah bad ka jingkren bein ïa ki kyrtong jong kiwei kiwei ki seng sain pyrtheiKa jingai jingtip ki Sorkar Jylla shaphang ki skhim jong ki ha ki jylla ba marjan ha kaba yn long elekshon ha ka por kaba biang bhaKi jingpyrshang ban khring ïa ki nongthep vote da kaba khot ïa ka jingkyntiew kyrteng ban ai ïa ki jingkular hapoh ki skhim ki bym don kaba long kum ka jingai bai sha ïa ki nongjied nongmihkhmat lyngba ki jingkular ki ba shu thokKa jingpyndonkam ïa ka kyrteng jong u kyrtong ban ai jingkren pyrshah ïa kano kano ka kynhun jong ki nongjied nongmihkhmatKi nongïalam jong ki seng sain pyrthei kiba la ithuh kum ki ‘nongai jingkren ba pawnam’ hapoh ka Section 77 jong ka Representation of the People Act, 1951, ki ju ai jingkren ha ki jingïalang ba heh. Ka long kaba donkam bha ban peit ïa kane namar ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) bad ki kyndon hapoh ka Ain ki ïahap iwei ïa iwei. Kumta, katba ka don ka jingïoh ïa ki bynta ba la wanrah hapoh ka Section 77, ki nongai jingkren ba pawnam ki don ruh ka jingbahkhlieh ban bat ïa ka burom ha ka por ba ki ai jingkren ha ki jingïalang.
title: Mana ka ECI ïa ki seng saiñpyrthei ban burom ïa kiwei haba kren ha ki rynsan ïalap elekshon

content: Shillong, Lber, 01: Ka Shillong All Faiths Forum (SAFF) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la iakynduh kyrpang ha Archbishop’s House Laitumkhrah, Shillong ban iathir iatai hadien ba la mih ka jingkynnoh ba ka don ka jingbyrngem jong ki shitniam na ka Jylla Assam ban pynpra ia ki dur niam bad ia ki stashu ba la buh ha ki jaka pule ba la pyniaid da ki Balang Khristan ha ki shnong khapppud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Jylla Assam ha ine ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep.Kane ka kynhun ka la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ïa ka Sorkar Assam ban shimkhia mardor halor kine ki jingjia kiba pyniaphiah bad kiba wanrah ïa ka jingiasih jaidbynriew ha ka kyrteng jong ka niam.Ha ka sngi Palei ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) Umden Area ba kynthup ïa ka RBYDSO, RBYF, HYC, HITO, AMKA bad ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Marmaiñ Area ki la ujor sha u Deputy Commissioner ka Ribhoi District u Arpit Upadhyay halor ka jingbyrngem ban wah ne buh ïa ka dur Jisu ne kino kino ki dur kiba pynpaw ïa ka ñiam khristan ha Sacred Heart Secondary School, Marmaiñ, Ribhoi District kaba don ha hajan khappud ka Assam bad kumjuh ruh ki skul mishon ha kane ka thaiñ.U President ka Forum u Most Revd. Dr. Purely Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang u la iathuh ong, “ngi la iakren bad ngi la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka saiñpyrthei kaba jia ha Assam, ha Meghalaya bad ha ka ri India baroh kawei. Ka ri India ka dei ka ri kaba kdup ia kiba bun ki jaitbynriew bad ki jait niam hynrei ha kine ki sngi, ka lyer jong ka jingkylla ki wan ki la mih na ki jingkren, na ki kam kiba ki leh ki bym itynnat shuh, kiba sngewsih bad kiba pyniapait iapra ia ki briew bad kane ka la wanrah ia kaei kaei ka bym itynnat shuh ha ka ri India jong ngi.”“Ngi sngewsarong ia ka ri ba ka la nang kiew ha ki kam pynroi bapher bapher hynrei ha kawei ka liang ka jingiadei jong ki parabriew ki khate, ki pynhiardor noh ha ka ri India. Ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka dei ka thaiñ kaba ki hynñiew tylli ki jylla ki im hapdeng ka jingsuk jingsaiñ hapdeng ka jingsuk bad ka jingialong kawei. Hynrei mynta ngam lah ban ong ba ka la jan ka elekshon ne ba la wan ka lyer na kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka ri India ne ba ka elekshon ka la jan ki mih ki kynhun ki bym kren buhrieh hynrei kiba pynpaw beit ia kiei ki jingdawa, ki jingthmu jong ki lyngba ka niam,” ong u President ka SAFF.“Kane ka long kaba sngewsih ka bym ju don ha ka jylla jong ngi hynrei mynta ngi ïohi ba ki la sdang ban wan kine ki jingkren ki jingdawa. Ka kynhun jong ngi ki nongialam niam bapher bapher ka SAFF ba kum ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla Meghalaya ngi dei ban long kiba jaijai, ngi dei ban long kiba jynsur ka jingmut jingpyrkhat, ngim dei ban long kiba shongshit khlehbiej,” u la bynrap.Haba kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin long kiba husiar, u la ong, “ngi dei ban long kiba husiar. Ki khubor ki bym shisha kiba ngi ïohsngew nangne nangtai ngi dei ban long kiba husiar bad kiba peitngor bad ngin ialeh shitom katba ngi lah ba ngin ia im lang ha kane ka jylla. Ngi dei ban shim ia ki sienjam ba ngin pynsah ia ka jingsuk, ka jingsngewthuh jingmut bad ka jingialong kawei hapoh ka Meghalaya.”
title: Ka elekshon ka la jan ki mih ki kynhun kiba kren ïa ki jingthmu lyngba ka niam: SAFF

content: Shillong, Lber 01: Wat lada u Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad Sangma daang shen, ju la ong ka jingthungkam Chairman ka sorkar kam da ktah than namar ka lut tang 12 lak shi bnai, hynrei ki kot ki sla kiba la ioh pat ki pynpaw da kumwei pat.Ka list ki Chairman, ki Co Chairman, ki Deputy Chairman, ki Vice Chairman, ki Director, ki Adviser ka pynpaw ba ki don palat 175 ngut baroh. Kine ki kynthup ia 27 ngut ki Chairman, 43 ngut ki Co Chairman, 53 ngut ki Vice Chairman, 20 ngut ki Deputy Chairman,10 ngut ki Adviser bad 14 ngut ki Director.Na ka bynta ka jingsiew sha ki, ka sorkar ka la phiah ha kis an tylli ki kyrdan ne ki Category. Kine ki long ki A+, kiba kynthup ïa ki Adviser bad ki Sitting MLA, nangta A kiba kynthup ïa ki Ex- MLA bad Sitting MDC bad ki B bad C Category ba ka aiti ha u Myntri Rangbah ban peit bad pynhap ïano.Katkum ki kot ki sla kiba la ïoh, la pynpaw ba ki A+ Category ki ioh ka jingsiew kumne, Ka Honororium ki ïoh 20 hajar shi bnai, ka bai umphniang 250 litar shi bnai, ka bai mobil 4 litar shi bnai, ka bai wai kali 15 hajar shi bnai, ka TA/DA 20 hajar shi bnai, bai wai ïing 20 hajar shi bnai, bai ding elektrik 5 hajar shi bnai, bai shan 8500 shi bnai. Nangta ki ïoh ruh ban buh uwei u draibar bad 3 ngut ki nongtrei Grade IV. Nalorkata ki ïoh bai moramot ïing 2 lak tyngka shisien ai, bai shuki bai miej 40 hajar shi snem, bai kot khubor lai tylli bad ar tylli ki Magazine. Nalor kane ruh lada ki pang ki shitom ne kiba haïing hasem jong ki, ki ïoh jingsumar ei ne ka reimbursement hadien ba la mynjur na ka DHS. Lada shu kheiñ antad ka jingïoh ki Politician kiba hap ha ka A+ kan nym duna ïa ka 1.60 lak shi bnai, khlem pat kheiñ ïa ka bai sumar, bai moramot ïing bad bai shuki bai miej.Kiba hap ha ka Category A pat ki ïoh ka Honororium ki ïoh 15 hajar shi bnai, ka bai umphniang 150 litar shi bnai, ka bai mobil 3 litar shi bnai, ka bai wai kali 12 hajar shi bnai, ka TA/DA 8 hajar shi bnai, bai wai ïing 8 hajar shi bnai, bai ding elektrik 1000 shi bnai, bai sha 2000 shi bnai. Nangta ki ïoh ruh ban buh uwei u draibar bad uwei u nongtrei Grade IV. Kine kim ïoh bai moramot ïing ne bai shuki. Bai kot khubor pat ki ïoh artylli bad Magazine kawei. Nalor kane ruh lada ki pang ki shitom ki ïoh jingsumar ei ne ka reimbursement hadien ba la mynjur na ka DHS. Ka jingsiew ïa kine ruh kan poi la kumno kumno jan shi lak marwei.Kiba hap ha ka B+ Category ki ïoh ka Honororium ki ïoh 10 hajar shi bnai, ka bai umphniang 100 litar shi bnai, ka bai mobil 2 litar shi bnai, ka bai wai kali 10 hajar shi bnai, ka TA/DA 7 hajar shi bnai, bai wai ïing 8 hajar shi bnai, bai ding elektrik 1000 shi bnai, bai sha 1000 shi bnai. Nangta ki ïoh ruh ban buh uwei u nongtrei Grade IV. Kine kim ïoh bai moramot ïing ne bai shuki. Bai kot khubor pat ki ïoh artylli. Nalor kane ruh lada ki pang ki shitom ki ïoh jingsumar ei ne ka reimbursement hadien ba la mynjur na ka DHS. Ka jingsiew ïa kine ruh kan poi la kumno kumno palat 50 hajar marwei ha ka shi bnai.Kiba hap ha ka B Category ki ïoh ka Honororium ki ïoh 10 hajar shi bnai, ka bai umphniang 50 litar shi bnai, ka bai mobil 1litar shi bnai, ka bai wai kali 10 hajar shi bnai. Kine kim ïoh TA/DA ne bai wai ïing. Hynrei ki ïoh uwei u nongtrei Grade IV.Ki C Category pat ki ïoh ka Honorarium 9000 tyngka bad ka bai leit bai wan ruh 9000 tyngka. Lait nangta kim ïoh eiei.
title: Kumba 1.60 lak shi bnai ka jingsiew uwei uwei uba bat kam Chairman

Kumta phim dei ban don kano kano ka jingkhuslai ha kaban ioh ia ki jaka pynieng kali.Ki kali kiba poi hapoh ka 10:00 AM ha ka Sngi U Trai, kin rung beit lyngba ka shnong sha ki jaka parking kiba don ha ka lynti ban leit sha Mawdohnud (Laitmawsiang).Namar kiba bun ki jaka kiba heh phlang, ki nongwan jingïaseng kin sngewbha ban leh sumar ban ym bret pathar ïa ki kyndok, biri/sikret, khnang ban lait na kano kano ka jingpluh ding.Ki nongwan jingïaseng kin sngewbha ban ym bret pathar ïa ki kot, ki plastic, ki foil song ja bad kiwei kiwei ha shilynter ka surok bad kumjuh ha ki jaka parking bad jaka shong jingïaseng; hynrei ban sumar khuid ia ki sawdong sawkun baroh.Ki nongwan jingïaseng kin sngewbha ban wanrah bad la ki jingsiang shong na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki hi.
title: Wat pynher sted ne overtake, bthah ka Balang Laitryngew ïa kiba wan Synod

content: Shillong, Lber 1 : Ka kyrtong MP Lok Sabha jongka National Peoples Party (NPP) na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la kyntait mardor ba ki paidbah ki sngew pyrshah ïa kane ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ïalam da u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma ha kane ka election MP namar ki paidbah ki ïohi ba kane ka dei ka sorkar kaba treikam.“ Batai ïa ka jingmut pyrshah sorkar, phi la ïohi dang shen kumno u Myntri Rangbah ula wanrah ïa ka Mang Tyngka kaba dei na ka bynta ki paidbah hynrei phi dang pyrkhat ïa kata. Ngam don kano kano ka jingartatien namar kat shaba ngi leit ngi ïohi ba ka don ka roi ka par. 7 bnai mynshwa nga leit sha Rambrai ka surok ka sniew shaba palat pud bad haba nga la leit mynta nga lap ba ka surok ka la bha palat” ong ka Dr Ampareen.“ Phai sha ki nongrep haduh katno ki la ïoh jingmyntoi mynta ban ïa kaba long mynshwa. Peit kumno ki kamai pisa bad kumno ki kyrshan ïa ki ïing ki sem jongki lyngba ki prokram bad mission ai jingïarap bapher bapher jongka sorkar ban kyntiew ïa ka rep ka riang. Kane ka pynpaw ba ka don ka jingkiew ha baroh ki liang bad haba kumta kumno keiñ yn don kata ka jingpyrshah sorkar bad ha nga hi ngam ïohi satia ïa kata” ong biang ka kyrtong ka NPP.Haba batai ba baroh ki seng saiñ pyrthei ba ïadon ha ka sorkar MDA ki pynïeng la ki jong ki jong ki kyrtong “ Kumta ngi ïadon lang ha kajuh ka sorkar nangno keiñ kata ka jingpyrshah sorkar kan wan?” ong biang ka Dr Ampareen.“ Phi don ka rynsan kaba paka eh ban ïatai halor kata ka phang pyrshah sorkar bad kata ka dei beit hapoh ka ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ. Haba phim wan haba la wanrah ïa ka mat, haei kata ka jingkylli ba pyrshah sorkar. Ha nga hi nga shem ba ngi la leh bha ha baroh ki liang. Nalor kata kane ka sorkar ka leh bha ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah, ka pule puthi, ha ki kam jngoh kai bad kumta ter ter. Phi ïoh sngew ïa kaei kaba u myntri rangbah u la dep pynpaw dang shen. Hato phim ngeit ba kane ka sorkar kam thaw ki lad ki lynti ban pynïoh kam ïoh jam ïa ki samla. Kiba bun ki tnad sorkar ki la hap ban pynbna ïa ki kam ba lait ban ïoh thep kam ki samla. Kumta haei keiñ kan don kata ka jingsngew pyrshah sorkar? Nalor kane bun ki lad ki lynti ba ka sorkar ka thaw ba ki khun samla kin lah ban ïeng ha la ki jong ki kjat.Ka Dr Ampareen ka la pynpaw ba kan ym pynleit jingmut satia ha kiei kiei kiba ki nongïaleh pyrshah ïa ka ki kren ne kynthoh namar lada ka pynleit jingmut ha kine kan shu long lehnohei kata ka jingïakhun jongka ïa ka election. Hynrei kum ka briew kaba ïohi jngai bad kum ka kyrtong jongka party kan phai beit sha ka thong ban ïoh kheit ïa u soh ka jingjop.Kiba bun ki kyrtong ki dei beit na ki seng saiñ pyrthei ba ïatrei lang ha kane ka sorkar synrop kumta baroh ki ïadon ka jingkitkhlieh halor ka jingkiew jongka jylla. Hynrei khlem pep kin don pat ki ban pyrta khlem nongrim ba ka sorkar kam shym la leh ei ei bad na ka liang jong ngi ngin ïeng skhem ha ka nongrim ban pynshisha ïa ki jingkynnoh bym don nongrim bad ka dei ha ki paidbah keiñ ki ban bishar bad ai ïa ka rai. Hato phi kwah ïa u ne ka MP ki ban ïasaid na ka bynta ki mat ba kongsan ka jylla ynda ki la jop kum ki MP ne shu ïa kawang ktieh beit para ma ngi khlem da pynshong nongrim ïa ki jingshisha. Lada phi kwah ïa ki nongmihkhmat ki ban ïasaid na ka bynta ki mat ba kongsan jongka jylla da bishar bniah namar ki don bun ki mat kiba shu ïa hylla bad pyrta ha surok hynrei kiba dei ban shim rai ka dei ka sorkar pdeng. Katno sien phi la ju ïoh sngew ba la ïatai ha ka rynsan kaba dei ne hapoh ïing dorbar thawaiñ ka ri ïa ki mat ba kongsan ka jylla, ngam tharai ba ngin ïohsngew dei na kata ka daw nga leit sha ki paidbah da kawei ka jingmut kaba shai bad kata ka long nga ïakhun na ka bynta ban rah ïa ki mat ba kongsan ka jylla ha ka rynsan kaba biang bad ba dei ban rah” ong biang ka Dr Ampareen.Kane ka Myntri ka la ong ruh ba ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba ïadon lang ha ka sorkar ruh kim dei ban shu kren lap lah bad kren pathar tang namar ba la bthah ïaki ban kren hynrei ki dei ban kren halor ki nongrim bad da ka jingkitkhlieh kum kiba iadon lang ha ka liang synshar.Ka Dr Ampareen ka la ong “ Kumba nga la rai kut ban ïakhun ïa ka election bad hooid nga tip ïa ka jingjop bad jingrem kan don beit. Hynrei ka mat ba kongsan jong nga ka long nga la rai ban ieh ïa ka shuki ha ka jylla da kawei ka jingmut ba ngan leit ban ïasaid na ka bynta ka jylla ha Parliament” da kaba bteng “ Hato kata ka shuki myntri sorkar ka long kaba donkam ïa nga ha kaba kum kane ka por ba ngi ïohi kat shaba phai ki paid nongshong shnong ki don hapdeng ka jingsngew syier lyngba kita ki khana ba la pynsaphriang ha ki social media kum ka UCC, CAA, ka jing sdang duh ïa ka jingshakri Blei ba laitluid, ka jingpynbeit ïa u pud u sam, ka khaïi pateng. Kine ki dei ki mat ba kongsan bad lada ki paidbah ki sngewdei ban ailad ïa nga ha kata ka por kin sa ïohi kaei kaba ngan leh na ka bynta jong ki ha Delhi. Kumba long mynta ka nongbah Shillong kam don ka jingkieng ban pun hapdeng jongka bad ka sorkar pdeng bad ka la shu sah shrah la bun bun snem. Kumta donkam ban pynbeit noh ïa kane ban ïoh ïa ka jingkieng kaba skhem da ka jingïatrei lang u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, ki Myntri Sorkar bad ki MP jongka jylla” pynkut ka Dr Ampareen.
title: Ki paidbah kim don ka jingsngew pyrshah ïa ka sorkar MDA namar ka dei ka Sorkar kaba treikam : Dr Ampareen

content: Jowai, Lber 03: Ka Dorbar Shnong Pdengshakap kaba pynïaid ïaka jingïalehkai football ïaka ba la tip kum ka 10th Secondary School Football Knock-Out Tournament 2023-24 ha madan Pdengshakap, West Jaiñtia Hills.Ki jingïalehkai hakane ka sngi saitjaiñ bala dep la ïoh ban sdang da ki ar tylli ki jingïalehkai Quarter Final, haka jingïalehkai ba nyngkong ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC kala jop ïaka Tariang FC da ka jingïashut Tie-breaker hadien bala kut ka jingïalehkai da 2-2.Ïaka Tariang FC la ïoh ban thep da u Wanlam Nongkhlaw haka minit ba 3 bad 38 katba ïaka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC pat la ïoh ban thep da u Younis Suchen haka minit kaba 15 bad u Atlan Kharmaw haka minit ba 31.Haka jingïalehkai ba ar pat ka Thrangchynnam FC kala lah ban pynliem noh ïaka Nohron SC da 2-0, daki kol bala thep da u Phang Sumer haka minit ba 11 bad u Timy Ryngkhlem haka minit ba 69.Kumta ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC bad ka Thrangchynnam FC kila buh jaka ïalade sha ka Semi Final jong kane ka lympung.Naka liang ki bor pynïaid jong ka Tournament kin bteng biang sa kawei ka jingïalehkai Quarter final haka 9 tarik mynta u bnai hapdeng ka Sengkhihlang FC pyrshah iïka YFC Trangblang haka por 2 baje nohphai sngi.
title: Rung Semi ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC & Thrangchynnam FC haka Tournament Pdengshakap

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 03: Ka Nonglang Pungsier Social Cultural Youth Club, ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la ïoh ban pynkut noh ïa ka lympung jingïalehkai kynjat bol ïa kaba la pynlong ha madan shnong Nonglang.Ïa katei ka lympung la wan ban pynhap pyrda noh da u R.G.Momin MLA ka Rambrai Jyrngam konstitwensi kum u kongsan, ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u bah Ailand Lyngdoh sordar ka shnong Nonglang, bah Pynbiang Shylla President ka NPSCYC bah Treibor Marweiñ secretary ka NPSCYC bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah jong ka thaiñ.Ha ka jingïalehkai jong kiba hapoh ka 14 snem ka karta jong ki khynnah shynrang, ka Seiñduli ka la ïoh ban thep tang 1 kol la nod pyrshah ïa ka Mawsyrpat, ka jingïakhun jong ki kynthei pat ka NPScYC ka la shah pynrem noh ha ka Umwahlang haduh 2 kol la nod. Katba ha ka jingïakhun jong ki rangbah kiba la 40 snem tam ka karta, ka Kriangrin ka la ïoh ban pynbam haduh 2 kol la nod pyrshah ïa ka shnong Thawiar.Kum shibynta ban pynshit pynshngaiñ shuh shuh ïa katei ka lympung ha katei ka sngi, ki samla jong ka thaiñ ki la ïoh ban ïashimbynta ruh ha ki jingshad bad ki jingrwai bapher bapher.
title: Pynkut noh ka NPSCYC ïa ka lympung phutbol ha Nonglang

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 03: Ka shnong Siejlieh ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ka la ïoh ban pynkut noh ïa ka lympung jingïalehkai kaba la tip kum ka Inter Dong Cricket Tournament 2024, ïa kaba la pynlong da ka Siejlieh Sports Social and Cultural Youth Organization.Ïa katei ka lympung la wan ban pynhap lama noh da u bah L.G Nongsiej MDC barim ka Nongstoiñ kum u kongsan, ryngkat ka jingïasynranlang u samla Deborland Kharsyntiew Secretary ka shnong Siejlieh Nongstoiñ, samla Ben Hahshah Secretary ka Siejlieh Sports Social and Cultural Youth Organization bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong.Ka jingïalehkai ka la long kaba ishit ishngaiñ bha ha kaba na ka liang ki kynthei ka Dong Mawïaban ka la ïoh ban pynliem noh ïa ka dong Pdengshnong, katba na ka liang ki shynrang pat ka Seven United Mawthohthang ka la ïoh ban pynliem noh ïa ka Dong Pdengshnong da 6 Wicket na ka target ba la buh da ka Pdengshnong haduh 104 runs.Ïa ka nam kum kiba kynsai tam ha kane ka lympung la ïoh ban khur da ki ar ngut ki samla kaba kynthup ïa ka Wanpynshai Syiemlieh na ka dong Mawïaban bad u Banteilang Ïawphñiaw na ka Seven United Mawthohthang.
title: Kut noh ka lympung Cricket ha Siejlieh

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 03: Ka Sei-La-i-Sap Organisation, Mawlangwir ka la ïoh ban pynhap pyrda noh ïa ka lympung ïalehkai Volleyball ba lai sngi ne ka 3 Day Volleyball Tournament 2024 kaba la pynlong ha Madan Saitsnad, Mawlangwir South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka sngi, u bah Working Sangriang, General Secretary jong ka NPP South West Khasi Hills District ula long kum u kongsan ban wan pynhap pyrda noh ïa kane ka lympung ïalehkai.Ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai volleyball na baroh ki kynhun ïalehkai, ka NPNKG. Na Nongkynbah bad ka DNR na Shnong Sarin ki la long ki kynhun kiba poi ha ka phainal.Ha ka jingïalehkai ka NPNKG ka long ka lahduh da kaba ka la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka DNR da 3 set bad ïoh rah ruh ïa ka song pisa kaba T. 30 hajar tyngka bad ka DNR T. 10 hajar tyngka ha ryngkat ka khusnam.Ha shwa ban pynïalehkai la ïoh ban pynlong ka jingïalang ba lyngkot ha kaba la ïohh jingkren na u bah W. Sangriang kum u kongsan bad na u bah Bokstone Thongni kum u symbud kongsan, na u bah A.B.Shylla, Secretary jong ka Mawlangwir Sport Club kum ka dak ban ai mynsiem ïa ki rangïalehkai kumjuh ïa ka “Sei-La-i-Sap Organisation”, ba kan nang lah ban pynlong kum kine ki jait jingïalehkai ban kyntiew ïa ki samla kiba don ïa ka sap ka phong ba kin lah ruh ban nangkiew shaphrang ha ki kam ïalehkai.Ka Sei-La-i-Sap Organisation, ka la ïoh ruh ban ai sngewbha ïa u bah K. Wanniang kum u Best Smash bad ïa u bah W. Snaitang kum u Best Player ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka 3 Day Volleyball Tournament 2024.
title: Pynhap pyrda ka Sei-La-i-Sap Organisation ïa ka 3 DVT 2024 ha Mawlangwir

content: Shillong, Lber 03: Ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol jong ka Shillong Lajong FC kan bteng biang ïa ka jingïalehkai lympung I-League mynta ka sngi pyrshah ïa ka Churchill Brothers FC ha ka por 7 baje janmiet, shabar nala ïing ha madan phutbol ka liang pyrshah, ka Tilak Maidan ha Goa.Shuwa ban jam sha kane ka jingïakhun ka Lajong ka la ïakhaid bad ka Rajasthan United ha ka jingïalehkai ba dang shen bad ka shong ha ka kyrdan ba 6 ha ka miej da 26 point bad ka duna da tang 1 point na ka Inter Kashi kaba bat kyrdan ba san.Hynrei ka Lajong ka dang ïohlad ban kyntiew ïalade sha ka kyrdan ba san namar ka dang duna 2 sien ïakhun haba nujor bad ka Inter Kashi. Ka Lajong ka jop 7 sien, 5 sien ïakhaid, bad rem 4 sien naki 16 sien ïakhun naduh ba sdang ka samoi lehkai 2023-24.Haba kren lamphang shuwa ban jam sha kane ka jingïalehkai, u head coach ka Lajong – u Bah Bobby L. Nongbet u la pynpaw ba ka kynhun ka la pynkhreh bha na bynta kane ka jingïakhun hadien ba ka kynhun ka la pynsepei ïa ki 3 point ha ka jingïalehkai pyrshah ïa ka Rajasthan United hynrei u ngeit skhem ba ka kynhun kan wanphai bad kan pynleit jingmut ïa ka jingïakhun mynta ka sngi.Shuh shuh, u Bah Bobby u la pynpaw ruh ba ka kynhun kan ïakhun tyngeh ban khur pura ïa ki lai point bad ban pynduna ka jingïapher point bad ki kynhun ba shong ha ka thup Top 4 ha ka miej.Haba phai pat sha ka Churchill Brothers, kane ka kynhun ka shong ha ka kyrdan ba 11, bad ka dang jop tang 4 sien, ïakhaid 5 sien bad rem 7 sien na ki 15 sien ïakhun ba ladep, bad ka dang khur 17 point.Baroh arliang mamla ki kyrmen ban khur pura ïa ki lai point na kane ka jingïatyngkhuh ka jong ki ha ka lympung I-League mynta ka samoi.
title: I-League: Pyrshah ïa ka Churchill Brothers yn aireng ka Lajong mynta ka sngi

content: Nongpoh, Lber 03: Ban phai khmat kyrpang ka sorkar na ka bynta ban leh janai ïa ka madan Kurkalang ha Bhoirymbong ba kan long kawei na ka madan ïalehkai sport kaba la bit la biang, u MLA ka Umroi, u Bah Damanbait Lamare u la phah syndon da ka jingtoh sha u Myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K. Sangma ba un shim khia na ka bynta ban pynbit pynbiang ïa katei ka madan kum kawei na ka madan ïalehkai kaba la bit la biang ban kyntiew ïa ki kam ïalehkai sport ki samla hapoh ka jylla.Kumba la pynpaw ha katei ka dorkhas, u MLA ka Umroi u Bah Damanbait Lamare, u la pynpaw ba u don shisha ka jingangnud ka sorkar jylla kan phai khmat noh sha katei ka madan, kaba la donkam shisha ban pynbit pynbiang bad khamtam ban thaw noh ki lad ki lynti ban shna syndon da ka stadium kaba bit ba biang khnang ba ka jingdon katei ka madan kaba la biang pura kan ïarap ban kyntiew ïa ki khun samla kiba don sap ha ki jingïalehkai sport bapher bapher.Ha kawei ka bynta, u la pynpaw ruh ba katei ka madan ïalehkai ha Kurkalang la donkam ban siang noh da u phlang plastik (artificial turf) bad ruh ban pynbiang ïa ki jaka ïeng kali bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam kiba ïa dei dur bad ka kam ban kyntiew ïa ki kam ïalehkai sport/Shuh shuh, na ka liang u MLA ka Umroi, u Bah Damanbait Lamare, u la pynpaw ruh ka jingkmen ba u Myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K. Sangma u la kular ban shim khia bad ban pynurlong ïa katei ka jingangnjud jong u kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah na Umroi, khnang ba lada ka sorkar ka lah shisha ban leh janai ïa katei ka madan kan long shisha ka jingkyrkhu ïa ka dong Ri Bhoi bad wat ïa ka jylla hi baroh kawei khamtam na ka bynta ki samla kiba don sap ha ki kam ïalehkai sport, u la bynrap.
title: Da ka Dorkhas phah u MLA Umroi sha u Myntri Rangbah ban leh janai ïa ka Madan Kurkalang

content: Ym lah ban leit ka jingdon bad jingïoh shisha ïa ki surok ba bha bad ba bïang ki long ki lad ban kyntiew sted ïa ka roi ka par bad ka khaii pateng namar ki surok ki long da shisha u Budlum jong ka ïoh ka kot bad ka roi ka par jong ki paidbah.Ka jyla Meghalaya jongngi naduh ba la dep ka surok Shillong By-pass bad ka Surok 4-lane ka la wan rah shisha ïa ka jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah ha baroh ki lïang, namar ka long ruh ka jingsarong ïa ki paidbah ba ki la ïoh ban ïaid ha ka surok kaba la bit la bïang haba ïa ujor bad ki por ba la leit noh. Nalor kata ka jingïoh ïa ka surok Mawlai By-Pass nangta ka jingbha ka surok kum na Shillong sha Nongstoin shaduh Garo Hills, ka surok Shillong Jowai bad kiwei kiwei kiba dang shna mynta kum ka Shillong-Dawki, Shillong -Sohra khlem pep ka la rah ïa ka nam ka burom ka jylla namar ka sorkar ka pyrshang katba lah ban ïai pynbha ïa ki surok ha kylleng ka jylla.Haba phai dien sha ka Mynnor, ka jingeh ki paidbah ha ka jylla ka dei ka jingdheng ki kali paidbah ha ka surok bah NH40 kaba la teng teng ka shim por da ki phew kynta ba ki paidbah ki sahkut ha ki surok bad teng teng ki paidbah ki ïapthngan bad khamtam kiba pang ba shitom kiba thmu ban leit sumar ki khlad noh tang ha shiteng lynti. Ka jingkylli ka mih pat hangne. Hato, ka jingwan rah ka sorkar ïa ka Surok 4-lane bad ka Shillong By-pass kam dei moh ka jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah ka jylla?.Haba pyrkhat bha la dei ruh ban ai burom ïa ka sorkar jylla bad kumjuh ïa ka sorkar pdeng kiba la wan rah ïa kine ki surok sha kane ka jylla ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad khamtam ka jingïoh ïa ki surok kiba la bïang pura ïa ki paidbah ka dei shisha ka lad kaba lah ban kyntiew ïa ka roi ka par jong ki paidbah.Ka don ruh ka por ba ki paidbah ha ki por ba la leit noh ka la mih tang ka jingkhnium bad ka jingud ha ka leit ka wan ba ka jingrit jong ka surok bah NH40 ka la wan rah ruh ïa ka jingdheng ki kali namar ka jingbun ki kali ki motor ka la pynkhapngïah ïa ka surok. Hynrei ha kane ka por ba mynta mano ba poi pyrkhat ba ki paidbah ki la suk ha ka leit ka wan bad hato ki la klet mo ïa ka jingjynjar ha ka leit ka wan ha ki por ba la leit noh.Ha kine ki sngi pat naduh ba la pyndep ïa ka surok 4-lane bad ba la pyndep ïa ka surok Shillong By-pass ngim juh ïohi shuh ba kin don kata ka jingdheng kali ha ki surok bad kum ki paidbah ka jylla ki la dei ban sngewnguh ïa ka sorkar jylla bad ym tang ban shu tip ban kynnoh ne kynshi haba don kino kino ki jingduna ha ka lïang ka sorkar.Ka jingwan ka surok 4-lane bad ka Surok Shillong By-pass ki paidbah ki la dei ban ai ïa ka jingïaroh kaba khraw ïa ka sorkar kmie bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka sorkar jylla, namar dei lyngba ka jingshim khïa jong ka sorkar kmie bad sorkar jylla la lah ban wan rah ïa kine ki surok kiba la ai jingmyntoi shisha ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan namar ka jingbha ka surok ka la pynsuk naduh ki nongleit nongwan, kiba pang ba shitom bad ki samla pule kiba ïaid lyngba jong kitei ki surok.Ki paidbah ki la dei ruh ban phai dien ïa ka mynnor bad ka mynta. Ha ki p or ba la leit noh lada phai ha ka lïang ka surok ka long shisha ka jingkynduh mawsïang ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad ka jingshim khïa ka sorkar kmie bad ryngkat ka sorkar jylla kan ba dang mih ki por bad ki sngi ka dang wan ka jingkylla kaba la long ka jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah jong ka jylla.Ka jingwan rah ïa ka surok bah na Nongstoin ha Tura, ka surok na Mairang sha Ranibari, ka surok Jowai By pass bad ki don ruh kiwei kiwei ki surok ba ka sorkar ka dang thmu ban pyntrei mynta. Lada kine ki surok kin dep noh kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah ka jylla ha baroh ki laing.Ka la dei ka por ïa ki paidbah ba kin ieng ban ïa tylli ban ïa trei lang bad ka sorkar na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa shibun ki kam pynroi ba ki paidbah ki dang donkam ha ka jylla bad kum ki paidbah ki dei ruh ban sngewthuh ym tang ban khnium ne wohdong, hynrei ban wan shakhmat ban ïa trei ryngkat bad ka sorkar na ka bynta banwan ka roi ka par ha baroh ki lïang.Hooid, ka sorkar jylla ka la pyrshang ban wan rah ïa shibun ki surok ba ki paidbah ki donkam ha ka jylla bad kaba la long ruh ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki paidbah, hynrei kumba long haduh mynta ki dang don shibun ki thain kiba dang duna ha ka lïang ka surok ba kum ka sorkar ka hap ban phai khmat ban kham shim khïa kyrpang ïa ka surok.Ban wan ka roi ka par la donkam ban don ka jingïatylli kum ki nongshong shnong ka jylla, namar haba don ka jingïatylli bad ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut, lah ban wan rah ïa shibun ki kam pynroi ba ka imlang ka sahlang ha ka jylla ka donkam.Namarkata, kumba ka sorkar ka la shim khïa ban wan rah ïa shibun ki kam pynroi ba ki paidbah ki donkam khamtam ka surok, ka la dei ka por ruh ba ka sorkar kan dang kham shim khïa ïa ki surok sha ki nongkyndong bad ki thain khappud, namar kumba long haduh mynta bun na ki shnong nongkyndong bad ki shnong haki thaiin khappud ka jylla, ki dang sahdien shisha ha ka lïang ka surok bad lad lada ki paidbah kim ïoh ïa ka surok kaba bit bïang ka long ruh kaba eh ban kyntiew ïa ka roi ka par bad ka ïoh ka kot jong ki paidbah ha ka jylla.
title: Ki surok kiba bha ki long u Budlum ka roi ka par ka jyla

content: Jowai, Lber 03: Ka Jingïaseng Samla KJP Synod Mihngi kaba Arphew Ar (XXII), kaba la long ha Balang Presbyterian Moolang Ïapmala District Rymbai Presbytery kaba la sdang naduh 1 tarik Lber kala poi noh sha kaba kut mynta ka sngi U Blei 3 tarik u Lber, 2024 halor ka phang kaba ong “ka jingim ba riewblei haka pyrthei ba mynta”.Ha kane ka Jingïaseng Synod ki paid riewngeit da ki phew hajar ngut kiba na kylleng ka Ri-Lum Khasi bad Jaiñtia kila wan tuid sha kane ka Jingïaseng ban ïoh mad ïa ka jingpynim da kaba shah skor ïa ka ktien jong u Blei lyngba ki nongkren ha ki Jingïaseng paidbah bapher bapher.Ïa ka jingïaseng mynta ka sngi U Blei la pynïaid da u Chairman Elect Rev. E. Nongpluh, haka jingïaseng por 10 waje mymstep kum ka dak ban ai mynsiem ïa ki samla pule ka KJP Synod Mihngi kiba la wan shakhmat la pynkup burom ïa ki haki kyrdan jong ka exam SSLC bad HSSLC jong ka MBOSE, kumjuh ha ka Class- X, XII jong ka ICSE bad CBSE 2023.Ha ka por mynstep la sam ïa ka ktein U Blei da u Rev. R. S. Nongkynrih uba la pynshong nongrim naka shithi sha u Titos 2:5-6, u Pastor ula kyntu ïa ki para bangeit ba kin long kiba ‘Khan Adkar’ ha ka jingim, ka ktien ka thylliej, ka jingjemnud bad ka bor halade. Ula khot kum ki riewngeit ki dei ban don ka jingïadei dur bad ka Gospel U Khrist bad ban don ka iktiar ban jop ïa ki jingpynthame.Katba ha ka por noh sngi, la sam ïa ka ktien U Blei da u Rev. Dr. H.C.T Sumer uba la pynshong nongrim na ka shithi kaba 2 sha ki Nongkarinth 4:7-8, ha kaba u Pastor ula kren shaphang ka jingim Khristan kaba long tang kum ki khiew khyndew, da kaba u pynsngew “ngin long kiba don dor eiei ruh em khlem U Blei, kumta u kyntu ba dei ban don ïa ki jingnang ïa ka Gospel U Blei ha ka jingim bad ban long ki khiew ki bym lah ban pynlwet.Da kaba ula kyntu jur ba ka jingsarong ka lah ban pynmih ïa u soitan, kumta u Pastor ula pynkut ïa ka jingkren da kaba buh ka jingkyntu ïa baroh ki riewngeit haba ki ïoh ïa ki Gospel haka jingim ka dei ka bynta ïa ki ban sam lem ïa ka da ka jingieit sha kiwei de.La pynrhem shuh shuh ïa kane ka jingiaseng da ki jingrwai na ki Choir ha ka por 10 baje mynstep da ka na ka Jingïaseng Samla Balang Kayang, Jingïaseng Samla Balang Nongsning, Jingïaseng Samla Balang Umjalasiaw, Jingïaseng Samla Balang Moodymmai Wah, katba ha ka por 1:30 nohphai sngi da ka Jingïaseng Samla Balang Shnongrim, Jingïaseng Balang Mawbynna, Jingïaseng Balang Moolang bad ka Standing Choir JSKJPSM. Na ka liang ki riew saiñ hima sima ruh kila wan sha kane ka JingïasengKatba ha ka Jingïaseng por 6 shiteng janmiet la sam ïa ka khubor na ka ktien u Blei kaba ïadei bad ka Subject Balang “Ïa ngin ïa nang ïaid shaduh ka jingpynjanai” (Hebru 6:1) la kren da u Rev. F.S. Rymbai.
title: Tuid ki riewngeit sha ka Jingïaseng Samla KJP Synod Mihngi ha Moolang
