content: Nongstoiñ, Rymphang 3: Da ka jingthmu ban kyntiew ïa ka sap trei jingtrei bad ban pynïajan hapdeng ki nongai kam, ki nongïoh jingmyntoi kiba la tbit bad ki nongseng kam seng jam lajong, ka ophis jong ka Meghalaya State Skill Development Society (MSSDS), ka tnad Labour, Employment and Skill Development, ha ka 5 bad 6 tarik Lber 2024, kan sa pynlong ïa ka prokram kaba la tip kum ka ‘Skillerate Connect Event’.Kane ka prokram kan dei ka prokram kan ai buit ai bor ïa ki khun samla, ba kin trei ïa ki kam ki jam ha ki karkhana bad kiwei kiwei, kumjuh ruh ba kin nang ban seng ïa ki kam lajong. Kane ka prokram kan long ha madan New Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills District.Ha kine ki ar sngi, kin don bun jait ki ki prokram kaba kynthup ïa ka jingwan jong ki nongai kam na ki kynhun bad ki company ki bapher bapher ban pynrung kam ïa ki samla kiba tbit ha ki liang kiba pher kum ha ka kam rep kam riang, Information Technology, kam jngoh kai pyrthei bad kiwei kiwei de.Kin don ruh ki dukan kiban die ïa ki jingdie kiba bun jait kiban sa pynieng ha katei ka jaka kaba kynthup ïa ki dukan die jingbam, soh waiñ, dukan jaiñ, dukan die syntiew bad kiwei kiwei de.Kiba wan sha katei ka prokram kin ïoh shibun ki jingmyntoi ha kaba ki lah ban register ïalade na ka bynta ki training prokram ki bapher bapher, kumjuh ruh ba kin ïoh jinghikai halor ki skhim sorkar bad ki ram kiba ki bank ki ai bad ki jingshakri kiba ki tnad sorkar ki ai.Ha ka 5 tarik Lber 2024 por 1:30 nohphai sngi kin don ki prokram pynbyrngia paidbah, ka ban sa ai da u Bah Gilbert Thongni, bud sa da ka kynjat bol paralok na ki briew kiba lah ha kiwei pat ki bynta bad ka jingïatied Pohdun, ka jingïalehkai kaba ju ïalehkai bha da ki briew ka thaiñ Nongstoiñ.Ha ka 6 tarik Lber 2024 ha ka por 2 baje nohphai sngi, ka Northeast Institute of Professional Studies (NeIPS) kan sa pynlong ïa ka jingïakop pyni riam bad ka kynhun Shaphrang Ngin Tur jong u Bah Blom, kin sa wanrah ïa kawei ka Drama kaba pynphalang halor ka ‘Jingdonkam jong ka Sap/Jingtbit’.
title: Yn sei ka MSSDS ïa ka sap kyrpang ki samla Nongstoiñ

content: Nongpoh, Lber 03: Ha kawei na ka jingtyngkhuh Kali kaba la jia mynta ka sngi U Blei ha Ri Bhoi, u Dribar ka Maruti Car u la lait salit na ka jingmynsaw kaba dei hadien ba katei ka Kali kaba u ñiah ka la shah rad kynsan ha ka Trok.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka surokbah National Highway-6 ba hap hajan Saiden kumba ha ka por 12.30 baje mynsngi, ha kaba kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u number ML 05 U 7080 bad ba la ñiah da u John Dkhar ka la rad ïa katei ka Maruti Car kaba don ïa u number ML 05 F 0872 bad ba la ñiah da u John Kenny Longshiang.Ha kane ka jingjia, u Dribar ka Maruti Car u la lait salit na ka jingmynsaw jur bad u la shu pangmet pang phad, namar ba katei ka Trok ka la lah ban sangeh noh hadien ba ka rad ïa katei ka Maruti Car.Kumba la lap bad sakhi, kane ka jingjia ka la kham sngewma, namar ba ka trok ka la ioh ban rad ïa katei ka Maruti car bad donbok noh ba u Dribar u la lah ban bat brake, ha kaba katei ka Maruti Car ka la julor na ka phang jong u Dribar bad katba u Dribar pat u la shu pangmet pangphat khlem da mynsaw jur.Halor kane ka jingjia, ym lah ban batai shai mano ba bakla haduh ba ka trok ka la ioh lad ban rad ïa katei ka Maruti Car kaba la shakut syndon hapdeng surok, hynrei ki bor pulit na Nongpoh Police Station tang mar ïa ioh jingtip ki la wan poi sha katei ka jaka na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.
title: Lait salit u nongñiah kali ka Maruti Car ba shah rat ha ka Trok

content: Nongpoh, Lber 03: Ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynlong da ka jingïakynduh lang jong ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot na ka bynta ban pynkhreh halor ka jingwan hiar u CEM ka KHADC ban ïa kynduh kyrpang ïa ki nongïalam shnong ka Ri Bhoi, na ka bynta ban ïa kren bad ban ïa tai halor shibun ki kam jong ka imlang ka sahlang kaba dei ha ka jingpeit jingkhmih ka District Council.Haba ïa kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Secretary ka Synjuk ki rangbah shnong, u Bah P.B Sylliang, u la ong ba ka synjuk ka pynpaw ïa ka mynsiem jong ka jingsngewkmen ba u CEM ka KHADC, u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la dep ban pynthikna ba ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai un sa hiar sha Ri Bhoi na ka bynta ban ïa kynduh kyrpang ïa ki nongïalam ka synjuk bad ki nongïalam shnong na ki shnong bapher bapher ka Ri Bhoi. U la ong ruh ym tang katta u CEM ha katei ka sngi un ïa kynduh kyrpang ruh ïa ki nongïalam ki Seng Longkmie bad ki Seng Samla na ka bynta ban ïa mir jingmut halor ka kam synshar khadar bad khamtam kaba ïa dei bad ka Direct Funding na ka sorkar kmie.U la ong ruh kum ka synjuk ka kloi ban ïa trei lang ba u CEM uba la kloi ban pynlait por ban wan kynduh ïa ki nongïalam sha Ri Bhoi, namar kane ka jingwan jong u ban ïa kynduh ïa ki nongïalam shnong kum ki nongïalam shnong kin ioh lad ban pynpaw ïa shibun ki mat ki jura ba donkam ban ïa thir na ka bynta ka synshar ka khadar bad ruh kiwei kiwei ki kam kiba ai jingmyntoi ïa ki paradoh ki parsnam ha ka jingjingpeit jingkhmih ka KHADC.Kum u Secretary ka synjuk, u labuh ruh ka jingkyrpad sha baroh ki nongïalam shnong na ki shnong bapher bapher ba kin ïa wan ban don lang ha katei ka sngi ka 12 tarik u Lber 2024 ha District Library Hall Nongpoh bad ka jingwan ïasnoh kti lang ki nongïalam shnong kan pynlong ka jingjop ïa kane ka jingwan hiar krypang u CEM ban ïa kynduh ïa ki nongïalam Shnong ka Ri Bhoi, u la bynrap.
title: Kmen ka SRSRB ba yn wan hiar kypang u CEM ban ïa kynduh ïa ki nongïalam shnong ka Ri Bhoi

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 03: Ka Ophis treikam jong ka District Mental Health Programme (DM&HP), South West Khasi Hills District kaba hap hapoh ka jingpynïaid jong u District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO), South West Khasi Hills District ka la pynlong ïa “ka Program ïa syllok halor kumno ban pynduna ïa ka jingma jong ka jinglong jingman ha ka ïaid ka ïeng hapdeng ki khynnah samla na ka jingshah pynngop ha ka ban pyndonkam ïa u Drok” ha kaba u Pastor L.E. Jyrwa, Pastor I/c Mawkyrwat District Counsellor, Counselling Centre, Jingïaseng Kynthei Mawkyrwat Presbytery, Member Life Care Foundation, Mawkyrwat u la long kum u Resources Person.Ïa katei ka prokram la pynlong ha Multipurpose Hall jong ka ophis treikam jong u Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba la pynïaid ïa ka prokram da u bah T. Lyngwa, IAS, Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District bad ka Smt. Y. Mawlong, Additional Deputy Commissioner. Kiba la wan ban ïashimbynta ha kane ka program ki kynthup ïa ki District Heads bad ki Staff jong ki Department bapher bapher jong ka South West Khasi Hills District.U Pastor L.E. Jyrwa, Pastor I/c Mawkyrwat District Counsellor, Counselling Centre, Jingiaseng Kynthei Mawkyrwat Presbytery, Member Life Care Foundation, Mawkyrwat ha ka jingkren jong u ban ai jingpynshai lyngba ka Power Point Presentation u la kren halor ka phang, “Kumno ban pynduna ïa ka jingma jong ka jinglong jingman ha ka ïaid ka ïeng hapdeng ki khynnah samla na ka jingshah pynngop ha ka ban pyndonkam ïa u drok”, da kaba u ong ba ka jingkyrni ha ka jingpyndonkam ïa u drok ka long kawei ka jingeh kaba ktah ïa ka jingim shimet bad ha ka imlang sahlang.“Ka jylla Meghalaya jong ngi mynta ka la don ha ka kyrdan kaba 12 ha ka jingdon jong 1.65% ha ka jingkheiñ ba mynta jong kiba pyndonkam ïa u droks”, u la ong bad halor ki jaid jingma jong ka ïaid ka ïeng ne jinglong jingman hapdeng kiba pyndonkam ïa u drok. U la pashad jingmut ruh halor ki katto kane ki lad kiba lah ban wanrah jingbha ne jingduna jong ka jingktah ne jingngop ha ka jingpyndonkam ïa u drok, kaba nyngkong ka kynthup ïa ka Early Intervention lane ka jingpeitbniah ne jingïada shwa ka por. Ha kaba ngi hap ban peit thuh ne pynithuh ïa ki stake holders lane ki briew kiba don ka mon sngewbha ban trei lang ha ka ban wan rah ïa ka jingbha ha ka imlang ka sahlang, kaba kythup ïa ki Myntri Shnong, ki nongtreikam Balang, Seng Longkmie, Senglong Kpa ba kiwei kiwei kiba kloi ban trei ha ka ban wanrah jingbha hapoh shnong ‘pohthaw.U la ong shuh shuh ba kiwei pat ki kynthup ïa ka jingsngewthew ïa ka jingsngew bad ka ïaid ka ïeng namar ka don beit ka jingkylla ha ka ïaid ka ïeng jong uba la kyrni ha u drok. Namarkata, kaba donkam ka long ruh ka jingai ïa ki jingtip ne hikai ïa ki paidbah halor ki jingtip bapher bapher kiba ïadei bad kane ka bynta lyngba ka jingtip bniah halor ka jingsniew jong u drok. Ka jingpynithuh ïa u briew uba shimti ban hikai ne ïarap ïa kiwei pat halor kumno ban ïada ne kumno ban wad jingïarap lada ngop ha u drok. Kumta, ka counselling ne ka jingïasyllok ruh ka dei kawei ka ban ïarap ha ka liang ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong u briew ha ryngkat ki dawai.U la ai jingmut ruh ba dei ban pynkhlaiñ ha kaba ïa dei bad ka aiñ ne bad ka rukom pyrkhing ban ïada khnang ban ïarap ban ïada na ka jingpyndonkam ne pynïaid be-aiñ ïa u drok ka long kaba donkam bad kawei de ka jingaibor ne pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingsngew ha lade ïa ki briew kiba la ngop ha u drok da kaba lait na ki jingshah i-beiñ ne kren beiñ hapoh shnong ‘poh thaw, ka jingshah kyntait ha ki briew, ha ki kam ki jam bad ha kiwei kiwei kaba donkam bad kawei pat ka long kumno ban lait na ka jingngop ha u drok lane ka jingpyndonkam ïa u drok ka long ka ba kongsan eh lyngba ka jingïatreilang da kaba sdang na ka ïing kata na ki kmie ki kpa, ka shnong ka thaw, ki nongtrei ha ka koit ka khiah, ki pulit bad kiwei kiwei kiba don bynta ha ka imlang sahlang.U Dr. F.R. Lartang, DM&HO, South West Khasi Hills District u la kren khyndiat halor kumno ka ophis ne kum ki department bapher bapher kin lah ban leh ha kaba ïa dei bad u drok. Kum ki department bapher bapher ngi dei ban ïatrei lang bad ban wad ki lad kumno ban ïada na ka jingshah ktah ha u drok”, u la ong. U la ïathuh ruh halor ka kumno ka treikam ka OST hapoh Mawkyrwat bad ba ki briew ki lah ban ïoh jingïarap na OST, Mawkyrwat ki lah tang kito kiba lah ïoh jingsumar shwa na Shillong namar ïa mynta hi ym pat don Psychiatrist.U Dr. W.L. Narry, District Nodal Officer, South West Khasi Khasi Hills District u la kren ruh halor ka jingkiew stet jong ka jingshim noh ïa ka jingim lade jong ki briew. U la kren ruh halor ka jingwan rah ïa ka OST hapoh South West Khasi Hills District kaba long ruh kawei ka liang ha ka ban pynlait na ka jingïoh ïa ka HIV/AIDs.Ka kong Y. Mawlong, Additional Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District ha ba pynkut ïa ka jingïakren ne jingïa ai jingmut ka la ong ba kane ka program ka long ba ïarap bha bad kaba donkam bha. Ka la ïathuh ruh ba ka Social Welfare Department ka la thmu ban pyntreikam ïa ka Meghalaya Drug Abuse Prevention Policy bad ka donkam ruh ka jingïatreilang jong ki ophis treikam bapher bapher ka ba kynthup ïa ka Sports Department, C&RD Block, Transport, Police bad kiwei kiwei namar da ka jingïatreilang yn lah bn pynduna ïa ka jingpyndonkam ïa u drok.
title: Ka jingïasyllok ka ïarap ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong u briew ryngkat ki dawai: Pastor L.E. Jyrwa

content: Shillong, Lber. 03: Ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ki la tuh ïa uwei u Battery Solar napoh ka Nongchram Sub-Centre Quarter ha ka 15 tarik, Rymphang.Ïa kane la pyntip da u Sungdey S. Sangma katkum ka ujor ba u la phah sha ki Pulit.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia, u Pangrak S Sangma u la ujor sha ki Pulit ba ha ka miet 24 tarik Rymphang, ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la tuh ïa ka thuk thuk jong u kaba don ïa u nombar AS-01DM-2723 na jaka pynïeng kali kaba ha Tura Civil Hospital.
title: Tuh ki runar ïa u battery bad thuk thuk

content: Shillong, Lber, 03: Ka Assam Tribal Christian Coordination Committee (ATCCC) ka kyrpad ïa ka sorkar Assam ban khmihbniah biang ïa ka jingmut jong ka aiñ pynkoit da ki bor Jadu ne ka “The Assam Healing (Prevention of Evil) Practices Bill, 2024”, kaba la wanrah hapoh ka Ïingdorbar Thaw Aiñ ka Assam Legislative Assembly ha ka 21 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 da u Myntri ka Parliamentary Affairs jong ka sorkar u Pijus Hazarika ha jaka jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Dr. Himanta Biswa Sarma.Na ka jingsngewthuh jong ki kynhun Khristan jong ka jylla ki la shem bad pynpaw halor ïa jinglah ban shaniah bad ka mynsiem jong ka Bill. La don ka jingsngew ba lada la ïoh ka jingmynjur ha kane ka rukom thaw bad ka jingmut ba la pynpaw da u Myntri Rangbah ha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïalang ka kynhun Myntri ha ka 10 tarik u Rymphang, ki kyntien jong ka ki lah ban ïalam bakla bad batai bakla ban pynkit ïa ka jingban khia ban pynbor halor ki riewngeit Khristan bad kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew ba tlot bor jong ka imlang sahlang.Na ka liang ka ATCCC ka la ong ba ïa ka jingmut dei ban pynkylla bad ym dei ban pynïakhleh lang bad ki ktien kum ka jingpynkoit bor Jadu ne kum ki ktien “magic healing” lane “magical healing” hynrei dei ban pynrung da ka ktien ka jingthmu ban pynkylla ïa ka niam ki briew ne proselytization’ lane ‘conversion’ bad kiwei kiwei.Ka seng ka la ong ba ki Balang Khristan barabor ki mut ban ai ki jinghikai jong U Jisu Khrist da ka mynsiem ka jingieid bad ban burom ïa kiwei.Ka la ong ba ka Balang ka ngeit ba kine ki jinghikai jong u Trai Jisu Khrist ki long kiba bha bad kiba ïarap ban tei ïa ka longïing kaba bha, ka imlang sahlang kaba Koit ka Khiah bad ban pynthikna ïa ka suk ka saiñ bad Ïalong shipara bad ka roi ka san ha ka ri bad pyrthei baroh kawei.“Katto katne na ki jinghikai ha ka akor ka burom ki kynthup ba phim dei ban thok, bym dei ban tuh, bym dei ban klim, ym dei ban ïa huri hura, ym dei ban ïashoh ne ïakhun, ym dei ban pynïap, ym dei ban leh ki kam pynmynsaw, ym dei ban khwan lalot, hynrei ban ieid iwei ïa iwei, ieid ïa ki para marjan, ieid ïa ki kmie ki kpa, ïa ieid shi para, ban long kiba sngewrit, ban ieid bad ïarap ïa kiba duk bad kiba jynjar, ban wanrah jingsuk ha ka imlang sahlang bad ka ri bad ban im ha ka suk ka saiñ bad kiwei,” ong ka ATCCC.Ka la ong ba ki riewngeit ha ki Balang barabor ki duwai ha U Blei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat kiba tlot ka ïoh ka kot, kiba pang bad kiba la ha tmier jingïap, kiba pait dohnud, kiba shah khñiot beiñ bad ban ïada ïa ka mynsiem jong ki, hynrei ki Balang Khristan kim ju pynbor ne kyrpad ïa ki briew ban kylla niam ne kylla na ka niam jong ki.“Hapoh ka Article 25 jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India ka la batai shai ne pynthikna ba ka kam mynsiem ne ka jingngeit niam la ong ba ka dei ka kam shimet da ka jingsngewthuh nalade shimet. Kadei kawei na ki hok ka nongrim jong manla uwei pa uwei u nongshong shnong ka India. Ka la kdew ba ka jingpynphriang kam dei ka jingpynkylla niam. Ka riti synshar ka Ri ka la ai ïa ka hok ban pynphriang ne ïalap ïa ka niam lajong kaba mut ka hok ban ïakren ïa ka jingleh ngeit jong u briew sha kiwei pat lane ban pynpaw ïa la ka jingngeit. Kane kam mut ban pynkylla ïa u briew sha kawei ka jingngeit da ka bor, thok ne ban pynbeij. Namar katkum ka aiñ bad hapoh ki kyndon jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India, manla u ne ka briew ki long laitluid ïa la ka jingsngew bad laitluid ban ting ïa ka niam da ka jingleh kaba laitluid ha la ka jingmut ne ym don ba lah ban pynbor ïa u ban leh ïa kaei kaei kaba ym dei da ka jingjied la jong,” ong ka ATCCC.Ka ATCCC ka ong ba kam lah ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingthmu ne jingmut jong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Dr. HB Sarma kaba u la pynshai ha khmat ki lad pathai khubor. Lada ka jingthmu kadei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong baroh ki nongshong shnong khlem da kheiñ ïa kano kano ka niam bad ka jingpyrshang ban pynduh ïa kaba sniew na ka imlang sahlang bad ban wanrah ïa ka suk ka saiñ bad ka roi ka san, kumta ka jingmut bad ki kyntien hapoh ka Bill dei ban khmihbniah biang na kaba long mynta.“Namar shisien ba la mynjur ïa ka Bill lane kan long ka aiñ da ki kyntien ki bym ïahab kan lah ban pynshlur ïa ki briew ban pyndonkam da khong pong ïa ka aiñ bad pyndonkam bakla ïa ka, ha kaba khatduh kan long kaba kham sniew shuh shuh na kaba bha. Kumta, ma ngi ha ka kyrteng jong ka ATCCC bad baroh ki Khristan riewlum jong ka Assam ngi kyrpad ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Dr. Himanta Biswa Sarma ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshaniah bad ka jingmut jong ka Bill bad ban long pdeng katkum ka Riti Mane laitluid kumba la thoh hapoh ka riti synshar ka Ri India ka Article 25, haba mynjur ïa ka “The Assam Healing (Prevention of Evil) Practices Bill, 2024″ na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka jylla,” ong ka shithi ba la soi da u Rev. Dr. Solomon Rongpi, Enash Kumar Basumatary, Rev.Laban Pegu, Rev. D.C. Haia, President, Vice-President Rev. Sushil Daimari, Rev. Primingson Milick, Rev. Juron Baglari, Rev. Lazarus Deori, Secretary, Asstt. Secretary, Joint Secretary, Joint Secretary.
title: Kyrpad ka ATCCC ïa ka Sorkar Assam ban khmih biang ïa ka aiñ pynkoit bor jadu

content: Katba nang ïaid ki snem katta la nang kiew ka jingduk ha ka jylla Meghalaya. Mynta kane ka jylla ka long kawei na kiba duk tam ha ka ri India bad ka wan balai na tdong. Haba peit ïa kita ki nongthaw ain lane ki MLA kiba ngi jied pat, ngi shem ba ki kiew spah shaid shaid mar ïa shah jied. Ki la sdang sngaid bad ki iphuh iphieng ka leit ka wan. Kito lei lei kiba don ha ka liang synshar kim donkam ban pyrkhat kumba pyrkhat lem mangi baroh, kumno ban pyndap pynbiang ha iing ha sem.Ki lah biang nadong shadong namar ki lah shah thung Chairman, Vice Chairman bad Deputy Chairman ha ki Committee/Commission bapher bapher kiba khlem pynmih kam da ki phew snem. Kum ban shu kdew nuksa, kata ka Employment Generation Council kaba dei ban shong pyrkhat kumno ban pynmih kam pynmih jam, kam shym la shong mynta la bun bun snem. Uwei u MLA uba dei ban ai buit halor ka rep ka riang (Advisor on Agriculture) u ong ba ym pat khot meeting shisien ruh naduh ba u shah thung ha kane ka kam. Bad ki don bun kiwei pat kiba shem ïa kane kajuh ka jingshem. Lah thung haduh 188 ngut kum kine ki nongaibuit ïa ka sorkar (advisors) ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher bad ki ïoh ruh ka bai siew man u bnai lem bad kiwei ki jingsiew ruh, ryngkat bad ka kali bad ka petrol/diesel.Kane ka jingsiew ïa kitei ki 188 ngut ka ktah shibun eh ïa ka pla pisa ka sorkar kaba la long lypa kaba shim ram shi rynieng. Hynrei ngi ki paidbah ngi sngap mutlop ban ngim kren pyrshah ïa kine ki jingleh jingkam ka sorkar. Haba ki MLA liang pyrshah ki kdew ïa kane ha iing dorbar thaw-ain u myntri rangbah Conrad Sangma u ong ba ki sorkar kiba mynshuwa ruh ki thung hi ïa kum kine ki Chairman, Vice Charman, Deputy Chairman etc. Ha u snem 2004 bnai July, ka sorkar ha kato ka por kaba la ïalam da U Dr Manmohan Singh ka la pynmih ïa ka ain ba dei ban thung minister tang 15 na ka shispah (15%) ha ka sorkar kmie bad ki sorkar jylla ruh. Katkum kane ka ain ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei ban thung tang 15% na ka 60 ngut ki MLA. Kata ka mut tang 9 ngut ki lah ban ïoh bat ïa ka kam minister. Hynrei ym lah sngewthuh kumno ba ha ka jylla Meghalaya ki don haduh 12 ngut ki minister.Kawei na ki daw ba la pynmih ïa katei ka ain ka long namar ba ki sorkar ki shong syier tang namar ba ki MLA/MP ki kwah long minister bad ki ryngkoh seng na kawei sha kawei pat tang ban shah thung minister. Sa kawei ka long ban kham pynduna ïa ka jinglut jingsep ka sorkar namar man uwei u minister u hap ban ïoh bun ngut ki nongtrei, ar bad lai tylli ki kali, sa ka iing shong bad ka leit ka wan shabar jylla kaba dei ban siew da ka sorkar na ka pla pisa paidbah.Ka jingpynlut phut jong kane ka sorkar MDA-2 ka long kaba la kham palat bad ym lah shuh ban buddien ruh ïa kine ki jingpynlut. Tip don jingmih eiei mo na kine ki jingpynlut pisa? Haba leit sha ki nongkyndong pat ym ïohi eiei ruh. Ka surok kaba dang siang ha u snem ba la lah mynta ka la khoh lut bad la paw sa tang ki mawria bad u shyiap. Mynta la sdang ka thung ïa ki pipe um kylleng halor kata ka skim JJM hynrei imat ka pisa la pynlut ban thied ïa ki pipe um khlem da pyrkhat naei kan wan kata ka um. Ïa kane ka skim la dei ban wad jingtip shaphang ka rukom pyntrei kam. Wat tang ha Laitkor ruh bun ki bym pat ïoh um ha iing. Te ki shnong kiba kham sha kyndong leilei ynnai ïakren.Ha ka taiew ba la dep u myntri ka kam peit ïa ka bha ka miat ka imlang sahlang (Social Welfare) u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingshongkha khynnah dei ban teh lakam shisyndon namar dei kane kaba ïalam sha ki jingeh har rukom. Ïa kane lah dei ban pyrkhat naduh kham mynshuwa. Ki khynnah samla kynthei kiba dang 14-15 snem ki la ïoh khun haba tang ïalade ruh kim pat lah satia ban sumar. Nalor kata u shynrang na uba ki ïoh khun bun ba u iehnoh ïa la ka tnga bad khun. Ka kynthei ka poi sha ka ïoh lok biang bad ki khun pat ki ïoh kpa-nah. Lane lada ka kynthei ka shong marwei ruh ka hap ban wad lad wad lynti bad ban trei ïa kano kano kano ka kam tang ban pyndap bam ïa ki khun bad ïalade.Don katto katne ki samla shynrang kiba shna video bad pyni ïa ka Khyndailad ha ka por mynmiet bad kumno ba ki kynthei ki wad “customer” ban die ïa la ka met. Kane ka kdew ba ka jingduk ka la kiew shaba palat. Haba ka khynnah samla rit kynthei ka pep skul shiteng por bad ka ïoh lok noh bad lada u lok u iehnoh ïa ka hadien ba ka la ïoh khun arngut, kan leit shaei bad wad khaw naei? Ka hap ban wad bylla sngi bad ïa ki khun la shu iehnoh bad ki para marjan lane ki bahaiing. Don katto katne pat kiba shu kut ha kaba die met ban pyndap pynbiang ïa ki jingduna ha iing. Kito ki rangbah kiba kren bein ïa kum kito ki kynthei die met ki dei ban da pyrkhat bha ïa ka ka iing ka sem lajong ruh, ïoh lah ban wan jia kum kata ka apot.Kam long kaba suk ïa ka kynthei ba kan pynheh pynsan ïa ki khun tang marwei. Bun ki kynthei kim pyrkhat jngai ïa ka lawei. Ki shu kynrup kulmar ïa uno uno u shynrang, bunsien khlem da tip thikna ïoh dei uba la don lok lypa ruh. Tang mar ïashong la poi sa ka pun khun. Bad hadien nangta la bud sa tang ki jingeh. Lehse ban kha khun ka long kaba suk, hynrei ban pynheh pynsan bad khamtam eh ban phah skul ïa ki khun ka long kaba shitom lada ym biang ka kamai kajih. Bad lada kiba bun ki khynnah kim ïoh lad ban leit skul lane ki pep skul noh tang shiteng por kaei ka ban jia ïa ka lawei jong ki? Hato ngi ju pyrkhat sani bha mo ïa kine kiei kiei?Tip balei ngi long ka jaidbynriew kaba jyndong sat ka jingmut jingpyrkhat. Kito ki nongïalam balang bapher bapher ruh imat kim ju kren ïa kine kiei kiei kiba dei ban kren khamtam eh na ka bynta ki khun samla kynthei. Ym don ba pyni ïa ki khun samla kynthei ba ka don da kawei pat ka pyrthei lada ki pyndep hok ïa ka jingpule jong ki bad lada ki ïai pule sha ki kyrdan kiba kham shalor. Mynta wat ban seng ia ka kam lajong ruh donkam ban don ka jingnang jingstad, kumno ban pynïaid ïa kata ka kam. Kam dei kaba suk. Donkam ban nang ban khein ban diah bad lada leit ha ki bank ban wad ram ruh kham suk ia kiba lah don ka jingnang jingstad.Ka jingnang jingstad ka ai jingkyrmen ïa u/ka briew. Ki lah ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ïoh kam shabar jylla lada ym don kam ha kane ka jylla. Don shibun ngut ki samla shynrang bad kynthei jongngi kiba trei shabar jylla bad kiba ïoh ban phah pisa sha la iing.Ngi lah dei ban pyrkhat thymmai noh. Lehse ha ki skul ha nongkyndong ka duna ka jingbtin lynti (mentoring) jong ki nonghikai khamtam ïa ki samla rit bad samla heh kynthei. Kane ka long kaba donkam eh ha kane ka juk mynta nalor ba ki hikai ïa ki lynnong kot. Bun ki skul ha sor ki don ïa kita ki counsellor lane ki nongai buit ai bor bad batai kumno ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ka eh ka shon. Ki skul ha nongkyndong ruh ki la donkam bhai a kum kine ki counsellor.Ka sorkar ruh ka la dei ban kham pynleit jingmut halor kumno ban kyntiew ïa ka rukom hikai ha ki skul ha nongkyndong bad ban wanrah da ki nonghikai kiba tbit.
title: Ki jingeh bad ki diengpyngkiang hakhmat ka jaitbynriew

content: Shillong, Lber, 03: Uwei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Kynsailin Kharphanbuh ba ju khor ieid Bahïit, uba shong basah ha Lum Mawbah, Block -3, Upper Shillong, u la jah na la iing ha ka 1 tarik, Lber, 2024 naduh ka por 11:00 mynstep bad um shym la wan phai iing satia haduh kane ka sngi.Halor kane ka jingjah jong une u rangbah uba bat ïa u mobile number: 9402382844, ki bahaing hasem ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha ki Pulit jong ka Jhalupara Out Post.Ka Kong Barisha L. Mawlong ka la pyntip ruh ba u Bah Kynsailin Kharphanbuh u dei uba la don palat 60 snem ka rta bad ïathuh ruh ba u Bah kynsailin u phong da ka patlun jain rong dark grey bad ka sweater rong iong.Ki bahaing ki la kyrpad ïa ki kino kino kiba lap ne ïoh jingtip kin sngewbha ban pyntip sha ha u mobile number: 9774850875.
title: Jah u Bah Kynsailin Kharphanbuh na ïing

content: Shillong, Lber 03 : Ki paidbah nong Mawlai ki dang ïai bteng ban phaikhmat sha u MLA barim, bah PT Sawkmie haba ïadei bad ki jingdonkam jong ki hapoh shnong poh thaw.ïa kane la sakhi ha kaba u Bah PT Sawkmie u la aiti ïa ki tiar pynsawa sha ka dong Rumnong jong ka shnong Mawiong Umjapung ha ka sngi Saitjain ka 02 tarik u Lber, 2024 ha ïing u rangbah dong bah B. Wanniang ha ka jingdon ryngkat ka secretary seng longkmie ka dong, ka kong L. A. Kharshiing, ka executive committee bad kiwei kiwei.Haba ai jingkren u bah Sawkmie u la pynpaw ba ki paidbah nong Mawlai ki dang ïai phaikhmat sha u ha kine ki sngi kiba mynta, naduh ki dong, ki shnong, ki skul, ki sports club bad kiwei kiwei.U pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewkmen kaba shi katdei eh ba ki paidbah ki dang wan ïa kynduh ïa u, watla um longeiei shuh ruh, khamtam ïa ka dong Rumnong kaba la wan ban pynpaw ïa u haba ia dei bad ka jingdonkam jong ki ïa kine ki tiar pynsawa (PA System).U pynpaw ruh, ba um lah khlem da pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa ki paidbah nong Mawlai kiba la pynjop ïa u, lai sien kum u MLA bad shisien kum u MDC.U la pynpaw, ba kine ki dei ki dawbah ba la pynlong ïa u ba un ïai shakri ïa ki paidbah ka Constituency, wat hapdeng ka jingbym long ei ei shuh ruh.Haba pynkut ïa jingkren u bah Sawkmie u la kular ruh ban ai sa ar tylli ki top syntek ïa ka dong Rumnong.Na ka liang u rangbah dong haba ïa dei bad ki tiar pynsawa u la ai khublei bad pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa u bah PT Sawkmie, kumjuh ruh u rangbah shnong uba la ong, watla i long i tiar i barit ba u la pynioh, hynrei iba lah pat ban pynsawa ïa ki sur kiba heh hapoh dong, haba pynbna paidbah ïa ki jingdonkam jong ka dong.
title: Dang phai khmat ki paid Mawlai sha u Bah PT Sawkmie

content: Shillong, Lber, 03: Hadien ka jingjia ba itriem ha ka miet 20 tarik, Rymphang ha kaba ka la don ka jingïashoh ïadat kaba la poi ruh sha u pud ban sei tari bad ïadung, ki nongkitkam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Urkaliar ki la ïaid pahara ban pyntikna ba kan ym don shuh kaba kum kane ka jingjia hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong.Ki nongïalam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Urkaliar kiba la sdang ïa ka jingïaid pahara mynmiet naduh ka 24 tarik, Rymphang haduh mynta da ka jingsynran lang jong ki Pulit ka Nongmensong Police Out Post.Naduh ba la jia ka jingïashoh ïadat ha ka 20 tarik, Rymphang, ka Dorbar Shnong marmar ka la lum da ka jingïalang ha ka 24 tarik, Rymphang bad shim ruh da ka rai ban ym shah shuh ban die jingdie palat ïa ka 10:00 baje mynmiet shaneng bad ha kajuh ka por ka Dorbar Shnong ka la thaw ruh da ka Village Defence Party (VDP) bad la bthah ïa ki trai dukan ba ki dei ban pyndait ïa ki CCTV hakhmat ki dukan jong ki.U Secretary ka Dorbar Shnong Urkaliar Bah Samborlang Diengdoh ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor u la ïathuh hadien ka jingïalang kaba la long bad ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong RM KUrbah ka Dorbar Shnong ka la rai ban pynlong da ka jingïaid pahara hapoh ka shnong ha ka por mynmiet khnang ba pynthikna ba kan ym don shuh kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih hapoh ka shnong ka thaw ha kaba ki longkmie bad ki rangbah ki la shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban peitngor ïa ka shnong ka thaw da ka jingsynran lang jong ki Pulit.
title: Hadien ka jingïadung tari, ïaid pahara ka DS Urkaliar bad ki Pulit

content: Shillong,Lber 03 : Ka Executive Committee jong ka Kur Sten Dorbar Pyllun Meghalaya-Assam kaba la long ha ka ha ka 02.03.2024 ha Shillong da kawei ka jingmut ka la ïakut ban phah khubor kitbok kitrwiang sha baroh ki samla jong ka Kur kiba ïaleh ïa ka HSSLC & SSLC Examination 2024 ka ban sdang naduh mynta ka sngi. Ka Kur ka la pynmang lypa ïa ka “Professor HW Sten Excellence Award man la ka snem sha ki Toppers jong kino kino ki Public Examination. Lah ruh ban pynkynmaw ba ka Kur ka la ïoh ban sam ïa katei ka Award la sawsien sha ki samla jong ka Kur kiba la pass bha ha ki line bapher bapher naduh ka snem 2011, kata; sha U Covertis Sten na Tyrso, ka Jessica Sten na Jowai, U Ardamon Sten na Barato, ka Sucia Gracia Sten na Nongrim Nongladaw. Ïa kane ka Kyrwoh la phah da u Bah Finely Sten,General Secretary & Bah Gilbert Sten President jong ka Kur.
title: Yn ai khusnam ka Kur Sten ïa kiba passbha ha ki Examination

content: Shillong, Lber 03 : Ka Seng Karbi (Mikir) Traditional Faith (Religion) Association (KTFA) ka la pynshai ba hadien ba ki la ïoh sngew ïa ka jingrah jong u MLA ka Nongpoh ha Iing Dorbar haba ïadei bad ka jingshong syier ki paidbah ha ka thaiñ Marmaiñ ki kwah ban pynshai ba kim don bynta ei ei halor katei ka kam.Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u President bad Secretary ka Seng la ong hadien ba ki la ïohsngew na ki Social Media ki la pyrshang ban wad jingtip hapoh ka shnong bad ha ki jaka ba marjan, kim shym la lap sabut ei ei ruh em ba ka don kum kata ka jingtah poster hapoh shnong ne hangno hangno ruh.“Kumta ngi sngewdei ban pynshai ba katei ka khubor ka long ban ïalam bakla, bad ngi kyrpad shaphi ki nongshong shnong jong baroh kawei ka jylla ban nym sngewthuh bakla,” ong ka kyrwoh.Haba pynshai pat halor ka voice mail ki nongïalam ka Seng ki la kam ba na ka liang ka KTFA ki la payrshang ban wad jingtip bad kim shym la ïoh kano kano ka sabut ba don kum kita kiba kren ha ka voice mail.“Haba ïadei bad ka jingkynnnoh ba la shim rai ban phah weng ïa ki stashu na ki iingskul kam long kaba shisha bad ym shym la don satia kaba kum kata ka rai. Hynrei ha ka jingïalang ha katei ka sngi ka long tang ka jingïasyllok haba shit ba shai ha khmat ki paidbah paidlang baroh kumno ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jingngeit Niam Tynrai sha kine ki thaiñ,” bynrap biang ka kyrwoh.Nalorkata haba pynshai haba ïadei bad ka jingkynnoh ba don ka jingïadei bad ka seng Sanmilato Samatan Samaj na Assam, katei ka kynhun ka la ong ba ki kwah ban pynshai ba kim don jingtip ne jingïadei ei ei ruh em shaphang kane ka Seng hynrei ki dang shu ïoh sngew na ka Voice Mail.Shuh shuh la ong halor ka Traditional symbol, kum ka seng kim don kano kano ka jingtuklar ne hukum ban weng, hynrei ki shaniah ha ka bor jong u Syiem Hima Dumura (Doomora), kum u Syiem u Kmie ban pynbeit ïa kane ka kam.Kumta, halor kane, ka Seng KTFA ka ong ba ki kyntu ïa ki bor pynïaid distrik ba lada don kum kita kiba pyndik, ki bor distrik ki dei ban leh ïa kaba donkam bad kum ka seng ki kular ban ai ka jingïatrei lang bad ki bor pynïaid distrik ban ym ailad ïa kum kita kiba wan pynkulmar ha shnong ha thaw.
title: Kyntait ka KTFA ba donkti wanrah shongsyier ha ka thaiñ Marmaiñ

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 03: Ka long kaba sngewphylla ban tip ba ka jaka theh ñiut ha ka shnong Tuberkmai-shnong East Jaiñtia Hills District kam don satia kano kano ka jingsma iwtung kaba mih na ki ñiut kiba la lum thup bad ki nongtrei kiba trei ha kane ka jaka theh ñiut ki shimkhia bha ban pynïakhlad ïa ki ñiut bad pynthikna ruh ba kim dei bad tuid pathar sha ki um ki wah kiba don hajan ka jaka theh ñiut.Ha kane ka jaka theh ñiut ha Tuberkmai-shnong, ki don ar ngut ki longkmie, ka Kong Thliangmon Sana bad ka Kong Tiknabha Phawa kiba pynïakhlad ïa ki ñiut kiba pyut bad ki ñiut ki bym pyut bad kiba shimkhia bha ban lum ïa ki ñiut ha ka rukom kaba beit bad ba ryntih bha. Ïa kine ki arngut ki longkmie la siew tulop da ka Dorbar Shnong Tuber Kmai-shnong.Haba ïakren bad u Mawphor, u Waheh Shnong ka Tuberkmai-shnong Bah Miki Lyngdoh, u la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka don jingthmu ban thungkam shuh shuh ïa ki briew ha kane ka jaka theh ñiut namarba ka kam ka long kaba bun.U Bah Miki Lyngdoh u dei ruh u briew uba sngewtynnad bha ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka khuid ka suba ha ka shnong ka thaw, kumjuh ruh ki nongshongshnong ki dei kiba ju ai ka jingaitreilang manla ka por bad ka Dorbar Shnong ban wanrah ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba.Hapdeng kine ki jingïaid lynti, ka shnong Tuberkmaishnong ka la shah jied kum ka Model Village bad lyngba kane, u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Abhilash Baranwal u la pynïoh ïa ka jaka theh ñiut kaba bit ba biang bha hapoh shnong kumjuh ruh ka kali kit ïa ki ñiut na ki ïing ki sem kiba don hapoh shnong.Kane ka kali kit ñiut ka dei ka bym pyndonkam ïa ka umphniang Petrol ne Diesel hynrei la pynïaid da ka bording elektrik bad ïa u nongñiah ïa ka kali ruh la siew tulop da ka Dorbar Shnong, la ïathuh u Waheh Shnong.“Nga sngewtynnad bad sngewkmen bha ba kane ka projek ka wanrah ym tang ïa ka khuid ka suba hynrei ka wanrah ruh ïa ki lad ïohkam ïohjam ïa ki nongshong shnong,” la bynrap u Bah Miki Lyngdoh.Ki longkmie kiba trei ha ka jaka theh ñiut ki la ïathuh ba ïa ki plastik kim ju thang hynrei ki lum shi jaka, ki thang ha ka ding tang ïa ki dieng lyngkhot lyngkhai, ïa ki ñiut kiba pyut kum ki snep jhur ki buh shi jaka ba kin ïoh pyut ban ïoh pynkylla sboh.“Ngi sngewtynnad ba ngi trei hangne bad ha kane ka jaka kam don satia kano kano ka jingsma iwtung watla ki ñiut ki wan poi na ki shnong ruh hynrei ym don jingsma. Ngim da donkam eh ban pyndonkam ïa ki Mask (jingda khmut) namarba kam don ka jingsma iwtung bad ngi khmihlynti ba ngin neh ha kane ka kam,” la ong kine ki arngut ki longkmie.Ki la ïathuh ba ki ñiut ki ju poi ar sien shi taiew bad haba poi ki ñiut ki ju pynïakhlad noh ïa ki kiba pyut bad ki bym pyut la ka jong bad ki lum bha shi jaka, ki don ruh ka jingthmu ban shna ne pynmih sboh na ki ñiut kiba lah ban pyut ha kaba ïa ka sboh lah ban pyndonkam da ki nongrep kiba don hapoh shnong ban pyndomkam ha ka thung ka tep.Ïa ki ñiut ki bym pyut kum ki plastik bad ki bitor la lum bad thep bha shi jaka khnang ban dup pynpoi ïa ki sha ka jaka ba dei ban pynpoi, namarba ka shong ka ju phah ïa ki ñiut sha ka karkhana pynmih dewbilat jong ka Dalmia Cement kaba don ha Thangskai ban thang ïa ki ñiut ha ka pajwa barhem khnang ba kan ym pynjakhlia ïa ka mariang.Ki longkmie ki la ïathuh ruh ba la siew tulop ïa ki da ka dorbar shnong bad ong ba ka la long ka jingmyntoi shibun eh ïa ki ban pyndap ha ïing ha sem bad ki la pynpaw ruh ba ki trei ïa ka kam da ka mynsiem kaba kmen.
title: Ka Tuberkmaishnong kum ka Model Village, pynïoh u DC da ka kali kit ñiut elektrik

content: Shillong, Lber 03 : U MP ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ Rajya Sabha na ka Jylla Meghalaya, u Dr W R Kharlukhi u la mang pisa 10 lak tyngka na ka skhim MP jong u ban shna ïa ka jaka jngohkai ha Rit Lwai ha ka shnong Nongjrong hapoh Mawkynrew Constituency.Kane ka jingnoh synñiang u Dr Kharlukhi ka la long myn ha ka 02 tarik u Lber, 2024 ha ka jingleit jngoh ïa katei ka shnong ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, MLA ka Mawkynrew, u Bah G Dhar, BDO ka Mawkynrew C&RD Block, ki ophisar, ki nongïalam shnong lem ki riewrangbah.Kum ban shu kdew ba ka shnong Nongjrong ka la paw sha khmat ha ka jingkhring ïa ki nongshangkai pyrthei namar ka jingdon ïa ka jaka peitkai ba ki kjat sngi ki itynnad bha ha ka por mih sngi mynstep halor u lyoh ha ki them ka Wah Umngot kaba ker pyllun ïa katei ka shnong.U Bah Banteidor da kaba ai khublei ïa u Dr Kharlukhi, u la ong, “Nga dap da ka jingsngewnguh ïa ka jingwan ïuh kjat u MP Rajya Sabha ba don burom ha kane ka shnong kumjuh ïa ka jingai jingïatreilang jong u ban kyntiew ïa ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ha ka thaiñ”.U la ong ba ka jingnoh synñiang u MP Rajya Sabha ka long ruh hadien ka jingsakhi jong u ïa ka jingjop ka tamasa Escape To Nongjrong ïa kaba la dep pynlong ha ka 16 bad 17 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 harud ka Wah Umngot.Shuh shuh, u Bah Banteidor u la kyntu ïa baroh kiba ïa don bynta ban ïa snohkti lang ban kyntiew ïa ka kam jngohkai ha ka thaiñ namar ka dei hi ka bynta jingtreikam kaba lah ban wanrah ki lad ïoh kam ïa ki khun samla bad kyntiew ruh ïa ka ïoh ka kot.U MLA u la pyntip ba u la dep ïakren bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, u Conrad K Sangma ba un noh synñiang na ka bynta ka jingshna ïa katei ka jaka jngohkai bad u ruh un noh synñiang ban shna ïa ka da kaba mang pisa na ka skhim MLA.U Bah Banteidor, uba bat ruh ïa ka kam kum u President ka Mawkynrew Tourism Sociable Society (MTSS), kaba la jop ha ka ban pynlong ïa ka tamasa Escape To Nongjrong bad kaba khmih ïa ki kam ban kyntiew ïa ka kam jngohkai ha Mawkynrew, u la ong ba ka Society kan shna ïa ka Information Centre ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka tnad Tourism ka Sorkar Jylla na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki nongwan jngohkai.“Na ka Society ngin pyrshang ban ai jinghikai ïa ki samla ha ki bynta bapher bapher kiba ïa dei bad ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ba kin long ki lad kamai na ka bynta ki khun samla”, la ong u Bah Banteidor uba la ai khublei ruh ïa baroh kiba la don bynta ha ka ban pynlong ïa ka tamasa Escape To Nongjrong kaba jop bad kaba shongkun shi katdei.
title: Noh synñiang u MP Rajya Sabha 10 lak ban pynitynnad ïa ki jaka jngohkai ha Nongjrong

content: Shillong, Lber, 03: Ha kine ki sngi la ïohi ba ïa ka jingtrei ïa ka surok nakhmat jong ka ophis ka Meghalaya Public Service Commission (MPSC) ban poi shakhmat ka ophis jong ka Passport Ophis kaba la sdang ha u snem 2022 ha Lower Lachumier mynta ka la sangeh biang.Hynrei ïa kane ka jingtrei ka la sdang ha u snem 2022 kaba dei ruh kaba la jan kut snem bad ynda poi hakhmat jong ka skul All Saint ka la sangeh bad kane ka la pynlong ïa ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr.Ampareen Lyngdoh ban leit ban jurip ïa kane ka jaka bad hadien kane ka la sdang biang ka jingtrei.La ïohi ba ka jingtrei ka la ïaid beit haduh ban da poi shakhmat ka ophis jong ka Passport Ophis hynrei sa ban mih sha surok kane ka jingtrei mynta ka la sangeh biang, kane ka jingsangeh ka la buh ïa kiba pyndonkam ïa kane ka surok ha ka jingeh namar ki don ki ophis sorkar ha kane ka surok kiba pyndonkam ïa kane ka surok ban leit ban wan.Halor kane la ïohi ruh ba ka jingsangeh ïa ka jingtrei kaba dei jong ka Smart City ka dei ka jaka ïeng kali kaba ha Motphran kaba la dep ban pynpra bad mynta ka jingtrei kala sangeh ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jaka ïeng kali.Ïa ki daw jong kane ka jingpynsangeh ban pyntrei ïa katei ka jaka ïeng kali ha Motphran ym pat lah satia ban tip.Kane ka jaka ïeng kali ha Motphran hadien ba la dep ban pynpra la ïohi pat ba mynta ka la sah ha ka jingkhong reng bad ba la shu iehnoh kumto.Kiba bun na kiba ju pynïeng kali ha kane ka jaka khamtam kito kiba ju kamai sha Jaïaw, Polo, Lamali bad kiwei ki la pynpaw ïa jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingpynsangeh ïa ka jingtrei namar ba ki la ong ba lada la lah ban pyndep kloi ïa kane ka jingshna kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa baroh.
title: Sah khongreng biang ka jaka ïeng kali ha Motphran ba sangeh jingtrei

content: Shillong, Lber 03 : U President ka National People’s Party (NPP), Meghalaya bad Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong ula ong ba ki jingkynnoh ba dei ka seng NPP bad u Conrad K Sangma kiba long ki diengpyngkiang ne ki nong khanglad ne nongpynwit ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba Phra ka long ka bym don nongrim bad ka bym shisha hynrei ka dei tang ka jingthmu ban ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah ka jylla.U Bah Prestone ula kynthoh ïa kane ha ka jingïalang jong ka NPP-Pynursla kaba la pynlong ha madan Urksew, PHE ha ka sngi saitjain kaba long kum shi bynta ka jingsdang ïa ka jingïalap election ha katei ka constituency na ka bynta ka kyrtong MP jongka NPP ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh.“Ki jingkynnoh kiba bun jait ki la mih bad saphriang, hana ba khanglad u Conrad Sangma bad ka NPP namar ba ka ktien Garo ka khlem rung ha ka thup kyrteng, hai re hai ito iba kren iba pli i kren kum iba tip tangba im tip ba i kren batip ïa kaba im tip ei ei ruh em ani ka jingkren stad haduh katta katta” ong u Bah Prestone.“ Ngan shu ïathuh ïa phi ki paidbah , ba ka ba khatduh eh kaba ka Sorkar India ka la pynrung ïa ki ktien ha ka Eight Schedule ne Khyrnit kaba Phra ka dei ha u snem 2003-04 lait nangta ym don shuh” ula bynrap.U Bah Prestone ula ong ba ki don sa kumba 40 tylli tam ki jait Ktien kiba ka Sorkar India haduh mynta kam pat lah ban rai bad kawei na kita kadei ka Ktien Khasi.Une u Nongialam ka NPP ula ong bad katba ki briew ki dang tim bad ki dang ïalam bakla, ka seng NPP kan dang kiew arshah namar ka NPP ka ngeit tang ha kawei ka nongrim kata ban shakri ïa ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya.“Paidbah jong ka Pynursla wat shah pynbiej bad nga thikna bha lada dei ba phi shah pynbiej nga la dei ban rem ha kane ka elekshon MLA 2023 pynban phi nang pyndon burom ïa nga da kaba pynjop don burom ïa nga bad ai ba ka Pynursla Constituency kan dang ehrngiew kan dang ehdaw” ula ongKa jingkren ito i kong ka la ialam bakla shi katdei eh namar la mih ki jingkynthoh pyrshah kiba har rukom hana ba u Conrad u sniew, u bah Prestone u dei u nongdie ri hynrei ko ki paidbah ka Pynursla wat shah pynbiej ne shah ialam bakla.U Bah Prestone ula ong ruh “Ngin pynbna mynta ia ka khubor ba ka jingwan nyngkong jong I Kong Ampareen ha Pynursla ngin pynthikna ba in dei ma i i ban long MP jongka Party. To ngin mih na kane ka madan da ka mynsiem kaba shitrhem ban trei shitom ban pynjop don burom ïa I Dr Ampareen”.Nga i shyrkhei ïa kine ki paralok jongngi kiba pyrta ha surok nga ieit jaidbynriew bad nga isynei ïa ki khun samla jong ngi kiba shah ïalam bakla. Nga kynmaw ba ki don ki para nongïalam kiba pyrta myn shem snem hakhmat Addl. Secretariat kiba ong ko Bahduh Prestone phi la ieit palat ïa ka Constituency to ieit teng ïa ka Jaidbynriew, ïathuh ïa nga mynno nga die tad dor ïa ka jaidbynriew. Tangba ïakren Reservation Policy ka mut la ieit jaidbynriew. Kynmaw lada phim nang ka buh ha ka jingma mano bym kwah ban ïoh kham bun ka reservation wat ha ïing hasem ruh kwah ban ïoh kham bun hi em kumta ka long ruh kumjuh na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew ruh tangba ngi dei ban nang ban khlong ïa ka ksing ngap namar lada ym nang ïoh shah dait ne shah kynthah kylla ha ki ngap. Don ruh kiba ong ba ka jaidbynriew ka don ha tmier nga te nga ong em kam don ha tmier hynrei ka jaidbynriew ka nang kiew irat na kawei ka snem sha kawei pat ka snem. Namar ha u snem 1972 ka mang tyngka ka long tang 5 hajar klur tyngka bad mynta ka long 27 hajar klur tyngka kaba mut ngi la nangkiew bad hapoh ka jingïalam jongka NPP ngin dang ïai kiew nad lada jop lei lei ïa ka MP kan kham kloi ban tuid ka roi ka par sha ka jylla Meghalaya jong ngi na kata ka daw nga kyntu to ngin ïatrei shitom ban ïoh ïa ka jingjop ba don burom”.Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren na ka Kyrtong MP ka NPP ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ruh ka Myntri Sorkar, Bah Wailadmiki Shylla, Bah Gavin Mylliem bad Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri bad ha katei ka jingïalang la wan ban ïadonlang ki heh nongïalam ka NPP, ki nongïalam ka NPP Pynursla bad ki paid nongkyrshan na ka thaiñ Pynursla.
title: Ka NPP kam dei ka diengpyngkiang ban ïoh jingithuh ka ktien Khasi, la shu kynnoh khlem nongrim : Dy CM

content: Tilak Maidan, Lber 04: Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Shillong Lajong ka la mad ïa namrem kaba 5 sien mynta ka samoi ha ka lympung I-League 2023-24 hadien ba ka la shah pynliem da 2-1 kol ha Churchill Brothers ha ka jingïakhun kaba la long shabar nala ïing ha madan Tilak Maidan hynne ka Lah Sngi U Blei.Ka jingïakhun ka long kaba itynnat bad kaba shongshit hapdeng kine ki arliang mamla, ha kaba baroh ar ki la ïakhun tyngeh naduh ba sdang ban ïoh pynkhihjar. Ka la don ruh ka jingïakynad hapdeng ki player kaba la ïalam shaduh u pud ba u referee un sei red card ïa arngut, uwei na ka liang jong ka Churchill Brother bad u wei na ka Lajong.Ha ka jingïakhun, ka Churchill Brothers ka la ïoh ban lamkhmat nyngkong ïa ka jingïakhun tang hadien 15 minit ba la ïaid ka por lyngba ka kol ba la thep da u Stendly Teotonio Fernandes.Hadien ba shah lamkhmat da shi kol, ka Lajong ka la pyrshang katlah katïai ban ïoh pynphai ha kaba ka la ïoh ïa shibun ki kabu kiba la sepei tad haduh ynda la jam sha ka 42 minit ba u Phranki Buam u la ai mynsiem ïa ka kynhun da kaba pynïakhaid shuwa ban kut ka kylla step.Ka jingïakhun ka la nang khluid ha ka kylla kaba ar, bad kumba katto katne por arngut ki player, u Ronaldkydon Lyngdoh Nonglait jong ka Shillong Lajong bad u Lamgoulen Hangshing jong ka Churchill Brothers ki la shah sei red card ha ka minit ba 68, kaba la pynlong ïa kine ki ar kynhun ban duna sha ka 10 ngut.Ha ka 80 minit u Martin Chaves u la ïoh ban thep ïa ka namtam na bynta ka Churchill Brothers kaba la pynthikna ïa ka kynhun ban khur pura ïa ki lai point na kane ka jingïakhun.Da kane ka namjop ka Churchill Brothers ka la ïoh ban kyntiew 20 point ïalade ha ka miej na ki 17 sien ïakhun bad ka shong ha ka kyrdan ba 9, katba na ka Lajong ka dang ïaineh ha ka kyrdan ba hynriew da 26 point naki 17 sien ïakhun, ka duna da shi point ban knieh kyrdan ba san na ka Inter Kashi.Ka Shillong Lajong FC kan ïakhun biang la 9 tarik mynta u Lber pyrshah ïa ka Aizawl FC shabar nala ïing ha ka por 4:30 baje nohphaisngi.
title: Da ka said pynliem ka Churchill Brothers ïa ka Lajong

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 03: Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba long ka kynhun jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hill State Peoples Democratic Party (HSPDP) kiba dang pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha, ki la mad ïa ka jakhom khait hadien ba ki nongkitkam bad ki dkhot jong ki ar tylli ki Unit ka UDP ha Sutnga-Saipung Constituency ki la mih noh na party.U Publicity Secretary jong ka UDP na Sutnga Saipung Constituency Bah Marshall Biam bad u President ka UDP na Unit Hingaria Bah Ting Khonglah, u President UDP na Unit Natbor Bah L.Suchen bad u Secretary UDP Unit Natbor Bah S.P.Suchen bad ar phew ngut ki dkhot ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai ki la phah ïa ki shithi iehnohkam jong ki sha u President ka UDP bad phah kopi ruh ïa ki shithi iehnoh sha u MLA barim jong ka Sutnga Saipung Constituency Bah Shitlang Pale.U Bah Marshal Biam, ha ka shithi iehnohkam, u la pynpaw ba kane ka jingiehnohkam jong u lem bad ki dkhot ka dei kaba ki la ïa rai lang da kawei ka jingmut ba ki kwah ban weng noh ïalade na ka jinglong dkhot hapoh ka UDP na ki daw bym lah ban kiar.Ki arphew ngut ki dkhot na Natbor bad na Hingaria Unit kiba la weng noh ïa ka jinglong dkhot bad ka UDP ki kynthup u Bah Long Khonglah, Bah Seli Surong, Bah Commingsoon Pohtam, Bah Ïohsuk Rymbai, Bah R.Bareh, Bah Pir Pohshulet, Bah Kiang Pohtam, Bah Stelin Surong, Bah Hep Talang, bah Rit Pohshulet, Bah Phili Rymbai, Bah Three Khonglah, Bah Pynhun Bareh, Bah Lamiki Mulang, Bah Obinash Pohplet, Bah Youluti Pohlong, Bah Tipsngi Surong, Bah Elbrit Khong-muloh, Bah New Pohshna bad u Bah Michal Sohkhlet.Kine ki dkhot bad ki nongkitkam kiba la iehnohkam bad weng noh na ka jinglong dkhot na ka UDP ki la pynpaw ka dei na ki daw bym lah ban kiar.
title: Shwa ka elekshon MP, mih noh ki nongïalam ka UDP na ki Unit ka Sutnga-Saipung

content: Ka thma ktien halor ka jingbym ïoh rung ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra jong ka Riti Synshar ka la sdang, haba ka Dr. Fnella Lyngdoh Nonglait, kaba long ka nongsaid aiñ, ka la kynnoh ba dei ka jingleh ka MP na Tura bad kiba don ha ka bor synshar kaba la khanglad ïa Ktien Khasi ban ïoh jingithuh ha ka Riti Synshar jong ka ri, da kaba ong ba ki la leit ban pyrshah ia ka jingbym ïoh rung ka Ktien Garo ha ka thup jong ki ktien ban ithuh da ka riti synshar jong ka ri.Hynrei na liang ki nongialam ka NPP, ki la pynphai kylla ia kane da kaba kyntait ba kadei ka jingkynnoh kaba khlem nongrim. Mano badei mano ba lait, ym tip, hynrei lehse tang kita kiba don ha ka bor synshar jong ka ri India kiba tip ïa kane. U paidbah hangne u shu peitkai ïa kane ka jingïapyni nia kiba heh ba haiñ. Hynrei na ka liang uba bun baling hi um kwah ban ïohi ïa kane, u kwah beit lano ka ktien Khasi bad Garoh kin ïoh rung noh ha ka Riti Synshar jong ka ri, lyngba ka Khyrnit kaba phra.Nangta mih ruh sa ka jingkynthih na ha Social Media baa k HANM ka la leit pynthut ban ithuh ïa ka Ktien Khasi da kaba leit dawa ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi bad Garo hana ba dei ba ka la bei tyngka da ka Seng NPP. Ka HANM ka la ujor da ka ejahar halor kane jingshah kynnoh ha ki Social Media.Ha ka jingshisha, ka jingïakhun ban ïoh rung ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar jong ka ri India, ka la ïai bteng bad ym tang ba ka ïai bteng, hynrei la nang pynlyngngoh ruh ïa kiba bun, balei hadhuh mynta kam ïoh satia ia ka jingkular na ka sorkar pdeng ba kan sa pynrung noh ne ban ai noh ka jingithuh ha ka Riti Synshar jong ka ri katkum ka Eight Schedule.Naduh ba la mih ka jingdawa ban pynrung noh ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka riti synshar, kaba la sdang naduh shuwa ba ka Meghalaya kan ioh la ka jong ka jylla haba ka District Council ha u snem 1967 ka la pass ia ka Resolution ban dawa ban pynrung noh ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar. Hadien ki jingdawa ki la nang iai mih bad ka la kham jur haba ka Khasi Author’s Society ruh ka la buddien ban tynruh ïa kane ka kam ym tang na ka sorkar jylla, hynrei wat shaduh ka sorkar pdeng ruh kumjuh.Ha ki snem kiba hadien bad khamtam hadien ba ka Meghlaya Legislative Assembly, ka la pass ia ka Resolution bad phah sha ka sorkar pdeng, kiba bun kiwei pat ki kynhun bad ki Party ruh ki la shimkhia ban pynjur ia ka jingdawa. Ha ka snem 2023 shuwa ka elekshon MP, ki MP ka Seng Trinamool Congress ki la rah ia kane ka mat ha Parliamentm, ha kaba u MP ka TMC ha Rajya Sabha, u Derek Obrien, u la rah ha Rajya Sabha. Nangta ki MP ka Congress ruh ki la pynlong ka Demonstration hakhmat ka Parliament ban dawa na ka bynta kane kajuh ka mat.Ha us nem baladep, na kaliang KAS ryngkat ki nongmihkhmat na ka jylla bad ki Sengbhalang ki la pynlong ka Seminar bad kumjuh ruh ka jingdawa ha nongbah Delhi ban pynsngew sha ki bor sorkar halor ka jingdawa ban pynrung noh ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra. Ki heh sorkar jong ka jylla naduh u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, nangta u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, Chairman ka State Planning Board bad kiwei ki la ïashim bynta lang ha ka jingiakhih ha Jantar Mantar. Khyndiat sngi hadien kane, la kiew sa ka Seng HANM kaba ym tang ba ka la pynlong ka jingkhih ha Jantar Mantar Delhi, hynrei ka la lei tai ruh ryngkat ka jingthih sha ka tnad Ministry of Home Affairs.Ha kane ka dorbar mangtyngka ba mynta , u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad Sangma, u la ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka la phah haduh phra tylli ki shithi ban ithuh noh ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri India, hynrei kaba sngew diaw ka long ba ka sorkar pdeng kam shym la jubab eiei halor kane bad ka sngap man man. Na ka jingiathuh u Myntri Rangbah la sngewthuh ba ka sorkar pdeng kam buh satai kano kano ka kyndon ia ki ktien ban pynrung ha ka riti synshar ne ban ioh jingithuh nih ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri.Kumta ka long kaba sngewlyngngoh kaei pat ka jingeh ba ka sorkar pdeng lyngba ka tnad kam pohïing kam sngap ïa kane ka jingdawa na ka jylla Meghalaya wat lada kadei ka jingdawa kaba la palat sanphew snem. Hato kadei ba ka sorkar pdeng kam kheiñ snep ia kane ka jylla lane kam pat i long ban ithuh noh ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra?. Lada kam pat I long kadei na kadaw aiu?, haba ym don kano kano ka kyndon kaba la buh ban ai jingithuh ia ka.Kumba long mynta ka ktien Khasi kadei kawei na ki 38 tylli ki ktien kiba la ap lain ne kiba don ha ka list ban ithuh noh ha ka riti synhshar jong ka ri India. Ka jingioh rung ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra kumba la ju batai na ka por sha ka por ba ka wanrah shibun ki jingmyntoi, ha kaba ki samla ka jylla ki lah ban thoh eksam noh na ka Khasi. Nangta ki lah ban ïaleh interview da ka ktien la jong, kata ka ktien Khasi. Nangta kan long ruh kum ka jingplie lad na ka bynta ka ïoh kam ïoh jam lyngba ki Translation bad kiwei kiwei.Kumta ka long kaba donkam ban ïatreilang ym ban ïakynthih bad wad daw pynban na ka bynta ban pynbor ïa ka sorkar pdeng ban pynrung noh ïa ka Ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Riti Synshar ka ri India.
title: Balei mih ki jingkynthoh ha jaka ban ïakhun pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit ba Phra

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 4: Ka One Stop Centre kadei ka Skhim lane ka lad jingïarap kaba la bei tyngka da ka sorkar pdeng lyngba ka Ministry of Women and Child Development (MWCD). Ka dei ka jaka ai jingïarap ïa ki longkmie ne ki kynthei ba don18 snem ka rta, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah thombor ne shah leh beiñ ha la ka jong ka longïing, jaka trei ne ha shnong ka thaw kum ka jingshah ktah kti, leh beijot, shah leh beiñ ne kren beiñ kaba ktah ïa ka jingmut jingpyrkhat bad ka ïoh ka kot.Ki jingïarap ki long ha kiba bun ki bynta, ka jingïarap kaba long kyrkieh ne ka bym kyrkieh, ka jingleit synran shapoh ki jaka sumar haba pang ne mynsaw jur, ka jingïarap kaba dei bad ki lynti jong ka aiñ, ban ai jaka sah shi por, kumba 5 sngi ei ei, ki jingïasyllok bad ki jingkynpham haba don ha ki jingeh ne haba ktah ka bor pyrkhat.Ki don bun ki lad ki lynti ban pyntip ne poi sha ka One Stop Centre bad kita ki long ba ki Kynthei kiba shah thom bor, ki lah ban wan mih dalade ne lyngba jong ki briew kiba lah ban synrang lang ïa ki, ne ki briew kiba don ka mynsiem ban ïarap ne lyngba ki Nongtrei Sorkar, kiba haïing hasem, ki paralok parajor, ki sengbhalang, ki volunteer ne lyngba u helpline number 181 ba ïatreilang bad ki pulit, ambulance bad kumta ter ter.Ban ïoh ïa ki jingtip kiba kham bnïah halor kane ka skhim, wanmih sha ka ophis jong ka One Stop Center ha GAD Quarter type VIIAB quarter No.3 (B) Deputy Commissioner Eastern West Khasi Hills, Mairang.
title: Ka Jingtip Shaphang ka ONE STOP CENTRE

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 04: U MLA Mawsynram Constituency, u bah Ollan Sing Suin u la ai ka jingkitbok ïa baroh ki khynnah bad ki samla pule jong ka Constituency kiba ïa leh ïa ka SSLC bad HSSC Examination mynta u snem 2024.Ha ka kyrwoh khubor, u bah Ollan Sing Suin u la ong ruh ba un dwai ba U Blei Un long ryngkat bad ki, kiba long ki khun ki hajar jong u ba baroh ba kin ïoh ban pass bad ban poi sha ki jingpass kiba sha khmat.“Wat la ngam lah ban ïa kynduh bad phi iwei pa iwei shim ïa kane ka jingkhublei bad kitbok jong nga ïa phi baroh bad U Blei Un long ryngkat bad phi iwei pa iwei bad phin ïoh ban khet ïa u soh uba thiang jong ka jingjop”, pynkut ka kyrwoh na u bah Ollan Singh Suin, MLA ka 25-Mawsynram Constituency (ST).
title: Kitbok u MLA ka Mawsynram ïa ki khynnah ba ïaleh eksam

content: Shillong, Lber 03: Ki pulit ka Jylla ki dang trei shitom mynta ban kthong ïa ka jingpyrshang jong ka kynhun lehnoh GNLA ba la pynduh ba kan ym lah ban khie khlieh biang.“Ngi dang buddien mynta bad ngi dei ban lah ban pynpra biang ïa ka jingpyrshang jong ki ban khie khlieh biang,” ong uwei u heh pulit.“Ngi suba ba dei ki dkhot ba la rim jong katei ka kynhun kiba donkti ha katei ka kam namar dei ma ki kiba tip bad ïoh ruh ïa ki tiar siat bad kiwei kiwei,” u la ong.Hynrei u la ong pat ba bun na ki tiar ïaleh jong ka GNLA la dep ïoh kurup lut ha ki snem ba la dep, kata kynthup ïa kito kiba buhrieh bad don ruh kiba ki pyrshang ban die noh.La ïathuh ba na ka liang ki pulit ki dang peitngor bad buddien ïa kito ki dkhot ba la pyndem wait hadien ba la mih khubor halor ka jingkhie im biang jong ka GNLA.Dang shen u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ba dei peit ïa ka tnad Kampohiing ka jylla, Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka tnad pulit kan shimkhia ban pyntikna ba ka GNLA kan ym lah ban khie khlieh shuh ha rilum Garo.“Ka tnad pulit ka jylla ki la peitngor bha bad ngin pyntikna ba kane ka kynhun kan ym lah ban khie khlieh shuh,” ong u Bah Prestone Tynsong.
title: Yn kthong ki Pulit ban ym lah khie khlieh biang ka GNLA

content: Shillong, Lber 03 : Ka sorkar jylla ka la rai ban pynkhuid kumba 1,50,000 ton ka jaboh jabaiñ kaba lang ha jaka ñiut ha Marten lyngba ka juk stad mynta lane da kata ka bio-mining bad value recovery.“Ban pynkhuid ïa ki jaboh jabaiñ ba la don slem, ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka tnad Urban Affairs ka la khot ïa ka jingtyrwa ha ka 18tarik Kyllalyngkot na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka bio-mining bad value recovery kaba kot palat 1,50,00 ton (metric tonne) ka jaboh. Kane ka kam ka dang ïaid shakhmat mynta,” ong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ba peit ïa ka tnad Urban Affairs, Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka jubab (unstarred questions) ba wanrah ha ka Dorbar Mangtyngka kaba dang shu kut shen.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka bio-mining kan ïarap ban pynkhuid ïa ki jaboh ba la slem bha lyngba ka value recovery bad kumta kin sa pynthymmai ïa katei ka jaka theh niut.U pyntip ruh ba ka sorkar jylla ka la shim ïa ka sienjam ban wad jaka na ka bynta ban buh ïa ka jaka pynkhuid ïa kitei ki jaboh bad ruh ka jaka ban bret ïa ki jaboh.“Ki don katto katne ki jaka kiba la dep jied bad ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ka Environment Impact Assesment and Mitigation Plan ka la ïaid shakhmat,” ong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah da kaba kdew ba ïa mynta ka jingïakren bad kito kiba leh ïa ka kam ka dang ïaid lyngba ka tnad Urban Affairs.Ka jaka theh ñiut ha Marten kadei tang kane kawei ka jaka ba ka nongbah baroh kawei ka leit ban theh lut ïa ki jaboh jabaiñ ïa kaba ka Shillong Municipal Board ka la sdang naduh ki snem 1938.La ïathuh ruh ba nalor ka jingtreikam jong ka Compost Plan ha Marten kaba ngiam haduh 170 ton ha ka shisngi ka la don ruh ka jingbret ïa ki jaboh ha ka rukom jong ka juk mynta ha ka jaka kaba heh haduh 15000 square meter.Ka sanitary landfill ka dei ka jaka bret jaboh na ka bynta kito ki jakhlia ba la shah kyntait.Ïa ka bynta ba trai eh jong katei ka jaka bret niut ka kynthup ruh ïa ka kynja dewbyrtha (geosynthetic clay) kaba 900mm bad shi syrtap ka HDPE Geomembrance kaban ïada ïa ka jingtuid ka um sha rud kaba lah ban pynjaboh pat ïa ka tyllong um.Nalorkata, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba ka jingpynkhuid ïa ki jaboh na ki jaka sumar (bio medical waster), la pyndait da ka Common Bio Medical Waste Treatment & Disposal Facility (CBMWTDF) bad treikam ha Marten, Shillong ha ka jaka kaba heh 2009.06 square meter.
title: Kumba 1.50 lak ton ka jaboh pynkhreh ka Sorkar ban pynkhuid na Marten

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 4: Ka tnad Fisheries jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ha ka jingïalam jong I Kong A.L.Mawlong, MCS Director of Fisheries, Meghalaya, ha jingïadonlang jong I Bah L.G.Marboh Kharmih MCS, Joint Director of Fisheries, Meghalaya, Bah D.B.Kharwanlang, Assistant Director of Fisheries, Bah P.S.Tariang, Assistant Director of Fisheries, ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki Ophisar bad ki nongtrei jong ka tnad Fisheries, ha ka 1 tarik Lber 2024, ki la ïoh ban plie ïa kawei ka jaka buh bad thep Dohkha ha ka shnong Myrïaw kaba hap hapoh jong ka Mawthadraishan C&RD Block, kaba la ïoh jingïarap lyngba ka PMMSY 2021-22.Ha kane kajuh hi ka sngi, la ïoh ruh ban plie ïa ka kor shna jingbam Dohkha kaba la ïoh jingïarap lyngba ka CSS Blue Revolution 2018-19 ha Mawthengkut bad ar tylli ki Fish Sanctuary 2021-22, kaba la ïoh jingïarap lyngba ka Meghalaya State Aquaculture Mission (MSAM) 2.0 ha Malangkona, jong ka Mawshynrut C&RD Block.
title: Plie ka tnad Fishery ïa ka jaka buh bad thep dohkha ha Myrïaw

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 04: Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewphylla namar naduh ba la plie ïa ka top-um ha u snem 2022 haduh mynta ka jingpynpoi um kam long kumba la bhah kata ban ïoh manla ka thliew ïing hynrei kam long kumta la mang.Katkum ka jinglum jingtip jong u nongthoh khubor ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka bynta la lap ba ka jingbym biang ka umbam umdih ka dei ha kawei ka dong Me-ïa-wan kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Nonglang, South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba ha kane ka dong naduh ba la plie ïa ka top-um ha u bnai Kyllalyngkot jong u snem 2022 da u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, uba bat ïa ka kam kum u Myntri jong ka tnad um-bam um-dih ha kane ka snem, ka um ha ki longïing longsem kam da long kaba biang kumba la bhah.Shuh shuh katkum ka jingïathuh jong ki longïing kiba sah ha katei ka dong ki la pynpaw ba kane ka jingbym biang ka buh jingeh shi katdei namar kumba ka long mynta ba ka jingkyrduh um ka long shaba palat hynrei kiwei pat ki pahuh te hato kam dei ka jingleh shiliang khmat dano re? Ki la buh jingkylli.Namarkata, ki la buh ka jingkyrpad ïa ka ophis ka Public Health Engineering (PHE) jong ka Mawkyrwat Division ba kam dei ban shu sngap me peit kai halor kane ka jingeh hynrei ka dei ban da wan jurip ym ban ai jingtip lypa hynrei ban wan jurip kynsan kynsan ne surprise inspection namar lada ai jingtip lypa ki nongpeit kin sa pynkhreh lypa ïa ki jingdonkam.“Kumba ka la jia ha ki bnai kiba la dep ba ka don ka jingwan jurip bad la ai jingtip lypa bad ha kata ka por ka um ha kane ka dong ka pahuh kumba long lem kiwei”, ki la pynpaw.
title: Pahuh um tang lada lah tip ba don ba wan jurip ne inspection

content: Jowai, Lber 4: Ka West Jaiñtia Hills District Cricket Association, Jowai ka khot bad wer ïa kino kino ki kynhun napoh ka District ban wan ïashim bynta haka ‘District Cricket League 2024’.La pyntip da u General Secretary ka WJHDCA ka bai Entry Fee ka long 4,000/- hajar tyngka kawei ka team. Ka bai Registration jong ki player na ka bynta kawei ka kynhun hapoh 15 ngut haka dor 100 tyngka uwei player.Ka Match Format ka long 35 over, ïa ka bai Affiliation fee (fresh) ka long 1000/- kawei ka team, katba ka bai Affiliation Renewal fee ka long 500 tyngka kawei ka team, ka tarik ba khadduh ban pdiang ïa katei ka bai Entry, Registration bad Affiliation Fees kan long ha hapoh ka 20 tarik u Lber, 2024. Ka jingpynkhalai ïa ki teams ha ka 20 tarik hi ha ka por 4 shiteng janmiet.Na ka bynta ka bai Transfer fee jong ki player ka long 300 tyngka uwei player bad ka tarik ba khadduh ka long haka 14 tarik Lber, 2024.Ïa ki jingtip ba khambiah lah ban phone ha kine ki No 7005666802, 9863043885, 8729912904, 7005217560.
title: Wer ka WJHDCA sha ka District Cricket League

content: Jowai, Lber 04: U Deputy Commissioner (Supply), jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ula pynbna paidbah ba la pyllait ïa u khaw rashon uba hap hapoh ka NFSA (AAY & PHH) bad ka Non-NFSA na ka bynta u bnai Lber, 2024, yn sdang ban pyllait noh sha baroh ki Fair Price Shop Dealers naduh ka 11th Lber, 2024 haduh 14th Lber, 2024.Ïa u khaw AAY yn sam 35 kilo kawei ka long ïing (ym donkam siew pisa), ïa u khaw PHH ka long 5 kilo shikhlieh (ym donkam siew pisa). Katba ïa u khaw Non-NFSA ka long 7.215 kilo kawei ka card ha ka dor ba ym duna ïa ka 14/- shi kilo.Kumta la bthah ïa ki Fair Price Shop Dealers ba kin leit shim ïa ki permit na ka ophis u DC bad ban sam pyndep ïa u khaw hapoh ka 10th Lber 2024, khlem pep, da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki e-Pos machine da ka online mode.
title: La pyllait ïa u khaw AAY, PHH bad Non-NFSA ha West Jaiñtia Hills

content: Jowai, Lber, 04: Ka jingai dawai Polio ïa ki khynnah rit hapoh ka rta san (5) snem ne ka ‘Intensified Pulse Polio campaign’ kala sdang mynta ka sngi hapoh ka District West Jaiñtia Hills, ha kaba u Assistant Commissioner Shri. S. Phanbuh ula wan ban plie ïa kane ka prokram ha MCH Hospital Panaliar, Jowai.Na ka liang u S. Phanbuh haka jingkren uba kyntu ïa ki kmie ki kpa ba kin sumar bha ïa ki khun ki kti kiba dang hapoh ka rta ba san snem bad ban ïalam ïa ki sha ki booth centres ban ïoh ïa kane ka dawai Polio kaba long ka lad jingïada ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki khynnah.Ka Dr. Helen J Uriah, District Maternal and Child Health Officer kala pynsngew shaphang ka jingdonkam ban ai ïa kane ka dawai sha ki khynnah rit khnang ba kin lad na ka jingpang kaba ktah na ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met.Shuh shuh ka Dr. Helen kla ong ïa kane ka jingai dawai la leh ha baroh ki Polio booths centres kiba la buh ha ki dong bapher bapher hapoh ka sor Jowai, kumjuh ha ki Health centres bad ha ki shnong nongkyndong.Kane ka jingai dawai Polio kan sdang naduh mynta ka sngi 4 tarik ban yn pyndep ha baroh kawei ka ka District ka ban bteng haduh ka 6 tarik u Lber, 2024 ka jingleit mih sha ki ïing kan long haka 5 bad 6 tarik u Lber, 2024.Nalor ka District Medical & Health Officer Dr. Evalyneda B.V Laloo, ki Doctors bad ki Nurses jong ka MCH Panaliar, Jowai kila wan ban ïadon lang ha kane ka sngi.
title: Sdang ka jingai dawai Polio ïaki khynnah rit hapoh ka rta 5 snem

content: Nongpoh, Lber 04: Ka Umdohkha Government LP Skul kaba dei kawei naki skul kaba la rim haka thaiñ Umdohkha kaba la seng naduh u snem 1953 kala ioh ïaka jingpynmang pisa ba thymmai kaba haduh 44 Lakh ban shna da ka skul building kaba thymmai bad 4 lakh naka bynta ki tiar ki tar naka tnad pule puthi hadien ba katei ka skul kala jot bad pei bad kaba la I sangsot ban pynlong skul khamtam haka por slap.Ïa u mawnongrim ban tei da ka iingskul ba thymmai la leit ban plie paidbah mynta ka sngi da u Bah Mayral Born Syiem MLA ka Nongpoh kum u kongsan haka jingdonlang u Bah Balajied Ranee MDC ka Nongpoh, ka kong P L Nonglait, District School Education Officer, Ri-Bhoi, PP Yadav BMC, Umling Block, ki nongtrei naka tnad pule puthi, ki nongkitkiam bad ki Nonghikai skul, ki kmie ki kpa lem bad ki khynnah skul.U Bah Mayralborn Syiem, kum u kongsan u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingwan ban buh ïa u Maw-nongrim ka long ban ïathuh sha ki paidbah ba ka jingtei ïa ka ïing building kaba thymmai jong kane ka skul kan sa sdang noh sa tang khyndiat por bad lyngba jong kane ka program ki paidbah kin ïoh ruh ïaka jingtip kaba shai ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka jingtei ïa kane ka building skul kaba la donkam shikatdei ban tei thymmai ïaka iing skul kaba la jot rathai bad pei thliew.U la ong ruh, ka jingnang jingstad ha kane ki juk mynta ka long kaba kongsan haduh katta katta, bad dei halor kane ka sorkar jylla ka phai khmat kyrpang sha ka tnad pule puthi khnang ba ki khun samla kin ïoh ïaka jingnang jingstad kaba biang.U la ong ruh, ban nang kyntiew ïaka jylla ngi donkam ban kyntiew shuwa ïaka jingnang jingstad khnang ba kin nym don kiba sahdien.U Bah Mayral u la kitbok ïaki nongpynïaid jong ka skul Umdohkha ba kin nangtrei shitom ban kyntiew ïaka jingnang jingstad hapoh katei ka shnong bad kumjuh ruh ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul ba kin peit pyrman bha ïa la ki khun ki kti ba kin leit tista sha la ki skul ryngkat ka jingkyntu ïaki khynnah skul ba kin iai minot haki jingpule jong ki ban kiar ruh naki kam sniew kiba lah ban ïalam shaka jingjot.
title: 48 lak pynmang ka tnad pule puthi ban tei thymmai ïa ka iing skul ba la jot ha Umdohkha

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 04 : Ka Dorbar Shnong Langja, West Khasi Hills bad ka seng Hynñiewtrep Youth Council, hynnin ka miet sngi U Blei, ki la leit kyndang ïa ki bar jylla kiba wan trei hapoh ka Post Office jong ka shnong Langja.Ka Dorbar Shnong bad ka HYC ki la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra hynnin ka miet por 9 baje ei ei hapoh Shnong bad lap ïa ki katto katne ki bar jylla, kiba la wan trei hapoh ka Post Office khlem da don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang kynthup ka No Objection Certificate (NOC) na ka Shnong.Ha kane ka jingkhynra, ka Dorbar Shnong ka la lap ba ki don ki briew kiba kam kum u Sordar Shnong, u ba la ai NOC tuh sha kitei ki bar jylla. La ïathuh ruh ba tang namar ka jingleh une u briew u ba kam Sordar Shnong, ka la mih ka jingïania kaba jur hapdeng ki para nongshong shnong kiba pyrshah bad kiba ïashah ïa kine ki bar jylla bad kiba la ai ïing sah wai ruh ïa kine ki briew.Halor kane ka jingshem, ka Dorbar Shnong bad ka HYC ka la leit ban ujor da ka ejahar ha u Officer Incharge ka Langpih AD Camp pyrshah ïa une u briew. Ka Dorbar Shnong bad ka HYC ka la dawa ïa ki bor ka aiñ ba kin kem mardor ïa u ne u briew u ba leh ïa katei ka kam bymman bad ban ai ka jingpynsajia ba tyngeh.
title: Kyndang ka Dorbar Shnong bad HYC ïa ki bar Jylla ba trei ha ki Post Office

content: Shillong, Lber 04: Ka Confederation of Ri Bhoi People (CoRP) sengkmie ka dawa ia ka MeECL ban pyntreikam noh ia ka Sub Station ba 33 KV ha shnong Umsong, Ri Bhoi District, khnang ba ki paidbah ka thain Ri Bhoi sepngi kin ioh bording ilektrik thikna kumba long kiwei ki jaka.Ha ka jingjurip ka seng ka la lap ba katei ka sub station ba 33 KV la shna naduh u snem 2004 na bynta ai bording ha ka thain Ri Bhoi sepngi, hynrei haduh mynta ka dang treikam kum ka sub station ba 11 KV, kumta ki paidbah ka thain kim ju ioh thikna ka bording ilektrik bad bun ki shnong ki shong dum, kumba long mynta ka jingduh light ka long khah khah ha ka thain bad kane ka lah ban dei na ka jingtlot ka bording ilektrik namar la pyntreikam da ka 11 KV ha jaka jong ka 33 KV.Ka seng ka pynpaw ka jinglyngngoh ba ki bor MeECL ki la iathuh ha ki snem ba la dep ba katei ka lain ka la poi haduh Lailad, hynrei haduh mynta kam pat pynpoi ha shnong Umsong. Kumta ka kyntu jur ia ka MeECL ban pyndep kloi ia ka lain bording ba 33 KV, khnang ba ki paidbah ka thain kin ioh tikna ia ka bording ilektrik.Halor kane ka seng kan sa buddien balei ka MeECL ka shim por da ki snem ban pyndep ia ka lain jong ka 33 KV na Nongpoh sha Umsong, kane ka pynpaw ba ka MeECL ka jingkhein sting ia ki paidbah ka thain Ri Bhoi sepngi. Namar wat ka ophis jong u SDO kaba la mang ban buh ha Patharkhmah haduh mynta kam pat pyntreikam.Ha ka jingleit jurip ki nongtrei ka MeECL ba dei peit ia katei ka sub station, ki la iathuh ba la pyntreikam shipor da ka lain ba 33 KV, hynrei hadien katto katne bnai kam shym la treikam shuh na ka jingthud ki sainar namar ia ka lain la pyniaid na khlaw bad la palat 6 snem ka treikam tang da ka 11 KV bad kane ka buh jingeh ban pynbiang bording ia ki paidbah ka thain.Ka seng ka kyntu ia ka MeECL ban pyndep kloi noh ia ka lain 33 KV na bynta ka jingbit jingbiang ki paidbah ka thain Ri Bhoi sepngi, la pynkut ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Bah Gershome Hat Vice President ka CoRP.
title: Dawa ka CoRP ïa ka MeECL ban pyntreikam noh ia ka Sub Station 33 KV ha Umsong

content: Shillong, Lber 04 : Ki nongïasaid aiñ kiba hapoh ka shatri jong ka Shillong Bar Association ki la ïoh ïa ka Shlem treikam ba shipor kaba don markhap bad ka ïing bishar ba don burom ka Meghalaya High Court.U nongthoh khubor haba ïoh ban ïakren bad u Bah T. L. Jyrwa Secretary ka Shillong Bar Association hynne ka sngi Nyngkong ka 4 tarik Lber 2024 hapoh ka kamra treikam kaba shipor, u la ïathuh ba ka High Court ka ai ia katei ka shlem treikam tang na ka bynta hynriew bnai.U Bah T. L. Jyrwa u la ïathuh ba hadien ka jingshah bam duh ka ophis treikam kaba don hajan ka DC ophis, na ka liang ka Association ka la pynlong ka jingïakynduh kaba kyrkieh bad kyrpad ïa ki bor badei peit ban ai ïa ka shlem treikam khnang ba ki nongïasaid aiñ kin ïoh ban pyndonkam ban pynïaid shaphrang ïa ki kam.U la pynpaw ka jingai khublei bad sngew nguh ïa ka Meghalaya High court, Myntri ka tnad aiñ bad ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma kiba la sngewthuh ïa ka jingeh jong ki nongïasaid aiñ kiba la duh noh ïa ka ophis bad khamtam ïa ki kot ki sla ha kaba ki la ai ïa katei ka shlem treikam kaba shipor.Kumba la sngewthuh ban ïoh ïa ka shlem treikam kaba thymmai kan dang kham shim por, kumta u Bah T.L. Jyrwa u buh ka jingkyrpad ïa ka High Court ba lada kut ki 6 bnai kan kham pynjlan shuh ïa ka por namar kam dei kaba suk ïa ki ban pynïaid shaphrang ïa ki kam ki jam lada khlem ka shlem treikam.U la ïathuh ba ka ki dkhot kiba la pynrung kyrteng ïalade bad ka Shillong Bar Association ki don 12 spah ngut tam.Kum ban pynkynmaw hangne ba ha ka miet jong ka 24 tarik Rymphang 2024 ka ding kaba klang ka la bam duh ïa ka Shillong Bar Association kaba la wanrah ka jingduh kaba khraw ïa ki nongïasaid aiñ ba ki kot ki sla ki la ing lut.
title: Ïoh ki nongsaid aiñ da ka shlem treikam ba shipor hajan High Court hadien ba pluh ka SBA

content: Shillong, Lber 04 : Ka kynhun jong ki nonghikai SSA hapoh ka lama jong ka Meghalaya SSA Schools’ Association (MSSASA) ha ka sngi Nyngkong ka la bteng biang ïa ka jingdawa ba dei ban thaw ïa ki post bad pynkynrïah noh ïa ki 12,541 tylli ki kam nonghikai SSA na ka State Implementation Society sha ka State Education Department katkum ki kyndon jong ka RTE/SSA.Halor kane, ka kynhun ka la leit ruh ban kynduh ïa u State Project Director Samagra Shiksha u Swapnil Tembe ban pyndap ïa kitei ki kam nonghikai ba lait ha ki skul lower primary bad upper primary. Na ka liang u President ka MSSASA, u Bah Aristotle C Rymbai u la ong ba ka association ka la dep phah ruh ïa ka jingthoh sha u chairpersno ka state education commission ha ka 01tarik Risaw 2023 ban thaw ïa ki post bad pynkynriah noh ïa ki 12,541 tylli ki kam nonghikai SSA na ka State Implementing Society sha ka State Education Department katkum ki kyndon ka RTE/SSA.La ïathuh ba na ki 12541 tylli ki nonghikai SSA, 5814 tylli ki dei ki nonghikai ha ki lower primary bad 6727 tylli pat ki dei ki nonghikai Upper Primary kiba trei hapoh ka mangtyngka jong ka Samagra Shiksha Abhiyan ba tip mynshwa kum ka Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan.U la ong ba na ka liang u Member Secretary ka Commission u Ambrose Ch Marak u la pyntip ba ka Commission ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jingthoh na ki bad mynta ïa kane la phah pat sha ka sub committee ban bishar bniah.“Kumta, ngi kyrpad ïa baroh ki nonghikai SSA ba kin ai ka jingïatrei lang bad ka association naba ka jingïakren bad ka sorkar ka dang ïaid,” u la ong.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u haba ïadei bad ki kam nonghikai kiba lait, la ong ba ki don 22 tylli ha ki lower primary bad 89 tylli pat ha ki skul upper primary.
title: Pynkynriah noh ïa ka kam nonghikai SSA sha ka tnad Education ka jylla, dawa ka MSSASA

content: Baghmara, Lber 4: Ka Baghmara Civil Hospital kaba don ha South Garo Hills, kaba dei tang ma ka, ka jaka sumar jong ka sorkar ha ka District kala treikam mynta la bun bun snem bad shen yn nang pynkhlaiñ ïa kane ka jaka ai jingsumar da kaba yn tei shuh shuh ïa ka hospital ka ban ngiam sa 150 tylli ki jingthiah. ïa kane la mang tyngka da ka tnad DoNER 15 klur tyngka, pyntip u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma.U Myntri Rangbah ula pynbna ïa katei mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei ha ka jingplie ïa ka Academic Block bathymmai bad ia ka Hostel ki kynthei bad hostel ki shynrang jongka Captain Williamson Memorial Government College.Haba ai jingithuh ïa ka jingdonkam ban pynïar ïa ka jingtei bad ki jingdonkam ha Baghmara ha kaba ki nongpang kiba wan na jngai kum na Maheskola, Mahadeo, Rongara bad Siju kin ïoh ïa ka jingsumar, u Conrad Sangma ula ong, ba ka sorkar ka tyrwa ban buh sa 150 tylli ki jingthiah lyngba ka Projek kaba thymmai.“Ngi lah dep ban aiti ïa ka jingtyrwa sha ka DONER Ministry ha ka jinglut jingsep ka ban kot T.15 Klur na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka Baghmara Civil Hospital khnang ban don sa 150 jingthiah” ong u Myntri Rangbah.Katkum ka jingtyrwa, u Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ban mang sa T.5 Klur na ka bhah tyngka jong ka jylla na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka jaka sah jong ki doctor, nurses bad ki nongtrei ha ka Hospital.Ula pynpaw ba ka lah ban don ka jingslem na ka liang ka DONER Ministry ban pynbna ïa katei ka projek namar ban long ka elekshon hapoh ka ri bad ula pynpaw ïa ka jingkyrmen ba katei ka projek kan sdang ha u snem 2025.
title: Mang ka DONER 15 klur ban tei sa 150 jingthiah ha Civil Hospital Baghmara

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 04: Ki riew runar ruser ki la pynïap dusmon ïa uwei u nongñiah tourist taxi ha Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills hynne ka miet shiteng synñia. Kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por kumba 12:15 baje eiei ha Kynroh Taxi Stand, ong ki Pulit kiba pyntip ba une u nongñiah kali tourist ba kamai na Nongstoiñ-Shillong, u dei u ba la tip kyrteng u Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani 29 snem ba shong ba sah ha ka shnong Upper New Nongstoiñ.Na ka liang kiba haïing hasem haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, ki la ïathuh ba ha kane ka miet, u Macborn u dang shu dep pynhiar lut ïa ki briew kiba wan na Shillong bad thmu ban leit phai noh sha la ïing. Hynrei haba poi ha steshon kaba don ha katei ka jaka, saw ngut ki briew ki la ker kut ïa u bad ki la kynroi ryngkat ka tim sih tim sang.Kiba haïing ki ïathuh ruh ba ha katei ka por, uwei u briew u la dung da ka wait na ki bynta jong ka shadem jong u Macborn haduh ba u la kyllon beit khrup ha madan. Ki ong ba haba ïoh jingtip ïa kane ka jingjia na ka jingkren phone, ki la mareh wut wut sha kane ka steshon, ha kaba ki la lap ba u la thiah lyngktar ha madan. Hadien kane ki la pynkit noh mar mar ïa u sha Nongstoiñ Civil Hospital, hynrei ynda poi ha kane ka jaka sumar, ki doktor ki la pyntip ba une u samla u la khlad.Na ka liang ki ba haïing hasem ki la leit ban ujor ïa ka ejahar halor kane ka jingjïa bad ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra kaba jur ha ka thaiñ, ha kaba ki la ïoh kem ïa uwei u briew ba suba donkti u ba la tip kyrteng u Medius Mawlot na ka shnong Mawkaton.Ki Pulit ki ïathuh ba u Medius u la phla ba u dei u ba dung ïa u Macborn. Ka jingtohkit mynta ïa kane ka jingjia ka la ïaid shakhmat ban lapdien sa ïa kiwei pat kiba donkti lang.
title: Shah kem uwei ba suba pynïap dusmon u samla ha ki riew runar ha Nongstoiñ

content: Shillong, Lber 04: Ki Shipai BSF ki la ïai bteng ka jingkhynra ne ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ki marbam na Meghalaya sha Bangladesh.Ha kine ki 24 kynta kiba ladep, ki BSF ki la ïoh ban kurup haduh 33,000 Kilo ka shini ba la thmu ban khaïi tuh sha Bangladesh lyngba ki jaka khappud jong ka Meghalaya (South Garo Hills), India sha Bangladesh.Ki kynhun shipai BSF jong ka 200 Batatlion, hadien ba ki la ïoh jingtip ba ka don ka jingthmu ban khaï tuh ïa ki marbam, ki la leit ban khang kdong ïa kane ka jingkhaïi beaiñ bad ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang ba ki Pulit, ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa kane ka shini kaba la buhrieh ha kawei ka ïing kaba khlem shong briew shuh kaba don ha Rongra Area.Kawei pat ka jingïoh kurup kadei kaba la ïoh da ki shipai kiba ïaid pahara ha ki bynta jong ka Baghmara. Hadien ba la suba ïa kawei ka trok ba kit shini, ki BSF ki la bat ïa kane ka trok. Hynrei u draibar bad kiwei pat kiba don ha kali ki la phet noh bad iehnoh ïa ka mar ba kit ha ka trok. Na ka liang ki BSF ki la kurup noh ïa kane ka trok bad ka shibi ba la kit ha kane ka trok da ka jingthmu ban khaïi sha Bangladesh bad aiti sha ki Pulit kiba don ha katei ka thaiñ.
title: Bteng khynra mar khaïi tuh ki BSF, kurup 33 hajar kilo ka Shini

content: Shi spah snem mynshuwa, ha u ‘nai Lber ka snem 1924, uwei u pukir Khristan uba don nam ka Ri India, u Sadhu Sundar Singh, u la wan ïaid pilgrim sha ki Lum Khasi. Ka jingwan jong u ka long ban ïalap bad ïasam lem ïa ka Gospel bad ïa ka jingshem mynsiem jong u hapdeng ki paid Khristan kiba don ha Ri Khasi. Ha kane ka jingthoh, nga ai khublei kyrpang ïa kine ki rangbah, kita, Babu Horju Roy Khongwir, Capt. H. Lyngdoh, Babu Joel Gatphoh, Babu Kubur Singh bad Rai Sahit D. Ropmay kiba la pynshitom ban buh ha ka jingthoh ïa kane ka jingwan jngoh. Kine ki rangbah ki la pynkylla Khasi, ki la lumthup shi jaka bad pynmih ïa ki jingïalap ktien Blei jong u Sadhu Sundar Singh kiba u la kren ha ki Balang bapher ha Ri Khasi bad ha ki jingïaseng paidbah jong ka Presbyterian Assembly ha ka snem 1924.Ban rakhe kynmaw ïa ka jingdap shi spah snem jong ka jingwan jngoh jong u Sadhu Sundar Singh, nga wanrah sha phi ki nongpule ïa kane ka jingthoh shaphang une u pukir Khristan ka Ri India bad ïa kane ka jingthoh la pynshong nongrim ha ki kot ki sla kiba lah ban shem. Ka long ruh kaba sngewtynnad ba nalor u Sadhu Sundar Singh, ki don sa kiwei pat ki riewkhraw kiba la wan jngoh bad pynlong Ïing ha Ri Khasi, kaba kynthup ïa u myllung ka Bengal, U Rabindranath Tagore uba la wan ha ka snem 1919, u nongïalam jong ka Indian National Army, u Subhas Chandra Bose uba la ïuh kjat ha ka snem 1927 bad 1938. Nangta, u scientist uba khraw, u C.V Raman, uba la shong bad thied ïa ka Ïing ne ka “Rao Bhavan” ha Kench’s Trace ha ki snem 1920.Ka Shillong bad ka Ri Khasi ha ki snem 1920:Ha ki snem 1920 ka Ri Khasi ka hap hapoh ka jingsynshar jong ki British bad la kynthup ïa ka hapoh ka Assam Province. Katkum ka khanasamari jong ka snem 1921, ka jingdon ki paid Khasi bad Synteng (kumba la kdew ha ka kot Census 1921) ha Assam ki long baroh 124,053 (shi lak ar phew saw hajar bad san phew lai) ngut. Ka paw ruh ba ka don ka jingkiew ha ka jingdon ki Khristan bad ka long ar shah ha ki shi phew snem, kata 1911-1921. Ha ka snem 1924, ka jingdon ki dkhot ka Balang Presbyterian ha Ri Khasi-Jaiñtia ka long 37,693 (lai phew hynñiew hajar hynriew spah khyndai phew lai) ngut.
