Ha ki snem 1920 la sakhi ïa ka jingkylla kiba bun ha ka Ri Khasi bad ka jingkiew rasong ka Balang Khristan kaba la suh thied lynga ki skul, ki hospital bad ki kam ïalap.Katkum u K.D Saha, “ha ka por ba ka Assam ka ïasoh bad ka Sorkar Bilat ha ka snem 1826, ka Sorkar British ka pyrkhat ban pynïasoh ïa ka Sylhet bad ka them jong ka Brahmaputra lyngba ka Khasi bad Jaiñtia Hills…bad u David Scott, uba long u agent jong ka Sorkar Company na Bilat, u la thaw ïa ka surok lyngba ka Khasi-Jaiñtia hills. Shuh shuh ha ka snem 1862, la thaw ïa ka committee ban wad ïa ka jaka kaba biang tam ban pynlong kum ka jaka pdeng ne ka nongbah. Nalor ki jaka kiba bun, ka Committee ka shem ba ka jaka kaba ki khot mynta ka Upper Shillong ka long kaba bit ban pynlong kum ka jaka treikam na ka bynta ki kam paidbah bad ka jaka ha Ïewduh kan long ka jaka ban buh ïa ki shipai European kiba la shong thait ne ki bym lah shuh ban trei bad ïa ki len shipai. Kumta ha ka snem kaba bud, ha ka 1863 ka Sorkar British ka la soi ïa ka Sorkular ne ka Dulir bad U Syiem Mile Sing jong ka Hima Mylliem. Lyngba kane ka Soskular ka Hima Mylliem ka la ai ïa ki katto katne ki jaka raij kaba la tip kum ka Shillong Land, Nongkseh Land bad Shillong-Laban Land sha ka Sorkar British. Ñiuma, ki don ruh ki Ri kynti kiba ka Sorkar British ka la shu thied na ki trai khyndew”.Ka jingroi bad jingïar jong ka Shillong ka la sdang naduh ka snem 1874. Ka long kaba dei ban kynmaw ba ha ka snem 1874 ka Sorkar British ka la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna paidbah ha ka 6 Rymphang bad 12 Nailar ba la phiah ïa ka Assam na ka Bengal bad thaw ïa ka Province kaba thymmai, kata ka Assam Province hapoh ka jingkhmih jong u Chief Commissioner kum u khliehduh. Kumta kum ka Nongbah jong ka Province bathymmai, kha ma kha ka Shillong ka la kylla long ka ïing bad ka shnong bah jong ki jaitbynriew kiba pher kiba la wan buhai shnong kum ki babu sorkar, katba kiwei pat ki wan kum ki nongkhaïi bad ki nongbylla ban kamai jakpoh. Nalor ki trai muluk hynñiewtrep, kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew kiba la wan buhai shnong ha Shillong naduh kitei ki snem ki long ki Assamese, Bengalee, Bihari, Nepali, Rajasthani, Punjabi bad kiwei. Ha khanasamari jong ka Sorkar la kdew bad shat phalang ïa ka jindon bad jingsaphriang ki jaitbynriew bapher kiba shong shnong ha Nongbah Shillong.Nalor kiwei ki jaitbynriew, nga kwah ban kdew hangne ïa ka kynhun jong ki Mazhabi ne Dalit Sikh, kiba long ka kynhun kaba la wan shong trei ha Shillong na ka bynta ban pynkhuid ïa ka jaboh jabaiñ jong ka Nongbah bad ki jakhlia kiba mih na ki tyngkong ïing jong ki nongshong shnong. La ju tip ïa kine da ki nongsar surok, ki nongpynkhuid bad nongkit ïa ka jakhlia ne ki metor jong ka Shillong. Ym lah ban tip thikna ïa ka snem ne ki snem ba ki wan buhai shnong nyngkong eh, hynrei kane ka kynhun jong ki Mazhabi Sikh ka la wan ban shakri ïa ka Nongbah naduh ka por jong ka Sorkar British. Ha ka article, “The Sweepers of Shillong”, kaba la pynmih da ka tnat Anthropological Survey of India 1979, u Jayanta Sarkar u la batai da ki dak jingkheiñ halor ka rukom wan buhai shnong bad nangno kine ki Mazhabi Sikh ki wan? Ka paw shai kdar ba ki Mazhabi Sikh ki dei kiba wan na ki ar tylli ki District ka Jylla Punjab, kita ki long ka Amritsar bad Gurdaspur. Ka jingshem lanot jong kane ka kynhun ki Mazhabi Sikh kiba dei ruh ki jait kiba poh bad kiba trei ïa ki kam pynkhuid jakhlia ka ïai bteng haduh kine ki sngi. Kumba u Himadri Banerjee u kynthoh, ba kine ki Mazhabi Sikh ki im bad ki shong ki sah ha ki jaka kiba sma iw tung, kiba jakhlia, ka bym koit bym khiah bad ka bym bit ban shong briew. Wat la ki la shong shnong la palat spah snem ha ka Nongbah, pynban la ñiewbeiñ ïa ki kum ki riewpoh bad ki nongwei. Ha pyrshah jong kane ka jinglong jingman, nga la pule ïa ki sermon jong u Sadhu Sundar Singh kiba u la sam ha Ri Khasi bad ïa ka jingshem mynsiem jong u kum u pukir Khristan.U Sadhu Sundar Singh ha Ri KhasiYm shym la shem ki jingthoh kiba ïathuh ba U Sadhu Sundar Singh u la ïakynduh ne ïalap ktien Blei hapdeng ki Punjabi/Sikh kiba don ha Ri Khasi, khamtam ha Shillong, wat la ha ka por ba u don u Shillong, u Sadhu u shong u sah ha kawei ka ïing ha Mawkhar, ka jaka kaba tang shi pda maw na ka them Ïew Mawlong, ka jaka kaba ki Mazhabi Sikh ki shong ïing. Lah ban ong ba u Sadhu u tip ïa ka jingdon jong ki namar ki dei ki nongtrei, ki nongpynkhuid bad nongkit ïa ki jakhlia na ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Shillong Municipality, kaba kynthup ïa ka shnong Mawkhar, Laban bad kiwei.Ka jingwan jong u Sadhu Sundar Singh sha Ri Khasi, ka sdang da ka jingïathoh shithi hapdeng jong U bad u Babu Joab Solomon, u tymmen basan jong ka Balang Presbyterian Mawkhar, Shillong. Haba jubab ïa ka shithi jong u Babu Joab Solomon kaba u la thoh ha ka 26 June 1923, U Sadhu Sundar Singh u la pynpaw ïa ka jingthrang ban wan jngoh ïa ka Ri Khasi bad u thoh kumne- “Ko Parabangeit ha U Trai, Nga ainguh shibun na ka bynta ka shithi jong phi ba phi phah ha u June 26. Nga dang shait bha da ka jingisynei u Trai…Lada U Blei un ibit, ngan pyrshang ban wan sha Shillong ha kane ka snem ka ban dang wan. Phi sngewbha ban ai ka jingkhublei jong nga ha ki para Khristan ha baroh ka Ri Assam, shynrang bad kynthei bad ong ïa ki ba nga kyrmen ban ïashem bad ki ha kane kawei ka snem…”Katkum ki jingthoh, U Sadhu Sundar Singh u la poi ha Ri Khasi ha u bnai Lber 1924 bad nyngkong eh u la sam ïa ka ktien Blei ha ka jingïaseng miet ha Balang Mawkhar ha ka 7 March. Ha ka snem 1968, u Babu Wilson Reade, tymmen basan ka Balang Presbyterian Mawkhar, u la ïathuhkhana na ka bor kynmaw ïa ka jingïaseng pdiang burom ïa u Sadhu Sundar Singh ha ka Balang Mawkhar bad ha kata ka por ka Ïingmane ka dang heh bun shah ïa ka jingdon ki dkhot ka Balang, hynrei ha kata ka miet ka Ïingmane ka la dap smam da u paidbah uba la wan ban sngap ïa ka jingïalap jong u Sadhu. La ïathuh ba ka longïing jong u Babu Joab Solomon ha Mawkhar ka la pdiang bad ai jaka shong basa ïa U Sadhu Sundar Singh mynba u don ha Shillong.U Sadhu Sundar Singh u la leit kylleng ka Ri Khasi bad u la kren ‘tien Blei ha kiba bun ki Balang bad ki jingïaseng bah jong ka Assembly kaba la long ha Mairang ha ka snem 1924. Kine ki long ki Balang bad ki jaka ba U la kren ïa ka Ktien Blei- (a) Ha Balang Presbyterian Mawkhar Shillong ha 7th, 8th bad 9th March (b) Ha Balang Presbyterian Laitkynsew ha 10th March (k) Ha Sohra ha ka 11th March (d) ha Shillong ha ka 12th March (e) Ha ki jingïaseng Assembly kaba long ha Mairang naduh 14th haduh16th March (g) Ha Balang Presbyterian Laitumkhrah ha ka18th March bad (ng) Ha Balang Presbyterian Mawphlang ha ka19th March.U Sadhu Sundar Singh u dei u pukir Khristan na Ri India uba la paw nam ha ka dew bah Asia bad kylleng ka pyrthei. Une u Sadhu u la aiti ïalade bad len lade na ka bynta ka Gospel U Khrist. U long ruh u nonghikai uba kynja mynsiem bad ki jinghikai jong u ki long shaphang ka jingieid bad jinglong kawei hapdeng ki para bynriew. La kha ïa u ha Punjab ha ka snem 1899 ha ka longïing kaba bat pyrkhing ïa ka niam Sikh, pynban hadien u la kylla Khristan ïalade. La thoh kumne, “U Sadhu Sundar Singh u phla paidbah ba dei u Mysiem Bakhuid uba pynkylla Khristan ïa U, katba ka dei ka kmie jong u pat kaba btin lynti bad hikai ïa U ban kylla long U Pukir ne Sadhu. U phla ruh ba ynda un poi ha Bneng un wad shuwa ïa ka kmie bad lada jia ba um shem ïa ka un ym shongduh hangta, hynrei un kyrpad ïa la U Kynrad ba un îalam ïa u sha ka jaka ba don ka kmie…”Ha ka jingim bad jingïaid lynti jong U ban ïalap ‘tien Blei u la mad shibun ki jingshem bad ki jingleh phylla jong U Blei bad u don ruh ka jingtip-jingshemphang halor ki niam ne jingngeit tynrai kiba la suhthied ha Ri India. Ki jingkren ‘tien Blei jong u ki long kiba jylliew, kiba synlar, kiba shai bad kiba suk ban sngewthuh da ki paidbah ne ki riewmadan. Ki nuksa ne jingïathuh khana kiba u ju bynrap ha ki jingkren jong U, ki long kiba kordor namar u ju ring dur na kiei kiei kiba U mad bad ïohi ha ka jingim. Ki Lum Makashang ki dei ki paralok bad ki lum sop ïor ki dei ki jaka shongthait jong U, katba ki krem ktah kiba pjah tasam ki dei ki jaka ba u ju ïasyllok bad u Trai Kynrad.Ka jingduwai bad ka bor jong ka, ki long ka subject pdeng jong ki jingïalap ‘tein Blei jong U Sadhu. Ha U ka jingim ba dap kyrhai ka thew ïa ka jingim kaba ïoh ïa ka bor ban ïeng skhem ha ka nongrim, ban ïakhun bad ban jop hapdeng ki jingtynjuh kiba bun. U Sadhu Sundar Singh u dei u pilgrim uba thrang ïa ka Hok, ka Jingshisha bad ka Jingsuk kaba janai.
title: Ka jingwan jngoh u Sadhu Sundar Singh ïa ka Ri Khasi

content: Nongpoh, Lber 04: Ki kynhun sengbhalang bapher bapher hapoh ka jinglam khmat ka Ri Bhoi People’s Council bad ka MPSO Ri Bhoi District mynta ka sngi kila sdang ïaka jingïakhih ba nyngkong jong ki da kaba shong kyllaiñ mungor hakhmat ka Indoor Stadium ha Umlyngkdait ban dawa naka sorkar ba dei ban pynlait noh mardor ïak result DSC ha Ri-Bhoi District ïa kaba la dep ban pynlong exam naduh u snem 2021-22Ïa katei ka jingiakih jong ka seng RBPC bad MPSO da ka ba shong kyllain mungor la wan ruh ban pynshngaiñ da kiwei kiwei ki kynhun sengbhalang naduh ka CoRP, HANM, Synjuk ki Seng Samla shnong, ryngkat ki nongïalam ka Ri Bhoi Dorbar kiba la shong hakhmat katei ka Indoor stadium naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep haduh ka por 3 baje janmiet.U Samla Jayson Lennox Nongrum President RBPC haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba kum ka seng baroh shi katta kala ïaid da ka lynti kaba jai jai lyngba ka miej jingïakren bad mynta ka sngi ruh kum ka seng kala shim da ka lynti ïakhih kaba jai jai ban shong kyllaiñ mungor, hynrei lada ka sorkar kam kheiñ snep ne kheiñ kor ïaka jingjai jai kum ka seng kala pynkhreh da kiwei ki lynti kiba kham tyngeh nangne shakhmat wat ban mih surok bad ka sorkar ka dei ban shim ïaka jingkithlieh.Kiwei kiwei ki nongkren bala ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi naduh u Bah RR Makdoh Adviser ka Ri-Bhoi Dorbar, Bah Pateng Marsing Working President ka CoRP, Bah Aristone M Ryndongsngi President SSSS bad kiwei kiwei kila ai ka jingkyrshan ïaka seng RBPC kaba la lamkhmat ïa katei ka jingïakhih ban dawa naka sorkar ba kadei ban pynlait mardor ïaka Result DSC kaba ki khun samla kila ap khmih lynti baroh shi katta.Ki la ong ruh ba kum ka sorkar kala dei ban shimkhia ban ai ïaka Result ym ban shu aidaw ïaka Reservation Rooster kaba ki tnad sorkar kila dep ruh ban ioh ïaki jinghikai ne ki training bapher bapher, hynrei ban shu ap sah da ki bun snem ka pynlong ïaki samla thepkam ban sah haka umdum bad ka jingnang ïaid jong ka rta thep kam.Kumta kila kyrpad sha ka sorkar ba dei ban shimkhia ban pynlait noh ïaka result DSC ym ban ap haduh ban da mih ki jingïakhih bad ki jingïakulmar.
title: Pyllait noh ïa ka result DSC ha Ri Bhoi, ong ki sengbhalang ba shong kyllaiñ myngor ha Nongpoh

content: Shillong, Lber, 4: Ka Synjuk ki Seng Samla Shnong (SSSS) Shillong City ka phaha ia u kyrwoh kitbok kitrwiang ia baroh ki khun samla ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep bad ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei kiba ialeh ia ki eksamin bapher bapher jong u snem 2024 naduh SSLC, HSSLC bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Synjuk Ki Seng Samla Shnong lyngba u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Chairman u samla Pynshaibok Diengdoh ka ai mynsiem sha iwei pa iwei ki samla ba kin kiew shaphrang bad ban minot thop ban poi sha ka thong ha ka jingialeh ka jongki ha kane ka eksamin bad ban rah ruh ia ka nam ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei, kum ka jaitbynriew ngi donkam shisha ia ki samla trai ri trai muluk ban ioh hi ban Bat hi ia ki kyrdan ba kham ha jrong ha ki bynta kiba ba pher bapher.U Khulom Ksiar u dei u Atair bad waitlam ba nep ban pruid dak ban im bad shngain ka jaitbynriew, kyntang iawai ka Synjuk ka phai khmat ban iohi ba ki khun Samla ka Jylla ba kin long ki Dongmusa ban tbeh jingshai ia lade bad ia ka pateng ka jaitbynriew baroh kawei. To u Blei Un kyrkhu kyrdoh ia ka jingiaid lynti ka jong phi nangne shakhmat, la ong u kyrwoh na ka SSSS…..
title: Kitbok ka SSSS ïa ki khynnah skul kiba ïaleh eksamin SSLC bad HSSLC

content: Baghmara, Lber 4 : Ban kyntiew ïa ka kyrdan jingpule sha ki jaka ba shabar ki Sor Shillong bad Tura , u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ula pynbna ba shen ka Kynhun Myntri kan sa shim ïa ka rai ban sdang noh ïa ka tnad pule Commerce bad Science ha ki College ka Sorkar ha Sohra, Williamnagar bad Baghmara.U Myntri Rangbah ula pynbna ïa kane ha ka jingïalang plie ïa ka ïing College bad ki Hostel ki Kynthei bad Shynrang ba thymmai jong ka Captain Williamson Government College kaba don ha Baghmara mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei.“ïa ka rai ban sdang noh ïa ka tnad pule Commerce bad Science ha ki lai tylli ki College Sorkar yn sa ai jingmynjur shen da ka kynhun Myntri” pynbna u Myntri Rangbah hakhmat ki paidbah ha Baghmara.Mynta, namar ka jingbym don ka tnad pule science bad commerce ha kine ki college Sorkar, da ki hajar ngut ki samla kynthei bad shynrang na ki jaka nongkyndong kila hap ban wan sha Tura ban rung klas ha ka Tura Govt College bad Don Bosco College.Namar kane, kila hap ban pynlut bun bha namar ka jinghap sah ha ki hostel shimet lane shong wai. Kiba bun ki samla pule na ki longïing ba duk, wat hapdeng ka jinglah jong ki ban pule ha ka science bad commerce, kim banse ban kynran dien noh ha ki jaka nongkyndong.Ban pynkut ïa kane ka jingeh, u Conrad ula ong ba ka Sorkar ka don jingangnud ban kyntiew ïa ka jingpule science bad commerce haba buh hakhmat ïa ka jingnep jabieng jong ki samla ka Jylla.“Ngi la ïohi dalade ïa ka jingangnud bad jingthrang jong ki samla ban pule ïa ka science bad mathematics. Ha kiba bun ki jingïakop lehkai chess kaba donkam ban kheiñ jingkheiñ, ngi la shem ba ki samla jong ngi kila paw bha shakhmat. Khlem ka sap bad ka jinghikai kumno yn lah ban long satang lada don ka jingnang jingtip ïa ka science bad ka mathematic hapdeng ki samla. Ngi donkam ban shu ai ka kabu ïa ki” ong u Myntri Rangbah.Lada ki kam ki jam ki ïaid beit, ka Sorkar ka angnud ban sdang noh ïa ka tnad science bad commerce ha Williamnagar, Baghmara bad Sohra ha une u snem pule ba mynta u ban sdang naduh u Jymmang bad Jylliew.
title: Shen yn rai ka Kynhun Myntri ban sdang ïa ka Science bad Commerce ha Sohra, Baghmara bad Williamnagar College

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 04 : Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council West Khasi Hills bad ka Mawshynrut Youth Movement (MYM), ha ka sngi nyngkong, ki la leit ban pynsangeh ïa ka interview thep kam ba la pynlong da ka tnad Social Welfare ka West Khasi Hills.Kine ki kam ba lait ïa kaba la pynlong interview thep kam ki kynthup ïa ka kam District Mission Coordinator, Gender Specialist, Specialist in Financial Literacy, Accountant Assistant, Data Entry Operator bad Multi Tasking Staff.Hynrei, ki nongïalam jong ki ar seng hapoh ka jingïalam u samla Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh, President ka HYC bad samla Shembor Rynñiaw jong ka MYM, ki la phah pynsangeh ïa kane ka interview thep kam, namar ba ka tnad Social Welfare ka la khot interview tang ïa ki samla ba la thep kyrteng hapoh ka Ophis jong ka Employment Exchange.Kine ki nongïalam ki la pyntip ba ki la leit ban dawa ïa ka Ophisar ka tnad Social Welfare Kong Pakynteiñ ba kan pynsangeh ïa ka interview. Hynrei la kynnoh ba kane ka Ophisar ka la pyneh da kaba ai daw ba ka la ïoh ïa ka hukum na ki bor khmih ba hap ban pynlong beit.Kumta, kine ki Seng k ila leit ïakynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hills ban dawa pynsangeh ïa ka interview bad dawa ruh ba dei ban da pynmih da ka jingpynbna laitkam (Advertisement) kumba ju leh ha ka rukom thung kam.Ki ar Seng ki la hiar sha ka ophis ka tnad Social Welfare ban pynsangeh ïa kane ka interview, hynrei la shem ba u Deputy Commissioner u la shimkhia ïa ka jingdawa bad u la hukum dalade ban pynsangeh shuwa ïa kane ka kam.U samla Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh u la ong ba ka seng ka sngewnguh ïa u DC u ba la sngap ïa ka jingkyrpad jong ki ar seng kiba la ieng na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki samla wad kam.
title: Leit pynsangeh ka HYC bad MYM ïa ka interview kam ka Tnad Social Welfare

content: Nongpoh, Rymphang 04: Ki pulit ka Ri-Bhoi ryngkat bad CRPF kiba la pynkhlaiñ bha ka jingpahara shuwa ka elekshon Lok Sabha, haka 3 tarik sngi u Blei kila ioh ban bat ïa kawei ka trok ha Lad Umsaw ha Ri-Bhoi ryngkat u kynja kumba 280 song haka jingkhia kumba 4746.409 kilo bad u ba la antad ka jingshong dor kumba 20 klur eiei.Kumba la pyntip da u heh pulit ka Ri-Bhoi u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la pyntip hadien ka jingtip kaba bñiah halor ka jingdon kawei ka trok kaba kit ïaki jingdih buaid, ki pulit ka Ri-Bhoi kila pynlong ka jingpynap shrip ha lad Umsaw, bad ioh bat ïa kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u number NL 01 AH 5853 bad hadien ka jingtalasi la lap ïa kumba 280 tylli ki song kynja (Marijuana) bala song bha haki plastic bala kit ha katei ka trok.Hadien ka jingtohkit ki pulit la lap ba u dei u kynja (Marijuana) bad don ka jingkhia kumba 4746.409 kilo bad halor katei ka jingioh kurup ki pulit kila kem ruh uwei u briew bala tip kyrteng kum u Babulal Sheikh (48) na Maharashtra bad haka jingtalasi ïa utei u briew ki pulit kila kurup ruh ka pisa kumba T.3760/- ryngkat kawei ka mobile phone Nokia.Hadien ba la dep ban tohkit bñiah halor ka jingioh kurup ïa utei u drok, na ka liang ki bor pulit ka Ri Bhoi ki la dep ban register case ha Umiam Police Station katkum ka NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban lap shuh shuh ïa kiba donkti ha katei ka kam.
title: Kurup ki pulit ka Ri-Bhoi ïa u kynja ba shongdor 20 klur ha lad Umsaw, kem ki pulit 1

content: Jowai, Lber 04: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) sa shisien pat ka la hiar sha ka ktem jong ka NPP ha West Jaiñtia Hills na ka bynta ban ïalap elekshon sha ka Dorbar Lok Sabha, da kaba pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha nyngkong ha Ïaw Musiang bad hadien pat ha Ladthalaboh.Ha kine ki artylli ki jingïalang, ha kaba la kren da u Bah Ardent Basaïawmoit, President ka Seng bad u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon, uba long u Kyrtong MP bad u General Secretary ka Seng, wat lada ka VPP kam shym la don tnad trei ha kane Jowai Constituency ha kane ka elekhon MLA baladep, hynrei la ïohi ba ki paidbah ki la ïatuid ban sngap ïa ki jingkren bad kumjuh ruh ban pynpaw ka jingkyrshan ïa kane ka Party kaba dang dap tang arsnem tam.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ïaw Musiang ha ka jaka ba don mar syndah bad ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) u Bah Ardent u la khyrwit nyngkong ïa ka jinglehbeiñ ka Executive Committee(EC) ba la ïalam da ka NPP bad ïatreilang bad ka UDP bad kiwei de ki Seng, namar ba la jan shi snem ki nongtrei bapli kim shym la ïoh tulop.“Aiu ki Party ba pynlong ïa ka EC ha JHADC ki leh haduh ba ki nongtrei jong ka Council kim shym la ïoh tulop satia?”, la ong u Bah Ardent, hapdeng ka jingrisa bad thap kti ki paidbah. La ïohi ruh ba ki nongtrei ka JHADC kiba la ïeng na ki jingkhang ïit bad kiew sha jrong tnum ka ophis treikam jong ki.U Bah Ardent u la ong ba dei namar kane ka daw ba ka VPP ka la mih ban kren na ka bynta kiba shah lehbeiñ kiba shah leh shiliang, kiba tieng kiba smiej ïa ki nongmihkhmat jong ki. U la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ki MDC, ki MLA kidei tang ki shakri jong ki paidbah bad ki paidbah kidei ki nongaikam ïa ki. Ha ka jingshisha kum u trai ka kam, haba u shakri ne u nongbylla um trei bha,la ju bujli noh da kiwei. “Lada ki MDC bad MLA jong phi kim trei bha, dei ban jied bujli noh da kiwei”, la ong u nongïalam ka VPP.U la ai mynsiem ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban tieng ïa ki MLA ne ki MDC jong ki, namar ba ka VPP kan ïeng ha syndah jong ki. Namar kata ka daw u kyntu ïa ki ba kin ai noh ka jingkyrshan ïa ka VPP ha kane ka elekshon MP kan ban sa long shen bad kumjuh ha ka elekshon MDC.“Ngin ïakhun ban thaw ïa ka record da ka jingshem phang u paidbah ban pynjop ïa ka VPP ha kane ka elekshon MP bad ngin ym shah shuh ïano ïano ban ïalam bakla nangne shakhmat ïa ka synshar ka khaddar” , la ong u MLA ka Nongkrem.U President ka VPP u la kynthah ruh ïa u MLA ka Jowai, uba la ong ha kine ki sngi baladep ba ki MLA VPP kim ju kren eiei ha Assembly, hynrei ki nang tang ban mih sha surok. “Nga da lyngngoh kumno phi ïajied MLA kum ïa une u rangbah, uba kren pynban kum u khunlung, katto ngi kren ha Assembly ha ka dorbar ba dang shu dep kumno um ïohi. Kadei tang ka jingkren khunlung”, u la ong.Ula pynsngew ba ki don ki MLA kiba kynthoh ïa ka VPP kiba kren shano yn jop u Prah khlem don ki nongtrei, hynrei u ong mynta u paidbah ula tip lut ïala ka jong ka hok da kaba pynjop don burom ïa u Prah. Ka jingjop u Prah ha kane ka Election MP, MDC bad MLA ban wan yn pynkhuid ïa kane ka ri ba ieit da ka jingleh shilliang khmat, ha kaba wat lada ki don ki samla kiba la thep tender da ka lynti kaba khuid bad ïoh ruh ïa ka tender, hynrei ki la shah pynbor ban ai noh shawei. “Ka VPP kan nym ailad da lei lei ba kin jia kiba kum kine ïa ki khun samla jong ngi”, la byrthen u hehduh ka VPP.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Ladthalaboh lei, la ïohi ba ki paidbah ki la mih da ki hajar ngut wat lada ka jingïalang ka long ha ka por mynmiet. Ki paidbah ym tang ba ki la ïamih ban sngap ïa ki jingpynshai na ka liang ki nongïalam ka Seng, hynrei kiba bun ruh ki la wan shakhmat ban pynïasoh sha ka Seng, ha kaba u bah Ardent ha ka jingkren jong u la ong, “Lada U Blei U don ha ka liang jong ngi, yn nym don bal ah ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ngi”.
title: Ha ïaw Musiang bad Ladthalabuh, tuid ki paidbah sha ka jingïalap elekshon MP ka VPP

content: Shillong, Lber 04 : Ka sorkar jylla ka la thung da ka jingtohkit magisterial inquiry halor ka jingshah siat ïap jong u rangbah ha ka sngi Thohdieng ba la dep ha ki BSF ha ka shnong Dalia kaba hap ha Shella-Bhologanj sub division, East Khasi Hills, ong ki tyllong khubor ha ka sngi Nyngkong.Ïa kane ka jingtohkit la ong ba yn khlieh da ka Sub – Divisional Officer ka Sohra.Katkum ka jingpyllait khubor na u SP ka East Khasi Hills, u Rituraj Ravi la ong ba kane ka la jia ha ka miet sngi Thohdieng ha ka por 8:00 baje ei ei hadien ba ka la don ka jingïa pyneh hapdeng ki BSF bad ki briew ki bym ithuh ha ka shnong Dalia kumba 150 mitar na u pud bad ka Bangladesh.La ong ruh ba ha katei ka jingjia, ki BSF ki la siat sha ki paidbah bad uwei u briew ba tip kyrteng kum u Asen M Marak u la khlad. Ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjïa ban lap ïa ka jingshisha ka dang ïaid.U Asen M. Marak, uba la don kumba 40 snem ka rta, u la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha ka jingsiat kuli jong ki shipai BSF katba ki paidbah ki dang pyrshang ban patan ïa u na ka jaka ba la jia ka jingïasiat, kaba jngai kumba 300 mitar na khappud, ka bym pat ker sainar shiah. Ïa uba la mynsaw, ki Pulit bad ki shipai BSF ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban tip kyrteng bad ïa ka jaka sah.Haba pynshisha ïa kane ka jingjia, ka Sub Divisional Officer (Civil) jong ka Sohra, ka Salon Verma ka la ong ba ïa kane ka kam mynta ka dang don hapdeng ka jingtohkit katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ. La iathuh ruh ba kane ka la jia ha ha shnong Dalia hajan Shella, East Khasi Hills District ha ka por kumba 8 baje mynmiet, haba ki shipai BSF kiba dang ïaid pahara ki la khang lynti ïa ka kynhun jong ki birew kiba thmu ban shalan tuh ïa ka shini, u piat bad ïa kiwei kiwei ki mar ha ka dor kaba rem sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ka shnong Dalia ka dei kaba la buhai shnong da ki Garo bad ka thymmei khubor ka ïathuh ba ki kam runar ruser ki ju jia bha watla kam pat ju don satia kano ka jingïatakhuh bad ki bor jong ka aiñ ha ki sngi ba la leit noh.Katkum ka jingai jingtip ba malu mala halor ka jingjia, u Heh Ophisar BSF uba shimti ïa kane ka kam u la ong ba kine ki jingjia ki ju jia manla ka por, hynrei ha katei ka sngi ki la don kumba 300 ngut ki briew na India bad Bangladesh ki la ïatakhuh bad ki shipai BSF katba ki dang pyrshang ban pynpulom ïa ki kam khaïi tuh bad khnang ban pynjem ïa ki paidbhur ki shipai BSF ki la siat ar kuli ha kaba u Asen Marak u la ïap.
title: Da ka Magisterial Inquiry ban tohkit ba shah siat iap u rangbah ha ki BSF

content: Ka jingïakhun ban ïoh rung ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar jong ka ri India, ka la ïai bteng bad ym tang ba ka ïai bteng, hynrei la nang pynlyngngoh ruh ïa kiba bun, balei hadhuh mynta kam ïoh satia ïa ka jingkular na ka sorkar pdeng ba kan sa pynrung noh ne ban ai noh ka jingithuh ha ka Riti Synshar jong ka ri katkum ka Eight Schedule.Naduh ba la mih ka jingdawa ban pynrung noh ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka riti synshar, kaba la sdang naduh shuwa ba ka Meghalaya kan ïoh la ka jong ka jylla haba ka District Council ha u snem 1967 ka la pass ïa ka Resolution ban dawa ban pynrung noh ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar. Hadien ki jingdawa ki la nang ïai mih bad ka la kham jur haba ka Khasi Author’s Society ruh ka la buddien ban tynruh ïa kane ka kam ym tang na ka sorkar jylla, hynrei wat shaduh ka sorkar pdeng ruh kumjuh.Ha ki snem kiba hadien bad khamtam hadien ba ka Meghlaya Legislative Assembly, ka la pass ia ka Resolution bad phah sha ka sorkar pdeng, kiba bun kiwei pat ki kynhun bad ki Party ruh ki la shimkhia ban pynjur ïa ka jingdawa. Ha ka snem 2023 shuwa ka elekshon MP, ki MP ka Seng Trinamool Congress ki la rah ïa kane ka mat ha Parliament, ha kaba u MP ka TMC ha Rajya Sabha, u Derek Obrien, u la rah ha Rajya Sabha. Nangta ki MP ka Congress ruh ki la pynlong ka Demonstration hakhmat ka Parliament ban dawa na ka bynta kane kajuh ka mat. Ki MP na ka jylla naduh u ma Vincent H Pala MP Lok Sabha bad u Dr W.R Kharlukhi jongka Rajya Sabha ruh ki la kren halor kane ka mat hapoh ka Parliament.Dang ha kine ki khyndiat bnai na ka KAS ryngkat ki nongmihkhmat na ka jylla bad ki Sengbhalang ki la pynlong ka Seminar bad kumjuh ruh ka jingdawa ha nongbah Delhi ban pynsngew sha ki bor sorkar halor ka jingdawa ban pynrung noh ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra. Ki heh sorkar jong ka jylla naduh u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, nangta u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, Chairman ka State Planning Board bad kiwei ki la ïashim bynta lang ha ka jingïakhih ha Jantar Mantar. Khyndiat sngi hadien kane, la kiew sa ka Seng HANM kaba ym tang ba ka la pynlong ka jingkhih ha Jantar Mantar Delhi, hynrei ka la leit ai ruh ryngkat ka jingthoh sha ka tnad Ministry of Home Affairs.Ha kane ka dorbar mangtyngka ba mynta , u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad Sangma, u la ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka la phah haduh phra tylli ki shithi ban ithuh noh ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri India, hynrei kaba sngew diaw ka long ba ka sorkar pdeng kam shym la jubab eiei halor kane bad ka sngap man man. Na ka jingïathuh u Myntri Rangbah la sngewthuh ba ka sorkar pdeng kam buh satia kano kano ka kyndon ïa ki ktien ban pynrung ha ka riti synshar ne ban ïoh jingithuh noh ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri.Kumta ka long kaba sngewlyngngoh kaei pat ka jingeh ba ka sorkar pdeng lyngba ka tnad kam pohïing kam sngap ïa kane ka jingdawa na ka jylla Meghalaya wat lada ka dei ka jingdawa kaba la palat sanphew snem. Hato ka dei ba ka sorkar pdeng kam kheiñ snep ïa kane ka jylla lane kam pat i long ban ithuh noh ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra?. Lada kam pat I long ka dei na kadaw aiu?, haba ym don kano kano ka kyndon kaba la buh ban ai jingithuh ïa ka.Kumba long mynta ka ktien Khasi ka dei kawei na ki 38 tylli ki ktien kiba la ap lain ne kiba don ha ka list ban ithuh noh ha ka riti synhshar jong ka ri India. Ka jingïoh rung ha ka Khyrnit kaba phra kumba la ju batai na ka por sha ka por ba ka wanrah shibun ki jingmyntoi, ha kaba ki samla ka jylla ki lah ban thoh eksam noh na ka Khasi. Nangta ki lah ban ïaleh interview da ka ktien la jong, kata ka ktien Khasi. Nangta kan long ruh kum ka jingplie lad na ka bynta ka ïoh kam ïoh jam lyngba ki Translation bad kiwei kiwei.Kumta ka jingbym jubab ka sorkar pdeng halor kine ki jingdawa ban ithuh ne pynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka riti synshar ka shu sah ha ka lyngngoh, lano ka sorkar pdeng kan ai jingithuh noh ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri?.Ki paidbah ki shu ap khmih lynti kmang lano ba ka sorkar pdeng kan ai ïa kane ka jubab.
title: Balei ka sorkar pdeng ka shu sngap man man halor ka jingithuh ïa ka Ktien Khasi ?

content: New Delhi, Lber 05 : Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Goa ka la ïoh ban poi sha ka semi final jong ka 77th National Football Championship jong ka Santosh Trophy hadien ba ka la ïoh ban pynliem noh ïa ka Delhi da 2-1 kol ha ka quarter final kaba ar ha Golden Jubilee Stadium kaba don ha Yupïa ha Arunachal Pradesh ha kane ka sngi Nyngkong.Baroh kitei ki lai tylli ki kol jong ka Goa bad Delhi ki dei kiba la ïoh ban thep tang ha ka kylla step katba ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla miet ka la kut haka jingïakhaid khlem don shuh ba ïoh ban thep kol.Ïa ka kol kaba nyngkong dei ka Delhi kaba ïoh ban lamkhmat tang ha ka minit kaba 8 lyngba u Sahil Kumar. Hynrei dei tang hadien katto katne minit kata ha ka minit kaba 20 ba ka Goa kala ïoh ban pynphai noh lyngba u Jobern Cardozo. Ka jingïakhun ka la nang itynnad hadien ba ka Goa ka la ïoh ban thep biang sa shi kol lyngba u Llyod Cardozo ha ka minit kaba 29.Katei ka kynhun kaba la ïoh ban ban bat haduh san sien ïa ka nam lahduh kan hap ban kynduh ïa ka kynhun jong ka Manipur ha ka semi final.Shwa kane, ka Manipur ka la ïoh ban pynliem haduh 7-1 kol ïa ka Assam ha ka jingïalehkai kaba la noh shilliang bha. Ïa ki kol jong ka Manipur la ïoh ban thep da u Phijam Sanathoi Meetei tang ha ka minit kaba 4 jong ka kylla step, pynbud sa u Wangkhei mayum Sadananda Singh da ka hat-trick kata ha ka minit ba 11,16 bad ha ka minit kaba 70. U Ngangbam Pacha Singh ruh u la ïoh lang shi kol ha ka minit kaba 19(P) nalor u Maibam Deny Singh ha ka minit kaba 82 bad u Imarson Meitei ha ka minit kaba 88.Ïa ka shi kol jong ka Assam pat la ïoh ban thep da u Joydeep Gogoi ha ka minit kaba 64.Shwa kane, ka Services kaba la bat haduh hynriew sien ïa ka nam lahduh ka la ïoh ban pynliem da 2-0 kl ïa ka Railways ha ka quarter final kaba itynnad bha.Ha kane ka jingïakhun ruh ka jingthep kol kadei tang ha ka kylla step bad ïa ki kol jong ka Services la ïoh ban thep da u Shafeel PP ha ka minit kaba 9 (P) bad ïa ka kol kaba ar na u Samir Murmu ha ka minit shwa ban kut ka kylla step kata ha ka minit kaba 45+1.
title: Sdang shongshit ka Santosh Trophy : Pyrshah ïa ka Manipur yn aireng ka Goa ha ka SF

content: Nongpoh, Lber 05: Ka University of Science and Technology Meghalaya (USTM) ha ka sngi nyngkong jong ka taiew ka la pynlong da ka prokram ba kyrpang ban rakhe don burom ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ba 8 snem jong u myntri rangbah barim ka jylla bad u Speaker barim ka Lok Sabha, u (L) P.A Sangma kum ka jingburom halor u synñiang u bynhei ba u la shakri na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka jylla Meghalaya.U Lat barim ka jylla, u R.S. Mooshahary u la wan ban shim bynta kum u kongsan ban rakhe ïa kane ka lyngkhun sngi ïap jong u (L) P.A Sangma bad la sakhi lang ruh da ka jingdon lang u Chancellor ka USTM u M. Hoque, u Vice chancellor ka USTM u Prof. G.D Sharma, ki samla pule bad ki nonghikai katei ka skulbah.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi kum u kongsan, u Lat barim ka jylla u R.S Mooshahary, u la ong ba u P.A Sangma u dei uwei na u riew rangbah uba la phong ïa ka dur khmat jong ki jylla shatei lam mihngi ka ri India, lyngba ki kam kiba u la shakri kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah bad u long ruh u rangbah uba don ka jingiohi jngai kumno ban saiñdur ïa ka jylla Meghalaya bad ki jylla shatei lam mihngi ka ri India.U la pynpaw ruh da kaba ong ba kawei na ka kam kaba khraw ba u P.A Sangma u la leh, ka dei kaba u la pynmih ïa ki khun kiba la don lut ka jingnang jingstad bad kam don kano kano ka jingkynnoh bamsap ïa ka ïing ka sem jong u. Nalor kata u la pynmih ruh ïa u khun, u Conrad K. Sangma uwei na u Myntri rangbah uba la stad bad uba la biang pura ha ka jingnang jingstad.Da kaba ïaroh ruh ïa u P.A Sangma kum u nongïalam ka jylla, u la duh noh ïa ar tylli ki kyrdan hadien ba u la u la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei, kata ïa ka kyrdan President ka ri bad ruh u Myntri rangbah ka ri, kaba dei na ka daw ka jingdon ka jingïaleh politik hapoh ka party.Shuh shuh, u la bynrap ruh da kaba ong ba ïa ka jylla Meghalaya la ithuh sha ki rithor ka ri India, ka dei namar ba don kum kine ki nongïalam kum u P.A Sangma bad u kyrmen skhem ruh ba ka jylla Meghalaya kan dang lah ban pynmih ïa shibun ki nongïalam kiba lah ban shakri na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa la ka jong ka jylla, u la bynrap.Haba kren ruh ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u chancellor ka USTM, u M. Hoque u la ong ba ka USTM ka sngewburom bha ïa u P.A Sangma, ka dei namar ba u P.A Sangma u don ka bynta kaba khraw bha ban saiñdur ha kaba sdang ban seng ïa ka USTM bad u dei ruh u rangbah uba don ka jingiohi jngai kumno ban saiñdur ïa ka lawei ba phyrnai ki khun samla ha ka jylla.U la pynpaw ruh da kaba ong, ba ka USTM ka shim ïa u P.A Sangma kum u nonghikai (Mentor) ïa ka USTM bad dei lyngba ka jingïasnoh kti lang jong u, ba ka USTM kat dang mih ki sngi ka la dang kiew ha baroh ki liang ban ai ka jingshakri na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka pule ka puthi bad kiwei kiwei ki kam ban shakri sha ki paidbah ka jylla, u la bynrap.
title: Rakhe ka USTM ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ba 8 snem u Purno A. Sangma

content: Jowai, Lber, 05: Kum shi bynta ban pynshlur ïa ki kynthei ha ki kam sport, bad ka mynsiem ieit sport, ka jingbha jong ka met bad ka mynsiem jingïakhun hapdeng ki kynthei ka Nehru Yuva Kendra, Jowai kan sa pynlong ïa ka Nari Shakti Fitness Run ha baroh ki Block jong ka District ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai.Kane ka jingïamareh ka long shi bynta na ka jingrakhe ïa ka International Women’s Day bad ka long ruh ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka met ba koit ba khiah ïa ki kynthei ki ban tei ïa ka roi ka par jong ka ri India.Ïa kane ka Fitness Run, ha kawei pa kawei ka Block jong ka District un sa don 25 ngut ki kynthei ki ban shim bynta ha ka ban mareh shiteng Kilometer.Bad ka NYK kan ïa trei lang bad ki NSS, Ki NCC bad ki bor District.Ki kynthei kiba kwah ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingiamareh ki lah ban register ïalade lyngba ka link jong ka MYBharat portal (www.mybharat.gov.in)Ka NYK ka wer ïa baroh ki kynthei ba kin ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingïamareh ‘Nari Shakti Fitness Run’.
title: Wer ka NYK sha ka Nari Shakti Fitness Run

content: Nongpoh, Lber 05: Haka jingpyrshang jong ka Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawroh, Nongpoh ban wan rah ïaka khuid ka suba hapoh ka Shnong ka thaw, ki nongialam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Mawroh ki la ïoh ban pdiang ïaka pisa kaba la aiti da u Bah Mayralborn Syiem MLA ka Nongpoh ban kyrshan ïaka dorbar Shnong ha ka ban thied ïa ka kali ka ban kit ïaki ñiut kaba mih napoh ka shnong bad ban leit theh pat sha ki jaka kiba la buh.Ha kane ka sngi la U MLA ka Nongpoh u la aiti daka song pisa sha ki nongïalam Shnong kum ka jingïarap ïaki ban thied ïaka kali kit ñiut kaba thymmai hakaba u la pynbna ruh ba un dang wat ki lad ban bteng ïaka jingïarap haki sngi ki ban wan.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi da ka jingdonlang u MDC ka Nongpoh, Bah Balajied Ranee, Rangbah Shnong Mawroh bah Opel Lyngdoh, ki dkhot jong ka committee Shnong, Seng Longkmie lem bad ki khun Samla jong ka Shnong.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi naka liang u MLA u la ai ka jingïaroh ïaka Dorbar Shnong Mawroh kaba la shim khia ïaka khuid ka suba kum kawei naki kam ba hakhmat eh ba donkam haka shnong. U la ong ruh, ka jingleh khuid leh suba ka long kawei naki kam kiba ma ngi kum ki nongshong Shnong ngi dei ban pynmlien namar ka jingleh khuid barabor kadei ban sdang shwa na la ïing hynrei ngim dei pat ban klet ba ngi pynkhuid ruh ïaka Shnong ka thaw.
title: Da ka pisa ai u MLA Nongpoh ïa ka Mawroh ban thied kali kit ñiut

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 5: Naduh u bnai Ïaiong jong u snem 2022 jong ka jinghiar pynjot jong ki khñiang ïa ki jingthung kum u motor bad kiwei kiwei ha ka thaiñ Umyiap bad kiwei de ki jaka, na ka liang ki Nongrep bad ka Seng Nongrep HFU, ka la leit ïakynduh ïa u District Horticulture Officer ka West Khasi Hills.Ha ka jingïakynduh ïa u DHO, u la phah lum thup ha ki Form bad ki Nongrep ki la leh kumta ban lum ki Nongrep man ki shnong. Pynban haduh mynta ki lad jingïarap kim pat long kam ei ei satia.“Ha 29.2.2024 na ka liang jong ngi ka seng ki nongrep ka Hill Farmer Union West Khasi Hills District, ha ryngkat ki nongrep ka thaiñ Umyiap kiba dei ruh ki dkhot jong ngi, ngi la leit ïakynduh ïa u DC ka West Khasi Hills, ban kyrpad ban ïarap siew noh ïa ki bad na ka liang u DC u la kular ban ïarap ban leh ïa ka ba donkam. Kumta kum ka seng HFU ngi kyrmen ka Sorkar hapoh ka jingshimkhia lem jong u DC ban ïarap noh ïa ki nongrep lyngba ka Relief Fund ne kino kino ki lad jingïarap na ka sorkar”, ong u Bah Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh Secretary HFU West Khasi Hills.
title: 3 snem khlem ïarap eiei ka Sorkar ïa ki nongrep ka thaiñ Umyiap

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 5: Kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka sap ka phong, ba ki paitbah nongshong shnog jong ka West Khasi Hills ki don bad ban pynïajan ïa ki bad ki nongai kam, ba kin long ki nongïoh jingmyntoi na ka bynta kito ki nongshong shnong kiba seng ïa ki kam la jong da kaba ïeng ha la ki kjat, ka Meghalaya State Skill Develoment Society mynta ka sngi hat majai ka la sdang ïa ka prokram ba ar sngi kaba la pynlong ha madan shnong New Nongstoiñ.Ha kane ka sngi shuwa ban sdang ïa katei ka prokram, la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha kaba la pynïaid da ka Miss Banri Rani Project Manager jong ka MSSDS ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang jong ka kong A.Kharbudon Programme Manager jong ka SANKALP & MSSDS, I ba la ai ruh ka jingkren bad pynshai ba ka jingpynlong ïa katei ka programe.Haba ai jingkren I la ong ba kane ka lympung kam dei tang na ka bynta ba ki riew don sap ba kin wan ban shu pyni nam ïa ki tiar ki tar ba ki la shna. Hynrei ka dei ruh ka prokram kaba ai jingmyntoi ïa kiba kwah ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka sap ba ki don, da kaba shim jingmut bad pan ki lad jingïarap na ki riew shemphang kiba la wan ban ïashim bynta ha katei ka prokram. I la ong ruh ba ki lah ruh ban ïoh ïa ki lad jingïarap na ka sorkar lyngba ki tnad trei kam kiba dei peit ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki samla.Ha kajuh ka por la ïoh ïa ka jingkren na ka kong Nambie Jesica Marak ha kaba ka la ai mynsiem ïa ki samla jong ka District, ba ki dei trei shitom lada ki kwah ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot lyngba ki sam ba ki don la ka dei ha kino kino ki jait jingtrei.U bah Valentine Swer MCS Additional District Magistrate ka West Khasi Hills, haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi kum u kongsan, u la ong ba bun ki samla kiba la pyndep ïa ki jingpule bapher bapher kim sngew thikna shuh, namar ban wad kam sorkar ka la shem jingeh haduh katta katta hynrei lada ki pyndonkam hok ïa ka sap kaba ki don ban trei ïa kino kino ki kam, ka don ka lad na ka bynta jong ki ba kin kiew ha ka jingim kaba man la ka sngi.Nalor kata u la ong ruh ba ha kine ki sngi ki don shibun ki jylla hapoh ka ri bad shabar ka ri ruh, kiba don kam shibun ki nongtrei bad ka por ka la dei ïa ki samla jong ka District bad napoh ka jylla, ba ki dei ban phai khmat sha kiwei pat ki jylla ym ban khmih lynti tang ha ki jaka la jong.U la kyntu ïa ki samla ba haba ki trei ïa kano kano ka kam la ka dei ka kam sorkar, ka kam ha ki Kompeni ne ka kam jong ki trei shimet, kim dei ban trei tang na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki. Hynrei ki dei ban don ka jingkut jingmut ba kin trei na ka bynta ban kyntiew bad pynkhraw ïa ki nongai kam, khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa kiwei pat.
title: Sdang ka MSSDS ïa ka rynsan ba ar sngi ban kyntiew ïa ki riewdonsap

content: Nongpoh, Lber 05: Ka jingap khmih lynti jong kiba bun ki samla ïalehkai ka Ri-Bhoi ban ioh noh kawei ka madan ïalehkai kaba bha kala urlong hadien ba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma mynta ka sngi u la leit ban buh mawnongrim naka bynta ban sdang shna noh ïaka madan Artificial Turf ha Umbuda hadien ba kum ka shnong kala ai sngewbha ïakatei ka madan ban pynbha ïaka naka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki khun samla.Ïa kane ka madan Artificial Turf la mang pisa kumba 10.93 klur lyngba ka tnad ïalehkai bala wan ruh ban sakhi da ka jingdonlang u Bah Shakliar Warjri myntri ka tnad ïalehkai ka jylla, Bah Mayral Born Syiem MLA ka Nongpoh, Bah Sosthenes Sohtun MLA ka Jirang, Bah Balajied Ranee MDC ka Nongpoh, Bah Victor Rani MDC ka Jirang, Bah B.M Syiem Chief Engineer State Sports Council, Bah CB Syioem Rangbah Shnong Umbuda, ki nongïalam ka RBDSA bad kiwei kiwei ki ophisar naki tnad sorkar, ki khynnah skul lem bad ki riew rangbah na kylleng ka them Ri-Bhoi.Na ka liang u Conrad Sangma u la ong kumba 700 klur ki project ki dang ïaid mynta haka tnad ïalehkai bad kane ka Artificial Turf ha madan Umbuda kan long kawei naki jingkyrkhu ïaki samla ïalehkai haka district kumba ka Ri-Bhoi kadei kaba paw haka kam ïalehkai bad ïaka kam yn sa sdang noh shen bad khmih lynti hapoh 18 bnai yn pyndep ïa katei ka madan.U la ong ruh ba kum kitei ki madan yn shna ha kylleng ki jaka bad ki shnong nongkyndong ban kyntiew ïaka kam ïalehkai haka jylla, bad da ka jingtreishitom jong kane ka sorkar ba mynta yn pynmih ïaki Indoor Stadium, ki Synthetic Track, ki jaka lehkai kiba biang da kaba pynbna ruh ba yn shna kawei ka madan ïalehkai kaba biang ha Pahamsyiem.U Conrad Sangma u la kyntu ruh ïaki khun samla ha katei ka sngi ba kin shim kabu haba wan ki kam pynroi khamtam ki jaka ïalehkai bad ban pyndonkam hok ïaka sap kaba ki don, ym ban ngop haki kam kai bad ki kam sniew kiba lah ban pynjot ïaka jingim tang haka shikhyllipmat bad lyngba katei ka madan bad kiwei kiwei ki project ban dang wan kan kyntiew ïaka kam ïalehkai haka district bad ka jylla baroh kawei.
title: Da ka Artificial Turf ïoh ka madan Umbuda, buh mawnongrim u Myntri Rangbah

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 5: Ka KSU Nongtrai Sepngi Unit hapoh ka jjngïalam u samla Kitbor Riangtem President, ha ka sngi hat majai ka la leit ïakynduh ïa ka kong E.G.Tariang Pajat DMHO West Khasi Hills bad ka la dawa ba kan ïarap ban shna noh ïa ka Sub Center ha ka shnong Langdongdai.Ki nongïalam ka seng ki la ong ba haduh mynta mynne katei ka shnong kaba dang hap ha ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills District, kam pat don satia wat tang kawei ruh ka jaka ai jingsumar na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah. Bun ki briew kiba pang kiba shitom ki hap leit kit shaduh Riangdo kaba jngai kumba 38 km ei ei nalor ka surok ruh ka dang khohruh khohram bad ka shim por kumba 2 kynta ei ei. Ka seng ka la ban jur ba dei ban leh noh mardor namar ka long ka dong ka thaiñ kaba dang sahdien haduh katta katta. Ha jingïakynduh jong ka seng, ka DMHO ka la kular ban leh ïa ka ba donkam bad kan sa pynsngew ruh ïa kane ka mat ha ki bor kiba kham halor.
title: Shna noh ïa ka Sub Centre ha Langdongdai, dawa ka KSU

content: Shillong, Lber 4: Ka UGC- Malviya Mission Teacher Training Centre (MMTTC) bad ka Department of Biomedical Engineering jong ka North Eastern Hill University (NEHU), Shillong kila pynlong ïa ka ‘Short Term Course’ halor ka “Telemedicine and Digital Health” bad ïa kane ka jingai jinghikai la sdang mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei.Kane ka ‘Short Term Course’ kala sdang ha ka 4 tarik bad kan kut haka 9 tarik u Lber ha kaba 30 ngut kila wan ban ïashim bynta kiba kynthup ïa ki nonghikai bad ki Scholar na kylleng ka ri.Ki riewshemphang na kylleng ki jaka ai jingsumar kiba paw ha ka ri ryngkat bad ki riewstad kila sam ïa ki jingtip bad jinghikai sha ki nongïashimbynta ha kane ka jingai jinghikai kaba shi taiew.U Coordinator jong kane ka ‘Short Term Course’ u Dr. Dinesh Bhatia ula pynpaw ïa ki jingmyntoi ki ban ïoh na kane ka jingai jinghikai bad kan ïarap ha ka ban kyntiew ïaka jingnang bad jingstad bad kumjuh ban kyntiew ïa ka sap ka phong.I Prof. Quendarisa Kharbuli, Director Incharge kala pynpaw ïa ki kamram jong ka UGC-MMTTC Centre bad kumno ka leh ïa la ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka sap ka phong bad ïa ki jingnang jingtip jong ki nongïashimbynta kiba wan ha ki Course ki bapher bapher kiba la wanrah da ka Centre baroh shisnem.U Prof. S.S. Ray u Head jongka Biomedical Engineering Department uba long ruh u Symbud Kongsan, ula ïaroh ïa ki kam kiba la trei da ka Artificial Intelligence ha ka koit ka khiah ha une u spah snem uba mynta bad ula pynpaw ba ki kor teknoloji kila pynwandur ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah ha ka ban pynïadei hapdeng ki nongpang bad ki nongai jingsumar.
title: Ai jinghikai ka MMTTC bad NEHU halor ka Telemedicine bad Digital Health

content: Shillong, Lber, 5: Ïa ka met jong u Bah Kynsailin Kharphanbuh ba ju khot ieid Bahïit, uba shong basah ha Lummawbah, Block -3, Upper Shillong, uba la jah naduh ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 11:00 baje mynstep la lap na khrum ka jingkieng Umshyrpi ha ka sngi Baar da ki paidbah hadien ba ka shnong ka la pynlong ka jingwad ïa une u rangbah naduh ka sngi kaba um shym la wan phai shuh sha la ing.Ki Pulit jong ka Jhalupara Out Post bad ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) ryngkat bad ki bahaing hasem ki la poi sha kane ka jaka ha ka por ba la sei ïa ka met jong u Bah Kynsailin.Haduh mynta, ym pat lah satia ban tip ïa ka daw tynrai halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih la une u rangbah u la shah pynïap dusmon.Na ka liang jong ki bahaing hasem ki la kyrpad ïa ki bor ka aiñ ban ym leh shuh ïa ka Post Mortem da kaba pynpaw ba kim don jingsuba eiei ba une u rangbah un shah pynïap.
title: Lap ïa ka met u Bah Kynsailin Kharphanbuh na khrum jingkieng Umshyrpi

content: Tura Lber 4: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei ula plie ïa ki kamra klass (Academic Block) bad ïa ki ar tylli ki hostel jongki Shynrang bad Kynthei jongka Captain Williamson Sangma Government College ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ka katei ka college.Kiba la ïadon lang ha kane ka jingplie ïa kane ka ïing ba thymmai jongka College kaba la pyndep ban tei tang hapoh san snem ki long u Myntri ka tnad pule puthi u Rakkam A Sangma, u MLA ka Baghmara u Kartush R Marak, u MLA ka Amlarem & u Chief Advisor jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Ma Lakhmen Rymbui bad u Chief Secretary ka jylla Bah DP Wahlang.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang u Myntri Rangbah ula ai burom ïa la u Kpa u (L) P.A Sangma ha kum kane ka sngi kaba dei ruh ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba 8 jongu da kaba ong, “Ka dei ka jingïohi jngai bad ka jingngeit jong u (L) PA Sangma ula shim khia ban kyntiew shaphrang ïa ka pule puthi ha ka jylla bad ula buh ïa u maw nongrim ïa kane ka College ha u 2008 bad kumta ka long kaba ïahap bha ba ha kum kane ka sngi ba ïa katei ka projek la sdang ha u 2008 ka la ïaid ha ka lynti kaba dei bad ngi la lah ban plie ïa ki jingtei na ka bynta ki jingpule ha ki kyrdan kiba heh na ka bynta ki samla bad ki paidbah jong ka South Garo Hills.”Ula pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh a u Myntri barim ka pule puthi jong ka sorkar kaba la dep u Ma Lahkmen Rymbui bad ïa ka kynhun kiba la wanrah ka jingpynkylla ha ka pule puthi bad ula ong ba ka thong bad ka jingïohi jngai kaba la buh da ka tnad pule puthi ha ki 5 snem kiba la dep la shim bad pynïaid shaphrang haduh kine ki sngi kiba mynta.“Nga ngeit skhem ba ha ka liang ka pule puthi yn ïohi ïa ka jingkylla kaba radbah ha kine ki sngi ban wan hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri uba mynta” ula ong.Ula ong ruh ba ki samla ki long ki atiar kiba kordor bha hynrei ka long kaba donkam ban ai ïa ka rynsan kaba dei, ki kabu bad ki jingbtin lynti khnang ba kin lah ban pyndonkam ïa la ki buit bad ki bor, ki sap ki phong jongki. Ula ong, ba ka pule puthi ka dei ka mat kaba hakhmat eh kaba ka sorkar ka buh hakhmat bad kumta ka sorkar ha u 2020 ka la kytiew ïa ka jingbhah tyngka ha ka pule puthi na ka 27 Klur tyngka sha ka 350 Klur tyngka bad ka sorkar kala bhah kyrpang ruh 3000 Klur tyngka na ka bynta ki jingpynlut ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ki samla ha ki bynta bapher bapher.U Myntri Rangbah ula ïathuh, ba ula leit jurip ïa ka Baghmara College ha u snem 2019 bad lap ba ka jingtei kam long satia kaba shngaiñ na ka bynta ki samla pule khamtam haba ka la dei kaba la rim bha bad sdang tor.“Nga dap da ka jingkmen ba hapoh 5 snem, ngi la lah ban pyndep ïa ki jingtei kiba thymmai ïa ki samla bad ki paidbah jongka Baghmara,” ula ong ba ka Kynhun Myntri shen kan sa ai ka jing mynjur ïa ka jingtyrwa ban buh ïa ka Science bad Commerce Stream ha Sohra, Williamnagar bad Baghmara College.U Myntri Rangbah ula kyntu ïa ki nonghikai bad ki samla pule ba kin shim lang ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynlong ïa kane ka College kum kata ka ‘Centre of Excellence’.Katba u Rakkam A Sangma, ula ong ba ka dei ka sngi ka ban sah jingkynmaw na ka bynta ka Baghmara bad South Garo Hills baroh kawei bad ula pynkynmaw shaphang ka jingïaid lynti haka jingseng ïa ka college .La sdang ïa ka Captain Williamson Government College ha u snem 1994 bad la pynïaid da ka sorkar jylla naduh u snem 2008 bad ha ki snem kiba hadien ka sorkar ka la rai ban kyntiew noh ïa ka Captain Williamson Memorial Government College ha ka jinglut jingsep kaba kot 10.80 Klur tyngka, ka jingthmu ka long ban ïaid ryngkat bad ka jingbthah jong ka NEP 2020 ban pynbiang ïa ka jingpule ha ki laiñ bapher bad ban kyntiew ïa ka GER ha ka Higher Education ha ki District da kaba thaw ïa ki Academic Block kiba thymmai.Ka jingbuh dor haka Tender na ka bynta ki jingtei la mang 8,51,65,956.00 tyngka bad la pyntrei bad khmih bniah lyngba ka State Higher Education Council (SHEC) bad lyngba katei ka jingbhah tyngka ka sorkar jylla kala thaw ïa ka Academic Building kiba kynthup ïaka kamra pule, library, laboratory & jaka leit shabar ryngkat bad ki jaka shong bad ki tiar ki tar kiba thymmai.Ki samla pule kiba pule ha ka Arts ki don 1180 ngut bad da ka jingthmu ban sdang ïa ka Science bad Commerce Stream la khmih lynti ba ka jingwan pule ki samla kan kiew bha bad ka College kala sdang ïa ki kam ki jam ban sdang ïa ka jingpule Honours Course ha ka B.Sc. bad B.Com bad la phah ruh ïa ka jingtyrwa sha ka sorkar jylla.ïa ka jingtei ïa ka Girls’ & Boys’ Hostel ha Captain Williamson Memorial Government College la bei tyngka da ka NEC ha ka jinglut jingsep kaba kot 1.20 Klur tyngka. Ha kine ki hostel ia mynta ki ngiam tang 20 ngut ki samla pule shynrang bad 20 ngut ki samla pule kynthei.
title: Plie u MR ïa ka jingtei thymmai ïa ka Capt. Williamson Sangma Govt. College bad Hostel

content: Shillong, Lber 05 : Ka Punjab National Bank Rural Self Employment Training Institute kaba don ha Mawphlang East Khasi Hills District hynne ka sngi Ba ar ka 5 tarik Lber 2024 ka la pynkup burom ïa ki 47 ngut ki Bank sakhi lane ki Business Correspondent kiba la pyndep ïa ki jingshah hikai ha katei ka shlem ai jinghikai lyngba da ki syrnot bad ki jingai mynsiem.Ïa kane ka jingïalang pynkup burom la pynlong ha phyllaw jong katei hi ka jaka, ha kaba ka Kong Rosetta Mary Kurbah Deputy Commissioner ka EKHD ka la long kum ka Kongsan ha ka jingïadonlang ka Kong Jacqueline FJJ Nongkhlaw kaba dei ka Director.Kiba ïadonlang ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup u Assistant Manager ka NABARD, Lead District Manager, Chief Manager ka PNB Shillong Branch, Branch Manager PNB Umlyngka Branch, Branch Manager SBI, Mawngap Branch, Branch Manager MRB, Mawngap Branch, ka Principal Secondary School, Mawphlang, ki heh ka MSRLS, ki nongtrei ka PNB RSETI bad kiba la pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai.Ka Kong Rosetta Mary Kurbah haba kren kum ka Kongsan ka la ai khublei ïa baroh kiba la pyndep ïa kane ka jingai jinghikai kaba dei ka bynta ba kongsan tam khamtam na ka bynta ki shnong nongkyndong. Ka la ong ba ka kam jong ki Bank Sakhi ka long kaba donkam tam ban ïarap khamtam ïa ki paidbah ha ki thaiñ nongkyndong kibym don ïa ki jaka kynshew pisa. Ka la kyntu ba kin ïatreilang ryngkat ki bor shnong, ki BDO bad ka tnad C&RD.Ka jingdon jong ki Bank Sakhi ka ïarap shibun ïa ki paidbah ha ki shnong nongkyndong kiba donkam ban kynshew pisa.
title: Pynkup burom ka PNB-RSETI ïa 47 ngut ki Bank Sakhi kiba la pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai

content: Shillong Lber 05: U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills mynta ka sngi Baar, ula pynbna ban khang ïaid ïa ki kali heh sha Sohra bad Mawphlang ha ka 8,9 bad 10 tarik mynta u Bnai naduh ka por 6 baje mynsstep haduh ka por 11 baje mynmiet.Ula ong ba kane ka jingkhang ban ïaid ki kali heh ka dei namar ba kan don ka Monolith Festival ha Mawphlang ha ka 7, 8 bad 9 tarik u Lber bad kan don ruh ka Jingiaseng jong ka KJP Synod Sepngi kaba 22 ha ka naduh 7 tarik haduh 10 tarik u Lber ha Laitryngew, Sohra.Namar ba ki don kitei ki prokram ïa kaba la khmih lynti ba bun bah ki briew bad ki kali kin poi na kylleng ki District, kumta la pyrkhing ban ïaid ki kali heh ne Heavy Vehicle ban leit sha Sohra bad Mawphlang khnang ba kan ym don ka jingthut ka ïaid ka ïeng kiwei ki kali kiba leit sha kitei ki prokram.Hynrei la shah pat ban ïaid tang ïa ki kali kiba donkam kyrkieh ne ki Emergency Service Vehicles.
title: Khang ïaid kali heh sha Sohra bad Mawphlang

content: Shillong, Lber, 5: Haba ka sngi ka la sep, ki briew ki ïa mih ban leit sha ka iew janmiet ha Nan Polok. Hadien bun ju khang shuh ha ka por 5 baje janmiet kum ba ju long, ka phalor ka plie ïa ki nongdie jingieid ban plie ïa ki dukan jong ki ban pynkylla dur ïa ka Nan Polok da ki jingthaba bad jingshai, ka bam ka dih lem bad ki jingput jingtem ban pynshongshit.Haba peit ïa ki dukan, ngi lah ban Shem ïa ki dukan bam bad kiwei kiwei ki ukn ba die ïa ki mar ba bun jait lem bad ka jingdon ka rynsan ka put ka tem,bad ngi ai khublei ïa ka MGMP namar kane. Hadien ka por 5 baje janmiet ki paidbah ki la sdang ban ïa tuid sha kane ka jaka ban wad ïa ki jaka ban ïoh shong jahthait hajan ka rynsan ban ïohsngew ïa ki sur jingrwai katba kiwei pat ki ïaid pyngngad sharum shneng ban peit ïa ka jingitynnad ka Nan Polok bad ban rung sha ki dukan ba don sawdong kane ka jaka naduh ba la plie paidbah ha ka 19 Tarik u kyllalyngkot.Kane ka iew ka plielad ïa ka jingïadei hapdeng ki jaid bynriew bapher bapher bad ka jingpynneh ïa ka riti distur. Ym kum ha ka por mynsngi, kane ka iew janmiet ka wanrah ïa ka jingïadei lyngba ka put ka tem, ka bam ka dih bad ki mar ba shu shna hi.Lyngba une u bnai baroh shi bnai, la sakhi ïa ka jingwan jong ki briew bapher bapher sha kane ka jaka. Ki la mad ïa ki jingbam ki babang bad bashngiam, ki la peit bad thied ïa ki tiar ki tar bad ki la peit ïapmat ïa ka jingitynnad jong ka jaka. Man ka ki dukan ki don la ka jong ka jong ka jingitynnad kaba pynpaw ïa ka jingriewspah ka kolshor bad ki riti distur jong ngi.Ha kane ka iew miet, ka jingphai khmat kam long tang ha ka kamai kajuh hynrei ban don ka jingïadei kaba jan bad ki nongdie jingdie. Ka pynpaw ïa ka mynsiem ha Meghalaya kum ha ka sngi iewbah ha kaba ki briew ki leit sha iew ym tang ban leit siew leit tda. Ka kren ka khana ka ïaid shaid shaid hapdeng ki nongdie bad nongthied kaba wanrah ïa ka jingïajan ha ka imlang.Ka iew ka hat kam da dei eh ka jaka ban ïa sngewbha, ka dei ka rynsan ïa ki nongsengkam lajong, ki nongrep, ki nongshna tiar ban ïoh ban pyni ïa ka sap ka phong jong ki. Ka jinglong jan ka ailad ïa ki nongwan ban ban bad leh sngewbha ïa kaei ka ba ki lah ban ai kum ka bam ka dih, ki tiar ki tar bad ki mar rep ha ka dor ka ba tad ha kane ka iewHapdeng ka ïa jong ka bor digital ka bym donkam ïa ka jingïashem mar met, ka iew janmiet ha Nan Polok ka ieng kum ka ta ka ba ju long ban ïashen bad ïakynduh markhmat. Ki bahaiing hasem,ki lok ki jor bad wat ki nongwei ki ïakynduh da ka jingsngewtynnad, ban ïasam ym tang ïa ki jingbam hynrei ïa ki khana bad ka rkhie sngewbha. Haba sakhi ïa kum kane ka jinglong jingman ka wanrai ïa ka jingsngew long trai bad jingsngew long paralok ka long ka b bha ka ban beh noh ïa ka jingsngew ïapher jaid bynriew ka ban pynskhem ïa ka jingïadei para briewHaba u bnai Lber u la wan, ka iew janmiet ka la jam sha u bnai bakhatduh. Ha ka jingïakren balyngkot bad ki nongpynïaid ka pynpaw ïa ka jingthmu ban lehkmen ïa kane ka jingjop da ki prokram bakyrpang. Na ka bynta kito ki ba kwah ban lait na ki jingbunkam ba man ka sngi, ka jingleit sha ka iew janmiet ha Nan Polok mynta u bnai phin mad ïa jingkmen bad jingsngewbha.
title: Ka jingkongsan jong ka ïew janmiet: Ka jingkhmih bniah ïa ka iew janmiet ha Nan Polok

content: Shillong, Lber 4: U bah Wanshwa Nongtdu District President jong ka Jaintia Hills District u la ai khublei ïa u myntri ba dei peit ïa ki kam pynroi nongkyndong u Abu Taher Mandal bad ïa ka sorkar kaba la sngap ïa ka jingkyntu ka party HSPDP ban pyntrei kam ïa ka Community bad Rural Development Block Lumshnong.Katkum ka jingpynbna sorkar kaba la pynmih ha ka 16th Rymphang 2024, la thung ïa u bah Lamriche Kharmon MCS ban shimti ïa ka kam Block Development Officer jong ka Block Lumshnong bad kane kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah kane ka thaiñ.ïa kane ka Lumshnong C&RD Block la plie da u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha 5th Nohprah 2022, hynrei haduh ka 2 Rymphang 2024 ka sngi ba u President ka HSPDP Jaintia Hills u la leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u myntri kam pynroi nongkyndong kam pat treikam.Na kaliang jong ka party HSPDP Jiantia Hills ka ai khublei ïa u myntri namar ba u la ai ka jingkular ha ka jingïakynduh bad u la pynurlong ïa ka jingkular jong u ha ka 16th Rymphang 2024 ba la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna sorkar ba la thung ïa u BDO jong ka Block Lumshnong.Na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paidbah katei ka thaiñ ki shnong kiba hap hapoh kane ka Blok ki don haduh 56 tylli, ka MLA jong kane ka jaka ruh ka la kren ha ka dorbar mang tyngka halor kane Block ha kaba kum ka party ka ai khublei ïa ka MLA ka kong Santa Mary Shylla kaba la kren ïakane ka kam hapoh ka ïing dorbar thawaiñ ka jylla ha dien bala dep mih kane ka jingpynbna sorkar.
title: Ai khublei ka HSPDP ba pyntreikam ïa ka Lumshnong C&RD Block

content: Shillong, Lber 05: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi Ba-ar, u la plie paidbah ïa ka jaka thung bad hikai ban thung ruh ia u tit Shiitake ne ka Shiitake Mushroom and Training Centre kaba la bei tyngka da ka tnat Ministry of Tribal Affairs, ka tnat Ministry of DoNER bad ka Sorkar Jylla ha Upper Shillong, haka jingdon lang ka Myntri ka tnat ka rep ka riang ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Conrad u la ong ba ka sienjam ba la shim da ka Sorkar Jylla ka long ban kynthup lang ïa baroh ha ka imlang sahlang katba ka Jylla ka dang jam shakhmat.“Ka jingkynshew ba ngi la leh bad ka roi ka par ba ngi wanrah kan long lehnoh ei lut lada ka imlang salang baroh kam lah ban kiew lang kumjuh bad long shibynta na ka jingkiew irat jong ka Jylla” ong u Conrad.U Conrad u la pyntip ba ka Sorkar Jylla ha ki lai snem ka la kynshew pisa palat T.700 klur na ka bynta ban tei ïa ki jingtei ba donkam bad ban pynmih mar na ki marrep na ka bynta ki nongrep khnang ba ka kam rep bad ki mar ba ki pynmih kin ai kamai pynïohnong bha.“Nga don beit ïa ka jingngeit ba ngim donkam ban leh ïa kiei kiei kiba thymmai hynrei ngi donkam ban ïarap ïa ki nongrep ba kin nang pynjanai ïa ka rukom rep”.U Conrad u la pyntip ba ka jingthaw ïa ka Shiitake Mushroom Production bad Training Centre, ka dei ka thong ban ïarap ïa ki 1000 ngut ki nongrep bad u la ong ba kane ka shlem ai jinghikai kan lah ban kyntiew ïa ka ioh ka kot ki nongrep kumba T.1 lak man ka por thung haba bynrap “Da kaba shu kheiñ kyllum ngi lah ban ïoh jingkheiñ ba tang ha ki lai snem haduh T. 117 klur ki nongrep kin ïoh kamai pisa”.U la ai mynsiem ïa ki nongrep ba kin shim bynta ha ka jingrep tit Shiitake namar kane ka kam kan dei ka kam bynrap namar ka donkam duna eh ka jaka ban tep bad ba shimpor tang 15 sngi ka jingtrei man ka por thung.Nalor kane u la ong baka ïew die tit Shiitake ka la don lypa hapoh ka Jylla bad ka don ruh ka thong ban khaïi shabar ka Jylla lada ka jingpynmih ka kham bun bad u la kular ïa ki nongrep ba ka Sorkar ka kloi ban kyrshan ïa ki nonggrep.Ia kane ka Projek la tei ha ka jinglut kaba T. 15.15 klur bad kane ka Unit ka don hapoh ka Mushroom Development Centre Upper Shillong ïa kaba la pyntrei da ka jingïatreilang bad ka YATS Corporation Tokyo kaba dei ruh ka Company ba heh tam ban pynmih tit Shiitake.Lah ban kdew ba T.62.37 klur la mang naka bynta ka Mushroom Mission naka bynta san snem bad haduh mynta palat 5000 ngut ki nongrep kila ïoh jingmyntoi na kane ka Prokram.Ka jingpynshlur ban rep ïa u tit Shiitake ka dei ka thong jong ka tnat ka rep ka riang hapoh ka Mushroom Mission lyngba lai tylli ki mat kata ban wanrah ki bor Technology, ban kyntiew ïaka ïew bad ban ïatreilang bad ki paidbah.
title: Plie U Myntri Rangbah ïa ka jaka hikai thung tit Shiitake ha Upper Shillong

content: Guwahati, Lber 05 : Hadien 15 sngi ba kut ka jingaipor ïa ki skul Missionary Khristan ba kin weng ïa ki motdur u Jisu, ka Mary bad u Diengphna, katto katne ki kynhun shit niam Hindu ki la byrngem ban leit mudui da ka mukotduma ha ïing bishar High Court Guwahati pyrshah ïa kine ki Missionary namar ka jingleh ïa ki kam ba pyrshah ïa ka Ri India bad jingleh niam khristan ha ki skul Mission hapoh ka Jylla Assam.Kane ka kynhun ki Hindu ka dei kaba la ïalam khmat da ka Kutumba Surakshy Parishad. “Ka kynhun jong ki Seng Sanatan Hindu ki la rai ban leit mudui sha Guwahati High Court bad ban mudui ïa ka PIL halor ka kam ban weng ïa ki jingleh niam bad jingpynïeng mot niam na ki phyllaw ïingskul” ong u President ka Kutumba Surakshya Parishad u Satya Ranjan Borah haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha Guwahati Press Club mynta ka sngi Ba-ar.Kine ki seng Hindu ki la dawa ban weng ïa baroh ki mot jong u Jisu Khrist bad ka Mary nalor ki diengphna na ki skul Mission.Kane ka jingdawa ka la mih hadien ka jingjia hapoh ka skul Mission-Calvary English School kaba don ha Balipara, Sonitpur District ha kaba uwei u khynnah 10 snem ula shah shoh bad shah pynshitom tang namar ka jingpynmih ïa ka ktien “Jai Sri Ram” haba plie ïa ka kot hapoh kamra shong klas. Kane ka jingjia kala jia ha ka 5 tarik u Rymphang.“Kane ka jingjia kala pynkheiñ ïa ka Juvenile Justice Act, Article 14,15 jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri, ka New Education Policy ha ryngkat ka Article 51 (A) jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India” ong u Borah.Ula ong ba hadien kane ka jingjia, ngi la pynpaw ïa ka jingbym sngewtynnad bad ngi la thoh ruh ïa bun ki shithi sha u Lat ka Jylla Assam, Myntri Rangbah, Chief Secretary bad u Archbishop ka Guwahati nalor u District Commissioner ka Sonitpur District. Hynrei u ong, ka long kaba sngewsih ïa ka jingbym don jingkitkhlieh bad jingleh bym suidñiew jong ka Sorkar Assam halor kane ka jingjia.Kane ka kam ka dei kaba la ïakren ruh ha ka ïingdorbar Thaw Aiñ jong ka Meghalaya ha ka 27 tarik Rymphang ha kaba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ula ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan pynshisha shuwa ïa ka khubor halor ka jingthombor ïa ki skul Mission ha Assam shuwa ba un ïakren bad ki bor Sorkar ha Dispur bad ha kajuh ka por ula kular ban ai ïa ka jingïada bad jingshngaiñ ïa ki paidbah kiba sah ha khappud ki ar Jylla.“Ngi la jubab da ka emai ba kwah ban ïakren bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya ruh halor kane ka jingsngewkhia jong ngi. Hynrei ym don mano mano ruh ba kwah ban pynbeit ïa kane ka kam haduh mynta” ong u Borah.“Kumta ngi la rai ban leit mudui sha Gauhati High Court bad ban mudui da ka PIL ban weng noh ïa ki jinglehniam bad ka jing buh mot niam ha ki phyllaw ïingskul” ula ong.
title: Pyni bor ki kynhun shitniam ha Assam rai ujor sha ïing Bishar ïa ki Nongïalam Niam Khristan

content: Shillong, 05 Lber : Ka jingpynkhreh ka Balang Presbyterian Laitryngew, Sohra Presbytery ban pdiang ïa ka jingïaseng Khasi Jaiñtia Presbyterian (KJP) Synod Sepngi kaba 22 naduh ka 7 tarik haduh ka 10 tarik u Lber, 2024 ka la ïaid shaid shaid ha katei ka shnong.Ha ka 5 tarik u Lber, 2024, u MLA ka Sohra, u Bah Gavin M Mylliem ha ryngkat ki nongïalam ka Balang na Laitryngew, ki nongïalam shnong kumjuh ki dkhot na ka Sohra Presbytery, ki la pynlong ka jingjurip ïa ki jingdonkam na ka bynta kane ka jingïaseng naduh ki jaka ïeng kali, ka jaka pynlong jingïaseng haduh ki jaka leit bar nalor kiwei pat.Ha kaba ïa dei pat ka lynti syngkien, la shna ïa ki surok rong ha ki bynta bapher bapher ka shnong khnang ban pynsuk ïa kiba wan sakhi ïa kane ka jingïaseng nalor ka um bam um dih.“Ka jingpynkhreh ban shna ïa ki surok na ka bynta kane ka jingïaseng ka dei naduh u snem 2019 bad ka mang tyngka ka la wan kumba 10 klur ha u snem 2022 na ka bynta 5 KM ka surok haba kheiñ kyllum lang baroh”, la ong u Bah Gavin.U la ong ba na ka bynta ka um bam pat la wanrah lyngba ka skhim sam um kaba la tip kum ka Laitryngew Mawkma Combined Water Supply Scheme kaba long 10 klur tyngka.Na ka liang u Pastor Nongrud, Executive Secretary Sohra Presbytery u la ong ba ka Balang ha ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka jingïaseng Synod ka la pynbiang bha ïa ki jaka ïeng kali ban pynsuk ïa ki para bangeit kiba wan sha kane ka jingïaseng.
title: 20 klur tyngka pynlut ka sorkar ha Laitryngew ban pynbit pynbiang shwa ka jingïaseng KJP Synod Sepngi

content: Shillong, Lber, 5: Ka jingthep kam ban pyndap ïa ki 3100 tylli ki kam ba thylli ha ka tnat Pulit Meghalaya kan sa sdang noh shen.Kine ki kynthup ïa ki 76 post jong ka Unarmed Branch Sub Inspector, 1255 tylli ha ka Unarmed Branch Constable bad 1637 tylli ha ka Armed Branch Constable.Ka jingpynrungkam kan long ha ki san tylli ki Sector, kata, ha 1st Battalion ha Mawiong, ha 2nd MLP Battalion na ka bynta ka West Garo Hills, ha 3rd Battalion Sahbseiñ na ka bynta ka Jaiñtia Hills, ha 4th Battalion Sohpian na ka bynta ka West Khasi Hills bad ha 5th Battalion ha Williamnagar na ka bynta ka East bad ka South Garo Hills.Ka jingplie ïa ka Online Application kan sdang naduh ka 1 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024.Haba pyntip ïa kane ha ka sngi Baar, u Director General of Police Dr. LR Bishnoi u la ong, “kane kan dei ka jingpynrungkam kaba heh bha ha ka histori jong ka tnat Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya. Ka tnat Pulit kan sa nang khlaiñ shuh shuh da ka jingpynrungkam palat 3,000 hajar ngut ki Pulit.” U la pynthikna ruh ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingleh buittuh ha ka jingthepkam ba la tip kum ka Transparent Recruitment Process (TRP).U DGP u la ong hadien ba la kut ka elekshon MP, ka jingpynrungkam kan sa sdang shaid shaid.
title: 3100 tylli ki kam ha ka tnat Pulit yn khot Advertisement ha u ïaïong

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 5: Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) thaiñ Narpuh, East Jaiñtia Hills, kaba kynthup ïa bun tylli ki shnong hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President Bah Lasting Pala, uba dei ruh u waheh shong jong ka shnong Umkiang bad u Chairman Bah Love You Bareh uba dei u Waheh Shnong ka shnong Pyrtakuna ha ka jingïalang ba la pynlong ha ka sngi Baar ha ka shnong Umkiang ka la shim ïa ka rai ban pynlong da ka jing pakhang surok kaba 24 kynta ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai ka ban sdang naduh ka por 6:00 baje mynstep.Ki nongïalam ka JAC ki la pynpaw ka jingsngew bitar namar ka jingleh bym salia jong ka Sorkar bad ka bym shym la shimkhia eiei ban phah maramot noh ïa kane ka surok kaba la jot rathai, watla na ka por sha ka por ki nongsynshar shnong bad ki paidbah jong ka Narpuh ki la dawa na ka Sorkar ban sngap lem ïa ka sur u paidbah ban sngewthuh lem ïa ka jingeh ki nongleit nongwan hynrei ka Sorkar kam patiaw eiei ruh.Da kawei ka jingmut ka JAC, ka la rai ban shim da kane ka sienjam kaba tyngeh bad pynpaw ruh lada ka jingmaramot ïa ka surok ka dang sahteng ka JAC kan ïai bteng biang ïa kane ka jingpakhang lynti ïa ka surok ha Narpuh.U Waheh Shnong jong ka Umkiang, u la ong, “ka surok ruh ym i dur surok shuh, ka jingkieng ruh ym i jingkieng shuh ynda la wan lei sa u slap kane kan sa twa bad tuid lut baroh. Kumba long mynta ka jingsniew ka surok ka la ktah ruh ïa ka leit ka wan namar lada ngi mut leit sha Khliehriat ka la shim por haduh 8-9 kynta ban poi. Tang wan u slap ki thliew ki syar kiba don ha surok ki ladap um lut baroh ym long shuh ban ïaid ki kali bad dei na kata ka daw ka jingkhot pakhang surok da ka JAC ka dei namarba ka sorkar kam shimkhia ban phah maramot ïa ka surok.”“Ha ka 5 tarik, Rymphang ngi la ïakynduh ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tyngsong uba khmih ïa ka tnat PWD (Roads) bad u ong ba ïa kane ka surok la aiti sha ka Dhar Company ban pyntrei. Hynrei ngi sngewlyngngoh ba haduh mynta ym pat don kaei kaei ka dak ban maramot ïa ka surok,” ula ong’U la kyntu ruh ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ba kin ïa mih paidbah ha ka 7 tarik ban sdang ïa ka jingpakhang surok.U Bah Pala u la pynpaw ka jingsngewlem bad sngewsynei ïa ki Pulit ka Umkiang bad ïa ki Pulit ka Lumshnong kiba la trei shitom khlem shong thait ban pyllait ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jia manla ka sngi. U la ong ba ki hap ban ïaid da ka kjat bun kilomitar naduh Umkiang shaduh Sonapur, kumjuh ruh ki Pulit Lumshnong ki ïaid kjat naduh Lumshnong shaduh Sonapur ban pyllait ïa ki kali kiba sahkut ha ka jingdheng kali.“Balei ka Sorkar ka lehsting haduh katne katne kane, ka surok kam dei tang ïa ngi hynrei ka dei ka surok kaba baroh ki briew jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ruh ki ju ïaid na kane ka lynti, ka jingsakut ha ka jingdheng kali kaba bun kynta ka ju pyn lynga ïa ki khyllung khynnah kiba shong hapoh ki kali kiba wan na ki jylla bapher bapher, ki ju ïam lynga hapoh ki kali, kumjuh ruh ka buh jingeh ïa ki kynthei ki khynnah, ki paidbah kiba ïaid na kane ka surok bad shisha ka long ruh kaba i jah burom ïa ka jylla lada ka surok National Highway ka long ha kane ka dur kaba wanrah jingeh ïa ki paidbah,” u la ong.U Secretary shnong Umkiang, Bah Nicholas Lyngdoh u la ong, “ka rukom shnna surok da ka National Highway Authoriry of India (NHAI) ka dei kaba la shu shna tangdep namar kumba long mynta ki paidbah ki ïakynduh jingeh ha ka leit ka wan, ki khynnah skul ruh bun ba ki duh ban leit skul namar ka jingdheng kali kaba jur kaba na ka daw ka jingsniew ka surok.“Ngi kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar ba lada shna ïa ka surok ym dei ban shu shna tang dep, tang ban ïoh ïa ka pisa, hynrei dei ban shna ha kata ka rukom kaba paka kaba dei ban don ruh ki nala tuid um kiba paka, wat ñiew beiñ ïa ngi tang namar ba ngi sah sha ki khappud, ngi ruh ngi don ka hok ban thep vote ban pynlong ïa ka Sorkar, lada phi leh beiñ ïa ngi ngi sngewsih, sngewbha shna ïa ka surok, ki nala kiba paka,” u la bynrap.U Bah Love You Bareh, haba bynrap halor kane u la ong, “ngi la mad jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsniew palat ka surok, ngi ladep khang ïa ka Toll gate ha Lumshnong hynrei u Deputy Commissioner u la khot ïa ngi na ka por sha ka por ban ïakren hynrei ngim pat shah satia ban plie ïa ka Toll Gate ha Lumshnong. Ngi ki nongïalam shnong ha ka 5 tarik u Rymphang ngi la leit ruh ban ïakynduh bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tyngsong ha kaba u la kular ruh ba ha u Lber ngin sa ïoh ka surok kaba bha hynrei haduh mynta ka sngi ngim ïohi dak eiei ban maramot ïa kane ka surok.”U la ong ruh ba ka jingsniew ka surok ka la buh jingeh ïa ki nongleit nongwan, ka buh jingeh ruh ban pyndep ïa ki kam namar ka jingdheng kali ha kane ka surok kaba da ki kynta manla ka sngi.“Namar ka Sorkar kam leh eiei ngin ïa mih paidbah ban pakhang noh ïa kane ka surok. Ki nongmihkhmat ruh kim leh eiei hato ki kheiñ ïa ngi ba ngi dei kiei. Ngi la kyrshan ïa ki nongmihkhmat hynrei ynda la jop kim peit shuh ïa ngi,” la kren bynñiaw u Bah Bareh.
title: 24 kynta yn pakhang surok ka JAC ha ka Narpuh ba sniew palat ka surok NH-6

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 5: Ka kur Kharbani napoh Pathew Eastern West Khasi Hills ha ka sngi hat majai ki la ujor biang sa kawei ka ejahar halor ka jingshah pynïap dusmon jong u samla Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani, 29 snem karta, kaba la jia ha ka shiteng synñia jong ka 3 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka jing ujor ejahar ka long ban dawa na ka ki bor jong ka aiñ ban thwet bad kem lut ïa baroh kiba donkti lang ha ka ban pynïap ïa utei u samla.U Bah S.Kitbok Kharbani uwei na ki samla rangbah hapoh jong ka kur, u la ong ba ka kur Kharbani ka la buh biang sa ïa kawei pat ka ejahar hakhmat ki pulit, hadien ba ka kur ka la ïoh biang sa ki katto katne ki sakhi ba u ba leh ïa kane ka kam pyntriem um dei tang uwei, hynrei dang don shuh shuh kiba donkti.U la ong ba ka kur ka la ïoh ruh ïa ki phone call record kiba pynshisha ba ki dang shuh shuh sa katto katne ngut ki briew, kiba donkti ha katei ka kam pyntriem pyrshah ïa u Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani. U la ong ruh ba ha ka jingïakren bad ki pulit, ki dang don shuh shuh sa kiwei pat kiba donkti.Ha ka juh ka por u la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba lah ban ïohi ïa kane ka jingjia, ba kin wan shakhmat ban ïasnohktilang bad ka kur Kharbani, na ka bynta ban rat diengkhong ïa kine ki kam sniew hapoh jong ka dong ka thaiñ baroh kawei.Ka kur Kharbani ka kyntu ruh ïa ki bor jong ka aiñ ba kin leh da kaba tyngeh, da kaba kin kem lut ïa baroh kiba donkti bad dei ban pynngat bad pynshitom tyngeh katkum ka aiñ.Ha kane ka jingleit buh ejahar ba la don da kiba haïing hasem jong u samla Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani, la donlang ruh da ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ki kynhun sengbhalang bapher bapher ka West Khasi Hills, kiba la pynpaw ïa ka sur jong ka jingpynrem bad dawa ruh na ki bor jong ka aiñ ban kem bad pynshitom tyngeh ïa baroh kiba donkti.
title: Ujor ejahar biang ka kur Kharbani ba shah pynïap dusmon u Macborn Bonnyson

content: Shillong, Lber, 5: Ka Deputy Inspector General of Police (TAP) Kong Claudia Lyngwa ha ka sngi Baar ka la ong ba ka jingkhang ka dang plie na ka bynta ka jngïakren ïasuk ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC).Ka la ong ruh ba ki Pulit ki la lap sabut na ka Mobile Phone jong u dkhot ka HNLC ba la shah kem u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh ba u donkti ban dawa pisa na kiba bun ki briew.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Kong Lyngwa ka la ong ba u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh uba la don bynta ha kynhun ïakren ïasuk jong ka HNLC u la shu rung tuh sha ka jylla Meghalaya na Bangladesh bad ula shah kem ha ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills.“Kam don kano kano na ka liang jong ngi ba kane ka jingïakren ïasuk kam dei ban shu kut noh, ka dang dei ban ïai bteng bad ka jingkhang ka dang plie,” ka la ong.Haba kylli shaphang ki khubor kiba kam ba u Bah Storgy u la wan sha Meghalaya ban pyndem wait, ka DIG ka la ong, “u briew uba la leit phai sha Bangladesh ka pynpaw shai ba lada u kwah ban pyndem wait, u la dei ban sah ha Shillong katba ka HNLC ka dang ïakren bad ka Sorkar bad katkum ka jingïohi jong ngi, ka jingleit phai biang jong u sha ka ri Bangladesh bad wan phai biang na ka Bangladesh, kaei kaba pynpaw, nga ieh ha phi ban sngewthuh ïa kane.”Ka la ong, “kam don kano kano ka shithi dawa pisa ba u la phah sha ki briew na ka mobile phone jong u, hynrei ki don bun tylli ki mobile number kiba la peit bad ki dei kiba la dawa pisa na kiba bun ki briew.”Haba pynpaw ba ka jingtohkit kan dang ïai bteng, ka Kong Lyngwa ka la ong, “ka jingïakren ïasuk kan dang ïaid bad lada kino kino ki donkti ha ki kam be-aiñ khlempep ngin hap ban pynshitom ïa ki katkum ka aiñ.”Shuh shuh ka DIG ka la ïathuh ba katkum ka jingïoh jingtip ka HNLC mynta ka don sa tang 20-30 ngut ki dkhot. “Hynrei, ngim lah ban ong ki tiar kiba kumno ki don hynrei kiba ngi tip ki don tang khyndiat tylli ki tiar siat,” ka la ong.Bun na ki briew kiba la ïohpdiang ïa ki shithi dawa pisa kim shym la ujor sha ki Pulit.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyrshang ban ïoh jingshaniah na ki paidbah ka Kong Lyngwa ka la ong, “ka kamram jong ngi ka long ban peitngor bad kano kano ka jingtip ba ngi ïohlum ngi pyndep mardor khnang ban ïoh ïa ka jingshaniah ki paidbah. Naduh ka por ba ka HNLC ka la mih ha Meghalaya, ki Pulit ki la trei shitom khlem shongthait. Ki Pulit ki la len ïa la ka jingim ha kane ka jingïakhun bad kumba ka long mynta nga ngeit ba phi ïohi ïa ka jingwan ki nongjngohkai pyrthei ka la kylla bha namarba ki Pulit ki la trei la ka jong ka kamram bad ki la len ruh la ka jong ka jingim. Kane ka pynïoh jingshaniah na ki paidbah jong ngi.Ha kajuh ka por, ka DIG ka la maham ïa ki paidbah kiba noh synñiang ne kiba kyrshan pisa ïa ka HNLC ba shisien ka sngi kin ym lait satia na ki kynjri jong ka aiñ.
title: Ka jingkhang ka dang plie ban bteng ïa ka jingïakren

content: Shillong, Lber 06: Ka kynhun ïalehkai kriket jong ka Rangkynsai CC hynne ka sngi ka la khur ïa ka jingjop kaba suk hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem kput ïa ka Raj bhawan haduh 163 ron ha ka lympung lehkai jong ka Shillong Cricket League Super Dicision 2024 . Ki la don haduh arngut ki rangïalehkai ka Rangkynsai kiba khyrwit spah ron ha kane ka jingïakhun.Haba phai sha kane ka jingïakhun, ka Rangkynsai CC ka la jied ban tied nyngkong hadien ba jop ïa ka toss, ha kaba ka kynhun ka la tied haduh 293 ron na ki 45 over bad shah pynhap 8 ngut.Ki player kiba seisoh ha ka tied ki kynthup ïa u Ram Gurun u ba la khyrwit palat ïa ka spah ron, kata da 119 ron naki 99 bol, katba u wei pat u ba la kynjoh spah ron u dei u Ajay Duhan da 108 ron na ki 116 bol.Haba phai sha ki rangkawangbol ka liang pyshah kiba la seisoh ki long u Pankaj Mandol u ba la kawang 9 over, shah tied 53 ron bad khur 5 wicket, katba u Arbin singh u la kawang 9 over, shah tied 80 ron bad ïoh pynhap 2 wicket.Haba pyrshang ban beh ïa katei ka thong ba la buh ka Raj bhawan ka la shah khanglad noh da tang 130 ron naki 31.3 over hadien ba baroh shiphew ngut ki la shah pynkhyllem. Ki player kiba la ïoh kamai ron kham bun ki long u Rahul shah (32 ron naki 44 bol) bad u Babloo passah (23 ron naki 53 bol).Dei ki rangkawangbol kiba la tyngshaiñ ha ka pali tied jong ka Raj bhawan, ha kaba u Charm Marbaniang u la ïoh ban khur 3 wicket naki 3.3 over, bad ailad tang 13 ron, nangta u Shavian Blah u la kawang 4 over, shah tied 21 ron bad khur 2 wicket.ïa ka nam rangïalehkai ba kynsai lane Player off the match ha kane ka jingïakhun la khur da u Ram Gurung u ba la tied 119 ron naki 99 bol kaba la kyrshan radbah ïa ka Rangkynsai ban jop kput haduh 163 ron.
title: Lyngba ka spah ron u Gurung bad u Duhan jop kput ka Rangkynsai ïa ka Raj Bhawan

content: Shillong, Lber, 5: Uwei u dkhot barim jong ka United Achik Liberation Army (UALA) bad arngut kiwei pat kiba donkti ban pynkhlaiñ biang ïa ka Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA) ba la kheiñ be-aiñ ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit.U Simsang K. Marak uba la 40 snem ka rta na Resubelpara u dei u dkhot barim ka UALA, la ïathuh u Superintendent of Police ka North Garo Hills u Bruno A. Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar“U (Simsang) u dei uba hakhmat eh ha kane ka kam. U dei ruh uba la shah thwet ha ki Pulit Assam. Ka kashari na Assam ka la pynngat pyrshah ïa u ha ka MPWA bad ngin sa aiti ïa u sha ki Pulit ka Assam hadien ba ngi ladep tohkit ïa u ïa ki kam be-aiñ ha North Garo Hills,” u la ong.Arngut kiwei pat kiba la shah kem ki dei kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u T Sangma uba la 40 snem bad u Suresh Sangma 32 snem na Adogre, la ong u SP.Ka jingïohkem ïa kine ki lai ngut ka long hadien ba ki Pulit ka Kharkutta Police Station ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka ejahar ha ka 24 tarik Rymphang. Nalor kane, ka la don ruh ka shithi ba la thep ha ka social media ha ka 7 tarik, Rymphang kaba pyntip ïa ka jingpynkhlaiñ biang ïa ka GNLA.“Ngi la kurup ïa ki mobile phone na ka met jong ki, kiba la pyndonkam ha ki kam runar. Ki donkti ban dawa pisa T. 20,000 na uwei u lanot ha North Garo Hills,” la ïathuh u Sangma.Haba pynpaw ba ki Pulit kin dang kem shuh shuh ïa ki dkhot ha ki sngi ban sa wan, u SP u la ïathuh ba ki dang don sa kuimba 7-8 ngut ki dkhot ha kane ka kynhun bad ïa ngi ruh ngin ym pyllait suk hynrei ngin thwet tyngeh haduh ban da ïohkem.”Haba kylli, u Sangma u ong, “bun na ki tiar siat ba la buhrieh da ka GNLA la ïoh kurup ha Williamnagar. Ïa mynta, ngim shym la ïoh kurup ïa ki tiar siat na ki,” u la bynrap.
title: Shah kem lai ngut ki dkhot ka GNLA (R), thwet ki Pulit ïa ki dkhot ba phetrieh

content: Shillong, Lber, 5: U drok uba shongdor palat T. 300 klur la kurup da ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya hapoh ar snem la ïathuh u Director General of Police (DGP) Dr. LR Bishnoi bad ong ruh ba kane ka jingeh ka dei kaba khia bha namarba ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba ïajan tam bad ka Golden Triangle.“Jan T. 300 klur u drok la ïoh kurup hapoh ki ar snem ba la leit noh. Ha kine ki ar snem u drok uba shongdor 75 klur la ïoh kurup hapoh u snem 2022. Nangta sa 170 klur hapoh u snem 2023 bad sa 21 klur hapoh ki ar bnai jong u snem 2024,” la ong u Bishnoi ha ki lad pathai khubor.Haduh 26 kilo u drok la ïoh kurup hapoh ki ar snem.
