Kane ka kynthup ïa u drok ba 7.5 kilor ha u snem 2022, 16.3 kilor ha u snem 2023 bad jan 1 kilor u drok ba la ïoh kurup ha u bnai Kyllalyngkot-Rymphang 2024.Ka jingïohkurup ïa u Ganja ka la long haduh 4,750 kilo ha u snem 2024 (ba la ïoh kurup da ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi) na ka 1400 kilo ba la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2023 bad 3987 kilo ha u snem 2022.U DGP u la pynkup burom ruh ïa ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi halor ka jingïoh kurup ïa u Ganja ha ka sngi u Blei ha Lad Umsaw.“Ki Pulit ka Ribhoi ki la pynlong ka jingap shrip bad kurup 4750 kilo u Ganja bad ka jingwan rah ïa une u jingdih ka dei na ka jylla Tripura bad nangne la pynrung lyngba ka Meghalaya bad ngi la ïohkem ïa ki runar kiba donkti bad mynta kane ka case ka dang don hapdeng ka jingtohkit,” u la ong.Ka jingïoh kurup ïa ki dawai kuli Yaba ka la kiew bha ha kaba 19000 tylli ki kuli la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2022, haduh 60,000 tylli ki kuli la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2023 bad 2000 ki kuli la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2024. Ka jingïoh kurup ïa kiwei pat ki dawai kuli jingdih pynbuaid ki long 16928 tylli ha u snem 2022, 32,298 tylli ha u snem 2023 bad 600 tylli ha u snem 2024.Ha ka sien banyngkong eh, ki Pulit ki la kurup ruh 14.2 kilo u jingdih Crystal Neth uba shongdor T. 1.5 klur.Shuh shuh, haduh 116 tylli ki NDPS case la rejistar ha u snem 2022 bad kane ka la kiew sha ka 189 ha u snem 2023 katba haduh 13 tylli ki case ladep ban rejistar ha ki ar bnai jong une u snem 2024Palat 610 ngut ki briew ki la shah kem naduh u snem 2022 haduh u snem 2024. Na kine, 234 ngut kiba la shah kem ki long ha u snem 2022, 355 ngut ha u snem 2023 bad 25 ngut ha u snem 2024. 10% na kiba la shah kem ki dei ki kynthei kiba donkti ban khaii drok.Kumjuh ruh, 19 ngut la ithuh kum ki briew kiba ïai mlien ban khaii drok, ha kaba 8 tylli ki case jong ka PITNDPS la phah sha ka kashari bad mynta ka Advisory Board kan sa shim ïa ka rai, la ong u Bishnoi.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingisaitmet jong u dang dei ka kam kaba jwat bha ha Meghalaya, u DGP u la ong, “kane ka dei na ka daw ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka ïajan bha bad ka Golden Triangle. Mynshwa, ka dei ka lynti ïaid, hynrei mynta ka ka long ka pdeng khaii.”U la ong ba ka jingdon jong ki nongdih drok ha ka jylla ka la nang kiew bad kane ka la pynsngewkhia bha ïa kiba bun.“Ban ïakhun ïa kane ka jingisaitmet, ka tnat Pulit ka la wanrah da ki buit treikam kum ka jingpynshai paidbah khamtam eh hapdeng ki samla da kaba pynlong ïa ki jingpynshai paidbah ha ki skul, ki University bad ka jingïai thwet ïa ki nongkhaii drok ruh ka dang bteng,” la ong u Bishnoi bad bynrap ba ki nongkhaii drok ki dei kiba kiba ïai mlien bad bun na ki kynhun Gang na kiwei ki jylla ki don bynta lang ha kaba ki Pulit ka Meghalaya ki la ïakhun ban pynduhjait ïa ki.Shuh shuh u DGP u la ong, “ngi la pyndonkam ruh da ki technology ban kem ïa ki nongkhaii drok bad ka tnat CID ka la trei shitom ban pyndonkam da ka technology ban wad ïa ka jingdonkti jong ki nongkhaii drok. Ngi ju ïasam jingtip ruh bad ki jylla ba marjan khnang ban khanglad.”“Nalor kata, ngi la plie ïa ki Counselling Cells ban ïarap ïa ki lanot dih drok da kaba khot lang ïa ki bahaing hasem. U Myntri Rangbah u dei uba la ai mynsiem bha ban pyllait luid ïa ka Meghalaya na u drok bad ngin dang ïai bteng ban trei shtiom da kaba pyndonkam ïa ka social media,” u la bynrap.Ha kine ki ar snem ba la leit noh, haduh 28,000 bilor ka dawai jyrhoh la kurup ha u snem 2022, 88000 bilor ha u snenm 2023 bad kumba 112 bilor ha u snem 2024.Nalor ka pisa kaba T. 36 lak la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2022, T. 45.6 lak ha u 2023 bad T. 60,000 hajar ha u 2024. Ka jingïoh kuru ïa ki kali ha u 2022 ka long 67tylli, 157 tylli ha u snem 2023 bad 12 tylli ha u snem 2024.
title: 300 klur u drok kurup ki Pulit ha u 2022-2024, shah kem 610 ngut ki snar khaïi drok

content: K a jingwanrah jong ka Sorkar ïa ka ain ban pyrkhing ïa ka jingshna iing kaba la tip kum ka Meghalaya Building Bye Law ka long tang ha ki jaka sor bad la pynjlan sa sha ki khap sor. Hynrei ha ka jingtyllun ka shalyntem ki por, la i donkam ban pynjlan ïa kane ka aiñ namarba ki District Headquarter mynta ki la nang mih ki ing mala kiba heh. Ki paidbah kiba shong basah sha ki District bapher bapher ka jylla kim dei ban sngew khohñïoh lada ka Sorkar ka pyntreikam ïa kane ka aiñ wat sha ki shnong ba kyndong ka jylla namarba ki dei ban sngewthuh bha ba ka Jylla Meghalaya ka dei ka lynti ïaid jong u jumai kaba hap ha ka Seismic Zone-V bad ka jingkhynñiuh u jumai ka ju jia khah khah.Ha u snem 1897 ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la mad ïa ka jingjulor kaba khraw bha hadien ka jingkhie u jumai uba jur 8.7 magnitude. Shwa kane, u jumai uba jur 8.5 magnitude u la jia ruh ha u snem 1950 ha kaba ka la wanrah ïa ka jingduh ei ki mynsiem briew bad ka jingjulor ki ing ki sem.Watla shipah snem tam mynshwa ka jingkhynñiuh u jumai ka jingjulor bad ka jingïap lehse ka lah ban duna hynrei ki paidbah ki la dei ban pyrkhat bha da ki hajar sien bad ban puson bha ba la donkam ïa ka aiñ kaba pyrkhing ban shna iing bun mala namarba ka jingbun briew ha kane ka jylla ka la nang kharoi.Ka jingtyrwa jong ki Autonomous District Council ïa ka tnat District Council Affairs (DCA) jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynjlan ïa ka ain shna ing sha ki nongkyndong ka jylla ka long ba ki la ïohi ïa ka jingmih jong ki ing mala ha kaba ki paidbah ki la sdang ban shna ïa ki iing ki sem kiba kham bha bad lehse ha ka jingïohi jong ki Autonomous District Council la i dei ban don da ka ain kaba lah ban tehlakam ïa ka jingshna iing mala.Da ka jingshimkhia jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat District Council Affairs u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la lum ïa ka jingïalang jong ki Autonomous District Council ban ïathir ïatai bad ban pyrkhat sani bha halor ki jingeh kiba lah ban ktah ïa ka jylla ha ki shnong bapher bapher jong ki 12 tylli ki district ka jylla.Haoid, ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka Municipal ka Meghalaya Urban Development Authority (MUDA) ka tehlakam ïa ka jingshna iing bun mala hynrei ka jingbym pat pyntreikam ïa ka Building Bye Laws sha ki nongkyndong ka Jylla ka dei kawei pat kaba pynpyrkhat ïa ka District Council ban pyntreikam noh da kane khnang ban ïada lypa ïa kino kino ki jingjia kaba la ban wanrah ïa ka jingduhei ki mynsiem bakordor lada jia ba wan ki bor lynshop jong ka mariang ha ka por ka bym poi pyrkhat.Mynta ka shong sa ha ka Komiti kaba la thaw da ka District Council Affairs kumno ban pyrkhat ïa kane ka jingai jingmut jong ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) ban pyntreikam ïa ka Meghalaya Building Bye Laws sha ki shnong nongkyndong jong ka Jylla la ka sngewdei neem ban pdiang ïa kane ka jingai jingmut bad ka shong ruh sa ha ki paidbah ban phah ïa ki jingai jingmut sha ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynjanai ïa kane ka aiñ khnang ba kane ka aiñ kan ym ktah pat ïa ki paidbah nongkyndong kiba dang duna ka ïoh ka kot watla khyndiat eh ki dei kiba bit ba biang ha ka ïoh ka kot.Lada ka Building Bye Laws ka la treikam sha ki nongkyndong kam dei ban ktah pat ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki paidbah nongkyndong namarba ka jingpyrshah jong ki paidbah ha ki snem ba la leit noh ban pyntreikam ïa kane ka aiñ ba pyrkhing da ka MUDA ha kito ki por ka dei namarba ki sngewthuh ba kin hap ban siew da ka dor kaba rem hynrei hadien ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la aiti sha ka Autonomous District Council ban pyntreikam tang ha ki Scheduled Area kiba bun ki Dorbar Shnong ki la pdiang sngewbha ïa kane ka aiñ.
title: Ka Building Bye Law sha ki shnong nongkyndong

content: Jowai, Lber 06: Ka Jaiñtia Student’s Movement (JSM) Lapangap Unit mynta ka sngi Balang kala leit ban ujor sha u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaiñtia Hills District bah B.S. Sohliya halor ka jingeh jong ki nongshong shnong ka thaiñ Lapangap kaba dang hap hapoh ka Namdong C&RD Block kaba ki ïa kynduh na ka jingshah lum khajna ha ki pulit Assam haba ki ïaid lynti lyngba u surok Tahpat-Lapangap-Khanduli.Ka seng kala pynsngew la kumba ar taïew mynta ki pulit jong ka Assam kiba wan sah naduh u snem 2023 ha ki bynta ba ïa khajia pud hapdeng ka shnong Lapangap bad Tahpat kila sdang ban khynra bad lum khajna ïa ki paidbah Pnar kiba ïaid lynti da ki kali ba don ïa ki Registration No jong ka jylla Meghalaya, katba ïa kito ki kali ki bym rah ïa ki licence bad Registration ki lum khajna haduh 500 bad 1000 tyngka.Kane ka jingkhrong khajna jong ki pulit Assam kaba pynbitar ïa kiba bun ba lang khamtam ïa ki nongshong shnong ka Lapangap namar katei ka jaka (pynthor) ba ki khrong khajna ka dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Lapangap, la ong ka seng.Halor kane ka JSM ka buh ka jingkyntu na u Deputy Commissioner ba un shim khai mardor ïa kane ka kam, khnang ban lait na kino kino ki jingïakynad ha kine ki sngi ban wan.Na ka liang u President katei ka Unit samla Heyboyme Myrphet hadien ka jingïakynduh bad u DC ula pyntip ba utei u khlieh duh ka District ula kular ban shimkhia ïa kane ban pynlong ka jingïakren lyngba ka Video Conference hapeng ki ar District ka West Jaiñtia bad West Karbi Anglong haka 12 bad 13 tarik mynta u bnai.Shuh shuh ula ong kiba bun ki nongshong shnong haba ki leit sei pisa na ki Bank jong ki, hynrei kaba sngewsih ki hap pat ban siew pynban ïa katei ka pisa kum ka bai khajna jong ki pulit Assam.
title: Haduh 500 bad 1000 tyngka lum khajna ki pulit Assam ïa ki kali naka thaiñ Lapangap

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 05: Ka Kharraswai Football Club ka la long ka nongjop hadien ba ka la pynliem noh da 4 – 2 kol pyrshah ïa ka Mawsynram Sports Club ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka 1st Knock-Out Football Tournament 2024 ba la pynïaid da ka HANM, Balat Border Area Circle ha madan Dangar, East Khasi Hills District.Haba phai ha ka jingïalehkai hapdeng kitei ki ar kynhun ka la long shisha ka jingïalehkai kaba itynnad bha namar ha ka jingïakhun ka long ban rah ïa ka nam jop. Kumta ha ka jingïaleh, kaba dei ha ka kyllastep, ym shym la don mano mano ban ïoh ban ïa pynkhih jar wat kawei ruh hynrei haba wan phai pat ha ka jingïalehkai jong ka kyllamiet, ka Kharraswai FC bad Mawsynram SC ki la ïoh ban ïa khaid da kaba ïa thep mar kawei ka kol.Namarkata, ban rai mano ba jop, na ka liang ki nongpynïaleh ki la shu pynïaleh noh da ka Tie Breaker ha kaba ha kane ka jingïaleh ka Kharraswai FC ka la long ka nongjop da kaba ka la tam noh da 4 – 2 kol pyrshah ïa ka Mawsynram SC.Ha kaba ïa dei bad ki khusnam, na ka liang u bah H.M. Shangpliang, u nongaibuit jong ka tnad pule puthi jong ka sorkar Meghalaya bad u bah Alvin Sawkmie, MDC ka Mawsynram Constituency ki la ïoh ban sam.
title: Lah duh ka Kharraswai FC ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka 1st Knock-Out FT 2024

content: Khliehriat lber 06: Ka Jaiñtia Students Movement, hapoh ka jingïalam u President rangbah, u bah Lenningstar Rymbai bad u General Secretary, u bah Roitre Dkhar, mynta ka sngi ka la leit ban ïakynduh bad iakren bad u Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiakhun exam ki khynnah pule da kaba leh online bad ka seng ka kyntu ruh ïa ki bor district ban shimkhia ïa ki mat ba ka seng ka kyrpad ban kham pynsuk ïa ki khynnah pule jong ka thaiñ.Katkum u kyrwoh na ka seng la ong “Ngi la kyrpad ïa u Deputy Commissioner ban bthah ïa ka NIC cell hapoh DCophis ba kan ai jingiarap ïa ki samla pule ban pyndap ïa ka online application, ban bthath ruh ïa ki BDO ban buh ïa ki centre ba shipor lane temporary centre ha ki ophis Block khnang ban suk ban thep ïa ki online application jong ka CUET, shuh shuh ban bthah ïa ki common service centre ne rainbow ban ai jingiarap ïa ki samla pule ha ka por ba thep online” la ong ruh ba ha ka jing ïa kren ki nongialam jong ka JSM bad u DC, u Abhislah Baranwal, la ong ba u DC u la kular ban bthah ïa ka NIC hapoh ka ophis u dc ba kin iarap ia ki samla pule ban thep online application, bad ruh ïa ki BDO bad ki Common Service Centres ne rainbow ba kin iarap ïa ki khynnah pule ban thep online application, ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka kyntu ïa ki khynnah pule na duh ki kyrdan HSSLC ban wan sha khmat ban thep kyrteng na ka bynta ka examination CUET namar sa tang 20 sngi ka la kut ka por namar kane ka dei tang haduh ka 26 tarik u lber 2024.La ong ruh ba ka JSM hadien ba ka la ioh jingtip ba ka tnat pule puthi jong ka jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka shithi no. EDN:69/2022/110 Dated Shillong the 20 December, 2023 ka la bthah ia ki Principal jong ki skul bad ki college bad ki Principal jong ki Higher Secondary Schools ha Meghalaya ban ai jingtip halor ka jingdonkam ban ialeh ïa ka exam Common University Examination Test (CUET) khnang ban ioh admission ha ki college kiba pyniasoh ba ka skul bah NEHU, Shuh shuh katei ka shithi ka la kdew ba kan nym don shuh ka jingpyllait ne exemption ïa ka Meghalaya na kane ka exam CUET, kumta ka seng JSM myn ha ka 16 tarik u kyllalyngkot 2024 ka la phah shithi sha u Education Minister ka Meghalaya, kumjuh ruh sha u myntri rangbah ka jylla, sha u Chief Secretary bad sha ki Deputy Commissioner jong ka East bad West Jaiñtia Hills ban pynioh ïa ki exam centre jong ka CUET ha Shillong, Tura bad jowai ne ha baroh ki district headquarters.
title: Ïakynduh ki nongïalam ka JSM ïa u DC ka EJHD halor ka jingiakhun exam online ïa ka CUET na ka bynta ki khynnah pule

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 06: Na ka bynta ban pyllait ïa ka jingdheng kali ha sor Nongstoiñ, ki ophisar ka tnad pulit ba pynïaid ïa ka ïaid ka ïeng ki kali ha West Khasi Hills, ha ka sngi balang ka 6 tarik Lber ki la leit ban pynshai ia ki nongñiah kali kamai na Nongstoiñ sha Shillong, ba naduh lashai ka sngi palei ka 7 tarik Lber 2024, baroh ki nongñiah kali kamai kata naduh ki Alto tourist taxi, TaTa Sumo, Ertiga, Mahindra bad kiwei kiwei kiba wan kit ïa ki nongleit nongwan na Shillong sha Nongstoiñ, ki dei ban pynhap beit ha Madiwat parking lot bad ym shah shuh ban dang wan pynhiar ïa ki sha pdeng sor.La pynbeit ruh da ka por ba yn shah ban wan pynhiar ïa ki nongleit nongwan hapdeng sor tang naduh ha por 5 baje janmiet shaneng. Ha kajuh ka por la pynbeit ruh ba ïa ki kali Tourist baroh ba thep ïa ki nongleit nongwan napdeng sor Nongstoiñ ha ka por mynstep yn shah tang haduh 7.30. Lait nangta baroh ki kali kiba kiew sha Shillong ki dei ban thep ïa ki nongleit nongwan na Mandiwat parking lot.
title: Pynbeit thymmai ïa ka leit ka wan ki kali Nongstoiñ-Shillong

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 06: Ka seng Congress lyngba ka Mahila Congress Committee West Khasi Hills, ha ka sngi balang ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang paidbah ban jied pynthymmai ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka District lem bad jong baroh lai tylli ki Block kynthup ïa ka Nongstoiñ, Mawshynrut bad ka Rambrai Jyrngam.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la pynlong ha Congress Bhawan Nongstoiñ, la ïadonlang naduh ka kong Joplin Scott Shylla President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Mahila Congress kaba la ïoh ban pynskhem ruh ïa ki nongkitkam da ka kong Sony Kharjana General Secretary ka Meghalaya Pradesh Mahila Congress Committee, ka Kim Haokip Secretary ka All India Mahila Congress Incharge ka Meghalaya Pradesh Mahila Committee, u bah Bormanding Nonglang president ka District Congress Committee West Khasi Hills bad kiwei kiwei.Ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka District Congress Committee Mahila ki kynthup ïa ka kong Joyfulness Marweiñ kum ka President, Phyrnai Sohshang Vice President, Lucky Marweiñ Secretary, Gloryhorny Lyngkhoi Treasurer bad ka Deitina Marweiñ kum ka nongai buit.Katba ka kong Meris Kharsyntiew ka la shah jied kum ka President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Mahila Congress Nongstoiñ Block, ka kong Rose Mery Marbaniang kum ka President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Mahila Congress Mawshynrut Block.
title: Ïoh ka Mahila Congress WKHD ïa ki nongkitkam thymmai

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 06: Kum ka dak jong ka jingsngewsih bad ka jingpynrem jur ïa ki runar kiba la shim jubor ïa ka jingim jong u (L) Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani uwei na ki nongñiah Tourist Taxi na Nongstoiñ, ka Synjuk ki nongñiah tourist taxi ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Joint Action Committee of Taxi Owner & Driver Association, mynta ka sngi ka la sdang ban pyndeng da ki lama ïong ïa baroh ki kali kamai na Nongstoiñ sha Shillong.Ha kajuh ka por na ka liang ki nongñiah bad ki trai jong ki kali Tourist Taxi ki la kyntu ïa ka tnad pulit ba ka dei ban kem lut ïa baroh kiba donkti ha katei ka kam pynïap briew ba shyrkhei. Kane ka jingteh lama ïong ha ki kali kit passenger kan ïai bteng biang lashai ka sngi 7 tarik Lber 2024.
title: Teh lama ïong ki kali kamai ka sor Nongstoiñ

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 06: Ka Nonglang Sports Club ka la ïoh ban pynkut noh ïa ka lympung ialehkai kynjatbol ba la tip kum ka Football Interdong 2023-24 jong ki samla shynrang ha kaba kane ka jingïalehkai ba khadduh hapoh shnong ka la ïoh ban thaw record ïa ka jingïathep bun kol eh ha ka ha kaba ym pat ju jia koit ha ki snem ki por ba la leit.Lah ban kdew ba ki 2 tylli ki kynhun kiba la poi sha ka wat ba khadduh dei ka Dong Nongdom bad ka Dong Pyndenjathang, ha kaba ka Dong Nongdom ka la ïoh ban thep 5 kol katba ka Dong Pyndenjathang pat ka la thep 4 kol.Shuh shuh, ka jingïalehkai ha kane ka sngi ka la long shisha kaba ïa khaid bha namar kine ki kynhun ki dei ki kynhun kiba la ïalehkai ha ka sngi plie pyrda kata ha ka 20-10-2023 ha kaba ka Dong Nongdom ka la jop da 2 – 0 kol ia ka Dong Pyndenjathang bad kine ki juh hi ki kynhun kiba la poi phainai mynta ka sngi.Lah ban kdew ba kane ka jingïalehkai ka la pynlong sngewphylla bad sngewtynnad kata ka long ba ki juh ki kynhun ba ïalehkai por plie bad ki juh ki kynhun kiba ïalehkai ne poi phainal bad kine ki kynhun ki la thaw record ban ïathep bun kol kata 5 – 4 kol ha ka sngi ba la pynlong da ka Nonglang Sports Club naduh mynshwa haduh mynta.Kane ka Inter-dong ki la pynïalehkai da ka League System bad na ki 7 tylli ki dong kata ka Dong Meiawan, Dong Pdengshnong, Dong Nongdom, Dong Lawmyrsiang, Dong Pyndenbah, Dong Mawphorkynbat bad Dong Pyndenjathang ki kynhun baroh kiba la ïashimbynta ki long 10 tylli ki kynhun.Ha kane ka sngi bna pynkut, la wan ban ïa donlang ruh u bah Damang Synkon, District Sports Officer (DSO), South West Khasi Hills District kum u kongsan bad u bah Avin Wanbah, BADO ka Ranikor C&RD Block ryngkatlang u bah Firsterlin Kharraswai, Myntri Shnong Nonglang bad kiwei kiwei de ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong ki la ïadonlang. Kane ka dei ka kyrwoh na u bah Kordorlyne Kharlyngdoh, Secretary jong ka Nonglang Sports Club.
title: Pynkut noh ka NSC ïa ka jingïalehkai phutbol Interdong 2023-24 ha Nonglang

content: Nongpoh, Lber 06: Nalor kiwei kiwei ki kam pynroi ba ki paidbah ki donkam ha Ri Bhoi, u MLA ka Nongpoh Constituency, u Bah Mayral Born Syiem u la buh syndon ïa ka jingkyrpad na u myntri rangbah ka jylla ban pynsted noh ïa ki kam ïa pynbeit pud ha ki bynta ba dang dang hap ha Ri Bhoi bad wat ha kiwei kiwei ki jaka ïa kajia pud hapdeng ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya.U MLA ka Nongpoh, u Bah Mayral Born Syiem ula ioh lad ruh ban pynsngew na ka bynta ki kam pynbeit pud kiba dang sahteng ha pud u sam ka Ri Bhoi District, ka dei ha ka jingïalang hynnin ka sngi kaba u myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K. Sangma u la wan ban buh ïa u Mawnongrim na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka madan plastic (Artificial turf) ha ka madan Umbuda ha Ri Bhoi District.Na ka liang u MLA ka Nongpoh, ha kane ka sngi u la pynsngew ruh ba ki dang don sa saw tylli ki jaka ba dang ïa kajia pud hapdeng ka Assam ba la donkam ban pyndep noh ïa kane ka kam ïa pynbeit pud kiba kynthup ïa ka Nongwah Mawtamur Deshdomriah, Borduar bad ka Block II khnang ba lada dep ban ïa pynbeit ïa ki kam pud ki kam sam kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah ha ki thaiñ khappud.Kum u MLA ka nongrpoh Constituency, u Bah Mayral Born Syiem, nalor kitei ki kam pud ki kam sam, u la shim kabu ruh ban ban pynsngew ïa shibun ki mat ha khmat u myntri rangbah ka jylla ba kynthup ruh ban plie noh ïa ka Trauma Centre ha Civil Hospital Nongpoh, ban wan rah ïa ka 132 KV power grid substation, ka surok na Nongpoh sha Sonapur bad kiwei kiwei ki kam pynroi kiba donkam ha Ri Bhoi.Shuh shuh, ha kane ka sngi, hadien ba la pynsngew da u MLA ka Nongpoh halor kitei ki phang ba ka sorkar kan shim khia ban pyndep na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki paidbah, u Myntri rangbah ka jylla ruh u la kular ban shim khia ban pynurlong ïa kitei ki jingdonkam ki paidbah hapoh ka them Ri Bhoi.
title: Na u Myntri rangbah, kyrpad u MLA Nongpoh ban pynsted ïa ka jingpynbeit pud ha Ri Bhoi

content: Nongpoh, Lber 06: Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawlyndep mynta ka sngi ka la pynmih syndon da ka jingmaham kaba jur ïa kino kino kiba thang khlang pathar, ba kane ka ktah ïa ka mariang bad ka buh jingma ruh ïa ki nongshong shnong ha katei ka thaiñ Mawlyndep ha Ri Bhoi District.Na ka liang ka Dorbar shnong Mawlyndep ka la buh ruh ka jingma halor kane ka jingthang khlaw pathar, ka dei ruh hadien ba hynnin ka janmiet ha ka por janmiet, la don ki riew shim kabu kiba thang ïa ka khlaw bad na kane ka jingthang khlaw ka ding ka la pur ruh sha ki jaka shong jaka sah ki noingshong shnong kaba la buh jingma ïa ka shnong hi baroh kawei.Haba ïa kren bad u rangbah Shnong ka Mawlyndep, u Bah Jinu Kharbuki, u laong ba ka shnong ha ka jingshisha na ka por sha ka por ka la ju don ka jingmana ba tyngeh ïa kiba thang khlaw, hynrei haduh kine ki sngi dang don kiba shim kabu bad kim ju pyrkhat ba na ka jingthaw khlaw ka ktah ïa ka mariang bad ruh ka buh jingma ïa ki ing ki sem khamtam ha kum kanr ka por ba tyngkhong.U la ïathuh ruh ba katei ka jingthang khlaw hynnin ka janmiet ka dei hajan ka Rympei Arrupe Jesut Novitiate kaba dei ka jaka pule ki ban long ki nongtrei riew niam ka Balang Katholik bad ha katei ka jingthang ki runar ïa ka khlaw ki samla pule ki la hap ban mih ban pynlip ïa ka ding namar ka ding ka la pur sha katei ka jaka sah jongki.Kum ka shnong ka pynrem jur halor ka jingbym pyyrkaht ïa ka mariang bad ka jingma na ka jingthang khlaw ba ki riew shim kabu ki la shu thang pathar ïa ka khlaw bad kane ka jingthang khlaw ka la buh jingnma ruh wat ïa ki ing ki sem ba ka ding ka lah ban pur namar ba la dei ka aiom tyrkhong, u la ong.Namar kata, na ka laing ka Dorbar shnong ka la maham jur ïa baroh ba kim bit ban thang khlaw ha katei ka jaka ba hap ha u pud u sam ka shnong Mawlyndep bad lada lap ka bor shnong kan leh da kaba tyngeh wat ban ujor da ka ejehar sha ki bor pulit ba kin ngat ha ka jingpynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ, u la bynrap shuh shuh.
title: Ba shim kabu ban thang khlaw pathar, yn leh ka Dorbar Shnong Mawlyngdep da kaba tyngeh ïa kiba thang khlaw pathar

content: Shillong, Lber, 6: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) lyngba ka Employment Monitoring Cell ka la phah dorkhas sha ka Meghalaya Public Service Commission (MPSC) halor ki katto katne ki jingujor ba la ïoh na ki samla thep kam ha ki post bapher bapher bad katto katne ki mat ban pynbha bad pynwandur halor ka thung kam thung jam.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka post Junior Divisional Accountant (JDA) hapoh ka Directorate of Account & Treasuries, Meghalaya katkum ka jingpynlait Advertisement, ki don 69 tylli ki post kiba lait, hynrei ha ka por ba la mih ïa ka result la ïohi ba don tang 34 ngut. Halor kane, ka MPSC ka la pynshai ba la don tang 34 ngut kiba pas ïa kane ka eksamin bad la khot interview tang ïa kine 34 ngut. Haba kylli halor ka jingbym pas ki samla, u Secretary ka MPSC u la pynshai ba lehse ka dei ka pass mark ba heh ba la buh da ka Directorate of Account & Treasuries kaba pynlong ba ki samla kim shym lah ban pas namar haba ïanujor bad kiwei kiwei ki tnad Sorkar ki buh ïa ka Qualifying Marks tang 33 marks bad kiba wan shakhmat kin shah jied. Halor kane ka bynta ka Seng kan ïa kynduh bad ka Directorate ban pynsngew ïa kine ki jingeh jong ki samla.Halor ka kam Typist (Ordinary Grade) ha Meghalaya (Civil) Secretariat & Heads of Department ïa kane ka kam la pynlait Advertisement ha u snem 2016 na bynta 36 tylli ki post hynrei haduh mynta ka dang sahteng wat hadien ba ladep pynlong ïa ka eksamin bad Typing Test. Ka MPSC ka la pynshai ba ka la long kaba la khreh halor kane kam bad ban pynlait noh ki result hynrei ka dang ap tang ïa ka Roster ba ka SAD Department kin phah. Ka Seng ka pynrem ïa ka SAD Department ka bym shym la lah ban phah ïa ka Roster haduh mynta bad pynsahteng ïa kane ka kam. Ha kine ki sngi, ka Seng kan leit ujor sha ka tnad ba dei peit ban phah noh ka Roster bad ki samla ki ym shu ap sah.Halor ka jingsuki ka thungkam thungjam ba la pynïaid da ka MPSC na ka por sha ka por, ka Seng ka ju lap ba ki samla thepkam ki hap ban ap haduh 4-5 snem ba ka jingpynrung kan dep. Kane ka pynduhnong shibun ïa ki samla kiba ap kam namar ka rta ruh ka nang ïaid bad na ka liang ki samla kiba pas manla u snem ruh ki shu ap khlem don kano kano ka lad ban thep kam. Ka Seng ka la ai jingmut ba ïa kino kino ki kam kiba pynbna paidbah (advertised) dei ban pyndep noh hapoh 1 snem na ka tarik ba la pynbna ïa ka jinglait kam.Ka Seng ka la dawa ruh ba na ka bynta ki Grade ne Group B, C bad D dei ban pynduh noh ïa ka Personal Interview. Ka Seng ka ju ïoh ïa ka jingujor manla ka por ba ka don ka jingbamsap ha ka thung kam thung jam bad ka jingleh shiliang ha ka por Personal Interview. Ka Seng ka sngewba kam don jingmyntoi ban don ïa ka Personal Interview na bynta kine ki Grade ne Group. Wat ha ki kam Sorkar Pdeng (Central Government jobs) ïa ka Personal Interview lah pynduh noh bad kiwei kiwei ki jylla ruh ki la bud ïa kata, hynrei balei ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya haduh mynta ka dang leh ka Personal Interview halor kine ki post ne grade bad dei ban weng noh bad ka thung kam thung jam kan long kaba khuid.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka Personal Interview na ka bynta ki Grade ne Group A, ka Seng naduh ki snem ba ladep ka la buh ïa ka jingdawa ba ka Personal Interview ka dei ban long ha ki jingdon ki Camera ban lait na ka jinglehtuh jingleh shukor kumba la ju ïohsngew na ki por sha ki por. Ka Seng ka pynsngew biang ka thungkam ka thungjam hapoh ka jylla ka dei ban long kaba khuid khnang ba ka jylla baroh kawei hi kan kiew.Halor kine ki mat, ka MPSC ka la pynshai ba ka shong ha ka mon jong ka Sorkar ban leh ïa kine kiei kiei baroh bad na ka liang ka MPSC kam don kano kano ka jingpyrshah. Ka Seng ha kine ki khyndiat sngi kan sa buh ïa ka jingdawa hakhmat ba Sorkar ban pynurlong noh ïa ka jingdawa ka Seng.
title: Tyrwa ka KSU ïa ka MPSC ban pynduh noh ïa ka Personal Interview ha ka Grade B,C,D

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 6: Hadien ka jingïoh jingtip kaba tikna halor ka jingdon ki briew kiba kit ïa u drok, ki Pulit ka ANTF East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi Baar ki la pynlong ïa ka jingpynap shrim ha surokbah National Highway ha Lumshnong bad ioh bat ïa kawei ka kali Maruti Suzuki Baleno kaba don u number AS-11-S-3488 ba la ñiah da u Ajamal Husen kaba dang wan na ki thaiñ Silchar, Assam. Ha ka jingkhynra ki Pulit ki la lap hynñiew tylli ki synduk thep sabon barit kiba la thep da u drok.Hadien ba la dep tes la pynshisha ia u drok uba don ka jingkhia kaba 77 gram.Ki Pulit ki la kem noh ïa u nongñiah ïa ka kali u Ajamal Husen bad la kurup noh ïa u drok, ïa ka kali, kawei ka mobile phone, ka EPIC, ka Driving License, Pancard bad Aadhar Card. La register case ruh ha Lumshnong Police Station bad la pynngat hapoh ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: Kurup drok ki Pulit EJH, shah kem u snar khaïi

content: Shillong, 06 Lber : U Myntri ka tnat Arts and Culture ka sorkar jylla u Paul Lyngdoh kum u Kongsan ha ryngkatlang bad u Chairman ka MTDC u Bah Sanbor Shullai u Symbud Kongsan ki la buh ïa u mawnongrim ban tei ïa ka Tagore Cultural Complex (TCC) ha Rilbong Shillong ka ban donlang ïa ka Museum bad kiwei.Hadien ba la buh ïa u mawnongrim u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingbuh mawnongrim ka long kum ka jingai sngewbha ka sorkar jylla ha ka jingdap ba shisnem jong ha ka sngi Balang.Haba pynpaw ïa ki kam ba la leh da ka Tnat Arts and Culture u la ïathuh ruh ba ka sorkar ha shwa kane ka la ïoh ruh ban plie ïa u Mot Tirot Sing Syiem ha Dhaka.Haba kre shaphang u Rabindranath Tagore haba ïadei bad ki jingshem phang bad ba u la thoh ïa ki 3 tylli ki poitri u Bah Paul u la ong ba watba ka Shillong kadei kaba rit bha ha ka jingheh, hynrei kala pynmih bun ki khraw pyrkhat bad kaba mynta ka la paw ha ka pyrthei.U la ong ba kane kadei ka Sngi bakmen ban pynbna ïa kane ka project da ka jingthmu ban sdang tei noh ïa kane ka kam, bad hadien ba u la shimti ïa ka tnat u la ïoh ban pyllait ïa ka jingmang napoh ka state share kaba long T. 1.4 klur.“Ngi Kyrmen ba ynda la dep kan long kaba paw ha ka pyrthei baroh kawei kum ka jingïakylliang ha ki riti dustur bad ka jingshem phang ban mih ki riewstad. Sngewbha pyni sha ka pyrthei ba ka Shillong ka la paw ha kiba bun ki liang,” u la ong.Katba u Bah Sanbor Shullai uba dei u MLA ka thaiñ bad u Chairman ka MTDC u la pynkynmaw ba ha ka por ba u dang long u Myntri ka Arts and Culture ha u snem 2021 u la sdang ïa kane ka kam da ka jingleit ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng uba khmih ïa kane ka tnat u G Kishan Reddy na ka liang jong u ula mang T. 13.13 klur na ka jinglut jong baroh kawei ka projek kaba long T. 14.48 klur. “Ïa kane ka kam nga la sdang naduh ba nga la long Myntri ka tnat ha ka 27 tarik u Naitung, 2021 nga la sdang ïa kane ka projek haduh ba ka la urlong mynta. Hadien ka jingwan jurip kaba bunsien ha ka 7 tarik u Risaw, 2022 la ïoh ka shithi ba la mang ka Sorkar Pdeng ïa kane ka projek bad ha u snem 2023 ka tnat ka ïohpdiang ïa ka jingmang kaba nyngkong,” ong u Bah Shullai.
title: 14.58 klur ban tei ïa ka Tagore Cultural Complex ha Rilbong

content: Shillong, Lber 06 : Ka nongshna ïa ki dawai umphniang mih shñiuh na Umseiñiong Marbaniang kaba don ha ka thaiñ Sadew, Kong Reality Syiem ha ka sngi Balang ka la ïathuh ba namar ka jingïaid iew ka dawai ba ka pynmih ka la pynlong ïa ki katto katne ki briew shim kabu da kaba die ïa ki dawai ba ki shna hi ha kyrteng ka dawai ba shna ma ka.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Kong Reality ka ïathuh ba ïa kane ka la tip da ka jingïathuh jong ki paidbah kiba thied ïa kitei ki dawai da ka jingngeit ba kadei ka dawai Marvelous oil ba pynmih ma ka.“Don kiba ïoh ïa ka umphniang ha u bilor ba la weng ïa ka jingpyndait (seal) bad don pat kiba ïoh ïa ka dawai umphniang ha u bilor ba don tang shiteng ka dawai. Kumta, nga kyntu ba lada phi thied na shabar wat ym thied satia lada ym don shuh ka seal,” ka la ong.Nalorkata, ka ong ruh ba ki don ki briew kiba shim kabu ban pynïaid iew ïa ki dawai umphniang da kaba kam ba kadei ka dawai ba pynmih ma ka.”Kiba die wat shim kabu bad kiba thied pat kim dei ban thied palat ïa ka dor,” ka la bynrap biang.Ka Kong Reality ka la ong ruh ba ki la don palat 10,000 ngut kiba la hap shñiuh kiba wan ban shim dawai na ka bad ki don tang khyndiat ngut eh ne kumba 5 persen kiba pyntip ba kim mih.Shuh shuh ka ïathuh ruh ba kiba wan shim ïa ka dawai jong ka ki wan naduh Delhi, Rajasthan bad na kiwei kiwei ki jylla.
title: Mih ki nongshim kabu ba thnem palat ka ïew dawai pynmih shñiuh

content: Shillong, Lber, 6: Ka tnat elekshon bad ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Balang ki la ïasoi ïa ka soskular ïasngewthuh jingmut (Memorandum of Understanding) ban pyntreikam da ka Electoral Literacy Clubs (ELC) khnang ban pynrung kyrteng ïa ki samla pule kiba la kynjoh 18 snem ka rta ba kin ïoh ïa ka Electoral Photo Identity Card (EPIC) shwa ba ka ri India baroh kawei kan leit sha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen.Ïa ka MoU ba la ïasoi da u Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) Jylla u Dr. BDR Tiwari bad u Director ka School Education and Literacy u Swapnil Tembe ka dei kaba la bthah da ka Election Commission of India (ECI) khnang ba ki samla kiba la kynjoh 18 snem ka rta ki dei ban ïoh ïa ka EPIC khnang ba kin ïoh ïa ka lad ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Parliament.“Ïa kine ki ELC yn sa buh ha ki jaka pule Higher Secondary School bad ha ki College. Ka jingthmu ban buh ïa ki ELC ka dei kaba la slem bad ki dang treikam haduh mynta hynrei ki don pat katto katne ki bym treikam,” ong u Tiwari ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ïasoi ïa ka MoU.U ong ruh hadien ka jingbthah jong ka ECI la pynbha ïa ki katto katne ki kyndon jong ka MoU.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ki nonghikai kin dei ki Nodal Officer jong ki ELC.U Swapnil Tembe u la phah ïa u kyrwoh sha ki khynnah skul ïa ka jingangnud jong ka sorkar ban pynngewthuh ïa ka synshar paidbah.“Ka khubor ka don ha ki lynnong kot bad ka dei ruh ka mat ba la kdew ha ka MoU,” u la ong.“Ngi la thaw ïa ki Electoral Club mynba nga dang long u Deputy Commissioner saw snem kynthih bad nga dang kynmaw kyndiang haba ngi la thaw ïa ki ELC ha ki District Level. Mynta, hadien ka jingïasoi ïa ka MoU ngin pynthikna ban sa peitngor bha ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki ynda la thaw ha ki Secondary School,” u la bynrap. “Kawei ka mat ba kongsan kaba la kdew ha ka MoU ka long ba ki khynnah skul kiba la kynjoh 18 snem ka rta ki dei ban don ïa ka EPIC namarba nga kynmaw ba bun ki khynnah kiba la kynjoh 18 bad 19 snem ki dei ki bym pat don satia ïa ka EPIC,” la ong shuh shuh u Tembe.
title: Bun ki samla bym pat ïoh EPIC, da ka ELC thaw ka tnat Election ha ki skul bad Kolej

content: Shillong, 06 Lber: U Myntri ka sorkar jylla bad u Nongaiktien ka sorkar MDA II u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ha kine ki shisnem ba la leit ka la lah ban leh bun ki kam kiba kongsan kiba ym sngewlah ruh ban mut dur.Haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor uba Paul haba ong ba ladei ban ïoh ïa ka jingïaroh ïa kiba bun ki kam ba ïoh jingjop da ka sorkar jylla u la pynkynmaw ïa ka mang tyngka kaba la wanrah da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma ha ka dorbar mang tyngka kaba dang shudep.Lah ban ong ba ka sorkar MDA-2 ha ka sngi Balang ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai ka la kynjoh shisnem ha ki jingshakri jong ka ïa ka jylla.Haba ong ba ki jingtreikam jong ka sorkar MDA II ka la long kaei kaei kaba ym lah ban mut dur, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong ba kumba la ïohi na ka mang tyngka kaba la wanrah da u Myntri Rangbah ka sorkar ka don ka jingpyrkhat ban trei ïa ka kam bad la khmih lynti ba ha shwa ban kut ka samoi treikam jong kane ka sorkar ka Meghalaya kan sa kynjoh sha ka ïoh ka kot kaba 10 Billion ne ka 10 Billion dollar economy.Haba phai sha ka prokram CM elevate kaba la kiew bha, u Bah Paul u la ong, “Haba phai ïa ki kam kaba ïadei bad ka tnat Arts and Culture kaba la ju pyrkhat kum ka tnat kaba malu mala hynrei ka la lah ban buh ïa u durmot jong U Tirot Sing library ha Dhaka, kane Tagore cultural complex ha Shillong bad kiwei pat ki kam kum ka jingbuh mawnongrim ban pynbha shuh shuh ïa ka State Central Library kaba la ïaid shakhmat lyngba ka jingshimkhia u Myntri Rangbah.U la ong, “Ka Tnat Tourism ka long kaba bun kam ha ki kam ba manla ka sngi naba ngi don ka MGMP kaba pynlong ïa ki prokram bad ka jingdonlang kumba 3000 ngut ki samla.”“Ngi don kumba 1500O ngut ki briew kiba ïadei beit ne kiba treikam napoh haba ïadei bad ki bynta ka tourism,” u la bynrap. U la pynpaw da kaba ong, “Kine kidei ki kam ba heh kiba ka sorkar jylla ka la leh bad ïaid lyngba ha kine ki 1 snem ba la leit kiba dei shisha ban ïoh ki jingithuh.”Haba kren shaphang kiba bun jait ki ram ba la shim da ka sorkar jylla u Bah Paul u la ong, “Ngin sa pynthikna ban pynkhuid ïa kine ki ram da kaba pynthikna ruh ba kadei ban don ka jingmih na kane ka jingshim ram”.“Ha ka jingshisha haba ngi peit ïa ki projek kum kane ka jingbuh mawnongrim hangne ha Rilbong kadei tang lyngba ka sorkar MDA II, ba la ïoh ban ai bynta na ka jylla kaba la lah ban pynurlong ïa kane ka complex ban ïaid shakhmat,” u la bynrap.U la ong ba ki paidbah kin sa ïohi shuh shuh nangne shakhmat ïa ki kam ba ka sorkar kan sa leh ha kine ki snem ban wan.
title: Ka MDA II ka la ïoh ban leh bun ki kam ha kane ka jingdap 1 snem : Bah Paul Lyngdoh

content: Shillong, Lber 06 : Ka North East India Fellowship of Charismatic Churches, Meghalaya ka la khot la wer ïa ki paidbah sha ka jingïaseng ïalap bad ka jingduwai ïa kiba pang ba shitom ba tip kum ka Joy in the City kaban long ha madan Malki naduh ka 07 – 10 tarik mynta u bnai.Haba pynbna ïa kane, u President ka NEIFCC u Apostle RR Khongkrom u la ïathuh ba ka jingïaseng ïalap ha ka sngi Palei haduh sngi Saitjaiñ kan long ha ka por 5:30 baje janmiet. Katba naduh Sngi Thohdieng haduh Sngi Saitjain naduh ka por 9:00 baje mynstep haduh 1:00 baje mynsngi kan dei ka jingai jinghikai.Shuh shuh la pynbna ruh ba ha ka sngi u Blei pat ki jingïaseng ïalap kan long ha ka por 10:00 baje, 1:30 baje bad ha ka por 6:00 baje janmiet.
title: Wer ka NEIFCC sha ka jingïaseng ïalap naduh 7 -10 tarik

content: Shillong, Lber 06 : Ka sorkar jylla ka la rai ban thaw da ka komiti kaban bishar bniah biang ïa ka Indian Registration Act khnang ban pyntikna ba ki naduh ki bank bad kiwei ki jaka treikam kin ithuh bad pdiang ïa ki kot pynskhem jaka puta ba la ai da ki lai tylli ki district council jong ka jylla.Haba pynbna ïa kane, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ba dei peit ïa ka District Council Affairs, Bah Prestone Tynsong haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïalang bad ki lai tylli ki district council u la ong ba ba wat hadien ba ka Land Bill jong ka KHADC ka la long aiñ (Act) hynrei ki dang mih katto katne ki jingeh.“Kumta kum ka sorkar jylla ngi hap ban bud pyrkhing ïa ka Indian Registration Act bad haba ngi bud ïa ka IRA ngi lap ba don ki don ki jingeh hangne. Kumta haba ki paidbah ki leit sha district council ban ïoh ïa ki kot jaka ne NOC ban shim ram lane kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam na ka liang ki Bank kim ithuh ïa ki kot ba ai da ki ADC,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba hadien ba la ïatai bniah, ka jingïalang ka la rai ban don da kawei pat ka komiti ban bishar bniah biang ïa kane ka IRA bad ruh ban pyntikna ba ki kot jaka ba ai da ki lai ADC ki dei ban pdiang beit da ki bor bahalor kynthup ïa ki bank,” ong u Bah Prestone.
title: Bym ithuh ki Bank ïa ki kot jaka KHADC, thaw komiti ka sorkar ban bishar bniah ïa ka IRA

content: Shillong, Lber 6 : U Chief Electoral Officer ka jylla u BDR Tiwari ula ong, ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la dep pynkhreh na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka Elekshon MP Lok Sabha 2024 bad mynta ka ap sa tang ïa ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ban pynbna ïa ka tarik ban long ka elekshon.U BDR Tiwari ula kren ïa katei, ha ka sngi ba ar hadien ba ula dep lum ïa ka jingïalang bad ki Deputy Commissioner (DC) bad ki Superintendent of Police (SP) jong ki District bapher jong ka jylla Meghalaya, ha Conference Hall jong ka Secretariat, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka Elekshon MP Lok Sabha.Ha ka jylla Meghalaya ïa ka elekshon MP Lok Sabha yn pynlong ha ki Ar tylli ki Constituency, ka Shillong bad Tura Parliamentary Constituency.U CEO ula ïathuh ba ha katei ka jingïalang ki heh jong ka Election Commission of India, kila ïakren lyngba ka Vodeo Conferencing bad ki DC bad ki SP na ki district bapher na ka bynta ka jingpynkhreh ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon MP Lok Sabha 2024.“Ka jingpynsngew jong ki heh ophisar ka sorkar, ka long kaba biang bha bad ka jylla Meghalaya mynta, kala long kaba la pynkhreh ban pynlong ïa ka Elekshon MP Lok Sabha” ong u Tiwari.Ula ïathuh, ba kiba ki kam ki jam ki la ïaid bha shakhmat bad kumta la khmih lynti ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka elekshon kan long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih bad la khmih lynti ba ki paidbah kin mih bun ban ïashimbynta ha ka elekshon.U Tiwari ula ong, ba ki ophisar ki la ai ïa ki jingbatai kiba bniah ha ki heh jong ka ECI halor ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka elekshon bad halor ka jinglong jingman jong ka suk ka saiñ ha ka jylla bad na ka liang ka ECI kala dap da ka jingsngewtynnad halor ka jingpynkhreh baroh.Ula ong ba ka Tnad Elekshon jong ka jylla myta ka ap sa tang ïa ka jingpynbna jong ka ECI ïa ka tarik ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha.
title: La dep pynkhreh ka Meghalaya ïa ka election MP ap sa tang ban pynbna tarik ka ECI

content: Shillong, Lber 6 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Balang, ula ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shim khia bha ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynthikna ba ki kam dawa pisa jubor jong ka seng Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ki dei ban kut noh hapoh ka Jylla.“Ngi la trei shaid shaid bad ngin pynthikna ba kine ki kam (dawa pisa) kin kut lut ploin bad yn ym don napdeng ki nongshong shnong jong ngi ki ban shah ktah na kane” ong u Conrad haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor.Kane ka jingkynthoh jong u kala mih halor ka jingkiew ka jingsam shithi dawa pisa sha ki Hehspah bad Nongkhaïi bad kumjuh ruh ka jingïohkem ïa u PSO ka HNLC u Storgy Lyngdoh na Shillong.U Conrad ula ong ba ka Sorkar jong u, kala kren da kaba shai kdar ba kan ym ailad ïa kino kino ki kam beaiñ kum kane ka kam dawa pisa jubor.“Kumta, haba kaneka mih ka la wan sha ka jingtip jong ngi, ngi la shong da ka jingïalang ha ki taiew bala leit- Ngan ym batai lut namar ka dei ka jingïalang hapoh ïing-bad ngi la bthah ïa ki Pulit ba kin shim ïa ki sienjam bad leh ïa kaei kaba donkam ban pynthikna ba kum kine ki kam kim dei ban jia” ula ong.“Dei halor kane, ki Pulit kila leh ïa la ka kamram. Ki la jam shakhmat bad phin sa ïohi ba ki kam dawa pisa kiba ju don ha ki snem bala leit noh, kin sa duna bha bad wat ki briew ruh kin sa ïathuh ha phi. Hooid, ki don shibun ki kam ba hap leh bad ka jingtrei ka la ïaid shaid shaid” ula bynrap.Hato kane ka kam dawa pisa ka pynpaw ba ka HNLC kam don jingmut hok ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong “Khlem pep, ngi la kren da kaba shai sha ka HNLC ha kiba bun ki jingïakren lyngba u ksiang jong ngi ba lada ki mut hok shisha ïa ka jingïakren, baroh kine ki kam dawa pisa ki dei ban sangeh noh”.Haba phai pat sha ka jingpyrshang thaw kynhun biang ïa ka GNLA ha Garo Hills, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba lai ngut ki briew kila shah kem bad ki Pulit ki dang wad mynta sa ïa lai ngut, ïa kaba la thikna ba kin sa ïoh kem ïa ki.Nalor kane, u Myntri Rangbah ula kam ba ka jinglong jingman ka suk ka saiñ hapoh ka Jylla ka long kaba jai jai bha. “Ki jingjia hangne hangtai kin don beit ym lah len ïa kata hynrei ngi la lah pat ban tehlakam ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ” ula ong.
title: Ka Sorkar kan pynthikna ba ki kam dawa pisa ka HNLC kin kut noh ha ka jylla : CM

content: Shillong, Lber 06 : U CEM ka KHADC, Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi Balang u la ong ba ka jingïakhih pyrshah ïa ka MUDA ban pyntreikam ïa ka building byelaws ha u snem 2015 hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President ba mynta ka VPP ka khlem seisoh satia.Hynrei u la ong pat ba dei kane ka sorkar ba mynta ba la aibor ha ki District Council (KHADC) ban pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ shna ïing ha u pud u sam jong ka Council.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïalang jong baroh lai tylli ki District Council ka jylla bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, Bah Prestone Tynsong, u CEM u la ong, “Ka jingïakhih pyrshah MUDA ha u snem 2015 ba la ïalam da u President ba mynta ka VPP kaba ha kato ka por dei ka sorkar u Dr. Mukul kum u Myntri Rangbah, ngi ruh ngi la don bynta ban ïakhih ba ym dei ka MUDA kaban pyntreikam ïa kane ka building byelaws hapoh sor bad khapsor.” Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba ka jingïakhih jong u paidbah ha kato ka por kadei beit na ka jingheh palat ka dor ba ki hap siew ban ïoh ïa ka jingbit ban shna iing shna sem.“Hynrei ngi ïohi pat ba kato ka jingïakhih kam poi shaei sahei hynrei dei tad ynda la wan kane ka sorkar MDA ba mynta ha u 2018 haba kut jong u snem ba la pyndam noh ïa ka building byelaws jong ka MUDA ha u 2015 bad la pynmih thymmai pat ba ka KHADC kan dei kawei na ki bor ban pyntreikam ïa ka,” u la bynrap biang.Nalorkata, u ong ba naduh ba pyntreikam ka KHADC, kam don shuh ka jingsiew kaba heh hynrei kadei tang katto katne bad ka la ïapher bun bha bad ka dor ba ka sorkar ba mynshwa ka phah siew sha ki paidbah.U CEM u ong ruh ba nalor ka jingsiew kaba duna, kawei pat ka long ban pyntikna ba ki paidbah kin ïoh ïa ki iing kiba skhem khamtam naba kane ka jaka kadei ka lynti ïaid jong u jumai.Shwa kane, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, Bah Prestone Tynsong u la pyntip ba ha ka jingïalang, ka la don ka jingtyrwa na ki District Council ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka building byelaws wat ha ki nongkyndong ruh na ka bynta ka jingshngaiñ bad jingskhem jong ki iing ki sem.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka byelaws hapoh ki jaka jong ka Municipal, ha ki ophis sorkar, ha ki hospital bad ki hotel ba heh ba heh la aiti ha ka MUDA ba kan ai jingbit. “Hynrei shabar jong ka Municipal la aiti ha ka District Council la ki jong ki jong ba kin leh,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïakren ka la mih ruh ka jingpynpaw na ki District Council ban pyntreikam lang noh ïa ka byelaws wat sha ki nongkyndong ruh khamtam haba ka Meghalaya kadei ka jaka ba jur bha u jumai, khnang ba ka jingtei ïa ki iing ki sem kan long kaba skhem ba shngaiñ.“Kumta ha kaba khatduh ngi la ïa kren bad rai ban thaw ïa ka komiti kaban khlieh da u Secretary ka tnad Urban Affairs bad ki dkhot kin kynthup na ki lai tylli ki district council ryngkat ki tnad kiba donkam,” u la bynrap shuh shuh.
title: Dei kane ka sorkar ba ai bor ha ki District Council ïa ka building byelaws : CEM KHADC

content: Shillong, Lber, 06: Ka tnat Social Welfare jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pan jaka na ki Dorbar Shnong kiba don ha kylleng ka jylla khnang ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan dup lah ban tei ïa ki Rehabilitation Centre ban ai jingsumar ïa ki samla kiba la shah teh mraw ha u drok.U Myntri uba khmih ïa ka tnat Social Welfare Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang u la ong, ki Rehabilitation Centre kiba la peit hi da ka Sorkar ïa mynta ki don hynriew tylli bad ki don ruh ki Foundation ba la pynïaid da ki kynhun shimet kiba la kyrshan jingïarap pisa da ka tnat Social Welfare.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka tnat Social Welfare da ka jingïatreilang bad ka Mawlai Town Dorbar (MTD) kan sa tei ïa ka Rehabilitation Centre ha ka shnong Mawlai ban ai jingsumar ïa ki samla kiba la kut jingmut ban bthat noh ïa u kynjri ba ki la shah teh mraw ha u drok.“Ngi kyntu ruh ïa kiwei kiwei ki Dorbar Shnong ba kin sngewthuh ïa kane ka jingeh da kaba ki ai jaka ne ai khyndew khnang ba ngin dup lah ban shna noh ïa ki Rehabilitation Centre,” ong u Bah Paul.“Ha kaba ïadei bad ka sohkhliang kaba kiba bun ki ong ba kam bit ban shna ïa ki Rehabilitation Centre hapoh ki shnong ki thaw, hynrei ki Dorbar Shnong ki dei ban sngewthuh pat ba kine ki jingeh, kim jia tang hapoh ki san ne hynriew tylli ki shnong hynrei ka dei kaba la saphriang ha baroh kawei ka jylla. Ngi donkam bha ïa ki Dorbar Shnong ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Sorkar bad ngin dup lah ban ai jingïarap ïa ki samla kiba la ngop ha u drok,” la ong u Myntrt ka tnat Social Welfare.
title: Pan jaka ka Sorkar na ki shnong ban shna Rehab Centre

content: Shillong, Lber 07: Hynriew ngut ki dkhot na ka kynhun kaba la tip da ka Meghalaya Traditional Wrestling and the Pankration kiba la ïashimbynta ha rynsan ba dang shu kut shen, ka National Referee & Judges Seminar kaba la pynlong naduh 1 tarik haduh 4 tarik mynta u Lber, 2024 ha Tripura ba la pynïaid da ka All Meghalaya Traditional Wrestling & Pankration Association [AMTW&PA] ki la lah ban pyndep ïa ki jingpule bad kiba la pass ban ithuh kum ki License Referee & Judges jong ka All India Traditional Wrestling and Pankration Federation (AlTW& PF) kaba hapoh ka jingpynïaid u Omar Tamboli na Pune, Maharashatra kum u President. Khyndiat, ka AlTWPF ka dei ka dkhot jong ka International Mas-Wrestling Federation(|MWF) & International Federations bad ki dkhot kiba la pynïasohlang bad ka United World Wrestling (UWw). Ka AITWPF ka kynthup ïa shibun ki sap ki phong jong ka Traditional wrestling kiba don jingïapher na kawei ka ri sha kawei pat, kum ka Alysh (Belt Wrestling) – Qazakh Kuresi – Pankration Athlima – Pankration- Palesmata – Polydamus- Khapsagai – Mas Wrestling.Ka AMTW&PA ka hap hapoh ka jingkhmih jong ka Kong Anita Songthiang kum ka President, ka Kong Eva Kharmujai- kaba dang shu ïohpdiang shen ïa ka khusnam Kiang Nangbah award haka Arm Wrestling- kum ka Vice-President, nangta u Bah Nangkitboklang Songthiang ba bat ïa ka kam General Secretary bad u Bah Shadwinson Kharmawphlang ba bat Treasurer.Ka AMTW&PA ka dei ka synjuk kaba ladep ban registar lane ithuh hapoh Meghalaya bad ka la dep ruh ban pynlong ïa ka 1st bad ruh ka 2nd All Meghalaya Traditional Wrestling & Pankration kaba seisoh ha u snem 2022 ha Madanrting bad ha u snem 2023 ha Meghalaya School of Martial Arts (MSMA) Hq.Laitkor, bad ka la ïashimbynta ruh ha ka 10th All India Traditional Wrestling & Pankration Championship, 2022 bad ka la ïoh ban khur 5 tylli ki takma ksiar, 4 tylli Rupa bad 3 tylli rnong na bynta ka Meghalaya.Ka Lorenza Songthiang ka la jop takma rnong ïa ka jylla na ka World Pankration Championship kaba la pynlong ha Tashkent, Uzbekistan ha u snem 2022. Ka la shah jied ruh ban shimbynta ha ka World Combat Games kaba long ha Riyadh, Saudi Arabia ha u snem 2023, bad ka pyndep baroh khlem kino kino ki lad jingïarap ne jingkyrshan na ka tnat sport lane na ka Sorkar jylla Meghalaya.Dang shen, ka jingkam jong ka synjuk Wrestling Association of Meghalaya (WAM) ha ki khubor ba ka Belt Wrestling ka dei ka jingïalehkai (sport) hapoh jong ka WAM ka long kaba lait bad kaba pynsngewthuh bakla bad ym lah ban pdiang namar ba ka AMTW&PA ka la ïoh la ka jong ka jingithuh (Registration) bad ka Registrar of Socities,Govt. of Meghalaya bad ka don ïa ka jingïadei kaba jan bad ka AITW&PF kaba dei ka dkhot ba la ïasoh bad ka United Worid Wrestling (UWW) recognized by the International Olympic Committee (I0C).Ki dkhot jong ka synjuk AMTW&PA hapoh ka jingïalam jong ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) kin sa leit ban shimbynta ha ka 3rd Northeast Olympic Games ka ban long ha Nagaland naduh 19 haduh 23 tarik mynta u Lber, 2024.
title: Pyndep jingpule Referee bad Judge 6 ki dkhot jong ka Meghalaya Traditional Wrestling and the Pankration

content: Ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kawei na ki jylla kaba dang ker tawïar hi haduh mynta da ki khlaw ki btap wat lada kim rben shuh kumba long ha ki por ba mynshwa hynrei kat shaba leit ba wan dang iohi hi ïa ki jingjyrngam ki lum ki wah bad dei kane kaba pynlong ïa ka jylla ban kyrsoi ki umpohliew kiba da bang bad shngïam pat haba dih ïa ki. Ka jingkyrsoi jong ki umpohliew, ym tang ba ka lah ban pyndap ïa ka jingdonkam jonng u briew, pynban kaba tam ka da kyrsoi shisha haduh katta katta kaba lah pat ban ring nur pat ïa ki ban tan sha ki lyngkha naka bynta ban ioh pat ban rep ban rïang.Haba broh ki saw aiom jong ka snem, lait noh tang ha ka aiom Tlang, haba ka bneng ka sdang ban ring tyrkhong bad ap ïa ka jingwan ka aiom pyrem bad lyiur,ba ki umpohliew ki rit bad ki rngat, hynrei ki ïai long pat kiba la pynkhreh ba kin shim ïala ka kamram ban pyndap ïa ka jingdonkam ka jong u khun bynriew.Pynban ha ka juk ïa beh ïa ka spah ka jingbeh than eh ïa ka jingsuk pyrthei ka pynlong ïa ka mynsiem u khun bynriew ba un khynra hi war ïa kiba bun ki tyllong um, ha kaba sdang eh, u pynjot ïa ki khlaw ki btap, u dain u khrai ïa ki dieng ki siej, u da dusmon da tyngeh ïa ki kynbat dawai, haba um sngew iohnong na ka khlaw, u hïar sha ki jaka ba kham them haba ka um ka lang, hangne u pyndonkam da ki kor ki bor ba khlain ban sam lyngba ïa ka khyndew, namar ka jingkwah rhah palat ka jong u ïa ka um kaba un bam, hynrei ïa kaba tam u da pynkylla dur pat ïa ka sha ka lad ban kamai ja kamai dohkha, da kaba die pat ïa kaum.Ym tang katta, ka mynsiem bam duh byn don ka jingpyrkhat ïa ka lawei ka ïai rung ha ka mynsiem u bynriew, da kaba u da thang dusom ïa ka khlaw ki btap ïa ki dieng siej, kiba da kylla, katta ka um kaba jïar na ki, ki sdang ban ring tyrkhong bad ruh ha ka juh ka por ba kin jah rngai noh.Haba phai sha ki tyllong um ba kyrsoi ha ki wahduid bad ki wah bah, u bynriew u sdang ban pynjot da kaba tih maw tih syïap, u da khynra naphang ïa ki jaka ba don ki tyllong um, da kaba u da pynduh pyndam ïa ki, namar na kum kane ka jaka, u da sngewkmen palat ka mynsiem namar ba u ioh ïa ka kabu ban kamai spah kamai phew.Kumta, katba nang mih ki sngi, kiba bun ki tyllong um ba kyrsoi ha kane ka jylla ki sdang ban duh jait, ha kaba ka umpohliew bah ba ïai kyrsoi ha ki saw aiom jong ka por, mynta ki la sdang ba kin jah, hynrei shu sah shisha satang ki dienjat jong ka jingtuid ka um, kaba da kylla ki long pynban kum ki ummat jingtim ïa ka jingleh hanga mei palat ka jong u khun bynriew.Da kumta ka jingrakhe ïa ka sngi ba kyrpang ka um ha ka pyrthei, ka donkam ba kan sei mardor ïa ka kynja khubor ban sdang ban pynkyndit bynriew ïa u paidbah, ba ka por ka la dei shisha ban sdang ha kaban tyngkai lut ïa man la ki tyllong um kiba don ha kane ka jylla, ha kaba man la ki shnong ki thaw, ki dong ki kyntoit ban shim khïa naka bynta ban pynneh ïa ki tyllong um kiba kyrsoi na ki. Lymda kloi lan ban shim khïa katba dang bïang ka por, ka por kan sa poi ba kan sa khie ka kynja kyrduh um kaba shyrkhei, katno tam lei lei ha kum kane ka aiom pyrem, kaba ka bneng ka rang tyrkhong bha, ba sdang pat ka kdew kti ne thnum namar balei, ka daw baroh ka long namar ka jingbym shim ïa don lem ïa katta ka mynsiemban ïa bah khlieh.Shuh shuh ka por ka la dei ruh ba ka sorkar ba kan khang noh shi syndon ïa ka jingsdang ban bteng ban ksam um pathar shapoh ka khyndew, namar ba kane kam ktah tang ïa ka jingpynrngat ïa ki tyllong um, pynban ka jingma ka long ïa ka jingpei thliew ka sla khyndew, kaba tang shu khie pat u jumai lah ban lam pynban sha ka jingma, namar ba ka khyndew ka la long lypa kaba la tor.Lymda kloi ba teh lakam ïa kane ka jingpynjot ïa ki tyllong um, sa shsien dei bïang u paidbah hi uban mad ïa ka jingeh, ha kaba un shem bad iohi ïa ka um ha baroh sawdong ba ker ïa u, hynrei wat tang shi jaw ruh pat un nym ioh pat ban dih ïa ka, namar ba ka um kaba kyrsoi,kadei kaba long bih naka jingleh dusmon jongno re.
title: Ka por ka dawa ba donkam ban pynneh ïa ki tyllong umdih

content: Nongpoh, Lber 07: Ka Secrtetary ka District Legal Services Authority (DLSA) Ri Bhoi District ka la pyntip paidbah na ka bynta ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Ri Bhoi ba kan sa pynlong ïa ka National Lok Adlalat ha ka 9 tarik u Lber 2024 naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep ha ophis ka District & Session Court, Ri Bhoi.Kane ka jingpynlong ïa ka National Lok Adalat ha katei ka sngi ka long ban bishar bad ban ai ka jingbishar baroh ki jaid motkoduma bad kino kino kiba kwah ban shim bynta ki la ban wan shim bynta ha katei ka sngi la khot kyrpang ka ophis ka District & Session Court Nongpoh.
title: Yn pynlong ka DLSA ïa ka Nationnal Lok Adalat

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 07: Ka FKJGP Mawliehbah Area Unit ka pynpaw ka jingsngewdiaw ïa ka jingbym lah ban pyndep jong ki contractor ïa ka surok Mawïaban-Mawkadiang sha Nongkaniang kaba la sanction da ka Sorkar Meghalaya lyngba ka, “Administrative Approval and sanction for Improvement Including Metalling and Blacktopping”, kaba 2 km (4th-5th km) (L=2.00km) kaba la mang pisa da ka sorkar Meghalaya ar klur tyngka.Ha ka jingshisha la dep ai Tender sha ki 8 ngut ki contractor bad katkum ka final work order ki lah dei ban pyndep hapoh 12 bnai kata hapoh u bnai Kyllalyngkot 2024. Hynrei kaba sngewsih bad pynlyngngoh haduh mynta ka long ba nalor ba bun jaka la shu trei torti, ki dang don pat ki contractor ki bym lah ban pyndep ïa katei ka jingtrei kaba dang sah khongreng khlem don ba trei shuh.Ka jingïoh ban shna ïa kane ka surok, ka la long shisha ka jingpynkmen ïa bun ki paidbah jong ki shnong kiba la pynïasoh da katei ka surok. Ka long ka jingkyrkhu haka leit ka wan ka kit ka bah bad khamtam ka pang ka shitom hynrei kumba ka long mynta ka pynduh jingkyrmen pynban.Ka seng ka dawa ïa u Executive Engineer ka tnad PWD, ba un thaw ki lad ban tuklar bad bthah noh mardor ïa kitei ki contractor ki bym shym pat la pyndep haduh mynta, ban pyndep noh kloi katba lah khnang ba katei ka jingtrei kan dep noh ha ka por kaba biang shuwa ban wan ka aiom slap.Lymda kumta ka Seng na ka bynta ka bha u paidbah kam banse ban hap shim da kiwei ki sienjam kiba tyngeh ban pynbor ban pyndep ïa katei ka surok.
title: Nalor ba trei torti khlem pyndep ki Contractor ïa ka surok Mawïaban-Nongkaniang

content: Jowai, Lber 07: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) mynta ka sngi sdang ïa ka Dorbar ula wanrah ïa ka Mang Tyngka kaba duna ïa ka jingpyllut da T.13.59 klur tyngka na ka bynta ka snem 2024-2025.Kane ka mang tyngka ka kynthup ïa ka jingpyllut kaba T.218,22,60,300 (Arspah khadphra klur Arphew ar lak hynriewphew hajar lai spah) tyngka, katba ka jingmih pat ka long T. 204,63,23,500.00 (Arspah saw klur Hynriewphew lai lak ar phew lai hajar san spah) tyngka bad ka paw ba ka jingpyllut ka heh ban ïa ka jingïoh kaba kot haduh T.13.59,36,800 (Khadlai klur Sanphew khyndai lak Laiphew hynriew hajar phra spah) tyngkaLa wanrah ïa kane ka mang tyngka da u CEM katkum ka Rule 109 jong ka Assam and Meghalaya Autonomous District Council (Constitution of District Council) Rules, 1951 jong ka District Council.La pynsngew ruh katkum ka Financial Year 2022-23 la ïoh jingkheiñ ba ka jingïoh lum na baroh ki mar ka long T. 113,62,46,064/-, katba ka jingpynlut T.117,81,88,185/-. Katba ka Financial Year 2023-2024 lyngba ka Executive Committee kala ïoh lum haduh T.46,63,70,500/-, na ki marpoh khyndew Major Mineral bad T.13,96,86,519/- na ki minor Mineral, na ki khajna (Taxes) na ki kali mator ka long T. 14,50,93,319/-. Ka bhah ba la ïoh na ka sorkar jylla lem bad ki revenue la siew sha ki nongtrei ka Council, ka ram (Lone) jong ka Civil Work Department nalor kiwei de ki jingpynlut pynsep jong ka ophis.Ka jingïoh na ka Financial Assistant jong ka sorkar katkum ka Financial Year 2023-24 ka long 17,00,000/- la ïoh na ka Land Reform Scheme katba naka Centrally Sponsored Scheme ka Council ka ïoh lum T.3,54,04,700 tang ka 1st Installment naka Digital India Land Record Modernisation Programme (DILRMP).Ka jingpynmih jong ka Council nalade (Resources) ka long T.29,38,23,800/- bad na ka share revenue jong ka sorkar ka long T.97,50,00,000/-, ka jingïoh na ka Grants jong ka sorkar ka long T.77,74,99,700/-.Ka Council ka la pyrshang ban pynmih revenue lyngba ka Executive Committee da kaba shim ïa kine ki sien jam kaba nyngkong ban pyntreikam ïa ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (Village and Town Development Council) Bill, 2023 bala pdiang haka 9 November, 2023 bad mynta la phah sha u lad ka jylla.Kaba ar ban thaw ïa ka Village and Town Administration Department ba peit ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Building bye Law kaba ïarap ban pynmih jingïoh ïa ka Council lyngba ki Fee jong ki jingtei.Kaba lai ka Art & Cultural Department kala pynbna kiba don ïaki jaka jngohkai Tourist Sports bad Stake Holder, ki Private Enterprise bad ki riew shimet kiba plie thymmai ïa ki Tourist Sport ki dei ban ïoh jingbit NOC na ka District Council. Nalor kiwei de ki lad pynmih Revenue ïa ka Council ka long katkum ka Notification No. JHADC/GENL/15/2023/1 dat. 25.09.2023.Na ka bynta ka jingpynlut ban siew tulop ïaki nongtrei ka Council, ha kane ka Financial Year ban wan yn pynduna noh ïa ki nongtrei sha ka 1286 na ka 1335.Khnang ban lait na ka jingduhnong jong ka Council la thaw ïa ka Internal Audit Section ha u snem 2023-2024 kane ka IAS ka la sdang treikam naduh u Septermber, 2023.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka ka ophis thymmai jong ka Council “New Additional Office Building” la tei pyndep ïa ka ha u juh u snem kata haka 5 tarik December, 2023.Ïa ki lad jingïarap Grant na ka sorkar kmie hapoh ka Financial Year 2023-2024 ka Council kala dep ban pyntrei haduh 363 ki Schemes/project na ka Tied bad Untied Grant kaba kynthup ïa ki tyllong umbam, ki Check Dams, Fishery Ponds, Ambulances, Water Canal, ki solar Light, ki ïing skul, Community Halls, ki jaka leit bar, ki madan, ki lynti ïaid kjat, ki jaka sait jaiñ nalor kiwei de kiba don hapoh ka WJHD.Halor kine ki jingdonkam naduh ki jingïoh bad jingpynlut jong ka Council na ka liang u CEM ka JHADC ula khot ka jingïatrei lang jong baroh naduh ki Member, ki nongtrei ba kin ai ka jingkyrshan ïa kane ka Executive Committee ha kine ki san snem ba la dep, kiba la lah ban pynïaid ïa ki kam ka Council na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paidbah ka Jaiñtia Hills hi baroh kawei. Ïa kane ka mang tyngka 2024-25 yn ïatai sani lashai ka sngi 8 tarik u Lber 2024 hapoh ka ïing darbar jong ka JHADC.
title: Mang ka JHADC ban pynlut 218.22 klur katba ka jingmih 204.63 klur

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 07: Ka seng WKSU ka la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingnang kiew ki kam sniew, khamtam ka jingshah pynïap ha sor Nongstoiñ ha kine ki kyndiat sngi, ha kaba uwei u samla u (L) Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani u la shah pynïap ha ki riew thrang snam ki bym don shuh ïa ka ïatip lem para briew.Ka seng ka pynrem jur ïano ïano ne kino kino kiba donkti ha ka ban shim noh ïa katei ka mynsiem ba kordor jong u tei u samla. Ka seng ka ai jingkyrshan ïa ka kur Kharbani na ka bynta ki sienjam kiba tyngeh ban ujor pyrshah ïa ki riew thrang snam riew bymman, kiba la pyndkut noh syndon ïa ka jingim jong utei u samla u ba dei na ka kur ka jait Kharbani.Ka seng ka phah ka khubor sngewlem sha kiba haïing hasem ki kur ki jait ki kha ki man jong u (L) samla Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani u ba la khlad noh bad ai ka mynsiem kan shong jahthait ha ka ka jingsuk.Ka seng ka dawa na ki bor jong ka aiñ khamtam ka police department, ba kan shimkhia ïa ki jingujor jong ka kur Kharbani halor kitei ki jingjia. Ai ba ki aiñ ki kanun kin ai ïa ka hok sha katei ka longïing kaba laduh ïa la u khun ba ki ieit ki thoiñ.Ka seng ka dawa ruh dei ban pynshitom jur ïa kito kiba don kti ha katei ka kam pynïap briew bad ruh ym dei ban pyllait jamin da kaba suk ïa ki riew pyntriem ha ka imlang sahlang ha ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills khamtam hapoh sor Nongstoiñ.Ka seng ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpur stet ki kam sniew ki kam pynïap kiba har rukom ha ka sor Nongstoiñ, kan sa shong pyrkhat kumno kumno ban teh lakam ïa kine ki jingsniew.Ka seng ka kyntu ïa ki bor Hima ki bor shnong ki bor sorkar ban kyndit thiah noh bad ban shimkhia, ha shuwa ba ki kam sniew kam bymman kin wan jia khala khala haman ki kyrpong ïing ki jong ngi jong phi, ong u samla D.Sun President West Khasi Students Union Seng kmie.
title: Sngewkhia ka WKSU ba nang kiew ki kam sniew ha sor Nongstoiñ

content: Nongpoh, Lber 07: Hadien ba shipor ba ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ka la sospon ïa u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai kum u Sirdar ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship kaba dei na ka jingdon ka jingujor pyrshah ïa u halor ki kam synshar khadar, hynrei mynta u Bah Wanphrang Syiem u la wan phai biang kum u Sirdar ba pura ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship, kaba dei hadien ka jingai rai hi da ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council.Kum ban pynkynmaw, ka KHADC ka la sospon kam shipur ïa u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai bad ka la thung ïa u Bah Pillarstone Syiem Nongshai kum u Acting Sirdar ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship, hynrei hadien ba la tohkit bad bishar halor kitei ki jingshah ujor ka KHADC mynta ka la ai rai biang ïa u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai ba un shimti biang kum u Sirdar ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship kaba dei halor ka Nongrim ba ka jingshah ujor jong u kam shym la la don Nongrim ei ei.Kane ka jingioh biang u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai kum u Sirdar ba pura ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship ka dei ruh hadien ba na ka liang ka KHADC ka la pynmih syndon da ka jingpynbna lyngba ka Executive Committee ka KHADC ba la pynkut noh ïa ka jingtreikam u Pillarstone Syiem Nongshai kum u Acting Sirdar kaba dei katkum ka hukum Dt. 04.03.2024 kiba dei katkum ka kyndon aiñ jong ka United Khasi-Jaintia Hills Autonomous District (Appointment and Succession of Chiefs and Headman) Act 1959.Lyngba katei ka kyndon la pynbna biang ïa u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai kum u Sirdar jong ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship ba un bteng biang ïa ka kam katkum ka Sanad No.DC.XXVIU Genl/12/ 2012 24 bad ka KHADC ka la pynbna ruh ba kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor tad haduh ban da ai hukum da kumwei pat.
title: Wan phai u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai kum u Sirdar ka Elaka Nongpoh

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 07: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council HYC Rambrai Circle hapoh ka jingïalam u Samla Bankitkupar Marweiñ ha ka sngi 7 tarik mynta u bnai, ka la leit ïakynduh ïa u SDO MePDCL Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills District, halor ka jingbym poi bill lait ha ki shnong jong ka thaiñ Rambrai.Ki nongïalam ka seng ki la ong ba ki la ïoh ïa ka jingujor na ki paidbah nongshong shnong halor kane ka jinglong jingman bym poi bill lait la hynriew bnai. Kumta ka seng ka buh ka jingkyntu sha ka tnad ban leh ei ei halor kane ka jingeh ki paitbah.Ka seng ka kynthoh ruh ba kane baroh ka lah ban dei na ka jingleh sting ki nongtrei lane dei na ka jingduna nongtrei ka office ba kam lah ban ai jingshakri kaba bha ïa ka thaiñ.Kumta ka kyrpad ïa office ban shimkhia lem, khnang ba kan pynsuk ïa ki longïing bad kan nym ban khïa ïa ki paitbah ka thaiñ lada lah ban ai bill lait man la u bnai. Na ka liang u sahep SDO u la kular ban shimkhia ïa kane.
title: Hynriew bnai khlem poi Bill sha ki shnong Rambrai

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 07: Hadien ka jingpan por jong ki bor district kaba lai-saw sngi ban sdang noh ia ka jing maramot ïa ka surok, na ka liang ka Joint Action Committee jong ki khatwei tylli ki shnong na elaka Narpuh East Jaiñtia Hills District, mynta ka sngi ki la pynsangeh noh ïa ka jingiakhi kaba pakhang ïa ka surok bah NH-6 ha Narpuh, kane ka jingpakhang surok ka la sdang naduh ka por 6 baje mynne mynstep tat haduh ka por 4.30 janmiet.Hadien ka jingiakren sani bha hapdeng u ADC ka East Jaiñtia Hills District, u bah G.Warjri lem bad ki nongïalam ka JAC ryngkat lang bad ki paidbah ha Umkiang, ka JAC ka la ngeit bad pdiang ban weng noh ïa ka jingpakhang surok bad ka JAC ka buh ruh da ki kyndon ba lada ka jingmara-mot ïa ka surok kam urlong hapoh kine ki lai-saw sngi ka JAC lem bad ki paidbah kin khot pynlong biang ïa ka jingpakhang surok ha Narpuh, ha kane ka janmiet na ka liang u ADC u la wanrah bad pyni ruh ïa ka work order kaba pyni ba ïa ka surok yn maramot noh shen.U bah Warjri u la ong ruh ba na ka liang u contractor u hap ban leh ïa ka kam ha ka por ba la buh lym kumta u lah ban duh noh wat ïa ka work order ruh, la ong ba na ka liang ki bor district ruh kin shim khia ban kyntu bad pynkyrkieh ïa u contractor ban sdang pyntrei noh kham kloi, u la kyrpad ruh ïa ki paidbah ba kin sngewthuh lem ba u contractor u donkam ban lum ban lang ïa ki tiar ki tar ban maramot ïa ka surok na kata ka daw kan shim por hi katto katne sngi.Na ka liang u President ka JAC, u bah Lasting Pala, u la ong ba “ U ADC, u bah Warjri u la kular ba hapoh lai-saw sngi yn shna bad maramot noh ïa ka surok kaba naduh Ratacherra haduh Tongseng, ngi pdiang ïa kane ka jing pan por tangba lada kane ka jingkren u ADC kam urlong na ka liang ka JAC kan pynlong biang ïa ka jingpakhang surok kaba sawphew phra kynta” u la ong ruh ba balei ka JAC ka hap ban shim ïa kane ka synjam ka dei namar ba ym don satia kano kano ka jingmaramot ïa ka surok wat tang khyndiat ruh, ka surok ka la dap sa tang ka thliew ka syar, ka la buh jingma bad buh jingeh haduh katta katta ïa ki paidbah nongleit nongwan, u la iathuh ruh ba na ka liang ka JAC ka la dep ban iakynduh bad pynsngew ha u Symbud myntri rangbah, u bah Prestone Tyngsong halor ka jingsniew palat ka surok ha ka thaiñ, u la ong ba ïa kane ka surok la dep aiti sha ka Dhar Construction Compa-ny bad ka JAC ka la ap haduh ar phew sngi hynrei kam don kano kano ka jingsei soh na kata ka daw ka JAC kan sa shim ïa kane ka synjam bad mih shakhmat ban pynlong da kane ka jingiakhihU Secretary jong ka JAC, u bah Loveyou Bareh, u lapynpaw ka jingsngew khia namar ka jingsniew palat ka surok bad ong ba na ka por sha ka por ka JAC ka la dep iakren halor kane ka jingsniew palat ka surok bad ka jing trei thulmur ha ba pyntrei, ki kali kiba iaid ruh ki kit palat pud ka bym iahap shuh bad ka surok.U Secretary Shnong Umkiang, u bah Nicholas Lyngdoh, u la ong ba donkam ban pynkloi ïa ka jingpyntrei ia ka surok namar lada hap slap kan wanrah jingeh ban pyntrei ia ka surok , u kyrpad ba katba lah dei ban pyndep noh ïa ka jingpyntrei ha shwa ban slap.Ha ki kynta jong ka jingiakhih pakhang surok, la lap ba ki paidbah jong ka shnong Tongseng, Kuliang, Pyrtakuna, Umkiang, Donaskur, Donaumbluh, Ratacherra bad ki shnong kiba don ha ka shatri jong ka JAC ki la ïa mih paidah kynthei bad shynrang bad shong hapdeng surok, ki la kang lynti bad khlem shah ïa ki kali ban iaid, na ka liang ki Waheh Shnong, ki longkmie, longkpa ki la pynpaw ka jingsngew bitar namar ka jingmynthi ka sorkar jylla ka bym sngewthuh ïa ka jingeh ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan, ki la iathuh ruh ba wat ki khynnah skul ruh ki mad jingeh ha kaba bunsien ki ju duh ban leit skul ruh na ka daw ka jingjur palat ka jingdheng kali ha ka thaiñ, ka jingsniew ka surok ka buh jingeh ruh ïa ki ba pang ba shitom kiba leit ban wad dawai sha ki jaka sumar.Na ka liang u bah Lasting Pala, u la ai khublei ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong baroh jong ka thaiñ kiba la ïa snohkti lang ha kane ka jingiakhih mynta ka sngi bad u khmih lynti ruh ba ka jingmaramot ïa ka surok kan urlong noh shen kumba la dep kren da u ADC, lym kumta ka JAC kam mih madan biang.
title: Weng noh ka JAC ïa ka pakhang surok ba kular ka NHAI ban shna ïa ka surokbah NH-6 hapoh lai sngi

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi Balang ka la pan jingshai na u Deputy commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Abhilash Baranwal uba dei u Chairman jong ka District AYUSH Society halor ka jingbym pyllait ïa ki katto katne tylli ki posts kiba kynthup naduh ki post Ward Boy, Ward Girl, Sweepers, Cook, Chowkidar, Jamandar, Peon bad kiwei kiwei kiba la pynmih Aadvertisement da ka ophis DM&HO ha ka 15 tarik Rymphang 2024.Ka seng ka la pan jingshai bad la buh jingkylli hato kum kine ki Post yn set noh ne yn sa khot pat da kawei ka Advertisement.“Ka seng ka suba ba ka don ruh ka shithi na u Commissioner ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ba la btah ïa ki Deputy commi–ssioner kiba long ruh ki Chairman jong ki District AYUSH Society ba kin leh ïa kaba donkam ban pynbeit halor ka jingthepkam bad ïa ka Notification ne Circular ym shym la pynmih paidbah ban ai jingpynshai halor katno tylli ki Posts lah bthah ban pyntip paidbah,” la ong ka seng.Halor kane ka jingpan jingshai, u Deputy commissioner u la ong ba un hap ban ïa phylliew jingmut shwa bad u DMHO ka East Jaiñtia Hills District uba dei ruh u Member Secretary jong ka Society shwa ban shim ïa kan kano ka rai.Ka seng kan buddien halor kane ka jingkhot thepkam khnang ba kan long kaba khuid khlem da don kano kano ka leh shilliang ha baroh ki Posts.
title: Suba ka KSU ba set ka Sorkar katto katne tylli ki Posts ha East Jaiñtia Hills

content: Nongpoh,, Lber 07: Ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri Bhoi District (SRSRBD) ka la mih shakhmat ban ai ka jingkhublei kaba kyrpang ïa ka tnad Pulit Ri Bhoi, kaba dei halor ka jingshim khia ban ïa khun thma pyrshah ïa u drok kumba la paw ba ka tnad Pilice na Ri Bhoi na ka por sha ka ka por ka la ju ioh ban kem ïa ki snar ba don kti ha ki kam khaïi drok.Kum ban pynkynmaw, ka tnad Pulit na Ri Bhoi dang shen ka la ioh ruh ban kurup haduh 4 hajar Kilo tam u Ganja ha Lad Umsaw ha Ri Bhoi kaba dei na ka jingshim khia ki bor pulit ka Ri Bhoi ban ïa khun pyrshah ïa kane ka jingkhaïi beaiñ ïa ki jingdih basniew.Haba ïa kren bad ki Nongthoh Khubor, u President ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnoing Ri Bhoi District, u Bah B.B Makdoh, u la ong ba kum ka synjuk kaba ai ka jingshakri na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki shnong ki thaw bad ki paidbah ha ka Ri Bhoi ka dap da ka mynsiem jong ka jingkmen, kaba dei halor ka Nongrim ba ki bor pulit ka Ri Bho ki la shim khia thikna ban ïa khun pyrshah na ka jingkynrei u drok.U la ong ruh kum ka synjuk ka ai khublei kyrpang ïa u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi ryngkat ki ophisar bad baroh ki pulit kiba la ïa don bynta ha kaba ïa khun pyrshah ïa u drok bad kum ka synjuk ruh ka kloi ban ai ïa ka jingïatrei lang na ka bynta ban rad dyngkhong ïa u u drok bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdih ba sniew kiba pynsniewdur ïa ka imlang ka sahlang.U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong ba ka Synjuk ka shim ïa ka bynta ban ai khublei kyrpang ïa ka tnad Pulit na Ri Bhoi ba kin dang shim shuh shuh ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban ïa khun pyrshah ïa u drok bad kiwei ki jingsniew bad ha kawei ka bytna ka synjuk ka khot ka wer ruh ïa ki paidbah ban ai ka jingïatrei lang bad ka bor pulit bad bor District khnang ba da ka jingïatrei lang ngin lah ban rad dyngkhong ïa baroh ki jaid jingsniew kiba ktah bad pynsniew ïa ka imlang ka sahlang, u la bynrap shuh shuh.
title: ïaroh ka SRSRBD ïa ki Pulit Ri Bhoi kiba ïakhun pyrshah ïa u drok

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma, mynta ka sngi Balang, ula buh mawnongrim ban pynkylla, pynwandur thymmai bad shna ïa ki jingtei ban pynbhabriew ïa ka State Central Library, Shillong.ïa une u mawnongrim la buh ha ka jingïalang kaba long ha U Soso Tham Auditorium ha ka jingïadon lang u Myntri ka Tnad Arts & Culture Bah Paul Lyngdoh.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, u Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ba ka Sorkar ka don jingthmu ban tei da ki jingtei ba thymmai jong ka Soso Tham Auditorium ha kine ki snem bala lah hynrei kam shym la lah namar ka jingdon ka Covid. “Kam pher ngi lah ban pynkup ïa ka dur thymmai ïa ka auditorium bad ka complex kaba la shu ieh la slem khlem ka jingmaramot lane pynbha” ula ong.Ula ong ba kane ka jingtei thymmai kan ai jaka ban buh ïa ki jingdonkam ka juk ba mynta bad kan pynkylla dur ïa ka Library kum ka jingtei kaba kynsai bha. Ula ong ruh ba ka Sorkar kan pynkup ïa ka dur thymmai ïa ka State Library Complex baroh kawei bad kan buh ruh ïa ka Cineplex lem bad ki rynsan ban leh drama bad kiwei kiwei.U Myntri Rangbah ula kular ruh ïa ka song pisa na ka bynta kiwei ki project kiba hap hapoh ka State Library Complex.“Kane ka dei ban long ka centre kaba ki samla ba don sap ki lah ban ïakynduh, ïasam ïa ki jingnang jingtip bad ban pyni ïa ka sap ba ki don sha ka pyrthei bad ban pynlong ruh ïa kane ka jaka kaba jia, kaba im bad ka hui hui ha kaba kiba bun jait ki prokram art & culture yn lah ban pyni bad ïasam mar kylliang” ula ong.U Myntri Rangbah ula ong ruh ba hapoh ka CM Elevate, ka Sorkar kan buh haduh 30 tylli ki movie theatre ha kylleng ki jaka jong ka Jylla ban kyntiew ïa ka art & culture, ki phlim bad ka ktien ka thylliej jong ka Jylla nalor ban ai rynsan ïa ki nongshna phlim ka Jylla ba kin pyni ïa ki kam ba ki trei.Haba pynpaw ba ka 6 tarik Lber 2024 ka dei ka sngi dap shisnem jong ka Sorkar MDA 2.0 bad hynriew snem ka Sorkar MDA, baroh kawei kata 1 bad 2 u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka Sorkar kala buh ïa u mawnongrim ka jingkiew irat bad ka roi ka par bad wanrah ruh ïa ki prokram ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka Jylla. Ula pynpaw ruh ba da ka jingshaniah lang jong u paidbah, ka Sorkar kan lah ban pynurlong ïa ki jingangnud jong ki paidbah ka Jylla.`U Myntri ka Tnad Arts & Culture Bah Paul Lyngdoh ula ai khublei ïa u Myntri Rangbah halor ka jingai ïa ka thong bad ka mishon ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ki shaka ka roi ka par jong ka Jylla.Ula ai khublei ruh ïa ka National Library Board halor ka jingbei pisa ba T. 2.33 klur ban pynitynnad bad pynheh ïa ka State Library Complex.
title: Buh mawnongrim u CM ban pynbhariew ïa ka State Central Library

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: Uwei u rangbah briew na ka Jylla Assam u la ïap hapoh kawei ka kamra sah ha Hotel ha Shillong ha ka sngi Palei.U SP ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi u la ïathuh ba ki nongtrei ka Hotel Assembly kaba don ha Police Bazar ki la pyntip ba uwei na kiba sah basa um shym la mih satia napoh ka kamra bad mardor ki Pulit ka Sadar Police Station, ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki nongsakhi ki pynpait ïa ka jingkhang.Ïa ka met jong une uba ïap la ithuh kyrteng kum u Sijo Joseph uba la 47 snem ka rta uba dei na ka shnong Beltola Road, Guwahati.U SP u la ïathuh ba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad la lap ba ka dei na ka daw ba u Sijo u la dih shaba pud ïa ki dawai kuli.“Kam don kano kano ka dak ba pynsuba sniew. Ïa ka met la phah leh post mortem. Ngi la pyntip ruh sha ki bahaing bad ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ka dang ïaid shakhmat,” u la ong.
title: Ïap u rangbah na Assam ha Hotel Assembly

content: Shillong, Lber 07 : U Bah Process T Sawkmie, MLA barim bad Co-Chairman ka Meghalaya State Development Reforms Commission, Meghalaya u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw halor ka jingwanrah burom I Dr Helen Giri ïa ka jylla Meghalaya hadien ba ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka khusnam na ka President ka Ri India Droupadi Murmu mynta ka sngi.“Nga sngewkmen shikatdei eh ba ka sorkar India ka la ithuh bad ai khusnam Sangeet Natak Akademi Award ïa I Dr Helen Giri, kaba long ka burom kaba khraw ïa ka ri bad ïa ka jaitbynriew,” ong u bah PT Sawkmie.U la bynrap, “I dei iwei na ki longkmie iba trei shitom naduh ki por ba mynshuwa haduh mynta bad ka jingïoh jong i ïa kane ka khusnam kan ai mynsiem ïa ki khun samla kiba mynta.”U bah Sawkmie u pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingkyrmen ba in nang lah ban ïai trei shitom bad ban nang lah ban sam ïa ki sap ki phong sha kiwei ki khun samla jong ka jylla.Kumba shu kdew ka President ka Ri India Droupadi Murmu kala pynkup burom da ka Sangeet Natak Akademi Awards (Akademi Puraskar) 2022- 2023 sha ki 91 ngut ki nongak drama ba pawnam kynthup (2 tylli Joint Award) haka liang ka Performing Arts.Ïa kane ka jingpynkupburom la pynlong hapoh ka Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi ha kaba I Dr Helen Giri na Meghalaya i la ïoh ïa ka khusnam Sangeet Natak Akademi Award na ka bynta u snem 2023 halor ka jinglah jong ka ban kyntiew bad ban pynpaw nam ïaki rukom tem bad rukom put tynrai ka Meghalaya.Ka Kong Helen Giri, kaba la kha ha ka 7 tarik Lber 1944, ka dei kaba la paw bha haka put ka tem tynrai napoh Meghalaya bad kala shim bynta ban kyntiew bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shad tynrai.Ka Kong Helen ka dei ruh kaba ju don bynta ban rwai jingrwai tynrai Khasi hapoh ka All India Radio bad ka don bynta ruh ban pyninam bad ban pynsaphriang ïa ka put ka tem tynrai ha ki rynsan National level.Ka la shim bynta ruh ban pyni ïa ka sap ha ki State, National bad International Level ïa kaba ka la ïoh ka jingithuh bad jingïaroh na ki bun balang.Ka Kong Helen Giri ka ju pynlong ruh ki jait Prokram bad Tamasa ban kyntiew ïa ka put ka tem bad ka shad tynrai jong ka Meghalaya.
title: Kmen u Bah Sawkmie ba wanrah burom i Dr. Helen Giri

content: New Delhi, Lber 7 : Ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka sorkar pdeng ba la khlieh da u Myntri Rangbah duh, u Narendra Modi ka la mynjur ban pyllait ïa ka bynta jong ka Dearness Allowance (DA) sha ki nongtrei sorkar pdeng bad ka Dearness Relief (DR) sha kito kiba ïoh bai bam tymmen naduh ka 1.1.2024 kaba long ka jingkiew kaba 4% na ka jinglong jingman kaba 46% mynta jong ka Jingsiew Basic / Bai Bam Tymmen, khnang ban pynïahap bad ka jingkiew dor ki mar.Ka jingktah ïa ka pla tyngka ha kaba ïadei bad ka Dearness Allowance bad Dearness Relief kan long T. 12,868.72 klur shi snem. Kane kan ai jingmyntoi ïa kumba 49.18 lak ki nongtrei sorkar pdeng bad 67.95 lak ïa kito kiba ïoh bai bam tymmen.Kane ka jingkiew katkum ka jingkheiñ kaba la pdiang, kaba don nongrim ha ki jingai jingmut ka 7 th Central Pay Commission.
title: 4% yn kyntiew ka Sorkar Pdeng ïa ka DA bad DR

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: U Chairman ka Regional Committee ba khmih ïa ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills u Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long ruh u Nongaiktien ka sorkar jylla u la ong ba ka jingïakren pynbeit pud hapdeng ka jylla Assam bad Meghalaya ha ka wat kaba ar la dang hap ban pynsangeh shuwa, da kaba ïathuh ba ki jingïakren ki la slem na ka daw ka jingduna ka jingai ktien ne jingjubab na ka liang ka Sorkar Assam.Ïa kane u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ïathuh haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la buh ïa u mawnongrim ïa ka Rabindranath Tagore Cultural Complex TCC ha Rilbong.U Bah Paul uba dei khmih ïa ka Langpih ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills kaba dei kawei na ki jaka kaba dang ïaid ha ka lynti ban ïakren pynbeit pud u la ong ba ïa kane ka kam yn sah ban ïaid shakhmat tang ynda la ïoh ka jingai ktien na ka sorkar Assam.Kiwei ki shnong kiba hab ha ka jingïapynbeit pud ki kynthup ïa ka Borduar, Nongwah-Mawtamur, Deshdoomreah, Block-II ha Ri Bhoi District;
