Block- I, Psiar – Khanduli ha West Jaiñtia Hills District.Haba pyrshang ban kylli khambniah halor kane na ka liang u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pynpaw ïa ka jingeh ban ïathuh lut halor ka jingïaid jong kane ka jingïakren pynbeit pud naba u la ong ba kin sa don kiba shim kabu namar ka ilekshon ka la janHaba ong ba ki donkam satang 2 sngi ban leit jurip ïa ki jaka hynrei la hap ban slem noh na ka daw ka jingbym pat jubab jong ka sorkar Assam.Haba ong ba ka donkam satang 2 sngi ban pynlong ïa ka jingleit jurip jaka hynrei ka la don ka jingpynslem namar ka jingduna ka jingai ktien ne jubab na ka sorkar Assam.U Bah Lyngdoh u la pyntip ba ha kawei pat ka liang, ka la don ka jingpynpaw ba ka Assam ka la mon ban shimbynta ha ka jingleit jurip ha u bnai Lber mynta u snem.“Ha kawei ka bynta kaba ngi dei ban peit bha ka long ba kum kine ki jait kam kum ka kam ïakajia pud kan lah ban poi sha ka jingïatakhuh khamtam ba ki ilekshon ki la jan naba kin sa don kiba ïaleh ban kren ïa kane ka kam ban khring ïa ki nongthep vote ,” ong u Bah Lyngdoh.Halor kane u la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingkyrmen ba ïa kane ka kam ynsa lah ban pyndep noh kham kloi.
title: Slem ka jingïakren pynbeit pud bym pat ai ktien ka Assam

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) ha ka sngi Palei ka la pan jingpynshai na u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation u Macruise N. Marak halor ka jingïoh ujor jong ka seng ba ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation ki pyntrei hi ïa ki projek ne ki skhim bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla kum ka IWMP, ka AIBP, RKVY bad ka Nabard Loan.U President ka HITO Bah Donbok Dkhar ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba lyngba ki projek bad ki skhim kane ka tnat ka ju shna ïa ki Dam, ki nala ring um, ki kynroh, ki jingkieng ba long ban ïaid kjat bad ki jaka pynlang um, ki pung um bad kiwei kiwei.U ong ba la lap ba ïa kine ki kam la pyntrei hi da ki Ophisar bad ki nongtrei jong kane hi ka tnat treikam khlem da khot Tender ban ai ïa ki jingtrei sha ki Contractor ne ki Supplier kumba la leh da kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar.“Ngi la ïoh pdiang bun tylli ki jingkyrpad na ki samla kiba la nang la stad ki bym donkam donkam kiba shu trei malu mala ïa ki kam Kontraktor halor ka jingpyntrei hi da ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei ka tnat Soil and Conservation,” ula ong bad bynrap, “kumno ka Sorkar ka shah ïa ka tnat Soil and Conservation ban aikam ïa la ki jong ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei watla kam don ka Engineering Wing ha ka tnat kynthup ka jingsuplai ïa ki mar bad leh kiar na ki Registered Contractors ne Supplier bad na ki nongtrei ba la tbit kumba la leh ha kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar.”“Ngi sngewthuh ba ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation ki don bynta ban suplai bad ban jied nongtrei bylla ha la ka mon khlem da khot Tender ha ka rukom kaba dei khnang ban ailad ïa ki samla kiba la nang la stad ki bym donkam donjam. La pyntip ruh sha ngi ba bun na ki nongbylla la wanrah ruh na shabar ki shnong ba la pyntrei ïa ka projek ha kaba la pynduhlad ïa ki nongtrei kiba la tbit jong ka thaiñ kaba long kum ka jingpynduh ïa ka kamai jakpoh,” la ong une u nongïalam ka HITO.
title: Kynnoh ka HITO ba trei hi ki ophisar bad nongtrei ïa ki projek ka Soil & Water Conservation

content: Jowai, Lber 07: Ka Dorbar mang tyngka jong ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) Jowai kaba la long mynta ka sngi 7 tarik u Lber, 2024 kala long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih, ïa ka Dorbar la pynïaid da u Chairman ka JHADC Dr. Sankey Shangpung bad ïa kane ka Dorbar yn pynkut lashai ka sngi 8 tarik Lber 2024.Ki MDC ka Liang Pyrshah ba kynthup ïa u ma A.A. Shullai u la pan jingpynshai na ka Executive Committee ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingmang pisa ïa ka JHADC na ka 15th Finance Commission hapoh ka Tied Grant bad United Grant jong ka Financial Year 2023-24, na ka liang u EM I/c ma P. Dkhar ula jubab ba kam don.U ma A.A. Shullai ula kyntu ïa ka EC ba ka dei ban bud dien ïa kane khnang ba ka sorkar na Delhi kan shimkhia ban pynlait ïa ki skim jong ka 15th Finance Commission. Shuh shuh ula pan jubab ïa ka 5th Finance Commission 2023-24 la dep ban submit lyngba ka Egram Swaraj portal jong ka sorkar kmie, la jubab ym pat dep hynrei ka dang uploaded haka e-Portal.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthmu ban bhah ïa ki Constituencies hapoh ha District Council u ma A.A. Shullai ula pan jingshai kaei ka jingthmu ban thaw ïa ka District Council Constituency jong ka JHADC bad ïa ka Delimitation Committee. La jubab da u CEM ka jingthaw ïa kane ka District Council Constituencies la thaw khnang ba kan peit bniah ïa ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote hapdeng ki Constituencies. Katba ka Delimitation Committee kan eksamin ïa ki Constituency katkum ka order bala bthah da u Lat ka jylla ba donburom ïa ka District Council.Na ka liang u ma Andrew ula pynpaw ka jingsngewsih halor ka jinglait paitbah (leaking) jong kane ka jingthmu jong ka Council ban bhah ïa ki Constituencies.Katba na ka liang u ma Brightstar Chyrmang ula buh jingkylli halor ka jingdon jong ka Check Station ka Council ha shnong Khliehtyrshi ban jurip ïa ka jingkit mar beaiñ na ki bar jylla, la jubab da u ma W.G Sungoh haoid ka don ka Check Station ha katei ka jaka bad ïa katei ka Check la pynïaid da ka tnad jong ka Council da kaba ai bor ïa ki nongtrei ka Council ban pynïaid ryngkat ki nongtrei kiba dei ki trai shnong bad ki trai jaka.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkylli halor ka NOC sha ki Coke Factory ha East Jaiñtia Hills District naduh ka 1 tarik u April, 2023 haduh 29 tarik u February, 2024 bala kylli da u Brighstar Chyrmang la jubab da u ma T. Shiwat CEM ba kam shem la issue wat tang kawei ruh.U ma B. Chyrmang ha ka jingkylli halor ka jingshah transfer jong ki nonghikai DCLP kiba hikai ha ki Govt. LP School sha ka Council DCLP School, la jubab da u L. Dkhar EM haoid, da kaba pynsngew ruh haduh mynta ki khynnah DCLP ki don 4317 ngut, ki nonghikai 200 ngut bad ki skul ki don 95 tylli..Ha kane ka Dorbar mang tyngka la pynkiew kyrdan ruh ïa ka kong Christabelmorn Bthuh Junior Engineer- sha ka kam Assistant Engineer ha ka Civil Work Department JHADC, Jowai.Lashai ka sngi 8 tarik ka Council ka dorbar kan ïatia ïa ka mang tyngka na ka bynta u snem 2024-25 halor ka jingïoh bad jingpynlut jong ka JHADC.
title: Pan jingshai ki MDC TMC ïa ka jingpan pisa ka JHADC na ka 15th Finance Commission

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: Ki jaidbynriew Garo kiba la im bad kiba la shong la sah ha ki 54 tylli ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Raid Marwet jong ka Hima Mylliem ha ka sngi Palei ki la ki la pan jingïarap na ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan tuklar lem hadien ba kawei ka kynhun sengbhalang ka la pyrshah ïa ka jingai Sanad long Rangbah Shnong sha ki jaidbynriew Garo kiba sah hapoh kane ka Raid kaba hap ruh hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Khasi Hills Autnomous District Council.U Adviser jong ka All Ribhoi Garo Headman Association (ARGHA) u Nickel R. Marak bad ka Serimina Marak ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ki la ïathuh ba ki la pynsngew ha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma halor kane ka jingpyrshah ban long Rangbah Shnong da ki Garo ha ki shnong ba la buhai shnong ki Garo ha Raid Marwet.Ki la ïathuh ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u la phah ïa ki ban leit ïakynduh ïa u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autnomous District Council (KHADC) ban pan jingpynshai halor kane, la, ki Garo kiba dei ki trai shnong hapoh kane ka Jylla Meghalaya ki don hok neem ban ïoh ïa ka Sanad ban long Rangbah Shnong ha ki shnong jong ka Raid Marwet ba la sah tang da ki jaidbynriew Garo.“Bun ki Garo kiba sah ha ki shnong hapoh ka Raid Marwet ngi la sah naduh ka por Phareng. Mynshwa ki don tang ki Garo ym don satia ki Khasi bad mynshwa la ïathuh ïa ki Rangbah Shnong Garo hynrei ka don kawei ka kynhun sengbhalang kaba pyrshah ban ai Sanad. Ngi dei ki trai shnong jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ngi la sah ha Raid Marwet naduh u snem 1905,” la ong u Nickel R. Marak.“Mynshwa ki ailad ba ngin pyndonnkam ïa ki muhor Rangbah Shnong hynrei ka don kawei ka sengbhalang kaba pyrshah, katba kiwei kiwei ki sengbhalang kim pyrshah satia haba ngi la ïakren bad ki halor kane,” ong u Nickel.U la ïathuh ba kane ka kynhun kan sa leit ban ïakynduh ïa u CEM ka KHADC ha ka taïew ban sa wan khnang ban ïoh jingpynshai halor kane ka mat,” u la ongU la ïathuh ruh ba kum ka kynhun ki la pan jingïarap na u MLA bad na u MDC ba kin kren lem halor kane ka kam bad ka District Council.
title: Pan jingïarap ki Garo na u CM ba mih ka jingdawa ban pynduh Rangbah Shnong

content: Shillong, Lber 7 : Ka Monolith Festival kaba lai sngi ka la sdang mynta ka sngi Palei bad ka la long kaba shongkun bad phuh phieng bha da ka jingwan shim bynta shitrhem jong baroh ki Hima kiba hap ha u pud u sam jong ka Council.ïa kane ka tamasa la wan ban plie da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ba dei peit ïa ka tnad District Council Affairs,u Bah Prestone Tynsong.La pynphuh shuh shuh ïa kane ka tamasa da ki jingpyni ïa ka shad tynrai, ki jingrwai bad ruh ka phawar kaba la pynshongshit bha ha kane ka sngi sdang.U Kongsan ha ka jingkren u la kyntu ïa ka KHADC ba kan ïai bteng ban pynlong ïa kane ka tamasa man u snem nangne shakhmat.U Bah Prestone u ong ruh ba bun ki kwah ban ïohi ïa kane ka tamasa naba ka long ka lympung ba ki paidbah ki lah ban ïohi ïa ka tynrai, ka kolshor bad khamtam ïa ki riti distur jong ki Hima bapher bapher kiba don ha u pud u sam jong ka Council.Na ka liang u CEM ka KHADC, Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka jingkren u la ong ba lyngba ka tamasa Mawbynna ka pyni ïa ka kolshor, ka kup ka sem, ka shad ka mastieh, ka lehniam leh rukom, ka Ktien ka thylliej bad kiwei kiwei ki jingriewspah ba kum ka Jaidbybriew Khasi ka don ban pyni sha ka pyrthei.U CEM u la ai ruh ka jingïaroh ïa ki Hima, ki shnong bad baroh kiba la donkti ban pynphuh pynphieng ïa katei ka tamasa.“Lada shim tang naduh ka jingwan ki mishoneri ka Jaidbybriew jong ngi ka la don kumba 200 snem. Kumta ha kine ki snem ngi sngew dei ban ai burom ïa ki longshwa kiba la lah ban pynrung ha ka Khyrnit kaba Hynriew jong ka Riti Synshar jong ka Ri ban ïada ïa ka jinglong kyrpang jongngi.”Ha ka Sixth Schedule la aibor ïangi ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka aijait sha ka Kmie. “Ngim kwah ba kiwei ki ar kin ïalam bakla da kaba ai jait sha kiwei ki ar,” u la bynrap biang.La pynphuh ïa ka tamasa da ka Shad Thma na Hima Mawphlang, ka Shad Sajer na Raid Khadar Nonglyngdoh, Ri Bhoi, nalor ki jingrwai bad ka Phawar.Ha kane ka sngi jan baroh ki MDC kumjuh ki Khlieh Nongsynshar ki la wan ryngkat ka spong bad ki riam tynrai ban pynïahap bad katei ka tamasa.Ha ka por janmiet u Kongsan ryngkat u CEM ki la leit ruh ban peit ïa ki Ïing trep jong ki Hima bapher bapher.
title: Dei ban pynlong beit man la u snem ïa ka tamasa Monolith : Kyntu u Dy.CM ïa KHADC

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: Ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) ha ka sngi Palei ka la ot noh ïa ka bording na ki longing kiba shong basah be-aiñ ha Maxwelton Estate hadien ka jingujor jong ka KSU Laban Circle ha ka sngi Balang ha u Chairman ka MeECL bad ha u Director ka MePDCL.Ka jingujor jong ka KSU ka long ba ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha Maxwelton Estate ki tuh ïa ka bording ilektrik bad dawa ba dei ban phah ot noh mardor.Mardor ka MeECL ka la phah ïa ki nongtrei ha ka step sngi Palei ban khmih ïa ka jingshisha hadien ba la ïoh ujor na ka KSU.Ha ka jingjurip, ka MeECL ka la lap ba ka don shisha ka jingtuh bor ding ilektrik bad la lap ruh ba don ki longiing ba na uwei u meter ki ai bording sha 14 tylli ki iing, don kiwei kiwei pat kiba ai bording sha 4-5 tylli ki iing bad kumta ter ter.Na ka liang jong ka MeECL ka la ot bording lut ïa baroh kine ki iing kiba tuh bording bad kin sa ai Notis ruh ïa kine ki briew ha kine ki sngi ban shah daiñ kuna.Ka MeECL ka la lap ba ki don 27 tylli ki longiing kiba biang ïa u Meter bording (20 postpaid bad 7 prepaid) bad kine ki ai pat sha kumba 50 tylli eiei ki iing (re-sale) kaba long beaiñ. Ka MeECL ka la ot ruh ïa bording na kine ki 50 tylli eiei ki iing.Ka Seng ka ai jingïaroh bad ka sngewnguh shibun ïa ka jingkitkhiah bad ka jingkloi jong ka tnad MeECL ban hiar jurip ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Ka Seng kan sa leit ai dorkhas sa shisien ba kine ki briew ki ym ïoh ban aplai ïa ka bording khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad khlem ïoh ïa ka NOC na ka Dorbar Shnong bad ha kajuh ka por ruh ban pan jingpynshai ba kumne kine kiwei ki 27 tylli ki iing ki ïoh ilektrik bording bad ki kot ki sla kaba kumno ki ai ban ïoh, khamtam ïa kiba leh prepaid connection kiba dang shu aplai dang shen.Ka Seng ka kyntu ruh ïa ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ban weng noh ïa ki masi na kane ka jaka katkum ki kyndon aiñ kumba la kular hakhmat ka Deputy Commissoner ha 29 tarik u Rymphang, 2024. Lada ka SMB ka pynslem ka Seng kan pynlong da ka jingïakhih ha khmat Ophis jong ka SMB.
title: Hapoh 24 kynta ba ïoh ujor na ka KSU ot ka MeECL ïa ka bording ha Maxwelton Estate

content: New Delhi, Lber, 7: Ka President jong ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynkup burom da ka khusnam Sangeet Natak Akademi (Akademi Puraskar) na ka bynta u snem 2022 bad 2023 sha ki 91 ngut ki riewpawkhmat kiba la paw pyrthei bha ha ka liang ka lariti ha ka jingïalang pynkup burom kaba la long ha Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi.Na kane ka jylla Meghalaya, i Kong Helen Giri i la ïoh pdiang ïa ka khusnam Sangeet Natak Akademi na ka bynta u snem 2023 halor u synñiang u bynbei ba i la noh sha u sup u thiar jong ka put ka tem tynrai ha Meghalaya.La kha ïa i Kong Helen Giri ha ka 7tarik Rymphang, 1944, bad i dei ka longkmie kaba la trei shitom khlem shongthait ban kyntiew bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shad Khasi. Kum kawei na ki nongrwai bapawkhmat jong ka All India Radio, Shillong, i Kong Helen Giri i la trei shitom ruh ban pynpawnam ïa ki tiar tem tiar put u Khasi ha ka rynsan jong ka ri. Kum ka nongrwai ha kylleng ki bynta ka ri India bad shabar ka ri India, i Kong Helen Giri i la ïoh bha ïa ka jingithuh na kylleng.I Kong Helen Giri ym tang ba i ju ïashim bynta ha kiba bun ki prokram bad ki tamasa, hynrei i ju pynlong ruh ïa ki tamasa ban pynpawnam ïa ki jingrwai bad ki jingshad tynrai ha Meghalaya. Lyngba kane ka jingtrei shitom, i la pynkhie im ïa ka lariti bad ka kolshor, khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka riti ka dustur Khasi. Shuh shuh, i la shimkhia ban ithuh ïa ki Master Craftsmen kiba ju shna ïa ki tiar tem tiar put Khasi. Kane ka jingthrang jong i, ym tang kaba pynneh pynsah ïa ka jingtrei bani jong ki nongshna tiar tem hynrei ka long ruh kum ka lad aikam ïa ki briew kiba ju shna ïa kine ki tiar.I Kong Helen Giri i dei iba la ïoh pdiang ïa ka khusnam Padma Shri halor ka jingnoh synñiang sha ka lariti bad ka kolshor jong ka Meghalaya ha u snem 2008.Ha ka jingsam ïa kane ka khusnam la sakhi lang da u Myntri uba khmih ïa ka tnat Culture, Tourism bad DoNER u G. Kishan Reddy, u Myntri Khynnah ka tnat Law & Justice (Independent Charge) bad Parliamentary Affairs and Culture u Arjun Ram Meghwal, u Secretary ka Ministry of Culture u Govind Mohan, u Chairman jong ka Sangeet Natak Akademi u Dr. Sandhya Purecha bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Ïoh khusnam Sangeet Natak Academy i Kong Helen Giri na ka President ka ri

content: Shillong, Lber 7 : U President ka National People’s Party (NPP) ka Jylla bad Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong mynta ka sngi Palei ula ong ba ym don jingmyntoi ban phah ïa u kyrtong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) sha Parliament namar kan long shisha tang ka jingsepei kaba khraw bad ka daw ka long ba un ym poi shong Dorbar baroh 5 snem ba pyrshah ban kren ktien Hindi.Une u Nongïalam ka NPP ula kyntu ïa ki paidbah ka Ri-lum Khasi bad Jaintia ba kin ym ngop ha ki jingpynbiej bad jingphon jingpah ka VPP namar kine ki juh ki briew kiba pyrshah ban kren Hindi u Lat hapoh ka Assembly hynrei ki dei kine ki juh kiba kwah leit sha Parliament ha kaba kiba bun bah ki MP ki kren beit da ka ktien Hindi.Haba kren ha ka 3rd State Youth Conference jong ka National People’s Youth Front(NPYF), u Bah Prestone ula ong “Dang shen uwei u briew ula pynsngew ba lada ngi phah ïa ka VPP sha Parliament, une u MP un shu mih jyndat beit ïing Dorbar bad yn nym poi shong dorbar baroh 5 snem. Balei? Namar ka VPP kan pyrshah ha Parliament ïa baroh ki MP ba kren ktien ktien”.“Namar kata, ngi dei ban mih nangne bad pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban kyntait ban ai vote khamtam ïa u kyrtong ka VPP, uba ïeng pyrshah ïa ka jingkren ktien Hindi namar un sa mih jyndat beit na Parliament. Lada phi mih jyndat, kaei pat phin kren ha Parliament, kan shu long sepei kai lut” ula ong haba kyntu ïa ki paidbah ka Shillong Constituency ba kin kyndit thiah na ba ka por ka dang don ïa ki ban ym shah pynbiej ha kum kane ka party.Haba kren halor ka jingmih jyndat ki seng saiñ pyrthei ka Liang Pyrshah ha ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka ba dang shu dep, u Bah Prestone ula ong “Ngam dei nga uba ong ïa ka hynrei kila ïohi ïa ka kam ba ki la leh hapoh ka ïing. Ngam shym la thok hynrei ki briew ki la ïohi na ka live telecast kaba phalang ba ki dei ki khawpud. Ha ka por ba u Myntri Rangbah u ïeng ban ai jubab (ïa ka mang tyngka) bad ruh ban batai bniah shaphang ka mang tyngka, ha ka nam jong ka Rule, ki la mih jyndat lut man”.Ula antad ba lehse ki dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah kila peit ïa ka jubab u Myntri Rangbah na ki TV ba la buh hapoh ka kamra jong ka Liang Pyrshah. Hynrei ula pynpaw pat ïa ka jinglyngngoh ba tang u President ka VPP Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit uba kynnoh ba ka Sorkar ba mynta ka Meghalaya ka dei kaba dap da ki jingartatien suda, kaba mut ba u Bah Ardent u dei tang ma u, uba peit ïa ka jubab u Myntri Rangbah na TV.Haba kyntu ïa ka Liang Pyrshah ban sngew laitluid ha ka ban pan jingpynshai ïa kane, u Bah Prestone ula ong “Ka kamra u Myntri Rangbah ka dei kaba heh bad ka kamra jong nga ruh ka don marjan bad u, kumta nga kyntu ïa ki ba kin wan shakhmat namar u Myntri Rangbah u dang kloi ban ai sa kawei ka jingbatai”.Haba kam ba ka Sorkar MDA-2 ka dei kaba buh record thymmai tang ha ki 6 snem, une u President ka NPP Meghalaya ula ong “Ngi la thaw ïa ka record ba thymmai haba phai sha ka mang tyngka, ka jingkynshew pisa, bad ka roi ka par tang hapoh ka hynriew snem. Namar kata, kito kiba ïa hylla kyrkaw ha ki jaka ïew ai ba kin hylla namar ki nang tang ban kren pynheh da kaba shu kren thok bad shukor ïa ki paidbah ym ba ki kren ïa ka jingshisha”.Ha kajuh ka por, u Bah Prestone ula ong ba ka NPYF ruh ka ïeng ban shakri ïa ki paid Khasi Jaintia haba bynrap “Balei nga ong ïa kane ka long namar ki don katto katne kiba kam ba ki ieid Jaidbynriew palat ban ïa kaei kaei baroh hynrei nga ruh nga ong ba ka NPYF ruh ka dei kaba ieid Jaidbynriew palat ban ïa kiwei kiwei” ula ong.U pyntip ba ka jingïalang ba heh bha kan sa long ruh ha Adogre ha Ri-lum Garo ha ka 15 tarik Lber, ban pynbit pynbiang ïa ka jingpynkhreh jong ka party na ka bynta ka elekshon Lok Sabha.Ula kyntu ïa ki nongtrei ka party ba kin trei shitom ha ka ban pynthikna ba baroh arngut ki kyrtong ka Agatha Sangma na Tura bad Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh na Shillong-kin ïoh ïa ka jingjop ha ka elekshon.“Ngin thaw record ha kane ka kynti ba mynta ba nangne na Meghalaya ngin phah ïa arngut ki kynthei ki ban long ka sur u paidbah ka Jylla sha Parliament” ula bynrap.
title: Ym myntoi ban phah ïa ka VPP sha Parliament yn ym poi shong Dorbar baroh 5 snem ba pyrshah kren Hindi : Dy CM

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la aiti ïa ki shithi thungkam sha ki 425 ngut ki doktor ba dang shu rung kam thymmai bakynthup ïa ki Junior Specialist, ki Medical Officer bad ki Dental Surgeon kiba shakri ha ki jaka ai jingsumar bapher bapher ka Jylla.Ïa ki shithi thungkam la aiti ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Myntri ka tnat PHE u Marcuise N. Marak.Haba ai khublei ïa kine ki doktor, u Myntri Rangbah u la kyntu ïa ki ban long kiba trei shitom ïa ka kam khnang ba kin dup lah ban ai ïa ka jingshakri bapaka ïa ka imlang ka sahlang.“Ïa ka jingthungkam la pynlong da ka Sorkar ha ka lynti kaba khuid. Phi don hangne namarba phi long kiba tbit bad phi la leh bha ïa ka eksamin,” u la ong.U Myntri Rangbah haba pynshai ïa ki jingeh halor ka jingthungkam ha ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar u la ong, “ngi la pynïakhlad ïa ka jingpynrungkam da kaba thaw ïa ka Board na ka bynta ka pule puthi bad ka koit ka khiah, kaba la pynsuk ban treikam. Ha ki snem baladep, ka jingthungkam ka long kaba suki bad ki don ki khep, ka shimpor wat haduh hynriew snem. Ka rai ban thaw la ka jong ka Recruitment Board na ka bynta ka pule puthi bad ka koit ka khiah ka long ban pynstet ïa ka jingthungkam bad ban pyndap kham kloi ïa ki kam ba thylli.”Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah, u Sangma u la ong, ha kaba ïadei bad ka Percentage, la buh hakhmat eh ïa ka Koit ka Khiah kaba long 8 percent na ka mang tyngka jong ka Sorkar. “Ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka dei kaba heh tam ha ka ri, namarba ngi angnud ban pynkhlaiñ bad ban pynthymmai ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah,” u la bynrap.“Ki don ruh ki jingtynjuh kiba ap ïa ngi hakhmat, hynrei ngi hap ban ïakhun la ka long ha kano kano ka dur, ngin ïai bteng ban pynjanai ïa ka koit ka khiah ha ka jylla,” u la ong shuh shuh.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba la tei ïa ki Administrative Housing Unit ha kylleng ka jylla na ka bynta ki nongtrei jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah bad kiwei kiwei. Ka jingshna ïa ki jaka treikam wat sha ki jaka ba kyndong tam jong ka jyllaka long ba ki nongtrei Sorkar kin dup lah ban ai jingshakri lang kumjuh. “Ka Sorkar ka la shna da ka Complex ban pynsah lang ïa ki doktor, engineer, bad kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei sorkar hapoh kajuh ka tnum ing, u la ong.U Sangma u la ïathuh nalor ki District Headquarter ban sa shna ïa ki Administrative Housing Complex, yn sa shna ruh ïa kine ki ing sha ki jaka ba kyndong na ka bynta ki doktor, ki nurse bad kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei jong ka Sorkar.“Ngin ym lah ban shu pyntreikam noh mynta mynta ha baroh kawei ka jylla hynrei ka sorkar ka la kut jingmut ban sdang tei noh shen ïa ka Housing Complexe,” la ïathuh u Sanmga. U la pyntip ruh ba ha ki khyndiat snem ban sa wan, yn sa shna pynbha ïa ki PHC bad CHC kynthup ruh ïa ki Hospital.U la ïathuh ba ha ki khyndiat taïew ban sa wan, yn sa plie paidbah ïa ka Patient Management System ha ka jylla khnang ban peitngor ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ki nongpang kiba shah sumar ha ki jaka sumar bapher bapher ka jylla.“Ngi la leh ïa ka pilot project ha Ribhoi district bad ïa kane ngin sa leh ruh sha kiwei ki jylla,” la bynrap u Sangma.
title: 425 tylli ki shithi thungkam aiti u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla sha ki Doktor

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la pyllait paidbah ïa ka “Climate Adaptive Community Based Water Harvesting Project” ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Myntri ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation u Marcuise N. MarakKane ka projek kaba T. 21 crore ka long ban shna ïa ki 532 tylli ki jaka pynlang um ha ka jingheh kaba 350 hecrate ka jaka, 2500 hectare kiwei pat ki jaka bad 12500 hectare ki tyllong um.Ka jingpyntreikam ïa kane ka projek kan pynthikna ïa ka jingpahuh jong ka um ha ki shnong ki thaw bad kumjuh ruh ban sam um sha ki lyngkha ki risai. Kan pynmyntoi ïa ki 72,000 hajar ngut ki nongshong shnong, kynthup ruh ki tyllong um.Haba pynpaw ba ka jingkynshew um jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba la ai jingïaroh da ka Ministry of Jal Shakti, ka Sorkar India, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “ka Meghalaya ka dei kaba nyngkong eh ka jylla ha ka ri ban pyntreikam ha kiba bun rukom ban kynshew ïa ka um. Ka tnat PHE, ka tnat Water Resource bad ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation ki ïatreilang na ka bynta kiba bun ki projek, bad lada kheiñ kyllum lang kan kot kumba T. 8000 klur.”U la ong ba ki don bun tylli ki projek kiba la pyntreikam mynta bad kin dang don shuh shuh sa kiwei pat ki projek ki ban dang wan kiba thmu ban ïada, ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka um bad ïa ki tyllong um.U la ïathuh ba ha ka taïew ban sa wan yn sa buh mawnongrim na ka bynta ka projek sam um kaba heh ha New Shillong Township kaba kot T. 1600 klur.“Ngi la wanrah ïa kane ka projek ha kata ka rukom ba ka Shillong, New Shillong, Administrative bad ka Knowledge City kin ïoh pahuh ïa ka um na ka bynta 30-40 snem,” u la ong.Ka Phase-1 jong kane ka projek ka kynthup ïa ka jingshna ïa ki jaka pynlang um kaba kot T. 600 klur.U la ong ruh ba ha kane ka jingïalang mynta ka sngi, la ithuh ïa ki 36 tylli shnong kiba lah ban shna ïa ki jaka pynlang ïa ka um kaba kot T.7 klur ha kaba ïa ka pisa la pyllait sha kine ki shnong ban pyntreikam noh ïa kane ka projek.
title: 21 klur mang ka Sorkar ban shna 532 tylli ki jaka pynlang um bad tyllong um

content: Shillong, Lber 7 : Namar ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingrem palat ka bai klass ba la oh da ki college ha Jylla, ka Sorkar ka la rai ban thaw noh da ka Committee ka ban shong bishar ïa ka bai klass bala shim da ki college bapher bapher kiba ïoh jingïarap na ka Sorkar ne ki Govt Aided College. Kane kan long ruh wat ia ki skul ruh kumjuh, ong u myntri ka tnad pule puthi ka jylla u Rakam A Sangma.“Kane ka Committee kan shong ban bishar bha thik ba thik ïa ka jingïapher ka jingshim bai klas jong ki jaka pule bapher bapher” ong u Myntri ka Tnad Pule Puthi Rakkam A Sangma haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi Palei.“Ki lah ban don ki jingdonkam jong ki College-ïa ka jingtei building, ban pyntyllun ïa ki kam, ka song pisa sha ki kam pynroi-lada ka jingpynlut ka dei kaba shong nongrim kan bha palat hynrei lada palat, nga tharai na ka bynta ka bha ka miat ki kynnah,ka Sorkar kan hap wad ïa ka lynti ban shim rai ïa ka kam” ula ong.Ula ong ba ka don ka jingïapher bak ly bak hapdeng ka jingoh bai klas da ki college ka Sorkar lem bad ki college ba ïoh jingïarap na ka Sorkar hapoh ka Jylla.U Myntri ula ai nuksa sha ka degree course (Bachelor of Arts), ka Kiang Nongbah Goct College, Jowai ka don 98 ki santion post da ka Sorkar bad kane ka college kala shim bai klass tang T. 7460 na ka bynta ka jingpule ba lai snem katba ka St. Anthony’s College, Shillong, ka ba don haduh 101 ki sanction post da ka Sorkar, ka la shim haduh T. 69,020. Kumjuh ruh, ka Tura Govt College kaba don 86 ki sanction post da ka Sorkar, kala shim T. 15,260 na ka bynta ka jingpule degree ba lai snem ha ba ïanujor bad ka St. Mary’s College, Shillong kaba shim haduh T. 84,780 ïa kajuh ka course watla ka don 65 ki sanction post da ka Sorkar.Ka St. Edmunds’ College, Shillong ka don 70 tylli ki sanction post da ka Sorkar hynrei ka la shim haduh T. 95,720 na ka bynta ka jingpule degree ba lai snem. ïa ka BA Media Technology , ka St. Anthony’s College kala shim haduh T. 1,90,120.“Kala iapher bun shah ha ka jingshim bai klass da kine ki college, ïa kiba la ai jingïarap da ka Sorkar….Nga sngew ba ngi dei ban ïakren ïa ka dor bai klas bad shim rai” ula ong haba bynrap “Haba kut jong ka sngi, kam dei satia tang ka kam bai klas hynrei ka dei ruh ka jinglong janai. Ki lah ban don katto katne ki samla pule kiba stad kiba kwah ban rung klass ha kine ki jaka pule kiba paw hynrei tang namar ka jingrem ka bai klass, kim shym la ïohlad shuh”.Nalor kane, u Myntri ula ban jur ba ki jaka pule kim dei ban kdat noh sharud ïa ka jingthmu ba hakhmat jong ki “naba ka jingdon ki jaka pule ka long ban ai jinghikai, ka long ban saiñdur ïa ka longbriew manbriew kaba bha”.“Nga sngew ba hateng hateng ngi klet balei ba ngi ieng hangne mynta. Nga kyrpad ia baroh ki college, ngi dei ban kynmaw ia ka thong balei ngi don hangne, ngi don hangne mynta ban shakri ia ki para briew” ula bynrap.
title: Da ka Committee yn thaw ka sorkar ban bishar ïa ka jingshim bai Skul bad College

content: Shillong, Lber, 08: Watla ka dei ka samla kaba donsap ha ka kam suhjain, hynrei ka Samla Evadahun Shisha Rani kaba shong basah ha Umpling Dong Umbah, East Khasi Hills District ka don sa kawei pat ka sap iakura ha kaba ka ju leit ban kilan met manla ka janmiet ha Community Hall jong ka shnong Golflink Khliehshnong, Shillong.Ka samla Evadahun Shisha Rani kaba la pynkhreh bha ialade mynta ka kynti kan sa leit ban iashim bynta ha ka rynsan iakura MMA ka ban sa long ha nongbah Kolkalta, jong ka Jylla West Bengal kaba la tip kum ka Lastman Standing Fight Night-3 ha ka 10 tarik, Lber, 2024 ia kaba la pynlong da ka Sunayana Entertainment.Nalor ka samla Evadahun Shisha Rani ka ban mihkmat ia ka Legendary Warrior Combat Team ka ban iakhun ha ka kyrdan Straw Weight Category, kiwei pat ki rang iakura MMA ki ban sa leit iashim bynta lang ha kane ka rynsan iakura ki long u samla Feathrel Massar uba sah ha Mawlai mawdatbaki u ban iakhun ha ka Feather Weight Category bad mihkhmat na ka Legendary Warrior Combat Team, u Moderkai S. Kharpuri u ban iakhun ha ka Middle Weight, Co-Main Event u ban mihkhmat na ka Lumshyiap Sports and Cultural Club bad u rangiakura MMA uba pawnam ka jylla u Johny Nongrum u ban iakhun ia ka Main Event.Kane kan dei ruh ka sien iakura kaba khatduh eh na ka bynta u Moderkai S. Kharpuri ha kaba u la pynbna ba un shongthait noh na ka jingiakura MMA bad ka kynhun ialehkai ka jong u, kan sa leh burom ia u hadien ba la wan phai na ka jingiakhun na ka jylla West Bengal.
title: Na ka kam suhjaiñ, sha ka rynsan ïakura yn pyni sap ka Evadahun S. Rani ha Kolkata

content: Shillong, Lber 08: Ha ka jingsnohktilang bad ka pyrthei shi tyllup ban rakhe ïa ka International Women’s Day, ka tnat Social Welfare jong ka Sorkar jylla Meghalaya ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka State Hub for Empowerment of Women bad ka Meghalaya State Rural Livelihoods Society ka la rakhe ïa ka International Women’s Day ha State Convention Centre, Shillong.Ha kum kane ka sngi kynmaw burom na bynta ki kynthei na ka liang jong ka Social Welfare ka la ïoh ban pynkupburom ïa katto katne ki Kynthei kiba paw ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher, bad arngut napdeng kine ki dei kiba pawkhmat ha ki kam ïalehkai, ba kynthup ïa ka Kong Kmoin Wahlang bad ka Bonifilia Shullai.Khyndiat shaphang ka Kong Kmoin Wahlang, ka dei ka nongïakop mareh thong ba la tymmen na Shillong bad kaba la hap ruh ha ka thup kiba la tymmen tam ha India, hynrei wat hapdeng ka jinglong tymmen kam shym la khanglad satia ïa ka ban shimbynta ha ki jingïakop mareh kiba ju pynlong barabor ha Shillong.Ka Kong Kmoin Wahlang ka dei ka kmie jong 12 ngut ki khun, bad don ïa ka jingshitom ha ki bynta jong kpoh, hynrei watla kata ruh, kane kam shym la pynsangeh ïa ka ban shimbynta ha ki lympung ïakop mareh.Katba ka Samla Bonifilia Shullai, ka dei ka thei ïalehkai phutbol kaba la pynsngew sarong ym tang ïa ka jaid bynriew hynrei ïa ka jylla hi baroh kawei hadien ba ka la shah jied ha ka kynhun India na bynta ka SAFF U-16 Women’s Championship ha Nepal kaba dang ïaid mynta.Ha u snem 2022, ka la don bynta bad ka kynhun U-15 jong ka Bengaluru FC bad mih madan ruh na ka Garhwal FC ha ka Football Delhi Women’s Premier League.Ka Bonifilia ka la ïoh ruh ban thep ïa ka kol kaba nyngkong na bynta ka ri ha ka jingïalehkai kaba long pyrshah ïa ka Nepal, ha kaba ka India ka la pynbam kput haduh 10 kol ban ïoh rung sha ka final.Ka Kong Kmoin Wahlang ka la pdiang ïa ka khusnam pynkup burom na ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba la wan kum ka kongsan ha kane ka sngi ryngkat bad ka Santa Mary Shylla kum ka symbud kongsan, katba ka Bonifilia Shullai kam shym la lah ban don ryngkat namar ka don shabar bad ka kynhun India, ka ban sa ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Bangladesh ha ka final lashai ka sngi ha Nepal.
title: Shah pynkupburom i Meirad Kmoiñ bad ka Bonifilia

content: Jowai, Lber 08: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) Jowai Circle mynta ka sngi hapoh ka jingïalam u President samla Owan Paswet bad u Finance Secretary samla Lakhon Challam kila leit ban buddien ïa ka rukom ai jinghikai ïa ki khynnah skul SSA kiba don hapoh ka West Jaiñtia Hills District.Ka seng hadien bala ïoh lad ban ïakynduh bad ka District Mission Co-ordinator (DMC) ka kong Mumubai Lakiang kaba dei peit ïa ki skul SSA hapoh ka West Jaiñtia, ha ka jingïakynduh ka seng kala ïoh ban phylliew jingmut shibun eh haka jingïadei ban kyntiew ïa ka pule ka puthi hapoh ki skul SSA.Ka seng kala buh ruh ka jingkyntu ïa baroh ki skul SSA ba kin shimkhia ïa ka lynkor ai jinghikai khamtam ïa ki nonghikai kiba don ka bynta kaba khraw na ka bynta ka lawei ki khynnah skul.Ka seng ka pynpaw ka jingsngew diaw bad sngewsih ban peit ïa ka rukom hiar palat ka pule puthi katba dang mih ki snem bad ka jingduna ki khynnah skul hapoh ki karma klas kaba jur bha nalor ba duna kiba pynrung skul ïa ki khynnah ha ki skul SSA.Sa kawei kaba sngewsih ka long lada peit ki don tang katto katne ki nonghikai kiba thung da ka School Managing Committee (SMC) ha ki skul SSA kine ruh ki dang ap ïa ka kam sorkar, la pynsngew ruh ba kitei ki nonghikai ki wan hikai tang ban pyndep rukom namar wat ïa ka tulop kim ïoh satia bad kane kala buh jingeh ïa ka pule puthi hapoh ka jylla hi baroh kawei la pynsngew ka seng.Halor kane lada jia kumne shi kumne ka seng ka ong ka jingduh nong ka dei ïa ki khynnah kiba pule hapoh ki skul SSA. Na ka liang ka HITO Jowai Circle mynta ka dang buddien ïa kane ka kam khnang ban pynjanai ïa ka rukom ai jinghikai ïa kito ki khynnah kiba leit skul manla ka sngi bad kiba bun ki khynnah kiba leit pule ha ki skul SSA ki dei kiba wan na ki longïing ba duk.
title: Diaw ka HITO Jowai Circle ba hiar ka rukom ai jinghikai ïa ki khynnah skul SSA

content: Shillong, Lber 08: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, hynne ka sngi, u la buh maw nongrim ban shna ïa ka madan Futsal Playground ha Lower Mawprem, ha ka jingïadonryngkatlang u Myntri ka tnat Sports, u Bah Shakliar Warjri lem bad u Myntri ka Tourism-u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka jingïalang, na ka liang jong u MR ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, da kaba kdew ba kane ka sorkar ba mynta ka la trei shitom bha ban kyntiew ïa ki samla ka thaiñ, bad kawei na ki lad ka long lyngba ka Sports kaba long kawei na ki kabu kaba lah ban kyntiew shaphrang ïa ki samla ka jylla.“Ha kine ki khyndiat snem ba ladep ka sorkar ka la theh haduh 700 klur ban pynbit pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam jong ka sport bad kumba 300 tylli ki jingtei kiba ka sorkar ka tbmu ban pynïeng ha kaba 122 tylli ki project la ïoh ban pyndep ha kine ki lai snem,” u la ong. U la bynrap ruh ba 20 tylli ki dei ki madan ïalehkai Futsal kiba yn sa pynïoh hapoh ka jylla.Shuh shuh, u MR u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la shimkhia ban wanrah ïa ki rynsan na bynta ki samla ka thaiñ da kaba pynlong ïa ki prokram bapher bapher kum ka Skills Meghalaya, YESS Meghalaya, PRIME, CM Elevate bad kiwei kiwei.U la pynbna ruh ba ka jingthmu ban tei ïa ka Mawkhanu Sports Complex kaba la mang 350 klur kan sa nang kyntiew kham shaphrang ïa ka Sport hapoh ka jylla. “Da kaba tei ïa ka Mawkhanu Sports Complex, ka jylla kan sa lah ban pdiang bad pynlong ïa ki rynsan kiba dei jong ka national bad ruh international,” he said.U la bynrap ruh ba lyngba ka STAR Program Talent Scouting ngin ïai bteng bad kin dang shibun ki rynsan ban pynpaw bad kyntiew ïa ki nongïalehkai na bynta ka 6th Meghalaya Games ka ban long ha Jowai bad ruh na bynta ka National Games ka ban sa long ha kine ki snem ban dang ïaid.
title: Buh maw nongrim u MR ka jylla ban shna ïa ka madan Futsal ha Mawprem

content: Ka Khuid ka suba ka long kawei ka kam kaba donkam tam ha ka jingim jong ngi ki briew ha kane ka juk mynta. Ngim lah ban len ba ka jingjakhlia jong ki jaka sah, ki tyllong um bad ki rud ki kiar ha kane ka sawdong sawkun ba ngi ngi im mynta ka la nang kham shyrkhei shuh shuh ban ïa kaba ki long ha ki por ba kham mynshwa. Ka daw baroh ka mih namar ka jingnangkiew ha ka jingbunbriew, ka jingnangroi ha ka jingstad saïan (Science and Technology) ka jingnangkiew ha ka jingdon jong ki Karkhana barit bad ba heh.Na ka jingnang kiew ka jingbun briew ha ki shnong ki thaw ki nongbah bad nongrit jong ka jylla bad ka ri jong ngi, ngi sngewthuh bad ïohi shai ba ka jingjakhlia jong kine ki jaka ruh ka nangkiew. Kane ka long namar ka jingbret jong ngi ïa ki tiar ki tar kiba ngim pyndonkam shuh sha ki sawdong ki sawkun jong ngi bad ngim lah ruh ban lait na kata namar ngim don jaka ban buh ïa kine ki tiar kiba la sniew ne ki bym long shuh ban pyndonkam. Katba nangkiew ka jingbun briew katta nang kiew ka jingmih ki jakhlia jakhlaid na ki iing ki sem jong ngi, la ka long ki jakhlia ba long met (Solid waste) ne ki jakhlia ba long um (liquid waste)Ka long kaei kaei kaba thamula ban ong ba ka jingnangroi ha ka jingstad saïan ka nang pynjakhlia shuh shuh ïa ki sawdong sawkun jong ka jaka ba ngi im ngi sah ma ngi ki briew, hynrei ka long pat kaba shisha ba ka jingnangroi ha kane ka jingstad ka pynbun ïa ka jakhlia ba ki ong ka ‘Solid Waste’. Ha ka juk jong ngi mynta bun kiei kiei ki long ha kadur ba pyndonkam bad bret noh ‘use and throw’ ki bym lah shuh ban pyndonkam pat ‘reuse, ne recycle’. Ki plastik ba ngi pyndonkam ha kaba ngi thep ïa ki tiar ba thied na iew, ki kynja plastik ha ki tiar ki tar ba ngi ju pyndonkam man ka sngi kum, ki mobile, TV, ki kali, tiar iing, bad kiwei kiwei, la jan baroh la pyndonkam da ki kynja plastik. Kine ynda ki la sniew ngi shu bret kumto khlem lah ban pyndonkam pat ïa ki, ki pynlang ïa ka jakhlia ha ki sawdong sawkun jong ngi.Ka jingmih jong ki karkhana barit bad ba khraw ruh ka long kawei ka daw kaba pynsniew ïa ka mariang ba ngi ngi im ngi shong ngi sah, la ha ka lyer, ka um, ne ha ka jakhlia ba long met (solid waste). Kine ki karkhana ki pynmih ïa ka lyer kaba jakhlia sha ka mariang kaba ktah bha ïa ka jingim jong ki briew, ki pynmih ïa ki um ba jakhlia ban tuid sha ki wah ba itynnad jong ngi ban pynjakhlia bad pynïap ïa ki doh um doh wah ha ki wah jong ngi kumjuh ruh ka pynmih ïa ki jakhlia (solid waste) sha ki sawdong sawkun jong ka jaka ba ki don ban pyn isait met ïa ka Mariang.Haba phai sha ki jaka nongkyndong ngi lap bad ïohi ba ka jingjakhlia ha ki shnong ki thaw ka ka kham duna ban ïa nujor bad ki jakhlia ha ki jaka sor, kane ka long namar ka jingduna ha ka jingdon briew ha ki nongkyndong. Ha ki jaka nongkyndong ka jingeh kaba hakhmat ba ki mad ka long ka jingbym biang ki painkhana ban leit bar katba ha ki jaka sor pat ka jingeh ka long ban bret ïa ki jakhlia. Ym lah ban tip la ka jingbym biang ka painkhana ha ki nongkyndong kan kham sniew mo ïa ka jingjakhlia jong ki ‘solid waste’ ha ki jaka sor? Lada ngi ïaid ha ki jaka sor khamtam ha ki jaka ba lum ïa ki jakhlia ngi ju ïa set noh ïa ki khmut jong ngi namar ka jingsma kaba shyrkhei ka mih na kato ka jaka ba lum ïa ki jakhlia. Haba peit ikumba ka jingma ïa ka koit ka khiah ba mih na ka jingpynlang ïa ki jakhlia ha ki jaka sor ka kham sniew bun shah ïa ka jingbym biang ki painkhana ha ki nongkyndong.Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewsih ba katba ki briew kila nangkiew ha ka jingnang jingstad pynban ngi lap ba ka jingkiew ha ka jingjakhlia ruh ka kham shyrkhei katba nang mih ki sngi. Kane ka jingkiew ha ka jingjakhlia ha ki sawdong sawkun jong ngi ka la pynlong wat ïa ka sorkar India ban kyndit bynriew na ka jingma ba lah ban mih. U Prime Minister jong ka Ri u la pynmih ïa kawei ka thong (Mission) kaba u la khot kyrteng ka ‘Swaach Bharat Mission’. Ka thong jong U Prime Minister jong ka ri ka long ban pynlong ïa ka ri India jong ngi ka ri kaba khuid kaba suba.La ïohi bad ïohsngew ruh ha man ki shnong khamtam ki nongkyndong ka don ka jingkhih khohreh ban pynlong ïa ki shnong jong ki kita ki shnong kiba la biang lut ki jaka leit bar. Ka long ka thong kaba donkam tam kaba kawei pa kawei ka longiing kadei ban don ïa ki jaka leit bar kiba biang khnang ban lait na ki jingma kiba ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah. Hapdeng ka jingpyrshang bad jingtrei shitom jong ki paid nongshong shnong jong ka Jylla ka sorkar ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang jong ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka la dei ban nang ai mynsiem shuh shuh bad khmih bniah khnang ba kane ka jingthmu kan urlong bad kan pynlong ïa ka jylla jong ngi ka Jylla kaba la biang lut ki jaka leitbar.Ka la dei eh ka por ba ka sorkar ha ryngkat ki Nongsynshar Shnong, ki Sengtrei mon sgnewbha kin saindur kumno ban pynlong ïa ki shnong jong ngi kiba khuid kiba suba. Dei ban don la ka jingthmu kaba biang kumno ban pynïaid (manage) ïa kine ki jakhlia kiba mih na ki iing ki sem, ki skul, ki kolej, ki ophis, ki iew ki hat, ki karkhana bad kiwei kiwei de ki jaka. La ïoh jingtip ruh ba ka sorkar ka la thmu ban buh (set up) ïa kita ki jaka pynïaid ïa ki jakhlia (Centre for management of Solid and liquid Waste), la dei ban pynsted ïa kane ka kam khnang ba ka jingjakhlia jong ki shnong ki thaw ki iew ki hat jong ngi kin ym don shuh. Ka sorkar ka la dei ruh ban leit bishar bniah ïa ki Karkhana kiba don ha ka jylla jong ngi bad bthah ïa ki ba kidei ban pynïaid (manage) ïa ki jakhlia ba mih na ki karkhana jong ki ha kata ka rukom ba kim dei ban pynjakhlia wat tang khyndiat ruh ïa ka Mariang, la ïa ka lyer, ka um ne ka khyndew.Ka khuid ka suba ka dei ka jingkit khlieh jong uwei pa kawei ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong ka thaw ka jylla hi baroh kawei. Ka la dei ka por ban pynngam jylliew ïa ka jingkitkhlieh jong ngi iwei pa iwei ïa kane ka kam khnang ba ngin ym long shuh ki briew kiba hun ban ïohi ïa ka jingjakhlia, ne kiba sngewtynnad ban bret pathar ïa ki jakhlia jakhlait ha ki sawdong sawkun jong ngi.
title: Nang roi ka jingstad, nang jur ka jingjakhlia

content: Khliehriat Lber 8: Ka tnat treikam jong ka Meghalaya State Rural Livelihood Society(MSRLS), NRLM, East Jaiñtia Hills District, mynta ka sngi ha ryngkat lang bad ka pyrthei baroh kawei ka la rakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang jong ki kynthei, ïa ka prokram la pynlong ka Khliehriat West Community Hall ha kaba u Deputy Commissioner, East Jaiñtia Hills District, u A. Baranwal, IAS, u la long kum u kongsan.Haba kren kum u kongsan, u Deputy Commissioner u la ai ka jingiaroh ïa ka jingnoh syniang ba radbah jong ki kynthei ka ba wanrah ïa ka roi ka kiew ha ka im lang ka sah lang bad kiba la ju shim ruh ïa ka bynta kaba hakhmat ha ka District Mission Management Unit (DDMU) ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ki kynthei ha kaba iadei bad ka kamai ka kajih, u la bynrap ruh ba ki kynthei ki dei kiba ju don ka jingkitkhlieh kum ki dkhot ha ka im lang ka sah lang ban rat dyngkhong ïa ka jingduk bad ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka ioh ka kot ha ki longïing longsem kata lyngba ki shlem treikam jong ki kum ki Self Help Group (SHG).U kongsan, u la ban jur halor ka phang kaba iadei bad ka jingpynkup bor ïa ki kynthei ha ka thoh ka pule khamtam eh na ka bynta kito ki kynthei ki bym nang ban thoh ban pule.U Additional Deputy Commissioner, uba dei ruh u Project Director jong ka District Rural Development Agency, (DRDA), East Jaiñtia Hills District, u bah G. Warjri, MCS u la ong ba ka tnat ka la pynlong ïa kum kane ka prokram ba kyrpang khnang ban dup tip bad sngewthuh ïa ka jingnoh syniang ki kynthei ha kaba kyntiew lem ïa ka im lang ka sah lang ha kajuh ka por, u kyntu ïa ki kynthei ba kin mih shakhmat ban noh syniang shuh shuh sa ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ.Ha kane ka prokram la ioh ruh ïa ka jingrwai kyrpang na ka kynhun Ïainehskhem VO, Khliehriat West, la pyni ruh lyngba ka screen ïa kawei ka video kaba iadei bad ki kam jong ka MSRLS, ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.
title: La rakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang jong ki kynthei ha Khliehriat

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 08 : Ka Dorbar Shnong Nonglang, South West Khasi Hills District ka don ban pynshai khyndiat halor ka khubor kaba la mih ha u ‘Highland Post’ ha ka 05 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024, kaba ong, “ba ka top um ba la dep plie da u Myntri ka tnad umbam umdih jong ka Jylla, u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, kam pat trei kam.Shuh shuh kum ka Dorbar Shnong ka kwah ruh ban pynshai sha ki paidbah baroh ba katei ka top kaba don ha kawei na ki kyntoit lane dong jong ka shnong (Me-ïa-wan) ka lah treikam bad la ïa pyndonkam hi man ka por ïa ka um na katei ka top kaba dei ruh ka main supply ïa kiba bun tylli ki top barit bad bun ruh ki thliew ïing lah palat spah.Hooid! ka dang don hi pat ka jingduna hangne hangtei khyndiat khynsoit namar ba ka dang don ka jingïapynbeit lang na ka liang ka ophis u Executive Engineer ka P.H.E jong ka Mawkyrwat Division ryngkat ka shnong ïa ki kam kiba dang sah, ong u Myntri.Namarkata, na ka liang ka shnong ka kwah ban ong, lane bthah ïa kino kino ki briew napoh shnong lane ki nongshong shnong ba sngewbha lada ki don ei ei lane kynthoh ïa kino kino ki kam hapoh ka shnong, ba kin da ïa kynduh lane pyntip shwa ha ki nongkitkam shnong lane dong na ka bynta ka jingbhalang ka shnong ka thaw.Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh khubor na u bah Firsterlin Kharraswai, Myntri Shnong Nonglang.
title: Ka jingpynshai na ka DS Nonglang halor ka khubor ba ïa dei bad ka umbam umdih

content: Jowai, Lber 08: Ka ophis jong ka District Medical Health Officer West Jaiñtia Hills Diatrict, mynta ka sngi Thohdieng 8 tarik u Lber, 2024 kala plie paidbah ïa ka jaka ai sumar kaba la tip kum ka Loomkyrwiang Urban Primary Health Center, Jowai.Ïa kane ka jaka sumar la wan ban plie da ka myntri ka koit ka khiah jong ka jylla ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh, haka jingdonlang u MLA ka Jowai ma Wailadmiki Shylla, u Deputy Commissioner uba dei ruh u Chairman District Health Society ka WJHD bah B.S. Sohliya, ka DM&HO Dr. E.B.V Laloo, u President ka Kur Sookpoh Khadar Wyrnai uba dei ruh u Dolloi ka Elaka Jowai ma Puramon Kynjing, ki nongtrei jong ka UPHC nalor kiwei kiwei de.La ïathuh ba kane ka Loomkyrwiang Urban Primary Health Center kala sdang treikam ban ai jingshakri ïa ki paidbah naduh u snem 2020, hynrei mynta ka sngi la wan ban plie paidbah ïa u Mawnongrim jong kane ka jaka ai jingsumar ba pura da ka myntri bad ka ïa katei ka jaka la ai sngewbha da ka Kur SookpohKa jingdon jong kane ka Urban Primary Health Center kala ïarap shibuh eh ïa ki paidbah kiba donkam ban leit shim dawai naduh ki khyllung khynnah, ki longkmie, ki longkpa bad ki samla kane ka Center ka lah ruh ban ai jingshakri ïa ki 12 tylli ki dong hajan ka sor Jowai.Ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh kum ka myntri ha ka jingkren kala ong kane ka dei ka sngi ba kyrpang kum ka nongmihkhmat kynthei ban ïoh plie ïa kane ka jaka sumar, haka juh ka por ka pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa kane ka sorkar MDA 2.0 kaba la ibit ban bynshet haka ïa kane ka kam kum ka myntri jong ka koit ka khiah.Kane ka jaka ai sumar ka long kaba donkam eh ha ka imlang ka sahlang na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah la ong ka kong Ampareen, da kaba ong ka jingtreikam kloi jong kane ka UPHC ka dei lyngba ka jingtrei shitom jong u MLA ka Jowai, kala kyntu kynjuh ïa u ban buddien ban thung ïa u MO ba pura jong ka Center.Kala ong ka jingdon jong ka Center kan ai jingsumar kyrpang ïa ki longkmie haka kha ka pun, kan ïarap ïa ki longkmie ba kin don ha ka koit ka khiah, kumjuh ka ïarap ïa ka jingkoit jong ki khynnah bad ki khun samla ha ki liang baroh.Kala buh ka jingkyntu ïa baroh ban long kiba ïatreilang haka imlang ka sahlang lyngba kane ka Center kan ïarap kynjuh ïa kiba pang HIV bad ban rat diengkhong ïa u Drug uba la kynrei mynta ki sngi. Kala ong ba ka sorkar mynta kala mang pisa khambuh ha kaba ïadei bad ka koit ka khiah bad kyrmen ba kane kan treikam pura hapoh ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Na ka liang u MLA ma Wailadmiki Shylla ula ong hadien ba ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kala shimti kum ka myntri ka koit ka khiah ka District kala ïoh sa ar tylli ki Urban Primary Health Center kata ha Ïawmusiang bad ha Mihmyntdu nalor kaba la don lypa sa kawei ha Ladthadlaboh.Hynrei dei tang kane ka Loomkyrwiang Urban Primary Health Center kaba don ïa ka ïing ba pura (Permanent) hapoh ka jylla hi baroh kawei. Shuh shuh ula ong ba kane ka Center kala ai jingsumar haduh 22 hajar ngut.Ula pyntip ka sorkar kan ïaleh ban pynbha shuh shuh ïa kane ka Center namar wat na ka liang ka sorkar kala ju mang pisa haduh 11 hajar klur ha u snem 2018 hynrei mynta u snem kala poi sha ka 27 hajar klur tyngka.
title: Plie ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ïa ka Loomkyrwiang Urban PHC, kumba 22 hajar ngut kin myntoi

content: Nongpoh, Lber 08: Ka kynhun jong ka Surya Kiran Aerobatic Team jong ka Indian Air Force mynta ka sngi kala pyni nam ïaki liengsuiñ ïapom ha pung Umiam bala wan ruh ban sakhi da ki spah ngut ki paidbah ban iohi ïaka sap bad ka jingtbit jong ki shipai ñiah liengsuiñ ka ri, kaba dei ruh shibynta ka jingrakhe ïaka sngi kyrpang jong ki kynthei ne ka International Women’s Day.Ha katei ka sngi ka jingpyninam ïaki liengsuiñ ïapom ka Indian Air Force la wan ruh ban sakhi da u Phagu Chauhan u lat ka jylla, u Conrad Sangma Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ryngkat ki heh shipai jong ka Indian Air Force.Lyngba katei ka sngi ki shipai suiñ jong ka Ri kila pyni ïala ka jong ka sap ka phong da kaba dro dur ha suiñbneng kaba shai bad itynnad jong ka pung Umiam da ki liengsuiñ bala tip kum ka Cheetah Helicopter, SU-30 MKI Rafale bad Hawks bala pynshoh biej ïakiba bun ki paidbah khamtam ka jingdro ïa u dohnud ha suiñbneng kum ka jinglehkmen ïaka sngi kyrpang ki longkmie kiba la don bynta ruh bun ngut bad ka Indian Air Force.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi naka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ban sakhi haka sien ba nyngkong da la ki jong ki khmat ïaka sap jong ki shipai suiñ bad kane ka pyni ïaka jingtriem ka jong ki kaba long ka jingsarong ïaki paidbah ka ri hi baroh kawei ban long kum ki nongïada ïaka ri.U la ong ruh lyngba ka jingpyni nam jong ki shipai ha katei ka sngi kan long ruh ka jingai mynsiem ïa kiba bun ki khun samla ban khring sha ka kam shipai Indian Air Force, ban long ki nongïada jong ka ri na suiñ.Kawei naki longkmie bala tip kyrteng kum ka Kanwal Sandhu kaba dei ruh ka Flight Lieutenant jong ka Indian Air Force kala ong ba kane ka dei ka sngi kyrpang jong ki longkmie bad kaba kyrpang ïaka hadien ba ka phong ïaka uniform ka long ba phin nym iohi shuh ïaka dur kynthei ne shynrang hynrei la iohi ïaki kum ki shipai da kaba ai mynsiem ruh ïaki paidbah khamtam ki khun samla ba kin pynïasoh ïalade bad ka Indian Air Force bad ai khublei ruh ïa baroh ki longkmie ïaka sngi kyrpang jong ki kaba suk bad kaba kmen.
title: Pyni nam ki shipai ïa ki liengsuiñ ïapom ha pung Umïam ha ka sngi kyrpang ki longkmie

content: Shillong, Lber, 08: Ki shnong katto katne tylli kiba don hapoh ka Nongbah Shillong ki la pynpaw ïa ka jinglyngngoh bad bitar ruh ha kajuh ka por ïa ka jingbym mih um na ki kor ïing bad kumjuh ruh ki kor sorkar ri ha ka step sngi Thohdieng.Kane ka jingbym sam um kynsan jong ka tnat PHE khlem da la ai ki jingpynbna paidbah ka la pynlong ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba lah dep ban buh pali ne ban pynïeng laiñ ïa la ki jong ki borti ne ki tiar rah um ha ki kor sorkar ri.Kane ka jingsdang ban duna ka jingsam um sha katto katne ki shnong ka Nongbah Shillong ka la wanrah ka jingeh kaba khraw bha ïa ki nongshong shnong.Napdeng ki katto katne ki nongshong shnong haba ïakren ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew lyngngoh kaba jur naba kane ka jingmih um ka la ktah namarba ki khlem da la ïoh ban pynlang lypa ïa ka um naba kam shym la don ka jingpynbna ha ki lad pathai khubor halor kane ka jingpynduh um kaba kynsan.Napdeng katto katne ki nongshong shnong haba kren biria ki la ong, “Imat kane ka jingpynduh um kynsan ka lah ban dei ba ki nongtrei ka PHE ki la shem jingeh na kadaw jong ka jingpyrkhing ka rukom pynïaid ïa ki kali sha Mawphlang na ka daw ba ka don ka Monolith Festival,” kren biria katto katne ki nongshong shnong.Watla ka sorkar jylla ha ka dorbar mang tyngka kaba dang shudep na ka liang u Myntri ka tnat PHE u la kam ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la long hakhmat eh na kiwei ki jylla kiba la lah ban pyntreikam bha ïa ka skhim ka sorkar Pdeng ka Jal Jeevan Mission hynrei da peit ïa ka jingtlot ka jingtrei kam ka tnat PHE haba ïadei bad ki rukom sam um ka la long da khongpong namar tang ïa ki shnong ha Nongbah Shillong ym pat lah ban sam um thikna kumno yn lah ban ngeit ba katei ka skhim ka la lah ban pynpoi um sha manla ki thliew ïing lyngba ki kor um ha ki Ïing jong ka skhim JJM.
title: Bitar ki nongshong shnong ba kynnoh pynduh um kynsan ka PHE

content: Shillong, Lber 08 : U Lamphang ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla, Thomas A Sangma ha ka sngi Thohdien gu la leit ban jurip ïa ka jingpyntrei ia ka Ïing Dorbar ba thymmai ha Mawdiangdiang bad ha kajuh ka por u la lum ruh ia ka jingialang buddien halor katei ka jingtei.Ha ka jingïalang la donlang ruh naduh u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, Conrad K Sangma, nangta ki Symbud Myntri Rangbah, Bah Prestone Tynsong bad Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, Myntri ka tnad Bording AT Mondal bad Myntri ka tnad PHE, Marcuise N Marak bad ki ophisar na ki tnad bapher bapher bad ruh ki kontraktor.Na ka liang u Lamphang haba kren hadien ba la dep jurip bad shong ïa ka jingïalang buddien u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewhun ha ka jingïaid jong ka kam.U pynpaw ruh ba ka thong ka long ban pyndep ïa katei ka jingtei ha ka por kaba biang khnang ba yn lah ban pynlong noh ïa ka Dorbar ha katei ka Ïing kaba thymmai.Tangba u ong pat ba kaba kham kong san ka long ban trei sani khnang ba ka jingtrei kan long kaba skhem khlem da ïa peiñ bad ka jingshngaiñ.U ong ruh ba watla ki beh ïa ka thong ban pyndep ha ka por kaba la buh hynrei kam don pat ka jingpynbor ïa u kontraktor bad kito kiba don bynta ha ka kam ban pynher ïa ka jingpyntreikam da kaba klet noh ïa ka jingshngaiñ.Haba jubab halor ka jingkylli, u Lamphang u laong ruh ba u Myntri Rangbah kumjuh ki Symbud Myntri Rangbah ki la pynpaw lang ka jingsngewhun haba ïadei bad ka jingïaid jong ka kam.Na ka liang u Lamphang u la pyntip ruh ba ïa ki tiar ba donkam na ka bynta ka main central hall la dep ban ioh bad kumta ki khmih lynti ba ka jingpyntrei kan long kaba ïaid beit.
title: Buddien u Lamphang bad u CM halor ka jingpyntrei ïa ka Ïingdorbar thymmai ha NST

content: Shillong, Lber, 08: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ong ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla um don iktiar satia ban ai Sanad Rangbah Shnong ïano ïano ruh.Kane ka jingkynthoh jong ka KHNAM ka long halor ka jingïakynduh jong ka All Ribhoi Garo Headmen Association ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ban dawa ïa ka kam Rangbah Shnong.“Kum ban pyntip hangne ba u Myntri Rangbah um don satia ïa ka itkiar ban ai Sanad Rangbah Shnong ïano ïano ruh, namarba ka dei ka kamram jong ka Hima Mylliem bad ka KHADC. Dei pynsngew sha ka KHADC,” KHNAM ong u working president ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah ha u kyrwoh.“Namarkata, ngi kwah ban pynpaw ba kum kine ki jingdwa kin ktah ïa ka long jingman ka jaka bad ban kiar na kino kino ki jingtakhuh hapdeng ki jaidbynriew ha ki por ban sa wan, kum kine ki jingdawa ym dei satia ban pynsngap,” u la bynrap.U Bah Passah shuh shuh u la pynkynmaw ïa ka KHADC ba ka The Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Appointment and Succession of Syiem, Deputy Syiem, Electors and Rangbah Shnong of Mylliem Syiemship) Act 2007, Section 2 Sub Section (o) ka la kren shai ba ïa u Rangbah Shnong dei ban jied tang na ki jaidbynriew Khasi, bad ki bor ba dei peit ki dei ban bud ryntih ïa ki kyndon jong ka aiñ kiba la don lypa bad ban kiar mardor ban shu pynsngewbha ïa kine ki jingdawa.
title: U CM um don iktiar ban ai Sanad Rangbah Shnong ïano ïano ruh: KHNAM

content: Shillong, Lber 08 : Ka All India Congress Committee (AICC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynskhem ïa ka kyrteng jong u Bah Vincent H Pala bad Saleng A Sangma kum ki kyrtong MP jong ka Congress na Shillong bad Tura na bynta kane ka elekshon MP kaban sa long shen.Ha katei ka thup kyrteng ba pyllait da u General Secretary ka AICC, Central Election Committee, KC Venugoal ki la don 39 ngut ki kyrtong ba la mynjur da ka AICC kynthup lang ïa u Bah Pala bad u Saleng.Kitei ki kyrtong ki kynthup ïa ki 6 ngut na Chattisgarh, 6ngut na Karnataka, 16ngut na Kerala, 1 na Lakshwadeep, 1 na Nagaland, 1 na Sikkim, 1 na Tripura bad 4 na Telangana.Lah ban kdew hangne ba u Bah Pala u la dei lypa u MLA ba la jop bunsien kum u MP na Shillong katba u Saleng pat u dei u MLA ba la jop bunsien na Gambegre constituency.
title: Pynskhem ka AICC ïa kyrteng u Bah Pala bad Saleng

content: Shillong, Lber, 08: Ka Ratriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK) National Health Misssion (NHM) ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynbna paidbah ïa ka National Birth Defect Awareness Month March 2024 ha Ganesh Das Government Maternal and Child Health Hospital, Shillong kum shi bynta ban pynshai sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingai jingsumar ei ïa ki khunlung kiba dang kha bad ïa ki khynnah kiba kynjoh ïa ka rta kaba 18 snem kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet.Ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah la batai bad ai jingpynshai da ka Dr. (Mrs) Susildaris Longtrai kaba dei ka Paediatrician, DEIC bad na u State RBSK Consultant, NHM, Meghalaya u Bah Johnson J. Nongbet.Ha kane ka jingïalang, la sakhi lang da ka Addl. Superintendent jong ka Ganesh Das Government Maternal and Child Health Hospital, Shillong Dr. (Mrs) M. Syiemlieh, ka Social Worker, DEIC, East Khasi Hills ka Kong Euniky Lyngdoh, ka Director of Health Services (Maternal and Child Health & Family Welfare) cum Joint Mission Director NHM, Meghalaya ka Dr. (Mrs) F. Kharshiing bad kiwei kiwei.Katkum ka jingai jingkheiñ jong ka RBSK, NHM, Meghalaya, ki khunlung ba dang shu kha kiba don ïa ki jingduna ha ki dkhotmet naduh u snem 2014 haduh u Rymphang, 2024 ki long 1916 ngut ki shynrang, 2191 ngut ki kynthei.Kino kino ki kmie ki kpa kiba don ïa ki khun kiba la kha hapdeng ki jingduna ki dkhotmet ki lah ban leit sha ki jaka ai jingsumar kiba don ha ki shnong jong ki bad nangne yn sa phah ïa ki sha Ganesh Das Govt. MCH Hospital ka ban sa pyntip kumno ban ai jingsumar ïa ki khun jong ki.
title: Yn ai jingsumar ei ka RBSK, NHM ïa ki khunlung, khynnah kiba duna dkhotmet

content: Shillong, Lber, 8: Ryngkat lang bad ka pyrthei baroh kawei, ka tnat Social Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla ka la ïashim bynta ban rakhe kyrpang ïa kane ka sngi da ka jingïatreilang bad ka State Hub for Empowerment of Women bad ka Meghalaya State Rural Livelihoods Society ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong.Ha kane ka sngi, ka tnat Social Welfare ka la pynkup burom ïa ki longkmie kiba don ïa ki sap kyrpang ha ka jingim jong ki.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. M Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba kane ka sngi ka dei rakhe namarba ngi la kynjoh ha ki thong bapher bapher ha ka jingim.“Ngi donkam ban rakhe lang kawei, ki longkmie ruh ha la ki ing ki sem, ki khynnah kynthei ruh ki rakhe ïa kane ka sngi kaba kyrpang namarba ka Sorkar baroh kawei ka ri India ryngkat bad ka phang pdeng jong kane ka sngi,” la ong ka Dr. Ampareen.Ka la ong shuh shuh ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la mang pisa shibun bha na ka bynta ki kynthei kaba kot T. 5271 klur.Ka la bynrap ba ngi hap ban pynthikna ba ki kynthei ki dei ban ïohlad ban ïashim bynta ha ki lad kamai jakpoh, ngi kyrmen ba ngin pynkhlain ïa ka ïoh ka kot kum ki longkmie bad ban pynskhem ïa u païa jong ka ing ka sem. Lyngba ki kynhun ïatreilang ngin sa lah ban ïohi ïa ka jingïaid shaphrang jong ki kynthei ha ki liang bapher bapher.“Ka Sorkar kan sa bei jingïarap 18% na ki 5 hajar tylli ki jaka ai jingsumar ïa ki kynthei,” ka la bynrap. Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la pynkhlaiñ ïa ki kynhun ïatreilang kiba trei tang da ki kynthei bad da ka lynti yn sa lah ban kyrshan jingïarap ïa kine ki kynhun ba kin nang kiew shaphrang.Ha kane ka sngi, la ïadon lang ka Chairperson jong ka Handicraft and Handloom ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla, u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Social Welfare u Pravin Bakshi bad kiwei kiwei.La sam ruh ïa ki khusnam sha ki kynthei kiba la pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki sap ki phong jong ki, ba kynthup ïa ka Nambi Jessica Marak (kaba long ka nongshet jingshet), ka Kong Kmoiñ Wahlang ka nongmareh marathon, ka Kong Bonifilia Shullai (nongïalehkai sports), ka Kong Sidalin Marbaniang (ka nongsengkam), ka Kong Ratna Rai bad ka Kong Pdiangsngewbha Pohti (ki nongseng ïa ki kynhun ïatreilang.La sam ruh ruh ïa ki kor suhjaiñ sha ki kynthei da ka tnat Superintendent of Training for Women in Need of Care & Protection, Social Welfare Department.
title: Ïoh burom ki longkmie kiba paw ha ki sap ha ka International Women’s Day

content: Shillong, Lber, 08: Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Meghalaya State Unit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pdiang burom ïa u MLA barim ka All India Trinamool Congress na Salmanpara u Winnerson D. Sangma uba pyntip ruh ba shen ki Sitting MLA jong ka TMC ruh kin sa pynïasoh sha ka BJP.Ïa u Winnerson la pdiang burom sha ka BJP da u State President u Rikman G Momin ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki arngut ki MLA – u Bah AL Hek bad u Bah Sanbor Shullai, u Chief Spokesperson Bah M. Kharkrang bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam.Haba pynpaw ka BJP ka la jop lypa ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong bad Tura, u Bah AL Hek u la ong, “kiwei kiwei ki MLA barim lane ki Sitting MLA shen kin sa wan ban pynïasoh bad ka BJP bad ngi shu ap sa tang ïa ka por bad ha ki khyndiat sngi, ma ki ruh kin sa wan.”Haba kylli, katno ngut ki MLAka TMC ki ban pynïasoh sha ka BJP, u Bah Hek u la ong, “katno ngut kin wan, sa shu ap bad shu peit.”U Bah Sanbor Shullai haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli, u la ong ba ka BJP ka long kaba la khreh ban siang Carpet saw ïa u nongïalam ka TMC u Dr. Mukul Sangma, uba long ruh u Myntri Rangbah barim ka Jylla.Shwa kane, haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Winnerson u la ong ba um lah satia ban kren eiei ha ka kyrteng jong u Dr Mukul Sangma.“Ïa ka rai jong u (Mukul) ngam lah ban kren eiei bad kata ka shong ha u (la u wan pynïasoh ne um wan). Ka dei ka rai jong u shimet lada u wan sha ka BJP ban shakri ïa ki paidbah.Une u ophisar MCS barim u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong u haba u pynïasoh bad ka BJP ka long ban ai jingshakri kaba kham bha shuh shuh sha ki paidbah.“Nga la don ha ka jylli saiñpyrthei naduh u snem 2023. Nga la mihkhmat ïa ka Salmanpara Constituency la jan 10 snem naduh u snem 2013 haduh u 2023 hynrei ngam la rem noh ha ka elekshon baladep. Hynrei nga dang don beit ha ka saiñpyrthei. Nga kwah ban shakri ïa ki paidbah, ïa ka jylla bad ïa ka ri. Nga sngewthuh ba dei tang ka BJP ka rynsan kaba lah ban shakri kham bha ïa ki paidbah ha ki jylla bad ha ka ri.U Winnerson u la kam ruh ba kin dang don sa kiwei pat kin ban dang pynïasoh sha ka BJP ha ki khyndiat sngi ban sa wan.
title: Pynïasoh BJP u MLA barim ka TMC na Salmanpara

content: Shillong, Lber 08 : Ka Expert Committee ban khmih bniah halor ka Reservation Policy lane ka bhah thungkam thungjam ha ka jylla ka la shong ïa ka jingïalang kaba nyngkong eh markhmat bad ki heh sorkar jong ka jylla hynne ka sngi Thohdieng.Ïa kane ka jingïalang la pynlong hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Justice (Retired) Mool Chand Garg. Kumban shu kdew hangne ïa ka Expert Committee la thawe da ka sorkar jylla ha ka 12tarik Nailur, 2023 ban khmih bniah halor ka bthah thungkam thungjam.Shwa kane, ka committee ka la don bun tylli ki jingïalang online bad ka jingïalang ha kane ka sngi kadei kaba nyngkong ban kynduh markhmat, ong ka kyrwoh.Ha kane ka sngi, u Chairman bad ki dkhot ki la leit ruh sha ka ophis treikam jong ka Expert Committee kaba don ha ophis treikam jong u Assistant Commissioner of Food Safety, Lachumiere, Shillong. Ki dkhot ka Committee ki la shong ruh ïa ka jingïalang ha kaba ki la ïa kren katto katne ki bynta kiba dei na ka bynta ki sienjam ban ïaid shakhmat ïa ka kam.Katkum ka kyrwoh, la ong ba ka jingïalang kaba bud jong ka Committee kan long biang ha u Ïaiong mynta u snem.
title: Ïakynduh ka Expert Committee halor ka State Reservation Policy

content: Shillong, Lber, 08: Ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la pynjynsur ïa ki sngi set along sha ka 10 snem ïa uwei u briew uba la shah rai pynrem halor ka jingdonkti ban leh be-ijot ïa iwei i heprit kynthei ba dang 5 snem ka rta.Ïa u Rajingstar Thabah la kem halor ka jingujor da ka kmie jong ine i heprit sha ki Pulit ka Sohiong Police Outpost ha ka 3 tarik u Naiwieng, 2017.U Special Judge (POCSO), Shillong u la pynmih ïa ka rai bishar ha ka 11 tarik, Naitung, 2022, kaba rai set along shi jingim na ka bynta 18 snem bad phah siew ïa ka kuna kaba T. 20,000 hajar bad lada um lah ban siew ïa ka kuna un hap ban shong along sa lai bnai. Ïa ka pisa ba la daiñ kuna la bthah ban siew sha i lanot.Ha ka rai bishar ba la pynmih ha ka 7 tarik Lber, haba shong bishar ïa ka Criminal Appeal, ka Division Bench kaba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice S Vaidyanathan bad u Justice W Diengdoh ka la ong, “halor kane, ïa ka Criminal Appeal la shah ha kane ka bynta bad ïa ka rai pynrem bad ban set along la pynmih da ka Ingbishar ha ka 08.07.2022 bad ka hukum ban set along la pynmih ha ka 11.07.2022, ba la pynmih da u Special Judge (POCSO), Shillong ha ka Special POCSO Case No.5 of 2018 la pynkylla ha kaba u nongshah mudui un shong along na ka bynta shiphew snem bad siew ïa ka kuna kaba T. .20,000 bad lada um siew ïa ka kuna un hap ban shong along sa lai bnai. Kumba la hukum da ka Trial Court, ïa ka kuna dei ban siew sha ka lanot, lada ym pat siew.”
title: Sha ka 10 snem pynjynsur ka Ingbishar ïa ki sngi set along ïa uba leh be-ijot

content: Shillong, Lber 08 : U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la buh mawnongrim na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka Mawlyndep Hospitality Complex ha ka shnong Mawlyndep ha ka jingmang kaba kot sha ka 29 klur tyngka.Ha kane ka sngi la donlang ruh u Myntri ka tnad Tourism, Bah Paul Lyngdoh kumjuh u MP ka Rajya Sabha, Dr. WR Kharlukhi nalor kiwei kiwei.Ïa katei ka projek kaba la mang lyngba ka New Development Bank, yn tei ha ka jaka kaba ïar haduh 10 akar ei ei.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la pynshai ruh halor ka jingsngewthuh bakla kaba ïadei bad ka jingshim ram jong ka sorkar khamtam na ki bank bapher bapher na shabar ri.“Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la shim ïa ka jingkyrshan pisa na shabr hynrei kane pat ka wan lyngba ka sorkar India kaba la pynduna ha ka dor kaba 72 persen,” u la ong.U ong ruh ba ka Meghalaya kadei kaba ioh bun bha ki jingmyntoi na ki projek kiba kyrshan na shabar ri ki ba la kot sha ka 7500 klur ba wan lyngba ka sorkar pdeng. Nalorkata, u ong ruh ba ka sorkar jylla ka buh thong ban pynlut haduh 4000 klur tyngka ha ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha ki saw snem ban wan khnang ba kan lah ban aikam haduh 50,000 ngut ki samla.“Dang hynin ka sngi u Myntri Rangbahduh ka Ri u la pynbna ban ai shuh sa 120 klur tyngka na ka bynta ban pynbha ïa ka East Khasi Hills bad kiwei pat ki bynta jogn ka jylla,” u la ong. Haba kren pat halor katei ka projek ha Mawlyndep, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ïa ka work order la dep ban ai sha ki kontraktor bad la khmih lynti ba kin pyndep haki 24 bnai kaba la buh thong ba la kumno kumno yn ioh ban plie noh ha u 2026.Na ka liang u Bah Paul pat u la ong ba ka kam jngohkai pyrthei kadei ka kam kaba lah ban ai kamai junom da kaba ai nuksa ruh ïa ka Sohra kaba la myntoi bha na ka kam jngohkai pyrthei.La ioh ruh ïa ka jingkren na u Dr. WR Kharlukhi uba la batai bniah ba ka jingjied ïa ka Mawlyndep ban leh ïa katei ka projek ka long ruh ban khring ïa ka kam jngohkai pyrthei kaba lah ban ioh ruh ïa ka koit ka khiah.
title: Ha ka dor 29 klur buh mawnongrim u CM ban tei ïa ka Hospitality Complex ha Mawlyndep

content: Jowai, Lber 08: Ka Dorbar mang tyngka jong ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) Jowai kaba la sdang naduh hynnin ka sngi 7 tarik u Lber la pynkut mynta ka sngi 8 tarik u Lber, 2023 ka Dorbar kala mynjur ïa ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ka jingpyllut jong ka snem 2024-2025.Kane ka mang tyngka ka kynthup ïa ka jingpyllut kaba T.218,22,60,300 (Arspah khadphra klur Arphew ar lak hynriewphew hajar lai spah) tyngka, katba ka jingmih pat ka long T. 204,63,23,500.00 (Arspah saw klur Hynriewphew lai lak ar phew lai hajar san spah) tyngka bad ka paw ba ka jingpyllut ka heh ban ïa ka jingïoh kaba kot haduh T.13.59,36,800 (Khadlai klur Sanphew khyndai lak Laiphew hynriew hajar phra spah) tyngkaKatkum ka report ba la wanrah na ka bynta ka jingpynlut ka Council la pynbynta sha ki 17 tylli ki tnad treikam hapoh jong ka JHADC.Kine ki tnad kiba kynthup ïa ka General Administration kaba long T.11,76,48,200 tyngka, Finance & Accounts Department T.31,33,19,000 tyngka, Land Revenue & Land Reform Department T.11,38,71,500 tyngka, Land Record & Land Settlement Department T.10,38,89,400 tyngka, Taxation Department T.4,59,13,300 tyngka, Forest Department T.16,41,24,000 tyngka, Political Department T.4,34,93,200 tyngka, Civil Works Department T.64,57,92,200 tyngka, Education Department T.24,97,57,100 tyngka, Art and Cultural Department T.2,37,37,400 tyngka, Market Department T.19,95,91,900 tyngka, Statistics and Information Department T.1,51,79,200 tyngka, Stationary & Printing Department T.1,42,34,800 tyngka, Planning Department T.1,20,41,900 tyngka, Judicial Department T.3,09,20,400 tyngka, Legislative Department T.7,89,54,800 tyngka, Village and Town Administration Department T.97,92,000 tyngka.Hadien ba la dep pynsngew da ki EM i/c jong kitei ki tnad treikam ka Council na ka liang ka Dorbar kala pdiang ïa katei ka mang tyngka (2024-2025) kaba duna haduh T.13.59,36,800.
title: Mynjur ka JHADC ïa ka Mang Tyngka 2024-25 ha ka jingpynlut ba 218.22 klur

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 08: U Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hills District Bah Garod LSN Dykes, ha u kyrwoh khubor ba u la pyllait mynta ka sngi, u la pyntip ba ka Sorkar ka la bthah ïa baroh ki tnad treikam/Board/Corporation, ba kin pan briew na ka Employment Exchange haba ki don jingthmu ban thung kam contract ha kino kino ki kam kiba lait.Kane ka la mih mynta ka sngi 8 tarik Lber 2024, kum ka jingpynshai halor ka jingpyrshah jong ki kynhun Sengbhalang ba khot interview thung kam contract ka Ophis jong ka District Socïal Welfare Officer ka WKH, Nongstoiñ myn ha ka 4 tarik Lber, 2024.Lah ban kdew ba u Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hills, u la pynsangeh shuwa ïa kane ka interview thep kam, namar ka jingpyrshah jong ki Sengbhalang ba ka Ophis ka DSWO ka la khot interview tang ïa ki samla ba la register kyrteng hapoh ka Employment Exchange.U Deputy Commissioner u la ong, la sngewthuh ba ki Sengbhalang ba pyrshah bad ki nongwad kam kim da tip bha ïa ka jingtreikam, ka bynta bad ka kamram jong ka Employment Exchange bad ka jingbthah jong ka Sorkar ban pyndonkam ïa ka jingshakri jong ka Employment Exchange.U la ong ba dei namar kane ka daw ba la pynsangeh shuwa ïa ka interview thep kam jong ka District Social Welfare Office ka West Khasi Hills. U ïathuh ruh ba ïa ka Employment Exchange ka Nongstoiñ la seng ha u snem 1974 bad ka Employment Information Assistant Bureau ha Mawshynrut la seng ha u snem 2011. Ka Employment Exchange ka Nongstoiñ ka la ai ka jingshakri ïa ki nongwad kam ka District la 50 snem.U khlieh duh ka District u pyntip ba ka don ka jingbthah na ka Sorkar sha baroh ki tnad treikam/Board/Corporation bad kiwei kiwei, ba kin pyndonkam ïa ka Employment Exchange ba kin jied ne phah ïa ki kyrteng kiba ibit ban pyndap ne thung kam ha ki kam contract kiba lait.U la ong ba ka rai jong ki bor khmih ban pyndap ïa ki kam kiba lait, da kaba thung contract hapoh ka Ophis ka DSWO West Khasi Hills ka dei kaba ïaid katkum ka jingbthah jong ka Sorkar Jylla.U la pyntip ba dei halor kane ka nongrim ba ka DSWO ka la thoh sha u Assistant Employment Officer ka WKH, ban phah ïa ki kyrteng jong ki nongwad kam kiba ibit ban trei ha ki kam kiba lait, kiba kynthup ïa 2 tylli ki kam Gender Specialist, kawei ka kam Specialist in Finance Literacy, kawei ka kam Assistant Accountant, kawei ka kam DEO jong ka PMMVY bad kawei ka kam MIS.
title: Imat ki Sengbhalang kim tip ïa ka Employment Exchange bad jingbthah ka Sorkar: DC

content: Shillong, Lber, 08: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia & Garo People ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingbitar ïa ka North East Sunshine Trust (NEST) India halor ka dorkhas ba ka la phah sha ka Sorkar India da ka jingkyntu ban pynim biang ïa ka kam ban tih noh ïa u Uranium na kane ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ka FKJGP ka la maham ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kam dei ban ailad ïa kum kine ki seng ba kin thaw jingkulmar hapoh ka Jylla.U General Secretary ka FKJGP Bah Eldie N. Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka kam tih Uranium ha Meghalaya ka dei ka kam kaba la pynkut naduh mynno namar ka jingpyrshah jur jong ki paidbah.U la maham ïa kane ka seng ba kam dei ban mushlia bad pynim biang ïa kane ka kam hynrei lym kumta ka FKJGP kam banse ban tuklar bad leh ïa kaba dei ban leh.“Ka FKJGP bad kumjuh ruh kiwei ki seng, kin ym ailad satia ïa ka jingtih Uranium ha Meghalaya. Long kat kaba long, kane ka dei ka kam ïap kam im jong ka jaidbynriew,” ula ong.
title: Bitar ka FKJGP ïa ka NEST (India) ba kyntu ban pynim ïa ka kam Uranium

content: Shillong, Lber 08 : U Chief Adviser jong u Myntri Rangbah ba dei ruh u General Secretary barim ka KSU , Bah Hamletson Dohling ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ong ba da lei lei ruh ym dei satia ban ailad ïano ïano ban khyllie biang ïa ka kam tih Uranium ha kane ka jylla.Ïa kane u la kren hadien ba la phriang ki khubor ba kawei ka kynhun ba tip kum ka North East Sunshine Trust (NEST) ka kwah ban tih ïa u Uranium na Meghalaya.U Bah Hamlet uba bat mynta kum u Working President ka NPP u la ong ba katei ka kynhun kam dei ban mushlia lane khyllie biang ïa ka lynnong kaba ïadei bad ka ishu tih Uranium ha ka jylla.“Ka sorkar jylla ka la dep rai ban pynduh pyndam ïa ka jingthmu tih uranium ka UCIL ha Jylla naduh u snem 2016,” u la ong da kaba buh jingkylli artad ïa ka NEST halor ka jingleit tynruh jong ka ïa ka sorkar pdeng ba ka kwah tih Uranium. Ha kajuh ka por u Bah Hamlet u la ïathuh ruh ba wat na ka NPP ruh kin ieng pyrshah bad kin ym ailad da lei lei ruh ban tih Uranium
title: Da leilei ruh ym dei ban ailad ban tih Uranium: GS barim ka KSU

content: Shillong, Lber, 08: Ka North East Sunshine Trust (India) dang shen ka la phah ïa ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) sha ka Sorkar Pdeng ban sdang noh ïa ka jingtih Uranium ha Meghalaya.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Myntri Khynnah ka Department of Atomic Energy u Dr Jitendra Singh ha ka 26 tarik, Rymphang, 2024, ka Founder Trustee bad Chairperson jong ka NEST (I) ka Kong Elizabeth Mathews Nongbri ka la ong, “ïa ka Detailed Project Report ban sdang biang ïa ka projek tih Uranium ha Meghalaya la pynkhreh da ka kynhun jong ngi.”Ka Kong Nongbri ka ong, “ha ka 23 tarik, Naiwieng, 2023 ha ka National Ex-Servicemen Convention ha Kurukshetra, nga la ïakynduh ïa u Col Pravat Kumar Panda (Retd), Independent Director, Uranium Corporation of India Ltd (UCIL). U la wanrah ïa kane ka mat ban sdang biang ïa ka jingtih Uranium ha Meghalaya. Kumba phi tip, ka jingleh sorjamin ka Sorkar India ka lap ba u Uranium u don bun bha ha West Khasi Hills District jong ka Meghalaya. Ka jingshim nuksa ïa une u marpohkhyndew uba remdor ka long naduh khat hynñiew snem mynshwa hynrei kam shym la long kam satia, na ka daw ba ki don ki riewshim kaba kiba kawang maw ïa ka jingtrei shitom da kaba pynsngewthuh bakla ïa ki paidbah ba kin ieng pyrshah ïa kane ka jingthmu. Ïa ka ophis jong ka UCIL la pynbor ban khang khyrdep noh Shillong. Ïa ka jingïasoi soskular hapdeng ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla ha u snem 2009 na ka bynta ban shimwai ïa ka jaka ha West Khasi Hills, la pyndam noh ha u snem 2016. La kheiñ antad ba u Uranium u bun bha, nalor uba u long uba remdor. Katba kiwei kiwei ki jylla kum ka Jharkhand ka la ïoh jingmyntoi na ka jingdon jong u marpohkhyndew ha ka jaka jong ki, ka Meghalaya ka shong halor u marpohkhyndew uba remdor hynrei kam lah ban ïoh jingmyntoi eiei ruh em.”Haba pyntip ba u Uranium u don kyrhai hapoh West Khasi Hills, ka kong Elizabeth ka la ïathuh ba ka NEST(India) kaba don ki briew ba ithuh ithaw ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ki stad ki jhad ban tih marpoh khyndew, ka lah ban pynurlong ïa ka kam tih Uranium hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ka dorkhas ba la phah da ka Kong Nongbri sha u Myntri Khynnah ka Sorkar Pdeng ka dei ruh kaba la saphriang ha ka Social Media.Ha ka ka dorkhas, ka Kong Elizabeth Nongbri ka la pynithuh ïalade ba ka dei ka Khasi bad ka dei ka nongtreikam jong ka BJP naduh u snem 2015. Ka la pynithuh ruh ba ka dei kaba ïohlok shipai bad ba kala bat ïa ki kam ba kongsan hapoh ka BJP Minority Morcha bad ruh kum ka National Executive Member.“Katto katne na kiba ithuh ithaw, kiba la trei hapoh ka tnat Soil & Conservation ka Sorkar Meghalaya, mynta ki dei ki dkhot jong ka kynhun jong ngi. Kine kin sa ïaleh ban ïoh ïa ka jingshaniah na ki paidbah khnang ban pynsdang ïa kane ka projek. Ki la kyrpad ruh ban ïalam sha ka jaka tih Uranium ka UCIL ha Jharkhand, khnang ba kin dup lah ban pynkhreh ïa ka jinglum jingtip ba kin dup ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan na ki paidbah,” la ong ka Kong Nongbri bad bynrap, “ngi la leh bun ki kam kiba jwat ban ïakren bad ban ïakynduh ïa ki briew kiba dei ki kynhun bapawkhmat ban sdang biang ïa ka jingtih (Uranium.”Ka la kam shuh shuh ba ka ïoh ka kot jong ki paidbah lada pynsdang biang ïa kane ka kam kan kyntiew shikatdei eh ia ki. Nalor kata, u marpohkhyndew uba remdor tam un ïarap ban pynurlong ïa ka jingangnud jong u Myntri Rangbah.“Ngi kyrpad namar kata, ban ailad katto katne ngut ki dkhot kynthei ka kynhun jong ngi, kiba dei ki Viksit Bharat Ambassador na ka jylla ai jait kmie ha Meghalaya, ban pyni markhmat ïa ka Policy Document and Framework for Execution ha u Myntri Rangbahduh bad ha ki ophisar jong ka UCIL ha New Delhi.Haba pyrshang ban pan jingpynshai halor kane, ka Kong Nongbri ka ong, “ngam lah ban kren eiei (halor kane) ïa mynta. Ngan sa kren ïa phi ha kawei pat ka por.”
title: Dawa ka NEST (India) ïa ka Sorkar India ban tih noh ïa u Uranium na Meghalaya

content: Nongpoh, Lber 08: Ki nongïalam ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo People (FKJGP) North Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi kila leit ban ïakynduh syndon ïaka Medical Superintendent jong ka Civil Hospital Nongpoh hadien ba seng kala lap ba ki bor pynïaid jong katei ka hospital ki khlem don kano kano ka jaka pynthiah kyrpang naka bynta ki koidi hynrei la pynthiah lang hajuh bad ki riew paidbah kiba leit phah sumar ha katei ka hospital sorkar.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor naka liang u Bah Ricky Majaw Publicity Secretary haka jingdonlang u Samla Banroy Wahlang Asst Publicity secretary ka North Khasi Hills District ryngkat ki dkhot u la ong ba kum ka seng ka dap da ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingpynthiah lang ïaki koidi kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar bad ki riew paidbah kiba leit sumar ha katei ka hospital ka ba la wanrah pynban ka jingsyier ïaki paidbah.U la ong ruh kat ka kyrdan Civil Hospital kala dei ban don ka jaka pynthiah kyrpang naka bynta ki koidi ba shah sumar ym ban pynthiah lang bad ki paidbah, ha kaba naka liang ka Dr D Blah Medical Superintendent kala pynshai sha ki nongïalam ka seng ba kadei ka jingkhapngiah jong ka jaka ha kaba naka liang jong ka kan sa shimkhia halor katei ka kam namar kumba long mynta la shu kyntiew kyrdan tang ka kyrteng katba ka building treikam ka dang long kumjuh.
title: Ha kajuh ka kamra sumar lang ïa u koidi bad ki nongpang ha Civil Hospital, Nongpoh

content: Shillong, Lber 10: Ka Treilang Welfare Society ha ka jingiatrei lang bad ka Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan, Shillong ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïakop mareh ba 500 meter kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang jong ki kynthei, kaba la tip da ka “Run Women Run – Run for a Cause”, MYBharat Viksit Bharat – Nari Shakti Fitness Run ha ka step sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taïew ba ladep.La sdang ïa ka jingïakop naduh 7 baje mynstep bad ka jingsdang ban mareh ka dei naduh Malki Point sha Barik Khun sha Swimming Pool bad ka kut biang hapoh Malki Point. La sakhi ruh ïa ka jingwan shimbynta bun ngut ki longkmie na kylleng ka Sor Shillong ha kane ka jingïakop mareh.ïa ka kyrdan ba nyngkong la jop da ka Kong Beltina Pyngrope ba shong basah ha Mawpat, nangta bud sa ka Leena Ryntathiang ha ka kyrdan ba ar ba shong ba sah ha Mawpat. Ka Bitarisk Marbaniang bashong basah ha Nongmynsong ka la wan ha ka kyrdan ba lai.
