Ka Gloria Thangkhiew ba shong basah ha Lummawbah ka la jop kyrdan ba saw.Ha kane ka Sngi la wan Kongsan da u Bah Fantin Joseph Lakadong-MDC ka Malki Laitumkhrah, katba Symbud Kongsan la wan da u Bah D. Rapsang, Deputy Director, Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan, Shillong.Ka jingthmu ba la pynlong ïa kane ka jingmareh thong ka long ban rakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang ki Khynthei kaba ngi tip kum ka “International Women’s Day” kaba thew beit ba ka jingïamareh thong ka dei thik tang ïa ki khynthei/longkmei kumjuh ruh ka jingmut jong kane ka jingïashim bynta ha kane ka rynsan mareh ka long ruh ban pynsngewthuh lane pynshai paidbah ïa ka jingkordor jong ka jingdonkam kum ki kynthei lane Longkmie ban phikir ïalade ha kaba ïa dei bad ka koit khiah.Na ka liang jong ka kynhun ka la ai khublei ruh kyrpang ïa baroh kiba la wan ïashimbynta kaba la pynlong ïa kane ka Lympung ïakop mareh thong kaba kaba seisoh.
title: Lahduh ka Kong Beltina Pyngrope ha ka jingïakop mareh “Run Women Run”

content: Shillong, Lber 10: Hadien ka namrem ba mad pyrshah ïa ka Churchill Brothers da 2-1 kol dang shen ha ka jingïalehkai kaba la long ha Goa, ka Shillong Lajong FC ka la wanphai jingjop pat ha ka jingïakhun NorthEast Derby pyrshah ïa ka Aizawl da 2-1 kol ha ka lympung I-League kaba la long hynnin ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ha Aizawl, Mizoram.Haba phai sha kane ka jingïakhun, lah ban kdew ba ka Lajong ka la ïakhun tyngeh naduh ba sdang ban ïoh pynkhihjar. Ka Lajong ka la ïoh shibun ki kabu ba ka la shna ha ka kylla step.Dei ynda la jam sha ka 27 minit ba ka kynhun ka la ïoh ban lamkhmat ïa ka jingïalehkai lyngba ka kol u Phrangki Buam, bad kane ka kol ka la ïeng skhem haduh kaba kut ka kylla ba nyngkong.Hadien ba ka jingïalehkai ka la jam sha ka extra time, na ka liang jong ka Aizawl kaba ïakhun hala ïing ka la pyrshang katba lah ban ïoh pynphai bad dei ha ka 80 ba u Lalrinzuala u la lah ban pynurlong ïa ka jingangnud ka kynhun da kaba pynïakhaid mar shi kol. Shuwa ba ka jingïalehkai kan jam sha kaba kut, u player ba mih bujli jong ka Lajong – u Damaitphang Lyngdoh u la knieh jyndat ïa ka jingkyrmen jong ka Aizawl ban ïasam mar shi point hadien ba u la khyrwit ïa ka kol ha ka 94 minit kaba la ïarap ïa ka Lajong ban khur pura ïa ki 3 point.Wat hadien kane ka namjop, ka Lajong ka dang ïaineh ha ka kyrdan ba 6 da 29 point naki 18 sien ïakhun, bad ka duna da tang shi point ban knieh kyrdan ba san na ka Inter Kashi.Ka Lajong kan wanphai shala ïing ban pynkhreh ïa ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Real Kashmir la Sngi Balang,Lber 13 tarik ha ka por 7 baje janmiet ha SSA Stadium-Polo, Shillong.
title: Lyngba ka kol u Damaitphang khur ka Lajong pura ïa ki lai point

content: Shillong, Lber 10: Ka Riwar Mihngi Football Assocïation hynnin ka Sngi Saitjaiñ (9 tarik Lber) ka la jied ïa ki nongkitkam (Office Bearers) kiba pura na bynta ka samoi treikam 2024-27 lyngba ka Election ba la pynlong ha Ing Dorbar Shnong -Urksew Wahpathaw ha ka por 11 baje mynstep.Ïa kane ka Election jied nongkitkam la pynïaid da Election Committee jong ka synjuk Riwar Mihngi Football Assocïation bala ïalam da I bah Wanhun Massar kum u chairman ha ryngkat u Bah Summit Massar, kiba la juh long teng ki nongïalam ha ka imlang ka sahlang jong kane ka thaiñ Riwar Mihngi.Ka jingpynlong ban jied nongkitkam ka la ïaid katkum ki kyndon riti treikam ka Assocïation. La wan ïashim bynta da baroh 16 (Khathynriew) tylli ki sports Club. Football club ba la pynïasnoh bad ka Assocïation (affilïated). La pynshongkun shuh shuh ïa katei ka jingjied nongkitkam da ki pyrman (Observer) na ka Meghalaya Football Assocïation kiba Kynthup ïa u Bah Sunesh Syiem bad u Bah Dipshon Ryntathïang ki la wan ban sakhi lang bad ban pynshisha ba ka long kaba bit ba bïang bad ïaid beit ïa ka Election kat kum ki kyndon treikam ka Meghalaya Football Assocïation.Ki dkhot nongkitkam kiba la shah thung na bynta ka samoi treikam 2024-27 ki long: President: Bah Iengskhem Diengdoh, Vice President: Bah Largest LAso, General Secretary: Bah A. Dapborlang Kharbudon, Asst. General Secretary: Bah Kitdor Khongsdam, Finance Secretary: Bah Aimusing Khongjee.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban aiti ha kitei ki nongïalam ba kin pyndep ban thaw ïa ka Executive Committee kiba ïadei dur bad ka riti treikam bad ruh ba ki dkhot kin ïadonbynta lang na baroh ki bynta ka Riwar Mihngi.La ïoh ruh ki jingkren kyntu kynpham na ki nongïalam ka Meghalaya Football Assocïation.La pyntip ruh ba ka jingïalehkai Final jong Senior Men league 2023 yn pynkut ha ka 16th March 2024 ha ka por 2 baje nohphaisngi ha UUP Stadium Urksew, Pynursla bad ki team ki ban ïaknieh ïa ka nam lahduh kin long KA Pynursla United Youth Club pyrshah ïa ka Lapalang Sports club.
title: Jied nongkitkam ka Riwar Mihngi Football Association na bynta ka samoi treikam 2024-27

content: Shillong, Lber 10: Ka 19 South Shillong Konstitwensi ka la long kaba donbok napdeng kiwei pat ki konstitwensi kaba la ïoh ïa ka mang tyngka kaba T. 5 klur ban shna bad buh ïa u phlang plastic ne artificial turf hapoh madan Laban nalor kiwei pat ki jingtei.Kane ka konstitwensi ka la rung lang hapoh ka jingmang pisa jong ka sorkar jylla ban maramot ïa ki madan ïalehkai kiba ka la buh ka mang tyngka kaba T. 42,61,31,100. 00 kaba dei ruh na ka State Plan Assistant bad na kane ka pisa ka South Shillong Konstitwensi ka la ïoh ka jingmang pisa kaba T. 5 klur bad ïa kane ka kam la tyrwa bad sdang hi da u MLA u Bah Sanbor Shullai naduh u snem 2021 ha ka por ba u dang long u Myntri ka tnat Arts and Culture bad ba u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh u la long u Myntri ki Kam ïalehkai.Haba leit jurip ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ïa katei ka madan Laban kaba la iaid ka jingpyntrei ïa ka kam u Bah Sanbor uba long ruh u Chairman ka MTDC u la ïathuh ba nalor ka konstitwensi jong u, ka Madan ha Shangpung Pohshnong, ka Laitlyngkot, ka PWD Ground Mawsynram bad Umbudda kiba la rung lang ha katei ka T. 42 klur tam.U la ai khublei ïa ka sorkar jylla naduh u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad Sangma, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u Myntri kam Lehkai ba mynta u Bah Shakliar Warjri bad u Myntri barim u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, Director Sports and Youth Affairs ki ophisar ka State Sports Council nalor ki ophisar kiba la donlang ha kane ka jingjurip, ki Nongïalam shnong bad ka seng kynthei bad seng samla ka Laban.U la ïathuh ba ha kane ka madan phlang plastic, yn don ruh ki Rest Room, Changing Room bad kiwei bad la buh ban pyndep hapoh ki 24 bnai.Ïa kane ka madan kumba la ïathuh da u MLA u Bah Sanbor Shullai yn khmih bad ban sumar sukher da ka Dorbar shnong Madan Laban Rait Laban, ka Seng Longkmie bad ka seng samla ka shnong Laban.
title: 5 klur tyngka la mang ban siang phlang plastik ïa ka madan Laban

content: K atba nang ïaid ki snem katta la nang kiew ka jingduk ha ka jylla Meghalaya. Mynta kane ka jylla ka long kawei na kiba duk tam ha ka ri India bad ka wan balai na tdong. Haba peit ïa kita ki nongthaw aiñ lane ki MLA kiba ngi jied pat, ngi shem ba ki kiew spah shaid shaid mar ïa shah jied. Ki la sdang sngaid bad ki iphuh iphieng ka leit ka wan. Kito lei lei kiba don ha ka liang synshar kim donkam ban pyrkhat kumba pyrkhat lem mangi baroh, kumno ban pyndap pynbiang ha ïing ha sem. Ki lah biang nadong shadong namar ki lah shah thung Chairman, Vice Chairman bad Deputy Chairman ha ki Committee/Commission bapher bapher kiba khlem pynmih kam da ki phew snem. Kum ban shu kdew nuksa, kata ka Employment Generation Council kaba dei ban shong pyrkhat kumno ban pynmih kam pynmih jam, kam shym la shong mynta la bun bun snem. Uwei u MLA uba dei ban ai buit halor ka rep ka riang (Advisor on Agriculture) u ong ba ym pat khot meeting shisien ruh naduh ba u shah thung ha kane ka kam. Bad ki don bun kiwei pat kiba shem ïa kane kajuh ka jingshem. Lah thung haduh 188 ngut kum kine ki nongaibuit ïa ka sorkar (advisors) ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher bad ki ïoh ruh ka bai siew man u bnai lem bad kiwei ki jingsiew ruh, ryngkat bad ka kali bad ka petrol/diesel.Kane ka jingsiew ïa kitei ki 188 ngut ka ktah shibun eh ïa ka pla pisa ka sorkar kaba la long lypa kaba shim ram shi rynieng. Hynrei ngi ki paidbah ngi sngap mutlop ban ngim kren pyrshah ïa kine ki jingleh jingkam ka sorkar. Haba ki MLA liang pyrshah ki kdew ïa kane ha ïing dorbar thaw-aiñ u myntri rangbah Conrad Sangma u ong ba ki sorkar kiba mynshuwa ruh ki thung hi ïa kum kine ki Chairman, Vice Charman, Deputy Chairman etc. Ha u snem 2004 bnai July, ka sorkar ha kato ka por kaba la ïalam da U Dr Manmohan Singh ka la pynmih ïa ka aiñ ba dei ban thung minister tang 15 na ka shispah (15%) ha ka sorkar kmie bad ki sorkar jylla ruh. Katkum kane ka aiñ ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei ban thung tang 15% na ka 60 ngut ki MLA. Kata ka mut tang 9 ngut ki lah ban ïoh bat ïa ka kam minister. Hynrei ym lah sngewthuh kumno ba ha ka jylla Meghalaya ki don haduh 12 ngut ki minister.Kawei na ki daw ba la pynmih ïa katei ka aiñ ka long namar ba ki sorkar ki shong syier tang namar ba ki MLA/MP ki kwah long minister bad ki ryngkoh seng na kawei sha kawei pat tang ban shah thung minister. Sa kawei ka long ban kham pynduna ïa ka jinglut jingsep ka sorkar namar man uwei u minister u hap ban ïoh bun ngut ki nongtrei, ar bad lai tylli ki kali, sa ka ïing shong bad ka leit ka wan shabar jylla kaba dei ban siew da ka sorkar na ka pla pisa paidbah.Ka jingpynlut phut jong ka sorkar ka long kaba la kham palat bad ym lah shuh ban buddien ruh ïa kine ki jingpynlut. Tip don jingmih eiei mo na kine ki jingpynlut pisa? Haba leit sha ki nongkyndong pat ym ïohi eiei ruh. Ka surok kaba dang siang ha u snem ba la lah mynta ka la khoh lut bad la paw sa tang ki mawria bad u shyiap. Mynta la sdang ka ring ïa ki pipe um kylleng halor kata ka skim JJM hynrei imat ka pisa la pynlut ban thied ïa ki pipe um khlem da pyrkhat naei kan wan kata ka um. ïa kane ka skim la dei ban wad jingtip shaphang ka rukom pyntrei kam. Wat tang ha Laitkor ruh bun ki bym pat ïoh um ha ïing. Te ki shnong kiba kham sha kyndong leilei ynnai ïakren.Kiba bun ki shnong sha nongkyndong ki ud bha ha ka rukom pyntreikam ïa ka skhim JJM namar ki top um la dep shna ki pipe la dep ring hynrei ka um pat kam pat tuid ne poi haduh mynta sha ki ïing jong ki briew. Katba ka sorkar pat ka kam ba kumba 75% la dep ban pyntreikam ïa kane ka skhim. Kane kam long tang hangne ha ri lum Khasi bad Jaintia hynrei wat sha ri lum Garo ruh kumjuh. Kumta ka sorkar ka dei ban phah bud dien bha ïa kane ka skhim lada ka kwah shisha ba ka umdih kan poi sha man la ki thliew ïing jong ki briew namar lada ym bud dien ïoh poi ka por ba ka sorkar pdeng kan phah tohkit da ka CBI namar kane ka dei ka skhim jongka sorkar pdeng.
title: Balei katba dang ïaid ki snem ka jylla ka la nang duk tasam?

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 10 : Ka Ophis u Deputy Commissioner Eastern West Khasi Hills District, ha ka 9 tarik Lber 2024 ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram pynkhuid shnong halor ka phang ‘My City My Campaign’. Ïa kane ka campaign la pynlong ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Village Water and Sanitation Committee Pyndengumiong MairangDa ka jingthmu ban wanrah ïa ka khuid ka suba hapoh ka thaiñ Mairang, u Deputy Commissioner Eastern West Khasi Hills, District Bah G. Kharmawphlang I.A.S, ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad kiwei pat ki ophisar sorkar, ki Rangbah Shnong bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka Shnong Pyndengumiong, ki la ïasnoh kti lang ban pynkhuid ïa ki jaka paidbah jong ka shnong Pyndengumiong.La sdang ban pynkhuid naduh ka skul St.Thomas Higher Secondary School shaduh Mairang stand bus. Ka jingthmu hi jong kane ka campaign ka long ba baroh ki nongshong shnong, ki dei ban don ka jingkitkhlieh ha kaba ïadei bad ka khuid ka suba jong ka shnong ka thaw bad ki sawdong sawkun jong ka.U Bah Kharmawphlang, u pynpaw ka jingkyrmen kaba skhem ba lada ki nongshong shnong ki don ka jingkitkhlieh ha kaba ïadei bad ka khuid ka suba, kan ym don kano kano ka jingeh ban wanrah jingkhuid hapoh shnong hapoh thaw.
title: ‘My City My Campaign’ ka prokram kyrpang jong ka ophis DC ha Mairang

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 10: Ka Nativity Higher Secondary School, Mawkyrwat kan sa ïoh ban rakhe ïa u mawmer jong ka jingdap 50 snem jong ka jingshakri ïa ka dong ka thaiñ lyngba ka jingnang jingstad. Kumta kan sa plie ïa kane ka jingrakhe jubili ksiar ha ka 3 tarik u Ïaïong, 2024 ha ka por 10 baje mynstep.Namarkata, na ka liang jong ka School Managing Committee ha ryngkat ki nonghikai ka khot sngewbha ïa baroh ki khynnah skul ba rim bad ruh ïa ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul ba kin wan pynshit pynshngaiñ lem ïa kane ka jingplie pyrda.Ym tang kata ha kajuh hi kan sngi kan don ruh ka jingplie ïa ka Annual School Sports 2024 ha madan jong ka Nativity Higher Secondary School, Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District. Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh na u Rev. Fr. A. Wahlang, Principal jong ka Nativity Higher Secondary School, Mawkyrwat lem bad ka Past Pupils.
title: Ha ka 3 tarik u Ïaïong yn plie ka NHSSM ïa ka jingdap 50 snem ka skul

content: Khliehriat Lber 10: U State President jong ka party BJP, u Rickman Momin, hynnin ka sngi u la plie ïa ka ophis jong ka party BJP East Jaiñtia Hills District ha shnong Dkhiah, ha ka jingïalang la kren shibun kiei kiei kiba iadei bad ka party bad ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka party, kum ka jingkyrshan lem ïa kane ka ophis treikam jong ka party, ka Dr Fenela. L.Nonglait lem bad u bah A.L.hek ki la noh syniang da ka pisa bad ong ruh ba ka sharak kam ju rhem khlem ka umphniang, te donkam ban ai mynsiem lang.Ha katei ka jingialang u State President BJP, u la pynskhem bad pynkup burom ruh ïa ki lai phew san ngut ki dkhot kiba wan ban pyniasoh bad ka party BJP ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.Haba kren ha ka jingialang , u R.Momin u la pynpaw ka jingsngew kmen ba ka party ka la kiew ha East Jaiñtia Hills District, u la ong ba ha ka por ba u dang wan nyngkong ki don tang hynñiew ngut ki briew kiba wan jingïalang, ha ka sien kaba ar ki don khatsan ngut bad mynta ka kynti ki la don shibun bha ki briew kiba la wan sha ka jingialang bad ruh ki la don shiun kata haduh 35 ngut kiba la wan ban pyniasoh bad ka party BJP, u la ong ruh ba ka BJP kan sa sei da u ne ka kyrtong ba bit ha kane ka election MP ka ban sa long, u kyntu ïa baroh ki nongkitkam bad ki dkhot ban trei shitom ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka party ban poi sha ka thong.U la ong ba ki don haduh palat 3 lak ngut ki ba la ioh jingmyntoi na ki skim u Modi bad lada kine baroh ki thep vote sha ka BJP khlem pep ka BJP kan jop da kaba suk, u kyntu ïa ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot ba kin leit ban iakynduh bad kito kiba la ioh jingmyntoi na ki skim Modi bad kren bad pynsgewthuh ïa ki a ka party ka dei ka party kaba kyntiew ïa ki paidbah, u la kyrpad ïa ki Disrict President ban pyndep ïa ki kam khnang ba lada ynda la jied ïa u ne ka kyrtong kan suk ban treikam, u la iathuh ruh ba ki la don san ngut kiba pan ïa ki tiket na ka BJP na ka bynta kane ka MP elction bad mynta ka la dei ka por ban ïa treilang ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka party namar lada ka party ka khlaiñ kam long kaba eh ban ïakhun ïa kano kano ka electon.Ka Dr Fenella. L.Nonglait, kaba dei kawei na ki dkhot jong ka party BJP ka la kynthoh jur halor ka jingmih bun ki jingkynthoh pyrshah ïa ka party kiba ju mih ha ka por election bad ong ruh ba kine ki long kum kito ki bseiñ plastic bad ynda la dep ka election yn sa ithuh ba ki dei tang ki bseiñ plastic, ka la ong ruh “Ngi tip bha mynta mano ba synshar ha Delhi te kan kham suk ka lynti ban iaid da kata, ka aiñ ka mih na ki paidbah ka riti synshar ri ruh ka sdang da kaba ong ‘ma ngi ki paidbah’ ngi lei ngi la don lypa ka (IOA), Instrument of Assession kaba la pynithuh ïa kita ki 30 tylli ki hima jong ngi bad kita ki 12 doloi, ngi khlem die duh ïa ki hok longtrai jong ngi, ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap, ki synshar ki khadar ngi dang bat”“Ngi hap ban khanglad ïa u nongtuh ba na poh, katne ngi hiar katne ngi shah thom bor, to ngin ïa iaid ïa kane ka electoon khlem jingtieng, kane ka election kan long kaba phyla bha bad kan wanrah jingkylla ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki paidbah” ong ka Dr Fenella.Kum ka jingpynshai sha ki paidbah, ka kong Fenella, ka la bynrap shuh shuh ba “ngi hapoh ka jylla ngi don 74 percent ki kristan, ha Nagaland ki don 89 percent, ki kham bun ha nagaland katba ha Nagaland synshar ka party BJP, ha ri india baroh kawei ki kristan ki don tang 5 percent te shwa ban wan u modi, kata ha u snem 2014 ki kristan ha India ki don 3.9 percent, hynrei mynta ki don 5.79 percent hato ong maphi, u Modi u pyniap kristan?Ngi iohi ba ka don jingkiew ki kristan, ka mang tyngka lane ka Interim budget jong ka Assam ka dei T 50 hajar klur tyngka, hynrei jong ka Meghalaya pat ka dei tang T90 klur tyngka, kaba tang ka bai tulop ïa ki nongtrei sorkar ruh ym dap, na kata ka daw yn sa pynleh ne pynlong sa da ki tamasa ban ioh pisa (revenue), ka tamasa ka kylla long pynban ka jingkordit ïa ki paidbah namar la shu khlong na ki paidbah hi. Mynta ka jylla Meghalaya ka don T2000 tam klur ka ram ba la shim na shabar lada phi ong ban pynkhyllem ïa kane ka sorkar, mynta kita kiba sngew ba ki lah ban pynkhyllem ki donkam ban don T2000 hajar klur tyngka ha pla ban siew ïa kata ka ram, hynrei mynta shi tyngka ruh ngi dang ap na Delhi ,ngi donkam mynta ban pyrkhat ïa ka jingkiew ka jylla jong ngi namar ki jingeh kin wan hapoh ka jylla ” ka la bynrap ruh ba ha kane ka elaction ka jingpynkupbor ïa ki kynthei ka la sdang na ka party BJP namar ka la urlong da kaba 33 percent kin ioh ban ïa shim bynta ha ka synshar khaddar, ka la ai ruh ka jingkitbok kitrwiang ïa ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka party.U State Secretary BJP, u bah Wankitbok Pohshna, u la kren shaphang ka jingkiew iarat ka ri India hapoh ka jingïalam u myntri rangbah ka ri, u N.Modi bad ong ruh ba ka ri kan sa poi sha ka thong ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkiew ha ka ioh ka kot jong ki paidbah namar ki la don mynta haduh 25 klur ngut ki paidbah ki la lait na ka jingduk tasam hapoh ka jingialam u N.Modi bad ong ba kane baroh ka dei namar ka jingiohi jngai u myntri rangbah ka ri “ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa u Modi baroh ki dei tang ki khana election tang ban pynbiej ïa ki paidbah namar ba ki tip ba kim nym lah ban trei kumba trei ka BJP kaba don ruh ki kyntien phira ‘ngyngkong eh ka Ri ba ar ka Party bad khatduh eh ka malade, katba kiwei ki party pat ki pyrkat shwa ialade, ïa kiba haïing ha sem bad u paidbah lei te um don jaka, ngi la iohi ki sorkar ba la leit ha ka por ba shynshar congress ka ri India ka dei kaba duk na kiba duk tam ka wan ha ka kyrdan ba 11 ha ka jingduk, hynrei mynta pat ka la rung ha ka kyrdan kaba san kum ka ri kaba la kiew shakhmat, u Modi u ong ba lada wan biang ha ka bor ka ri India kan rung ha ka kyrdan kaba lai ha ka jingkiew.U State President ba rim jong ka BJP, u bah Shibun Lyngdoh, u la pynpaw ka jingsngew kmen namar ka jingbun ki briew kiba la wan ban pyniasoh bad ka party BJP ha kane ka sngi, u la kyntu ïa ki nongialam bad ki dkhot ban khot shuh shuh ïa kiwei kiwei ruh bad ong ruh ba ka party BJP kam dei ka party kaba sam pisa hynrei ka party kaba khot da ki kam ki jam ym da kaba shu sam pisa.Kiba la ai jingkren ki kynthup ruh, u BJYM President, u samla Mewaker Lyngdoh, ka kong Sumitra Laloo, u District President ba rim, u bah Bison Paslein, u ST Morcha President, u bah Jiedlang Sana, u Vice President BJP West Jaiñtia Hills District, u bah Karbar Tyngkan bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Sngewkmen u State President ka BJP ba kiew ka party ha East  Jaiñtia Hills

content: Ki paidbah Khasi-Pnar ki ju sngew sarong ïa ka rukom synshar kaba la hiar pateng na ki longshuwa manshuwa. Ka rukom synshar ka long ha ki lai bynta – Ha trai eh don ki Dorbar Shnong, halor jong ki don ki Dorbar Raij/Dorbar Elaka bad halor jong kine ki ar kyrdan pat don sa ki Syiem kiba synshar ïa ki Hima kiba kynthup ïa bun tylli ki Raij. Ha ri Jaintia te mynta ym don syiem ba synshar hynrei don da ki Doloi kiba long ruh ki nongleh niam bad ki nongknia nongkhriam.Ka jylla Meghalaya, ryngkat bad ka Mizoram bad Nagaland ki la lait noh na ka aiñ Panchayati Raj Act kaba mut ka jingsynshar kaba ha trai eh – kata ka synshar khadar ha shnong tangba ïa ki nongkitkam ïa kita ki Panchayat dei ban jied da kaba thep Vote. Ka jingkyntait ïa ka Panchayati Raj la ong namar ba ha kine ki rilum la don lypa kita ki rukom synshar shnong kiba naduh hyndai. Hynrei kane ka jingkyntait ïa ka Panchayati Raj ka la pynduh nong shibun eh ïa ngi shane namar ba ki nongsynshar shnong kumba long mynta kim don ka pisa bad ki lad pynroi ïa ki shnong ki thaw namar ba kim ïoh ïa kata ka “direct funding,” lane ka jingbei pisa na ka Sorkar Kmie kaba wan beit ha ka pla pisa kita ki Panchayat.Ki syiem jong ngi shane ki shu lum khajna na ki iew ki hat bad na ki mar ki mata kiba mih na kane ka jylla bad leit die shabar jylla. Ki District Council kiba peit ba khmih ïa ka jingtrei kam jong ki Syiem/Doloi bad ki Dorbar Raij/Elaka bad ruh ki Dorbar Shnong, ruh kim don pisa ban bei sha kine ba kin trei ïa ki kam pynroi bapher bapher namar ki District Council ruh ki shaniah ha ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan bei pisa ïa ki. Ho,oid na ka por sha ka por ki District Council ki ïoh ïa ka Direct Funding na ka Sorkar Kmie hynrei ïa kata ka pisa ki Council ki pyndonkam ha kaba pyntreikam ïa ki skhim lajong. Ho,oid ki District Council ki ju ïasnoh lang hateng hateng bad ki Shnong/Elaka ban pyntrei ïa ki skhim bapher bapher. Hynrei ka jingwan pisa na ka Sorkar Kmie kam long kaba bun. Dei na kata ka daw ba ki District Council ruh bun ba ki hap khrong khajna na ki iew ki hat bad na ki dieng kiba pom na ki khlaw kiba hap ha ka jingpeit ki District Council.Ha kane ka juk mynta ka synshar shnong kam long shuh kum ha ki por hyndai ba ym pat don plastik bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar elektrik. Ha ki por mynshuwa ïa ki kot ki sla la shu thang ha kper bad ïa ki jhur ki jhep bad kiwei ki mar bam na iingshetja la theh ha ka sboh kaba long ka thliew kaba tih hajan kper bad ynda la dap kawei ka thliew la tep noh ïa ka bad tih na kawei pat. Hadien 6 bnai eiei kata ka thliew kaba la dep tep lah ban tih biang bad ban khlong ïa ka sboh kaba bha eh bad thung jingthung ha kper.Ha kane ka juk mynta ïa ka jaboh na iing kynthup wat ïa ki snep jhur bad ki jingbam ruh hap bret shabar iing namar ym don jaka shuh ban theh ñiut shadien iing. Mynta ha kane ka juk baroh kiba shna iing kim buh jaka ban ïoh tih liewsboh ban bret ïa ki jhur, ki snep soh, ki jingbam ba lah sniew bad kumta ter ter. Ha ki por mynshuwa nga ju kynmaw ba ka don ka adong na iing Syiem haba ai jingbit ban shna iing la ong ba dei ban ieh kumba 6 phut eiei ka jaka na u pud u sam bad bym dei ban shna iing thik ha u pud khlem da ieh shuh tang shiphut ruh. Ki shnong kiba dei ban peit ïa kine kiei kiei ruh ki ong ba ym don ba sngap. Dei na kane ka daw ba wat halor ka wah ruh ki briew kim salia shuh ban shna iing. Peit ïa ka Wah Umkhrah ter ter naduh na ka tlong jong bad phin ïohi ba ki iing ki la ieng halor ki wah. Ki briew ki bret lut ïa ki ñiut na iing thik thik sha ka wah khlem ka jingsalia. Ki klet pat ba ka wah ka dei kawei na ki tlong um bad ka um ka dei ka jingim.Mynta lada rngad lut ki wah nangno shuh ngin ïoh den um ban pynpoi sha ki lyngkha kba bad ki kper jhur kper soh? Ka Sorkar Kmie ka la pyntrei shaid shaid ïa kata ka skim Jal Jiwan Mission (JJM) kaba thmu ban pynpoi um ha manla ki thliew iing. Hynrei kiba bun ki tlong um jong ngi mynta ki lah bun ba rngad lut. Bad wat lada ki wah ki dang doh ruh ka um kam long shuh kaba lah ban dih namar ba la jakhlia shaba palat. Lada dih ïa kum kato ka um ïohpang kpoh bad kiwei ki jait jingpang ruh.Haba nga peit ïa ka Umiew ha Smit nga ishyrkhei bha namar ki briew ym tang ba ki sait jain ha wah hynrei ki bret ruh ïa kito ki jingboh khunlung kaba don bad ka eit – khlem jingsalia. Kham harum pat don sa ka jingsait kali baroh shisngi hapdeng wah syndon. Ka umphniang Diesel bad Petrol na ki kali ka la poi lut ha um. Haba ka iing Syiem ka don hajan kane hi ka wah balei kein u Syiem ka Hima Khyrim um leh eiei ïa kane? Nalor ba u Pa-iem u dei ruh u doktor nongai jingsumar ïa kiba pang ba shitom.Myn sngi saitjain nga poi sha Pynursla bad u Bah Restone Khongtani uba long ruh u nongïalam ïa ka kynhun Riwar Environment Protection and Sustainable Development Organisation (REPSDO) ngi la leit peit ïa ka jaka theh ñiut paidbah ïa kaba ym don jingker eiei ruh bad ïa kaba la shu thang bad baroh shisngi. Kata ka jaka ka mih tdem beit bad ngi tip ba ka jingthang ïa ki plastik ka pynmih ïa ka lyer kaba long bih. Hynrei ym don ba salia ïa kata. Ynda la dei ka por slap, ka um kaba tuid nangta na ka jaka theh ñiut ka tuid lut sha ka Wah Umkhat kaba ki briew ki pyndonkam ban dih bad shet jingshet. Hato ki nongpynïaid shnong kim lah dei ban shim khia ïa kum kine kiei kiei?Ka Sorkar mynta kam banse ban wad ïa ki jaka ha ki shnong ba kan pynlong ïa kita ki Landfill (ki ban theh ñiut) bad ban leh pat da ki kor kumno ban pynkylla pat ïa ki ñiut bad khamtam ïa ki kynja plastik sha ki tiar kiba lah ban pyndonkam biang. Hynrei lada ki shnong ki pyneh bad kim kwah satia ban ïatrei lang bad ka Sorkar na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki hi te ka apot sepsngi ka ap ïa ngi.Ki Dorbar Shnong/Dorbar Elaka ki dei ban peit ïa kine kiei kiei kiba lah ban long ka daw jong ki jingpang har rukom. Ka por kam dei shuh ban shu ïa sngap mynthi ne ban shu theh ñiut kat shaba mon. U Bah Restone bad ka kynhun jong u ki sngewkhia bha ïa kane ka phang bad ki wad lad wad lynti kumno ban leh ïa kaba dei ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbret ñiut pathar. Ka shnong ruh ka dei ban ïatreilang bad kane ka kynhun khnang ban ïa bha lang baroh.Ki nongsynshar shnong ha kane ka juk mynta ki dei ban long kiba ïohi jngai bad kiba pyrkhat ym tang ïalade shimet hynrei ïa ki paidbah paidlang kiba hap hapoh ka jingsynshar jong ki.
title: Ki nongsynshar shnong ha ka juk mynta

content: Nongpoh, Lber 10: Kum ka jingburom ïa ki Longkmie halor ka sngi kyrpang jongki ba la tip kum ka International Women’s Day ba la rakhe ha kylleng ki ri ka pyrthei, ka University of Science and Technology (USTM), Baridua Killing ha ka 8 tarik u Lber ka la pynlong da ka jingrakhe ba kyrpang lyngba ki prokram bapher bapher ban ai burom kyrpang ïa ki Longkmie ha katei ka sngi kyrpang jong ki Longkmie.Ka USTM ka la pynlong ruh ïa kane ka jingrakhe da ka jingrekhe ba kyrpang ba la shim bynta da ki department bapher bapher katei ka skul bah. Ka Centre for Gender Studies ka USTM ha kane ka sngi ka la leh kyrpang ruh ban pyni da ki kynja documentary sha ki samla pule ban ai jinghikai halor ka jingdonkam ban sgnewthuh ba dei ban long kumjuh ha ka longbriew ka man briew la ki dei ki kynthei ne ki shynrang khlem da don ka jingïapher ha ka long kynthei ka long shynrang.U Vice chancellor ka USTM, u Prof. GD Sharma u la ai jingkren halor kane ka phang “Gender Inequality and the need for gender centric investment’ ba la dei ruh ban phai khmat kyrpang ïa ki riew kynthei ha ki kam sports hapoh ka ri India.Na ka ka liang ka Economics ryngkat ka Department ka tnad Commerce ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram ai jinghikai halor ka phang ‘Economic Empowerment for Women’ ha ka jylla Meghalaya lyngba ki SHG. Kane ka jingthmu ka long ban saindur na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka ioh ka kot ki longkmie. Ha kane ka prokram ai jinghikai la don bynta lang ruh naduh ka Kong Felicita L. Majaw ka dkhot ka MSCW, Dr. Bandana Chowdry Assistant Professor ka Economic department na Guwahati University ki la shim bynta ha kane ka ka prokram ai jighikai (workshop).Ki nongwan shim bynta kiba hakhmat ha kane ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi kyrpang ki Longkmie, ki la ai ki jingkren ban ai mynsiem bad pynshlur da ki jingïathuh khana ba ngi dei ban jop ïa ki jingeh ha ka jingim kaba ngi ïa kynduh man ka sngi.Ka Kong Felicita L Majaw haba kren ha kane ka sngi ka la ai da shibun ki jingmut jingpyrkhat kiba ju jia man ka por pyrshah ïa ki longkmie bad ki riew kynthei kum ka jingshah lehbein ki Longkmie ne ki riew kynthei kaba la ju jia man ka por ha ka imlang ka sahlang ba ngi la donkam ban pynduhjaid noh bad kum ki Longkmie ki dei ban don ïa ka hok ban imsuk imsaiñ ha ka imlang ka sahlang.Ka Dr. Bandana Chowdry ka la kren halor shibun ki bynta kiba ïa dei bad ka jingpynkupbor kyrpang ïa ki Longkmie bad ka la kdew ruh halor ki bynta ba ngi dei ban pynkup bor ïa ki riew kynthei kum ka jingailad ban kin paw ha ka kam shakri ha ka imlang ka sahlang, ban kyntiew ïa ka pule puthi jongki, ka ioh ka kot, ha ka kam sain hima sima bad kumjuh ruh wat ha ka pyrkhat ka pyrdain ki Longkmie ba ki dei ban long kiba khlaiñ bor ha ka imlang ka sahlang.Ha kawei ka bynta, ka Department ka tnad pharmaceutical science ka la pynlong da ka webinar ban ïa kren halor ka koit ka khiah ki Longkmie bad kum ki longkmie ki dei ban long kiba koit ba khiah. Lyngba jong kane ka sngi ki department bapher bapher ka USTM ki la rakhe kyrpang ïa kane ka sngi kyrpang ki Longkmie ban ai burom ïa ki longkmie ha ka jylla bad ka ri hi baroh kawei.
title: Da ki prokram bapher bapher rakhe ka USTM ïa ka International Women’s Day

content: Shillong, Lber, 10: Ka Synjuk Ki Seng Longkmie Katholik (SKSLK) Archdiocese Shillong, Zone-II ryngkat ka pyrthei baroh kawei ka la rakhe kyrpang ïa ka sngi bakyrpang jong ki kynthei ne ka “International Women Day’s” ha ka sngi u Blei ha Divine Saviour’s Church, Nongthymmai Parish.La sdang ïa kane ka jingrakhe da ka Mass Bakhuid ba la pynmynta da u Lyngdoh Sad ka Jyllaniambah Shillng u Most. Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Parish Priest ka Nongthymmai Parish u Sohblei Augustine Kuttala uba dei u Spiritual Director jong ka Synjuk ki Seng Longkmie Katholik , Zone II.U Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh haba ai ïa ka sneng ka kraw sha ki Longkmie kiba la ïashim bynta ha kane ka lympung ba phra ba la buh ruh ïa ka mat puson kaba ong, “U Kpa jong ki u la ai bynta ïa ki khun kynthei bad ki hynmen shynrang,” ïa kaba la sot na ka kitab u Job 42:15, u la pynpaw ba kane ka dei ka kam phylla jong U Blei ban pynkhraw ka long ba ki kynthei ki don ka bynta kaba khia tam ban ïa tynrong ïa ka kam ka khia ka shon jong ka ïing ka sem bad ka imlang ka sahlang.“Ka kynthei ka dei ka dohnud jong ka ïing ka sem bad u kpa u dei Khlieh ka ïing, sngewkmen pat ki kynthei ne ki longkmie ki ïalong ryngkat lang ym don bakhraw ne barit,” ong u Lyngdoh Sad.Ha kane ka sngi u Lyngdoh Sad u ong ruh ba ki longkmie ba mynta ki la paw bad kiew shaphrang wat ha ka imlang ka sahlang haba ïanujor bad ki shynrang la ha ka kam ka jam ki la kham tbit ki kynthei.“Ki longkmie ne ki kynthei ki dei ka jingaiei jong U Blei bad ki dei ban long borabor kiba nyngkong ban ïaroh ïa u Blei,” u la ong.Hadien ka nguh ka dem Blei ka la don ka jingïalang kaba lyngkot ba la pynïaid da ka Synjuk ba la lamkhmat da ka President jong ka Synjuk ka Kong Cathleen Pyngrope bad kumjuh ka jingïakob rwai da ka ktien U Blei ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongkitkam ka Synjuk ki Seng Longkmie Katholik, Central Body, ki seng longkmie na ki san tylli ki Parish ba kynthup ïa ka Pynthorumkhrah, Laitumkhrah, Nongthymmai, Nongmynsong bad Mawpat.
title: Ka kynthei dei ka dohnud jong ka ïing ka sem bad nyngkong ban mane ïa u Blei: Archbishop Victor

content: Nongpoh, Lber 10: Ki runar kiba ym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ha ka miet jong ka 8 tarik u Lber 2024 ki la leit ban rong tuh ïa kawei ka Auto Rickshaw na ka sem ba la set ïa katei ka Auto Rickshaw bad tang hadien 4 kynta u trai katei ka Auto Rickshaw ula lap pat ïa katei ka Auto Rickshaw na ka surokbah Mawhati ba la iehnoh jyndat da kitei ki runar hadien ba la don ka jingthud ki kor ki bor katei ka Auto Rickshaw.Kane ka Auto Rickshaw kaba la shah tuh ka dei jong u Bah Francis Khymdeit na ka Shnong Sohnidan ha Ri Bhoi District bad katei ka Auto Rickshaw ba la shah tuh ka don ïa u number ML 10 A-1912.Kumba la ïathuh da u Bah Francis Khymdeit, la ong ba kane ka jingshah rong tuh katei ka Auto Rickshaw la tip hadien ba ki la leit peit ha katei ka sem ba ka Auto Rickshaw kam don shuh ha katei ka sem kaba ki la set bad mar kumta hi ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïawad ïa katei ka Auto Rikshaw bad dei hadein kumba saw kynta ei ei ba ki la ïa wad ki la lap noh na ka suork Mawhati ba la jngai kumba 2 km ei ei na ka ïing sah jong ki.U la ong ruh ka daw kaba la pynlong ïa katei ki runar ban iehnoh noh ïa katei ka Auto Rickshaw ha surok, ka dei namar ba katei ka Auto Rickshaw ka la sniew noh bad namar ba kim lah shuh ba leh ei ei ki la shu iehnoh jyndat noh bad phet noh ïa lade ban lait na ka jingshah kem ne wad ha katei ka jingtuh jongki ïa ka Auto Rickshaw.Shuh shuh, u la ïathuh ruh kumba la ioh sngew da ki param manjan la ong ba kitei ki runar ki la wan da ka Scooty ban tuh ïa katei ka Auto Rickshaw bad donbok noh ba la don ka jingthud ha katei ka Auto Rickshaw ba ki runar ki la shu iehnoh noh ha ka surok khlem da ioh pat ban rong tuh syndon ïa katei ka Auto Rickshaw.
title: Na jaka set rongtuh ki runar ïa ka Auto Rikcshaw, iehnoh shiteng lynti

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 10 : Wat la ki dorbar shnong, sengbhalang, ki synjuk jong ki rawon, ki seng pynneh pynsah ïa ki doh um doh wah, ka seng kur Rongrin bad kiwei kiwei kiba don ha baroh ka thaiñ Lyngngam, ki la maham bad pyrkhing haduh katta katta ban pynïap pathar ïa ki doh um doh wah da kaba ber da ki dawai bih, siat bom, khang jar. Hynrei, ki riew shim kabu ki dang don bad ki dang ïaleh pyrshah man ka por, ong u bah Boylan Langrin Myntri ka hima Nonglang Sirdarship.Utei u rangbah haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba ki wah ba kongsan kiba don ha ka thaiñ Lyngngam ba ki rawon bad ki paitbah nongshong shnong ki im sngi ban leit khwai bad leit tong doh, ki dei ka wah blei, Riat tham, wah Riangdo, wah Biu, wah Riangken, wah Riangsih bad bun kiwei kiwei ki wah.Ha kitei ki wah, ki dorbar shnong, sengbhalang bad seng ïada doh um ki la buh da ki signboard ha man la ki jaka bad thoh ïa ki jingmaham, hynrei ki riew shim kabu kim patiaw bad kim kheiñ snep satia. U la ong ruh ba kitei ki riew shim kabu haba ki leit sha ki wah, ki ju rah da ki jar khang bad ki rah ruh da ki kynja dawai tutia ban ber ha wah, khnang ba ki dohkha kin buaid bad ngat ha ki jar bad ki ju rah ruh da ki gelatin ban bom.U la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong ki riew rangbah, ki sengbhalang, ki dorbar shnong bad ki nongsynshar hima jong ka hima Nonglang Sirdarship, ki sngewkhia jur namar dang ha kine ki taïew ba la dep, ki la ïoh jingtip ba ki nongshong shnong ba don ki briew kiba leit pynap jar ha Wahblei, ha kaba ki la lap satang ïa ki dak ki shin ha kaba ki la suba jur ba kitei ki riew shim kabu ki lah ban pyndonkam ruh da ki kynja dawai ban pynïap pathar ïa ki doh um, hynrei kim shym lap shuh ïa ki briew kiba leh ïa katei ka kam.Ha kaba ïadei bad katei ka kam ki riew rangbah bad sengbhalang ki dang buddien ban lap ïa ki bad lada lap ïa kiba don kti kin leh da kaba tyngeh. U la kyntu ruh ïa ki para nongshong shnong ka thaiñ, ba ki dei ban kiar rai maw rai dieng na ka jingpynïap pathar ïa ki doh um doh wah.Lada ki lap ïa kino kino kiba pynïap pathar ïa ki doh um don wah kin pyntip kloi katba lah ha ki sordar, rangbah shnong bad ki sengbhalang khnang ba kin leh ïa kaba donkam.U la ong ruh ba kim dei ban sheptieng namar wat ki bor ka aiñ ruh ki la khang pyrshah ban pynïap dusmon ïa ki doh um doh wah ki mrad ki mreng, ki sim ki doh bad baroh ki jingthaw ba im ha um bad ha ryngkew.
title: Jur ka jingpynïap pathar ïa ki doh um doh wah ha ka thaiñ Lyngngam wat la bun ki jingmana

content: Shillong, Lber, 10: Ki shnong katto katne tylli kiba don hapoh ka Nongbah Shillong ki la pynpaw ïa ka jinglyngngoh bad bitar ruh ha kajuh ka por ïa ka jingbym mih um na ki kor ïing bad kumjuh ruh ki kor sorkar ri ha ka step sngi Thohdieng jong u taïew ba la dep.Kane ka jingbym sam um kynsan jong ka tnat PHE khlem da la ai ki jingpynbna paidbah ka la pynlong ïa ki nongshong shnong ban dom bad bitar kiba lah dep ban buh pali ne ban pynïeng laiñ ïa la ki jong ki borti ne ki tiar rah um ha ki kor sorkar ri.Kane ka jingsdang ban duna ka jingsam um sha katto katne ki shnong ka Nongbah Shillong ka la wanrah ka jingeh kaba khraw bha ïa ki nongshong shnong.Napdeng ki katto katne ki nongshong shnong haba ïakren ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew lyngngoh kaba jur naba kane ka jingmih um ka la ktah namarba ki khlem da la ïoh ban pynlang lypa ïa ka um naba kam shym la don ka jingpynbna ha ki lad pathai khubor halor kane ka jingpynduh um kaba kynsan.Napdeng katto katne ki nongshong shnong haba kren biria ki la ong, “Imat kane ka jingpynduh um kynsan ka lah ban dei ba ki nongtrei ka PHE ki la shem jingeh na kadaw jong ka jingpyrkhing ka rukom pynïaid ïa ki kali sha Mawphlang na ka daw ba ka don ka Monolith Festival,” kren biria katto katne ki nongshong shnong.Watla ka sorkar jylla ha ka dorbar mang tyngka kaba dang shudep na ka liang u Myntri ka tnat PHE u la kam ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la long hakhmat eh na kiwei ki jylla kiba la lah ban pyntreikam bha ïa ka skhim ka sorkar Pdeng ka Jal Jeevan Mission hynrei da peit ïa ka jingtlot ka jingtrei kam ka tnat PHE haba ïadei bad ki rukom sam um ka la long da khongpong namar tang ïa ki shnong ha Nongbah Shillong ym pat lah ban sam um thikna kumno yn lah ban ngeit ba katei ka skhim ka la lah ban pynpoi um sha manla ki thliew ïing lyngba ki kor um ha ki Ïing jong ka skhim JJM.Naduh katei hi ka sngi Thohdieng ka jingsdang ka jingkyrduh ka umbam umdih ha Nongbah Shillong ka la ïaibteng ha kaba ka jingsam um na ka tnat PHE ka la mih kham slem ha ka por mynstep bad ha ka por mynmied pat ka shu tang hapdeng katto katne por.Wat la tip bad sngewthuh ba ha kine ki bnai manla u snem ka don beit ka jingkyrduh um hynrei ym lah satia na ki bor badei peit ba kin lah tehlakam ïa kane ka jingkyrduh um.
title: Syrtok ki nongshong shnong sdang duna ka sam um kynsan na ka PHE

content: Shillong, Lber, 10: U General Secretary ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Balang u la plie paidbah ïa ka Maitshaphrang Fitness Centre hapoh ka shnong Mawïongrim ïa kaba la pynbit pynbiang da ka KSU Mawïongrim Unit.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, une u nongïalam ka seng u la pynskhem ruh ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka KSU Mawïongrim Unit na ka bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2024-2027Ha ka jingplie ïa kane ka jaka kilan met la sakhi lang u Vice President samla Biangbor L.Paliar, u Sports Secretary samla Eric Nongkynrih, u Assistant secretary ka Mawlai Circle u samla Donboklang Sawkmie, Assistant Finance Secretary samla Robert khongsit bad kiwei kiwei.Haba ai jingkren sha ki nongkitkam bathymmai jong ka shnat treikam ka KSU Mawiongim Unit u Samla Donald Thabah u la kren shaphang ka jingïohrung ki mynder lyngba ka shongkha shongman bad ka jingleh Benami ki trai ri trai muluk kaba pynïohlad ban buhai shnong bad ban khaii laitluid ha kane ka jylla.U la banjur ruh ïa ka jingkynrei stet u drok ha manla ki kyndong kynshrot ha ki jaka ba don tang para Khasi bad ka lah ban dei ka jingleh jongno re kiba kwah ban pynngop ïa ki samla Khasi ha une u jingdih ba shyrkhei khnang ba ki samla Khasi kin troiñ ha baroh ki liang.U la kyntu ruh ïa ka Mawïongrim Unit ba ki dei ban peitngor bha ïa ka ïaid ka ieng ki mynder kiba ju ïaid manla ka khyllipmat na ka surokbah kiba ym lah ban tip ïoh ki dei kiba wan leh ki kam sniew laiphew jait ban pynsniew dur ïa ka imlang ka sahlang ha kane ka Jylla.
title: Plie ka KSU ïa ka Maitshaphrang Gym Fitness Centre ha Mawlai Mawïongrim

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber, 10: Ki nongïalam bad ki nongkyrshan jong ka Hill Sate People Democratic Party (HSPDP) jong ka ri lum Khasi bad Jaiñtia, hadien ba ki la ïohi lyngba ki lad pathai khubor ba ka kong Elizabeth Mathew Nongbri kaba la kam ïalade ba ka dei ka nongseng jong ka North East Sunshine Trust (India), ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Dr Jitendra Singh Myntri Khynnah ba peit ïa ka tnad Atomic Energy ban sdang biang ïa ka jingtih Uranium ha Meghalaya, ki la bitar lep bad ki la byrthen da kaba tyngeh ba kin ym ailad da leilei ban sdang ïa ka jingtih Uranium hapoh ka jylla.Ka kong Badariti Lyngdoh Nonglait president ka HSPDP Sengkmie (Women Wing), ha u kyrwoh ba la pyllait mynta ka sngi, ka la ong ba ka jingtih Uranium ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia ka la sdang ha ki snem ba mynshuwa. Hynrei u (L) Maieit Hopingstone Lyngdoh u nongseng jong ka party HSPDP bad u (L) Pastor P.B.M Basaïawmoit ryngkat ki sengbhalang jong ka jylla, ki la ïeng pyrshah bad ki la ïakhun ban ym ailad ban tih Uranium. Ki la jop haduh ba baroh ki nongtrei jong ka Uranium Corporation India Limited ka Kompeni kaba tih ïa utei u marpoh khyndew ki la hap ban phet krad noh.Nalorkata, ka la ong ruh ba u (L) Maieit Hopingstone Lyngdoh u la leit ban ïashim bynta ruh ha ki jingïalang pyrshah Uranium jong ki ri ka pyrthei kum ha Germany, Switzerland, Hungary bad kiwei kiwei ki dorbar bah jong ki ri ka pyrthei kiba pyrshah Uranium, ban kyntu ba kin ai jingkyrshan lem halor ka jingpyrshah jong ka HSPDP ban tih Uranium hane ha ri lum Khasi Jaiñtia. Ha kajuh ka por ka la ong ba da ka jingpyrshah jong ka HSPDP ban tih Uranium la jop shisyndon.Katei ka nongïalam jong ka HSPDP sengkmie ka la kynthoh ruh halor ka jingkam jong ka kong Elizabeth, ba ka jingpyrshah tih Uranium ka dei namar ba ki ïoh jingmyntoi bad ka la pan jingpynshai ruh na katei ka nongseng jong ka NEST, ba lada ki ba pyrshah tih Uranium ki ïoh jingmyntoi ka dei ban pyni da ki jingpynshisha kiei kita.Ka la ong ruh ba haduh mynta ka HSPDP ka dang ïakren bad ka dang ïai khot ïa ki nongshong shnong, ki trai khyndew bad ki paitbah kiba shong ha ki jaka ba don Uranium kum ha Domïasiat, Kylleng, Pyndengsohïong bad kiwei ba kim dei ban ailad ban tih Uranium.Lada ka sorkar India ka dang thmu ban wan khlong Uranium biang, na ka liang ka HSPDP kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti ban khang lad ïa katei ka jingthmu. Ka HSPDP kan sa pynsngew biang sha ka sorkar ba kam dei ban shah lada don jingthgmu ban tih Uranium ha kano kano ka por.Ka la ong ba lada ailad ban khlong biang ïa u Uranium na ri lum Khasi Jaiñtia, ka jingma kaba khraw ka ap ïa ka jaitbynriew namar u Uranium u don ka bih kaba shyrkhei kaba ktah ym tang ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki briew. Hynrei wat ïa ki jingthung jingtep, ki mrad ki mreng bad baroh ki jinggthaw ba im. Kumta horkit hordang kan ym shah bad kan ïai pyrshah ïa katei ka jingthmu.Shuh shuh ka la ong ba bun ki paitbah ki kynnoh ba ka HSPDP ka leit ban kyrshan ïa ka sorkar NPP, hynrei wat la ka HSPDP ka leit ban ai jingkyrshan ruh kam shym la kynriah na ki nongrim ba ka party ka ïeng naduh ba sdang, hynrei ka shu leit ban kyrshan na ka bynta ka roi ka par ha ki Constituency.
title: Byrthen ka HSPDP ïa ka NEST ba kwah phah tih Uranium biang na ri lum Khasi Jaiñtia

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber, 10: Ka long ka jingmyntoi bad ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki khynnah ka FGEM Higher Secondary School Nongspung ha kaba ka ophis u Commandan 4th BN, MLP, Sohpian ha ka taiew baladep ki ai jingpynshai ha kaba ïadei kumno ban kiar na u drok bad ban pynsngewthuh ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam Pulit ba lait ha ka tnat PulitHa kane ka prokram kaba la long hapoh ka skul la pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u Principal Bah Kyrshan Marngar ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ki nonghikai bad ki khynnah skul. U Principal u la pdiang sngewbha ïa u Commandant uba la kloi ban ai jingpynsngewthuh sha ki khynnah skul.U Principal u la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Bah Syiem ba u la wanrah ka jingïadei kaba jan hapdeng ki paidbah lyngba ka Civic Action Programme bad kiwei pat ki prokram bapher bapher khamtam ban ai jingïarap ïa ki paid nongshong shnong kane ka thain khamtam ki baduk kiba don hajan kane ka ktem jong ka 4th MLP Bn, Sohpian.U Bah Lakador Syiem u la pynshai bniah shaphang jingsniew bad ka jingshyrkhei u drok lyngba ka Presentation halor ka Phang “Ill Effect of Drugs on Youths and Society” bad batai bniah shaphang ki lai jait ki drug, u Natural Drug, Semi Synthetic Drug bad u Synthetic Drug.“To ngin ïa ong em ïa u drug, to ngin kiar na ki kam sniew ban leh ïa ki kam babha namar nyngkong u pynsngewbang hynrei hadien u wanrah tang ïa ki jingbabe suba,” la ong u Bah Syiem.“Nga ruh nga dei u khynnah skul kum ma phi mynshwa nga long kumne dei na ki nonghikai, ki kmie ki kpa kiba la hikai ïa nga”la pynshlur u Bah Syiem ïa ki khynnah skul kiba la biang ka rta ban aplai ïa ka kam Pulit namar ha kane ka juk kyrduh kam Sorkar dei satang ha ka tnad Pulit ba bun ki nongkyndong ki dang ïoh kam Sorkar kaba dang lah ban ai kam da ki hajar ngut.
title: Kiar na ki kam sniew kiba wan rah ka jingbabe bad ka jingsngewsih hadien: Bah L.Syiem

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 10: Ka Hynñiew Trep Youth Council HYC Nongtrai circle ha ka sngi saitjaiñ, ha ka jingïalam jong u secretary u Blastarland Sohmad bad u vice president u Johnpaul Kharsohphoh, ki la leit ban jingïarap ïa kawei ka longïing ka kong Magdalina Ïawphniaw bad u Francis Dkhar ha shnong Nongrim, kaba la shah bam duh ka ïing ha ka ding ha ka jingjia kaba la jia ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka shnong Nongrim thawrat ka don hajan jong ka shnong Riangsih bad kane ka longïing ka la don lai ngut ki khun kynthei bad uwei u khun shynrang. La ong ba ki trai jong kane ka ïing ki ïoh kum bakla hi ba ym pynlip ïa ka ding ha ka por ba ki shet jingshet hapoh ïing, ha ka por ba ka kmie ka dang leit shim bynta ha ka program jong ka V.O hapoh shnong Nongrynñiaw.La ong ba hadien ba ka la wanphai na ka program, ka la ïohi ba ka ding ka dang klang bha, ha kaba ki dkhot jong ka ïing ki la pyrshang ban tem ïa ka hynrei kim lah satia. Ha kane ka jingjia, kane ka longïing ka la duh ïa shibun ki tiar ki tar bad ki jingdon jingem baroh naduh ki tin sop ïing, ki tiar shet tiar tiew, ki jaiñ ki nep, ki ksiar ki ksah bad u kpa u khaw baroh.Na ka liang ka seng kat I bor I ba rit ka la kner ïa la ki jingïarap ïa kane ka longïing ba la shah bam duh bad lyngshop ha ka ding. Ka seng ka kyrpad ruh ïa ki para sengbhalang bad ïa ka sorkar ban phai khmat ban kner jingïarap sha kane ka longïing.
title: Leh isynei ka HYC sha ka longïing ba pluh ïing

content: Shillong, Lber, 10: Naduh u Rikman G. Momin u la shimti kum u President jong ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Meghalaya State Unit, u la long barabor uba kloi ban pdiang ïa baroh ki dkhot ka seng bad kane ka la urlong shuh shuh hadien ka jingsakhi ïa ka jingrung jong kumba 90 ngut ki dkhot ka Congress ha Khliehriat ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha ryngkat ka jingplie ïa ka ophis treikam jong ka party ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.Hadien ka jingwan pynïasnoh jong u MLA barim ka Trinamool Congress na Salmanpara Constituency u Winnerson D. Sangma dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi bad ka jingpynïasoh jong ki dkhot thymmai na East Jaiñtia ka la nang pynkhaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka Party bad ha kine ki sngi ban sa wan yn sa nang sakhi shuh shuh ïa ka jingrung kiwei kiba la kham paw ha ka saiñpyrthei.Ka don ka jingkhih napoh napoh kaba la nang pynksan ïa ki rukom trei jong ka party hadien ba u Rikman G Momin ula jied ïa ki nongkitkam kiba treishitom ban pynkiew ïa ka seng. Ym lah ban nujor ba ka seng BJP ka dei ka seng saiñ hima kaba heh duh ha pyrthei. Ka jingtrei shitrhem jong ka kynhun jong u Rikman ka paw lyngba ka jinglah jongki ban pynïar ïa ki shnat treikam jong ka seng ha man la ki konstituensy, la ong ka Seng.Haba kylli na ki nongrung dkhot thymmai kaei kaba pynlong ïa ki ban iehnoh ïa ka Congress uwei na ki ula ong, “nga rung sha ka BJP hadien ba nga ïohi ïa ka jinglah jong ki nongkitkam ka party ban pynsngewthuh sha ki paidbah ïa ki skhim bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar BJP bad kane ka la pynktik ïa ka mynsiem jong nga’.Sa iwei na ki nongrung dkhot ila bynrap da kaba ong, “ha ki jylla ba synshar ka BJP ka roi ka par ka la nang kiew ynda ïa nujor bad ka jylla jong ngi bad ka la wan ka por ba ki paidbah ka jylla ki dei ban pdiang ïa ka BJP kumba pdiang ïa kiwei ki National Party namar ka BJP kan sa nang ïai synshar ha Delhi hapoh ka jingïalam u Narendra Modi kum u Myntri Rangbah bad kan ym myntoi lada ka jylla jong ngi kam ïasnoh kti lang bad ka party.”Haba ïakren bad u President u Rikman Momin ula ong, ‘ki paidbah hi ki dei ki nongrah khubor ïa ki kambah ba ka BJP ka leh hapoh ka jingïalam u Myntri rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi ban kyntiew ïa ka ri bad ban kham sngewthuh shai ïa kiei kiei baroh ïakren bad kito kiba la ïoh kheit ïa u soh lyngba ki jingïarap babun ba la wan na ki skhim kiba u Modi u la pynbna bad shim ruh ïa ki jingsngew jong kito kiba la ïakynduh bad ki nongkitkam ka party kiei ki jingpynshai ba ki ïoh kaba lah ban wanrah jingkylla ha ka jingim jong ki.
title: Nang bun kiba pynïasoh sha ka BJP hapoh ka jingïalam u Rikman G Momin

content: Shillong Lber, 10: Ka Meghalaya State Legal Services Authority mynta ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynlong ïa ka National Lok Adalat ha baroh ki district jong ka jylla Meghalaya, hapoh ka lama jongka National Legal Services Authority (NALSA).U Member Secretary, Meghalaya State Legal Services Authority Bah E. Kharumnuid, ula pyntip ba ha katei ka National Lok Adalat, la shong bishar ïa ki 1347 tylli ki mukotduma bad ïa ki 371 tylli ki mukotduma kiba la sahteng na ka bynta ban pynïasuk bad ban ïa beit noh.Kila don baroh 1718 tylli ki mukotduma kiba la shah tian bishar, ha kaba la pynïasuk noh ïa ki 340 tylli ki mukotduma ha ka jinglut jingsep kaba kot T.1,64,70,567.
title: 1718 tylli ki mukotduma bishar ka National Lok Adalat

content: Shillong, Lber 10 : Kum ka jingnoh synñiang ryngkat ka jingthmu ba ka pule puthi ha ka thaiñ Mawkynrew kan kiew sha khmat, u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, MLA ka Mawkynrew Constituency ha kajuh ka sngi kata ha ka ka 08 tarik u Lber, 2024 u la leit ban aiti ïa ka bus kit khynnah skul sha ka Holy Cross Higher Secondary School bad plie ïa ka ïing skul ba thymmai jong ka Mawkynrew Presbyterian School.ïa kane ka bus skul u MLA u la pynïoh ha ka mang tyngka kaba long 10 lak tyngka katba ka iing skul pat ka dei kaba la shna na ka mang tyngka jong ka Special Rural Work Programme (SRWP) 2022-2023 kaba long 8 lak.Ha ka jingïalang aiti ïa ka bus skul la ïa donlang da ki bor pynïaid ka Holy Cross Higher Secondary School, ki nongïalam ka Balang Katholik, ki khynnah skul nalor kiwei pat. Ka skul ha ryngkat ka jingsngew kmen ka la pynlong ia ka prokram kum ki jingai jingkren khublei ïa u MLA na ka liang ki bor pynïaid skul bad ki jingrwai jingshad na ki khynnah.U MLA ha kane ka jingïalang haba kren kum u kongsan u la pynbna ban ai sa 10 lak tyngka ka jingïarap pisa na ka bynta ban pynheh ïa ka ïing skul kumba la ïamir jingmut bad ki bor pynïaid skul.Katba ha ka jingïalang plie ïa ka ïing skul ba thymmai jong ka Mawkynrew Presbyterian School, la ïa donlang da ki bor pynïaid kane ka skul, ki nongïalam shnong nalor ki nonghikai bad ki khynnah skul.Nalor kane ka jingplie ïa kane ka ïing skul ba thymmai, u Bah Banteidor u la kular ba un peit bniah ïa ki jingdonkam ban nang pynbha shuh shuh ïa kane ka skul.Ka phang jingkren u Bah Banteidor na kine ar tylli ki jingïalang ka long halor ka jingangnud jong u ban kyntiew ïa ka pule puthi ha kaba u la ong, “Ka Literacy Rate ka la kiew bha haba nujor bad kiwei pat ki snem ba la dep”.U la ong ba na ki jingnoh synñiang kiba u la noh sha ki skul ha ka Constituency hi bunsien kam ju long lehnohei bad kumta u ïohi bad ïai kyntu ban don ka jingïatreilang na ka por sha ka por ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ ha ki liang baroh.
title: Da ka Bus ïa ka Holy Cross HS School, ka iing skul ïa ka Mawkynrew Presbyterian – Aiti u Bah Banteidor

content: Shillong, Lber, 10: U Nongïalam jong ka All India Trinamool Congress u Mukul Sangma uba dei ruh u Myntri Rangbah barim ka jylla u la takrain tyngeh ïa ka Congress kaba la pynbna ban pynieng kyrtong na ki ar tylli ki Lok Sabha Seat ha Meghalaya.U Mukul u la kynthoh ruh ïa ka jingkren jong u Jairam Ramesh ba ka Trinamool Congress kam shym la ap hynrei ka la ïaid beit shakhmat ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ha ki 42 tylli ki Seat ha ka jylla West Bengal.“Ngi la ap la slem bad nga ngeit ba baroh ki ïohi bad ka ri baroh kawei ka peit ïa ngi bad ap da ka jingïaishah. Ka la don ka jingthmu ban sei tang uwei u kyrtong na ka INDIA Bloc ban pynthikna ba ngin ïatreilang kum kawei ka kynhun hynrei kane kam shym la urlong satia,” la ong u Mukul ha ka sngi u Blei.“Mynta lada ka Congress ka ong ba ka TMC kam ap bad ka la ïaid shakhmat ban pynbna ïa ki 42 ngut ki kyrtong ha West Bengal, nga ngeit ba ngin hap ban pynkynmaw ïa ka jingshisha ba ka Congress kam shym la shim ïa ka rai bad kaei kaba la ïakut,” u la ong.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka Congress ka la pyndkut ïa ka jingïateh, u Sangma u la ong, “kam long kaba shisha ba ki la ïaid shakhmat bad ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka Meghalaya. Ha Meghalaya, ki don tang ar tylli ki Seat. Na ki ar tylli, ka Congress ka ladep ïaid shakhmat ban pynbna la ki jong ki kyrtong.”
title: Takraiñ u Mukul Sangma ïa ka Congress ba pynïeng kyrtong na Shilong bad Tura

content: Shillong, Rymphang 10 : Uwei na ki nongïalam ba pawnam bad ieit bha ïa ka jaidbynriew uba long mynta u Myntri ba peit ïa ka tnad Arts and Culture ka tnad kaba peit ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jinglong tynrai jongki jaidbynriew trai ri trai muluk u bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ki don lai tylli ki mawbyrsiew kiba tehsong bad pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jaidbynriew bad kine ki long ka jinglong trai ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap, jinghiarpateng bad ka ktien ka thylliej. ïa kane u la kren ha ka Sngi Saitjain ha ka jingpynhap pyrda ïa ka tamasa Mawbynna ne ka Monolith Festival kaba Lai kaba la long ha Heritage Village, Mawphlang naduh 7 tarik bad kut ha ka 9 tarik.U la ong “Kane ka tamasa ym tang ba ka wanrah ïa ka jingïalong kawei ka jaidbynriew hynrei ka pyni ruh sha ka pyrthei ïa ka jinglong ïatylli, ka jingpawnam ha ki jinglong tynrai bad kolshor jongka jaidbynriew Khasi.Ka long ruh kum ka rynsan ban ïoh sei madan ïa kiei kiei ki jinglong tynrai naduh ka shad ka tem, ka rwai ka siaw, ki rukom shna jingshna, thaiñ jingthaiñbad kiwei kiwei kiba la ïalam bad hikai da ki longshwa man shwa jong ngi. Lyngba kane ka tamasa ki khun samla ne ki riew don sap ki ïoh ban sei ïa ki sap bad talen jongki. Kane ka tamasa kan ïeng ruh kum ka sakhi ban pyni ïa ka jingriewspah ka deiti ne kolshor jong ki jaidbynriew trai ri jongka jylla Meghalaya”.U bah Paul u ai khublei ïa ka jingshimkhia ban pynlong ïa kane ka tamasa bad u ong ba u kyrshan ïaka jingangnud jong ka KHADC ban kyntiew bad pynneh pynsah ïa ka kolshor u Khasi.Kum u briew uba ieit ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jinglong tynrai jongka jaidbynriew u la buh thong ruh ban wad bniah shuh shuh shaphang ki jaidbynriew riewlum jongka jylla bad halor kane la pynbna ruh da u Myntri Rangbah ha ka Sngi Saitjain ha ka jingkren jongu ba kumba la thrang bad lam khmat da u bah Paul Lyngdoh ka sorkar kan ai ka jingkyrshan sha baroh ki District Council hapoh ka jylla mar 50 lak tyngka ban leh ïa ka jingwad bniah shuh shuh shaphang ka jinglong tynrai jong ki jaidbynriew riewlum kiba don hapoh ka jylla.U Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma ha ka jingkren jongu u la ong “Kane ka song tyngka kan ïai kiew man la u snem, khnang ba ki District Council kin lah ban sdang ïa ka jingwad bniah ha ki liang ki bapher bapher, la ka dei ha ka thoh ka tar, ka jingring video ne kiwei kiwei ki lad ban buh rekod ïa ka kolshor kyrpang jong ki jaidbynriew bapher bapher ha ka jylla Meghalaya” ong u Myntri Rangbah.Ula pynbna ruh ïa ka CM Research Scholarship Program ïa kaba la lamkhmat da u Myntri ka tnad Arts & Culture Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha kaba ka sorkar jylla kan kyrshan kumba 50 ngut ki nongwad bniah haduh mar 3 Lak tyngka ïa kawei ka jingwad bniah ne Research/Scholar ba kin wad bniah ha kaba ïadei bad ka kolshor bad ka histori jong ki jaidbynriew trai ri ka jylla.Ka jingjied kan long lyngba ka jingthaw ïa ka Committee ka ban khmih bniah ïa ki nongaplai kiba dei hok ban ïoh.
title: 3 tylli ki mawbyrsiew ba teh song bad pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jaidbynriew ong u bah Paul ha ka Monolith

content: Shillong, Lber 10 : Ka KHADC ka la rai ban pyneh triang ban da ailad satia ïa ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar pdeng lyngba ka Atomic Minerals Directorate (AMD) ba kan leh ïa ka jingwad bniah lane ban khlong ïa u mar Uranium na kino kino ki jaka ba hap ha u pud u sam jong ka Council bad ruh ha ka jylla.“Ka Council baroh kawei, naduh ki Executive Member haduh baroh ki MDC ngin ieng ban pyneh beit triang ban pyrshah ïa kane ka jingthmu kumba ngi la pyneh naduh mynshwa bad ngin ïai bteng haduh mynta ban pyrshah tih ïa u Uranium,” ong u Chief Executive Member ka Council, Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem.U ong ruh ba ka KHADC ka kwah ruh ban phah ïa ka khubor kaba shai sha ka sorkar India bad kumjuh lyngba ka sorkar jylla ba ka Council kan ym ailad satïa ne ai kino kino ki jingbit ïa kino kino ki bor ne ki kynhun ban pynlong ïa ka jingwad bniah ne tih Uranium na ki jaka ba hap ha ka jingpeit jong ka Council.
title: Da lei lei ngin ym ailad ba kin tih ne wad bniah Uranium : CEM KHADC

content: Laitryngew, Lber 10: Palat lak ngut u paidlang u la poi sha ka jingïaseng KJP Synod Sepngi kaba la long ha Balang Presbyterian Laitryngew mynta ka sngi.Kane ka jingïaseng mynta ka sngi, la ong kiba bun ba ka lah ban dei ka jingïaseng Synod kaba hehduh naduh ba la sdang ïa ka KJP Synod Sepngi 22 snem mynshuwa.Hynrei la ïathuh ruh ba ka surok ban leit sha Laitryngew ka la sdang ban sahkut kali naduh 7mer ter ter naduh ka por mynstep bad ki don kiba mih na Shillong por 7 baje mynstep ki dang poi ha Laitryngew haduh ban da sdang ka jingïaseng kaba ar kata ha ka por 1:30 mynsngi.Kiwei pat ki kali kiba wan na ki thaiñ Jaiñtia Hills ki la poi ha Laitryngew ha ka por 6 baje mynstep.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshakri, ha ka por 10:30 mynstep ïa ka khubor ka jingïalap ïa ka ktien U Blei la sam da u Rev. KB Snaitang bad la pynshit rhem da ki jingrwai na ka Jingiaseng Khynnah Balang Laitryngew. Nangta ka Choir na ka Balang Kulang, Standing Choir Presbytery bad Shella Presbytery.Nangta ha ka jingshakri kaba 1: 30 ia ka khubor na ka ktien U Blei la sam da u Rev. GPL Gadew, uba hapdeng ka jingdon lang u MP Bah Vincent Pala, u Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad Sangma,u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, Bah Prestone Tynsong bad kiwei kiwei de ki Myntri, u la ther tyngeh ïa ki bor synshar bad ki nongmihkhmat bad ïa ki paidbah kum ki nongjied.La ioh ruh ïa ki jingrwai Choir na ka Balang Nongpyndeng, Sohiong, Synod Standing Choir bad Balang Laitryngew.
title: Palat lak tuid u paidlang sha Laitryngew, lah ban dei ka Jingïaseng Synod ba heh tam

content: Shillong, Lber 10 : Ki Nongtrei ba shitrhem bad ki Nongïalam ka NPP Mookaiaw Constituency, West Jaintia Hills ki la rai ban trei shitom katba lah ban pynthikna ïa ka jingjop don burom jong ka kyrtong ka party ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha 2024 na Shillong Parliamentary constituency.ïa kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingïalang kaba heh bha bala pynlong ha ka shnong Mookaiaw ha ka 9 tarik Rymphang 2023 ( Sngi Saitjain).Ki nongïalam ka party bad ki nongkitkam na ki shnong bapher bapher kiba hap hapoh ka Mookaiaw constituency ki la ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalang.“Ngi la ïarai lang ban trei shitom ban pynthikna ïa ka jingjop ka kyrtong jong ngi” ong ki Nongïalam ka party kiba la ong ba ki paidbah ka constituency kiba kut jingmut shisha ban ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ïa ka party.
title: Rai ki Nongtrei ba shitrhem ka NPP Mookaiaw ban pynjop don burom ïa ka Dr Ampareen

content: Shillong, Lber 10 : Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la ïoh ïa ka jingïaroh kaba khraw halor ka jinglah ban pynphuh pynphieng ïa ka Monolith Festival mynta ka kynti kaba long naduh ka 07tarik haduh 09 tarik mynta u bnai ha Mawphlang, hynrei ha kajuh ka por ka la mih ruh ka jingkhñium ha kawei ka liang.Kiba bun ki nongwan kai sha katei ka tamasa ki khmih lynti ban ïoh mad ïa ka bam ka dih tynrai kumba long ka kyrteng ryngkat ka jingkhmih lynti ba ki jaka bam kin don bun tylli bad ruh ha ka dor kaba biang.“Ngi dap da ka jingkmen ba ka District Council ka la pynlong biang ïa kane ka tamasa, ngi la khmih lynti ba nalor ki prokram ba harukom ngin ïoh mad ruh ïa ka bam tynrai kaba harukom na ki hima bapher bapher,” ong i Kong I Suting.Itei i longkmie i la kdew ruh ba ka KHADC lada ka pynlong biang ha ka snem ban wan kadei ban peit ba ki jait jingbam ki dei ban long ki jingbam tynrai ym ki jait jingbam kiba lah ban ïoh na ïew na hat.“Baroh kiba wan lang bad ngi ki la khmih lynti ban ïoh mad ïa ki jingbam tynrai kum na Ri Bhoi, na ki thaiñ Nongstoiñ, na ki thaiñ War bad kumta ter ter ym ki jait jingbam kiba ju die man ka sngi ha ki dukan bad ha ki iew ki hat,” i la ong.Iwei pat i longkmie khlem da kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng i la ïathuh ba i la wan baroh shi iing ban wan sakhi ïa ka Monolith Festival bad ban wan mad ïa ki jingbam tynrai. “Ki don katto katne ki jait jingbam kiba ngi kwah ban mad tangba ka dor ka la rem shaba palat. Lehse na ka bynta kiba kham bit kham biang ka dang tad palat hynrei na ka bynta ki riew paidbah kiba kwah ban mad ïa ki jingbam tynrai khlem pep ki hap ban pynlut baroh shi taiew ka bai bylla,” i la ong.Kiba bun ki paidbah ki ïathuh ba ki jingbam ba kham phylla ha katei ka tamasa dei tang iwei ar tylli eh ki dukan ba ki buh ïa ki tham, ki ñianglong, ki shymprong bad katto katne ki kynja khñiang. Hynrei kiwei pat ki long beit kumjuh man ki dukan.“Ka tamasa tynrai kadei ban don kham bun ki jingbam tynrai hynrei ngi lap ba don tang iwei ar tylli ki dukan ba buh kum ki dohum kum ki sher syngkai bad dohthli,” ong sa u Bah P Swer. Haba kylli kaei ka jingai jingmut, une u rangbah u la ong ba ka KHADC ha u snem ban wan kadei ban bthah ba man ki Hima ki dei ban buh kawei ka dukan bam kaba dei beit tang ki jingbam tynrai.“Ka KHADC ka la pyrshang, hynrei lada ki kwah ban long janai ki dei ban sdang ïa kane. Bun kiba kwah ban mad ïa ki jingbam dihsha ba ju shet kum ha ki bynta jong ka West Khasi Hills, Ri Bhoi bad kumta ter ter. Katno tylli ki dukan phi ïohi ba ki buh ïa ka shriew, phankaro, putharo, pumaloi bad kiwei kiwei,” u la bynrap biang.U Bah N Lyngdoh pat u la ong ba ka jingduna ki dukan bam kadei kawei pat ka mat ba ka Council ka hap ban buh hakhmat lada ka pynlong biang ha u snem ban wan naba bun ki paidbah ki hap ban ieng laiñ slem slem ban ïoh bam.Une u rangbah ruh u la kubur lang ba lada ka KHADC ka ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan na ka sorkar kadei ruh ban tehlakam ïa ka jingrem dor ka bam ka dih ha kane ka tamasa. “Ban ïoh lehkmen lang da baroh kiba wan, ka bam kadei ban pahuh, ka dor kadei ban long kaba pdeng bad ruh ki jingbam ki dei ban long kiba bha. Ngi kyrmen skhem da ka jingkyrshan jong ka sorkar, ka KHADC ka lah ban pynduna ia ka bai dukan,” u la ong.Kawei pat kaba jan baroh ki paidbah ki kyntu ïa ka District Council ba kan pyrkhat biang shwa ban pynlong ïa kane ka tamasa ha ka snem ban wan kadei ïa ka por. “Malu mala kumba 80,000 haduh 90,000 ngut ki khun samla jong ka jylla ki duh ban sakhi ïa ka jingiphuh jong ka Monolith Festival tang na ka daw ba ka KHADC ka pynlong ha ki bnai ba ki hap ban ïakhun ïa ka SSLC bad HSSLC. Lada ka lah ban pynlong noh tang ha u bnai Nohprah – Kyllalyngkot lane ha ki bynta ba khatduh jong Lber – Iaiong ma ki ruh ki la ïoh ban lehkmen lang,” pynpaw ki paidbah ba bun.Tangba kiba bun hi ki ai jingmut ba dei ban pynlong ha u bnai Nohprah – Kyllalyngkot namar ki skul ruh dang ïoh shuti bad ki samla ba ïakhun ïa ka SSLC ne HSSLC ki dang lah ban wan kai shiphang arphang sha kane ka tamasa.Kyllum lang haba kren pat halor ka tamasa, baroh baroh ki la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka KHADC bad ong ba ka rukom pynïaid ka la paka palat. Tangba, ki dang don hi kiba ai jingmut ba katei ka tamasa kadei ruh ban long ka kabu ban ailad ïa ki heprit ba dang khie bad ki khun samla ba donsap ba kin ïoh mih rynsan.“Haba ong tamasa tynrai kadei ka rynsan na bynta baroh kiba kyntiew ïa ka tynrai bad ka kolshor jong ka Jaidbynriew Khasi. Dei ha kum kine ki lympung ba dei ban ai ka rynsan kaba kyrpang na bynta jong ki,” ong iwei i Mei-ieid iba poi sha katei ka lympung ryngkat ka riam tynrai.Ka khubor kaba itei i riewtymmen i ai sha ka KHADC ka long, “Lada kane kadei ka tamasa tynrai, nga sngewdei ba kiba wan sha kane ka tamasa ki dei ban wan ha ki riam tynrai. Lada baroh ki sdang ban leh kumta, khlem artatien ki nongjngohkai pyrthei na sha shilliang duriaw kin sa long ma ki ki nongrah khubor kylleng ka pyrthei ïa kane ka tamasa tynrai.”
title: Ïoh jingïaroh ka Monolith Festival, tangba shah khñium ha kawei ka liang

content: Shillong, Lber, 10: Ka tnat Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi u Blei ka la pynbna ban ai khusnam T. 1 lak ïa kino kino ki briew kiba lah ban ai ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah kaba lah ban ïoh ksai na ka bynta ban ïohkem ïa kino kino ki briew kiba donkti ban pynbthei ïa u bom IED ha Them Ïewmawlong ha ka miet sngi Saitjaiñ.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rijuraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ïa ka kyrteng jong ki nongai jingtip yn sa buhrieh kyrpang. U SP u la ong ba ki nongai jingtip ki lah ban phah ïa ka jingpyntip sha ka Special Cell lyngba ka Call/Text/WhatsApp ha u mobile number 9366790273 lane lyngba ka email: specialcelLekh.m1p-@gmail.com.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ha ka miet sngi Saitjain ha ka por kumba 10:30 baje mynmiet, u bom Improvised Explosive Device (IED) u la bthei ha kawei ka ïing tap tin bym don shuh mano ruh ba ba shong basah kaba don hajan ka Syndicate Bus Stand, Punjabi Lane, Them Ïewmwlong.U SP u la pyntip ba ïa u bom IED la buh hapoh ka tin. Ka jingbthei, ïa kaba la suba ba la pyndonkam da ki Gelatin Stick ba la buh hapoh kane ka ing tap shiliang, kaba la pynjulor ïa ki iit jong ki jingkhang iit jong ki ing kiba don markhap bad kane ka ing ba la jia ka jingbthei.Uwei u nongïaid lynti uba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Lakhan Singh u la mynsaw malu mala na ki bynta jong ka kjat namarba ka jingsied jong ki phngit ba la mih na ka jingbthei.Shuh shuh u SP u la ong ba ka kynhun kaba donkti ha kane ka kam runar ka dei kaba syriem kum ka jingbthei kaba la jia ha ki snem baladep ha kaba ka seng kieng atiar ba la kheiñ beaiñ ka Hynnniewtrep National Liberation Coyuncil ka la shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh. Hynrei, ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingbthei, tad haduh ha kane ka kynti ba la pynmih ïa kane ka khubor, ym shym la don satia kano kano ka kynhun ne ka seng kieng atiar ka ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh halor kane ka jingbthei.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la ujor da ka ejahar ba la rejistar Sadar Police Station na ka bynta ban pynlong shuh shuh ïa ka jingtohkit hapoh ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act bad ka Explosive Substances Act.U SP u la ong ruh ba ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills ki la kut jingmut ban tohkit bniah bin pa bin ban ïohkem ïa kiba donkti bad ban tian bishar ïa ki hakhmat ka aiñ.“Na ka bynta kane, ngi pan ka jingïatreilang na ki paidbah ïoh ïa ka jingjop,” la kyrpad u SP.
title: 1 lak thong ki Pulit ïa kiba ai jingtip ïa ka jingpynbthei IED ha Them Ïew Mawlong
