content: Shillong, Lber 11: Ka kynhun lehkai kriket jong ka Lumpyngad SCC ka la long ka lahduh ha ka lympung ïalehkai kriket ba la tip da ka Shillong Cricket League 1st Division 2024 ba la pynïaid da ka Shillong Cricket Association.Ka Lumpyngad SCC ka la ïoh ban rah ïa ka namlahduh hadien ba ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Donkins SCC da 61 ron ha ka jingïakhun final hynne ka Lah Sngi U Blei ha madan kriket kaba ha Polo, Shillong.Haba phai sha ka jingïakhun, ka Lumpyngad ka la jied ban tied nyngkong hadien ba ka jingkynting (toss) ka la noh sha liang jong ka. Ha ka inning jong ka Lumpyngad ka la ïoh ban kamai 219 ron, shah pynhap 8 wicket haduh kaba kut jong ka 40 over.U rangïalehkai ba la seisoh ha ka tied na bynta ka Lumpyngad u dei u Vishal kr Balmiki, u ba la khyrwit 66 ron naki 82 bol, katba u Raja kr Balmiki u la kamai 40 ron naki 37 bol.Napdeng ki rangkawangbol ka Donkins SCC, kiba la seisoh ki long u Marcus bhujel (8 over: shah tied 39 ron: khur 2 wicket) bad u Rohit Rai (8 over: shah tied 35 ron: khur 1wicket).Haba pyrshang ban beh ïa katei ka thong kaba la buh, ki rangtied ka Donkin ki la ïohlad ban kynjoh tang sha ka 158 ron shuwa ba ki rangkawangbol ka liang pyrshah kin ïoh ban pynkhyllem noh ïa baroh10 ngut ki wicket tang naki 33.1 over.Ki rangtied kiba la kamai kham bun ron ïa ka kynhun ki long u Baremdor LS Lyting (24 ron naki 29 bol) bad u Rayner lyngdoh (24 ron naki 56 bol) kiba la ïoh ban tied 20 ron shaneng na bynta ka kynhun, hynrei kam pat biang ban btin lynti ïa ka kynhun sha ka namjop.Dei ki rangkawangbol kiba la seisoh bha ha ka inning tied jong ka Donkins SCC, ha kaba u Vishal kumar Balmiki (8 over: shah tied 18 ron: khur 4 wicket) bad u Parveen katty (7 over: shah tied 22 ron: khur 2 wicket) ki la ïoh ban khur mar 2 ngut ha ka bol.ïa ka namtam ha kane ka jingïalehkai lane Player of the match la khur da u Vishal Kumar Balmiki u ba la tied 66 ron bad khur haduh 4 wicket ha ka bol kaba la ïarap ïa ka Lumpyngad scc ban jop ïa ka final da 61 ron.Katba na ka liang jong u Rohit Rai u la ïoh ban khur ïa ka khusnam Man of the Series jong kane ka lympung.Ha kane ka sngi la ïadon ryngkatlang u Secretary jong ka MCA-Bah Gideon Kharkomgngor, u Druba Thakuria-Treasure MCA, u Peter MacDonald Kharsawian President jong ka SCA bad Banri Kharmalki-Secretary SCA kiba la ïoh bynta ban sam ïa ki khusnam sha ki nongjop.
title: Rah ka Lumpyngad ïa ka namlahduh ha ka Shillong Cricket League 1st Division 2024

content: Ha ki khyndiat bnai kiba ladep, ka NitiAayog, ka la pynmih ia ka Kaiphod halor ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba duk bad ym don jinglyngngoh ba ka Meghalaya kadei ka jylla kaba lai ha ka jingdon ki briew kiba duk ha ri India. Ka Meghalaya ka shu tam tang ia ka Bihar bad ka Jharkhand ha ka liang ka jingbun eh ki briew kiba duk. Kane ka report ka wan tang hadien khyndiat bnai ba ka NitiAayog, ka pynmih ia ka report ba ka Meghalaya kadei ka jylla kaba duk tam ha ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi bad kaba ar ha ri India, ha kaba ka shu tam tang ia ka Bihar.Ka Niti Aayog kam dei satia ka Private Firm na kynhun bym don jingïasnoh bad ka sorkar, hynrei kadei kawei na ki bor treikam la thaw da ka sorkar pdeng ha ka jaka jong ka Planning Commission jong ka ri India. Kumta haba ka pynmih ïa kiba kum kine ki Kaiphod, ym don mano mano ba lah ban kyntait ne ban ong da kumwei pat. Hynrei hap ban pdiang ba ka long ka jinglap ne ka kaiphod kaba shisha.Ki khyndiat bnai baladep, ki la iohi ia ka Kaiphod ba la wanrah ha ka rukom jong ka Discussion Paper ba la thoh da u Prof. Ramesh Chand, uba dei u dkhot jong ka NitiAayog da kaba shim ruh ïa ka jingiarap jong ka United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) bad ka ka Oxford Policy and Human Development Initiative, la pynpaw ba ka ka jingpynpaw ne ka projection na ka bynta u snem 2022-2023, ka jingdon ki briew kiba duk ha Meghalaya ka long 27.79 percent. Ka Bihar ka don 33.76 percent bad ka Jharkhand ka don 28.81 percent.Ñiuma ka rukom kheiñ ne ka rukom buh ïa kane ka paper ka long kaba eh ban sngewthuh bha da u lik u lak, hynrei ka pawshai hi ba ka Meghalaya kadei ka jylla kaba lai ha ka jingduk ha ri India.Haba ki mih ki report ne ki jingthoh kiba kum kine, kiba bun lehse kin kylli, kumno ka jylla Meghalaya kan duk haduh katne katne kan ïahap ryngkat bad ki jylla kum, ka Bihar bad ka Jharkhand ne kumno kin kham duna kiba duk sha Uttar Pradesh ne Madhya Pradesh ban ïa ha Meghalaya. Namar kiba bun hi ki ju ong ba ha Meghalaya ym khamlap ïa ki briew kiba dang shong ha ki ïing skum ne ki briew kiban duh bam wat tang ha ka shisngi ruh. Lehse ym sngewlah ban pdiang ruh.Pynban lada phai ne ïaid hi kylleng kylleng yn lap ba ki dang bun ki briew jong kane ka jylla kiba im hapoh u laiñ jong ka jingduk. Ka daw ka long ba ki dang bun bha ki nongshongshnong jong ka jylla ki bym don la ka jong ka ïing ka sem, ki bym don la ka jong ka jaka ban rep ban riang ne kita ki landless people. Wat lada kiba bun ki sngew sarong ba ha Meghalaya ka ka jaka ne ka khyndew ka shyiap kadei jong u paidbah, ym jong ka sorkar.Ka jylla ka i riewspah namar lah ban ïohi ïa ki ïing ki sem kiba heh kiba don bun mala. Nangta ka jingbun ki kali bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingdon jingem lehse kiba pyni riewspah ïa ka jylla. Hynrei ki dang bun bha pat ki briew ki bym don wat tang ka kam ka jam ne ka kama ka kajih ban long ka jingpyndap ïa ka ïing ka sem. Ki don ruh kiba shu im ja ban kamai mynstep bad bam mynmiet.Ka sorkar ka la pyrshang ban pynmih ïa ki prokram kiban ïarap ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot bad ka kamai kajih jong ki paidbah. Hynrei kiba bun pat kiba kum kine ki lad kidei kiba la pynmih da ka sorkar pdeng bad tang khyndiat eh kiba la pynmih na la ka jong ka jylla. Ka jingthaw ïa ki Self Help Group kiban long ki kynhun ban iarap ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot ne ki prokarm ban weng ïa ka jingduk. Hynrei kum kine ki prokram pat ki dang duna bad ki briew ruh kim pat sngewthuh bha ban ïashim bynta ne ban pdiang.Nangta ka jingban jong ka jingduk kadei namar ba ki lad kamai kajih ki duna bha hangne, ha kaba ki karkhana ki dang duna bad lada ki don ruh kim aikam aijam ia ki paidbah kumba kidei ban ai. Nangta ki kompeni kiban iarap ban aikam aijam ia ki briew ruh ki dang duna bha.
title: Balei ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya ki im ha ka jingduk

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 11 : Ka Mawkyrwat Constituency Socio Economical & Political Awareness Committee (MCSEPAC) kaba dei hapoh ka jingïalam jong u bah Sounder Strong Cajee kum u President ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taïew ka 9 tarik u Lber, 2024 u la lum ïa ka jingïalang paidbah ne ka General Meeting kaba tang ïa ki nongïalam na ki dong bad shnong bapher bapher ha ophis treikam jong ka Trinamool Congress Party Mawkyrwat Block ha Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.Kane ka jingïalang ka long kum shibynta ban pynshai paidbah ha kaba ïa dei bad ka Election MP 2024 sha ka Lok Sabha da kaba ïathir bad ïa tai ïa kiba bun tylli ki mat bad ha kane ka jingïalang ki la rai bad da kawei ka sur ka la mih ba ha kane ka kynti kum ki nongkyrshan jong ka TMC kin sa leit ban ai jingkyrshan tang ïa ki ar tylli ki party kata ïa ka Voice of People’s Party (VPP) lane ïa ka Indian National Congress (INC).Hadien ka jingïalang, u bah Sounder Strong Cajee kum u President jong ka MCSEPAC haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor u la pynpaw ka jingaikhublei na ka bynta baroh ki nongkyrshan kiba la ai ka kti ka mon ka kti ka diang ha kane ka MLA Election kaba la dep, watla ka TMC Mawkyrwat Block kam shym la poi sha ka thong jong ka jingjop. Ha kaba ïa dei bad ka MP Election jong mynta u snem 2024, u bah Cajee u la ïathuh ba kiba bun ki paidbah kiba la poi ha ka jingïalang na ka TMC Mawkyrwat Block ki don ka jingthrang ba namar ha kane ka election ban wan na ka TMC ymdon kyrtong ki ban ïa khun, kumta ki la don ka jingthmu ban leit ai jingkyrshan noh ïa ka VPP bad ka INC.“Nga ngam don jingpyrshah ïa kata, hynrei ka sur hi ka mih na ki paidbah ba tang ha ki ar tylli ki party ka Voice of People’s Party (VPP) lane ka Indian National Congress (INC)”, ïathuh u bah Cajee hynrei halor kane u la bynrap pat da kaba ong ïa ki nongkyrshan ba da lei lei kim dei ban kyrshan ïa ka National People’s Party (NPP) namar kane ka party ka la dep pyni lypa ïa ki kam ki bym lah ban pdiang”, u la ong bad kata ka dei namar ka jingleit kyrshan jong ka MP na Tura Parliamentary Seat ban pyntreikam ïa ka CAA.Ha kaba ïa dei bad ka MDC ne MLA Election, u bah Sounder Strong Cajee u la pynpaw b akum ka party TMC na Mawkyrwat Block ka long kaba la khreh ban ïakhun. Ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u General Secretary ka MCSEPAC, u bah Remdor Shylla ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ki nongïalam ba hakhmat jong ka TMC Mawkyrwat Block.
title: Ngim don kyrtong ban pynïeng, ka mon ka shong ha phi ïano phin kyrshan: TMC

content: Shillong, Lber, 11 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi Saitjain, ula ot ribon ïa ka ‘My City’ Campaign, ka jingïalap ban pynkhuid ïa ki shnong ki thaw bad plie ruh ïa ka ‘Reimagining Streets’ nalor ka jingïashim bynta ha ka jingpynkhuid ïa ka surok Dhankheti.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang kaba la pynlong ha Moreau Institte of Integral Training (MIIT) hadien ka jingpynkhuid ïa ka Dhankheti Parking Lot, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ki kynhun bapher bapher, ki riew shimet bad ki Tnad Sorkar kila leh ïa ki kam hala ka jong ka bor ka sor bad ka long kaba donkam ban don ka jingïatreilang kawei jong baroh.“Kane ka jingpynkhuid shnong ba ngi leh mynta ka dei kaei kaei kaba ngi kwah ban leh manla ka lai bnai namar ki jaidbynriew bad ka kolshor jong ngi ka dei ban pynlong ïa ki kyntoit bad ki shnong ki thaw kiba khuid” ula ong haba bynrap ba bun bah ki shnong ki thaw kila leh hi ïa kane ka kam khlem kano kano ka jingkyrshan.U Myntri Rangbah ula ong “Ha ka sien ba nyngkong, ka Sorkar ka la shim ïa kane ka kolshor jong ngi ban pyntyllun shakhmat ha kaba kan sa ai song pisa man ka lai bnai ban ïapynkhuid ïa ki shnong ki thaw”.Ula ong ruh ba kane ka ‘My City’ campaign kan sdang shuwa ha manla ki District Headquarter bad suki suki kan sa leit sha manla ki shnong ki thaw ka Jylla. U Myntri Rangbah ula ong ruh ba ka jingthmu hi kan long ym ba tang shisngi ngin lah ban pynkhuid ïa ka Nongbah lane ka sor baroh kawei hynrei ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki briew.“Man ka por ba ngi pynkhuid ngi hap ban sdang sngewthuh ba ngi hap ban shim ïa la ka bynta bad ai ba baroh ki nongshong shnong ha ki sngi ba ka Sorkar kam bei pisa ïa kine ki jingpynkhuid shnong, kin shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynthikna ba ngi pynneh ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba ka sawdong sawkun bad ba lait na ka jingbret niut” ula ong.Haba pynpaw ba ki samla pule bad ki samla ki don ïa ka bynta kaba khraw bha ha kane ka campaign, ula ong “Ki samla haba ki sdang ïa ka movement, ka lah ban long kaba khlaiñ bha” bad bynrap ba ka thong kaba bun hi ka long ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki nongshong shnong ka Jylla ba kin pynneh ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba ki jaka sor bad ki sor rit. Haba kren halor ka jingmut jong ka ‘Reimagining Street’, u Conrad ula ong ba kane ka dei ka sienjam ba la shim ban pynlong ïa ki surok kiba lah ban ïaid kjat bad ong “Ngi don ia ka jingangnud ban shna ïa ki lynti ïaid kjat ba 10-15 kilometer, pynheh ïa ki lynti ïaid kjat bala don lypa kat haba lah toi, ban shna lynti ïaid kjat biang ki ban ïasoh kawei ïa kawei pat khnang ba kan aimynsiem ïa ki nongshong shnong ba kin ïaid kjat”.U Myntri Rangbah ula kren ruh ïa ki sienjam ba la shim kum ka jingpynïaid ïa ki cable waïar napoh khyndew, ka jingai rong ïa ki jingtei, ka jingshna ïa ki lynti iiad kjat bad kiwei kiwei, ban pynitynnad bad pynkup dur bhabriew ïa ka Nongbah. Ula pyntip ruh halor ki prokram bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar ban pynlong ïa ka Jylla bad ki jaka sor, ki shnong ki thaw kiba khuid bad ba kynsai.U Myntri Rangbah ula sam ruh ïa ki song pisa da ka cheque sha ki nongmihkhmat jong ki Dorbar Shnong bapher bapher bad pyllait paidbah ruh ïa ka Reimagining Streets Initiative Booklet ha kane ka sngi. Ki samla pule college, ki dkhot ka NCC bad NSS, ki dkhot jong ki Dorbar Shnong bad ki SHG kila ïashim bynta ha kane ka prokram.
title: Pyllait paidbah u CM ïa ka My City Campaign ïarap pisa ïa ki shnong ban lehkhuid

content: Nongpoh, Lber 11: Ka seng Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Ri-Bhoi Sepngi mynta ka sngi kala leit ban ïakynduh bad ka myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh hadien ba kala wan ban hiar sha Nongpoh naka bynta ban ïakynduh bad ki paidbah ka dong Ri-Bhoi ha Circuit House Nongpoh, bad naka liang ka seng kala ioh ruh ban pynsngew bad aiti da ka dorkhas sha ka myntri halor ka jingdonkam ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïaka Umsong Sub Center sha ka PHC kaba la donkam eh hakatei ka thaiñ bad kum ki paidbah kila angnud la slem.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien jong ka jingïakynduh bad ka kong Ampareen Lyngdohu Samla RC Thangkhiew, President ka HYC Ri Bhoi Sepngi u la ïathuh ba kane ka Umsong Sub-Center ka dei ka jaka ai jingsumar kaba la slem lada ïa nujor bad kiwei pat, bad kane ka sub-center ka ai jingsumar palat ïaki 15 tylli ki shnong bad ka wan rah jingeh ruh ïa ki paidbah jong kitei ki shnong ban leit sha ki PHC namar ba ka la jngai kum 17 kilometre na katei ka Sub-center.U tei u nongïalam ka HYC u la ïathuh ba namar ka jingbun tylli ki shnong bad ka jingjngai ba ki paidbah ki mad jingeh kala long kaba donkam eh ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïa ka Umsong Sub-Center sha ka PHC. U la ïathuh ruh ha kane ka jingïakynduh bad ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, myntri jong ka koit ka khiah ka la long kaba sei soh ha kaba naka liang ka myntri kala kular ban shimkhia ïa kane ka mat, bad naka liang ka Seng HYC ka kyrmen ba ka jingangnud ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïaka Umsong Sub-Center sha ka PHC kan urlong noh shen.
title: Sha ka myntri pynsngew ka HYC ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa ka Umsong Sub Center sha ka PHC

content: Nongpoh, Lber 11: Tang hadien ba ka seng Khasi Student Union, Nongpoh Circle dang shen kala leit ban pynlong ka jingjurip ïaka jaka die kot ha Iew Nongpoh hadien shibun ki jingujor naka liang ki kmie ki kpa ha kaba naka liang ka seng kala leit ruh ban aiti da ka jingthoh sha u DC ka Ri-Bhoi namar ka jingeh jong kiba bun ki longiing ba duk ba rangli, naka liang ka bor pynïaid district ki la shim khia ïa kane ka jing ujor hakaba mynta ka sngi naka liang ki bor Pulit ki la leit ban jurip bad tohkit na ki nongthied bad naki trai dukan kiba shong die kot skul ha ïew-Mawlong.Ha kane ka sngi, naka liang ki pulit ki la ioh ban tohkit naki katto katne ngut ki nongdie kot lem bad ki nongthied kot hakaba ki la lap ba ka don shisha ka jingdie tam ïaki kot skul palat 5 lane 10 tyngka naka dor trai (MRP) ba la shon haka kot.Na ka liang katto katne ngut ki nongdie kot ki la pynsngew ba kam shym la don ka jingdie palat pud ïaka dor kot skul naka MRP, hynrei ka jingdie tam ïaki kot haka dor 5 lane 10 tyngka ka dei beit tang ban pynmih ïaka bai kit bai bah ïaki mar kiba hap ban pynpoi naduh Shillong haduh Ïew-Mawlong, Nongpoh.Ha kane ka sngi naka liang ki bor pulit ki la dep ban shim lut iaki kyrteng jong ki die kot bad kin phah pat ïaka kaiphod sha u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri-Bhoi ban leh ïa kaba donkam.
title: Jurip ki bor pulit ïa ki nongdie kot ha ïew Nongpoh, lap ba don ka jingdie palat ïa ka dor

content: Shillong, Lber 11: Ki jaka kiba mynshwa kiba long ki ktem ba rieh tngen jong seng lehnoh ka Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA) ka la kylla long mynta sha ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei hapoh ka South Garo Hills District.ïa kane la ïathuh da u Myntri ka sorkar jylla bad u MLA ka Siju-Rongara u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka sngi nyngkong, haba ïaroh ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka sorkar MDA ha kine ki 6 snem ba la leit.U la ong ba ha ki por ba mynshwa ka jingdon ki lehnoh ha ka thaiñ Garo Hills ka la kylla long ka daw jong ka jingsngewkhia hynrei hadien ba ka sorkar MDA ka la wan ha ka bor ka la wanrah ka jingkylla bad kaba la wanrah ka jingpynthikna ba kan don ka jingkylla ha baroh kawei ka sawdong sawkun jong ka thaiñ Garo Hills.“Mynta ka Garo Hills ka la kylla long kum ka bneng. Ka la long ka thaiñ kaba shongsuk shongshngaiñ,” bynrap u Sangma.Na ka liang utei u Myntri u la ithuh ruh ba mynta da ki phew hajar ngut ki nongwan jngohkai napoh ka jylla bad kumjuh ruh kiba nabar ka ri ki la wan ban jngoh ïa katei ka jaka hapoh ka konstituensi jong u.“KI nongwan jngohkai ki la wan ruh ban jngoh ïa kane ka jaka kaba kyrpang, kaba la ju pyndonkam kum ka jaka riehtngen jong ka seng GNLA bad ïa kane mynta la pynlong kum ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei. Kane ka la long ka jingkyrkhu ïa kiba bun naba ki la ïoh ka lad ban kamai jakpoh na ka jingwan ki nongwan jngohkai,” u la ong.U la ong ruh kumjuh ba mynta ki la don satang khyndiat ngut eh ki briew kiba la wan ban ïakynduh ïa u ban pan pisa naba ki la ïoh ka lad kamai da kaba pdiang sngewbha ïa ki nongwan jngohkai sha kane ka jaka.
title: Kylla jaka jngohkai ki jaka ba ju buh ktem riehtngen ka GNLA

content: Jowai, Lber 11: Ka Loompyrdi Iongpiah Upper Primary School, Jowai ha kane ka sngi saitjaiñ 9 tarik ka la sdang ïa ka jingrakhe lehkmen dap 25 snem jong ka jingshakri ïaka jingnang jingstad ïa ki khynnah skul, ïa ka jingïalang bala pynlong ha Madan Myngkoi Pyrdi, Iongpiah, Jowai bad ïa kane ka jinglehkmen yn leh ha baroh shisnem.Ha kane ka sngi la wan ban sakhi naduh ka kongsan ka M. Lakiang, District Mission Coor dinator, SSA West Jaiñtia Hills, u C. Tympang Laloo, Chairman SMC uba la ai ki kyntien pdiang sngewbha, ka jingduwai ainguh da ka Riianom Passah, Member SMC, u ma Hercules Toi, Founder Secretary uba la pynsngew shaphang ka jingïaid lynti jong ka skul naduh kaba sdang jong u snem 2000 bad ki kam kiba ka skul kan leh ha kine ki snem ban wan, ka jingkren naka Neetu Shullai, Headteacher Loompyrdi Iongpiah UPS SSA, na u Waheh Chnong ka Loompyrdi Iongpiah ma R.L. Bimee Suwer, nalor ki dkhot ka School Managing Committee, ki khynnah skul bad kiwei de.Na ka liang ka kongsan ka kong Lakiang haka jingkren kala ai jingïaroh ïa kane ka skul kaba la kiew shakhmat katba dang mih ki sngi, ha kaba la sakhi ïa ki jingrung skul jong ki khynnah, kumjuh ruh ka rukom ai jinghikai ha baroh ki liang jong ka jingdonkam bad khamtam kala ïaroh ïa ka jingtrei shitom bad ka sap hikai jong ki nonghikai jong kane ka skul.Shuh shuh kala pynsngew ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka skul na ka liang ka ophis SSA ha kine ki snem bala dep kala ïarap ïa kane ka skul naduh ki karma klas, ki jaka leit bar, ki Uniform, ki kot nalor kiwei de. Kala ong kane ka jingdap 25 snem jong ka skul kam dei tang ka jingïaid lynti hynrei ka buh ka jingkyrmen skhem ba ka skul ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban ai jinghikai khambha ha kine ki sngi ban wan. Ha kane ka sngi ka kong Lakiang kala ai jingïarap haduh 25 hajar tyngka ïa ka skul.Ha kane ka sngi la plie paidbah kumjuh ïa u Mascot jong kane ka jingdap 25 snem ka skul daka kongsan bad ka jingpynher ïa ka dingkum, la pynphuh shuh shuh da ki jingrwai na ki nonghikai, ki jingshad na ki khynnah skul bad ka jingsam ïa ka khusnam sha ki nongjop haka jingïakop dor dur, katba ïa ki kyntein ai khublei la ïoh na u C.A. Ram Kyndiah Secretary SMC.
title: Sdang ka Loompyrdi Iongpiah Upper Primary School ïa ka lehkmen dap 25 snem

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 11: U District Magistrate (DM) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat ha ka Press Release ba ula phah lyngba ka jingïoh jingtip ba ki la don katto katne ki jingkieng ïaid kali kiba dei jong ka Public Work Department (PWD) (Roads) ba ki la don ha ka jingshongsyier bad kumjuh ruh ki jingkieng kiba don hapdeng ka jingman lada wan ki kali kiba kit khia ne heavy load.Namarkata halor kane ka bynta, u District Magistrate jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat kumba la pynkhamti u la pynbna da ka kyndon aiñ ba 144 Cr.P.C., ha kaba da kane ka aiñ la khang pyrshah ïa ki kali ba kin ïaid ryngkat ka jingkit kaba khia palat ïa ka 9 (nine) MT (ka jingkheiñ). Kane ka jingpynban kan kynthup ïa ka Semi-Permanent Bridges (SPT)/Weak Bridges kaba hap hapoh jong Ranikor Division, ha kaba baroh ki jingkieng ki don 25 tylli.Kawei ka dei na Jakrem – Ranikor Road (L = 38.520 KM) ka jingkieng No. 19/1 (Span = 7.20m), (Chainage at 19th Km), ka jingkieng No. 19/2 (Span = 7.20 m), (Chainage at 19th Km), ka jingkieng No. 20/1 (Span = 9.20 m), (Chainage at 20th Km), ka jingkieng No. 20/2 (Span = 9.60m), (Chainage at 20th Km) bad ka jingkieng No, 21/1 (Span = 11.00 m), (Chainage at 21st Km).Na Mawphlang-Balat-Gomaghat-Maheskola (MBGM) Road (L = 29.00 Km), ka jingkieng No. 17/1, Span=32.00 m (Located: Mula River) (Chainage at 17th Km), ka jingkieng No. 18/1, Span=6.50 m (Located: Stream) (Chainage at 18th Km), ka jingkieng No. 24/1, Span=8.10 m (Located: Phudjakhong) (Chainage at 24th Km), ka jingkieng No. 25/1, Span=7.40 m (Located: Phujawer) (Chainage at 25th Km), ka jingkieng No. 25/2, Span=8.90 m (Located: Phudksew) (Chainage at 25th Km), ka jingkieng No. Span=8.40 m (Located: Stream) (Chainage at 26th Km) bad ka jingkieng No. 26/2, Span=19.20 m (Located: Stream) (Chainage at 26th Km).Ranikor Nolikata Road (3.50 KM), ka jingkieng No. 1/1, Span=7.65 m (Located: Phottilik) (Chainage at 1st Km) bad ka jingkieng No. 1/2, Span=7.10 m (Located; Phottilok) (Chainage at 1st Km).Nangta, Maheskola – Darengiri Road (L= 15.00 Km), ka jingkieng No. 5/1(Span = 10.25 m) (Chainage at 5th Km), ka jingkieng No. 6/1 (Span = 18.29 m) (Chainage at 6th Km) bad ka jingkieng No. 7/1 (Span = 9.90 m) (Chainage at 7th Km). Shuh shuh na Nongjri – Nongkulang Road (L =8.14 KM), ka jingkieng No. 3/ 1(Span = 6.25 m) (Chainage at 3rd Km), ka jingkieng No. 3/2 (Span = 6.25 m) (Chainage at 3rd Km), ka jingkieng No. 4/1 (Span = 7.10 m) (Chainage at 4th Km) bad ka jingkieng No. 5/1 (Span = 7-15 m) (Chainage at 5th Km).Na Nongkulang – Maweit Road (L =7.68 KM), ka jingkieng No. 7/1(Span = 5.40 m) (Chainage at 7th Km), ka jingkieng No. 7/2 (Span = 5.40 m) (Chainage at 7th Km) bad ka jingkieng No. 7/3 (Span = 6.30 m) (Chainage at 7th Km), naRangthong – Rangjadong – Ngunraw Road (L = 8.55 m), ka jingkieng No. 2/1(Span = 10.00 m) (Chainage at 2nd Km).Namar ka jingdonkam ba kyrkieh, ïa kane ka jingbthah ne ka hukum la pyntreikam mardor naduh ba la pynbna paidbah ïa ka.
title: Pynjari 144 CrPC u District Magistrate ha South West Khasi Hills District

content: Shillong, Lber 11: U CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ha ka Dorbar Mang tyngka u la ïathuh ba ka KHADC haduh mynta ka la ïoh lum pisa (revenue) naduh u ïaïong u snem ba la dep haduh u bnai Lber mynta u snem (2023-2024) ka la kot sha ka T. 73,39,2054 klur bad kadei kaba la ïoh jingkheiñ kaba dei naduh ka 1.04.23 haduh une u snem 2024.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u Nongïalam ka Liang Ïatei hapoh ka dorbar mang tyngka ha ka sngi Nyngkong kaba dei ruh ka sngi sdang jong ka KHADC.U MDC ka Sohra u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne u la wanrah ïa kane ka jingkylli halor ka nongrim ban tip bad maham lypa ruh ïoh ba ka KHADC kan mad ïa ka jingduna pisa kumba la jia ïa ki artylli ki ADC ka JHADC bad GHADC ka jylla bad u la kwah ban tip bniah halor ki jingïoh lum pisa ka KHADC.Halor kane u CEM u la batai ba na ka Professional Tax ka pisa ba lah lum ka long T. 1,8,27,617, katba ka Fee na ka Tnat ki kam Khaïi la ïoh T. 3, 59, 93,615 klur, na ka land revenue ka jingïoh ka long T. 43,40,160, na ka tnat Forest ka long T. 1,88,68,272, na ka Civil Works Department ka la ïoh T. 16,23,41 lak, na ka Administration of Justice lyngba ki Court Fee ka long T. 33,42,314.Katba na ki Miscellaneous ka long T. 8,58,954, na ki Toll gate ka long T. 25, 21 lak, na ka Building permission ka long T. 88,67,709, na ki ïew kum ka Ïew Laitlyngkot bad Byrni hat la ïoh T. 16,52,10, na ka printing and missionery T. 21,945, ka khajna na ki jingri ka long T. 1 lak, na ka grand in aid ka long T. 23 lak.Katba halor ka bhah jong ki Major mineral kum u Dewïong ka long 60% sha ka KHADC bad 40% sha ka sorkar jylla ha kaba ïa kane khlem pat ïoh haduh mynta bad haba ïadei bad ki minor mineral kum u Mawshun bad kiwei ka bhah ka long 25% sha ka Council bad 75% sha ka sorkar jylla bad ïa kane la ïoh naduh u bnai Ïaïong mynshem snem haduh Lber mynta u snem ka la poi T. 39 klur tam, kumta ka jingïoh lum pisa da ka council ba la lum hi dalade ka la kot sha ka T. 73,39,20,54 klur ha ka shisnem ha kaba da kane la ïoh ban siew ïa ka tulop ki nongtrei kiba la ïoh jingpynskhem ne Permanent Staff kiba don malu mala kumba 800 ngut bad ki nongtrei contract basis ne Casual kiba don kumba 100 ngut kaba ha ka shibnai ka Council ka hap pynlut T. 5 klur tam ne duna malu mala.
title: T. 73 klur tam ha ka shisnem ïoh lum pisa ka Council: ong u CEM

content: Nongpoh, Lber 11: Ki nongïalam ka Sunjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri-Bhoi District (SRSRB) mynta ka sngi ki la leit ban ïa kynduh ïaka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka myntri ba dei peit ïaka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha Circuit House, Nongpoh ban pynkynmaw biang ïakiba bun ki kam sahteng haka tnad ka koit ka khiah haka them Ri-Bhoi.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah PB Sylliang Secretary jong ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong, Ri-Bhoi District haka jingdonlang u bah BB Makdoh Chairman lem bad ki dkhot, u la ïathuh, ba ha kane ka jingïakynduh ïaka Myntri, naka liang ka Synjuk ka la ioh ban pynkynmaw biang ïaki kam sahteng kiba la dei ban pyntreikam la slem kiba kynthup ïaka Maternity & Child Hospital kaba don ha Parila Umsning bad ka Trauma & Emergency Center kaba don ha Nongpoh Civil Hospital.U Bah PB Sylliang u la ïathuh ruh, ba naka liang ka Synjuk ka la wad jingtip ruh naka myntri halor jingdonkam ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa ki sub center bad PHC kiba don ha kylleng jong ka Ribhoi kumba ladep ban ïakren ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha u snem bala dep baki don ki jaka ai jingsumar kiba la donkam shisha ban kyntiew kyrdan.La ïathuh ruh ba ki la ioh ban ïakren halor Ka jingduna ka jingdon ki doctor bad ki staff nurse haki jaka sumar bapher bapher, hakaba naka liang ka Myntri ba dei peit iaka koit ka khiah ka la ïathuh ba ki la dep ban pynlait ïaka jingpynbna bad kumba 27 ngut ki ban trei naka bynta ka koit ka khiah bad kin sa khot noh ïaka interview ha kine ki bnai ki ban sa wan.
title: Buddien ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong naka Myntri ïa ki kam sahteng ha Ri-Bhoi

content: Shillong, Lber 11: U President ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) u Bah Sadon Blah, ula ong ba ka seng kam lah pdiang ïa ka jingpynlong ’langknia jong ka Tnad Pulit ïa ki Nongïalam Sengbhalang.Une u Nongïalam Sengbhalang ula kynthoh ïa kane halor ka jingshah kem u dkhot ka seng (HNYF) halor ka jingkynnoh donkti ha ka jingpynbthei bomb IED ha Them Metor, kaba jia ha ka miet sngi Saitjain.U Bah Sadon u pyntip ba une u dkhot ba shah kem u kyrteng u Bah Thyrson Lymba ba 55 snem ka rta na Dawki bad u dei u Nongïalam bala rim bha ha ka seng, uba bat mynta ïa ka kam kum u Disciplinary Secretary.U Bah Sadon uba la leit ïakynduh ïa u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi ban pan jingshai halor kane ka jingkem, ula pyntip “Ngi la kren shai ha u SP ba ka seng kam ngeit satia ba un donkti ha ka jingpynbthei bomb”.Haba pyntip ruh ba u SP ula buh jingkylli la u Bah Thyrson u don bynta ha ka jingïakren ïasuk jong ka HNLC, u Bah Sadon ula ong “Naduh ka sngi ba nyngkong, ha ka por ba ngi leit shaw ïa ki nongïalam ka HNLC ban wan sha ka miej ïakren ïasuk, ha ryngkat ki Pulit bad ki Ophisar sorkar, ngi hap ban leit shaw na ki shnong kiba ma nga ruh ngam tip bad ki Pulit ruh kim tip hynrei namar ba u dei u nongshong shnong ka Dawki, ngi hap ban pan ïa ka jingïarap jong u ban leit shaw. Ngi la lah ban leit shaw ïa ki(Nongialam HNLC) ruh da ka jingïarap u Bah Thyrson Lymba.Haba kylli, u Bah Sadon ula ong “Nga la ithuh la 24 snem eiei ia u Bah Thyrson bad ngi la ïatreilang ha ka seng hynrei ngam pat ju ïohi ba un leh ia kano kano ka kam ka bym lah ban pdiang” ula bynrap.Hynrei ula ong, ka seng kan hap ban ap bad kam lah ban pynthut ïa ka jingtohkit ki Pulit ne ka jingtian bishar jong ka ïing bishar.“Ynda ka kam kala poi sha ïing bishar bad lah chargesheet, ngi ruh ngin ym shong sngap jar ïa kane ka kam namar ki Pulit ki ju myllien ban pynlong langknia ïa ki nongïalam Sengbhalang haba don kano kano ka jingjia” ong u Bah Sadon.“Ha bun ki khep kiba bun ki dkhot jong ngi kila shah khot hajir ha ki Pulit hynrei ngim ju pynpaw paidbah halor kine ki juh ki jingsuba bad wat ka kali jong nga ruh kala shah khynra ha ki Pulit ka Ri-Bhoi khlem kano kano ka daw” ula bynrap.
title: Ther u President ka HNYF ba pynlong langknia ki Pulit ïa ki dkhot Seng Bhalang

content: Shillong, Lber 11:Kumba la leh naduh ki por ba kane ka EC kaba thymmai ka la shimti ïa u lakam synshar ka KHADC bad da ka jingthmu ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingïoh lum pisa ka KHADC bad kumjuh ruh ban khanglad ïa ka jingïoh khaïi laitluid ba beaiñ jong ki bar jylla hapoh u pud u sam ka KHADC, u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la ong ba kumba la leh ha ki por ba la leit noh, kumjuh mynta tang shu lah kut ka Ïingdorbar Thaw Aiñ jong ka Mang tyngka ka KHADC ka Council kan ïaibteng biang ban leit khynra ïa ki laisen khaïi ha baroh ki jaka ka KHADC.“Watla ka long kaba eh ban leit khynra laisen khaïi khlem ka jingïatreilang bad ki nongïalam shnong namar ka jingduna ki pulit Enforcement, hynrei ka Council lyngba ka Trade department kan bteng biang ïa ka jingkhynra laisen khaïi,” ong u CEM.Haba ïadei pat bad ka jingïoh jingtip ba ki don ki bar jylla ne kiba lah ruh ban dei ki bar ri na Bangladesh kiba la seng da ka ïew kaba thymmai ha Ichamati u CEM u la ong, “Ïa kane ngin ïatreilang bad ka Elaka Mawlong ba la don ki briew ba nabar jylla ne bar ri kiba la sdang ban seng ïew sha kawei pat ka jaka na Ichamati ka Council kan ym pyntip lano ngin leit hynrei kan ym slem shuh ba kan shu leit khang beit ïa katei ka ïew namar ki la seng ne leh kam khaïi khlem ka jingtip ka shnong, ka KHADC kumta ka la long beaiñ kane ka jingleh jong ki.”
title: Ka KHADC kan sa leit khang ïa ka ïew beaiñ ki bar jylla ha Ichamati, ong u CEM

content: Shillong, Lber 11: Ka seng Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Nyngkong, kala maham jur ïa ka Northeast Sunshine Trust (India) bad kiwei kiwei ki Agent Sorkar ba kim bit da lei lei ruh ban khyllie biang ïa ka kitab tih Uranium hapoh ka Jylla.“Ka HYC: CEC lyngba kane ka kyrwoh ka kwah ban phah ka khubor kaba shai sha baroh kito ki Agent jong ka Sorkar India ne ka Sorkar Jylla ba kidei ban sangeh shi syndon ia kino kino ki jingthmu ban pyrkhat ne mutdur ba kin khlong lane tih ïa u Uranium na ka Bri U Hynñiewtrep,” ong u President ka HYC u Bah Roykupar Synrem.Une u Nongïalam ka HYC ula ong ba ka HYC ka ïeng ha ka nongrim kaba skhem bad ka jutang ba la khlei ba kan ym shah ban khlong ïa une u marpoh khyndew na kane ka Ri.“Kumba ngi lahdep ban kren naduh ki sngi bad ki snem kiba lahdep, haduh mynta ka kynti ruh ngi ïaineh skhem ba ngi pyrshah jur ïa kano kano ka jingpyrshang ban khyllie biang ïa ka kitab tih Uranium napoh kane ka Ri ka jong ngi,” ula ong.“Ngi kren ruh da kaba shai ba kum ka Seng bad ki dkhot ki jong ka baroh, ngi long kiba lah kloi ban ïakhun da kaba kano kano ruh ka lynti ban pynthikna ba ka Sorkar India ne ka Sorkar Jylla kan nym dei ban ïohlad ban pyrshang pynim biang ïa kane ka mat namar kan bha ba ngin ïakhun mynta ban ïa kaba ieh ban ïap bad duhjait ka Jaitbynriew lyngba kane ka bih jong u Uranium,” ula bynrap.Ha kajuh ka por, ka HYC ka pynrem jur bad maham tyngeh ruh ïa ka Founder Trustee bad Chairperson ka NEST (India) kong Elizabeth Nongbri bad kiwei kiwei ba kim dei dei ban pyrshang mushlia laplah ïa kane ka kam ïap kam im jong ka Jaitbynriew.“Lehse kane ka briew ka kwah ban sngewthuh (testing the waters) ïa ka sur jong ki khun samla bad ki dkhot ka Jaitbynriew bad hadien pat ka pyrshang ban len noh ïa kaei kaba ka lah dep ban thoh. To tip tang kawei ba kum ki Sengbhalang ne ki kynhun bapher bapher, ngi lah ban don ïa shibun ki jingïapher ha ki lama ba ngi don, hynrei ngi long kawei ka jingmut bad ka jingthmu bad, “kata ka long ban ïada bad pynneh pynsah bad khamtam eh ban ïaleh khlem kynrandien na bynta la ka Jaitbynriew,” ula ong.
title: Maham ka HYC bym dei ban khyllie biang ïa ka kitab Uranium ha ka jylla

content: Shillong, Lber 11: U Personal Security Officer (PSO) ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) uba la shah kem u bah Storgy Lyngdoh, ula hap ban shong along ne ïoh judicial custody sa 14 sngi.U Bah Storgy uba shah kem na Mawlynrei ha ka 2 tarik Lber, la ïalam tian bishar biang ïa u mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei hakhmat ka ïing Bishar hadien bala kut ka jingshah set ha byndi ki pulit kaba long 10 sngi.Ki Pulit ki ïathuh ba u Bah Storgy ula sam shithi dawa pisa na ka bynta ka HNLC kaba la wanrah ka jingrit mynsiem bad jingsheptieng jong kiba bun ki nongkhaïi ha nongbah Shillong.U Bah Storfy u dei u dkhot ka HNLC uba ïajan bha bad u Deputy Commander-in-Chief ka HNLC. U dei u PSO jong u A Hazarika ba khot sin u Manbhalang Jyrwa, uba dei u Vice Chairman ka HNLC uba la ïehnohkam hapdeng ka jingïakren ïasuk.
title: 14 sngi ha along hap shong u PSO ka HNLC

content: Shillong, Lber 11: Ka North East Sunshine Trust (India) ka la hap ban pan map na ka seng Khasi Students Union (KSU) halor ka shithi ba ka thoh sha u Myntri Khynnah ka Department of Atomic Energy, (kaba ka kam ba kam pat phah) ba pynpaw ïa ka jingkwah ban tih noh ïa u Uranium hapoh ka Jylla.Ka Nongseng bad Chairperson ka NEST (India) ka kong Elizabeth Nongbri, ka la phah da ka shithi sha u President ka KSU Bah Lambokstar Marngar ban pan map bad ba la pynsangeh noh ïa ka shithi ba ïadei bad ka jingkwah tih ïa u Uranium ha Jylla Meghalaya.Shithi pan map“Ngi babe jur halor ki synboh ba don ha kane ka shithi kaba la pyllait paidbah lyngba ki rynsan social media da ki briew ki bym lah ban tip. Ka seng jong ngi kam don jingmut lane pynshlur ne kyrshan ïa kum kine ki project” kala ong ha ka shithi.“La pynthikna ba kane ka shithi kaba dang dei tang ka draft, ym pat phah satia sha uba la jer kyrteng” kala bynrap.
title: Hap panmap ka NEST na ka KSU halor ka shithi kwah tih Uranium

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 11: Kawei ka jingkieng ïaid kali kaba don ha ka surok Nongshillong-Jakrem Road ka la dkut noh katba dang ïaid lynti kawei ka trok 12 taïar kaba kit nar rod.Ha ka tyllong khubor ba la ïoh lum, la ong ba kane ka jingjïa ka la jia ha ka step jong ka 11 tarik u Lber, 2024 ha Shnong Larem, South West Khasi Hills District ha kawei ka wah Umshangkhar katba kawei ka trok 12 taïar kaba don ïa u Registration Number AS01 EC 8291 ka dang ïaid lynti bad kane ka trok ka la hap lang ryngkat bad ka jingkieng.Shuh shuh ha kane ka la jia la ong ba ym shem la don kino kino kiba mynsaw. Ha ka kyrwoh khubor lyngba u Executive Engineer jong ka PWD (Roads) Mawkyrwat Division ula ai ka jingpyntip paidbah ba ïa mynta shipor ïa kane ka surok Nongshillong-Jakrem Road kaba don ka jingkieng No.19/5 kaba ïaid lyngba ka wah Umshangkhar ha Shnong Larem, South West Khasi Hills District la khang ban ïaid kali.
title: Dkut ka jingkieng ïaid kali ha wah Umshangkhar ha shnong Larem

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 11: U kyrtong MP na Shillong Seat u Bah Vincent Pala ha ka sngi nyngkong jong ka taiew, u la lum la lang ïa ki nongkitkam bad nongkyrshan ka party Congress na West Khasi Hills na ka bynta ban ïa syllok shwa ban leit sha ka lympung ïalap elekshon sha ki bynta bapher bapher ka District bad ka Jylla.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Congress Bhavan Nongstoiñ, la donlang ruh u Bah Gabriel Wahlang MLA Nongstoiñ, MLA Mawhati Bah Charles Marngar, ki nongkitkam ka seng Congress na West Khasi Hills, kata naduh ka Mahila, Youth Congress bad ki nongkyrshan, ki la don shim bynta ban ïakren halor ki kam kiba ïa dei bad ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka elekshon MP.Na ka liang u Bah Gabriel Wahlang u la pynshai halor ka jingmut jong kane ka jingïalang, da kaba u la ong ba kane ka dei ka lad kaba biang eh ba kum ki nongkitkam bad nongkyrshan ka party kin ïoh ban ïakren markhmat bad u kyrtong MP shwa ban don ki jingïalang paidbah ha kylleng ki jaka. Namar bunsien ynda la pynlong jingïalang paidbah, bun na ki nongkitkam kim shym ïoh lad ban ïakynduh ne kren markhmat bad u kyrtong.U Bah Charles Marngar u la ong ba dei ka seng Congress kaba la ai ïa ka Jylla Meghalaya naduh u snem 1972 ha ka por jong ka (L) Indira Gandhi ha ka por ba ka long Prime Minister, ka la wan hi dalade ha madan Nongthymmai Shillong ban ai ïa ka Jylla.“Ngim dei ban klet ba dei ka seng Congress kaba la ai ha ngi ïa ki jinglaitluid kiba bun, naduh ka riam ka beit, ka ktien ka thylliej, riti dustur bad ka niam ka rukom. Lada ym don ka seng Congress wat ka District Council ruh ngim don ban ïada ïa ngi. Shibun bah ki kam ba ka seng Congress ka leh ïa kaba ngim lah shuh ban siew kylliang”, ong u Bah Charles Marngar.“Lada ngi kren ïa ki kam pynroi ruh naduh ki surok bah National Highway, ka NEHU, ka NEIGRIHMS, ka skhim 100 sngi, ka smart card bad lada ngi kynmaw ba wat ki mar bam mar dih ruh ha ka por ka sen Congress ka long kaba bit kaba biang. Kine ki long katto katne kiba ka seng Congress ka leh na ka bynta ki paidbah”, u la ong.U la ong ruh, “I Ma Vincent Pala I la long MP 15 snem hynrei bun bah ki jingkynthoh ki jingkylli pyrshah ïa I. Mano ban pyrkhat ba ka lyngkor ban kit ïa ki 36 tylli ki Constituency ka Shillong Parliamentary seat kam dei satia kaba suk. Ngi ki MLA tang kawei ka Constituency ngi ktha khlieh namar kam dei kaba suk. Hynrei ïa I Bah Pala bun ki kdew kti bad kylli ban ong hato I la leh aiu, ki klet pat ba u dei u MP u ba la ïoh ban kren bunsien tam hapoh Parliament napdeng ki MP na ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi”.U Ma Pala haba ai jingkren u la ong, “Ka nongrim jong kiwei kiwei hi khamtam ka BJP kumba phi la ïohi ka long ban pynpharia ïa ngi. Ha ki jaka ba don ki Muslim bad Hindu, pynïashrut ïa ki, ha ki jaka ba don tang Khristan ki pynïashrut ïa u Khasi bad Garo lane ïa ki Khristan bad ki bym long Khristan. Kane ka dei ka rukom treikam jong ki kumba la jia ha Manipur hapdeng ki Meitei bad Kuki”.“Hapoh ka Jylla jong ngi ruh ka NPP ka la sdang pynpharia hapdeng u Khasi, Garo bad ki ba nabar bad khyndiat pa khyndiat kane ka rukom treikam jong ki ka ïaid napoh napoh hapoh ka jingïalam ka BJP”, u la ong bad bynrap, “Kane ka dei ka jingïapher hapdeng ka Congress bad ka BJP bad kiwei kiwei”.“Ka VPP kum ka party thymmai ka long thik kum ka AAP hapoh India kaba shu kular ïa ka bneng ka khyndew bad ban ong ba ngi long kiba hok. Hynrei ynda la pynjop ïa ki tang mar shiteng ka samoi ki la don hapoh Jail, namar ki jingkular kim ïahap bad ka kam ba ki leh. Ban shu kular bad ban pynheh ka suk hynrei ban synshar pat kam dei satia kaba suk”, u la ong.“Ka jingïapher hapdeng ka Congress bad kiwei ki party ka long ba kaei kaei kaba ngi kren ngi kular lyngba ki manifesto jong ngi, ngi leh ïa kata wat lada ngim lah ban leh 100 na ka 100 ruh. Katba ka BJP bad kiwei kiwei ki party pat ki shu pynbiej paitbah. Peit na ka NPP myn kane ka kular pynïoh kam 5 lak ngut bad pyllait dewiong. Hynrei haduh mynta la urlong ki jingkular. Ban shu kular por elekshon ka suk hynrei ban leh ta ka eh palat”.“Ha ka Congress nalor ba ngi ïoh ki lad jingïarap bad ki kam pynroi, ngi donkam ban pyrkhat khamtam eh ïa ka shong suk shong saiñ jong ka ri bad ki jaidbynriew. Kata hi ka dei ka kam kaba kongsan eh hapoh ka ri ka jong ngi”.“Peit aiu ka BJP ka leh, ka la pass ïa ka aiñ CAA haduh ba ki paidbah ki la pyrshah jur, pynban ka pass jubor. Ka UCC kaba ktah ïa ka riti dustur jong ngi, ïa ka hiar pateng jong ngi, ka shongkha shongman jong ngi, ka BJP ka thmu ban iuhroit. Lada phai ha baroh hi ki liang ngi ïakynduh jingeh bad ki jingeh ki ap hakhmat jong ngi. Dei tang ka Congress hi kaba ai ka jingshngaiñ bad ka jinghun sha baroh ki nongshong shnong hapoh ka ri”, u la ong.
title: Lum ka Congress ïa ki nongkitkam bad nongkyrshan shwa ka elekshon MP

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 11: Ka synjuk ki nongñiah kali Tourist Taxi Nongstoiñ lane JAC Tourist Association ha ka janmiet sngi nyngkong, ka la pynlong ïa ka jingthang mombati ha jingkieng Nonbah bad dawa jur ïa ki bor jong ka aiñ ba ki dei ban leh ei ei noh ban ïohkem sa ïa kiwei pat kiba donktilang ha ka ban shim noh ïa ka jingim jong u (L) Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani.Ki nongkren kiba la ai jingkren hadien ka jingthang mombati naduh ki sengbhalang bapher bapher, seng samla shnong, seng nongñiah kali bad kiwei, ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingdawa na ki bor ka aiñ ba ki dei ban shimkhia bad pynkloi ban ïoh kem ïa kiba dang phet rieh haduh mynta bad ban pynshitom ïa ki katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Napdeng ki nongkren don kiba la pynpaw ba lada ka tnad pulit ka thong haduh shi lak tyngka ïa kiba ïoh jingtip ïa kiba pynbthei bom. Hato balei ki pynslem pat ban kem ïa ki nongpynïap briew. Don ruh kiba la ong ba dei ban leh ei ei ïa kiba donkti ban pynïap ïa utei u samla, lym kumta kim banse ban kem hi ïa kitei baroh kiba donkti pynïap briew.“Hato phi sngew hun mo ïa kum kane ka jingleh shilliang jong ki bor ka aiñ, ban pynbna buskit ïa kiba ai jingtip ïa ki nongpynbthei bom. Katba ïa ki nongpynïap briew haduh mynta kim lah satia ban kem ne leh ei ei. Ka jingkylli ka long balei haduh mynta ym lah ban kem ïa kita ki nongpynïap briew kiba donkti pynïap ïa u samla ha ka jingjia kaba dang shu jia ha ka 3 tarik”, ong u Bah H.Lyngkhoi uwei na ki nongkren bad nongïalam sengbhalang hapoh ka thaiñ.
title: Haduh mynta dang shah kem tang uwei ba donkti pynïap briew

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : U Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC ha kane ka sngi Nyngkong u la wanrah ïa ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ka snem treikam jong u snem 2024-25 kaba duna 4,33,410 tyngka kaba mut ba ka jinglut ka kham heh khyndiat ban ïa ka jingmih.U CEM u la ong ruh ba ka jingmang ban pynlut ha kane ka snem ka kot sha ka 329,07,00,710 tyngka (329.07 klur tyngka) katba ka jingmang ka pisa kaban mih ka long 329,02,67,300 tyngka (329.02 klur tyngka).U CEM u la ong, ba kane ka mang tyngka la pynlut na bynta ka tnad General Administration Department, ka Law Department, ka Revenue Budget bad Finance Department, ka tnad Forest, ka tnad Administration of Justice & Judicial, ka Tnad Legislative, ka tnad Pule puthi, Civil Work and Development, Enforcement Scheme for Protection of Tribal Land and Interest.Ha kajuh ka por ka por u la ïathuh ba ki tnad kiba pynmih khajna ïa ka Council pat ki kynthup ïa ka tnad Land Revenue, Forest, ka tnad Administration of Justice, Market, Trade, Stationery and Printing, khajna na ki marpoh khyndew, khajna na ki kali, Professional Tax, Civil Works Department, kiwei kiwei ki jingpynlut (Miscellanous Receipt), Khajna na ki khyrdop, ka jingïarap na ka sorkar jylla bad ruh na ka Khasi Hills Building Structural Regulatory Authority.U CEM u la ong ruh ba ha kane ka snem 2023-24 ka Executive Committee ka la lah ban wanrah bad mynjur ïa ka Administration of Elaka (Amendment) Bill, 2023 ban pynkup bor shuh shuh ïa ki dorbar shnong bad ruh ïa ki seng kynthei bad seng samla ha ki shnong. Nangta u ong ruh ba nalor ka United Khasi Jaintia Hills District Fishery (Amendment) Bill, 2023 ban ïada ïa ki dohum dohwah, ka Council kala wanrah ruh ïa ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) (Amendment) Bill, 2023 ban pynkup bor ïa ki Dorbar Kur.Shuh shuh u CEM u la kdew ruh ba halor ka jingai jingbit ban shna iing, ka EC lyngba ka Khasi Building and Structure Regulatory Authority ka la pyrshang ban pynbha bad pynjanai ïa ka jingtreikam na bynta ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah.U CEM u la pyntip ruh ba halor ka jingai ïa ka syrnod trai jaka (Land Title Right Certificate) kaba dei ka dulir ban pynshisha ïa ka jinglong trai ha ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka Council ka dang kynduh jingeh namar ka jingdon ki notification na ka sorkar. “Halor kane ka Executive Committee ka la shimkhia bad ka jingïakren bad ka sorkar jylla ka dang ïaid shakhmat bad kyrmen skhem hadien ba ngi la lah ban weng jingeh ka jinglum na ka jingai Land Title Right certificate kan ïarap ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ka council.U Bah Pynïaid ula pyntip ruh ba ka EC da ka jingïarap jong ka sorkar pdeng lyngba ka National Land Records Modernisation Programme kan sdang ban buh rekod ïa baroh ki khyndew ki shyiap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka council bad ngi kyrmen ruh ba lyngba kane ka skim kan ïarap bad pynsuk shibun ïa ki rukom buh jingthoh ba tikna ïa ki jaka puta.Ha kajuh ka por u CEM u la ong ruh ba ha kane ka Dorbar Mangtyngka ym shym la lah bn pyni jinglut bad jingmih jong u snem 2023 – 2024 namar ba ym pat ïoh lum lut ïa ki jingkheiñ. Kumta u la ong ba ïa kane kin sa pyni ha ka Mangtyngka jong u snem 2025-26.
title: Wanrah u CEM KHADC ïa ka mangtyngka kaba tam ka jingpynlut ïa ka jingpynmih da 4.3 lak tyngka

content: Shillong, Lber 11:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la buh ïa ki 3 tylli ki mawnongrim na ka bynta ki projek jong ka New Shillong Water Supply Scheme, ka land reclamation project hapoh ka jaka jong ka Waster Processing and Disposal kaba ha Marten Mawlai bad ka jingshna ïa ki surok shnong kiba hapoh ka New Shillong Township kaba ha ka shnong Mawkhanu, Mawpdang.Ha kane ka prokram u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u Myntri ka tnat PHE u Marcuise Marak bad ka Myntri ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Chief Secretary u Bah D.P Wahlang ki la donlang kaba la pynlong hapoh ka shnong Mawkhanu, Mawpdang.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma u la ong, “Ka long kaba ai jingkyrmen ban ïohi ïa ka jingïashim bynta jong ki nongshong shnong bad ka rukom pynïaid jong kane ka prokram kaban sah jingkynmaw. Kine ki 3 tylli ki projek kiba la sdang mynta ka sngi, ki wanrah ka jingïajan jong ka jylla sha ki mawjam jong ka jingïohi jngai ba kane ka sorkar ka don na ka bynta ka jylla”.Haba ïathuh ba ïa ka New Shillong Water Supply Project, kaba la kot sha ka jinglut kaba T. 1600 klur ka long kawei na ki jingbei tyngka kaba heh jong ka jylla, na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “Kane ka New Shillong Water Supply Scheme ka la long kawei na ki projek kiba heh kiba la shim hapoh ka khana pateng jong ka jylla. ïa kane ka projek la mang kumba T.1,600 klur ha kaba na ka lajan T. 500 klur lah dep ban pyllait na ka bynta ka jingsdang kaba nyngkong ne ka first phase bad la buh ka thong ban pyndep hapoh ki 36 bnai”.Kane ka New Shillong Water Supply Scheme kan ïarap ban pyndap umbam umdih na ka bynta ka Shillong bad ïa ka New Shillong Township ba kynthup ïa ki jaka pule bad ki ophis, bad ïa ki 32 tylli ki shnong kiba ha ka jingbun briew kaba mynta kaba long 29,889. Kane ka jingsdang ka long ban shakri ïa ka jingkiew ka jingbun ki nongshong shnong, kaba la buh ïa ka jingbun briew kaba 198,997 ngut la kumno kumno ha u snem 2042, bad ka jingbun briew ka ban sa kiew sha ka 413,701 ha u snem 2057.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingtei ne jingshna ïa ki surok shnong hapoh ka Shillong Township, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ïa ki surok ba la mut ban shna ïa ka shnong Mawkhanu kan long ha ka jinglut kaba T. 185 klur. U la ïathuh ruh halor kiwei pat ki surok kiba dang pyntrei kiba hapoh ka New Shillong Township ban ïarap ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingpynïasoh ïa ki surok bad kiwei ki lynti kiba la kot sha ka T. 343 klur kiba dang ïaid hapoh ka New township, kaba kynthup ïa ka shnong Ummir sha Mawkhanu bad Kynoton sha Lyngkien, Bellefonte sha new township, ka Diengpasoh sha Shillong bypass, bad Bribah Mawpat bad sha new township.Ha ka phase kaba 2 jong ki surok, ki surok kiba hapoh ka 16.6 Km kaba da ka 15m ka jingïar bad ka 3.2 km jong ka 2-lane da ka jingïar kaba 7.5m la tyrwa ha ka jinglut kaba T. 185 klur. Kine ki surok la khmih lynti ba kin pyndep ha shwa ban kut jong u snem 2026.Haba ïadei bad ka land reclamation project kaba don hapoh ka jaka jong ka Waste Processing and Disposal kaba ha Marten, Mawlai, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “Ka jaboh kaba la lum lang hapoh kane ka jaka ka la long ka jingsngewkhia ym tang ïa ki nongshong shnong ha kane ka thaiñ hynrei na ka bynta ki briew jong ka jylla baroh kawei. Ngin pynkylla ïa kane ka jaboh sha ka jingmih kiba lah ban pyndonkam biang bad shna biang”.U la ong ba ïa ka project yn pyndep hapoh ka 12 sha ka 18 bnai. “ïa kane ka jaka bret bad theh ñuit yn pynkylla sha kaei kaei kaba ki paidbah kin lah ban pyndonkam bad ai jingïaroh bad ïa kane ka juh ka rukom yn sa leh kumjuh sha kiwei pat ki jaka sor jong ka jylla,” u la bynrap.U la ong ruh kumjuh ba ka sorkar jylla ka la ruid dak ban pynïar ïa ki kam bad ki lad pynroi jong ka jylla bad ban wanrah ka jingkylla kaba bha na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong ka jylla. “Ka sorkar MDA ka dang ïaitrei da ka jingïohi kaba shai bad ka jingruid dak ban kyntiew ïa ka jylla sha kawei ka jylla hapoh ki 10, 25 bad kumjuh ruh wat sha ki 50 snem”, u la banjur.“Ha kine ki 4 snem ban wan kan long ka jingkylla na ka bynta ka jylla bad ki nongshong shnong. Kane ka New Shillong township kaba kynthup ïa ka Knowledge City bad ka Administrative city lah dep ban buh hapoh ka mang tyngka kaba T. 10,000 klur na ka bynta ki kam pynroi, ka ban wanrah ïa ka jingpyndap kam ïa kumba 50,000 hajar tylli ki kam ba thylli,” la bynrap u Myntri Rangbah.Haba ïathuh halor ka jingangnud jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ban thaw sa kumba 8 tylli ki sor ba thymmai ne ki new township lyngba ka ri, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka New Shillong Township ka Meghalaya hapoh ka jingpyrkhat jong ka sorkar Pdeng kan sa nangïoh ïa ki jingïarap pisa bynrap ba kot sha ka T. 500 klur.U la ïathuh shuh shuh ba baroh ki kam jong ka sorkar la pynïasoh da ki jingthmu kiba don jingïohi jngai jong ka jylla ban kynjoh ïa ka thong jong ka ïoh ka kot kaba 10 billion US dollar bad ban kyntiew ïa ka jingïoh jingkot ki nongshong shnong.
title: 3 tylli ki projek buh mawnongrim u CM ki surok bad um sha New Shillong bad jingpynkhuid ïa ka Marten
