content: Shillong, Lber 11: Ka Seng HNLC ka la kyntait ba u Bah Tarson Lymba udei u dkhot ka Seng, hynrei ka la long ba une u dkhot ka HNYF udei uba ïadon bynta ha ka jingïakren ïasuk ka Seng bad ki bor sorkar, namar u ju leit bud ïa u Bah Sadon Blah, uba long u Ksiang jong ka Seng (HNLC) ha ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ki bor sorkar.Ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw, General Secretary ka Seng uba long ruh u Publicity Secretary, la ong ba ka Seng ka pynrem jur ïa kane ka jingkem ki Pulit ïa u Bah Tarson, u bym dei satia u dkhot ne u nongkyshan ka HNLC.Ka HNC, ka kynnoh ba kane kadei tang ka bui treikam kaba ju leh da ki Pulit ban kem pathar ïano ïano haba kam lap ïa ki briew kiba donkti shisha ha ka jingjia. “Lada ki briew kiba donkti ha ka jingïakren ïasuk ki shah pyndik ha ki Pulit, mano ban dang shaniah shuh ha ki jingtreikam ki bor sorkar lada ka HNLC ka wan bian na ka bynta ka jingïakren ïasuk?”, la ong u Bah Saiñkupar, da kaba bynrap ruh ba ka jingshisha ka paw na ka jingpharep bad siat ïap ka sorkar ïa u Bah Cherish uba la thmu ban wanrah jingsuk ha ka jylla.Ka Seng ka pynrem jur ruh ïa ki nongmihkhmat paidbah ka jylla kibym shym la lah ban ïada ïa ka jingsynshar paidbah ha ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep, hynrei kiba la pynlong pynban ïa ka ri kum ka ri jong ki briew kiba riewspah bad ba la synshar ruh da ki briew kiba heh spah. “Kine ki la long tang ki puppet ne ki tyngshop jong ka sorkar India”, la ong u Bah Saiñkupar.Ha kaba ïadei pat bad ka jingkem ki Pulit ïa u Ebakordor Nongpluh, ka HNLC ka ong ba udei u nongsyntiat ne u Informer jong ki Pulit.Ka kyrwoh ka ong ruh ba ka Seng kam pyrshah ïa ka jingsuk, hynrei ka jingsuk kam dei ban wan pat da ka lynti jong ka jingthombor bad ka jingbanbeiñ. U nongïalam ka HNLC, u la ong ba ka sorkar kadei ka nongban beiñ bad ka HNLC kadei kaba shah ban beiñ. Hynrei lada ka ri ne ki paidbah ki shah knieh noh ka khyndew ka shyiap shano kan wan kata ka jingsuk. U Bah Saiñkupar, u la ong ruh ba ka India mynta la 76 snem kam shym la don satia ha ka jingsuk bad ka jingsuk kan nym wanrah ruh katba ka dang don ka jingsynshar leh shiliang khmat, ka jingthombor, ka jingnoh shiliang ka aiñ ka jingshet kylla bad ka jingsynshar donbor.Shuh shuh ka Seng ka la ong ba ka jingsynshar ha ka ri mynta ka dap tang da ka briew kiba thombor, ki nongpyniap ïa uba rit baria, ki riew thok riew shukor bad ki riewsniew, ha kaba na ka por sha ka por ki bor sorkar ki pynkheiñ ïa ka jingïateh kular bad ki Hima Khasi. Nalor kata la thombor bad ñion beiñ ïa ki nongïalam Hynñiewtrep kiba ka sorkar kam sngewtynnad satia ïa ki.Ka Seng ka ong ruh ba ki bor sorkar ki la donkti ha kaba pynïap klep ïa ki nongïalam lyngba ki fake encounter ne kata ka jingïasiat markylliang ba shu thok. “Phi la pynïap ïa u Bah Cherish, phi la rahbor ïa u Sib Sing Syiem, phi la ñion ïa u Wickliffe Syiem da kaba pynbor ïa u ba un moih noh na la ka jong ka It ka Hima. Phi lah ban ong ba ngin tieng da kaba leh kumne, hynrei ngim tieng bad ngin ym kynran dien, hynrei ngin tur beit shakhmat”, la ong ka Kyrwoh ba la phah bad soi da u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw.
title: Lada kiba donkti ïakren ïasuk ki shah pyndik mano ban shaniah shuh ïa ka sorkar : HNLC

content: Shiillong, Lber 11: Ki Pulit ka jylla ki la kem arngut ki briew kiba la suba ba ki donkti ha kaba jingpynbthei bomb IED ha Them Mawlong, ha haka ba ju ïeng ki bus kamai kaba la jia ha ka miet 9 tarik mynta u bnai.Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u SP East Khasi Hills District, u Rituraj Ravi, la ïathuh ba kiba la shah kem ki long u Ebakordor Nongpluh, 26 snem ka rta na West Jaiñtia Hills, uba la shah kem na Shillong. Uwei pat udei u Bah Tarson Lymba 58 snem ka rta uba la shah kem na Dawki.Ïa kine baroh arngut la leit rah hakhmat ka ïingbishar mynta ka sngi bad ki Pulit ki la ïoh bor ban tohkit ïaki shiphew sngi lynga ka Police Custody.Ki Pulit ki la kam ba ki don ki sakhi kiba biang ba kine arngut kidei kiba ïadon bynta ha kane ka jingpynbthei bom IED ha ka Them ïew Mawlong ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai.Hadien kane ka jingshah kem jong u Bah Tarson, ki nongïalam ka HNYF hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Sadon Blah, Presaident ka Seng ki la leit ban ïakynduh ïa ki Pulit, namar ba u Bah Tarson udei u Disciplinary Secretary ka HNLC.Haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Sadon, u la ong ba ka Seng kam kwah ban ong than ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah kem u Tarson bad halor ka jingtohkit ki Pulit ba u don bynta ha kaba pynbthei bom IED ha Them ïew Mawlong, hynrei u la ïathuh ba u Bah Tarson udei uba ïadon bynta bad ka jingïakren hapdeng ka HNLC bad ka sorkar, namar dei ma u uba ju leit shaw ïa ki nongïalam ka HNLC haba ki wan kiew na Bangladesh sha Meghalaya ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakren ïasuk, namar u ithuh lynti ban ïalam ïa ki sha jaka ba ki sah.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba kane ka jingkem jong ki Pulit ïa u Bah Tarson ka lah ban dei ba ki shu pharep, namar ba ki nongïalam jong ka Seng naduh ba pynbna ka HNLC ban weng noh na ka jingïakren ïasuk, ki la shah pyndik ha ki Pulit bad wat ma u ruh u la shah pyndik arsien laisien, ha kaba ki la khot hajir ne shah talasi haba leit jingleit da ki kali.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka jingpynthei bom IED ka la jia ha ka miet Sngi Saitjaiñ ha jaka ieng Bus jong ka Shillong Syndicate, ha Them ïew Mawlong kaba don ha syndah jong ka Them Metor. Ha kane ka jingbthei bom, kawei ka dukan ka la pra bad pait lut ki ïit bad uwei u briew u la mynsaw.
title: Shah kem 2 ngut ba suba donkti pynbthei bom IED ha Them ïew Mawlong

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : Ka National People’s Party (NPP) Umroi Block hynne ka sngi ka la pynkup burom ïa i samla Boniffila Shullai, i thei ïalehkai phutbol ba mihkhmat ïa ka India ha ka lympung U-16 jong ka South Asian Football Federation kaba dang shu lah shen ha Kathamandu, Nepal.Itei i samla i la poi hynne ka janmiet sngi Ba – ar hadien ba i la wanphai na Nepal. Ïa ka samla Bonifilia la pdiang burom da u Bah PR Rynghang General Secretary ka NPYF State Unit ryngkat ki nongïalam ka NPP Umroi.Kumban shu kdew hangne, katei ka samla na ka jylla ka la ïoh ban donlang bad ka kynhun ïalehkai ka India ha ka thup ba nyngkong (First XI) ha ka jingïakhun final jong ka SAFF U16 Women’s Championship 2024 ba khatduh pyrshah ïa ka Bangladesh kaba la kut noh da ka jingshah rem lyngba ka jingshut penalty da 3-2 kol ha kane ka sngi U Blei.Ha ka jingïalehkai ka India ka la ïalehkai bha naduh ba sdang da kaba ïoh ban pynkhih jar tang ha ka minit kaba saw lyngba ka Anushka Kumari na ka bol kaba la pashat kham najngai da ka Bonifilia.Tangba ka jingkyrmen jong ka kynhun ka la pjah noh hadien ba ka thei ïalehkai ka ri, ka Shweta Rani ka la kum thep noh sha kol la jong ha ka minit kaba 70 jnog ka kylla miet kaba la pynlong ïa ka rai rem rai jop ban poi sha ka tie-breaker.Ka ‘thei apkol ka Bangladesh ka Yearzan Begum ka la lah ban pynpaw ïa ka jingtbit ha kaba ka la lah ban pyllait na ka jingshah thep haduh lai sien ha ka tie-breaker bad kaba la lah ban pynurlong na ka bynta ban rah syndon ïa ka nam lahduh.
title: Pynkup burom ka NPP ïa ka samla ba mihkhmat ïa ka India ha ka phutbol

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : Ki nongïalam na ka North East Sports Association (NESA) ha ka 09 tarik mynta u bnai hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah John F Kharshïing, Secretary General, NESA ba dei ruh u Working President ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association ryngkat u Bamang Tago, Secretary General, Arunachal Pradesh Olympic Association ki la leit ban kynduh ïa u Prof (Dr.) Manik Saha, Myntri Rangbah ka Tripura bad ruh ïa u Myntri ka tnad Sport katei ka jylla, u Tinku Roy ban ïa syllok kumno ba ki nongïalehkai na katei ka jylla kin ïoh ban shim bynta ha ka 3rd North East Games 2024 kaban long ha Nagaland naduh ka 18tarik haduh 23tarik Lber, 2024.Ha kane ka jingïakyn duh la donlang ruh ki ophisar na ka tnad Sports jong ka Tripura, nangta ki nongïalam jong ka Tripura State Olympic Association bad ka Tripura Olympic Association nangta ka Tripura Sports Council nalor kiwei kiwei.Katkum ka kyrwoh la ïathuh ba katei ka jingleit kynduh kadei hadien ba ka NESA ka la shim ïa ka rai ban phah da katei ka kynhun ban leit jurip bad leit sngap ïa ka jingeh kiba mih ha katei ka jylla namar ki don haduh ar kynhun hapoh ka jylla kiba ïa knieh ban phah nongïalehkai sha katei ka NE Games.“Ha kane ka jingïakynduh, ka NESA ka la lah ban ïasyllok bad ki bor sorkar bad ki bor kynhun ïalehkai bapher bapher ban wanrah ka jingïabeit ha kaba la phah ïa ka kyrteng jong ki nongïalehkai na ka jylla Tripura.
title: Leit kynduh u Secretary General ka NESA ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Tripura

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 12: Hadien shi sngi jong ka jingdkut ka jingkieng ha wah Umshangkhar ha shnong Larem, South West Khasi Hills District kaba dei ka surok kaba pynïasnoh ïa ka Mawkyrwat bad ka Pariong shaduh ka surok bah National Highway, u MLA ka Mawkyrwat bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar mynta ka sngi jong ka 12 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024 u la hiar jurip ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ki ophisar na ka tnad PWD (Roads) ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman jong katei ka jingkieng.Hadien ka jingjurip, u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba kane ka jingkieng ka lah ban dkut noh namar ba ka la rim palat kaba la kot sha ka 50 snem ei ei bad dei na kata ka daw ka sa dkut bad shuh shuh ka jingtrei ka dei ha ki por ba rim kim shem la mang katkum ka juk kaba mynta kaba la bun ki kali heh, kumta kane ka jingkieng ka la dkut noh.“Ïa mynta shi por ngin peit shwa da kaba shna da ka surok Subway khnang ba ki paidbah nongleit nong-wan kin nym ïa kynduh bad ba kin ïoh ïaid biang na kane ka lynti kumba ki ju ïaid”, ong u bah Renik. La synrang da u bah B. Shylla, Assistant EE ka PWD (Roads) Mawkyrwat Division bad kiwei.
title: Jurip u MLA ba dkut ka jingkieng

content: K i paidbah Khasi-Pnar ki ju sngew sarong ïa ka rukom synshar kaba la hiar pateng na ki longshuwa manshuwa. Ka rukom synshar ka long ha ki lai bynta – Ha trai eh don ki Dorbar Shnong, halor jong ki don ki Dorbar Raij/Dorbar Elaka bad halor jong kine ki ar kyrdan pat don sa ki Syiem kiba synshar ïa ki hima kiba kynthup ïa bun tylli ki raij. Ha ri Jaintia te mynta ym don syiem ba synshar hynrei don da ki doloi kiba long ruh ki nongleh niam bad ki nongknia nongkhriam.Ka jylla Meghalaya, ryngkat bad ka Mizoram bad Nagaland ki la lait noh na ka aiñ Panchayati Raj Act kaba mut ka jingsynshar kaba ha trai eh – kata ka synshar khadar ha shnong tangba ïa ki nongkitkam ïa kita ki Panchayat dei ban jied da kaba thep vote. Ka jingkyntait ïa ka Panchayati Raj la ong namar ba ha kine ki ri lum lah don lypa kita ki rukom synshar shnong kiba naduh hyndai. Hynrei kane ka jingkyntait ïa ka Panchayati Raj ka la pynduh nong shibun eh ïa ngi shane namar ba ki nongsynshar shnong kumba long mynta kim don ka pisa bad ki lad pynroi ïa ki shnong ki thaw namar ba kim ïoh ïa kata ka “direct funding,” lane ka jingbei pisa na ka sorkar kmie kaba wan beit ha ka pla pisa kita ki Panchayat. Ki syiem jongngi shane ki shu lum khajna na ki ïew ki hat bad na ki mar ki mata kiba mih na kane ka jylla bad leit die shabar jylla. Ki District Council kiba peit ba khmih ïa ka jingtrei kam jong ki syiem/doloi bad ki dorbar raij/elaka bad ruh ki dorbar shnong, ruh kim don pisa ban bei sha kine ba kin trei ïa ki kam pynroi bapher bapher namar ki district council ruh ki shaniah ha ka sorkar jylla ba kan bei pisa ïa ki. Hooid na ka por sha ka por ki district council ki ïoh ïa ka direct funding na ka sorkar kmie hynrei ïa kata ka pisa ki council ki pyndonkam ha ka ban pyntri kam ïa ki skim lajong. Hooid ki district council ki ju ïasnoh lang hateng hateng bad ki shnong/elaka ban pyntrei ïa ki skim bapher bapher. Hynrei ka jingwan pisa na na sorkar kmie kam long kaba bun. Dei na kata ka daw ba ki district council ruh bun ba ki hap khrong khajna na ki ïew ki hat bad na ki dieng kiba pom na ki khlaw kiba hap ha ka jingpeit ki district council.Ha kane ka juk mynta ka synshar shnong kam long shuh kum ha ki por hyndai ba ym pat don plastik bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar elektrik. Ha ki por mynshuwa ïa ki kot ki sla la shu thang ha kper bad ïa ki jhur ki jhep bad kiwei ki mar bam na ïingshetja lah theh ha ka sboh kaba long ka thliew kaba tih hajan kper bad ynda lah dap kawei ka thliew la tep noh ïa ka bad tih na kawei pat. Hadien 6 bnai ei ei kata ka thliew kaba lah dep tep lah ban tih biang bad ban khlong ïa ka sboh kaba bha eh bad thung jingthung ha kper.Ha kane ka juk mynta ia ka jaboh na ïing kynthup wat ïa ka snep jhur bad ki jingbam ruh hap bret shabar ïing namar ym don jaka shuh ban theh niut shadien ïing. Mynta ha kane ka juk baroh kiba shna ïing kim buh jaka ban ïoh tih liewsboh ban bret ïa ki jhur, ki snep soh, ki jingbam ba lah sniew bad kumta ter ter. Ha ki por mynshuwa nga ju kynmaw ba ka don ka jingadong na ïing syiem haba ai jingbit ban shna ïing la ong ba dei ban ieh kumba 6 phut eiei ka jaka na u pud u sam bad bym dei ban shna ïing thik ha u pud khlem da ieh shuh tang shiphut ruh. Ki shnong kiba dei ban peit ïa kine kiei kiei ruh ki ong ba ym don ba sngap. Dei na kane ka daw ba wat halor ka wah ruh ki briew kim salia shuh ban shna ïing. Peit ïa ka Wah Umkhrah ter ter naduh na ka tyllong jong bad phin ïohi ba ki ïing ki la ïeng halor ki wah. Ki briew ki bret lut ïa u niut na ïing thik thik sha ka wah khlem jingsalia. Ki klet pat ba ka wah ka dei kawei na ki tyllong um bad ka um ka dei ka jingim.Mynta lada rngad lut ki wah nangno shuh ngin ïoh den um ban pynpoi sha ki lyngkha kba bad ki kper jhur kper soh? Ka sorkar kmie ka la pyntrei shaid shaid ïa kata ka skim Jal Jiwan Mission (JJM) kaba thmu mut ban pynpoi um ha man la ka thliew ïing. Hynrei kiba bun ki tyllong um jongngi mynta ki lah bun ba rngad lut. Bad wat lada ki wah ki dang doh ruh ka um kam long shuh kaba lah ban dih namar ba la jakhlia palat. Lada dih ïa kum kato ka um ïohpang kpoh bad kiwei ki jait jingpang ruh.Haba nga peit ïa ka Umiew ha Smit nga ishyrkhei bha namar ki briew ym tang ba ki sait jaiñ ha wah hynrei ki bret ruh ïa kito ki jingboh khunlung kaba don bad ka eit – khlem jingsalia. Kham harum pat don sa ka jingsait kali baroh shisngi ha pdeng wah syndon. Ka umphniang diesel bad petrol na ki kali ka la poi lut ha um. Haba ka ïing syiem ka don hajan kane hi ka wah balei keiñ u Syiem Khyrim um leh eiei ïa kane? Nalor ba u Pa-iem u dei ruh u doktor nongai jingsumar ïa kiba pang ba shitom.Ki nongsynshar shnong ha kane ka juk mynta ki dei ban long kiba ïohi jngai bad kiba pyrkhat ym tang ïalade shimet hynrei ïa ka paidbah paidlang kiba hap hapoh ka jingsynshar jong ki.
title: Ki Nongsynshar Hima bad Shnong kane ka juk ba mynta

content: BDWS
title: BDWS

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 12: Ka Young Pirates ka la ïoh ban pynhap pyrda noh ïa ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol kaba la tip kum ka 1st T.L. Pariong Memorial Football Tournament 2024 ha kaba ka Ïawpaw Football Club bad ka Thiepdiengan Football Club ki la poi sha ka phainal.Lah ban kdew ba kane ka Young Pirates ka dei kawei na ki Seng Samla hapoh jong ka Seng Samla Shnong Rangthong, South West Khasi Hills District kaba la pynlong ïa kane ka jingïalehkai kum ka dak ka jingsah jingkynmaw ïa u babu T.L. Pariong uba la khlad noh bad uba dei u Myntri barim jong ka shnong Rangthong uba la noh synniang shibun ïa ka shnong ka thaw mynba u dang don ha ka sla pyrthei.Ha ka jingïalehkai phainal ka Ïawpaw Football Club ka la long ka lahduh, ha kaba ka la pynliem noh ïa ka thiepdiengan Football Club da 3 – 0 kol.Ha kane ka sngi la ïadonlang ruh da u khun khatduh jong u babu T.L. Pariong, u Myntri jong ka shnong Rangthong, u bah Kitborlang Nongrem kum u kongsan uba ha ka juh ka por u dei u State President jong ka NPYF, lem bad kiwei kiwei de ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong.
title: Pynhap pyrda noh ka Young Pirates ïa ka 1st TL Pariong MFT 2024

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 12: Ki riew rangbah nongïalam jong ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Mawshynrut C&RD Block, ki la ju maham na ka por sha ka por bad la khang pyrshah ban pynïap pathar ïa ki don um doh wah da kaba pyndon kam da ki dawai bih, khang jar, siat bom, pynrngad ïa ki um, shoh khariew bad kiwei kiwei. Katei ka jingmaham ka dang ïai treikam haduh mynta.U Bah Boylan Langrin uwei na ki rangbah ka thaiñ, u ba long ruh u Myntri ka Hima Nonglang Sirdarship, haba ïa kren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba ka jingpynïap pathar ïa ki doh um doh wah, ka dei ka kam beaiñ bad ka kam kaba sniew haduh katta katta.U la ong ruh ba baroh ki riew rangbah katei ka thaiñ naduh ki sordar shnong, ki sengbhalang, ka synjuk ki nongkhwai bad ki paidbah ki don ka jingïatreilang, ban khang pyrshah ban pynïap pathar ym tang ïa ki doh um, hynrei ïa ki mrad ki mreng, ki sim ki doh bad baroh ki jingthaw ba im ha um bad ha ryngkew.Utei u rangbah u la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong u kum u Myntri ka Hima Nonglang Sirdarship, u don ruh ka jingsngewkhia ïa ka jingpynjulor ïa ka mariang da kaba pom pathar ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ki dieng ki siej, namar na ka jingpom pathar ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ki mrad ki mreng, ki sim ki doh bad wat ki doh kha doh pnat kiba im hapoh um ruh, kim ïoh bam shuh bad kane ka pynlong ïa ki ba kin jah suki suki.Khatduh eh u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong ba lada ki lap ïa kino kino kiba pynïap pathar ïa ki doh um doh wah, ki mrad ki mreng bad ki sim ki doh, ki dei ban pyntip ha ki riew rangbah, ne ki sordar shnong, khnang ba kin leh ïa kaba donkam bad ba kin pynshitom ïa ki katba shong ka aiñ, da kaba ïatreilang bad ki bor pynïaid District bad ki Pulit.
title: Maham jur ki Sordar ka thaiñ Mawshynrut ban pynïap pathar ïa ki doh um

content: Amlarem, Lber 12: U Sub-Divisional Officer (Supply), Amlarem Sub-Division u la pynbna paidbah ba ïa u khaw u ba hap hapoh ka skhim NFSA (AAY & PHH) bad ka Non-NFSA na ka bynta u bnai March, 2024 yn sdang ban pyllait noh sha baroh ki Fair Price Shop Dealers kiba don hapoh Amlarem haduh ka 15 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024.Ïa ka bhah jong u khaw AAY yn sam ha ka jingthew kaba 35 kilo kawei ka longing, ym donkam siew Pisa. Ïa ka bhah jong u khaw PHH yn sam ha ka jingthew kaba 5 kilo shi khlieh, ym donkam siew Pisa. Katba ïa ka bhah jong u khaw Non-NFSA yn sam ha ka jingthew kaba 7.215 Kilo shi card ha ka dor ba ym palat ïa ka Rs.14/- shi kilo. Lada don kino kino kiba shim da ka pisa ne ki bym ïoh ïa kitei ki mar jong ki, ki lah ban ujor ha u ba soi kyrteng harum da kaba thoh shai ïa ka kyrteng bad ka shnong jong ki nongdie rashon khnang ba yn lah ban pynshitom ïa ki. Ki paidbah ki lah ban ujor ha u Sub-Inspectors – 9436110184/8731025753, Email: sdo_amlarem@outlook.com.
title: La pyllait khaw AAY, PHH bad Non-NFSA ha Amlarem

content: Nongpoh, Lber 12: Tang hadien ba ki jait bynriew Garo hapoh ka kynhun All Ri-Bhoi Garo Headmen Association kila leit ban ai jingthoh syndon sha u Myntri Rangbah ban ithuh ïaka jinglong Rangbah Shnong jong ki hapoh u pud u sam ka Hima Mylliem jong ka Raid Marwet, u bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem CEM ka KHADC haba kren haka jingïalang bad ki Rangbah Shnong mynta ka sngi ha Nongpoh u la kren shai ba ka aiñ kam ithuh ban long Rangbah Shnong da ki jaitbynriew Garo haki shnong Khasi namar katkum ka Appointment and Succession of Syiem, Deputy Syiem, Electors and Rangbah Shnong of Mylliem Syiemship Act 2007 kala kren shai ba tang ki jaitbynriew khasi kiba lah ban long Rangbah Shnong.U la ong ruh ba ki don ki jaitbynriew Garo haka Raid Marwet kiba kam kum ki Rangbah Shnong bad naka liang ka District Council kan sa khot hajir ïaki namar ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïaka bor bad ka muhor Rangbah Shnong bad kum ka Council hi kam ailad da lei lei ruh ba ki jaitbynriew Garo kin long Rangbah Shnong hapoh ki shnong Khasi.Ha kawei pat ka bynta naka liang u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih bad pangnud ba bun naki shnong khasi kiba don ha khappud ka jylla la buhai shnong da kiwei ki jaitbynriew bad niar eh ban shem ïa u khasi bad kane ka wanrah ka jingeh kaba khraw ha kaba u la pynshlur ïaki samla khasi ba kin pyniar ka kamai ka kajih wat sha ki thaiñ khappud ban pynneh ïaki jaka bad u pud u sam.
title: Ka aiñ kam ithuh Rangbah Shnong Garo, yn khot hajir lada don kiba kam: CEM

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi Ba-ar, ula ong ba ka Sorkar kan ai ka jingpynshitom kaba tyngeh kat kum ka aiñ ïa ki briew kiba donkti ha lyndet ka jingpynbthei bomb IED ha Them ïew Mawlong, myn ha ka miet 9 tarik Lber.“…la bun ngut ki briew kila shah kem mynta bad la ai ka jingpynshitom ba tyngeh ïa ki. Kumba nga ong, ngin pynthikna ba ki briew, kiba donkti kin shah kem lut” ong u Conrad haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor.Ula ong ba ka Tnad Pulit ka la treikam sted bha halor ka jingïoh lum khubor syntiat bad ka jingpyn donkam ïa ki kor ka juk ba mynta.“Ki pulit ki dang pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad bun ngut ki briew ki la shah kem bad wat hynnin ka miet, la pyntip sha nga ba haduh ka por 12 baje mynmiet, nga ïoh phone call na ki heh Pulit ba pyntip ïa nga halor ki sienjam bapher bapher ba la shim bad kumta, nga la peit pyrman bha ïa ka jinglong jingman” ula bynrap.Haba kylli la ka Sorkar kan dang bteng ban shong ïakren iasuk lada ka HNLC ka donkti ha kane ka jingpynbthei bom, u Conrad ula ong ba kane ka dang dei tang ka jingantad hynrei ngin sa peit ynda ngi lap mano ba donkti.“Hadien ba ngi la lah ban pynthikna ryngkat bad ki sakhi satar, ngin sa lah ban ai ka jingkren aiu ba ngi rai” ula ong.“Hooid, ki don katto katne ki kam ba ngi lah jam shakhmat. Ngi la leh ïa ka jingwad bniah, jingtohkit bad kiwei kiwei bad ki khubor ba ngi ïoh lum ki pyntip ba ki don ki briew bad kynhun hynrei khlem ki jingtip kiba bniah bad ba pura, kam long kaba bha ïa nga ban kren eiei mynta” ula bynrap.Ha ka miet sngi U Blei, arngut ki briew kynthup u Nongïalam ka HNYF ula shah kem halor ka jingkynnoh donkti ha ka jingpynbthei bomb IED ha Them ïew Mawlong. Kine ki kyrteng u Tarson Lymba uba dei Disciplinary Secretary ka HNYF bad u Ebakordor Nongpluh.Hynnin ka miet, ki Pulit kila kem sa 4 ngut ki briew na Ri-Bhoi District bad ïoh kurup ruh ïa u bom IED u bym pat pynbthei.
title: Yn pynshitom da kaba tyngeh kat kum ka aiñ ïa kiba donkti pynbthei bom IED; ong u CM

content: Shillong, Lber 12: Ka KHADC lyngba u EM ba khmih ïa ka Land u Bah Teibor Pathaw u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong ka Digital Land Record Modernization Program (DLRMP), kadei ban shna ïa ki Cadastral Map jong ki bynta ne plot jong ka khyndew na ka bynta kawei pa kawei ka shnong bad ban pyni ruh artad ïa ki pud ki sam.Ïa kane u la jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MDC ka Mawthadraishan u Bah Jambor War uba la pan jingtip halor ka rukom treikam bad jingthmu jong ka DILRMP kiba la ai jingmynjur sha ka KHADC.U EM u la ong ka jingthmu ka long ruh ban pyni ne identify bad ban pruid dak ïa ki pud ki sam ki shnong, ban ïoh ïa ka dur ne shape, ka jingheh ne area ki jingdon ki jingthung jingtep ka jinglong ka khyndew bad kiwei kiwei.U Bah Teibor u la ong ban shna ïa ki dulir halor ka nongrim jong ki map. Kane kan pynduna ïa ka jingïakajia ha ka Liang u pud u sam, kane ka skhim ka ïarap ban pynbha ïa ka rukom pynbiang ïa ki dulir jaka puta katkum kane ka juk hynrei kam pynkylla ïa ka rukom bat khyndew ba la ju leh haduh mynta.“Kane ruh kan ïarap ban pynskhem ban ïada ïa ka jinglong trai bad ïa ka hok nongkynti halor ki khyndew ki shyiap jong ki. Kane ruh kan khanglad ïa ki briew ba khlem jingsngew bad pyndik pynshitom ïa kito ki trai jaka badei hok da kaba ai nishan ha ka aiñ bad kan pynduna ruh ïa ki mukotduma khnang ban ïa imlang sahlang da kaba suk ba saiñ,” ong u EM.U la ong ba kane ka prokram kan ïarap ban ïoh jingtip kiba biang ïa ka khyndew, nangta kan ïarap ïa ka sorkar ban pyntreikam ïa ki kam ba ïadei ha ka imlang sahlang kum ha ka Koit ka Khiah bad Sanitation. Kan ïarap ïa ka sorkar ban pyntreikam ïa ki kam pynroi, kum ki surok ki lynti syngkien, ka supply umbam umdih bad kiwei kiwei. U la ong ruh ba kane kan ïarap ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Meghalaya Land Transfer (Regulation) Act, namar kito kiba pynkheiñ ïa kane ka aiñ lah ban lap da kaba suk.“Lada don ki dulir kiba biang kan ïarap ïa ki trai jaka ban wad ïa ki jingïarap na ki Bank, ne skhim na ka sorkar. Kane ka prokram ka thmu ruh ba kan ym ktah ïa ka rukom bat khyndew ne mushlia ïa ki rukom treikam ki ADC hynrei kan ïarap ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka rukom bat khyndew da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki kor ki bor jong kane ka juk ba mynta,” ong u EM.
title: Ka jingthmu jong ka DLRMP ka long ban ïoh jingithuh ïa ki khyndew ki trai jaka, ong u Bah Teibor

content: Jowai. Lber, 12: Ka prokram ai jinghikai ba ar sngi ne ka ‘Marketing and Promotional Workshop’ hapoh ka “Scheme on Studies for Promotion & Strengthening of Black Pottery haka shnong Tyrshang bad Larnai, West Jaiñtia Hills District la pynlong da ka Rural Craft and Engineering Division (RC&E) mynta ka sngi ha Tyrchi Inn, Khliehtyrchi, West Jaiñtia Hills.Ïa kane ka prokarm ai jinghikai ba ar sngi la sdang mynta ka sngi 12 tarik u Lber bad pynkut lashai ka sngi 13 tarik u Lber, 2024. Ha kane ka sngi sdang la wan ban donlang da u Joint Director, Commerce and Industries, Shillong bah M. L Wanshong kum u kongsan, katba u General Manager, DCIC, Jowai bah B. Warjri kum u symbud kongsan.Kane ka projek “Scheme on Studies for Promotion & Strengthening of Black Pottery ha Tyrshang bad Larnai, West Jaiñtia Hills District, Meghalaya” la ïarap pisa da ka tnad Commerce and Industries (DCI) jong ka sorkar jylla bad kane ka projek la pyntreikam da ka Mahatma Gandhi Institute of Rural Industrialization (MGIRI) Wardha, Maharashtra, kaba dei ka R&D Institute hapoh ka Ministry of MSME, jong ka sorkar kmie.Ka jingthmu ba kongsan jong kane ka project ka long ban pynkiew shuh shuh ïa ki karkhana tynrai kiba ïadei bad ka rukom thaw khiew khyndew, kumjuh ruh ban pynïaid ïew ïa ki mar ki mata bad ban pynmih khambuh ïa ki bad ha ka juh ka por kin ïoh jinghikai katkum ka juk ba mynta.Na ka liang u Joint Director Commerce & Industries bah M.L. Wanshong ha ka jingkren ula ai khublei ïa ki nongpynlong ïa kane ka prokram kaba long ruh ka lad jingïarap ba kyrpang ïa ki nongthawkhiew jong kitei ki ar shnong Larnai and Tyrshang. Ula ong ha manla ki ïew pyni nam ki nongthaw khiew jong kitei ki ar shnong kila wan rah ïa ki mar jong ki ha ki jingshna kibapher bapher. Ula kyntiu ba kin sam leh ïa kane ka jingtip jong ki sha kiwei de kiba long ki lawei.U Dr. K. Venkata Rao, Deputy Director Rural Craft and Engineering ula pyntip ba kane ka prokram ba ar sngi ka long kum ka lad ban ai jinghikai ba bniah ïa ki nongthaw khiew, naduh ka rukom pynïaid ïew, ka ki rukom shna ba bun jait bad ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki.Ula ong hapoh kane ka project ka jingtreikam jong ka hapoh shisnem bad ka MGIRI la pynkhreh ha ki ar bynta kata ka Phase-I ban pule bniah ïa ki khiew khyndew (black pottery artisans) bad ban pule halor ka rukom pynwan dur ïa ki. Katba ka Phase-II kaba ïadei bad ka rukom ai jinghikai ba bniah halor ki sap pynwan dur bapher bapher bad ka jingpynneh pynsah ïa ki.Ula pyntip ïa kane ka bynta jong ka phase-I la dep ban leh ïa ka, katkum ka survey ki don 127 ngut ki nongthaw khiew kiba don sap, 104 ngut na Larnai bad 23 ngut na ka shnong Tyrshang bad la ai jingtip babniah ïa kitei ki nongsthaw khiew bad ka ïing ka sem jong ki ba kin im ryngkat ka imlang ka sahlang, ka synshar ka khaddar bad ka ïoh ka kot.Katba haka Phase II ïa ki bynta ba donkam jong ka project hapoh ka ‘capacity Building program’, ki nongshah hikai ban thaw khiew khyndew (Black Pottery) la pynlong da ka RC&E division ha MGIRI, Wardha naduh ka 6th October haduh 4th November, 2023 na ka bynta ki 16 nongthaw khiew na Larnai bad Tyrshang.Ïa ka Skill Development Training hapoh ka Project “Scheme on Studies for Promotion & Strengthening of Black Pottery ha Tyrshang bad Larnai village, West Jaiñtia Hills District, la pynlong naduh ka 15th January haduh 29th January, 2024 na ka bynta ki 76 ngut na ki ar shnong.Shuh shuh ula pyntip hapoh kane ka prokram ai jinghikai ïa ki nongthaw khiew kin sa ïoh lad ban leit mih sha Siliguri, West Bengal bad sha Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh naduh ka 11th February haduh 20th February, 2024 ïa ki 8 ngut yn jied na kitei ki ar shnong jong ka Larnai bad Tyrshang.Kiwei de kiba ai jingkren bad ki jingbatai bniah ki kynthup ïa Dr. Annaji Sharma, Professor & Management NIFT, Hyderabad, u Siewspah D. Buhroy, Assistant Professor Fashion & Management studies, NIFT, Shillong, u Viswanath B Kasi, Founder & Director Inkwisitive Global Advisory Singapore, Hyderabad, u Shri. R S Nongbri, Assistant Director, Branch MSME, DFO, Shillong bad u Mondon Lyngdoh. Jr. Executive KVIC, Shillong ‘Different Schemes of KVIC’ Kiwei de kiba la wan ban ïa donlang ki long u H.D Sinnur, ka kong S. Kharpran, Functional Manager, DCIC, Jowai bad ki nongtrei na ka Commerce and Industries Shillong bad Jowai.
title: Ar sngi ïoh jinghikai ki nongthaw khiew ranei na ka shnong Tyrshang bad Larnai

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 12: Ki paidbah kiba shong ba sah ha ki bynta khappud bad ka jylla Assam, ki la mad shisha ïa ka jingeh ba khraw ha ka kit ka bah, ka pang ka shitom bad ha ka ïaid ka ieng khamtam mynta ka por lyiur namar ka jingbym don ki surok kali ba bha ban leit sha ki shnong ki thaw jong ki.Ïa kane la pynpaw da ki nongsynshar shnong ka thaiñ Mawïamsyiem kiba hap hapoh ka Hima Nongmynsaw, kata ba kynthup ïa ki shnong ba don ha ka thaiñ Mawïamsyiem bad kiwei.U bah Patstar Nongshlong, sordar ka shnong Mawïamsyiem u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew bynñiaw, namar ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la iehnoh khunswet ïa ki paidbah kiba don ha kitei ki bynta khappud. U la ïathuh ba kumba long mynta ki don palat 10 tylli ki shnong kiba don ha ka thaiñ Mawïamsyiem, ki bym shym pat la ïoh pdiang satia wat tang khyndiat ruh ka jingïarap na ka sorkar jylla.U la ong ruh ba hapoh ka shnong Mawïamsyiem, ka sorkar kam pat pyllait wat tang ïa ka khanasumari kaba la dep ban lum naduh kham mynshwa. Kane ka la ktah bad pynduhnong shisha ïa ka shnong ka thaw, namar haduh mynta kim pat shym la ïoh pdiang wat tang u khaw rashon ne kiwei kiwei ki lad jingïarap na ka sorkar.U la ong ba katei ka thaiñ kam ïoh wat ïa ki scheme kyrpang ïa kiba duk na ka sorkar India kum ka MGNREGA, PMAY, PMGSY, bad kiwei kiwei ki kam pynroi ka ba la pynlong ïa ka thaiñ ban shong sah ha ka jingdum. Namarkata u la buh jingkylli ïa ka sorkar ba shaei ka buh ïa kita ki scheme border Road, ki scheme PMGSY bad kiwei kiwei kiba dei hok ban pynïoh sha ki jaka nongkyndong bad jaka khappud.U la ong ba kane ka pyni ba ka sorkar jylla kumjuh ruh ki nongmihkhmat kim kheiñ briew bad kim don jingkitkhlieh ïa ki briew kiba don ha kitei ki bynta khappud. U la ïathuh ba na ka liang jong ka jylla Assam ka la pyrshang katba lah ban theh ïa ki lad jingïarap wat sha kito ki jaka ba dang hap ha u pud jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad ki la don ki nongshong shnong kiba la kham sngew jan ïa ka Assam, namar ka kham leh bha hynrei haba phai pat sha ka jylla Meghalaya ka la shu pynbam tang da u dew ryngkhiang ïa u paidbah.Namarkata, u la kyntu jur ïa ka sorkar bad kumjuh ïa ki nongmihkhmat ba kin shimkhia ban peit lem ïa ka khia ka shon ki paidbah kiba don ha kitei ki bynta khappud, khnang ba kin ïoh ban im lem kumba long kiwei pat.Shuh shuh, u la pynpaw ruh ba kum ki nongsynshar shnong jong ka thaiñ, ki dawa ïa ka sorkar, khamtam ïa ki nongmihkhmat ba kan pynïoh noh ïa ka surok ban pynïasoh naduh Noapara-Mawïamsyiem-Umthli shaduh Kyrshai, khnang ba ki phew tylli ki shnong kiba don ha katei ka don ka thaiñ, kin ïoh noh ïa kaei kaba ki la angnud baroh shikatta na ka bynta ban kham pynsuk ïa ka kit ka bah bad ïa ka ïaid ka ieng.
title: Kumba 10 shnong tang ha ka thaiñ Mawïamsyiem ki bym pat ïoh jingïarap na ka Sorkar haduh mynta

content: Shillong, Lber 12: U EM ka tnat Elaka uba dei ruh u CEM ka KHADC u Bah P N Syiem u la ong ba ïa ka ilekshon ba pura ïa u Wahadadar hapoh ka Shella Confederacy yn pynlong noh hapoh ka shibnai shiteng.Ïa kane u la jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u Nongïalam ka Liang Ïatei u Bah T W Chyne bad u MDC ka thaiñ u Bah Teiñwell Dkhar hapoh Dorbar Mang tyngka ka KHADC.Na ka liang u Bah Chyne u la ïathuh hapoh ka Ïing ba ka la don kumba palat 15 snem ba khlem da ïoh shuh ban pynlong ïa ka ilekshon hapoh ka Shella Confederacy bad ba khlem ïoh ïa u Wahadadar ba pura bad la shu thung da u Adminstrator bad u Acting bad bun na ki shnong ki la klet ruh ïa kane ka kam khamtam ba ka rukom synshar khaddar ka paw bha kumta u la kyntu ïa u EM Elaka ban pynkloi noh ïa kane ka kam.Katba u MDC ka thaiñ u la ïathuh ba katkum ka jingtip ba la ïoh la ong ba baroh ki shnong ki la dep phah lut ïa ka kyrteng ki nongthep vote ne voter’s list.Haba jubab ïa kane, u EM Elaka u la kubur ba ka long kaba shisha ba khlem la lah ban pynlong ïa ka ilekshon hynrei u la kular hapoh ka ïing ba hapoh shisnem shiteng yn pyndep noh ïa kane ka kam.
title: “Hapoh 1 snem shiteng yn pynlong noh ïa ka ilekshon u Wahadadar”

content: Shillong, Lber 12: Na ka bynta ka jingdonkam ban buh ryntih ïa ki Kur ki Jait hapoh ka thup ka KHADC na ka liang u EM Elaka u Bah P N Syiem u la ïathuh ba ka jingwanrah ïa ka Clan Bill ka long ba ki Kur ne seng Kur kidei ban pynrung kyrteng ne Register khnang ban ïoh buh jingthoh bad ba kin ïoh ruh ki lad jingïada da ka aiñ hapoh ka KHADC.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MDC ka Liang Ïatei u Bah Jambor War uba la kwah tip ïa ka thup ki Kur hapoh ki trai ri trai muluk jong u Khasi kiba la pynrung kyrteng ruh hapoh ka KHADC.Halor kane na ka liang u MDC ka Nongpoh u Bah Balajied Rani uba la wanrah ïa ka jingkylli kaba bynrap bad uba la kwah tip ïa ka jingïoh jingmynjur ïa ka Clan Bill ne ba ka EC kan pynmih da ka jingpynbna ba shipor khnang ba ka Council kan ïoh jingithuh ïa ki Kur.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane u EM Elaka u la ong ba ka EC kan sa khmihbniah halor kane la ka donkam ne em ban pynmih ka jingpynbna khnang ba kan ym ïatyngkhuh bad ki kyndon ka Clan Bill.Halor ka jingai jingmut jong u MDC ka Laban Mawprem u Bah Mitchell Wankhar kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynbeit spel dak ïa ki kyrteng kur bad kumjuh ïa ka jingkylli bynrap u MDC ka Nongpoh u Bah Balajied Rani uba la ong ba ha kano ka rukom ka Council kan pynshong nongrim ban pynshisha ba kidei ki Kur Khasi namar ki don ki briew kiba pynkylla jait tang ban kam trai ïa ki jaka puta khamtam eh lyngba ka tang jait.U EM Elaka u la ong ba lada shah ki kyndon ynsa lah ban pynbeit ïa ki jingspel dak ïa ki kyrteng ki Kur.“Ki kur kin hap ban register bad ngin pyrshang ban peit ïa ki kyndon ban ïoh bsuh bad ynda la ïoh ka jingmynjur bad pynlong aiñ ïa ka Khasi Lineage Act lah ban bsuh lang ïa ka Clan Administration bad haba ïadei bad ka tang jait ngin sa shim khia lyngba ka Law Department,” ong u EM Elaka.
title: “Ka Clan Bill ka dei ba ki Kur kin hap pynrung kyrteng ban ïoh ki jingïada na ka KHADC.”

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma mynta sngi Ba-ar, ula ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la jan dep artad ïa ki lad ki lynti ha ka ban lah pynbeit noh ïa ka kam ba ïadei bad ka jingpynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki Longïing Harijan na Them ïew Mawlong.Haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, u Conrad ula ong “Ngi la jan dep artad ban ïapynbeit ïa ki lad ki lynti bad ngin sa lah ban pyndep noh kham kloi ïa kane ka kam”.“Ngi la don ha ka kynti ba sah satang ban shim rai bad ki nongshong shnong ki dei ban ïaroh ïa kane bad nga thikna bad kular ïa ki nongshong shnong ba ngi la shim khia bha ïa kane ka kam” ula bynrap.Kane ka jingkynthoh jong u ka la mih tang arsngi hadien ka jingjia pynbthei bomb IED ha Them ïew Mawlong bad ka jingkynnoh ba kane ka jaka ka la pynijli ïa ki paidbah ka Jylla.U Conrad ula ong ba ki paidbah bad ka Jylla kin ïaroh namar ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong eh ba kala don ka jingshimkhia da kano kano ka Sorkar ban pynkynriah ïa ki nongshong shnong na katei ka jaka.
title: La jan dep pynbeit ban pynkynriah ïa ki Harijan na Them Metor

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : Ka Liang Pyrshah All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) ne TMC ka la pynbna ïa ka kyrteng u MLA barim ka Rangsakona Zenith M Sangma kum u kyrtong MP jongka na ka Tura Parliamentary constituency ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ban wan.“Ka AITC hapoh ka jingïalam bad jingai mynsiem jong ka Chairperson Mamata Banerjee, ka sngewbha ban pynbna ïa ka kyrteng u Zenith Sangma kum u kyrtong ka AITC na ka Tura Parliamentary constituency (ST) ha Meghalaya” ong ka kyrwoh bala phah da ka AITC mynta ka miet Sngi Ba-ar.
title: U Zenith Sangma kum u kyrtong MP ka TMC na Tura

content: Ha ka sien ryngkoh jong ka Sorkar kaba la pynkhih khohreh ym tang ïa ki Nonghikai hynrei bad ïa ngi ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul ha ka jingïadei bad ka rai ban pynrung kyndit kynsan sa ïa ka sobjek krammar ha ki skul pule naduh ka klass ba san haduh ka klass ba shiphew katkum ba paw ha ka shithi No: MBOSE/AW/RNT/170/18/20900 Dated Tura, the 8th March, 2024. Kaei kaba wanrah ïaka jingbym sngewtynnad bad jing artatien ka long ym tang ïa ka rukom pynshong syrnot ïa ka thup pule ha ki skul hynrei khamtam ïa ka jingdier por ban buh bad pynrung sobjek shuh shuh.Hadien kumba shibnai eiei naba la sdang ban plie bad ai jinghikai ha ki skul, ka tnad pule puthi jong ka jylla pat ka dang bunkam ban ïaleh ban thaw lad thaw lynti thymmai shuh shuh ha ka ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha ka pule dangle jong ki khynnah skul. Nalor ki jingeh ba tyngkhuh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbujli ïa ka sobjek Jingkheiñ, Saian bad English da ki kot thymmai ha kaba dang bun ki khynnah pule ki bym pat ïoh ïa ki kot thymmai na ka jingduna ki kot ha ïew ha hat kaba ktah ym tang ïa ki bapli ki khynnah pule hynrei kaba ktah pat ïa ki jing-pynïaid beit pynïaid ryntih ïa ki skul ha ka ban ai jinghikai ïa ki khynnah. Kane ka wanrah shibun kiei kiei ki jingkylli kiba kane ka jingpynkylla ïa ki sobjek ka pynkiew ne em ïa ka pule ka dangle ha ka jylla. Ka jingduna jong ki kot ha ïew ha hat, ka jing-kyrkieh jong ka Sorkar ban bujli kot thymmai ka la pynsha-ïong janor hi ngaiñ ïa uba bun ba lang. Haba tang ïa ki kot thymmai ym pat lah ban pynbiang ha ïew ha hat, mynta pat bluit mih sa ka sobjek Krammar ?? Sangsot ki bapli ki kmie ki kpa khamtam na nongkyndong kiba da hap ban wan kiew sor man ka por ban wad kot thymmai ban ïoh pynbiang ïa ka jingdonkam ki khun ki kti ha skul nalor ba ka ktah pat sa ïa ka pisa pilaiñ ha ïing ha sem. Hato, ka Sorkar ka wanrah ïa ka nongrim pyn-kylla ïa ki sobjek ha ryngkat bad ka jingsngewthuh paka ïa ki jingeh ban mih na ka?? Ne, la shu wanrah kyrkieh khlem da sngewthuh ïa ka khlieh ka tdong ki jingeh ba tyngkhuh u paid nongshong shnong mo.Ka jingduna kine ki kot thymmai ha ïew ha hat ka pynpaw ba ka Sorkar kala phiel lypa ha ka jingpynkhreh (planning) bad rukom ïa trei-lang (coordination) bad ki nongshna ne nong supply ïa ki kot kaba la wanrah pat ïa ka jingartatien bala leh ïa kane ban kyntiew bad kynrong shisha ïa ka pule dangle ha ka jylla ne ka dei pat kawei na ki buit ban pynmih pisa (business) jong ka Sorkar ha ka kyrteng jong ka pule ka puthi.Ka jingwanrah ïa ki jingkylla ha ka por ba tbian ba lyngkot bad ka jingleh kyrkieh jong ka Sorkar ka pynmih ïa ka jingsngew bym-shaniah bad jing artatien ïa ki-ei ki-ei kiba rieh kiba ka sorkar ka don jingthmu. Ha ka jingshisha, ka kamram ba kongsan jong ka Sorkar ka dei ban wanrah ïa ki jingkylla ba pynïoh jingmyntoi ïa ki nongshong shnong khamtam ha ka ïadei bad ka hok ban ïoh ïa ka pule ka puthi ba bha bad miat hapoh ka jylla. Katba ka jylla ka dang ïaleh bad ki jingeh ba kynduh na ka jingrai bad ka jing bamja-khluit jong kane sorkar, ka dei pat ka kamram ba hakhmat jong ki nongpeit nongkhmih ïa ka tnad pule ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdawa ba donkam u paid nongshong shnong ha ryngkat ka jing pyntikna ba ka jingpynkiew ïa ka pule puthi hapoh ka jylla kam dei ban long pat ka jing ïohnong jong no re jong no kiba bat ïa ka bor ne ka shuki.
title: Ki jingkylla ha ka pule puthi: Ka jing-artatien ïa u nongshong shnong

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : Ka Kynhun Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla mynta ka sngi Ba-ar, ka la ai jingmynjur ïa ka Meghalaya Industrial and Investment Policy, 2024 ba thymmai, ka ban plie lad ïa ka jingbei tyngka ne seng kam seng jam ba palat T.10,000 klur da ki riew shimet nalor ban pynthikna ban aikam 90% ïa ki trai shnong ha ka kyrdan Unskilled.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïalang, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ula pyntip ïa kane ka Policy ba thymmai yn sa pyllait paidbah ha ka 14 tarik u Lber. Hadien kane yn sa pynbud da ka jingïasoi ïa ki katto katne ki soskular Memorandum of Understanding (MoU).U Conrad ula ong ba lada kren kyllum, ka Industrial Policy ba thymmai ka pynleit jingmut ha ki ar bynta-kawei ka long ban aikam aijam bad ban kyntiew ïa ki kam ba la buh hakhmat kum ka kam jngohkai, ka rep ka riang, ka food processing, ka pule dangle, IT bad kaba ar ka long ban pynshlur ia ka jingthied ïa ki mar napoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.“Ngi la buh ruh katto katne ki kyndon ba ka jingaikam ïa ki trai shnong ha ka kyrdan unskilled, shisien bala ai subsidy,ka dei ban kot haduh 90% na ki trai shnong” ong u Conrad.Hynrei ula ong “Haba phai pat sha ki kam ba donkam ïa ki briew ba tbit kum ka nuksa, phi donkam ïa ki engineer ban trei ïa ki optical fibre lane ki special cook ïa ki jait jingbam ba kwah bad lada ki trai shnong kim don ïa kane ka sap treikam, ngi la ailad ba kumba 2 snem tang 25% yn donkam ban thungkam ïa ki trai shnong hynrei ha kine ki arsnem kane ka nombor ka dei ban kiew sha ka 50% la kumno kumno ruh”.Haba ñiew ïa kane ka policy thymmai kum kawei na ki Policy kiba biang eh hapoh ka Ri, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong “Kane ka dei ruh kaba ïaid ha ryngkat ka thong jong ka Jylla ban kynjoh ïa ka 10 billion dollar economy”.“Da kum kane ka policy bala don, ngi khmih lynti ba ngin sa tam palat ïa ka shi billion dollar da T. 10,000 klur ka jingseng kam seng jam bad bei pisa kaba ngi la buh ha kine ki 3-4 snem ban wan” ula ong.U Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ruh ba ka Sorkar Jylla dang shen ka la wanrah ïa ka Industries Meghalaya Agency (IMA) ban pynbeit ryntih ïa ka kam seng kam bad bei pisa hapoh ka Jylla.
title: Mynjur ka Kynhun Myntri ïa ka Industrial Policy kaba thymmai

content: Shillong, Lber, 12: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la kren da kaba shai ba kan ym pdiang daleilei ruh em ïa ka aiñ Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 da kaba ñiew ba ka dei ka aiñ Ïakjakor ba la wanrah da ka Sorkar India.Ki dkhot ka KSU ba la lamkhmat da u President samla Lambokstarwell Marngar ha ka sngi Baar ki la ïasnohkti lang bad ka North East Students Union (NESO) ban thang ïa ka Rule jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha Lower Lachaumiere, Shillong.“Ngi thang ïa ka Rule jong ka CAA, ban pynkynnmaw ïa ka Sorkar India ba dalelei ngim pdiang ïa ka aiñ Ïakjakor ba ka Sorkar India ka wanrah. Kane ka dei ka buit aiu re ba ka Sorkar BJP ka thmu sha lyndet bad ka riehtngen ha ka shatri ba ka hap ban pdiang ïa kita kiwei pat kiba don sha Bangladesh, sha Afghanistan, sha Pakistan ba ki shah thombor (ha ka kyrteng ka niam) hynrei nga kren da kaba shai ba ka dang jur ka jingthombor jong ki heh paid ïa ngi ki trai ri trai muluk ban ïa ka jingshah thombor kita. Kine ki daw kiba ka ai ka Sorkar India ki dei ki bym shongnia shong nongrim hynrei ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar India kumba ka paw ba ka kwah ban pynmadan ïa ngi ki rit paid,” ong u President ka KSU Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar ha kajingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U la ong ba ha ki sngi ban sa wan ka KSU bad ka NESO kin sa shong pyrkhat kiei ki lad ki sienjam ba kum ka seng bad ka NESO kin shim.“Ngi dang pyrkhat ba ka Sorkar India kan ai ïa kita ki aiñ ki ban ïada ïa ngi ki trai ri trai muluk ha kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei hynrei ka jingpynlong aiñ ïa ka CAA ka dei ka jingkhot sngewbha jong ka Sorkar India ïa ki briew khamtam na ka ri Bangladesh. Phi hap ban sngewthuh ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba ïajan tam bad ka ri Bangladesh bad na ka por sha ka por ka jingwanrung kyrthep bad wan rung laitlan sha kane ka jylla jong ngi bym don ki aiñ ki kanun,” ong u samla Marngar.“Ngi don tang 15 lak ha ka jingbun briew, lada ki wan ki Hindu tang 10 lak na ka ri Bangladesh ka jaidbynriew ritpaid jong ngi ka la kut,” ong une u nongïalam ka KSU bad bynrap, “ngan pynkynmaw ha u snem 2019 ka CAB ka la long aiñ bad ha une ujuh u snem ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ruh ka la mynjur ïa ka Resolution ban dawa ïa ka Sorkar India ba kan pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) hapoh kane ka jylla hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ka Sorkar India naduh u snem 2019 haduh mynta ka dang pule sah ïa ka Resolution. Kane ka pynpaw shai ba ka Sorkar India ka mut ban thombor biang ïa ka jinglong ba kyrpang jong ngi,’ u la ong.“Ha ka mynnor, nga lah ban ong, ym dei ba ngi pyrshah ïa ka Sorkar India, hynrei ngi hap ban kren ïa ka jingshisha ïa ka histori. Ka jaidbynriew Hynñiewtrep ka ïasnoh bad ka ri India lyngba ki ktang suloi ba la pynap bad pynkbum jubor. Sa shisien pat, ym da ki ktang suloi, hynrei ka (Sorkar India) thombor da ki aiñ kiba khyllah khyllah pyrshah ïa ka jingshong shngaiñ jong ngi ka jaidbynriew,” la kynthoh u President ka KSU.“Katkum kane ka aiñ (CAA 2019), kiba rung shwa ka 31 tarik, Nohprah, 2014 kim donkam ban pan kot pan sla bad pan ïa ki jingpynshisha hynrei la pdiang sngewbha beit ïa ki kum ki nongshong shnong bapura hapoh ka ri India baroh kawei. Ha,oid, ka Sorkar India, ka ong ba kane ka aiñ kan ym kynthup ïa ki Schedule Area lait noh ha ki Non-Schedule Area, hynrei lada ka long kumno kumno ruh hynrei ka seng ka ju ïohkem ïa ki briew kiba wan rung shapoh ka jylla khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang. Ngi shem ba ki wan na ka jylla Assam,” bynrap u President ka KSU.“Katkum ka thup kyrteng ba la pynmih ha ka National Register of Citizens (NRC) da ka Sorkar Assam ki don palat 20 lak tam ne duna ki bym don kyrteng. Kane ka pyni shai ba ha ka jylla Assam ka jur bha ka jingrung kyrthep ki mynder ri. Kane ka dei ka jingma kaba ap ym tang ïa ka jylla jong ngi bad ka jylla Assam hynrei ïa ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei,” u la bynrap.“Ka NESO bad ka KSU ka la ujor sha ka Supreme Court ïa ka CAA bad mynta ka dang sah pongding hapoh ka Ingbishar bad ki lad ki lynti ngin sa nang pyrkhat halor ka jingpynlong aiñ ïa ka CAA kaba long pyrshah ïa ngi ki trai ri trai muluk. Ngin sa shong ban pyrkhat bad ban pynsngew sha ka Sorkar Jylla ïa kiei ki lad ki lynti ban tehlakam bad pyrkhing ïoh lehse ki don kita ki poiwir kiba na ka jylla ki leit wad ïa ka shatri ban long ki nongshong shnong bapura jong ka ri India bad kane ka jylla,” la ong u samla Marngar.Haba kylli, u la ong, “kan ym lah ba long hynrei ka long tang kumno ban pynthame bad ban ïalam bakla hynrei kan don beit ka jingktah. Lada ka ktah ïa ka Assam kan ktah beit ïa ka jylla jong ngi. Kut ki bar jylla kiba wan rung beaiñ ha kane ka jylla jong ngi ki dei beit na ka jylla Assam. Peit ki nongtrei bylla kiba wan sha Meghalaya khlem ki kot ki sla. Ki Kharbangla ki rung sha Meghalaya khlem ki kot ki sla bad bunsien ki ong ba ki dei na Assam. Kine ki rung sha Assam tang ban ïoh ïa ki kot ki sla ba kin ïoh buhai shnong hapoh kane ka jylla jong ngi. Kita ki dei ki dak mynsaw kiba ap ïa ka jylla jong ngi,” u la kynthoh.
title: Da leilei ngim pdiang ïa ka aiñ Iakjakor ba ka Sorkar India ka wanrah, ong u President KSU

content: Shillong, Lber 12: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka sngi baar, u la ïashim bynta ha ka CM Elevate Conclave, 2024 kaba la long ha U Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong. Ha kane ka sngi la donlang ka myntri jong ka tnat ki kam rep ka M Ampareen Lyngdoh bad ka MLA, ka Saipung-Sutunga, ka kong Santa Mary Shylla.Haba kren shaphang ka jingsdang jong ka CM Elevate program u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la trei halor ka kam ka Meghalaya ba kan poi ha ka kyrdan kaba 10 na kiwei ki jylla ha ka ri.“Ngi la sdang ïa kane ka kam ban pynlong ïa ka jylla kaba poi ha ka kyrdan kaba 10 napdeng kiwei ki jylla bad ngi la ïaid shakhmat da ka jingthmu ban kynjoh sha ka thong jong ka 10 billion economy bad ban bynrap sa 10 tylli ki lad bad ban ithuh ïa ki 10 tylli ki jaka ki ban long ki nongïalam jong ka jingkiew bad ka ïohkam ïohjam,” u la ong.U la bynrap ruh ba ki briew ki la sdang ban seng ïa la ki jong ki kam, ki leh ïa ki kam bad na ka liang ka CM Elevate ka la thmu ban thaw ïa ki sawdong sawkun na ka bynta ka jingkiew ki lad plie kam plie jam bad ban ïarap pisa na ka bynta ban thaw ïa ki kam.“Ka CM Elevate kadei ka nuksa ba la shimkhia da ka sorkar ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa ki jingangnud jong ki samla bad kiba sengkam lajong da kaba pynïoh ki tyllong ban pynkylla ïa ki jingmut sha ki jingjop,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ruh ba kumba 1254 ngut kiba ïoh myntoi kaba la kot sha ka jingïoh kaba la kot kumba T. 56 klur kiban ïoh myntoi lyngba ki skhim kiba bun jait lyngba ka CM Elevate program ka ban pynmih ki kam kumba 50,000 tylli.Haba plie ïa ka Meghalaya State Floriculture Mission ha kane ka prokram, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka long kaba kongsan bad ka sienjam kaba heh halor ki kam rep bad ka roi ka san ha ki thaiñ nongkyndong. U la ong ba ka kyrdan ka jingsdang kumba 3,100 ngut kiba ïoh jingmyntoi bad ha ka jingmang tyngka kaba long T. 240 klur ha kine ki 3 snem kiba la thmu ban thaw ïa ka Meghalaya kum ka pdeng ki kam rep syntiew.Katba ka Myntri ki kam Rep ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka sorkar ka la buh ïa ka thong ban thaw bun ki kam bad ki prokram kum ka CM Elevate bad ka Floriculture Mission ka dei ka sienjam halor kane ka bynta. Ka la banjur halor ka jingdonkam ban ithuh ïa ki kam ki samla ban pynkynthup ïa ki ha ki kam ka ïoh ka kot.Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah u la ruh sam ïa ki cheque bad ki shithi ba la mang sha ki nongïoh myntoi na ka Prime Agriculture Response Vehicles, Piggery Development, Poultry Farming, Goat Farming, Common Facility Centre, Agriculture Warehouse scheme kiba hab hapoh ka CM Elevate program. La sam ruh ïa ki shithi mang tyngka hapoh ka Meghalaya Floriculture Mission.La pyllait ruh ïa ka Mission Document ka Meghalaya State Floriculture Mission bad ka Meghalaya GDP Vision 2028.
title: Dang trei shitom ka sorkar ban pynpoi kyrdan ba 10 ïa ka jylla, ong u Conrad

content: Shillong, Lber 12: U MLA ka BJP u Bah Sanbor Shullai u la pynshai ïa ka aiñ kaba la dep ban pynbna da ka sorkar pdeng kaba la pynpaw shai ba ki jaka kiba hab hapoh ka khyrnit kaba 6 kiba kynthup ïa ka jylla Meghalaya kin lait na ka jingshah pyntreikam ïa ka Citizenship amendment act kaba la long katkum ka dorkhas kaba u la dep phah sha ka sorkar pdeng ha ka 19 tarik u Naiwieng ha u snem, 2019.U Bah Sanbor Shullai u la ong ba u dei uba nyngkong u MLA ka BJP na ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi uba la rah ïa kane ka mat kaba ïadei bad ki jylla kane ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi ban pynlait ïa ki thaiñ riewlum na ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka citizenship amendment act.U Bah Sanbor Shullai u la ai khublei ïa u Myntri Rangbah duh ka ri u Narendra Modi ba u la pyllait ïa ki jaka ki riewlum hapoh ka act bad u la ong ba tang ka party BJP kiba kren da ki MLA ka BJP na ki jylla kane ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi kaba la pdiang ruh da ka sorkar pdeng.U Bah Shri Sanbor Shullai u la ong ba ka citizenship act 1955 lah dep ban pynkylla kham mynshwa da ka sorkar ka seng Congress bad ki jaka ki riewlum kim pat ju lait hapoh ka jingsynshar jong ka congress, hynrei ka sorkar BJP hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Narendra Modi u la pyllait ïa kine ki thaiñ riewlum napoh ka citizenship amendment act 2019.U Bah Sanbor Shullai shuh shuh u la pynshai ba hapoh ka kyndon jong ka section 6(B) point no 3 jong ka bynta ba la bsut ka la pynshai bha ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïoh long nongshong shnong watla ki don ki mukotduma kiba dang sah pyrshah ïa u.Shuh shuh katkum ka citizenship amendment act 2019 ki kyndon kiba la bsuh ki la pynshai ba tang kito kiba rung sha India ha lane shwa ka 31 tarik u Nohprah 2014 bad hapoh kane ka clause ka por kaba rit ban sah kam dei ban duna ïa ka 5 snem ha ka jaka jong ka 11 snem kaba la kdew hapoh ka citizenship act 1955.Kumta haba peit ïa baroh kitei ki kyndon u MLA ka BJP u la ong ba ka Meghalaya ka la leit pura na ki kyndon jong ka CAA.U MLA ka BJP u Bah Sanbor Shullai u la ong ba katkum ka jingtohkit na ki village council, welfare society bad kiwei ki seng ha ki non-schedule area ha Shillong ki seng ki la pyntip ba ki khlem ïoh ïaid lyngba kum kine ki kam sha u snem 2014. Kumta ka long kaba shai ba ka CAA kan ym lah ban pyntreikam ha ki jaka Khasi bad Jaiñtia hills kynthup ïa ka jylla Meghalaya, naba ka sorkar pdeng ka la dep pyllait ïa ki jaka ba hab hapoh ka khyrnit ba 6 ka riti synshar ka ri India kumba la pynkylla.“Ngi dei ban ai khublei ïa u Myntri Rangbah duh ka ri u Narendra Modi ji bad u Myntri ka tnat ki Kam Pohïing u Amit Shah uba la kynthup lang ïa ka kynhun ki khristan hapoh ka Citizenship amendment act 2019 naba bun ki khristan khambun kiba don ha Pakistan bad ri Afghanistan kin ïoh ka jingmyntoi na kane ka act. Kumta nga kyrpad ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ka jylla ba kim dei ban shah ïalam bakla ha kino kino ki seng saiñ pyrthei naba kane ka aiñ kam don jingïadei hapoh kane ka jylla Meghalaya,” ong u Bah Sanbor.
title: Yn ym treikam ka CAA ha jylla Meghalaya, ong u MLA ka BJP na South Shillong

content: Shillong, Lber 12: U Nongïalam ka Liang Ïatei ha KHADC u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne uba dei u MDC ka Sohra bad u CEM barim haba ïashimbynta ha ka jingïatai nia kaba kyllum halor ka mang tyngka kaba la wanrah da u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi sdang ka dorbar mang tyngka u la pynpaw ba ka jingkwah jong kawei ka kynhun Garo ban ai jingithuh ïa ki Rangbah shnong Garo kiba don ha ki 54 tylli ki shnong ha thaiñ Ri Bhoi ka long ka jingma ïa ka riti synshar khaddar ka jaitbynriew Khasi.U la ong ba lada ai lad ïa ki Garo ban long Rangbah Shnong kum ha kiwei ki shnong ne Hima kiba lah don la ki jong ki aiñ ne Act kan jia aïu ïa ki.“Haba ïadei bad ka jingphah tuklar jong ki na ki bor kiba nabar haba ïadei bad ka jingkwah ban ithuh ïa ki kum ki Rangbah shnong, ka KHADC kam dei ban ailad satia ïa ki jingtuklar kiba wan na kino kino ki liang, namar kumba long mynta kine ki paralok Garo ki ïoh ïa ki kam pynroi kum ba ïoh kiwei kumta ym dei ban ïasuk ne compromise halor kane ka bynta,” kyntu u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne.Haba jubab ïa kane u Symbud CEM u Bah P N Syiem uba khmih ruh ïa ka Elaka u la ong ba na ka liang ka KHADC ne EC kaba mynta ka khlem pat ai jingithuh ïa ki Rangbah shnong Garo bad namarba ka thaiñ Marwet ka hab hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka Hima Mylliem kumta ka Hima ka la jied da ki Circle Rangbah Shnong.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba na ka liang ka All Ri -Bhoi Garo Headmen Association (ARGHA) ha ryngkatlang bad ka All Khasi Hills Achik federation ki la leit ban ïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew pyrshah halor ka jingithuh ïa u Rangbah Shnong ki Garo da katto katne ki kynhun hapoh ka thaiñ Marwet.U President ka headmen association, u Nickel R Marak u la ong ba ki long ki nongshong shnong kane ka thaiñ mynta naduh ki por ba dang synshar ki phareng bad ki la don la u jong u Rangbah Shnong Garo hynrei mynta ka lah don kawei ka seng kaba la thoh sha ka KHADC ba kam dei ban ithuh ïa u Rangbah Shnong Garo bad halor kane hadien ba ki la ïoh ïa ka shithi na ka KHADC halor kane ka kam.Kumta kane ka kynhun ka la leit ban ïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla bad ban kyrpad ïa u ban pynthikna ba ka riti dustur bad ka jingithuh ïa u Rangbah Shnong Garo kan dei ban bteng ha kine ki 54 tylli ki shnong.
title: Ka KHADC kam dei ban ailad ban mushlia ïa ki kam dawa Rangbah Shnong ki Garo: Titos

content: Shillong, Lber 12: Ka Synjuk ki nongïalam niam ha Shillong, ka Shillong All Faiths Forum (SAFF) ka la kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba kan shimkhia bad leh hok haba don kino kino ki jingjia kiba wanrah ïa ka jingshong syier ha ka imlang sahlang.Haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, u Rev. P. Lyngdoh, uba long u Chairman ka Forum, u la ong ba ki don ki bor kiba na shabar ka jylla kiba thmu ban wanrah ka jingïasngew pher niam ha ka jylla kumba la jia ha ki jaka khappud ha kine ki sngi baladep, na ka liang ka sorkar ka hap ban shimkhia bad ban trei hok da ka lynti kaba khuid ba suba, khnang ba ki paidbah kin nym don hapdeng ka jingshong syier.Shuh shuh na ka liang ka Forum, ka la ïathuh ba ka la buddien ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia ha khappud ha kaba ki skul jong ki Balang Khristan ki la shong syier, na ka liang ka sorkar ka la pyntip ba u Chief Secretary ka jylla u la ïakren bad u Chief Secretary ka Assam ban ïapynbeit, khnang ba kan nym don kano kano ka jingjia ba wanrah ïa ka jingthut ka suk ka saiñ.Ha kajuh ka por na ka liang ka Forum ka kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah ba kin pynneh ïa ka jingshongsuk shongsaiñ da kaba kiar na ki kam pynshit bad ban nym ngeit bieit than ïa ka jingïathuh jong kiwei pat.Ki la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong ki kum ki nongïalam niam, kin ïatreilang la ka long bad ki bor sorkar ne bad ki paidbah ban wanrah bad pynneh ïa ka shonsuk shongsaiñ ha ka jylla.
title: Ka Sorkar ka dei ban shimkhia haba don ki jingkhih phaloh na ka jingsngew pher niam: SAFF

content: Shillong, Lber 12: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka sngi baar u la buh ïa bun tylli ki mawnongrim na ka bynta ki 4 tylli ki projek ha ki jaka sor ha ka prokram ba la pynlong ha Ward lake Shillong. Ki projek ki kynthup ïa ka Development of Commercial Building ha Polo, ïa ka Mechanised Multi-Level Car Parking kaba ha Vivekananda Road, nangta hajan ka Additional Secretariat bad ka Polo Commercial Complex, ka jingpynitynnad ne ka Beautification ïa ka Ïewduh bad ka jingkyntiew bad pynbha briew ïa ki 5 tylli ki pung ne ki Lake ha ka jylla bad ki jaka ba don ka Ward Lake.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, u la ong ba ka sorkar ka don ka jingthmu bad ïohi jngai ban pynkylla ïa ka nongbah Shillong sha ka nongbah kaba long katkum ka juk kaba mynta khamtam haba ïadei bad ka jingkhap ngiah.Haba kren shaphang ka jingpynbhabriew ïa ka Ïewduh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “Kane kadei kaba ngi la pyrkhat bad kaba ngi la trei khnang ba ïa ka ïew la pynbhabriew bad ki kam jingtei kin khambha ban khring ïa ki nongwan jngohkai,” u la ong.U la ong ïathuh ba kumba T. 15 klur la mang ïa kane ka project ban pynthymmai bad pynkylla ïa kane ka ïew kaba la buh da u mynbarim bad ka ïew ki trai ri trai muluk. Ha kane ka projek kan don ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ki pipe um, ki nala, ka jingshna ïa ki jaka leitbar paidbah, ka jingbuh ïa ki kali kit ñuit bad ki jaka bret ñuit, ka jingpynthaba ïa ka ïew da ki bording ilektrik bad kiwei.Haba kren shaphang ka jingpynbha briew ïa ka Ward’s Lake bad ka Ward’s Lake Promenade u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba shi bynta na ka projek kan leit sha ka jingïar kaba 1.5-2 km pyrshah jong ka Ward’s Lake ha kaban shna ïa ki dukan, ki jaka die jingdie ha madan, jaka ïeng kali bad kiwei kiwei.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la ong ba ka thong jong ka sorkar ka long ban peit ïa ka jingeh halor ka jingkhap ngiah bad ka jingpynïaid ki kali hapoh nongbah Shillong. Haba kren shaphang ka jingthmu ban pynkynriah noh ïa ki ophis treikam na Shillong sha ka nongbah ba thymmai ne ka new administrative city, u la ïathuh ba kane ka projek kaba kynthup ïa kiba bun ki kam halor ka jingpynkylluid ïa ka Shillong ka jinglut ka la kot sha ka malu mala T. 90 klur kaba dei ruh ka jaka ïeng kali kaba ngiam kumba 465 tylli ki kali ha kine ki jaka.U la ïathuh ba 5 tylli ki nan ne Pung kiba kyrteng ka Ward’s Lake, Malse Lake, Nirman Jheel, Memo Lake kum kaba ha Williamnagar bad ka Rangjokram Lake ha Resubelpara yn pynbha briew bad pynkhuid.
title: Buh Mawnongrim u Myntri Rangbah ïa bun ki projek ban kyntiew ïa ki kam pynroi sor

content: Shillong, Lber 12: Ki shipai Ïada Pud ki la ïathuh ba ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024, ki shipai kiba la peitngor bha jong ka kynthun ka 172 Bn BSF Meghalaya da kaba suk ki la lah ban pynpulom bad kurup ïa ki jaiñ bad kiwei ki tiar ba la thmu ban khaïi beaiñ sha Bangladesh kiba la shongdor kumba T. 14 lak ba la thmu ban shalan lyngba u pud ka ri kaba ha East Jaiñtia Hills district.Hadien ba la ïoh ka jingtip kaba thikna ïa kitei ki tiar la kurup da ki shipai BSF hadien ba la tep hapoh ka khlaw kaba hajan u pud u sam ka ri, ba la thmu ban khaïi sha beaiñ Bangladesh. Ïa kitei ki tiar ba la ïohkem la aiti sha ka ophis custom ban leh ïa ki kam katkum ka aiñ.
title: Ïoh kurup jaiñ ki BSF ba shongdor T. 14 lak

content: Shillong, Lber, 12: Tang shi sngi hadien ba ka Sorkar India ka la pynmih paidbah ïa ka Rule jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019, ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) kaba long ka shatri jong ki sengbhalang bapher bapher ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ha ka sngi Baar ka la thang ïa ka Rule jong kane ka aiñ hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha Lower Lachaumiere, Shillong.La lamkhmat ban thang ïa kane ka Rule da u Chairman jong ka NESO u Bah Samuel B Jyrwa ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongïalam ka Khasi Students Union (KSU), ki dkhot jong ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo Peoples (FKJGP) bad kiwei kiwei.“Lada ka Assam ka shah ktah suki suki kiwei ki bynta jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei kin shah ktah. Lada phi ong ba ngi don ïa ka Sixth Schedule ha kane ka jylla, kumno pat ka jingjyllei jong ki bar jylla ka jur haduh katne katne. Ka Sixth Schedule katkum ka jingïohi jong ngi ka khlem lah ban ïada ïa ka jingrung jong ki bar jylla bad kiba bun ki bynta jong ka Sor Shillong bad ki bynta jong ka khappud jong ka jylla la bun da kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew. Lada kata ka Sixth Schedule ka lah ban ïada, balei pat kam lah ban ïada baroh shikatta. Dei halor kata ka nongrim ba ngi sngew ba ka CAA kan nang pynshlur shuh shuh ïa ki mynder ri ba kin wan shapoh ka ri jong ngi,” ong u Bah Samuel ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Naduh u snem 1947 ba ka ri India ka la ïoh ïa ka jinglaitluid ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka la ïai shah ba ki bar ri kin wan buhai shnong bad shong shnong bad kumjuh ruh ha u snem 1971 haba la khie ka thma ha ri Bangladesh da ki phew hajar bad da ki lak ki la rung shapoh ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi,” u la ong.“Ka Sorkar India da kaba leh kumne ka nang kwah shuh shuh ba ki bar ri kin long ki trai shnong, ki trai ri trai muluk hangne ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei, kaba long ka jingma ïa ngi ki ritpaid ym tang ha ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei,” la bynrap u Chairman ka NESO.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne ba ka NESO ka la mudui hapoh ka Iingbishar Supreme Court pyrshah ïa ka jingpynlong aiñ ïa ka CAA bad haduh mynta kane ka kam ka dang sah pohding hapoh ka Ingbishar.Haba kylli u la ong, “ka Sixth Schedule ka kren tang ïa ka riti ka dustur, ka jingpynneh ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap hynrei ka khlem kren ïa ka jingrung jong ki briew kiba nabar. Dei namarkata, ka Sixth Schedule kam pat biang kumba ka long mynta ban tehlakam ïa ka jingwan rung jong ki briew kiba nabar.”“Ka jinglah ban tehlakam ïa ka jingwanrung jong ki briew kiba nabar ka dei ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng. Kumba ka long mynta ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act (MRSSA) ka Ingbishar High Court ka la pynsangeh bad ïa ka ILP ruh ka Sorkar India ka khlem ai nalor ba la ïai dawa mynta da ki phew phew snem,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Jyrwa.Halor ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar India ban ai jingmynjur ïa ka Inner Line Permit ha Meghalaya, u Bah Jyrwa u la ong, “ka jingïajngai jong ki jaidbynriew ritpaid ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi naduh mynshwa na ka ri India ka dei ka jingleh jong ki hi naduh ka por ba ngi ïoh ïa ka jinglaitluid ngi khlem ïoh ïa ka hok jong ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi. Naduh ka sngi ba la ïoh laitluid haduh kane ka khyllimat ba mynta kaei kaba ka Sorkar India ka la leh ïa kaba bha ka ban long ka jingïada, ka jingkyntiew ïa ka ktien ka thylliej, ïa ka riti ka dustur bad ban ïada ïa ki jaidbynriew jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei, tang kawei ruh kam pat don ba kan leh. Kumno ngin ong ba ka Sorkar India ka la leh bha, ka khlem leh eiei ruh em. Dei halor kane ba kane ka jingpynjngai da nang jur nang jur hapdeng ki trai ri trai muluk ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi bad ka Sorkar India hapoh Delhi.”
title: Thang ka NESO ïa ka Rule jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 ka Sorkar India

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi Ba-ar, ula ong ba ka Sorkar MDA hapoh ka jingialam jongu da lei lei ruh kan ym shah satia ban tih Uranium hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.U la kren ia kane mynta ka sngi ha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la mih ki khubor ba kawei ka seng ba la tip kum ka North East Sunshine Trust (India) ka la thoh sha Delhi ban sdang biang ïa ka project tih uranium ha Meghalaya.“Kino kino ki seng ki lah ban thoh, ngam lah ban khang ïa ki ba kin thoh sha ka Sorkar India hynrei kane kam mut pat ba ka dei ka nongrim ba ïeng da ka Sorkar Jylla namar ka sorkar jylla ka la dep rai naduh mynshwa ban khylliap noh ia kane ka kitab tih Uranium ha Meghalaya” ong u Myntri Rangbah.“Ngi la kren shai ba khlem ka jingmynjur lang ki paidbah, khlem da khmih lang ïa baroh ki kam ba ïadei bad ka saian, ngin ym shah satia ban tih uranium ha ka Jylla jong ngi” ula ong.U Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka nongrim jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shai bha halor kane ka kam namar “Ka dei ka kam iap kam im u paidbah, ka dei ïa ka koit ka khiah u paidbah bad ka dei ia ka lawei jong ka Jylla jong ngi”.“Ki lah ban don ki jingsngewkhia na ki riew shimet, kiba lah ban kwah ia kane bad don ruh kiba kwah ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa kan, ka dei ïa ka ban hap pynbeit ha ka lynti kaba jai jai bha namar kumba nga ong, ngi hap ban shim lem ïa ka jingmynjur u paidbah, ngi hap ban da pule bniah ïa ki jingktah jong kine ki kam bad dei hadien kine kiei kiei, ngi hap ban pynthikna ba ym dei ban shim ïa ki sienjam ha kane ka lynti (ban tih) namar kumba nga ong, ka dei ka kam ba ktah ïa ka iap ka im u paidbah bad ka lawei ki briew jong ngi” ula bynrap.Shuh shuh, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ula pyntip ba kam shym la don satia kano kano ka jingphah ktien ne ka jingthoh na ka Sorkar Pdeng sha ka Jylla haba ïadei bad ka kam tih Uranium.
title: Ka Sorkar MDA kan ym shah da leilei ban tih Uranium ha Meghalaya: CM

content: Nongpoh, Lber 12: Ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills bad ki Pulit jong ka Ri Bhoi District ki la lah ban pynpulom ïa ka jingthmu jong ki suba dkhot Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ban pynbthei sa uwei u bom IED ha Nongpoh hadien ba ki Pulit ki la ïoh kem ïa ki saw ngut ki briew ba la suba ba ki dei ki nongkyrshan barieh jong ka HNLC.Ki saw ngut kiba la shah ha ki Pulit ki kynthup ïa u Damanbha Ripnar ba ju khot sin u Shall Lapang, u Robinis Ripnar, u Jill Tariang bad u Shining Nongrum bad baroh kine kiba la shah kem ki dei kiba na Ri Bhoi District. Kum ban pynkynmaw, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka taiew baladep, u bom IED uba khlaiñbor bha u la bthei ha Them Iewmawlong, Shillong. Tang hapoh arphew saw kynta, ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills ki la kem ïa u Disciplinary Secretary jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front u Bah Tarson Lymba na Dawki bad ïa u Bah Ebakordor Nongpluh na Mawlki, Shillong.U Superintendent of Police ka Ribhoi District Jagpal Singh Dhanoa ha u kyrrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ula ïathuh ba ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills bad Ri Bhoi ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei kumba ha ka por 6:00 baje janmiet ki la ïoh bat ïa kawei ka kali Bolero Pick-up kaba don ïa u nombar ML12-3243 ba la ñiah da u Bah Damanbha Ripnar na surok Usmning-Mawhati. Ha ka jingtalasi ïa ka Kali la ïoh kurup ïa u bom IED lyngba ka kynhun Bomb Detection & Disposal Squad na Shillong ba la leh ha kata ka rukom ban lait na ki jingma jingmynsaw.La ïathuh ruh ba ka kynhun ki saw ngut ki nongkyrshan barieh jong ka HNLC ki la shah kem da ka jingthmu ban pynbthei ïa u bom IED ha Shillong bad Nongpoh. Ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ba kine ki saw ngut ki la phla ba ki la thmu leh da ka jingbthah jong ka seng HNLC na Bangladesh.Ha ka jingïohkem ïa kine ki suba nongkyrshan barieh ka HNLC ki Pulit ki la ïoh ban kurup 15 tylli ki Gelatin Sticks, 167 tylli ki nar lyngkhot (ba ju thep hapoh u bom IED, uwei u Safety Fuse Wire, 3 tylli ki Non Electric Detonator, 5 tylli ki Mobile Phone, ka Bolero Pick-up kaba don ïa u number ML-12-3243.Halor kane ka jingïoh kurup ïa ki tiar pynbthei bad ka jing ïohkem ïa kine ki 4 ngut, ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi ki la register case ha Nongpoh Police Station da kaba pynngat hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Section 120 B/121 A Indian Penal Code (IPC), pule lang ruh bad ka Section 10/13/18 UA(P) Act bad ka 5/6 Explosive Substance Act.
title: Pulom ka jingthmu pynbthei Bom IED ki dkhot barieh ka HNLC ha Nongpoh bad Shillong , shah kem 4 ngut bad ki bom

content: Shillong, Lber, 12: Ka Harijan Panchayati Committee (HPC) ha ka sngi Baar ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing u Amit Shah da kaba kyrpad ba un tuklar lem halor ki kynrum kynram jong ka Them Metor da ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ki lai kynhun, ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) bad ki kynhun bapher bapher.Ka Committee ka la kyntu ruh ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ban phah tohkit halor ka jingbthei u bom IED dang shen ha jaka ieng ki Syndicate Bus kaba la pynsyier mynsiem thot thot ïa ki jaidbynriew bym dei riewlum kiba shong basah ha Them Iewmawlong.“Ngi kyrpad ïa phi ba phi tuklar lem halor ki kynrum kynram jong ka Punjabi Colony da ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ki lai kynhun bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya,” ong u Secretary jong ka HPC u Gurjit Singh ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Shah.U la ong ba ki jingeh ba ïadei ïa ki hok bad ki nongshong shnong ha Them Iewmawlong ïa mynta la kheiñ dewthala, bad da ka jingtrei shitom jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ka Harijan Panchayat Committee bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun ban poi sha ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut.“Wat hapdeng ki jingïalang kiba bun tylli bad ki jingïakren, ka kam kaba jwat ka dang shong per ha suiñ. Watla ka jingkular ban tuklar da ka Sorkar India, kam shym la urlong satia. Ngi don ka jingshaniah lada ka Sorkar Pdeng ka shimkhia ban pynkut noh ïa kane ka kam, ka dei ban long kaba suk,” ong u Singh.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka jingbthei bom dang shen ka dei ka jingpyrshang ban pynslem ïa ka jingstet ka kam, u Secretary ka HPC u la ong, “kane ka jingjia ym dei ban shu ieh kumto hynrei ka dei ka dak ka shin kaba ktah ïa ki jaidbynriew ritpaid kiba sah hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya. Ka jingkem ïa ki briew halor kane ka jingjia ka pynpaw ba ka dei ka jingpyrshang ban pynsyier mynsiem bad ka jingpyrshang ban pynkbum ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Punjabi Colony.”“Ngi pynpaw hakhmat jong phi da ka jingsngewkhia ba ym don mano mano ruh na ka Sorkar Meghalaya, na u Myntri Rangbah ter ter ban pynrem ïa ka jingjia. Ki nongïalam saiñpyrthei, ki ïai pynmih ïa ki jingkynthoh pyrshah ïa ki nongshong shnong ka Punjabi Colony khlem sangeh, ym shym la kren eiei wat shi kyntien ruh ne ban wan jngoh ïa ka jaka ba la jia ka jingpynbthei ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingbthei ne ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki longiing,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u Sing u la pyntip ba ka Delhi Sikh Gurdwara Management Committee, ka Shiromani Gurdwara Prabandhak Committee bad ka National Commission of Minorities, ka National Commission for Human Rights bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun ki la wan jngoh ïa ka Punjabi Lane katba ki jaidbynriew Sikhs ki dang ïai bteng ban ïakhun na ka bynta ki hok ki jong ki.“Namarkata, ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar India, hapoh ka jingïalam jong phi, ban shimkhia bad ban shim rai mardor ïa kane ka kam. Ka long kaba kongsan ym tang ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah hynrei ban pynshitom ruh ïa kito kiba ju byrngem byrsit bad kiba pyntieng kohtympan ïa ki jaidbynriew bym dei riewlum. Ngi ngeit ba ka jingsuk yn sa lah ban wanrah da ka jingpynshitom pyrshah ïa ki nongleh kam bymman, ym ban ailad ïa ki jyrwit jyrwat ban shu buhrieh hapoh u shylliah,” u la ong.U la ong, “ki nongshong shnong ka Punjabi Colony kim kwah eiei hynrei tang ban ïoh shong suk shongsaiñ, ban noh synniang sha u sup u thiar jong ka imlang ka sahlang bad ka ïoh ka kot jong ka Jylla Meghalaya kumba ngi la leh mynta pateng la pateng. Ka jingsheptieng bad ka jingbym sngew shngaiñ ka la pynwit ym tang ïa ka bha ka miat jong ngi hynrei wat ïa ka roi ka party ha ka jylla.”Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka dei ka kamram kong ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ ba ïada ïa ka hok bad ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongshong shnong, la ka long na kano kano ka jaidbynriew.“Ka jingtuklar deipor jong phi ïa kane ka kam ym tangba kan pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki briew kiba sah ha Punjabi Colony hynrei kan long ruh ka khubor kaba khlaiñ pyrshah ïa ki jingumsnam bad ki kam thombor,” la ong ka HPC.
title: Phah tuklar ka HPC ha u Amit Shah ban pynkut noh ïa ki jingeh ha Them Metor

content: BDWS
title: BDWS

content: Shillong, Lber 13: Ka Shillong Sports Association ka la pynbna ba kan sa sdang ïa ka lympung Shillong Premier Division Football League Tounament 2023 naduh 18 tarik mynta u Lber ha madan SSA Stadium, Polo.Ka lympung kan ïaid katkum ki kyndon jong ka Shillong Sports Association Football League Tounament kiba ju pynlong barabor man ka samoi, bad ka por ïalehkai la phiah mar 45 minit kawei ka kylla.Ki kynhun ban ïakhun mynta ka kynti ki kynthup ïa ka lahduh jong ka samoi ba ladep (2022), ka Mawlai SC, ka Nangkiew Irat SC, Shillong Lajong SC, Langsning SC, Ryntih SC, nangta ka lahduh jong ka Meghalaya State League- ka Rangdajied United FC, lem bad ar tylli ki kynhun ba dang kiew kyrdan na ka lympung First Division ba kynthup ïa ka Nongthymmai SC bad ka Sawmer SC.Ka jingïakhun kaba nyngkong ka ban sa plie pyrda ïa ka Shillong Premier Division Football League Tounament 2023 ha katei ka sngi (18 tarik) kan long hapdeng ka kynhun ba dang shu kiew na ka 1st Division, kata ka Nongthymmai SC pyrshah ïa ka lahduh jong ka Meghalaya State League- ka Rangdajied United FC ha ka por 3 baje nohphaisngi, ha SSA Stadium, Polo.Katkum ki kyndon ïalehkai jong ki League Tournament, tang saw tylli ki kynhun ba wan hakhmat kin ïohrung sha ka Semi-Final. Ka lahduh jong kane ka Championship kan ïohpdiang ïa ka buskit kaba haduh 3,00,000/- tyngka ryngkat bad ka Trophy, katba ka kynhun ba wan ba ar kan ïohpdiang 1,50,000 tyngka. Ha man ki jingïalehkai, ki kynhun ki lah ban bujli player (subsitution) tang san ngut.Wat hadien ba ka SSA dangshen ka la pynbna paidbah ban sdang ïa kane ka lympung ha ka 20 tarik, hynrei namar ka jingtyngkhuh bad ka lympung I-League, ha kaba ka TRAU-FC kan pdiang ïa ka jingïalehkai pyrshah ïa ka Neroca la 21 tarik mynta u bnai ha madan SSA Stadium kum ka jingïalehkai hala ïing namar ka jingbym shongshngaiñ ha jylla Manipur. Na kane ka daw ka SSA ka la hap ban pynkynriah noh ïa katei ka sngi sdang.
title: 18 tarik yn sdang ïakhun nyngkong ka Nongthymmai bad ka Rangdajied ha ka Shillong Premier League

content: Shillong, Lber 14: Ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association [MSOA] hynne ka sngi ka la pynbna ïa ka thup kyrteng ki nongïalehkai na ki synjuk bapher bapher ki ban mihkhmat ïa ka Meghalaya sha ka 3rd North East Games 2024 ka ban long ha Nagaland naduh 18 tarik haduh 23 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024.Na ka liang jong ka synjuk ka la pyntip ba kan sa pynlong ïa ka prokram kitbok kitrwiang (Sent off ceremony) ïa kaba la khreh ha madan SSA Stadium ha ka 15 tarik mynta u Lber (Sngi Thohdieng) ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi.Ha kane ka sngi yn wan Kongsan da ka Kong Isawanda Laloo-IAS Director jong ka tnat Sports ka Sorkar jylla.Ha kane ka kynti ka jylla kan ïashimbynta ha 14 tylli ki rynsan ïalehkai (Discipline), kiba kynthup ïa ka Archery, Athletics, Badminton, Basketball, Boxing, Football, Belt Wrestling, Freestyle Wrestling, Lawn Tennis, Pencak Silak, Table Tennis, Taekwondo, Volleyball bad ka Wushu.
title: Pynbna ka MSOA ïa ka thup kyrteng ki ban leit ïakhun sha ka North East Games

content: Ka jingpynmih jong ka Sorkar India ïa ka rule jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 ka la pynkhihwin biang ïa ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi bad kumjuh ruh ïa kiwei ki jylla hapoh ka ri India khamtam ha ki bynta ka India bashathie.Kane ka la pynkynmaw biang ïa ka jingpluh ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ha ki snem ba la leit noh haba ka Sorkar India ka warah ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB).Ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) ka dei ka kynhun jong ki seng samla pule ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kaba la ieng pyrshah bha mynba ka Sorkar National Democratic Alliance (NDA) ba la ïalam da Bharaitya Janata Party (BJP) ka la wanrah ïa ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB) khnang ban plie ïa ka jingkhangbah ka ri India ban khot long nongshong shnong ïa ki jaidbynriew na ka niam Hindu, Sikh, Buddhist, Jain, Parsi bad ki Khristan na ka ri Bangladesh, Pakistan bad Afghanistan kiba shah pyntyrha ha ka kyrteng ka niam.Ka dawbah ba ka NESO ka la ieng pyrshah ïa kane ka aiñ ka long namarba ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka dei kaba don markhap bad ka ri Bangladesh. Kane ka long ka jingplie lad ïa ki jaidbynriew heh paid na ka ri Bangladesh ban tyllep ïa ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kiba duna paid haduh katta katta.Ka jingrung tuh jong ki mynder ri na ka ri Bangladesh sha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi lyngba ka jylla Assam ka long kaba shyrkhei bha haduh katta katta. Wat ha ka National Register of Citizens (NRC) ba la leh da ka Sorkar Assam ki don palat 20 lak ngut ki briew kiba shong basah ka jylla Assam ki bym don kyrteng. Kane ka ladei lypa ka jingma kaba ap ïa ka jylla Meghalaya bad ïa kiwei kiwei ki jylla ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi na ka jingrung kyrthep bad rung beaiñ jong ki mynder ri na ka ri Bangladesh.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 kan ym treikam satia ha Meghalaya namarba ka hap hapoh ka Sixth Schedule hynrei ka aiñ ka treikam tang ha ki jaka Municipal ne ki Non-Schedule Area.Hynrei ka jingpyrshah jong ki sengbhalang bad ki kynhun bapher bapher ka long namarba ka Sixth Schedule kam treikam bad ka tehlakam satia ïa ka jingwanrung jong ki myndei ri bad ki bar jylla shapoh kane ka jylla. Ka jingkharoi jong ki mynder ri kiba rung tuh lyngba ka khappud jong ka Jylla bad ka ri Bangladesh ka long kaba shyrkhei bha haduh katta katta namarba ki don ki jaka ha khappud kiba ka Sorkar kam pat lah ban ker ïa ki sainar shiah watla ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha khappud ki byrngem byrsit ïa ki mynder ri kiba wan rung tuh shapoh ka jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka khappud.Watla ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya ki la dawa ïa ka Sorkar India ban ai jingmynjur na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar India ka dang buh sha kyndong almari jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs ïa ka Resolution ba la mynjur da ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla ha u Nohprah, 2019.Lada ïakren ïa ka jingshisha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka jingjyllei jong ki mynder ri ka jur bha haduh katta katta. Lada peit ïa ka Assam, ka jingpyrshah jong ki paidbah Assamese ïa ka CAA ka dei namarba ki la ïohi ïa ka jingkharoi kaba la palat liam jong ki mynder ri kiba rung tuh lyngba ka khappud ka Assam bad ka Ri Bangladesh.Haba bishar bniah ïa ka jingkharoi ki mynder ri ha Meghalaya ka la ktah haduh katta katta ïa ka khih ka kamai, ka ïoh ka kot namarba kine ki knieh ïa ka pliangja jong ki trai shnong kiba long ki trai ri trai muluk jong kane ka jylla bad ha kiwei ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi.Lada u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u ong ba ka CAA kam don jingktah eiei ïa ka Jylla Meghalaya, hynrei ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyrkhing ïa ka jingrung laitlan jong ki mynder ri bad ki bar jylla khnang ba kan ym ktah ïa ki trai shnong ka jylla kiba la nang kylla rit paid ha la ka jong ka ri.
title: Khluit biang ka ishu CAA ha North East
