content: Jowai, Lber 13 : Ka Ophis jong ka Assistant Commissioner of Food Safety, West bad East Jaiñtia Hills Distrik ka la pyntip paidbah khamtam ïa ki nongdie doh (dohmasi, dohsyiar, dohsniang, dohblang, dohkha bad kumta ter ter) bad kumba la kdew na ka por sha ka por na ka liang ka Ophis ïa ki jingdonkam ba hap ban pyndep bad bud pyrkhing khnang ban kohnguh ïa ka ORDER jong ka Meghalaya High Court badon burom lyngba ka PIL No.2 jong u 2021 tarik 14.06.2022 bad 20.05.2022 bad PIL No. 7 tarik 17.08.2023 ba kane ka jingpynbna kan long ka lad kaba khatduh ba ka Ophis jong ka Assistant Commissioner kan ai por ïa ki nongdie doh ban pyndep ïa ki jingdonkam kumba la kdew ha ki NOTICE ba la sam sha ki nongdie doh:-Ki nongdie doh kin hap ban register ïa ki dukan jong ki bad ka Food Safety Department (FSSAI). Ki nongdie doh ki bym pat siew ïa ka “FINE” hadien ba ki la ïoh “NOTICE” ba ki lah shah daiñ kuna, kin hap ban siew noh wut wut wat lada kila pynbha pynmiat ïa ka dukan jong ki.Ki nongdie doh kiba don harud surok ki dei ban kah ïa ka dukan nakhmat bad na ki liang kiba ïohi briew da ka ïit ïong kaba 40% -50% khnang ba ki briew kiba ïaid lynti kin nym ïohi ïa ka doh ba don shapoh. Kum ka nuksa, kin thoh da ki dak saw, “Hangne die doh sniang”, etc.La khang pyrshah ban buh lane wah lyngkrang ïa ka doh ha ki dukan khamtam da ki dukan ba don harud surok hynrei ban buh halor ka kynja miej ne ka jaka ba long hajrong. Ki dukan ki dei ban da lehkhuid bha (hapoh ka dukan, sawdong ka dukan bad kumjuh ruh kum ki nongdie doh). Ia ka doh ba die dei ban buh bha ban lait na ka jingboi ki skaiñ bad pum pum, kum ha ki fridge, ki khiew, ki dabor wat ha ki showcase/synduk lane ki jingker khamtam lei lei ïa ki dukan ba don harud bad hajan surok.Iaki showcase dei ban da shna bha da ki lyntang dieng kiba bha bad ymdei da ki lyntang snep dieng ba lah ban ïoh na ki kharkhana ot dieng ki bym paka. Ki dieng lyntang ba pyndonkam dei ban da polish bad ai rong bha khnang ban suk ban pynkhuid.Ki ïit ba pyndonkam ki dei ban bit syndam bad ka lyntang ym kaba lah ban sei na ka por sha ka por.Ki dukan kiba don sha jngai ki surok/highway lane kiba don hapoh ki ïew ki lah ban don ki showcases kiba da ki jar bani (khnang ban leit rung ki skain), bad ïa ki jar dei ban da ai rong ban ïada na ka jingsarang jong ki jar. Lada ïa ki dukan ym lah ban shna da ki tiles na ki daw ki bapher bapher, ki nongdie ki lah ban ai rong ïa ki dukan jong ki da ka rong ba lah ban sait manla ka sngi.Kumta ka Ophis jong ka Assistant Commissioner of Food Safety, West bad East Jaiñtia Hills kan ai por haduh ka 31 tarik u bnai March 2024 ba phin bud pyrkhing bad ban pyndep ïa baroh kine ki jingbthah ban lait na ka jingshah file case ha Court.Kumjuh ruh ïa baroh ki dukan ba die marbam (Restaurant, Dhaba, Fast Food, Dukan sha, Bakery, Grocery, Dukan jhur, Guest house bad kumta ter ter) kin hap bad register ïa ki dukan jong ki bad ka Food Safety Department (FSSAI) hapoh ka 31 tarik u March 2024.Sa kawei ruh, lada lap ba kino kino ki dukan ki don ïa ki mar bam kiba lah kut tarik lane expired food item, ïa ki mar ba la kut tarik yn kem (seized) noh da ka Ophis jong ka Assistant Commissioner of Food Safety khlem kano kano ka warning hadien ka 31 tarik March 2024. Lada don kino kino ki marbam ba lah kut tarik, ki nongdie kin hap ban buh ïa ki ha kyndong kaba don ruh ka jingthoh ha kynroh, “EXPIRED FOOD ITEMS/DAMAGED FOOD PRODUCTS.”Kane ka dei ka JINGPYNBNA ka ba long ruh ka NOTICE ba kumba la kdew haneng ka Ophis ka khmih lynti ba baroh kin iatreilang na ka bynta ka bha ka miat ki marbam mardih ha ki ïew ki hat da ka ba bud pyrkhing bad pyndep ïa kaba donkam hapoh ka 31 tarik March 2024, khnang ban lait na kano kano ka jingpyn shitom katkum ka Aiñ hadien habud.
title: Pyrkhing ka Commissioner of Food Safety ïa ki nongdie doh ban bud ryntih ïa ki kyndon aiñ

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 13: Ka Golden Lion Football Club ka la rung sha ka phainal hadien ba ka la pynliem noh ïa ka 7 Wasa Football Club ha ka lympung ïalehkai Semi-final 2nd Leg jong ka XVI Mawlangwir Invitation Football Tournament 2023-‘24 ba la pynïaid da ka Mawlangwir Sports Club ha Madan Rowell Lyngdoh Stadium, Mawlangwir South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka jingïaknieh ban poi sha ka phainal kaba la long mynta ka sngi, ka Golden Lion FC ka la ïoh rah ïa ka nam jingjop lyngba ka jingïaleh ha ka Tie Breaker 5 – 4 pyrshah ïa ka 7 Wasa FC.Ban shu pynkynmaw, ka 7 Wasa FC ha ka Semi-final 1st Leg ka la ïoh ban thep 3 – 1 kol ïa ka Golden Lion FC bad mynta ka sngi ha ka Semi-final 2nd Leg ka Golden Lion FC pat ka la ïoh ban thep 2 – 0 kol pyrshah ïa ka 7 Wasa FC bad ha ba kheiñ ha ka jingïathep kol ka la poi ha ka jingïakhaid kaba long mar 3 kol.Namarkata, ki nongpynïaid ban rai ïa ka kynhun ka ban poi sha ka phainal ki la pynlong da ka Tie Breaket ha kaba ka Golden Lion FC ka la tam noh da 1 kol.Shuh shuh ka Golden Lion FC ka la ap ban ïa kynduh sa ha ka phainal kata ka long na ki ar tylli ki kynhun ïalehkai la ka long ïa Shillong Lajong FC ne ïa ka KMC Sonapur Assam ka ban sa knieh ha ka Semi-final 2nd Leg ka ban sa long ha ka 21 tarik u Lber, 2024 ha ka juh ka madan.
title: Sha ka phainal rung ka Golden Lion FC ha ka XVI MIFT 2023 – 24 ha madan Rowell Lyngdoh Stadium

content: Nongpoh, Lber 13: Ban plielad bad ban ai ïa ka rynsan na ka bynta ki khynnah skul ban pynpaw ïa la ki sap ha ka kam ïalehkai sport bapher bapher, nalor ka pule ka puthi kaba ki pynlut por haki saw kynroh jong ki kamra klas, na ka liang ki bor pynïaid skul ka King of Kings Higher Secondary School Mawkyrdep mynta ka sngi ki la plie pyrda noh ïa ka Inter House Athletic Meet 2024 ha madan ïalehkai ka shnong Mawkyrdep.Ïa katei ka Annual Sports Week la wan ban plie pyrda bad ban ai mynsiem da u Bah Cornelius Laloo uwei naki nongthoh khubor ba rangbah ka District Ri Bhoi kum u kongsan ha ka jingdonlang ka Sister Lily Mary Kharbuki Principal, Sr Wismary Kharbihkhiew, Babu Michael Lyngdoh ki khynnah skul lem bad ki nonghikai jong kane ka skul.Ha ka sngi plie pyrda ïa kane ka Annual Sport Meet, la sdang shwa da ka jingïaid ïa ka March Pass ba la shimbynta da ki khynnah skul jong ka Red House, Blue House, Yellow House bad Green House, la pynbud pat da ka jingthang ïa ka sharak kum ka dak ban bud thik ïa ki kyndon ïalehkai sport ryngkat ka jingbam smai da ki khynnah skul bad pynphuh phieng ruh da ki jingrwai, jingshad bad mass drill bala shim bynta da ki khynnah skul.Haba kren kum u kongsan u Bah C Laloo u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki bor pynïaid skul jong ka King of Kings Higher Secondary School kiba la shimkhia ban pynlong ïa kum katei ka lympung ïalehkai man la u snem khnang ban plielad ïa kito ki khynnah skul kiba don shisha ïa ka sap ïalehkai ba kin ioh ban pynpaw paidbah ïa kata ka sap bad ruh ban kiew ha kane ka kam ïalehkai sport, nalor ka jingpule jong ki.U la ong ruh ba ka sport ka hikai shibun ïangi ban heh ban san haka rukom ka ba koit ba khiah, ban pynproh ïaka jabieng bad khamtam ka hikai ban don ruh ka mynsiem kaba khlaiñ ban don ïaka akor ka burom ryngkat ka jingkyntu ruh ïaki khynnah skul ba ki dei ban kiar naki jingmlien bad ki jingdih ba sniew kum u drok, ka kyiad ka shongkha khynnah bad kiwei kiwei lada ki kwah ban poi shaka thong haka jingim jong ki.
title: Hapdeng ka jingiphuh iphieng sdang ka King of Kings HSS ïa ka Inter House Athletic Meet 2024

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 13: Ka jingpyntreikam jong ka sorkar India ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Act, kaba la pynbna dang shen da u Amitshah u Myntri kam pohïing jong ka sorkar India, ka la pynkhih win biang sa shisien ïa ka Khasi Student Union bad ïa ki paitbah ha baroh kawei ka jylla.Halor kane ka bynta ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi balang, ka Khasi Student Union West Khasi Hills District Unit ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha Nongstoiñ, ban pynshai paitbah bad ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa katei ka aiñ khyllah ka bym ïahap satia bad ka jinglong jingman jong ka Jaitbynriew Khasi bad Jaiñtia bad kiwei kiwei ki jaitbynriew kiba shong ha ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi.Ha ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u samla Wanbhakupar Lyngdoh la ïadon ryngkat da u samla Johnfisher Nongsiang president ka KSU West Khasi Hills, u samla Franklin Syiemïong General secretary, u samla S.Kharbani Organising secretary Sengkmie, u samla Shemphang Marbañiang organizing secretary ka KSU Mairang circle, ki president bad secretary jong ki unit bad ki circle kiba don ha West Khasi Hills bad kiwei kiwei.Haba ai jingkren ki la ong ba ha u snem 2019 ka sorkar India ka la pynbna ba kan sa pyntreikam noh ïa ka CAA lyngba ka mat kaba la tip kum ka Citizenship Amendment Bill. Hadien kata ka Lok Sabha kan sa phah sha ka Rajya Sabha bad lada ka Rajyasabha ka mynjur kan sa pyntrei kam noh.Ki la ong ba naduh kitei ki snem ka KSU bad kiwei pat ki sengbhalang napoh ka jylla, ki la pynlong da ki jingïakhih kiba jur ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah. Hynrei ha kine ki khyndiat sngi kynsan kynsan ka sorkar NDA kaba la ïalam da ka BJP ka la pynbna bad Notified ba ïa katei ka aiñ la sdang ban pyntreikam.Nalor kata ki la ong ruh ba ka jingpyntreikam ïa katei ka aiñ ka dei ka jingïuhroit ïa ka hok jong ki jaitbynriew rit paid kiba shong ha ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi. Ki la pynshai ba ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi kum ka Meghalaya, Tripura, Mizoram ki dei ki jylla kiba mar khap bad ka ri Bangladesh kumta ka jingpyntreikam ïa katei ka aiñ ka long kaba ma shibun.Ki la pynshai ruh ba ha ki snem ba mynshuwa eh ki bar jylla kiba wan rung hapoh Meghalaya, ki wan tang kum ki nongbylla bad kiba wan trei ha ki ophis sorkar. Hynrei ha kine ki sngi ka sor Shillong ka la kylla long ka nongbah jong ki bar jylla suda, ha kaba ki bar jylla ki la knieh lut ïa ka kami kajih, ka bylla ka sngi, ka trei ka ktah bad ha baroh ki liang.Kumta lada ailad ba katei ka aiñ kan trei kam ki khun ka bri u Hynñiewtrep, kin kylla long tang kum ki nongtong um ne ki nongthohdieng jong ki mynder. Ki nongïalam ka KSU ha katei ka jingïalang, ki la ong ruh ba kumba ka seng ka la ïeng pyrshah naduh ba sdang kan ïeng pyrshah beit haduh ba kut bad lada ka sorkar kan pyntreikam jubor ïa katei ka aiñ, na ka liang ka seng kam banse ban mih sha surok, ban pynlong da ki jingïakhih bad ban shim da kiwei pat ki lad ba kham tyngeh kampher wat lada kan poi haduh u pud jong ka jingïa um snam ruh.Shuwa ban pynwai ïa ka jingïalang ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot ka seng ki la thang ïa ki kot ba ka sorkar India, ka la thoh ïa ki kyndon aiñ jong ka Citizen Amendment Act kaba yn sa pyntreikam noh hapoh ka ri baroh kawei.
title: ‘Ngin ym pdiang da lei lei ïa ka CAA’, thang ka KSU West Khasi Hills ïa ki kyndon aiñ

content: Shillong, 13 Lber: Ha ka Dorbar mang tyngka jong ka KHADC kaba la kut noh ha ka sngi Balang na ka liang u EM ba peit ïa ka tnat Elaka ka KHADC bad uba dei ruh u Symbud CEM u Bah P N Syiem u la ong ba halor ka jingïapynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba ar yn shim beit katkum ka jingdon ki dulir ne ki jingshisha halor ka khana pateng (Historical Facts) bad ïa kane yn ïakren ruh hapoh ka Regional Committee bad ka EC kan sa khot pan jingmut la jong baroh ki MDC.Ïa kane u Bah Syiem u la jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MDC ka Mawthadraishan u Bah Jambor War uba la pan ïa ka jingheh ki jaka jong ki 5 tylli ki jaka kiba ïapher halor u pud u sam ka Meghalaya bad Assam kiba hab hapoh ka Khasi Hills ban pynbeit ha ka wat kaba ar.U Bah Jambor u la ong ruh ba ka KHADC kan dei ban don da ki dulir ban pynshisha ïa ki jaka khnang ba kan ym jia shuh kumba la jia ha ka wat kaba nyngkong.Haba ïashim bynta lang ha ka kynta jingkylli u MDC ka Sohra uba dei u Nongïalam ka Liang Ïatei u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne u la kylli ïa ka bynta ka Council halor ka jingpynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba ar bad u la ong ba ïoh ka jia kumba la long ha ka Phase 1 kumta shwa ban ïasoi MOU dei ban ïoh ka jingshaniah jong ka KHADC bad kan dei ban long kaba ïahun lang da baroh.Halor kane u EM u la ong ba ha shwa ban leit sha ka Phase 2 yn ïaid lyngba ki Raid ki Hima ïa ki shnong kiba hab hapoh ka Council.“Nalor ki dulir bad ki kot ki sla kiba la pynskhem da ki Raid ki Hima kita hi ki la long kiba pynshisha,” ong u EM.Na ka liang u EM u la ïathuh ba ki 5 tylli ki jaka ba don jingïapher ne ïakajia pud kidei ka Langpih Area ha West Khasi Hills kaba ka jingheh 298.07 malu mala ha ka Sq.Km.Nangta ka Borduar Area Ri Bhoi District kaba don 147.83 Sq.Km, ka Nongwah-Mawtamur Area Ri Bhoi District kaba don 137.51 Sq.Km, ka Desh Doomreah Area ha Ri Bhoi District kaba don 484.72 Sq.Km bad ka Block -II area ha Ri Bhoi District kaba don 1,009.88 Sq.Km bad ka jingheh jong baroh ki jaka haba kheiñ lang ka la long 2078.01 Area Sq. Km.Na ka liang u EM u la ong ruh ba ka KHADC ka la shah kynthup lang hapoh ka Regional Committee bad ka don bynta bad ka MOU ba ïasoi hapdeng ki arjylla bad ki jingshisha katkum ki khana bad ki dulir dei ka bynta jong ka KHADC ha kaba ïa kane yn ïakren hapoh ka Regional Committee.
title: Ha ka wat ïakren pud kaba ar yn lum jingïalang shwa ki MDC ka KHADC

content: Nongpoh, Lber 13: U CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem haka jingïakynduh bad ki Rangbah Shnong ka Ri-Bhoi hapoh ka lama ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong u la pynbna ban ai syndon 25 lakh naka liang ka KHADC sha ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong naka bynta ban shna ïaka ophis treikam ba pura namar kumba long haduh mynta ka Synjuk kam pat don satia ka jaka treikam kaba pura.Halor katei ka jingpynbna u CEM ïaka song pisa kaba 25 lakh naka liang ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong kala pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw bad ka jingsngewnguh ïa u CEM ka KHADC u ba la kloi ban pdiang ïaka jingkyrpad jong ka synjuk bad kyrmen ba shen kin sa sdang noh ïaka kam naka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ka jingtreikam ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong.
title: Pynbna u CEM 25 lakh sha ka SRSRB ban shna ophis treikam ba pura

content: Shillong, Lber, 13: Ka Executive Commitee kaba mynta kaba la ïalam da ka seng NPP hapoh KHADC lyngba u Executive Member (EM) ba dei peit ïa ka tnat Building ha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Teibor Pathaw ula pyntip ba haduh mynta ka tnat kala ai haduh 263 tylli ki jingbit ne permission ban tei ïing hapoh u pud u sam jong ka.Ïa kane u la jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u Nongïalam ka Liang Ïatei u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne, u Bah Teibor ula pyntip ruh ba ki don sa 174 tylli ki aplikeshon ba pan jingbit ban tei ïing ba ka tnat kam pat ai jingbit namarba kim pat sdang ïa ka kam bad ba kin hap ïaid katkum ka Building Bye Laws bad kiwei ki jingdonkam.U EM ula ïathuh ba ka tnat ka don da ka Committee jong ki Engineer bad kiwei stad ki riewshem phang ban bishar bniah ïa ki aplikeshon ba pan jingbit ban tei ïing bad ula pyntip ruh ba ka tnat ka shim jingïarap na kiwei ki stad na bar jylla haba ïadei bad ka jingbishar bniah ïa ki aplikeshon bad ïa ki jingpynwandur jong ki ïing kiba kham heh bad ha kane kin donlang ruh ki briew napoh ka jylla ki ban khmih lang ïa kane ka bynta.“Nalor ki 263 tylli ki jingbit (permission) ba la dep ai ban tei ïing, ka tnat ka dang bishar bniah sa ïa ki 174 tylli ki aplikeshon bad ïa ki rukom tei ïing kaba ka tnat kala ïohpdiang ha u snem 2022-2024,” ong u Bah Teibor.Haba shim bynta ha ka jingkylli, u MDC ka Mylliem u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la ai jingmut ïa ka Executive Committee (EC) bad ïa ka tnat ba kam dei ban ai jingbit (permission) ban tei ïing ha ki jaka markhap bad ki rud Wah.Haba jubab, u Bah Teibor u la ong, “Ka tnat ka bud ryntih ïa ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Meghalaya High Court ban ym shah ban tei ïa ki jait jingtei marjan ki wah bad na ka liang ka tnat nangne shakhmat kan peitngor bad kan pyrkhing bha ban pynthikna ba ki nongshong shnong kim dei ban kyntur pud ha jan ki wah da ka ba tei ïing”.Ha kaba ïadei pat bad kito ki ïing kiba la tei naduh shwa u snem 2023 hadien ba la shimti ka KHADC ban ai jingbit na ka liang u EM u la ong ba kitei ki ïing kin hap ban wanrah ïa ki jingthoh na ki nongïalam shnong ban pynshisha ba ki la shna ïa ki ïing shwa katei ka snem.U la ong ruh ba na ka liang ka tnat ka la lum ïa ki Nongïalam shnong ban pynsngewthuh ïa ka building bye laws ha shwa ban pyntreikam bad kumjuh ka la don ka team kaba leit jurip haba ïadei bad kane ka kam.
title: 263 tylli ladep ai jingbit ka KHADC ban shna ïing

content: Shillong Lber 13: Na ka liang ka Executive Member (EM) ka tnat Market jong ka KHADC, ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri ha ka sngi Balang ka la pyntip hapoh ka dorbar mang tyngka ba ka Council ka la ïoh ban lum kumba T.35 lak ka khajna na ki Ïew jong ka Council ha u snem 2022-2024.Ïa kane ka la jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba wanrah da u MDC ka Laban u Bah Mitchell Wankhar, ka Kong Grace ka la pyntip ba ha u snem 2022-2023 ka KHADC ka la ïohlum T.16,10,900 bad ha u snem 2023-2024 ka la ïohlum T.18,98,900 na ki ïew ka Council.Ka Kong Grace kala pyntip ba ka jingïohlum khajna ka dei na ka Ïew Laitlyngkot, Ïew Byrnihat bad na Mawïong Regulated Market.Na ka liang jong ka kala pyntip ba ha u snem 2023-2024, ka Council na ka Ïew Byrnihat ka la ïohlum T.6,20,000, bad na ka Ïew Laitlyngkot la ïohlum T.3,20,000 bad na ka Mawïong Regulated Market la ïohlum T.5,30,000.Nalor kane ka Kong Grace ka la pyntip ruh ba ki don 45 tylli ki ïew Hima bad 14 tylli ki ïew ki shimet kiba la ïoh jingbit na ka KHADC.
title: Kumba 35 lak ïoh lum khajna ka Council na ki Ïew ha u snem 2022-2024

content: Shillong, Lber 13:U CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem haba ai khublei ïa u nongïalam ka liang ïatei u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne uba la wanrah ïa ka phang halor ka jinghiar ka ïoh ka kot bad ka jingkyrduh kam u la ong ba kane ka dei ka mat kaba donkam bha bad u la ong ba ka long kaba donbok ruh ba ka jingïoh ha ka KHADC ïa ka khyrnit kaba 6 ka long kum ka stieh ban ïada ïa ka jaitbynriew.Halor kane ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdonkam ban ai kam ai jam ïa ki khun samla u CEM u la ïathuh ba kane ka EC kaba mynta ka la pyrkhat ban wanrah ïa ka Skill Development Programme ban kyntiew ïa ka sap khnang ba kin lah ban sengkam lajong.Haba phai sha ki kam ri jingri u CEM u la ïathuh ba kumba 60 na ka 100 dei ka mar kaba wan nabar bad kumba T.200 klur shisnem hap pynlut ban siew sha kiwei ki jylla, kumta ka EC kan pynshlur ïa ki kam ri jingri, kam rep, ki kam ba shna da ki kti bad kiwei ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot ki briew lajong.Halor ka jingdon ki kompeni kiba wan nabar ban khaïi hapoh ki jaka ka KHADC u CEM u la ong ba ka Council kan pyrkhing ïa ka jingai laisen watla ka long kaba eh ban leit khynra manla ka por na ka daw ka jingduna ki pulit Enforcement kiba don tang 70 ngut katba ki hap pat ban peit ïa ki 5 tylli ki distrik kumta ka EC kan pynkhlaiñ ïa ki shnat treikam kiba don ha ki distrik khnang ban lah pyrkhing ïa ki rukom ai laisen khaïi sha kiwei kiba nabar jylla.
title: 200 klur hap pynlut ka jylla ha ka shisnem ban thied marbam na shabar, ong u CEM

content: Ka jingmih jong ka khubor ba kawei ka kynhun, kaba la tip kum ka North East Sunshine Trust (NEST), ka la thoh shithi (kaba ki la pynshai pat hadien ba ki khlem pat phah ïa kata ka shithi bad ka dei tang ka shithi rew) sha u Myntri ka tnat Atomic Energy, ka Sorkar India, ba ka Sorkar India kan sdang biang ban khlong ïa u mar poh khyndew Uranium napoh ka Bri Hynñiewtrep. Kane ka khubor ka la pynkhluit tar bad pynmih biang ïa ka jingïakren halor kane ka “issue tih Uranium”. Ñiuma, ngam don ei ei ban ong halor ka hok jong ka kynhun NEST ne mano mano ban thoh shithi ne wat ban pynpaw paidbah ba ki kwah ban tih ïa u Uranium. Kino kino kiba kwah ban tih uranium ki dei ban pynshai ïa ka daw bad khamtam eh ki dei ban lah ban pynshisha ba kan ym ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah, ïa ka mariang, kan ym don ka jingduh ïa ka kyhydew bad ka jingphet wir jong ki briew. Ngi kiba pyrshah ngi ïeng skhem triang bad ngi don ka nongrim kaba ngi la ïeng la palat lai phew snem mynta bad ngin ai ki nia kiba khlaiñ ban pynlip ïa ki jingpynksan nia jong kiba kwah bad ban pynduh ïa ki buit sianti jong ki tnat Sorkar.Haba la mih biang ka jingïakren halor kane ka issue, nga sngewdei ban buh hakhmat jong ki paidbah katkum ki mat kumne harum:1. Ba ngim dei ban pyrkhat ba ka issue tih Uranium ka dei kaba ngin ïatai tang ma para ma ngi hangne lymne ba ka ktah tang ïa ngi. Naduh ki phew snem ba la leit, ka issue ban tih Uranium ha Meghalaya ki la ïakren ha kylleng ka pyrthei bad ki Ri khrawbor kum ka America ki kwah bha ba ka Ri India kan tih bad khlong lut ïa ki mar poh khyndew kum u Uranium, uba pynmih ïa ka bor nuclear energy.2. Ba ngim dei ban sngewphylla lada ka Sorkar India ne Bharat, (la ka long ka Sorkar kaba lam khmat da ka BJP ne INC ne ka Sorkar jong ki lama saw, lama stem, lama jyrngam ne kino kino kam pher), ka pyrshang da ka bor ban tih ïa u Uranium. Lehse kan poi ka por ba ki lah ban phah da ki shipai ki pyrton bad ki thup ki man ban thombor ïa ki jingïakhih pyrshah. Ha kata ka por ngi nud ban ïeng?3. Ba ha ka 10 Risaw 2008, ka Sorkar India ka la ïasoi ïa ka Soskular ne Nuclear Deal bad ka Sorkar America. Kumta ka Sorkar America ka shim khia bha bad ïai buddien ïa kane ka kam tih Uranium ha Ri India. Ki tnat bapher jong ka Sorkar America ki lumthup ïa ki jingïakren halor ka kam tih Uranium ha ki Jylla kiba pher ha Ri India, kaba kynthup ha Meghalaya.4. Ha u Nohprah 2006, u Julian Assange bad ka kynhun jong u, kaba la tip kum ka wikileaks.org ka la pynlait ïa ki jingtip kaba ki la lum bun snem lynter halor ka jingtreikam jong ka Sorkar America bad kiwei de ki Ri, khamtam eh ha kaba ïadei bad ki thma bad kiwei de ki kam synshar khadar jong ki Ri ha ka Pyrthei.5. Ha ka “WikiLeaks cable” kaba 12 tarik Nailar, 2005, ka don ka thup kaba la ai kyrteng, “The US-India Nuclear Deal: Shaping Public Opinion”. Ha kane ka thup lah ban shem ba la lum thup ïa ki jingïakren bad jingïatai halor ka kam tih Uranium ha ki Jylla ka Ri India, kaba kynthup ïa ka Domïasiat ha Meghalaya. Ha kane ka thup la pynpaw ruh ba ha Meghalaya ka kam tih Uranium ka long mat kaba khluit bad ka don ka jingpyrshah na ka liang ki seng bhalang.6. Ba baroh ngi tip ba ka jingdonkam ïa u Uranium ka long ha ki ar bynta, kawei ka long ban pynmih bording (nuclear energy) na ka bynta ka jingdonkam ki paidbah bad da kane, ki ong kan kyntiew ruh ïa ka ïoh ka kot bad kamai kajih (economic growth). Kaba ar, ka long ban shna ïa ki tiar thma kiba shyrkhei (nuclear weapon) khnang ba ka Ri kan long kaba khlaiñ bor bad ba kiwei ki Ri kin sheptieng ïa ka.7. Ba katto katne phew snem mynshuwa, la don u MP (ngan ym jer kyrteng) na ka Jylla uba la pynpaw ïa ka jingmyntoi hadien ba la lap ïa u Uranium ha ka Ri Hynñiewtrep bad u ong kumne, “ba katto te ki paid ka Bri Hynñiewtrep kin sa long kiba riewspah bad ka Jylla ruh kan sa roi”. Lehse ha kata ka por u peit tang na ka liang jong ka ïoh ka kot bad ka jingroi.8. Hooid, ha kine ki phew tylli ki snem ka la mih ka jingpyrshah bad ka jingïakhih kaba jur pyrshah ïa ka jingtih Uranium hapoh ka bri Hynñiewtrep. Tangba ngim dei pat ban klet ba ki la don ki khep ba wat ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Autonomous District Council ki la pynpaw teng ba ki mon eh ban tih noh ïa u Uranium. Kumjuh ruh ki la mih ki seng, ki kynhun bad ki riewshimet kiba ha ka kyrteng bad ka nongrim jong ka roi ka par ki la pynpaw ba ka long kaba kongsan ban tih noh mardor ïa u Uranium. Kine ki kynhun kwah tih Uranium ki la ïaid kylleng bad khroh ïa ki briew ban pdiang ïa ki kam pynroi, kum ka jingshna bad jingpynheh surok, ban shna skul, hospital bad kiwei. Ñiuma, kine ki long ki jingdonkam ba kongsan bad ki kynhun kwah tih uranium ki don tang kawei ka nongrim bad kata ka long ka roi ka par. Kim salia pat ïa ka koit ka khiah, ka jingduh ïa ka kyndew ka shyiap, ka jingkylla phetwir bad jingïap jong ki nongshong shnong lada tih ïa u uranium.9. Ha ka snem 2010, ka Khasi Jaiñtia Presbyterian Synod Sepngi (ka kynhun Balang Presbyterian kaba don palat ar lak ngut ki dkhot) ka la shim ïa ka rai ban rakhe ïa ka Sngi U Trai kaba nyngkong jong u ‘nai Jylliew kum ka “Environment Sunday”. Kata ka sngi kaba kyrpang ba ki dkhot jong ka Balang kin duwai bad ïasaid na ka bynta ka jingpynneh pynsah ïa ka mariang.10. Ha ki snem kiba bud, ki Balang bad ki kynhun jong ki nongsharai Balang ki la pynlong ruh ïa ki jingïalang kiba kyrpang na ka bynta ban ïakren bad ïatai halor ka jinglong ka mariang bad ka jingpynjot pathar ïa ka. Nga la don ha kawei na ki jingïaseng syllok jong ki Nongsharai ha kawei ka Balang ha West Khasi Hills ( ngan ym jer kyrteng) bad ha kane ka jingïaseng syllok la ïakren shaphang ka jinglong jingman bad jingjot jong ka mariang. Ka la mih ruh ka jingkylli bad jingïaphylliew halor ka kam tih u Uranium. Watla ha kata ka jingïasyllok ka don ka jingsngewthuh kaba shai ba ka mariang ka jot rathai da ki jingleh khlem akor jong ki khun bynriew, pynban ka la don ruh ka jingpynpaw kaba jur ba na ka bynta ka jingroi la dei ban pdiang noh ban tih ïa u Uranium uba don ha ki thaiñ sepngi jong ka bri Hynñiewtrep.11. Ha u ‘nailur 2008, U Bah Ardent M Basaïawmoit, u MLA jong ka Nongkrem u la leit sha Jaduguda kaba don ha Jylla Jharkhand, ban wad, ban thud bad ban ïohi da la ki jong ki khmat kumno ka long ka jingtih Uranium hangtei. Kumno ka ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah, ïa ka mariang bad ka jingim jong ki trai muluk bad ki nongshong shnong. Hadien ba u la wan phai u la ai ïa ka kaiphot lyngba ki kotkhubor bad lad pathai khubor ryngkat bad ki dur ki dar jong ki briew kiba ïoh ïa ki jingpang kiba khyllah bad jingkynrei jong ka jingpang duh khun, jingpang bampong bad kumta ter ter. Hadien u la ther tyngeh ruh hapoh Ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ jong ka Jylla. Hynrei, ki don pat kiba kynthoh pynrem, khamtam eh ïa ki dur jong ki briew kiba pang bad ki kynthoh beiñ ba ki dei “ki dur jong ki nongkhrong bad ki phetwir kiba khlem ïing kiba lah ban shem ha ki jaka sangeh rel ha ri thor”.12. Ba ka jingïakren bad jingpyrshang ban tih ïa u Uranium uba don ha bri Hynñiewtrep kan ym pat sangeh. Ei ba tip, lashai, la shi sngi, kin sa mih sa ki stad nuclear ne stad saian physic thymmai napdeng ki khun Hynñiewtrep, ki ban sa batai pynshai ba donkam ban tih bad kan ym lei lei lada tih? Ïoh don lei kiba shlur bieit, ki ban ong ngin tih hi kumba tih pathar ïa u mawshun, u dewïong bad kiwei ki mar mariang. Ha kata ka por yn leh kumno? Hato ngin ngeit bad pdiang ïa ka jingbatai ki khun ki kti bad ki kur ki kha lajong?13. Ba ka jingma ka long ba ïoh don kiba pyrshah tang mynta namar ba ka pyrthei Hynñiewtrep baroh kawei ka dang pyrshah ban tih Uranium, kumta ki ruh ki sngewdei ban pyrshah. Ei ba tip lashai la shi sngi, kine kiba pyrshah tang mynta, ha ka kyrrteng jong ka roi ka par bad ka ïohnong shimet ma ki ki ban pyrta shnong nyngkong ba dei ban tih noh mar mar.14. Ba ka jingma kaba kham khraw ka long ïoh don ki “nongïalam jaidbynriew” ne “nongmihkhmat paidbah” ne ki ban sa long “nongïalam jaidbynriew” ne “nongmihkhmat paidbah” kiba pyrshah tang na sla bad tang mynta shikhmat, hynrei kiba kwah ban pynsngewbha ïano re, bad kiba lah ban shah thied da ka spah, ka burom bad ka iktiar. Kine kin sa kyndeh bad khohreh ban tih Uranium, ynda la phngaiñ ka pyrthei. Ngin leh kumno ha kata ka por?15. Ba ka jingtih ïa u Uranium ka long ka jingma ïa ka jingkoit jingkhiah bad ka buh jingma ïa ka jaidbynriew Hynñiewtrep kaba tang shitroh. Ka lyer bih kaba mih na ki par tih Uranium ki lah ban wanrah ki jingpang kiba kordit bad jingïap jong ki briew. Wat tang mynta ba ki la dep khlong malu mala tang ban shu wad jingtip (exploratory) ki la don ki jingïakren shaphang ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong ki briew kiba shong sha ki thaiñ Domïasiat, Umdohlun, Wahkaji bad kiwei ki shnong ba marjan. Ka donkam eh ban jurip bad thwet bniah halor ka jinglong ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong ki shnong hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District.16. Ba ha ka snem 2028, ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) kan dap san phew (50) ka jingtreikam jong ka bad lah ban ong ba lai phew (30) ne lai phew san (35) snem na ka jingïaid lynti jong ka, ka long ka jingïakhun bad jingïakhih ban pyrshah ïa ka jingtih ïa u Uranium napoh ka bri Hynñiewtrep. Nga ngeit skhem ba ka jingpyrshah jong ka KSU ban tih ïa u Uranium ka long ka jingpyrshah kaba shirta bad kan ym kylla. Lada ka kylla, kan long ka jingshet shukor kaba ki pateng ba bud kin ym lah ban map lano lano ruh.17. Ba i Kong Spility Lyngdoh Langrin, i Bah Hopingstone Lyngdoh bad Rev Dr. P.B.M Basaïawmoit kim don shuh bad ngi hangne ha sla pyrthei. Hynrei ki la leh la ka bynta bad ki la ïeng skhem bad ïakhun pyrshah haduh kaba kut ka rta jong ki.18. Ngi la ju ong EM ïa ka jingtih Uranium bad ngin ïai ong EM shi junom. Im slem ka jingïakhun pyrshah tih Uranium.
title: Halor u Uranium: Ngi ong em tang mynta ne ngin ong em shirta?

content: Jowai, Lber 13: U Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills u la pyntip ba ka sorkar kmie kan dang bteng ba ai khaw rashon khlem donkam ban siew pisa ïa ki nongbam khaw Antyodaya Anna Yojna (AAY) bad Priority Household (PHH) na ka bynta 5 (san) snem ka ban sdang naduh 1st January, 2024.
title: Yn bteng ka sorkar ban ai khaw rashon ei sa san snem

content: Shillong Lber 13: Na ka daw ka jingshah khang ka tih maw tih shyiap bad nalor kiwei ki kam kiba ktah bha ïa ka ïohkam bylla ki khasi na ka liang u CEM ka KHADC barim uba dei ruh u Nongïalam ka Liang Ïatei bad u MDC ka UDP na Sohra u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur bha, lyngba ka phang ne motion kaba u la wanrah halor ka jinghiar ka ïoh ka kot bad ka jingkiew ka jingduk tasam bad ka khaïi pateng kaba la ktah ïa ka jakpoh uba tlot ha ka ïoh ka kot.“Ka ïoh ka kot ha kine ki sngi ka la pyni ba uba riewspah u la nang riewspah bad uba duk u la nang duk. Haba phai sha ki kam khaïi ne business ha jaka la jong la leh mynta da bun ki briew ba nabar. Lah jyllei ka jingsengkam ki kompeni, ki dealer ba nabar hynrei ym don jingïarap eiei ïa samla, kumta ka Council ka dei ban don ka bynta ban pynïaid ne tehlakam ïa ka jingwan sengkam kiba nabar,” ong u Bah Chyne.U la kdew haba ïadei bad ka kam ka Kit ka Bah ne Transport u la ong ba bun na ki bus bad taxi kiwan nabar katba kiba na shnong lajong kim ïoh kamai shuh bad bun ki ud halor kane ka bynta.Halor ka ïoh kam ïohjam bun ki samla ki ud ba kim ïoh jingtrei ha ki kompeni. U la ong ba watba ka jylla ka don 80% ki nongrep hynrei ha ka kam khaïi la bat da kiba nabar bad dei kine kiba bat ïa u shabi u lakam ka khaïi pateng ba sa hiar ka ïew die synsar mynta haduh 40% na ka 100%.U la kyntu ba ka Council kadei ban khot hajir ïa ka seng All Broom Stick Association bad lada kim lah ban pynhiar ïa ka dor dei ban pynduh noh ïa ka laisen khaïi jong ki.Halor ka jingshah khang ka tih maw tih shyiap kane ruh ka la ktah bha ïa ki briew lajong kiba im kamai jakpoh bad na kadaw ba la shah khang ha la ri la jong ki la hap ruh ban shu kit tuh.U la pynkynmaw ba ha ki por ba u dang long u CEM u la dep phah da ka jingthoh sha ka sorkar ban ailad ïa ka rukom tih maw kumba ju leh mynshwa kaba mut ban pyndonkam beit da u Lyngka, ka Belsha ym pat da ka JCB ne ki kor ba mynta khnang kiba im ha ka kam bylla shna ïing kin ym ïap ja.Halor ka bam kum ka doh, ka pylleng, ka dohkha kaba bun hi hap wanrah na shabar duna ki briew lajong ki ban ri jingri ne buh farm.U la ong ba nalor ka jingthaw aiñ ban ïada ïa ka jaitbynriew dei ruh ban pyrkhat ïa ka ïap ka im, ka kamai kajih ka jaitbynriew Khasi.
title: Ka jingbym ïoh tih maw tih shyiap shuh ka la ktah ïa ka ïoh bylla ki briew, ong u MDC Sohra

content: Shillong, Rymphang 13 : Ki Sngi ki la nang jan bad ki tiket ki la jan lut na ka bynta ka jingwan kyrïuh bad pynshongshit jong u nongrwai ba pawnam ka pyrthei u Calum Scott ka ban long ha ka 20 tarik Lber 2024 ha Lariti Hall kaba ha Mawdiangdiang New Shillong.La ïathuh ba 70 % ki tiket ki la lut hynrei na ka bynta kito ki bym pat ïoh ïa ki tiket jongki ki lah ban thied noh kloi na www.rockskitickets.com ïoh phi babe namar kane kan long ka concert ban sah jingkynmaw namar ka long ruh ka sien ba nyngkong eh ban pynlong ïa ka Indoor Concert haba ki nongrwai ba pawnam ki wan sha ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka jingpyrshang ban wanrah shuh shuh ïaki jingpynbyrngia da ka Rockski EMG, na ka bynta kito kiba thied ïa ki tiket ban wan sha ka Concert kin ïoh ruh ban ïadon bynta ha ka Reality TV Show kaba la jer kyteng “Hills on a Plate-Meghalaya” kaba dei ka Episode ba nyngkong na ki 7 tylli ki Episode. Kane ka dei ka jingïatrei lang ka tnad Tourism jongka jylla bad ka Rockski EMG kaba ïadei bad ka jingriewspah ha ka bam ka dih bad kiei kiei ki jingitynnad ba tynrai kiba ym pat ju ïoh sngew koid ha ka jylla.Kin don ki nongbishar ha kane ka Show ba kynthup ïa ka Sarah Todd ka Masterchef na Australia, Ardahun Passah bad William Diengdoh. Kine ki prokram kin kynthup ïa ki jingïakob shet jingshet bad kiwei kiwei ki jinglong tynrai ba riewspah ka jylla bad ban pynbit pynbiang ïa kane ka prokram kin long u Gordon Thabah bad Abigail Pamei bad ki ban ïashim bynta ki long Artet Kharsati, Ivan Suting, Daei Suchiang,Nambie Marak, Tanisha Phanbuh, Uttam Thangkhiew, bad Adonijah Lyngdoh.Hadien katei ka concert jongu Calum Scott kan don sa ka Culinary Extravaganza ha Nanpolok ha ka 21 bad 22 tarik Lber. Ha katei ka prokram kiba wan ïashim bynta ki lah ban ïakren bad ki nongshet ba pawnam Jason White bad kiwei kiwei ki ban wan na kylleng ka ri India.Dei ruh ha katei ka jaka ba ka tnad Tourism jongka jylla kin pynbna ïa ka tarik na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka Cherry Blossom, ki nongjop jongka Megha Music Contest bad kiwei kiwei ki prokram.
title: La jan lut ki tiket bad la nang jan ki sngi ban wan kyrïuh u Calum Scott ha Lariti

content: Shillong, Lber 13 : U Nongïalam ki MLA Congress ba dei ruh u nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah, Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Balang u la ther kylla ïa u nongïalam ka TMC, Dr. Mukul Sangma halor ka jingkynthoh pyrshah ïa ka Congress haba ïadei bad ka jingjied ïa ki kyrtong ban aireng ha kane ka elekshon MP na Shillong bad Tura watla ki don lang ha ka India Bloc.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Ronnie u la ong ba ka TMC ka la ïaid shakhmat ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong MP na ki 42 tylli ki constituency ha West Bengal khlem da ap ïa ka Congress hynrei ynda la dei pat ka pali ha Meghalaya, utei u nongïalam ka TMC u kynnoh ïa ka Congress.Shuh shuh u ong ba ka jingkren jong u Dr. Mukul ka pynlyngoh ruh khamtam haba ka West Bengal ka don haduh 42 tylli ki seat katba ha Meghalaya pat ka don tang ar tylli ki parliamentary seat. Kumta, u la ong ba lada ki ar seat na Meghalaya ki kham kongsan ïa ka TMC bad ki 42 tylli ki seat kim da donkam, kata hi ka la dei ka jubab kaba kham shai.“Lada ka TMC ka ong ba ngi la ïaid shakhmat ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ha Meghalaya kumta kam kwah shuh ban ïatrei lang bad ka Congress, te balei pat kim pynbna ba ka la don ka jingïa pynbeit ïa ki constituency ban treilang ha West Bengal. Nga kwah ban buh jingkylli ïa ka TMC kaba dei shi bynta jong ka INDIA Bloc balei kam pdiang ïa ka jingpynbeit ïa ki seat ha West Bengal. Lada ki leh ïa kata ha West Bengal ki lah ban leh ruh ha Meghalaya. Hynrei hato dei ba ki la don ka jingïapynbeit sop sop bad ka BJP,” u la bynrap shuh shuh.”Shuh shuh u la buh jingkylli ruh ba kaei ka jingïohnong jong ka TMC da kaba kyntait ban treilang bad ka INDIA Bloc, kata ka Congress ha kane ka elekshon MP. “Ne kadei na bynta ka jingïohnong jong ka BJP khnang ba kan paw ba ka BJP bad ka TMC kam don kano kano ka jingïadei,” u la bynrap biang.U Bah Ronnie u ong ruh ba ka BJP ka la tip bha ba ka TMC ka don bun bha ka jingïoh vote, kumta lada ki treilang ka vote jong ka liang pyrshah kan pharia noh bad kane kan pynïohnong ïa ka BJP khamtam haba ka vote jong ki rit paidbah ka bun bha ha katei ka jylla.Nalorkata, u la ong ba kaba sah mynta ka shong ha ki paidbah ban bishar ïa ka party bad jied ïa ki party kiba ïatrei lang na ka bynta ka jingsynshar kaba laitluid.
title: Imat don ka jingïapynbeit sop sop hapdeng ka TMC bad ka BJP : Bah RV Lyngdoh

content: Shillong, Lber 13 : U Deputy CEM ka KHADC, Bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem ha ka sngi Balang u la ong ba kam dei satia ka Executive Committee kaba kwah ba pynjlan ïa ka elekshon MDC hynrei dei ka Delimitation Committee (DC) kaba pan por sa 6 bnai ban pyndep ïa ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa baroh 29 tylli ki constituency.Haba jubab halor ka jingkylli ba wanrah da u MDC ka Mawthadraishan, Bah Jambor War, u Deputy CEM u la ong, “Ka jingkwah jong ka Executive Committee haba thaw ïa ka Delimitation Committee ka long da ka thong ban pyndep noh ïa ka kam shwa ban kut ka samoi treikam jong ka Council. Hynrei khlem poi pyrkhat ka Committee ka khlem lah ban pyndep ïa ka jingkhmih lynti jongngi ka EC.”Shuh shuh u ïathuh ruh ba ïa ka Delimitation Committee kam dei kaba leh da ka EC hynrei kadei kaba da ïoh jingbit na u Lat. U ong ruh ba dei lyngba ka jingthoh kaba wan na ka Committee kaba pan por sa hynriew bnai ba ka EC ruh ka la pyntip (forward) sha u Lat ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Shwa kane, u la pynshai ruh ba ka EC kam shym la thoh ei ei la ki kwah ban pynjlan ne ynnai pynjlan ïa ka elekshon hynrei ki la shu phah beit ïa ka jingthoh kaba wan na ka Committee.“Haba ngi la phah ka shong pat ha ka jingstad jong ka sorkar kumno kin leh. Hynrei u Lat ha ka notification ha u Rymphang u la mynjur ban pynjlan sa 6 bnai naduh ka 13tarik Rymphang 2024,” u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por, u MDC ka Laban-Mawprem, Bah Mitchel Wankhar u la ong ba ka jingïakren kaba hakhmat ha ka phiah constituency kadei beit hapdeng ka Mawlai kaba heh tam bad ka Laban kaba khyndïat tam.U ong ruh ba ha ka jingshisha ïa kaba heh yn shim bad pynngat noh sha kawei ka constituency bad ïa kaba khyndiat yn ai shuh. Hynrei u la ïathuh ba ha constituency jong u kam long kumta naba don ki bynta jong ka constituency kiba la bna ba yn rah noh sha Laitumkhrah watla ki paidbah ka Laban constituency ki dang kwah ban neh hajuh.Hynrei haba jubab halor kane, u Bah Pynshngaiñ u la ong ba ïa katei ka kam ki shaniah beit ha ka Delimitation Committee ban leh ïa kaba donkam khnang ba ka jingphiah ïa ki constituency kan long kaba ia ïahap lang khlem da don shuh kiba heh ne rit than.
title: Ym dei ka EC ba kwah pynjlan elekshon MDC, hynrei dei ka DC ba pan por 6 bnai

content: Shillong, Lber 13:Na ka daw jong ka jingdon bun palat ki briew kiba nabar jylla kiba ïoh ban khaïi hapoh ki ïew kiba dang hab hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka Raid Marwet hapoh ka Hima Mylliem, na ka liang u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia ba ha ki por ba u la leit ban khynra ïa ki laisen khaïi sha katei ka thaiñ u la lap hi da la ki jong ki khmat ba ki don sa tang 19 tylli ki longïing Khasi.Ïa katei u la jubab ïa ka phang ba la wanrah da u MDC ka Sohra u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne uba la kren halor ka jingkyrduh kam bad ka jingbym ïoh kam ki samla Khasi wat hadien ba ki la pas ha kiba bun ki kyrdan.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane na ka liang u CEM u la ong ba ka Council lyngba ka EC ka la pyrkhat ban wanrah noh da ka Skill Development Prokram ka ban ai jinghikai ïa ki samla ban ïeng bad seng kam lajong. U la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewdiaw ban ïohi ba bun ki briew kiba heh nia tang ha ki rynsan Social Media ban ong ba ki ieid jait bynriew tang maki katba kim ju hiar pat sha madan ban leit knieh noh ïa ki kam ba la trei ne ki kam khaïi ba la leh da ki bar jylla.Kumta u la kyntu ïa kito ki samla kiba ban pyndonkam ïa ki lad kiba la pynbiang da ka sorkar lyngba ka CM-Elevate bad kane ka Skill Development Programme ka ban sa pyntreikam da ka Council.
title: Haba ieid jaitbynriew wat heh nia tang ha Social Media, wan sha madan: CEM KHADC

content: Shillong, Lber 13 : U Nongïalam jongka Congress uba dei ruh u MP na ka jylla u ma Vincent H Pala mynta ka Sngi Balang u la kynnoh ba kane ka sorkar MDA hapoh ka jingïalam ka NPP ka leh kum ki Gunda ne ki Gang kiba shu lute beit na ki paidbah bad dei na kane ka daw ba sa nud ki riew kieng atiar ruh ban shim kabu.ïa kane u la kren shisngi hadien ba ki pulit ki la ïoh ban pynpra ïa ka Sleeper Cell jongka seng HNLC kaba la thmu ban pynbthei bom IED ha nongbah Shillong bad Nongpoh hadien ba ki pulit ki la bud dien tyngeh na ka jingbthei bom IED ha Them ïew Mawlong ha ka miet 9 tarik mynta u bnai.U la ong ruh ba ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ka la nang hiar ha ka jylla. U ma Pala u la ong “ Lada phi phai shilynter ka surok bah phin ïohi ba ka sorkar ka leh kum ki Gunda bad lada leit sha ki ophis sorkar ruh ki kam jongphi kin ym ïaid shakhmat khlem ka pisa. Lada phi niah kali ha surok bah lada phi kit dewiong phin hap siew bun bah ka pisa, lada kit kwai bad tympew ruh hap siew pisa bun, lada kit synsar ruh phin hap ban siew pisa bad lada kit syiar ruh hap siew haduh 30 hajar shi trok rit ( pick up) wat haduh u rnga bad kiwei kiwei hap ban siew ym duna ïa ka 500 tyngka”.“ Kane ka jingleh jongka sorkar ban lute na ki paidbah ka la pynshlur ïa kiwei ki kynhun bad ki seng kieng atiar ban mih bad leh ïa ki kam beaiñ namar kumba leh beaiñ da ka sorkar kumta ruh kiwei ki bud nuksa ban ïoh pisa bad kane ka dei ka polisi jongkane ka sorkar ba mynta” ong u ma Pala.“ Nga ngeit skhem ba kane ka polisi jongka sorkar ka la pyntroiñ ïa ka jylla bad phi ïohi hi kumno ka jylla ka la troiñ ha kine ki 7-8 snem. Nga ngeit skhem ruh ba lada ngi ïai bteng kumne ngin sa ïohi ïa ka lawei ba dum ha kane ka jylla” ong biang u ma Pala.U la ther tyngeh ruh ïa kane ka sorkar kaba la pheil ban bteng ka jingkren ïasuk bad ka seng HNLC. “ Ka sorkar ka la pheil namar ka seng HNLC ka la wan sha ka miej jingïakren hynrei ka dei ka sorkar kaba pyntud bad ka paw shai ruh ba kam shim khia hi ruh ïa ka kam” ong biang une u nongïalam jongka Congress.U la ong ba kane ka sorkar ka la pheil lut nadong shadong “ Ki la pheil ha ka khaïi pateng, ka ïoh ka kot bad mynta sa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ “ ong u ma Pala.U ma Pala u la ong ba kane ka sorkar ka jop tang kawei kata ka long ban shim ram ban pynriewspah ïa ki katto katne ngut.“ Ngam tip ha kano ka bynta ka sorkar ka la kheit ïa u soh jongka jingjop lait noh na kane kaba shim ram da ki phew phew hajar klur bad ka jingkylli shano ki pyntrei ïa kane ka ram. Ki la shim ram na ka Asian Development Bank, World Bank bad shaei ki pyntrei ïa kata ka pisa ym don ba tip. Ki pyntreikam ha surok namar ki dei ma ki hi ki kontraktor, ki myntri sorkar bad ki nongshim ram ruh. Kumta kane ka dei tang ka jingmyntoi ki katto katne ngut ym dei ka jingmyntoi jong kiba bun ba lang” pynkut u ma Pala.
title: Ka sorkar MDA ka leh kum ki ‘Gunda’ shu lute beit na ki paidbah sa nud shim kabu sa ki riewkieng atiar

content: Shillong, Lber 13: Ka jingrung sha ki krem ki kroh kaba la pynlong mynta u snem 2024 kaba la tip kum ka Caving in the Abode of the Clouds Expedition ka la sdang naduh ka 28 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ka ban kut haduh ka 22 tarik u Rymphang, 2024. Kane ka kynthup ïa ka prokram kaba shi taïew kaba la thmu ban pynpaw ïa ki jinglong kyrpang ki shnong kum ka Sakhain kaba don ka jingjngai kumba 5 km na South jong ka shnong Sutnga kaba ha East Jaiñtia Hills District. Kane ka jingleit sha kane ka shnong ka la long naduh ka 29 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2 tarik u Rymphang 2024.Hadien katei la pynbud sa ka jingleit peit jaka kaba 2 taïew shiteng kaba dei ruh ka jingleit kaba kongsan sha ki thaiñ sawdong ki shong kum ka Tlang Moi bad Muallian, kiba baroh artylli ki don hapoh ka bynta ba shathie jong ka Shnongrim. Kane ka jingleit ka la sdang naduh ka 3 tarik u Rymphang haduh ka 21 tarik u Rymphang, 2024.Kumba ka la long ka kam jong ka jingleit rung krem kaba la tip da ka Caving ha ki ri jong ki lyoh bad kiwei pat ki jingleit kiba bun jait bad ha kane ki la don ki kynhun nongrung krem kiba la wan na ri UK, Ireland, Austria, Netherlands, Germany, USA, bad India ha kaba la ïashim bynta da ka Meghalaya Adventurers Association bad kiwei pat ki thaiñ jong ka ri India kiba kynthup ïa ki 8 ngut ki riew shimet bad ka kynhun kaba na ka jylla kaba ïadon kumba 29 ngut.Hapoh ka thaiñ Sakhain, la lap ba ki la don 10 tylli ki krem kiba thymmai kiba don ka jingjngai kaba 1,458m. Napdeng kine dei ka Ur Selle kaba jngai kumba 373m ki jaka rung jaka mih, ka Urluri kaba jngai 346m bad ka Rong Kso 3 kaba don ki lynti ïaid kiba jngai 314m. Baroh kine ki krem ki don ha ki kliar jong ki maw shyiap ha kaba ka shnong Sakhain ka don bad ha kaba baroh ki don lang ruh ki kshaid hapoh kiba ïaid lang bad ki wahduid. Ka jingleit sha kine ki jaka ka la jan long kaba la jandep.Hapoh ka thain Muallian/Tlang Moi, ïa kane ka kam la leh kumba leh ha ki snem 2020, 2022, bad 2023 bad ka thong ka long ban lap ïa ki krem bad kiwei pat kiba thymmai ha kaba ha ki snem ba mynshwa la lap ïa ki jaka rung tangba kiba khlem lah leit ban rung. Ha kaba ïadei bad kiwei kiba la tip mynshwa bad kiwei pat kiba dang lah ban pyndep dang shiteng kiba la lap ba ka don ka wah napoh ka Krem Rynjangor Retdung Khur kaba la ïar na ka 20,445m sha ka 23,219m kaba la sdang napoh ka krem kaba 7 ha ka ri India bad kaba jrong tam kaba mih sha ka krem kaba la ithuh kaba long kaba 3 ha India bad kaba 2 ka krem kaba jrong tam kaba don hapoh ki jaka ba don ki maw shun.Ka Pynnoh Um Sngad/Ram Khur System kaba la pynïar na ka 14,951m sha ka 20,459m kaba la shim na ki krem kiba la long ha ka kyrdan kaba 8 ha ri India bad kaba 7 ka krem kaba jrong tam lane ka 6 krem kaba poi ha ka kyrdan kaba 6 kaba don hapoh ki krem mawshun. Hynrei ka long pat kaba sngewsih ba khlem la lah ban pynpoi sha ka thong ban ïoh leit pyndep lut ïa ka Retdung Khur bad ka Pyynod Um Sngad/Ram Khur ka ban thaw ïa ka 45+km kaba ha Meghalaya watba kitei ki artylli ki jrong kumba palat 150/200m. Ka jingthmu ban leit sha Um LadawtoRetdung Khur kane ruh ka khlem long kaba jop da kaba shu tih ne ban kiew.Ki la don pat ki krem kiba thymmai kiba la ïoh ban leit rung kiba ha ka thaiñ Muallian kum ka Rebung Kung 2 kaba jrong 1,896m ki lynti ïaid bad ka Rebung Kung Maul kaba don 1,604m. Kine baroh artylli ki krem ki long kiba itynnad lyngba ki wahduid kiba la ohshrong. Ban bynrap shuh shuh ki la don sa kumba 6 tylli ki krem kiba thymmai kiba la lap.Katto katne ki krem ba thymmai kiba la lap ki long kiba jylliew bha ha kaba kaba jrong tam ka dei ka Trevor Khur kaba don ka jaka rung kaba jylliew kumba 152m bad kadei ka krem kaba jylliew tam ha Meghalaya ne India kaba la lap haduh mynta.Ha kane ka jingleit rung krem kaba kut jong u snem 2024 baroh kiba la lap ki don ka jingjrong kaba 13,895m. Kane ka la wanrah ka jingkheiñ jong ka jingjrong ki krem kiba la lap bad kiba la dep ban dro ïa ka map ha Meghalaya naduh ka jingsdang ban lap bad ban leit wad ïa ki krem katkum ka juk kaba mynta naduh ki snem 1992 kiba baroh ki long 551 km.Ka Association ka ai khublei ïa Meghalayan Age Ltd. bad ka Directorate of Sports and Youth Affairs, ka sorkar jylla, ïa ka jingïaibteng ban kyrshan bad ban ïoh pynrung ha ki jingthoh halor ki krem jong ka Meghalaya kiba la wanrah ki jingmih kiba khraw, ong ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Bah Brian D. Kharpran Daly, General Secretary.
title: Lap ki Nongrung krem bun tylli ki krem thymmai kiba ym pat paw pyrthei ha East Jaiñtia Hills

content: Shillong, Lber, 13: U Chief Conservator jong ka tnat Forest u N. Luikham uba dei ruh u ophisar Indian Forest Services (IFS) u la pynkut noh ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha u tyllai phasi ha ka ingsah ka jong u kaba don hajan ka Lady Keane College, Shillong.U Luikham u dei uba la don kumba 50 snem ka rta bad u dei u ophisar IFS jong ka Batch 2003.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la pyntip da u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi u la ong ba u Luikham u la phasi ïalade ha ka por 7:30 baje mynstep.Tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, ki Pulit ki la leit ban shimti noh ïa ka met jong u bad ban pynkit sha Shillong Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka Post Mortem.Ha ka por janmiet, ki bahaing hasem ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongtrei ka tnat Forest ki la leit ban shimti noh ïa ka met ba dang sah jong u Luikham na Civil Hospital, Shillong bad ban pynkit biang sha ka quarter kaba u ju sah shwa ban pynkit noh ïa ka met sha ka shnong Ukhrul, Manipur na ka bynta ka jinglehniam kaba khatduh.Haduh mynta ym pat lah satia ban tip ïa ka daw tynrai halor ka jingpynkut noh jong une u ophisar ïa la ka jong ka jingim.Tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad Kongkal Sangma ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah Donald P. Wahlang bad ki ophisar jong ki tnat treikam bapher bapher ka Sorkar Jylla kynthup ruh ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Forest ha ka por janmiet ki la leit sngewlem bad pyntngen ïa ki bahaing hasem halor ka jingkhladnoh kyndit jong u Luikham.Na ka liang jong u Myntri Rangbah haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang sngewlem u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih bad ong ruh ba ka jingkhladnoh jong u Luikham ka long ka jingduh kaba khraw ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya khamtam ïa ka tnat Forest bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki bahaing hasem bad ki paralok kiba ïajan eh bad u.
title: Phasi u Chief Conservator ka Forest ha ïingsah hajan Lady Keane College

content: BDWS
title: BDWS

content: Shillong, Lber, 13: Ki Pulit ka Ribhoi District kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bha ha kaba ïadei bad ka Case kaba la rejister ha Nongpoh Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/121A jong ka Indian Penal Code pule lang ruh bad ka Section 10/13/18 jong ka UA(P)Act bad ka section 5/6 Explosives Substance Act, ha ka sngi Balang ki la ïoh kurup kawei ka pistol, bun tylli ki Gelatin Stick, ki Detonator bad ki Ignition Fuses bad kawei ka lama jong ka seng HNLC bad kiwei kiwei ki jait tiar.Ka jingïoh kurup jong ki Pulit ïa kine ki lama bad ïa ki tiar pynbthei ka long hadien ka jingïalam lynti jong uwei na kiba la shah kem sha kawei ka ïing ba la buhrieh ïa kine ki tiar be-aiñ.Ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ruh ba ki dei kine kijuh ki nongtrei barieh kiba la pynher ïa ki lama jong ka HNLC ha ki snem baladep da ka jingbthah jong ki nongïalam ba phetrieh ka seng kieng atiar HNLC na Bangladesh .Kane ka kam runar ka la paw pyrthei hadien ba ki nongïalam ba la phetrieh sha Bangladesh ki la bthah ïa ka kynhun treikam barieh. Nalor kata, la ai khusnam ruh da ka pisa bad kynthup ruh ïa ki kali ba thymmai sha kine ki nongtrei barieh ban pynbthei ïa ki bom IED, la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh ba u SP ka Ribhoi Jagpal Singh Dhanoa.Ka jingtohkit halor kane ka dang ïaid shakmat.
title: Ha ka jingkhynra ïa ka ïing sah kurup ki Pulit ka Ribhoi ïa ka pistol, ki lama ka HNLC bad ki tiar pynbthei

content: Shillong, Lber 14: Ka long ka kabu bad ka jingmyntoi ïa ki khynnah samla ka jylla kiba don ïa ka sap lehkai phutbol hadien ba ka klob ba ïakhun ha ka Indian Super League- ka NorthEast United FC hynne ka sngi ka la ïateh soskular bad ka Sorkar jylla Meghalaya ban sdang ïa ka shlem ai jinghikai phutbol lane ka football academy kaba la khreh ban seng ha Mawkhanu- New Shillong.U trai jong katei ka klob ISL- u John Abraham u ba dei ruh u khlur ak phlim ba pawnam ka Bollywood u la wan jngoh ïa ka nongbah Shillong hynne ka sngi bad sakhilang ïa ka jingplie ïa ka kylla kaba ar jong ka Talent Identification bad Elite Pathway Programs 2024-25, ha SAI- NEHU ryngkat bad u MR ka jylla- u Conrad K Sangma.Katkum ka kyrwoh na ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs ka Sorkar jylla la pyntip ba ka “jingïateh” la mynjur hapdeng katei ka klob bad ka tnat ïalehkai ban kyntiew ïa ka football hapoh ka jylla.Ka jaka jong ka sorkar kaba ha Mawkhanu la bynta kyrpang ïa ka NEUFC, ka ban sa tei ïa ka shlem ai jinghikai phutbol lane ka football academy ha katei ka jaka ïa kaba ka kynhun NEUFC ka lah ban kilanmet bad ban ai jinghikai ban kyntiew ïa ki khynnah samla ka thaiñ ha ka football.Watla kata ruh, kane ka jingïateh ym pat shym la thikna, ha kaba ki kyndon bad ki aiñ ka Sorkar ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingthmu ka dang ïaid shakhmat, la bynrap ka kyrwoh na ka tnat Sports.Ha kine ki snem ba ladep, la bna khubor ïa ka jingthmu u Abraham u ba la wan jngoh la bun sien ïa ka nongbah Shillong ban ïatreilang bad ka sorkar ha ka ban seng ïa ka shlem ai jinghikai hapoh kane ka nongbah ban kyntiew ïa ki khynnah samla ka thaiñ ha ka phutbol khnang ba kin pyndonkam thikna ïa ka sap ryngkat ka jingkhmihlynti ban sei ïa ki player ban mih madan ïa ka NEUFC.
title: ïateh soskular ka NorthEast United FC bad ka sorkar jylla ban sdang ïa ka shlem ai jinghikai

content: Shillong, Lber 14: Ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar jylla hynne ka sngi ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban plie ïa ka kylla ba Ar jong ka Talent Identification bad Elite Pathway Programs 2024-25, ha SAI-North Eastern Hill University, Shillong, kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka jingnang roi ki khynnah samla ka jylla ha ki rynsan bapher bapher kum ha ka sports bad kiwei kiwei de.La plie ïa ka bynta ba Ar jong ka Talent Identification and Elite Pathway Programs 2024-25 da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma uba long kum u Kongsan, bad la wan sakhilang da u khlur ak phlim Bollywood-u John Abraham u ba dei trai jong ka klob phutbol North East United F.C. (NEUFC) .Kiba ïadonrynglang ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ïa u Chief Secretary-u Bah DP Wahlang, ka Director of Sports & Youth Affairs-ka Kong Isawanda Laloo, u Working President ka MSOA-u Bah John F Kharshiïing bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Ha kane ka sngi palat 500 ngut ki khynnah samla jong ka thaiñ ki la shah khot sngewbha ban pdiang ïa ki jingmyntoi kiba na ka liang jong ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs ka la pynkhreh na bynta jong ki.Haduh mynta, ki don haduh 14,500 ngut ki nongïashimbynta kiba la ïoh ban pyrshang ïalade ha ka Talent Identification Program da kaba pyndonkam da ki kor kane ka juk (scientific method) ban lap ïa ki khynnah samla ba don ïa ka sap kaba kyrpang.Lyngba ka EPP, kumba 200 ngut ki nongïalehkai (athlete) ki la ïoh ban don bynta ha ka prokram kilanmet kaba shi snem. Na bynta ka samoi 2024-25, ki don haduh 10,000 ngut ki nongïashimbynta, kynthup ruh ïa ki khynnah ba dang 6 snem, kiba hap hapoh ka Talent identification program, bad palat 200 ngut ki nongïalehkai (athlete) kiba hap ban pyndep ïa ka EPP Camp kaba ar.Lyngba kane ka prokram la khmihlynti ban nangsei ïa ki khynnah kiba don ïa ka sap ïalehkai. Lah ban kdew ruh ba 12 ngut ki khynnah samla ki la shah jied ban nang pyntbit shuh shuh ïalade lyngba ka Super Elite Program, ba kin long kiba kynsai ym tang hapoh ka ri hynrei wat shabar ri ruh kumjuh.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban sam khusnam da ka Cash Award sha ki nongïalehkai (athlete) ka jylla kiba la jop takma ha ki rynsan ïakop bapher bapher. Ka mang tyngka kaba la kot 68 Lak la sam sha ki 297 ngut ki nongïalehkai (Athlete) kynthup bad ki Coach ha kane ka sngi.Na ka liang jong ka tnat Sport & Youth Affair ka la pynbna ba kan ïai bteng ban pynlong kum kane ka prokram khnang ba baroh ki nongïalehkai ba khur takma napoh ka Meghalaya kin ïohpdiang ïa ka Cash Award lyngba kane ka Scheme.Shuh shuh, la pynbna ruh ïa ka Sports Scholarships ba la bynta khanng ïa ki nongïalehkai (athlete) mynta u snem. ïa kane ka Scholarship yn sdang ban pyllait naduh u ïaïong 2024 haduh Lber 2025, ha kaba ki nongïalehkai kin ïohpdiang ïa ka mangtyngka man u bnai katkum ka syrnod jong ka scheme ba la pyllait dang shen.
title: Ryngkat u John Abraham plie u MR ka jylla ïa ka kylla ba Ar jong ka Talent Identification bad Elite Pathway Programs

content: Shillong, Lber 13 : U Nongïalam ka Congress Legislative Party (CLP) Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Balang ula ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act (CAA) ka politik tad dor jong ka BJP ban pharia ïa ki jaitbynriew bad ka jingngeit niam, shuwa ka jingwan ka elekshon Lok Sabha.“Phi shu peit ïa ka CAA, ka dei ka politik taddor jong ka BJP. Shuwa jong ka elekshon, kila wanrah ïa kane ka ishu tang ban pharia ïa ki briew halor ka jingngeit niam, ïa kaba ngi pynrem jur bha, kaba ngi pyrshah bad ngi kyrpad ïa ki nong India, ki paidbah ka Jylla ba kin ai ïa ki vote sha ka party kaba burom ïa baroh ki niam, ki briew kiban ïada ïa ka riti synshar ka ri, ki briew ki ban pynneh ïa ka riti synshar paidbah” ong u Bah Ronnie.Ha ka sngi Ba-ar, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ula ong ba ka CAA kan ym don jingktah ïa ka Jylla Meghalaya namar la pyllait ïa ki jaka Sixth Schedule na ka jingtreikam jong ka aiñ.Haba kynthoh ïa kane, u Bah Ronnie ula ong “Ngin kham sngew shngaiñ lada kane ka long shibynta jong ka CAA rules. Tang da ki jingkren, ngam sngew ba ngi la thikna ba kan ym treikam. To ngin sa ïa peit ïa ka rule ba kila shna la kila pyllait ne em ïa ka Sixth Schedule bad ngin sa ngeit ïa kane”.
title: Ka CAA ka dei ka politik taddor jongka BJP ban pharia ïa ki jaidbynriew bad niam : Congress

content: Nongpoh, Lber 14: Kumba 30 ngut ki samla naka them Ri-Bhoi mynta ka sngi kila iohpdiang ïaka syrnod lem bad ki tiar khap shñiuh hadien ba kila pyndep ïaka jingshah hikai khap shñiuh kaba 1 bnai lynter bala sdang naduh u bnai Rymphang haka shnong Nongjri bad kane ka long ka jingai mynsiem ïa kiba bun ki khun samla ba kim dei ban ud kyrduh kam bad ban sngewpoh ïa kano kano ka kam namar ka jingknieh hi ïaka khaii ka pateng naki bar jylla ka dei ka ILP kaba khlaiñ kumba la pynpaw uwei naki samla bala pyndep jinghikai khap shñiuh.Kaba kham sngewtynnad ban ïoh sngew ka long ba napdeng kitei ki 30 ngut ki khun samla shynrang kiba la ïoh ïaka jingshah hikai haka kam khap sñiuh, 9 ngut ki la ïoh ban trei haki dukan riew shimet, 7 ngut ki la sdang ban seng hi ïa ka dukan la jong, bad 11 ngut ki la don ka jing thmu ban seng ïa ki dukan lyngba ki scheme sorkar kum ka PMEGP bad ka kiwei kiwei ki jingïarap lyngba ki ram na ki Bank bad 3 ngut pat ki dang don ka jingthmu ban leit pyntbit shuh shuh ïa lade sha ka Advance Training ban dang pynjanai ïaka sap khap shñiuh ka jong ki.Ïa katei ka jingshah hikai kaba hapoh jong ka SANKALP Aspirational Skilling Abhiyan project halor ka Men’s Salon kaba la dep ban pynlong haka shnong Nongjri la pynïaid daka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner Ri Bhoi District haka jing ïa trei ryngkat lang bad ka El Elyon Institute bad ka Meghalaya State Skill Development Society.Ha kane ka sngi la wan ban sam ïaki syrnod da u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi u Arpit Upadhyay IAS haka jingdon lang u H Decruse General Manager DCIC, kong S Nongbri Skills Development Officer Ri Bhoi lem bad ki nongpynïaid ka El Elyon Institute kiba kynthup ïa u Samla Saiñ Kupar Syngkli bad ka Samla Darihun Lyngdoh.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Deputy Commis-sioner ka Ri Bhoi u Arpit Upadhyay kum u kongsan u la ka jingkhublei ia katei ka shlem ai jinghikai ka El Elyon Institute kaba la shimkhia ban pyndep ïaka jingai jinghikai ha ki kam khap shñiuh sha ki khun samla kaba long ruh kum ka jingplie lad ïaki kumno ban sdang ban seng kam bad ban ïeng ha la ki jong ki kjat.U DC la Ri Bhoi u la ong ruh ba kano kano ka kam kaba khraw ka sdang shwa naki barit, kumta u la ai ki kyntien kyntu kynpham sha ki samla ba kim dei ban kheiñ poh ïa kane ka kam khap shñiuh, hynrei to shim ïaka kum kawei naki kam ka ban lah ban kyrshan ïaka ïing ka sem. U la kyntu ruh ba ki dei ban nang ïai trei shitom bad ban nang pynkhraw ïaka kam khnang ba kin long ruh ki nongaikam ai jam sha kiwei pat ki khun samla.U Deputy commis-sioner ka Ri Bhoi u la kitbok kitwriang ruh ïaki samla ba kin nangleh bha haka jingim ka jong ki khnang ba kaei kaba ki jinghikai ki la ioh kan nym long leh nohei bad kumjuh u la kitbok ruh ïa katei ka shlem ai jinghikai ba kan nang iai bteng ban pynlong kum kine ki jingai jinghikai bad u la tyrwa ruh ba naka liang ka ophis jong u kan nang ai ka jingkyrshan ban ïa trei ryngkat khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi iaki khun samla ym tang jong ka District hynrei haka jylla hi baroh kawei.
title: Pyndep 30 ngut ki samla ha ka kam khap shñiuh, ngim dei ban sngewpoh ïa ka kam; ong u samla

content: Shillong, Lber 13 : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma, ula ong ba ka ïoh ka kot jong ka Jylla kan kiew lada baroh ki paid nongshong shnong ka jylla naduh ki samla, ki kynthei,ki rangbah, ki nongrep, ki nongsengkam bad baroh ki dkhot ka imlang sahlang ki ïoh bynta lang ha kane ka jingkiew.U Conrad ula kren ïa kane ha ka CM Elevate Conclave na ka bynta ki nongsengkam ka Ri-Lum Garo kaba long mynta ka sngi Balang ha District Auditorium, Tura, ha ka jingïadonlang u Symbud Lamphang Timothy D Shura, ki Myntri Sorkar bad ka MP Lok Sabha ka Agatha K Sangma.Haba ai jingkren, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka don ïa ka mishon bad ka jingïohi jngai ban kynjoh ïa ka 10 billion US dollar economy hapoh u snem 2028 bad ban pynïaryngkat kyrdan ruh ïa ka Jylla bad kiwei kiwei ki Jylla bala kiew shaphrang hapoh ka Ri.“Lada ngim jam shakhmat da kane ka thong, ngin ym lah satia ban kiew bad roi lane ba ka ïoh ka kot jong ngi kan kiew” ula ong.Ula pyntip ba ha kine ki shisnem shiteng bala leit, ka ïoh ka kot jong ka Jylla kala kiew na ka T.45 hajar klur sha ka T. 56 hajar klur haba ban jur ïa ka jingdonkam ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingseng kam bad ka jingpynlut ban lah pynkhlaiñ ïa ka ïoh ka kot.U Myntri Rangbah u pyntip ba lyngba ki skhim bapher bapher jong ka CM Elevate program, ki nongïoh jingmyntoi kin ïoh haduh 50% ka subsidy lane palat na ka jinglut jingsep jong ka project.Ula pyntip ba ka CM Elevate Program kan ïai bteng manla u snem bad kyntu ïa ki samla ba kin shim kabu ïa ki jingmyntoi ba kin ïoh na kane ka prokram.U Conrad ula kren ruh halor ka Floriculture Mission kaba la pyllait dang shen bad ong ba kane ka Mission kan pynkhlaiñ ïa ka kam rep syntiew hapoh ka Jylla.Ula pyntip ruh ba ka IT Park ha Tura ïa kaba la dep ban ai work order, kan lah ban pynïoh kam haduh 5000 ngutki samla ka Tura bad ka ri lum Garo baroh kawei.Ha kane ka sngi u Myntri Rangbah ula sam ruh ïa ka shithi thungkam ïa ki Village Data Volunteers bad aiti ïa ka work order jong ka Bio-mining ha ka jaka bret niut ka sor Tura, kaba don ha Rongkhon Songital.Nalor kine, ula sam ruh ïa ki shithi pyllait song pisa sha ki nongïoh jingmyntoi jong ki Agri-Response Vehicles, Agri-Warehouse, Common Facility Centre, Piggery, Poultry bad Goat Farming schemes hapoh ka CM Elevate bad ki sanction letters hapoh ka Floriculture Mission.
title: Ka ïoh ka kot ka jylla kan kiew lada baroh ki paid nongshong shnong ki ïakiew lang : CM

content: Ym lah ban len ha kine ki sngi bun na ki samla pule ha ka jylla ki hap ban mad ïa ka jingjynjar jong ka jingkyrduhkam kyrduhjam bad bun ruh na ki samla kiba la pyndep ïa ki kyndan bapher bapher ha ki kyndan pule bapher bapher ki hap ban shong khlem kam khlem jam.Ym lah ban len ha kine ki sngi, wat ki samla kiba la nang la stad ki la hap ban shu shong khlem kam namar ka jinghiran ka ïohkam ïohjam. Katba nang mih ki snem ka jingjyllei ki samla kiba la nang la stad ka la nangjur. Ka jinghiran ka ïohkam ïohjam ha kane ka Jylla ka long ruh namar ba ka Jylla kaba rit ka bym don satia ïa ki karkhana ai kam kumba long sha kiwei kiwei ki jylla ha kaba ki samla wadkam ki kham ïabeh ban trei ha ki Kompani namar ka jingsiew kaba heh watla ki hap ban trei shitom. Lah ban ong, da ki hajar ngut ki samla na kane ka jylla kiba la hap ban jngai na la ïing tang namar ban leit wad jakpoh sha kiwei pat ki jylla namar ka jinghiran ka ïohkam ïohjam ha kane ka jylla.Ka jingkylli ka mih hangne, hato ka sorkar jylla ka lah ban ban aikam aijam ïa baroh ki samla kiba la pyndep ïa ki kyrdan pule kiba kham shalor. Lah ban ong ka long kaba eh ba ka sorkar kan lah ban ai kam ai jam namar ba ka jingroi jong ka jingbun paid ka la nangkiew katba nang mih ki sngi bad ki por.Ynnai ïa kren lei lei ïa ka lawei jong ki khynnah pule kiba dang don ha ki skul ha kaba peit shi synpeit la iduh jingkyrmen, namar khamtam kum ha ka Nongbah Shillong bad wat ha ki jaka nongkyndong ruh ha kine ki sngi tang kawei ka skul pule ka la don da ki hajar ngut ki khynnah pule.Ban ïakren lei lei ïa ki samla kiba la pyndep tang ïa ka degree ruh da ki phew hajar ngut ki dang don kiba shong khlem kam khlem jam ha kaba ka sorkar kam lah satia ban ai kam ai jam. Lah ruh ban ong ba ka long shisha kaba shem jingeh ba baroh ki samla pule kin ïoh ïa ki kam sorkar kiba ha kine ki sngi tang ïa kawei ne ar tylli ki post ki nongthepkam ki la kot da ki hajar ngut.Ka long pat kaba sngewsih ban ïoh sngew ne tip ba ka jylla jongngi ka dang duna ïa shibun ki samla kiba la pyndep ha kiwei pat ki kyrdan ha kaba dang don ki kam ba ki briew na ka jylla kim pat lah ban trei ha kaba la hap ban wan na ki briew kiba shabar ka jylla kaba buh ïa ka jingduh jingkyrmen ïa ki khun samla ka jylla.Shano ki polisi treikam ka Sorkar, watla kane ka jylla ka long kaba riewspah ha ka jingdon ïa ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei kiba la ai sngewbha da ka mariang. Haoid ym lah ban len, watla ka jngohkai pyrthei ka la kiew bha ha ka jylla pynban tang khyndiat ngut eh kiba lah ban ïeng ha la ki jong ki kjat. Lah ruh ban ong ba wat lada ka sorkar kam lah ban ai kam aijam ïa baroh ki samla kiba la pyndep ïa ki kyrdan kiba kham shaneng, hynrei ka sorkar ka donkam hi ban shim khia na ka bynta ban thaw ïa ki polisi bapher bapher kaba long shi bynta kum ka jingplie lad plie lynti ïa ki khun samla ha ka ïoh kam ïoh jam.Ryngkat ki Polisi ban pynrungkam ïa ki khun samla la donkam ruh ba ka sorkar kan thaw ruh ïa ki lad jingiarap na ka bynta ki khun samla da kaba ïarap lyngba ki skhim sorkar bapher bapher, khang ba na ka bynta kito ki samla kiba ym donkam donjam ka long ka lad ka kabu ïa ki ba kin lah ban ïeng ha la ki jong ki kjat.Lada phai ruh ha kine ki sngi lah ban kubur ruh ba ka long shisha ki sngi ba la kyrduh ïa ki kam ki jam, hynrei ym lah pat ban len ba dang bun ki kam ki jam ba la hap ban wan trei da ki bar jylla. Kum ka nuksa tang ïa ka kam misteri haba pyntrei ïa kino kino ki kam kiba la kham heh la hap ban wan rah ia ki briew kiba nabar namar shem jingeh ïa ki samla kiba la tbit ban trei wat kum ha kitei ki jaidkam ruh khamtam haba donkam ban trei bad ki kor ki bor ka juk stad mynta.Bun ruh na ki samla ki dang lehraiñ ruh ban trei ïa ki kam kiba kham poh namar ba ki don ka jingsngew ba ka kyrdan kaba ki pule kam ïahap shuh ïa ki kam barit baria. Hynrei bunsien pat ki samla kim juh phohsniew da kaba trei ïa ki kamrit kam ria ruh ka long kawei na ki lad ban aikam ïa ki samla ba kin lah ban ïeng hala ki jong ki kjat.Ka jingkylli ka mih ruh hangne, balei ba ka jylla jongngi ka jyllei da ki mynder ha baroh ki bynta jong ka nongbah Shillong ne wat sha ki jaka nongkongdong, ka daw kaba kongsan ba bunsien ngi ki kum ki samla ngi don ka jinglehrain ban trei ïa ki kam rit kam ria. Bunsien pat lada jyllei ki bar jylla ngi ïa ud bad ngi ïa kynshi kyneh ba ka sorkar kam shim khia ban ïada ïa ki mynder.Khatduh eh, kum ki samla kiba la shai bad kiba la nang la stad ngi dei ban don ïa ki buit ym tang ban shu ïa pyrta ba ym donkam donjam, hynrei ngim dei ban shlur ban trei la ha kino kino ki kam baheh ne barit. Dei tang lada ki samla ki don ïa ka mynsiem ban trei bad ban tip lut ïa baroh ki jaid kam lah ban kyntiew ïa ki khun samla ha ka ïoh kam ïoh jam ne ka long ruh ka lad ba ngin khanglad ïa ki briew kiba nabar kiba thmu ban wan rung sha ka jylla lada kum ki samla ki tip lut ïa baroh ki jaid kam.Lada phai sha baroh kawei ka Jylla Meghalaya, bun ki kam khaïi pateng la bat lakam da ki mynder bad ki bar jylla bad wat ka iewduh, ka Khyndailad kiba long ki ar tylli ki ïew bapawkhmat ka Jylla kiba ju long ka pliangja jong ki trai jylla pynban ki la long mynta ki pliangja pliang doh jong ki bar jylla.
title: Da ki hajar ba pass ha ka shisnem, lah mo ban ai kam sorkar lut??

content: Jowai, Lber 14: Ka All Hynñiewtrep People United Front (AHPUF) kawei na ki seng treimon sngewbha hapoh ka Ri-lum Jaiñtia kala lap ïa kawei Petrol Pump ka bym shem la kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng da ka seng halor ka jingleh thok jong ka ïaki paidbah kiba leit thep umphniang ïa ki kali.Ka seng haka jingkreh sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi na ka liang u Secretary ka seng u bah Chandame Sungoh ula ong hynnin ka sngi ki nongïalam ka seng kila lap dalade ïa kane ka jingleh thok leh shukor jong katei ka Petrol Pump haka por ba leit thep umphniang san (5) liter na katei ka Petrol Pump, hynrei kitei ki nongïalam ka seng kila lap pynban ba ka umphniang ka don tang 3 litar kaba duna haduh 2 litar.Ula pynsngew “na ka dor jong ka Petrol kaba long 97 tyngka tam shi litar, ka jingïoh lute bad ïoh nong jong katei ka Petrol Pump ka jur bha na ki paidbah”.Kane ka jingshah thok jong ki paidbah ba lui lui kala long kumba shah ïuhroit ïa ka hok jong ki kaba kila dep ban siew ïa ka bai umphniang Petrol katkum ka dor ba la buh, ‘katno ka long kaba shaktah jur khamtam ïa kito kiba thep umphniang da ki phew litar bad kane ka long kaba sngewsih eh’ la ong u Chandame.Halor kane ka seng ka buh ka jingkyntu ïa baroh ki trai Petrol Pump kumjuh ïa ki Manager bad ki nongtrei kiba don ha kylleng ka jylla ba kim bit shuh ban leh kum kine ki kam thok kam shukor ïa ki paidbah hynrei ki dei ban pynbiang tik pathik ïa ka umphniang Petrol sha ki nongthied.Na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki paidbah khamtam ïa kito kiba kamai kali Taxi bad Tourist ba kin ym shah ktah shuh, ka seng ka kyntu dei ban pynbiang ïa ka rukom sam umphniang kaba biang ha baroh ki Petrol Pump hapoh ka jylla.Ka seng ka mana kaba tyngeh nangne shakhmat lada ki lap sa shisien kum kine ki rukom lehthok kan ym ai lad satia da kaba ïaid shakhmat da ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Ka seng kan sa phah da ka jingthoh sha ka bor jong ka Metrology Department ba kan jurip bniah ïa kane ka rukom thew bad woh umphniang ha manla ki Petrol Pump hapoh ka jylla, khnang ba kan ym shah ktah ïa kiba bun ba lang.
title: Lap ka AHPUF ba duna litar ka rukom thep umphniang ha Petrol Pump

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 14: Ka long kaba jah burom namar wat hapoh sor ruh ym lah ban trei pyndep kumba dei ban long, katno tam sha ki jaka ba kham kyndong lei. Ka jingkieng ba donkam ha wah Phodthre kaba don hapoh jong ka sor Nongstoiñ, kaba dei ka jingkieng ban pynïasoh ïa ka surok Irrigation sha Mawrusyiar-Tiehsaw, ka la sahkut khlem lah ban shna pyndep ïa ka wat hadien ki 20 snem tam ba la sdang ban shna ïa ka.Kum ban shu pynkyn-maw ba kane ka jingkieng kaba jrong kumba 18.75 metar, la thmu ban shna khnang naduh u snem 2001 shuwa u 2002 u snem ba ka don ka jingïaseng KJP Assembly jong ka Balang Presbyterian ha New Nongstoiñ. Hynrei kaba lyngngoh ka long ba naduh utei hi u snem haduh mynta ym shym la lah ban pyndep shuh bad la ïohi tang ïa uwei u païa ba la shna da u Contractor ruh khlem pyndep shuh.Ka jingbym lah ban pyndep shuh ïa kane ka jingkieng, ka la wanrah ïa u dak jingkylli u ba heh bha na kiba bun ba lang ba hato ka tnad PWD ka leh aiu baroh shikatta ban pyndep ïa kane ka jingkieng na ka bynta ka bit ka biang ki paidbah. Ha ka jingshisha ka dei ka jingkieng kaba donkam haduh katta katta na ka bynta ki paidbah ka sor Nongstoiñ, namar ka dei kaba pynïasoh ïa ka shnong Upper New Nongstoiñ bad ka shnong Tiehsaw.Ka jingdonkam ka long khamtam eh lada don ka jingdheng kali ha Assam oil Petrol Pump shaduh Upper New Nongstoiñ ter ter, lane lada don ka jingdheng kali nadong Spengthaw-langlah sha New Nong-stoiñ, kane ka jingkieng kan ïarap ban pyllait na ka jingsahkut ki kali. Nangta kan ïarap ruh ïa ki khynnah skul kiba dei ïaid lyngba kane ka wah ban kam na shilliang sha shilliang.Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka bynta, u nongthoh khubor haba ïa kren bad u Headman jong ka shnong Tiehsaw Bah Moonshine Dkhar, u la ong ha u snem 2018 u ex MLA ba don burom jong ka Nongstoiñ Bah Mac Millan Byrsat, ha ryngkat u Superintending Engineer bad Executive Engineer jong ka tnad PWD, ki la poi sha ka shnong Tiehsaw na ka bynta ka jingpynbha ia ki surok jong ka sor Nongstoiñ.U la ïathuh ba na ka liang ki bor shnong ruh ki la sakhi lang ïa kata, ha kaba na ka liang u MLA u la kyntu ïa ki heh jong ka tnad PWD, ban buddien ïa ka kam kaba ïa dei bad katei ka jingkieng kaba la shu sahkut khlem lah pyndep shuh da ki phew snem.Hynrei, ka shu long ka jinglyngngoh sha ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ Nongstoiñ, ba haduh mynta ym pat iohi dak ei ei ba la sdang ban trei bad pynbha pat. Kumta na ka liang ki paidbah jong ka sor Nongstoiñ, ki kyntu sha katei ka tnad ba kan sngewbha ban pynsted katba lah ïa ki jingdonkam baroh, namar katei ka jingkieng ka long kaba donkam haduh katta katta na ka bynta ka sor Nongstoiñ baroh kawei.
title: Palat 20 snem shu sahkut ka jingpyntrei ïa ka jingkieng hapoh sor Nongstoiñ

content: Shillong, Lber, 14: Uwei u nongtuh uba ym shym la ithuh durkhmkat satia ha ka step phyrngap sngi Palei ha ka por 3:20 mynstep u la prong tuh ha kawei ka ing ha ka shnong Mawlai Phudmuri, khlem jingsalia wat haba ha phyllaw la pyndait da ka CCTv.Na phyllaw jong kane ka ing, une u nongtuh u la ïoh rong ei ïa u Battery kali bad lyngba ka CCTV la ïohi ba une u runar u la pyrshang shwa ban khynra ïa kiwei pat ki kali hynrei um shym la lah hynrei hadien u la leit rung ha kawei ka kali kamai bad ïoh rong ei ïa u battery kali.U nongñiah jong ka kali ynda u la khie thiah mynstep bad thmu ban leit kamai hynrei haba u la pyrshang ban pynim ïa ka kali kam shym la long satia bad ynda u la peit shapoh u la lap ba u Battery kali u la shah tuh.Kane kan long ruh kum ka khubor sha ki briew kiba ju set kali sha surok ne wat ha iing ba kin da phikir bha shwa ban set khnang ban lait na ka jingshah tuh ki tiar kali namarba ka jingjyllei jong ki nongtuh ha kine ki sngi ka long kaba shyrkhei bha.
title: Dang step phyrngab prong u nongtuh ha Mawlai Phudmawri

content: Ha kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh uwei u nongshong shnong ka RR colony, Rynjah, Shillong u la phah ïa ka jingujor ba ha ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai u la shah phone bunsien ha kaba utei uba phone u la thok ïa u da ka pisa kaba pisa kumba T. 3,55,980/-.
title: Shah thok pisa uwei u Rangbah

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber, 14: Ka National People’s Party (NPP) jong ka Mawkyrwat Block mynta ka sngi ka la ïoh ban pynlong ka jingïalang kaba tang ki nongïalam ha Mawkyrwat ryngkat ka jingkren diang sngewbha ïa ki briew kiba wan rung thymmai na ka Indian National Congress (INC) hapoh ka jingïalam jong u bah Carness Sohshang u MDC ka Mawkyrwat Constituency.Kane ka jingïalang ka long ruh kum shibynta ban pynshai ha ki paidbah nongkyshan jong ka NPP Mawkyrwat Block ba naduh mynta ka sngi hapoh ka NPP ym don shuh shuh ar ngut ki nongïalam kumba ka mih ba ka don ka NPP jong u bah H.S. Diengdoh ne NPP jong u bah Carness Sohshang hynrei mynta ka la don beit tang kawei ka kyrteng.Ka kong M. Ampareen Lyngdoh, Myntri jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka Jylla Meghalaya bad kum ka kyrtong jong ka NPP na Shillong Parliamentary Seat haba kren ha ka jingïalang ka la pynpaw ba lada yn kheiñ lang ïa ki nongkyrshan na ka NPP ba la don lypa bad kiba dang wan na ka INC, ka 12 hajar vote ka la don lypa napoh jong ka Mawkyrwat Constituency bad ïa kane ki da ïateh ruh ïa ka soskular ryngkat ka jingpyni da kaba ki nongkyrshan ki la rah ïa ki kti jong ki. Namarkata, ka la ong ba kaba donkam mynta ka long ba ka jingïatylli jong ki nongkyrshan na kylleng ki shnong ban ai ka vote sha ka NPP ka la biang pura.Ka la ong ruh ba ka jingleit na kawei ka shnong sha kawei pat kam dei eh tang ban kren shaphang ka elekshon, hynrei ka dei ba la i donkam ba ha ka ri Khasi/Jaiñtia ban sei madan ïa kano kano ka kynhun saiñ pyrthei ka ban pynïatylli biang ïa u paidbah haba jia kum ka seng Congress. “Ban long MP kam long kaba suk, mynta nga kaba phong ïa ka juti nga sngewthuh shai haei u prek u dung”, ong ka kong Ampareen bad ka sngewburom pat ba ha kine ki shi bnai shiteng kiba la dep kane ka lynti ïaid jong ka ka la nang ïalam shuh shuh sha ki kyndong ki kynshrot jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat bad haduh 450 tylli ki shnong ka la dep ban rung.“Kat nang mih ki sngi, ka jingkhia jong ka jingkit bad ka jingud jingnam jong u paidbah ka la nang sawa ha nga bad ïa ka kam MP hi lada u ne ka kyrtong kim dei ha juh ka tyllong party kaba bit kaba biang ne ha ka sorkar ka eh ban pynurlong ne weng ïa ki jingeh”, ong ka kong Ampareen. Namarkata, ka la kyrpad ba lada ki paidbah ki pynjop ïa ka NPP lyngba jong ka kum ka kyrtong, kita ki kam pynroi kin sa wan ha ki shnong ki thaw. “Haba nga leit na kawei ka shnong sha kawei pat ngam ju don por ban thnum hynrei nga ïaid beit ban trei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong u paidbah bad ong ba tang da ka jingtrei shitom hi yn lah ban pynpoi sha ka thong jong ka jingjop ym da ka pisa ka ban shu thied.Ka la kren ruh ba ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ha ka jingleit ban ïa kynduh ïa u CM, ka ong, “Phi la kyntu ïa nga ban long ka kyrtong na ka NPP, mano ban peit ïa ki jingeh jong ki paidbah lyngba ki shithi ba ki paidbah ki la phah ban ïoh ki lad jingïarap kiba pher bapher”, ong ka kong Ampareen ïa u Chief Minister bad khlem jingartatien 2 klur 25 lak u CM u la mang pisa na ka bynta ki jingdawa jong ki paidbah.Ka kong Ampareen ha ka jingkren jong ka ka ong ruh ba ka ‘Politics’ hi ka dei ka drama kaba khraw bha, namar kaei kaba ki ïa ju ïa kren ha ki rynsan tip ki da ïa kynmaw ne ki ïoh sngew ïa kaei kaba u thylliej u kren ne lah ban ong ba u thylliej khlem shyieng bad kam dei ban long kumta namar kane ka kam ka dei ka kam kaba kyntang bad lada kwah ban long MP ban leit kren beiñ ïa ki briew kam long ka lynti kaba dei hynrei ka donkam pat ka jingïatylli bad ka jingtrei shitom jong baroh ki nongkyrshan ban pynpoi sha ka thong ïa ki kyrtong.Kiba ïadon lang ha kane ka sngi ki long u bah H.M. Shangpliang, u nongaibuit jong ka tnad pule puthi ka jylla, u bah Kitborlang Nongrem, State President ka NPYF, u bah Hamletson Dohling, Working President jong ka NPP, ka Dr. Jasmin Lyngdoh, State President jong ka NPP Women Committee, u bah Lamphrang Blah, MDC ka Mawphlang Constituency, u bah Pynïaid Syiem, CEM ka KHADC, bad kiwei de.
title: 12 hajar vote ngi la ïoh lypa ha Mawkyrwat lada kheiñ lang ka NPP bad Congress: Dr. Ampareen

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 14: Ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union Narpuh Circle, hynnin ka miet jong ka 13 tarik u lber ki la beh bad ktnong ïa kawei ka bos nigh super bad lap ba katei ka bos ka la rung beit shapoh company Star Cement ha Lumshnong, katei ka bos ka la kit shibun ki briew kiba dei ki bar jylla, hadien ba ki dkhot ka seng ki la tohkit ki la lap ba kitei ki bar jylla ki mut ban leit trei hapoh company star cement khlem da biang ki kot ki sla.Khlem da shim ïa ka aiñ ha kti, ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka KSU Narpuh ki la leit ban aiti noh îa ktei ki bar jylla ha kti ki pulit bad buh ruh da ka ejahar ha Lumshnong Police Station.U President jong ka KSU Narpuh Circle, u bah K.S.Suchiang u la iathuh ba kitei ki hynriewphew ngut bar jylla ki la wan da ka bos night super kaba don u registration number ML 05L7887 bad ong ba kitei ki briew ki wan na Guwahati da kaba thok ïa ki nong ap khyrdop ha Umling check gate bad ong ba kin leit sha Silchar, hynrei hadien ba ka seng ka la ioh jingtip na ki para dkhot kiba na Ri Bhoi bad kumjuh ruh lyngba ki dkhot kiba na Khliehriat Circle, na ka liang ka seng ka la pynap shrip ïa katei ka bos ha surok NH -6 ha lad ban leit sha Amrit cement bad hapdeng ka miet ha ka por kumba 9.30 baje mynmiet ki dkhot ka seng ki la buddien ïa ka bos bad lap ba ka bos ka la rung beit shapoh Company Star Cement ha kaba kiba ap pahara ha ki khyrdop ka Company (Gate-1) ruh ki khlem bat satia ïa ka bos.
