Mar kumta hi ki dkhot jong ka KSU na Narpuh ruh ki la rung lang shapoh Star Cement bad dei hadien ba la iaid lait ïa ka khydop Gate No 1 jong ka Company ki dkhot ki la iohlad ban khang kdong ïa ka bos bad phah hiar ïa baroh kiba shong hapoh bos.“Haba la tohkit bha la shem ba kane ka bos Night supper ka la thok bunsien bad don ruh kiba iathuh ba dang myn ha ka miet jong ka 11 tarik Lber 2024 ruh kane ka juh ka kali (bos) la suba ba kit ïa ki bar jylla, ngi la ap bad peitngor hynrei ngi khlem lap dien namar ym lah shuh ban ap baroh shi miet. kine ki bar jylla ki dei kiba wan na Bihar bad na Assam, hynrei kim don ïa ka Work permit ba kin trei hangne hapoh ka jylla jongngi kumta ngi la leit bad aiti noh ha ki pulit Lumshnong ban leh katkum ki kyndon aiñ bad ruh ban pynphai dien noh ïa ki na ka jaka ba ki wan,” ong u bah K.S.Suchiang.La ong ruh ba na ka liang ka KSU Narpuh Circle, kan iai long peitngor beit ïa ka rung ka mih ki briew kiba na bar jylla bad ki bar ri ruh kumjuh, ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka kyntu ïa ki ba ap ha ki khyrdop talasi mynder bad kiwei kiwei ki khyrdop ruh ba ki dei ban da peit bad bishar bha ïa ki kot ki sla jong ki briew kiba na bar kiba wan rung shapoh ka jylla.
title: Ujor ejahar ka KSU ïa ki bar jylla kiba thmu leit trei ha Company Star Cement khlem ki dulir ba biang

content: Shillong, Lber 14: Ki Pulit ki ïathuh ba kawei ka longkmie ba uwei u bar jylla uba la ithuh kyrteng da u Mohamad Fareed, u la leit ïakynduh ïa ka ba kan long kum ka guarantor na ka bynta jong u ban thied ïa ka kali kaba thymmai bad u la tyrwa ruh ka pisa ïa ka kumba T. 50,000/- halor kane.Hynrei katei ka longkmie kham hadien ka la sngewthuh ba utei uba la shah kynnoh, u la pynbor ïa ka ban soi ïa ki kam kot kam sla ban thied ïa ka Maruti Eeco van kaba thymmai, khlem da batai bniah bha ïa ka.Halor kane kham hadien katei kaba la ujor ka la shah phone napoh ka jaka die kali bad sngewthuh ba ïa katei ka kali la thied hapoh ka kyrteng jong ka khlem da ïathuh ïa ki jingmut.
title: Katba dang long Guarantor shah thok ka longkmie

content: Shillong, Lber 14: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka la kyntiat ïa ka jingkynnoh u Bah Albert Thyrniang ha ka jingthoh jong u kaba u la kynnoh ba ka VPP ka pyndonkam da ka niam ha ki rynsan ialap elekshon.Ka Party lyngba ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Dr. Batskhem Myrboh, Nongaiktien ka Party, ka kwah ban pynpaw ba ka ïa kubur lem bad ka jingsngew ba la pynpaw da u Bah Albert Thyrniang ba ka don ka jingma na ka jingpynïakhleh ïa ka niam bad ka sainhima sima. Hynrei ka long pat kaba bakla ban kynnoh ba ka VPP ka pyndonkam da ka niam kumba leh da ka BJP. U Dr. Batskhem Myrboh ka ong ba kane ka jingkynnoh u Bah Albert jingkynnoh ka mih na ka jingbymsngewthuh bha ïa ka saiñpyrkhat bad ki nongrim ba la ju pynpaw da ka VPP bad ki nongïalam jongka.Ka Seng ka ong ba ym shym la thoh hangno hangno ha ka Riti Pynïaid Kam jong ka VPP ba ka seng ka ïashah ïa kano kano ka niam ne kynhun niam. “Ïa ka VPP la pynshong nongrim ha ka saiñpyrkhat kaba ym don liang bad kano ka niam. Ka VPP kam mynjur ruh ban ong ba ka Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla Khristan bad ngim don jingthmu ruh ban pynbna kumta”, la ong u Dr. Myrboh da kaba bynrap ruh ba kum ki briew ngi ïoh mynsiem na ki kot niam kiba hikai shaphang ka hok bad ka jingshisha ha ka imlang sahlang bad ka saiñhima sima.Ban kynnoh ba ka VPP ka pynkheiñ ïa ka Model Code of Conduct tang namar ba seng ka ju sot na ki kot niam ka dei ka rukom pyrkhat kaba bakla shibun. Wat la katta ruh na ka liang ka Party kam don eiei ban pyrshah ïa ki jingsngew jong ki nongkynnoh.U Nongaiktien ka Seng, u la ong ruh ba kum ka Party, ka kwah ruh ban pynshai ba kam ju pan jingkyrshan na ki paidbah halor ka nongrim jong ka niam lane ban leh shiliang ïa kano kano ka niam hynrei ka ïeng skhem halor ki nongrim jong ka hok ka sot. “Ka VPP ka pdiang ïano ïano ban pynïasoh bad ka seng lada kiba wan pynïasoh ki pdiang ïa ka saiñpyrkhat jong ka synshar khadar kaba khuid bad ruh ban ïada ïa ki hok tynrai jong ki trai ri trai muluk bad ruh da kaba burom lang ïa ki hok jong baroh ki nongshongshnong ka jylla”, la pynkut ka Kyrwoh.
title: Ka long kaba bakla ban kynnoh ba ka VPP ka pyndonkam da ka niam: Dr Batskhem

content: Shillong, Lber, 13: Ka Seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha ka sngi Palei hadien saw sngi ka la kam trai ba ka dei ka kynhun kaba la pynbthei ïa u bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka miet sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ba ladep.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u General secretary cum Publicity Secretary ka HNLC Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ngi shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ka jingpynbthei bom IED ha them metor ha ka miet 9 tarik, Lber. Ka Budnar Shadow Squad (BSS), kaba treikum kum ka Special Forces jong ka HNLC, ka dei kaba la leh ïa kane ka kam. Ka Sorkar MDA bad ka tnat Pulit ki kyndit ba ka kynhun jong ngi ka la leh ïa kane ka kam ha ka jaka ba khlaiñ ka jingpahara. Ngim don jingthmu ban pynmynsaw ïa ki paidbah ne ïa ki mynsiem ba luilui, namarkata ngi la kiar. Ka Sorkar ka dei ban weng ïa ki pulit CRPF na them metor ban pynthikna ïa ka jinglaitluid ka leit ka wan jong ki paid u Hynñiewtrep na kane ka jaka..”“Namar ka jingbym suidniew ba la slem jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban pynkynriah ïa kine ki Harijan na kane ka jaka, ngim don lad shuh da kumwei pat sa tang ban shu pyni da ka bor. Kane ka dei tang ka jingpynkynmaw ba lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban ai jingïada ïa ka jaidbynriew jong ngi, ngi lah ban ïohi ba ka ri Hynñiewtrep ka lah ban poi sha u pud ka thma pohïing. Kano kano ka jaidbynriew kaba buh jingma ïa ka ri Hynñiewtrep kan hap ban mad ïa ka jingeh. Ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynkynriah noh ïa ki hapoh shi bnai ne mad ïa ka jingeh kaba khraw,” la byrngem ka HNLC.“Ki Pulit ki don ha ka thma bad ka jaidbynriew jong ngi, bad ngin ïada ïa la ka jong ka ri bad ïa ki paidbah la ka long ha kano kano ka dur. Haba ngi ïakhun na ka bynta ka daw, jong ka jaidbynriew, kynmaw ba ngim don eiei ban duh. Ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shah pynïaid ïa ki bar jylla bad ki ophisar Pulit Khasi ki shah pynlong kum ki ‘sew beh. Haba u ophisar bar jylla u phah wiar, ki wiar, haba u ong dait, ki dait. Haba u ong kaweh tdong, ki kaweh, haba u ong mih snam, ki mih snam na ka bynta ki bar jylla. Hynrei, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïada ïa ka jaidbynriew Hynñiewtrep na ka jingshah thombor bad ka jingshah pynlong sohpdung ha ka kti jong ki bar jylla, ne ki Pulit bar jylla, kim don bniat ne ka snam ban jaw,” la kynthoh ka HNLC.Haba kynthoh ïa ki arngut ki Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, ka HNLC ka la ong, “ïa u Bah Prestone bad u Bah Sniawbhalang la pyndonkam da ki nongïalam Garo kum u Mukul Sangma bad u Conrad K. Sangma kum ki nongbah saiñpyrthei, nyngkong hapoh ka Congress bad mynta hapoh ka NPP. Ki ïasyriem kum ki kada kit blei thaw ha ka Phawar u Aesop.”“Ngi pdiang ïa ka jingdon kaba la slem bha jong ki jaidbynriew Harijan ha ka ri Hynñiewtrep. Ngim shym la ong ïa phi mih noh na ka ri Hynñiewtrep. Ka jingthmu jong ngi kam dei satia ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngew ïapher ne ka jingpyrshah. Hynrei, ngi kyntu ïa ki jaidbynriew Harijan ban pdiang ïa ka jingpynkynriah sha ka jaka ba la ai da ka Sorkar na ka bynta ki briew jong phi bad mih noh da kaba suk ba saiñ na them metor. Ha ki snem baladep, ngi la siat ïap ïa u para jong phi, u Lal Singh, namarba ki kam runar jong u, kaba la pynmong ïa ka jingsngew jong ki jaidbynriew jong ngi,” la bynrap ka HNLC.“Kane ka dei ka khubor kaba shai ba kino kino ki bar jylla kiba buhai shnong hapoh ka ri Hynñiewtrep, ngi pdiang sngewbha ïa phi ban shong ban sah hangne, hynrei kiar na kaba kam trai ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap jong ngi, ban pyndonkam da ka bor, ban pynibor ne ban pyndom ïa ngi hynrei lym kumta phin mad ïa ka jingap kaba shyrkhei, kumba u nongtuh um lah satia ban long u trai,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: Dei ka Budnar Shadow Squad ka HNLC kaba pynbthei IED ha Them ïewmawlong

content: New Delhi, Lber 14 : Ka High level Committee kaba peit halor ka jingpynlong lang ïa ki elekshon ha kajuh ka por ba la thung hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Ram Nath Kovind, President barim jong ka India, ka la ïakynduh ïa ka President jong ka India, Droupadi Murmu bad aiti ïa ka Kaiphod.Kane ka Kaiphod kaba kynthup haduh 18,626 sla, kadei ka jingmih jong ki jingïamir jingmut bad kito kiba don bynta ha kane ka kam, ki riewshemphang bad ka kam wad bniah kaba 191 sngi, naduh ba la thung ïa ka ha ka 02 tarik Nailur, 2023.Kiwei kiwei ki dkhot jong ka Committee ki kynthup ïa u Myntri ka tnad Kampohiing ka Ri, u Amit Shah, u GhulamNabi Azad, Nongïalam barim jong ka Liang pyrshah ha Rajya Sabha, u N.K. Singh, Chairman barim ka 15th Finance Commission, Dr.Subhash C. Kashyap, Secretary General barim ka Lok Sabha, u Harish Salve, Senior Advocate, bad u Sanjay Kothari, Chief Vigilance Commissioner barim.La donlang ruh naduh u Arjun Ram Meghwal, Myntri Khynnah (Independent Charge) Tnat Law and Justice kum u nongshah khot kyrpang bad Dr.Niten Chandra u long u Secretary jong ka HLC.Ka Committee ka la pynlong ïa ki jingïamir jingmut ban sngewthuh ïa ki jingsngew jong kito kiba don bynta ha kane ka kam.La don haduh 47 tylli ki seng sain pyrthei kiba la aiti ïa ki jingsngew bad ki jingai jingmut jong ki bad na kane 32 tylli ki kyrshan ïa ka jingpynlong elekshon lang ha kajuh ka por.Bun ki seng sain pyrthei ki la pynlong ki jingïamir jingmut bad ka HLC halor kane ka phang. Hadien ka jingpynbna paidbah ba la pyllait ha ki kot khubor ha baroh ki jylla bad ki Union territory, 21,558 tylli ki jubab kidei kiba la ïoh pdiang na ki briew jong ka ri. Na kine haduh 80 per cent kiba jubab ki kyrshan ïa ka jingpynlon gelekshon ha kajuh ka por.La khot sngewbha ruh da ka Komiti ïa ki riewshemphang ha ka ain kum saw ngut ki Chief Justice ba rim jong ka India, phra ngut ki State Election Commissioner bad Chairman, Law Commission of India ban ïakren halor kane ka kam. La twad jingmut ruh na ka Election Commission jong ka ri India.La khot ruh ïa ki kynhun kiba trei ha ki kam khaii pateng kum ka CII, FICCI, ASSOCHAM bad ki riewshemphang ha ki kam ka ïoh ka kot ba kin ai jingmut halor ka jingktah ïa ka ïoh ka kot lada pynlong elekshon lang ha kajuh ka por. Ki la ong ba kane ka long kaba donkam na ka bynta ka ïoh ka kot namar ka jingpynlong elekshon ha ki por bapher bapher ka wanrah ïa ka jingkiew dor ki mar bad ka jingsuki jong ka ïoh ka kot. Kine ki kynhun ki la ong ïa ka Komiti ba ka jingpynlongelekshon na ka por sha ka por ka ktah ïa ka jingkiew ka ïoh ka kot, ka jingpynlut pisa na ka bynta ki paidbah, ka pule puthi bad ka ktah ruh ïa ka shongsuk shongsain ha ka imlang sahlang.Hadien ka jingpyrkhat jylliew shaphang kine ki jingai jingmut bad ki jingsngew, ka Komiti ka la ai jingmut ïa ka rukom treikam kaba ar bynta ban ïalam sha ka jingpynlong lang ïa ka elekshon ha kajuh ka por. Kum ka sienjam ba nyngkong, yn pynlong elekshon lang na ka bynta ka Iing Dorbar Thaw ain jong ki paidbah bad ki Iing dorbar Thaw Ain jong ki Jylla.Ha ka sienjam kaba ar, yn pynïahap lang ïa ki elekshon na ka bynta ki Municipality bad ki Panchayat ha kajuh ka por bad kine ki Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain ha ka rukom ba ki elekshon jong ki Municipality bad ki Panchayat kin long hapoh shispah sngi hadien ba la pynlong ïa ki elekshon na ka bynta ka Iing Dorbar Thaw ain jong ki paidbah bad ki Iing dorbar Thaw Ain jong ki Jylla.Ka Komiti ka la ai jingmut ruh ba ka dei ban don tang kawei ka electoral roll bad ki Electoral Photo Identity Card (EPIC) ban pyndonkam ha ki elekshon na ka bynta ki lai kyrdan jong ka Sorkar.Katkum ka kam jong ka ban peit ïa ki rukom pyntreikam na ka bynta ka jingpynlong lang ïa ki elekshon ha kajuh ka por, bad da kaba kynmaw ïa ka jinglong jong ka Riti Synshar, ka Komiti ka la ai ïa ki jingmut jong ka ha ka rukom ba ïahap bad ka jinglong jong ka Riti Synshar jong ka India bad ha ka rukom ba donkam tang katto katne ki jingpynkylla ïa ka Riti Synshar.Hadien ki jingïamir jingmut, ka Komiti ka la ong ba baroh ki jingai jingmut jong ka kin kyntiew ïa ka jingshai, ka jingai bynta lang ïa baroh, ka jingshaniah bad ka jingsuk jong ki nongthep vote. Ka jingkyrshan kaba pura na ka bynta ka jingpynlong lang ïa ka elekshon ha kajuh ka por kan kyntiew ïa ki kam na ka bynta ka roi ka par bad ka jingïaid ryntih ka imlang sahlang, pynskhem ïa ka nongrim jong ka synsha rpaidbah, bad pynurlong ïa ki jing thmu jong ka India kaba long ka Bharat.Ïa ka kaiphod ba pura lah ban ïoh ha ka: onoe.gov.in/HLC-Report.Shon hangne ban ïoh ïa ka: Kaiphod ha ka ktien phareng (https://onoe.gov.in/HLC-Report-en#flipbook-df_manual_book/1/), Kaiphod ha ka ktien Hindi (https://onoe.gov.in/HLC-Report-hi#flipbook-df_manual_book/1/), Flyer English, Flyer Hindi, FAQs.(PIB)
title: Bun ki party ba kyrshan ban pynlong elekshon ha kajuh ka por ha baroh kawei ka Ri

content: Shillong, Lber 15: Ka kynhun ïalehkai Shillong Lajong FC kan sa ïakhun biang ïa ka lympung I-League mynta ka sngi ka ban long shabar nala ïing pyrshah ïa ka Namdhari FC ha ka por 3:30 baje nohphaisngi ha Bhaini Sahib Stadium, Ludhiana.Ka Lajong kan jam sha kane ka jingïakhun hadien ba ïakhaid mar kawei bad ka Real Kashmir FC dang shen hala ïing. Ka kynhun ka don mynta ha ka thup kyrdan ba 6 ha ka miej ryngkat ki 30 point ba ka la khur na ki 19 sien ïakhun ba kynthup 8 sien namjop, 6 sien ïakhaid, bad rem san sien.Katba ka Namdhari ka shong ha ka kyrdan ba 11 ryngkat ki 19 point ba la khur na ki 20 sien ïakhun (5 jop: 4 ïakhaid: 11 rem).Kumba ka paw ka Lajong ka don jingkyrmen ban khur pura ïa ki lai point na kane ka jingïakhun, hynrei kan nym long kaba suk ïa ka kynhun namar kan hap ban ïalehkai shabar nala ïing ha kaba baroh ar kin ïaknieh ban khur shalade ïa ki lai point ban kyntiew kyrdan ïalade ha ka miej kheiñ point ka lympung I-League mynta ka samoi.
title: Mynta ka sngi yn aireng ka Shillong Lajong ïa ka Namdhari FC ha ka lympung I-League

content: Shillong, Lber 15: Ka kynhun ki nongïalehkai ka jylla hapoh ka lama jong ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association mynta ka sngi kin mih na nongbah Shillong ban leit ïakhun sha ka lympung ïakop kaba la tip da ka 3rd North East Games ka ban long ha Nagaland naduh 18 tarik haduh 23 tarik mynta u Lber 2024.Ha kane ka kynti ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) ka la sei haduh 249 ngut ki nongïalehkai (athlete) kynthup bad ki nongïalam ban ïashimbynta ha ki 14 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai (discipline) ha katei ka North East Games kaba lai ha Nagaland.Na ki 15 tylli ki jingïalehkai ba ka Nagaland kan pynlong ka Meghalaya kan nym shimbynta tang ïa ka sepak takraw (kick volleyball).Shuwa ba kitei ki nongïalehkai ryngkat bad ki nongïalam kin mih na jylla ban leit sha Nagaland, na ka liang jong ka MSOA ha ryngkat bad ka tnat ïalehkai jong ka Sorkar jylla ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram kitbok kitrwiang khadduh ban ai mynsiem ïa ki samla ka jylla ba la pynlong ha madan First Ground, Polo, hynne ka sngi.Ha kane ka sngi la ïadonryngkatlang ka Kong Isawanda Laloo-Director of Sports & Youth Affair kum ka Kongsan, u Working President ka MSOA -Bah John F Kharshiïing, u General Sec. ka MSOA- Bah Finely Pariat, ki coach bad ki manager lem bad ki khynnah ïalehkai ki ban mihkhmat ïa ka jylla sha katei ka North East Games, lem bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Na ka liang jong ka Kongsan ka la kyntu ïa ki nongïalehkai ba kin trei shitom bad lehkai khambha shuh shuh ban kyntiew lai shah ïa ka jingkhur takma na kane ka lympung ba ladep snem 2022 kaba la long ha jylla.Ka Kong Isawanda ka la pynpaw ruh ba man ki nongïalehkai ki ban ïashimbynta ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher ki la pynkhreh bha ïalade shuwa ba kin leit ïakhun sha kane ka lympung bad ngeit skhem ba kin wanrah nam ïa ka jylla da kaba khur shibun ki takma.Kumban shu pynkynmaw, palat 3,000 ngut ki nongïalehkai (athlete) kiba la wan ïashimbynta ha ka North East Olympic Games 2022 ha Meghalaya, bad 18 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai (discipline). Ka Manipur ka la long ka lahduh da kaba khur haduh 237 tylli ki takma, bad 85 tylli ki dei ki takma ksiar. Katba ka jylla ka la wan kyrdan ba saw bad ïoh khur 149 tylli ki takma ba kynthup 36 ki ksiar, 35 rupa bad 78 tylli ki rnong.Hynrei ha kane ka kynti, ka North East Games ka kynthup tang 15 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai (Discipline) bad kine ki long Archery, Athletics, Badminton, Basketball, Boxing, Football, Lawn Tennis, Pencak Silat, Sepak Takraw, Table Tennis, Taekwondo, Volleyball, Belt Wrestling, Wrestling bad ka Wushu.Ka jylla kan ïashimbynta 14 tylli ki rynsan ïakop lait noh ka sepak takraw (kick volleyball) ha kane ka 3rd North East Games ha Nagaland.
title: Khmihlynti ka jylla ban khur kham bun ki takma na ka North East Games ha Nagaland

content: Shillong, Lber 15: Ka kynhun ïalehkai kriket jong ka Nongmensong CC ka la lah ban pynliem ïa ka Sunrise CC da 7 wicket ha ka jingïalehkai kaba la long hynne ka sngi ha ka lympung Shillong Cricket League Super Division 2024. Ha kane ka jingïalehkai u Arpit jong ka Nongmensong CC u la lah ban tyngshaiñ bha ïalade hadien ba u la khyrwit palat ïa ka spah ron ban ïarap ïa ka kynhun ban jop suk da 7 wicket.Haba phai sha kane ka jingïalehkai, ka Sunrise CC ka jied ban tied nyngkong hadien ba jop ïa ka toss. Haba shimti ïa ka pali tied nyngkong kane ka kynhun ka la kynjoh 181 ron shuwa ba baroh 10 ngut kin shah pynkhyllem noh hadien 39.2 over.Ki rangtied kiba la ïoh kamai bun ron ïa ka kynhun ki long u Manish Sangam (51 ron naki 66 bol) bad u Krishna Chettri (30 ron naki 29 bol).Haba phai sha ki rangkawangbol ka Nongmensong CC kiba seisoh ki kynthup ïa u Raghav Magotra u ba la kawang 7 over, shah tied 17 ron bad khur 3 wicket, katba u Anish Charak u la pyndep 9 over, shah tied 27 ron bad khur 3 wicket.Haba pyrshang ban beh ïa katei ka thong ba la buh, ka Nongmensong ka la lah ban pyndep tang hadien 26.4 over bad shah pynhap tang 3 ngut ban kynjoh pura sha ka 183 ron bad jop ïa ka jingïalehkai da 7 wicket.U Pawan Kumar Singh (6 over: shah tied 18 ron: khur 1 wicket) bad u Prince Thakur (4.4 over: shah tied 23 ron: khur 1wicket) rangkawangbol ka Sunrise CC ki la ïoh ban pynhap mar u wei hynrei kane kam pat biang ban pyllait ïa ka kynhun na ka namrem.Haba phai sha ki rangtied ka kynhun ba khur jingjop, u Manish Rai u la tied 30 ron naki 38 bol, bad ka namtam ka long sha u Arpit u ba la khyrwit haduh 123 ron naki 99 bol bad ban khur syndon ïa ka khusnam Player of the match.
title: Lyngba ka spah ron u Arpit khur jingjop ka Nongmensong

content: Nongpoh, Lber 15: U Director ka tnad Urban Affairs jong ka sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah E. Kharmalki mynta ka sngi u la leit ban plie ïa mawnongrim na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka jaka pynieng kali paidbah ha ka phyllaw ka Nongpoh Town Shopping Complex ha Ri Bhoi District.Haba leit ban plie ïa u mawnongrim la shim bynta lang ruh da u President ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri Bhoi District, u Bah B.B Makdoh kum u symbut kongsan bad la sakhi lang ruh da ka jingdon lang u Bah S. Langstieh District Urban Officer ka Ri Bhoi, u Bah Rayonald Kharkamni, Secretary ka Nongpoh Town Committee, ki rangbah shnong bad ki riew rangbah. Ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u Bah S.F Lyngdoh uba dei u Charman ka Nongpoh Town Committee.Kum ban pynpaw, ka sorkar Meghalaya lyngba ka tnad Urba Affairs ka la mang haduh T. 10 lak tyngka ban tei ïa katei ka jaka pynïeng kali paidbah ha khmat ka Nongpoh Town Shopping Complex ha Nongpoh.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi, u Bah E. Kharmalki u la ai jingïaroh ïa ka Nongpoh Town Committee ba dei lyngba ka jingshim khia ka town Committee ba ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad Urban Affair ka la mang ïa katei ka song pisa na ka bynta ban tei ïa katei ka jaka pynieng kali ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah ha katei ka iew ha Nongpoh. U la ong ruh ba ka tnad Urban affair ka la shim khia bha ban peit ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki paidbah ha ki jaka sor bad kumba long mynta ka tnad urban affair ka la thaw ruh ki lad ki lynti ban wan rah ïa ki jaka thang briew (crematorium) ban pynduna ïa ki jingjaboh bad jingpynjot mariang bad ha kajuh ka por ruh ka tnad urban affair kan shim khia ruh ban buddien ïa ki jaka theh ñiut (Solid Waste Management) ha baroh ki district jong ka jylla.Shuh shuh, u la kyntu ruh ban urlong shibun ki kam ai jingmyntoi la ki dei ha ki jaka sorkar ne ha ki jaka nongkyndong donkam ban don ka jingïatrei lang na baroh ki liang khamtam ki nongïalam shnong bad ki riew rangbah ka jylla, u la bynrap.
title: Plie u Director Urban Affair ïa u mawnongrim ban tei ïa ka jaka pynïeng kali ha Nongpoh

content: Man la u snem kata ha u Bnai Lber haduh Iaiong la ju ïohi ba ki skul naduh sor haduh nongkyndong ki ju bunkam ban pynlong ïa ki tamasa ïalehkai ba harukom. Hynrei ka jingkylli kaba mih ka long ba watla ki dei ki lympung ki long man u snem hynrei katno ngut eh ki samla ïalehkai ba pawnam ba ka jylla ka ïoh ban sei.Kawei pat ka jingkylli ka long ba la ka tnad ïalehkai jong ka sorkar Jylla ka la ju snohkti lang bad kitei ki rynsan ïalehkai jong ki skul. Lada ka jubab kadei haoid, kiei ki jingkyrshan kiba ka ai sha kitei ki skul bad katno ngut ki rang bad ki thei kynsai kiba tbit ba ka la dep ban jied.Ym lah ban len, lada ka tnad ïalehkai jong ka sorkar hi ka shimkhia, da kaba phah ïa ki coach kiban leit shim bynta lang ha kitei ki tamasa ïalehkai jong ki skul, lehse bun ki skul kin ïoh ban sei ki nongïalehkai kiba tbit kiba lah pat ban mihkhmat ïa ka jylla ha ki lympung ïalehkai bapher bapher. Hynrei sngewsih imat katei kam don satia haka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ka tnad.Lah ruh ban ong ba ka jingpynlong ïa kitei ki tamasa ïalehkai man ka snem ki shu kut beit tang ha kito ki skul hi namar ym don ki briew naka tnad kiba leit ban peit lane ban jied bad buh kyrteng ïa ki nongïalehkai kiba tbit. Kumta kane ka ïai bteng na uwei u snem sha uwei pat bad kumta kito kiba tbit ki shu kut beit tang ha ka jingdeng medal rong stem ryngkat ka syrnod khlem da poi pat shaei shaei.Ka la dei ka por ba ka tnad ïalehkai jong ka sorkar jylla ba kan kyndit bynriew noh naduh mynta khnang ba ka jylla kaba dang sahdien bha ha kane ka phang kan ïoh ban pynkhreh khambha na ka bynta ki lympung ïalehkai kiba harukom la ka long ha ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi jong ka Ri kumba ju tip kum ka North East Games lane ki National Games.Ka por ka dang biang ïa ka tnad ba kan kyndit thiah. Kam dei satia ka kam kaba eh ïa ka, lada ki district sports officer ki lah ban trei ïa ka kam da ka jingkitkhlieh ka jylla hi ka lah bansei bun ki rang bad ki thei ïalehkai ba kynsai.Kawei ruh kam don jingeh ei ei ïa ki ophisar ka tnad ban leit kum ki nongpeit kai ha ka sngi ba kitei ki lympung ïalehkai ki don. Dei lyngba kitei ki rynsan ïalehkai ba ki lah ban jied kino kiba khlaiñ ha ka ïakob mareh 100, 200 ne ki jingïakob mareh jngai. Ki lah ruh ban jied ïa kito kiba khlaiñ ha ka long jump, high jump ne ha kiwei pat ki jingïalehkai. Lada ki lah ban jied tang kumba lai ngut na man kawei pa kawei ka jait jingïalehkai na kawei kawei ka skul, lehse ka tnad kan ïoh pahuh bha ki nongïalehkai bad da kaba leh kumtei, kan lum lang pat ïa baroh kitei ki khynnah skul ban pynïakob pat hapdeng para ma ki khnang ba kan ïoh sa tang ïa kiba kynsai tam.Kawei pat ka bynta ba ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad kadei ban leh, ka long ban kyrshan pisa ne ai ïa kita ki scholarship ïa kito kiba ka jied ban shah pyntbit kyrpang kumba long lem ha kiwei ki jylla kumba lamkhmat da ka Manipur. Lada ka lah ban leh kumta, lehse tang hapoh san snem ka Meghalaya kan kylla long kawei na ki jylla kaba lah ban pynmih bun bha ki nongïalehkai kiba kynsai ha ka Ri.Kumba long haduh mynta, jan ha baroh ki jait jingïalehkai ha ka Ri, ki samla Manipur kidei ban don beit namar kitei ki la ïoh ïa ka tynrai naduh na la iing bad kumta kam shem jingeh shuh ïa ki ban ïakhun ha kino kino ki lympung. Ym tang katta dei kitei ki samla kiba wan na ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi jong ka Ri kiba paw khmat eh ha man la ki lympung ïalehkai ba ka Ri ka pynlong.Ka por ka dang biang palat bad lada ka kyndit thiah noh mynta,lada ka sorkar ka kwah ban shim khia ban kyntiew ïa ka kam ïalehkai sport ka la dei ruh ban seng da kawei ka skul kaba kyrpang ban ai jinghikai ïa ki samla lehse kiba ka la jied kyrpang na ki skul badpher bapher ba kin don noh ha katei ka skul ban ai jinghikai ïa ki naduh ka jingpule haduh ki kam ïalehkai sport bad lada ka sorkar ka leh kumne khlem artatien ka lah ban sei bun ki samla kiba la tbit bad kiba la paw ha kiba bun ki liang.
title: Hato ka tnad ïalehkai sport ka shim khia ban leit jngoh bad jied ïa ki rang bad thei ïalehkai na ki skul ?

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 15: Ka Seng Samla Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien (SSKLM&LN) ka pynpaw ka jingsngewdiaw kaba khraw bad ka jingpyrshah jur halor ka rai kaba la rai ha ka jingïalang hapdeng jong ka Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Kur Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien kaba la long ha ka 9 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024, ha ïing ka kong Bandaplin Lyngdoh Umiong, ban ïa pynbeit ïa ki kam jong ka kur ba la mih ar tylli ki kyrteng kur, kata ka long ka Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Kur Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien kumba la bthah na ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) shithi No. DCXXVII/Gen1/6/2023/9, dated: Shillong The: 28 tarik u Jylliew (July) 2023. Namur na ka liang jong ka KHADC ka sngewthuh ba ka Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Kur Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ka dei kajuh bad ki dei shipara.Namarkata, halor kane ka kam ka la don ka jingïapynbeit ar sien, hynrei kam shym la seisoh bad dei ha ka jingïapynbeit kaba khadduh kata ha ka 9 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024, ki kñi jong ngi ki la shim ïa ka rai ban ïa-tait kur noh shi syndon. Hooid, ka la don ka jingpynssngew na ki dkhot jong ka Kur khamtam na ki samla jong baroh ar kur ba kin shu ïateh kur noh, ba ka Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Kur Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ka dei kajuh namar ha ka jingkular naduh ki tymmen jong ki mynshwa ki la sngew skhem ha la ka jong ka jong ka Nongrim, hynrei kim shym la sngap bad ka jingïalang ka la shu wai noh, kumta khlem da ïa saiñ ne shon kti bad ki la ïa pher noh ha la ka jong ka jong.Shuh shuh la ong ba na ka liang jong ki katto katne ki bym kwah ban ïa-tait kur khamtam ki samla jong baroh ar kur ki la mih da ka jingsngewsih kthang na ka jingialang, namar ban ïa-tait kur noh ïa la u para, u hymem, u kñi bad ki ‘mei-san ‘mei-nah ki sngew ba ka long kaba sang kaba ma bed ka bym lah ban pdiang ruh ha ka inilang sahlang.Namarkata, halor kane ka kam na ka liang Seng Samla Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ki la ïa shong pyrkhat kyrkieh ha ka 12 tarik bnai Lber, 2024 ha Nonglyngkien bad ka la rai ba da lei lei ngi kum ki samla ngin nym lah ban pdiang ïa kane ka jingïatait kur kaba la rai da ki kñi jong ngi ha ka 9 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024.Hynrei ngi nang tehsong nangne shakhmat ïa baroh ki ar kur kum ki shipara haduh ki sngi jong ka jingïap. Khnang ba kan nym wan jia ka nem sniew hapoh jong ka kur bad ban nym jia ka shongsang shongma hapoh jong kine ki ar ku hadien habud. Haba don kino kino ki kam hapoh jong kine ki ar kur ngin ïa long kawei bad ïa ki bat ki bynta jong ka kur ba la buh da u longshwa manshwa ruh kin long kumjuh.Ka Seng Samla Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ka la kyntu ruh ïa baroh ar ngut ki kñi kata ïa u bah Railing Lyngdoh Umiong bad u bah Dmikstar Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ba kim dei ban leh shongshit kat ïa ka kam jong ka kur tang ban myntoi shimet haduh ban ïa-tait noh ïa ki para kur para jait, hynrei ki dei ban long ka nuksa kaba bha ban tehsong ïa ki para kur para jait khnang ba kan long ka jingkyrhu ïa ki longdien mandien jong ka kur.Ka Seng Samla Kur ka la kyntu ruh ïa baroh ar ngut ki kñi ba kim dei ban pynsngap than ïa ki jingpyshoi ne pyntieng koh tympan jong ki briew ba nabar, ba lada kin ai ïa kata ka jait Lyngdoh Umiong ne Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien kin duh ïa ka jinglong trai ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap hapoh ka Ri Khaiñ. Hynrei ki dei ban buh ha khmat ïa ka kam jong ka kur, namar ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap dang lah ban thied sha kiwei kiwei ki jaka hynrei ïa ki para kur para jait kim nym lah ban thied. Uba nabar un nym lah ban tuklar ïa ka kam kur jong ngi bad u dei ban lehraiñ hi ban wan tuklar ïa ki kam kur kam jait jong kiwei. Kaba kongsan ki dei ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh kum ki rangbah ban tehsong ïa baroh ar kur khnang ban wanrah noh ïa ka jingsuk hapoh ka kur bad hapoh ka Ri Khaiñ.Ka Seng Samla Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien sa shisien ka ïai ban ba kat bym pat lah ban tehsong ïa ki hi ar tylli ki kur, ïan iai long ka dieng-pynkiang ïa baroh arngut ki kñi haba ma ki ki pyntreikam ïa ka kam jong ka kur bad ïa ka Ri Khaiñ lait noh ïa ki kam shimet jong ki. Namar kum ki samla ki tip shai ba ka Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ki dei shipara bad ki dei ki juh.Ka Seng Samla Lyngdoh Umiong bad Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ka kyrpad ruh ïa ki bor ba dei khmieh ïa kine ki kam kur kam khaiñ la ka long ïa ka ophis jong u Syiem Maharam Syiem Ship, ka District Administration jong ka South West Khasi Hills District bad ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ba kim dei ban pdiang ïa kino kino ki jingtreikam jong ka kur Lyngdoh Umiong ne Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ne Shiphew Kur (kaba ngi la ujor ha u Executive Member (Elaka) ïa ka jingïateh soskular u kñi na ka kur Lyngdoh Umiong, hapoh ka Ri Khaiñ Nonglyngkien, katba ym pat lah ban ïa pynbeit ïa kine ki kam kur, khnang ba kan nym wanrah ïa ka jingkulmar hapoh jong ka kur bad ka Ri Khaiñ hi baroh.Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh khubor ba la phah da u Pynkmenlin Lyngdoh, President, bad u bah Wanpyndap Lyngdoh, General Secretary jong ka Seng Samla Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad Seng Samla Kur Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien.
title: Ka Kur Lyngdoh Umiong bad ka Kur Lyngdoh Nonglyngkien ki dei ka juh: SSKLM&LN

content: Nongpoh, Lber 15: Ka All India Children’s Educational e-Content Competition (AICEeCC) kaba dei ka jingïakop thoh katkum ka juk stad ba mynta naka bynta ban dang pynïar shuh shuh ïakajingtip sha ki khynnah bad ki samla pule kala sdang mynta ka sngi ha North East Regional Institute of Education (NERIE) Umiam bad ïa katei ka jingïakop la pynlong da ka Central Institute of Educational Technology (CIET), NCERT, Delhi.Ïa katei ka jingïakop ba 2 sngi lynter la wan ban plie paidbah u Prof. PS Shukla Vice Chancellor ka NEHU kum u kongsan, haka jingdonlang u Prof. Amarendra Behara Jt. Director ka CIET, NCERT, Prof. F.G Dkhar Principal ka NERIE bad kiwei kiwei ki khraw pyrkhat, ki nongwad bñiah, ki nonghikai na kylleng ki jaka jong ka ri.Haba kren maitphang ha katei ka sngi u Prof. Amarendra Behara Jt. Director ka CIET, NCERT, u la ong ba ka thong jong katei ka jingïakop ka long ban nang pynïar ïaka jingnang ka jingtip bad ka jinghikai lyngba ka juk stad kaba mynta bala shim bynta da ki khynnah, ki nonghikai, ki khraw pyrkhat ban wanrah ki jingkylla haka liang ka pule ka puthi.U Prof. PS Shukla kum u kongsan haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la pynpaw ba ki nonghikai ki dei ki nongtei ïaka ri bad kane ka rukom pynïar ïaka jingnang jingtip lyngba ki rukom pyrkhat bapher bapher kan wanrah ka jingkylla haka liang ka pule ka puthi bad khamtam ka pynkylla ïaka pyrkhat pyrdaiñ bad ka jingstad jong ki samla pule ha kane ka juk ba mynta ba ki samla pule ki lah ban pyndonkam ïaki jingthoh (content) lyngba ki kor internet.U la kyrpad ruh sha ki samla pule ba kin pyndonkam hok ïaka jingstad ka jong ki haka rukom kaba dei bad ban pyndonkam ïa ki e-content, ka ban long ruh kum ka jingmih bujli ïaki nonghikai ha kane ka juk stad kaba mynta bad kane hi kan wanrah shibun ki jingkylla haka liang ka pule ka puthi bad ka jingnang jingtip jong ki samla pule.
title: Sdang ka AICEeCC ha NERIE Umiam, angnud ban pynïar jingtip sha ki khynnah katkum ka juk stad mynta

content: Jowai, Lber 14: Ka seng samla jong ka National People Youth Front (NPYF) 1-Nartiang Constituency kala ai ka jingkyrshan pisa ïaka prokram ai jingsumar khmat ei ïa ki samla pule ne ka ‘Free Eye Check up Camp’, bala khot pynlong da ka West Jaiñtia Hills District Adventure Sports and Mountaineering Club (WJHDAS&MC) ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Mission Nethralaya Eye Care Center, Shillong bad ka Kiang Nangbah Govt. College Student Union.Ïa kane ka jingai jingsumar khmat ei ïa ki samla pule la pynlong ha Kiang Nangbah Govt. College Indoor Sports Halls kaba la sdang naduh hynnin ka sngi 14 tarik bad pynkut mynta ka sngi 15 tarik u Lber, 2024 baroh ki nong ïoh jingsumar khmat ki don haduh 600 ngut ki samla pule bad ki nongtrei ka College.U President ka West Jaiñtia Hills District Adventure Sports and Mountaineering Club samla Sambor Surong haka jingkren sha ki lad pathai khubor ula ong ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïa kane ka ‘Free eye Check up Camp’ ka long kyrpang eh na ka bynta ki samla pule kiba wan na ka longïing ba duk, kaba long ruh shi bynta na ka jingdap saw snem jong ka Club naduh ba la seng ïa ka ha u snem 2020.U samla Sambor ula pynshai na ka bynta kito kiba don ïa ka BPL Card yn ai jingsumar ei khlem jingsiew, katba ïa kito ki bym don Card BPL kin hap shim kumba 30 present bad kane ka jingai jingsumar kan dang ïaibteng ha kylleng ki jaka bad kumjuh ruh sha ki bynta ka West bad East Jaiñtia Hills.Shuh shuh ula ïathuh haka por ba sdang ïa kane ka kam ka long kaba eh bha ïa u khamtam ha ka liang ka pisa pilaiñ hynrei dei da ka jingïarap u Blei la lah ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa kane ka kam ba bha jong ka Club, da ka jingwan shakhmat ka seng samla jong ka National People Youth Front 1-Nartiang Constituency mynta ka kynti ban ai jingkyrshan, la ong u samla Sambor Surong.Katba u President ka KNGCSU u samla Evermore Rymbai ula pynpaw ka jingai khublei kyrpang ïa kane ka West Jaiñtia Hills District Adventure Sports and Mountaineering Club kaba la shim ïa kane ka bynta kaba donkam eh ban ai jingïarap ïa ki samla pule kiba donkam jingïarap ha ka bor ïohi bad kane kala long kaba jop da ka jingïarap ka Principal jong ka College kaba la ai jingbit ban pynlong ïa ka Prokram.Ula pynsngew kum ki samla pule ki donkam bha ban ïoh ïa ka bor ïohi kaba biang na ka bynta ka pule puthi kaba kham shakhmat.Shuh shuh ula pynsngew ba ka College mynta kala sdang ban wan ha ka jingkylla da ka jingwan hiar jurip jong u symbud myntri rangbha ka jylla ma Sniawbhalang Dhar dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi, ha kaba la sakhi ïa ki Footpath ban poi sha College bad ki phyllaw la sdang ban shna ïa ki bad kynmen ba kine ki kam kin long kiba ïaid beit ïait ryntih da ka jingïarap jong kane ka sorkar kaba mynta.Kum u President u buh ka jingkyntu ïa baroh ki samla pule ba kin buh ha ka jingduwai na ka bynta kane ka sorkar ba kan trei khambha shuh shuh na ka bynta ka College, ha ka juh ka por u khot ïa baroh ban don ka jingïatrei lang ha kino kino ki kam khnang ba kin long kiba jop.
title: Kyrshan ka NPP Youth Front 1- Nartiang ïaka jingai sumar khmat ei ha Kiang Nangbah Govt. College

content: Shillong, Lber 15: Ha kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba u Company Commander A-Coy, 193 Bn., BSF, BOP Karaigora (SWKH) u la phah ka jingujor ba ha ka 29 tarik u Rymphang ha ka por kumba 7.45 baje mynmied, ki shipai BSF kiba don ha ka kamram ki la lap kawei kaba don 1,581 tylli ka pisa India kaba don da ki kot T. 500 kiba la poi kumba T. 7,90,500.
title: Lap song pisa ki BSF ba shongdor T. 7 lak tam

content: Shillong, Lber 15: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ka la phah da ka shithi sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma da kaba pynpaw ha kaba nyngkong ïa ka jingai khublei ba ka sorkar ka la kyntiew ïa ka rta thep kam na ka 27 snem sha ka 32 snem ka rta ha kaba 32 snem ka rta shaduh ka 37 snem na ka bynta ki Schedule Tribe, na ka ban thung kam ïa kiba aplai kam ha kiba bun jait ki kam ha ki tnat sorkar bapher bapher.Ka la ong ba kane ka la plie ïa ka jingkhang ha ka ïoh kam ïohjam na ka bynta ki samla jong ka jylla ha ka por ba ka la don ka jingduna bha ha ka ïohkam ïohjam ha ka jylla manla ka sngi. “Ngi ai khublei ïa ka sorkar na ka bynta kane ka jingjop kaba la long ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki samla kiba dang wad kam ha ka jylla. Ngi ai khublei ruh ïa ka jinglah ka sorkar ban shimkam sted ïa ki kam kiba pyrshah ïa ka umlang sahlang ha kine ki sngi ba la leit,” ong u President ka HITO u Bah Donbok Dkhar ha ka shithi.Na ka liang ka seng ha ka shithi ne ka dorkhas kaba la aiti sha u Myntri Rangbah ka la kyrpad ban kyntiew ïa ka rta jong ki samla kiba aplai ïa ki kam pulit kiba thylli ha ki shnat bapher bapher jong ka Meghalaya Police.“Ngi kyntu ïa ka jingbha jong phi ban pyrkhat ruh ïa ka jingjia jong ka jingsar ka khlam COVID 19 bad ka Lockdown kaba la pynsangeh ïa ka jingthung kam bad ban ïaleh ïa ki eksam bad ban khmih ïa ka jingdonkam kiba aplai kam pulit, kaba la khang lad ïa kiba bun kiba kwah thep kam ban duh ban thep ïa ki kam pulit kiba lait thylli ha kiba bun ki shnat jong ka tnat Pulit da ka daw ka jingkut ka rta kaba la ktah ïa kiba wad kam khlem da la bakla hi dalade,” ong ka HITO.Ka seng ka la pynpaw ba lyngba ka advertisement notification (dated 6 March 2024) kaba la pyllait da ka Office jong u Inspector General of Police cum Chairman, Central recruitment board, ka sorkar Meghalaya, la pynbna ba ki la don 76 tylli ki kam kiba lait thylli hapoh ka kam UB Sub Inspector, 720 tylli hapoh ka Unarmed Branch Constable, 195 tylli ki kam kiba lait ha ka kam Fireman.La pynbna ruh ba ki la don 53 tylli ki kam kiba lait ha ka kam Driver Fireman, 26 tylli ki kam ha ka Mechanic, 205 tylli ki kam MPRO operator, 56 tylli ki kam Signal/BN operator, 1494 tylli ki kam armed branch constable/battalion constables/MPRO GD/ constable handyman, 143 tylli ki kam Driver constable.Haba kheiñ lang baroh, ka seng ka la ong ba ki la don haduh 2968 hajar tylli ki kam ba lait thylli hapoh ki kam pulit kiban aikam ïa ki samla jong ka jylla. Ka seng ka la ong ba kan long ka burom kaba khraw bad kaba wanrah jingmyntoi lada ka sorkar ka pyrkhat ban rah biang ïa ka rta jong kiba thep kam ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka bynta.Ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ba ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthung ia ki nongbud hapoh ka tnat pult, kam shym la don ka jingpynbna ne ka notification/advertisement kaba la pynmih kaba la wanrah ka jingkylli ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthung kam ia ki nongbud. “Ngi kwah ban kyrpad ïa phi kaei kaba ka sorkar bad ki tnat kiba dei ban shim khia kin leh ban pynthikna ba ka rukom thungkam kan ïaid katkum ki kyndon jingtreikam na ka bynta ban thung ïa ki nongbud khnang ba kan long kaba sted bad kaba la pynkhreh kloi bad ba ïa ki jingpynbna dei ban pyllait paidbah, kumta ka donkam ïa ka jingbuddien halor kane ka shithi khnang ba kan long kaba myntoi ïa ki samla pule,” ong ka dorkhas ka HITO ba la phah sha u Myntri Rangbah.Ha kawei pat ka liang ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ka la dawa na ka sorkar jylla ban wengnoh ïa ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih dangshen ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthmu ban thep ïa ki kam ba lait hapoh ka tnat Meghalaya police da kaba ong ba ka rai ban pynduna ïa ka rta kiba thep kam ka long ka bym lah ban pdiang.Ha ka shithi ba ka la phah sha u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma u President ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong, “Namar kata ngi kyntu ïa phi ba phin shim ïa ki sienjam ban wengnoh ïa katei ka jingpynbna bad ban pynbna biang da kawei ban kyntiew ïa ka rta thep kam kiba aplai kam pulit kaba long ïaryngkat lang bad kiwei ki jylla ha ka ri India na ka bynta ki ST/SC,” u la ong.U la ong ba katkum ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da ka ophis u Inspector General of Police (R/PR)-Cum- Chairman, Central Recruitment Board ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai, ka rta jong ka kam UB Constable/Fireman/Driver Fireman/ Fireman Mechanic/MPRO Operator/Signal Operator/ AB Constable/ Battalion Constable/ MPRO GD/ Constable Handyman bad Driver Constable, ka long naduh ka 18 snem haduh ka 21 snem kaba la ailad pat 5 snem ka jingpynjlan ia ki nongthep kam kiba dei hapoh ka thup ST/SC.“Mynta ka jingkylli ka long, shano ki samla kiba la shah pynduh ban thep ia kitei ki kam ba la pynbna kin leit? Hato ngi kwah ia ki ban long kiba shang makia ha ka imlang sahlang bad ha ka jylla baroh kawei? Hato ngi tan shapoh ia ki da kaba wanrah ia kine ki kyndon ki rukom treikam kiba kum kine?,” buh jingkylli u nongialam ka HYC.
title: Kyrpad ka HITO bad HYC ïa ka Sorkar ban kyntiew ïa ka rta thung kam Pulit

content: Shillong, 15 Lber : Ka North East Centre for Technology Application and Reach (NECTAR), Dept of Science and Technology, ka Sorkar India , ha ka 15 tarik u Lber, 2024 ka la sdang ïa ka Community Radio Station (CRS), ba la ai kyrteng ka “Mawkynrew 89.60 FM Community Radio” ha shnong Jongksha ha Mawkynrew C&RD Block, East Khasi Hills District.Kane ka Community Radio Station ka long hi kum ka FM Radio Station, ha kaba lah ban sngap da kaba leit sha ka 89.6 Mega Hertz ha ka FM band na ka radio lane mobile phone bad ki paidbah ki lah ban sngap ban ïoh jingmyntoi ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah, ka pule puthi, ki jingai jingtip halor ka rep, bad ki jingrwai ki jingtem.ïa kane ka projek ba la mang 60 lak tyngka la wan ban plie da u MLA ka thaiñ, u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh kum u kongsan ha ka jingïadonlang ki ophisar ka NECTAR, ki nongïalam shnong ba kynthup ïa u Bah Olet Kharsahnoh, Sordar ka shnong Jongksha, ki nongshong shnong, ki khynnah skul lem ki nonghikai.Kiba wan ban ïa don lang ha kane ka sngi ki la sakhi ïa ki jingrwai jingshad ba itynnad na ki khynnah skul ka Mary’s Garden School, Jongksha bad ki jingrwai Myllung na ki khynnah ka Inclusive Music School, Shillong.Na kane ka Community Radio Station kan ai jingshakri sha 9 tylli ki Constituency kiba hap ha ka East Khasi Hills bad West Jaiñtia Hills ba kynthup palat 200 tylli ki shnong.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, u Bah Banteidor u la pynpaw kane ka Community Radio Station kan long ka lad ïa ki samla ban sei ïa la ki jong ki sap kiba ki don.
title: Ka Mawkynrew 89.60 FM Community Radio ka lad ïa ki samla ban sei ïa la ki sap

content: Shillong, Lber 15: Ka Lady Keane College kaba dei kawei na ki shlem ai jinghikai ïa ki samla pule kynthei ha ka liang ka jingnang jingstad, ka la pynbna paidbah ba naduh mynta u snem 2024 kan sa pdiang ïa ki samla pule shynrang ha ka laiñ Science bad Professional Course.U Bah W. Khyllep Retd IAS uba dei ruh u President ka Governing Body ka Lady Keane College bad u Dr. Khlur Mukhim uba dei u Principal, haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka janmied sngi Thohdieng ha ka ophis treikam ha katei ka jaka pule, ki la ïathuh ba ka college naduh mynta u snem kan pdiang ruh ïa ki samla pule shynrang kiba pule ha ka Science bad ruh ka Professional Course kum ka Tourism, Computer Science, Fashion Designing bad ka Traditional Music.U Dr Khlur Mukhim u la ong ba katkum ka jingkylla jong ka por ba mynshuwa ki briew ki dang syier biej hynrei ha kane ka juk ba mynta ym tang ki kynthei lane ki shynrang hynrei ka shong katkum ka jinglah khamtam ha ka liang ka jingnang jingstad.U la ong ruh ba lyngba kane ka sienjam ba ka College ka shim kan long ka jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki samla pule shynrang bad kynthei ba kin don ka mynsiem ïakhun bad ban ïaburom mar kylliang.Kumba la sngewthuh na ka kyrteng Lady Keane College kaba mut ba kadei tang na ka bynta ki kynthei, hynrei u Dr. Khlur Mukhim haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli u la ong ba kane kam dei shuh kaba dang thymmai, namar mynshuwa ha St Edmunds ym don kynthei hynrei mynta la bun ngut ki samla pule kynthei ruh ki leit ban pule, kumta ki bor pynïaid kim don kano kano ka jingthmu ban pynkylla kyrteng ïa ka Lady Keane College.Shuh shuh u la ong kaba la pynlong ïa ka College ban ailad ïa ki samla shynrang kadei namar ki duna kiba pule ïa kitei ki laiñ bad kaba long ruh kum ka jingplie lad na ka bynta kito kibym ïoh ban pule ha kiwei pat ki College. Ka College hi kan kham peit bad ailad shuwa ïa kito kiba biang ki percentage la ka long ïa ki shynrang lane ki kynthei.
title: Yn pdiang ka Lady Keane College ïa ki shynrang ha ka Science bad Professional Course

content: Shillong, Lber, 15: Ïa ka kot kaba la thoh da u Bah Daniel Stone Lyngdoh kaba la ai kyrteng, “Aiu ngin leh ha jingim ba tang shisien? la pyllait paidbah ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha phyllaw ing sah jong u Wickliff Syiem u Syiem Khynnah ka Hima Nongstoiñ ha ka shnong Rajai, Bangladesh.Ha kane ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u Romesh Juwel Sohlamar ha ka ktien Lyngngam, la sakhi lang da kiba bun ki Khasi bad kiwei kiwei ki jaidbynriew kiba shong basah ha ka ri Bangladesh kynthup ruh ïa i Meiieid Relimai Sohlamar iba la kynjoh 93 snem ka rta.U Bah Daniel u la thoh ïa kane ka kot ha ki 48 sngi ha jingïaid lynti jong u ha baroh kawei ka ri India bad ha ki ri kiba marjan bad ka Ri India.U nongthoh u la ïathuh, “ ïa kane ka kot la thoh da ka sur khot kaba U Blei U la kren ha ka mynsiem jong nga ba dei ban thoh ïa kane ka kot bad khlem ka jingkhot jong U Blei ym lah ban thoh bad ym ban pyndep ïa kane ka kot. U Mynsiem jong U Blei U kren ba dei ban thoh ïa kane ka kot, Aiu ngin leh ha jingim ba tang shisien?”Bah Daniel u la ïathuh ba ki don 8 tylli ki lynnong ha kane ka kot kaba khot bad wer ban tip aiu kum ki briew ngi dei ban leh haba ngi im tang shisien. “Ngin ym lah ban wan phai arsien ha kane ka sla pyrthei. Ka kot ka ïathuh ba ka don ïa ki jubab kiba ngi dei ban leh,” u la ong.U nongthoh u la kyrken ba ka jingmih paidbah jong kane ka kot kan leit sha ka bai kot jong ki khynnah ki baduk kiba pule ha ki skul bad ki Kolej.U Bah Andrew Joel Sohlamar uba dei u Organising Secretary jong ka Bangladesh Indigenous People’s Forum (BIPK) bad u khun ba nyngkong jong u Wickliffe Syiem haba kren kum u kongsan ha ka jingpyllait paidbah ïa kane ka kot u la ong, “kane ka kot ka don ha ka ïa ki saw tylli ki bynta, ba kynthup ïa ka jingieid ïa ka niam ka rukom (Religion), ka jingieid ri (Nationalism), ka jingieid ïa la ka jait ka kynja (Tribe) bad ka mynsiem riewshlur (Patriotism).”“La ngi don ha ki niam ki bapher bapher hynrei ka niam ka dei ban buh nyngkong ïa U Blei. Watla ngi don ha kino kino ki bynta jong ki Ri ka pyrthei ngi dei ban burom ïa ka Lama jong kata ka Ri kaba ngi don la ngi don ha India, ha Bangladesh, ha England bad ha kino kino ki Ri ngi dei ban burom ïa kata ka Ri kaba ka Lama jong kata ka ri ka kaweh. Ngi dei ban tip ïalade ba ngi dei na kano ka jaidbynriew bad kum ki Khasi kim dei ban klet ïalade ba ki dei ki Khasi bad ki dei ban ieid ïalade bad ki dei kiba ai jait sha ka kmie kaba dei ka kynthei bad u bym ai jaid sha ka Kmie um dei u Khasi. Ki dei ban burom ïa ki riewkhraw ka jaidbynriew Khasi kum u Tirot Sing, u Kiang Nangbah, ka Phan Nonglait bad u Wickliffe Syiem kiba don ïa ka mynsiem ban ïada ïa la ka jaidbynriew ba ka pateng kaba mynta jong ki samla ki dei ban don ïa ka mynsiem riewshlur ba ki dei ban ïada ïa la ka jaidbynriew,” la ong u Bah Andrew.
title: Ha phyllaw ïing u Wickliff Syiem la pyllait ïa ka kot, “Aiu ngin leh ha jingim ba tang shisien?”

content: Shillong, Lber 15: Ka khubor ba la ïoh na ki pulit la ïathuh ba u Bah Klurningson Donna, Myntri, Dwara, Nongtyrnem Sirdarship (EKH) u la phah ka jingujor ba ka jaka kaba heh bha kaba la long trai da ka Hima Dwara Nongtyrnem Sirdarship la dep kurup beaiñ na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka surok Indo-Bangladesh Border, ban ker bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka Surok shnong kaba ha ka shnong Thyllaw (EKH) bad uwei u briew uba kyrteng u Arwanphai Wanshong, Sirdar, Dwara, Nongtyrnem Sirdarship, u la kam ba u la long trai ïa katei ka khyndew kaba heh kaba dei jong ka Hima bad kaba pyndonkam bakla u la ïoh ka pisa kaba T. 1,03,33,785/- kum ka bai lutksan khyndew.
title: Ujor u Myntri ba shah kurup ka jaka Hima Dwara

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 15: Ki ar tylli ki trok ki la ing khong hadien ba ki briew bym lah ithuh ki la wiang ding dusmon katba ki dang ïeng ha lynti Photkylla – Ranikor hajan ka shnong Umsih, South West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka tyllong khubor ba la ïoh lum, la ong ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka miet jong ka 13 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024 katba ki ar tylli ki trok kit piat kiba don ïa u Registration No: AS010 C 2203 bad AS17 C 1086 ki dang ïeng harud lynti Photkylla – Ranikor.“Kane ka jingjia ka lah ban dei ha ki por miet”, ong ka tyllong khubor na ki paidbah katei ka thaiñ bad ha kane ka jingjia ym don mano mano ba mynsaw.
title: Ing khong ar tylli ki trok hajan shnong Umsih

content: Shillong, Lber, 15: U MLA ka BJP Bah Alexander L.Hek uba dei ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u dei uwei napdeng ki san ngut kiba pan ïa ka tiket na ka BJ ban aireng na Shillong parliamentary Seat.Ka party ka la phah ruh ïa ka kyrteng jong ki hynriew ngut ki nongpan tiket na Tura Parliamentary Seat sha ka Central Election Committee jong ka BJP.Haba pyntip ïa kane ha ka sngi Thohdieng, u State President ka BJP Rikman G. Momin u ong, “ngi ladep phah ïa ka kyrteng jong kine kiba pan tiket sha ki bor bahalor ka party. Mynta ka shong sa ha ka party ïano ka ibit ban pynieng kum ki kyrtong na Shillong bad na Tura.”Nalor u Bah Hek, u Momin u la ïathuh ba kiwei pat kiba la pan tiket ban aireng na Shillong Seat ki kynthup ïa ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait, u State President barim ka BJP Bah Ernest Mawrie, u President ka BJYM Bah Mewaker Lyngdoh bad ka Kong Sumitra Laloo.Na ka bynta ka Tura Seat, ki nongpan tiket ki kynthup ïa u MDC ba mynta jong ka Tura u Bernard N. Marak, ki MLA barim ba kynthup ïa u Winnerson D Sangma bad u K.C Boro, u MDC barim u Boston Marak,Ria Sangma bad u Thomas Marak.Haba kylli, u Momin u la ong, “ngim pat tip (lano kin pynbna ïa ka kyrteng jong kyrtong) hynrei ka thup kyrteng kaba lai kan sa mih noh shen.”Shuh shuh, une u nongïalam ka BJP u la ong ba ka party ka long kaba la pynkhreh ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon. Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka party ka la pynsdang ruh ïa ka jingïalap elekshon.
title: Paw kyrteng u Bah AL Hek napdeng san ngut kiba pan tiket na Shillong Seat

content: Shillong, Lber 15: K Election Commission of India, ka la pyntip ba kan pynbna ïa ki tarik ban long elekshon lashai ka sngi, ha kaba ka la lum ïa ka jingialang bad ki nongthoh khubor ha nongbah Delhi ha ka por 3 baje janmiet.Wat lada ka ECI kan dang pynbna lashai ka sngi ïa ki tarik, hynrei la sngewthuh ba ka elekshon kan long ha kiba bun tylli ki phase ne ki bynta ha baroh kawei ka ri India, lait noh ha ki jylla rit kum ka Meghalaya, ha kaba ka sngi thep vote kan long beit tang shi sngi. Kiba bun hi ki ong ba ka lah ban sdang ha u bnai ïaïong haduh u bnai Jymmang mynta ka snem.Ryngkat bad ka general election sha Lok Sabha ka ECI kan buh tarik ruh na ka bynta ka elekshon shiteng samoi sha ki katto katne tylli ki elekshon sha ki State Legislative Assembly kibym pat don MLA haduh mynta.Ha Meghalaya kiban ïakhun na Shillong Parliamentary Seat kiba kynthup ïa baroh ki District ha Khasi Jaiñtia ki long u Bah Vincent H Pala jong ka Congress, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh jong ka NPP, u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon jong ka VPP, u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin jong ka RDA, u Prof. Lakhon Kma bad u Bah ……kum ki kyrtong Independent. Ka BJP bad TMC haduh mynta kim pat pynbna kyrtong bad ym pat ïoh jingtip la kin pynïeng kyrtong ne em.Katba na Tura Parliamentary Seat pat kaba kynthup ïa ki District na Garo Hills kiban iakhun ki long ka Agatha Sangma na ka NPP, u Saleng A Sangma na ka Congress, u Zenith Sangma na ka TMC. Ka BJP haduh mynta kam pat ong eiei la kan pynïeng kyrtong ne em na Tura.
title: Mynta yn pynbna tarik elekshon MP ka ECI

content: Shillong, Lber, 15: U State President ka BJP Rikman G. Momin ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ong ba ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 ka dei ka lynnong kaba la khylliap ha Meghalaaya namarba katkum ka Rule jong kane ka aiñ ka la pyllait noh ha ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka Sixth Scheduled.“Ka State BJP ka ai khublei ïa ka Sorkar India bad khamtam ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri Narendra Modi, u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing u Amit Shah kiba burom ïa ka jingsngew jong ki riewlum da kaba pyllait ïa ki jaka ba hap hapoh ka Sixth Schedule na ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019,” ong u Momin ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Ha ka Aiñ barim jong u snem 1955 ka jingpyllait ïa ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka Sixth Schedule kam don. Ïa kane la pynrung ha ka aiñ jong u snem 2019 da ka Sorkar BJP. Ka BJP ka burom ïa ka jingsngew jong ki riewlum bad ka wanrah ïa kane ka jingpyllait,” ula ong.“Kane ka sienjam ba la shim da ka Sorkar Pdeng ka long ban pynthikna ïa ka jingkular jong ka Sorkar ba la ïalam da u Modi ban kyntiew ïa ka jingim jong ki jaidbynriew riewlum lyngba ki skhim bapher bapher. Mynta ka Meghalaya ka la lait na ka CAA bad kam don nongrim satia ïa kito kiba pyrshah ban dang kren kulmar hynrei kum ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka ri ngi dei ban trei shitom na ka bynta ka jingïaid shaphrang ha baroh ki liang,” la bynrap u Momin.U la ïathuh ruh ba dang shen T.15,000 hajar klur la mang pisa na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka surok na Umroi sha Silchar na ka surok ar laiñ sha ka surok saw laiñ. Ka State BJP Unit ka khot bad wer ïa ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ban kyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ba la pynieng da ka party ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shne khnang ba ka jylla kan kham ïoh bun ki jingmyntoi da kaba phah arngut ki MP ka BJP ha kane ka kynti.
title: Ka CAA ka dei ka lynnong ba la khylliap ha Meghalaya, ong u President ka BJP

content: Shillong, Lber 15 : U National General Secretary ka NPP bad Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, ula ong ba ka seng Congress ka dei party kaba don mynta ha Intensive Care Unit (ICU) bad kam don jingmyntoi ban jied biang ïa u kyrtong bad MP ba mynta u Ma Vincent H Pala na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.Kumjuh ruh u la ong ba kam don jingmut ne jingmyntoi ban jied ïa u kyrtong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) bad ka United Democratic Party (UDP) namar kine kim poi shano shano ruh namar la kut u pud u sam jongki tang ha Byrnihat.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang kaba long ha Byrnihat, Ri-Bhoi ha ka sngi Palei, ban pan ka jingkyrshan ïa ka kyrtong ka NPP na Shillong Parliamentary Conostituency kaba dei ruh ka Myntri Sorkar ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Ma Sniawbha ula ong ba kin don 4-5 ngut ki kyrtong, ki ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong.“Hynrei, u kyrtong ka UDP un nym poi shano shano ruh bad kumjuh u kyrtong ka VPP kumba phi ïatip, kine kin kut tang ha Byrnihat” ula ong. Ula ong ruh ba ki Nongthep vote, khamtam ki Garo bad ki bar jylla, kin ym jied satia ïa kine ki artylli ki party.Haba kynnoh ba ka Congress ka dei ka jhad kaba la ngam jyllop, u Ma Sniawbha ula ong “Ka Congress ka dei ka party, kaba don mynta ha ICU bad ngam tip kaei ka ban jia ïa ka. Kane ka Party ba la rim duh hapoh ka Ri kala don satang 5 ngut ki MLA ha Meghalaya. Ka Party kaba ju synshar ïa ka Ri, kaba la jop shisien haduh 543 ngut ki MP hynrei kala don satang 40-50 ngut bad ha kane ka elekshon ban wan, ngam tharai ba kan tam wat ïa ka 40 seat ruh. Kumta, balei ngin phah biang ïa u MP ka congress. Lada ngi phah ïa ka Congress, ngi la ïakhun ïa ka thma kaba la rem lypa”.“Na kata ka daw, nga kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba ka lynti ïa mynta ka dei ïa phi ban vote ne jied ïa ka kyrtong ka NPP ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh” ula ong haba bynrap ba ki paidbah ki tip bha ban bishar ïa ka jingtreikam jong u Ma Vincent Pala ha kine ki 15 snem bala leit noh.Ha kajuh ka por, u Ma Sniawbha ula pyntip ba kum u Myntri ka Tnad Transport, ula shimkhia ban ïakren bad ka Sorkar Pdeng ban mang pisa ha ka ban shna ïa ka surok 8 Lane na Khanapara sha Byrnihat bad ka surok 4-Lane na Umroi sha Ri-lum Jaintia khnang ban pynkylluid ïa ka jingïaid ki kali bad lait na ka jingdheng.U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ula ai jingïaroh ruh ïa u MLA ka Jirang Bah Sosthenes Sohtun uba la trei shitom bha ban wanrah ïa ka roi ka par hapoh ka constituency. Ula ong ba une u MLA u ju ïa pyni nia wat bad u Myntri Rangbah manla ka janmiet ban ïoh ïa ki kam pynroi hapoh ka constituency.“ Namar kane ka jingtrei shitom jongu ngi ïohi ba kane ka constituency kam shym la sahdien lada phai sha ka liang ki surok, ka umbam umdih, ka pule puthi bad kumta ter ter” ong u Ma Sniawbha da kaba ban biang “Ka Jirang bad ka Ranikor ki dei ki Constituency kiba ïoh bun eh ki kam pynroi pynpar na ka sorkar. U bah Sohtun u dei uwei na ki MLA uba shlur bad trei shitom bha nga lah ban ong namar u lah ban leit bud dien man la ka sngi ïa ki kam pynroi na u Myntri Rangbah”.Ha kane ka jingïalang la ai jingkren ruh da u MLA ba rim ka Sohiong uba la ong ba ka NPP ka dei ka party kaba don ka nongrim bad ki nongïalam kiba biang kum u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, ki arngut ki Symbud Myntri Rangbah u bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Ma Sniawbha kumta u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin jied ïa ka kyrtong ka NPP ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ha kane ka election MP Lok Sabha khnang ba ki kam pynroi kin nang ïai tuid sha ka jylla.ïa kane ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u MLA ka Jirang bad la wan ïashimbynta da ki Nongïalam bad ki nongtrei jong ka party na kylleng ka them Ri-Bhoi.
title: Ka Congress ka don mynta ha ICU, ka UDP bad VPP kim poi shano shano ruh, jied ïa ka NPP: Sniawbhalang

content: Nongpoh, Lber 15: Uwei u nongniah thuk thuk Pulsar, ula khlad hashen bad ka paralok ka la mynsaw jur, na ka jingleit tynrah hi ïa ka jingker jong ka surok bah ha ka shnong Shangbangla, Ri-Bhoi District.Kane ka jingjia kala jia mynta ka janmiet por 4 baje eiei, ong ki Pulit kiba ïathuh ba kane ka thuk thuk ba don u nombor AS15-K-2231, ka dei kaba dang hiar sha ka thaiñ Guwahati.La ïathuh ba une u nongniah uba iap u kyrteng u Rasid Ali ba 18 snem bad uba mynsaw u kyrteng ka Subham Das ba 14 snem. Kine baroh arngut ki dei kiba shong ba sah ha Harlibagan, ByrnihatHaba ïoh jingtip ïa kane jingjia, ki Pulit kila hiar mar mar sha katei ka jaka ban tohkit bad ïa ka metiap la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital, Nongpoh ban pyndep ïa ka post mortem.
title: Khlad hashen u nongniah thuk thuk ba tynrah hi ïa ka jingker surok

content: Shillong, Lber, 15: U Commissioner ka tnat Transport ka Sorkar Jylla Bah E. Kharmalki ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la maham ïa ki paidbah kiba ju shong da ki Rapido kin hap ban shim hi ïa la ka jong ka jingkitkhlieh namarba kane ka Kompeni kaba na Bengalore, Karnataka kam pat don satia ïa ka Permit ba la ai da ka tnat Transport ka Sorkar Jylla ban kit ïa ki nongleit nongwan hapoh kane ka Jylla Meghalaya.“Haduh mynta ki dang don tang ar tylli ki Aggregator kiba la ïoh Permit, ka JETS 24×7 bad ka NE Rider ban kamai da kaba kit ïa ki paidbah nongleit nongwan,” ong u Bah Kharmalki haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor.“Ka Rapido ka ïoh ïa ka Temporary License na ka bynta 6 bnai namarba ha kato ka por ka Aiñ bad ka Rule kam pat don bad mynta ïa ka Rule la pynbna paidbah bad ki la tip ba ka Rule ka la don bad ki la sdang ban aplai ïa ka Permit,” u la ong.“Ngi dang wad uei u briew uba pynïaid (ïa ka Rapido) bad ngin sa phah Show Cause Notice ïa u bad ban pynduh noh ïa u App jong ki. Mynta u App jong ka Rapido u don lut ha ka kti jong ki paidbah ha ki Mobile Phone bad lyngba kane ka khubor ki paidbah kin tip ba lada ki dang leit jingleit da ka Rapido kin hap ban shim hi ïa la ka jingkitkhlieh bad kano kano kaba jia eiei ïa ki kin hap ban kitkhlieh hi,” la maham u Commisioner Transports bad bynrap, “mynta ngi don ïa ki Aggregator ba la ithuh da ka aiñ kiba don ïa ki GPS Device kiba ngi lah ban tohkit shaei ki leit ki wan.”Haba kylli, ula pynshai ruh ba ka jingbym lah ban khanglad ïa ka Rapido naduh ki snem baladep ka long namarba ka Sorkar kam pat shna ïa ka Rule.Halor ka jingpynrung ïa ki nongniah thuk thuk hapoh ka Rapido u Commissioner ka tnat Transports u la ong, “ngi la ïoh jingtip halor kane bad ngin sa tih bniah kaei kaba jia bad lada donkam ngin hap ban mudui da ka ejahar bad ban pynshitom.”U la ïathuh ruh ba u la lum jingïalang ïa ki Aggregator ba kin ïoh pynrung briew kham bun bad ba ki paidbah kin dup tip ba ki don ki License Bike Taxi. Ïa mynta kiba la ïoh permit kum ki Bike Taxi ki dei ban don ïa ka Number Plate rong stem bad ki hap ban da tah ïa ki Sticker Bike Taxi ha ki thuk thuk. Ki dei ban don ruh ïa ka Mobile App. Ynda ki paidbah ki la tip shaphang ki Bike Taxi, ki Traffic Police bad ki Pulit Enforcement kin sa leh ka kamram. Kine ki kynhun ki dei ban don ïa ka Transport Permit ba ki lah ban kit ïa ki nongleit jingleit.“Ngin sa pyntip paidbah ba ki la don ki Aggregator kiba la ithuh da ka aiñ bad ngin sa ai notis ïa kito kiba shu kamai beain bad lada ki kwah ban kamai jakpoh ki dei ban wan rejistar kum ki Aggregetor lane ki lah ban rejistar ïalade hapoh kine ki Aggregators kiba la don lypa,”u la ong.“Kino kino (kiba kwah kamai) ki lah ban ïoh ïa ka laisen, ki lah ban wan shakhmat ban ïoh laisen bad kito kiba ju mlien ban kamai be-ain ki lah ban pynïasoh noh ïalade bad ki Aggregator kiba la don lypa ban ïoh ïa ka laisen. Hadien kata, hapoh 10 ne 15 sngi ngin sa pyni da ki kam ban leh pyrshah ïa kito kiba shu kamai beaiñ,” u la bynrap.“Ngim kwah ban pynduh jakpoh ïa ki briew, hynriew ka jingkamai jakpoh ka dei ban long da ka lynti kaba ki paidbah nongleit nongwan ruh ki dei ban shngaiñ,” u la ong.
title: Ki paidbah kiba shong Rapido kin hap shim hi ïa ka jingkitkhlieh : Commissioner Transport

content: Shillong, Lber 15: Kan long kaei kaei kaba ym ju kham jia koit ba ka tnat pule puthi jong ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka MBOSE la kynnoh ba ka la sam ïa ki kot jingkylli na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba la ïaleh ïa ka eksam matrik khamtam eh ha kane ka sngi kut, ba kan don ka jingsam ïa ki kot jingkylli kiba khlem wan da don ha ka kot pule jong ka Subjek Social Science.Haba na ka liang ki lad pathai khubor kiba la ïoh ban ïakren bad ki katto katne ngut ki khynnah pule kiba ïaleh ïa ka eksam matrik ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw bad kaba la pynlong ruh ïa ki ban ong ba ki sngew kum ban jaw ki ummat bad ktha ruh khlieh marsien shu ïohi, ba eh ki jingkylli ka social science.Kane ka la wanjia ïa ki khynnah skul ba thoh eksam matrik mynta u snem 2024 kaba la kut ruh ha 15 tarik u Lber 2024 kaba dei ruh ka sngi kut thoh eksam, hadien ba ki la mih na ki kamra thoh eksam ki la ud ha kaba ïadei bad ka rukom set jingkylli ka MBOSE ki bym ïadei katkum na ka kot pule ba ki la pynkhreh bad kaba ki trei shitom baroh shisnem.Katto katne ngut ki khynnah skul na ki skul bapher bapher kiba wan thoh eksam ha KJP Higher Secondary School, Shillong, ki la pynpaw ïa ki jingeh namar ka jingset jingkylli ka MBOSE ïa ka sobjek social science mynta u snem kam wan katkum na ki kot kiba ki la pynkhreh bad pule shitom.Ki la ïathuh ruh ba kiwei kiwei ki sobjek watla ki la long kiba eh hynrei dang ki lah ban thoh ne thaw hi nalade hynrei ïa kane ka subjek social science kaba ki la thoh ha kane ka sngi kut kim lah satia ban thoh eiei ruh namar kim wan katkum na ki kot ba ki la pynkhreh bad pule.Da kaba pynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih bad tieng artat ïoh kim lah ban poi sha ka thong ne kiba la angnud ban poi sha ki kyrdan kiba kham heh ne ha ki top position ne ha ka kyrdan kaba nyngkong katto katne ki khynnah ki la ong ba mar syn ïohi ïa ka kot jingkylli shwa ban thoh ïa ka eksam ki la ktha khlieh bad sngew kum ban ïam haba ïohi ïa ka rukom buh ïa ki jingkylli . “Ka la long ruh ka jinglehnohei ïa ka jingtreishitom jong ngi baroh shisnem, ban duh thiah duh dem ban pynkhreh bad ban pule ïa ka social science,” ïathuh ki khynnah skul haba ïakren sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ha kaba adei bad kane ka jingeh na ka liang ki khynnah skul ki la kyrpad ïa ka MBOSE ba kan sngewbha ban ïarap kyrpang da kaba pynbeit thymmai biang bad lada long khamtam ha kane ka social science.
title: Sngew ban jaw ummat ki khynnah SSLC ba eh palat ka subjek Social Science

content: Ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki ïit ïong ha ki kali ka la kylla long ki jaka rieh jong kiba bun ki riew shim kabu naduh ki kam ïaluh samla lyngkar haduh ka jingïadih ïabam sngewbha kaba pathar, naduh ki jingioh riehtngen jong ki riew pyntriem haduh ka jingshah shim kabu ki riew lui lui khmatam lei ki kynthei hynnah samla. Baroh ki sngew ba ka jingdon jong ki iit ïong kiba ym don ba lah ban ïohi ka ai jingshngaiñ ia kiba leit ba wan marwei bad ruh ka buh rieh ia ki tiar ki tiar kiba ki kit ki rong, bad bunsien ngi klet ba kane ka juh ka ïit ïong ka buhrieh ruh ïa ki riew shim kabu bad ka ai jaka rieh ruh ïa ki riew pyntriem ha kitei ki kam kiba har rukom kaba niew hakhmat. Ym lah ban len ba ka jingpyndait iit ïong ia ki kali kam dei tang ba ka pynïoh ne pynduh jingmyntoi, hynrei ka kham pynitynnad shisha hi ruh ia ki kali ba ju pyndonkam shimet. Ha kine ki khyndiat snem la ïohi ba ki pulit ka jylla ba ki la sdang ban tar ïa ki kali tah iit ïong, hynrei hato katei ka jingtar ka kut noh noh tang hapdeng ki riew paidbah, kumno shaphang ki heh sorkar pat? Ka aiñ kam dei ban long tang ia ki paidbah, hynrei ka dei ban long beit 100% na ka bynta baroh.Bun hi ki sakhi ia ka jingshisha ba wat ki kmie ki kpa kim tip shaei ki khun samla jong ki, ki leit namar mar la kiew ha ki kali iit ïong ym tip shuh wat la ki don tang ha surok ba phyllaw iing ruh. Ki bun bah ki jingjia ha kaba ki riew lyngkar ki ialuh samla sahuh hapoh ki kali ïit ïong wat hapoh shnong poh thaw ruh tang ka kham kynjah briew kim salia shuh ïano ïano ruh. Ka jingïohlad ban don hapoh ka kali iit iong imat ia ka long hi kumba tap hapoh ka nep. La ju don ka jingjia ba ki riew shi kabu kim ju rung hi wat shapoh iing jong kita ba ki kam ba ki dei ki baieit jong ki, hynrei ki shu sangeh kali beit harud surok bad pynlong ka jingiakynduh bad jingleh sahuh beit tang hapoh kali. Katno ka long shisha kaba i jakhlia bad kane ka pynpyut shisha ia ka imlang sahlang.Da ka jingiohlad ban pyndonkam da ki kali tah iit iong, bunsien wat haba kit jubor iano iano ruh ki paidbah kim lah satia ban tip namar ba ym ïohi shapoh. Ki riew pyntriem ki ioh shisha ban rieh tngen bad katno ki sngewshngain ban leit ban wan bad pyndep ia ki jingthmu jongki. Khlem pep wat ki bor ka ain hi kin shem jingeh shibun eh wat ban buddien ia ki riew sniew kiba leit ba wan namar ba kim lah ban iohi ba mano ba don ha ki kali ba la tah iit iong. Khlem pep ruh ki kmie ki kpa kiba don ki khun samla ki iakynduh jingeh shibun ban pynthikna ba ki khun jong ki, ki leit ki wan bad ki briew kiba kumno. Ka long kaba suk ia ki riew shim kabu ban shet kylla iano iano bad ban leit da ka kynhun wat hadien ba la iakut tang para marwei. Lada dei ba ym don ka jingkah ka iit iong da kaba suk lah ban iohi mano ba don hapoh ka la ki bad la lah ban sngewthuh lypa ban kiar ne iada na ka jingjia ba sngewsih kaba lah ban jia.Ka jinglah ban weng ia ki iit iong wat la lehse kam long ei ka lad jingiada(solutions) ba 100% ban khanglad ia ki kam sniew, hynrei khlem pep kan kham tehlakam bad wanrah ia ka jingsngew shynrain pyrshah ia ki kam sniew ba bun jait. Ki samla kiba dei khamtam ki khun ba riewspah kin sngew thait shibun eh namar ba kin duhlad ban lum paralok hapoh kali iit iong bad pynlong mobile sitting room (kamra shongkai ba iaid), pynheh jingtem baroh shi lynter surok bad leh sahuh kum ka jingiadih beer, ialuh samla lyngkar bad kumta ter ter. Ha ka juh ka por ki riew bymman kin ym lah ban iaid laitlan namar ba wat lada ki shong hapoh kali ruh lah ban iohi ia ki da ki paidbah bad ruh da ki briew jong ka ain.Kan long hi ka jingbishar hok ia ki paidbah haba ka sorkar ka la lah ban weng lut ia baroh ki iit iong na ki kali. Hooid, don kiba ong ba ka long ka jingduh jingmyntoi lada weng noh ia ki iit iong namar kito kiba niah kali marwei sha ki lynti ha kham jngai bad por mynmiet kin sngewshngaiñ namar ba ki riew shim kabu ki lah ban tip da kaba suk katno ngut ki don briew hapoh kali. Khamtam ki kynthei kin ym shngaiñ shuh ban niah kali por miet por iong ban pyndep ia ki jingdonkam jongki. Ha ka juh ka por kan pynsalia ruh ban ieh ia ki kali ha ki jaka sangeh ne parking lot ryngkat bad ki tiar kiba shongdor kum ki Lab Top bad Mobile bad kiwei pat ki tiar ba ki leit siew leit pet namar ba ki nongtuh bad riew shim kabu kin lah da kaba suk ban ïohi don aiu hapoh kali. Ha ka jingshisha katei ka aiñ ka la treikam pyrkhing bha ha kine ki khyndiat snem, hynrei mynta la sdang ban ïohi biang ïa ja jingsdang mih jong ki kali tah ïit ïong hapoh ka nongbah Shillong.
title: Sdang mih biang ki kali tah ïit ïong ha nongbah !

content: Jowai, Lber 16: Ka Jaiñtia Fishing and Environmental Protection Association (JFEPA) ha ka General meeting kaba dang shu dep kaba la long ha kane ka 14/03/2024 ha ka por 7 baje janmiet ha Shnong Tpeppale kala ïoh ban pynthymmai ïa ki nongkit kam ki jong ka na ka bynta u snem 2024-2026 hadien bala dep ban ïakren ïa ki kam jong ka seng kumjuh hadien ba la dep ban pass ïa Audit report.Ki nongkitkam thymmai ka Association ki long kumne President- Shri Dame hiwot Pde, Vice President: Shri David H Blah, General Secretary Shri Mariphang Challam, Assistant General Secretar Shri Dawan Roy Pyrbot, Auditor (Convener): Shri Kitbok Passah, Shri Jopthiaw Bareh, Shri V.E Pohlong.Ki dkhot Executive members 1. ma Lamwan Paswet, ma N.K Lamare, ma D. Paka Syngkon, ma Womlin pakyntieñ, ma Nelson Roy Pde, ma S. K. Lato, ma Drolin Dkhar, ma Wanbor Lato, ma Damanlang Passah, ma Kiki Pakma, ma Alwin Laloo, ma J. M Pohsngap. Ki Members Construction Committee ma Kiki Pakma, ma David H Blah bad u ma Phimoris Pariat.Ka Jaiñtia Fishing and Environmental Protection Association mynta ka sngi 16 tarik u Lber, 2024 haka por 10 baje mynstep kala leit jurip (Joint Inspection) ha ki bynta ka Dam Sier ha Treïongriang daki members ka Association na ka bynta ban leh maramot (repairing) ïa katei ka dam kaba la don ha ka jingma kaba la lah ban kad ha kano kano ka por ba wan ka um saw khamtam bala jan poi ka aiom lyuir.
title: Pynthymmai nongkitkam 2024-2026 ka JFEPA, yn maramot ïa ka Dam Sier

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 16 : Ki nongïalam jong ka kynhun synrop jong ki ar tylli ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba la rim tam ha ka jylla, kata ka Hill State People Democratic Party ba la ïalam da u bah K.P.Pangñiang MLA barom ka Rambrai Jyrngam u ba long ruh u president bad u secretary jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance, u bah Metbah Lyngdoh MLA ka Mairang president ka UDP u ba dei ruh u Chairman ka Regional Democratic Alliance, kaba dei ka kynhun synrop jong ki seng riewlum, u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar MLA ka Mawkyrwat ryngkat u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin u ba dei u kyrtong ba baroh ar tylli ki party ki la mon lang ban pynïeng ha ka elekshon MP ka ban sa wan, hynin ka sngi ki la hiar sha ïew Langpih ban pynshai sha ki paitbah ïa ki mat ïaleh elekshon bad ban pynshai ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jing pynïeng lang jong ki ar party tang uwei u kyrtong.La pynlong ïa ka jingïalang paitbah ha phyllaw jong ka Raidmynsaw Upper & Higher Secondary school, ha kaba la pynïaid da u bah K.P.Pangñiang president ka HSPDP. Ha ka jingïalang la ïadon lang ruh da ki rangbah shnong, ki nongkitkam jong ka HSPDP Rimuliang zone ki longkpa longkmie ki samla bad ki paitbah jong ka thaiñ.Ha katei ka jingïalang ki nongkren ki la pynshai ba ka jingpynïeng tang uwei u kyrtong da ki ar tylli ki party, ka dei kaba ki la angnud la kham slem ba wanrah ïa ka jingïatylli hapdeng ki party riew lum. Namar lada ki party riew lum kin ïa ïeng pyrshah kawei ïa kawei pat kin ym poi shano shano, khamtam eh ha ka MP elekshon kaba na ka Shillong Parliamentary constituency kaba don tang uwei u kyrtong.Nalor kata ki la ong ba lada ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kin pynïeng la u jong u jong u kyrtrong baroh ar tylli ki party kin shah rem bad ki ban jop kin dei beit da ki National Party. Shuh shuh ki la pynshai ba baroh shi katta ki paitbah ki la ju ong ba ki la I donkam ba ki party riewlum kin ïatylli. Ha kane ka kynti ki nongïalam jong ka HSPDP bad ka UDP ki la sngewthuh shai ba ka jingïatylli ka dei kaba donkam eh bad ki la shim ïa ka sien jam kaba nyngkong ban ïatylli lang.Ki la kyntu ïa ki paitbah nongkyrshan jong ka HSPDP ba ha kane ka kynti ka shap jong u Sing kam don ha ka sngi thep vote, namar ba ki la ïa mynjur lang ban pynieng tang uwei u kyrtong bad ka shap kan long ka Bom.U bah Robertjune Kharjahrin kyrtong MP jong ka RDA haba pynshai sha ki paitbah, u la ong ba lada ki paitbah kin ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ban un jop ha kane ka elekshon ban wan, un ïasaid na ka bynta ki mat ki jura ba ka jaitbynriew ka angnud.U la ong ruh ba kum u nongïalam barim jong ka HYC, u sngewthuh shai haduh katne ka jaitbynriew ka mad jingeh, namar ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Lok Sabha kiba la jop ha ki snem ba la dep kim shym la ang ïa ka shyntur ban kren ha ka Dorbar Parliament ha ka por kaba biang. Hynrei ki kren tang ym da ka Dorbar Parliament ka la jan kut bad ka sorkar kam don por shuh ban sngap ïa ka jingkren jong ki.
title: Hiar ki nongïalam ka RDA sha Langpih ban pynshai paidbah shuwa ka elekshon MP

content: Nongpoh, Lber 16: Haba rakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang ba la tip kum ka ‘World Kidney Day’ ba la rakhe ha kylleng ki ri ka pyrthei, ka University of Science and Technology ryngkat ka PA Sangma International Medical College and Hospital ha ka 14 tarik u Lber 2024 ka la rakhe ïa kane ka sngi shi bynta ban ïalap halor ki lad jingïada ban lait na ka jingpang khyllai, kaba dei kawei na ka jaid jingpang kaba la sdang ban kynrei ha kine ki sngi.Ïa kane ka jingrakhe la pynlong ha Auditorium Hall ka USTM ha kaba la shim bynta naduh ki samla pule, ki nonghikai, ki nongtrei ha ka USTM bad kynthup ruh ki riew shemphang kiba la tip bha shaphang ki lad jingïada ban lait na ka jingpang khyllai ba la tip paidbah ha ka ktien nognwei, ‘chronic kidney diseases’ (CKD).Ki riew shemphang kiba la pyntbit ïa lade ban ai ïa ki jingsumar na ka bynta ki jingpang khyllai kiba la don lang ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ïa u Dr Sarbeswar Sahariah, Prof Dipti Devi, kaba dei ka Ped Nephrologist, bad ka Prof Chitralekha Baruah na ka tnad Medicine ka PIMC USTM.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi, u Dr. Sarbeswar Sahariah, kaba dei ruh ka Pro Vice Chancellor ka la ong ba ka jingpang khyllai ka dei ka jingpang kaba ym lah ban pynkoit, hynrei lah pat ban lait na katei ka jaid jingpang tang lada ngi la phikir lypa ïa lade ban sumar lyngba ki lad jingïada ban lait na kane ka jaid jingpang.Ka jingpang CKD ka dei kawei na ka jingpang kaba la ktah bhai ïa ka koit ka khiah bad bun ki la ïap shiteng por bad don ruh kiba la kylla long ana tang namar ba ki ngat ha katei ka jingpang, ong u Dr. Sahariah bad bynrap ruh kumba 10% kiba la rangbah ki ju duh noh ïa ka jingim na ka jingpang khyllai bad da ki million ngut ha ka pyrthei ki khlad noh ka dei tang namar ba la sniew u khyllai.Shuh shuh, ban ïada ne ban lait na kane ka jingpang khyllai, u Dr. Sahariah u la ïathuh ba ki don 8 tylli ki lad ki lynti ban ïada bad ban lait na ka jingpang khyllai ba kynthup kit ki kynthup ba ngi dei ban trei ban ktah, ban pynduna ïa ka Blood Sunar Level, ban phah bishar bniah bha ïa ka Blood Pressure, ban ki jingbam ba tei met, pynduna ïa ka jingtyrkhong ka met, ban nym dih duma bad dei ban phah peit beit ïa ki doctor halor ka jingtreikam jong u Khyllai.Namar kata, u Dr. Sahariah u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban don ka jingïatrei trei lang ban ïalap halor kane ka jaid jingpang ba ngi donkam ban shim ïa ki lad jingïada bad u la pynshlur ruh ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban dih bha ka um shibun khnang ba lait na ka jingshah ktah jong u khyllai ha ka met, u la bynrap.
title: Ka jingpang Khyllai kam dei kaba lah ban pynkoit, dei tang ka lad jingïada, ong ka Dr. S. Sahariah

content: Jowai, Lber 16: Ka Khasi Students’ Union Jowai Unit ha ryngkat ka jingsynran lang ki nongïalam ka KSU West Jaiïtia Hills District Unit haka 15 tarik u Lber kila leit jurip ïa ka MCH Hospital Jowai halor ka jingdkoh treikam katei ka hospital.Kane ka jingleit jurip ka long hadien ba ka seng kala ïoh bun ki jingujor na ki paidbah khamtam kiba wad jingsumar ha kane ka MCH Jowai.Ha katei ka jingleit jurip la lap shibun ki jingdkoh ha ka rukom trei kam khamtam ka jingduna ki Doktor bad kiba bun na ki nongtrei ki dei kiba dang hapoh ka training kiba lehse kan buh jingma ïa ki paidbah.Ha katei ka sngi ka seng ka la ïoh ruh ban ïa kynduh ïa i Dr.E Chullet ha ka jinglam khmat da u President ka KSU Jowai Unit u Samla Ewanmi Phawa bad LekiRichard Tyngkan General Secretary ryngkat ka jingdonlang ka kong Ladaplin Hayong President Girls’ WingHa kane ka jingïakynduh ka seng ka la pynsngew sha ki bor ba dei khmih ba kum ki nongïalam seng kim lah ban shu sngap halor ka jingud jingnam ki nongthiah pang.Ka seng ka la kyntu ïaki bor ba dei peit ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam ha katei ka jaka ai jingsumar khnang ba ki paidbah ba leit thiah pang kin ïoh ïaka jingsumar ba paka khamtam ïa ki duk ki suk.
title: Leit jurip ka KSU ïa ka MCH Hospital Jowai hadien ba ïoh shibun ki jingujor

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng lyngba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ka la aiti ïa ki kot ki sla jaka sha ka Varun Beverages na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka karkhana pynmih Pepsi ha Mendipathar, North Garo Hills na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa kane ka thaiñ.Ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Mendipathar, u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, ula ai khublei ïa u Chairman jong ka Varun Beverages u Ravi Jaipuria, halor ka jingshim ïa ka rai ban seng ïa katei ka karkhana ha Mendipathar bad ula ong ba katei ka jingshim rai ka la pynïaid shakhmat ïa ka jingwan sengkam ki kompeni ha ka jylla bad ka jingseng ïa ka karkhana ha Mendipathar kan wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha ka jingim jong ki paidbah ha ka thaiñ khamtam ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingkyntiew ruh ïa ka ïoh ka kot.Ha ka jingïalang ula pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewkhublei ïa ka MIDC kaba la pyndep ïa ki kam ki jam ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingaiti ïa ki kot jaka puta ha ka por kaba lyngkot bha bad kaba khlem da la pynslem.Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka Mendipathar Industrial Growth Centre la dep ban pynbna kum ka Industrial Area ha ki snem kiba la dep hynrei kam shym la don satia pat kano kano ka kam pynroi ha katei ka thaiñ la bun snem kaba la long ruh haduh mynta.“Da ka jingshim rai ban seng ïa ka Industrial Unit ban song ïa ki umsoh kum ka Pepsi, Mirinda bad kiwei, yn pynkylla ïa ka jingim jong ki paidbah bad ki trai shnong ba kin ïohkam ïohjam,” ong u Myntri Rangbah.U la pynpaw ruh da kaba ong ba ba ïa ki umsoh la dih beit man la ka sngi bad kidei kiba la song ha ka jylla Assam ne West Bengal.“Da ka jingdon kane ka Bottling Unit ha Mendipathar ngi lah ban dih ïa kine ki umsoh kiba la song hi hapoh ka jylla jong ngi,” ula ong bad bynrap ba ka kompeni ha ki snem ban wan, kan wad ruh ïa ki lad ki lynti ban song ïa ki umsoh bad ïa kiwei ki mar kiba la pynmih da ki trai jylla kum u sohtrun nalor kiwei.U Myntri Rangbah ula pyntip ba ka kompeni kan bei T.185 Klur ïa katei ka projek bad yn pyndep hapoh ka 12 bnai.Katei ka Bottling Plant nalor ka jingsam ïa ki mar kiba pynmih sha ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya, kan shalan ruh sha ki jylla kiba marjan.
title: Da ka jaka ai ka Sorkar ban seng karkhana Pepsi ha North Garo Hills

content: Shillong, Lber 16: Kum shi bynta na ka jingsdang ïa la kam ïalap ilekshon kaba la ju leh da u (L) Purno Agitok Sangma, ka National Peoples’ Party ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la sdang ïa ka kam ïalap ilekshon MP napoh ka shnong Adokgre kaba ha North Garo Hills.Ka Adokgre, kaba la khot da ka kyrteng “Chenanggre” kane ka jaka jong ka jingjop, ka la dei ka jaka ïalap ilekshon jong u Purno Sangma. Ha u snem 2016, u Conrad K. Sangma, u la shimti kum u National President jong ka party bad u la bteng ïa kaei kaba la sdang da u kpa jong u kaba la long mynta la kumba 30 snem tam.Baroh ki nongïalam jong ka party ba kynthup ïa u State President u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u MP ka Rajya Sabha u Dr W.R. Kharlukhi, u State Working President u Marcuise Marak, bad kiwei pat ki nongïalam jong ka seng ki la ïalum lang hapoh ka shnong Adokgre ban sdang ïa ka kam ïalap ilekshon.Baroh angut ki kyrtong ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka ban ïakhun na Shillong bad ka Agatha K. Sangma na Tura ki la ïadonlang ha kane ka sngi.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, u National President ka NPP bad u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K.
