Sangma u la ong, “La ka long ka ilekshon ha ka MP, MLA ne MDC, u kpa jong ngi u la sdang barabor na kane ka shnong Adokgre namar u la leit ha ka jingjop bad kumta la mih ka kyrteng Chenanggre bad mynta ngi ïeng hakhmat jong phi na kane ka madan ban pynurlong ïa ki jingphoh sniew u nongïalam jong ngi.”U la ong ba ka Meghalaya haba kren kyllum, bad ka thaiñ Garo haba pyrkhat kyrpang, ka la sakhi ïa ka jingkylla kaba khraw ha kine ki 6 snem ba la dep.Haba pan ïa ki vote na ka bynta jong ka Agatha, u nongïalam ka NPP u la kyrpad, “Mynta ka sngi ka khun jong u P A Sangma ka ïeng hakhmat jong phi ban pan ïa ka jingkyrshan ka jong phi, ngim lah ban klet ïa u Late P A Sangma.”U la ong ba kane ka ilekshon ka long kaba kongsan na ka bynta ka NPP bad u la pynpaw ïa ka jingshaniah ban ïoh ka jingjop kaba kham palat ïa ka 1.90 lak kaba ki nongshong shnong ki la ai ha u ha ka por ba u la ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon shiteng samoi hadien ka jingkhlad noh u P A Sangma ha u snem 2016.“Nga don ka jingshaniah kaba skhem ban ïoh ka jingjop da ka jingïoh vote kaba heh kaba ym duna ïa ka 2.50 lak ne palat ïa ka 3 lak ngut,” pynpaw ka jingshaniah u Conrad Sangma haba pynbna ïa ka jingsdang ka ïalap ilekshon.
title: Sdang ïalap ilekshon MP ka NPP na Adokgre, kyrmen u Conrad ban tam kput ka Agatha

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: U Sanbor Shullai, u MLA cum Chairman MCIC ka 19th South Shillong Constituency, u la leit ban jurip lang na ka bynta ka jingtei ïa ka surok PWD kaba pynïasoh na Main Entrance Gate jong ka Arts and Culture kaba ha Rilbong (Raid Laban) shaduh ka surok jong ka Rilbong Community Hall bad shaduh ka lynti jong ka Umshyrpi ka surok kaba mynta jong ka PWD Road Rhino Museum Rilbong Shillong.Ïa kane ka jingjurip lang la don ki Engineer jong ka PWD Department, ki heh opisar jong ka Arts & Culture department bad ki dkhot jong ka Monitoring cum Implementation Committee (MCIC) jong ka 19th South Shillong Constituency.Kane ka surok kaba dang ïoh ka jingmang pisa kaba thymmai ka la kot sha ka T 1.98 klur kaba la mang hapoh ka PWD scheme bad kaba ia kane ka project la sdang bad mynjur da u MLA u Bah Sanbor Shullai.Ha ka jingkren na ka liang u Bah Sanbor Shullai, MLA u la pynpaw ïa ka jingai khublei bad ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma, u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba khmih ïa ka PWD bad kiwei ki tnat bad ïabaroh ki Engineer bad ki heh ophisar jong ka tnat PWD Deptt., ka Arts & Culture Deptt., ka Planning bad Finance Deptt, kiba la pynïar ïa ki jingïarap bad kyrshan ban ïoh ïa jingmang pisa na ka bynta kane ka project na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki nongshong shnong jong ka Zigzag Road Rilbong (Raid Laban), bad khamtam ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka 19th South Shillong Constituency bad ki paidbah babun.Baroh ki nongkren ha kane ka jingleit jurip ki la ai ka jingkhublei ïa ka jingtreikam jong u MLA u Bah Sanbor Shullai ban wanrah bun ki kam pynroi bad ki skhim ki bym ju urlong ha ki por kiba mynshwa bad kiba dei ruh ki jingangnud kiba la slem bha jong ki briew ka thaiñ bad kiba la ong ba kum kine ki jait scheme kin ïarap ïa ki jingdonkam na ka bynta ka bha ka miat bad ka roi ka san jong ki nongshong shnong hapoh ka 19th South Constituency bad ki paidbah babun jong ka jylla.
title: Hadien ba la mang 1.98 klur yn ïoh surok ka thaiñ Rilbong ka Raid Laban

content: Shillong Lber 16: U Heh ki shipai BSF ne u Additional Director General (ADG) jong ka BSF (Eastern Command), Kolkata, u Ravi Gandhi, ula wan ban jngoh ïa ka jylla Meghlaya ban peit ia ki rukom treikam ki shipai BSF kiba pahara ha khappud ka Meghalaya jong ka ri India bad ka ri Bangladesh.Katkum ka kyrwoh na ki shipai la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingwan jngoh kaba 2 sngi kaba dei ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ka 15 bad 16 tarik u Lber, u ADG ula lum ïa ka jingïalang ban sngewthuh bad ban ïoh jingtip halor ka jinglong jingman, ka rukom treikam treijam bad ki kam khynra ïa ki kam beaiñ bad kam bymman ha khappud hapdeng kine ki artylli ki Ri.Ia u ADG la pdiang sngewbha da u IG ka BSF Meghalaya u Harbax Singh Dhillon ryngkat bad ki heh ophisar ka BSF. U IG ula ai ka jingbatai kaba bniah bha ïa u ADG ha kaba ïadei bad ïa ka jinglong jingman ha ki thaiñ khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh bad ula pyntip ruh ïa ki jingeh ba mad da ki BSF ha ka kam pahara ha khappud bad ïa ki lad kiba kila shim ban ïakhun ïa kitei ki jingeh kiba bun jait.Katkum ka kyrwoh khubor la ïathuh ba ha ka 15 tarik u Lber, u ADG ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u IG BSF Meghalaya, kila leit ban khmih bniah ïa ka rukom pynïaid kam bad ka jingpynkhreh lypa jong ka Sector Headquarter Tura.Ha kane ka jingwan jngoh u Ravi Gandhi ula ai jingkren ïa ki shipai BSF ha ka Sainik Sammelan ha kaba ula ban jur ïa ka jingdonkam ki shipai ba kin long kiba khlaiñ ha ka bor met bad ha ka bor pyrkhat bad kiwei ki jingdonkam kumba la ïoh ki jingshah hikai.Hadien kane, u ADG ula leit ruh ban ïakynduh ïa u Lat ka Jylla Meghalaya u Paghu Chauhan ha Raj Bhavan, ïa u Chief Secretary ka jylla u Bah D.P. Wahlang bad DGP ka jylla Dr. L.R. Bishnoi.Ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, u ADG ula leit ruh ban jurip ïa ka jingtei ïa ka Composite Hospital Mawpat bad ula leit ruh ban jngoh ïa ka BOP Dawki, Pyrdiwah bad Lyngkhat. Ula ïakren ruh bad ki Field Commander bad ki shipai BSF ha kaba ula ïaroh ïa ka jingtrei shitom ka jong ki ha kaban ïada ïa ka ri na kiba bun ki kam sniew.
title: Wan jngoh u ADG ki BSF ïa ki shipai ba pahara ha khappud Meghlaya

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: Ka Directorate of Civil Defence & Home Guards, Meghalaya ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pyntip ba ka donkam ïa ki Home Guards Volunteer ba la pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ban leit sha ka kamram ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha.U Divisional Com-mandant of Home Guard, Bah Paul H. Shylla ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la kyrpad ïa ki Home Guards Volunteer kiba kwah ban leit sha ka kamram elekshon kin pyntip sha ka ophis jong ka Home Guards ha ki District jong ki marmar.
title: Khot ka Home Guard ïa ki Volunteer ban leit kamram elekshon

content: Khliehriat Lber 16: Ki paidbah nongleit nongwan ki la lait thaw salit katba kawei pat ka kali rit ka la julor hadien ki top mobil kiba khia kumba 150 kilo kawei kawei ki la hap kunsan na kawei trok kaba kit ïa ki ha ka lynti surok bah NH-6 ha Kuliang, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Kane ka jingjia kaba la jia mhnta ka sngi shisha ka la buh jingma shibun ïa ki mynsiem briew bad lah ruh ban ong ba kane ka la wan jia tang namar ka jingsniew palat ka surok NH-6 ha ka thaiñ Narpuh kaba ki kali kim lah satia ban iaid da kaba suk hynrei ki hap ban iaksaid bad ñiom ïa ki thliew ki syar jong kane ka surok kaba la sniew palat pud.Ka jingsniew jong kane ka surok ym tang ba ka la wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur , hynrei ka buh jingma ruh shibun ïa ki nongleit nongwan kumjuh ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba hap ban iaid man ka sngi lyngba kane ka surok.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsniew palat ka surok National highway ha Narpuh na ka liang ki Rangbah Shnong, ki sengbhalang, ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ ruh na ka por sha ka por ki la ju pynsngew bad muh madan ruh ban iakhih bad kyntu jur ia ka sorkar ba kan shim khia ban phah maramot ïa kane ka surok bad la khmih lyruh ba ka jingmaramot kan sdang noh ha shwa ban poi ka aiom slap namar lada kane ka surok kan shu long sah kumne khlem pep kan wanrah jingma ïa ki paidbah nongleit nongwan bad ïa ki paidbah ka thaiñ.
title: Lait thaw ki nongleit nongwan, julor ka kali ba hap ki top mobil na ka trok ha Kuliang

content: Shillong, Lber 16: Na ka daw ba ka Election Commission of India ka la pynbna ban pynlong ïa ka ilekshon sha Lok Sabha 2024 ka ban long ha ka jylla ha ka 19 tarik u bnai ïaïong 2024, kumta lyngba ka bor ba la pynkup hapoh ka kyndon jong ka 144 jong ka Criminal Procedure Code, 1973 bad hapoh Section 21 (1) kaba pule lang bad ka Section 17 (3), (a) bad (b) jong ka Arms Act 1959, na ka liang ka ophis District Magistrate la bthah ïa baroh kiba la ïoh ïa ki laisen ban buh ïa ki suloi bad ki kuli ba kidei ban leit buh noh hapoh ki Police Station/Outpost/Beat-House kiba don hajan ha ki naduh ka por ba la pyntreikam ïa ka Model Code of Conduct khnang ban pynthikna ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka General Election sha ka Lok Sabha 2024 kan long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.Lada don ki bym ïatreilang bad kane ka hukum kan don ka jingpynngat hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Section 25, 1 B, (h) kaba pule ba lada ym lah ban pynpoi ïa kitei ki tiar siat kaba ïaid lang ruh bad ka Sub Section (1) jong ka Section 21.. .. , kin shah pynshitom da kaba shah set patok kaba ym duna ïa ka 1 shisnem hynrei kaba lah ruh ban pynjlan sha ka 3 snem kaba lah ruh ban ïaid lang bad ka jingshah daiñ kuna.
title: Kyntu ka ophis DM ban aiti ïa ki tiar siat sha ki thanat Pulit

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: Ki thylliej ding barhem ki la pynkylla dpei ïa kawei ka ing ha ka shnong Sohkynduh, ka shnong kaba hap hapoh ka thaiñ Khatarshnong, Sohra, East Khasi Hills District.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïohlum la ïathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 3:00 baje noh phai sngi. Kane ka ing ka dei ka ing jong ka Kong Baralin Mawpat bad u Bah Phainal Phanbuh.Ka ding ka la ïoh ban bamduh ïa ka iing baroh kawei namarba ka dei ka ing tap tin shiliang bad baroh ki jingdon jingem hapoh ka iing ki la kylla dpei tang hapoh shikhyllipmat.Ha kane ka jingjia ym shym la don mano mano ruh ba mynsaw.
title: Bamduh ki thylliej ding ba rhem ïa ka ïing ha Sohkynduh

content: Shillong, Lber 16: Ka Sorkar Jylla Karnataka ka la thung ia u ïada Martin Marbaniang, IPS officer jong ka kynhun ne batch jong u snem 2009, kum u Commissioner of Police, ha Belagavi, Karnataka.U la trei kum u DIG recruitment, ha Bengaluru. U la shakri ruh ia ka kam kum u SP ha Kalaburagi, u Head of Police Training College, Yadgir, bad u SP CID.Kum u ba la im la kha bad kum u nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya, u la pyndep ia ka eksam MA ha shwa ba un iakhun ia ki eksam UPSC.Ka khubor ka iathuh ba un sa shimti ia katei ka kam na u Vikas Kumar Vikash, IGP, Northern Range, uba la bat ruh ia katei ka kam hapoh ka nongbah. La iathuh ba ia katei ka kam kaba la thylli ka la mih na ka daw ka jingshong thait noh jong u S.N. Sidramappa, ha ka 29 tarik u bnai Rymphang mynta u snem.
title: Shah thung u Bah Martin Marbaniang kum u Commissioner of Police ha Belagavi

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: Ka Meghalaya Joint Action Committee (MJAC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ujor sha u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah Donald P. Wahlang bad kyntu ba un shimkhia ban tuklar lem halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki Pulit ki donkti ban dawa pisa na ki trok kit maw, mawria, dewbilat, dpei dewiong bad na ki trok kit marbam.“Ka jingdon jong ki Police Outpost ha shilynter ka surokbah National Highway naduh East Jaiñtia Hil, West Jaiñtia Hills, East Khasi bad Ribhoi District ki dei ki jingpang ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ngi. Manla ka por ba ngi hap ban ïaid lyngba ïa kine ki Police Outpost ngi shah pynbor ban siew da ka dor kaba heh watla ka dei ka pisa kaba ngi hap ban pynlut ban thied bam ha ka jingïaid lynti. Don ki khep ba ngi hap ban shah jingit da ki sngi namarba ngi la lut ka pisa na ka daw jong kine ki Police Outpost. Kaba kham pynmong shuh shuh, kine ki Police Outpost kiba dei ban peit ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, pynban, manla ka sngi ki dawa pisa na ki nongñiah trok,” ong ka dorkhas na ka MJAC ba la soi da u Chairman Bah Biangshwa Shylla, u Finance Secretary Bah Balen Thubru bad u General Secretary Bah Enrico D. Passi.“Ki trok ki shah pynsangeh kumba 12 haduh 15 sien ha ki Police Outpost ba don ha ki surokbah National Highway kiba leh mynleh ban talasi ïa ka jingkit palat pud, ka jingshalan dewiong be-aiñ bad talasi ïa ki kot ki sla jong ki trok khnang ban ïohlad ban dawa pisa T.100 haduh T. 500 na kawei kawei ka trok kiba kit ïa ki maw, mawria, dewbilat, dpei dewiong bad na ki trok kit marbam,” la kynnoh ka MJAC.“Wat haba rah ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang ban kit ïa ki mar, ki Pulit ki dawa pisa nga ngi ha ka por mynsngi bad ha ka por mynmiet. Lada ki nongñiah trok ki kyntait ban siew ïa ka pisa ba ki shah dawa ki Pulit ki shoh ïa u nongñiah bad pynjulor ruh wat ïa ki trok bad ym shah hi ruh ïa ki trok ban ïaid,” kynnoh shuh shuh ka MJAC.“Ka bym lah ban long ba u Pulit un dawa pisa khlem ka jingtip jong uba kham halor jong u. Hadien ba la pyntreikam ïa ka GST, ngi ngeit ba ki Pulit kin ym tuklar ïa ka kam jong ngi namarba ngi la pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang hynrei ngi shah pynbor ban siew ïa ka pisa watla bun na ki trok ki dei kiba don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang ban ïaid ha ki surokbah. Ym baroh ki trok ki ïakynduh jingeh. Ki don ki khep haba ki Pulit Traffic ki lah ban pynsangeh ïa ka Trok, hynrei ym dei ban shu pynsangeh lut naphang. Kum ka nuksa, shispah tylli ki trok kiba ïaid, bad u pulit u pynsangeh lut ïa ki. Hato kine ki trok kin mad lut ïa kajuh ka jingeh,” la buh jingkylli ka MJAC.Ka MJAC ka la kam ruh ba wat hapdeng ka jingtalasi bad pynsangeh ïa ki trok kumba 12 haduh 15 sien hynrei ka jingshalan beaiñ ïa u dewiong ka dang don ha East bad ha West Jaiñtia Hills District. Haduh mynta, ki dang don byllai ki trok kit dewiong kiba kit ïa u mar sha ki jaka bapher bapher ka District, ka Jylla bad wat sha ka jylla Assam khlem sangeh.“Kum kine ki kam yn ym lah ban leh khlem ka jingïada da ki bor sorkar. Kaba pynlyngngoh, ba bun na ki trok kit dewiong ki dei ki jong ki bahaing hasem ne kiba don ka jingïadei kaba jan bad ki briew kiba don ha ka bor,” la kynnoh ka MJAC.“Ngi kyrpad ïa phi ban pynsangeh noh mardor ïa kine ki jingdawa pisa da ki Pulit ha shilynter ka surokbah,” la kyrpad ka MJAC ïa u Chief Secretary bad phah kopi ruh sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, sha u Symbud Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka jylla bad sha u Director General of Police ka Jylla.
title: Kynnoh ka MJAC ba dawa pisa jubor ki Pulit na ki nongñiah trok ha surokbah

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: Ki samla kiba ju kamai jakpoh da ki thuk thuk ban kit ïa ki nongleit jingleit kylleng ka sor Shillong ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la ïakynduh lang ha madan Malki, Shillong ban shim rai kumno ban leh nangne shakhmat hadien ba la mih ka jingkhanglad ban kamai be-aiñ khlem da ka ïoh ïa ka Permit bad siew Khajna sha ka tnat Transports jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha ka sngi Thohdieng u Commisisoner ka tnat Transports Bah E. Kharmalki ha ka jingïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u la maham ïa ki paidbah ba kin hap ban shim hi ïa la ka jong ka jingkitkhlieh lada ki leit jingleit ne shong da ki Bike Taxi jong ka Rapido ne jong ki nongniah Scooty shimet bym pat ïoh Permit na ka tnat Transports ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka Ride to Serve Bah K. Nongkynrih u la ong, “ïa ka jingkhein be-aiñ ngim sngew eiei namarba ngim dei ki khynnah kiba tuh na iing na sem bad nangne nangtai hynrei ka dei ka jaka kpoh jong ngi shimet bad ngi im da ka ki jong ki kti ki kjat. Ngi baroh ngi la rai beit ban kamai.”“Ha ka taiew ban sa wan ngin sa leit ban ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnat Transports ban ïakren halor kane,” ong u Bah Nongkynrih.“Ngi la ai da ka jingthoh sha ka Sorkar naduh u snem baladep, hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar kam shym la jubab ïa ka jingthoh,” u la ong.Ha ka 1 tarik, Nailur, 2023 ka Ride to Serve ka la aiti da ka shithi ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong ban ai Permit bad siew khajna khlem da pynïasoh bad ki Aggregator kiba don hapoh kane ka jylla.Haduh mynta, ka JETS 24×7 kaba don ïa ka Permit ka dei ka Aggregator ba nyngkong eh ha Meghalaya ban shakri ïa ki paidbah lyngba ki Bike Taxi.“Ka ophis u DTO ka la pyllait ïa ka Permit hynrei ngi kiba kamai ynda ngi leit shim ïa ka permit ki ong ba ngi hap ban pynïasoh bad kiwei ki Kompeni. Ha ka jingthoh ba ngi la aiti ha u Myntri ka tnat Transports ngi la pynpaw ba ngi kwah ban siew ïa ka Permit bad siew khajna lyngba ka Sorkar bad ngim kwah ban leit lyngba jong kino kino ki kompeni,” ong u Bah Nongkynrih bad bynrap, “ngi kwah ban long ki nongkamai shimet bad ïohnong sha lade.”Haba kylli, u la ong, “ngim dei kiba kamai bad ka Rapido. Ngi kamai da ka Scooty shimet bad dei na kata ka daw ngi sa ieng Offline bad ngi khlem pyndonkam ïa uno uno u App. Lada ngi siew ïa ka bai permit bad ka khajna sha ka Sorkar ngi hap ban siew sa ïa ka bai App sha ki kompeni namarba ki ohdor ïa ka bai kamai shi khlieh briew.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Bah Nongkynrih, ki don 300 ngut tam kiba kamai shimet da ka Scooty.
title: Ngim dei ba ngi tuh ngi thiem ngi kamai la ka hok, ong ki nongkamai Bike Taxi

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: U Chief Electoral Officer jong ka Jylla u DR. BDR Tiwari ha ka 16 tarik u Lber, 2024 u la pyntip ba ki nongthep vote ha Meghalaya haduh une u snem 2024 ki don 22, 17,100 lak ngut ban rai ïa ka lawei san snem jong ki kyrtong na Shillong bad na Tura ha ka eleshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Ïaiong, 2024.Ki nongthep vote shynrang ki don 10,94, 947 ngut, ki kynthei ki don 11,22,150 ngut bad 3 ngut ki Third Gender.Ha ka jingïalang bad ki lad pathai khubor tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ka Election Commision of India ka la pynbna ïa ka tarik ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha, u Tiwari u la ong, ka jingkiew ki nongthep vote na u snem 2023 haduh kaba sdang jong ki ar bnai jong u snem 2024 ka long 55, 971 ngut.Ki nongthep vote ba dang shu pynrung kyrteng thymmai ha ka Electoral Roll, 2024 ki long, 56,909 ngut, ki Service Voter ki don 3835 ngut, ki nongthep vote ba duna dkhotmet ki don 11179 ngut, ki nongthep vote ba la kynjoh 80 snem ka rta shaneng ki don 23, 793 ngut bad 5 ngut ki Non Resident Indian (NRI).Ki Polling Station ki don 3512 tylli, ba kynthup 326 tylli ha ki jaka sor bad 3186 tylli sha ki jaka nongkyndong.Haba ai jingkheiñ ïa ka jingpoi ki paidbah kiba thep vote ha Shillong bad Tura ha ki elekshon Lok Sabha ba la long ha u snem 2014 ki long 63.28 percent ha Shillong bad 79.14 ha Tura. Ha u snem 2019, ki nongthep ki long 65.48 percent ha Shillong bad 81.38 percent ha Tura. U CEO u la ïathuh ruh ba ka tnat Election ka la ïakren bad ki bor shipai BSF ba kin peitngor ïa ka khappud katba ka ri ka dang pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon.Ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingrah pisa beaiñ, u CEO u la ong ba kan don ka komiti kaba kyrpang kaba peitngor ban kem ïa kino kino kiba donkti ban sam pisa hadien ba la pynbna ïa ka elekshon.
title: 22, 17,100 lak ngut ki nongthep vote ha Meghalaya; ai jingkheiñ u CEO

content: Shillong Lber 16: Arngut ki briew ba la shah kynnoh ba dei ki suba mynshoh ki la shah bom shnong ha ki paidbhur ha ka shnong Lawmei, East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ia kine ki arngut la ïoh ban pyllait im da ki Pulit na ka kti jong ki paidbhur hadien ba ki la shah tangon haban da jem jai.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Ritiraj Ravi ula ïathuh, “ha ka por kumba 11:30 baje mynstep, uwei uba la 37 snem ka rta bad uwei uba la 20 snem ka rta, ki la shah kynnoh ba ki dei ki menshohnoh bad halor kane ka jingsuba ki paidbhur kiba la don kumba 200-300 ngut ki la kem bad bom shnong ïa ki.”U SP ula ong shuh shuh, haba ki Pulit na ka thanad ka Sohïong ki la ïoh ïa kane ka jingtip marmar ki la leit sha ka shnong Lawmei ban pyllait im ïa kine ki ar ngut hynrei namarba u paidbah ula bun palat ki pulit SOT na Shillong ki la leit ban synran lang bad ki la ïoh ban pyllait ïa ki arngut na ka kti ki paidbhur.”Ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh ïa kine ki arngut kiba la mynsaw jur sha Sohïong CHC bad kham hadien la pynkynriah noh ïa ki sha Shillong Civil Hospital, ong u Rituraj Ravi.U la ïathuh ruh ba ki pulit ki la register case halor kane ka jingjia bad kin sa pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.
title: Haban da jem jai shah bom shnong ar ngut kiba suba menshohnoh ha Lawmei

content: New Delhi, Lber 16: Ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote hapoh ka ri India la sakhi ba la ki la nang kiew. Ïa kane la pyntip da ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ haba ai jingkhein ïa ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote hapdeng ki kynthei, ki samla bad ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Chief ElectionCommissioner (CEC) Rajiv Kumar, ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Election Commissioner ba kynthup ïa u Gyanesh Kumar bad u Dr. Sandhu ki la pynbna paidbah ïa ka Tarik ban pynlong ïa ka General Elections 2024 sha Lok Sabha bad ha ki Assembly jong ki Jylla.Kawei na ki bynta ba kongsan ba la pynpaw da ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka dei ka jingkiew jong ki nongthep vote khamtam hapdeng ki kynthei, ki samla bad ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet. Kumba 82 lak ki nongthep vote ki dei kiba don jingduna dkhotmet, 2.2 lak kiba la kynjoh ïa ka rta kaba 100 snem, 48,000 hajar ngut ki Third Gender.Kane ka elekshon kan sakhi ïa ka jingkiew ki nongthep vote ki samla kiba don 1.8 klur ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingthep vote ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ha ka jingim ka jong ki. Nalor kata, hapdeng ka rta 20-29 snem ki nongthep vote ki don 19.47 klur.U Rajiv Kumar u la ong ba ka Commission kan pynthikna ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingïathep vote kan long da ka lynti kaba khuid, ban leh ruh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ïa ki jingïalam bakla.Da kaba bsut ïa ka phang, “Celebrating Inclusivity,” ka ECI ka la ïaiban ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha kane ka kynti kan dei da ka lynti kaba khuid bad kaba bym don jingïashah liang.Haba kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin ïashim bynta pura ha ka jingthep vote, u Kumar u la kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka ri ba kin pyndonkam hok ïa la ka itkiar ba la pynkupbor da ka riti synshar jong ka ri India da ka jingïashim bynta ha ka jingïathep vote, khnang ba yn dup lah ban sngap ïa ka sur jong iwei pat iwei bad ban khein lang.
title: 2.2 lak ki nongthep vote ba la kynjoh 100 snem, 82 lak kiba duna dkhotmet

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: Tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ka Election Commisssion of India (ECI) ka la pynbna ïa ka tarik ba pynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha, u District Election Officer jong ka East Khasi Hills District u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ban mana ïa kino kino ki briew ne ki kynhun ban rah pisa palat 50 hajar tyngka shaneng hapoh u pud u sam jong ka East Khasi Hills District.Katkum kane ka hukum, u DEO u la ong, “la ïoh jingtip ba ki don katto katne ki briew kiba rah bun bha ka pisa ban thied ïa ki nongthep vote ba kin ai ïa ka vote bakordor jong ki sha u kyrtong. Lada ailad kum ïa kine ki jait kam, kan ktah ïa ka jingïaid beit bad ka jingkhuid jingsuba ka elekshon Lok Sabha 2024 bad ka lah ban pynmih ïa ka jingïakajia, ka jingïashoh ïadat hapdeng ki paidbah, kaba lam sha ka jingthud jong ka shongsuk shongssaiñ, ka jingduh ei ki mynsiem briew bad ki mar ki mata.”U DEO u la mana ruh ban pynlong ïa ki jingïakhih kum ki jingshah thngan, ki proseshon, ki rally bad kiwei kiwei yn sa pynlong da ki katto katne ki kynhun bapher bapher hapoh ka district.La mana ban dro ha ki kynroh, ban tah poster ne kot kino kino ki jingthoh ba pynjah burom, ban pynieng ïa ki cut-out, hoarding, banners ha ki jaka paidbah ne ha ki phyllaw ing jong ki paidbah khlem da ïoh jingbit na ki trai iing bad ka jingïoh jingmynjur na ka ophis u Deputy Commissoner.La mana ïa ki seng saiñpyrthei ne kyrtong ban buh ïa ki banner ha surok ne ki jaka rung.La mana ban pynlong ïa ki jingïalang khlem da ïoh jingbit na ka ophis u Deputy Commissoner bad na ki Rangbah Shnong. La mana ban pyndonkam ïa ki tiar jingpynsawa hapdeng ka por 10:00 baje mynmiet haduh 6:00 baje mynstep.Lada pyndonkam ïa ki PA System/Loud Speaker khlem da ïoh jingbit yn kurup noh mardor da ki bor synshar district.Yn ym shah ban pynlong ïa ki proseshon bad ki rally khlem da ïoh jingbit.Kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor tad haduh ban da kut ka jingpynlong ïa ka elekshon.
title: Mana u DEO ka East Khasi Hills ban rah pisa palat 50 hajar shaneng

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: Ka ophis jong u Executive Engineer jong ka PHE Electrical Division ka la pynbna paidbah khamtam ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Mawlai (Umsohlang) ba kan don ka jing bym sam ïa ka um na ka bynta ki 3 sngi kaban treikam naduh ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai haduh ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai na ka daw jong ka jingpynkhuid ïa ka wahduid Umsohlang bad kiwei pat ki kam kiba kyrkieh.Ki jaka ki ban shah ktah na kane ka jingkhang sam um kin long ka Kynton Massar, ka Umjaïur, Mawdatbaki, Phudmuri, Syllai kariah, Motsyiar, Nonglum, ïewrynghep, Nongkwar, Mawroh, Nongpdeng, Patarim bad Umthlong.Ka jingsam biang ïa ka um kan sdang biang naduh ka 21 tarik ha ka nohphai sngi. Kumta la kyrpad ïa ki nongshong shnong ban pyllang lypa ïa ka um na ka bynta ban pyndonkam ha kitei ki sngi ban ym sam ïa ka um, na ka bynta kine ki daw ki bym lah kiar na ka liang ka ophis ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia.
title: 3 sngi yn sangeh sam um ka PHE ha Mawlai

content: Jowai, Lber 17: Ka Dorbar shnong Pdengshakap kaba pynïaid ïaka jingïalehkai phutbol ïaka ba la tip kum ka 10th Secondary School Football Knock-out Tournament 2023-24 ha madan Pdengshakap, West Jaiñtia Hills.Ka jingïalehkai hakane ka sngi saitjaiñ bala dep kala ïoh ban pynlong kawei ka jingïalehkai Quarter final ba khatduh ha pdeng ka Thun FC pyrshah ïaka One soul Utd (Pdengkarong) ha kaba ka Thun FC kala jop da 3-1 daka jingïa shut Tie-breaker hadien bala ïakhaid ka jingïalehkai da 1-1.Ïaka shikol jong ka Thun FC la ïoh ban thep da u Dritam haka minit kaba 35, katba ïa ka One Soul Utd (Pdengkarong) pat la ïoh ban thep da u Pynshai Lathong haka minit kaba 85. Kumta ka Thun FC kala buh jaka ïalade sha ka Semi-final jong kane ka Tournament. Kum ban shu pyn kynmaw ba ki Teams kiba la ïoh rung sha ka Semi-Final jong kane ka Tournament ki long ka Rymbai Shken shynriah SC, ka Thrangchynnam FC, ka YFC Trangblang bad ka Thun FC.Naka liang jong ka Tournament Committee kan bteng ïaka jingïalehkai Semi-Final ba nyngkong haka 23 tarik mynta u bnai hapdeng ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC pyrshah ïa ka Thrangchynnam FC ha ka por 2 baje nohphai sngi.Kumta naka liang jong ka Tournament Committee ka khot bad wer lang ïa baroh ki paid ieit phutbol jong ka thaiñ ban wan sakhi lang ïakane ka jingïalehkai Semi-Final ba nyngkong.
title: Rung Semi Final sa ka Thun FC ha ka Tournament Pdengshakap

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 17: U Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Khasi Hills District Bah Garod L.S.N Dykes, ha ka sngi saitjaiñ, u la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang kaba kyrpang bad ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba pher bapher kiba dei napoh ka distrik, ban pyntip sha ki shaphang ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Model Code of Conduct da ka Election Commission of India, na ka bynta ka jingjied nongmih-khmat sha ka Lok Sabha, 2024.Kane ka jingïalang ka long kum ka jingbthah bad pynkynmaw ïa baroh ki seng saiñ pyrthei, ba kim dei satia ban pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka Model Code of Conduct, khnang ban ïoh ka election kaba khuid kaba suba, khlem kino kino ki jingpynthut hapoh ka distrik. U la pynkynmaw ba ha ka election MP 2019, ka West Khasi Hills, District ka dei ka districk kaba duna bha ha ka jingwan jong ki nongthep vote bad ka long tang 64.4%. Kumta, u la kyntu jur ïa baroh ki nongthep vote ba ki dei ban don ka jingkitkhlieh bad ban pyndonkam hok ïa ka hok thep vote jong ki.Kino kino kiba kwah ban ïoh jingbit na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ki jingïalang paidbah, ki rally lane kino kino kam kiba ïadei bad ka election, ki hap ban da pan jingbit bad apply online lyngba ka Suvidha App. Lada kwah ban ujor ei ei lane lada don kiba pynkheiñ kyndon ki lah ban ujor lyngba ka cVIGIL App.La pyntreikam ïa u control room number 03654280152 lada don kiba kwah jingtip kiba ïadei bad ka election, kumjuh ruh ïa u toll-free helpline number 1950 la dep ban pyntreikam, khnang ba ki paidbah ki lah ban ujor ïa kino kino ki jingujor kiba ïadei bad ka elekshon.
title: Lum u DC Nongstoiñ ïa ki seng saiñ pyrthei

content: H a kane ka juk ba mynta la ïohi ba kiba bun ki khun ki kti kim don por shuh ban peit bad sumar hok ïa la ki kmie ki kpa kiba la pun la kha, la ri bad sumar bad pynheh pynsan ïa ki bad lehse ka MERCY HOME kadei kawei pat ka jaka kaba kyrpang tam ba kin pynlut ïa ka por ka jinglong tymmen jong ki da ka jingbym banse. Shi kyntien lah ban ong ruh ba ka jingdon jong kum kitei ki jaka ri ïa ki tymmen ki kro ba la pynïaid da ki Sister of Charity, ka long pat ka jingkyrmen na ka bynta kiba bun ki meiieit pa ieit kiba la duh noh ïa ka jingkyrmen ha ka jingim.Ïa ka jingtreikam bad ka jingshakri jong ka Mercy Home la tip kylleng kibynta jong ka jylla bad wat shabar ka jylla ruh khamtam eh ha kum ki bnai Kristmas bad Snem Thymmai namar bun ki kynhun kynthup naduh na ki Balang haduh ki sengbhalang kiba leit ban pynlut por shisien ha ka shisnem bad kitei ki paieit mei ieit.Hynrei, katba kiba rung ban leit jngoh ïa katei ka jaka sah kyrpang ki mih ym da ka mynsiem kaba sngewhun hynrei da ka jingkhia ka dohnud, khamtam eh haba ki ïoh sngew da la ki jong ki shkor bad ïohi da la ki jong ki khmat na kitei ki meiieit paieit ba dei ki khun kiba ki la pynheh pynsan bad pynnang pynstad kiba wan buh ïa ki hangtei namarba ki la bunkam palat ban beh ïa ka spah pyrthei bad ba kim don por shuh ban peit ïa ki.Tangba ym baroh ki long kumta, don pat napdeng jong ki kiba long marwei, kiba ym don khun ne ym don shuh kiba haïing hasem kiba ïa jan kiban peit ban sumar ïa ki. Kumta, kum ïa kitei, na ka liang ka Balang ne ki bor pynïaid shnong ki ju wan ban aiti noh ha ki nongpynïaid jong ka Mercy Home ban pynpeit ban sumar lem ïa ki.Ban sngewthuh khambha, wat ki khun trai ki dang shem jingeh ban peit ïa ka kmie ne kpa lajong, katno tam kan dei ïa ki sister kiba hap ban peit da ki phew ngut kiba kum kitei. Kam dei satia ka kam kaba suk ban pynbit pynbiang ïa ki man ka sngi la ka long naduh ka bam ka dih, ka kup ka sem, ka koit ka khiah bad khamtam eh haba ki shem jingeh wat ban leit painkhana.Katno ngut napdeng kiba pule ïa kane ka jingthoh kiba sngew sarong bad ong ba long katba long ngan ri ngan sumar hi ïa i mei i pa ha ka jinglong tymmen. Hato don seh ki khun kiba kheinkor ïa kiwei pat ban ïa la ka kmie bad u kpa. U Blei u ai ïangi tang iwei i mei bad iwei i pa bad da lei lei ngim lah lano lano ruh ban khot mei khot pa ïa kiwei pat ki briew. Ki shiphew hukum ruh ki kdew shai ba kum ki khun ki dei ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban burom ïa la u kpa bad ka Kmie.Kaba kham i lung mynsiem lada don napdeng jong phi kiba leit ban jngoh ïa kitei ki meiieit paieit kadei eh ba phin ïohi markhmat ba ki bapli ki ap khmih lynti ba iwei na kito kiba wan jngoh in dei i khun ne ki bahaïing hasem jong ki. Hynrei bunsien katei ka jingap khmih lynti jong ki ka shim por da ki snem ki snem ba kan urlong.Watla ki ïoh ïa ka jingieid bad ka jingshakri kaba paka tam eh palat ban ïa kaba ki khun ki lah ban leh hynrei ki sliang hir hir ban ïoh mad ïa ka jingieid jong ki khun. Bad phin lap ruh ba don kiba ong, pynphone lem seh ïa u/ka khun jongnga nga kwah tip lano kin wan peit ïanga.Ka Mercy Home naduh ba la seng ïa ka ha u snem 1973 ka la kylla long ka ïingbasa jong bun ki tymmen ki kro kiba ha ka jingnoh ka rta ki hap ban pynlut ïa ka jingim jong ki hangtei bad ki para tymmen.Watla ki khun trai kim ïohi patiaw shuh ia la ki kmie ki kpa, hynrei katno i pangmet bad lung ka mynsiem ban peit ba watla ka sniehdoh ka la ringsti, ki kti ki kjat ki la kyiuh bad kim skhem shuh ban ieng hynrei ki shah knieh kynthet ïa ka jingieid jong ki khun. Bun ki hap ban pynlut ïa ka por jong ki katto katne snem ha Mercy Home ha shwa ba kin khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.Ki ummat kuratia bad ki jingïam paitdohnud ha ka sngi khatduh jong i mei i pa jong phi kin long pynban ki jingshah kynshi kyneh ha ka pyrthei lada phim lah ban peit bad sumar ïa la ki kmie ki kpa ha ka jinglong tymmen jong ki.Lehse kan poi ka por ba ka kyntien tymmen kaba ong, Ka nongkylliang kaba kham sniew ka ap ïa kaba snoh ha piew’, kan sa kylla long pynban ka raibi ha kum kitei khun kiba sngew kumba ki wan hi sha kane ka pyrthei khlem ki kmie ki kpa.
title: Burom ïa la ki jong ki kmie ki kpa pynlut ïa ka por na ka bynta jongki

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 17: Sa tang ar snem eiei ka West Khasi Hills kan sa jam ïa u mawmer ba sanphew jong ka jingïaid lynti naduh ba la ïoh ïa ka, hynrei ki dang bun bah ki jingduna lada peit kata naduh ki lynti syngkieng, ka pule puthi, ka koit ka khiah, ka kamai ka kajih, ka bording, ka umbam umdih bad habaroh ki liang.Haba phai sha kane ka phang ka long kaba sngew lehraiñ ban ong ba ka West Khasi Hills ka la jan dap san phew snem. Kumta ha kaba ïadei bad ka jing bym pat biang jong ka district ha baroh ki liang, ki nongïalam ka Bharatya Janata Party ha ka sngi thohdieng ba la dep, ki la hiar sha Langpih kaba hap ha Rambrai Jyrngam constituency kaba dei kawei na ki constituency kiba dang duna palat ka roi ka par, ban pynshai sha ki nongsynshar shnong kaei kaba ki dei ban leh shuwa ba ka sorkar kan pynlong ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka Jubili rupa jong ka jingdap sanphew snem jong ka District.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la pynlong ha Langpih Government L.P skul kaba la pynïaid da u bah Spastarlin Nongrem u ba dei u nongïalam ba hakhmat jong ka BJP West Khasi Hills, la ïadon ryngkat da u bah David Kharsati National Council Member ka BJP, u bah Mewanker Lyngdoh State president jong ka BJP Youth wing, u ba dei ruh u nongsaid aiñ, u Dr. Evrist Myrsing secretary ka Meghalaya BJP Youth wing Meghalaya state unit bah Diostarness Jyndiang MLA barim ka Nongstoiñ ryngkat kiwei kiwei ki dkhot ba paw khmat jong ka BJP bad palat sanphew ngut ki riew rangbah na ki shnong khappud ba kynthup naduh ki shnong Khasi bad ki shnong Garo.Ha katei ka sngi la ïoh ïa ka jingpynshai na u Dr. Evrist Myrsing ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingeh ba ki paitbah nongshong shnong kiba shong ha khappud ki ïakynduh na ka por sha ka por.U bah Myrsing haba pynshai halor katei ka phang, u la ong ba kum uwei na ki nongshong shnong ha Block II, kaba dei ka jaka khappud kaba ki jingïakajia bad ka Assam ki mih na ka por sha ka por, u sngewthuh shai ïa ki jingeh ba ki paitbah nongshong shnong ha ka thaiñ Langpih ki ïakynduh, hynrei wat la ki ïakynduh jingeh man ka por ruh ki dei ban sngewthuh ba ka shong suk shong saiñ para nongshong shnong ka dei kaba donkam eh.U la ong ruh ba ki briew jong ka Assam ki dei ki nong India ki briew jong ka Meghalaya ruh ki dei ki nong India kumta ban thaw ïa ki jingïaklumar para nong India kam long kaba bha. Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba ki pulit kiba don ha khappud ruh kim don hok ban ïashah shilliang ïano ïano, namar ka jingshah shilliang ka dei ka daw bah kaba wan rah ïa ka huri hura ha ki shnong khappud.U bah Mewanker Lyngdoh haba pynshai lyngkot ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba kum u nongsaid aiñ u sngewthuh ba ki jingbym ïasngewthuh para nongshong shnong ki don ha kylleng ki jaka. Hynrei haba ki jingbym ïasngewthuh jingmut ki jia, kim dei pat ban poi haduh u pud jong ka jingïaklumar namar ka long kaba beaiñ.U la pynshai ruh ba lada ki don kino kino ki jingïaklumar kum ki nongshong shnong, kim bit da lei lei ban shim ïa ka aiñ ha la ka kti, hynrei ki dei ban pynkloi ban pan jingïarap na ki bor ka aiñ.U bah David Kharsati haba ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba kum u Dkhot jong ka National Council jong ka BJP, u tip ba ki paitbah katei ka thaiñ ki la angnud haduh katta katta ban pynbeit noh ïa u pud u sam. Ki ju pynsngew na ka por sha ka por sha u Conrad Kongal Sangma Myntri Rangbah ka jylla bad sha u Himanta Biswa Sarma Myntri Rangbah ka Assam, ba kin pynkut noh ïa ki jingeh ha khappud bad ban pynbeit noh da u pud u sam ba thikna. Hynrei lada ki Myntri ka Sorkar pdeng kim mon ki Myntri Rangbah jong ki ar jylla kim lah satia ban pynurlong lada dawa katno katno ruh.U la ong ruh ba lada ki paitbah ki kwah ban pynbeit noh ïa u pud u sam kin phah da ki jingthoh sha u Myntri kam pohïing ka ri bad ma u kum u dkhot ka National Council jong ka BJP, u ba ju don lynter ha Delhi bad u ba ju ïakren ïa ki kam bad u Myntri kam pohïing ka ri na ka por sha ka por, un pynsngew lyngba kitei ki jingthoh khnang ba ka sorkar pdeng kan shim khia bad kan leh ïa kaba donkam.Ha ka jingïalang la jied ïa u bah Spastarlin Nongrem kum u Convener jong ka Committee ka ban buddien ïa ka roi ka par hapoh West Khasi Hills, nangta saw ngut kiwei pat ki ban long kum ki co-convener.
title: Yn buddien ka BJP ïa ka roi ka par ha WKH shuwa ka jingdap 50 snem

content: Shillong, Lber, 16: Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynbna ïa ki tarik ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Chief Election Commisioner (CEC) Rajiv Kumar, ka elekshon ha Meghalaya kan long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong ha ka Phase-I. Ka jingniew ïa ki vote kan long ha ka 4 tarik Jylliew.Ka sngi khatduh ban thep kyrteng kan long ha ka 27 tarik, Lber bad 28 tarik, Lber. Ka tarik ban bishar ia ki kot ki sla kan long ha ka 28 tarik, Lber bad 30 tarik Lber. Ka sngi weng kyrteng ki kyrtong kan long ha ka 30 tarik, Lber bad 2 tarik, ïaiong.U Kumar u la ïathuh ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka elekshon kan long haduh hynñiew sien ha baroh kawei ka ri. Ka Meghalaya kaba don ar tylli ki Seat ba kynthup ïa ka Shillong bad ka Tura ba hap ha ka Phase-I kan sa thep vote lang bad ki Jylla, kata, ka Arunachal Pradesh, Andaman &Nicobar Island, Andhra Pradesh, Chandigarh, DDN&H, Delhi, Goa, Gujarat, Himachal Pradesh, Haryana, Kerala, Lakshadweep, Ladakh, Mizoram, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Puducherry, Sikkim, Tamil Nadu, Punjab, Telangana, Uttarakhand, Karnataka, Rajasthan, Tripura, Manipur, Chhattisgarh, Assam, Odisha, Madhya Pradesh, Jharkhand, Maharashtra, Jammu & Kashmir, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar & West Bengal.Da ka jingpynbna ïa ka tarik ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) ka la treikam mardor ha baroh kawei ka ri.U CEC u la ïathuh ba ki don 96.8 klur ngut ki nongthep vote ha ka ri India bad 49.7 klur ki dei ki shynrang bad 47.1 klur ki dei ki kynthei.U la ïathuh ruh na napdeng kine ki don 19.74 klur ki nongthep vote kiba hapdeng ka rta 21 haduh 29 snem.
title: Lok Sabha Elekshon: 19 tarik Ïaïong yn thep vote ha jylla Meghalaya, ñiew vote 4 tarik Jylliew

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 17 : Ka West Khasi Hills District Boxing Association ka kitbok ïa ar ngut ki thei ïa kura na West Khasi Hills, i hep rit Isawanda Nongsiej na ka shnong Tiehsaw Nongstoiñ (35-37 kg) in mihkhmat ban ïa shim bynta sha ka 3rd sub juniors boy’s & girls National Boxing Championship ka ban long ha Noida, UP mynta u bnai.Na ka liang ka seng ka kitbok ïa i ne i heprit ban ïalehkai bha ban wanrah burom ïa ka thaiñ bad ïa ka jylla hi baroh kawei. Ha kajuh ka por ka WKHBA ka ai ka jingkit bok kit rwiang ïa i thei ïa kura na Upper New Nongstoiñ West Khasi Hills District i Veronica Sohshang (45-46 kg), i ban leit mih khmat na ka jylla sha ka 3rd North East Olympic Game ka ban long mynta hi u bnai ha Nagaland.Ka synuk ka kyrmen ba baroh ar ngut ki thei ïa kura na West Khasi Hills, kin ïa lehkai bha ha kitei ki rynsan kiba heh jong ka ri bad jong ka shatei ka thaiñ lam mihngi hi baroh kawei ong u samla Despitol Sun President WKHBA.Ka seng ka sngew dei ban ai khublei ïa ka Meghalaya Boxing Association, halor ka jinglah jong ka ban kyntiew ïa ki thei bad ki rang ïa kura ka jylla lyngba kiba bun ki jingïakop ïa kura, kata lada dei ha ka jylla lane ha ki rynsan ïa kop ïa kura ba heh duh jong ka Ri India.
title: Kitbok ka WKHDBA ïa ki snar ïa kura na Nongstoiñ

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 17: Khnang ban ïoh ïa ka election Lok Sabha 2024, kaba khuid kaba suba khlem kano kano ka jingpynthut bad ban pyntreikam ïa ki aiñ hapoh ki kyndon jong ka 144 Cr.P.C, u District Magistrate Eastern West Khasi Hills, District Bah G. Kharmawphlang IAS, katkum ka Model code of Conduct, u la pynmih ïa ka hukum ba la khang pyrshah pynlong ïa kino kino ki jingïalang, ki jingïaïaid paidbah, khlem da ïoh jingbit.Ym shah ban buh ïa kino kino ki jingthoh, ne ban wah ïa kino kino ki jingthoh kiba long kum shi bynta jong ka jingïalap elekshon ha ki jaka Sorkar ne kino kino ki jaka paidbah. Ym shah ban pyndonkam ïa ki kali sorkar ne ki Ïing Sorkar na ka bynta ki kam election, ban pynlong ïa ki jaka mane blei kum ki jaka ïalap elekshon.Ym shah pyndonkam ïa ki tynhung pynsawa shuwa ka 6 baje mynstep bad hadien ka por 11 baje mynmiet. Ym shah ban rah ne thep pisa ha pla palat ïa ka 50,000/-. Ym shah ban wah banner, placard, hoarding, lane kino kino ki jingthoh kiba ïadei bad kam ïalap elekshon ha ki ïing jong ki briew, ki jingtei ïing, ki jaka paitbah bad kiwei kiwei, khlem da ïoh jingbit shuwa na kit rai. Ym bit ban pyndonkam da ki kali kiba khlem ïoh jingbit ha ka por ba pynlong jingïalang ne jingïaid paidbah.Ym shah ban thoh ïa ki poster, ki kot lyngkdop, ki banner ki lama bad kiwei kiwei khlem da ïoh jingbit. La khang ban ïalap elekshon hapoh 100 meter na ki Polling station. Ym bit ban pyndonkam ïa ki ktien khlem akor ha ka por ba ïalap elekshon paidbah ne jingïaid paidbah. La khang pyndonkam ïa ki lad pathai khubor, la ki dei ki kot khubor, ne lyngba ki tv, radio, mobile, ki SMS, kum ki lad ban ïalap elekshon khlem da ïoh shuwa ïa ka jingbit.La khang pyrshah ïa ka jingrah suloi ha ki jaka paidbah haduh ban da kut ka elekshon bad la bthah ïa baroh ki briew kiba don ïa ki suloi license kiba dei napoh Eastern West Khasi Hills, District ba kin wan pyndem bad wan buh noh mardor ïa ki suloi jong ki ha ki Police Station kiba hajan eh jong ki.Hynrei kane ka hukum kan ym treikam ïa ki pulit/ki shipai bad ki nongïalehkai sport kiba dei ki dkhot jong ka National Rifle, Association bad kito ki briew kiba don bynta ban ïada ïa ka suk ka saiñ, la ki dei kiba lah registar da ki Security Agency lane da ki Bank. Kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor.
title: Pynmih hukum u Majistor EWKH shwa ka elekshon MP

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 17: Ka Election Commission of India (ECI), ka pynbna ba ka ka General Election ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Lok Sabha 2024 yn pynlong ha ka 19tarik u ïaiong 2024 bad ka mynta la pyntreikam ïa ka Model Code of Conduct hapoh ka District hi baroh kawei bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki kyndon 144 CrPC.La ong ruh ba ka tnat Election Commission kan peitngor ba baroh kin iaid beit iaid ryntih bad ki nong thep vote kin thep ïa ki vote jong ki khlem kano kano ka jingartatien bad khlem kano kano ka jingsheptieng.Ha kajuh ka por ka tnat kan peit ngor ruh ïa kino kino ki briew kiba rah ïa ka song pisa ban thied lane ban pynbor ïa ki nong thep vote bad ruh la mana ban pynlong ïa kano kano ka prokram iakhih hapoh ka district bad hukum ruh ban ym dei ban don kano kano ka jingiakajia hapdeng ki paidbah kaba ktah ïa ka shongsuk shong saiñ hapoh ka district.Ki bor synshar district ki la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ba mana ban rah pisa 50000 hajar shaneng, la mana ban pynlong jingïalang paidbah ne jingïakhih paidbah hapoh ka district bad kane ka hukum kan treikam tat haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.La hukum ruh ïa baroh kito kiba don ia ki suloi ba ki dei ban pynppoi noh ïa ki sha ki Police Station, Outposts bad Beat Houses kiba don hajan kaba long katkum ka aiñ Arms Act, 1959.La mana ba ym bit ban thoh kino kino ki jingthoh ha ki kynroh, kum ki posterr bad kiwein kiwei bad ruh ban pynieng kino kino ki banners, ki lama hapoh ki phyllaw jong ki ophis sorkar, ïa ki banners lane ki lama lah ban buh tang ha ki jaka jong ki briew shimet da kaba ioh jingbit ba ki trai jaka bad ki banare ne ki lama kim dei pat ban wanrah kano kano ka jingklumar ïa kiwei.Lada wah ïa ki lama ha ki kali kim dei ban wanrah ïa kano kano ka jingbym sngewtynnad kaba long katkum ki aiñ ne ki kyndon jong ka Motor Vehicles Act.La mana ban buh ïa kino kino ki banaer lane ki lama ha ki kali kamai laitnoh sa tang lada ka kali ka dei kaba pyndonkam na ka bynta ka elaction bad dei ruh ban da ioh jingbit na ka ophis jong u District Election Officer/Returning Officer.Kane ka kyndon aiñ 144 CrPC jong ka Code of Criminal Procedure 1973 ka mana ruh ban arrah ïa ki tiar pynmynsaw ne ki tiar pynbthei ki ban ktah ïa ka shongsuk shong saiñ hapoh ka district.
title: Mana u DC ka East Jaiñtia Hills ïa ki paidbah ban rah pisa palat 50 hajar shaneng

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber, 17: U Bah T. Lyngwa, District Magistrate, South West Khasi Hills District, hadien ba ka Election Commission jong ka Ri India ka la pynbna ha ka 16 tarik u Lber, 2024 kaba ïa dei bad ka General Election sha ka Lok Sabha, 2024 bad ba ka sngi thep vote ha ka Jylla Meghalaya kandei ha ka 19 tarik bnai Ïaïong, 2024.U District Magistrate u la pynjari ïa ka Section 144 CrPC ha South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba la khang bad mana na kaba rah ïa ki suloi bad ki tiar pynmynsaw kynthup ka jingpynmih huri hura da uno uno u nongshong shnong kaba lah ban pynthud ïa ka jingïaid-beit ïaid-ryntih jong ka elekshon ha South West Khasi Hills District.Kumta, ka long kaba donkam ban don ka jing-shongsuk shong-shngaiñ ha baroh kawei ka South West Khasi Hills District bad ka jingrah ïa ki suloi bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar pynmynsaw da ki katto katne ki nongshong shnong jong ka distrik ka lah ban wanrah ka jingthaw kulmar, shong syier bad kiwei kaba lah ban pynduh ïa ka hok jong ki nongshong shnong ban leit ïashimbynta ha ka jingïathep vote.Namarkata, u la wer ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba don ïa ki license suloi ban leit buh noh mar mar ïa ki tiar jong ki ha kano kano ka Police Station kaba don hajan hapoh 10 sngi naduh ba pynmih ïa kane ka hukum.Kinokino ki bym leh kumba la bthah, yn kheiñ ne ñiew beaiñ bad yn shim ruh kum ka dak ban khanglad ïa ki nongtrei sorkar na kaba pyndep ïa ki kamram jong ki kaba long ruh ka jingshah pynshitom katkum ka aiñ.Kane ka hukum kan treikam mardor tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: Pynjari 144 CrPC ha SWKH, khang ban rah suloi ne tiar pynmynsaw

content: Nongpoh, Lber 17: U District Magistrate ka Ri Bhoi, u Arpit Upadhyaya hadien ba ka election commission ka ri India ka la dep ban pynban ïa ka tarik jong ka jingjied nongmihkhmat sha ka ïingdorbar thaw aiñ ha Lok sabha ba la pynbeit ban long ha ka 19 tarik u Ïaiong 2024 bad tang hadien ba la pynbna ïa katei ka tarik election MP sha Lok Sabha u District Magistrate u la pynbna paidbah ruh ba ka Model Code of Conduct ka la treikam ha baroh ki bynta jong ka Ri Bhoi District.Kumba la pynkup bor katkum ka Section 144 CrPC, u District Magistrate u la pynmih ïa ki hukum ban khang pyrshah na ka bynta ki jingtoh kiba ïa dei ba ka election kum kaba thoh dak ha ki kynroh, ban tah poster, ki banner ki lama ha ki jaka sorkar ne ki jaka paidbah.La khang pyrshah ruh ban ban wah lama ne banner ha ki jaka ki riew shimet khlem da ioh bor na ki trai jaka, ka jingtah sticker ne lama ha ki kali paidbah ne ki kali kamai kam dei ban ktah ïa ka leit ka wann ki paidbah bad na ka bynta ki kalai kamai paidbah la shah ban wah lama ne ki sticker tang lada ki la ioh bor na u District Election Officer ne ki Returning Officer.Kane ka kyndon aiñ ka la khang pyrshah ruh ban rah ïa ki tiar siat ne ki kynja tiar ba pynbthei katba ym pat kut kane ka election ban jied ïa ki MP sha ka ing dorbar thaw aiñ ha Lok Sabha bad la shah ban rah ïa ki tiar siat la ki dei ki pistor ne ki suloi tnag ïa ki Police, Home guard, ki nongtrei ka tnad forest, BSF, CMPF bad kito kiba don License ki dei ruh ban leit buh sha ki Police Station ba don hajan ki jaka sah jong ki.Kane ka kyndon ka khang pyrshha ruh ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang election khlem da ioh jingbit n aka ophis u District Election Officer ne na ki Rangbah Shnong bad la shah ruh ban pyndonkam ïa ki tiar jingpynsawa (PA System) tang hapoh ka 10 baje mynmiet bad kino kino kiba pyndonkam palat ïa kane ka por kin shah ngat ha katei ka kyndon ba la dep ban pynjari.La pyntip ruh ba kane ka kyndon aiñ ka la treikam mardor tang mar ïa dep pynban ka ECI ïa ka tarik jong ka election ban jied ïa ki MP sha ka ing Dorbar sha Lok Sabha bad kan treikam ruh katba ym pat pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: Pynbna u District Magistrate ba la treikam ïa ka Model Code of Conduct ha Ri-Bhoi

content: Shillong, Lber 17: Ka khubor ba la ïoh na ki pulit la ïathuh ba u Papular R Marak u la ujor ba ha ka 18 tarik u Rymphang, 2024, ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la tuh ïa ki spare part jong ka kali napoh ka sem kali kaba hab hapoh ka Ampati PS (SWGH).
title: Shah tuh tiar kali na Ampati

content: Shillong, Lber 17 : U Bah Process T Sawkmie, President ka Mawlai Constituency Progressive Forum (MCPF), uba dei ruh u MLA barim ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka 15 tarik u Lber, 2024 u la leit ïakynduh kyrpang ïa I Dr Helen Giri Syiem ha ïingsah jong I ha Mawlai Mawroh.Ha kane ka jingïakynduh u la ai khublei bad kitbok kitrwiang ïa i halor ka jingïohpdiang jong i ïa ka khusnam Sangeet Natak Akademi Award naka bynta u snem 2023 na ka kti jong ka President ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu kaba la pynkup burom ïa i ha ka prokram ba la pynlong hapoh ka Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi dang shen.I Dr Helen i la ïoh ïa kane ka khusnam halor ka jinglah jong i ban kyntiew bad ban pynpaw nam ïa ki rukom tem bad rukom put tynrai ka Meghalaya.Kum shi bynta ban pynpaw ïa ka dak jong jingsngewkmen bad sngewburom ïa i u bah PT Sawkmie u la ai ruh ïa I jingai sngewbha sha I Dr HelenHaba kren halor jong I, u bah Sawkmie u la pynpaw, ba watla ki dang dei tang ka jaitbynriew ba dangrit, hynrei ki la lah ban sei ïa ki longkmie bakhraw na kane ka jylla jong ngi kiba la ïoh jingithuh bad ïoh khusnam na ka por sha ka por na ki President bapher bapher jongka ri.U la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewkmen bad jingsngewsarong ba Ine i longkmie na ka thain Mawlai i la ïoh kat kane ka jingithuh ha ka sorkar India.U la pyrto ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong I Dr Helen wat haduh kine ki sngi na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka riti dustur jong u Khasi lyngba ki tiar tynrai.U la kyntu ïa ki khun samla ba kin bud ïa ka nuksa jong I ban long kiba trei shitom wat hapdeng bun ki mawjynthud ha ka jingïaid lynti ha ka jingim da kaba ïaishah bad dem minot ban pynurlong ïa ki thong ba ki don.
title: Watla ngi dei ka jaitbynriew barit, hynrei ngi la pynmih ïa ki longkmie bakhraw : Bah Process

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 17: Ka ophis jong u District Medical & Health Officer (MI) West Khasi Hills ka la sdang ïa ka tour programme naduh ka taïew ba la dep, ban leit sha ki Sub Health Centre bad ha ki shnong ban pynshai sha ki nongshong shnong kumno ba kin ïada na ka jingpang malaria.Ha ka taïew ba la dep ki nongtrei ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka West Khasi Hills, ki la leit ban ai jingpynshai paitbah ha ki lai tylli ki Sub Health centre kiba don ha ka shnong Nonglang, Langja bad Kyrdum, ha kaba ki la rah lypa ruh ïa ki tiar ban test ïa ki nongshong shnong la ki don ne em ka jingpang malaria, ki la rah ruh ryngkat ki dawai ban sam sha kito kiba don ïa katei ka jingpang bad ki musari, ban sam sha kito ki nongshong shnong kiba la don kyrteng ha ka thup ba ka thup ba la buh jingthoh da ka tnad ka koit ka khiah.Ka jingleit pynshai jong ki briew jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah kim shym la pynkut tang ha ki Sub Health centre, hynrei ki la leit shaduh ki shnong kiba kyndong tam ban leh ïa ka test, sam ïa ki musari bad ki dawai, ban pynshai kumno kin pyndonkam ïa ki musari ha ka por ba ki thiah mynmiet ban ïada na ka jingdait ki skaiñ pyrjong kiba dei ki nongkit ïa ki khñiang jingpang malaria.Ha ka sngi thohdieng ki nongtrei ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ki la hiar sha ka shnong Umpha kaba don ha khappud bad ka Assam ban pynshai sha ki nongshong shnong kumno ba kin ïada na ka jingpang malaria. Ha katei ka sngi ki la rah ruh ryngkat ki musari, ki tiar test bad ki dawai bad da ka jingïatreilang bad ka ASHA la lah ban pyndep ha ka por ba biang.Ha kajing pynshai sha ki paitbah nongshong shnong shuwa ban leh ïa ka test bad ban sam ïa ki musari, ki nongtrei ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ki la pynshai ba ka sorkar ka la ai khnang da kitei ki musari kiba la dep pdem ha ka dawai bad ïa kitei ki musari ki paitbah ki dei ban pyndonkam hok bad kim dei ban pyndonkam ha kaba leit tong doh thli doh sher, namar ki dei kiba la pdem ha ka dawai bad ka lah ban ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki.Ki la pynshai ruh ba shuwa ba kin pyndon kam ki dei ban thad shuwa haduh shimiet khnang ba ka dawai kan ym sma shuh nangta kim bit da lei lei ban leit sait ïa kitei ki musari ha ki wah duid lane,ki pung lane ha jan ki jaka tong um namar lada ki don kid oh thli, ki shalynnai kin ïap bad lada don kiba tong bad bam kan ktah haduh katta katta ïa ka koit ia ka khiah.Haba kylli na ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah la ki la lap ne em lyngba ka test ba ki la dep leh ba ki don kiba ïoh jingpang malaria, ki la ïathuh ba haduh katei ka sngi ki la lap lyngba ka test ba ki don ar ngut kiba don ïa ka jingpang malaria, uwei ha Nonglang bad uwei pat ha Mawlan (B) bad hadien ba ki la lap ki la ai sha ki ïa ki dawai ba kin pyndonkam.Ki la ong ruh ba katei ka programe jong ki kam pat kut satia bad kan dang bteng haduh ba kin da lah ban pyndep lut ïa baroh ki shnong. Ki la ong ruh ba lada ïanujor bad ki por ba mynshuwa, ka jingpang malaria ha kine ki sngi ka la jan duh jait.Ki kyrmen ruh ba lada ki paitbah ki ïatreilang bad ka tnad ka koit ka khiah bad ki bud ryntih ïa ki jingbthah ba la pynshai ha ki, ym don jingartatien ba yn sa lah ban rat diengkhong ïa ka jingpang malaria.
title: Ban ïada na ka jingpang malaria sam musari ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah sha ki paitbah

content: Shillong, Lber, 17: Ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) East Khasi Hills mynta ka sngi ka la leit ban pan jingshai na u Commissioner jong ka tnat Transports halor ki 40 tylli ki Post kiba lait kiba khynthup naduh ka Enforcement Inspector bad Enforcement Checker kiba la shu thep kam hapoh katei ka Post khlem pyllait ia kano kano ka adverstisement .Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor na ka liang u Assistant Secretary jong ka Seng U Samla Tyllibor Swer  u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ka seng ka thmu ban ia kynduh ia u Commissioner jong ka tnat Transport hynrei namar ba um don la shu ioh ban ia kynduh ia uwei na ki officer jong ka tnat ban kylli halor ka jingpyllait advertisement.halor ki 40 tylli ki post ki ba lait kiba khynthup ia ka 10 tylli ka post Enforcement inspector bad 30 tylli Enforcement checkers, kiba la shu pynrung ïa ki briew khlem don kano kano ka advertisement.U la ong ba na ka liang ka Seng ka dap ka jingsngewkhia halor ka rukom leh jong ka sorkar khamtam ha ba dei bad kane ka mat, namar ka dei ka bynta kaba kongsan ki samla. Na ka liang ka HNYF ka la maham jur ia ki tnat Sorkar bapher bapher ha kim dei ban leh kai bad ka lawei ki samla namar ka ktah ïa ka wad kam jam jong ki samla.u la ong ban shu thep ha kano kano ka post da ki briew la jong ka wanrah jingeh ïa ki wei pat khamtam kiba wan na ki longïing ba duk kiba ki kmie ki kpa ki trei shitom ban pynlut na bynta la ki khun.
title: Khynra ka HNYF ba thungkam khlem Advertisement ha tnad Transport

content: Nongpoh, Lber 17: Ki paid Garo kiba shong basah ha ka thaiñ rilum Khasi mynta ka sngi ha ka lama jong ka All Khasi Achik Federation (AKHAF) ki la pynrem jur ïa ka KHADC halor ka jingkyntait ban ai bor ïa ki Garo kiba shong basah ha kane ka thaiñ rilum Khasi ban long rangbah shnong bad ki dawa ruh dei ban ailad ïa ki Shnong Garo ba kin don la u jong u Rangbah shnong na ka bynta ban synshar khadar ha ki shnong Garo.Kane ka jingpynrem ki paidbah Garo lyngba katei ka kynhun seng ka la paw mynta ka sngi ha ka jingïalang ba la pynlong ha Nongspung A ba hap ha Pilangkata Police Outpost bad ïa kane ka jingïalang la lamkhmat da ka Serimina D Marak, kaba dei ka Presdient ka RI Bhoi District Women Wing. Ka Sinita Monin kum ka Vice president, Kleden Sangma kum ka General Secretary bad ba la ïa don lang ruh ki dkhot ka Central Executive Committee ba kynthup ïa u CLiftus Ch Marak kum u President bad u Manuel Ch Marak kum u General secretary.Ha kane ka jingïalang la wan poi kumba 300 tam ki paid Garo kiba la ïa shong pyrkhat ha kane ka jingïalang bad kiba la shim ïa ka rai ban pynrem jur ïa ka KHADC halor ka jingpynduh long rangbah shnong ïa ki Garo ha u pud u sam ka KHADC.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi sha ki Nongthoh Khubor, ka Serimina D. Marak bad u Maniel Ch Marak ki la pynrem u jur ïa ka KHADC halor ki aiñ ba la shna bad ba la khanglad ban long rangbah shnong ki Garo hapoh rilum Khasi ba ki Garo kim ioh lad shuh ban long rangbah shnong wat ha ki Shnong ba don tang da ki paid Garo.Ki la ong ruh ba kane ka jingpynduh long rangbah shnong ïa ki Garo ka la ktah shibun ïa ki paid Garo kiba la shong la sah ha kane ka rilum Khasi naduh hyndai hynthai ba ki la im ha ka shongsuk shongsain, hynrei kane ka jingpynmih hukum ka KHADC ban nym ailad ïa ki Garo ban long rangbah shnong ka la ktah shisha ïa ka hok longbriew man briew ki paid Garo.Ki la ong ruh ha kane ka jingïalang ba la wan ban shim bynta da ki pad Garo ki la shim ruh ka rai ban dawa na ka KHADC ba ka dei ban weng ïa katei ka kyndon aiñ ban khanglad ban long rangbah shnong ki paid Garo bad ka sorkar jylla ruh ka dei ban shim lem ïa ka jingkitkhleh halor kane ka bynta khnang ba kan nym ktah ïa ka shongsuk shongsain ki paidbah ha kane ka rilum Khasi.Shuh shuh, kitei ki nongïalam ki paid Garo ki la dawa ruh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K. Sangma ba un tuklar ïa kane ka kam bad na ka liang ka All Khasi Hills Achik Federarion ka la ai por ar taiew ban tuklar ïa kane ka kam bad lada kane kam urlong kim banse ban shim pat da kiwei ki lad ki lynti kiba tyngeh, la pynpaw kitei ki nongïalam ki paid Garo.
title: Pynrem ki paid Garo ïa ka KHADC ba khanglad long Rangbah Shnong ha rilum Khasi

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 17: Ka ‘National Testing Agency’ (NTA) kan sa pynlong ïa ka Common University Entrance Test (CUET(UG) – 2024 ha ki 13 tylli ki ktien ha kylleng ka ri India khnang ba kan long ka jingïarap na ka bynta ki khun samla ba kin ïoh rung Under Graduate Programme.Katei ka Under Graduate Programme ka ban long ha ka Hybrid Mode (kaba kyntup ïa ka Computer Based Test (CBT)/Pen & Paper) na ka bynta baroh ki Central Universities (kynthup ïa ka ka NEHU ka long kawei na ki Central University hapoh jylla Meghalaya) bad kiwei kiwei de ki skul bah ne universities ba la pynïasoh hapoh ri na ka bynta u snem 2024 – 2025 khnang ban ïoh ban rung ha ki Under Graduate Courses ha ki kolej ba pynïasoh ba kine ki universities.Namarkata, kane ka long ka jingpynbna ba donkam na ka bynta ki paid nongshong shnong ka South West Khasi Hills District khamtam na ka bynta ki khynnah skul ki ba shong klas 12, kiba wad admission ha ki Under Graduate Courses.Ki jingtip ba kham bniah ki samla pule ki lah ban peit lyngba ka https://cuet.samarth.ac.in/index.php/site/index. Ka Tarik ba khatduh ban phah ïa ki phom lyngba ka online application ka dei ha ka 26 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024 haduh 11:50 baje mynmiet.
title: Yn pynlong ka NTA ïa ka CUET(UG), 2024

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 17: Ka Indian Army ka khot ïa ki samla jong ka South West Khasi Hills District na ka bynta ba kin thep ïa ka kam shipai lyngba ka ‘Online Registration’ ba la plie naduh u bnai Rympphang, 2024.Shuh shuh la pyntip ba kaba kwah ban thep ki lah ban leh ïa ka ‘online registration’ ha ka Join Indian Army website kaba dei www.joinindian-army.nic.in ha kaba ki lah ban pynrung kyrteng na ka bynta ka kam Agniveer (General duty) (All Arms), Agniveer Tech (All Arms), Agniveer Clerk/Store Keeper Technical (All arms), Agniveer Tradesmen (All Arms) na ka bynta ki ba lah pass class 10) bad ka Agniveer Tradesmen (All arms) na ka bynta kiba lah pyndep ïa ka class 8).Na ka bynta ki jingtip ba kham bniah ki lah ban phone sha u Recruiting Office (Headquarters), Shillong ha u 0364-2504177 lane ha ka email: rohqshillong@gmail.com.
title: Khot ka Indian Army ïa ki samla ban rung kam shipai

content: Tura, Lber 16 : Lai ngut ki runar kiba shna ïa ka social media page bad kam ba pynkhie im ïa ka GNLA kaba la iap bad khot ïalade kum ka “GNLA-R ( Regroup)”, kila shah kem ha ki Pulit ka Ri-lum Garo ha ka sngi Saitjain.Kine ki laingut ki dei ki runar kiba ju donkti ha ki kam dawa pisa, lute bad kiwei kiwei, ong ki Heh Pulit.Kawei ka jingthoh ka la mih ha Facebook myn ha ka 22 tarik Rymphang ba la thoh da uwei u briew uba ai kyrteng ïalade da u Goera Pantora Sangma, uba kam ba u dei u Chairman ba thymmai ka GNLA-R kaba don ïa ka Headquarter ha Tura.U Superintendent of Police ka West Garo Hills ula pyntip ba ki Pulit haba tohkit ïa kane ka jingkam, kila lap ïa kine ki lai ngut bad ki la kem ïa ki na kylleng ki jaka ka West bad North Garo Hills.U iathuh ba kine ki runar kila phla ïa ka jingshna ïa ka facebook page u ‘Goera Pantora” bad thep ïa kane ka kyrwoh khubor.Kine ki laingut ki kyrteng u Sengsrang N Marak, Thosengcheba A Sangma bad u Chijang A Sangma.Na kine ki briew, ki Pulit kila ïoh kurup ïa ki mobile phone bad Sim card, ka laptop, ki booklet ba don 82 tylli ki pamphlet bad ruh 6 tylli ki pamphlet ha ka kyrteng jong ka All Garo Hills Merchant Association.U SP ula kyntu ba lada don mano mano ba tip shaphang kiwei pat ki dkhot ka GNLA-R ba kin sngewbha ban ai jingtip sha ki thanad kiba don marjan.
title: Shah kem 3 ngut ki runar ba kam ban pynkhie im biang ïa ka GNLA

content: Shillong, Lber 17: Ha kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba u L Suchiang u la phah ka jingujor ba ha ka 3 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 9.30 baje mynmied, ki runar bym lah ban ithuh kiba don kumba 3/4 ngut ki la shoh ïa u ha Mawlai Nongkwar, Shillong bad ki la shim da ka bor ïa ka mobile phone bad ka pla pisa kaba don T. 4,000/- bad ki kot kiba donkam.
title: Shah tuh mobile bad Pisa na Mawlai

content: Haba ïaid kylleng kane ka ri Khasi-Jaintia jong ngi la shem ba ka jingduk ka la nang kiew bad kata ka jingduk ka pynlong ïa ngi ba ngin sngew rangli, sngew dukha mynsiem. Ngi sngew ba ka sur jingud jong ngi kam poi sha ki tyndong shkor jong ka sorkar. Katba nang ïaid ki sngi katta ngi nang ïohi ïa ki samla rit kiba la pep skul noh shipor. Ka jingduna ki skul heh kiba ai jinghikai haduh ka klas kaba shiphew bad haduh ka klas kaba khat-ar ka pynlong ïa kiba bun ki kmie ki kpa ba kin phah ïa ki khun jong ki sha ki skul ha Shillong. Kane ka mut ba ki khynnah skul ki hap ban shong iing wai, ban shet ban tiew bad ban pule kot ruh. Kito kiba na ki iing ki sem kiba ïoh ba kot te ka biang hi ban phah pule sha Shillong. Hynrei bun ki bym kot bor ban leh kumta. Te ym banse ban pynpep skul noh ïa ki khun kiba dang samla rit bad kiba dang shong ïa ka klas kaba hynriew ne hynniew.Nga ïashem bad kawei ka khynnah samla kaba shong klas kaba khyndai. Mynta ka lah kiew sha ka klas kaba shiphew. Kane ka khynnah ka leit skul ha kawei ka skul ha Ri Bhoi. Lada phah pule ïa ki kot phareng tang kawei ka kyntien ruh kam nang. Sa hadien shisnem kane ka samla ka la dei ban ïaleh ïa ka eksamin matrik bad ki subjek baroh dei ban jubab da ka ktien phareng lait noh ka sobjek Khasi. Kane ka khynnah kam kot tang bad kiba shong ïa ka klas kaba nyngkong (Class-1) ban sngewthuh ïa ka ktien phareng. Ka jingkylli ka long kumno kane ka khynnah ka kiew klas manla u snem haduh ban da poi ka klas kaba khyndai, khlem da sngewthuh ïa kaei kaba ki nonghikai ki hikai? Haba nga kylli ïa ka shaphang kane, ka samla ka ong ba ki hikai beit da ka ktien Khasi wat ïa ka sobjek English ruh. Lada kum kine ki skul ki pynmih kum ïa kine ki khynnah pule hato ka sorkar kam la dei ban shim khia ïa kum kine ki jingjia?Ha ki por kiba kham mynshuwa ka Sorkar ka ju thung ïa u/ka inspektor ban leit peit ïa ki skul baroh bad ban peit la ki nonghikai ki tbit ne em ban hikai bad lada ki khynnah ki sngewthuh ne em ïa ka jinghikai. Hynrei sngewsih ba mynta lah bun snem ym ju don shuh kita ki Inspektor leit jngoh skul bad dei na kane ka daw ba ka jinghikai ha kiba bun ki skul ka tlot bha. Ym dei ban kynnoh ïa ki khynnah skul haba ki pep skul noh tang shipor. Ki khynnah kim sngew myntoi shuh ban leit skul haba ki nonghikai kim i don ïa ka jingkitkhlieh bad ka jingnang ban batai ïa ki lynnong ha ka rukom kaba ki khynnah kin sngewthuh.Kawei ka dawbah kaba pynlong ïa ki kmie ki kpa ban pynpep skul noh ïa ki khun tang shiteng por ka dei bunsien namar kim lah shuh ban siew bai skul bad thied uniform bad ban thied ïa ki kot ruh. Toi, lah dei ban don ka skim sorkar ban ïarap ïa kum kine ki longiing kiba duh tasam khnang ba lada ki khynnah ki pas ïa ka skul ki lah ban leit kolej bad kumta ter ter bad ki lah ruh ban ïoh ïa ki jinghikai ïa ki kam trei da ka kti (skill training) ban pynmih ïa ki tiar bapher bapher lane ban nang rah ïa ka dor jong ki soh ki pai da kaba pynkylla um soh lane kiwei pat ki jait jingbam. Kane ka ri ka long kaba seisoh bha. Ha ka por tlang ki mih ki soh ki pai kiba bun bad khamtam eh u sohniamtra. Hynrei duna eh kiba nang ban pynkylla um soh lane pynkylla jam ïa kita ki soh. Ïa kane la khot ka Food Processing lane ka jingpynkylla ïa ki soh sha kiwei pat ki kynja jingbam kiba kham neh. Mynta haba kheit ïa u sohniamtra lada ym lah die noh kloi kloi u lah sah ei bad lip dur noh ban ym lah dor shuh. Hynrei lada lah don kita ki Processing Unit ïa u soh lah ban pynkylla ha ki bun ki rukom bam bad kiba kham lehr uh ka dor. Kata kein ki khot ka “value addition” lane ka jingrah dor ïa ki soh ki pai bad ki jhur ruh kumba leh ïa u shynrai.Ki don bun ki jingduna ha ki nongkyndong jong ngi. Nyngkong eh ki surok ki dei kiba la jot la pra. Ban pynkit ïa ki mar rep ruh ka long kaba shitom palat. Bad wat lada shna surok ruh tang shipor ka lah rong noh ka um slap. Ïa kane ka jingshna torti ïa ki surok ha ka jingshisha ki dei ki nongpynïaid shnong kiba dei ban ujor bad wanrah hakhmat ka sorkar. Ki dei ban kylli kumno u Engineer uba dei peit ïa ka jingshna jong ka surok u ai ïa ka Certificate ba lah pyndep ïa ka jingshna surok katkum ba la buh da ki kyndon PWD bad ha kano ka rukom u kontrak u ïoh jingsiew na ka bynta ki kam torti. Kum ban shu ai nuksa ka surok naduh Dienglieng shaduh Nongjrong kaba dang shna dang shisnem mynshuwa mynta pat ka la paw lut da ki mawria. Nangta ka surok na Shella sha Sohra shuwa ban poi Nongsawlia ka la khoh lut ha kiba bun ki bynta wat lada kato ka surok ka dei kaba dang shu lah maramot.Mynta la sdang beh la lyer elekshon MP bad ki seng saiñ pyrthei baroh kin sa wan pah wan khroh ïa ki paidbah ban jied ïa u Candidate jong ki. Ha kum kine ki rynsan elekshon ki paidbah ki dei ban kdew ïa ki jingdkoh trei kam ka sorkar. Wat ïa die tad ïalade na ka bynta ki katto katne hajar bad jied ïa ki pnah thylliej kiba la pynbiej ïa ngi ki nongjied na ka por sha ka por. Lada ma ngi ki nongjied ngim kyndit bynriew ka jingduk kan nang ban ïa ngi katba kiba riewspah pat ki la nang kiew ka spah katba kiba duk pat ki la nang kylla rangli shuh shuh. Ki khynnah jong ngi ki dei ban ïoh ïa ka jingnang jingstad kaba biang ha ki skul kiba la pynïaid bha, ym kiba la shu thung ïa ki nonghikai kiba la thung namar ba ki “recommend” ki politishan. Ki nongshnong shnong ki hap ban long trai halor kine ki skul bad ki donhok ban buh jingkylli haba ki khun jong ki kim nang eiei ruh wat haba la poi haduh ka klas kaba khyndai bad shiphew.Ngi dei ban kyndit bynriew noh mynta hynrei kane ka jylla kan sa sakma.
title: Ka jingduk ka pyntlot bor ïa ngi ki paidbah

content: Shillong, Lber 17: Ka Seng Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Meghalaya, ka la pynpaw ba kam pat da don eh ka jingktah na ka jingbym pat pynbna ia ka kyrteng ki kyrtong na ka liang ka High Command na Delhi namar kumba ka long mynta ka dang ka por hynrei ki la angnud pat ba la kumno kumno na ka liang ka party Sengkmie kan dei ban pynbna noh mynta u taïew.“Haoid ngi sngewthuh ba ka party ka la kham slem ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ki ban ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong bad Tura Parliamentary seat, hynrei kumba ka long mynta kam pat da ktah than eh ïa ngi kiba trei hapoh ka party namar ka por ka dang biang hynrei tang kawei kaba ngi kwah ban kyrpad ïa ka High Command ne ka BJP Sengkmie ba kan pynbna noh ha une u taïew,” ong u Bah M Kharkrang u Chief Spokesperson jong ka BJP Meghalaya.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba na ka liang ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ka la pynbna ba ka jingïathep vote ha kine ki artylli ki constituency ka Jylla Meghalaya bad kiwei ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi, kan long ha ka 19 tarik ïaïong.Ka BJP na Delhi, ka la dep ban pynbna ïa 267 ngut ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon hynrei ka la buhteng ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ban ïakhun na Meghalaya.Ka Party ka la phah haduh san tylli ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong kiba kwah ban ïakhun na Shillong bad hynriew tylli na Tura constituency.Kine ki san ngut ki dei u Myntri Sorkar jylla u Bah AL Hek, u President barim ka party u Bah Ernest Mawrie, ka Kong Fenela L Nonglait, Mewaker Lyngdoh bad Sumita Laloo.Na Tura pat ki dei u MDC ba mynta ka Tura Bernard N Marak, Boston Marak, Riya Sangma, KC Boro, Winnerson D Sangma bad Thomas Sangma.Ka BJP Meghalaya ka kyrmen skhem ba ka High Command kan pynbna noh kham kloi ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong.Kumba long mynta, ki kyrtong kiba la pynbna ban ïakhun na Shillong seat ki dei u MP ba mynta ka Congress u Bah Vincent H Pala, ka Myntri Sorkar ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh na ka NPP, u Robertjune Kharjahrin na ka UDP, u Dr Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka VPP bad ki kyrtong shimet.Na Tura, ka MP ba mynta ka Agatha K Sangma kan ïakhun na ka NPP, u MLA ka Congress Saleng A Sangma bad u Nongïalam ka TMC Zenith Sangma.
title: Kyrmen ban pynbna noh ka BJP ïa ki kyrtong mynta ka taïew, ong u Bah Kharkrang

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 17: Ka Kur bah jong ka jaid Kharbani Khasi bad Jaiñtia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang kyrpang ban ïathir jingmut bad ban ïa pyrkhat sani bha, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah pynïap dusmon jong u samla Macborn Bonnyson Kharbani kaba la jia myn ha ka 3 tarik u Lber 2024 shiteng synñia.Ka kur lyngba u bah Macmillan Kharbani general secretary na ka kur bah jong ka Kharbani sengkmie, ka la ong ba ha katei ka jingïalang la ïakut ban ai jingkyrshan pura ïa I kong Violin Kharbani, kmie jong u samla Macborn Bonnyson bad ka ïing ka sem haduh ba kin ïoh ïa ka hok.La ong ruh ba ka kur ka la thung ïa ka komiti kyrpang, ka ban trei shitom haduh ban da lap dien ïa kiwei pat ki runar thrang snam, kiba la donkti lang ban thombor bad shim jubor ïa ka jingKyrmen taïew,” ong u Bah M Kharkrang u Chief Spokesperson jong ka BJP Meghalaya.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba na ka liang ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ka la pynbna ba ka jingïathep vote ha kine ki artylli ki constituency ka Jylla Meghalaya bad kiwei ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi, kan long ha ka 19 tarik ïaïong.Ka BJP na Delhi, ka la dep ban pynbna ïa 267 ngut ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon hynrei ka la buhteng ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ban ïakhun na Meghalaya.Ka Party ka la phah haduh san tylli ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong kiba kwah ban ïakhun na Shillong bad hynriew tylli na Tura constituency.Kine ki san ngut ki dei u Myntri Sorkar jylla u Bah AL Hek, u President barim ka party u Bah Ernest Mawrie, ka Kong Fenela L Nonglait, Mewaker Lyngdoh bad Sumita Laloo.Na Tura pat ki dei u MDC ba mynta ka Tura Bernard N Marak, Boston Marak, Riya Sangma, KC Boro, Winnerson D Sangma bad Thomas Sangma.Ka BJP Meghalaya ka kyrmen skhem ba ka High Command kan pynbna noh kham
