Lyngdoh na ka NPP, u Robertjune Kharjahrin na ka UDP, u Dr Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka VPP bad ki kyrtong shimet.Na Tura, ka MP ba mynta ka Agatha K Sangma kan ïakhun na ka NPP, u MLA ka Congress Saleng A Sangma bad u Nongïalam ka TMC Zenith Sangma.im u khun jong ka kur Kharbani.Ha katei ka jingïalang la ïadonlang ruh naduh u bah Beststarwell Kharbani president rangbah jong ka kurbah Kharbani, bah Phranklin Kharbani vice president Nongstoiñ, bah Alfred Kharbani vice president Shillong bad kiwei kiwei ki nongkitkam jong ka kur kiba kham hakhmat na Sawsymper, Umyiap, Mawshynrut, Shillong bad na ki jaka bapher bapher.
title: Da ka komiti kyrpang thung ka Kur Kharbani halor ka jingshah pynïap dusmon

content: Sa saw snem nangne, ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) kan rakhe ïa ka jingdap san phew (50) snem ka jingïaid lynti. Na ka jingsdang ban dawa ïa ki hok jong ki khynnah bad samla pule, kum ka “scholarship”, ban shna pynbha ïa ki jaka pule kot bad ka jaka sah ki samla pule, ka KSU ka la ïaid ka lynti kaba jlan bad ka la san ha ka dur ka dar. Ka la shim ruh ïa ka jingkit ha ki jylli ba ïar ka imlang-sahlang bad synshar-khadar.Haba ka KSU kan jam sha u maw mer ba san phew, ka long kongsan ban phai dien sha ka mynnor khnang ban lah pat ban saiñdur thymmai ïa ka lawei bad ban bteng ïa ka jingïaid lynti. Mynta kumne ka KSU ka lah ban ït bad kylli ïalade haduh katno ba ka la san? Kane kan pynmyntoi ïa ka seng bad ki samla ban thew, ban woh ïa ki nongïalam, ïa ka rukom treikam, ka jingïashim bynta jong ki samla, kynthei bad shynrang, bad ruh ban peit biang ïa ki mat ki jura bad jingdawa. La ki mat ki jura ki dang ïeng bad ïadei ne em bad kane ka juk? Ne ïoh don sa da kiwei pat ki mat kiba kham kongsan bad kiba ktah jur ïa ka mynta bad ka lawei? Ka KSU ka dei ruh ban pdiang ïa ki jingkynthoh jong kiwei pat ki bym dei ki dkhot ba pura jong ka bad wat na kiwei ki jaitbynriew ruh kiba lah ban ai ïa ki jingthoh kiba shong nia. Kane kan ïarap ïa ki samla ka Ri ban nang mait shaphrang.Katba ngi dap ap ïa ka snem 2028 bad ba ka KSU kan rakhe ïa ka jingdap ba san phew snem? ngan pyrshang ban thoh ei ei mynta shaphang U President uba nyngkong jong ka seng, U Bah Panbor Tariang. Ka long ka kam kaba jwat, hynrei nga kyrpad lem ïa ki samla pule, ki nongthwet jingtip bad kiwei de ban ïa pashat lang ïa ki khana ne jingkynthoh shaphang ka KSU katkum ka jingtip ne jingshem jong ki.Ka Ar Phew Tarik U Lber 1978: Ym shym la kha ïa ka KSU ha ka pyrthei kaba loi loi. La kha ïa ka KSU ha ka jylli jong ka imlang sahlang, ka synshar khadar bad ka treikam treijam. Naduh ka snem 1908 ki samla Khasi ki la ju ïalum dorbar bad ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki policy jong ka Sorkar British kiba ktah ïa ka pule dangle ki samla. Kham hadien, ha ka snem 1955, ki samla pule ki thaw ïa ka Khasi Students Association (KSA). Nangta hapdeng ka snem 1960-1977, la mih ki seng jong ki samla pule kiba pher, kum ka Hills Students Union (HSU), Khasi-Jaiñtia Students Union (KJSU) bad ka Shillong Students Union (SSU).Ha ka 20 Lber 1978, ki samla pule jong ka North Eastern Hills University bad na khatar (12) tylli ki kolej kiba don ha Shillong, ki la lum jingïalang ban thaw ïa ka Khasi Students’ Union bad jied ïa kine ki nongkitkam- (i) Bah Panbor Tariang, kum u President (ii) Kong Bluecylian Jyrwa & Bah Aibuit S Rynjah kum ki Vice-President (iii) Bah Geoffrey Basan kum u General Secretary (iv) Kong Bertha Dkhar, Kong Velerina Basaïawmoit, Bah S. Marshall Nongkynrih and Bah Langstong Slong kum ki Joint Secretaries bad (v) Kong Miranda Hynñiewta kum ka Treasurer.Tang hadien shi sngi ba la thaw ïa ka seng, ka KSU ka la ai ïa ka dorkhas sha ka Sorkar ban dawa na ka Sorkar ban ai ïa ka bai bam ne “scholarship” sha baroh ki samla pule, ban thaw ïa ki jaka ban lumthup ïa ki kot pule ba ki samla pule ki lah ban pyndonkam, ban pynbha ïa ki “library” bad ki “hostel”. Ka KSU ka pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewdiaw halor ka jingpynsangeh ban ïalam “excursion” ïa ki samla pule. Kumta ka la dawa na ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban pynim biang namar kane ka kyntiew ïa ka jingnang jingtip bad ka jingsan jong ki samla pule. (Memorandum Dated 21st March 1978)Bah Panbor Tariang u Nongshong shnong bad u President: U Bah Panbor Tariang u la long u nongshong shnong jong ka Riatsamthiah, Shillong bad u dang pule ïa ka MSc ha Northeastern Hill University, ha ka por ba la jied ïa u kum u President ba nyngkong jong ka KSU ha ka 20 Lber 1978. Ha ka jingïakren bad kiba bun, nga la ïohsngew shibun ki khana kiba ktik jingmut shaphang u Bah Panbor kum u samla bad nongshong shnong. Ka sap nongïalam jong U, ka shat phalang ha ki kam kiba bun syrtap hapoh shnong, ha kaba u la long u nongïalam ba hakhmat jong ki samla ka shnong Riatsamthiah ha kito ki por. U long ruh uba kitkhia bad ïashim bynta bha ha ki kam hapoh ka Dorbar Shnong bad Balang Presbyterian Riatsamthiah. U Bah Panbor u lah ruh ban pynïadei paralok bad ki tymmen ki san kiba hikai bad kdew lynti ïa u. Kumta u la kylla long u Samla Nongïalam uba proh, uba ïar jingtip bad uba skhem jingmut.U Bah Allan Lyndem, uba ithuh bha ïa u Bah Panbor, ha ki por ba u dang pule ha skul bad kolej, u pyrto ïa ka jingproh bad jingïar jingtip jong u Bah Panbor Tariang. U la ong, “ha ka por ba ki par jingtip ba ki paidbah ki ïoh ki long tang na ki ar tylli ki kotkhubor, kita ka Amrita Pratika bad Sentinel, U Bah Panbor u don ka jingtip kaba ïar bad jylliew bad u ju sngewtynnad ban ïasam ïa ki jingtip sha ki samla jong ka shnong. Kane ka la long ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki samla shong skul bad pule kolej kiba thrang ban tip bad ban nang ban stad. U Bah Allan, u kynmaw ieid ïa ki por ba u Bah Panbor u ju ïapur khana bad ïakren bad ki samla shaphang ka thma Bangladesh, ka Bordoloi Trophy, ka Northeast Re-Organization Act, Vietnam War, Yom Kippur War bad Emergency jong ka snem 1975.U Bah Allan, u pynkynmaw ruh ïa kawei ka jingïaphylliew jingmut hapdeng U Bah Panbor bad u mama jong u, u Bah Morgan Lyndem. U Bah Panbor uba ju smat ban wad ïa kiba la san bad ruh ban pynïadei paralok bad ki, ha kawei ka sngi u la shongkai bad u Bah Morgan bad ban tih bniah na u Bah Morgan halor ka jingïakhih bad jingïaid procession jong ki samla pyrshah ïa ka United Khasi & Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council kaba la jia ha ka 27 June 1952.U Bah Morgan, uba la shah jied kum u Ward Commissioner jong ka Shillong Municipality na Mawkhar ha ka snem 1966 bad uba baroh ki ïatip ba um ju jubab beit ïa kino kino ki jingkylli, bad uba don la ka buit ban jubab ne hikai, kumta haba jubab ïa ka jingwad jingtip jong u Bah Panbor, u la kren pharshi kumne- “Ka dei ka jingïaleh phutbol Independence Cup bad ki Khasi ki la rung sha ka phainal ha ka 21 July 1949 bad ki la long nongjop ruh. Ñiuma, ki nongpynïaid kim shim pdiang ne ithuh ïa kata ka jingjop phainal jong ki Khasi. Lai snem hadien ki nongpynïaid ha ka jaka ba kin pynkup burom ne ai khunsnam ïa ki Khasi da ka kyrdan “First Schedule”, phewse ki ai bad pynhiar pynban ïa ki Khasi sha ka kyrdan “Sixth Schedule”. Hangta hi u Bah Panbor Tariang u ïohkem ïa ka jingmut jong kane ka pharshi u Bah Morgan. Kane ka khana pharshi ka pynkynmaw ïa ka jingnep ka jabieng jong u Bah Panbor uba ha kata hi ka khyllipmat u lah ban ring ksai ïa ki jingjia kiba la jia ha ka Ri. Kane ka la pynkhih jingmut ïa u Bah Panbor ban ñiewkor ïa ka history bad ban ïada ïa ki hok.Hapdeng ki snem 1974 haduh 1976, U Bah Panbor Tariang u la long u President jong ka Shillong Student Union (SSU). Ha ka jinglong President, u Bah Panbor u la lah ban ïapynbeit bad ka Shillong City Bus Syndicate ban sam ïa ki “identity card” sha ki khynnah skul khnang ba kin lah ban pyndonkam ïa ki bus ha ka dor kaba jem. Shuh shuh u Bah Panbor Tariang kum u nongïalam jong ka SSU u la pyneh triang bad ïeng pyrshah ïa ka jingthaw ïa ka ophis jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education ha Tura.Ka Jingïakren ka long ka lynti: Naduh ba sdang bad ha ka por ba long President u Bah Panbor Tariang, ka KSU ka la seng ïa ka nongrim ba ka jingïakren bad jingïatai ka long ka lynti. Ki la don shibun ki jingjia ha ka snem 1978. Ha u Lber 1978, u Bah Panbor Tariang u la lamkhmat ïa ka KSU ban leit ïakynduh ïa U Chief Minister bad ai ïa ka dorkhas. Ha u Nailar kajuh ka snem ka KSU ka la ai biang ïa ka dorkhas bad ki la pynsngew bad buh ha khmat ka Sorkar ïa ki jingeh bad jingdawa.Haba ka Sorkar ka leh kuman ïa ki jingdawa, ki samla pule ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih da kaba pakhang ïa ki skul bad kolej naduh 12 Nailur 1978. Ha kajuh hi ka sngi ka Sorkar pat ka la pynmih khubor bad pynbna paidbah ba ka la shim pyrkhat ïa ki jingdawa jong ka KSU bad ruh ka la sdang ban pyntreikam ïa ki. Kane ka long ka dak ba ka jingïakhih jong ki samla pule ka seisoh. Kumta na ka liang ka KSU ka la leit sha ka jingïakren ba la khot da u Deputy Commissioner East Khasi Hills. Ha ka jingshisha, ka KSU kam don jingtip ei ei halor ka jingpyntreikam jong ka Sorkar ïa ki jingdawa jong ka, wat la katta ruh ka KSU ka la mynjur ban ïakren bad ka Sorkar. Kumta ha kane ka jingïakren la lah ban ïapynbeit kumne- “Ka meeting kaba la long hapdeng ki dkhot jong ka KSU bad u Deputy Commissioner, hapoh ka kamra jong u Bah T.W Pakyntein, IAS, Deputy Commissioner, ha ka 13 September 1978 ha ka por 12 baje shiteng sngi…la ïoh ban ïakren bad pyrkhat halor ka khubor ba la pynlait da U Chief Secretary jong Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka 12 September 1978, kaba pynshai ïa ki sien jam kiba ka Sorkar ka la shim ban pyntreikam ïa ki jingdawa jong ka KSU katkum ka dorkhas kaba ka KSU ka la ai sha u Chief Minister ha ka 28 August 1978…Hadien ka jingïakren-ïatai ki dkhot bad nongmihkhmat jong ka KSU ki la mynjur ban pynsangeh noh shuwa ïa baroh ki jingïakhih…”Ha kaba pynkut, U Bah Panbor Tariang u dei u nongïalam uba kiba bun ki ñiewburom, ki kohnguh bad pdiang ïa ka jingïalam jong u. U long ruh u samla nongïalam uba lah ban pynïadei bad ki para samla, bad ki tymmen ki san ruh kumjuh. Ngi ïai pyrto ïa ka jingim bad ki kam kiba kordor jong u Bah Panbor Tariang.
title: Bah Panbor Tariang u President ba nyngkong ka Khasi Students’ Union

content: Shillong, Lber 17: U Bah Process T Sawkmie, u MLA barim hynne ka sngi u la kyrpad ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Konkal Sangma ba un ïarap lem ïa ki samla kamai scooty kiba ha Shillong ba kin ïoh ïa ka permit kaba biang.“Nga kyrpad ïa ka sorkar hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Conrad K. Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ba kan ïarap lem ïa ki samla kamai scooty kiba ha Shillong ba kin ïoh ïa ka permit kaba biang, khnang ba kiba kamai scooty kin ïoh ïa ka kamai kajih kaba biang,” ong u Bah Sawkmie bad u la bynrap, kumba na ka liang jong ki, ki la submit ïa ka jingdonkam baroh sha ka sorkar, u kwah ba na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah un ïarap lem ïa ki.U la pynpaw ruh, kumba ha kine ki sngi u Myntri Rangbah u la sam ïa ki shithi thungkam (appointment letter) sha kiba bun ki samla ha ki tnad treikam (department) bapher bapher.Na ka liang u ïah Sawkmie u kwah ruh ba ki kamai scooty ha Shillong kin ïoh ïa ka permit bad kane kan ïarap shuh shuh ïa ka thong jong ka sorkar ban aikam ai jam ïa ki samla.Shuh shuh ka sorkar ka la thaw lad ïa ki samla, ha ka liang ka sports bad ka put ka tem kumjuh kan peit ruh ïa kiwei pat kiba don la ka jong ka bynta.
title: Kyrpad u Bah PT Sawkmie ïa u Myntri Rangbah ban ïarap ïa ki samla kamai scooty

content: Shillong, Lber 17: U nongïalam ka liang pyrshah bad u President ka Congress uba long u MP na Shillong u Bah Vincent H Pala u la ong ba ka seng kaba la synshar ïa ka sorkar jylla ka National People’s Party (NPP) ka la rai ban pynïeng da ka kynthei na baroh artylli ki ki kongstituensi na Tura bad Shillong kam shym dei kata kaba la pynkupbor ïa ki kynthei hynrei namarba kim don shuh da kawei lad.U Bah Pala u la ong ba ka Congress ka la leh khambha ban ïa kino kino ki party haba kren shaphang ka jingai bor ïa ki kynthei. U la ong ba ïa ka women reservation policy la sdang da ka Congress bad ym da kiwei ki party.“Da kaba shu phah pynïeng da ki longkmie kum ki kyrtong na baroh artylli ki konstituensi nga tharai ba ka NPP kam don shuh da kawei ka lad naba ym don kiwei pat kiba la khreh ban ïakhun na Shillong. Ki hap ban ïoh da kiwei. Ki hap ban pynkylla ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong la palat 2 sien kumta nga tharai kam dei kaba la thmu ban pynkup bor ïa ki kynthei hynrei ba kam don da kawei pat ka lad,” u la ong.“Ka Agatha ka dei ka MP kaba mynta kumta ki khlem ai sha ka kynthei bad ki la dep ai lypa ïa ka mynshwa. Kumta phi peit ha kata ka laiñ ka Congress ka kham long ka seng kaba khambun ban pynkup bor ïa ki kynthei ban ïa kino kino ki party,” ong u Bah Pala.Lah ban pynkynmaw hangne ba ka NPP ka la pynïakhun da ka myntri sorkar bad ka MLA napoh ka East Shillong ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh na Shillong parliamentary seat.
title: Ka jingpynïakhun ka NPP da ki kynthei kam dei ka jingthmu pynkupbor ïa ki kynthei : Vincent

content: Shillong, Lber 17: U MDC ka BJP na Tura u Bernard N Marak ha ka sngi U Blei u la ong ba ha Garo Hills, na ka liang ka Centre Scheme Monitoring Committee (CSMC) ka la leh ïa kiba bun ki kam kaba kynthup ïa ki kyrteng jong kito kiba ïoh myntoi kiba la shah iehnoh da ki Gram Sevak ha ki Block.“Ki nongshong shnong ki la pynpaw ba da ki hajar ngut ki longïing ki la shah ieh napoh ka thup kyrteng ba la ai sha ki Block da ki Secretary ki VEC (Gram Panchayat). Ban peit ban pynïaid kam bad ban ïarap, la thaw ïa ka CSMC ha ki VEC level kaba la pynkupbor ïa ki nongshong shnong ban peit ïa ki jingtreikam jong ki skhim ka sorkar pdeng khnang ba ki longïng kin ym shah ieh bad ba ki longïng kiba la shah ban beiñ kin ïoh ïa kitei ki skhim,” ong u Marak ha ka kyrwoh khubor.U la ong ba ka kynhun jong ka Monitoring Committee ka la pynpaw ba bun na ki longïng longsem ki la shah ieh ha ki gram sevak bad ha ki block ha ki por ba la leit bad da kiba bun ki snem hynrei mynta ki la shah kynthup bad ki la long ki nongïashim bynta kiba shit rhem ha ki committee jong ki shnong.Kitei ki longïng ki la shah ieh noh ban ïoh ki skhim kum ka PMAY (BPL houses), NREGA (Job cards), RATION CARD, IHHL (Latrines), Pension bad kiwei namar ym don uwei ruh uba shim khia ban ïarap ïa ki ha madan. Ha ka jaka ban lum ïa ki ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah na kitei ki longïng, ki Gram Sevak kiba la don ki jingduna ki nongtrei ha kiba bun ki C and RD block, ki la kyntu ïa ki VEC secretary ban shim ïa ki kyrteng jong ki longïng longsem na ka bynta jong ki hynrei kiba bun ki shnong ki Secretary ki VEC ki pulom ban kynthup ïa ki longïng kiba dei hok ban ïoh ki lad jingmyntoi ban shah kynthup lang hapoh ka thup, u la bynrap.Na ka liang u Marak u la ong ba ki la don ki por jong ki jingtreikam, ki kyrteng jong ki longïng kiba dei hok ki la jah napoh ka thup ki nongïoh jingmyntoi naba ki la don katto katne ki nongtrei ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba la don hapoh ka thup ha kaba kane ka la ïalam sha ka jingshah iehnoh ki longïng kiba dei hok ban ïoh ïa ki skhim hapoh ki kyrdan jong ka Gram Panchayat.“Ha kiba bun ki jingjia, ka kynhun jong ngi ki la leit ban pynshisha ïa ka thup kiba ïoh myntoi kaba ngi la ïoh napoh ka Centre kaba la paw ba ki longïng ba duk kiba la don hapoh ka thup ki khlem ïoh ïa ki skhim wat hapdeng ba ki kyrteng jong ki ki don hapoh ka thup jong ka sorkar pdeng,” u la ong da kaba bynrap, “Ki la don ruh ki jingjia ha kaba kijuh ki longïng ki ïoh bunsien ki jingmyntoi tang namarba ki ïoh ka jingkyrshan na ki katto katne ki nongïalam saiñ pyrthei.”Shuh shuh u Marak u la ong ba lyngba ki RTI la pynpaw ba ki la don bun ki jingbakla ha kaba pyntreikam ïa ki skhim ka sorkar pdeng. Bun ki tnat sorkar kim pynpaw ïa ka kyrteng ki sub-contractor bad ki jingtip ba bniah jong ka JJM, PMGSY, NREGA, ki supplier bad kiwei namar kine ki contractor ki dei jong ki katto katne ki seng saiñ pyrthei. Ka BJP kan sa pynpaw ïa baroh hadien ba la ïoh shibun ki jingtip lyngba ka CSMC.
title: Kynnoh u MDC ka Tura ba bun ki longïing baduk ki duh ki skhim sorkar Pdeng

content: Nongpoh, Lber 17: Ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka kyrtong jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) na Shillong Seat ban aireng ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la ïa kynduh kyrpang ïa ki nongïalam jong ka NPP ha Jirang Constituency kum shi bynta ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka election.Kum ka Myntri Sorkar ha kane ka sngi ka Dr. Ampareen ka la leit ban jurip ïa ki ar tylli ki jaka ai jingsumar paidbah ba kynthup ïa ka CHC Patharkhmah bad ka Health Sub Centre ha ka shnong Umsong ba la synran lang da u MLA jong ka Jirang Bah Sosthenes Sohtun lem bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam ka NPP.Ha ka jingïakynduh lang bad ki nongïalam ka party ha Dorbar Hall Patharkhmah, ka Dr. Ampareen ka la ai mynsiem ruh ïa ki nongïalam ka party bad ki la shim ruh ïa ka rai ban trei shitom na ka bynta ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka party ha kane ka election MP kaba long ka thong na ka bynta ka jingjop ka party bad ban pynjop donburom ïa ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh.Ha ka jingïalang, ki nongïalam bad ki nongkitkam bahakhmat eh jong ka NPP na Ri Bhoi Sepngi ki la wan sha kane ka jingïalang ban sngap ïa ki jingkren jong ki nongïalam naduh ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, u MLA ka Jirnag Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, u Bah Batskhem Ryntathiang MDC ka Mairang, u Bah Macmillan Byrsat MLA barim ka Nongstoiñ bad kiba la shim rai ruh ban pynkhlain ïa ka party na ka bynta ka jingjop ka party ha kane ka elekshon na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.
title: Ïakynduh kyrpang ka Dr. Amapreen ïa ki nongïalam ka NPP ha Patharkhmah

content: Shillong, Lber 17: Ka jingbun bad jingkynrei kiba die bad kiba dih drok hapoh ka jylla katba nangmih ki sngi ka la nang pynshong syier ïa kiba bun ki nongshong shnong khamtam eh ha kaba ïohi ba ha kine ki sngi ka jingïadie bad ïadih drok kaba la long pylleiñ pylleiñ khamtam ha nongbah Shillong ka la long shaba palat.Kawei na ki jaka kaba la long pylleiñ pylleiñ bha kadei ka pdeng jong ka Motphran kaba ju ïadie jhur hapdeng surok bad ka jaka kaba la ju buh ïa ka jaka bret ñiut kaba ha Motphran hi.Kane ka jingleh ïa katei ka kam la ïathuh ruh da kiba shong dukan hajan kane ka jaka kaba ki la ong ba ka jingïadie bad ïadih drok ha katei ka jaka manla ka sngi ka la long kaba ishyrkhei bha.Ki la ïathuh ruh ba mynta kiba die bad kiba dih drok ki la khambun bha kidei ki khynnah samla kiba dang rit bad ki la iathuh ruh ba ki nongdie ki ju pyndonkam lang ruh da ki kynthei kiba dei ki samla lud ban pynngop ne pynbeij ia ki lanot kiba la ngat ha kane ka kam.Kiba bun na kiba shong dukan ha katei ka jaka haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor ki la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingtieng bad sngew syier namarba tang shu lah kem dum kane ka tamasa iadie bad iadih drok ka la long kaba ishyrkhei bha.Ki la ong ruh ba nalor ka jingdon ki nongkloh pla kiba la bun bha hapoh katei ka jaka bad hapoh iewduh hynrei mynta la mih pat sa kine kiba die bad kiba dih drok khlem salia shuh wat ban iohi ki briew ruh.Haba kylli ki la ong ba mynta ym tang hapoh iewduh hynrei wat hapdeng jong ka Motphran kam long shuh kaba shngain kumta ki la pynpaw ia ka jingtieng namarba ki la iohi ba kane ka kam mynta ka la nangjur katba dang mih ki sngi, kumta ki la kyrpad ia ki bor jong ka ain ban ai ka jingpahara kaba biang bha ha kane ka jaka, khamtam eh ha ka por mynmied kaba dei ka por kaba thnem bha kane ka jingiakhaii bad dih drok kaba long pyllein pyllein.“Mynta naduh ki nongtuh nongkloh pla ruh ki la don bynta lang ha ka kam iadie bad ia khaii ia une u jingdih ba pynbuaid uba la kynrei bha ha Shillong bad kumjuh ruh ha baroh kawei ka jylla,” ong ki katto katne kiba shong dukan ha u nongthoh khubor ki bym kwah ban iathuh kyrteng.
title: Syier kiba shong dukan ha Motphran ba jur palat ka ïadie bad ïadih drok pylleiñ pylleiñ

content: Shillong, Lber 17 : Ka jingslem palat jongki heh ne nongïalam Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) na Delhi ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya ka la nang pynduh lyer ïa ka BJP namar wat haduh mynta ba la dep pynbna ïa ka tarik ban ïathep vote ruh ki nongïalam bad ki nongkyrshan jongka BJP kim pat lah ban leit shano shano ruh ban ïalap election namar kim pat tip mano ban ïoh tiket ne ban long kyrtong ka party la ka dei hangne ha Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ne ha Tura Parliamentary Constituency ruh.Kumta kane ka jingpynslem ka la pyndiaw jingmut jingpyrkhat ïa ki nongïalam bad nongtrei ba shitrhem jongka party namar ki tip shai ba ka long kaba eh ïa ki ban pyndep ha baroh ki constituency hapoh kane ka shibnai.Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Saitjain, kala pynbna ba ka jingïathep vote ha kine ki artylli ki constituency ka Jylla Meghalaya bad kiwei ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi, kan long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong.Ka BJP na Delhi, kala dep ban pynbna ïa 267 ngut ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon hynrei kala buhteng ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ha Meghalaya bad ha kiwei kiwei ki jylla ruh.Kat kum ka jingïathuh u President ka BJP Meghalaya Rikman G Momin, ka Party ka la ïoh pdiang haduh san tylli ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong kiba kwah ban ïakhun na Shillong bad hynriew tylli na Tura constituency. Kine ki san ngut ki dei u Myntri Sorkar Bah AL Hek, u President barim ka party Bah Ernest Mawrie, ka kong Fenela L Lyngdoh, Mewaker Lyngdoh Pakma bad Sumita Laloo.Na Tura pat ki dei u MDC ba mynta ka Tura Bernard N Marak , Boston Marak , Riya Sangma, KC Boro, Winnerson D Sangma bad Thomas Sangma. Kumba long mynta, ki kyrtong kiba la pynbna ban ïakhun na Shillong seat ki dei u MP ba mynta ka Congress u Ma Vincent H Pala, ka Myntri Sorkar Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh na ka NPP, u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin na ka UDP, u Dr Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka VPP bad Prof Lakhon Kma kum u kyrtong shimet.Na Tura, ka MP ba mynta Agatha K Sanga kan ïakhun na ka NPP, u MLA ka Congress Saleng A Sangma bad u Nongïalam ka TMC Zenith Sangma.
title: Duh lyer ka BJP ha Meghalaya ba slem ban pynbna kyrtong ki heh na Delhi

content: BDWS
title: BDWS

content: Shillong, Lber 17 : U President ka MPCC uba long ruh u MP ka Lok Sabha na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency u ma Vincent H Pala u la ong ba ka Congress ka la shim ïa ka rai kaba biang bad dei eh ban pynïakhun kyrtong na baroh ar tylli ki Parliamentary Constituency ha ka jylla namar ka Congress ka dei tang ma ka ka party kaba ïeng ban ïada ïa ki Khristan, ki Rit Paid bad ïa ki Riewlum bad na kata ka daw kam shym la ïehnoh ïa ki paid Achik ne Garo da kaba rai ban pynïakhun kyrtong beit na Tura ruh nalor nangne na Shillong.“ Ka Party ka la shim ïa ka rai kaba dei bad biang eh ban pynïeng kyrtong na baroh ar ki Parliamentary Constituency kata na Tura bad Shillong ha kane ka Election Lok Sabha kaba ka jingïathep vote kan long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong 2024 namar ngim lah ban ïapeiñ ïa ka lawei jongka party ha ka jylla” ong u Ma Pala.“ Ha nga shimet nga sngew ba lada hap ban ïa pynbeit sngewthuh bad ka INDIA Block dei ban leh tang ha ki jylla ba heh kum ka Assam, West Bengal ym ha ki jylla ba rit kum ka Meghalaya. Nga tharai ka TMC ka ïakhun na ka bynta ban ïoh suhthied bad kumjuh ruh ym lah ban len ba ka Congress ruh ka kwah ban ïai suhthied bad skhem ha ka jylla Meghalaya namar ngi don ki nongkyrshan ba ieit ha ri lum Garo bad kumjuh ruh ha ri lum Khasi bad Jaintia” ong biang une u Nongïalam ka Congress.U la ong shuh shuh “ Kumba long ïa mynta ha Jaintia Hills ngim don MLA, ha Khasi Hills ngi don saw ngut bad ha Garo Hills ngi don uwei. Kumta lada ailad noh ïa ka Garo Hills sha ka TMC khlem pep ka lawei jongka party kan long kaba dum hynrei ngim kwah ïa kane, na kata ka daw ngi la shim ïa ka rai khnang ba ki dkhot bd nongkyrshan jongka party kin ïai im bad ïai neh hapoh ka party”.U la ong ka Congress ka lah ban ïatrei lang bad no bad no hynrei kam lah ban ïapeiñ ia ka lawei jongka party.“ Dei halor kane ka nongrim ba nga la lah ban pynkohnguh ïa ki Nongïalam ba halor duh ka party ha Delhi ban pynïakhun beit na ri lum Garo bad kumjuh ruh na ri lum Khasi bad Jaintia. Namar lada ym pynïakhun na Garo ki paidbah kin sa sngewdiaw bad sngew rem ba ki la shah ïeh khun swet ne leh shilliang khmat ha ki nongïalam ka Congress um kum ka BJP kaba dei ka party kaba la shu pnah bad bang tang ka ktien ka thylliej khlem da leh da ki kam. Kumta kumba ngi la rai bad mynjur ruh na Delhi ngi la leh ïa kane na ka bynta ka lawei jong ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya” pynkut u ma Pala.
title: Ka Congress ka ïeng ban ïada ïa ki Khristan, ki Rit Paid bad ki Riewlum : Vincent Pala
