content: Shillong, Lber 18 : Ka Rangdajied United FC ka la sdang da ka jingjop ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka Shillong Premier League kaba sdang hynne ka sngi ha madan SSA Stadium, Polo Shillong.Kane ka jingjop jong ka Rangdajied kadei hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka kynhun ba dang rung thymmai ka Nongthymmai SC da 1-0 kol ha ka jingïakhun kaba itynnad bha. Ïa ka kol jop na bynta ka kynhun la ïoh ban thep da u Ksankupar Khongmalai ha ka minit kaba 61 jong ka kylla miet.Ka Nongthymmai ka la ïoh rung sha ka SPL hadien ba ka la wan ba ar ha ka First Division ha u 2022. Kane kadei ka samoi kaba nyngkong ïa ki ha katei ka lympung ïalehkai hynrei watla ki la ïalehkai pynban ki hap ban leit phai iing khlem kamai point.Shwa jong kane ka kol, dei u Andyson Lapang ka Nongthymmai u ba la ïoh ïa ka kabu ksiar ban pynkhih jar tang ha ka minit kaba 11 hynrei ïa katei ka bol la ïoh ban ïada noh da u Banshanskhem Khar-syntiew ha phyllaw kol jong ka Rangdajied.U rangïalehkai shakhmat ka Rangdajied FC u Bansanbha Khongsdam u la ïoh lad katto katne sien ban pynsyier ïa ki rangap dien ka Nongthymmai ha ka kylla step hynrei ym shym la ïoh lad ba ksam sha kol. Hynrei la katta ruh u la jan ïoh ban thep kol ha ka minit kaba 35 tangba ka jingstet jong u rangap kol ka Nongthymmai, u Senapati la pynpulom noh ïa katei ka jingthmu.Na ka liang ka Nongthymmai watla ki lah ban kyrshan tyngeh ha ka kylla step khlem shah thep kol hynrei ka rukom ïalehkai ha ka kylla miet ka la kylla watla u Senapati bad ki rangap dien ki la kyrshan tyngeh. Ym lah ruh ban len ba ki rangïalehkai shakhmat ka Nongthymmai kynthup naduh u Andyson bad u Robi Hansda ki la ïoh lang ka kabu ban pynthut ïa ki rangap dien ka Rangdajied tangba kim ïoh pat ïa ka lad ban pynkhih jar.Ka jingïakhun ha kane ka sngi Ba-ar pat kan long hapdeng ka Sawmer pyrshah ïa ka Nangkiew Irat SC ha ka por 3:00 baje janmiet.
title: Sdang ka Rangdajied FC da ka jingjop ha ka sngi sdang jong ka Shillong Premier League

content: Sa shisien pat ka ri India ka la thnam da ka jingpynbna ïa ki tarik na ka bynta ka General Election na ka bynta ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmats ha Lok Sabha. Kane kadei ka elekshon ka ban rai na ka bynta ka sorkar kaban synshar ïa ka ri India ha kine ki san snem ban wan, kata naduh u 2024 haduh 2029.U Chief Election Commissioner ka Election Commission of India u Rajiv Kumar u la pynbna ba ka election ha ka ri sha Lok Sabha na bynta ka samoi ba 18 ka ïingdorbar ne 18th term ka Lok Sabha kaban long ha ki 7 tylli ki phase ha kaba ka elekshon ha ka jylla kan thep vote ha ka phase ba nynkong kata ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong 2024.Ka jingthep vote ha ka Second phase kan dei 26 ïaong, ka Third phase 7 Jymmang, 4 phase 13 Jymmang, 5 phase 20 Jymmang, 6 phase 25 Jymmang bad ka 7 phase kan dei ha ka 1 Jylliew bad ka tarik ban niew vote ia la elekshon MP kan dei ha ka 4 tarik u Jylliew 2024.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u CEC u la iathuh ba kin don 96.8 klur ngut ki paidbah kiba la don la hok ban jied ia ki MP bad na kine ki don 49.7 klur ki shynrang bad 47.1 klur ki kynthei. U la iathuh ruh na napdeng kine ki don 19.74 klur ki nonthep vote kiba hapdeng ka rta 21 haduh 29 snem.Ha kane ka sngi u CEC u la pynbna ruh ia ka election sha ki iing dorbar thaw aiñ ki jylla ba khynthup ia ka Arunachal Pradesh, Sikkim, Odisha, Andra Pradesh kiban long lang ha ka juh ka por bad ka election MP.Lada phai ka jylla Meghalaya  u Chief Electoral Officer jong ka Jylla u DR. BDR Tiwari ha ka 16 tarik u Lber, 2024 u la pyntip ba ki nongthep vote ha Meghalaya haduh une u snem 2024 ki don 22, 17,100 lak ngut ban rai ïa ka lawei san snem jong ki kyrtong na Shillong bad na Tura ha ka eleshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Ïaiong, 2024.Ki nongthep vote shynrang ki don 10,94, 947 ngut, ki kynthei ki don 11,22,150 ngut bad 3 ngut ki Third Gender. Ha ka jingïalang bad ki lad pathai khubor tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ka Election Commision of India ka la pynbna ïa ka tarik ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha, u Tiwari u la ong, ka jingkiew ki nongthep vote na u snem 2023 haduh kaba sdang jong ki ar bnai jong u snem 2024 ka long 55, 971 ngut.Ki nongthep vote ba dang shu pynrung kyrteng thymmai ha ka Electoral Roll, 2024 ki long, 56,909 ngut, ki Service Voter ki don 3835 ngut, ki nongthep vote ba duna dkhotmet ki don 11179 ngut, ki nongthep vote ba la kynjoh 80 snem ka rta shaneng ki don 23, 793 ngut bad 5 ngut ki Non Resident Indian (NRI).Ki Polling Station ki don 3512 tylli, ba kynthup 326 tylli ha ki jaka sor bad 3186 tylli sha ki jaka nongkyndong.Haba ai jingkheiñ ïa ka jingpoi ki paidbah kiba thep vote ha Shillong bad Tura ha ki elekshon Lok Sabha ba la long ha u snem 2014 ki long 63.28 percent ha Shillong bad 79.14 ha Tura. Ha u snem 2019, ki nongthep ki long 65.48 percent ha Shillong bad 81.38 percent ha Tura. U CEO u la ïathuh ruh ba ka tnat Election ka la ïakren bad ki bor shipai BSF ba kin peitngor ïa ka khappud katba ka ri ka dang pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon.Ha Meghalaya hi ka elekshon MP kam dei ka elekshon kaba shongshit kumba long ha ka elekshon MLA ne MDC ruh. Kadei ka elekshon kaba jar jar bad kaba bobarabor hi ka jingwan ki nongthep vote ruh ka duna bha. Hynrei mynta u snem ka shu i shongshit da ka jingleit ka Seng VPP kylleng kylleng ki jaka jong ka Ri Khasi bad Jaiñtia na ka bynta ban pynshai ïa ki nongrim bad ki mat treikam ka Seng kaba la sdang naduh ba ladep ka elekshon MLA jong u snem 2023. Hynrei namar ba ka Party ka la pynbna lypa ïa u Kyrtong MP da kaba pynieng ïa u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon, kane ka jingleit ka la kylla long ruh syndon ka jingïalap na ka bynta ka elekshon MP. Katba nang jan ki sngi sha ka jingpynbna ia ka elekshon MP, ka jingialap ruh ka la nang shongshit kat haduh kaba la pynlong ruh ia kiwei pat ki Party ban ther beit ia ka Party VPP bad bun ki la klet noh ïa ki mat ne ki ishu kiba kidei ban kren.Te ka por ka sah sha shi bnai na ka bynta ki artylli ki Parliamentary Constituency, kata ka Shillong bad ka Tura na ka bynta ka jingpynshai bad ka jingkhroh briew. Te kan shong ha ki nongialam bad ki nongtrei jong baroh ki Party na ka bynta ban pynurlong ia ki jingthmu jong ki.
title: Ka Election Lok Sabha ha ri India

content: Amlarem, Lber 18: U Sub-Divisional Officer (Election), jong ka Amlarem Sub -Division West Jaiñtia Hills District, ula pyntip ba hadien ba ka Election Commission of India kala pynbna ïa ka tarik elkshon, kumta na ka bynta ka jingdonkam jong ki paidbah ka thaiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam Elekshon jong ka Lok Sabha, 2024, na ka liang ka tnat Elekshon jong ka Amlarem Civil Sub-Division kala buh ïa ka Call Centre kaba lah ban phone 24×7.Ïa kane ka Call Centre la buh ha Control Room jong ka ophis u Sub-Divisional Officer (Civil), Amlarem Sub-Division, Amlarem.Lada don kino kino kiba kwah ban ïoh jingtip ne kiba ai jingujor ha ka jingïadei bad ka kam Elekshon sha ka ïing Dorbar thawaiñ Lok Sabha ki lah ban phone ha kine ki number; 1950 / 18003453802 / 9485432400.
title: La buh ïa ka Call Centre ba 24×7 hapoh ophis SDO (C) Amlarem

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 18: U bah T. Lyngwa, IAS, Deputy Commissioner (EL) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat mynta ka sngi u la lum ïa ka jingïalang ryngkat bad ki Political Parties hapoh ka DRDA Hall, South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka General Election 2024 sha ka Lok Sabha ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik u Ïaïong, 2024.Ha ka jingïadonlang u bah L.T. Tariang, MCS, Additional Deputy Commissioner (EL) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat, ka kong Y.R. Mawlong, MCS, Additional Deputy Commissioner jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat, u bah K. Nongsteng, MCS, Assistant Commissioner, AC/BDO, Ranikor C&RD Block bad kiwei kiwei ki ophisar.U bah T. Lyngwa, IAS u la ong ba hadien ba la pynbna ïa ka tarik ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Lok Sabha Election 2024 la pyntreikam ïa ka kyndon hapoh ka kyndon aiñ 144 CrPC ha kaba la mana ïa ka jingpyndonkam ne kit ïa ki tiar siat bad suloi bad kane ka aiñ kan ym treikam ïa ki Police Home Guards, Forest Personnel, Border Security Force bad Central Reserve Police Force.Ha kajuh ka por la bthah wat ïa kito kiba don license ban wanrah noh shwa ïa kitei ki tiar siat ha ki Police Station kiba don hajan hapoh 14 sngi ba la pynmih ïa kane ka hukum.Shuh shuh u la pynkynmaw ruh ba ki Political Parties ki dei ban bud beit bud ryntih ïa ka Model Code of Conduct ne MCC bad kiwei kiwei ki jingbthah jong ka Election Commission na ka bynta ka jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih ha ka election.La ïoh ruh ka jingbatai halor ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka Suvidha App bad kiwei kiwei kiba ïadei bad kane ka Lok Sabha Election 2024.
title: Lum jingïalang u Deputy Commissioner (EL) ïa ki ophisar bad ki Political Parties ha Mawkyrwat

content: Nongpoh, Lber 18:U District Magistrate ka Ri Bhoi, u Arpit Upadhaya mynta ka sngi u la pynjari da ka section 144 CrPC ha Ri Bhoi District ban teh kyndon na ka bynta ka jingiaid beit iaid ryntih ka general election ban jied ia ki nongmihkhmat na ka jylla sha ka ïing Dorbar thaw aiñ ha Lok Sabha ba la buh ban long ha ka 19 tarik u ïaiong 2024 hapoh ka ri India hi baroh kawei.Kane ka jingpynjari ia katei ka kyndon aiñ la khang pyrshah ban rah pisa palat ia ka T.50000 la ki dei ki riew shimet ne ki kynhun katba dang treikam ka Model Code of Conduct.Ka kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor lyngba u District Magistrate ka la mana ruh ban pynlong kino kino ki lad jingiakhih, ki jingiaid paidbah ne ia khih paidbah la ki dei ki riew shimet ne ki kynhun hapoh u pud u sam ka Ri Bhoi District.Shuh shuh, la pynbna ruh ka daw kaba la pynjari ia katei ka kyndon aiñ ka dei shi bynta ba la treikam ka Model Code of Conduct bad la btah ruh naduh ka Election Commission ka ri India hadien ba la dep ban pynbna ia ka election jong ka Lok Sabha ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik u ïaiong 2024 hapoh ka ri India. Kino kino kiba pynkheiñ ne ialeh pyrshah ia katei ka kyndon aiñ ba la dep ban pynjari kin sa shah pynshitom katkum katei ka kyndon aiñ.
title: Pynjari u District Magistrate da ka section 144 CrPC ha Ri Bhoi District

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 18: Ka Dorbar shnong Nongsohpian ha ka sngi nyngkong, ka la ïoh ban plie paidbah ïa ka ïing Dorbar shnong, kaba la tei lyngba ka skhim Rashtriya Gram Swaraj Abhiyan (RGSA) lyngba ka ophis jong u BDO ka Nongstoiñ C&RD Block ha ka mang tyngka kaba 20 lak tyngka.Ïa kane ka ïing Dorbar la plie paidbah ruh da u bah C.P Mawkon ADC ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u bah Lakador Syiem Commandant ka 4th MLP Batllaion, u bah T. Diengngan BDO ka Nongstoiñ C&RD Block, ki ophisar na ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher ki riew rangbah bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong.U Kongsan haba ai jingkren ha kane ka jingïalang plie ïa ka ïing Dorbar u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong, ba kin sumar ïa ka khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ka shnong ka thaw bad ïa ki paidbah hi baroh.Ha kane ka juh ka sngi, u bah C.P Mawkon ADC ka WKHD u la plie paidbah ruh ïa ar tylli ki ïing PMAYG, ki ïing na ka bynta kiba duna ka ïoh ka kot hapoh ka shnong Nongsohpian, West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi da ka jingïadon ryngkatlang ruh u bah Lakador Syiem Commandant ka 4th MLP Battalion kum u symbud kongsan u ba long ruh uwei na ki ophisar u ba ju noh synñiang shibun ki kam kiba bha na ka bynta katei ka shnong, u Sordar ka shnong Nongsohpian u Babu Sirian Wahlang, ki riew rangbah bad kiwei kiwei.Na ka liang jong u ADC ryngkat u Commandant ka 4th Battalion ki la ai jingïaroh ïa ki nongïalam shnong ha ryngkat kitei ki ar tylli ki longïing, kiba la lah ban pyntrei bha bad trei hok ïa ka skhim kaba ka sorkar ka la ai bad ïarap.
title: Plie u Bah C.P Mawkon ADC ïa ka Ïing Dorbar ha Nongsohpian

content: Nongpoh, Lber 18: Ka M/S NES Jorobat kawei na ka jaka theh umphniang kali jong ka Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL) kaba la paw bha ha ka jylla shatei lam mihngi ka ri india, ha ka Sngi u Blei ka la rakhe ïa ka jingïaid lynti ba 18 snem jong ka jingshakri na ka bynta ban pynbiang ïa ki Umphniang kali sha ki paidbah ha Meghalaya-Assam bad ha ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei Lam Mihngi ka ri India.U Myntri sorkar ka jylla, ba dei peit ïa ka tnad Animal Husbandry and Veterinary, u Bah A.L Hek u la wan ban shim bynta kum u kongsam ha kane ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingïaid lynti ba 18 snem katei ka petrol pump bad ruh la shim bynta ruh ban plie ïa ka petrol pump ba la pynkha tnad da katei ka M/S NES Jorobat na ka bynta ban ai shuh shuh ka jingshakri ban pynbiang umphnaing ïa ki kali riit kum ki SUV, Car bad Sdan la ka long petrol ne diesel.La pynphuh pynphieng ruh ha ka sngi da ka jingdon lang u Jubin Garg u nongwai ba paw ka ri bad kynthup ruh ki jingshad tynrai na ki samla Assamese ba la pynhun ia ki paidbah ba sakhi ha kane ka sngi kyrpang.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi kum u kongsan, u Bah A.L Hek myntri sorkar ka Meghalaya u la pynpaw ka jingkmen ba ka M/S NES Jorobat ka la ai ka jingshakri kaba 18 snem sha ki paidbah bad kawei kaba u la ai jingïaroh ka dei ka jingaikam ai jam ïa ki samla lyngba ka jingdon jong kane ka petrol pump ha ka jylla.U B J Phukan, MD ka NRL, u la ai jingaroh ïa ka BPCL ba ka don bynta bad ka M/S NES Jorobat kaba la ioh ïa ka nam kum ka petrol pump kaba heh tam bad kaba lah bha ban die ïa ki umphniang ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki paidbah bad ruh ba ka kyrdan jong kane ka petrol pump ka la long kaba bit ba biang pura kumba angnud ki paidbah.U Debashis Naik, uba dei u Head Retail East BPCL, u la kren halor ka jingdonkam ban dang pynsuk ïa ki paidbah khamtam ka jingwanrah ïa ka EV Charging bad ka jingwan rah ruh ïaka Double Dhamaka Scheme ban ai jingmyntoi shuh shuh ïa ki paidbah.Ha kane ka sngi nalor ki paidbah bad ki nongïalam shnong la wan ruh ban sakhi da ka jingdon lang ki heh ka BPCL ba kynthup ïa u Pankaj Das, State Head North East, u Mowsam Khaund, Assam Territory Manager, u Faiyaz Alam, State Engineering Officer, u Janmjeet Das, Shillong Territory Manager, u Pankaj Doley, Shillong Engineering Officer bad kiwei kiwei.Shuh shih kumba la pynpaw, ka jingrakhe ka M/S NES ïa ka jingïaid lynti ba 18 snem bad ruh ba plie thymmai ruh ïa ka jaka theh umphniang ka dei ka jingangnud ka M/S NES ban dang ai shuh shuh ka jingshakri kaba paka tam sha ki paidbah ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpynbiang ïa ki umphniang kali sha ki paidbah bad kiwei kiwei ki jingshakri na ka bynta u paidbah.
title: Ka M/S NES ka jaka theh umphniang kali ba paw ha ki jylla shatei lam mihngi ka ri India

content: Jowai, Lber 18: Ka Little Angels Secondary School Moosalangkat Jowai, West Jaiñtia Hills District mynta ka sngi 18 tarik u Lber, 2024 kala sdang ban rakhe ïa ka jingdap 25 snem ka jingshakri haka liang ka jingai jingnang jingstad ïa ki khynnah skul hapoh ka District hi baroh kawei.Ïa kane ka skul la seng naduh ka snem 1999 bad ka motto kaba ong “Stepping Stones to Success”, haka por ba sdang ki don tang kumba 7 ngut ki khynnah skul bad ar ngut ki nonghikai, katba ki snem ki nang ïaid ka skul kala ïoh ban pynïasoh bad ka Meghalaya Board Of School Education (MBOSE).Ym tang haka jingpule kaba ki khynnah kila ïoh hynrei wat ha ki kam Sports ka skul kala lah ban pynmih shibun khynnah ïalehkai kiba don ïa ki sap kyrpang bapher bapher, ka skul ka don ïa ka thong na ka bynta ban ai jinghikai ïa ki khynnah pule katkum ka jingkylla jong ka juk ba mynta.Ïa kane ka jingsdang rakhe dap 25 snem jong ka skul la wan ban plie pyrda da u kongsan uba dei ruh u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaiñtia Hills u bah B.S. Sohliya (IAS), haka jingdonlang ka School Education Officer West Jaiñtia Hills kong A. Syiem kum ka symbud kongsan, ka kong Wanbok Sayoo Headmistress, ki nonghikai, ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul nalor kiwei de kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Na ka liang u bah Sohliya haka jingkren ula ai mynsiem ïa kane skul ban kan dang ïaibteng ka jingai jingnang jingstad ïa ki khynnah skul jong ka District bad ha kajuh ka por kan long ruh kum ka nuksa ïa kiwei de ki skul. U bah Sohliya ula ong kum ka Ri synshar paidbah ka donkam ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong bad pyndep ïala ka jong ka hok ban thep vote na ka bynta ka election ban wan.Ha kane ka sngi la plie kumjuh ïa ka Library bad Digital Classroom kaba la pynheh khnang na ka bynta ki khynnah skul bad la jingot ïa u cake jong ka jingrakhe kaba shi snem lynter. La sam kumjuh ïa ki khusnam sha ka nonghikai ba nyngkong jong ka skul, ïa ki 7 ngut ki khynnah skul bad i wei kiba la pass ïaka Matriculation exam (Batch 2012), ïa kiba pass ha u snem 2023 jong ka SSLC bad ïa kiwei kiwei de.La pynsngong shit shuh shuh ïa kane ka sngi daki jingrwai bad ki jingshad bapher bapaher ba la shim bynta da ki khynnah pule jong kane ka skul. La ïoh ïa ki kyntien ai khublei na ka Rimanda Suchiang bad la pynkut ïa kane ka prokram da ka jingduwai na u Rev. G.C. Lynden.
title: Rakhe ka Little Angels Secondary School, ïaka jingdap 25 snem ka jingshakri jingnang jingstad

content: Nongpoh, Lber 18: Ka Shnong Nongdewsaw ha ka Dorbar ba khatduh jong u snem 2023-2024 lyngba ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong Nongdewsaw, Ribhoi District ha ka jingïalam u Rangbah Shnong, u bah A.B Warjri ki la soi ïa ka MOU bad kawei ka Company ba al tip kum ka JICA (Japan International Cooperative Agency) ban aiti ïa ka khlaw shnong kaba don ka jingheh haduh 20 hectare sha katei ka company na ka bynta ban thung dieng kaba long ka thong ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki khlaw ki btap bad ïa ka mariang.U Rangbah Shnong ka Nongdewsaw, u Bah A.B Wajri ha ka sngi u Saitjain u la ïathuh ba ïa kane ka jingïasoh MOU bad katei ka Company la leh hadien ba la dep ban pynthymmai ïa ki nongïalam shnong bad kumjuh ruh u rangbah shnong ba ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la ibit ban jied ïa u Bah A.B Wajri ku u rangbah shnong ba thymmai.U Bah AB Warjri, Rangbah Shnong Nongdewsaw, u la ong ba ka Dorbar shnong ka la ïoh pdiang ïaka Skim lyngba ka Tnad JICA (Japan International Cooperative Agency) naka bynta ban thung dieng haki khlaw ki btap bad ki donkam ruh haduh 20 hectare eiei ka jingheh ka jak ana ka bynta ban thung ïaki dieng ban pynneh pynsah ïaka mei mariang.Shuh shuh, u Bah Warjri, kum u Rangbah Shnong u khot ïawer ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong lem bad ïa kito ki bym dei ki trai shnong hynrei kiba don pat ïaki jaka hapoh ka shnong Nongdewsaw ba kin wan mih haka sngi saitjaiñ kata haka 23 tarik Lber, 2024 ha kapor 9 baje mynstep ban ïa kynduh bad ki nongpynïaid shnong haka ophis treikam naka bynta ban ïa kren pynbeit ïa katei ka kam kaba long kaba donkam eh na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong, u la bynrap.
title: Ban ïada mariang, 20 Hectare ka jaka yn pyndonkam ka Nongdewsaw ban thung dieng

content: Khliehriat Lber 18: Ka ophis treikam jong u Acting Doloi Elaka Sutnga, ka pynpaw ka jingsngew khia halor ka jingai syrnot Land Holding Certificate ka ophis jong ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council sha ki briew shimet kiba leit ban register ïa ki jaka kiba hap hapoh elaka Sutnga kiba dei ki jaka ba la buh kyrpang da ki men ba rim, kiba dei ki longshwa manshwa na ka bynta ki khun ka elaka ba kin pyndonkam.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary Elaka Sutnga, u bah Lappideris Pala, la ong ba ka elaka ha ka jingialang ba la pynlong ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai lber, ka pynkynmaw biang ïa baroh ba ka Elaka Sutnga ka mana ban register ne ban shna Land Holding ïa ki jaka ba kynthup ka Umthe, Lum Lyndon, Moo Iong, Sha Pra, Sakwa, Tongsko, Bri Muliat Khaddum, Umsynrem, Umsngad, Kdait, Umsngad Tyrko, Wah Shympe,Khlaw Salang, Um Kboh, Latngiar, Bri Shyrmang, Khlaw na Shnong Sakhain, Khlaw na Umtyra, Nongsning ter ter haduh Lunar, Lum Syngket Moopad UmladoNadang, Bom Masi Umsatad pdang Tyngkong Waheh Saphoh.La ong ruh ba”Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiakut ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki jaka kiba ka elaka Sutnga ka la kdew hangneng, ka Elaka Sutnga naduh ka 24 tarik u bnai ïaïong jong u snem 2017 ka la dep buh da ka jingthoh bad pynkynmaw ïa ka office ba donburom jong ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council, ba ym bit ban ai Land Holding Certificate ne ban nym pdiang satia ban register ïa kitei ki jaka kumba la kdew hangeng hynrei sngewsih ban ong ba ka ophis jong ka JHADC pat ka dang ai LHC sha ki briew shimet, namar kitei ki jaka ki dei kiba la buh da ki longshwa manshwa na ka bynta ki khun jong ka elaka ban rep ban riang bad na ka bynta kiwei pat ki jingdonkam jong ka elaka”ong u kyrwoh.Ka elaka ha ka jingïalang jong ka Executive committee kaba pynlong ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai lber 2024 ka la pynkynmaw biang ba kitei ki khlaw elaka kim lah ban long ki khlaw shimet, la ïakut ruh ba baroh ki kyndon jong ka elaka ki dang iaineh bad kim pat kylla haduh mynta mynne naduh ba la buh da u longshwa manshwa na ka bynta ki khun jong ka elaka ban rep ban riang bad na ka bynta kiwei pat ki jingdonkam jong ka elaka.Kumta la kyrpad ïa kino kino kiba la don ne ioh ïa ki Land Holding Certificate (LHC) kiba hap hapoh kitei ki jaka ki dei ban pynphai noh ïa ki LHC jong ki sha ka ophis jong ka elaka Sutnga bad la ai por ba dei ban pynphai hapoh ka shi bnai, lym kumta ka elaka kan sa shim da kwei pat ka lyntiShuh shuh na ka ophis jong u Acting Doloi ka la buh ïa ka jingkyrpad ïa baroh ki Rangbah Shnong jong ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka elakaSutnga ba ki dei ban pyntip sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ki ïa ki jingpyntip kiba katkum ki shithi ban la dep phah sha phi ki Rangbah Shnong.
title: Mana ka Elaka Sutnga ban shna LHC bad ban register ïa ki jaka ba la buh da ki men ba rim

content: Ka la mih ka khubor marsien dep ka Exam SSLC ba bun ki khynnah kiba ïaleh ïa ka SSLC Exam mynta u snem 2024 ki la shah shet pluk ha ka subject Social Sciences kaba kynthup ïa ka History bad Geography mar 23 mark, ka Civics bad Economics pat mar 17 marks nalor ka 20 marks ka Internal Marks bad 4 marks pat ka Map, katkum ka Blue Print ba la ai copy da ka MBOSE sha baroh ki skul ha u snem 2018.Hashwa jong u snem 2018, kata, naduh ka snem 2008, ka MBOSE ka la phiah ïa ki jingkylli la ki jong ki jong ki subject ba ki khynnah ki dei ban jubab, kata, ki khynnah kidei ban jubab beit ïa ka History, Civics kiba hab ha ka Social Sciences I bad ka Geography bad Economics kiba hab ha ka Social Sciences II kin thoh la ka jong ka jong ka subject.Dei ha ka snem 2018 ba ka MBOSE ka la pynkylla noh ba kin don noh ki jingkylli ban shu jied ki khynnah ïa kiba dei (right answers) ne Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ) kiba kit shi mark (1 mark) kawei ka jingkylli bad ki Short Answer (SA) kiba kit 2 marks kawei ka jingkylli. Kitei ki jingkylli baroh 2 jait dei ban khleh lang (mixed) ïa baroh 4 subject bad ki khynnah kidei ban jied ne jubab tang 12 tylli na kawei-pa-kawei na kitei ki jingkylli.Hynrei ki Long Answer (LA) pat ki khynnah kidei ban jubab beit (mandatory) la ka jong ka jong ka subject, kata, mar 3 tylli na ka History bad Geography bad mar 2 tylli pat na ka Civics bad Economics. Kane ka rukom leh kan kham pynsuk ne ïarap ïa ki khynnah ba kin ïoh jied khnang ba ki lah ban kham pass bha. Haba phai pat sha jingkylli jong ka Social Sciences jong mynta u snem 2024, ki jingkylli na ka Social Science I (History bad Civics) u/ka nongset jingkylli um/kam da pynpher palat ne leh stad eh haduh katta katta lait noh katto katne. Hynrei ïa ka Social Science II (Geography bad Economics) u/ka la wanrah ka rukom set jingkylli kaba ïapher bak-ly-bak na ka rukom set jingkylli kaba mynshwa (existing system). U/Ka la ïaid lait ïa ka nuksa jingkylli (sample questions) jong ka MBOSE ba dei ban kham bun ki jingkylli ban set na ka kot pule (Text book) jong ki khynnah bad tang khyndiat eh ki jingkylli dei ban pynpher tang ban ithuh ïa ki khynnah ba proh jabieng (talented students). Lada shu pynpher lut ïa ki jingkylli, kata, ki set tang ïa ki proh jabieng khlem pyrkhat shuh ïa ki khynnah ba shu pdeng (average students) bad ki khynnah ba kham duna (below average students).Ha kamra class, kin don eh 10/15 pc ki proh jabieng katba 90/80 pc kidei ki average bad below average students. Kidei kine keiñ kiba kylla ‘langknia namar kim lah ban thoh ne jubab hi na la ka jingstad lade (common sense). Wat lada set jingkylli thik na copy ne na ka kot pule jong ki ruh, bun kim lah bad bun kiba fail. Katno tam lei lei lada pynpher ïa ki jingkylli na kiba la ai. Hynrei, kiba kham shah ktah eh ha ka Social Sciences mynta u snem 2024 kidei ki khynnah bym leit skul (private candidates) kiba ju shaniah ïa ki jingkylli barim (previous question papers) bad ki shaniah ruh ha ki help book kiba ki thied na ïew na hat (bazar notes). Kine kin long ki ‘langknia ba shyrkhei (worst affected victims) ïa ka subject Social Science mynta u snem 2024.Nangne shakhmat, lada ka MBOSE ka kwah ban pynkylla ïa ki rukom set jingkylli, ka dei ban ai jingtip (notify) sha baroh ki skul khnang ba kin tip ban hikai ïa ki khynnah ha classroom katkum kata ka model jong ka rukom set jingkylli, ym ban shu set katba mon katba kwah. Bun ki nonghikai ki dang hikai da ka rukom set jingkylli kaba rim (existing system) ha une u snem 2023 ba la dep namar ym pat don satia kano kano ka jingpyntip thymmai (new notification) ka ban pynïap noh (supercede) ïa ka system kaba ju leh. Lada ka MBOSE ka ïai mlien ban ïaid lait ïa ki kyndon (guidelines/criteria) ba ka la bthah hi, kata, kan kylla long ka nongpynïap ba jar jar (silence killers) namar kin nang jur shuh shuh ka jingpep skul (drop outs) shiteng por jong ki khynnah.Nalor ba ka Meghalaya ka la poi lypa sha trai (bottom) ha ka liang ka thoh ka pule ha ri India, nangne shakhmat kan sa kham hiar shuh shuh wat ïa ka Bihar kaba dei ha state kaba poi sha trai duh. Ym tang kumta, hynrei nangne shakhmat, bun ki skul ha sor bad wat ha nongkyndong ruh ki ban leit pynïasnoh (affiliate) noh sha ka Central Board kum ka CBSE/ICSE, etc, kumba pynïasnoh lem kiwei ki skul kum ka Pine Mount School, BK Bajoria, Army school nalor bun bah ki central school kiba don ha state jong ngi.Dei hangta keiñ ba ka lah ban ktah matïong ïa ka burom ka ijot (prestige/credibility) jong ka MBOSE hakhmat ki ri India hi baroh kawei.
title: Hato, kylla ‘langknia ki khynnah ba ïaleh SSLC Exam, 2024 ha ka subject Social Sciences?

content: Shillong, Lber 18: Imat ha ri India hi haba ïakren ïa ka elekshon, yn nym don kawei ruh ka jingdonkam kaban kham tam ïa ka bad ka tam ruh ka jingdonkam wat ïa ka pule puthi ruh.Ka daw ba la ong kumne, kadei namar ba la ïohi ba hadien ba ka Election Commission jong ka ri India, ki Nonghikai skul ki la ïa bunkam ban mareh sha ki ophis DC, SDO Civil bad shawei shawei na ka bynta ban pyndep ïa ki kam elekshon. Kiba bun ki la hap ban iehnoh noh ïa ki kam hikai jong ki bad ban wan beh shuwa ïa ki kam kiba ïadei bad ka elekshon. “Mynta ka sngi, ngim shym la ïoh lad ban peit shuh ïa ki khynnah skul, hynrei la hap ban wan beh noh shuwa na ka bynta ki kam elekshon”, la ong katto katne ki nonghikai kiba la ïakynduh ïa u nongthoh khubor ha ophis DC.Kane ka jingngat duty elekshon ki Nonghikai khlem pep kan ktah ïa ki khynnah skul, namar ba la ïohi ba ka jingthep vote ha Meghalaya na ka bynta ka Lok Sabha kan long haduh ka 19 tarik u ïaïong mynta ka snem, kaba mut sa shi bnai nangne. Ki nonghikai ki la ïathuh ba kim tip katno sien kin hap ban leit ban attend ïa ki election duty la ka long ki training ne kiwei pat ki jingdonkam. Hynrei shisien hi ba ki la leit ki la duh beit ïa ka jinghikai ha skul.Ki don shi kynhun ki nonghikai kiba na kawei ka skul ruh ki la ïathuh ba ki la ngap election duty lut baroh na kajuh ka skul, lait noh tang i BLO. Haba u nongthoh khubor u la kylli, kumno pat ki leh ïa ki khynnah skul, ki la ïathuh ba ki la hap ban shu ai shuti beit namar kumno kin phah wan ïa ki khynnah skul haba ym don nonghikai ha skul.La ïathuh ruh ba ki nonghikai kiba ngat duty elekshon kim dei tang ki nonghikai na ki skul sorkar, hynrei ki nonghikai skul SSA, nonghikai Adhoc ruh ki ngat lang bad ki bym ngat duty imat ki lah ban dei tang ki nonghikai skul Private lane ki skul ki bym pat ïoh kino kino ki jingïarap na ka sorkar.Haba la ïoh ban ïakren bad ki kmie ki kpa ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingngat election duty jong ki nonghikai namar kan ktah shibun ïa ki khynnah skul. Tangba ki la pynpaw pat ba kin nym lah ban leh eiei na ka liang jong ki, katba ka sorkar ne ki bor pynïaid elekshon kim lah ban pynkiar ïa ki nonghikai na ki kam elekshon. Namar naduh mynshuwa ki la ïa pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ïa kane ka jingngat election duty ki nonghikai, hynrei kim lah ban leh eiei pat namar man ba long elekshon ki nonghikai ki hap leit duty beit bad kata ruh ym dei tang shi sngi arsngi hynrei bun sngi.
title: Don ki skul ba hap ai shuti namar ba ngat election duty ki Nonghikai

content: Shillong, Lber 18:Sa kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba uwei u nongshong shnong jong ka shnong South West Khasi Hills u la phah ka jingujor ba ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 9.10 baje mynmied, u la ïoh ka jingthoh ne ka text message kaba la ong ba udei ban update ïa ka PAN card number lyngba ka link kaba la bthah hapoh ka message.Kham hadien ha ka por ba u la click ïa ka link, u la shah pan ban pynbiang ïa ki OTP, hadien u la shem ba ka pisa kumba T. 49,997/- la shah khate napoh ki 2 tylli ki SBI Bank account jong u.
title: Shah khate tuh ka Pisa T. 49 hajar tam

content: Shillong, Lber 18: U Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) ka Jylla u BDR Tiwari ula leit jurip ïa ka strong room ne jaka buh ïa ki kor EVM ha madan Polo, Shillong, kum ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka ilekshon Lok Sabha ha Jylla.Ïa u CEO la synran da ka District Election Officer, Addl Deputy Commissioner (EL), Assistant Commissioner(i/c strong room) bad u EE ka PWD (Building).U CEO ula bthah ïa u EE ka PWD ban pynkloi noh ïa ka jingmaramot ïa ka strong room bad ban pynthikna ba kan long kaba shngaiñ.U CEO ula shong bishar kam ruh halor ka jingpynbeit ban phah bad pdiang ïa ki EM ha ki counting centre bad ka bha ka miat jong ki nongñiew vote.
title: Jurip jaka buh EVM u CEO ha madan Polo

content: Shillong, Lber 18 : Ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ka shini bad piat ka la nang jur mynta nangne na khappud Meghalaya sha Bangladesh. Kane ka la paw pyrthei bha hadien ka jingshah siat iap uwei u nongkhïi shini beaiñ ha ka shnong Dalia East Khasi Hills myn ha ka 1 tarik Lber uba kyrteng u Asen M Marak. Kane ka jingjia kala jia tang kumba 300 metre na khappud kaba ym pat ker sainar shiah. La ïathuh ba uwei u paralok jongu ruh u dei na kjat tangba ki pulit ki dang thwet ban lap dien ïa u.La kynnoh ba kane ka jingkhaïi beaiñ ïa ka shini bad piat ka dei ruh kaba la ïadonkti da ki BSF bad ki heh ka Land Custom ruh.Haba u nongthoh khubor u ïakren bad ka Secretary jongka Meghalaya Importer and Exporter Chamber of Commerce ka kong Dolly Konglah ka la ïathuh ba kane ka jingkhaïi beaiñ ka long haba shit ba shai bad kaba la ïohi tyngkreiñ ruh da ki bor sorkar naduh ki BSF, ki briew ka Land Custom bad ter ter.“ Leit sha Tamabil phin ïohi ïa ki trok kiba ïeng laiñ kiba la kit ïa ki byrni shini bad piat bad kumno ki ïoh ban rung suk sha khappud bad la ïarap ïaki da kito kiba dei ki nongpahara ha khappud hi” ong ka Kong Dolly.Haba la kylli hato ki don ki kot ki sla ha kane ka jingïakhaïi, ka la jubab “ Ki kot aiu, ki khaïi tuh haba shit ba shai. Kine ki nongkhaïi beaiñ ki don ruh la ki lynti ïaid jongki kiba la pynjulor ym tang ïa ki bynta khappud hynrei wat ïa ki pipe um, ïa ki tyllong um namar ki trok ki ïaid nalor jongki. Kane ka nongkhaïi dewiong ba la rim bha sha Bangladesh ka la ong ba kane ka jingjur ka jingshalan tuh ïa ka shini bad piat sha Bangladesh ka dei namar ka jingkiew kynsan ka khajna ha Banladesh na ka 1 BD Taka sha ka 35 BD Taka bad kane ka la pynlong ïa nongkhaïi beaiñ ban ïoh shim kabu bad leh katba mon.Ia ka shini la thied na Shillong bad Assam ha ka dor 50 tyngka shi kilo bad khaïi beaiñ sha Bangladesh ha ka dor 140 tyngka shi kilo.
title: Jur ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ka Shini bad Piat sha Bangladesh kynnoh ba donkti ki BSF

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 18: U District Election Officer (DEO) ka West Khasi Hills Garod LSN Dykes ha ka sngi nyngkong, u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin ai jingtip lada don kano kano ka jingthong pisa ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik Ïaiong.Ha ka jingkyntu, u Bah Dykes u la ong ba haba pyntreikam ïa ka jingbthah jong ka Election Commission ka Ri India, la pyntip sha ki paidbah ba kano kano ka jingtyrwa pisa, kyiad, jingai sngewbha ne ka bam ei sha ki nongthep vote ha ka por elekshon ka dei kaba khein kum ka jingthong.Baroh ki briew, kiba tyrwa bad kiba pdiang ïa kine ki jingthong, kin ngat ha ka jingpynsajia da kaba set along haduh shi snem bad ka kuna. U pyntip ba la dep thaw mynta ïa ka kynhun Flying Squad bad kynhun peitngor ba kin peit pyrman halor ki kam kiba ïaid ha ki sngi ïalap elekshon.“La kyntu ba kino kino ki briew ki lah ban pyntip ïa kum kine ki jingjia (thong) sha ka Complaint Monitoring Cell, ba la buh ha ka District lyngba ka toll free number 1950 bad C-Vigil”, ong u DEO.
title: Kyntu u DEO ka WKH ïa ki paidbah ban pyntip lada don ba thong pisa

content: Shillong, Lber 18: Ka kam ba shah bom shnong da u paidbhur ne ka Mob Lynching tang da kaba ai ïa kiba bun kidaw ka la dei kawei na ki mat ïatai nia kaba la thnam bha hapoh ka ïingdorbar Thaw Aiñ jong ka ri ne ka Lok Sabha ha u bnai Nohprah jong u snem ba la dep hadien ba na ka liang ka sorkar Pdeng NDA ba la ïalam da ka BJP ka la wanrah ïa ka jingpynkylla ïa ki lai tylli ki bill kiba la tip da ki criminal code bill, ha kaba ïa kane la wanrah da u Myntri ka tnat ki Kam Pohïing u Amit Shah u la ong ba hapoh kine ki aiï ban pynshitom ïa ki runar ka sorkar ka la kynthup ïa ki kyndon kiba dei ïa ka jingshah pynshitom kaba long da ka jingshah pynïap ïa kito kiba donkti ha kine ki kam runar ba bom shnong da ki paidbhur (crime of mob lynching).Ha kane ka jingmynjur jong ka Lok Sabha ïa kitei ki aiñ ne criminal laws kidei ka Bharatiya Nyaya (Second) Sanhita, ka Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha (Second) Sanhita bad ka Bharatiya Sakshya (Second) Bill.ïane ka Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita kan mih bujli ïa ka Indian Penal Code-1860, ka Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita kan mih bujli ïa ka CrPC jong ka 1973 bad ka Bharatiya Sakshya Bill kan bujli ïa ka Indian Evidence Act jong u snem 1872.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam mob-lynching ne ki kam shah bom shnnong tang na kino kino ki daw ba suba sniew, kane ka Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita ka bynrap ba ki kam shah pynïap lane kano kano ka jingpynmynsaw kaba la donkti da ki 5 ngut ne palat ïa ka 5 ngut ha kano kano kano ka jingjia ka la dei lypa ka kam kaba la pynkheiñ aiñ.Ki jingshah bom shnong kiba don ka jingïadei bad ka jait bynriew, ka kyrdan ki jait briew, ka jinglong kynthei ne shynrang, ka kyntien ba kren lane ka jingngeit shimet, ka jingshah pynshitom kaba ïadei bad kine ki kam pynïap briew kan dei ka jingshah set patok kaba shyrta jingim ne ka jingshah pynïap.
title: Ka jingpynshitom ïa ki kam bom shnong ka long ka phatok shirta jingim ne ka rai shah pynïap

content: Shillong, Lber 18: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat ki kam Pynroi Sor ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka sngi Nyngkong u la ong ba ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) ka la pan por ban jubab ïa ka jingkhot sngewbha jong ka sorkar ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingïasyllok ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingpynkynriah nohïa ki 342 tylli ki longïng napoh ka Sweeper Colony napoh ka Them ïew Mawlong.“Ngi kwah ban khot sngewbha ïa ki (HPC) ban ïakren hynrei ki la pan por,” ong u Bah Dhar sha ki lad pathai khubor.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai, na ka liang ka seng Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ka la kam ba ka la donkti ha ka jingpynbthei bom IED kaba la jia ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai hapoh Them ïew Mawlong bad ka la aipor shibnai ïa ka sorkar ban pynkynriah noh ïa kitei ki 342 tylli ki longïng na katei ka jaka.Haba kylli shaphang kane, na ka liang u Dhar u la ong ba ka sorkar kan sa leh la ka kam ban pynkutnoh ïa kane ka kam kaba la sah lah slem bha. Katkum ka jingong jong u, u la ong ba dei ruh ban pynkynmaw ïa ki briew ba kane ka kam ka dang dei kaba dang sah hapoh ka ïingbishar jong ka Meghalaya High Court.“Kane kam dei namar ka jingshah pyntieng kaba wan na ka HNLC hynrei ka sorkar kan sa leh ïa la ka kamram bad ban trei katkum ki rukom treikam kiba dei,” u la bynrap.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba hadien ba la jia katei ka jingshah pynbthei bom IED, na ka liang ka HPC ka la pan ka jingïarap bad ka jingtuklar jong u Myntri ka Kam Pohïing jong ka Sorkar Pdeng u Amit Shah na ka bynta ban pynlong da ka jingtohkit bad ban tuklar halor katei ka jingjia bad ban pyndep ïa kane ka kam ha ki lai liang.Halor kane u Bah Dhar u la ong ba kadei ka kamram jong ka sorkar ban pynthikna ïa ki lad jingïada ym tang ïa ki Harijan hynrei jong manla iwei pa iwei I nongshong shnong ka jylla.“Nga dang shudep kren ïa ki ophisar jong nga bad nga la bthah ïa ki ban pynkynmaw ïa ka HPC na ka bynta ki jingïakren khnang ba ngin lah ban ban ïashong jingïalang noh mardor,” u la ong.Haba kylli, na ka liang u Bah Dhar u la pynpaw ïa ka jingkyrmen ba ka sorkar kan lah ban pyndep bad ban shim ka rai la kumno kumno ha kane ka jingïalang ka ban sa long shen.“Da ka jingïalang ka ban sa long la kumno kumno ngi dei ban shim noh ïa ka rai naba baroh lah dep ban pynkhreh da ka sorkar. Ha ka jingïalang ban sa long lada kam long kaba la rai khatduh hynrei kan dei ka lynti jong ka rai kaba khatduh,” pynthikna u Bah Dhar.
title: Ym dei ba byrngem ka HNLC hynrei ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh hi ban pynkynriah ïa ki Harijan

content: Shillong, Lber 18: Kumba lai tylli ki Sengbhalang ha ka sngi Nyngkong ha ka jingïalang kiba ki la pynlong kila dawa ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) kaba la ïalam da ka National Peoples’ Party (NPP), ba kan kren ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kan pyllait noh pura ïa ka Meghalaya na ka jingtreikam ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019 bad ka Rules 2024 nalor ban mynjur noh ha ka ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ban tehlakam ïa ka jingwan rung kyrthep ki briew nabar ka Jylla sha kane ka jylla.Kitei ki Sengbhalang ki kynthup ïa ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC), ka Jaiñtia National Council (JNC) bad ka Confederation of Ri-Bhoi People (CoRP). Kitei ki seng kila aiti ruh ïa ka dorkhas sha u Myntri Rangbah (MR) ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ba un shimkhia ïa kane ka kam kaba la donkam kyrkieh.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka HYC Roy Kupar Synrem ula ong ba ki lai tylli ki seng ki la dawa ïa u Myntri Rangbah ba un ïakren bad ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kan pyllait noh pura ïa ka Meghalaya na ka CAA 2019 bad ka Rules jong ka nalor ban pyntreikam ïa ka ILP kham kloi kat kaba lah na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ka jylla baroh kawei.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u la ong ba ka Ministry of Home Affairs ka Sorkar India ha ka 11 tarik Lber, 2024, ka la pynmih ïa ka jingpyntip paidbah ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rules 2024 na ka bynta ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019.“Watla ka CAA, 2019 ka la pyllait noh ïa ka jingtreikam na ki jaka riewlum jong ka Jylla, ka jingshisha hi kan ïai neh ba ym baroh ki jaka ha Meghalaya ki hab hapoh ka Sixth Schedule jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri. Ki dang don ki jaka kum ka sor Shillong, ka nongbah jong ka Jylla ha kaba ki kyndon jong ka Sixth Schedule kim treikam satia bad ruh ka jaka ba bun eh ki briew ba nabar jylla ki wan ban shong ban sah,” ong u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem.“Ha kum kine kiei kiei, lada ki briew ba sah ha kine ki jaka bym treikam ka Act ki lah ban kynriah ïa ka jaka sah bad sa aplai ïa ka jinglong nongshong shnong ka India hapoh ka Act, 2019. Lada kane ka jia, kumno ka Jylla kan khanglad ïa ki ba kin ïoh long nong India hapoh kane ka Act?. Hato kadon kano kano ka lad ka lynti ban buddien ïa ka jingdon kine ki briew kiba sah ha kine ki jaka khnang ba yn lah ban bishar ïa ki hadien habud,” ula buh jingkylli u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem.Shuh shuh, u Bah Roy Kupar ula ong, “Ngi don ruh ka jingsngewkhia ba lada bun ki jaka hapoh ka Jylla kila lait na ka CAA, 2019, ka Jylla kan sa shah ktah na ka jingwan rung pat na kiwei ki Jylla khamtam ka Jylla Assam. Namar ka jingbym don kano kano ka aiñ ka ban pyrkhing ïa ka jingrung jingmih ki briew hapoh ka Jylla, ngi sheptieng ba kane ka jingpyllait (sixth Schedule) kan ym don jingmut bad ngi lah ban mad ïa ka jingeh kaba khraw na ka jingwan rung ki bar jylla hapoh ka Jylla”.“Namar kata, ka lad jingïada hi kaba ngi lah ban don ban ïada ïa kane ka jingwan rung kiba nabar Jylla ka dei ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka ILP bad ruh ban pyllait noh ïa ka jingtreikam ka CAA ha Jylla,” ong utei u nongïalam ka HYC.
title: Da ka dorkhas phah ki sengbhalang ha u MR ban pyllait pura ïa ka jylla na ka CAA

content: Jowai, Lber 18: Ka Bouncers Association of Meghalaya (BAM) West Jaiñtia Hills, ha kane ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la ïoh ban pynkhalai ïa ki Ticket Lucky Draw jong u snem 2024, kum ka lad ban pynmih pisa ïa ka seng kaba la treikam mynta ha ka jingïaid lynti la 3 snem tam ban ai jingshakri ban pynïoh kam ïa ki khun samla shynrang bad kynthei.Hashwa ban pynkhalai ïa ki ticket la don ka jingïalang ba lyngkot ha ka jaka ai training ka Association ba la pynïaid da u President samla Yoosar Kynjing, ha ka jingdonlang u kongsan jong kane ka sngi u ma D. Kma, u Dolloi ka Eleka Jowai ma Puramon Kynjing, ki dkhot ka BAM bad ki samla ba shah hikai.Na ka liang u kongsan haba ai jingkren ula ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka Bouncers Association of Meghalaya (BAM) West Jaiñtia Hills, kaba dei kawei na ki kynhun kaba shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingshong suk shong saiñ hapoh ka imlang ka sahlang.Ula ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki kam ba bha jong kane ka seng kiba la leh ha kine ki snem ba la dep, ula ai mynsiem shuh shuh ba kan dang ïaid shakhmat ha ka jingtreikam da ka jingïalong kawei, ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut bad ban ïarap kyrpang ïa ki khun samla ba kin ïoh kam ïoh jam ha kum kane ka juk mynta.La ong ruh ba ka jingdon kum kane ka Association hapoh ka Ri-Lum Jaiñtia kan ïarap shibun eh lada don kino kino ki Tamasa, ki Fete, ki khawai dawai nalor kiwei de prokram ha kaba ka Association kan ïoh ban shim ïa ka bynta ban long kum ki nongïada bad ki nong pahara.La pynkhalai ïa ki Ticket Lucky Draw bad ki nongjop ki long kumne 1st Prize: 15018 kaba long 20 hajar tyngka, 2nd: Prize: 4319 ka pisa 10 hajar tyngka, 3rd Prize: 4305 bad ka pisa ka long 5 hajar tyngkat. La kyrpad ïa ki nongjop ba kin wan shim ïa ki khusnam hapoh ka 30 sngi naduh mynta ka sngi ba la pynbna.
title: Ban pynmih pisa pynkhalai ka BAM-JH ïa ki Ticket Lucky Draw

content: Shillong, Lber 18 : Ki kyrtong na ki party bapher bapher kiba thmu ban aireng ha kane ka elekshon MP ka ban sa long shen ha ka 19tarik u Iaiong mynta u snem, ha ka sngi Nyngkong ki la ïoh ban mih rynsan ha ka Sympossium ba la pynlong da ka Sankardev College kyrpang na bynta kitei ki kyrtong ba la tip kum ka Sympossium on Parliamentary Politics and Political Participation.Ha kane ka rynsan, ki kyrtong kiba wan ban pynshai paidbah ki kynthup naduh u kyrtong ka Voice of the People Party Dr. RJ Syngkong, kyrtong ka UDP Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin, bad kyrtong shimet Prof Lakhon Kma. Na ka Congress pat lawan ban mihkhmat da u Bah Manuel Badwar bad na ka BJP da u Nongai ktien ka Party, Bah MH Kharkrang. Katba na ka NPP ym shym la don ba wan ban mihkhmat.Shwa ban sdang, la ïoh shwa ïa ka jingkren maitphang na ka Principal Dr. Eureka Lyngdoh bad ruh na u IOAC Coordinator Bah MS Warjri.Ka jingïatai ka la long kaba shongshit bha khamtam hadien ba la ailad ruh ïa ki samla pule bad ki paidbah ban kylli jingkylli ïa ki kyrtong.Ha ka jingkren kyllum kaba la ai por mar 10 minit, u nongkren nyngkong, Prof Lakhon Kma u la ong ba ki 7 tylli ki distrik jongka jylla kin sa jied tang uwei u nongmihkhmat ban leit sha Lok Sabha. Kumta u la ong ba lada ki paidbah ki jied ïa u, marwei un ïeng laitluid ban pynsawa ïa ki dawbah jong ka Jaidbynriew ha Parliament.“Na ki 16 sien ki MP sha Lok Sabha, haduh 6 sien dei ki kyrtong shimet bad u MP ba nyngkong eh ba ngi phah ruh dei u kyrtong shimet,” u la ong da kaba pynskhem ïa ka nongrim kaba u mih bad ïeng ban aireng ha kane ka elekshon kum u kyrtong shimet.Shuh shuh u ong ruh ba kum u kpa jong ki khun ba dang rit u don ka jingsngewkhia na ka bynta ka lawei jong ki khun ha ka ïohkam ïohjam khamtam eh haba ka jylla mynta ka don ha ka kyrdan kaba ar ne balai na kaba khatduh. “Dei na kane ka daw kaba pynlong ïanga ban shim ïa ka sienjam da ka thong kaba hakhmat eh ban ïakhun ïa ka bamsap bad ruh na ka bynta ban ïakhun ïa kine ki jingeh.”Haba bynrap lang, u Dr. AJ Syngkon haba kren halor ka koit ka khiah u la ong ba donkam ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka rukom sumar tynrai. U ong ruh ba kum ka party ka phaikhmat bad kwah ban kyntiew ïa kane ka rukom sumar kaba ki 170 tylli kiwei pat ki ri ki phaikhmat kum kawei naki lad ai jingsumar.“Hangne ngi don bun bha ki stad dawai tynrai, kumta lada kyntiew bad plie lad ïa ki kan long ruh kum shi bynta ban pynneh ïa ki khlaw ki btap bad ki dawai kynbat,” u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba kwah ban pynshlur ïa ki samla ba kin sngewthuh ba kano kano ka kam ka dei kaba donburom bad ruh ban trei shitom.U Bah Manuel ba mihkhmat ha jaka jong u MP ba mynta, Bah Vincent H Pala u la ong ba kane ka juk ka dei kaba jur bha ka jingïakdew kti da kaba pynïapher hapdeng kawei ka jaitbynreiw bad kawei pat kum hapdeng Khasi ne Garo, Hindu ne Muslim bad kiwei kiwei.Une u rangbah u la kren ruh bun bha halor ka phang kaba ïadei bad ka lawei ki samla ha ka ïohkam ïohjam, nangta ka bylla sngi na ka bynta kito ki bym dei ha ki kam sorkar bad ruh halor bun kiwei kiwei kip hang kiba ïadei bad ka jingkyrshan ïa ki nongseng kam lajong.Na ka liang u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin pat ula ong ba ka mat kaba hakhmat lada kum u kyrtong ka RDA u jop ka long ban pynbor ïa ka sorkar NDA ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit, nangta ban ïakhun ïa ka hok ban ïoh mane Blei laitluid ha kano kano ka sngi, ban ïakhun pynrung noh ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba Phra bad khamtam eh ïaka ishu pynbeit pud la ka long bad ka sorkar Assam bad kumjuh bad ka Bangladesh.“Ngin pynkhlaiñ ïa ka Sixth Schedule bad ngi pyrshah ïa kito kiba kwah ban pynduhnoh ïa ka,”u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ruh ba ki don bun ki samla ba la nang la stad bad pyndep ki jingpule hynrei kim don pat ka lad ban sengkam lajong kumta u ong ba kane ruh ka dei shi bynta jongka mat jong ka RDA ha kane ka elekshon.U la kren ruh halor ka jingeh jong ki nongrep khamtam halor ka jingnang hiar ka dor ki mar rep kiba pynmih na khlaw kum u synsar, latyrpad bad kiwei kiwei.U banjur ruh ïa ka jingdonkam ban pynbiang ïa ki jaka sumar khnang ba ki paidbah kin ym donkam shuh ban leit shaduh Assam ne shabar jylla ban phah sumar.Katba u Bah MH Kharkrang u la ong ba naduh ba shimti ka BJP ïa ka sorpdeng ka la pyrshang ban pynkylla thymmai lut ïa ka rukom treikam. U la kob ruh ba ka party jong u kam don jingartatien ban wan biang ha ka bor ha kane ka elekshon ban wan.“Hato phi kwah ba u MP jongphi un don ha ka liang synshar ne liang pyrshah. Kum u nongïalam ka BJP ha ka jylla ngi kwah ba u MP ka party lada u jop un trei bha,” u la ong da kaba ïathuh ruh ba ka party ka la pynduh tiket ïa kumba 30 ngut ki MP tang na ka daw ba ka lap ba kim treikam.
title: Markhmat pynksan nia ki kyrtong MP ha ka Sympossium jong ka Sankardev College

content: Shillong, Lber 18: Ki shipai BSF bad ki Pulit jong ka jylla kila pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ha Rongra South Gao Hills District ha khappud bad ka Bangladesh kila ïoh ban kurup shibun ka shini na kawei ka ïing bad ka dor jong ka shini ka la long palat ïa ka shiphew lak tyngka.Ïa ka shini ba la ïoh ban kurup na kawei ka ïing kaba don ha khappud ba la thmu ban phah sha Bangladesh, kane ka jingïoh ban kurup ka long hadien ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ki pulit ka jylla Meghalaya bad ki shipai BSF jong ka 200 Battalion ba don ha South Garo Hills.Ki shipai BSF ki la kynnoh ba katei ka shini kaba la ïoh ban kurup ka dei kaba la mang ban shallan tuh sha Bangladesh, ha kaba la buh ha katei ka ïing jah kaba ym don ba kam haba ki pulit bad ki BSF kila khynra ïa katei ka jaka.Hadien ba ki BSF kila dep ban pynbeit katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ kila aiti sha ki pulit jong ka Rongra Police Station ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ka aiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ka shini ba la ïoh ban kurup.
title: Kurup ki BSF bad Pulit ka shini ba shongdor T. 10 lak

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 18: Kum shibynta ba tehlakam na ka jingïaid ki kali ba kit palat pud (tam ïa ka 9 Matric Ton) kiba ju ïa lyngba ki jingkieng ba rit bad ba don hapdeng ki jingma, u bah T. Lyngwa, IAS, District Magistrate (DM) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District u la pynmih ïa ka kyndon aiñ 144 CrPC.Kane ka jingpynmih hukum ka dei hadien ba u la ïoh jingujor ba ki la don ki jingkieng ne PWD Bridges kiba la sdang ban tor bad bad ap jingma ïa ka ïaid ka ïeng jong ki kali bad shuh shuh ki don ruh ki jingkieng kiba buh jingma lada ki kali ki kit palat pud ne heavy load.Namarkata, u District Magistrate (DM) u la kdew ruh bad ki don 8 tylli ki jingkieng kiba don jingma lada kit palat pud kita ki long ka jingkieng No. 8/13 (Span = 12.20m) ha ka lynti Jakrem-Ranikor ba ïaid lyngba ka surok Rangmaw sha Mawksiar kaba jngai 17.44 KM, ka jingkieng No. 11/8, (Span=24.38 m) ha ka lynti Jakrem-Ranikor ba ïaid lyngba ka surok Rangmaw sha Mawksiar kaba jngai 17.44 KM, ka jingkieng No. 4/1 (Span = 32.70) ka lynti Mawkyrwat sha Photjaud kaba jngai 7.00 KM.Nangta, shuh shuh ka jingkieng No 4/1 (Span – 30.30 m) ha ka surok Mawkyrwat sha Wahsiej kaba jngai 8.343 KM, ka jingkieng No 7/1(Span = 51.60 m) ha ka surok Mawkyrwat sha Wahsiej Road kaba jngai 8.343 KM, ka jingkieng No 1/2(Span = 13.80 m) ha ka surok Mawlangwir sha Nonglang lyngba ka Saitsnad kaba 3.00 KM, ka jingkieng No 2/1(Span = 4.10 m) ha ka Approach Road sha shnong Mawlangwir kaba 1.66 KM, bad ka jingkieng No 2/2 (Span = 4.10 m) ha ka Approach Road sha shnong Mawlangwir kaba 1.66 KM.Namar ka jingdonkam ba kyrkieh, kane ka hukum ka treikam mardor naduh ba la pynbna paidbah.
title: Ban tehlakam ïa ka jingïaid ki kali ba kit palat pud, da ka kyndon aiñ 144 CrPC pynbna u DM

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 18: Namar ka election sha ka Lok Sabha, 2024, ka Election Commission ka Ri India ka la pyntrekam ïa ka model code of conduct naduh ka 16 tarik u Lber 2024, khnang ba kane ka election kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih khlem kano kano ka jingpynthut.Katkum ka bor kaba la pynkup hapoh ki kyndon 144 Crpc, u District Election Officer West Khasi Hills District Bah Garod L.S.N Dykes IAS, u la pynmih hukum ban mana pyrshah ïa baroh ki seng saiñ pyrthei, kumjuh ruh ïa ki nongkyrshan ba kin bud ryntih ïa kine ki jingbthah khang ban lait na ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Ha kaba ïadei bad ki lad pathai khubor, la ki dei ban pynmih advertisement, ki jingkyrpad, ki jingrwai, ki lama, ki flex, ki poster bad kiwei kiwei kiba ïadei bad kane ka Lok Sabha Election, dei ban da ïoh jingbit shuwa na ka Media Certification and Monitoring Committee kaba don ha ka ophis u District Election Officer West Khasi Hills, District.La ai por shiphew sngi ïa kiba don ïa ki suloi license ba kin wan buh ne aiti ha ki police station kiba hajan eh jong ki lait noh ïa ki bor pulit bad ki bor shipai. Ka jingrah pisa kam dei ban palat ïa ka 50 hajar tyngka bad lada ki donkam ban rah palat ïa kata, ki dei ban da buh da ka jingthoh khnang ban lait na ka jingshah kem.Ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki tynghung pynsawa ha ki jingïalang paidbah kam dei ban palat ïa ka 6 baje mynstep haduh ka por 10 baje mynmiet. Ym bit ban pyndonkam da ki kali kiba khlem ïoh jingbit ha ka por ba pynlong jingïalang ne jingïaid paidbah. Ym shah ban thoh ïa ki poster, ki kot lyngkdop, ki banner ki lama bad kiwei kiwei khlem da ïoh jingbit.La khang ban ïalap elekshon hapoh 100 meter na ki Polling station. Ym shah ban pyndonkam ïa ki ktien khlem akor ha ka por ba ïalap elekshon paidbah ne jingïaid paidbah. Ym bit ban pyndonkam ïa ki lad pathai khubor, la ki dei ki kot khubor, ne lyngba ki tv, radio, mobile, ki SMS, kum ki lad ban ïalap elekshon khlem da ïoh shuwa ïa ka jingbit.Nangta u District Election Officer, u la pynbna sngi tyrkhong kyiad ha baroh kawei ka distrik naduh ka 4 baje janmied jong ka 17 tarik u Ïaiong 2024 haduh ka 4 baje janmiet jong ka 19 tarik Ïaiong 2024 bad ruh naduh ka 7 baje janmiet jong ka 3 tarik u Jylliew 2024 haduh ka 7 baje janmiet jong ka 4 tarik Jylliew 2024.Mairang: U District Election Officer jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District Mairang, u la pyntip paidbah ba namar ka jingpynbna da ka ECI ïa ka Election Lok Sabha, 2024, ka Model Code of Conduct ka la treikam ha baroh kawei ka Ri India. Kumta ka ophis ka la buh ïa ka Call Centre ka ban treikam 24 kynta lane 24×7 ha control room DC office, Mairang. Kino kino ki briew kiba kwah jingtip lane kiba kwah ban ujor ki lah ban phone ha kine ki number 1950 (Toll Free) bad 7629065843.
title: La treikam pura ka MCC ha baroh kawei ka West Khasi Hills: DEO

content: Shillong, Lber 18: Ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka 17 tarik U Lber 2024, kumba 10 haduh 12 tylli ki tnum ïing jong ka Seng Khasi Nongwar ki la mih shakhmat ban ïoh ban pynkhie im biang ïa ka Shad Suk Mynsiem hadien 50 snem.Kum ka shnong kaba u Lei Ryngkew U Lei Basa uba dang ri dang kdup dang sumar ïa kane ka shnong, ka jingmih ki 10-12 tylli ki tnum ïing Seng Khasi ban pynlong ïa kane ka shad ainguh ai dem, lah ban ong ba ka dei ka kam shlur kaba da radbah bad kaba ai mynsiem lem ïa kiwei pat ki tnat Seng Khasi.La treikam pura ka MCC ha baroh kawei ka West Khasi Hills: DEONongstoiñ, Lber 18: Namar ka election sha ka Lok Sabha, 2024, ka Election Commission ka Ri India ka la pyntrekam ïa ka model code of conduct naduh ka 16 tarik u Lber 2024, khnang ba kane ka election kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih khlem kano kano ka jingpynthut.Katkum ka bor kaba la pynkup hapoh ki kyndon 144 Crpc, u District Election Officer West Khasi Hills District Bah Garod L.S.N Dykes IAS, u la pynmih hukum ban mana pyrshah ïa baroh ki seng saiñ pyrthei, kumjuh ruh ïa ki nongkyrshan ba kin bud ryntih ïa kine ki jingbthah khang ban lait na ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Ha kaba ïadei bad ki lad pathai khubor, la ki dei ban pynmih advertisement, ki jingkyrpad, ki jingrwai, ki lama, ki flex, ki poster bad kiwei kiwei kiba ïadei bad kane ka Lok Sabha Election, dei ban da ïoh jingbit shuwa na ka Media Certification and Monitoring Committee kaba don ha ka ophis u District Election Officer West Khasi Hills, District.La ai por shiphew sngi ïa kiba don ïa ki suloi license ba kin wan buh ne aiti ha ki police station kiba hajan eh jong ki lait noh ïa ki bor pulit bad ki bor shipai. Ka jingrah pisa kam dei ban palat ïa ka 50 hajar tyngka bad lada ki donkam ban rah palat ïa kata, ki dei ban da buh da ka jingthoh khnang ban lait na ka jingshah kem.Ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki tynghung pynsawa ha ki jingïalang paidbah kam dei ban palat ïa ka 6 baje mynstep haduh ka por 10 baje mynmiet. Ym bit ban pyndonkam da ki kali kiba khlem ïoh jingbit ha ka por ba pynlong jingïalang ne jingïaid paidbah. Ym shah ban thoh ïa ki poster, ki kot lyngkdop, ki banner ki lama bad kiwei kiwei khlem da ïoh jingbit.La khang ban ïalap elekshon hapoh 100 meter na ki Polling station. Ym shah ban pyndonkam ïa ki ktien khlem akor ha ka por ba ïalap elekshon paidbah ne jingïaid paidbah. Ym bit ban pyndonkam ïa ki lad pathai khubor, la ki dei ki kot khubor, ne lyngba ki tv, radio, mobile, ki SMS, kum ki lad ban ïalap elekshon khlem da ïoh shuwa ïa ka jingbit.Nangta u District Election Officer, u la pynbna sngi tyrkhong kyiad ha baroh kawei ka distrik naduh ka 4 baje janmied jong ka 17 tarik u Ïaiong 2024 haduh ka 4 baje janmiet jong ka 19 tarik Ïaiong 2024 bad ruh naduh ka 7 baje janmiet jong ka 3 tarik u Jylliew 2024 haduh ka 7 baje janmiet jong ka 4 tarik Jylliew 2024.Mairang: U District Election Officer jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District Mairang, u la pyntip paidbah ba namar ka jingpynbna da ka ECI ïa ka Election Lok Sabha, 2024, ka Model Code of Conduct ka la treikam ha baroh kawei ka Ri India. Kumta ka ophis ka la buh ïa ka Call Centre ka ban treikam 24 kynta lane 24×7 ha control room DC office, Mairang. Kino kino ki briew kiba kwah jingtip lane kiba kwah ban ujor ki lah ban phone ha kine ki number 1950 (Toll Free) bad 7629065843.m bynta ki rangkynsai bad ki thei sotti na kylleng ka Bri Hynñiewtrep. U Riew Tymmen Riew San ka Seng Khasi Kmie u la ai ka duwai ka phirat ka nguh ka dem ha ka Ïing Seng ha ka por mynstep bad kum ka dak ba la wai ka shad la pynhiar Ïa ka lama Seng da u President ka Seng Khasi Kmie, Rgh O. Pyngrope. Shuwa kata la ïoh ruh ka jingkren ai khublei bad ai mynsiem na iwei na ki trai shnong iba la shim ka jingkitkhlieh bad kitkhia ban pynlong biang ïa kane ka Shad, I Kong Mira Dkhar.Ïa kane ka shad la ïoh ban pynlong lyngba ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ki dkhot ka Seng Khasi Nongwar, Seng Khasi Sohra Circle, Seng Khasi Kmie, Seng Khasi Mawlai, Seng Khasi Nongthymmai bad kiwei kiwei.Ïa ka shad la wan sakhi lem u Wahadadar ka Shella Confederacy, U Swami Maharaj ka Ramkrishna Mission Sohra bad ki President ki Secretary, ki Rangbah bad ki longkmie na tnat Seng Khasi najan bad jngai.
title: La pynkhie im biang ia ka Shad Suk Mynsiem hadien 50 snem

content: Shillong, Lber 18 : U Nongïalam ka Congress bad MP na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency bad uba long biang ruh u kyrtong jongka Congress u ban ïa aireng biang ha kane ka kynti u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah kiba ju kyrshan ïa kiwei ki seng saiñ pyrthei ba kin ïatylli ha kane ka kynti bad kyrshan ïa ka Congress ha kane ka election Lok Sabha ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong khnang ba kan ïoh ban synshar biang ha Delhi.ïa kane u la kren ha ki jingïalang paidbah ha Malangkona, Athiabari West Khasi Hills ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai. Haba kren ha kitei ki jingïalang u ma Pala u la ong “ Kam pher la phi don ha ka NPP, TMC, UDP, HSPDP ne VPP hynrei to ngin ïatylli lang bad kyrshan ïa ka Congress namar ha Delhi dei tang ka Congress lane ka BJP ki ban thaw ïa ka sorkar ba thymmai”.U la ong lada ka Congress ka khlaiñ ka mut ka jaidbynriew bad imlang sahlang ruh ka khlaiñ.Namar u la ong kumba long mynta ka jingsynshar ka la noh shilliang palat. “ Kiba riewspah ki la nang riewspah, kiba duk ki la nang duk, kiba don ha ka bor ki la nang kiew spah. Ki dor ki mar rep naduh u tympew bad kiwei kiwei ki la nang hiar namar la ailad ïa ki kwai ban wanrah na kiwei ki jylla sha kane ka jylla. Na kata ka daw kano kano kaba kit ba bah ha surok kin dawa pisa bad lada siew pisa kaba long beaiñ ka long kat kum ka aiñ bad yn ym don ba pynthut shuh hi ruh. Ka jingsynshar kane ka sorkar ka la noh shilliang palat bad suki pa suki kane ka jingeh kan nang khraw bad ki ban mad jingeh lei lei kin dei ki khun samla”.
title: Kam pher lada phi don ha kano kano ka party ïeng tylli kyrshan ïa ka Congress ban ïoh synshar ha Delhi : Pala

content: Shillong, Lber 18 : U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba long ruh u National General Secretary ka NPP u ma Sniawbhalang Dhar u la ther tyngeh mynta ka sngi ïa ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) kaba la shu kynnoh khlem nongrim ïa ka sorkar MDA ba ka dei kaba bamsap.U la ong “ Lada phi (VPP) kynnoh bamsap ïa ka sorkar MDA sei bad ki jingpynshisha ne ujor sha ki bor ka aiñ la ka dei sha ki bor pulit ne sha ki ïing Bishar wat ju kynnoh khlem nongrim tang ban pynbiej bad pynthame ïa kiba pli ki paidbah khamtam ïa ki paid nongkyndong”U ma Sniawbha u la ong “ Ha kiba bun ki khep ki nongïalam ka VPP kim ju pyrkhat shwa ba kin kren ki shu kren kat shaba lap ba shem na kata ka daw kiba bun ki paidbah ki kynnoh ba ka dei ka party ïew . Ki kynnoh ba kane ka sorkar MDA kaba bamsap hynrei ki klet ïa lade ba ki pynap da ki borti ban khrong pisa na ki paidbah ïa kaba ym pat ju don party kiba leh kumtei”.Nalor kata u la ong “ Mano ba pynhikai bamsap ïa ki paidbah hato ym dei u nongïalam ka VPP hi u bah Ardent Basaiawmoit , namar na ka por sha ka por u hikai ïaki paidbah ba ki dei ban shim beit ïa ka pisa tangba kim dei pat ban vote hato kane kam dei ka jinghikai bamsap ïaki paidbah? Kam dei ba u ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah bad pynshlur ïa ki kam bamsap? Haba kumne mano ba pynshlur bamsap ka VPP ne ka sorkar?”Kumta u laong ba kam dei satia kat kaba kren u bah Ardent ka long kaba dei namar ka sorkar ruh ka trei na ka bynta ka roi ka par, ka ïoh ka kot bad ka ïoh kam ïoh jam ki samla.U ma Sniawbha u la ong shuh shuh “Namar ba ka sorkar ka wanrah ïa ka roi ka par wat lada hap ban shim da ka ram ruh kane kam mut ba ka sorkar ka bamsap. Nga la ju ïohsngew na ka por sha ka por ba ki kynnoh bamsap ïa ka sorkar lada ki lap ïakita ki kam bamsap ai da ka jingthoh ne pynshisha da kaba kiew sha ïing lieh ïing saw ruh kam pher hynrei ym dei ban shu kynnoh mata madei khlem nongrim”.
title: Sei bad ki jingshisha ne ujor sha ki bor ka aiñ lada phi lap ba bamsap ka sorkar MDA ther u ma Sniaw ïa ka VPP

content: Shillong, Lber 18: Ka seng North East Students’ Organization (NESO) ha ka sngi Nyngkong ka la mudui da ka mukotduma ka jingkyrpad hakhmat ka ïingbishar ba halor duh ka ri ka Supreme Court ka ri India ba pynsangeh ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ki kyndon jong ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019.Ha ka jingthoh na ka liang u Chairman jong ka NESO u Bah Samuel Jyrwa u la ong, “Ngi la phah ïa ka jingkyrpad sha ka Supreme Court, ba kan tuklar lem ha kaba ïadei bad ki kyndon jong ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019 bad da kaba kyrpad ruh ïa ka Supreme Court ban pynmih ïa ka hukum ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa kane ka aiñ.”Kham ha shwa na ka liang ka NESO ka la phah da ka jingkyrpad sha ka Supreme Court ha ka 19 tarik u Nohprah, 2019 pyrshah ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka aiñ CAA, 2019.“Watla ba ka CAA 2019 ka la pynlait ïa ki jylla kiba don ïa ka ILP kiba kynthup ïa ka jylla Mizoram, Nagaland, Arunachal Pradesh bad Manipur bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki jaka kiba hab hapoh ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka khyrnit kaba 6 kiba kynthup ïa kumba 98% jong ka jylla Meghalaya, 70% ïa ka Tripura bad kumba 8 tylli ki district jong ka jylla Assam hynrei ïa ki 27 tylli ki district jong ka Assam ki khlem da la shah pynlait na kane ka aiñ, kaba long ka jingma ïa baroh ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi, ha kaba khatduh kan ktah ïa ka lawei,” u la ong.“Kumta ban ïada ïa ki trai ri trai muluk bad ki rit paid jong ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi kiba la shah dep shah ktah da ka jingwan rung ki mynder ri na ri Bangladesh,” ong u Bah Jyrwa. U la ong ba ka long kaba kongsan ba ïa ka CAA, 2019 ym dei ban pyntreikam naba kane kan nang pynsniew dur ïa ki jingbym shngaiñ ka jinglong jingman jong ka thaiñ shatei lammingi.
title: Mudui ka NESO da ka Mukotduma sha Supreme Court pyrshah ki kyndon ka CAA

content: Shillong, Lber 19 : Ka Royall CC ka la pynliem noh da 3 wiket ïa ka Nongmensong CC ha ka Shillong Cricket League Super Division 2024 kaba long hynne ka sngi ha ka nongbah. Ha ka jingïakhun, ka Nongmengsong kaba tied nyngkong ka la ïoh ban kamai 212 ron la 9 wiket ha ki 45 over.Na ki rangtied u Kush Agarwal u la ïoh ban kamai 65 ron an ki 103 bol bad u Anish Charak pat u ïoh ban kamai 36 ron na ki 41 bol.Haba beh ïa ka thong, ka Royal CC ka la lah ban kamai 213 ron da ki 7 wiket ha ki 42.1 over. Na ki rangtied u Swastic Chetri u la ïoh ban kamai 66 ron na ki 95 bol bad u Raj Biswas pat u la ïoh ban kamai 46 ron na ki 38 bol.Ia ka khusnam player of the match ha kane ka jingiakhun la ioh ban khur da u Abishek Kumar ka Royal CC uba la ioh ban khur saw wiket.
title: Da 3 wiket jop ka Royal CC ïa ka Nongmensong

content: H aba ïaid kylleng kane ka ri Khasi-Jaintia jongngi la shem ba ka jingduk ka la nang kiew bad kata ka jingduk ka pynlong ïangi ba ngin sngew rangli, sngew dukha mynsiem. Ngi sngew ba ka sur jingud jongngi kam poi sha ki tyndong shkor jong ka sorkar. Katba nang ïaid ki sngi katta ngi nang ïohi ïa ki samla rit kiba la pep skul noh shipor. Ka jingduna ki skul heh kiba ai jinghikai haduh ka klas kaba shiphew bad haduh ka klas kaba khat-ar ka pynlong ïa kiba bun ki kmie ki kpa ba kin phah ïa ki khun jong ki sha ki skul ha Shillong. Kane ka mut ba ki khynnah skul ki hap ban shong ïing wai, ban shet ban tiew bad ban pule kot ruh. Kito kiba na ki ïing ki sem kiba ïoh ba kot te ka biang hi ban phah pule sha Shillong. Hynrei bun ki bym kot bor ban leh kumta. Te ym banse ban pynpep skul noh ïa ki khun kiba dang samla rit bad kiba dang shong ïa ka klas kaba hynriew ne hynniew.Ha ki por kiba kham mynshuwa ka sorkar ka ju thung ïa u/ke inspektor ban leit peit ïa ki skul baroh bad ban peit la ki nonghikai ki tbit ne em ban hikai bad lada ki khynnah ki sngewthuh ne em ïa ka jinghikai. Hynrei sngewsih ba mynta lah bun snem ym ju don shuh kita ki Inspektor leit jngoh skul bad dei na kane ka daw ba ka jinghikai ha kiba bun ki skul ka tlot bha. Ym dei ban kynnoh ïa ki khynnah skul haba ki pep skul noh tang shipor. Ki khynnah kim sngew myntoi shuh ban leit skul haba ki nonghikai kim I don ïa ka jingkitkhlieh bad ka jingnang ban batai ïa ki lynnong ha ka rukom kaba ki khynnah kin sngewthuh.Kawei ka dawbah kaba pynlong ïa ki kmie ki kpa ban pynpep skul noh ïa ki khun tang shiteng por ka dei bunsien namar kim lah shuh ban siew bai skul bad thied uniform bad ban thied ïa ki kot ruh. Toi lah dei ban don ka skim sorkar ban ïarap ïa kum kine ki longïing kiba duh tasam khnang ba lada ki khynnah ki pass ïa ka skul ki lah ban leit kolej bad kumta ter ter bad ki lah ruh ban ïoh ïa ki jinghikai ïa ki kam trei da ka kti (skill training) ban pynmih ïa ki tiar bapher bapher lane ban nang rah ïa ka dor jong ki soh ki pai da kaba pynkylla um soh lane kiwei pat ki jait jingbam. Kane ka ri ka long kaba seisoh bha. Ha ka por tlang ki mih ki soh ki pai kiba bun bad khamtam eh u sohniamtra. Hynrei duna eh kiba nang ban pynkylla um soh lane pynkylla jam ïa kita ki soh. ïa kane la khot ka food processing lane ka jingpynkylla ïa ki soh sha kiwei pat ki kynja jingbam kiba kham neh. Mynta haba kheit ïa u sohniamtra lada ym lah die noh kloi kloi u lah sah ei bad lip dur noh ban ym lah dor shuh. Hynrei lada lah don kita ki processing unit ïa u soh lah ban pynkylla ha ki bun ki rukom bam bad kiba kham lah ruh ka dor. Kata keiñ ki khot ka “value addition” lane ka jingrah dor ïa ki soh ki pai bad ki jhur ruh kumba leh ïa u shynrai.Ki don bun ki jingduna ha ki nongkyndong jongngi. Nyngkong eh ki surok ki dei kiba la jot lah pra. Ban pynkit ïa ki mar rep ruh ka long kaba shitom palat. Bad wat lada shna surok ruh tang shipor ka lah rong noh ka um slap. ïa kane ka jingshna torti ïa ki surok ha ka jingshisha ki dei ki nongpynïaid shnong kiba dei ban ujor bad wanrah hakhmat ka sorkar. Ki dei ban kylli kumno u engineer uba dei peit ïa ka jingshna jong ka surok u ai ïa ka certificate ba lah pyndep ïa ka jingshna surok katkum ba la buh da ki kyndon PWD, bad ha kano ka rukom u kontrak u ïoh jingsiew na ka bynta ki kam torti. Kumban shu ai nuksa ka surok naduh Dienglieng shaduh Nongjrong kaba dang shna dang shisnem mynshuwa mynta pat ka la paw lut da ki mawria. Nangta ka surok na Shella sha Sohra shuwa ban poi Nongsawlia ka la khoh lut ha kiba bun ki bynta wat lada kato ka surok ka dei kaba dang shu lah maramot.Mynta la sdang beh la lyer elekshon MP bad ki seng saiñ pyrthei baroh kin sa wan pah wan khroh ïa ki paidbah ban jied ïa u candidate jong ki. Ha kum kine ki rynsan elekshon ki paidbah ki dei ban kdew ïa ki jingdkoh trei kam ka sorkar. Wat ïa die tad ïalade na ka bynta ki katto katne hajar bad jied ïa ki pnah thylliej kiba la pynbiej ïangi ki nongjied na ka por sha ka por. Lada mangi ki nongjied ngim kyndit bynriew ka jingduk kan nang ban ïangi katba kiba riewspah pat ki la nang kiew ka spah katba kiba duk pat ki la nang kylla rangli shuh shuh. Ki khynnah jongngi ki dei ban ïoh ïa ka jingnang jingstad kaba biang ha ki skul kiba la pynïaid bha, ym kiba la shu thung ïa ki nonghikai kiba la thung namar ba ki “recommend” ki politishan. Ki nongshnong shnong ki hap ban long trai halor kine ki skul bad ki donhok ban buh jingkylli haba ki khun jong ki kim nang eiei ruh wat haba la poi haduh ka klas kaba khyndai bad shiphew.
title: Haba ban ka jingduk shah ktah jur ka pule puthi ki khynnah

content: Nongpoh, Lber 19: Ki paidbah jong ki shnong bapher bapher ha ka thaiñ Raid Madan Kyrdem ba hap hapoh ka Ri Bhoi District ki la hap ban mad ïa ka jingsyrtok ha ka leit ka wan, kaba dei na ka daw ka jingshna ïa ka surok thymmai na Bhoirymbong sha Khyndewso bad na Nongthymmai sha Mawbseiñ.Kiba bun ki paidbah la bun bun snem mynta ki la syrtok ha ka leit ka wan na ka daw ka jingsniew jong ka surok kaba la shah iehnoh bein la bun bun snem, hynrei mynta ka sorkar ka la mang tyngka ban siang rong thymmai ïa katei ka surok khnang ban suk ban sain ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan, hynrei na ka daw ka jingpyntrei torti u Contractor ha ka jingthmu ban siang rong ïa kane ka surok ka la pynjynjar pynban arshah ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan.Kumba la lap bad sakhi, u Contractor ba pyntrei ïa kane ka surok ula shuh tieh ïa ki maw ha shi lynter ka surok da ka jingthmu ban siang rong, hynrei namar ba la tieh ïa ka surok ka la pynjynjar arshah ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan ba la jynjar ban leit ki Kali ki motor.Kumba la pynpaw da ki paidbah, hooid ki kmen ba ka sorkar ka la phai khmat kyrpang na ka bynta ban siang rong ne pynbha ïa katei ka surok, hynrei ka rukom leh jong u Contractor pat ka la pynjynjar pynban arshap ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan na ka daw ba la shu tieh ïa ka surok bad la shu tap da ki maw ba ka long kaba jynjar bha ban leit wan ki kali paidbah.Kaba kham pynjynjar shuh shuh ïa ki paidbah, ka dei ka jingpum pum ha shi lynter ka surok khamtam ha kane ka por tyrkhong tang shu ïaid kali ki paidbah ki la hap ban ring mynsiem da u pum pum, kaba ktah kylla pynban ïa ka koit ka khiah ki paidbah namar lyngba jong kane ka surok la pyndonkam naduh ki khynnah skul, kiba pang ba shitom bad ki paidbah hi jong ka thaiñ Raid Madan Kyrdem.Kiba bun kiba lang ki la kyrpad ruh ïa ka sorkar ba ka shim khia ban kren ïa u Contractor ba un pynsted ïa ka kam na ka bynta ban siang rong ïa katei ka surok bad ym tang da kaba shu tieh ïa ka surok ha baroh shi lynter jong ka surok kaba la pynjynjar pynban ïa ki paidbah bad da thmu ban siang rong ruh dei ban pyndep shwa khyndait khyndiat khnang ba kan nym ktah ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan, pynpaw ki riew paidbah.
title: Syrtok ki paidbah ka thaiñ Kyrdem ha ka leit ka wan na ka jingshna surok thymmai

content: Shillong, Lber 19 : Ka Nangkiew Irat SC ka la khur suk ïa ki lai point ha ka Shillong Premier League da kaba pynliem noh da 2-1 kol ïa ka Sawmer SC ha ka jingïakhun kaba itynnad bha ha kane ka janmiet sngi Ba-ar ha madan SSA Stadium, Polo.Ïa kitei baroh ar tylli ki kol la ïoh ban thep da u Shaibor Nongrum tang hapoh shiteng kynta jong ka kylla miet, kata ha ka minit kaba 62 bad minit ba 83.Katba ïa ka shi kol jong ka Sawmer pat la ïoh ban thep da u Diego Khriam ha ka minit kaba 70.La sakhi ba ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla step ka long kaba itynnad bha khamtam haba ym shym la don satia mano mano ban ïoh ban thep kol. Ka jingïalehkai ka la nang itynnad shuh shuh ruh hadien ba ka Nangkiew Irat ka la ïoh ban lamkhmat ha ka minit kaba 62 hynrei tang hadien phra minit ei ei ka Sawmer ka la ïoh ban pynphai noh.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Nangkiew Irat ka la duh ei bun ki kabu ksiar khamtam ha ka minit kaba 23 lyngba u Banshanlang Nongdhar bud pat sa u Nikhil Raj hadien ar minit tang na ka daw ka jingtbit palat u rangap kol ka Sawmer, u Pyrshangbanbha Dkhar.Watla u Nikhil u la ïoh biang ïa ka kabu ban thep kol hynrei um shym la lah satia naba ka bol kaba u khyrwit ka leit dei noh ïa u dieng kol ha ka minit kaba 34.Haba phai pat sha ka Sawmer, u Gamelial Kharlyngdoh u la ïoh katto katne ki lad ha ka kylla step. Shwa ban kut ka kylla step ruh u la ïoh biang ïa ka kabu ksiar ban lamkhmat ïa ka kynhun hynrei ka bol kaba u khyrwit ban poi sha kol ka leit pynban sha rud.Ka kylla miet ka la nangitynnad naba baroh arliang ki ïakhun ban ïoh lamkhmat bad dei ha ka minit kaba 62 ba u Shaibor u la ïoh ban rah para marwei ïa ka bol bad khlem bakla u la ïoh ban thep suk da kaba pynkiar ïa u rangap kol.Kaba kham pynshongshit ha kane ka sngi ka dei da ka jingïoh pynïakhaid noh jong u Diego tang hapoh 10 minit ha kaba ka bol kaba u khyrwit ka la pynlong ïa u rangap kol ka Nangkiew ban ym lah leh ei ei shuh.Pynban ha ka por ba baroh ki rangïalehkai ki la kheiñsting ba kin ïoh ban ïasam mar shi point, u Shaibor u la ïoh biang ïa ka lad ban pynkhih biang sa shisien ïa ka jar jong ka Sawmer kaba pyntikna syndon ïa ka kynhun ban khur suk ïa ki lai point.Ka jingïakhun kaba bud jong ka SPL kan long ha kane ka sngi Thohdieng ha kaba ka Shillong Lajong kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Langsning ha ka por 3:00 baje janmiet.
title: Mad nam rem ka Sawmer SC ha ka SPL, khur suk ka Nangkiew Irat ïa ki lai poiñ

content: Shillong, Lber 19 : Ka National Cricket Academy jong ka BCCI ka la jied saw ngut ki thei ïalehkai kriket ba kynsai na Meghalaya ban leit shim bynta ha ka North East Senior Women’s camp kaban long naduh ka 22tarik u Ïaiong haduh ka 16tarik Jymmang ha Rangpo, Sikkim.Kine ki sawngut ki kynthup ïa ka Monika Lyngdoh Phawa, Debasmita Dutta, ka Ajima Sangma bad ka Luiza Tamang.Kine ki thei ïalehkai kin ïoh ban don lang bad ki nongïalehkai kriket na ki san tylli kiwei pat ki jylla ha ka North East Zone, kata ba kynthup ïa ka Sikkim, Manipur, Mizoram, Nagaland bad Arunachal Pradesh ha katei ka camp.Ïa kine ki nongïalehkai la jied katkum ka jingtbit jong ki ha ki lympung ïalehkai jong ka BCCI ha u snem 2023-24 kynthup naduh ka Senior Women’s T20 Trophy ha u Risaw jong u snem ba la dep bad ruh ka Senior Women’s One Day Trophy kaba dang shu lah shen ha u Kyllalyngkot mynta u snem, 2024.
title: Shah jied sawngut ki thei ïalehkai kriket ka Jylla ha ka BCCI ban leit sha Sikkim

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 19: Ka kshaid Thupthup kaba don ha ka wah Rwiang ka hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mawsiangbah kaba jngai kumba san kilomitar na ka surok bah National Highway 44 (E) Shillong Tura ka dei ruh ka kshaid kaba itynnad haduh katta katta.Kham shaneng ïa katei ka kshaid ki don ar tylli ki thwei hynrei kaba kham itynnad ka dei ka thwei Koh Langheit, namar baroh sawdong ka dap da u shyiap bad na kjat jong katei ka thwei koh Langheit ka wah ka pait ar bynta bad ha pdeng don u lum uba long kum u dewlynnong.U bah P.Nongsiej uwei na ki riew rangbah ka shnong Mawsiangbah haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba na ka liang ki paitbah nongshong shnong ki kwah bad angnud haduh katta katta, ba ka sorkar kan pynpoi surok sha katei ka kshaid bad lada shna surok shaduh katei ka jaka ka jingjngai ka long tang kumba ar kilomitar ne tam. U la ong ba lada shna surok na jan jingkieng Rwiang pat ka jingjngai ka la jan poi sha ka san kilomitar.U bah Nongsiej u la ong ruh ba lada ka sorkar kan pynbha ïa ka surok kaba khlad na ka National Highway haduh ka shnong Mawsiangbah bad pynpoi haduh katei ka kshaid, kan long ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw ïa ki nonghong shnong kum ka Nongkhñiang, Mawlangniang bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong kiba don ha katei ka thaiñ.U la ong ruh ba watla ym pat don surok ruh ki don shibun ki briew na kylleng ki jaka kiba ju wan peit kai sha katei ka kshaid man ka por. Lada la don ka surok kaba biang lei lei ki nongwan jngohkai na kylleng ki jaka kin wan poi man ka sngi bad kan long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw.
title: Angnud ki paibbah Mawsiangbah ban pynpoi surok haduh kshaid Thupthup

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 19: Ka jingïoh jong ka shnong Langpih ïa ka skul Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan (RMSA) kaba la mang pisa da ka sorkar pdeng, kan la long ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw ïa ka thaiñ baroh kawei, namar ba katei ka skul ka dei ka skul ba ka sorkar pdeng ka hap ban pynbiang ïa baroh ki jingdonkam kum ki jaka sah jong ki nonghikai bad kiwei kiwei.U bah K.P.Pangñiang MLA barim ka Rambrai Jyrngam constituency haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba ban ïoh ïa katei ka skul ka long kaba eh haduh katta katta, namar ka dei ka skhim kaba hap ban ïaid lyngba ïa kiba bun bah ki kyndon ba la buh da ka sorkar pdeng.Hynrei na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki khun ki kti jong ka thaiñ, u la ïakhun da kaba tyngeh ban pynsngew sha ka sorkar ba kan pynïoh ïa katei ka skul. Namar, ka Langpih ka dei ka jaka kaba don ha khappud bad ka Assam ha kaba ka sorkar ruh ka la sngap.U la ong ruh ba ïa katei ka skul ka sorkar pdeng ka la mang pisa haduh 1.31 klur (shi klur laiphew wei lak tyngka) bad ka jingpyntrei ka la ïaid shait shait ha kine ki sngi.U bah Pangñiang u la ong ruh ba ha Langpih ka la don ka Raidmynsaw Upper Primary skul kaba la seng da ka Raidmynsaw la slem bah. Katei ka skul ka la shu neh hajuh la bun phew snem, hynrei dei tad haduh u snem 2013 ba katei ka Upper Primary skul ka la sdang ban kiew ha ka jingdon jong ki khynnah skul.Hadien kata ki riew rangbah jong ka Raidmynsaw ki la I donkam ban kyntiew kyrdan sha ka Higher secondary school. Kumta, ki la pyrshang katba kot la ka bor ban kyntiew sha ka class VII, ha kaba ïa ki nonghikai la siew tulop tang da kaba noh synñiang da ki long ïng kiba don ha poh ka Raid. U la ong ruh ba hadien katto katne snem la plie noh haduh ka klass X.Nalorkata u la ong ba ka jingïoh sa ïa katei ka RMSA skul, ka la long ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw namar ba katba nang mih ki snem, ka jing roi briew ka nang kiew bad wat ki Nepali kiba shong ha katei ka thaiñ ruh, ha kine ki sngi ki la sngewthuh ba ka skul ka dei kaba donkam haduh katta katta, ki la ïabeh ban phah skul ïa ki khun.Kumta ka jingdon jong ktei ki ar tylli ki skul ka la long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ïa ki nongshong shnong ka thaiñ baroh kawei.
title: Ïaid shait shait ka jingpyntrei ïa ka skul RMSA ha Langpih

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 19: Kum shibynta ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshongsuk bad jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih ha ka Lok Sabha Election 2024 hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District, na ka liang u District Magistrate bad District Election Officer jong ka South West Khasi Hills District u la pynmih ïa ka hukum hapoh kyndon aiñ 144 CrPC ha kaba la khang ban pynlong jingïalang bad jingïalum briew palat ïa ka 5 ngut khlem ka jingïoh jingbit na ki bor distrik bad la mana ruh na kaba rah ïa ki tiar siat ne ki tiar pynmynsaw.Shuh shuh ha kawei pat ka hukum ba la pynmih da u District Magistrate u la khang ban thoh ne draw ha ki kynroh, ban tah lane wah ïa ki poster, ki kot lane kino kino ki jingthoh ne jingpynïeng ïa ki banners, ki hoardings bad kumta ter ter ha ki office sorkar ne jaka sorkar.Shuh shuh, la khang ban thoh ki jingthoh ha ki kynroh, ban tah lane wah ïa ki poster/kot, ki banners, ki hoardings lane kino kino ki jingthoh kiba ha kano kano ka rukom ha ki kynroh ne ha ki jaka jong ki riew shimet khlem da ïoh ia ka jingbit (NOC) da ka jingthoh na ki trai jaka bad na ka ophis jong u District Election Officer.Ym shah ban pyndon-kam ïa ka tiar pynsaw naduh 10 baje mynmiet haduh 6 baje mynstep.Yn ym shah ban pynlong jingïalang ban ïalap elekshon khlem da pan bad ïoh jingbit na ka ophis u District Magistrate kumjuh ruh ka jingbit na ka shnong ha kaba ïadei bad ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang.Kiba pyndonkam ïa ka tiar pynsaw nr Loudspeaker khlem ïoh jingbit na u District Magistrate kin shah pynshitom ha ki Local Authorities.
