Ym shah ban pynlong jingïaid paidba ne rallies/procession khlem ka jingai jingbit na u District Magistrate.U District Magistrate u la pyntip ba ka khanglad ïa ka jingthong pisa ha ka por elekshon, ka Election Commission ka la pynmih ïa ka hukum ban pynthikna ba baroh ki nongthep vote kin ïoh lad ban pyndonkam ïa ka hok jong ki khlem jingsheptieng lane jingshah pynbor namar ki lah ban don ki briew ki ban rah bun pisa na ka bynta ban khring bad thong da ka pisa ïa uno uno u kyrtong uba ki mon bad lada ailad ïa kiba kum kita ka lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingbym ïaid beit ïaid ryntih ha kane ka elekshon bad kaba lah ban lam sha ka jingïakajia, ka ïashoh ïadat hapdeng ki paidbah bad kaba lah ban poi shaduh u pud ban pynthut ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District.U District Election Officer jong ka South West Khasi Hills District u la pynjari da ka hukum hapoh ka kyndon aiñ 144 CrPC ha kaba la mana ïa uno uno ne kano kano ka briew ne kano kano ka kynhun na kaba rah pisa palat ïa ka T. 50 hajar (sanphew hajar shaneng) hapoh u pud u sam jong ka South West Khasi Hills District.Kane ka hukum kan treikam shisyndon tad haduh ban da kut ka por elekshon.
title: Da ka Section 144 CrPC pynjari ha SWKH, mana ban ïalum briew palat ïa ka 5 ngut

content: Jowai, Lber 19: Hadien ka jingpynbna tarik jong ka Election Commission of India na ka bynta ka General Election sha ka ïing Dorbar thawaiñ jong ka Lok Sabha, 2024 ka ban sdang naduh 19 tarik u April, 2024 na ka liang jong u District Magistrate jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District u bah B.S. Sohliya, IAS, ula pyntreikam ïa ka kyndon 144 CrPC bad pynbna ba ka Election Model Code of Conduct kala treikam naduh ka 16 tarik u March 2024, ha West Jaiñtia Hills District baroh kawei.Kane ka hukum kan treikam na ka bynta ki kyrtong (Contesting Candidates), ki nongbud (Agents) jong ki bad ruh ïa ki seng saiñ hima (Political Parties).Katkum kane ka hukum la khang ban tah ïa kino kino ki poster, hoarding, ki banner ne kiwei de ki jingthoh ïalap elekshon ha ki jaka paidbah bad kumjuh ruh ha ki lynti syngkieng.La khang ruh ban pynïeng, tah ïa kino kino ki lama, ki poster, ki hoarding, ki banner bad kiwei de ha ki jaka jong ki riewshimet khlem da ïoh bor ryngkat ka jingthoh na ki trai ïing ne trai jaka bad ruh na ka ophis jong u District Magistrate, ka West Jaiñtia Hills District.La khang ban pynlong ïa kino kino ki jingïalang paidbah khlem da ïoh bor na ka ophis jong u District Magistrate, ka West Jaiñtia Hills District, bad kumjuh na u Waheh Shnong jong kato ka jaka ba thmu ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang paidbah ïalap elekshon.Yn ym shah ban pynsawa ïa ki P.A. System hapdeng ka por 10:00PM haduh 6:00AM.Lada don ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki P.A. System ne ki Loud Speakers khlem da ïoh bor na ka ophis jong u District Magistrate, ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ïa kine ki tiar yn sa kurup noh shisyndon da ki bor ba dei peit.Yn ym shah ban pynlong ïa kino kino ki jingïaid Raly khlem da ïoh bor shwa na ka ophis jong u District Magistrate, ka West Jaiñtia Hills District.La khang ïa ka jingrah pisa kaba palat ïa ka Rs.50,000/- (Sanphew Hajar) tyngka da ki kyrtong lane da ki nongkyrshan jong ki.U District Magistrate ula bthah ruh ïa baroh kiba don ïa ki tiar siat kynthup ïa ki suloi, kiba don license ba ki dei ban leit buh noh ïa ki sha ki Police Station ne ki Out Post kiba marjan jong ki ryngkat bad ki Xerox copy jong ki licence, ïa kine ki tiar yn sa pynphai pat hadien ba la kut ka elekshon. La khang ïa kino kino ki briew ban rah ïa ki tiar siat, hynrei kane ka hukum kan ym khang pat ïa ki Police bad ki Shipai ki ba donkam ba pyndep ïa ka duty jong ki.Kane ka hukum kan treikam ha baroh ka West Jaiñtia Hills District naduh bala pynmih ïa ka bad kan bteng haduh ban da kut ka Elekshon Lok Sabha.
title: Pyntreikam u DM ka WJH ïa ka Section 144 CrPC ba don ka Election Lok Sabha

content: Nongpoh, Lber 19: Uwei u Dribar Trok u la mynsaw jur na ka daw kaba u la leit hi ban tynrah ïa kawei ka Trok kaba dang ieng ha surokbah katba u dang kiew na Guwhati ban wan sha Shillong bad kane ka jingjia ka la jia noh hadien ba u la poi ha Nongpoh ha kaba khlem poi pyrkhat ula leit ban tynrah ïa katei ka trok kaba ieng haduh ba u la mynsaw jur.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 10 baje ei ei janmiet ha ka surokbah National Highway-6 ba hap ha sor Nongpoh ha kaba katei ka trok kaba don ïa u number NL 01-G- 6729 ka dang ieng rud ka surok na ka jingsniew ka taiar, hynrei katei ka trok kaba wan nadien kaba don ïa u number ML 05-Z-9460 ka la tynrah nadien ba la wan rah ka jingmynsaw jur utei u dribar.Une u Dribar uba la mynsaw la tip kyrteng kukm u Rajendra Das, ha ka rta kaba 28 snem na 8Mile Guwhati bad katei ka trok kaba ieng ha surok pat la niah da u Lamshwa Pakyntei ha ka rta kaba 44 snem.Kumba la sakhi halor kane ka jingjia, katrei ka trok ba la niah da u Rajendra Das ka la leit ban tynrah nadien ka dei kaba la suba ba u la shoh samthiah bad ha ka jingleit tynrah ka bynta bahakhmat jong katei ka trok kana u la niah ka la dam syndah haduh ba u la sahkut noh hapoh katei ka trok.Dei lyngba ka jingiap ki paidbah la lah ban sei noh ïa u napoh jong ka trok bad hadien kata ka la rah noh mar mar ïa u sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh kaba dei na jingmynsaw jur ka kjat kaba kdiah na ka jingdam syndoh ka trok hapoh katei ka trok kaba u niah hadien ba u la leit ban tynrah ïa katei kawei pat ka trok.Na ka liang ki bor pulit ka Nongpoh ruh ki la wan mardor ha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ruh ban ai jingïarap ïa utei u dribar ban pynpoi sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh ban ioh kloi ïa ka jingsumar kaba la ktah na ka jingmynsaw ha katei ka jingjia ïa tyngkhuh kali.
title: Mynsaw jur u nongñiah trok ba tynrah ïa ka trok ba ïeng ha surokbah ha Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong, Lber 19: Ha ka sngi baar ki shipai jong ka 193 Battalion ka Border Security Force Meghalaya, kum shi bynta na ka jingpyrshang ban pynthikna ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki nongshong shnong kiba sah ha shilynter jong u u pud u sam ka ri bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki khynnah skul jong ki shnong kiba don ha khappud ha kaba ki shipai ki la sam ïa ki jingïarap ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba don ha ka shnong Purnanagar kaba shb hapoh ka East Khasi Hills district jong ka Meghalaya.IA kane ka prokram la plie da ka jingdon kawei ka longkmie kaba la tymmen tam jong ka shnong Purnanagar, kaba pyni ïa ki dak jong ka jingïadei kaba jylliew bha bad ki nongshong shnong katei ka thaiñ.U Rajiv Kumar, Commandant ka 193 Bn BSF Meghalaya, u la donlang uba la batai halor ka jinglong jong ka jingaiti ki BSF ha kaba ïadei bad ka roi ka san bad ka jingshakri ïa ki paidbah.Ha kane ka prokram na ka liang ki shipai BSF ki la sam ïa ki tiar kiba kongsan sha ka shnong bad kumjuh ruh sha ki shnong kum ka Betgora, Khaikona, Purnanagar, bad Badrup kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ïa kine ki shnong.Ha ka prokram la sam ïa ki kor computer, ki meij, bad ki tiar ïalehkai sha ki khynnah skul ban kyrshan ïa ki ban kiew ha ki kam pule puthi bad kiwei ki kam.Ia kane ka jingsam la leh ha ka jingdonlang ki nonghikai, u rangbah shnong bad ki shnong ba marjan. Na ka liang jong ki, ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingai khublei ïa ki shipai BSF, bad na ka liang ki nongshong shnong ruh ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingïaroh ïa kiwei ki kam ba bha ba la leh da ki BSF.
title: Ai jingïarap ki BSF sha ki shnong ha khappud

content: Shillong, Lber 19: Katkum ka khubor ba la ïoh na ki pulit la ïathuh ba u Bah Heimonmi Pala, Site In-charge, ka Dhar Construction Company u la phah ka jingujor ba ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 9 baje mynstep, u la shem ba ki la don ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la tuh ïa ki crash barriers constructed kiba la pynïeng ha Shnong Nongkya, Khlieh Umrong bad ha Shnong Tdoh Umsiang (RB).
title: Shah tuh ki tiar ka Dhar kompeni

content: Shillong, Lber, 19: U Additional Director of Health Services, Civil Hospital, Shillong u la pyntip ba uwei u nongpang uba la uba la tip kyrteng kum u Biswanath Thakur, 55 snem ka rta uba sah ha Laban, Shillong u la thiah pang ha Male Orthopedic Ward, Bed No. 16 ha ka 18.03.2024 ha ka por 7:41 baje mynmiet. Une u nongpang u la khladnoh ha kane kajuh ka sngi ha ka por 9:15 baje mynmiet.La kyrpad ïa ki bahaing hasem ba kin shimti noh ïa ka met jong une u rangbah na ka jaka buh metïap ha Hospital hapoh la sngi naduh ka sngi ba la pynmih ïa kane ka jingpynbna hynrei lym kumta ïa ka metïap yn sa aiti ban tep da ka Shillong Municipal Board.
title: Kyrpad u ADHS ïa ki bahaïing ban shimti ïa ka met u Biswanath Thakur

content: Nongpoh, Lber 19: Kum ka jingai burom bad ka jingpyrto ïa ki kam ba ki la shakri ha ka tnad Pulit hapoh ka jylla hadien ba ki la ioh ban kiew kyrdan, u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa mynta ka sngi u la pynkup burom ïa kine ki pulit da kaba pyndeng khlur hadien ba la ioh ban kiew kyrdan ha ka kam kaba ki trei kum ki pulit ka jylla.Ïa kane ka jingpyndeng khlur ne ka jingleh burom la pynlong ha ka ophis u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi ha Nongpoh, ha kaba u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la shim bynta kum u kongsan ban pyndeng khlur halor kane ka jingkiew kyrdan kitei ki pulit ha ryngkat ka jingdon lang kiwei ki Pulit officer ka Ri Bhoi.Nalor kito kiba la ioh ban kiew kyrdan, u Rubul Ali kum u Sub Inspector u la ioh kiew sha ka kuyrdan Inspector of Police, ki saw ngut ki head constable ba kynthup ïa u Mansih Chettri, Deepak Thapa, Amar Boro, and Suraj Gurung, ki la ioh ban kiew kyrdan sha ka kyrdan Sub Inspector bad ki Constable ba kynthup ïa u S. Arengh, I Narlong bad u C. Lyngdoh ki la ioh ba kiew kyrdan kum ki Head Constable.Ha kane ka jingpyndeng khlur ne pynkup burom, u SP ka Ri Bhoi, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la ai khublie kyrpang ïa ki bad u ai ruh ka jingkitbok kitrwiang ïa ki ba kin dang kiew shaphang ha ka kam kaba ki shakri ba ki dang lah shuh shuh ban ai ka jingshakri kaba paka tam na ka bynta ki paidbah.
title: Pyndeng khlur u SP ka Ri Bhoi ïa ki Police ba ïoh kiew kyrdan ha Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong, Lber 19 : Ka kyrtong jong ka NPP bad Myntri sorkar ka ban ïakhun na kane ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ther tyngeh ïa ki MLA kiba dang ïai bteng ban bam armaloi ne bat ar kam.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang paidbah ha Mawsynram mynta ka sngi ka Dr Ampareen ka la ïathuh ba ma ka ka la ïehnoh ïa ka kam Nonghikai tang hadien hynniew bnai ba ka la dep ban shah jied kum ka MLA kata ha u 2009.Ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew khia jur ba ki don ki MLA ba ki dang bteng beit ban bat ïa ka kam nonghikai wat hadien shisnem ba ki la shah jied kum u MLA ruh.Ki paidbah ki dei ban wat uei une u MLA uba dang ïai bat ïa ka kam nonghikai bad ki dei ruh ban wat bniah ïa ki kyrtong kiba bat ar kam.ïa kane ka la kren da kaba thew sha u MLA jongka Voice of the People Party (VPP) na Mawlai Constituency u bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang uba dang bat ïa ka kam nonghikai haduh mynta.
title: Don ki MLA bym pat ïehnoh kam nonghikai wat hadien shisnem ba la shah jied : Dr Ampareen

content: Shillong, Lber 19: Ka Mary Our Help Training Centre (MOHTC) ka la kynjoh sha kawei ka sienjam ha ki rukom treikam jong ka ban pynïoh ïa ki lad jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki khynnah pule bad ki nongtrei da kaba plie ïa ka jaka thetkti kaba hapoh ka “The Project for the Provision of Water Supply System and Sanitation Facility” ba la bei tyngka da ka Japan Embassy ha India hapoh ka “ Grant Assistance for Grass-Roots Human Security Projects (GGP) kaba dei ka skhim kaba ai sngewbha bad kaba la sdang da ka sorkar ka ri Japan, ban ïarap ïa ka sorkar bad ki seng bhalang bym ïoh jingmyntoi ne ki non-profit organization ban pyntreikam ïa kiba bun ki jingdonkam kum ki tiar ki tar bad kiwei ki jingdonkam hapoh India.ïa kane ka prokram la pynlong ha ka sngi baar la plie da u Kodero Jiro, Counsellor of Economic Section, ka Japan Embassy ha India kum u kongsan ryngkat ka jingdonlang ka Kawato Akiko, Economic Cooperation Assistant of Japan Embassy ha India, ka Verma Yavanika, Project Coordinator of Grant Grassroot ka Japan Embassy ha India, ka Sr. Elizabeth George FMA, Provincial of Salesian Sisters, Shillong, ka Sr. Helen Puweiñ, President ka Bellefonte Community College bad ki heh ka tnat PHE Lumshyiap, Shillong.Kane ka jaka thetkti la plie da ka jingthmu ban pynbha ïa ka koit ka khiah ka khuid ka suba kaba long kaba donkam na ka bynta ki khynnah kynthei bad shynrang. Ha kane ka skhim la kynthup lang ruh ïa ki filter dih um bad ka jaka sait kti.U kongsan haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u la ong ba kane kadei ka jingïadei paralok hapdeng ki briew ka India bad ka Japan bad ka jingïateh kaban dang bteng ha ki sngi ban wan.Ka jingplie ïa kane ka jaka thetkti kaba thymmai ha Mary Our Help Training Center ka dei ka jingsakhi ïa ka jingtreikam kane ka centre ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki khynnah bad ka jingkiew ha ka pule puthi.
title: Kyrshan pisa ka Japan Embassy ïa ka MOHTC ban shna jaka thet kti ki samla pule

content: Shillong, Lber 19: Ka General Meeting jong ka Kur Marbañiang Lai Kpoh Mawsynram kaba la long ha ka 3 tarik Rymphang, 2024 ha Seng Khasi Hall Dongneng Mawsynram ka la pynthymmai ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka kur na ka bynta ka samoi treikam ba 3 snem kiba kynthup ïa u President Bah Klas Marbañiang, Vice President Bah Bostarwel Marbañiang, Vice President Bah Ronjit Marbañiang, General Secretary Bah Ivanlumlang Marbañiang, Asst . Secretary Bah Jeffer June Marbañiang, Asst . Secretary Bah Copperfield Marbañiang bad Treasurer Bah Wanlap Marbañiang. La jied ruh ïa u Auditor Pynjanai Marbañiang, Ki Adviser Dr. K. K. Marbañiang bad i Ma Medrass Marbañiang bad 25 ngut kiwei pat ki Executive Members. Kane ka long kag kum ka jingpyllait khubor jong u Secretary Kur Marbaniang lai kpoh, Mawsynram.
title: Ki Nongkitkam thymmai jong ka Marbaniang Lai Kpoh Mawsynram

content: Shillong, Lber, 19: Ka National Health Mission ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka sngi Baar ka la rakhe ïa ka World TB Day 2024 halor ka phang, “Yes, we can end TB.”Ha ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi, la ïashim bynta lang da u Ramkumar S Mission Director ka NHM bad Secretary ka Health & Family Welfar, Dr. F. V. Kharshiing DHS, MCH&FW cum Joint MD, NHM, Meghalaya, Dr. J. Kharwanlang State Tuberculosis Officer bad Dr. B. Shanpru, District TB Officer East Khasi Hills, ki nongtrei jong ka R. P. Chest Hospital bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Ramkumar S u la ong ba ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla ki la buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban pynkut ïa ka jingpang TB bad da kane ka thong la ai ïa ka jingsumar kaba paka sha ki paidbah. U la ong ba dei ruh ban shimkhia bha ïa ka jingpang TB bad ïa kane ka jingpang yn sa lah ban pynkoit tang da ka jingsumar bapaka.U la ïaiban ruh ba donkam ban leh test ïa ki briew kiba shong basah ha ki shnong nongkyndong bad ha kajuh ka por u la khot bad wer ïa ki nongïalam jong ka Village Health Council, ki nongsumar dawai kynbat, ki jaka ai jingsumar ba kin pynthikna ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingpang TB ha ka jylla bad ha ka ri.Ka State Tuberculosis Officer Dr. J. Kharwanlang ka la ïathuh ba ki don 4974 tylli ki case jong ki briew kiba pang TB ha u snem 2022 bad 4812 tylli ki case ha u snem 2023. Ka jingleh test ïa kiba suba don jingpang TB na ka bynta shi lak ka la kiew na ka 646 lak ha u snem 2021 sha ka 1433 lak ha u snem 2023. Ka bynrap, “watla ka jingleh test ïa kiba suba don jingpang TB ka la kiew ar shah bad ka jingpyndonkam ban pyndonkam ïa ka High Quality Diagnostic Tests, ka la hiar na ka 130 lak ha u snem 2022 sha ka 124 lak ha u snem 2023, kaba pyni ïa ka jinghiar ka jingdon jong kiba pang TB ha ka jylla.”Ha kane ka sngi, la plie paidbah ruh ïa ka C&DST Lab ka ban ai jingkyrshan ban lap bad ban sumar ïa ka jingpang TB.Kum shi bynta ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka National Tuberculosis Elimination Programme (NTEP), la plie ruh ïa ki Regional Laboratory ha kylleng ka jylla. Ha kine ki Lab la leh ïa ka Culture and Drug Susceptibility Testing (C&DST) na ka bynta kiba don jingpang TB bad na ka bynta ki nongpang Drug-Resistant TB.
title: 4812 ngut kiba pang TB ha Meghalaya, la plie ïa ka C&DST Lab ha RP Chest Hospital

content: Shillong, Lber 19: Ki khubor na ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba ha kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba u Grikcheng S Marak jong ka shnong Cherangre, Tura (WGH) u la phah ïa ka jingujor ba ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 1.30 baje nohphaisngi uwei uba kyrteng u Chonba R Marak, 24 snem ka rta bad ki paralok ki la shoh bad byrngem ïa u khun jong u uba kyrteng u Yangkam M Sangma ba dang 24 snem ka rta.
title: Shah shoh bad shah byrngem uwei ha WGH

content: Shillong, Lber 19: Na ka liang ki khubor na ka bor District ka East Khasi Hills, ka la ong ba ka la pynïaid bha da kaba sted mynta ïa ka jingleit ai injek pyrshah ia ka jingpang shah dait ksew kaba long bih ne ka anti-rabi ïa ki ksew ha kylleng ka Nongbah Shillong, ban ïakhun bad pynduhjait ïa ka jingpang rabi hapoh ka District baroh kawei.La ïathuh ba kane ka jingleit ai injek anti-rabi ka dei kaba la pynlong da ka District Joint Steering Committee on Rabies Elimination ka East Khasi Hills ba kynthup ïa ki bor District, ka Tnat ka Koit ka Khiah, ka tnat Veterinary, Shillong Municipal Board, ki Seng trei monsngewbha bad ki Dorbar Shnong bad kiwei.Ïa kane ka jingai injek ïa ki ksew kynthup naduh kiba ri ki briew bad ki ksew surok, ka la sdang naduh ka 11 tarik Lber bad ha kine hynriew sngi ba la leit noh, la dep ai injek haduh 631 tylli ki ksew ha kylleng ki shnong ka Nongbah Shillong bad kiweik I jaka.Shuh shuh bna ka liang ki bor District ki la pyntip ba ka jingshah dait ksew ki briew ha Jylla ka la kiew bha hapdeng kine ki shisnem ba la leit noh, kaba kiew na ka 5302 ngut ha u 2022 sha ka 9611 ngut ha u 2023.La iathuh ba ha ka East Khasi Hills District ka dei kaba don bun eh ki jingjia shah dait ksew kaba don haduh 50% ki case. Ha u snem 2022, haduh 2512 ngut ki la shah dait ksew bad ha u 2023 kala kiew sha ka 5085 ngut.La pyntip ruh da kaba ong ba haduh 80% na kine ki jingdait ksew ki dei kiba jia ha jaka sor nong ka Nongbah Shillong.Katkum ka jingong ki bor ka koit ka khiah, ka jingdait lane ka jingkhlong ne ka jingjliah ïa ki dak mong ha ka snieh doh da ki ksew kiba don khniang rabi, ka lah ban pynbit jingpang ïa u briew bad ktah ïa ka jabieng bad u budlum nalor ka dei ruh ka jingpang kaba lah ban shim wat ïa ka jingim briew.Kila ong ba ka jingpang rabi ka dei pat kaba lah ban ïada 100% bad ki jingïada kiba dei ban shim ka long ban sait wut wut ïa ki jaka ba shah dait da ka sabon hapoh ka um ba tuid kumba 15 minit eiei bad sa leit wad ïa ki jingsumar ha ki jaka sumar ba marjan ba kin ai ïa ki dawai injek.Kila ïathuh ruh ba ïa ki ksew ba suba don jingpang rabi, ym dei satia ban pynïap hynrei ban teh ïa ki bad ban peit thuh haduh 10 sngi nalor ban pyntip ruh sha ki bor ba dei khmih ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam.
title: Haduh 631 tylli ki ksew la dep ban ai injek rabies da ki bor synshar ka EKH

content: Shillong, Lber : Ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka sorkar jylla ka la pynmih sa kawei pat ka episode ba la ai kyrteng ka jingïadei hapdeng ki kmie ki kpa bad ki khun samla.Ïa kane ka jingïakren kaba long ruh kum ka jingsyllok bad ki khun samla ba dang khie la wan ban shim bynta da i Programme Officer ka RKSK, Adolesncent Health Kong Flourish Lyngdoh bad ruh i Dr. HH Mohrmen ba dei nongtrei monsngewbha.Ka mat ïakren halor katei ka phang kadei eh halor ki khun samla ba dang khie ïa kaba la tip kum ka ‘adolescents unfiltered’.Kine ki riewshemphang ki la batai bniah ïa bun ki jingeh ba kum ki kmei ki kpa ki kynduh ban pynheh pynsan ïa ki khun samla. Ki la ïatai ruh halor ka jingïapher ki khun samla ha kane ka juk ba mynta bad ka juk ba mynshwa.Ki nongkren ki batai ruh ïa ki khun shaphang ka jingkylla ka met ka phad ha ka por ba ki khie samla bad ruh halor ka kam shongkha shongman.Nalorkane, ki la kren ruh ïa ka jingdonkam ban phylliew jingmut halor ka phang kaba kumno ki kmie ki kpa ki ju kren ïa ki kyntien kiba pynjem rngiew ïa ki khun.“Kumta ngi kyntu ba kum ki kmie ki kpa ngi dei ban pynjah noh ïa kine ki jingmlien,” ki la ong.Shuh shuh ki la pynshai ruh da kaba ong, “Ngi baroh kum ka imlang sah lang ngi don la ka bynta ban pynwandur ïa ka lawei jong ki khun jongngi. Ban hikai ïa ki ba kin lait na ki ba bun ki jingeh kum ka jingïoh khun khynnah, ki jingdih pynbuaid, Ka jingïaid khlem ka thong bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingeh.”Ki la kyntu ruh ïa ki kmie ki kpa bad ïa ki khun samla ba kin shim jingïarap na ki nongïasyllok ne ki counsellor haba ki shem kano kano ka jingeh ba ba kin ym don ka jingsngew artatien ne lehrain ha kaban pan jing ïarap.Ïa kane ka podcast, Adolescents Unfiltered, phi lah ban peit ha YouTube lane sngap ha ka Spotify. Phi lah ruh ban peit hapoh ka Instagram.
title: Kiar ban kren ïa ki khun da ki kyntien ba pynjem rngiew

content: Shillong, Lber 19 : Ka ïing Bishar High Court jongka Meghalaya ka la aipor 45 sngi ban kit lut ïa u dewiong ba pyllang ha kylleng ki jaka madan, sha ka jaka ka ban lum thup na ka bynta ban khaii noh ïa u.Ha ka hukum ba la pynmih halor ka PIL ba shong bishar myn ha ka 14 tarik Lber, ka Full Bench ka la ong “Ngi sngew ba baroh u dewiong bala dep tih bad lum pathar ha kylleng ki jaka, la dei ban pynkit noh sha ka jaka ka ban lum thup na ka bynta ban khaïi. ïa ka bai pynkit sha ka jaka ba la buh ban lum thup lah ban pan na ki trai dewiong namar ka buh pathar ïa u dewiong ha kylleng ki jaka”.“Shisien bala pynkit ïa une u dewiong, da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki drone kumba ai jingmut u Justice Katakey (retired), baroh kine ki jaka kin hap hapoh ka jingpeit pyrman, lada shem ïa ka jingmih biang u dewiong ha kane ka jaka, lah ban shim ïa u kum u dewiong ba tih beain kat kum ka kyndon 21 jong ka MMDR Act, 1957 bad lah ruh ban leh eiei pyrshah ïa u” ka la ong.Halor ka jingkyrpad u Aadvocate General, ka ïing Bishar kala mynjur ban aipor 45 sngi ban pynkit ïa baroh une u marpoh khyndew uba la shu buh ha kylleng ki jaka.
title: 45 sngi ai bor ka ïing Bishar HC ban pynkynriah ïa u dewiong sha jaka ba dei ban lum thup

content: Shillong, Lber, 19: Lai ngut ki briew ba kynthup arngut na ka shnong Mynsain bad uwei na ka shnong Nongbsap ki la shah rah tohkit ha ki Pulit ka Sohïong Out Post hadien ba arngut ki riewsniew ki la shah bom shnong ha ki paidbhur ha ka shnong Mawthlong ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi ki arngut lai ngut kiba la shah kem ha ki Pulit ha ka miet synnia Lah Sngi u Blei ki long u Skerling Pyrtuh, 39 snem na Mawthlong, u Traibor Lyngdoh, 30 snem na Nongbsap bad u Kyntiewnam Pyrtuh, 28 snem na Mawthlong.U SP u la ithuh ba ia kine ki lai ngut la pyllait noh ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi lyngba ka Bail Bond hadien ba ladep ka jingtohkit.“Ki Pulit ki la wan thwet hynnin mynmiet bad ki la rah arngut ki briew na ka shnong Mynsaiñ bad uwei na Nongbsap,” ong u Rangbah Shnong ka shnong Mawthlong Mynsaiñ u Bah Starwell Mawlong ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor hadien ba la wai ka dorbar.Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawthlong Mynsaiñ ka la lum da ka dorbar paidbah hadien ba ki Pulit ki la rah ïa kine ki lai ngut ki briew na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ kaba ki Video ki la saphriang ha ka Social Media.“Ban kynnoh (ïa ki lai ngut) ba ki dei ki nongkynshoit ngim sngew ïahap. Haba don ba hylla, ki paramarjan ki hap ban ai jingïarap hynrei ban kynnoh ba ki nongkynshoit ka long kaba bakla,” la ong u Bah Mawlong haba pynpaw ïa ka jingbym sngew ïahap hadien ba ki lai ngut ki briew ki la shah rah tohkit ha ki Pulit.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Rangbah Shnong, ki don lai ngut kiba donkti ha kane ka jingjia katba arngut kiba synran ki la shah kem ha ki paidbah bad uwei pat uba donkti ban ksih ïa ka riewkynthei u la leit phet. U la ïathuh ruh ba ki paidbah ki la pynjulor ruh ïa ka kali jong kine ki lai ngut.Haba ïathuh ïa ka jingjia kaba la lam sha ka jingbitar jong ki paidbhur ban bom shnong ïa ki arngut ki rangbah, u Bah Mawlong u la ong, “ngi ïoh jingtip ïa kane ka jingjia ba u don uwei u briew uba rung hapoh kawei ka ing u ksih, u khnoit bad u set na shyntur jong kawei ka riewkynthei kaba don san ngut ki khun bad u kurim ruh u la ieh um shym la sah lang shuh.”U la ïathuh ba kane ka riewkynthei ka la lait na ki tyrsim jong u runar da kaba dait ïa ka kti jong u bad ïoh ban pyrta jingïarap. “Ki paramarjan tang shu ïohsngew ïa kane ki la pyntip sha nga u Rangbah Shnong. Hynrei ynda la poi hangtei (ha ka jaka ba la jia) kato ka jingkynnoh menshohnoh ngim lah shuh ban bahkhlieh namarba ka jia ha khappud jong ka shnong (Mawthlong Mynsaiñ). Ban ong ba ka jingjia la leh da ki nong Mawtlong ngam lah shuh ban pynshong nongrim namabar la ïakhleh lang ki paidbah kiba najan shnong,” la ïathuh u Bah Mawloong.“Ngi kum ki nongïalam shnong ngi la pyrshang ban pyllait ïa kito ki briew bad ngi la rah sha ingdorbar ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Secretary Shnong, ki Rangbah Dong ban bishar ïa kane ka kam. Hynrei namarba ki paidbah ki la bun da ki hajar ngut ngim lah shuh ban tehlakam namarba ki paidbah kim ailad shuh. Ynda la kham sngi leilei, ki la nang bun shuh shuh ki paidbah bad kum ki nongïalam shnong ngi la poi ha ka kut lad,” la ïathuh shuh shuh u Bah Mawlong.“Ngi la pyrshang katba lah hynrei dei tad haduh ka por ba la wan poi ki Pulit (la ïoh ban pyllait im ïa ki arngut) namarba ki paidbah ki kwah beit ban tangon ïa ki nongleh kam sniew,” ong u Bah Mawlong“Ngi ka shnong ngi la leh katba lah ban ïada. Ki paidbah ki la pynpra wat ïa ka Iingdorbar hynrei namar ka jingbun palat ki paidbah ki la ïoh bom bad shoh bad wat haba ki Pulit ki la ïaleh ban pyllait, hynrei ki paidbah ki knieh ban bom beit (ïa ki arngut)” u la ong bad bynrap, “lada ïa ki Pulit ruh ki paidbah kim ailad ma ngi leilei ki nongïalam shnong ha ka bor barit ngin lah leh aiu.”“Halor kane ka jingjia, ka shnong, ngim pdiang ba ka dei ka jingtharai menshohnoh. Ngim tip la u dei u nongtuh ne u nongbatbor namarba ngim ïoh shuh ban bishar. U la ïathuh ka jingjia ka dei ha ka por kumba 2:30 baje eiei,” u la ong.“Nga la pyrshang ban tem da ka lynti. Hynrei ngim tip la ka ain kan ailad neem ban thaw ïa ka jingbha,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli u la ong, “ngim pat shim ïa ka rai hynrei ynda la bishar bniah ngi kum ka shnong ngi la ai jingïarap ban ujor ejahar khnang ba ka lanot riewkynthei kan ïoh ïa ka hok.”
title: Sdang thwet Pulit ïa kiba bom shnong ïa ki arngut ki riewsniew ha Mawthlong

content: Shillong, Lber 19: U MLA ka VPP napoh ka 17 North Shillong Konstituensi u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ba kum nongmihkhmat jong ki paidbah u la ïai kyntu ïa ki tnat treikam jong ka sorkar jylla kum ka tnat sam um ne ka PHE bad kumjuh ruh ka Shillong Municipal Board ba kin sngewbha ban trei minot namar ka kamram ka long ba dei ban ai ka jingshakri ka babha ïa ki paidbah khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka umbam umdih.U la ong ba ka um ka dei ka jingim bad ka jingïap jong ki paidbah bad khlem ka um yn ym lah ban im hynrei khlem ka bam la kumno kumno dang ïa lah ban im katto katne.“Ki tnat kin ym dei tang ban ai daw ba ka dei ka por tyrkhong, hynrei ki tnat sorkar ki don ka bynta kaba khraw bad ki hap ban shim ruh ïa ka jingkitkhlieh, khamtam ha Sor Shillong la bun tylli ki Snem ngi la mad ïa kane ka jingeh lano kum ki Nongshong shnong, ngin ïoh ïa la ka hok, ki la dei jingshisha ban kham pynthikna ba ka um ka la dei ban kham pynbha, bad ki tnat kiba dei khmih ïa ka umbam umdih kum ka SMB bad PHE ki dei ban phah ki ba dei sha field ban peit khmih ba ki don ki jaka ba ka um ka shlei bad pahuh hynrei ki don pat ki jaka ba ki longïng ki hap ban thied ïa ka um,” ong u Bah Adelbert Nongrum.U la ong ba baroh ki paidbah ki tip shai bad ka tnat PHE kadei ban pynbiang ka Source bad ka Municipal ka dei ban pynbiang ka jingsam (Distribution) ïa ka um, kumta u la kyntu ba ki dei ban trei hok bad ban ïatreilang na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ki paidbah ym ban ïa kynnoh ïa kawei ka tnat ïa kawei pat ne ban ïa thet kti, ki dei ban pyndep hok la ka kamram bad ka deiti ka jingkitkhlieh.
title: Don ki shnong ba shlei kai ka um, don ba hap thied, dei ban kitkhlieh ka tnat PHE: Bah Adelbert

content: Shillong, Lber, 19: Ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ha ka sngi Baar ka la buh sngi ban shong bishar haduh ka 9 tarik, Ïaïong 2024 ïa ka jingujor jong ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) ban pynsangeh ïa ka Rule jong ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka Khasi Students Union (KSU), ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la ïaiban ïa ka rai ba la pynmih dang shen ban shong bishar la ka jong ïa ka jingujor na ka bynta ka jylla Assam, ka Tripura bad ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi nalor kiwei pat ki jingujor ba la ïoh pdiang na ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka ri India.Ka KSU ka la ïathuh ruh ba ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la thung ruh ïa u Ankit Yadav, uba dei u muktiar jong ka All Assam Students Union (AASU) bad ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) kum u Nodal Officer na ka bynta ki nongujor. Ka Ingbishar ka la bthah ruh ïa ka Sorkar India ban ai jubab halor kine ki jingujor shwa ka 9 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ki nongïalam jong ka NESO ki la leit sha Delhi ban ujor halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rule, 2024 bad kyrpad ïa ka Ingbishar ba kan pynsangeh noh mardor ïa kane ka Rule ba la pynmih dang shen da ka Sorkar India.
title: 9 tarik Ïaiong, yn shong bishar ka SC ïa ka jingujor ka NESO pyrshah ïa ka CAA

content: Shillong, Lber 19 : U National General Secretary ka NPP bad Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ula pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewthikna ba ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh kyrtong ka NPP kan jop beit na kane ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ha kane ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong 2024.“Ngim don jingartatien ba ngin jop ïa ka elekshon” ong u Bah Sniawbha haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor.Haba pynpaw ba ka jingdon vote jong ka NPP ka la kiew bun bun shah hadien ka jingwan pynïasoh ki 2 ngut ki MLA bad kito ki MLA ba rim ne ki kyrtong jong kiwei ki party ha ka election MLA ba la dep. Ula ïathuh “Ka jingïoh vote jong ka NPP ha ka election MLA ba la dep hangne ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills ka long 3.17 lak kata ha u 2023. Mynta ka la nang kiew da ka jingwan pynïasoh sa ki arngut ki MLA ka PDF-u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh bad bah Gavin Mylliem, nangta u MLA ba rim ka Mawsynram bah Himalaya M Shangpliang bad ruh ka jingwan ïasoh ki MDC Bah Carnes Sohshang bad Batskhem Ryntathiang”.Nalor kane u la pyntip ba ka MDC barim ka Nongpoh, Kong Rona Khymdeit ruh kan sa wan pyniasoh sha ka NPP ha ka 22 tarik Lber, u Bah Sniawbha ula ong ba ka jingdon vote jong ka NPP kala nang kiew sa shi lak eiei.Halor ka jingkynthoh u MP ka Congress na Shillong Bah Vincent H Pala ba ka jingpynïeng ïa arngut ki kyrtong kynthei da ka NPP kam dei satia ka jingpynkupbor ïa ki Kynthei hynrei dei ba kam don lad da kumwei pat, une u Nongïalam ka NPP ula ong ba ka party ka la pynieng ïa ka Myntri Sorkar kum ka kyrtong namar ka lah ban ai ka jingïakhun kaba itynnad pyrshah ïa u bah Pala.“Phi mut ngi duna ïa ki kyrtong?. Ngi don ïa ki kyrtong kiba biang ba biang ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa u. Na kata ka daw ngi la ïakren bad ngi la shim ïa ka rai kaba dei bad ngi la jied ïa ka Dr Ampareen namar kan sa jop beit ïa ka elekshon” ula ong.Nalor kane, u Bah Sniawbha ula kren ruh halor ki kam pynroi bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar MDA ha kine ki hynriew snem bala leit noh.“Ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ki la sakhi ba ym dei tang ka Sorkar MDA-I bad 2 kaba la shimkhia ïa ki ishu kiba mih bad kumjuh ruh kumno ban tei pyndep kloi ïa ka Sor Shillong kaba thymmai ha Mawdiangdiang ban pynkylluid ïa kane kaba mynta. Ngi la khot tender ban tei ïa ki ophis, ïa ki surok, ïa ka jingring umdih. Phi ïohi ïa ki surok, ym duna ïa ka T.10,000 klur la dep shna surok ha kine ki 6 snem. Ha ka por ba ngi shimti ïa ka Sorkar, tang khyndiat tylli eh ki longïing ki don umkor ha ïing hynrei mynta palat 3 lak kila ïoh kor um ïing. Nalor kane, ym duna ïa ka 2000 lane 3000 km ki surok thymmai la dep ban shna. Dang shen, ka Kynhun Myntri kala rai ruh ban pynpoi bording elektrik sha ki shnong bym pat don bording. Ka MDA kala kular ban kyntiew ïa ki kam jngohkai, kala pynshna ïa ki madan artificial turf ha jan man ki district ka Jylla ban kyntiew ïa ki kam ïalehkai sport” ula ong.Une u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ula ong ba lada ym dei namar ka jingtreikam jong ka Sorkar, ka NPP kan ym ïoh satia haduh 26 seat ha ka elekshon MLA 2023.“Ha u 2018 ngi jop 19 seat bad ha u 2023 ngi la kiew sha ka 26 seat. Nga sngew ba kane ka dei namar ka jingtreikam bha jong ka Sorkar. Ngi tip ba ngim lah ban pynhun ïa baroh namar kin don hi kiba pyrshah sorkar, kiba pyrshah ha kiba bun ba lang hynrei kum ka Sorkar ngi la trei shitom ban wanrah ïa ki kam pynroi khamtam haba phai sha ki lad jingïarap ïa ki samla” ula ong.
title: Ka Dr Ampareen kan jop beit na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency; kob u Dy. CM

content: Shillong. Lber 19: Sa uwei pat u briew u la shah kem ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia pynbthei bom IED hapoh ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai hapoh ka Them ïew Mawlong, ong ki pulit ha ka sngi baar.Utei uba la shah kem la ithuh kyrteng da u Namphyrnai Lyngdoh Peiñlang uba la 21 snem ka rta napoh ka shnong Peiñlang ha kaba u la shahkem na Mairang, Eastern West Khasi Hills bad la wan ïalam noh sha Shillong ha ka sngi Nyngkong.“Da ka jingïarap jong ki pulit ka Mairang bad ki pulit ka Ri Bhoi, ngi la ïoh ban kem sa uwei. U la dei sa uwei uba la shah suba jur halor kane ka jingjia,” ong u SP ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi.U la ïathuh ba utei u briew uba la shah kem u la donkti bha bad ki dkhot ka seng lehnoh Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC).Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai, u Tarson Lymba uba la 58 snem ka rta, uba dei u nongïalam ka seng HNYF, u la shah kem napoh Dawki katba ïa u Ebakordor Nongpluh ba la 26 snem ka rta na Shillong kaba ha ka thaiñ Malki ha kaba ïadei bad katei ka jingjia shah pynbthei bom.Shuh shuh, ki pulit ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai ki la ïoh ban pynpulom ïa ka sleeper cell kaba la treikam bha jong ka HNLC bad ki la lah ban pynpulom ïa ka jingpyrshang ban pynbthei bom IED biang hapoh Sor Shillong bad Nongpoh.Kumba 4 ngut ki dkhot katei ka seng ki la shah kem napoh ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi district. Ia kitei la ithuh kyrteng kum u Damanbha Ripnar ba ju khot sin u Shall Lapang, u Robinis Ripnar, u Jill Tariang bad u Shining Nongrum.Hadien jong kane, na ka liang ka seng HNLC ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai, ka la kam ba ka la donkti ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia pynbthei bom IED ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha Them Metor, ha Them Ïew Mawlong bad ka aipor ruh shi bnai ïa ka sorkar jylla ban pynkynriah noh ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïng kiba sah hapoh ka Sweepers’ Colony.Haba kylli ïa u SP u la ong ba ki pulit ki la pynkhlaiñ bha ïa ki bor pahara hapoh ka nongbah Shillong bad ha kylleng jong ka district.
title: Shah kem sa uwei ba suba donkti pynbthei bom IED ha Them ïew Mawlong

content: Shillong, Lber 19 : Ban lah pynthikna ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka elekshon MP Lok Sabha ha ka jylla kan long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih bad kaba khuid ba suba, ka sorkar Jylla Meghalaya ka la pan 18 pyrton ki bor pahara ban pyndonkam ha ka por elekshon.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi mynta ka sngi Baar, ula ïathuh ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la pan 11 pyrton ki Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) bad sa 7 pyrton ki State Armed Police Force (SAPF).Ula ong, ba na kitei ki 18 tylli ki pyrton, ka jylla kala ïoh shwa 3 pyrton bad kitei kila don hapoh ka jylla mynta.Ar tylli ki pyrton CRPF kila don ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman bad la bynshet ha ki ïa ka kam elekshon bad ïa kawei ka pyrton la buh ha ka nongbah.Nalor kane u SP ula ïathuh ba ka tnad Pulit kala dep thaw ïa ka Flying Squad Teams (FST) bad ïa ka Static Surveillance Teams (SST) katkum ka jingbthah jong ka Election Commission of India (ECI) bad kine ki ar tylli ki kynhun kila sdang ban treikam shaid shaid.Ula ïathuh ba ki pulit kila buh ïa ki jaka ban khmih bniah bad ban pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ban pynthikna ba kan don ka jingpeitngor bha ha kylleng ki nongbah jong ki District bapher bapher.Namar ba ka jylla Meghalaya ha hap ha ka Wat kaba Nyngkong ne Phase – I kaba don artylli ki Parliamentary Constituency, ka elekshon kan long ha ka 19 tarik u Iaiong.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills ula banjur ïa ka jingdonkam ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ïa ka elekshon kaba ïaid beit bad ula kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin mih shakhmat ban leit thep vote khlem kano kano ka jingtieng ne jingshah pynbor.
title: 18 pyrton ki bor pahara pan ka sorkar na ka bynta ka election MP ha jylla

content: Shillong, Lber 20: U MLA barim ka Mawlai-Bah Process T Sawkmie, u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkitram halor ka jingtrei shitom jong ki sister ban kyntiew ïa ka pule puthi bad kiwei ki kam shakri Blei ha ka jylla.U la pyrto ïa ka jinglah ban aiti lut jong ki ha ki kam ba ki shakri bad halor ka jingnohsynnïang ban kyntiew ïa ka imlang sahlang.Ïa kane u bah Sawkmie u la pynpaw haba ai jingkren kum u kongsan ha ka sngi Balang ka 20 tarik u Lber, 2024 haba plie pyrda ïa ka Annual Sports Meet jong ka Rosario Secondary School, Mawsïatkhnam ka skul kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Mawlai Konstitwensi.Ha kane ka sngi u bah PT Sawkmie u la kyntiew ruh ïa ka lama kum ka dak ba la plie ïa ka Annual school sports kaba lai sngi kaban kut ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka 22 tarik u Lber, 2024 ha ka jingdon ryngkat i sister headmistress, Bakhmihlang Rangtong, i sister A. Thongni, ki nonghikai bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ban sakhi ïa ka March pass na ki house, ba kynthup ïa ka yellow, red, green bad blue, ka jingshad, jingrwai, ka dril bad ka jingïamareh 100 mitar.U bah Sawkmie u la pynpaw ruh ba ki don ar bynta na ka bynta ki khynnah ha ka sport, ka professional bad ka fitness.“Kin don ki khynnah kiban angnud ban long professional ne ban im ja da ka jingïalehkai sport bad don pat kiban ïalehkai na ka bynta ban bha met bha phad bad ban ïoh ïa ka met bakoit bakhïah” la ong u Bah PT Sawkmie.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren na i sister headmistress iba la ai khublei ïa u bah Sawkmie halor ka jinglong la kloi jong i ban don ryngkat bad ki ha kane ki jingpynïalehkai sport ba shisien shisnem jong ki.I la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewnguh halor ka jingnohsynnïang u bah Sawkmie sha ki na ka bynta kane ka jingïalehkai sport.
title: Sdang ka Annual Sports Meet jong ka Rosario Secondary School, Mawsiatkhnam

content: Shillong, Lber 19: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) mynta ka sngi ka la rung syndon ha ïing jong ka Kyrtong MP ka Seng NPP, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad la ïohi ba u paidbah u la dap mam ha ka ka surok kaba la pynlong jingïalang ha Laitumkhrah Beat House.Haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit, President ka Seng, u la pynshai ba ki paidbah kim dei ban ngeit ïa kito kiba la pynsngewthuh ba bakla da kaba ong ba ka la seng ïa ka VPP ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki bar jylla kiba shong ba sah ha kane ka jylla.Haba ai jingkren da ka phareng ha kane ka jingialang, u Bah Ardent u la ong, “La seng ïa ka VPP ym ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki bar jylla, hynrei ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ka bamsap, ka jingleh shiliang khmat, ka jingsynshar bym hok kaba don ha ka jylla mynta”.Hapdeng ka jingrisa kaba ir shi ir da ki paidbah, u Bah Ardent, u la ong ruh ki don ki Myntri jong ka sorkar mynta kiba ong ba ka VPP kadei ban sei ïa ki jingshisha halor ki jingkynnoh bamsap pyrshah jong ka. U Bah Ardent u la jubab da kaba ong, “Ai ha ngi ïa ka bor synshar ngin sei lut ×a ki kam bamsap kiba don ha ka jylla, hynrei mynta haba ngim don ha ka bor te kumno ngin sei ne pyni”, u la ong.U la ong ba ka elekshon MP mynta ka kynti ka shongshit bha namar ka jingleit ka VPP kylleng kylleng ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah ïa ka hok jong ki nongthep vote bad ïa ka jingïashim bynta ki paidbah ïa ka elekshon da kaba khuid ba suba. U Bah Ardent, u la ong ba ki bor pynïaid elekshon kidei ban sngewnguh ïa ka VPP ba ka shim ïa kane ka bynta ban ai jinghikai ïa ki paidbah halor ka jingleit jong ka kylleng kylleng ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah ba kin ïa mih paidbah ban leit thep vote ban jied ïa u MP, namar ha Meghalaya ki paidbah kim ju shimkhia ban leit jied ïa u MP jong ki. “Ka Election Commission kadei ban ai khusnam ïa ka VPP namar kane”, la ong u President ka VPP.U Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon, uba long u kyrtong MP ka Seng bad u General Secretary, ha ka jingkren jong u, u la ong ba kawei na ki jingïakhun ka VPP lada ki paidbah ba un mihkhmat sha Lok Sabha ka long ban peit na ka bynta ka hok jong ki samla trai jylla kiba dei ban ïoh kam ïoh jam ha ki ophis sorkar pdeng kiba don ha ka jylla. “Ngi la ai shibun ka jaka ïa ki bor treikam ka sorkar pdeng, kum ka NEHU, ka ICAR bad bun kiwei pat ki ophis treikam, hynrei balei pat kine kim lah ban aikam aijam ïa ki samla trai jylla ha ki post kiba dei ban ïoh ki trai jylla’, la ong u Dr. Ricky.
title: Wat ngeit ia kito kiba kiba ïalam bakla ba ka la seng ïa ka VPP ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki bar jylla : Ardent

content: BDWS
title: BDWS

content: Shillong, Lber 20: Ka kynhun ki nongïalehkai ka Meghalaya hynne ka sngi ki la ïoh ban khur bun tylli ki takma rnong bad katto katne ki rupa na ka 3rd North East Games kaba long ha Nagaland hynne ka sngi.Ka Meghalaya ka la ïai bteng ban tyngshaiñ ha ka ïakop mareh, ha kaba ka Ritina Hanse ka la jop takma rupa ha ka thup ïakop women’s 400m race. Ka la lah ban pyndep hadpoh 1 minute, 2.05 sekon. Kiwei pat ki takma rnong la khur da u Kyrshanlang Shylla, Repol Dkhar, u Renaldi Dhar bad u Henry Yoga A Sangma, kiba la wan kyrdan ba lai ha ka 4x100m men’s relay bad shimpor 44.22 sekon ban pyndep.Ha ka pencak silat ka kynhun Meghalaya, ba kynthup ïa ka Usefulness Lyngdoh Nongum (women’s -70kg) bad u Kyrshanlang Lyngdoh (men’s -50kg) baroh arngut ki la ïoh ban rung sha ka final ha ki kyrdan jong ki hynrei ki la hap ban hun da ki takma rupa hadien ba shahrem ha ka wat ba khadduh. Sa kiwei pat ki takma rnong la khur da ki nongïalehkai ba kynthup ïa Indoarbiushbirth N Marak (men’s -45kg), Lakshmi Rabha (women’s -60kg), Joplin Kharkylliang (women’s -65kg), Pranjal Rabha (men’s -65kg), Sanju Rabha (men’s -60kg) bad Moon Moon Rabha (men’s -70kg).Ha ka Wushu kaba la kut hynne ka sngi ka jylla ka la ïoh ban khur san tylli ki takma. Ki kynthei kiba la khur takma ki long ka Juliana Blah (45kg) bad ka Bashisha Nongrum (48kg), katba na ki shynrang ki long u Wanpher Kharkongor (56kg), Francis RR Songthiang (65kg) bad Mewanpynshngain Nongrum (70kg).Ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ruh ban khur ar tylli ki rnong ha ka table tennis. Ka kynhun kynthei ba khur takma ki kynthup ïa ka Badaaihun Diengdoh, Di Toomi Ch Momin, Wanpyntngenlang Lyngdoh bad Ilapynkmen Synrem, katba ki shynrang ki kynthup ïa u Jeff AK Marak, Suranjit Dey, Sandeep Kumar bad Prithvi Dey.Ha ka basketball, ka kynhun lehkai ki shynrang ka la shahrem ha ka Mizoram, kiba la pynliem da 88-39.Ha ka phutbol, ka Meghalaya ka la wanphai jingjop hadien ba rem ha ka Arunachal Pradesh hynnin ka Sngi Hat Majai ban pynliem ïa ka Tripura da 2-1 kol.Ha ka Boxing ka Riteeka Sarki ka la ïohrung semifinal ha ka 57kg women, kaba mut ba ka ladep ban pynthikna ïalade ban khur takma rnong. Bad ruh hynriew ngut ki nongïakura ha ka men’s division ki la ïoh rung semifinal – ba kynthup ïa u Sanjeev Maskut (48kg), Khrawbok Marwein (51kg), Banjop Nongkhlaw (54kg), Sunil Limbu (57kg), Ram Lyngdoh (60kg) bad u Bhalang Shadap (67kg).Ha ka Archery ka kynhun ki thei ki la ïoh rung sha ka final, kaba la pynthikna sa kawei pat ka takma na bynta ka Meghalaya. Hynrei, ka kynhun ki shynrang ki la shah rem noh ha ka Assam.Ha ka badminton ka jylla kam da seisoh bha, ha kaba saw ngut ki samla shynrang ki la khyllem noh hadien ba shah rem ha ka jingïakhun para marwei, bad ruh ha ka women’s single bad mixed double hynne ka sngi.Haba phai sha ka tennis, lai ngut ki nongïalehkai ki la shah pynkhyllem noh ha kawat ïakhun pre-quarterfinal katba ka Sasha Kharbuli ka la bteng ïa ka lynti ïaid jong ka hadien ba ïohrung sha ka Quarter Final ka ban long mynta ka sngi.
title: 3 rupa,14 tylli rnong khur ka Meghalaya ha ka sngi ba lai jong ka 3rd North East Games ha Nagaland

content: Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba long ka kynhun jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hill State Peoples Democratic Party (HSPDP) ka la ïakynduh mawsiang bad mad ïa ka jakhom khait hadien ba ka ktem jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la pra phom ha Ribhoi District shwa ba ka jylla Meghalaya kan leit sha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik u Ïaiong, 2024.Ha Ribhoi kaba don san tylli ki Constituency ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la jop tang ar Seat ha ka elekshon Assemly kaba la long ha u snem 2023, kata, tang na Nongpoh bad na Umroi. Hynrei watla katta ka jingïoh vote jong ka UDP ha them Ribhoi ka shu ïaryngkat bad ka Congress kaba jop ar Seat, kata, na Umsning bad na Mawhati, katba ka NPP ka la jop tang JirangKat haduh mynta, ym pat lah satia ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingleh phoi jong ki nongïalam ka UDP ha them Ribhoi bad lehse katkum ba lah ban shu ïoh ksai malu mala imat ka lah ban don ka jingbym suidniew ne ka jingkhein briew jong ki nongïalam ka UDP khamtam ïa ki nongïalam baradbah ka UDP ha them Ribhoi khamtam ïa u Bah Donbok Khymdeit uba dei u President jong ka UDP Ribhoi bad u MLA barim jong ka Mawhati.Kane ka jingresaiñ jong ki nongïalam ka UDP na them Ribhoi ka la pyntron ïa ka RDA kaba dang ïakhun dohïap ban rung sha manla ki shnong ki thaw ban pan jingkyrshan na ka bynta u kyrtong u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin uba dang khmihlynti ïa ka jingïatylli jong ki nongtrei bashitrhem ka UDP bad ka HSPDP.Toi, watla ka UDP ka la jop 12 Seat ha ka elekshon Assembly watla katta kam pat lah ban shu khein shngaiñ namarba ka HSPDP ruh ka jop tang ar Seat ha ka elekshon baladep.Kane ka jingjia kaba pynkyndit ïa ki nongïalam ka UDP mynta ka sngi, ka la pyndiaw mynsiem bha ïa u kyrtong ka RDA u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin uba la trei borbah ban tur sha ki kyndong kyshrot jong ka jylla ban pan jingkyrshan na ki paidbah ha kane ka kynti.Ka jingbym ïasngewthuh jingmut hapoh ka UDP ka la nang aibor ïa kiwei pat ki party kiba don ïa ki kyrtong ban pynïakhun ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha namarba mynta ki nongïalam ka UDP ha them Ribhoi kiba la mih noh na kane ka party ki la long kiba laitluid ban jied ïa uno uno u kyrtong ha ka elekshon namarba kim pat shim rai satia sha kano ka party kin leit ban pynïasoh.Watla ki nongïalam ka UDP Ribhoi kim shym la ai satia ïa kano kano ka daw ba ki la mih noh na ka party hynrei kat kumba lah ban sngewthuh ki lah ban leit pynïasoh bad ka NPP kaba bat ïa u lakam synshar ha ka jylla.Namarba ka jingbym don kyrtong ka Trinamool Congress ha Shillong Seat, ka Trinamool Congress ha Mawkyrwat Constituency ka la ai laitluid ïa ki nongkyrshan ban ai kyrshan ïa kano kano ka party kaba ki sngewbit bad kaba ki imon.Lehse kane ka elekshon Lok Sabha mynta ka kynti ka dei ka elekshon kaba sakma ki nongbud haba ki nongïalam kim lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingïatylli hapoh kawei ka sem.Ka kabu ksiar mynta, ka ap ïa kiwei pat ki party namarba kine ki nongïalam ka UDP ha Ribhoi kin ym lah ban shu shong kli kti hynrei kan don beit ka jingpyrkhat shaei ban leit snoh bad ïano ban ai jingkyrshan ha kane ka kynti. Ka por kam slem shuh bad sa tang hapoh khyndiat taiew shwa ban wan ka elekshon u paidbah un sa ïoh ïa ka jubab kaba shai shano kine ki nongïalam ba la phet na ka UDP kin leit riehtngen.
title: Jakhom ka RDA ha Ribhoi ba la phet lut ki nongïalam

content: Shillong, Lber 20 : Ka Maitshaphrang SC ka la ïoh rah ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol kaba la tip kum ka (L) Holet Suting Memorial Football Tournament 2024 ba la pynïaid da ka Mawdron SC.Ka Maitshaphrang SC ka la ïoh rah nam lahduh hadien ba ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Ryntihlang SC ha ka jingïalehkai phainal kaba la long ha ka 9 tarik Lber 2024 ha Pomdngiem Football Ground.Lyngba kane ka nam jop, ka Maitshaphrang SC ka la ïoh ruh ban khur ïa ka song pisa ryngkat ka trophy bad kumjuh ruh ka Ryntihlang SC kaba wan ba ar ka la ïoh ïa ka song pisa lem bad ka trophy.Ha katei ka sngi la wan ban pynhap pyrda da u Bah Olet Kharsahnoh Sordar ka Shnong Jongksha kum u Kongsan, Bah Ïohbor Suting kum u symbud kongsan, ha ka jingïasakhi lang ki riew rangbah jong ka thaiñ Mawkynrew, ki nongpynïaid ka Mawdron SC bad ki paidbah nongpeitkai.Ha katei ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol bol kaba lai sngi kaba sdang ha ka 7 tarik bad kaba la kut noh ha ka 9 tarik Lber 2024 la wan ban ïashim bynta da ki 16 tylli ki kynhun jong ka thaiñ.
title: Lahduh ka Maitshaphrang SC ha ka (L) Holet Suting Memorial FT 2024

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 20: Kawei ka Shlem ai jinghikai ha ka put ka tem kaba don ha Mawïong Pyndengrei kaba la tip ruh kum ka Art and School of Music, kaba la register ruh ha ka sorkar, ha ka taïew ba la dep ka la ïoh ban plie paidbah bad ban pdiang admission noh ruh shisyndon ïa ki khynnah kiba kwah ban leit pyntbit ha katei ka Shlem ai jinghikai.Ïa katei ka shlem la plie paidbah da u Dr. Dameshwa Lyngdoh kum u kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u Pastor S.L Lyngkhoi u ba dei uwei na ki nonghikai tem ba nyngkong eh ha ka thaiñ Nongstoiñ.Kum shi bynta ban pynshit pynshngaiñ shuh shuh ïa katei ka sngi, la ïoh ïa ki jingrwai kyrpang bad jingtem kyrpang na ki samla, kynthup na ka Kid’s Tarari, ka Khmih bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kajuh ka por utei u kongsan u ba dei u Doktor u la pynktik mynsiem ruh ïa ki paidbah, namar ka jingpyni sap tem lang jong u lyngba ka jingtem kaitar (guitar) ha ki sur kiba sngew thiang.Ha katei ka jaka ka don ruh ka music studio recording kaba la pynïaid da uwei na ki samla jong katei ka shnong Mawïong Pyndengrei.U kongsan haba ai jingkren u la ong, “Lada ngim lah ban pynsngew tynnad shuwa ïalade yn ym lah ban pynsngew tynnad ïa kiwei lyngba ki jingput jingtem, kumta kat kaba phi leh dei ban leh naduh ka mynsiem” ong utei u Doktor.
title: Plie biang ka Art and School of Music ïa ka shlem hikai ha Nongstoiñ

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 20: Ki jaidbynriew Nepali kiba shong ba sah ha ka thaiñ Langpih hapoh ka shatri jong ka Kamrup Jilla Gorkha Kalyan Samiti, ha ka taiew ba la lah ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang paidbah kaba 10 kum ka jingïakynduh lang ki paid Nepali kiba don ha ka jylla Assam.Ïa katei ka jingïalang paidbah la ïoh ban pynlong ha kawei na ki shnong kaba ki Khasi ki ju khot ne sien kum ka Lawbah, kaba dei ruh ka jaka ïa kajia khappud hapdeng ka jylla Assam Meghalaya. Pynban la ju sien ne khot ruh ïa katei ka shnong kum ka Harsha Nagar da ki Nepali, kaba ka Assam ruh ka ju kam ba ka dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka.Ha katei ka jingïalang kaba la neh kumba ar sngi la don shibun ki jingpynbyrngia bapher bapher, kynthup naduh ka shad ka rwai, ka put ka tem tynrai bad ka kynhun kum ka dak jong ka jingai mynsiem. Ban pynshlur ïa ki samla pule la ai ruh ïa ki khusnam sha kiba la wan shakhmat ha ki jingpule.U Nilamani Upadhay President ka Gorkha Kalyan Samiti, u Arjun Chettri Rabha Hasong Autonomous Council, u Bikas Chettri President Reception Committee bad u Sambu Chettri Secretary ka Gorkha Kalyan Samiti, u R.G.Momin MLA katei ka thaiñ bad kiwei kiwei, ki la donlang ban ai mynsiem.Katei ka seng ka la ong ruh ban ïawer ïa ki paid nongshong shnong jong katei ka thaiñ kiba dei ki Khasi, ban don ka jingïatiplem bad ban ïa im kum shi para wat lada don la ki rukom bapher bapher, la ka long ha ka riti dustur ne ha ka mane Blei pynban baroh ki long hapoh ka Ri India ym kum ki nongwei.
title: To ngin ïa long kawei hapoh ka ri, kyntu ki Nepali ha Langpih

content: Nongpoh, Lber 20: Tang hadien ba ka Election Commission of India kala pynbna ïaka tarik ban jied ïaki nongmihkhmat sha ka iing Dorbar thaiñ jong ka Lok Sabha, ki bor pulit ka Ri-Bhoi kila sdang ban pyrkhing ïaka ïaid ka ïeng jong ki kali paidbah ban pynlong ruh ki jingtalasi ïaki kali haka thaiñ Nongpoh hadien bala pyntreikam noh ïaka Model Code of Conduct haka jylla Meghalaya.Kum ban shu kdew hangne ba u District Magistrate ka Ri-Bhoi u Arpit Upadhyay u la pynjari ïaka kyndon aiñ 144 CrPC ha Ri-Bhoi District ban teh kyndon naka bynta ka jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih ka elekshon MP sha Lok Sabha ban sa long haka 19 tarik Ïaiong.Naka liang ki bor pulit ka Ri-Bhoi kila pynthikna ban wanrah ka jingshngaiñ sha ki paidbah bad pynlong ruh ka jingtalasi haka thaiñ Nongpoh ryngkat ki pulit CRPF ba kan nym don kano kano ka jingpynthud shuwa ka elekshon MP haka jylla.
title: Sdang pyrkhing ki bor pulit ka Ri-Bhoi ïaki kali shuwa ka elekshon MP

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 20: Ka Joint Action Committee jong ka Local People Kynshi Hydro Power Project, hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Zandy Myrthong u ba dei u Secretary jong kane ka kynhun, ka la leit buh dorkhas hakhmat u myntri sorkar ka jylla Meghalaya u ba dei u Minister Incharge jong ka tnad Power Department jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya kata u A.T.Mondal.Katei ka Dorkhas ka dei ban pynsngew ïa ka jingsahteng jong ka Kynshi Project kaba la ïa buh ka jingïasoi soskular ne Sign Agreement hapdeng ka M/s Anthena Pvt Ltd naduh u snem 2007, ha ka por jong Mukul Sangma u ba bat kum u power minister jong ka Sorkar barim ha katei ka snem.Kane ka Committee ka la kyrpad ruh na u A.T Mondal ba un sngewbha ban khot tender thymmai ha kaba ïadei bad ka Kynshi project. Ka kynhun ka la kyntu ruh ban pynrung ïa ki trai jong ka dong ka thaiñ ban ïa don bynta lang, khnang ba ka kam kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih haba ïadei bad kane ka project. Kan long kum ka lad ïoh kam ïoh jam ïa ki khun samla jong ka dong ka thaiñ ha kum kane ka juk kaba hiran ha ka kamai kajih.
title: Sahteng ka Kynshi Hydel Power Project ha West Khasi Hills

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 20: U District Election Officer, South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat u la pynbna paidbah ba namar ka General Election sha ka Lok Sabha, 2024 da kaba bud beit bud ryntih ïa ki jingbthah jong ka Election Commission ka ri India bad khnang ba ka Elekshon kan long kaba khuid ba suba, la thaw ïa ki committee kiba kynthup ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïoh kurup pisa bad ban sngew ïa ka jingeh ki paidbah (Committee on seizure of Cash and redressal of public grievances), ka District Committee kaba peit ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynlut pynsep ha ka Elekshon (District Expenditure Monitoring Committee), ka Election Expenditure Monitoring Control Room bad ka Complaint Monitoring Centre 24X7 ha ka South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba ki paidbah ki lah ban contact ha u No: 6909461926 na ka bynta kano kano ka jingpynlut kaba ïadei bad ka elekshon.
title: La buh ïa ki Committee kiba ïadei bad ka jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih ka elekshon ha South West Khasi Hills District

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 20: Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba kdup ïa ki ar tylli ki party ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hills State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) ha ka 19 tarik u bnai Lber, 2024 ka la pynlong ka jingïalang paidbah ha Ranikor, South West Khasi Hills District ban pynshai ïa ki mat ki jura shwa ban poi ka sngi jong ka jingjied ïa ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Lok Sabha ne MP Election jong u snem 2024.Ha kane ka sngi la ïa donlang naduh u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin kum u kyrtong ïa monlang jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA), u bah Pius Marweiñ, MLA/MDC ka Ranikor Constituency bad kum u Chairman ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA), South West Khasi Hills District, u bah Metbah Lyngdoh uba dei u President Rangbah jong ka UDP, u bah K.P. Pangniang, President ba Rangbah jong ka HSPSD bad General Secretary jong ka RDA Central Body.U bah Roberjune Kharjahrin haba kren ha ka jingïalang paidbah, u la ong ba ka Jaidbynriew ka bym burom ïa la ka Riti Dustur ka long kum u Dieng khlem ki thied, namar u Dieng khlem ki thied u long uba ïap bad ka Jaidbynriew khlem ki Riti dustur ruh ka long kaba ïap. U la ong ruh ba ka jingïada ïa ki Riti dustur kam dei ka jingïania tang ha kane ka kynti hynrei ka dei ka Nongrim bad ka mat ka jura ba hakhmat eh jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA).Namarkata, u la pynshai ha ki paidbah ba ka long kaba donkam ba ban ïada ïa ka Riti Dustur da kaba pynkhlaiñ ïa ki District Council ym ban pynduh noh namar lada ki District Council ki khlaiñ ha ka bor ban thawaiñ ki riti Dustur jong ngi ruh kin ïai neh bad ki kam bei-riti kum ka jingai jaidkpa kin nym ïoh jaka.U la ong ruh ba ban ïada ïa ka Riti-Dustur ha ka jingïohi jong u, ka long ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka Khyrnit Hynriew ymdei ban pynduh ne rat dyngkhong noh ïa ka namar ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ka Khyrnit Hynriew khamtam eh ban pynïoh ïa ka bor thaw aiñ kaba thikna da kaba pynïoh ïa kata ka mynsiem jong ka Article 200 hapoh ka Khyrnit Hynriew ka dei ka jingraikut jong ka RDA khnang ba ki kam bei-riti kum ka ai jait Kpa jong u Khasi kin nym ïoh lad ha kane ka Ri.“Ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kiba la pyni ïa ka dur ka dar jong ka jinglong Rilum mynta la bun tylli ki snem, ka UDP ka la 26 snem bad ka HSPDP la palat 50 tylli ki snem bad sa ka VPP ka dei ne kam dei ngin sa ïapeit ka long kumno”, u la pynshai ba ka dei ka jingshisha ba napdeng ki seng ‘riewlum.Haba pynshai shuh shuh halor ki mar ki jura jong ka RDA, u bah Robertjune u la pynsngew ba lada ki paidbah ki mon ban jied u kum u nongmihkhmat sha ka Lok Shabha, u kular ban rah hapoh ka Dorbar Parliament ïa ki jingeh bad ki jingangnud ki paidbah, kiba kynthup ïa ka jingpyrshah CAA kaba dei kawei na ki aiñ Sorkar India kaba long ka jingma ïa ka jaitbynriew rit paid, ki aiñ kiba tehlakam ïa ka jingtih ïa ki marpoh khyndew, ki lad kamai lyngba ka khaïi-pateng bad ka Ri Bangladesh bad kiwei kiwei.Kiwei de kiba la ïadonlang ki long u Ma Lehkmen Rymbui, Nongaibuit ka Sorkar Meghalaya, MLA ka Amlarem Constituency, u bah Titos Chyne, CEM barim jong ka KHADC, Working President ka UDP Central Body, u bah Olansing Suin, MLA ka Mawsynram Constituency, u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency bad kiwei de.Ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u bah C. Nongbri ka jingkren khublei na u bah G.G. Bung Snaitang, President ka UDP South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Ban ïada ïa ki Riti dustur kam dei ka jingïa-nia hynrei ka dei ka Nongrim bad ka mat ka jura jong ka RDA: Robert

content: Jowai, Lber 20: Ka Kiang Nangbah Government College, Jowai, hynnin ka sngi 19 tarik kala pynlong ïa ka jingïakop kyntip ne ka (Quiz competition) na ka bynta ki members jong ka College’s BIS Standards Clubs.La pynlong ïa kane ka prokram shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka sngi ‘World Consumer Rights Day’, ïa kaba la mut ban pynlong haka 15 tarik u Lber 2024 hynrei la pynkynriah tarik na ki daw bym lah ban kiar.Ka jingthmu jong ka kane ka jingrakhe ka long shi bynta ban ai jingtip shaphang ka hok jong ki nongthied nongpet hapoh ka ri jong ka pyrthei hi baroh kawei lyngba ki samla pule.Ka Standards Clubs kaba dei kawei na ki rishot bah ban ai jinghikai shaphang ka hok ki nongthied ym tang hapoh ka ri bad kumjuh ïa kiba don shabar ka Ri kumjuh.Ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da ka Jessica Dkhar, ka nonghikai jong ka College, na ka liang ki member jong ka Standards Club hashwa ban sdang jong ka session ba nyngkong kila shim bynta ban ïarwai haka ktien Hindi ïa ka Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) Manak Geet.Na ka liang u Dr. Blessing Roy Suchiang, Mentor, Standards Clubs, Kiang Nangbah Government College, ula ai ki kyntien pdiang sngewbha ïa baroh kiba la poi sha kane ka prokram da kaba ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki samla pule kiba la ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka sngi.Ula ong kane ka jingïakop kyntip (Quiz Competition) ym tang ba ka long kum ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi hynrei kan ïarap shibun eh halor ka jingdonkam ban tip ïa ka hok jong ki nongthied nongpet haki ïew ki hat.Na ka liang ki samla pule ka College kila ïashim bynta da kaba ai ïa ka jingshad tynrai ban pyni ïa ka jingriewspah ka riti dustur jong ki jait bynriew Pnar.Ka Dr. Easter Meena Blah, Principal jong ka College, haka jingkren kala ong ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi ka long kaba donkam eh, da kaba ong kum ki nongthied ki dei ban tip ïa ka hok la jong kaba khlem shah ñiewbeiñ ha ki nongdie bad kan long kaba khuid ba suba hapdeng ki nongthied bad nongdie.U Shubham Sanu, uba mihkhmar na ka BIS ula baitai shaphang ka BIS, halor ka rukom treikam jong bad kiwei de ki lad treikam, ula ai jingtip shaphang u BIS Care App bad BIS Quality Connect App kyrpang sha ki samla pule, ha kane ka session ba nyngkong la ïoh ïa ki kyntien ai khublei na u Rimiki Lada Nonghuloo.Katba ha ka session ba ar la sdang ïa ka jingïakop Quiz Competition bad ki nongjop ki long kumne la wan ba nyngkong da u Hamesainkupar Shadap bad u Wanshandame Dkhar, ïa ka nam ba ar la ïoh da Because Syrti bad Ngihunlang Shadap, ka nam ba lai la ïoh da Ebakordor Iakai bad Fascilitia Myrchiang, ïa ka Consolation prize la ïoh da Laxmi Kumari bad Sujatha Nath.
title: Ban rakhe ïaka hok ki nongthied pynlong jingïakop kyntip ha Kiang Nangbah College

content: Shillong, Lber 20 : Ka tnad Mining and Geology jongka sorkar jylla ka la jied ïa ka Sutnga ha East Jaintia Hills bad ïa ka Agremggitim ha South Garo Hills ban sdang nyngkong eh ban btep noh ïa ki ‘liew tih dewiong ka ban long ruh kum Pilot Project na ka bynta kane ka kam.Na ka liang ka Committee ba la khlieh da u Justice BP Katakey ka la ai por ïa ka sorkar ban buh da ka por ban pyndep ïa kane ka projek ban btep ïa ki ‘liew tih dewiong kata ha East Jaintia, West Khasi Hills, South West Khasi Hills, West Khasi Hills bad South Garo Hills.Ha ka kaiphod ba 21 ba ka la ai sha ka ïing bishar High Court jongka jylla ka Committee ka la pynpaw ba ka sorkar jylla ka la ïatrei lang bad ka Central Mine Planning and Design Institute Limited (CMPDI), ka tnad jongka Coal India Limited ban ïarap ryngkat ki kor ki bor ban pynbha pat ïa kine ki jaka ba la dep tih dewiong.Ka jingpynkhreh ban bthep noh ïa kitei ki ‘liew tih dewiong ha Sutnga bad Agremggitim ruh ka la ïaid shakhmat.Ka CMPDI ka la ai ruh ïa ka kaiphod ba ka la pynkhreh ban pyntrei na ka bynta kitei ki ar tylli ki pilot projek ha Sutnga bd Agremggitim bad mynta ka dang pynkhreh ruh ïaka Detail Project Report (DPR) na ka bynta baroh saw tylli ki disrict bad hadien ba la dep yn sa phah sha ka Oversight Committee ban mang pisa na ka MEPRF.Ka Committee haba bishar ka la lap ruh ba ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka jingtrei ka long kaba suki bha bad kumta ka la rai ban buh da ka por ban pyndep ïa katei ka jingbtep ïa kitei ki ‘liew tih dewiong kiba wanrah ka jingma bad jingmynsaw ym tang ïa ki mrad, ki jingri hynrei wat ïa ki briew ruh kumjuh kiba sah hajan kitei ki ‘liew tih dewiong ha baroh saw tylli ki Distrct.Nalor kane ka Committee ka la ai jingmut ruh ba pynsted ban pynbha ïa ki sawdong sawkun ka mariang kaba la shah pynjot pynjulor na kane ka jingtih dewiong bad mawshun namar ka pisaka la don lypa bad ka MEPRF.
title: Na East Jaiñtia bad South Garo Hills yn sdang ban tep nyngkong ïa ki ‘liew tih dewïong

content: Shillong, Lber 20 : Ha ka step jong sngi Balang ka 20 tarik Lber 2024 ki kali kiba mut ban kiew sha Shillong bad ba hiar sha ka thaiñ Mawsynram, Ranikor, ki la sahkut lut ha Pomlum haneng Mawsynram hadien ba kawei ka trok kaba kit shini kaba hiar sha ka thaiñ Mawsynram ka la duh hapdeng surok na ka jingkheiñ u beam pyndait tyre.Na ka jingduh katei ka trok, ka la pynlong ïa kiba bun ki kali khamtam ki kali heh, naduh ki trok, bus bad ki sumo kim lait shuh ban ïaid ha kaba ki don kiba hap phai noh lait noh tang ki kali rit ki lah ban ïaid.Bad ha katei hi kajuh ka jaka, kawei pat ka kali bolero pickup kaba hiar sha ka thaiñ Mawsynram ka la sahkut ha ka nala kaba dei na ka jingthmu ban ïaid bad kiar ïa katei ka trok kaba la duh noh kham hashuwa. Kumta da ka jingsahkut katei ka bolero pickup ka la nang wanrah shuh shuh ka jingsahkut ki kali bad hadien la wan ban tan noh da ka kali khwai.Hadien ba la tan da ka kali khwai ïa katei ka pickup, ki nongñiah kali ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki pulit, ki la thep bad pyndap da ki maw ïa ka nala tang ban ïoh ïaid ki kali rit.
title: Syrtok ka leit ka wan ki paidbah sha ka thaiñ Mawsynram ba duh ka trok kit shini hapdeng surok

content: Khliehriat Lber 20: Ha ka jingïalang paidbah jong ka party National People’s Party ba la pynlong mynta ka sngi ha Communty Hall Khliehriat West, u Symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla, u bah Sñiawbhalang Dhar bad u MLA jong ka Jowai, u bah Wailadmiki Shylla, ki la ther ïa ka party Voice of the People Party (VPP) bad kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban shah ïalam bakla bad kim dei ban shah pynbiej “ong kiba stad ba ka VPP kam bam sap hynrei ka don ka sap ban bam, wat shah pynbiej wat shah ïalam bakla”, u kynthoh ruh ba u Prah u pynlong jingïalang bad heh ktien tang ha ki jaka ïew namar lada khot ha madan ym don briew ba wanU Ma Sñiawbhalang Dhar, u la ong ruh ba “ki kren tang ïa ka bam sap, lada ngi bam sap ujor da ka ejahar lada phi lap ba ngi bam sap ma ngi” u la kynthoh ruh ïa ka jingpynkhih ïa ka Reservation Policy bad ong ba kane ka la long pynban kumba pynkhih ïa ka ksing ngap, kumjuh ruh ka jingpyrshah ïa ka ktien hindi bad ong ba ha Parliament lei baroh san snem ki kren beit da ka ktien hindi.U la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ban jied ïa ka Dr Mazel Ampareen ban leit mihkhmat sha Delhi namar ki don bun ki kam pynroi ki ban wan na ka sorkar pdeng na Delhi bad ong ruh ba dei tang ka party NPP kaba ïaid shakhmat bha mynta khamtam ha ki kam pynroi.Ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ka kyrtong MP na ka party NPP, haba kren ha ka jingïalang ka la ong ba kan leit ban bsuh sha ka ïing dorbar Parliamant lyngba ka jingkhang ïit kaba rit namar ban rung na ki jingkhang heh kam i long shuh, namar na ka jingkhang ba heh ha Parliament ki la don ki ar ngut ki radbah kata ka BJP bad ka Congress ki bym ju ïahap jingmut “kumta ngan rung lyngba ka jingkhangïit ha ka ophis u myntri rangbah duh jong ka ri bad ki myntri baroh ban ong ïa ki, ba ngi dei ki khun khasi Jaiñtia, ban wad lynti ban pynkhraw lem ïa ka jaidbnriew”“Ngam kwah ban don ha ka party kaba ïakren tang ïa ka kyrteng u President, nga ai khublei ïa ka NPP ba ka khlem pynjah kyrteng ïa nga, kumjuh ruh ki paidbah, phi khlem kynmaw tang ïa u President, ngam don ksiar rupa ban ai bad ym donkam ïa kata, nga kular tang ka jingtrei shitom ka ba ngan ai ha baroh ki por bad ai ba ka por kan batai, kumba phi kren beiñ ïa nga, phi tim da ka sih ka sang ha ki social media ka mymsiem jong nga ka kthang hynrei ka jingmut jong nga ka nang skhem ba ngan ïeng bad kiew bad ngan trei shitom namar khlem ka jingtrei shitom kam poi shano shano ruh” ka la bynrap.Ka la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban da ïa pyrkhat sani bha ïa kane ka kam bad ka ngeit ruh ba kane ka jingithuh ka party NPP ban pynkhamti ha ka kum ka longkmie ban shim ïa kane ka kam kaba khia ka dei ka ka jingsdang kaba thymmai, ka la ong ruh ba 33 percent ki longkmie kin ïoh ban ïuhkjat ha Assemby bad ha Parliament naduh u snem 2028, ka kyntu ïa ki longmie ban pynkhreh bad pynkhlaiñ ïalade, kumjuh ruh ki long kpa, ki khun samla ban ïarap lem ïa ki longkmie ki ban don bynta lang ha ka saiñ pyrthei kum ki lai tylli ki maw byrsiew, u kpa kum u khlieh ka ïing.Ha kajuh ka por, ka la khot bad wer lang ruh ïa ka party UDP ban wan ban ïakyrshan lem lada ka sngew ba ka i donkam ban ïatreilang, namar ka UDP ruh ka dei ka ba don lang ha ka sokar synrop, namar ha kane ka jingïaleh MP la dei shisha ba ïa treilang ym dei shuh ban ïa peit party “ngam ju leh shiliang ïa ka UDP nga la iarap ïa ka Khliehriat CHC, ka pisa kaba T16 klur nga la pynïoh ïa ka CHC Khliehriat kaba dei ka constituency ba jop ka UDP, ngam shun ïa ka UDP to ngin ïa trei lang, ngan leh katba nga lah nga tyrwa ïa kane ka jingïatreilang kane ka dei ka bynta ban ïatreilang” ka la bynrap.“Nga la ïarap ia ka Khliehriat CHC ka constituency ba jop ka UDP to ngin ïa trei lang, ngan leh katba nga lah nga tyrwa ïa kane ka jingïatreilang kane ka dei ka bynta ban ïatreilang namar lada ngi pharia ïa ka vote jong khasi bad Jaiñtia lada ngi saphred ngin khyllem , phi la ïohi ïa ka jingkloi jong nga ban ïarap ha kano kano ka bynta ba nga trei” la bynrap.Ka Dr Ampareen ka la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingbym sngewtynnad ïa ki policy pyntreikam jong ka sorkar BJP kaba pyrshang ban bret ïa ngi ki rit paid bad bynrap ba ka la wan ban rung sha kane ka party NPP ha ka por kaba biang “Tang namar ba ki ïadur ki ar ngut ki rad bah ha ka Parliament ma ngi ki rit paid ngim dei ban shu jah noh, ki dei ban kynmaw ïa ngi bad nga sngewkmen ba kane ka party ka la ibit ïa nga ba ngan shim ïa kata ka bynta ban rung lyngba kane ka jingkhangïit ban rung ha ka ophis u myntri rangbah duh ka ri bad ki myntri baroh ban ong ïa ki ba ngi dei ki khun khasi Jaiñtia ”“Lada ka ktien beiñ ha kano kano ka rynsan lane ha social media ne ha ki pathai khubor, lada ka lah ban pyniap ïa nga nga la dei ban mih phlang naduh mynno, hynrei nga ïeng skhem ban ong ba ngan nym reij ïa ki jingshah kren beiñ hynrei nga ïeng skhem bad ngan trei shitom, haba la ai ïa nga ka lad ka lynti ba ngan mihkhmat na ki 36 tylli ki constituency kiba long kum shi para”U MLA jong ka Jowai Constituency, u bah Wailadmiki Shylla, u la ther ïa ka VPP bad ong ruh ym don kawei ka mat ïakhih jong ki ka ban poi thong kum ka jingïakhih Reservation policy, ka Lokayukta, ka Clean Politic ym don kawei ruh ban pyndep hynrei la shu ïaid nawei sha wei, u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba ka donkam ban da shai bha ym dei ban shu shah pynbiej “kiba kam ba ki dei party ba thymmai tangba haba peit ki nongïalam ki dei kijuh hi” u la bynrap.Utei u MLA na Jowai, u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ban kyrshan ïa ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ha kane ka election MP sha ka Loksabha ka ban kren ïa ki kam pynroi ha ka dorbar Parlaiment ha Delhi, namar kiba bun ki kam pynroi ki wan na ka sorkar pdeng na Delhi, kum ka skim sam um, ka JJM, ka skim shna ïing bad kiwei kiwei ki skim pynroi. Kumjuh ruh ban shna ïa ki surok bah national highway ka dei ka sorkar pdeng kaba peit ïa kine.Ka MLA jong ka Sutnga Saipung constituency, ka kong Santa Mary Shylla, ka kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh namar kumba ma ka ruh ka pynrem ïa u bah Vincent Pala uba dei u MP ka ngeit ruh ba ka kong Ampareen kan pynrem ïa u bah Vincent Pala uba na ka party Congress ha kane ka kynti ruh bad ong ruh ba ka kong Ampareen kan kren ruh ïa ki jingeh jong ki long kmie namar ba ka dei ka longkmie kaba pher bha, kaba shim khia bha ïa ki kam, kaba kloi ban shim khia haba don kano kano ka jingeh.Ha kane ka jingïalang ha Khliehriat la ïa don ryngkat lang ruh u bah Nehlang Lyngdoh, u MLA ba rim ka Khliehriat, u bah Justine Dkhar, ki MDC, ki riew rangbah, ki longkmie, long kpa, ki khun samla kynthei bad shynrang kiba na ka thaiñ East Jaiñtia Hills District.Haba kren ha ka jingialap elekshon ha Jalaphet, East Jaintia Hills ryngkat bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Sniawbhalang Dhar, ka kong Ampareen kala ong “Ngan trei ryngkat bad ki Dolloi bad ki Waheh Chnong ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingeh ka jongki bad ban rah hapoh ka Parliament”.Ka Kong Ampareen kala leit ruh ban ïakynduh ia ki nongïalam jongka NPP Sutnga Saipung Block.“Nga pynpaw ka jngsngewnguh ïa ka seng kaba la jied iïa ka longkmie bad ïa ki paidbah kiba la jied ïa MLA kynthei na Saipung Constituency ban pynpaw ïa ka sur jongu paidbah hapoh ka ïing dorbar thawaiñ ka jylla” kala ong bad ka bynrap ba ka NPP kala ai bynta bha ïa ki kynthei ban long ki nongïalam na ka bynta ban shimkhia ïa ki jingeh kiba mad da ki paidbah ka jylla.“Ka la dei ka por ïa ki paidbah jongka Sutnga Saipung ban jied sa ïaka longkmie ba kan long ka MP ka jongki”.U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ula pynshai ba ka jingjied ka NPP ban pynïeng da ka kynthei ha ka elekshon MP kadei namar ba ka dei ka kmie kaba don jingkitkhlieh ym tang ïala ka ïing hynrei ia ka constituency ruh baroh kawei.Ula kynthoh ruh ïa ka seng VPP kaba pyrshang ban kynnoh ba ka sorkar MDA kadei kaba bamsap bad ula ong, “Lada ki jngkynnoh ki long kiba shisha, balei pat ki paidbah ki dang shaniah bad ai jingkyrshan biang ïa ka NPP ban synshar biang”.Ula ong ba ka Dr. Ampareen ka dei ka kyrtong kaba biang tam ban mihkhmat ïa ka Shillong ha ka Lok Sabha bad ula pynpaw ba kan mihkhmat na ka bynta ka jingangnud jong ki lak ngut ki paidbah jong ka constituency.
title: Ngan bsuh lyngba la jingkhangïit kaba rit ban leit sha Parliament ban kren na ka bynta ki khasi,ki Jaiñtia : Dr M.Ampareen Lyngdoh

content: Shillong, Lber 20: Ka Interim Report ba la aiti da ka Single Member Committee hapoh ka ïingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la pyntip ba kam shym la don satia kano kano ka jingïap ne jingmynsaw jong ki nongtih par dewïong ha shnong Murïap, kaba hab ha East Jaiñtia Hills.Katkum ka jingmih kot khubor la kynnoh ba lai ngut ki nongtih mar kila ïap bad 12 ngut kila mynsaw ha ka jingtwa ka par dewïong ha Murïap, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Halor kane, ka Single Member Committee ka la kyrpad ïa u Deputy Commissioner ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ban aiti ïa ka kaiphod.Halor kane, u Deputy Commissioner ula bthah ïa u Superintendent of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit.“Ka kaiphod ba 16/02/2024 ba la aiti da u Superintendent of Police sha u Deputy Commissioner ka pyntip ba ym shym la lap ïa kano kano ka jingjia ha ka por ba pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit ba la khlieh da u O/C ka Saipung Police Station,” ong ka Committee ha ka interim report ba 21.
title: Ym shym don ba ïap kiba tih dewïong ha shnong Murïap

content: Nongpoh, Lber 20: Watla u President ba rangbah ka UDP ha Ri-Bhoi District, u Bah Donbok Khymdeit u ba la resaiñ noh naka party um shym la kren ne pynpaw eiei sha kano ka party ban pynïasoh hadien ba ma u lem bad ki nongïalam ka UDP ha Ri-Bhoi kila resaiñ noh mynta ka sngi kum ki nongkitkam ka party, hynrei ka lyer ka beh ba kitei ki nongïalam bala resaiñ naka party UDP kin sa leit ban pynïasoh bad ka NPP kaba dei ka party ba synshar haka jylla.Kane ka jingmih noh jong ki nongïalam ba hakhmat ka party UDP ha Ri-Bhoi lehse kan ktah shibun bad wanrah ka jingkylla ha kane ka elekshon MP khamtam ïa u kyrtong MP bala pynïeng da ka kynhun synrop jong ki seng riewlum ka Regional Democratic Alliance.Kum ban shu pynpaw hangne ba ka kong Rona Khymdeit kaba dei ka MDC barim ka Nongpoh kaba lamih naka seng UDP kaba la leit ruh ban pynïasoh bad ka seng Congress shuwa ka elekshon MLA kaba dep, mynta ka kynti kala rai ban pynïasoh noh bad ka party NPP ban sa pdiang burom haka 22 tarik mynta u bnai ha Nongpoh.Kumba u nonglum khubor u la bna ruh ba kin dang bun kiwei pat ki nongïalam ki ban sa pynïasoh bad ka NPP ha kine ki sngi ban wan, kane kan dang pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïaka party NPP na Ri-Bhoi District shuwa ka elekshon MP ka ban sa long ha u bnai ïaiong mynta u snem, watla kiwei kiwei ki kyrtong na kiwei ki party ruh ki dang ïaleh shaid shaid ban pan ka jingkyrshan naki paidbah.
title: Her ka lyer pynïasoh NPP ki nongïalam bala resaiñ naka UDP ha Ri-Bhoi

content: Shillong, Lber, 20: Ki Pulit jong ka kynhun Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) East Khasi Hills District ba la lamkhmat da ka Kong Sandra Nongdhar, MPS, hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ha ka sngi Balang ki la ïohkem ïa ki arngut ki snar khaii drok na ka shong Happy Valley, Shillong kaba hap hapoh ka Madanryting Police Station.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi, ki arngut ki snar khaii drok ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Joshua Khiangte Tripura uba la 36 snem ka rta na uba na ka nongbah Aizawl, Mizoram bad uba sah mynta ha ka shnong Damchhara, Tripura. Katba uwei pat u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Joel Tripura uba la 29 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Kachharichara, Damchhara, North Tripura.Na kine ki arngut ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 11 tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba don ïa u drok Heroin uba khia 139.98 gram, kawei ka Aadhar Card, kawei ka PAN Card, kawei ka Mobile Phone bad kawei ka kali Tata Sumo kaba don ïa u nombar ML 05 N 0515. Ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: Na Happy Valley shah kem arngut ki snar khaïi, kurup ki Pulit 139.98 gram u drok

content: Shillong, Lber, 20: Shwa ba ka Jylla Meghalaya kan leit sha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Ïaiong, 2024, ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la ïakynduh mawsiang hadien ba ki nongïalam bahakhmat na Ri Bhoi District ki la shim ïa ka rai ban dkhat noh ïa ka jingïadei kam bad ka party.Kane kan long ka jingduhnong kaba khraw haduh katta katta khamtam eh ïa ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba la sei da u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin ban pynïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Seat ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, ïaïong mynta u snem.Ki nongïalam ba hakhmat eh ka UDP ha Ri Bhoi kiba la rai ban mih noh na ka UDP ki kynthup naduh u President ka District u Bah Donbok Khymdeit uba long ruh u Working President jong ka UDP Central Body, Bah Raphael Massar Chief Adviser UDP Ri Bhoi District, Bah Rangkynsai R Makdoh Adviser UDP Ri Bhoi District, Kong Queen Mary Rymbai Jt. Secretary UDP Women’s Wing State, Bah Biolkingstar Tmung Auditor UDP Ri Bhoi District, Bah Watson Kharkrang President UDP YW Umsning Circle, Bah Jeffrey Khymdeit Jt. Secretary UDP YW State, Bah Prosper Dorphang Secretary UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Rajes Lapang Working President UDP YW, Ri Bhoi District, Bah Richard Moksha Vice President UDP YW, Ri Bhoi District, Bah Kitdorius Dkhar Vice President UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Johny Marbaniang Finance Secretary UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Pril Sten Sports Secretary UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Moonstar Jaraiñ Asst Secretary Sports Secretary UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Bishno Roy Dillar – E/C member UDP Ri Bhoi District bad ki Executive Member ka UDP Youth Wing Ribhoi ba kynthup ïa u Bah Henry Mukhim, Bah Ribor Makdoh, Bah Kyrshan Lyngdoh, Bah Seibor Nongphlang, Bah Elevenson Makdoh bad ki dkhot ba kynthup ïa u Bah K. Wonderful Khymdeit, Bah Ng. Rolling Mangu, Bah Browel Makdoh, Bah Wolman Sujai, Bah Billingstar Sylliang, Bah Kiswel Langi, Bah Lukas Lyngdoh, Bah Hetsing Lymphuid, Bah Bransis Shadap, Bah Wanphrang Shadap, Bah Shlur Khymdeit.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang, u Bah Donbok Khymdeit u la ïathuh ba naduh kane ka sngi kim don jingïadei eiei shuh bad ka UDP bad kane ka jingshim rai ban iehnoh ïa ka UDP kam don kano kano ka jingpyrshah ïa ka party bad ka dei ka mon jong ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot.
title: Pra phum ka ktem UDP ha Ri Bhoi shwa ka elekshon MP, resaiñ lut ki nongïalam

content: Shillong, Lber 20 : Ka National People’s Party (NPP) ha ka sngi Balang ka la khyrwit kylla ïa ka Voice of the People’s Party (VPP) da kaba ong ba ka jingkynnoh jong ka VPP ka dei kaba khlem nongrim bad kaba la shu kren bad kynthoh da kaba shu mutdur khlem kano kano ka jingshisha.“Ka party ka kwah ban pynshai ba ka jingkynthoh da u nongai ktien ka VPP lyngba ki lad pathai khubor kadei tang ka jingkren shu mutdur khlem kino kino ki jingshisha,” ong u Nongai Ktien ka NPP, Meghalaya Bah HM Shangpliang ha ka kyrwoh.Shuh shuh ka kyrwoh ka ong ba ka NPP ka jop ha ka elekshon MLA ha u 2023 dei na ka jingkyrshan borbah ki paidbah ka jylla da kaba peit ïa ki kam pynroi kiba ka Party ka la leh ha kine ki san snem, kata naduh u 2018 – 2023.“Mynta ka NPP ka khie rasong dei na ka jingkyrshan jong ki paidbah namar ka nud ban tur bad ïakhun ïa ki ishu kiba la sahteng la slem jong ka jylla ïa kiba la shu ieh shrah kumto. Bad ka party kam shym la heh tang ka nia ban pynbiej ïa ki paidbah,” la bynrap shuh shuh.La ong ruh ba ka NPP ka trei shitom khnang ba kan ïoh khur ïa ka jingjop kaba donburom ha baroh ar tylli ki parliamentary seat kata ha Shillong bad Tura ha kane ka elekshon MP kaban sa long shen ha ka 19tarik u Ïaiong mynta u snem. Ka kyrwoh na ka party ka ong ruh ba ka party kan ïai bteng ban trei na ka bynta ka roi ka pa jong ki paidbah bad ban pynkylla dur ïa ka jylla sha kaba kham bha.
title: La shu kren da kaba shu mutdur, kynthoh kylla sa ka NPP ïa ka VPP
