content: Hadien ba la mih ki khubor ïa ka jingud bad jingbynñiaw ki khynnah kiba ïaleh ïa ka eksamin SSLC 2024 khamtam ïa ka sobjek Social Sciences kaba dei ha ka sngi ba la kut artad ka eksamin kaba la long ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai ngi ïohi ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ki bor pynïaid jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) lyngba u Controller of Examination u la pynshai bad ïathuh ba ka daw jong ka jingshem jingeh jong ki khynnah kiba ïaleh ïa ka SSLC Exam 2024 ha ka Social Sciences ka dei namar ba don katto katne ki skul kim bym shym la pynthymmai ïa ki kot pule thymmai jong ki, kata,ki don ki skul kiba dang hikai da ki kot ki barim.Kum kane ka jingpynshai na ki bor pynïaid ka MBoSE ka dei ka bym lah satia ban pdiang bad ka la nang paw penryngkew shuh shuh ban ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah bym tip eiei. Ka paw pynban ki kam torti jong kane ka bor pynïaid eksamin ba pawnam tam ha Meghalaya.Ka eksamin SSLC 2024 ka dei ka samoi pule (session) jong ki khynnah Class-X jong u snem 2023 tangba ka eksamin jong ki pat ka MBOSE ka pynïaleh ïa ki ha u snem 2024.Ka jingpynkylla kot thymmai ha ki skul, ka MBoSE ka la pynmih kyrkieh dang ha ki bnai January-February 2024 shi taiew ne ar taiew eiei shwa ban plie skul jong u snem 2024. Ki Class-X kiba pule ha u snem 2024 ki dang pule da ki kot pule kiba rim. Kumno kin pule ïa ki kot thymmai ha u snem 2023 haba ki kot thymmai ki sdang pynthymmai ha u snem 2024?Ki khynnah skul, ki kmie ki kpa, ki paidbah ki tip bha ba mynta u snem 2024, wat hadien shi taiew ar taiew ba la sdang ban long skul ruh bun ki khynnah skul kim pat ïoh kot pule satia ban thied na iew namarba pynkylla thymmai ka MBoSE ïa ki kot thymmai. Don ruh katto katne ki kmie ki kpa kiba ïathuh ba wat haduh mynta ruh, dang don sa iwei ar ki kot pule kiba kim pat ïoh satia ban thied namarba kim don ha dukan die kot.Ban ong ba dei ba don ki skul kiba khlem pynthymmai ïa ki kot pule ha u snem 2023, shi snem shwa ban pynmih kot thymmai ka long kaba sngew sammut palat. Wat ki khynnah bad ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah ruh kim lah pdiang satia ïa kum kine ki jingpynshai. Hato, ki kmie ki kpa bad ki paidbah ki sngew ïahap ïa kata? Wat kiba kham duna ka jingtip ïa nga- ïa phi ruh, kim lah ngeit satia ïa kum kata ka jingpynshai.Ha ka jingshisha, ka MBoSE ka dei ban jubab hok ba lada don shisha ki jingbakla hangne hangtai, ka dei ban pyrkhat ban ïarap da kino kino ki lad katba ka sngew dei ban leh, ym dei pat ban shu darapjot ba paw pewryngkew pynban ki kam torti jong ka bad kam dei ban ïalehkai ïa ka lawei bad ka ïap ka im jong ki khynnah pule.Ban tap eit miaw ïa la ka iwtung, kam dei satia ïa ki bor pynïaid eksamin ba donburom kum ka MBoSE.Kumno ki kmie ki kpa, ki sengbhalang bapher bapher ki sngew halor kane ka kam kaba ktah shisha ïa ka lawei ka jingpule ki khynnah bapli? Hato, sngew dei hi ban shu phah ne ai ka jingkitbok jingrwiang shwa ban long eksamin katba ynda ïa kynduh jingeh pat ki khynnah ngin shu ïa khaprip ngaiñ ngaiñ?Lada ki khun jong phi ki phiel ei shi snem, khlem pyrkhat lem katno ka jingduh jong ki? Ynnai ïakren ïa ka bai skul, bai kot, bai kali, bad kiwei kiwei ba phi la pynlut ha ka shisnem. Hynrei kaba kham shyrkhei eh dei ka jinghiar jong ki ïa ka jingïoh mark ha ka Social Sciences mynta u snem. Ha ka jaka ba kin ïoh First Division, ki khun jong phi kin poi noh tang ha ka Mark jong ka kyrdan 2nd ne 3rd Division. Don pat ki ban pass tang san (5) sobjek. Dei hangne ba ka ktah ïa ka lawei jong ki khamtam kiba kwah pule shabar ne ha ki skul ne College ba kham paw.
title: Sdang ïalam bakla ki bor pynïaid ka MBoSE halor ka Exam SSLC 2024

content: Shillong, Lber 20: Ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la ong ba ki nongïalam saiñ pyrthei ne ki kaitor kiba donkti ha ka ban pyrshang ban khroh ïa ki jingkyrshan na ka bynta ki kyrtong ha kine ki por ilekshon ka la pynlong ïa ka party ban pynkhuid bad ban lap ïa kiba lah ban shaniah kumba jaw ka um na u filter.“Lada pyrkhat ha kawei pat ka liang kane ka la ïarap ïa ngi ban pynlah ban pynkhuid ne filter bad peit lyngba ki jinglong jong bun ki briew kiba donkti bad shisien ba phi la don kaei kaei kum ka ilekshon sha Parliament bad ki briew ki kynriah liang hangta phin ïohi ïa ki rong ba shisha bad kane ka ïarap ïa ngi ban tip shisha ïa kino kiba lah ban shaniah bad kino kiba shu pynkylla rong tang da ka jingmut ban ïoh ki jingmyntoi shimet,” ong u Myntri ka Sorkar jylla u ba long ruh u working president ka UDP, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor.Halor kane u la ong ba hadien ba u la ïohi ba ki la don ki nongïalam ka UDP na Nongpoh constituency kiba la pynlong jingïalang bad ka kyrtong ka NPP ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad kiba la rung ruh sha ka NPP.Da kaba kynthoh ba kane ka dei kaei kaei kaba ju long bad ka routine hapoh ki saiñ pyrthei u la ong, “Haba wan ki election bun ki kaitor saiñ pyrthei ki long kiba treikam bha bad kiba trei kam kham bha shuh shuh, kumta kam don kaei kaei kaba sngewphylla hynrei ha kaba kut ka sngi ki briew ki thep vote halor ka jingkheiñ lade bad ka jingpeit ïa ki jinglah bad ki kam jong u ne ka kyrtong bad ka seng kaba ki mih ban ïakhun ia ka ilekshon”.“Kum kine ki kaitor saiñ pyrthei kim lah ban wanrah than ïa ka jingkylla bad kin ym lah ruh ban don ha kata ka kyrdan ban long pdeng ban ïashah ne ban pyrshah ïa u ne kano ka kyrtong,” u la bynrap.
title: Bun ki kaitor saiñ pyrthei kiba khroh vote, hynrei khatduh dei ki paidbah kiba shim jingkheiñ: Paul

content: Shillong, Lber 20 : Ka National People’s Party (NPP) ka la sdang nyngkong eh na constituency u CEM ka KHADC, Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ban pynshai paidbah ïa ka nongrim jong ka party na bynta ka elekshon MP kaban sa long ha ka 19tarik u Ïaiong mynta u snem.Ha katei ka jingïalang ïalap elekshon kaba long ha kane ka sngi Nyngkong ki paidbah na kylleng ki shnong jong ka Mawryngkneng constituency ki la lum lang khrui ha Iing Dorbar Shnong Umpling ban ïoh sngew markhmat ïa ka jingpynshai mat elekshon na ki nongïalam ka party khamtam na ka kyrtong, Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh.Nalor u Bah Pynïaid ba dei ruh u MLA barim bad MDC ba mynta la don lang ruh u Working President Bah Hamlet Dohling kumjuh u Spokeperson ka party, Bah HM Shangpliang, Bah Gavin Mylliem MLA, Bah Fantin, Bah Kit Nongrem, Bah Embhah,Bah Kimfa, Bah Allan nalor ka jingdonlang ki katto katne ki nongïalam shnong.Ha kane ka sngi, ki nongïalam ka party ki la pynshai ruh halor ka jingmih ki jingkynnoh bad ki jingkynthoh khlem nongrim jong kiwei ki seng saiñpyrthei ïa ka NPP.Na ka liang u Bah Pynïaid haba kren ha ka jingïalang u la pynkynmaw ba kum u MLA ba ïoh ban mihkhmat kumba shisnem tam u la ïohi da lade ba ka Mawryngkneng constituency ka dang donkam bun bha ka roi ka par la ka long ha ki shnong ki thaw haduh ki longiing longsem.“Kan dei ruh ka burom ïa ka Jaidbynriew Khasi kaba ñiewkor ïa ki kynthei lada i Kong Ampareen lyngba ka jingkyrshan jong phi in ïoh ban poi sha Iing Dorbar Parliament. Kane kan pynsuk ruh ïa i ban rah ïa ki ishu bapher bapher ha Parliament namar i la dei lypa i briew iba la ih bha ha ka saiñpythei kum ka MLA bad kum ka Minister la bun sien bad khamtam ba i don ha ka sorkar.” u la ong.Na ka liang u Bah Pynïaid u la kyntu ruh ïa ka kyrtong MP ban ïa khun lem na ka bynta ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka Khyrnit kaba Hynriew kaba don mynta ha ka jingpynbeit ha Delhi bad ruh ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba Phra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri.Na ka liang ka kyrtong pat ka la ong ba ka sngewkmen ba kane kadei ka sien kaba nyngkong ba ka Shillong seat ka la phah da ka longkmie kum ka kyrtong MP.“Kum ka longkmie nga don shibun ka jingkitkhlieh bad sngewthuh bha ïa ka khia ka shon bad ki jingeh ba ki kynthei bad ki longiing longsem ki kynduh man ka sngi kumjuh ia ki longiing ba duk, bad khamtam eh na ka bynta ka jingeh ki nongrep jongngi,” ka la ong da kaba bynrap ba dei na kane ka daw ka buh hakhmat ba ynda ka la jop kan ïakhun kyrpang hapoh Parliament ban ïa kren ïa kiba bun ki mat kiba ïadei bad ki longkmie bad ruh ki riewkynthei.Kum ka kyrtong ka la ong ruh ba kane kadei ka kabu ksiar na bynta ki nongthep vote jong ka Shillong Parliamentary seat ban ïatrei lang khnang ba ka NPP kan poi sha ka thong ha kane ka elekshon MP.
title: Kan dei ka burom ïa ka Jaidbynriew lada mihkhmat ka longkmie sha Parliament : Bah Pynïaid

content: Shillong, Lber 20: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat ki Kam Pohïing u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la kyrpad ïa ka seng Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ban sha ka meij jingïakren naba ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh pura ban shim kam pyrshah ïa kano kano kaba long shalyndet jong u pud u sam ka aiñ.Kane ka jingkren jong u ka la wan hadien ba ka HNLC ka la kam bad shim ka jingkitkhlieh halor ka jingjia pynbthei bom IED ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai kaba la jia hapoh ka Them ïew Mawlong bad kaba la ai por ruh shibnai ïa ka sorkar ba kan pynkynriah noh ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïng napoh ka Sweepers’ Colony.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang, u Bah Tynsong u la ong ba um kwah ban kynthoh halor ka jingkren jong ka HNLC hynrei ym duna ïa ka 3-4 snem mynta ba kane ka kam pynkynriah ïa ki Harijan ka dang dei hapoh ka jingpyrkhat kaba kongsan jong ka sorkar.“Ym tang kumta, ngi la pyrshang shitom ban poi sha ka jingshim rai artat kaba khatduh ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam,” ula ong.U Bah Tynsong u la ïathuh ba ki la don bun ki jingïalang bad ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC). “Ha ka jingshisha, mynta, kane ka kam ka dangsah hapoh ka ïingkashari Meghalaya High Court. Ka dang sah ha ka jingshim rai jong ka ïingkashari High Court naba ki dang ap ïa ka jingïalang kaba khatduh hapdeng ka sorkar bad ka HPC,”u la ong da kaba bynrap, “Ha ka jingshisha, ngi la dep kyrpad ïa ki dkhot jong ka HPC ba kin pynpaw ïa ka por, ka tarik na ka bynta ka jingïalang ba ngin ïakynduh. Ym tang ka jingïalang ha ka jingshisha ka High Court ka la dep kdew ba dei ban pyndep noh ïa kane ka kam kham kloi katba lah bad lada ym lah, ka ïingkashari kan sa leh ïa ka kam dalade.”“Namar kata, nga khmih lynti ba shen, ngin sa lah ban shong biang bad ka HPC bad shisien ba la dep, ngin sa lah ban poi sha ka jingshim rai kaba khatduh,” u la bynrap.Halor ka jingjia pynbthei bom u la ong ba u la bthah ïa ki pulit ba kum kane ka jingjia kaba la jia kam dei shuh ban bteng bad kino kino ki runar kiba donkti kidei ban shah kem kumba la leh ïa kiwei bad mynta ïa kitei kiba la shahkem ki dang shah tohkit, “Ngam lah ban pynpaw lut ïa baroh ki jingtip sha phi hynrei nga pynthikna ïa ki nongshong shnong ka jylla, na kin long kiba ïoh ki lad jingïada bad ki pulit kin ym thiah bad ngi pynthikna ba kito kiba don ka jingkitkhlieh kin shah kem bad shah pynshitom katkum ka aiñ,” u la ong.
title: Kyrpad u Dy. CM ïa ka HNLC ban wan phai biang sha ka miej jingïakren

content: Shillong, Lber, 20: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la kren diaw mynsiem halor ka jingbym kitkhia ki Politishian kiba don ha ka bor ban pynïaid ïa ka synshar ka khaddar ban pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019 bad ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rules, 2024 kaba ktah ïa ka jinglong kyrpang jong ki jaidbynriew rit paid ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya bad ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi jong ka ri India.U General Secretary ka KSU samla Donald V. Thabah ha ka jingïakren ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang u la ong, “kam don ka jingshimkhia jong ki briew kiba don ha ka bor ban pynïaid ïa ka synshar ka khaddar hynrei lada ngi peit ïa kiwei kiwei ki jaitbynreiw lada ka ïadei bad ki ishu jong ki jaidbynriew ki mih shakhmat. Ngi ïohi ba ki jaidbynriew Bodo ki ïakhih ban dawa ïa ka Bodo Territorial Council (BTC) bad ban dawa ban pynrung ka ktien Bodo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra, wat ki MP Bodo ruh ki la pynlong da ka jingïakhih hakhmat ka Parliament.”“Ngi ïohi ïa ka jingkulmar khappud hapdeng ka jylla Mizoram bad ka jylla Assam, ki MLA jong ka Mizoram khlem da khein ïa ka Liang Synshar ne ka Liang Pyrshah ki hiar sha khappud hynrei lada don kino kino ki huri hura bad ki jingjia ha khappud, ki politishian jong ngi ki shu kut tang ha ka ktien, ki shu kren tang ha rynsan ïalap elekshon,” la kynthoh une u nongïalam ka KSU.“Ngi ju ïohi ruh ba wat ha ki rynsan ïalap elekshon kim ju kren hynrei ki kren pynban ïa kaei kaei kaba ki shu ïakynthoh bad kren bein iwei ïa iwei. Kane ka long kum ka jingpang kaba ktah bha ïa ka jaidbynriew jong ngi namarba ki nongïalam jong ngi kim don ïa ka jingkhlieh bad ka jingïohi jngai ba kin leh eiei khnang ba ka jaidbynriew jong ngi kan ïai neh ha ka snap ba kyrpang jong ka, kaba ngi la long trai ha la ka jong ka khyndew ka shyiap la bun spah snem,” ong u samla Thabah.“Ka KSU, namar ka jingbym shimkhia bad ka jingbym lah jong ki nongïalam bad ki nongmihkmat jong ka jylla, kam banse ban ïatreilang bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun ban mih shakhmat ban ïaleh pateng la pateng bad ka KSU kan ïai ïakhun ban ïoh ïa ka jingdawa jong ka seng tad haduh ban da ïoh ïa ki jingdawa,” la pynpaw une u nongïalam ka KSU.U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) ka la shong jingïalang naduh u 2019 bad pynlong ruh ïa ki jingpakhang shnong, ki jingthang tyngshop ban pyrshah ïa ka jingwanrah ka Sorkar India ban pynbeit thymmai ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Bill, 2019 bad ha une ujuh u snem ka NESO ka la ujor ha Ingbishar Supreme Court ban dawa ban dei ban pynduh pyndam noh ïa ka CAB.“Ka don ka jingshong bishar shisien bad hynnin ka sngi ka la don biang hynrei ngi sngewkmen khyndiat ba ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la phiah noh ar bynta ïa ki 327 tylli ki jingujor, kata, ïa ki jingujor na ki jylla Rithor la ka jong ka jingujor na ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi la ka jong.“Ngi hun ba ngi ïohi ïa ka jingbishar namarba ha ka por ba la wanrah ïa ka CAB ngi la sdang nyngkong eh na kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ïa ka jingïakhih kaba jur bad ynda la mynjur ïa ka CAA, 2019 ka jingïakhih ka la pur sha Rithor,” la pynkynmaw shuh shuh u samla Thabah bad bynrap, “ngi ïohi ruh ba ïa ki jingïakhih ba la pynlong ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka duna bha ka jingpathai khubor na Rithor bad nabar ri katba ynda pynlong ki jingïakhih sha Rithor wat ki lad pathai khubor nabar ri ki shimkhia bha.”Haba ïathuh ïa ka jingïapher ka jingdawa sha Rithor bad ka jingdawa ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi samla Thabah u la ong, “ka jingïakhih jong ki (sha Ri thor) ka ïapher na ka jingdawa jong ngi bad ka jingtip jong ki briew shaphang ka daw tynrai ka jingïakhih jong ngi ka jah noh bad ka pynlong ba yn ym don batip ba ngi sdang ma ngi bad ki peit beit tang sha Rithor. Ka jingïakhih sha Rithor ka long ba kane ka aiñ kam long Secular namarba ha ka aiñ ym shym la kynthup lang ïa kiba na ka niam Muslim kum kita kiba shah banbeiñ ha ka kyrteng ka niam kiba wan na ka ri Pakistan, Afghanistan bad Bangladesh.”“Ki don ruh ha Rithor kiba la kylli balei ba ym shym la kynthup ïa ki phetwir Tamil na ka ri Sri Lanka bad kumta ter ter, hynrei ka jingïakhih ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kam dei namar ka Niam hynrei ka long namarba ha ki jylla jong ka thaiñ thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ki trai ri ki long kiba rit paidbah haduh katta katta. Ngi ki khasi ngi don tang tang kumba 15 lak bad ka NESO ha ka jingujor ha Supreme Court ka la dkew shai ba kane ka thaiñ ka la mad jingeh bha ïa ka jingshah thombor bad shah buhai shnong ha ki mynder bad dei na kata ka daw ba ka la dawa ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP),” la ong u nongïalam ka KSU.“Lyngba ka jingwanrung kyrthep ki mynder ri bun ki bor synshar trai ri ki la duh noh ïa ka jingsynshar shnong. Ngi ïohi ba ka bor jong ki Dorbar Shnong ka la tlot haduh katta katta, ki don ruh ki jaka kiba teng teng la mihkhmat da ki bym dei ki riewlum. Kane ka jia sha Assam, bad ha Tripura bad ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi,” u la ong.“Dei ban pynduh pyndam ïa ka CAA namar ngi don ïa ka khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh kaba jrong 4 hajar kilomitar tam ka dei kaba khappud basan ha ka jingjrong ha ka pyrthei. Ka jingheh paid ki briew ha Bangladesh ka poi haduh 16 klur bad tang ki Bangladeshi Hindu ki don haduh 1.6 klur. Ngi ki Khasi ngi don tang 15 lak ngut bad lada wan tang 20 lak ngut ban sah ha Meghalaya kaei ka ban jia ïa ngi? la buh jingkylli une u nongïalam ka KSU.Kum ban shu pyntip, ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la bthah ïa ka Sorkar India ban ai jubab halor ki 327 tam ki jingjor na ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi bad na Ri Thor pyrshah ïa ka CAA bad buh sngi ruh ban shong bishar ïa kane ka kam ha ka 9 tarik , Ïaiong, 2024.
title: Diaw mynsiem ka KSU bym kitkhia lem ki Politishian ban kren pyrshah ïa ka CAA

content: Shillong, Lber 20 : U President ka NPP bad Deputy Chief Minister (Dy.CM) ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong u la khyrwit da kaba tyngeh ïa ki nongïalam ka Voice of the People’s Party (VPP) khamtam ïa u President katei ka party u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit halor ka jingkob ieit jaidbynriew da kaba u la ong lada phi ieit jaidbynriew sei ïa kata ka Blue Print kaba phi la pynkhreh ban wanrah kata ka jingkylla na ka bynta ka lawei bad pateng ban wan wat shu kren laplah tang na rynsan bad pynbiej bad pynthame ïa ki paidbah.Haba ther halor kane ka jingkob ieit jaidbynriew jongki VPP u la ong “ Nga kwah ban ïohi ïa kata ka Blue Print kaba ki la pynkreh ban wanrah jingkylla lada dei shisha kumba ki kob ba ki kwah ïa ka lawei kaba phyrnai bad ki ieit ïa ka jaidbynriew namar lehse lada nga ïohi ïa kata ka blue print ïoh ka khring ïa nga ruh ban ïadon lang bad ki”.U bah Prestone u la ong ko VPP wat pynlut por ban leit pynbiej bad pynthame ïa ki paidbah ha ka kyrteng jongkata ka jaidbynriew. U la ong “Lada u Bah Ardent Basaiawmoit u dei uta u nongïalam uba shisha bad uba ieit ïa ka jaidbynriew nga kwah ban tip phi la long MLA 11 snem pyni ïa nga kiei ki synniang kiba phi la leh na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew khnang ba ngin ngeit shisha ba phi ieit ïa ka jaidbynriew. Aiu phi leh ha ka por ba phi long CEM ha KHADC na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew”.Nalor kane u bah Prestone u la pynkynmaw ruh ba u bah Ardent u President ka VPP u la ïalam ia ki paidbah ban tur sha Secretariat na ka bynta ka Building Byelaws ha ka por ba u Dr Mukul u long kum u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla hynrei kane ka jingpyrshah ka shu kut tang ha suiñ khlem poi shano shano ruh.Ka jingkylli ka long mano ba shim khia ban pynbeit ïa kane ka kam kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyntur ka MUDA sha u pud u sam ka Sixth Schedule hato kam dei ha u snem 2018 ha ka por ba u bah Hamlet Dohling u bat ïa ka tnad Urban Affairs ba u la wanrah ïa kane ka mat hapoh ka Kynhun Myntri bad lah ban pynbeit ïa kane ka kam. Kumta nga kyntu bad kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ka Shillong Parliamentary Constitueny ba kin bishar bniah bad shim ïa ka rai kaba dei ym ban shu ngeit matlah ïa kaei kaba ki pynbiej pynthame khlem ki nongrim jongka jingshisha”.Halor ka jingïai kynnoh ba ka sorkar MDA 1 bad 2 hapoh ka jingïalam ka NPP ka dei ka sorkar ba bamsap u bah Prestone u la ong “ Ngim sngew lyngngoh shuh ïa kine ki jingkynnoh ba khlem nongrim jong ki nongïalam ka VPP, tangba haba kynnoh sei bad ki jingshisha lane kiew sha ïing lieh ïing saw ne ujor sha ki bor ka aiñ. Ki jingshah kawang ktieh ka NPP ki long kiba la jur naduh ka por jongka Election MLA ha u 2023 la ka dei ha Garo Hills ne hangne ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills ruh hynrei kynmaw ba na ka 19 ngut ki MLA ha u 2019 ka NPP ka la jop sha ka 26 ngut ha u 2023. Hato kane kam pynpaw shai ba ki jingkynnoh ïa ka NPP ki dei tang ki buit pynthame kiba khlem nongrim ha ka por election katba ki paidbah pat ki ïohi ba dei tang ka NPP kaba nud ban shim ïa ki rai kiba sahteng naduh ka kam pynkynriah ïa ki Harijan, ka jingpynbeit pud pynbeit sam, ki kam pynroi pynpar khamtam ki surok bad lynti syngkieng kiba thymmai bad kumta ter ter”.“ Mynta lei lei ka VPP ka la shu lapmiet tang ban kynnoh beit ïa ka NPP kat ha ki jaka ba ki kren tangba ki nia jongki kim don nongrim namar ki dei ba ki nia ïew ki nia pynbiej bad pynthame ïa ki paidbah. Sa kawei nga kwah ba kylli ïa ka VPP lada ki ieit jaidbynriew hato ym dei ba phin sdang shwa na ki Constituency jongphi, lada ka long kumta nga kwah ban tip katno kilometre ka surok phi la shna ha ki 4 tylli ki constituency ba phi la jop, katno phi la tei hospital bad kiei ki kam babha ba phi la leh na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ki constituency jongphi ne na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew” ong u bah Prestone.Shuh shuh u bah Prestone u la ther tyngeh ruh ïa u President ka VPP u bah Ardent Basaiawmoit uba la kynnoh bad tei pop ïa ki nongïalam niam, ïa ki bor synshar shnong, ki nongïalam seng bhalang bad ki nongïalam seng saiñ pyrthei ba ki la pheil bad ki la pynsniew ïa ka jaidbynriew da kaba u sngew ba dei tang ma u uba hok. Hato phi la long nongïalam seng bhalang, phi la long nongïalam seng saiñ pyrthei naduh ka HSPDP, UDP phi la long MLA mynta 11 snem aiu phi la leh na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew sngewbha pynshai lem ong u bah Prestone.“ Nga la ïohi ha kawei ka interview jong une u President ka VPP uba la kynnoh ba baroh ki nongïalam ki la pheil bad ki dei ki nongpop bad nongpynjot jaidbynriew bad ka paw imat tang ma u uba hok uba ïalam ïa ka VPP. Nga sngewsih ba kane ka jingkren jongu ka la ktah jur ïa ki nongïalam niam kaba nga hi shimet nga sngew ba ym dei ban kynnoh ïaki nongïalam niam ne ïa kino kino ki nongïalam ruh. Kumta nga kyntu jur ïa ki paidbah ba kin ym ngop ha kum kine ki jait nongïalam ba nang tang ban kdew kti ïa ki kwei bad sngewhok ïalade namar kiba kum kine ki jingkynnoh kim wanrah ki jingmyntoi ïa ka lawei jongka jaidbynriew”. ong biang u bah Prestone.U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ha ka por ba u bah Ardent u long nongïalam ha ka HSPDP u la kam ba ka dei ka party kaba la rim bad kaba ïaleh ban pynïoh ïa ka jylla ba pura bad ha ka por ba u don ha ka UDP ruh u ong ba ka dei ka seng riewlum kaba biang tam hynrei mynta pat ba u la mih na kitei ki party u kynnoh kylla ïaki bad u sngew ba dei tang ka VPP kaba biang. “ Kumta nga kyntu ïa ki paidbah ban kiar ïalade na kane ka umsaw kaba wantuid kyndit kyndit namar tang khyndiat por kan sa rngad noh” pynkut u bah Prestone.
title: Lada phi ieit jaidbynriew sei ïa ka Blue Print ba phi la pynkhreh na ka bynta ka lawei jong ka jingkylla : Dy. CM

content: Nongpoh, Lber 21: Kum shibynta ka jingrakhe ïaka sngi kyrpang ban pynneh pynsah ïaka um ne ka “World Water day”, ka ophis jong ka tnad PHE Ri-Bhoi District, haka jingïatreilang bad ka ophis u District Sports Officer mynta ka sngi ka la pynlong ïaka jingïakop mareh Marathon haki kyrdan bapher bapher ïa kaba la sdang naduh ka por 6 baje mynstep.Ïa katei ka jingïakop mareh marathon la sdang na Mini Indoor Stadium Saiden bad pynkut pat haduh Indoor Stadium Umlyngkdait bad la wan ban kaweh lama kum ka dak jingsdang da ka kong Evangel Kharkongor District Project Manager PHE Nongpoh, haka jingiadon ryngkat lang ki nongtrei naka tnad ïalehkai.Naka liang ka kong E Kharkongor kala ong ba lyngba kane ka jingiakop mareh, ka tnad PHE, ka don ïaka jingthmu ban pyn saphriang ïaka khubor halor ka jingdonkam ban tyngkai ïaka umbam umdih kumba ka phang pdeng jong ka World Water Day ka long “Water for Peace” kaba mut mangi kum ki nongshong lada ngim don ka um kaba bit kaba biang ngim don ka imlang ka sahlang kaba suk kaba kmen, kaba lah ruh ban wanrah ka thma bad ka jingkajia kumta ka jingtyngkai ïaka um ka long kaba kongsan bad kaba donkam eh.Ha kane ka jingïakop marathon naka liang ki shynrang u samla Monas Bongrung u la khur ïaka nam ba nyngkong, u samla Ennistar Sohshang u la wan ba ar bad u samla Jamor Makri u la wan balai bad haka thup jong ki kynthei ka Samla Jilina Bongrung ka la wan ba nyngkong, Ka Samla Rosa Malai ka lawan ba ar bad ka samla Filinza Hansepi ka la wan balai.Shuh shuh ka kong Talina Shadap kala ioh ïaka nam kum ka nongïashimbynta ba rangbah tam bad u Joshwa Lyngkhoi ba dang khynnah tam.Kum ka dak ban nang ai mynsiem ïaki nongïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïakop mareh naka liang ka tnad PHE kala pynkhreh ruh ïaki khusnam ban sa sam pat lashai ka 22 tarik Lber haka jingrakhe ïaka World Water Day ha Nongpoh.
title: Daka jingïakop mareh, pynphriang khubor ka tnad PHE halor ka jingkordor ban pynneh pynsah ïaka um

content: Shillong, Lber 21: Ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol na jylla- ka Shillong Lajong FC kan ïakhun biang ïa ka lympung I-League mynta ka sngi ka ban long pyrshah ïa ka Inter Kashi ha ka por 7 baje janmiet ha Kalyani Stadium, Kolkata.Shuwa ban jam sha kane ka jingïakhun ka Lajong ka la ïakhaid bad ka Namdhari FC ha ka jingïalehkai ba ladep bad ka dang ïaineh ha ka kyrdan ba 6 ha ka miej ryngkat ki 31 point ba ka la khur naki 20 sien ïalehkai (8 jop, 7 ïakhaid bad 5 shah rem).Haba ai jingkren hynne ka sngi na ka liang u Head Coach ka Lajong-Bah Bobby L Nongbet u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew skhem halor kane ka jingïalehkai ka ban long mynta ka sngi bad u kyrmen ban ïoh ïa ka resol kaba seisoh mynta ka kynti hadien ba shah rem ha ka wat kynduh ba nyngkong (1st leg) ha ka por ba kine ki ar kynhun ki ïatyngkhuh ha madan SSA Stadium-Polo, Shillong.Kumban shu pynkynmaw, ha ka 3 tarik u Rymphang ka jingïakhun kaba la long ha nongbah Shillong, ka Inter Kashi ka la jop da ka said ïa ka Shillong Lajong FC, kata da 1 kol ban khur pura ïa ki lai point.Haba phai pat sha ka Inter Kashi, ka bat ïa ka kyrdan ba 5 ryngkat ki 36 point ba ka la ïoh ban khur naki 10 sien jop, 6 sien ïakhaid bad 5 sien rem na baroh 21 ïalehkai mynta ka samoi.Baroh ar kynhun ki khmihlynti ban khur shalade ïa baroh lai point na kane ka jingïalehkai mynta ka sngi bad ban nang pynskhem shuh shuh ïa ka kyrdan jong ki ha ka miej. Ka jingïapher hapdeng kine ki ar kynhun ka long ba ka Inter Kashi ka lamkhmat da 5 point ïa ka Lajong ha ka miej.
title: I-League: Khmihlynti ka Lajong ban wanphai jingjop ha ka sien ïakhun ba ar pyrshah ïa ka Inter Kashi

content: Shillong, Lber 21: Ka jinglah ban lehkai bha ki rang bad thei ïalehkai ha ka thup jong ka Athletics ka la nang ïai kyntiew ïa ka jingïoh khur takma ka Meghalaya ha kane ka 3rd NorthEast Games 2024 kaba long ha Nagaland.Hynne ka sngi ka kynhun ki nongïalehkai ka jylla kiba mihkhmat ha ka Athletics ki la ïoh ban khur 3 tylli ki Rupa bad 5 tylli ki rnong.ïa kine ki takma ha ka thup ïalehkai jong ka Athletics la khur da u Skhemlang Suba u ba la wan ba ar ha ka jingïakop mareh kaba 800M jong ki shynrang. Ha kane ka jingïakop mareh na ka liang jong u Skhemlang Suba u la lah ban pyndep hapoh 1.59.14 sekon.U Primus Ronghi u la jop takma rupa ha ka High Jump Men, hadien ka jinglah ban kynthih ïa ka jingjrong kaba- 1.82M. Nangta ka Rinalis Ingti ka la khur takma rupa ha ka High Jump jong ki kynthei, ka jingjrong ba ka la lah ban kynthih ka long- 1.43M.U Eleven Dkhar u la wan ha ka kyrdan ba lai ha ka jingïakop mareh ba 800M jong ki shynrang, bad ka por kaba u la lah ban pyndep ka long – 2:00.14 sekon, kaba la biang ïa u ban khur ïa ka takma rnong.Ka Glorify Kurbah ka la jop takma rnong ha ka jingïakop mareh ba 800M jong ki kynthei, hadien ba lah pyndep ïa ka jingmareh hapoh- 2.22.83 sekon. Ka Sibilda Maring ka la wan ba lai ha ka High Jump jong ki kynthei, ka jingjrong kaba ka la lah ban kynthih ka long- 1.35M ban pynthikna khur ïa ka takma rnong. U Pringchang N Sangma u la jop takma rnong ha ka High Jump ki shynrang, hadien ba kynthih ïa ka jingjrong kaba- 1.78M ban shim ïa ka kyrdan ba lai.Nangta ka Meghalaya ka la ïohruh ban khur takma rnong ha ka 4X400M Mixed Relay ba la mihkhmat da u Donbok Shabong, u Eleven Dkhar, ka Glorify Kurbahbad ka Ritina Hanse.Haduh mynta ka kynhun ki nongïalehkai Athletics ka Jylla ki la ïoh ban khur 2 tylli ki takma ksiar, 4 tylli ki rupa bad 8 tylli ki rnong, haba kyllumlang ki long haduh 14 tylli.Haba phai sha ka jingïalehkai Badminton ki shijur ba ïakhun ha ka Men’s Double ba la mihkhmat da u Chirag bad u Gitchiak ki la shah pynliem noh ha ki shijur ba kynthup ïa u Lalrinmawma & Laldintluanga Tlau jong ka Mizoram.Katba ha ka Basketball ki thei ïalehkai ka jylla ki la ïai bteng ban synshar ïa ka Group da kaba bat kyrdan ba nyngkong. ïa kane la nang pynskhem hadien ba ka kynhun ka khur namjop da kaba suk pyrshah ïa ka Mizoram ban pynliem haduh 57/22 basket ha ka jingïakhun kaba long hynne ka sngi.Ka Meghalaya ka don jingkyrmen ruh ban khur takma ksiar ha ka Boxing hadien ba u Bhalang Shadap ba ïakura ha ka kyrdan 67kg u la jop ha ka jingïakhun Semi Final ban ïohrung sha ka Final. Bad mynta ka sngi un sa ïakhun na bynta ka takma ksiar.Ha ka Table Tennis: u Prithvi Dey u la ïoh ban khur takma rnong hadien ba jop kyrdan ba lai, nangta ha ka taekwondo ka jylla ka la ïoh ban khur takma rnong lyngba u Mahi karki u ba la wan ba lai ha ka thup kyrdan ïalehkai 48 kg…
title: 3rd North East Games: ïai bteng ka jylla Meghalaya ban khur takma ha ka Athletics

content: La ïa im ia long ïa man ha kata ka juk kaba ka jingim briew da shisha ka long ka bym tikna,ym tip shi khyllipmat aiu lah ban jia, hynrei balei pat ki briew, katba u dang im, kim shim pat ïa kabu ksiar ban leh, ban mut beit tang da kaba bha.Ki jingjia bym juh bna koit, kine khlieh la ka sngi ki la wan ban jia, ka tuh ka thiem, ka shoh ka pynïap, la kum ba ïa im ha kum kata ka kynja juk, kaba um don jingtieng, jingsmiej shuh ïaka nongkylliang kaba la ap lypa kaban wan ha ka jingim.Kum ka jaidbynriew, kaba dang bat dang snoh bha hala ka jong ka khieñ kur ka kheiñ kha, ka tip briew ka tip Blei, sa shisien ka takhuh biang bad ki eriong ki erngit, jong kata ka rongphong kaba wan ba kan beh na kylleng sawdong, kat shaba phai, ym lah shuh ban peiphang kaei kaba dei bad kaei kaba lait, namar ba baroh baroh la shu pynskan hok jubor ñala ka jong ka nia ka jutang, kaba ha lyndet, don pat ka jingthmu ban ioh myntoi tang malade shimet.Kaba kham ima lei lei iala ka jong ka jaidbynriew ha kum kane ka juk kaba mynta, dei ka dak jingsdang ka thok bad lamler, kaba ym salia shuh ba im-im ne peit-peit ban ïeng shisha da ka thok ka shukor, bam sap bam klop ïaka um syep jong u duk u rangli, u shem jynjar u shem lanot, ñion naphang lin ia u rit bad u tlot, ha kaba ka nongrim hikai ban im sngi im hok shi beit shi lynti ban kamai ïaka hok, kam don shuh, pynban ba la khwan myntoi palat eh, kata ka mynsiem rhah ïaka spah bym hok.Ka daw kaba pynlong ïa ki briew ban im da kane ka lynti bym hok shuh hala ka jingim, ka dei ba ha ki kim don shuh ïaka raiñ ka rem, kim salia shuh ban iuh bad thom iaka hukum Blei, pynban wei shu sdang kiew, kiew skong ka mynsiem sarong kaba ha nga mei, ba kat ma nga ym duh shuh ha kane ka sla jong ka pyrthei. Kine ki jingjia, ksam ïa ki thied jabieng bym lah shuh ban poi pyrkhat ba pleng ba ha kum kane ka jaidbynriew, kaba dang don ïa ki snap kata ka jingïajan ba maïa bad la u nongbuh u nongthaw, ba ki dang bnud ba kin thom pat ïaka sang ka ma.Hynrei kum kine ki briew ki klet baka nongkylliang kaba kin sa ïoh, kaba ha ki akher jong ki sngi, kin niew kin tang iala kajingim kaba shempap, kaba u kur u kha, u marjan u marpa, un da I syrtok shisha ïaka jingim jong kum kine ki briew, kiba ka bainong ba ki la leh, kane mynta ki la ïoh pdiang lypa ha ka jingim.Kaba ima lei lei ha kum kane ka juk shai kaba mynta, dei ka jingim ba lyngkar kynthei bad shynrang, ki ïaid ruma ki ïaid rutit, kim tip shuh ïaka miet ka ïa, ki klet ïa ka tien sneng ka tien kraw jong ka kmie u kpa, ki phaidien ïaka hukum ka jong ki, namar ha ki la sur matlah shisha tang da ka rongphong pyrthei.Kat shaba ki ïaid kat shaba ki ïeng, ym ithuh shuh la kynthei ne shynrang, kine shu hai hai, la kum ba jngi ha ki lyoh, kim tip shuh ïaka miet ïa ïong, ki klet ïala ka ïing ka sem, kim salia shuh ban ri sumar kyndong ïala ka nam thei sotti, pynban ha ka jingim ban ïoh mad ïaka sngewbha ki da klet shisha wat ïala ka jong ka kheiñ kur ka khein kha.Hynrei ka jingeh kaba ki khun samla ki ïakynduh ka dei ba don pat ki khep, ba ïaka jingim kaba dang shu sdang ban phuh, hynrei la lap ba kdiah jubor noh ïaki, hangne kyndit bynriew ka shong ka thaw, sah shisha satang ka pur khana kiba har rukom, kaba ka nam ba bha jong ki, da lei lei um lah shuh ban lap dien trai, hynrei kit pap sah tang da ka nam sniew shi rynjaiñ.Dei haba la mad pat ïaka bainong , ba sa sdang ka kdew kti ne ka kynnoh pat ïa kiwei, sa sdang ka ïamrem pat hala marwei, ne ban ud ban nam kylla ïa la ka jong ka jingim, pynban ka nongkylliang kam juh ap shisha ïano ïano ruh, hynrei ka kloi ba kan trei ïala ka jong ka kamram ka jong ka.Lada sbu ïakren shisha hangne, aiu sha ha lyndet ba u bynriew um lah ban leh tang ïa kaba bha ha ka jingim, ka jubab ïa kane ka dei, ba ha ka mynsiem bad ka dohnud, la rung ka bishni ka pihuiñ, ka ïbeiñ ka I khoh ïa kiwei. Katno tam lei lei haba u marjan u shem bha u shem miat, duh thiah duh dem, sdang pat saka lorni ne ban thaw ktien kiba kynsha, namar bym lah shah ban ïohi ne shem ba kiwei ki shem bha katba lade li-li pen-pen, im ka jingim kaba shu alhia ba khlem khih khlem ksar, kaba shu lorni ia kiwei hyrnei ba klet noh pat ialade.Kumta katba ka por ka dang biang, ko para jaidbynriew, ïeng kyndit thiah noh sa shisien, ka jaidbynriew ka donkam biang ban ïeng ha ka nongrim ban im ka jingim ba khuid synlar, bym nym don satia kano kano ka dak thohbria, namar ka jingwan ban long briew sha kane ka snieh jong ka sla pyrthei, ka long wan lyngkhuid hap ruh ban leit lyngkhuid, ha kaba kaei kaba la wan ban im bad sah shipor ha kane ka sla ka pyrthei, hap ban im ne ban leh shisha kat kum kata ka hukum na u Blei, ha kaba ka nam ka kyrteng ruh kan da sien ïewbih bad neh shisha ka nam ba bha bad ïai pyrto sah da baroh lang.
title: Ka jingim briew bym thikna

content: Ka Jaitbynriew Jaiñtïa, ka dei ka wei na ki jaitbynriew kaba riewspah tam, ym tang ha ka ïoh ka kot, ha ki mar ki mata, ka riewspah khamtam ha ka ktien ka thylliej bad ka burom ka akor. Haba phai sha ka ktien ka thylliej, naduh hyndai hynthai ki longshuwa jong ngi, ki don ka jingkitkhlieh ban wanrah ha ka thoh ka tar ne ka pule ka dangle, ïa ka ei ka ei kaba ki pyrkhat. Ki jingthoh ki jong ki, da ki script ne ki dak thoh jong kiwei, ka pyni shai kdar ba ki ieid ïa la ka jaidbynriew. Kumba ong ka ktien – ‘Ka jaitbynriew kaba ka ktien ka thylliej jong ka, kadon ha jingthoh, kadei ka Jaitbynriew ka ba Im’. Te haduh mynta, ka jaitbynriew jong ngi ka im bad kan ïai im da kaba khlaiñ shuh shuh, halor ka nongrim ban burom ïa la ka jong bad ban ym isih ruh ïa ka jong kiwei.Ka burom ka akor, ka dang ïaineh ïaisah ha ka mynsiem, uwei pa kawei ki khun ka Jaitbynriew hapoh ka Ri Jaiñtia. Ka burom ka ba ha khmatduh kadei, ba ki tip ban burom ïa ka Bei Rymaw, kaba bsa bad ai ïa ngi ïa ka ei kaba ngi donkam.Ka jingpynkhie im biang ïa ka Chad Sukra da u Dolloi bad ka Señraij Jowai, ka long kawei na ki lad ban kyrsiew thiah ïa ka Jaitbynriew, da kaba rat dyngkhong ïa ki jingsniew kiba pynjot ïa ka Bei Rymaw. Ha ka Chad Sukra hi, man la ki snem, ka mat pdeng ka jong ka, dei ban burom bad ieid ïa ka Bei Rymaw. Naduh hyndai hynthai kulong kumah, ka pyrthei ka dang long kaba hok ba sati, ki briew ki im ha kawei don ka sur “Tipbriew Tipblei”, ki ïarap iwei ïa iwei, na kawei ka jaka sha kawei pat, ymdon kata ka mynsiem arsap arphong; Ki dem hok ha la ki jingtrei ban ioh bam, kim don por ban ïa lorni ïa ki kam jong kiwei, ki sngewtynnad ban ïa pyni ïa la ki jong ki jong ki sap ki phong hadien ba ki la dep ka trei ka ktah. Ki shait ïa pyndom iwei ïa iwei, ki shynrang ïa ki kynthei ne kynthei ïa ki shynrang tang ban pynlut por ban lap ka miet. Kimdon baje, kim don kot ne khulom ban thoh, hynrei ki tip thik thik ïa ka por, ïa ki sngi ki ïa. Ki pyntrei kam ïa ki saw aiom jong ka snem, katkum ki por ki jong ki, ryngkat ka nguh ka dem, ka duwai ka phirat ïa u Blei nongbuh nongthaw bad ïa ka Rymaw.Kumba ki sngewtynnad ïa ka put ka tem, ka rwai ka siaw bad ka shad. Kumta, ki pyndon burom ïa ka Bei Rymaw ha shwa ban pynhap ïa u symbai sha lyngkha da ka shad ka kmen, ka nguh ka dem, ban bha ban miat ka thung ka tep ka jong ki. Haduh mynta, ngi tip ba ka Chad Sukra la pynlong ïa ka, ha shwa ban rep ban thung. Kadon ruh ka jingmut kaba kongsan “Ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka Dustur ka Riti, ki Matti jong u Longshuwa Manshuwa” ba u la hikai ïa ka pateng ban ïa burom kylliang iwei ïa iwei bad ban pyndonkam hok ïa la ki jong ki Sap ki Phong da kaba hikai ïa kiwei ïa kaei kaba bha tam.La thaw ïa ki jingrwai kiba kit jingmut bad pyndait ïa ka jingshad ban pynshohbieit ïa ki khmat ki nongpeit. Ymtang kata, ka jingïa ieid bad burom, ka pynkhraw ïa ka jinglehkmen ïa ka Chad Sukra. Ka long ruh kawei na ki dak ban burom ïa ki Nongrep, namar khlem ma ki, ngin ymïoh jingbam ban bam. Ki jingduwai na ka bynta ka jong ki, ban bha ka khyndew ka shyiap, ban biang ki um ki wah ban shngaiñ ka met jong ka Bei Rymaw. Haba ïashad ïaleh sngewbha, ka mynsiem ki nongshad naduh kiba ïashimbynta ha rynsan haduh kiba shad surok, naduh ki khynnah haduh ki rangbah, ki don ka jingsngew ïajuh ïajan para jaitbynriew ha ka bri u Ñau Wasa u Ñau Wasung.Kumba ka matpdeng jong ka Chad Sukra mynta ka snem, “Ka jingkohnguh ïa ka Hukum Blei, ka Lynti ka Jingsuk ha ka Pyrthei”. Ka jingsuk kan ym wan, lada ngimïoh ïa ka jingbam; ka jingbam ngin ymïoh, lada ngim ïada bad sumar ïa ka Bei Rymaw. Kane kadei ka jinghikai kaba ngi la ïoh naduh hyndai, balei ngi khot Mei ïa ka Rymew; namar kadei ka nongbsa bam ïa baroh ki ba im ba khih ne kiba don mynsiem.Shibun kiba tip ban burom ïa ka Rymaw bad shibun ruh ki bymtip. U batip ban burom ïa ka Rymaw, don kipor ba u klet, ïa ka ei kaba u leh sniew halor jong ka, u bymtip ban burom, don ki por u kynmaw ïa ka jingkordor ka jong ka. Namarkata, lyngba kane ka Chad Sukra, to ngin kyndit bynriew da kaba sneng naduh ïing haduh kino kino ki jaka ba ngi don, banlong kiba lehkhuid, ymtang ïa ka met ka jong ngi, hynrei ïa ka met jong ka Bei Rymaw ruh.“To ngin don ka mynsiem kum ki riew hyndai, ka bakhuid kaba suba, ymdon arsap arphong, na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong baroh lang, kaba ki la hikai ïa ngi, ba ngin ïengtylli kawei, ka Jaitbynriew, ban im ka mynta bad ka lawei”
title: Ka Chad Sukra ka nongrim ban burom ïa ka Rymaw

content: Nongpoh, Lber 21: U Working President ka UDP RI Bhoi bad uba dei ruh u MDC ka Nongpoh mynta ka sngi u la pynshai paidbah halor ka jingmih noh ki nongïalam ka UDP ba kam don kano kano ka jingktah ïa ka party bad ka party UDP ka dang khlaiñ bad dang treikam ha RI Bhoi District.Haba kren bad u Nongthoh Khubor, u la ong ba ha kane ka ri synshar paidbah ki don kiba mih bad ki don kiba rung bad ngim lah ban bat ïa ka mon jong kiwei, hynrei ban ong ba ka jingmih kitei ki nongïalam UDP na Ri Bhoi kan ktah ïa ka party ka long kaba ym lah ban pdiang namar tang katto katne ngut ki nongïalam kiba la mih na ka party bad kiba bun ki dang don hapoh ka party.U la ong ruh ba kiba bun kiba mih na ka UDP ki dei tang na Mawhati Constituency bad kattto katnte ngut na kiwei ki constituency bad kumba long haduh mynta ka party UDP ka dang khlaiñ ha Ri Bhoi District bad kan ïai trei la ka jong ka kam kum ka party wat la kitei ki nongïalam ki la mih na ka UPD party.H kawei ka bynta, u Bah Rani u la kyntu ruh ïa ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot bad ki nongkyrshan ka UDP kim dei ban khih mynsiem ba ki dei ban dang don ha ka party kaba dang bteng ka jingshakri ha Ri Bhoi bad ong ruh shen yns alum lang ïa ki nongïalam bad ki nongkyrshan ban tehsong biang sa shisien.
title: Ngim lah ban khang ïa ka jingmih ki nongïalam ka UDP: Balajied Ranee

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber, 21: Ka Meghalaya State Price Monitoring bad Resource Unit(MSPMRU) mynta ka sngi ka 21 tarik u Lber, 2024 ka la pynlong ïa ka seminar ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpynïaid beit ïaid ryntih ïa ka dor ka mur jong ki dawai dashin da ka National Pharmaceutical bad Pricing Authority (NPPA) bad Introduction to Pharma Sahi Daam na ka bynta ki trai dukan jong ki dukan die lang bad dukan die khutia mutia kiba don ha South West Khasi Hills District, ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Mawkyrwat Community Hall.U Block Development Officer ka Mawkyrwat C&RD Block Bah I. Lawriniang, u la long kum u kongsan ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ki kynthup u bah W. L. Snaitang, Secretary Shnong, bah B.C. Kharsyntiew, Senior Drugs Inspector Meghalaya, Shillong, ka kong Y. Biam, Drugs Inspector, West Khasi Hills District, Nongstoin, bad u bah E. Tariang, District Social Welfare Officer, South west Khasi Hills District bad kiwei pat.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang u Bah I. Lawriniang u la pyntip ba la pynmih ïa ka “Pharma Sahi Daam” mobile application app khnang ba ki nongthied kin dup tip ïa ka dor ka mur jong ki dawai dashin na ka jaka ba ki thied. U la ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka la ïaleh katba lah ban teh lakam khnang ba kan don ka jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih jong ka dor ka mur ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingdie ïa ki dawai dashin ha ïew ha hat. Ha kajuh ka por u la pynshlur bad wer ïa ki doktor ban kyntiew ïa ki dawai kiba treikam kumjuh hynrei kiba ïapher tang ha ka dor. Shuh shuh u la ban jur ba lada ki lap ba don u laiñ saw ha u strp dawai kim dei ban dih ne pyndonkam khlem da ïoh jingbit na ki doktor.Haba kren halor ka phang kaba ïa dei bad ka Meghalaya State Price Monitoring bad Resource Unit (MSPMRU), u Senior Drugs Inspector, Meghalaya, Shillong, u bah B.C. Kharsyntiew, u la ong ba la thaw bad register ïa ka MSPMRU ha ka 1 tarik u bnai Kyllalyngkot, 2023 da ka jingthmu ban ïarap ïa ki nongdie bad ïa ki nongthied bad ka kamram ba kongsan jongki ka long ban peit ha kaba ïa dei bad ka dor ka mur jong ki dawai, ban pynthikna ïa ka jingdon jongki bad ban pynioh ha ka dor kaba bit bad ban pynsngewthuh ne ai jingshai ïa ki nongthied.Ka kong B. Nongrum, Field Investigator ka la ai ïa ka presentation halor ka jingbuh beit buh ryntih ïa ka dor ka mur jong ki dawai bad ka jingbatai lyngkot halor ka Pricing, ka Introduction to Pharma Sahi Daam, Drug Regulatory System ha India, ka National Pharmaceutical bad Pricing Authority, Drug Price Control Order (DCPO), 2013, Consumer Awareness, Publicity bad Price Monitoring (CAPPM), Pharma Sahi Daam nalor kiwei.
title: Pynsngewthuh ka MSPMRU halor ka jingpynïaid beit ki dor dawai ha Mawkyrwat

content: Jowai, Lber 21: U Deputy Commissiner (Election), jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District, Jowai u la pyntip ba hadien ba ka Election Commission of India kala pynbna ïa ka tarik elekshon, kumta na ka bynta ka jingdonkam jong ki paidbah ka thaiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam Elekshon jong ka Lok Sabha, 2024, na ka liang ka tnat Elekshon jong u Deputy Commissioner (Election) West Jaiñtia Hills District kala buh ïa ka Call Centre kaba lah ban phone 24×7 ha ophis DC. Lada don kino kino kiba kwah ban ïoh jingtip ne kiba ai jingujor ha ka jingïadei bad ka kam Elekshon sha ka ïing Dorbar thawaiñ Lok Sabha ki lah ban phone ha kine ki number; 1950 / 03652-295229.
title: Buh ïa ka Call Centre ha ophis DC

content: Jowai, Lber 21: Ka tnad treikam jong ka District Commerce and Industries Centre Jowai, ha kane ka 20 tarik u Lber, 2024 kala pynkup burom ïa ki 25 ngut ki ba lah pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai ban shna ïa ki jingshna bapher bapher kum ki Jewellery products bad ki Utility products, da kaba pyndonkam da ki siej.Kane ka jingai jinghikai ka la ïaid 25 sngi lynter ha ka shnong Sohkha Mission Village West Jaiñtia Hills District bad ïa ka jinghikai lah wan ai da ki Master Craftsmen jong ka Neera Foundation na ka bynta kitei ki 25 ngut kiba lah pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai bad la pynkup burom ïa ki da u kongsan u bah M.L Wanshnong Joint Director, Directorate of Commerce and Industries, ha ryngkat ka jingdon u bah S Majaw Retired General Manager, kong Neera Sarmah, Director, Neera Foundation, kong S.E Kharpran, Functional Manager DCIC Jowai, bah S. Pale, Industrial Promotion Officer DCIC Jowai, ma P. Suchen, Rangbah Shnong, ma M. Manner, Secretary Shnong lem bad kiwei.U kongsan, ha ka jingkren jong u, u la ïaroh ïa kitei ki nongshah hikai kiba la pyndon kam ïa la ka sap lyngba ka jingshah hikai jong ki, ula kyntu ïa ki ban pyndonkam hok ïa ki jinghikai ba ki la ïoh bad ban pynjanai shuh shuh ïa ka kam bad ki jingshna jong ki.Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïoh ruh ïa ki jingkren na u ma P. Suchen, kong Neera Sarmah bad na ka kong S. E Kharpran, kumjuh ruh na ki ar ngut ki nong shah hikai kiba la pynsngew ïa ka jingmyntoi ba ki ïoh ha kine ki 25 sngi jong ka jingshah hikai jong ki.
title: Ïoh jinghikai ki 25 ngut ban thaiñ bad shan tiar da ki siej ha shnong Sohkha

content: Nongpoh, Lber 21: Ka Shad Sajer Committee jong ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship mynta ka sngi kala shim syndon ïaka rai ban pynsangeh noh ïaka lehñiam Shad Sajer kaba la rai ban pynlong haka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ha u Lum Wortoh hadien ba naka liang ka District Council kala thung biang ïa u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai kum u Sirdar ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship bad pynkut noh ïa ka jingtreikam u Bah Pillarstone Syiem Nongshai kum u Acting Sirdar.Na ka liangka Sajer Committee ryngkat ki Lyngdoh na 6 tylli ki Raid ba kynthup ïaka Raid Nongkharai, Raid Nongpoh, Raid Nonglyngdoh, Raid Nongkhrah, Raid Sohkhwai bad Raid Nongkyrla kila lum ruh da ka jingïalang bad shim ruh ka rai ba kim kwah shuh ban pynlong ïa katei ka Shad Sajer namar ki kynrum kynram ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam Sordar hadien ba ka District Council kala pynskhem biang ïa u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai u ba la shah sospon shipor naka jingdon ka jingujor pyrshah ïa u halor ki kam synshar khaddar bad weng noh ïa u Bah Pillar Stone Syiem Nongshai naka kam Acting Sordar.Kum ban shu kdew hangne ba naka liang ka Sajer Committee kala dep ruh ban pynkhreh pynkhrum bad ban khot sngewbha ruh ïaki briew bad ki paidbah na kylleng ka bri u hynñiewtrep ban wan sakhi ïaka jingriewspah ka kolshor bad riti ka dustur lyngba ka Lehñiam Shad Sajer kaba dei ka jinglehñiam ba shisien shisnem jong ki khun ki hajar ban pan ka kyrkhu kyrdoh na u Blei nongbuh nongthaw hadien ba u la theh shibun ki jingkyrkhu ha kine ki snem bala leit noh.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor naka liang u Bah Luistar Lyngdoh Chairman ka Sajer Committee u la ong ba kum ka Committee lem bad ki 6 Raid kila rai ban pynsangeh noh mynta u snem ïaka lehñiam Shad Sajer kaba la rai ban pynlong haka 23 tarik mynta u bnai namar ka jingrai jong ka District Council ban thung biang ïa u Bah Wanphrang Syiem Nongshai kum u Sordar haka jaka jong u Bah Pillarstone Syiem Nongshai ba kum ki 6 Raid ki pynpaw ka jingpyrshah halor katei ka rai ka District Council.U la ong ruh ba naka liang ka Sajer Committee ka pan map naki khun ki hajar ki Raid bapher bapher ka Elaka Nongpoh Sirdarship bad kumjuh ruh ïaki paidbah ka bri u hynñiewtrep, ki nongshah khot sngewbha kiba la thmu ban wan sakhi ïa katei ka jinglehñiam ba ïa mynta ki hap ban pynsangeh noh na kitei ki daw ba ka Committee kala pynpaw.
title: Mar ïa pynkylla Sirdar, pulom ka lehñiam Shad Sajer ka Elaka Nongpoh, rai ki 6 Raid ban pynsangeh

content: Jowai, Lber 21: Ka jingshah thok shah sukor jong ki paidbah ka la nangjur katba nang mih ki sngi, la sakhi mynta ka sngi ki longkmie na ka shnong Sohmynting West Jaiñtia Hills District kila leit mih sha Jowai Police Station ban ujor ejahar pyrshah ïa uwei u briew uba la pan pisa ban pynïoh ïa ka tyndong lyer bad ka Stove shet jingshet.Ïa utei u briew ba leh thok la tip kyrteng kum u Ialam Makri uba na ka shnong Umsning Nongthymmai, Ri-Bhoi District katkum ka jingpynpaw kitei ki longkmie, shuh shuh la ïathuh ba utei u briew ula kular pynïoh tyndong lyer shet (Gas) ïa ki 93 ngut ki longkmie ka shnong da kaba pan pisa haduh 2500/-, 4000/- lane 6 hajar kawei ka longkmie.Ha kajuh ka por utei u Ialam Makri u la pynithuh ïalade kum u nongtrei Agency ban pynïoh Gas ïa ki naka M/s Ri Pnar bad na M/s Rymbai. Da kaba ula pyndonkam ruh da ka seal kaba don ki jingthoh INDANE CYLINDER GAS STORE bad ka INDANE GAS CYLINDER ban ai shap ha ka Cash Memo ban lum pisa na ki nongshong shnong.La ïathuh da kitei ki longkmie baroh kiba la dep siew pisa sha u kaba la kot sha ka 3 lak tyngka tam, ïa kane ka kam ula leh naduh u bnai Jymmang, 2023 hynrei ula dep ban sam tyndong lyer shet (Gas) tang kumba 20 ngut ki longkmie hynrei haduh mynta utei u briew ula jah khlem da wam mih shuh shapoh ka shnong.Ka jingïoh lad jong utei u briew ban thok bad leh shukor ïa ki longkmie ka shnong ka long da kaba ula leit mih shwa sha ki bor shnong ba kin shah ïa u ban leh ïa kane ka kam hapoh ka shnong, ka shnong da ka jingthmu ïa ka kam ba bha kala shah ïa u ban leh ïa katei ka kam, hynrei ka la long pat ka kam thoh kam shukor jong u.Halor kane, kitei ki longkmie u la leit ban buh da ka ejahar ha Jowai Police Station ba dawa pynshitom shi syndon ïa utei u Ialam Makri da kaba kem bad leh ïa kaba donkam bad ba un pynphai noh ïa ka pisa bala dep shim, ha kajuh ka por ki la kyntu ïa kiwei de ki longkmie jong kiwei de ki shnong ba kim dei ban shah pynbeit ha kum une u briew, katkum ka jingïoh jingtip kila ong kum kane ka kam thok ula leh sha kiwei de ki shnong.
title: 3 lak tam shah thok ki longkmie ban pynïoh tyndong lyer shet ha shnong Sohmynting

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: Da kaba bud ïa ki kyndon jong ka Election Commission of India ba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) hadien ba la pynbna ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha 2024, ka tnat Elekshon jong ka Jylla hapoh 72 kynta ka la phah tar bad phah jynrat lut ïa baroh ki jingthoh kiba ïaroh ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka tnat Elekshon ka Sorkar Jylla, ka la pyntip ba ïa ki hukum jingmana ladep pynmih da ki bor synshar distrik, ka jingthaw ïa ki Flying Squad ha baroh ki Constituency, la buh ruh ïa ki Expenditure Monitoring Agency, la pynsngewthuh bniah ïa ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar ïa baroh ki kyndon jong ka Model Code of Conduct, la weng ruh ïa ki dur jong ki riewsaiñpyrthei na ki Website ka Sorkar bad la weng ruh ïa ki jingthoh ba pynsniewdur na ki jaka sorkar, na ki jaka paidbah bad na ki jaka jong ki riewshimet hapoh kine ki 72 kynta ba la leit noh naduh ba la pyntreikam ïa ka Model Code of Conduct.Ha kaba ïadei bad kine ki jingtreikam ba la kdew hangne, ki bor synshar distrik hapoh ka jylla ki la weng 109 tylli ki poster na ki jaka sorkar, 248 tylli na ki jaka paidbah. Ki banner ba la weng na ki jaka sorkar ki long 228 tylli, na ki jaka paidbah 440 tylli.Ki Hoarding ba la weng na ki jaka sorkar ki long 43 tylli bad 58 tylli na ki jaka paidbah.Ki jingthoh ba pynsniewdur ba la weng na ki jaka sorkar hapoh 24 kynta ki long 323 tylli, na ki jaka paidbah ba la weng hapoh 48 kynta ki long 599 tylli bad na ki jaka shimet ba la weng hapoh 72 kynta ki long 253 tylli.
title: Jynrat ka tnat Elekshon ïa ki jingthoh ba ïaroh ka Sorkar Pdeng bad Sorkar Jylla

content: Shillong, Lber 21: Katkum ka khubor ba la ïoh jingtip na ki pulit la ïathuh ba u Bah Cyril Ming u la phah ka jingujor ba ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la tuh ïa uwei u battery napoh ka ophis ka Director of Account (Postal), Shillong.Shuh shuh sa ha kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba uwei u nongshong shnong ka Lumshyiap, Shillong u la phah ka jingujor ba ha ka 31 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024, kadon kaa WhatsApp group kaba la ai kyrteng da ka.,’Waterfront Global Fund Trading Platform’, ba la kynnoh ba la pyntreikam da u Trisha Shah, Ravi Kumar,Abhishek Giri, Abu,u Akash Madhavan bad u Ali Sehgal, ki la thok pisa ïa u haduh T. 9 lak da kaba pynngop halor ka jingthep ïa ki stock.
title: Shah tuh battery bad shah thok pisa

content: Shillong, Lber 21: Ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka sorkar jylla ka la rakhe ïa ka World Oral Health Day ha ka sngi Balang hapoh ka Bharat Nirman Rajeev Gandhi Sewa Kendra Building, Mawdiangdiang.ïa ka prokram la pynïaid da Dr I. Mylliemngap, Dental Surgeon ka Smit PHC. ïa ki kyntien pdiang sngewbha la ai da Dr B.Kanti, District Nodal Officer ka NOHP bad NTCP, East Khasi Hills District. La ïoh ki jingkren lyngkot na Dr F.V.Kharshïing DHS, MCH & FW bad Dr S.Lyngdoh, DMHO, East Khasi Hills District halor ka phang “A Happy Mouth is a Happy Body”.ïa ka jingkren bad jingpynsngewthuh paidbah halor ka jingdonkam jong ka oral health la ai da Dr N. Kharumnuid, Dental Officer, NEIGRIHMS. ïa ka prokram la pynkut da ki kyntien ai khublei la ai da Dr D.Mukhim, Dental Surgeon, Pomlum PHC.ïa ka prokram la shimbynta da ki Dental Surgeon na ki jaka bapher bapher jong ka East Khasi Hills District, ki khynnah skul, ki nongtrei ka Mawryngkneng Block bad ki dkhot ka Executive ka Dorbar Shnong Mawkasiang. Ka la don ka jingkhmih bniah ïa ka shyntur bad ka jingsam ïa ki jingai sngewbha sha baroh kiba la ïashim bynta ha kane ka prokram.
title: Rakhe ka tnat ka Koit ka khiah ïa ka World Oral Health Day

content: Shillong, Lber 21: Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Palei, ka la bthah ïa ka sorkar Pdeng ba kan pynsangeh noh ïa ka jingphah message jong ka “Viksit Bharat Sampark” (VBS), ha ka whatsapp, kiba batai ïa ki prokram ka Sorkar Pdeng.Ka Commission ka la ai ka jingbthah sha ka Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology hadien ba ka ïoh pdiang ïa ki jingujor pyrshah ïa kane ka kam.“Kane ka sienjam ka dei shibynta jong ki rai ba la shim da ka Commission ban pynthikna ïa ka ilekshon kaba khuid bad bym shah liang,” ong ka Commission kaba la pan ruh ïa ka kaiphod pyntreikam na ka Ministry halor kane ka kam.Ka ECI kala ïoh pdiang ïa shibun ki jingujor ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka dang pynbteng ban phah ïa ki message ha ki phone jong ki paid nongshong shnong ka ri wat hadien ka jingpynbna ïa ka ilekshon Lok Sabha 2024 bad ka jingtreikam jong ka Model Code of Conduct.
title: Pynsangeh noh ka ECI ia ki WhatsApp message ka VBS

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: Ka Single Member Committee ba la thung da ka Ïingkashari Meghalaya High Court ka la ai jingmut halor ka jingdonkam ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan pyndep noh ïa ka jingleh audit ïa ka tyllong u dewïong ba la pyndonkam da ki karkhana Ferro Alloy bad ki Captive Thermal Power Plant jong ki karkhana dewbilat bad ban leh eiei hapoh ka shibnai.“La ai jingbthah ïa ka Sorkar ba kan shim ïa ka rai ba khatduh haba ïadei bad ki karkhana Ferro Alloy hapoh ka shibnai,” ong u Justice BP Katakey ha ka interim report ba 21, kaba la aiti sha ka ïingkashari Meghalaya High Court.La ong ba ka kaiphod ka ong ba ki kam leh audit ïa ka tyllong u dewïong bala pyndonkam da ki karkhana coke ka dei kaba la pyndep bad la dei ai ïa ki demand notice sha ki karkhana coke ha kaba ki karkhana coke hadien ba la ïoh pdiang, lait noh artylli kata ka M/s Jaintia Coke Pvt.Ltd bad ka M/S Abhi Coke Pvt.Ltd, kila siew ïa ki khajna bad kiwei.La ïathuh ba la ai jingbthah ïa ka Tnat Mining and Geology ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba kan shim ïa ki sienjam ba dei ban shim ha ka ban pynïoh ïa ka pisa ba la pynpaw ha ki demand notice na kine ki artylli ki karkhana coke.Ka la ong ba watla ka Tnat Mining & Geology ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jubab halor ka show cause notice na baroh ki karkhana Ferro Allow, hynrei kine ki dang don hapdeng ka jingbishar da ka Tnat ba dei khmih.Halor ka jingtreikam jong ki karkhana cole bad ferro alloy, ka Tnat Mining & Geology ka Jylla ka pyntip sha ka Single Member Committee ba ki karkhana coke kiba ym shym la ïoh ïa ka Single Window Approval da ka Sorkar Meghalaya lane ka Consent To Establish (CTE) bad Consent To Operate (CTO) na ka MSPCB, kim shym la treikam shuh hapoh ka Jylla.U Chairman bad u Member Secretary ka MSPCB ki la pyntip sha u Single Member Committee ba wat ki karkhana coke ki bym pat pynthymmai ïa ki CTO, ym shym la shuh shuh ïa ki ban treikam.
title: Bthah ka High Court ïa ka Sorkar ban tohkit ïa u dewïong ba pyndonkam ki karkhana

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: U President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) ha ka sngi Palei u la ïathuh ba ka Congress ka la buh sngi ban thep kyrteng ha ka 25 tarik ha nongbah Shillong bad ha nongbah Tura.U Bah Vincent H.Pala un sa thep kyrteng ha Shillong katba u Saleng Sangma un sa thep kyrteng ha Tura na ka bynta ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024.“Ngi la buh ha kajuh ka sngi ha ka 25 tarik, Lber ban thep kyrteng ha Shillong bad ha Tura,” la ïathuh u Bah Pala ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang bad ki nongïalam ka Congress na ki District bad ki Block kaba la long ha Congress Bhavan ha ka sngi Palei.U la ïathuh ba ka party ka la lum ïa ki baroh ki District bad ki Block President, ïa ki katto katne ki Secretary jong ka party ban pynsngew ïa ki nongkren ki ban sa ai jingkren ha ki rynsan ïalap elekshon ha ki Constituency jong ki.“Ka jingthmu ka long ban pynsngerwthuh ïa ki nongkren ban batai ïa ki kumno ban kren bad ym dei ban kren kulmar bad haba kren kulmar ki briew ki kyntait. Ngi la kyrpad ba kim dei ban kren kulmar bad ban beiñ ban khoh namarba ka Congress ka ïapher na ki party riewlum. Kiwei kiwei ki party ki lah ban kren katba ki mon ngi pat kum ka National Party ngi hap ban pyrkhat ïa kaba mynta bad ïa kaba lashai,” la ong u Bah Pala.U la ïathuh ba shi bnai mynshwa, ka Congress ka la ai jinghikai ïa ki District President, ïa ki Block President bad ngi la ong ïa ki ban kren da ka akor ka burom bad namarba ka dei ka National Election ki dei ban tip ruh ïa ki jingkwah bad ki jingangnud jong ka Congress ban ïarap ïa ki nongrep, ban ïarap ïa ki nongtrei sorkar, ban ïarap ïa ki samla, ban ïarap ïa ki longkmie bad ban ïarap ïa ki khynnah pule bad kumta ter ter.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba watla ka Congress kam pat pyllait ïa ka Manifesto hynrei ki jingdonkam ban pynrung ha ka Manifesto ngin sa pynrung shen. “Nga dang shu wan phai na Delhi hynnin ka sngi Balang bad ngi la ïoh ïa ka Manifesto kaba ngin sa pynkylla ktien na ka Phareng sha ka Khasi bad ngin sa sam ïa ki apil ba la leh da ka party ngi dang phah shon bad tang hapoh shitaiew ngin sa lah ban sam sha ki nongtrei ka party,” u la ong.
title: Bthah ka Congress ïa ki District bad Block President ban ym kren kulmar ha ki rynsan elekshon

content: Shillong, 21 Lber : Watla ha kine ki sngi bad ki por ba la leit la ïohi ba ka la don ka jingthnam bha kane ka jingïakren pynbeit pud hapdeng ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam ha ka kylla kaba ar hynrei kane ka la sangeh noh mynta lah bun tylli ki bnai ha kaba kam shym la don shuh kano kano ka jingïalang hapdeng jong ki regional committee lane ka jingïaleit ïa jurip lang, watla ka Sorkar jylla ka la ong ba ka dang don ka jingïasyllok kaba manla ka por bad ka jylla Assam.“Kum u dkhot ka regional committee jong ka Ri -Bhoi district ngi dang ïai syllok bad ka jylla Assam hynrei namarba ki ilekshon sha ka Lok Sabha ki ban sa long kane ka kam ka lah sahteng. Ngi kyrmen ba hadien ba la pynbna ïa ki result ilekshon MP ki artylli ki regional committee kin sa shim ka rai halor ka tarik bad ban ïaid shakhmat ïa kane ka kam kaba lah sahteng ban ïoh ïakren hapoh ka kylla ne ka wat kaba ar khamtam ha ki thaiñ ba don jingïapher hapoh ka thaiñ Ri-bhoi district,” ong u MLA ka Nongpoh MLA bad u dkhot jong ka Ri-Bhoi regional committee, u Bah Mayralborn Syiem.Na ka liang jong u ula ong ba tang hadien kine ki ilekshon kan sa don biang ka jingïalang kaba bha kaban pynbud sa da ka jingïaleit jurip lang da kaba buh ruh ha ka jingmut ïa ka bha ka miat ki paidbah”.
title: Ka jingïasyllok ïakren bad ka Assam ka la sahteng noh ba don ka ilekshon MP, ong u MLA Nongpoh

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: Kum ka jingthmu ban kyntiew ïa ki kam jngohkai ha ka jylla na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka la lah ban ïoh ki jingkyrshan kiba biang napoh ka sorkar pdeng bad kiwei pat ki jaka treikam ba na shabar ri na ka bynta ban pynneh ïa ki jingpyrshang ban khmih ïa ka jingkiew jinghiar kiba wan jngohkai pyrthei sha ka jylla.“Kum ka sorkar jylla ngi kwah ban kyntiew ïa ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha baroh ki liang da ka jingpyrshang jong ka tnat ban peitngor ïa ka jingkiew jinghiar kiba wan jngohkai kaba mut ba ngin lah ban leit sha ka lynti kaba biang da ka jinglah ban pynlut ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha ka jylla,” ong u Mynti ka tnat Tourism u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.Na ka liang jong u, ula ong ba haba kwah ban kyntiew ïa kane ka kam, na ka liang ka tnat ka la leh bun ki kam jingtei bad ki projek kiba don ka jingdawa kaba heh halor kam jngohkai.“Ka sorkar ka kwah ban pynpoi ha kata ka kyrdan kaba ki nongwan jngohkai kin lah ban sah kumba 3 ne 4 sngi kaba rit eh da kaba ïoh ban leit jngoh sha kiba bun ki jaka bad ngi la ïoh ki jingkyrshan na ka sorkar pdeng bad kumjuh ruh ki lad jingïarap na ki jaka bei pisa ba nabar ri kum ka ADB,” u la bynrap.U la ong ba katkum ka jingkheiñ ki la don kumba 15 lak ngut eiei ki nongwan jngohkai napoh ka jylla bad kiba nabar ri kiba la wan jngohkai ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ha u snem 2023.Ka long kaba la lah ban ïathuh lypa ba kane ka karkhana jngohkai jong ka Meghalaya la khmih lynti ba kan kiew sha ka T, 12,000 klur ha u snem 2028, bad ka jingkheiñ manla ka snem jong ka jingwan kiba peitkai phutbol kan sa kiew sha ka 20 lak ngut. U la ong ba kane ka karkhana jngohkai pyrthei jong ka jylla ka la kiew ka jingïoh sha ka T. 1,600 klur ha u snem 2022 bad la khmih lynti ba kan nangkiew sha ka 10 per cent manla u snem.
title: Kumba 15 lak ngut kiew ka jingwan ki nongjngohkai pyrthei sha Meghalaya ha u 2023 : Paul Lyngdoh

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: Ka ophis u Commissioner of Customs (Preventive), Ministry of Finance, ka Sorkar India, ha ka sngi Palei ka la pyntip ba ka la pynjulor haduh 1019.490 kilo u Ganja bad 2.437 kilogram u drok Heroin uba shongdor T. 19.17 klur ba la kurup hapoh ka NDPS Act, 1985.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka ophis ophis u Commissioner of Customs (Preventive), Shillong ka la pyntip ba ka jingpynjulor ïa u drok la leh ha ka 21.3.2024 da kaba shu thang ha ka ding da ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Drug Disposal Committee ba kynthup ïa ki ophisar jong ka Customs bad DRI.Ka jingthang ïa u Ganja bad u Drok la leh da ka ophis Customs da kaba pynthikna ba la buh bha bad pynjulor noh ïa ki mar ba la ïoh kurup khnang ba kan long kum ka jingai jingpynshai sha ki paidbah bad sha ka ri baroh kawei.Ka jingpynjulor ïa u drok kan pynthikna ruh ba ka ri baroh kawei kan lait na ka jingshah teh mraw ha u drok.
title: Thang ka ophis Custom ïa u drok uba shongdor T. 19.17 klur

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: Na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka la ong ba ka la pyrshang bun ki lad jingtreikam ban pynkynriah ïa kiba shong hapoh ka Harijan colony bad kan ym don ka daw ka ban ai jingdonkam ne ai burom ïa ki jingtreikam ne jingbthah ba la pynmih da ka HNLC.“Ka sorkar ka la leh bun ki jingpyrshang bad kam pat shim la pynkut ïa kane ka jingmut ban pynkynriah ïa kiba shong hapoh ka Harijan colony. Kumta nga ïohi ba kam don ka daw ban ai burom ne ban shim kongsan than ïa ki jingbthah ne aipor ba la pynmih da ka HNLC,” ong u Myntri ka Sorkar jylla bad uba dei u nongaiktien ka sorkar MDA u Bah Paul Lyngdoh halor ka jingbyrngem ba la pynmih da ka HNLC ban pyndep pura ïa ka jingpynkynriah ïa kiba shong hapoh Harijan colony hapoh ka shibnai ne ba kin mad ïa ki jingeh.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor shaphang ka jingpynbthei bom kaba dangshen hapoh ka Them Metor bad ka jingbym shong shngaiñ ki nongshong shnong u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong, “Ka jingjia kaba kum kane kaju ïaijia ha baroh ki bynta jong ka pyrthei bad haba ïadei bad ka Meghalaya ki sngi jong ki kam pyntriem bad ki kam rah suloi ki la long ki sngi kiba la leit bad ka HNLC namar kane ka kam kam shym la long shuh ïa kaei kaba la jia ha ki 15 snem mynshwa”.U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong, “Kam dei ka kam kaba heh kaba dei ban pynkhuslai ïa ngi hynrei ngin ym lah pat ban shah jem ne kheiñ sting bad yn pynthikna ba ka tnat pulit kan pynkhlaiñ ïa ki bor ïada khnang ba kan lah ban tehlakam ïa kine ki jinglong jingman kiba lah ban mih ha ki sngi ban wan”.Haba ïadei bad ka jingshah ktah ki kam jngohkai, u Bah Lyngdoh uba dei ruh u Myntri ba khmih ïa ka tnat Tourism u la ong, “Kaei kaba la jia ka long tang ka jingpynkyndit ha kane ka kam kaba jia shisien lano ne kaba long marwei bad kam shym la dei kata kaba la pynlong ba kan dei kaba heh”.“Nga la ïohi ba wat ki jaka ba khlaiñ bha ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha kylleng ka pyrthei, kum ka ri London da kaba shu ong ka la long kaba la mad ïa ki sngi jong ki jingïakhih paidbah kiba ha ka jylla kam shym la ïohi ha ki phew snem mynshwa bad watla katta ruh ngin ym lah ban kheiñ shngaiñ ïa kum kine ki jingjia,” u la bynrap.Na ka liang jong u, ula ong, “Hynrei ngi sngew ba ka la don ka jingkylla kaba heh kaba la jia Meghalaya ha kaba mynta ki briew ki la peit ïa ka kam jngohkai kum ka jingai kam aijam kaba heh kaba kyntiew ïa ka ïoh kamai bad kin pynleit jingmut ban pynkhlaiñ ïa kane ka bynta bad ha baroh ki shnong bad phin ïohi ba wat ki dorbar shnong ki la wan shakhmat bad ïatreilang bad ka tnat ban pynthikna ba ka jinglong shngaiñ bad ki lad jingïada kiba wanjngoh kai kan long ka kam kaba hakhmat”.
title: Watla ka HNLC kam long shuh kum mynshwa, hynrei ngim dei ba kheiñ sting: Paul Lyngdoh

content: Shillong, Lber 21: Katkum ka jingtip bad ka lad khubor ba la ïoh na ki pulit la ïathuh ba ha ka janmied jong ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la shoh ïa u Bah Bonny Jyrwa da u screwdriver hapoh ka shnong Lumkhyriem Umpling, Shillong bad hadien kane ki la phet krad na kane ka jaka.Halor kane ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba utei u lanot u la mynsaw jur bad phah sumar ha NEIGRIHMS.Na ka liang ki pulit ki la iathuh ruh ba ka la don sa kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba ha ka janmied jong ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la prong jubor hapoh ka ïing jong ka Kong Jessica Kharbuli kaba ha Bishop Cotton Road, Shillong bad ki la tuh ïa kawei ka TV set, artylli ki LPG cylinder, ka pisa T. 1,000/-, bad kiwei pat ki tiar.
title: Shah shoh uwei ha ki runar bad shah tuh tiar ba remdor

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: U President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala u la kam ba ka jingbym treh jong ka Congress ban ïatreilang bad ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) ha Meghalaya ka dei na ka daw ba lada ki nongïalam ka ATIC ki leit ban pynïasoh sha ka BJP, kan sa paw pat hadien habud ba dei hi ka Congress kaba phah ïa ki nongtrei sha ka BJP.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei u Bah Pala u la ong, “ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïatreilang bad ka Trinamool Congress ym dei tang ma nga marwei ba shim ïa ka rai. Ma nga bad u Bah Ronnie ngi la leit sha Delhi ban ïakynduh ïa ki nongïalam ka TMC. Nalor kata, u Bah Charles Marngar, Bah Gabriel Wahlang, Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh bad u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem ngi la shong jingïalang bad ngi la pyrkhat bha lada ngi phah ïa ki nongkyrshan jong ngi ban kyrshan ïa ka TMC ha Garo Hills lashai pat lada ki (TMC) ki leit sha ka BJP, ka pyni ba ngi phah ïa ki nongtrei jong ngi sha ka BJP, namarba ngi la tip shai ba ki heh ka TMC ki don ka jingïakren bad ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut bad ka BJP.”“Ka kamram jong ngi kum ki nongïalam ka Party, ka long ban batai ïa ki heh jong ngi ha Delhi ruh. Ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki nongïalam ka TMC ha Shillong ka ïapher bad ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ka TMC ha West Bengal,” la ong u Bah Pala.“Hangne (ha Meghalaya) kin sa pynïasoh bad bun kiba la khot ïa ki briew jong ngi ban leit sha ka BJP. Ka jingïapher kam dei hapdeng jong nga bad u Dr. Mukul Sangma hynrei ka jingïapher ka long ba ngi ladep tip ba ki la thmu ban mih na ka TMC bad ha kawei ka sngi kin sa pynïasoh sha ka BJP. Balei ngin ngop ha kata ka jingriam jong ki. Kam dei ba nga ïapher jingmut ma nga bad u Mukul,” la bynrap u Bah Pala.“Nga la lei nga la ong ïa kine (nongïalam ka Congress) khie leit khot ïa u Dr. Mukul ban wan (phai biang sha ka Congress) bad nga kloi ruh ban ieh ïa ka kam President jong ka party bad ngin ai (ïa ka kam President) ha uno uno (u briew) uba u (Mukul) mon hynrei ma u (Mukul) hi u ong ba ka party Congress ka la hiar bad kam myntoi hi ruh ban phet na ka party Liang pyrshah sha ka party Liang Pyrshah bad dei ban ïoh hi ïa ka bor,” la kam u Bah Pala.Haba pynksan ba ka Congress kam salia lada don ha ka Liang Synshar ne Liang Pyrshah, u Bah Pala u la ong, “ngi pat haba ngi treikam paidbah ngim pyrkhat hi ruh ïa kata ka Liang Pyrshah ne Liang Synshar bad lada ki paidbah ki bynshet ha ngi ïa ka bor ban trei ngin trei katba lah la ngi don ha kano kano ka kyrdan.”
title: Ngi la tip shai ba ki heh ka TMC ki la don ka jingïakren bad ka BJP; kynnnoh u Bah Pala

content: Shillong, 21 Lber: U nongïalam ka UDP bad u MLA ka Nongpoh u Bah Mayralborn Syiem u la ong ba ki don ki kynhun shitniam kiba treikam shitrhem bad kiba pyrshang ban shim kabu ïa ka jinglong kaba don jingma ka jinglong jingman ha kaba ïadei bad ka niam ne jingngeit ha u pud u sam ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam shibynta jong ka ri bad ka jylla ka donkam long kaba husiar bad peitngor bha.“Ngam dei ba nga kynnoh ïa baroh ne ïano ïano hynrei ka dei tang kawei ka kynhun ki briew kiba pyrshang ban shim kabu ïa ka jinglong syier ka jinglong jingman ym tang ha kaba ïadei bad ka niam hynrei ïa ka shongsuk shongshngaiñ ka kolshor hapoh ka jylla. Ki la don ki kynhun pynkheiñ aiñ kiba pyrshang ban shim kabu bad kine ki shitniam ki treikam bha ym tang ha khappud ka jylla Assam bad Meghalaya hynrei kane ka la jia ha baroh kawei ka ri,” ong u Bah Syiem da kaba pynkynmaw ba ki la don ki jingjia ba leit tah poster bad kiba donkti ban ai bor da kiba don ha ka bor khlem da ïoh ka jingmynjur kaba dei, ban shim kabu halor ka niam bad halor ka pule puthi hapoh ka thaiñ Marmain kaba ha khappud bad ka Assam.U la ong, “Ngi dei ban pynthikna ba ki briew jong ngi kiba sah khamtam ha ki thaiñ khappud kin I’m suk bad kum shi para. Ïa ngi la ai ka jingïada da ka Riti synshar ka Ri kaba itynnad kum ka ri kaba long laitluid ha ka niam ne jingngeit ha kaba ngi long kiba laitluid ban bud ïa kano kano ka niam kaba ngi kwah bad ngi khmih lynti ïa kane ba kan ïaid”.
title: Don ki kynhun shitniam kiba treikam da ka hukum ki briew ba don ha ka bor, ong u Bah Mayralborn

content: Shillong, Lber 21: Ka kyrtong jong ka Seng NPP na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kan thep kyrteng ha ka sngi thohdieng ha ka por 11 baje mynstep. Ïa kane la ïathuh da u State President ka NPP, u Bah Prestone Tynsong haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor ha Shillong.“Ngi la ïapynbeit bad i Kyrtong jong ka Seng ban thep kyrteng noh ha ka 22 tarik ha ka por 11 baje mynstep”, la ong u Bah Prestone Tynsong.La sngewthuh ba ha kane ka jingleit thep kyrteng yn synran lang ruh da ki nongïalam ba hakhmat jong ka Party ryngkat ki nongkyrshan jong ka Party.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka Dr. Ampareen, ka la jop nyngkong eh ha ka elekshon haba ka la jop kum ka MLA jong ka Laitumkhrah ha u snem 2008 na ka Seng UDP. Hynrei hadien shi snem, ka la iehnoh nih ïa ka kam MLA bad ïakhun ïa ka elekshon shiteng samoi ban jop da ka Seng Congress. Shuwa ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon shiteng samoi, ka la long ka Myntri hapoh ka sorkar ba ialam da ka Congress hadien ka jingsynshar President Rule ha katei ka snem.Hadien kane ka la jop biang ïa ka elekshon na ka Congress ha ka snem 2013 bad 2018 bad ha u snem 2023 pat ka la jop na ka Seng NPP hadien ba ki MLA ka Congress ki la phet noh sha ka Seng NPP. Mynta la long ka Myntri jong ka sorkar MDA-2.Na ka liang u kyrtong jong ka Congress, u Bah Vincent Pala, uba long u Sitting MP un thep kyrteng ha ka sngi nyngkong, kata ha ka 25 tarik mynta u bnai. U Bah Pala u la jop MP nyngkong eh ha ka snem 2009, ha kaba u la ïoh long ruh u Myntri Khynnah ha ka sorkar pdeng. Nangta u la jop biang ha u snem 204 bad 2019 na ka Congress hi.Katba na ka liang u Kyrtong ka VPP, u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon pat, un thep kyrteng ha ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 11 baje mynstep, ha kaba kan don shuwa ka jingïalang ha ophis jong ka Seng ha Laitkor. Nangne kin sa mih lang ki nongïalam ka Seng, lait noh u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit, President u ban hap leit sha ka jingïalap elekshon ka Party ha Jaiñtia Hills ha katei ka sngi.Ka Party ka bthah ïa ki paidbah nongkyrshan ban ïa mih lang ha katei ka sngi da kaba wan sha ophis jong ka Seng ha Laitkor, hynrei ki bym lah ban wan sha ophis ki lah ban ap hajan All India radio ban synran lang ïa u Kyrtong.
title: 22 tarik ka Dr. Ampareen, 25 u Bah Vincent bad 26 u Dr. Ricky kin thep kyrteng

content: Shillong, Lber 21: Ka Tnat sam bording ka jylla ka Meghalaya Energy Power Generation Corporation Limited (MePGCL) ha ka sngi palei ka la pynbna ba kan khang ïaid kali na ka jingkieng Umïam (Damsite) naduh ka 31 tarik Lber haduh ka 8 tarik Ïaïong namar ka jingmaramot ïa ka jingkieng ka dang ïaid shaphrang bad na ka liang ka tnat ka la pyntip ruh ba ïa kane ka jingpynbeit ïaid kali kadang dei tang ka jingtyrwa bad ka shong pat ïa ka sorkar ba kan pynbna khambniah shwa ka 3 sngi lada pyntreikam ïa kane ka jingtyrwa ban khang ïaid kali.Ka tnat ka la pyntip ruh ba ha ka 31 tarik Lber, ka jingkhang ban ïaid kali kan treikam tang hynriew kynta, naduh ka por 8 baje mynstep haduh ka por 2 baje janmied. Ka la ong ba tang ki Ambulance yn shah ban ïaid ha kane ka por.Ka MePGCL ka pyntip ruh ba hadien ba la dep pyntrei ïa ka kam, yn sa plie noh ïa shiliang jong ka surok ba pynnoh sha kaphang jong ka wah, ba kin ïaid ki kali kiba khia hapoh ka 4 ton. Ka jingplie ïa shiliang ka surok kan long ha baroh kine ki phra sngi haduh ka por 7 baje mynstep jong ka 8 tarik Ïaïong.Ka la pyntip ruh ba hadien ka 8 tarik Ïaïong, hadien ka por 7 baje mynstep, yn sa shah ban ïaid sa ïa ki kali kiba hapoh ka 15 ton na ka phang jong ka surok ba pynnoh sha ka liang ka wah.Ka la kyntu ruh ïa ki Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills bad Ri-Bhoi District ba kin ithuh ïa ki jaka hashuwa ban poi sha ka dam na ka bynta ban pynïeng ïa ki kali hapdeng ka por 8 baje mynstep haduh 2 baje janmied jong ka 31 tarik Lber.La kyntu ruh ïa ka Tnat PWD ba kan shong bishar bad ithuh ïa kiwei pat ki lynti ïaid ha ka por ka jingkhangdam ba 6 kynta ïa ka jingkieng ban ïaid kali ha ka 31 tarik Lber ban lah pynïaid ïa kiwei pat ki kali kiba khia palat ïa ka 4 ton.
title: Pynbna ka MeECL ban khang ïaid kali na jingkieng Umïam naduh ka 31 tarik Lber

content: Shillong, Lber, 21 : Uwei u nongtrei jong ka kompeni na ka jylla Uttar Pradesh la kynnoh ba u la shah rahbor na ki briew ki bym lah ban ithuh na Karukol Siju, South Garo Hills District, ong ki Pulit ha ka sngi Palei.Haduh mynta ym pat lah satia ban ïoh jingtip shaphang u Akhilesh Chauhan, 50 snem ka rta uba la shah rahbor ha ka por mynstep ha ka 20 tarik Lber, la ong ki Pulit.U Chauhan u dei uba trei kum u Foreman bad kawei ka kompeni ba la tip kyrteng kum ka R.K. Singh Construction Company bad u dei uba trei ïa kawei ka jingkieng ha surokbah National Highway-217 ha ka shnong Rongdik, ha Karukol kaba hab hapoh ka Siju police station.“Ka jingthwet ban lap dien ka dang bteng hadien ba ngi la ïoh jingtip shaphang kane ka jingshah rahbor. Ngi dang trei shitom ban lap dien ïa u lanot,” ong u SP ka South Garo Hills u Shailendra Bamaniya.Haba ïathuh katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Manager ka Compeny, u Bamaniya u la ong ba u Chauhan u la shah rahbor ha ki briew ki bym lah satia ban ithuh durkhmat kiba la rung jubor ha ka jaka trei ban wad umphniang diesel da kaba ai daw ba ka kali jong ki ka la lut umphniang.“U Chauhan katba u dang leit peit ïa ka top buh umphniang diesel, u la jahrngai khlem ïohi shu bad ki briew ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ruh ki la jah lang,” u la bynrap.,Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la register case bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: Shah rahbor u nongtrei ka R.K. Singh Construction Company na UP ha Garo Hills

content: New Delhi, Lber, 21: Shwa ba ka ri India baroh kawei kan leit sha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha sa tang khyndiat taiew, u Arvind Kejriwal uba long u Myntri Rangbah ka Delhi bad u nongïalam jong ka Aam Aadmi Party u la shah kem ha ka Enforcement Directorate halor ka jingkynnoh bamsap ha ka Liqour Policy.Ka Enforcement Directorate ka la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit halor ka jingbuhrieh ïa ka pisa bamsap kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia.U Kejriwal un long u Myntri Rangbah ba nyngkong eh ban shah kem naduh ba ka ri India ka la ïoh ïa ka jinglaitluid bad ka Aam Aadmi Party ka la pyntip ba u Kejriwal un dang ïai bteng ban bat ïa ka shuki Myntri Rangbah.Haba kren shabar ka iingsah jong u Myntri Rangbah ha ka sngi Palei, ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Delhi ka Atishi ka la ong, “ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ka Enforcement Directorate ka la kem ïa u Kejriwal. Ka jingkem ïa u Kejriwal ka dei ka jingïasuhbuit da ka BJP bad u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi.Naduh ba la sdang ka jingtohkit halor kane ka Case naduh ar snem mynshwa, ka ED ne wat ka CBI kim shym la ïoh kurup satia wat tang shi tyngka ruh ha ka jingkhynra ba palat shi hajar sien ïa ki ing sah jong ki nongïalam ka AAP bad ki Myntri ka Sorkar Delhi.Haba pyntip ba ïa u Kejriwal ym pat rai pynrem, ka Atishi ka la ong ba ka party kan sa leit ujor hakhmat ka Ingbishar Supreme Court pyrshah ïa ka jingshah kem jong u Kejriwal. “Ki muktiar jong ngi ki la leit sha Ingbishar bad ujor halor kane bad ngin dawa ba ïa kane ka case dei ban shong bishar mynta hi ka miet,“ ka la ong.Ka kynhun jong ka ED ba kynthup ïa ki 12ngut ki Ophisar, ki la poi ha ingsah jong u Kejriwal da kaba rah lang ïa ka Search Warrant ha ka janmiet sngi Palei bad tohkit ïa u shwa ban kem. Ïa ka mobile phone jong u bad jong ka kurim la kurup bad ïa ki data la shim na ki ar tylli ki Tablet bad na ki ar tylli ki Laptop hapoh ka ingsah jong u.Katba ki ophisar ka ED ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit ïa u Kejriwal ha ingsah jong u, la pynap pahra ruh da ki Pulit ka Delhi bad ki pulit ka Rapid Action Force (RAF) bad kumjuh ruh ki Pulit CRPF. Nalor kata, la pynjari ruh da ki jingmana shabar ka ingsah jong u katba ki nongkyrshan ka AAP ki dang ïalum shabar ka ing ban pyrshah ïa ka jingkem ïa u Kejriwal.Ka jingkem ïa u Kejriwal ka long tang hapoh shitaiew ba ka nongïalam jong ka BRS ka K. Kavitha ka la shah rah sha thanat ban shah tohkit halor ka Liquor Policy Case. Hadien ba la kem ïa ka, u Kejriwal ha ka sien banyngkong eh, u la shah jer kyrteng kum u nongïasuhbuit halor kane ka case.
title: Kem ka Enforcement Directorate ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Delhi u Arvind Kejriwal

content: Shillong, Lber 12 : U Nongïalam ka Congress bad MP ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency u ma Vincent H Pala mynta ka Sngi Palei u la ong ba ka Congress kan hap ban ïa khun ïa kane ka election kaba 18 jongka ïing Dorbar Thawain Lok Sabha hapdeng kiba bun ki jingeh namar ka BJP ka la knieh jubor ïa ki 11 tylli ki Bank Account jongka Congress kiba don pisa haduh 215 klur tyngka.U la ong ka jingïai kiew ki jingïaleh makynti ne jingïapher jingmut hapoh ka BJP ha kylleng ka ri kan plie lad ïa ki party ki bym don jingïadei bad ka BJP ban ïoh thaw ïa ka sorkar kaba thymmai hadien ka election.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang jongka party u ma Pala u la ong “ Kane ka election ka lah ban ym long kum kiwei ki election namar kane ka jingleh jubor bad knieh jubor jongka BJP ïa ki Bank Account jongka Congress kiba don pisa 215 klur tyngka. Na katei ki la sei jubor ruh ïa ka pisa haduh 115 klur tyngka ban ai sha ka Income Tax. Kumta ngin hap ban ïaleh ïa ka election hapdeng kiba bun ki jingeh khamtam ha ka liang ka pisa ka tyngka. Ka BJP ka leh ïa kane namar ka tip shai kdar ba dei tang ka Congress kaba lah ban ïakhun ïa ka ha kane ka election.Ha kine ki lai bad saw bnai ka party ka la lum synniang na ki paidbah ha kaba kiba bun ki riew shimet ki la noh synniang sha ka party. Don bun ruh kiba la noh synniang wat nangne na Shillong ruh. Haba ka BJP ka tip ïa kane ka la pynhiar kput da kaba sei ïa katei ka pisa bad thep sha ka Account jongka Income Tax.U la pynpaw ba kine ki jingleh thombor jongka BJP ka la pynbitar ïa kiba bun bad khlem pep ka BJP kan sa ïoh hi la ka bainong ha kane ka election ba mynta. U pynpaw ka jingkyrmen skhem ba ki paidbah kin jied ïa ka Congress ban ïoh ïalam thaw ïa ka sorkar ha Delhi.“ Ka BJP kumba long mynta ka la jur sa tang ki jingïapher jingmut ha kylleng ka ri. Mynshwa ki khlaiñ bha ha Bihar mynta kam long shuh kumta. Mynshwa ka khlaiñ bha ha Karnataka bad mynta kam long shuh. Mynshwa ka khlaiñ bha ha Rajasthan hynrei mynta kam khlaiñ shuh. Mynshwa ka khlaiñ ha Delhi hynrei mynta ka la nang troiñ nangtroiñ. Ka jur bha ka jingïaleh makynti para nongïalam kum ha Madhya Pradesh, Haryana, Bihar bad kylleng ki jaka.
