Ka la pynduh tiket ïa kiba bun ki MP, ki la pynkylla ïa kiba bun ki Myntri Rangbah. Kumta kine kiei kiei baroh ki la nang pyntroiñ ïa ka BJP namar ka la pyndonkam bakla palat ïa ka bor bad khamtam lei lei ka phrung beit da ka niam ha ka saiñ pyrthei kumta kane ka dei ka kabu ïa kiwei ki party ban pynkut noh ïa ka BJP.Hangne ha Meghalaya ruh ki paidbah ki phai khmat sha ka Congress. “ Wat la kiba bun ki nongïalam ki la shah khring hynrei ki nongtrei ba shitrhem ki dang ïai neh bad ka Congress. Ki paidbah ki tip shai ba tang ka Congress kaba dei ka party kaba lah ban ïakhun ïa kane ka party shitniam bad khniot beiñ ïa ki rit paid katba ka Congress ka burom ïa ki rit paidbah bad ka ieit bad burom ïa ki trai ri trai muluk bad ki riewlum. Kumta ki nongthep vote jongka Shillong bad Tura ki tip lut ïa kine ki jingleh jongka BJP bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki kam jongka sorkar MDA bad na kata ka daw mynta ki phai khmat sha ka Congress” ong u ma Pala.
title: Knieh jubor ka BJP 11 tylli ki Bank Account ba 215 klur ka Congress shwa ka Election

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: Ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi District ha ka sngi Palei ki la pyllait paidbah ïa kawei ka video ba la ring dur ïa ka jingïakren da ka mobile phone hapdeng u Military Commander ka seng kieng atiar Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) uba la tip kyrteng kum u Sanbor Pala uba la bthah ïa uwei na kiba la shah kem ha ka jingïoh kurup ïa u bom IED ha Ribhoi dang shen.Katkum kane ka video la sakhi ba u Sanbor Pala u la pan jingpynshai na u dkhot ba la phah ban pynbthei ïa u bom IED ha kaba u dkhot u la kyntait ban leh ïa kane ka kam bymman da kaba ai daw ba ka mynsiem jong u kam ailad satia ïoh ba ka jingbthei jong u bom kan pynngat kylla ïa ki jaidbynriew lajong.Nalor kata, ha ka jingïakren u dkhot u la kam ba u ladep bret ïa ka tiar, ïa kaba la suba ba u lah ban dei u bom IED ba ladep pynkhreh lypa ban pyntbthei ha ka jaka ba la thmu.Shuh shuh, u Military Commander ka HNLC u la bthah ïa u dkhot ban sangeh shwa ïa mynta shipor ban leh ïa ki kam pyntriem namarba ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ka jingthwet kaba jur ïa ki briew kiba donkti ha ka jingpynbthei bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka miet 9 tarik mynta u bnai.U Superintendent of Police ka Ribhoi u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ïathuh ba ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit halor ka case ba la register ha Nongpoh Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/121A Indian Penal Code bad pule lang bad ka Section 10/13/18 UA(P) Act bad ka Sec 5/6 Explosives Substance Act ki la kem sa arngut ki briew.Ha ka jingtohkit, ki Pulit ki la lap ba ka seng HNLC ka donkti ban pynngop ïa ki samla kiba lui lui ban leh ïa ki kam pyntriem da kaba buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingdawa pisa.Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ksai la ki don neem ki briew kiba la siew pisa sha kane ka seng kieng atiar bad ki Pulit ki la maham ruh ba lada kino kino ki briew ki don jingïadei kin shah kem bad shah tohkit bad yn pynngat beit hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Unlawful Activities Prevention Act.Shuh shuh u SP u la ïathuh ba ki Pulit ki la register case ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsieh ïa ka lama jong ka seng HNLC ha surokbah National Highway ha Ribhoi District ha u Nailar, 2023 bad ïa kane ka case la register ha Nongpoh Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/121A jong ka Indian Penal Code bad pule lang ruh bad ka Section 10/13 jong ka UA(P)Act.Ha kajuh ka por, une u heh Pulit ka Ribhoi u la ïathuh ba ïa ki kam runar jong ka HNLC la tohkit bniah lyngba ka Social Media bad na ka VO1P. U SP u la kyntu ïa kino kino ki briew lada ki ïoh phone call na ka HNLC ki dei ban pyntip mardor sha ki Pulit bad ban khang noh ïa ka dur bad ïa u nombar ba la ïakren.U SP u la ong ba la lada lap ïa kino kino ki briew kiba don jingïadei bad ka seng HNLC yn kem bad ban pyngngat ha ki kyndon aiñ kiba eh.
title: Pyllait ki Pulit ïa ka Video ba bthah u Military Commander ka HNLC ïa u dkhot ban pynbthei IED

content: Bdws
title: Bdws

content: Shillong, Lber, 21: U President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala u la kynthoh tyngeh halor ka jingkren jong u President ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Bah Ardent M. Basaïawmoit ha kawei na ki jingïalang ba ki Tymmen Basan ki donkti ban sam kiad.“Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka shu ong ba ki Pastor kiba sam kiad bad kata ka lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngew jong ka Balang baroh kawei hynrei ha ka jingshisha ka dei ban ong, ‘uei uta u Pastor, uei uta u Tymmen Basan uba leh, khnang ba ka Balang kan dup lah ban leh eiei ïa uno uno uba leh. Ban shu ong u Tymmen Basan u sam kiad ka pyni ba baroh ka Balang ka sam kiad bad kam ïahap,” la ong u Bah Vincent Pala ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei.“Ka VPP lada ka shlur ka dei ban ong uei uta uba leh khnang ba ma ngi ruh ngin don ka jingsngew shaniah hynrei ban shu ong u ong uta, u ong uta, ka long kamkai ki nongkren bad ka pyni ïa ka saiñpyrkhat jong ki,” la kynthoh u Bah Pala.“Ka saiñpyrkhat jong ka BJP ka long ban kynnoh ïa kiwei ki party bad dei tang ka BJP kaba hok. Ka Saiñpyrkhat jong ka VPP ruh kajuh hi, tang (ma) ki bahok, baroh kiba tuh suda na kata ka daw kam ïahap satia ha kane ka imlang ka sahlang jong ngi. Ki dei ban ïathuh mano ba leh khnang ba ngin sngewthuh ba ka jingkren jong ki ka long kaba dei. Hynrei ban shu ong ma nga u bahok, utei uba tuh dei ban da batai shai” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Pala da kaba ban biang ba ka sainpyrkhat jongka VPP kam ïapher satia na ka sainpyrkhat ka BJP ki ïa long kumjuh.“Ngi sngewtynnat haba mih ki party kiba thymmai ba ki paidbah kin ïoh jied hynrei mar ïa mih la sdang noh ban kynnoh bad ngi sngewthuh lada tlot ka Balang bad ka imlang ka sahlang kan ym ktah tang hangne hapoh Meghalaya bad kan ktah ïa baroh kawei ka ri India,” ong u Bah PalaHaba kynthoh ïa ka BJP, u Bah Pala u la ong, “nga la ïoh ïa ki jingthoh ki breiw ki la sdang ban kren pyrshah ïa ki Balang bapher bapher. Kane baroh ka dei ka saiñdur jong ka BJP ba ka la suhbuit naduh mynshwa ban kren pyrshah ïa kiwei ki party, dei ban kren pyrshah ruh ïa ki Balang bad ban kren pyrshah ruh wat ïa ki nongïalam Balang khnang ba ki briew kin duh jingshaniah bad ka imlang ka sahlang kan tlot bad kan tlot noh ka jaidbynriew. Kin ai sa u drok, kin ai sa ka kiad. Yn ïohnong ki shimet ki armet, kan duhnong pat ka imlang ka sashlang. Kata ka dei ka jingma kaba ngi don kumba ka long mynta.”
title: Ka saiñpyrkhat jong ka VPP ka long tang ma ki, ki bahok, long thik kum ka BJP kynthoh u Bah Vincent Pala

content: Jowai, Lber 23: U Pastor Mechak Shylla uba long ruh u Pastor haba kren haka sngi long Dorbar Pyllun kaba Saw jong ka Seiñ Kur Shylla West Jaiñtia Hills ha Sabah Muswang Hall ïa ki samla, ula ong ka pyrthei ka long kaba eh bha mynta ki sngi haka jingïadei bad ka jingnang jingstad da kaba ong ba wat haba la ïoh haduh 80% shaneng ki marks ruh wat tang ban ïoh Admission ha ki jaka pule ne College ka long kaba eh.Ula ong mynta ka pyrthei kala bun kiba nang bastad kaba la long ka jingïakhun (Competition) ïa ki samla pule mynta haba thmu ban leit pule sha kiwei pat ki kyrdan bakham shalor, ula ong ruh mynta ki sngi ki kmie ki kpa kim pynleit skul shuh ïa ki khun jong ki na ka bynta ban ïoh kam sorkar hadien ka jingpule, namar mynta ym shuh kum ka por kaba mynshwa, ym dei ban khmih lynti ban ïoh ïa ka kam sorkar hynrei lada don ka jingstad lah ban trei ïa shibun kiwei pat ki jait kam.Shuh shuh ula kyntu ïa ki samla ba kane ka jingpynkup burom ïa ki ka long tang kum ka jingpyn kynmaw ïa ki, ba kin nang ïaid trei shitom shuh shuh nangne shakmat, na ka bynta ban long ki khlur ki ban wan rah ïa ka nam ka burom ïaka kur bad ka jait bynriew.Na ka liang u ma Meshak ula ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki nongkit kam ka seng Kur, ba ki la lah ban pynlong ïa kum kane ka jait programe kaba donkam bha na ka bynta ki samla, u ma Meshak kum u Pastor ula ai ka jingsngeng jingkyntiew ïa baroh ki para kur kiba la wan sha kane ka jingïalang jong ki Kur Shylla.Ïa ka jinglang mynta ka sngi la pynïaid da u ma Barnes Shylla, ha kaba la ïoh ruh ki jingkren na u President Seiñ Kur Shylla ma Pyrkhat Shylla.
title: Pynlong ka Seiñ Kur Shylla ïa ka Dorbar Pyllun ba Saw ha Sabah Muswang

content: Kat kum ka jingthmu, baroh ki seng ki long hi ban wanrah ka jingmyntoi naka bynta ki babun balang bad ban trei naka bynta ban kyntiew bad peit ïa ka jingbit jingbiang jong kano kano ka bynta ha ka imlang sahlang. Ka jingdon jong kiba bun jait ki seng naduh sengbhalang, ki seng niam, ki seng tynrai, seng ki nongkhaïi, seng ki nongtrei ophis, seng ki samla pule bad bun kiwei pat ki seng ka long shisha kaba donkam. Hynrei ka long kaba donkam pat ban don ia ki nongïalam kiba don ka jinglah ban kit ïa ka lyngkor bad ban trei ia ka kam ha ka rukom kaba iaid beit ïaid ryntih. Kat haduh mynta ki dang don bun ki jait seng kiba kim shym la ioh satia ia ki nongïalam kiba don ka jingtbit namar ba kim shym la ioh ia ka jinghikai kaba biang ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam paidbah.Ka jingdon ki nongïalam kiba tbit bad kiba la ioh jinghikai kan iarap shibun ia ka seng ban trei kam kham stet bad ha ka juh ka por kan pynsuk ruh ia kito kiwei pat ki tnad kiba iadei kam bad ki. Ym lah ban len ba na ka liang jong ki seng kmie ne ki Central body ki don hi ia ki nongialam kiba bit ban trei ia ka kam paidbah, hynrei kib a bun na ki nongkitkam jong ki Unit jong ki khamtam kiba dei na sha ki thain nogkyndong ki dang donkam shibun ki jingshah hikai ban pynlong ia ki, kiba tbit ban trei ia ka kam paidbah.Kumta ka long kaba donkam ia ki seng kmie ne Central Body ban shim khia ban pynioh ia ka jinghikai kaba biang sha ki nongkitkam jong ki tnad ne ki unit bapher bapher. Ki nongkitkam kam jong ki tnad ki donkam ban don ka jingnang kumno ban thoh ia ki shithi sha kito kiba ki donkam ia kino kino ki jingiatreilang ne jingiarap kum sha ki Ophisar sorkar, ki kot khubor, ki tnad pulit bad kiwei pat. Kat haduh mynt dang don bun bah ki nongialam kiba ym tip ei ei ruh em shaphang kane ka kam kaba donkam eh. Bun sien ki wan sha ki ophis jong ki kot khubor ruh ki shu wan buh beit ia ki jingthoh kiba long tang kum ki jingpynbna paidbah ne poster khlem kano kano ka ktien lamphrang ban kyrpad ne iarap pynmih lem ia ki jingthoh jong ki.Khamtam lei ki nongkitkam jong ki seng ba dei na ki thain nongkyndong naduh ki Dorbar Shnong bad ruh ki seng tynrai ki dang duna bha shibun ha kane ka liang. Kumta ka long kaba donkam ban pynioh ia ka kynja jingialang ne Seminar kaba kyrpang na ka bynta ban ai jinghikai sha kitei ki nongialam ban nang ban thoh ia ki shithi naduh kiba iadei bad ki kot khubor, ki pulit bad ruh ki ophis sorkar. Ka jinglah jong ki nongialam jong ki tnad ne unit ban thoh ha ka rukom kaba beit bad kaba ryntih kan iarap ia ki hi ba kin kham trei khambha bad kin lait ruh na ki jingshah kyntait haba ki donkam ia kino kino ki jingiarap kiba kyrkieh ha kiwei pat ki liang.Ki don ki briew kiba la kham rangbah kiba ieid bad sngewtynnad ban iakit iabah bad iatynrong lang ia ki kam bhalang khamtam lei ha kaba pynnneh pynsah ia la ka jong ka tynrai bad ka riti ka dustur, hynrei ka jingduna jong ki ha ka bynta ban thoh ia ki shithi ka buh jingeh ia ki ban iakynduh ia kito kiba ki donkam. Khamtam lei ha kaba iadei bad ki kotkhubor ka dei ka bynta kaba donkam eh ia ki nongkitkam ban shim khia namar ka dei ka kam kaba iadei bad ki paidbah hi. Bun sien ym ju lah ban pynmih ia ki jingthoh ba la phah da ki tnad seng bapher bapher namar ba kim shym la long satia kiba biang bad la shu phah da ki briew ban wan rah pateng khlem kano kano ka jingpynthikna ia ka jingshisha.Bun sien ki kot khubor kim lah ban pynmih ia ki jingthoh namar ba ym biang ki jingsoi, ki jingkam jingkitkhlieh wat la ki long makna ki sobjek kiba donkam bha na ka bynta ka imlang ka sahlang ruh. Namar kata ka long kaba donkam ia ki seng bapher bapher ban peit ba baroh ki nongkitkam jong ki tnad kin long kiba la ioh jinghikai. Ka long ruh kaba donkam ban don ia ka jingai jinghikai halor kiba bun kiwei pat ki phang ha kaba iadei bad ki kam paidbah bad ka hok jong ki paidbah sha baroh ki nongkitkam khnang ba kin tip khambha ban trei ia ka kam kaba iadei bad ki paidbah. Khamtam lei ha kaba iadei bad ka ain ki nongkitkam ki dei ban tip khambha ia ka hok jong ki nongshong shnong bad ruh ia ka hok ba ka sorkar ka bat na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paidbah hi.
title: Ki nongïalam bad ki kam shakri paidbah

content: Jowai, Lber 23: Ki 24 ngut ki samla kynthup 11 ngut ki kynthei bad 13 ngut ki shynrang kila pyndep ïaka jingshah hikai ban long kum ki ‘Security’ hapoh ka jingkhmih jong ka Bouncer Association of Meghalaya (BAM) Jaiñtia Hills.La pynkup burom ïaki mynta ka sngi Saitjaiñ 23 tarik u Lber, 2024 haka jingïalang ba shongkun bala pynlong ha ka jaka ai jinghikai ka BAM-JH ha Tlane Mynkjai surok Dawki kaba dei trai jong u Dalloi ka Elaka Jowia ma Puramon Kynjing.Kitei ki samla kiba la dep shah hikai haka kam Security ban long kum ki nongïada bad ki lad pahara kan wanrah nyngkong ïa ka jingshongsuk shong shngaiñ haki bynta bapher bapher, la sam bad pynithuh ïa ki da ki Syrnod jong ka Association ha kaba kin ïoh ban apply ïa ki kam ki jam bad napdeng kine kin long kum ki dkhot ka BAM.La pynkup burom ïa kitei ki samla 24 ngut da u kongsan uba dei u Dolloi ka Elaka Jowai ma Puramon Kynjing bad ula pynher ruh ïa ka lama ka Association, haka jingdonlang u symbud kongsan ma Army Lipon President Synjuk Waheh Shnong Ri-Lum Jaiñtia, u OC ka Jowai Police Station ma S. Manar, u Iahmioo Khyriam Adviser ka BAM, ki Waheh Shnong bad kiwei de kiba la shah khot sngewbha, nalor ka jingdonlang ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah ba shah hikai.Na ka liang u kongsan ma Puramon Kynjing haka jingkren ula ai ka jingïaroh kyrpang ïa u nongseng jong ka Association uba long ruh u President ma Yoosar Kynjing uba don shisha ka mynsiem trei shitom ban wanrah kum kane ka kynhun ban pynïoh kam ïaki khun samla.Ula pynsngew ruh kaba donkam eh haka jingim ban don ka akor ka burom bad ka jingim bha im mait, khnang ba hadien habud kiwei kin ïoh ban ithuh ïa ki kam naduh na ïing, ha ka imlang ka sahlang bad haka Ri hi baroh kawei.Shuh shuh ula ong “ka kmie kaba hakhlieh duh bad kaba ieit tam dei ka Ri-India bad ka kmie kaba don ha mynsiem ka dei ka kmie ba kha ba pun bad kaba pynheh pynsan ïa ki khun”. Ula ong ka jingïoh hikai jong ki samla na kane ka Training kan sa long kum ka duriaw bah ba kin shemphang ha ki kam ki jam, nalor ka jingkoit jingkhiah.U Dalloi ula kyntu kum ka Association kaba nyngkong dei ban don ka jinglong ba bha haka akor burom bad ka dur khmat phuh samrkhie, “Ka spah bad ka burom ki dei ar tylli ki bynta ha ka jingim hynrei kaba kordor haka jingim dei ka burom kaba long ka jingkyrkhu bad ka nam”.U ma Army Lipon ha ka jingkren u ai ka jingkyntu ïa ki kmie ki kpa ban kit peit bha ïa ki khun ki kti ban im bha im miat, ula la ïaroh ïa ka BAM kaba long kum ka jingkhang ban plie lad ïa ki khun samla ha ka ïoh kam ïoh jam, wat ha ki kharkhana pynmih Dewbilat kiba wan seng hapoh ka Ri-lum Jaiñtia kine ki samla ki dei ban ïoh kam kum ka lad ban krad ïa ki bar jylla.Ha ka juh ka por ula kyntu ïa kane ka Association ha kine ki sngi ban wan kan pynlong ïa ki prokram ai jinghikai (Awareness) ha kylleng ki shnong ki thaw khnang ba ki khun samla ki lait na ki jingdih ba sniew kum ka kyiad bad u Drug.ma S. Maner (OC) ula ong donkam ban don ka akor burom namar khlem ka akor burom ym donkam satia haka jingim, ula kyntu lyngba ka kane ka Training Center ki samla kin ïoh shibun ki jinghikai ban im ha ka jingshemphang da kaba ong ïa ki kyntien “sian kum u bseiñ jemnud kum ka paro”,Ula buh ruh ka jingkyntu ïa ki kmie ki kpa bad ïa ki khun samla ban lait na ki kam thok kam shukor naduh ka rukom dawa pisa kiba wan na ki bor Internet lyngba ki mobile phone.La pynsngew da ki nongïalam ka BAM-JH kane ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong 1st Batch ïa ka BAM-JH ban shim ïa kane ka jingai jinghikai ïaki samla 24 ngut ban long Security, da kaba kitbok kitrwiang ba kin ïoh ïa ki kam ki jam jong ki ha ki ïew ki hat, ki ophis bapher bapher bad kumjuh ha ki kam sorkar.La pynshong shit shuh shuh ïa kane ka sngi da ki jingrwai bad ki jingshad na ki dkhot ka Association la ïoh ïa ki kyntien pdiang sngewbha ha kane ka prokram da ka Rihok Sumer General Secretary bad ki kyntien ai khublei na ka Corita Langbang President Women Wings BAM-JH.
title: Pyndep ki 24 ngut ki samla ban shah hikai ‘Security’ jong ka BAM-JH

content: Nongpoh, Lber 23: Ka skul bah Mahatma Gandhi University kaba don ha 13 mer Byrnihat mynta ka sngi kala ioh ban pyndon burom ïa kumba 493 ngut ki samla haka 3rd Convocation kiba la pyndep ïaki jingpule bapher bapher ba kynthup 154 ngut kiba pyndep ïaka Post Graduate, 261 ngut kiba la pyndep ïaka Graduate bad 78 ngut kiba la pyndep ïaka kyrdan PhD bala pynlong ha auditorium hall jong katei ka skulbah.Ha katei ka jingleh burom jong ka skul bah ïaki samla pule la wan ruh ban sakhi da ka jingdonlang u Ilias Ali Padmashree Awardee kum u kongsan, Dr. KK Sarma symbud kongsan, Dr. Rajan Chopra Chancellor, Dr. Debrata Das Vice Chancellor bad kiwei kiwei ki khraw pyrkhat bad ki nongshah khot sngewbha na kiwei kiwei ki skulbah.Naka liang u Ilias Ali kum u kongsan haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ban don bynta bad katei ka sngi lehkmen jong ki samla pule kiba la pyndep ïaki jingpule bapher bapher jong ki na katei ka skulbah wat hapdeng shibun ki jingeh haka jingïaid lynti jong ki bad katei ka long kum ka jingai mynsiem haka jingim jong ki ba hadien ba ki mih na katei ka jaka bad leit ban trei ne bteng ïaka jingpule kyrmen ba kin ai kaba bha tam naka bynta ka jylla bad ka ri hi baroh kawei.U la ong ruh ba ki samla ki long ka lawei jong ka ri, lada ki samla ki kiew haka jingpule ka ri ruh ka kiew sted ha baroh ki liang namar ka jingnang jingstad hi ha kane ka juk kaba mynta ka long kaba kongsan bad ka atiar kaba khlaiñ da kaba ai mynsiem ruh ïaki samla pule ba kin long ka nuksa bad ka jingshai ïaka jylla kaba ki leit phai bad ka ri hi baroh kawei.
title: Pynkup burom ka skulbah MGU ïa 493 ngut ki samla ba la pyndep ïa ka UG, PG bad PhD

content: Khliehriat Lber 23: Ka tnat Public Health Deaprtment East Jaiñtia Hills District, hynnin ka sngi saitjaiñ ka la rakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang jong ka um ba la tip kum ka World Water Day, ha kaba ka Additional Deputy Commissioner (ADC), ka kong J.Kharpuri, MCS ka la long kum ka kongsan ha katei ka sngi.Ha katei ka sngi ki la don ruh ka jingpyni nongmuna na ki khynnah skul jong ka skul Cambridge Secondary School Ladrymbai, ka Oxford Secondary School, Ladrymbai, Little Star Secondary School Ladrymbai, Hill’s Field English School Wapungskur bad ka Tiachaphrang Higher Secondary School Sohkymphor, ki la pyni bad ai ki jingbatai halor kumno ban pynneh pynsah bad ruh ban pynkhuid ïa ki tyllong umbam, um dih.Haba kren kum ka kongsan, i kong J.Kharpuri i la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban long ki nongshong shnong kiba don ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki tyllong umbam umdih bad ruh ban sumar khuid ïa ki tyllong um kiba don ha shnong ha thaw, la ong ruh ba ka thma kaba lai kan sdang nyngkong na ka um, namar ki wah kin sa kylla sniew ha kaba kin nym long shuh ban dih ban bam, ha ka jingbishar bniah na ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ruh la lap ba don bun ki khynnah khyllung kiba ioh pang bad ong ba dei na ka um, la kyntu ïa ki bor shnong ruh ba kin shim khia bha ïa kane ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki tyllong um ban sumar khuid ïa ki um ki wah kiba don ha shnong ha thaw da kaba iatreilang bad ki tnat bapher bapher “ka la dei ka lyngkor ba baroh ki paidbah kin shim lang ban pynbha ïa ki tyllong um, ban iada ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ki lum ki wah kiba u Blei u la ai kyrpang, lym kumta ki pateng ban wan ki tim ïa ngi lada ngi pom pathar ïa ki dieng ki siej bad pynduh pyndam ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ngi la don lypa ha ki jaka ba khappud bad kiwei pat ki jylla bad kumjuh ruh bad kiwei pat ki ri, te lada kan wan kane ka thma um kin sa wan ban hiar thma shane sha ngi tang na ka daw ka um” la bynrap i kong Kharpuri.Ka kongsan ka la ong ruh ba ka jingtih marpoh khyndew kam dei kaba sniew hynrei donkam pat ban pyrkhat ne leh da sumar bha ban buh ki lad jingiada ban nym ktah ïa ki tyllong um kiba don hajan bad ong ruh ba ki don ki wah kiba la khie im biang mynta namar la sangeh ban tih ïa ki mar pohkhyndew bad ki la don ki doh um ha ki um ki wah,U Executive Engineer jong ka tnat PHE (Electrical Division Jowai, u bah P.Synnah u la ong ba man la u snem ka tnat ka ju siew haduh 2 klur 50 lak tyngka tang ka Bill bai pom um ha Jowai bad ong ba ka um ka long kaba rem dor bha, u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban shim khia ban sumar bha ïa tyllong um “Haba leitkai sngewbha shano shano bad kumjuh ruh ki nongjngohkai pyrthei ruh bunisen ki kwah ban leit sha ki jaka ba don ki um ki wah kiba bha na kata ka daw donkam ban sumar ïa ki um ki wah ym dei ban pynjakhlia ne bret jakhlia pathar ha ki um ki wah bad ruh donkam ban sumar bha ban ioh ruh ban aiti pateng da kaba bha sha ki pateng ki ban wan”,.Haba kren halor ki kyntien phira “ka um na ka bynta ka jingsuk” utei u heh jong ka tnat PHE u la ong ba donkam ban pyrkhat bha ïa kine ki kyntien phira namar bunsien ki mih ki jingiamai iania tang na ka daw ka um bad dei naduh u snem 1993 la sdang noh ban rakhe ïa kane ka World Water Day.Kumjuh ruh u SDO jong ka tnat PHE (Electrical Sub-Division Jowai), u bah R.Nongtdu u la ong ba U Blei u la thaw ïa ka um ha ka pyrthei bad ka don 70 percent ka um ha kane ka pyrthei, u buh ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ki mrad ha ka mariang bad khatduh u buh ia u/ka briew ba kynsai na baroh ki jingthaw jong u ban ioh ban ri ban sumar ïa ka mariang sawdong kynthup ki um ki wah, lada ngim nang ban sumar kan sa poi ka por ban jynjar, u kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban don ka jingkitkhlieh lang ban sumar bha bad pynneh pynsah ïa ki um ki wah “Na ka liang ka tnat ruh ngi wad ki lad ki lynti ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki um ki wah, ngi trei ha PHE ngim don jingeh ban pynpoi ïa ki pipe um ha ki shnong ki thaw hynrei ka jingeh ba ngi kynduh dei ka jingjngai palat ki tyllong um, namar bun ki tyllong um ki la sniew ym long shuh ban dih, kiba stad ki la ong ba kan sa poi ka por ba ka um kan kham rem dor ban ïa ka petrol na kata ka daw ha shwa ban jia kata la pynlong ïa kane ka World Water Day khnang ban ioh ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah ba ka um ka long kaba donkam tam namar khlem ka um ym lah ban im, don ki jaka kiba ki briew ki ieng da u laiñ ban ioh pdiang um ban ioh ïa ka um ban dih”U la ong ruh ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka prokram ka long ban pynsngew sha ki paidbah ïa ka jingkordor ka um, dei ha u snem 1993 ha shnong Brazil la rai da ka UN ban buh ïa kane ka 22 tarik u bnai lber man la u snem kum ka sngi kyrpang, ka World Water Day”Ha katei ka prokram la ioh ruh ka jingkren ha u SDO-PHE RWS Sub-Division Khliehriat, u bah M.Pasah, na ki Scientist jong ka Trinity International bad la pynbyrngia ïa ka prokram da ki jingshad tynrai na ki khynnah skul bad ïa ka prokram la pyniaid da i kong T.Dkhar iba dei i Coordinator For IEC , DPMU-JJM.
title: Donkam ban don jingkitkhlieh ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki tyllong um, kyntu ki heh sorkar na EJHD

content: Shillong Lber 23: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla bad u National President ka National Peoples Party (NPP) u Conrad K Sangma ula ong, ba ka la don ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut kaba skhem hapdeng ki seng kiba ïatreilang hapoh ka kynhun National Democratic Alliance (NDA) ban kyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ka NDA ha ka ilekshon MP Lok Sabha.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “Ka la don ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut kaba skhem hapdeng ki paralok kiba donlang ha ka Sorkar Pdeng ban ïa kyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ka NDA ha kylleng ki Constituency bad ka ai nuksa ba u kyrtong ka NDA ha Nagaland u dei na ka seng NDPP. Ka la don ka jingïaid kaba khlaiñ ban sei ïa u kyrtong monlang ban kyrshan ïa u kyrtong jong ka NDA bad ha ka jylla Meghalaya kan dei ka seng NPP, ha Nagaland ka NDPP bad ha ka Outer Manipur ka NPF bad ha Manipur ka BJP.”“U la ong ngan sa leit sha Nagaland ban leit ïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Nagaland, ha kaba yn leit lang ryngkat ki nongïalam ka seng bad ki MLA ban ïakren halor katei ka mat. Kumba long mynta, u James PK Sangma u don hapoh Arunachal Pradesh ban ïakren halor katei ka kam kaba ïadei bad ka ilekshon MP. Nga la ïakynduh ruh ïa ki nongïalam na ka jylla Manipur kiba la wan sha ka nongbah Shillong ban ïakren halor ka kam ilekshon ban pynthikna ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ka NDA,” ong u National President ka NPP.Ula ong, ha ka jylla ba don ka BJP bad ki jaka kiba khlaiñ ka NDPP ne ka don ïa ki nongmihkhmat ki jongki kumta kin kyrshan ïa u kyrtong ka NDA.Halor kaba ïadei bad ka MP ilekshon Lok Sabha ha Shillong bad Tura khamtam haba ka BJP ka la rai ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka NPP, u Conrad ula ong “Ngam ju ngeit ba ngi la don lypa ha kyrdan kaba biang bad ngam kwah ban pyrkhat kumtei ne ban long kiba la skhem jingmut shaba palat ha ka ilekshon. Nga ju ong, ïa katei ha man la ki ilekshon bad ngam ju kheiñ sting namar man la ka ilekshon kadei kaba don ïa ka jingïakhun, ngi hap ban trei shitom ha Tura bad ngim lah ban kheiñ sting noh bad ngin ym kheiñ sting hi ruh”.Halor ka Shillong konstituensi, u Conrad ula ong, “Ngi la trei shitom bha hangne bad ngi ai khublei ïa baroh ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba ai ïa ka jingkyrshan ïa ngi, la kadei ba ngi ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan mynta na ka BJP ne ka jingai jingkyrshan ka TMC ha Nongthymmai Constituency bad shabar jong ka Nongthymmai Constituency ruh. Ngi la ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan na kylleng hynrei ngi dang treikam shuh shuh ban don ka jingïadei bad ki paidbah bad ban ïalap ilekshon na ka bynta ka kyrtong bad kane kan dang ïaid shakhmat bad ngin ap khmih lynti beit ïa kaba bha”.U la ong, ka jingwan ai jingkyrshan jong kino kino ki riewshimet ne kino kino ka seng ka long kaba bha bad kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ka NPP ha kane ka ilekshon kaba mynta.
title: Ngi don ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut kaba skhem hapoh ka sorkar NDA, ong u Conrad

content: Nongpoh, Lber 23: Kum ban ïa snoh kti ha satlak ka pyrthei ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingkordor jong ka um kaba long ka jingim jong u khun bynriew bad baroh ki kynja ba im, ka District Water and Sanitation Committee Ri Bhoi ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang ba ka tnad PHE Ri Bhoi haka 22 tarik mynta u bnai ki la rakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang ka um ba la tip kum ka ‘World Water Day’ ha NSCA Indoor Stadum Nongpoh.La rakhe ruh ïa kane ka sngi da kaba la pynlong shuwa ïa ka jingïamareh Marathon, ki jingïakop rwai bad ka jingïapyni nam ïa ki jingshna ba la shim bynta da ki 3 tylli ki skul ba kynthup ïa ka Alpha English Higher Secondary School Nongpoh, Nehru Memorial Higher Secondary School Umsning bad ka St. Mary’s Secondary school Nongkrah.Haba rakhe ïa kane ka World Water Day la wan ban shim bynta da ka Superintendent Engineer PHE ka Kong V.W Momin, Divisional Officer Soil & Water Conservation u L. Arengh EE PHE Nongpoh u Bah U.Kurbah, EE PHE Umsning u Bah W.Nongbri SDO, ki rangbah shnong bad kiwei kiwei.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi, ki nongkren ki la ban khia jur bha halor ka jingdonkam ban ïada ïa ka um, namar ka um ka long kaba donkam tam na ka bynta jong baroh ki kynja ba im ha sla jong kane ka pyrthei.Shuh shuh, ki nongkren ki la khot la wer ïa baroh ba ka dei ka kamram jong ngi ban ïa trei lang na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka um, namar khlem ka um kan nym don jingim ha kane ka pyrthei, namarkata, ka dei ka kamram jong ngi ban pynneh pynsah bad ban sumar ïa ka mei mariang khnang ba ngin nym kyrduh um ha ka pateng ban sa wan.
title: Rakhe ka tnad PHE ïa ka World Water Day ha Ri Bhoi, donkam ban kunai ïa ka um, ka jingim u khun bynriew

content: Shillong, Lber, 23: Kumba 40 ngut ki dkhot jong kiwei kiwei ki party ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la pynïasoh ïalade bad ka seng Congress ha ka jingïalang kaba la pynlong da ka Mawryngkneng Block Congress Committte ha ka shnong, East Khasi Hills District.Ïa kine ki dkhot ba la pynïasoh thymmai sha ka Congress la pdiang burom da u President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala uba long ruh u kyrtong jong ka Indian National Congress ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Seat ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024.U Bah Pala haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u la ong, “lada ngi wan ha ka por, ngin wanrah ïa ki polisi khamtam eh na ka bynta ki samla. Palat lai klur kiba donkam ha ka shisnem hynrei ki briew jong ngi na ka por sha ka por kim ïohkam. Ka Congress ka la trei shitom ban wad jingkheiñ bad ba ki samla jong ngi ki dei ban ïohkam.”U la ong ba ka Congress ka la phaikhmat ruh sha ki longkmie hapoh kane ka jylla bad lada ka Congress ka wan ha ka bor, kan sa wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban ïarap ïa ki kynthei.“Nga kyntu ïa phi ba phin shim ba kane ka elekshon kam dei tang ka elekshon jong u Bah Pala ne tang ka elekshon jong ka seng Congress. Ka elekshon ka dei ka kam ïap kam im. Ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ka dei kaba ngim lah ban phiah da kaba ong une u Khasi, une u Garo bad une u Jaiñtia hynrei hapoh ka Meghalaya ngi ïalong kawei. Lada ïa phiah ka ïoh ka kot ka ktah, ka pule ka puthi ka ktah bad kumta ter ter,” u la ong.“Ngin klet ïa ka MDC, ngin klet ïa ka MLA ngin ïatreilang ha ka MP namarba ka ktah ha ka riti ka dustur, ka ktah ïa ka kolshor jong ngi,” u la ong bad ïathuh, “ha rilum Garo ka la don ka jingkylla namarba ki paralok kiba rim ki la wan phai biang sha ka Congress.“Ki shongshit ha kato ka por bad ki ong ban pynrem ïa ka Congress ba bun ka bamsap hynrei ki la lap mynta ba kane ka sorkar ba mynta ym tang ba ka bamsap hynrei ka bamduh ruh. Nga kyrpad ïa phi ban ngin phai biang sha ka Congress bad ngi lah ban shongshit ha ki por baladep hynrei mynta ngin phai biang ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Congress bad ai jingkyrshan ïa nga,” la kyrpad u Bah Pala.“Ma nga kum u MP nga lah ban don ki jingduna hangne hangtai,” u la bynrap.“Ka skhim kaba tang 15 klur ban pyndap ïa ki 36 tylli ki Constituency kam dei kaba suk bad ong ruh ba mynta ka samoi san snem leiei haduh lai snem ki khlem ai ïa ka skhim bad nalor ba la buh ka jingtyrwa wat shi tyngka ruh ym lah ban pyndonkam bad kane kam jia tang ïa nga hynrei ïa baroh ki MP hapoh ka ri India ki mad kumjuh,” u la bynrap.
title: Ngin klet ïa ka MDC bad MLA, ngin ïatreilang ha ka elekshon MP: Vincent Pala

content: Shillong, Lber 23: Kum shi bynta na ka jingïaibteng ban leit khynra ïa ki dukan kiad beaiñ kiba kynthup ïa baroh ki jait kiad na ka liang ka tnat Excise ka la ïoh ban kurup bad kem ruh ïa katto katne kiba die kiad beaiñ ha ki jaka bapher bapher jong ka sor Shillong bad ki jaka ba khap sor.Halor kane na ka liang ka ophis Deputy Commissioner (Excise), East Khasi Hills District ka la ïathuh ba ha ka jingkhynra kaba la sdang naduh u bnai Kyllalyngkor jong une u snem 2024, ki pulit ka Excise ki la ïoh ban leit khynra ïa ki dukan kiad kiba don haduh 13 tylli ki jaka bad ban kurup kumba 76.5 litar ka kiad pyrsi bad ka 146.145 litar ka kiad phareng.Halor kane na ka liang ka tnat ka la ïoh ruh ban kem haduh 11 ngut ki briew kiba donkti ha kine ki kam beaiñ bad kumjuh ruh ki la shah pynngat hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Excise Act.
title: Kem ka Excise ïa 11 ngut kiba die kiad beaiñ

content: Shillong Lber 23: U President ka NPP National bad u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ula ong, ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan leh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ïa kito kiba pyrshang ban pynthud ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka jylla.Haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “Ki pulit kila trei shitom bha ha ki snem kiba la dep bad kila buh ruh ïa la ka jingim ha ka jingma bad kila ïoh kem ruh ïa bun ngut bad kila don ruh bun jait ki jingshah byrngem byrsit hynrei kila lah ban tehlakam noh bad ki pulit kila trei palat por ban pynthikna ba ki briew kiba donkti ha kaban pynthud ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka jylla kidei ban shah pynshitom da kaba tyngeh.”U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar kan ym kheiñ sting bad u la iathuh ruh ba ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ula lum ïa ka jingïalang halor ka jinglong jingman ha ka jylla ha kaba la donlang u Myntri ka kam Pohïing ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u Chief Secretary ka jylla u Bah D.P Wahlang bad u DGP ka jylla u Dr LR Bishnoi.“Ngi la shimkhia ïa ka kam ban pynthikna ba lada ka long kumno kumno ruh, baroh kiba donkti ne kiba pyrshang ban pynthud ïa ka shongsuk shongshngaiñ, ngin leh da kaba tyngeh ïa ki,” ïathuh u Myntri Rangbah.
title: Byrngem u Conrad ban leh tyngeh ïa kiba pynthud ka shongsuk shongshngaiñ ha jylla

content: Shillong Lber 23: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla bad u President ka NPP Meghalaya u Bah Prestone Tynsong ula ong, ba ka NPP ka pdiang sngewbha ïa ka jingshim rai ka BJP ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka NPP ha ka ilekshon MP Lok Sabha ha ka jylla Meghalaya.“Ka seng NPP ka pdiang sngewbha ïa ka jingrai ki nongïalam kiba hakhlieh jong ka BJP na Delhi ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki arngut ki kyrtong ka NPP na Tura bad Shillong kiba ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon MP. Ngam poi pyrkhat, hynrei ngi sngewtynnad shibun bad ngi ïoh mynsiem bad ngi sngew donbok ïa kane ka rai kaba ki heh duh ka BJP kila shim ba ki kyrshan ïa ki kyrtong jong ngi,” ong u Bah Prestone Tynsong.U la ong ruh ba ka jingwan ai jingkyrshan ka BJP ïa ka NPP kan long ka jingmyntoi namar ka Vote jong ka BJP kan wan noh sha ki kyrtong jong ka NPP.“Ha ka jingpeit hi ka jong ngi, kan long ka jingmyntoi namar ka Vote ka BJP ha Shillong Constituency la kumno kumno ruh ka ju ïoh 70,000 ne poi haduh shi lak, te mynta kane ka vote ha ka jaka ba kan leit sha kiwei ne ba kan neh beit ha ka BJP kan leit noh sha ki kyrtong ka NPP bad kane kan dang ïarap shuh shuh ia ka NPP,” ong u Bah Prestone.U la ïathuh, ba shen ki nongïalam ka NPP bad ka BJP kin sa ïakynduh bad kin shong jingïalang na ka bynta ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa ki kam kiba ïadei bad ka ilekshon MP ha Shillong bad Tura Constituency.
title: Kyrmen u Bah Prestone ban jop ka NPP ba ai jingkyrshan ka BJP

content: Shillong, Lber 22: Kum shibynta na ka jingthmu ban ïarap ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki nongshong shnong kiba sah ha khappud na ka liang ki BSF Meghalaya ki la pynlong ïa ka prokram ïarap ïa ki paidbah ne ka Civic Action Programme (CAP) kaba ïaid lang bad ka jingai jingsumar ei ha ka sngi Palei hapoh ki shnong kiba hab hapoh khappud ki shnong kum ka Dangar bad Nolikata kiba ha East bad South West Khasi Hills district.ïa ka prokram la pynlong da ka jingdonlang u Manoj Kumar Barnwal, DIG SHQ BSF Shillong bad u Rajiv Kumar, Comdt 193 Bn BSF.Ha kane ka prokram la wan ban shim bynta shitrhem da ki rangbah shnong jong ki shnong ba marjan, ki Medical Officer napoh ka PHC Dangar bad kumba 650 ngut ki nongshong shnong sawdong ka thaiñ bad ki khynnah skul.La sdang ïa kane ka prokram da ka jingthmu ban ai ka jingïarap ïa ki paidbah kiba don kam ïa ki lad jingsumar ha ka koit ka khiah bad ka jingïarap ïa ki shnong kiba sah ha ki thaiñ khappud.Ha kane ka CAP, kiba bun ki tiar kiba kongsan kum ki kor computer, ki top pynlang um, ki shuki plastic bad ki meij, nangta ki tiar ïalehkai, bad kiwei pat ki tiar, la sam sha ki shnong ba marjan bad sha ki khynnah skul.Ha ka jingai jingsumar ei ne ka Free Medical Camp, ki Doctor napoh ki jaka summar ki BSF ki la donkti lang ban khmih ïa ki nongpang bad ban ai ei ruh ia ki dawai sha ki nongpang.Shuh shuh ki la don ki prokram lariti ba la pynlong da ki khynnah skul ba don sap jong ka Govt Upper Primary School Dangar.Na ka liang ki rangbah shnong bad ki nongshong shnong ka thain ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingïaroh ïa kine ki kam leh isynei jong ki BSF Meghalaya kiba la sam ia ki tiar kiba kongsan bad ki jingïarap ha ki jingai dawai ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba donkam ha khappud.
title: Sam tiar bad ai jingsumar ei ki shipai BSF ha khappud Shillong, Lber 22: Kum shibynta na ka jingthmu ban ïarap ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki nongshong shnong kiba sah ha khappud na ka liang ki BSF Meghalaya ki la pynlong ïa ka prokram ïarap ïa ki paidbah ne ka Civic Action Programme (CAP) kaba ïaid lang bad ka jingai jingsumar ei ha ka sngi Palei hapoh ki shnong kiba hab hapoh khappud ki shnong kum ka Dangar bad Nolikata kiba ha East bad South West Khasi Hills district.  	ïa ka prokram la pynlong da ka jingdonlang u Manoj Kumar Barnwal, DIG SHQ BSF Shillong bad u Rajiv Kumar, Comdt 193 Bn BSF. 	Ha kane ka prokram la wan ban shim bynta shitrhem da ki rangbah shnong jong ki shnong ba marjan, ki Medical Officer napoh ka PHC Dangar bad kumba 650 ngut ki nongshong shnong sawdong ka thaiñ bad ki khynnah skul.  	La sdang ïa kane ka prokram da ka jingthmu ban ai ka jingïarap ïa ki paidbah kiba don kam ïa ki lad jingsumar ha ka koit ka khiah bad ka jingïarap ïa ki shnong kiba sah ha ki thaiñ khappud. 	Ha kane ka CAP, kiba bun ki tiar kiba kongsan kum ki kor computer, ki top pynlang um, ki shuki plastic bad ki meij, nangta ki tiar ïalehkai, bad kiwei pat ki tiar, la sam sha ki shnong ba marjan bad sha ki khynnah skul.  	Ha ka jingai jingsumar ei ne ka Free Medical Camp, ki Doctor napoh ki jaka summar ki BSF ki la donkti lang ban khmih ïa ki nongpang bad ban ai ei ruh ia ki dawai sha ki nongpang. 	Shuh shuh ki la don ki prokram lariti ba la pynlong da ki khynnah skul ba don sap jong ka Govt Upper Primary School Dangar. 	Na ka liang ki rangbah shnong bad ki nongshong shnong ka thain ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingïaroh ïa kine ki kam leh isynei jong ki BSF Meghalaya kiba la sam ia ki tiar kiba kongsan bad ki jingïarap ha ki jingai dawai ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba donkam ha khappud.

content: Shillong, Lber, 23: Kawei ka kali Alto 800 kaba don ïa u number ML05 T-1313 kaba ïaid “wrong side” na surok Kashari, najan ka DC ophis sha IGP Point kaba dei ka surok One Way, ka la tynrah ïa kawei ka kali Bolero Pickup kaba don ïa u number ML05 AB 2210 ynda poi hakhmat ka SP Office.Kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 9.30 baje mynmiet ka sngi Thohdieng.U nonglum khubor uba la lap ïa kane ka jingjia, la sakhi ba ki don lai ngut kiba shong hapoh ka kali Alto 800 uwei uba la mynsaw bad arngut ki paralok jong u kiba la phet krad ïalade bad ieh noh hapdeng surok ïa ka kali bad ïa u nongniah jong kane ka kali u bym shym la mynsaw.Ha kane ka jingjia, arngut ki briew kiba shong ha ka kali Bolero kim shym la mynsaw eiei katba ki briew kiba shong ha ka kali Alto la kynnoh ba dei kiba la buaid khawyiang bad lap ruh u bilor kiad hapoh ka kali.La sakhi ba ka kali Alto ka la julor bha na u Bumper bad ka iit ba nakhmat jong ka kali ka la pait namarba ka jingïakhuh ka la long kaba jubor bha.Ki Pulit ki la wan poi ha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.
title: Ïaid Wrong Side ka kali Alto na Kashari sha IGP Point, shah syllad ka Bolero Pickup

content: Shillong Lber 23: U nongïalam ka BJP bad u MLA ka 19 South Shillong Konstituensi u Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ula ong, lada jop ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad ka Agatha Sangma ha ka ilekshon MP Lok Sabha ka long kaba thikna ba kin ïoh long ki Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Sanbor u la ong, “Ka jingai jingkyrshan ka BJP ïa ka NPP ha Meghalaya ka la pynthikna ba 100% ka Kong Ampareen bad ka Agatha ki kyrtong ka NPP ba kin jop ïa ka ilekshon MP bad kan long ka khana ba kine baroh ar ngut ki longkmie kin jop bad kine baroh arngut na ka bhah jong ki kynthei kin ïoh long ki Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng baroh arngut.”Ula bynrap ruh da kaba ong, “Ban phah da kiwei kan long kaba sepei, hynrei lada phah da ka Kong Ampareen bad Agatha ka lad ka don bha ïa ki, ban ïoh long Myntri bad kin lah ban wanrah ïa ki kam pynroi ha ka jylla bad ban thaw ïa ki lad ban aikam aijam ïa ki samla kiba khlem kam khlem jam.”Halor ka jingkylli lada ka BJP ka lah ne em ban ai ïa ka jingpynthikna ba kitei ki kyrtong ka NPP lada ki jop ilekshon kin ïoh ïa ka shuki myntri, u Bah Sanbor ula ong, “Kidei beit ban ïoh namar kadei ha ka sien kaba nyngkong duh ban jop arngut ki kynthei bad kan long ruh ka khana pateng ba baroh ar ngut kin jop na ka NPP bad baroh ar ngut kin ïoh long Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng bad kan long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ba kin ïatai bad ïakren halor ki mat kiba sahteng kiba dei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah ka jylla, ki samla khlem kam khlem jam bad ban wanrah ïa ki kam pynroi ki bapher bapher.”U Bah Sanbor ula ong, ba um don jingsngew eiei halor ka jingshim rai ki Nongïalam ka BJP ban ai jingkyrshan noh ïa ka NPP ha ka ilekshon MP Lok Sabha ha Shillong bad Tura Constituency namar ka NPP bad ka BJP kidei kiba ïatreilang ha ka Sorkar MDA bad kumjuh ruh ha ka Sorkar NDA.U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong, “Kum ki dkhot kiba burom ka BJP ngin bud bad kohnguh ïa ka jingbthah jong ki nongïalam ka party bad shen yn sa pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha kylleng ki District bad ki nongkitkam ka BJP ban sdang ïa ka kam ïalap ilekshon bad ban ïatreilang ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Dr Ampareen bad ïa ka Agatha. Ka jingwan jingkyrshan ka BJP ka la pynthikna ba 100% ka Kong Ampareen bad ka Agatha kin jop ïa ka ilekshon MP.”
title: Lada jop ka NPP na baroh ar ki konstituensi lah thikna ba kin ïoh long Myntri Sorkar: Sanbor

content: Shillong, Lber, 23: Sa uwei u briew u la shah kem ha ki Pulit ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ halor ka jingdonkti ban pynbthei ïa u bom IED ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha Them Ïew Mawlong.Haduh mynta kiba la shah kem halor kane ka jingjia ki long saw ngut.“Ngi la kem kem ïa u briew uba saw mynta ka sngi ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynbthei bom. (La ithuh kyrteng ïa u kum) u Sansharbha Makdoh 24 snem ka rta uba sah ha Umroi, Ri-Bhoi,” la pyntip u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Hynrei, ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ka dang ïai bteng na baroh ki liang,” u la ong.Ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai, u Namphyrnai Lyngdoh Peinlang uba la 21 snem na ka shnong Peinlang u la shah kem na Mairang, Eastern West Khasi Hills bad la wanrah ïa u sha nongbah Shillong ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei. La lap ba u dei uwei na kiba shah suba donkti halor kane ka kam.U SP u la pyntip ba u Namphyrnai u don ka jingïadei bad ki dkhot ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC). Katkum ka jingong jong u, ki Pulit ki la raikut ban kem lut ïa baroh ki nongkam bymman kiba donkti ha ka jingïasylla, ka jingïasuhbuit, kiba donkti bei pisa.Dang ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai, ki Pulit ki la kem ïa u Tarson Lymba, 58 snem ka rta uba dei u nongïalam jong ka HNYF na Dawki katba ïa u Ebakordor Nongpluh 26 snem ka rta la kem na Malki, Shillong hadien ka jingjia bthei bom.
title: Kem ki Pulit sa uwei uba donkti ha ka jingbthei bom IED ha Them Ïewmawlong

content: Shillong, Lber 23 : Ka jingïaseng ka KJP Provisional Synod Pdeng kaba ar kan long ha ka District Balang Kharang Presbyterian ha ki tarik 22 haduh 24 u Lber 2024. Ka Balang Kharang Presbyterian ka khot sngewbha ïa baroh ba phin ïa wan bad ïa shim bynta ha ka jingshakri Blei sha kane ka jingïaseng bah ha ka 24.3.2024. Ka shnong Kharang ka don kumba 20 kilometer na lad Smit bad ki don ki bynta ha kaba u surok u long uba kham khim.Kumta la kyrpad ba kiba ñiah ïa ki kali ba kin long kiba husiar ban ym pynher sted ïa ki kali ki jong ki khamtam ha ki jaka ba long khongdong bad bym lah ban ïohi ïa ki kali kiba wan pyrshah ïa ki ban lait na kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih. Nalor kane, ka jingpyntip na ka Balang ka long kumne harum.Ka jaka long jingïaseng kan long ha ka madan Mawbynna. Namar ba ki jaka shong kin long ruh ha ki ranab lum, la kyntu ïa kiba wan sha kane ka jingïaseng ba kin ïa wanrah ïa ki jaiñ siang khnang ba kan pynsuk ïa ki ban shong.Baroh ki kali kiba wan na ki thaiñ Jongksha bad Lad Kharang, kin ïaid na u surok PWD shaduh ka jaka ban long jingïaseng ha kaba ki traffic police bad ki volunteer kin ïarap bad kdew ïa ki jaka pynïeng ïa ki kali kiba la pynbiang da ka Balang Kharang.Baroh ki kali kiba wan na Mawlein, Pingwait, Dienglieng, Nongjrong bad ki shnong kiba marjan kin pynïeng ïa ki kali ha ki jaka ïeng kiba yn sa kdew da ki traffic police bad ki volunteer kiba long shwa ban poi sha ka jaka long jingïaseng. Yn ym shah ïa ki kali lait noh tang kito kiba don ïa ki car pass ne kino kino ki kali kiba donkam kyrkieh na ki daw ki bym lah kiar ban ïaid lyngba na kane ka surok shakhmat khnang ban lait na ka jingdheng kali. Na ki jaka pynïeng kali haduh ka jaka pynlong jingïaseng, hap ban iaid tang kumba kato katne minit eiei.Yn ym shah pynïeng kali harud surok naduh Lad Kharang shaduh palat ka jaka long jingïaseng ha Mawbynna bad kane ka adong kan sdang naduh phra baje mynstep haduh san baje janmiet.La mana ba yn ym shah ban ïa die ïa thied harud surok naduh Lad Kharang haduh kumba 500 meter palat ka jaka long jingïaseng khnang ban pyllait na ka jingkhim ha ka ïaid ka ïeng hadien ba wai jingïaseng. Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka bynta, na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Kharang ka la pynbeit ïa ki jaka die madan na ka bynta kito kiba sngew donkam.Namar kata la kyntu jur ba baroh kin burom ïa ka jingpynïaid jong ka shnong khnang ba kiei kiei baroh kin long kiba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.Khatduh ïa wai ngi kyrpad da kaba sngewrit ïa baroh kiba wan sha kane ka jingïaseng ba kin burom ïa ka jingpynïaid ryntih jong ka Balang, ka Shnong Kharang, ki traffic police bad vounteer. Ngi phah ïa ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ïa phi baroh kiba wan sha kane ka jingïaseng bad U Blei un don ryngkat bad phi baroh.Contact number na ka bynta kino kino ki jingdonkam :Shri J.Rymmai.Mob No 9436100707
title: Ka Jingiaseg KJP Provisional Synod Pdeng kaba Ar ha Balang Kharang

content: Shillong, Lber 23: U President ki samla National People’s Youth Front (NPYF) Bah Kitborlang Nongrem u la ong ba kam dei satia ka jingshisha ba ki samla NPP ki kynjah jar jar ha kane ka elekshon MP kumba la kynnoh da kiwei pat ki seng sainpyrthei.“Ki samla NPP kim ju shongshit khlehbiej kumba long kiwei pat ki seng ban shu leit pyrta wat ha ki jaka bym dei. Ngi pyndep ïa ka kamram kum ki samla ban pynsngewthuh ïaki paidbah ïa ka nongrim treikam bad ka thong jong ka party,” ong u President ka NPYF.Nalorkata, u ong ruh ba kum ki samla hi kim kwah ban leh shongshit hynrei ki kwah ba ka jingpynkhreh jong ki na bynta ka elekshon kadei ban long beit da ka burom ka akor da kaba klet noh ïa ki kam leh shongshit.Haba kren pat halor ka kyrtong jong ka party, Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Bah Nongrem u la ong ka jingmih ryntih ki longkmie ha ka sngi thep kyrteng ka la ai mynsiem haduh katta katta ïa ki nongïalam party bad kane hi ka la ai jingkyrmen ba ka kyrtong kan poi sha ka thong.“Kan dei ruh ka burom lada ki paidbah ki ailad ïa ka longkmie kum jong i Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ban ïoh mihkhmat ïa ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat ha Parliament,” ong u Bah Nongrem.Kawei pat kaba utei u nongïalam ki samla NPP u kyntu ka log ba ki paidbah kim dei satia ban rai kyrkieh haba ki kyrshan ïa kino kino ki kyrtong hynrei ba ki dei ban da leh sani bha jai na ka bynta ka lawei ki khun ki ksiew bad ruh na ka bynta ka lawei jong ka jylla.Lah ban kdew hangne, ka NPP mynta ka samoi ka sei da ki longkmie baroh arngut ban aireng na Shillong bad ruh na Tura seat katba kiwei pat ki party ki la sei da ki rangbah ban ïakhun pyrshah.Dang ha ka sngi Thohdieng mynmiet, ka BJP ruh ka la shim ïa ka rai ba kan kyrshan lang ïa ki kyrtong ka NPP ha Shillong bad ruh ha Tura da ka jingkyrmen ba kine ki kyrtong kin poi sha ka thong.
title: Ngim ju shongshit khlehbiej elekshon kum kiwei, ngi trei la kam: President NPYF

content: Shillong, Lber, 23: Arngut ki dkhot jong ka Garo National Liberation Council (Regroup) ki la ngat ha ka shrip jong ki Pulit ka East Garo Hills District katba ki dang leit shimti ïa ka pisa ba ki la dawa na Rongjeng Reserve Forest ha ka sngi Palei.Kine ki arngut kiba la shah kem ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Predikson A. Sangma ba ju khot sin Ara, uba la 32 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Ambre A’ding, Rongjeng East Garo Hills bad uwei pat u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Setbingstar D. Shira ba ju khot sin Negro, uba la 33 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Nongchram Dekmik, East Garo Hills.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Garo Hills Bah S.A Rynjah u la pyntip ba ha ka 18 tarik, Lber, 2024 ki Pulit jong ka Rongjeng Police Station ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka ejahar ba la kynnoh ba ki don ki briew kiba la kam ïa lade kum ki dkhot ka GNLA (R) ki la telephone ïa ki nongujor na u nombar bym lah ban ithuh naduh ka 15 tarik Lber, 2024 ban dawa pisa bad byrngem ruh ba lada kim siew ïa ka pisa kin sa ngat ha ka jingeh.Lyngba kane ka ejahar ba la register ha Rongjeng PS hapoh ka Section 386/34 pule lang bad ka Section 16/184/20 jong ka U.A(P)Act ki la Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Ha ka 21 tarik ki Pulit ki la ïohkem shwa ïa u Predikson A. Sangma ba ju khot sin Ara katba u dang leit shim ïa ka pisa ba la dawa na ki nongujor na Rongjeng Reserve Forest. Ha kajuh ka por ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra, ki la ïohkem sa ïa u Setbingstar D. Shira ba ju khot sin Negro na Rongjeng Sengma. Ki Pulit ki dang ïai bteng ruh ban ïohkem sa ïa kiwei pat ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun kiba dang phetrieh na ka kti jong ki Pulit.U SP u la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba lada ki ïoh pdiang ïa kino kino ki jingshah dawa pisa ki dei ban pyntip marmar sha ki thanat bad ïa ki nongpyntip yn sa buhrieh noh ïa ka kyrteng bad yn sa ai khusnam.
title: Ngat arngut ki dkhot GNLA (R) ha ka shrip ki Pulit ka East Garo Hills

content: Shillong, Lber 24: Na ka liang jong ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) lyngba ka kyrwoh na u President ka synjuk, ka la ai khublei ïa baroh ki nongïashimbynta ba la mihkhmat ïa ka Meghalaya khamtam ïa ki 55 ngut kiba la khur takma.“Katba ngi khmihlynti ban lehkai bha ha kane ka 3rd North East Games ka long ruh ka kabu ïa ngi ba ngin bteng ban hikai ïalade lyngba kine ki jingïakhun kiba ngi ïakynduh ha ka ban pynkhreh ban poi sha ka thong.” ong ka MSOA.Ngin khmih bad bishar bñiah ha baroh 14 tylli ki synjuk ïalehkai ban ïakren ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingpynkhreh bad ki mat ban kyntiew ïa ka jylla ha ka ban khur takma. Ngin sa donkam ban noh khambun ki jingïarap sha ki Association na bynta ban kyntiew ïa ki program bapher bapher bad ruh na bynta ka jingpynkhreh ïa ki kynhun khnang ba kin ïoh ka jingkilanmet bad ruh ki jinghikai kiba biang.Ka MSOA ka la pynpaw ba bun na ki Athlete ba kynsai ka jylla ki la duh ban leit mihkhmat sha ka North East Games 2024 namar ka jingïatyngkhuh bad ki exam bad kiwei pat ki kam.
title: Ai khublei ka MSOA ïa ki nongïalehkai ba mihkhmat ïa ka jylla

content: Shillong, Lber 23 : Ki pulit ka jylla ha ka sngi Saitjain kila pynmih ïa ka jingbthah ha kaba ki la kyntu ïa kiba shah dawa pisa ha ki kynhun kieng atiar kiba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ kata ka HNLC bad GNLA ba kim dei satia da lei lei ruh ban siew pisa sha kitei ki kynhun.Namar lada jia ba lap ïa kino kino kiba siew ruh kin ngat ha ki kyndon ain UAPA.U Director General of Police (DGP) Dr LR Bishnoi ha ka kyrwoh khubor ula ong, ba ki pulit ki la ïoh ïa ki jingtip ba bun ngut ki briew ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ki shithi dawa pisa na ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC), Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA) bad kiwei kiwei lyngba ka social media sites/apps (Whatsapp, Telegram/SMS).Ula ong, ka long kaba donkam ïa ki nongshong shnong ban sngewthuh ba ka jingai ïa ka pisa ban kyrshan ïa ki kynhun kiba la shah ñiew be-aiñ ka dei kaba sniew bad ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon aiñ.“Ka jingai jingkyrshan ym tang ba ka nang ai ding ïa ki kam be-aiñ bad kiba pyrshah ïa ka ri, hynrei ka buh ruh ha ka jingma ïa ka jingim jong ki briew kiba lui lui bad ka ktah ruh ïa ka jinglong jingman ha ka imlang sahlang. Ka jingdon bynta ha ka ban ïarap ai pisa ïa ki kynhun be-aiñ, kam dei tang ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka aiñ hynrei ka ïuhroit ruh ïa ka jingpyrshang da baroh ban ïada ïa ka Ri na ki kam pyntriem ki lehnoh bad ki kam be-aiñ ki jongki” la ong u Bishnoi.U DGP ula maham ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban kiar ban ai kano kano ka jingsiew sha kino kino ki briew ne kynhun bad ula ong ka jingsiew pisa sha ki kynhun be-aiñ kan khring ïa ki kyndon jong ka Section 11, 13 & 17 jongka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act, 1967 bad kumjuh ïa ka Section 4 jongka Prevention of Money Laundering Act bad ka Section 109 IPC.Ula ong, kiba shah dawa pisa ki dei ban pyntip sha ki pulit khnang ba kin ïoh leh ïa kaba donkam bad yn buhrieh ïa ka kyrteng bad ïa kino kino ki jingtip shaphang jongki.
title: Wat  ym siew pisa da lei lei ruh sha ka HNLC bad GNLA maham ka tnad Pulit

content: Shillong, Lber 23: Ka jingïalehkai hapdeng ar tylli ki kynhun na Mawlai ha ka lympung Shillong Premier League 2023 kaba hynnin ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ka la kut ha ka jingïakhaid, ha kaba baroh ar, ka Mawlai SC bad ka Ryntih SC ki la ïoh ban thep mar kawei haduh kaba kut jong ka por.Ha ka jingïakhun dei ka Mawlai SC kaba la ïoh ban pynkhihjar nyngkong lyngba ka kol na u Khrawkupar Jana ha ka minit kaba 46 tang mar ïa sdang ka kylla miet, hynrei ka Ryntih SC ka la ïoh ban pynïakhaid lyngba u Yami Longvah ha ka 66 minit.Lah ban kdew ruh ba ka lahduh jong ka samoi ba ladep, ka Mawlai SC ka la duh ïa shibun ki kabu kiba kam shym la lah ban pynurlong, katba ka Ryntih ka la duh ïa ar tylli ki kol ba la thep kiba shah rai offside.Watla kata ruh, baroh arliang ki la ïakhun tyngeh bad sei la ki jong ki sap ki phong ha kane ka jingïakhun hynrei tad haduh kaba kut jong ka 90 minit ym shym la don ba lah ban pynïakhlad ïa ka jingïakhaid.Ka jingïalehkai mynta ka sngi kan long hapdeng ka Nangkiew Irat SC pyrshah ïa ka Nongthymmai SC ha ka por 3 baje nohphaisngi. Kumban shu pynkynmaw, ka Nangkiew Irat ka la jop ïa ka jingïakhun kaba nyngkong, katba ka Nongthymmai ka la mad namrem ha ka sngi sdang ïa kane ka samoi ba mynta ka SPL.
title: SPL 2023: Mar shi kol ïakhaid ka Mawlai SC bad ka Ryntih SC

content: Shillong, Lber 23: Wat hadien ba ka jylla ka la ïoh ban kyntiew sa katto katne ki takma ha ka sngi khadduh jong ka lympung 3rd North East Games ha Nagaland hynrei pynban ka Meghalaya ka la hiar shaduh ka kyrdan ba hynñiew ha ka miej khur takma ki nongïalehkai.Haduh kaba kut jong kane ka lympung kaba la long ha Nagaland ka jylla Meghalaya ka la wanphai ryngkat bad 2 tylli ki takma ksiar, 12 tylli rupa bad 41 tylli ki takma rnong, bad haba kheiñ kyllumlang ka jylla ka la ïoh ban khur 55 tylli ki takma, bad wan ba san haba kheiñ tang na ka jingïoh khur takma hynrei namar ka jingïoh ban khur tang 2 tylli ki takma ksiar ka Meghalaya ka la hiar ban tam shakhmat tang ïa ka jylla Tripura.Haba phai sha ki jingïalehkai hynnin ka Sngi Saitjaiñ, ka sngi ban sa khylliap artad ïa kane ka lympung, ka jylla ka la bynnud bad hap ban hun takma rupa naki thei ïalehkai basketball hadien ba ki la shah rem noh ha ka Sikkim ha ka final, kata da tang 61 – 60 basket.Na ki nongïalehkai Athletics ka jylla ka la ïoh ban khur ar tylli ki takma, da kaba khur takma rupa ha ka women’s cross country ba la mihkhmat da ka Bandasharai Marwein, Ibanriakor Lyngkhoi, Claire Jones Jala Kharbhih bad ka Barisha Khymdeit. Katba ha ka kynhun ki shynrang ba la mihkhmat da u Kresstarjune Pathaw, Knerlang Phawa, Iohborlang Nongspung bad u Dabit Dkhar ki la ïoh ban khur Rupa.Ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ruh ban khur kawei ka takma rnong ha ka Lawn tennis, lyngba ki shijur ba kynthup ïa u Wankhraw Wahlang Nongrum bad u Enrick Suchiang.Ka jylla ka la ïoh ruh ban khur ar tylli ki takma rupa bad kawei ka rnong ha ka archery. Ka kynhun ki kynthei (recurve women’s team) ki la wan kyrdan ba ar, ba la mihkhmat da ka Navidisha Kapoor, Daphishisha Jamu, Damandashisha Pasi bad ka Andrica Nongsiej. Kawei pat ka Rupa la khur da ki shijur ba kynthup ïa u Mukesh Tamang bad ka Navidisha.Nangta u Mukesh u la jop takma rnong ruh ha ka recurve men’s team ba kynthuplang ïa u Larilang Lyngdoh, Devraj Mohapatra bad u Amebalaker Wanniang.Khadduh, ka jylla ka la ïoh ban khur kawei ka takma rupa na ka belt wrestling lyngba u Kyrshanbor Romeo Songthiang (men’s 60kg) bad ar tylli ki takma rnong na ka Lorenza Songthiang bad ka Sany Khyriemmujat (women’s 60kg).Ki jingïalehkai kiba ka jylla kam shym la ïoh ban khur takma ha kane ka kynti ki long ha ka badminton bad ha ka football, ka volleyball, nangta ka sepak takraw ka jingïalehkai kaba ka jylla kam shym la ïashimbynta.Kumba ka paw, haba nujor ha ka lympung ba ladep ka Meghalaya ka la duna palat ha ka jingïoh khur takma mynta u snem. Ha ka North East Games 2022 kaba long ha nongbah Shillong, ka Meghalaya ka la wan kyrdan ba saw ryngkat bad 36 tylli ki takma ksiar, 35 tylli rupa bad 78 tylli ki takma rnong.Kawei na ki daw ka lah ban long ka jingkylla ha katto katne ki jingïalehkai. Ka Karate ka la shah weng noh mynta u snem, ka jingïalehkai kaba ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ban khur shibun ki takma ha u snem 2022. Nangta ki jingïalehkai kum ka judo, shooting, swimming, cycling, golf bad ka weightlifting. Ha jaka jong kine la pynrung da ka volleyball, belt wrestling, pencak silat bad ka sepak takraw.
title: Napdeng 8 tylli ki jylla wan kyrdan ba 7 ka Meghalaya ha ka 3rd North East Games

content: BDWS
title: BDWS

content: Shillong, Lber 23 : Ha kawei ka jingjia kaba la jia ha ka step Sngi Thohdieng, uwei u nongñiah trok na kane ka jylla Meghalaya uba dei na ka shnong Kyndongtuber, West Jaintia Hills u la shah rahbor bad shah pyniap dusmon ha ki riew runar ha ki thaiñ ka Jagi Road lynti ban leit Nagoan ha ka jaka ba la tip kum ka Kaliabor da kaba shah bom da u wheelrench na ki bynta ka khlieh bad hadien kane ki sa thep ïa ka metiap jongu ha poh ka seat dien jongka trok.Une u nongñiah trok uba dang 46 snem ka rta u dei uba kyrteng u Nicolas Dhar. La ïathuh ba ha ka Sngi Palei u la leit kit ïa ka dewbilat na Topcem Cement ban leit pynhiar sha Upper Assam. Haba u la dep ban jam ïa ka toll gate ha Raha, Assam u la phone sha ka para ha ka por kumba 1 baje ei ei mynstep bad ong ïa ka ba u la samthiah kumta un thiah shwa bad u phah ïa ka para ban sa kyrsiew ïa u ha ka por 4 baje mynstep.Ha ka por mynstep haba la phone ka para ruh ym don ba shim ïa ka phone, bad haba u trai jong ka trok kaba dei ka SPS Transport bad don u number NL-01AA 6213 u la peit lyngba ka GPS ïa ki trok jongu u la ïohi ba kane ka trok ka la ïaid sha ka lynti ba kam dei shuh ban ïaid. Kumta u la phone ïa u nongñiah bad la shim da uwei u briew uba dei u bar jylla bad u la ïathuh ha u trai ka trok ba u nongñiah kata u Nicolas u ïoh thiah um kyndit wat la kyrsiew ruh.U trai uba la pyndait GPS ïa ki trok u la ipher ïa ka rukom ñiah sted ïaka trok namar wat haba la ong ba un pynsangeh ïa ka trok harud surok ruh um treh satia kumta u trai u la pyntip sha ki bor pulit kiba la ïoh bat ïa katei ka trok na Kaliabor bad kem ïa utei u briew uba ñiah ïa ka. Hadien kane haba ki pulit ki la tohkit shaphang u nongñiah jong ka trok utei u briew u la ïathuh ba um don hapoh ka trok namar u la hiar ha shiteng lynti. Ki pulit ki la mut ban rah ïa ka trok sha Thanad ban tohkit bniah hynrei haba kam start ki la plie ïa ka seat dien jong ka trok ba ju buh ïa u battery ban pyndait bha ïa u battery bad lap pynban ba la thep ïa ka met iap jong u Nicolas hapoh katei ka seat. Mar mar ki pulit ki la kem ïa utei u briew ban tohkit bniah ïa u bad la ïoh jingtip ba mynta ki pulit ki dang thwet ïa kiwei kiba ïadonkti lang ha kane ka jingjia. Ha ka jingtohkit utei uba la ïoh kem da ki pulit u la phla ba ka jingthmu ka long ban die ïa katei ka dewbilat baroh shitrok bad kumjuh ruh ïa katei ka trok.Kiba haïing hynnin hi ka sngi ki la leit ban shimti ïa ka met hynrei namar ba hap ban pyndep ïa ka post mortem kumta ki dang ïoh ban wan kit mynta ka miet ïa ka met sha la shnong na ka bynta ban pyndep ïa kaba sah jong u.
title: Shah rahbor bad shah pyniap dusmon u Nongniah trok na Meghalaya ha Assam

content: Shillong, Lber 24: Ka jingïalehkai ka lympung Shilong Cricket League kyrdan Super Division 2024 hapdeng ka Rangkynsai CC bad ka Spartan CC hynne ka sngi ka la jam sha kaba kut ha kaba ka Rangkynsai CC ka la jop kput palat da spah ron.Haba sdang, ka toss ka la hap ha ka liang jong ka Spartan CC kaba la jied ban bol nyngkong. Haba shimti ban tied nyngkong ka Rangkynsai CC ka la lah ban kynjoh haduh 272 ron shuwa ba baroh 10 ngut kin shah pynhap hadien 42.3 over.Ki rangtied kiba la seisoh ha kane ka inning ki long u Kishan Lyngdoh u ba la kamai 62 ron na ki 47 bol, nangta u Savian Blah u ba la kamai 57 ron naki 35 bol.Haba phai pat sha ki rangkawangbol ka Spartan CC, u Ankit Yadav u la ïoh ban pyndep 7.3 over, shah tied 50 ron bad ïoh pynhap 4 wicket, katba u Mani Bhusan Thakur u la ïoh bynta 9 over, shah tied 43 ron bad khur 3 wicket.Haba pyrshang ban beh ïa katei ka ron ba la buh ka Spartan CC ka la ïohlad ban tied tang 137 ron namar ba baroh 10 ngut ki la shah pynhap noh hadien 32.1 over.Napdeng ki rangtied kiba la kamai bun ron ïa ka kynhun ki long u Dipankar Barua (75 ron naki 79 bol) bad u Gagandeep Singh (14 ron naki 35 bol) hynrei kane kam shym la biang ban pyllait ïa ka kynhun naka namrem.Haba phai pat sha ki rangkawangbol ka Rangkynsai CC, u Ram Gurung u la ïoh ban khur 3 wicket na ki 9 over bad shah tied tang 35, nangta u Ajay Duhan u la khur 2 wicket naki 6 over bad shah tied tang 19 ron.Ka Rangkynsai CC ka la jop ïa ka jingïakhun da 135 ron bad ïa ka nam Player of the match la khur da u Savian Blah u ba la tied 57 ron bad khur 1 wicket ha ka bol.
title: SCL Super Division 2024: Palat spah ron pynliem ka Rangkynsai ïa ka Spartan CC

content: Moscow, Lber : Ka kynhun Islamic State (ISIS) ka la shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam thombor ba shyrkhei hapoh ka hall ba pynlong concert ha Moscow kaba la shim ïa ka jingim jong palat 115 ngut ki briew bad ka jingmynsaw ïa palat 150 ngut kiwei pat ha kane ka sngi Thohdieng ba la lah.“Ki riewïaleh ka ISIS ki la thombor ha kane ka jaka ïalum paidbah ha ki thaiñ ba pajih na ka nongbah Moscow ka Russia,” ong kane ka kynhun kieng atiar lyngba ka Telegram.Ka la ong ruh ba kine ki nongthombor ki la wanphai biang sha la ki jong ki ktem hapdeng ka jingshngaiñ.”Ki riewkieng atiar ki la synreit kuli pathar hapoh ka concert ïatem ïa put ha ka thaiñ shatei ka Moscow kaba la shim ïa ka jingim jong palat 115 ngut ki briew bad pynmynaw ia palat 150 ngut kiwei pat bad kaba la wanrah ruh ka jingpluh ding ba triem hapoh kane ka jaka pynlong concert, ong ka khubor sorkar.Kine ki riewkieng atiar kiba phong da ki riam shipai ki la wan rung ha katei ka hall bad synreit kuli pathar bad kawang ruh da ki bom grenade bad kiwei pat ki jait bom, ong u nongpathai khubor uba don ha katei ka jaka.Na ka liang ki bor sorkar ki la ïaid shakhmat ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit, bad na ka liang u President Vladimir Putin ruh ula shim khia halor kane ka jingjia, ong u nongaiktien jong u, u Dmitry Peskov lyngba ki lad pathai khubor.Kane ka jingjia shah thombor ka la wan long ruh jan shi bnai hadien ba ka United States ka la maham ïa ki bor sorkar ka Russia ha kaba sdang jong une u bnai halor ka kam thombor lehnoh kaba lah ban wan jia ha ki jaka paidbah ha Moscow, ong ka White House khyndiat kynta hadien katei ka jingjia ba shyrkhei.“Ha kaba sdang jong une u bnai ka sorkar US ka la ïoh jingtip halor ka jingthmu kam thombor jong ki lehnoh ha Moscow, kata kaba lah ban long ha ki jaka ïalum paidbah, bad halor kane ka Washington ka la ïasam lem ruh sha ki bor sorkar ka Russia,” ong ka nongaiktien ka National Security Council ka Adrienne Watson.Ki heh sorkar US ki la pynpaw ruh lyngba ka lad pathai khubor ba ki ngeit ba ka jingkam jong ka ISIS halor kane ka jingjia ka dei kaba shisha.Ki katto katne ki jingjia shah thombor ba shyrkhei ha kane ka nongbah ka Russia naduh ki 25 snem kiba la dep ki kynthup halor ka jingpynbthei bom ïa ki ïing bun mala kaba la jia ha ka step jong ka 13 tarik u Nailur 1999 ha ka thaiñ shathie mihngi ka Moscow kaba la shim ïa ka jingim jong ki 118 ngut ki briew.Na ka liang ka Moscow ka la kynnoh ïa ka jingdonkti jong ki lehnoh na ki thaiñ ba bun ki paid Muslim ha ki bynta shatei ka Caucasus shatei jong ka Chechnya.Kawei pat ka jingthombor ba shyrkhei ka la jia ha ka 23 tarik u Risaw 2002 hadien ba ki lehnoh Chechen kiba kynthup ïa 21 ngut ki shynrang bad 19 ngut ki kynthei ki la thombor ïa kawei ka jaka cinema ha Dubrovka ha Moscow bad bat koidi jubor ïa haduh palat 800 ngut ki briew.Ka jingïaleh pyrshah bad ki bor pahara ka la neh haduh ar sngi lai miet.Kane ka la kut noh hadien ba ki bor shipai ki la siat da ka kynja lyer ba long bih hapoh katei ka hall ban pynjem khnap ïa ki lehnoh.Ha kane ka jingjia haduh 130 ngut ki briew ki la ïap ha kaba bun na ki, ki la khlad noh namar ka jingïoh ring ïa ka tdem ba long bih.
title: Iap palat 100, mynsaw da ki spah ngut na ka jing thombor ka ISIS ha ka jaka pynlong Concert ha Russia

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber, 24: Ka KSU West Khasi Hills District Unit ha ka jingïalam u samla Wanbhakupar L.Nonglait Organising Secretary KSU West Khasi Hills District, ha ka jingsynran lang u Samla Mixz Samakha u ba dei u Finance Secretary KSU West Khasi Hills District, ka la leit khynra Work Permit, Labour License ïa ki nongtrei bar jylla kiba trei ha ka Shnong Sohparu Nongstoiñ, kiba pyntrei ïa kawei ka skul ba la tip kum ka Residential School, ba la pyntrei da kawei ka Company ba la tip kum ka WAPCOS Limited ba dei na West Bengal.Ha katei ka jingkhynra, ka seng ka la lap ba la jan kot shi spah ngut ki bar jylla kiba wan trei ha katei ka jaka. Napdeng kitei kiba bun kim don satia ki kot ki sla kiba biang katkum katei ba la kdew haneng, kumta na ka liang ka seng ka la phah leit phai noh sha ki jaka ba ki wan ryngkat ka jingmaham ïa katei ka Company, ba ym bit ban wanrah nongtrei bar jylla palat ïa ka NoC ba la buh da ka shnong hangtei.Ka seng ka la dawa ruh ba dei ban thep kham bun da ki Khasi kiba la lah ban trei ha katei ka jaka ne ïa katei ka kam. Ka seng ka la ong ruh kan sa wan mih biang ha kiwei ki sngi bad lada lap ba ki pynkheiñ biang, ka seng kan shim da ka lynti kaba kham tyngeh la pynkut na ki nongïalam jong ka KSU West Khasi Hills District.
title: Pynher krad ka KSU ïa ki bar jylla ba trei bylla ha ka shnong Sohparu

content: Nongpoh, Lber 24: Ban pynurlong ïa ka thong jong ka seng ban shakri na ka bynta ki paradoh ki para snam ha ka jylla, ka HANM sengkmie ha ka jingïalam u President ba Rangbah, u Bah Lamphrang Kharbani haka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la lah ban pynthymmai ïa ki nongïalam ba pura ka HANM ha Ri Bhoi DistrictKi ar ngut ki samla na Ri Bhoi ba kynthup ïa u Samla Ajit Makri u la shah pynkhamti kum u President bad u Samla Donroy Kshiar kum u General Secretary ka HANM ha Ri Bhoi nalor kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam ba la pynthymmai hynnin ka sngi ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Dorbar Hall Pahamsyiem.Ïa kitei ki nongïalam la pynskhem bad pynbam smai katkum ki kyndon treikam ka HANM da u President ba Rangbah, u Bah Lamphrang Kharbani ha ryngkat ki jingsneng jingkraw ba kin shimti hok ïa ka lyngkor ba la bynshet ïa ki kum kita ki nongïalam ka seng.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi, u Bah Lamphrang Kharbani kum u nongïalam ba rangbah ka seng u la pynpaw ïa ka mynsiem jong ka jingkmen ba ki smala ka Ri Bhoi ki la wan ban pynïasoh sha ka seng namar ka thong jong ka seng ka long ban ai ka jingshakri na ka bynta ka eh ka shon jong ki paradoh ki para snam.Ku u nongïalam u la kren ruh halor shibun ki mat ki jura jong ka jaid byrniew ba ka seng HANM ka la ïaid lynti ban ïada ïa la ka jaid bynriew bad kum ka seng ka dang donkam ruh shibun ki shipai jaid bynriew khnang ban lah ban ïada kyrpang ïa la ka jong ka jaid bynriew.Shuh shuh, u la kyntu ruh ïa ki ba kum ki nongïalam ki dei ban don ka jingkitkhlieh ban ai ka jingshakri sha ki paidbah ka District bad ym ban wan ban pynïasoh sha ka seng tang ba ioh jingmyntoi shimet ba ka thong jong ka seng ka long ban peit kyrpang ïa ka eh ka shon ka jaid bynriew.
title: Shimti u Ajit Makri bad u Donroy Kshiar kum ki nongïalam ka HANM Ri-Bhoi

content: Shillong, Lber 24: U MLA ka BJP napoh 19 South Shillong Konstituensi u Bah Sanbor Shullai uba la long teng u kyrtong ka BJP ha la ilekshon Lok Sabha ha ki snem ba la leit noh u la pdiang sngewbha ïa ka rai jong ki nongïalam ka BJP Sengkmie ban kyrshan lang ïa ki kyrtong monlang kiba ïatreilang hapoh ka sorkar NDA.Ha ka kyrwoh khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u Bah Shullai u la ong ba na ka daw ba ka NPP ka dei ka seng kaba bun paid bad kiba la ïadonlang hapoh ka sorkar NDA, kam shym la don ka jingbakla na ka liang ki nongïalam ka BJP sengkmie da kaba ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ka NPP na Shillong bad Tura seat.U la ïathuh ba ha u snem ba la leit jong ka ilekshon MP na ka liang ka BJP ka la don ka vote bank kaba la shu kheiñ antad kumba 70 hajar ngut da kaba thmu ruh ba kan sa kiew sha ka lak ngut na ka bynta ka Shillong parliamentary seat.“Lada ïa kane ka jingïoh vote la ïoh ban ïabynta lang ka jingïatreilang jong ka NDA, kumta kan khambha ïa ka jinglah ban don ka lad ban jop da ka jingïaphiah ki vote. Kumta nga kyrpad ïa baroh ki nongïalam ka parti ba kim dei ban don ka jingïaphiah ha ki kam kiba hapoh ka parti bad ban ïalong kawei ba kan long kaba ïarap ïa ka sorkar NDA. Lada ka NPP ka jop, bad ki MP na ka jylla jong ngi kin ïoh ka lad ban pynpaw ïa ka sur kaba bha ban ïa u kyrtong ka Congress uba mynta uba don ha ka liang pyrshah,” ong u Bah Shullai.U la ong ba kin don ki por ba ïaid shalyndet ka jingsngew parti bad ban buh hakhmat nyngkong eh ïa ka jylla na ka bynta ban ïoh ki lad pynroi.“Kam don ka jingartatien ba ka BJP hapoh hapoh ka jingïalam jong u PM Modi kan ïoh kumba 400 tam tylli ki seat ha kane ka por, kumta lada ngi lah ban ai ar seat na ka Meghalaya kan sa ïarap ïa ka jylla ban ïoh khambun ki pisa bad ki skhim ka sorkar pdeng. Lada ngi jop baroh 2 seat, ngi la thikna ba kin ïoh ïa ki shuki myntri hapoh ka sorkar pdeng. Kumta kane ka jingïarai ban ïa kyrshan lang ïa ki kyrtong monlang kan ïarap ban pyndep ïa baroh ki mat kiba dang sah hapoh ka jylla lyngba ka sorkar pdeng. Ka jingïashrut hapoh ki paralok ba ïatreilang dei ban pynbeit noh kham kloi,” ong u Bah MLA ka BJP.Na ka liang u Bah Shullai u la ong ba ka BJP Meghalaya ka dei ban bud ïa ka Nagaland ha kaba ka NDPP bad ka BJP ki don ka jingïatreilang bad ka la jop palat ïa ka 37 seat. U Bah Shullai u la ong ba kiwei ki seng riewlum ki bym don ki jingïohi jngai kim long eiei hynrei kin long kum ki soh kiba mih ha ki por aïom ki ban shu wan bad leit.
title: Ki jingïashrut hapoh ki paralok ba ïatreilang dei ban pynbeit kloi, ong u MLA ka BJP

content: Shillong, Lber 22: “Ko Maduh Prestone wat lada phi kwah ban wan pynïasoh makna bad VPP ruh ngim pdiang te namar ngin pynkhuid noh ïa u stait”, la ong u Bah Ardent Basaïawmoit, President jong ka VPP haba kren ha ka jingïalang ha Mawlangsu.U Bah Ardent u la ong ïa kane hadien ba u Bah Prestone, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah bad u State President ka NPP u la ong ba lada u lah ban wanrah ne pyni ïa ka blue print halor ka jingieid ïa ka jaitbynriew, u(Prestone) kloi ban pynïasoh noh bad ka VPP.U nongïalam ka VPP u la ong ba ka Seng kan hikai ïa ki Samla, ki longkmie, ki longkpa ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki kam bamsap, ki jingsniew ba bun jait, ka jingleh shiliang khmat da kaba ïaid da ka lynti kaba thymmai bad ki briew kiba thymmai kiba khuid kiba suba.Shuh shuh ha kane ka jingïalang, u Bah Ardent u pynshai ruh ïa ka jingthaw ktien kiba ïaleh pyrshah ïa u ba u kren beiñ ïa ki Tymmen Basan ba ki sam kiad ha ka por ilekshon. “Nga khlem ong kumta ne kynnoh kumba thaw ktien kine kiba ïaleh pyrshah ïa ngi, hynrei nga shuh ïathuh ïa kaei kaba nga ïoh sngew na kaei kaba ong ki briew bad nga ong ruh ba ka long kaba sngewsih lada ka long kumta”, la ong u Bah Ardent.
title: Ko Maduh Prestone da phi kwah wan makna sha ka VPP ruh ngim pdiang: Ardent

content: “Lada uno uno ruh u mon ban wan nadien jong nga, ai ba un lenïalade, bad un rah ïa la ka diengphna…” Loukas 9:23.Ka pyrem ka wan ryngkat bad ka taïew jong ka jingshah shitom u Khrist bad ka dei ka aïom jong ka jingim bathymmai bad jingkyrmen. Ha kane ka aïom, ki Khristan kylleng satlak ka pyrthei ki rakhe ïa ka jingshah shitom u Khrist bad puson ruh halor ki jinghikai bad ka jingshahshitom u Khrist na ka bynta ki khun bynriew. Ha pyrshah jong ka jingther bomb kaba khlem sangeh jong ka Ri Israel ïa ka Nongbah Gaza bad ka jingkhie rasong ki kynhun shitniam Hindu ha India, to ngin ïapuson halor ka lynti jong ka diengphna bad kiei ki jinghikai ba ngi ïoh na ka.Halor ka jingther bomb ïa ka shnong Gaza, da ki million ngut ki nong Palestine ki la shem kordit bad ki la duh lut ïa ki jingdon jingem, ki kylla phetwir bad da ki phew hajar ngut ki la ïap. Kane ka dei ka jingpynïap dusmon ïa ki nongshong shnong ka shnong Gaza. Ha Ri India pat, ngi sakhi ïa ka jingkiew skong jong ki seng ne kynhun shitniam Hindu. Kumta ka long kaba kongsan ïa ngi ban bat skhem ïa ki jinghikai shaphang ka hok bad ka jingieid kaba u Jisu u la hikai ïa ngi. Bad ka lynti jong ka diengphna ka long ban ïengpyrshah ïa ka jingbymhok bad ka jingthombor da ka jingshemphang bad jingshlur.Ka lynti jong ka diengphna kam dei ban pynïashun hapdeng kawei ka kynhun bad kawei pat lymne kawei niam pyrshah ïa kawei pat ka niam. Hynrei ka dei ka lynti ban wanrah ïa ka jingïaburom kylliang bad ka diengphna ka dei ban pun lynti hapdeng ki jaitbynriew bad ban pynlong ïa pyrthei kaba dap da ka jingsngewlem bad jingsuk. Ñiuma, ka jingthaw ïa ka aiñ Healing (Prevention of Evil) Practices Act 2024, ha ka jylla Assam, lehse kan buh ïa ka jingmane blei ki Khristan ha ka jingeh bakhraw. Kane ka aiñ ka khang pyrshah ïa kino ki kambah kiba suba ba ki dei ki jingleh myntoi ne jinglehbyrtong da ka jingthmu ban pynkyllaniam jubor ïa ki briew? Ngi dei ban tip ba ka niam Khristan kam hikai ïa ki briew ban leh byrtong, hynrei ki Balang Khristan man la ka sngi ki ïaksaid bad ïakhun halor ki jingeh ba ki briew ki ïakynduh ha ka jingim. La ka long ki jingpang jingshitom, ka jingduk, ka jingdukha bad kiwei. Ka Balang lane ki nongsharai Balang ki ïasaid bad duwai ryngkat bad ki briew kiba donkam ïa ki jingduwai bad jingkyrshan jong ka Balang. Ka jingduwai ka dei ka lynti jong ka diengphna bad ka jingduwai ka ai jingtngen, ka ai jingkyrmen bad ka ai jingpynkhiah ïa kiba pang, kiba shah ïehnohbeiñ, ki mraw bad kiba shah thombor. Hynrei mynta ki jingduwai bad ki jingïasaid lyngba ki jingduwai na ka bynta kiba shemlanot, lehse ki lah ban shah khang bad shah pynshitom da katei ka aiñ.Wat la ka kynhun jong ki Khristan, ka Assam Christian Forum, ka la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ïa katei ka Aiñ, hynrei ka jingbyrngem byrsit jong ki kynhun shitniam Hindu kiba byrngem ïa ki nongpynïaid skul Balang bad ka jingpyndik ïa kawei ka riewniam, ka la buh ïa ki nongtrei Balang ha ka jingsyier. Ka jingkthong bad jingbyrngem ïa ki skul Balang bad jingpyndik ïa ki nongtrei mission Balang ka long kum ka jingñiewpoh ïa ki Khristan. Ka jingpynshitom beiñ ïa ki Khristan bad ïa kiwei de ki ritpaid ha Assam bad kiwei ki Jylla, ka dei ban pynkhuslai bad pynduh thiah ïa ngi kiba shong ha ka Jylla Meghalaya. Hooid, ha Meghalaya ym don ba pyndik ïa ki Khristan namarba ki bun paid, hynrei ka jingshah ñiew beiñ jong ki Khristan bad kiwei de ki ritpaid ha Assam bad shawei, ka dei ban ktah ïa ka mynsiem ïatiplem jong ngi kiba im ha Meghalaya. Kumta, kalynti jongka diengphna ka long ban ïakit ïabah lang ïa ka jingshitom bad kyrshan lem ïa kiwei kiba don hapdeng ki jingjynjar.Watla ka tynrai long jaitbynriew jongngi ki Khasi ka jngai bad ïapher bak lybak na kiwei pat, hynrei da ka jingshemphang bad ka jingkut jingmut jong ki riewstad bad ki dkhot jong ka Constituent Assembly ki la seng ïa ka Ri India baïar ha ka nongrim jong ka hok, ka jinglaitluid bad ka jingïalong mar ryngkat. Ka Riti Synshar ka ïada ïa ki hok jong ki nongshong shnong, khamtam eh jong ki rit paid bad ka pynlah ruh ïa uwei pa uwei ne kawei pa kawei ban imlaitluid hapoh ka Ri, khlem da ñiew tang ïa ka niam, ïa ka rongsnieh doh, ïa ka jinglong kynthei ne shynrang bad kumta ter ter. Hooid, ha ka por ba la thaw ïa ka Riti Synshar ki la don ruh ki lynti kiba dum ba ki nongthaw ki la dei ban ïaid lyngba bad ki la lah ban ai ha ki nongshong shnong ka Ri India ïa ka jinglaitluid, ka jinglong mar ryngkat bad ka hok. Kumta ma ngi ki long mynta ngi dei ban ïakhun na ka bynta ban pynneh ïa ka Riti Synshar bad ban pynïohbiang ha ki briew ïa kita ki hok. Kane ka dei ka lynti jong ka diengphna.Ka jingïatai halor ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) ka long kaba jwat bad kiba bun ki kynhun jaitbynriew bad ki seng ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewdiaw bad jingpyrshah jong ki ïa kane ka Aiñ. Kumta ka long kaba kongsan ban sngewthuh bad pdiang ïa ka jingartatien bad jingsheptieng jong ki kynhun kiba shem ba kane ka Aiñ ka pynkheiñ ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew bad ka ktah ïa ki rit paid trai ri (Indigenous people) bad ki Muslim.Haba phai pat sha ka thaiñ lam mihngi jong ka Ri India, ka Aiñ CAA ka nang sohkyrdot shuh shuh bad ka buh jingma ïa ki jaitbynriew trai ri kiba don ha kane ka thaiñ. Ym lah ban kheiñdew thala ïa ka jingma kaba ap ïa ki jaitbynriewtrai ri bad ki rit paid lada pyntreikam pura ïa kane ka aiñ. Nalorkata, ka CAA ka long kaba lah shilliang namarba kam kynthup ïa ki jaitbynriew trai ri kiba don ha Bangladesh, kum ki Khasi bad Garo. Ym lah ban len ba ki don napdeng ki Garo bad ki Khasi ha Bangladesh kiba dang bat ïa ka niamtynrai (kaba mut kim dei ki Khristan lymne ki Hindu). Kine ki lah ban mad ïa ka jingshah pynshitom beiñ ha ka Ri Muslim ha Bangladesh bad kin shem jingeh ban ïoh jaka rieh ne ban ïoh long nongshong shnong ha Ri India, ka Ri kaba ki kur jongki ki don namarba kim dei ki Khristan ne ki Hindu. Ka CAA ka long kaba lah shilliang namar ka khanglad ïa ki Khasi ne Garo ban phetrieh sha India.Nangta, ka CAA ka long pyrshah ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew bad ka lah shilliang, khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ki jaitbynriew Kuki-ZO bad ki Rohingya. Ka CAA ka khanglad ïa ki kynhun kiba shah lehbeiñ tam kiba dei ban ïoh ïa ka jingïada bad jingïarap. Kumba long ki Rohingya, ki jaitbynriew Kuki-Zo ruh ki mad ïa ka jingshah ban beiñ bad jingshah thombor ha ki bor shipai ka Ri Myanmar bad ki kylla phetwir. Kumta ki dei hok ban ïoh ïa ka jingïarap bad jingïada. Phewse, ka CAA ka khanglad ïa ki namar kam shym kynthup ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba phetwir na ka Ri Myanmar. Ka jingkhanglad bad jingkyntait ïa ki phetwir kiba luilui kiba phetrieh na ka jingshah thombor ka long ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka hok longbriew bad kam ïadei satia bad ki jinghikai jong ka lynti jong ka diengphna.Ka long kaba dei ban dawa jur ban pyndamnoh ïa ka CAA namarba ka long kaba lah shilliang bad ka pynkheiñ ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew. Lah ban thaw da kiwei pat ki aiñ kiba lah ban pynbeit bad ïarap ïa ki phetwir, khlem da ñiewtang ïa ki niam ne tynrai long jaitbynriew jong ki lymne ïa ka Ri kaba ki wan. Ki Aiñ kiba la thaw da ka jingsngewlem bad jingïatip lem ïa ki para briew kiba shem jynjar, kum ki phetwir bad kiwei, ki long kiba ïadei dur bad ka lynti jong ka diengphna, ka lynti kaba hikai ïa ngi shaphang ka jingieid, ka jingïatiplem bad ka jingkordor jong ka jingim briew.Hapoh la ka jong ka jylla, ka don mynta ka jingkynnoh ne jingkynthoh ba ka seng Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka pyndonkam palat pud ïa ka Bible na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki kam saiñ pyrthei. Hooid, ka buh ïa ka imlang sahlang, ka jingïatreikam bad ka synshar khadar ha ka jingma lada don kiba shim kabu ne pyndonkambakla ïa ka niam ne ki kot niam na ka bynta ban myntoi ki kam khaïi ne kam synshar jong ki ne wat ban pynïaid ïa ka jingimbriew. Ka long ruh ka jingpynjem daw ne jingpynhiar dor bad ka jingleh thala ïa ki jinghikai bakordor jong ki kot Bakhuid lada don kiba pyndonkam bakla. Hynrei lyngba ki por ki nongsynshar lehdonbor ki la ju pyndonkam bakla ïa ki Kot Bakhuid ban pynksan ïa ki kam runar ne jingsynshar thombor jong ki. Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka lynti jong ka diengphna ka ïai pynkynmaw ïa ngi ba u Jisu u ïeng ryngkat bad u ïakhun na ka bynta kiba shah kyntait bad kiba shah ban beiñ.
