U ïasaid ban pynïoh bad pynurlong ïa ka hok bad jingshisha.Ban wanrah ïa ka synshar khadar kaba khuid, ka mut ba ngi long la kloi ban pynrem bad ban pynduh jait ïa ka saiñpyrkhat kaba pynkha ïa ka jingïasih bad jingïashun para briew, bad ngi dei ban sdang na ka kyrpong ïing la jong. Kane ka mut ruh ban ïeng na ka bynta kiba tlot bor bad ki rit paid bad ban thaw ïa ki aiñ ne ki policy ki ban kyntiew ym tang ïa la ka jong ka jaitbynriew, hynrei na ka bynta ban ïabit ïabiang lang baroh. Da kaba ngi leh kumne ka mut ba ngi ñiewkor bad bud shisha ïa ka lynti jong ka diengphna bad ngi lah ban thaw ïa ka imlang sahlang kaba shngaiñ bad kaba dap da ka jingkyrmen.Khatduh eh, ka lynti jong ka diengphna ka kren aïu ïangi mynta? Ha ki kyntien jong u Stanley J Samartha, “Ka Diengphna ka ïeng ha ka khep ba ka niam jong ka politic bad ka politic jong ka niam ki ïashem lang ban ïasylla pyrshah ïa uwei u briew, uba ïeng na ka bynta ka hok bad jingshisha. Ha ka jylli jong ka bamsap (ka lehbor, ka hangamei, ka thombor, ka mynsiem isih, jingle shilliang khmat) bad ka khwan myntoi shimet, u ne ka briew kiba hok ki lah ban shah pynshoi bad lada u ne ka, ki ïaineh ha ka jinglonghok bad jinglongkhuid, ki lah ban shah pynshitom bad shah pynïap. Uno uno ne kano kano kiba nud ban ïeng pyrshah ïa ki bor kiba thombor bad kiba nud ban sei madan ïa ki jaboh jabaiñ bad ka jingrunar jong kita kiba shong ha ka bor synshar, ka jingim jong ki ka kutnoh bad ki shah pynïap halor ka diengphna. Ka jingïap u Jisu halor ka diengphna ka dei ka jingshah shitom jong ka met, ka jinglen lade na ka bynta kiwei pat bad ruh ka dei ka jingpyndem jong u Trai Jisu ha ka mon jong u Blei.”
title: Ka Taïew ka jingshah shitom U Khrist: Ka Lynti jong ka Diengphna

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 24: Ka Khasi Student’s Union (KSU) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ryngkat ka Synjuk ki Seng Samla Shnong (SSSS), South West Khasi Hills District bad Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia & Garo People’s (FKGJP) kiba hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District bad Mawsynram Block ki la pynlong ka jingïalang ban pyrshah bad thang ïa ki kyndon aiñ jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act ne CAA hapoh ïew Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.Lah ban kdew ba da ka jingïasnohkti lang jong baroh ki sengbhalang lem ruh bad ki paidbah kan pyni shai ïa ka jingïatylli jong ka Jaitbynriew ha ka ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa kino kino ki bor bad ki aiñ kiba ktah ïa ka ïap ka im jong ka Ri bad ka Jaitbynriew khamtam mynta ban ïeng pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Act ne CAA.U bah Forwardman Nongrem, President ka KSU, South West Khasi Hills District haba kren ha ka jingïalang u la ong ba, “horkit hordang da lei lei ngin nym shah ba ka sorkar India lyngba ka Sorkar kaba la lamkhmat da ka BJP kan pyntreikam ïa kino kino ki aiñ kiba ktah ïa ka jaidbynriew rit paidbah kum ka Jylla Meghalaya bad kumjuh ruh kiba ktah ruh ïa u paidbah, bad ym tang kata ngin ïai long ruh ki dieng pynkiang ïa ka sorkar lada wanrah ki aiñ ïah jakor”.U la pynkynmaw ruh ba kum ki sengbhalang hapoh jong ka North East hi baroh kawei, ymdei tang mynta ka sien ba ki pyrshah ïa kane ka aiñ, hynrei naduh ba kane ka aiñ ka dang long tang ka Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB), hynrei la ïohi pat ba ka sorkar NDA hapoh ka jingïalam jong ka BJP lyngba u Narendra Modi ha kaba um shym la sngap ïa kita ki jingpynsngew bad ïa ka sur jong ki paidbah kiba pyrshah. U la ïathuh ruh ba hadien ka Act, don sa ki kyndon ne ki rules ban batai ba kumno kita ki briew kiba dei na Pakistan, Afghanistan bad Bangladesh kin ïoh ban rung sha kane ka Ri India ne ha kine ki jaka jong ngi bad ynda ki la ïoh ka kabu ba biang kin sa leit da ka online lyngba ki sait ba la buh bad rung sha ki District Level Committee.“Ki District Level Committee kin sa don”, ai jingmaham lypa ka KSU ba lada kine ki committee ki nud ban pynrung ïa ki nongwei shi sngi ban long ki dkhot ne ki nongshong shnong ha kine ki jaka jong ngi bad lada jia ei ei ne mih kino kino ki jingeh/jingkulmar bad jingthut ïa ka shongsuk ka shongshngaiñ, ma ki kin hap shim ïa kata ka jingkitkhlieh.U la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba ynnai khmih lynti than eh ïa kata ka myntoi shimet, keiñ noh ka jingsngew party ba tang kata ka party ba ki ki kyrshan ka leh kata ka kam ban pyrshah hynrei ban myntoi lang baroh u paidbah to kin bret noh ïa kaba kum kata ka jingsngew bad shim ba ki mat jong ka jaidbynriew ki dei ki mat ba hakhmat eh bad ymdei ban ïa peiñ badno badno ruh. “Ka jingong ba ym lah ban pyntreikam ïa ka CAA ha kita ki schedule area, kane ïoh dei tang ka jingong ne pynsngew ba mynta ka dang don ka ilekshon hynrei ynda la kut ki kylla ka jingkren”, ong u bah Nongrem.U la ong ruh ba ha kum kane ka por ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki dei ban bret noh ïa ki jingïapher shnong, pher jaidbynriew, pher niam, pher jait ne kynja hynrei ki dei ban long kawei ban ïeng tylli ban pyrshah ïa kane ka CAA, bad la ïohi ruh ba ka Sorkar India haba ngi pan da ka dohkha ki ai pynban da u bseiñ (ngi pan ïa ka ILP ki ai pynban da ka CAA). “Kan kham bha ïa ngi ba ngin pynkheiñ ïa kata ka aiñ ba la thaw da u briew ban ïa kaba pynkheiñ ïa ki aiñ kiba U Blei U la ai ha ngi ba ngin long ki trai shnong, ngin long ki nongshynshar, ban long ki trai jaka, trai muluk kiba shongsuk shongshngaiñ ha la ka jong ka ri”, la pynsngew u bah Nongrem.U la bynrap ruh ba lada kane ka aiñ kan ïaid shakhmat ha ka ban pyntreikam, ma ngi pat ki shnong ki thaw, ki Seng Samla Shnong, ki Seng Longkmie, bad ki Sengbhalang bapher bapher kin sa thaw hi ïa ki ILP/ki work permit hapoh la ki jong ki shnong ban long ka jingïada namar ki aiñ shnong ki long kiba khlaiñ.Kiwei kiba la ai jingkren ki long u bah Zandy Sohtun, General Secretary ka KSU HEHU Unit, u bah D.K. Lyngdoh Nonglait, President ka FKJGP South West Khasi Hills District, u bah Raymond Kharjana, Organising Secretary ka KSU Central body bad u bah Wallambok Syiemiong, Chairman jong ka Synjuk ki Seng Samla Shnong, South West Khasi Hills District.Shwa ka jingïalang, la ïoh ïa ka jingrwai Ri Khasi Ri Khasi hapoh ka jingïalam jong u bah Jiedskhem, General Secretary jong ka KSU, South West Khasi Hills District. Hadien kata ki la thang ïa ki kyndon aiñ jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act ne CAA.
title: Ngin ïai long ki dieng pynkiang ïa ka Sorkar lada wanrah ki aiñ ïakjakor: Forward Nongrem

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 24: Ha ka sngi thohdieng ba la dep ki nongïalam jong ki ar tylli ki seng saiñ pyrthei, kata ka Voice of the People Party kaba la ïalam da u bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit u ba dei ruh u president rangbah bad ka Regional Democratic Alliance kaba la ïalam da u bah K.P.Pang-ñiang kum u president ka party HSPDP bad u secretary ka RDA bad ka United Democratic Party ba la ïalam da u bah Metbah Lyngdoh MLA, lem bad u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin kyrtong kyrtong MP, ki la hiar sha ka shnong New Mawlangsu ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang paitbah na ka bynta ban pynshai ïa ki mat treikam jong ki na ka bynta ka elekshon MP ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik u bnai ban wan.Ha katei ka sngi la pynlong ïa ka jingïalap elkshon ha kajuh ka rynsan ha kaba la pynïaid da u bah Phalastar Mawtyllup sordar jong ka shnong New Mawlangsu. Ha ka jingïalang pynshai paitbah kaba la sdang da ka Voice of the Peolple Party ha ka por shibaje shiteng noh phai sngi, ki rangbah kiba la ai jingkren kata u bah Marbud Dkhar, Powel Sohkhlet bad u Bah Ardent M Basaïawmoit ki la ban jur halor ka synshar khaddar kaba khuid bad ki jingkylla.U bah Powel haba pynshai ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba u kyrtong jong ka VPP u Dr Ricky A.J Syngkon kum u nonghikai ha ka skul bah Nehu, haba u ïohi ïa ka jingeh ki paitbah khamtam eh ha ki nongkyndong u la mih shakhmat ban ïatreilang bad u bah Ardent Basaïawmoiot bad ban ïakhun ha kane ka MP Elekshon. Lada u jop un leit sha Parliament ban ïaid na ka bynta ki jingeh ba ki paitbah ki ïakynduh, la ka long ha ka pule puthi, ka rep ka riang bad ka roi ka par ha ki nongkyndong.U bah Ardent M Basaïawmoit haba pynshai ha katei ka sngi u la ban jur halor ka synshshar khaddar kaba khuid. U la ong ruh ba ka VPP ka kwah ruh ban wanrah ïa ka jingsynshar kaba kynja Blei bad ka synshar tynrai kaba la buh naduh ki longshuwa.U la kynthoh ruh ba baroh shikatta ki jingïalam bakla da kaba ong ba ka politic ka dei kaba jakhlia, hynrei ka VPP ka ieng halor ka synshsr khaddar kaba khuid bad ka kwah eh ban pynkhuid ïa ka bamsap na ka jylla bad ban pynskhem ïa ka jinglongtrai ha ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ban pynkut noh ïa ki jingeh ha ki shnong khppud.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba ka sorkar kam ju kheiñ kor ïa ki nongrep hynrei ynda la jan ka elekshon, wat ki nongsor ki bym don kper ruh ki ïoh jingïarap skhim nongrep, ki bym ju ri sniang ki ïa ka jingïarap ri sniang, hynrei ynda ki wan rah sha ïing ïap lut sa ki sniang kiba la don lypa.Hadien ba ka VPP ka la pynwai ki nongïalam ka RDA ki la sdang ban ai jingkren ha kaba nyngkong eh la ïoh ïa ka jingpynshai na u bah K.P.Pangñiang president ka HSPDP, u la kyntu ïa baroh ki nongkyrshan jong ka HSPDP ba ha kane ka kynti kim dei ban sngewthuh bakla, namar ba ka shap jong u sing kan ym don hynrei kin thep beit ha ka shap jong ka UDP kaba dei ka Bom.U bah Metbah Lyndoh MLA ka Mairang Chairman ka RDA, haba pynshai ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba na ka por sha ka por ki paitbah ki thnum bad ki ud ba balei ki party riew lum kim ïatylli lang kawei. Dei halor katei ka nongrim ba na ka liang ki nongïalam ka UDP bad HSPDP ki la sngap ïa ka jingai jingmut jong ki paitbah bad ki la pynlong ïa ki jingïakynduh lang para nongïalam da ki phew sien, ban ïaphylliew jingmut na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingïatylli hapdeng jong ki.Nalor kata u la ong kane ka election MP kaba mymta kan dei ruh ka sien kaba nynkong ba baroh artylli ki party ki la hap ban ïaleit lang ryngkat ryngkat haman la ki jaka ban pynshai sha ki paitbah ba dei tang da ka yn lah ban ïalehpyrshah ïa ki jingeh.U la ong ba ki paitbah kim dei ban sngew phylla ïa ka jingïatreilang jong ka HSPDP bad ka UDP, namar baroh ar tylli ki party ki la dep ïamynjur lang ba ka jingïatreilang kan long ha baroh ki elekshon la ka dei ha ka MP, MLA bad MDC ruh, khnang ba ki paitbah kin sngewthuh ba ka jingïatylli ka long ka bor.U bah Robertjune Kharjahrin haba pynshai sha ki paitbah ha katei ka sngi, u la ong ba kum u nongsaid aiñ u ba la long ruh u nongai buit jong ka KHADC, u la ong ba kum u samla rangbah u la mih sha khmat ban ïakhun ha kane ka elekshon na ka bynta ban ïasaid ha ka dorbar Parliament ïa ki mat ki jura ba ki paitbah ka jylla ki angnud ban pynneh pynsah.U la ong ruh ba ha kine ki sngi ki don shibun kiba ong ba ïa ki nongmihkhmat na ki party riewlum yn ym don ba sngap lada ki kren ha Parliament hynrei kitei ki jingkren ki dei tang ki jingpynthame.U la ong ba ki don haduh sawphew hynñiew ngut ki MP kiba dei na ki jaitbynriew riewlum. Lada kitei ki sawphew hynñiew ngut kin ïatreilang kawei ban dawa na ka sorkar pdeng ba ka dei ban phaikhmat lem sha ki jingeh ba ki jaitbynriew riewlum ki ïakynduh ym don jingartatien ba ka sorkar pdeng ka hap ban kohnguh.Khatduh eh u la kyntu ïa ki paitbah ba haba ki nongïalam ki la pyni ïa ka jingïatylli, ki dei ban bud nuksa namar lada ka jingïatylli kam don, ka jingma kaba khraw ka ap ïa ka jaitbynriew khamtam eh ïa ka pateng ban sa wan.
title: Hiar ki nongïalam ka VPP bad RDA ha Mawlangsu ban ïalap election ïa ki kyrtong

content: Khliehriat, Lber, 24: Ka kynhun jong ki nongtrei kiba trei ïa ki kam electrical works ba iadei bad ki kam bor ding ka la mih pyrythei ha East Jaiñtia Hills District ba la tip kum ka East Jaiñtia Electrician Association, kane ka kynhun ka lum ka lang ïa baroh ki nongtrei kiba na ka thaiñ East Jaiñtia Hills District kiba ju im ja da kaba trei ïa ki kam bor ding lane ki electrical works.Ha ka jingïalang kaba nyngkong eh kaba la pynlong myn ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ha ïing Community Hall ha Khliehriat West ka seng ka la pynbna ba kane ka seng ka don ka jingthmu ban kyntiew ïa ki briew jong ka thaiñ kiba ju trei ïa ki kam shna bor ding ha ka thaiñ.Haba kren kum u kongsan ha ka jingïalang, u bah Deibormi Syad uba long u nonghikai skul bad ruh u nongtrei paitbah, u la ai mynsiem ïa ki nongialam bad ki dkhot jong ka East Jaiñtia Electrical Association ba kin nang kiew shaphrang ban kyntiew ïa ki khun samla jong ka thaiñ kiba don ka sap ban trei ha ki kam bor ding bad kyntu ruh ba ki dei ban don ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut, ka jingiaburom kylliang bad ban ïatreilang khang ba kin lah ban pyndep ïa ka kam ka jam kumba ki thmu ban kyntiew ruh ïa ka ïoh ka kot.Kumjuh ruh u bah Streamly N Suchen, uba dei u President jong ka KSU na East Jaiñtia Hills District kum u symbud kongsan u la ai ki kyntien jingsneng jingkhraw ïa ki dkhot ka EJEA bad u la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewkmen ba ki la don ki samla kiba la shimti ïa kane ka kam shna bor ding lane electrical works khamtam ha kum kane ka juk kyrduh kam u la ong ruh ba na ka liang ka seng KSU ruh ka long la kloi ban iarap ha kano kano ka por ne ha kano kano ka bynta ba donkam ban kyntiew ïa ki, u la ai ka jingkitbok kitrwiang ïa kane ka seng jong ki nong shna bor ding ba kin lah ban kiew shakhmat ha ka ban shakri ïa u paidbah jong ka district.U MLA ba rim jong ka Khliehriat, u bah Justine Dkhar, kum u Advisor u la pynkynmaw ba ha ki por barim ki bun tang ki briew ba nabar khamtam kiba wan na bar jylla ban trei ïa kane ka kam shna bor ding ha ka thaiñ East Jaiñtia Hills hynrei sngewtynnad ban tip bad ban iohi ba kane ka kynhun East Jaiñtia Elactrical Association mynta ka la mih shakmat ban shim ïa kane ka bynta ban shakri ïa ka thaiñ da kaba shna bor ding ban long kum ka lad kamai “Kano Kano ka Seng ne ka kynhun kan iakynduh shibun ki jingeh jingwit ha ka jingiaid lynti hynrei ym dei ban duh mynsiem, dei ruh ban ïa trei da ka mynsiem jingiatylli bad burom iwei ia iwei, kum ka seng ka dei ruh ban don bun ki jingshah hikai ban tip bha ïa ka kam kum ki training bapher bapher bad ruh ban ai ki jingpyntip sha ki bor ba dei peit khang ba kin lah ban shakri bha ïa ki paitbah’ ong u bah Justine Dkhar.U la ai mynsiem ruh ba kim dei ban sngew lehraiñ haba trei ïa kano kano ka kam.Ha kane ka program la ïa don lang ruh ki katto katne ki riewpaw khmat ka thaiñ, ki rangbah shnong ba kynthup ruh u rangbah shnong ka Kairang, u bah Riki Nongtdu, u bah Shanki Syih, u ba dei u wei na ki samla rangbha ka thaiñ bad kiwei kiwei ba kynthup ki trai dukan ba die ïa ki tiar electrict ba don hapoh ka district kum ka Dasy Electrical, Joy Electrical, Sympli Electrical, E. D. Enterprises bad ka Joyti Electrical kiba don hapoh ka district headquarter ha khliehriat kiba la wan iasnohkti lang ha katei ka sngi.Ïa ka ka program la pyniaid da u Secretary ka seng, u bah Jantis Dkhar, la ioh ïa ki kyntien pdiang burom bad jingpynshai halor ka nongrim jong ka seng na u President jong ka EJEA u bah Arki Juh Dkhar bad ki kyntien ai khublei na u Vice President ka seng, u bah Indro Syrti.
title: Mih ka EJEA ka kynhun kiba trei ïa ki kam Elektrik ha East Jaiñtia Hills

content: Ki don bun ki jingjia ha ka ri jongngi ïa kiba ngim ju kham pynleit jingmut lane ngi ïakren bad ïatai tang ha sor Shillong. Katkum ki kaiphod kiba la pynmih da ka World Inequality Report lane ka jingthew tarajur hapdeng kiba duk tam bad kiba riewspah tam, la shem ba ka ri India ka long kaba jur tam eh ka jingbym ïaryngkat ka jingïoh jingsep la shem ba ka ri India ka long kaba ïapher tam eh ha kaba tang kumba shiphew na ka shispah (10 percent) ki bat ïa kumba 57 na ka shispah (57%) ka kamai ha ka ri baroh kawei ha u snem 2021. Na kiba sah 90 na ka shispah pat kumba shiteng ki don ka spah tang kumba 13 na ka shispah (13 %). Namarkata kane ka kaiphod kaba la pynmih na ri phareng ka kdew ba ka ri India ka long kaba duk bad kaba jur eh ka jingbym ïaryngkat ka jingïoh ha kaba tang khyndiat ngut ki bat lut ïa ka spah jong ka ri.Kita ki long ki nongkhaïi kum u Mukesh Ambani bad u Gautam Adani ban shu jer katto katne ki kyrteng. Dang ha kine ki khyndiat taïew u khun jong u Mukesh Ambani u la khot ïa ki heh spah ka pyrthei baroh kawei kynthup ïa u Bill Gates, u Mark Zukerberg bad bun kiwei de ba kin ïadon bynta ha ka jingpynkhreh ka jingshongkurim jong u (pre marriage celebration). Ka jingshong kurim kan long haduh u bnai Naitung ne July. Kine ki heh spah baroh ki wan da la ki jong ki jong ki liengsuiñ bad lah pynkylla ïa ka jaka hiar liengsuiñ (aircraft landing ground) jong ka Indian Air Force sha ka jaka hiar kita ki liengsuiñ jing ki riewshimet. Toi ka jaka hiar liengsuiñ jong ka Indian Air Force lane ki shipai lehthma na suiñ ka long kaba kyrpang bad ym ju lah ban hiar kiwei pat ki liengsuiñ jong ki riew shimet namar ba ka lah ban long ka jingma ïa ka ri. Hynrei na ka bynta u khun u Ambani, u Ananth Ambani la pynkheiñ lut ki kyndon pyrkhing baroh.Ki jingai sngewbha ba ki ai kita ki nongrwai sha kata ka jingkhawai ki kynthup ïa ki kali kiba da ki spah klur tyngka. Don lei lei kiba ai sa da ka dewlynnong baroh kawei. Ki mawlynnai bad ki baje kiba shongdor da ki klur tyngka leilei ym lah ñiew shuh. Kane keiñ ka dei ka jingshisha jong ka ri India bad ka dei ruh ka jingshisha ha ka jylla Meghalaya. Kiba duk tasam ki la nang duk bad kiba la kiew ka spah pat ki la nang kiew bad dei kine kiba ïoh bat lut ïa ki jaka raid bad pynkylla ri kynti ïa ki. Dei kine ki khyndiat ngut ki heh spah kiba dang tih ïa u dewïong wat hadien ba la khang ban tih dewïong kumba tih hangne ha ka jylla ha kaba ki briew ki hap ban hiar sha ki krem ban tih bad khlong ïa u dewïong. Bunsien kata ka krem dewïong ka dap um syndet bad kiba trei hapoh ki ïap jyllop lut. Lah bun ngut kiba ïap shapoh kita ki thliew hynrei namar ba bun na kine ki nongtrei ki dei na Nepal lane na Bangladesh bad Assam ïa ki met jong ki ym ju don ba wad shuh. La shu tep noh ïa ki jar jar.Don kiwei pat kiba kamai spah da kaba pum lut ïa ki khlaw bad die ïa ki dieng lane ki pom dieng khnang ban ïoh tih maw ban khaïi sha Bangladesh. Da ki spah tylli ki trok ki kit ïa kine ki maw manla ka sngi. Ka mariang te ka la jot hynrei ym don ba salia; ym don ba ud ba nam namar ngi ong “Ka khlaw jong u te u lah ban leh katba mon.” Kane ka long ka bym shongnia ei ei ruh. Ka khlaw, ki um ki wah bad ki lum baroh ki dei ki jong baroh lang (collective owenership). Dei na kata ka daw ba khot ïangi ki riewlum (tribal). Lada ngim don shuh kane ka jingïadei kyrpang kum kiba long trai lang ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ki lum ki wah, ki tlong um bad kumta ter ter te ngi lah kylla long kum kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew ïa kiba ngi khot ki ‘dkhar.’ Ka long kaba I bynniaw ba ki nongpynïaid shnong kim lah ban tehlakam ïa kane ka jingkurup bor ïa kiei kiei kiba dei ki “jonglang” ïa kiba dei ban ïa long trai lang bad ban ïasam lang. Kumban shu kdew nuksa, ka um bam um dih mynnor ka dei ka “jonglang” kamut ba ym don ba long trai shimet ïa ki tlong um. Mynta pat ngi ïohi ba ki don ki riew shimet kiba thied ïa ki khlaw bad ki tlong um bad ki die um pat kylleng. Bun na ngi ruh ngi hap ban thied ïa ka um kaba u Blei nongbuh nongthaw bad ka mei mariang ki la ai sbun ïangi u khun bynriew. Kane ka jingkylla stet jong kita kiba dei ki jonglang (community resources) sha ka jong ki briew shimet ka la pynlong ïa kiba bun kiba duk ba rangli ba kin ym ïoh shuh wat tang shi nongrim ïing ruh.Kine ki jingeh kiba ka jaitbynriew ka ïaid lyngba dei ban ïakren ha ka por ilekshon. Mangi ki paidbah ngi dei ban buh jingkylli na ki kyrtong kiba wan na ki seng bapher bapher bad kiba ïeng ha ka nognrim shimet ruh balei ba kim ju kren halor kitei ki mat ki phang. Dei ban kylli ruh balei ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka wan balai ha ka jingduk tam na ki jylla baroh ka ri India. Kiei ki daw kiba pynlong ïa ki briew jongngi ba kin duk tasam haduh katne? Balei ba bun bah kiba na nongkyndong ki hap ban wan sah ïing kiba shi kamra ar kamra hangne ha sor Shillong tang ban ïoh buh dukan harud surok? Balei ba ym don lad ban seng kam seng jam ha ki nongkyndong jong ngi?Lada ka jingpule puthi ka nang hiar kata ka mut ki lad ïoh kamai ki samla jong ngi ruh kin nang jynjar. Te ka jingkylli ka long balei ba ka jingpule ka hiar haduh katne bad mano ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha kane ka phang? Hato uta/kata kiba shah jied nongthaw aiñ (Member of Parliament) ha ka dorbar bah ka ri India (Parliament) ki la ju tuklar mo ïa kine kiei kiei kiba ktah eh ïa ngi – kata ka jingduk tasam, ka jinghiar ka pule puthi, ka jingjynjar ban ïoh ïa ki lad pynkoit pynkhiah, ka jingbym ïoh ïa ka bam kaba tei khamtam eh ïa ki hep barit bad kata ka ktah ïa ka bor pyrkhat jong ki. Bunsien ym ju ïohsngew ba ki MP na kane ka jylla kin kren eiei ha Parliament. Hynrei lah dei ban kdew ïa kine ki mat ki phang kiba ktah eh ïa ngi. La jied ïa ki nongthaw aiñ ym tang ba kin shu leit mihkhmat na ka bynta jong ngi hynrei ban kren bad kdew ruh ïa ki jingeh ka jylla.Bunsien ma ngi ki nongjied ngi shu shong shit khleh beij bad jied ïa u/ka kyrtong tang namar ka jingrwai kaba pynkyndeh mynsiem hynrei ngim thew pat la uta/kata kaba ngi jied ki long ne em kiba lah ban ïeng tyngeh na ka bynta jong ngi bad khamtam ban ïada ïa ki hok ki sot jong ngi kum ki riewlum. Hynrei ka por kam slem ba yn nang bun kiba duk kiba wat tang ka ïing shong ruh kim don. Kumno keiñ ka imlang sahlang kaba mynnor ka ïeng halor ka nongrim ban ïa kyrshan mar kylliang bad ban ïarap lem ïa kiba duna jingïoh; ka imlang sahlang kaba ïoh ei ïa ka um bam um dih mynta pat la hap thied wat ïa ka um. Kine ki jingkylla ki dei ban pynpeit mat ïa ngi ym ban shu ïa khaprip haba ngi ïohi ïa kine king jingkylla ka por ha kaba ïa ka ‘jonglang’ lah knieh noh tang da ki katto katne ngut.Mynjur ka Air Force bad NEIGRIHMS ban pynbiang ki lad jingshakri ha ki sngi ilekshonShillong, Lber 24: Kum ka dak jong ka jingpynkhreh ia ka jingpynlong ia ki Lok Sabha Election, na ka liang u Chief Electoral Officer ka Meghalaya u Dr. B.D.R Tiwari ha ka sngi saitjain u la pynlong ka jingiakynduh lang bad ki Nodal Officer napoh ka H.Q Eastern Air Command Upper Shillong bad u nongialam ka Group Captain A. Sharma, bad u NEIGRIHMS u Nalin Mehta, nangta ka tnat Transport jong ka Meghalaya, na ka Directorate of Health Services (MI), ka State Nodal Officer CAPF, ban pan ia ki lad jingiarap kum ka Air Ambulance lane ki Chopper Service na ka bynta ki jingdonkam jingiarap ai dawai ne ki lad jingsumar kiba kyrkieh na ka bynta ki Lok Sabha General Election 2024 ban buh ia ki helicopter bad ka jingsumar kaba khlem donkam siew ia ki nongtrei kiba don ha ki polling station kiba don ha ki kamram jong ka ilekshon.U CEO u la banjur halor ki jingsngewkhia jong ka ECI na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah jong ki nongtrei bad ki jingdonkam ia ki health care bad baroh ki lad kiba bha tam khlem da donkam ban siew bad u la iathuh ba watla da don ka jingbym lah thikna jong ka jinglong ka suinbneng ha ka jylla, baroh ki lad jingdonkam ha kaba iadei bad ki jingiarap na ki shipai liengsuin dei beit ban buh kumba la bthah da ka ECI.Halor ka jingdonkam ban pynbiang ia ki Helicopter ban kit ia ki bor pahara bad ki nongtrei ha ki polling station kiba donkam kyrkieh bad kiba donkam ki jingiarap kiba mardor, ka ophis u CEO kan sap hah ia ka shithi sha ka Ministry of Defence na ka bynta ki sienjam kiba kongsan halor kane baroh ar tylli ki shnat trreikam ka Transport department jong ka Meghalaya bad ki shipai Air Force ki la pynthikna ba kin buh ia ki Chopper ha ki jaka ba donkam na ka bynta ka jingdonkam ba mardor ban kit ia ki nongtrei bad kumjuh ruh ia ki bor pahara bad na ka liang ki pulit ka jylla ruh ki la long kiba la kloi ban iarap khamtam sha kito ki jaka kiba khma jynjar.Ha ka jingialang u CEO u la iasyllok ruh bad u director jong ka NEIGRIHMS bad ka ophis DHS (MI) ban pynbiang ki lad sumar khlem donkam siew ia ki nongtrei kiba leit sha ki kamram jong ki ilekshon Lok Sabha ha ka jylla.U la iathuh ba kin sa pyntip sha baroh ki PHC bad CHC bad sha kiwei pat ki jaka sumar ban long kiba la khreh ban iarap bad ai ki jingsumar kiba kyrkieh kiba donkam. U la kyntu ruh ia DHS (MI) ban pynbiang ia ka kynhun ki nongsumar bad kumjuh ki Ambulance ba kin don ha ki jaka khnang ba kin lah ban leh ia ki kam kiba donkam ha ka por ba kyrkieh.
title: La khihwin ka ilekshon…mano ban jop mynta ka kynti?

content: New Delhi, Lber 24: Ka seng liang pyrshah kaba la tip da ka INDIA Bloc kan sa pynlong da ïa ka jingïalang paidbah kaba heh hapoh Ramlila Maidan kaba don ha Delhi ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai ban ïada ïa ka bha ka miat bad ka synshar paidbah jong ka ri, ong u nongïalam jong ka seng AAP u Gopal Rai ha ka sngi U Blei.“Ngin pynlong da ka ‘maha rally’ ha Ramlila Maidan ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai pyrshah ïa kaei kaba la jia hapoh ka ri. Ki nongïalam ba ha khlieh duh jong ka NDIA bloc kin ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalang,” ong u Rai, uba dei u convenor ka seng AAP kaba ha Delhi.“Ka Synshar paidbah bad ka ri mynta ka la don hapdeng jong ka jingma. Baroh ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba don hapoh ka INDIA-bloc kin sa pynlong ïa ka ‘maha rally’ ban ai ka jingïada ïa ka bha ka miat jong ka ri bad ka synshar paidbah,” ong u Rai.U Arvinder Singh Lovely, uba dei u heh ka Congress ka unit Delhi, u la kynnoh ba ïa ki parti ka liang pyrshah kim ïoh ïa ki kyrdan ban pyni bad mynta lei la khang sa ïa ka pisa ba la kynshew da ka parti Congress bad kumjuh ruh ka jingshah kem u Myntri Rangbah ka Delhi u Arvind Krjriwal.“ïa kane ka jingialang kaba heh ne ka ‘maha rally’ ka ban long ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai kan ym dei tang ka jingïalang saiñ pyrthei hynrei ka jingkhot ban ïada ïa ka ri synshar paidbah bad ban pynpaw ïa ka sur pyrshah ïa ka sorkar pdeng ba la ïalam da ka BJP,” u la bynrap.
title: Da ka jingïalang paidbah kaba heh yn pynlong ka INDIA bloc ha ka 31 tarik

content: Shillong, Lber 24 : U President ka Voice of the People’s Party (VPP), Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah nongkyrshan ba kin ym mih paidbah ha ka sngi ba u kyrtong ka party, Bah Ricky J Syngkon u mih ban leit thep kyrteng khnang ba kan ym ktah bad pynwit ïa ka leit ka wan ki paidbah.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka VPP ka pynkhreh ban leit thep kyrteng ha ka 26tarik mynta u bnai, Sngi Ba-ar.Ha ka kyrwoh, u Bah Ardent u la ong ba bun ki paidbah ki kwah ban leit synran lang ïa u Dr. Syngkon ha ka jingleit thep kyrteng hynrei hadien ba ki ïoh jingtip ba kin poi bun ki paidbah kumta kum ki nongïalam kim banse ban shim ïa kane ka rai.“Khnang ba kan ym ktah ïa ki nongleit nongwan, ngi la sngewdei ban kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin ïai shah bad ka jingpynbeit ba tang ki nongïalam katto katne kin leit ban synran ïa u kyrtong ha katei ka sngi thep kyrteng,” u la ong.Tangba u ong pat ba na ka bynta kito ki paidbah kiba kwah, ki lah ban wan sha ophis treikam jong ka seng naduh ka por 8:30 baje mynstep tad haduh ka por ba kin mih lang ban leit thep kyrteng.Ha kajuh ka por, u President ka VPP u ong ba kaba kham kongsan ka long ïa ki paidbah ba kin mih ryntih ha ka sngi thep vote. U Bah Ardent u la ong ruh ba ka rai ba kum ka party ka shim kadei da kaba buh hakhmat ïa ka bit ka bïang jong ki nongshong shnong ha Shillong ba kan ym pynthut ïa ka leit ka wan jong ki.
title: Wat ym mih paidbah ha ka sngi thep kyrteng – kyrpad u Bah Ardent

content: Shillong, Lber, 24: Ka CMC Mawiong kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih baroh shikatta da ka St. Dominic Savio Church Mawlai Parish ha ka sngi U Blei ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong la kyntiew kyrdan sha ka Parish ba thymmai kaba don la u jong u nongsharai mynsiem rangbah.Ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong ka la jer kyrteng thymmai ïa ka CMC Mawiong, ha ka jingplie Parish thymmai kum “Ka Maria ka Syiem U Rosari Bakhuid’ ïa kaba la pynbna da u Archbishop jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh da ka jingsynran lang jong u Parish Priest jong ka Mawlai Parish u Rev. Fr. Telesphor Nonglang bad kiwei kiwei ki Lyngdoh Sohblei.Shwa ban pynlong ïa ka Mass Bakhuid, u Archbishop Victor ha ryngkat ki paid u Blei la ïashim bynta ha ka proseshon u Sla Tlai ban kynmaw burom ïa ka jingrung jong u Jisu Khrist sha nongbah Jerusalem.U Archbishop Victor kum u kongsan u la aiti ha u Vicar General ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Fr. Richard Manbha Majaw ban pynbna ïa ka Dulir treikam bad u pud u sam jong ka Parish Mawiong.U Fr. Majaw haba pule paidbah ïa ka Dulir u la pyntip ba u pud u sam treikam jong ka Parish Mawiong u ïakynduh shaduh ka Parish Mawlaingut, Parish Mawprem, Parish Mawlai bad Parish Umbir.Ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Parish Mawiong ki long ka CMC Nongkwar, ka CMC Umjajew, ka CMC Umthlong bad ka CMC Umjapung.Ïa ka Parish Mawiong la shimti ban peit bad sumar ïa ki khun Khristan Katholic da ki Phadar ka Jingïasyllok Diocesan ne ki Phadar Trai Ri, la ïathuh u Archbishop Victor uba la thung ïa u Rev. Fr. Alfred Lyngdoh Nongbri kum nongsharai mynsiem banyngkong eh jong kane ka Parish.U Archbishop Victor haba pynkupbor ïa u Fr. Alfred Lyngdoh Nongbri uba la duwai kyntang ryngkat ka kylli ka pyrthew ïa u Nongsharai bathymmai ryngkat ka jingduwai ban phla ïa ka jingngeit jong ki Apostol.Kumba dei ka bynta ka Balang ban pynkhamti bad ai bor ïa ki Lyngdoh Sohblei; u Fr Alfred u la khlei ïa ka jubanlak da kaba kular ban bud ryntih ïa ki Dulir ba la ai da ka Jylla Niam Bah bad ban ïatrei lang bad ka Balang ryngkat bad ki paid U Blei.Haba pynkupbor shuh shuh u Bishop Victor Lyngdoh ban pynskhem ïa kane ka kam kum u Nongsharai u ïalam ïa u Fr, Alfred Lyngdoh Nongbri ban dohieid ïa ki sawdong jong ka Duwan bad ka kam ban shong ha Khet Jingphla.Ka kam ba kyntang tam jong ka jingpynkupbor ïa ki nongsharai jong ka Parish bathymmai ka dei da u Lyngdoh Sad ha kaba u la aiti ïa u shabi jong ka Tabernacle ka jaka ba shong ba sah ka Met bad ka Snam jong U Jisu Khrist ba ladep pynkyntang.Hadien ka jingpynkupbor na ka liang u Archbishop u la aiti ïa ki kot dulir bad ka jingïasoi ïa ka sakhi satar hapdeng ka Parish Council u nongsharai mynsiem banyngkong.U Archbishop Victor hadien ka jingpyndep ïa ka deiti lehniam u la plie ïa u Mawnongrim, bad pynher ïa ki baloon bad ka jingot ïa u cake.
title: Da ka Parish ba thymmai ai sngewbha Paskha ka Jylla Niambah ïa ka CMC Mawïong

content: Shillong, Lber 24: U National General Secretary ka National People’s Party (NPP) bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la pynrem ïa u President jong ka seng Voice of the People’s Party (VPP) u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit ba u la kylla long uba shet kylla ne uba kyntiap na kawei ka seng sha kawei pat (‘turncoat’).Haba kren ha ka jingïalang ïalap ilekshon kaba la long ha ka Nartiang konstituensi ha kaba haduh 9 tylli ki shnong ki la wan ban ïashim bynta, u Bah Dhar u la ong ba mynshwa u Bah Ardent u la shait don hapoh ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP) bad hadien u la pynïasoh bad ka Hill State People Democratic Party (HSPDP), ha kaba u la bat ruh kum u president.U la ong ba mynshwa u la iehnoh ïa ka HSPDP bad u la leit kyrshan ïa ka Congress da kaba kynnoh ba ki seng riewlum ki la roi bun palat la kum ki tit hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.“Hynrei nga kwah ban kylli ïa u, hato ka VPP kam dei mo kawei na kita kiwei pat ki seng Tit? U la ïalap na ka bynta ban wanrah ka jingkylla hynrei u la kut pat ïalade ban phet kylla na kawei ka party sha kawei pat. Um ïapher eiei hynrei u dei u nongshet kylla bad uba shu phet na kawei ka seng sha kawei pat (turncoat),” ong u Bah Dhar.U la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ka ri Khasi bad Jaiñtia Hills ba kim dei ban shah pynbeij ha kum kine ki nongïalam saiñ pyrthei.Haba pynshai ïa kiba bun ki kam pynroi kiba la leh hapoh ka jingïalam ïa ka sorkar da ka NPP ha kine ki 6 snem ba la leit, u Bah Dhar u la kyntu ban vote ïa ka NPP na Shillong parliamentary constituency.Ha ka jingïalang la donlang u CEM ka JHADC u Bah Thombor Shiwat bad kiwei pat ki nongïalam ka party bad ki nongtrei ka seng NPP.
title: Hato ka VPP kam dei mo kawei na kita kiwei pat ki seng Tit? kylli u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar

content: Shillong, 24 Lber: Ban ïaleh ban ïarap ïa ki nongthep Vote kiba don jingïapher ha ki dkhot dkhot met, la pynlong ïa ka jingai jinghikai halor ka “Sign Language” ong ka kyrwoh na ka ophis treikam ka Williamnagar, East Garo Hills.Ha katei ka prokram la wan ban ïashimbynta da ki 45 ngut ki Master Trainer na East Garo Hills bad North Garo Hills, ban ïoh ïa ki jingnang jingtip shaphang ka Sign Language ban ïoh ban ai jingïarap ïa ki nongthep vote ha ka ilekshon ban wan ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik u ïaïong mynta u snem.Ka Barefoot Trust kala ai ïa katei ka jinghikai ha baroh ki District jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Na ka liang ka A Sangma (MCS), ADC (Elections), haba ai jingkren ka la banjur ïa ka jingdonkam ban ym don ka jingnoh shilliang ïa ki nongthep vote bad kala ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka jingshimkhia katei ka kynhun kaba la pynlong ïa katei ka jingai jinghikai.Ka la ong, “Kane ka Training kan pynthikna ba ki nongïarap ha ka ilekshon kin ïoh ïa ka jingtip bad jinghikai ban nang ban ïakren bad ki nongthep vote kiba don ka jingduna ha ka dkhot met, khamtam ha kaban bat skhem ïa ka hok ka jong ki ban pyndep ïa la ka kamram ha kaban thep vote ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat ha ka riti synshar paidbah.
title: Da ka Sign Language ïoh jinghikai kiba don jingïapher ha ki dkhot met

content: Shillong, Lber 24 : U Nongai Ktien jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Dr. Batskhem Myrboh ha ka sngi U Blei u la ong ba ka party kam donkam satia ban pynshisha ïa ka jingieid jaidbynriew ha ka NPP lane ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla.“Ngi dei ban kynmaw ba ka jingieid jaidbynriew ka thew ïa ka jingleh bha ïa ka bynta kaba ngi dei ban leh na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ka imlang sahlang bad khamtam eh ka jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki briew ki bym don ïa kata ka bor ha ka jingim jong ki,” ong u Dr. Batskhem ha ka kyrwoh khubor.U ong ruh ba lada lah ban noh synnïang ha ka imlang sahlang kampher la don ha kano kano ka kyrdan, kata hi ka la dei ka jingieid jaidbynriew. “Kum ki nongïalam jong ka VPP haba ki ïohi ïa ka jingud jingnam jong ki paidbah bad haba ki ïohi ïa ka jingsynshar donbor bad jingsynshar bamsap jong kane ka sorkar naduh kito ki snem 2018 ter ter ka sienjam ba ngi shim ka long ban leh ei ei khnang ba ki paidbah kin ym ngat ha ka saja. Ngi la shim ïa ka rai ban seng ïa ka VPP da ka jingkitkhlieh ban ïada ïa ki paidbah na ka synshar thombor, synshar donbor bad jingsynshar bamsap abd ka jingsynshar bym don jingkitkhlieh na bynta u paidbah. Kata kadei ka jingnoh synniang jong ka VPP,” u la bynrap biang.Shwa kane, u Dr. Batskhem u la ong ruh ba ki paidbah i kumba ki la duh ka jingkyrmen ba ka sainpyrthei kadei kaba bha bad ba ka sainpyrthei kadei na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ka imlang sahlang. “Kadei ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba un ym sngewthuh ïa ka mynsiem ieid ri mynsiem ieid jaidbynriew namarba u la kren padiah kat shaba lap kaba ym ikob shuh ba kan mih na ka shyntur u riewrangbah,” bynrap shuh u Dr. Batskhem.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ruh ba ka VPP kan ym pdiang satia ïa u Bah Prestone ban wan pynïasoh sha ka party. U Dr. Batskhem u la ong ruh ba ki lyngoh ban ïohi ba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u buh jingkylli ïa ki MLA ka VPP ba katno kilometer ka surok ki la shna, katno tylli ki hospital ki la tei. “Kane ka jingkylli ka pynpaw ïa ka bor pyrkhat jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba um pat sngewthuh ïa ka synshar khadar. Mano ba dei ban shna surok hato dei ki MLA, hato dei ki Liang Pyrshah?”Halor kane, u ong ba kum ki nongshong shnong kynthup lang naduh ki nongïalam jong ka VPP bad kynthup ïa ki MLA ka VPP ki don ka hok ban ïoh ïa ka surok na u kum u Myntri ka tnad PWD. “Kadei ka kamram jongphi ban shna ïa ki surok ba bha. Dei ka jingtlot jongphi ban shna ïa ki surok ba ngi hap ban mad ïa ki surok khohruh khohram kiba pynjot ïa ki kali jongngi bad kiba ki paidbah ki mad ïa ki jingjynjar,” u la ong.
title: Ka VPP kam donkam ban pynshisha ïa ka jingieid Jaidbynriew ha ka NPP ne ha u DyCM

content: Shillong, Lber, 24: Uwei u heprit uba dang 7 snem ka rta u khun jong ka Kong Bandari Shangpliang u la mynsaw jur namar ka jingleh torti jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) kaba la shu ieh khongreng ïa ka jaka ba la buh ïa u Transformer khlem ka jingker ha ka shnong Lempluh, Nongspung Syiemship.Kane ka la jia ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai katba une u heprit u dang mih ban ïalehkai hajan une u Transformer.Halor kane ka jingjia, ka KSU Nongspung Circle ka la leit sha kane ka shnong bad noh synniang ïa u khun jong ka Bandari Shangpliang kum ka jingïarap.“Nga dang don ha ing bad nga la phah leit lehkai ïa u khun shabar, katba nga dang sait tiar nga shu ïoh sngew kynsan ïa ka jingbthei. Mar mar nga la mih shabar nga lap pynban ba u khun u la thiah lyndang ha madan bad ha ka por ba nga la leit shim ïa u, ka bording ka la bret ïa nga. Nga la pyrta jingïarap bad mar kumta la wan mih sa ki paramarjan ban ai jingïarap ïa u khun jong nga,” la ong ka Kong Bandari.Na ka jingshah bat ha ka bording, une u heprit u la mynsaw na ki bynta jong ki shympriah kti, shympriah kjat bad na ki bynta jong ka shadem.Ki nongïalam ka KSU ki la ong ba une u heprit u la mynsaw jur bad nalor ba u dei ruh na ka longing kaba kham duk kham kyrduh.“Ngi kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar khamtam ïa ka MeECL ban leh eiei namarba kane ka kam ïap kam im bad ba une u heprit lyngba ka jingïarap jong ka sorkar un ïoh ïa ka met kaba koit kaba khiah,” la ong ki nongïalam ka KSU.Ki la ong ruh ba ka seng ka la lap ruh ba kiba bun ki Transformer kiba don marjan bad shnong Lempluh ki dei ki bym ker saiñar satia bad ym shym la buh bha ban ïada ïa ka ïaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah bad la shu pyllait lyngkrang.“Ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan shimkhia ba kan ym jia shuh kum kine ki jingjia. Manla u bnai haba wan ka Bill thang bording, ngi siew bad ngi pynbiang hynrei balei haba don kum kine ki jingjia ki khein sting bad ki shim sting kim don kano kano ka jingsuidniew bad kim pyrkhat ïa ki mynsiem jong ki parabriew,” ki la ong.
title: Ba torti ka MeECL ha Lempluh, mynsaw u heprit ki kti, ka shadem bad ki kjat

content: BDWS
title: BDWS

content: Shillong, Lber 25: Ka resol jong ar tylli ki jingïalehkai ka lympung 3rd District League T20 Cricket Tournament 2024 jong ka East Khasi Hills Cricket Association ka la kut ha kaba ka kynhun Cricket Smit CC bad ka Pomshutia CC ki la khur jingjop.Ka Cricket Smit CC ka la pynliem ïa ka Mawphlang CC ha ka jingïakhun ba nyngkong. Kane ka jingïakhun ka la sdang ha kaba ka Mawphlang CC ka la jied ban tied nyngkong bad kynjoh 107 ron shah pynhap 6 ngut naki 20 Over.U Pynshongdor u la tied 28 (42), na ki rangkawangbol u Elbrenroy Mawthoh u la khur 1/13 naki 4 Over.Haba jubab ïa katei ka thong ka Cricket Smit CC ka la pyndep tang hadien 16.3 Over ban tied 108 ron, hap 7 ngut. U Pynkhrawbok Thabah u la lah ban tied 25 ron (25. Na ki rangkawangbol u Mawlynnai Wahlang u la khur 3/20 naki 4 over.Ka Cricket Smit CC ka la lah ban jop da 3 wicket bad ïa ka Player of the Match la la khur da u Pynkhrawbok Thabah.Ha ka jingïakhun kaba ar, ka Pomshutia CC ka jied ban bol nyngkongn hadien ba jop ïa ka toss, ha kaba ka Mawryngkneng CC ka la lah ban tied 76 ron shuwa ba baroh 10 ngut kin shah pynkhyllem noh hadien 15.3 Over.Napdeng ki rangtied ba kamai bun ron ki long u Pyntngenlang Kharsahnoh da 19(29). U Aristerwell Suting u la khur 3/9 na ki 2.3 Over bad u Shembhalang Pyngrope u la khur 3/8 naki 3 over ha ka bol.Haba pyrshang ban beh ïa ka ron ka Pomshutia CC ka la tied 81 ron shah pynhap tang 6 ngut naki 17.5 Over. U Shemphang Tymsen u la kamai 19(40) bad ka kynhun ka la jop da 4 Wicket katba ïa ka nam Player of the Match la khur da u Aristerwell Suting.
title: 3rd District League T20 CT 2024 : Jop ka Cricket Smit CC bad ka Pomshutia CC

content: Shillong, Lber 25 : ïa ka 1st A R Mawthoh Memorial Football Tournament 2024 ba la pynlong da ka Nongrim Hills Sport Social and Cultural Club la plie pyrda mynta ka sngi ha madan jong ka Meghalaya Football Association Turf, Polo da u Paiem Dr Balajied Sing Syiem, Syiem ka Hima Khyrim ha ka jingïadon lang u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem, Syiem ka Hima Mylliem kum u Symbud Kongsan, ki Rangbah Shnong hapoh ka shatri ka Synjuk ki Nongthymmai Pyllun kaba kynthup ïa ki 15 tylli ki Dorbar Shnong, Rangbah Shnong ka Laitumkhrah bad Rangbah Shnong ka Lapalang.Haba kren ha ka jingplie ïa kane ka Tournament I Paiem Dr Balajied i la ai ka jingïaroh ïa i bah A.R Mawthoh iba la long ruh kum u Myntri ka Hima Khyrim ba i long u briew uba shim khia ïa ka kam wat kum u Rangbah Shnong jongka Nongrim Hills ruh namar ka shnong ka long kaba shongsuk shongsaiñ bad kaba ïaid beit ka synshar ka khadar. I la kyntu ban bud nuksa ïa ki dienjat kiba la ïalam bad btin da une u Rangbah. I la ïathuh ha ki 10 snem ba i la bat kum u Myntri i la shim khia bha ïa ka kam da kaba beh ha kylleng u pud u sam ka Hima ban pynbeit ïa ki kam ki jam. I ai khublei ïa ka ïing ka sem, ki khun ki kti, ki kur ki jait bad khamtam ïa ka Nongrim Hills SS & CC kaba la lah ban pynlong ïa kane ka Tournament ban pynsahnam ïa une u rangbah uba trei hok ïa ka kam.Khyndiat shaphang i bah A.R Mawthoh ( Bam Kwai ha Dwar U Blei) i la long kum u General Secretary ba nyngkong eh jongka Nongrim Hills SS&CC kaba la seng ha u snem 1978. Shwa kane ka snem ka Club ka don ha Nongthymmai SC.I la trei shitom bha ïa ka kam ba la bynshet ha i bad ka Club ka la nang kiew shaphrang.Ha u snem 1987 i la shah jied kum u Asst. Rangbah Shnong jongka Dorbar Shnong Nongrim Hills bad ha u snem ba bud kata ha u 1988 hadien ka jingïehnoh kam u Rangbah Shnong i la pynïaid bad shimti kum u Acting Rangbah Shnong haduh u snem 1991.Ha u snem 1991 la jied ïa i kum u R.S ba pura bad i lah bat ïa ka kam haduh u snem 1998. Hadien kine ki snem i la bteng kum u Executive Member jongka Dorbar Shnong bad Sport Club tad haduh u snem 2013 ba la jied pat ïa i kum u President ka Nongrim Hills SS &CC haduh ka sngi ba i la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei.Ka Club ka la kiew irat bha hapoh ka jingïalam jongi bad ka la wanrah ïa shibun ka nam ka burom ïa ka Shnong ka thaw.Ha kane ka sngi plie ïa kane ka Tournament ki kynhun ba la ïalehkai ki long ka Nongrim Hills SS & CC bad ka Laitumkhrah SC. Ha ka jingïakhun ba itynnad bha ka Nongrim Hills SS & CC ka la pynliem ïa ka Laitumkhrah SC da 2-1 kol.
title: La plie pyrda ïa ka 1st A R Mawthoh Memorial Football Tournament 2024

content: Nongpoh, Lber 24: U MLA ka Jirang Constituency Bah Sosthenes Sohtun u la pyntip sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Conrad K. Sangma halor ka jingpynpra jong ka Sorkar Assam ïa ka Signboard jong ka pung ri dohkha ha ka shnong Maikhuli bad ka jingwan khang ki Pulit Assam ban pyntrei ïa ka project jong ka tnad Water Resource ha ka shnong Hawla kaba hap ha ki jaka khappud ka Meghalaya bad Assam.U Bah Sohtun u la bthah ruh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka Ribhoi u Arpit Upadhyay bad ia u Superintendent of Police u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa ban leit jurip ïa ka shnong Hawla hadien ba kum u MLA ha ka sngi Saitjain u la hiar jurip ïa ka shnong Hawla ba ka Assam ka la khang ban pyntrei ïa ka project jong ka tnad Water Resource.Ha ka sngi u Blei u Bah Sohtun la leit ban juip ïa ka shnong Maikhuli ba ki Pulit ka Assam ki la pynpra ïa ka Signboard ka pung ri dohkha.Kum ban pyntip hangne, ka projek ha ka shnong Hawla ka dei kaba pyntrei da ka tnad Water Resource na Ri Bhoi bad ka rung ri dohkha ba la pynpra da ka Assam ïa ka Signboard ka dei kaba la pyntrei lyngba ka skhim MGNREGS ha ka shnong Maikhuli.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingjurip ïa ki ar tylli ki jaka ba ka Assam ka la pyrshah ïa ki kam pynroi ba la wanrah da ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Sohtun u la ong, “kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah ka Jirang Constiteuncy u pynrem jur ïa ki ki kam thombor jong ka Sorkar Assam ha kaba watla ki la tip ba ka jingïapynbeit pud hapdeng ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya ka dang ïaid shaphrang, hynrei kim salia.”U la ong ruh ba kum u MLA u la shimkhia ïa kane ka kam ban pyntip sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ba un ïakren bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Sorkar Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma bad ha kajuh ka por ruh u ladep ban bthah ïa u Deputy Commissioner bad ia u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi ba kin phah ïa ki Magistrate bad ia ki bor Pulit ban leit jurip bad kumba la ïakren u Deputy Commissioner jong ka Kamrup District u la kular ban phah shna biang ïa ka Signboard ha Maikhuli bad u la bthah pat ïa ki bor synshar district ba kin phah shna biang lyngba ka ophis u Block Development Officer (BDO) ka Umling C&RD Block khnang ban pynskhem ïa ka jinglong trai ïa ka jaka ha Maikhuli.Ha kawei ka bynta u la ai ka jingïaroh ruh ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka Maikhuli kiba la ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingwan pynpra ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam ïa ka Signboard bad kane ka jingshlur jong ki naduh ki longkpa, ki longkmie bad ki samla ka long ruh shi bynta ban ïada ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap jong ka jylla.“Kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah nga kyrmen skhem ba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla un shimkhia ïa kane ka kam ban ïakren halor kane ka jingwan pynpra ïa ka Signboard bad ruh ïa ka jingpynsangeh ban pyntrei ïa ka project ka tnad Warter Resource ha Hawla khnang ba ki kam pynroi ba dei ban ioh jingmyntoi sha ki paidbah kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih,” la bynrap u Bah Sohtun.
title: Jynrat ka Assam ïa ka Signboard pung dohkha ha Maikhuli, khang ïa ka project ka Water Resource ha Hawla

content: Jowai, Lber 25: Ka Samla Phyrnai Kyndait, kaba dang 22 snem ka rta naka shnong Mukhialong East Jaiñtia Hills District, kaba dang pule 4th Semester Bachelor of Arts ha Kiang Nangbah Govt. College Jowai kala long kawei na ki samla kynthei napoh ka Ri-Lum Jaiñtia kaba paw bha ha ka jingñiah Cycle ha ki jingïakhun kiba ka leit ban ïashim bynta.Dang ha une u snem bala dep 2023 ka Samla Phyrnai Kyndait kala ïoh rah ïa ka nam ba nyngkong (Gold Medal) haka XCO Open Women Category jong ka 6th National Level MTB Tawang Cycling Competition bala pynlong da ka Arunachal Cycling Association and Cycling Federation of India, bala wan ïashim bynta da ki nongñiah cycle na kylleng ka Ri India bad nabar Ri kumjuh.Kane ka samla kala wan ba nyngkong (Gold Medal) kumjuh haka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 kaba dang shu dep long ha nongbah Tura West Garo Hills, kala jop haka kyrdan XCO women open category/Mass Star.U Mawphor haba ïakren bad kane ka samla haka por ba wan ban pyni ïa ka sap ñiah Bicycle jong ka haka prokram pynkup burom ka BAM-JH ïa ki 24 ngut ki samla bala shah hikai ban long kum ki Security Guard ha jaka training ka BAM.la pynsngew “Kum ka khynnah naduh u snem 2014 kala sdang ïa ka jingïalehkai Sports (Athletic) da ka jingïalam lynti jong ka para ba byngkong jong ka bad ha u snem 2022 kala sdang ban ñiah Cycle da ka jingïalam u para ba heh jong ka”, ki don 11 ngut shipara bad ka dei ka khun ba lai jong ka kong Roithai Kyndait bad u ma Kmenlang Phawa.Ha ka juh ka por ka ai khublei kyrpang ïa ki seng ki nongñiah Cycle kata ka West Jaiñtia Adventure Cycling Association (WJACA) bad ka Meghalaya Cycling Association (MCA) kiba la ai lad ïa ka ban leit ïa shim bynta haka Tawang bad kumjuh haka Meghalaya Game.Kala pynsngew ba ka jingïakynduh jong ka bad ki nongïalam jong ka BAM-JH ka dap da ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw khamtam ïa u President ka seng u ma Yoosar Kynjing uba la ai mynsiem ba kan ïaid shakhmat ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa kane ka sap ba ka don kaba ai mynsiem ïa kiwei de ki para samla ka Ri-Lum Jaiñtia.Ha ka juh ka por ka ai khublei kyrpang ïa ka kmie, u kpa jong ka bad ïa ki kur ki jait kiba la ai mynsiem ïa ka bad khamtam ïa u MLA ka Khliehriat ma Kyrmen Shylla u myntri ka sorkar jylla uba la ai jingïarap katba kot ka bor haka por ba leit ïashim bynta sha Tawang.“Kane ka jingjop jong nga ha kine ki jingïakhun bala dep ka dang ai mynsiem shuh shuh ba ngan bteng ïa kane ka jingñiah Cycle ha kine ki sngi ban wan da ka jingdon ryngkat u Blei Trai kynrad” ong ka samla Phyrnai.Shuh shuh kala ong haka jingñiah Cycle ki don shibun ki jingeh khamtam ïa ka Bicycle kaba rem palat ha ka dor, ka Bicycle kaba kane ka samla ka pyndonkam mynta ka long 50 hajar tyngka ban ka rukom Maintenance ruh ka long kaba eh, hynrei haba don ki jingïakhun bah eh ka dang donkam ban ïoh ïa kaba kham bha.Kum ka samla ka kyntu ïa kiwei de ki para samla ba kin mih shakhmat ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ka sap ka phong ba ki don khlem da buhrieh bad kaba donkam eh ban don ka jingtei shitom ban minot thop bad ka mynsiem ïaleh, khnang ban ïoh ka jingjop ha ki jingïakhun, kala kyntu ba ym dei ban sngap ïa kino kino ki jingshah kren kiba bun rukom bad dei ban ïaid beit ha ka lynti ba bha.“Nga dang don jingmut ban kiew shuh shuh ha kane ka rukom ñiah Cycle ban tip khambniah ïa ka rukom balance ïa ka Cycle, ka rukom bam ban ïoh ïa ka bor met kaba khlaiñ bad ban nang ban tehlakam ïa ka Cycle khamtam haba ñiah haki jaka off Road kiba hap ban kiew bad hiar ïa ki riat bad ban jam ïa ki lum ki wah, katba ha ki surok ka kam suk khyndiat” ong katei ka samla.Ka jingpoi jong nga ban ñiah cycle ka dei na ka daw jong u Para ka samla Phyrnai uba la aiti haka ïaka Bicycle, da kaba kyntu ba kam dei ban pynlehnoh ei ïa ka Bicycle kaba ula thied bad ka dei ban pyndonkam hok ïa ka, lyngba kitei ki kyntien kala leit ban ïashim bynta da katei ka Bicycle ban ïoh ruh ïa ka jingjop ha ki jingïakhun.
title: Hadien ka jingwan ïakhun ha Tawang bad haka 5th Meghalaya Game.

content: Shillong, Lber 25: Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Nongthymmai SC ka la ïoh ban khur ïa ka namjop kaba nyngkong jong ka ha ka lympung Shillong Premier League mynta ka samoi 2023-24 hadien ba pynliem ïa ka Nangkiew Irat SC da 2-0 kol ha SSA Stadium, First Ground, Polo, hynne ka sngi.Ha kane ka jingïakhun ki ar kol na ka Nongthymmai la thep da u Y Gopi Singh (58’) bad u Iohborlang Nonglyer (66’) bad baroh ar ki la wan ha ka kylla miet.Kumban shu pynkynmaw, ka Nangkiew Irat ka la sdang ïa ka samoi da ka namjop da 2-1 kol pyrshah ïa ka Sawmer SC ha ka jingïakhun kaba la long ha ka Sngi Hat Majai jong ka taïew ba ladep katba ka Nongthymmai, ka kynhun kaba dang shu kiew shen ha ka SPL, ka la liem ha ka sngi sdang ïa ka lympung ha ka Rangdajied United da 1-0.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka Nangkiew Irat kam shym la lah ban ïalehkai kumba long ha ka jingïakhun ba ladep, bad ki player kiba long ka jingma ïa ka liang pyrshah ki long na u kapten- u Shaibor Nongrum bad u M Nikhil Raj hynrei baroh arngut ki la shah khanglad ha ki bak ba skhem jong ka Nongthymmai.Kaba kut jong ka kylla step ym shym la don satia ba lah ban pynkhihjar kaba la pynlong ïa ka jingïalehkai ban ïakhaid da 0 kol. Tang hadien katto katne minit ba la ïaid ka por ha ka kylla miet ba u Y Gopi Singh (58’) ka Nongthymmai u la ïoh ban khyrwit ïa ka kol kaba nyngkong ïa ka kynhun.Khyndiat minit hadien ba ka Nongthymmai ka la ïoh ban thep ïa katei ka shi kol, u Iohborlang u la ïoh ban pynbud ïa ka kol kaba ar ha ka 66 minit, bad lyngba kane ka kol, ka Nongthymmai ka la nang kyrmen ban khur ïa ka jingjop.Haduh kaba kut jong ka por ym shym la don shuh ba lah ban pynkhihjar kaba la pynlong ïa ka Nongthymmai ban khur pura shalade ïa ki point.Ka jingïalehkai mynta ka sngi kan long hapdeng ka kynhun ba wan kyrdan ba ar ha ka samoi ba ladep, ka Rangdajied pyrshah ïa ka Sawmer, ka kynhun kaba dang shu kiew kyrdan na ka First Division.
title: SPL: Khur ka Nongthymmai ïa ka namjop ba nyngkong mynta ka samoi

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 25: Ka jingïoh jong ka Meghalaya ïa ka jylla ba pura ha u snem 1972 kam dei kaba suk, hynrei la ïoh ïa ka da ka jingïakhih jong ki paitbah ryngkat ki volunteer kiba la ïalam da u (L) Maieit Hopingstone Lyngdoh.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïoh ïa ka jylla ba pura baroh ki paitbah nongshong shnong ka jylla bad ka sorkar, kim shym la kynmaw satia bad kim tip hi ruh sa katno ngut ki volunteer kiba la ïa shim bynta ha ka jingïakhih ban leit tur sha District Council bad kiba la shah kem ha ki pulit bad shah set phatok.Kumta ka kur Lyngkhoi lai kpoh kiba shong ba sah ha shnong Siejlieh West Khasi Hills, hadien ba ka jylla ka la kynjoh sanphew snem ka la ïashong pyrkhat kumno kan leh ïa ki hynñiew ngut ki kñi rangbah kiba dei napoh ka kur Lyngkhoi lai kpoh, kiba la long ki nongïalam ha katei ka jingïakhih dawa hill state.Kumta kum ka dak jong ka jingkynmaw ïa ka jingshah shitom jong kitei ki hynñiew ngut ki Kñi, ka Kur baroh kawei mynta ka lah sngi u Blei ka 25 tarik ka la pynlong ïa ka Dorbar kur ha ka shnong Siejlieh. Hadien ba la wai ka dorbar kur ka la pynlong sa ïa ka jingïalang pynkup burom ïa kitei ki hynñiew ngut ki rangbah kur kiba la shah shitom ha phatok na ka bynta ka jingïakhih ban pynïoh ïa ka jylla ba pura.Ha katei sngi la pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u bah Liewrose Lyngkhoi bad ha shuwa ban pynkup burom ïa ki rangbah kur, la ïoh ïa ka jingkren na u bah Ospiar Lyngkhoi ha kaba u la pynkynmaw ba ka jingdawa ïa ka jylla ba pura ka la sdang naduh u snem 1960. Hynrei ka la kut noh ha ka por jong ka jingsynshar ka APHLC kaba la ïalam da u (L) bah B.B.Lyngdoh bad u Capt Williamson A Sangma, hadien ba ka (L) Mrs Indira Gandhi ka la pynbna ban ai da ka Sub state.U la ong ba hadien ba la pynbna ïa ka sub state u (L) bah Hopingstone Lyngdoh um mynjur satia namar u kwah ban ïoh da ka jylla ba pura. Kumta ka jingïaleh kaba kham eh shuh shuh namar ka jingïaleh ka long ym ïa kiba nabar hynrei ka jingïaleh ka long ïa ki riew ieit shuki kiba napoh ka jylla.Kumta haba ka jingïaleh ka la sdang u (L) bah Hopingstone Lyngdoh u la lum ïa ki paitbah bad jied ïa ki volunteer bad ki shipai kiba la shongthait, ki la long ki nonghikai kumo ban ïakhun ym shuh da ka ktien hynrei da ka kam bad ka thong kaba hakhmat duh ka long “Lada ym ïoh ïa ka jylla ba pura ngin leh da ki kam” No hill state no rest no hill state direct action”.U bah Lyngkhoi u la pykynmaw ruh da dei ha u snem 1972 ha ka por ba ka (L) Mrs Indira Gandhi ka dang long ka Myntri Rangbah duh ka ri, ka la wan sha Shillong ha kaba ki paitbah na kylleng ka ri Khasi bad Jaiñtia, ki la wan ban pdiang burom ïa ka da ki lama ïong ba ka la hap ban ai noh ïa ka jylla ba pura kumba ki la dawa.Hadien ka jingkren jong u bah Ospiar Lyngkhoi, la pynkup burom ïa ki hynñiew ngut ki rangbah kur kiba la shah set phatok ha ka jingïaleh hill state da u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar president ka KSU sengkmie u ba la shah khot kum u kongsan.Kiotei ki hynñiew ngut kiba la shah pynkup burom kum ki long u bah Ekstanly Lyngkhoi, u bah Ospiar Lyngkhoi, u bah Darlingstone Lyngkhoi bad saw ngut kiwei pat ha kaba lai ngut na ki ki la khlad noh hynrei kum ka dak ka jingpynsah kynmaw la pynkup burom noh ïa ki kurim jong ki.Hadien ka jingpykup burom, la ïoh ïa ka jingkren na u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar president ka KSU sengkmie, ha kaba u la ong ba kum u nongïalam jong ka seng u la ong ba u dap da ka jingsngewkmen ban tip ba ka kur Lyngkhoi, ka la shim ïa kane ka sienjam ban pynkynmaw sha ki paitbah jong kane ka pateng ba mynta ïa kaba kum kane ka bynta, namar ki dang don bun bah ki riew ialeh kiba jar jar kiba la pynïoh ïa kane ka jylla kumne kumba ka long mynta hynrei ïa ka jingshah shitom bad ka jingtyrha jong ki ym don ba kynmaw.U la ong ruh ba ha kine ki sngi ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ka la duna haduh katta katta. Kumta ka donkam ïa ki kmie ki kpa ba kin pynssgewthuh ïa ki khun, ba ki dei ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynbha ym tang ïa ka kur ka jait, ka shnong ka thaw hynrei ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew baroh kawei.
title: Pynkup burom ka kur Lyngkhoi ïa ki kñi kiba la shah set phatok ha ka jingïakhih Hills State

content: Nongpoh, Lber 25: Ka Ri Bhoi Youth Welfare Organization mynta ka sngi ka la dawa syndon na ki bor synshar district ka RI Bhoi ba kin phai khmat shwa ïa ki nongpynbiang bam ha kane ka election MP na Ri Bhoi bad ym ba ailad ïa ki nongpynbiang bam kiba na shabar ka District.U General Secretary ka RBYWO, u Samla Kenny Nongrum, u la pynpaw ïa kane ka jingsngewkhia, ka dei hadien ba ka seng ka la ioh pdiang ïa ka jingujor na ki trai District kiba ju pynbiang bam ha ka por election ba kim ioh satia ban shalan bam bad la ioh pynban da kiwei kiba dei na bar District.U la ong ba ka seng ka ka dawa na ka bor synshar District ba ha kane ka election MP ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik u ïaiong 2024, ki dei ban ai lad shuwa ïa ki trai ka District ban pynbiang bam ha kane ka election bad kum ka seng ka pyrshah jur ruh lada wat ïa ka kam ban pynbiang bam ha ka por election sha ki nongtrei sorkar la hap ban shim na kiwei ki District katba ki trai district pat ki shong khlem kam khlem jam, u la bynrap.
title: Dawa ka RBYWO na ka bor synshar District

content: Jowai, Lber 25: Ka Dorbar Shnong Pdengshakap kaba pynïaid ïaka jingïalehkai phutbol ïaka ba la tip kum ka 10th Secondary School football knock-out Tournament 2023-24 ha kane ka sngi saitjaiñ bala dep ka la ïoh ban pyn ïalehkai ïaka jingïalehkai Semi-final ba nyngkong hapdeng ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC pyrshah ïaka Thrangchynnam FC ha kaba ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC kala jop ïaka Thrangchynnam FC da 2-1 kol.Hapdeng jong ka jingïalehkai ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC kala ïoh ban thep shwa arkol daki kol bala thep da u Younis Suchen haka minit kaba 37 bad ïaka shikol pat la ïoh ban thep da u Nickel Bina haka minit kaba 56.Katba ïaka shikol naka bynta ka Thrangchynnam FC la ïoh ban thep da u Timmy Ryngkhlem haka minit kaba 66 jong ka kylla miet.Kumta ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC kala buh jaka ïalade shaka Final jong kane ka Tournament.Naka liang jong ka Tournament Committee ka la rai ban bteng biang ïaka jingïalehkai Semi-final kaba ar haka 30 tarik mynta u Lber ka ban long hapdeng ka YFC Trangblang pyrshah ïaka Thun FC haka por 2 baje nohphai sngi.Kumta naka liang jong ka Tournament Committee ka khot bad wer ïa baroh ki paid ieit football jong ka thaiñ ban wan sakhi lang ïakane ka jingïalehkai Semi-Final ba khadduh.
title: Jam ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah SC sha ka Final haka Tournament Pdengshakap

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 25: Ka Khasi Students Union Nongtrai sepngi unit, ka la ïoh ban noh synñiang ïa kawei ka longïing kaba la mad ïa ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha ka jingpluh ding kat haduh ba ki jingdon jingem baroh, ki la shah bam duh noh ha ka ding. Kane ka ïing ka don ha ka shnong Lummawblei West Khasi Hills District.Na ka liang ka Khasi Students Union Nongtrai Sepngi Unit marsien ïoh jingtip ïa katei ka jingjia, ha ka jingïalam u samla Slinglang Mawsor General Secretary, samla Kyntiewbor Nianglang Vice President bad kiwei ki dkhot, ki la leit ai jingïarap da ki tiar ki tar kum ki borti, ki jaiñ, ki dabor, lem bad ka song pisa ban kner ïa ka kti jingïarap sha kane ka longïing ba la mad ïaka jingjia sngewsih.Haba ai jingkren na ka liang jong ki Nongïalam jong ka seng ka la ai mynsiem ba kin nym duh jingkyrmen, namar ka seng kan ïai don ha syndah bad ki. Ka seng ka la kular ruh ba kan ïai buddien haduh ba kin ïoh ïa ka lad jingïarap lyngba ka Emergency Relief fund na ka C&RD Mawshynrut Block.Ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka kyntu jur ïa ka Department ba dei peit, ba kin pynkloi ïa ki lad jingïarap ha ka por ba kham kyrkieh namar ba la jan ka aiom lyiur.
title: Kner jingïarap ka seng KSU sha ka longïing ba pluh ding

content: Da ka jingrai ka BJP ban kyrshan ïa ka Seng NPP ha ka elekshon MP na Shillong bad Tura, ka saiñpyrthei ha ka Meghalaya ka la kylla sted. Ki paidbah ki la sah ha ka lyngngoh kumno ka Party kaba heh tam ha ri India kam lah ban pynïeng kyrtong ha ki jylla kiba rit kum ha Meghalaya, Manipur bad Nagaland?.Kaei kaba don sha lyndet jong kane. Namar kane kadei ka sien kaba nyngong ba ka BJP ka, shym la pynïeng kyrtong ha ka elekshon MP ha Meghalaya, namar ha ki elekshon kiba ladep, wat lada ka BJP bad ka NPP ki ïatreilang ha ka sorkar ruh, ka BJP ka la pynieng kyrtong ha ki elekshon sha Lok Sabha. Ha ka elekshon kaba ladep lei lei, kata ha ka elekshon MLA 2023, ka BJP ka la ther tyngeh haba ki nongialam jong ka, ki wan ialap elekshon shane, da kaba kynnoh ruh artad ba ka sorkar Meghalaya kaba la ïalam da ka NPP kadei ka sorkar kaba bamsap tam. Phewse tang hadien ka elekshon, ki heh duh jong ka BJP naduh u Myntri Rangbah, u Narendra Modi, u Myntri kam pohïing, u Amit Shah, ki la wan lang ha ka sngi ba pynsmai ïa ki Myntri jong ka sorkar u Conrad Sangma. Imat ka jingïadei kine ki ar Seng ka la sdang naduh katei hi ka por bad ki jingïakynnoh ha ka por elekshon, kidei tang ka drama ban pynbieit paidbah.Hangne pat kiba bun hi ki paidbah khamtam ki Liang Pyrshah ki la ju ong ba ka BJP bad ka NPP kidei kijuh, hynrei ki shu ïapher tang ki kyrteng, ka BJP da ka kyrteng Hindi bad ka NPP pat da ka kyrteng phareng. Hynrei ka rukom treikam kadei kajuh. Wat la katta ruh ka shong ha u paidbah ban bishar khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka elekshon Lok Sabha, kabaka ri India ka khmih lynti ba ka BJP kan wan biang sa shisien pat ha ka bor.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka election sha Lok Sabha na bynta ka samoi ba 18 ka ïingdorbar ne 18th term ka Lok Sabha kaban long ha ki 7 tylli ki phase ha kaba ka elekshon ha ka jylla kan thep vote ha ka phase ba nynkong kata ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong 2024.Ka jingthep vote ha ka Second phase kan dei 26 ïaong, ka Third phase 7 Jymmang, 4 phase 13 Jymmang, 5 phase 20 Jymmang, 6 phase 25 Jymmang bad ka 7 phase kan dei ha ka 1 Jylliew bad ka tarik ban niew vote ia la elekshon MP kan dei ha ka 4 tarik u Jylliew 2024.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u CEC u la iathuh ba kin don 96.8 klur ngut ki paidbah kiba la don la hok ban jied ia ki MP bad na kine ki don 49.7 klur ki shynrang bad 47.1 klur ki kynthei. U la iathuh ruh na napdeng kine ki don 19.74 klur ki nonthep vote kiba hapdeng ka rta 21 haduh 29 snem.Lada phai ka jylla Meghalaya  u Chief Electoral Officer jong ka Jylla u Dr. BDR Tiwari ha ka 16 tarik u Lber, 2024 u la pyntip ba ki nongthep vote ha Meghalaya haduh une u snem 2024 ki don 22, 17,100 lak ngut ban rai ïa ka lawei san snem jong ki kyrtong na Shillong bad na Tura ha ka eleshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Ïaiong, 2024.Ki nongthep vote shynrang ki don 10,94, 947 ngut, ki kynthei ki don 11,22,150 ngut bad 3 ngut ki Third Gender. Ha ka jingïalang bad ki lad pathai khubor tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ka Election Commision of India ka la pynbna ïa ka tarik ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha, u Tiwari u la ong, ka jingkiew ki nongthep vote na u snem 2023 haduh kaba sdang jong ki ar bnai jong u snem 2024 ka long 55, 971 ngut.\Ki nongthep vote ba dang shu pynrung kyrteng thymmai ha ka Electoral Roll, 2024 ki long, 56,909 ngut, ki Service Voter ki don 3835 ngut, ki nongthep vote ba duna dkhotmet ki don 11179 ngut, ki nongthep vote ba la kynjoh 80 snem ka rta shaneng ki don 23, 793 ngut bad 5 ngut ki Non Resident Indian (NRI). Ki Polling Station ki don 3512 tylli, ba kynthup 326 tylli ha ki jaka sor bad 3186 tylli sha ki jaka nongkyndong.Ha Meghalaya hi ka elekshon MP kam dei ka elekshon kaba shongshit kumba long ha ka elekshon MLA ne MDC ruh. Kadei ka elekshon kaba jar jar bad kaba bobarabor hi ka jingwan ki nongthep vote ruh ka duna bha. Hynrei mynta u snem ka shu i shongshit da ka jingleit ka Seng VPP kylleng kylleng ki jaka jong ka Ri Khasi bad Jaiñtia na ka bynta ban pynshai ïa ki nongrim bad ki mat treikam ka Seng kaba la sdang naduh ba ladep ka elekshon MLA jong u snem 2023. Hynrei namar ba ka Party ka la pynbna lypa ïa u Kyrtong MP da kaba pynieng ïa u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon, kane ka jingleit ka la kylla long ruh syndon ka jingïalap na ka bynta ka elekshon MP. Katba nang jan ki sngi sha ka jingpynbna ia ka elekshon MP, ka jingialap ruh ka la nang shongshit kat haduh kaba la pynlong ruh ia kiwei pat ki Party ban ther beit ia ka Party VPP bad bun ki la klet noh ïa ki mat ne ki ishu kiba kidei ban kren.
title: Ka jingkyrshan ka BJP ïa ka NPP, aiu ka phalang?

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 25: Ka Khasi Students Union Nongtrai sepngi unit, ka la ïoh ban noh synñiang ïa kawei ka longïing kaba la mad ïa ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha ka jingpluh ding kat haduh ba ki jingdon jingem baroh, ki la shah bam duh noh ha ka ding. Kane ka ïing ka don ha ka shnong Lummawblei West Khasi Hills District.Na ka liang ka Khasi Students Union Nongtrai Sepngi Unit marsien ïoh jingtip ïa katei ka jingjia, ha ka jingïalam u samla Slinglang Mawsor General Secretary, samla Kyntiewbor Nianglang Vice President bad kiwei ki dkhot, ki la leit ai jingïarap da ki tiar ki tar kum ki borti, ki jaiñ, ki dabor, lem bad ka song pisa ban kner ïa ka kti jingïarap sha kane ka longïing ba la mad ïaka jingjia sngewsih.Haba ai jingkren na ka liang jong ki Nongïalam jong ka seng ka la ai mynsiem ba kin nym duh jingkyrmen, namar ka seng kan ïai don ha syndah bad ki. Ka seng ka la kular ruh ba kan ïai buddien haduh ba kin ïoh ïa ka lad jingïarap lyngba ka Emergency Relief fund na ka C&RD Mawshynrut Block. Ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka kyntu jur ïa ka Department ba dei peit, ba kin pynkloi ïa ki lad jingïarap ha ka por ba kham kyrkieh namar ba la jan ka aiom lyiur.
title: Kner jingïarap ka seng KSU sha ka longïing ba pluh ding

content: Ka party NPP kaba la kiew bha ka jingsarong ka jingsngew meng mynta khamtam hangne ha jylla Meghalaya jong ngi, shen kan sa hiar kyrdan noh na ka kyrdan (status) National Party kaba ka la ïoh na ka Election Commission jong ka ri India (ECI) ha ka 7 tarik Jylliew 2019. Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka la sdang ban peitngor (observes) bha kliaw mynta ïa ka jinghiar arsut jong kane ka party ha kiwei kiwei ki jylla (states) kiba don kylleng ka ri India khamtam ha North East.Katkum ki kyndon (guidelines/criteria) jong ka Election Commission of India(ECI), kino kino ki political party kiba la pynrung kyrteng (registered) ha ka Election Commission of India(ECI), lada ki lah ban jop ne don MLA ha ki saw (4) tylli ne palat ban ïa kata, ha ki state ka ri India, kum kita ki party yn ithuh noh (recognised) ïa ki kum ki party solonsar ka ri India (National Party). Hynrei, lada ki duh ne kim lah jop shuh ha ki saw (4) tylli ki state ha ki khyndiat snem kiba wan, kum kata ka party pat kan sa shah pynduh ne sloit kyrdan biang (derecognise) noh ha ka Election Commission of India (ECI).Ha kine ki khyndiat snem kiba la dep, ha ka por ba ïalam hi u (L) P.A Sangma ïa ka NPP, ngi ïohi ba ka Party NPP ka la jop MLA ym tang ha North East hynrei ka la jop ruh ha kiwei de ki state ka ri India kum ka Rajasthan kaba la jop 4 seat eiei hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Kirodi Lal Meena, u MP Independent ha kito ki por na state Rajasthan. Kane ka party ka la jop ruh ha Arunachal Pradesh, Manipur, Nagaland nalor ka Meghalaya jong ngi. Dei na kata ka daw ba ka Election Commission of India ka la bishar ïa ka jinglah treikam (performance) jong kane ka party ha kito ki snem ba la dep, ka la ithuh noh kum ka National Party namar ka la jop bad don MLA palat ïa ki saw (4) tylli ki state ka ri India.Lada phai pat mynta, kane ka party ka la nang hiar arsut ka rukom trei kam (performance) jong ka ha kiwei kiwei ki state ka ri India. Ha Rajasthan kam ïoh ne jop MLA shuh ha kane ka MLA election ba dang shu dep shen. Ha Arunachal Pradesh pat, ki MLA jong ka ki la leit rung (join) syndon kluk sha ka BJP. Ha Nagaland ruh, imat ki MLA jong ka ki leit pynïasnoh sha BJP. Ka don MLA mynta sa tang ha ki ar (2) tylli ki state, kata, ha Manipur bad Meghalaya jong ngi. Lada kam lah ban jop biang ne ïoh MLA shuh sa kumba ar (2) tylli ki state, ka Election Commission of India (ECI) kan sa pynhiar kyrdan (derecognise) biang ïa kane ka party ha kine ki snem ki ban wan.Kat ka bor bad jingkhlaiñ jong ka party TMC jong ka Mamata Banerjee ha West Bengal ruh ka la shah pynhiar kyrdan (derecognised) na ka kyrdan National Party namar kam lah jop satia ha ki saw (4) tylli ki state ne palat ha ri India ha kine ki snem ba la dep. Tang ka Aam Army Party (AAP) ka la shah pynkiew kyrdan (recognised) kum ka National Party namar ka la jop bad don MLA mynta palat ïa ki 4 tylli ki state ka ri India.Don ki nongpeitngor (political observers) kiba ong ba dei tang kane ka party (NPP) kaba la ïoh ïa ka kyrdan National Party hynrei kaba khaweit bad tieng thot thot ban pynïaleh MP mynta ka kynti na kiwei kiwei ki state ka North East lait noh sa tang na Meghalaya ba ka bat sorkar. Haba ka kyntien phira (motto) jongka ngi ïohi ba ka dei ka ‘Sur jong ka North East (Voice of the North East)’, balei pat kam nud satia ban pynïaleh MP na Assam tang kumba 3 ne 4 seat eiei, balei ha Manipur, Nagaland, Mizoram, Sikkim, etc. Balei ka la leit ai jingkyrshan ïa ka BJP ha Arunachal Pradesh khlem ki nongrim kiba biang?. Kam don jingmut ne kam myntoi satia kata ka kyrdan National Party lada pynïaleh MP tang kumba 2 seat eiei ha Meghalaya la jong.Hynrei, kaba kham ma eh ïa kane ka party NPP ka dei ka jingai jingkyrshan ka BJP na Delhi ïa ka Shillong bad Tura seat. Ka party BJP kam treh satia ban buh Candidate MP nangne ha Meghalaya baroh 2 seat hynrei kan kyrshan tylli tyllang ïa ki Candidate jong ka NPP, hana, ba ki ïa dei kajuh ka ïing NDA. Ki ‘riew stad pyrkhat ka sorkar BJP na Delhi ki la tip lypa ba ka Meghalaya ka dei ka Christian state kaba khlaiñ bha. Ka la tip bad sngewthuh lypa ruh ba kam don jingmyntoi kata ka nongrim Hinduva/Hinduta ha Meghalaya.Ka la pyrkhat sani bha ban ïaid noh (applied) da kawei ka nongrim ba, ban jop ne pynjot ïa ki nongtuh, dei ban pyndonkam hi da ki nongtuh ban jop ne pynjot pat ïa ki men dih, dei ban pyndonkam hi da ki nongdih kiad. Kumjuh ruh ban jop ïa ki Christian ka North East, dei ban ïoh hi da ki Candidate Christian hi. Kane ka buit tuh (hidden agenda) ka BJP ka la pyntreikam ha Meghalaya. Ban jop ïa ki Christian ka Meghalaya, ki kyrshan ne ai noh da ki candidate Christian hi ba la pynïeng da ki paralok NDA.Da kane ka buit kan sa jop bad ïoh jingshaniah syndon suki suki na ki paidbah jong kane ka Christian State jong ka North East. Tip ki paidbah ka state jong ngi ka ïa tip ne sngewthuh ne em ïa kum kine ki rukom pyrkhat rieh jong ka Delhi kaba kham stad bad kham shemphang shibun shah ban ïa ngi hangne?
title: Lah ban shah pynhiar kyrdan noh ka party NPP?

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 25: Ka Myrtl Gospel Band ka dei kawei na ki 5 tylli ki kynhun ba rah ïa ka nam jop ha ka jingïakop rwai ne ka Rock Beat Contest, Mawkyrwat ba la pynlong ha madan jong ka Nativity Higher Secondary School, Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.Lah ban kdew ba ïa kane ka jingïakop rwai la pynlong da ka Seng Samla Shnong, Mawkyrwat (SSSM) ryngkat ka jingïatrelang ka Officers Club jong ka South West Khasi Hills District kaba ka phang ka sei, “Rock With-Out Drugs”.Ki kynhun ne ki Bands kiba la wan ïashimbynta ki long ka Dark Abyss Band, ka Green Room Project Band, ka Myrtl Gospel Band, ka The Nomads Band bad ka Cursed Arrow of Monbhut Band.Ha kaba kut jong ka jingïakop ka Myrtl Gospel Band ka la rah ïa ka nam jop ryngkat ka song pisa kaba T. 40 hajar, ka Cursed Arrow of Monbhut ka rah ïa ka nam ba ar ryngkat ka song pisa kaba T. 25 hajar bad ka The Nomads ha ka kyrdan ba lai ryngkat ka song pisa kaba T. 15 hajar. Shuh shuh ka la don ruh ka khusnam shimet kata nongtem kitar ba tbit u Sandonbor Lyngkhoi, nongtem drom ba tbit u Checkmanpaul Lyngkhoi, nongrwai ba tbit u Commander Lyngkhoi kine ki dei jong ka Myrtl Gospel Band, bad nongrem bass ba tbit u Damesamanbha Nongrum jong ka Cursed Arrow of Monbhut.Ha kane ka sngi ka la don ruh ka jingtem sngewbha na ka Liza & The Band bad ka DJ Tenny.Kiba la ïa donlang ha kane ka sngi ki long naduh u bah T. Lyngwa, IAS, Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District, u bah L.T. Tariang, MCS, Additional Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District bad kum u Secretary jong ka Officers Club, u Resource Person napoh ka Meghalaya Aids Control Society, bad kiwei de ki ophisar jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ryngkat ki nongwan ai mynsiem ïa ki kynhun tem.
title: Rah ka Myrtl Gospel Band ha ka ‘Rock Beat Contest’ ha Mawkyrwat

content: Jowai, Lber 25: U President Rangbah jong ka seng Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) u bah Lamphrang Kharbani ula kren diaw da kaba ong “haduh mynta ngim pat jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat kiba long shisha ki nongïaleh, hynrei ngi jied pynban ïaki nongmihkhmat kiba long tang ki nongïa kynthoh para ma ki kawei ka seng siañ hima ïa kawei pat”.Ïa kane ki kyntien u President Rangbah ula kren mynta ka sngi haka jingïalang pyntian smai ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai ka HANM West Jaiñtia Hills, haka jingïalang ba la pynlong ha GHM Guest House jingkieng Myntdu.Kumba long mynta u bah Kharbani ula ong ka jait bynriew kam pat ïoh satai ïa kita ki nongïaleh kiba long kum u ‘Kiang Nangbah bad u Tirot Sing’, naduh bala ïoh ïa ka jylla ha u snem 1972, hynrei haduh mynta ka jylla kam pat don ïa ki aiñ ïada Ri kata naduh ka Inner Line Permit (IPL), ban rung ka ktien Khasi hapoh kyrnit kaba Phra ka Riti synshar ka Ri India bad u Pud u Sam uba pura la 52 snem mynta.Ym lah ban len ngi la kiew ha baroh ki liang naduh ka kam Sport, ki jaka sumar, ki surok, ki lynti syngkeiñ, hynrei ngi dang hiar sha kawei pat ka liang kata ba ngim don shuh ka mynsiem jingïakhun na ka bynta ka ri bad ka Jaitbynriew, la ban jur utei u President.Haoid ngi la don ka Land Transfer Act, ka Six Schedule hynrei kine kim pat biang katkum ka jingdawa jong ka por ïa Ri bad ka jaitbynriew, kine baroh ngim don ïa ki nongïalam kiba ïakhun bad ngim shem la pynmih ïa kita ki riew proh jabieng kum ki IAS, IPS bad kiba bat ha ki kyrdan ba halor.“Ki seng saiñ hima sima mynta ki ïatan patlun iwei ia iwei, dang ha kine ki sngi ka VPP ka kynthoh ïa ka NPP, katba ka NPP ïa ka VPP, ïa ka UDP bad ïa kiwei de ter ter. Kane ka dei ka daw bah daw san kaba pynsuki ïaka sorkar India ban kheiñ sting ïaki jingdonkam ban ïada ïa ka jaitbynriew, la kynthoh u bah Kharbani.Kum ki nongïalam ka seng kin long kiba la pynkhreh shwa namar ka jingmynsaw bad ïaumsnam kala ap lypa ïa ka jaitbynriew namar ka kyndon aiñ jong ka CAA. Shuh shuh u ong ka jingpyntreikam ïa kane ka CAA kin sa ïoh lad ïa ki mynder ri, ki khar muslim bad ki khar Bangladesh ban wan tyllep ïa ka jaitbynriew, namar ka jaitbynriew ka don tang kumba 16 lak ki nongshong shnong bad kitei ki heh pait (bar jylla) ki lah ban pynduh pyndam shi syndon ïa ki riti ki dustur, ha kaba ki trai jylla kin long tang kum ki nongtong um bad nongthohdieng jongno re jongno.La ïathuh hashwa ba kane ka umsaw kan wan hapoh ka Ri na ka liang ka HANM kala rai mar sien kut ka MP Election haka sien kaba ar kin hap leit biang sha Delhi ban tied jingkhang ïa ka sorkar ha Delhi. Utei u President Rangbah ula ong lada ka treikam pura ka CAA la tikna kan sa jia ka thma bha hapoh ka jylla namar ka seng HANM kan ym ailad satia da lei lei ba ka jaitbynriew Khasi/Pnar kin long ki nongtrei ïa ki bar jylla. Namar kata ka seng ka kren shai ba ka sorkar ka dei ban ai noh ïa ka ILP kaba long ka nongïada ïa bar jylla ban ïoh rung shapoh ka ka jylla, da kaba u buh jingkylli balei ïa kiwei pat ki jylla ka sorkar India la ai katba ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ym shem la ai satia?.
title: Haduh mynta ngim pat jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat kiba pura kum ki nongïaleh : President HANM

content: Shillong, Lber, 24: Ka Organising Secretary jong ka Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) East Khasi Hills District Kong Nibiang Sumer ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la kyntait ba ka ABVP kam don bynta eiei ruh em bad ka jingïalum jong ki briew kiba kah durkhmat ba rah bad ki tiar pynmynsaw hajan ka Petrol Pump ha phyllaw ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU), Shillong ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai.Kane ka nongïalam jong ka ABVP ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor ka la dawa ruh ïa ki nongïalam jong ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU), kata ïa u Banpynbiang Riang bad ïa u Mandor Diengdoh ban ujor sha ki Pulit lada ki lap shisha ba dei ka ABVP kaba phah ïa ki briew kumba 40-50 ngut sha skulbah NEHU.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ha ka miet 21 tarik mynta u bnai ki Pulit SOT bad ka Mawkynroh Out Post ki la hiar sha skulbah NEHU hadien ba ki la ïoh jingtip na ki nongïalam ka NEHUSU halor ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba kah durkhmat bad kiba rah ïa ki tiar pynmynsaw kiba ïalum hajan ka Petrol Pump ha NEHU.Ka khubor ka la saphriang ha Social Media ba ki don kumba 40 ne 50 ngut ki briew ba la kah durkhmat bad kiba rah ïa ki tiar ki tar pynmynsaw ki la rung ha skulbah NEHU ban thwet ïa u Banpynbiang Riang bad ïa u Mandor Diengdoh hadien ba kine ki arngut kiba dei ruh ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) la kynnoh ba ki la pynsangeh ïa ka prokram kaba dei halor ka Indian Modern Literacy Language. Ki nongïalam ka NEHUSU ki la kam ba ynda la bishar bha ka dei ka Education Cell jong ka RSS.Ki Pulit kiba la leit sha kane ka skulbah kim shym la lap shuh ïa ki briew ba kah durkhmat bad rah tiar pynmynsaw hynrei watla katta ki la peitngor bha ïa ka jinglong jingman hapoh kane ka skulbah ban tem ïa kino kino ki jingïakynad kiba lah ban mih ha kano kano ka por.Ka Kong Sumer ka la ong, “ha ka jingïakynduh ïa ki nongïalam ka NEHUSU kiba dei ruh ki dkhot ka HYC ngi shu kylli ïa ki na kaei ka daw ba la pynsangeh ïa ka prokram bad ki ong ba ka don jingïadei bad ka RSS. Kane ka prokram kam dei jong kiwei hynrei ka dei ka prokram jong ka Hindi Deparment hynrei ma ki pat ki pynmih ba ka don jingïadei bad ka RSS bad ba ka ïadei bad ka niam Hindu. Ngi kwah ban tip balei ki Hindu kim lah seh ban long prokram?”Ka la kynthoh ruh da kaba ong, “ka jingkren jong u Banpynbiang Riang ha ka khubor ba la mih ha ka YouTube Channel (jong kawei ka lad pathai khubor) ka long thik kumba ong ba dei ma ngi kiba phah. Ngi dei tang ka seng ki samla pule bad haba ngi kwah jingpynshai ngi wan beit ha ka por mynsngi.”“Lada ki kynnoh ba dei ka ABVP kaba phah ïa ki runar ki dei ban ujor sha ki Pulit hynrei ym dei ban shu kren tang ha ki lad pathai khubor. Ma ngi ruh ngi lah ban ai ujor sha ki Pulit. Khot lang ïa ki dkhot ka AVBP bad ïa ki dkhot HYC ha Police Station bad sa peit ïa ki Mobile Phone mano ba telephone ïa kito ki runar ban wan ha skulbah,” ka la ong.Ka la ong ruh ba baroh ki briew ki tip bha ïa ka jinglong jingman ha skulbah NEHU ba ym dei tang ha kato ka sngi ba ki don ki briew kiba kah durkhmat bad rah tiar pynmynsaw hynrei wat ha kiwei kiwei ki sngi ruh ka ju jia.“Tangba balei pat ha kato ka sngi ki (nongïalam ka NEHUSU) ai da ka kyrteng jong ka ABVP? Lada ki don eiei pyrshah ki dei ban ujor beit da ka ejahar bad ngi lei ngi long kiba la kloi ban leh ïa kata bad kim dei ki briew jong ngi,” la bynrap ka Kong Sumer.“Lada ki ong ba ka dei ka Secular University (ka skulbah bym ïadon bynta eiei bad kano kano ka niam) hynrei balei pat ki pynmih ba dei ka Hindu ngim shah. Na kata ka daw, kito ki briew ki dei kiba sheptieng ïa ka niam Hindu. Lada ki kwah ban pynïaid ïa ka skulbah jong ki ngin wad ïa ki briew jong ngi na ka skulbah ban weng noh bad kin pynïaid noh ma ki hi,” ka la ong.“Lada ki ong ba ym ïadon bynta eiei bad kano kano ka niam hynrei balei kim shah ïa kiwei pat ki seng ban pynlong prokram. Ka ABVP ka dei beit thik tang ka seng ki samla pule. Lada ki don jingwit ïa ki nonghikai Hindu bad ïa ki khynnah pule Hindu namarba kane kam dei ka NGO University hynrei ka dei ka Central University bad lada ki pharep kumta ïa ngi ki dei ban ujor da ka case,” la ong shuh shuh ka Kong Sumer.
title: Lada ki pharep ba dei ka ABVP ba phah ïa ki runar sha NEHU ujor sha ki Pulit: Nibiang Sumer
