content: Jowai, Lber 25: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) mynta ka sngi 25 tarik u Lber 2024 kala ïoh ban pyntian smai ïa ki nongkitkam thymmai ka HANM West Jaiñtia Hills District haka jingïalang ba la pynlong ha GHM Guest House jingkieng Myntdu.Ïa ka jingïalang ha kane ka sngi la pynïaid da u Vice President Central Boby bah Bawan Nongsiej da kaba sdang shaw da ka jingrwai ieit Ri bad la pyntian smai ïa kitei ki nongkitkam ka seng da u President Rangbah u bah Lamphrang Kharbani, ha ka jingdonlang u bah Roiwan Sohtun uba dei u General Secretary Central Body bad ki dkhot ka seng kiba wan na kylleng ki Unit bad ki Circle bapher bapher.Ha kane ka sngi ka seng kala ïoh lad ruh ban pynkup burom ïa ki nongïalehkai Sports jong ka Ri-Lum Jaiñtia kiba la jop ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher bad kyrpang ïa u Ngalong Sukhlaiñ ba shong ha Memory Colony, Jowai uba don ka jingtlot ha ki kjat ki bym lah ban kyrshan ïa ka long rynieng jong u hynrei u long pat uba trei shitom ban ïoh pyndap bam ïalade bad ïala ka ïing ka sem jong u da ka kam shna Mobile.Kitei ki nongkitkam thymmai ka seng HANM West Jaiñtia Hills District ki kynthup ïa President samla Wankishwa Mawlong, Working President samla Damehi Dkhar, Vice President samla Max C. Pasi, Secretary samla Robel Pakma, Assistant Secretary samla James Syiemlieh bad u Arki Lytan, Education Secretary samla Thepmon Patwet, Organizing Secretary samla Seimon Sutnga, Publicity Secretary samla Kijuhi Sukhlaiñ bad u Finance Secretary samla Rimitre Lakiang.U bah Roiwan Sohtun haka jingkren ula kyntu jur ïa ki dkhot ka seng ban kin pynbor ïa ka sorkar ba kan pyntreikam ïa ka ILP, khnang ba ki mynder kim ïoh lad ban wah suhthied kum ki trai shnong hapoh ka jylla bad kan long ka lad jingïada ïa ka khyndew ka shyiep,Ka seng da ka jingthmu ba bha na ka bynta ka lawei ki khun samla kala plie kumjuh ïa ka Employment Cell ban peit bniah ha ka rukom pynïoh kam ïa ki khun samla ka bri u hynñiewtrep.Ula ong ruh ba ka Ri India ka dei ka Ri synshar paidbah (Democracy) kumta ka don hok ban pynbor ïa ka sorkar da kaba seng ïa kino kino ki kynhun seng bhalang. Ula kren diaw kumba long mynta ki dukan ba heh hapoh ka Ri-Lum Jaiñtia la dei trai beit da kiwei ki pat ki jaitbynriew kiba dei ki mynder ri, kumta ka donkam ïa ki dkhot ka seng ban leit mih sha ka District Council ban dawa ba kim dei ban ai NOC sha ki briew ba nabar.
title: Ïoh Nongkitkam thymmai ka HANM West Jaiñtia Hills District

content: Shillong, Lber 25: Ha kawei pat ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba uwei u briew uba kyrteng u Malcolm C Jones Nongpluh u la phah ka jingujor ba ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai, ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la thang ïa ka khlaw jong ka shnong Ksehpyndeng, Mawryngkneng (EKH). Halor kane ka jingjia, kane ka khyndew kaba la ai ban pyntreikam ïa ka Community Based Forest Management and Livelihood Improvement Project da ka MBDA ka la shah pynjulor.
title: Ujor u Rangbah ba shah thang ka khlaw

content: Nongpoh, Lber 25: U Working President ka UDP Ri-Bhoi u Bah Balajied Ranee u la ong ba hadien ka jingmih noh u Bah Donbok Khymdeit kum u President ka UDP ryngkat bad kiwei ki dkhot, kala mih ruh ka khubor hamsaia ba u Bah Mayral Born Syiem MLA ka Nongpoh ruh un leit pynïasoh NPP.Haba pynshai halor katei ka khubor naka liang u Bah Balajied Ranee u la ong “Ka jingmutdur ka jingmih khubor shipor ba nga ngan leit noh sha ka party UDP ka dei tang ka jingmutdur hynrei haka por ba nga mih naka congress ka don ka daw, ha kaba ki suspon ïa u MLA jong ngi u Bah Mayral Born Syiem, bad ngi shim ruh ba u MLA u dei u briew ba ngi pynjop lada ki suspoon ïa u ki supon lang ïa ngi.Namarkata ka daw nga ruh nga shim ka sienjam ba ngan mih noh naka party congress hynrei ha kane ka kynti ba mynta ngin don daw aiu ba ngin mih na ka UDP, bad ka jingpyrkhat ki briew ïa u Bah Mayral ruh kam long kaba shisha ka dei tang ka jingpyrkhat namar haduh mynta ym pat iohi kano kano ka dak ka shin ba in kren ne ong eiei ban don sha kata ka party bad kine baroh ki dei tang ka jingmutdur ki paidbah bad ngim lah ban khang ïakata ka jingmut dur jong ha kaba kham kongsan ka long ba ngin skhem kum ki nongmihkhmat ban neh haka party UDP, u la bynrap.
title: Ka jingpyrkhat ki briew ba u Bah Mayral Born Syiem un rung NPP ka dei tang ka jingmutdur : Bah Balajied Ranee

content: Shillong, Lber 24: Ka ophis jong ka Director of Health Services (MI) ka jylla Meghalaya ka la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna paidbah ha ka 22/3/2024 na ka bynta ka jingtip ki paidbah ba namar ba la pynbna ïa ka ilekshon MP sha Lok Sabha da ka Election Commission jong ka Ri India bad ka Model Code Conduct ka la treikam.Halor kane na ka liang jong ka ophis jong Director ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka jylla ka la pynsangeh noh shwa ïa ka interview kaba la buh ban long naduh ka 01 haduh 03 tarik bnai Ïaïong 2024 ha Shillong bad 01 haduh 02 tarik Ïaïong 2024 ha Tura la hap ban pynsangeh noh haduh ban da pyntip da kumwei pat.La kyntu ïa kito baroh kiba la apply na ka bynta katei ka kam ba ki peit na ka por sha ka por ïa ka website jong ka tnat ka koit ka khiah www.meghealth.gov.in na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba na ka por sha ka por, kane ka long katkum ka jingpynbna na ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah.
title: Naba treikam ka MCC hap pynsangeh ïa ka interview kam Nurse

content: Shillong, Lber 25: Ka Seng Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (AVBP) kaba dei ka seng ki samla pule ha ka sngi nyngkong ka la kyntait halor ka jingshah kynnoh ba ki dkhot ki donkti ban pynkulmar ïa ka jinglehkmen Holi hapoh ka skulbah North Eastern Hills University (NEHU).Lah ban ong ba ha ka step jong ka sngi nyngkong, ka la mih ka huri hura ha ka por lehkmen Holi ha NEHU ha kaba u Vice President ka NEHUSU u Samla Easterson Sohtun ula mynsaw malu.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha Shillong Press Club, u State Secretary ka AVBP, u Tengku M Marak ula ong ba kane ka jingkynnoh jong u Vice President ka NEHUSU ka long kaba bakla bad ka bym ïahab satia.U Tengku M Marak ula kynnoh ba ki don kumba 4 ngut kiba sdang ban rah kti ïa uwei u samla pule da ki tiar pynmynsaw katba ki dang ïalehkmen bad kynnoh ruh ba ki la don jingthmu lypa naduh nyngkong ban pynmih huri hura ha ka por lehkmen Holi.U la ong ruh ba uwei u samla ba kyrteng u Kamlesh, u khlem rah kti satia ïano ïano ruh hynrei u la leit ban pyn jai jai ha katei ka jingjia kaba la mih ha ka por lehkmen Holi.“Kane ka jingkynnoh jong u Vice President ka NEHUSU ka long kaba bakla hynrei ha ka jingshisha, ka dei ka kynhun jong u Vice President ka NEHUSU kaba don lypa ka jingthmu ban pynmih ïa ka huri hura,” la kynnoh u Samla Tengku.U Samla Tengku ula dawa na u Vice President ka NEHUSU ban pynshisha mano, kita ki dkhot ka ABVP kiba pynkulmar bad kiba thmu shoh ïa ki samla pule NEHU bad lada um lah ban pynshisha ka ABVP kan ujor da ka mukotduma pyn mynraiñ khmat (defamation case).Ha kawei ka liang lah ban ong ba kane ka huri hura kaba la jia ha ka sngi Nyngkong ka 25 Tarik hapdeng u Vice President ka NEHUSU u Samla Easterson Sohtun uba la mynsaw malu mala ha ka jingïapyni bor bad ki nongïalam ka AVBP ha ka jingrakhe leh kmen ïa ka lehniam Holi ha Skulbah NEHU, hadien ka jingpynshai utei u samla Easterson Sohtun sha ki lad pathai Khubor, hynrei tang da ki khyndiat kynta, ka Students Organisation ka Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (AVBP) ha kajuh hi ka sngi ka la wan ban ïa kynduh ïa ki lad pathai khubor ha Shillong Press Club ban pynshai halor ka jingjia kaba la jia ha NEHU.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang u State Secretary ka AVBP, u Tengku M Marak u la ong ba kane ka jingkynnoh jong u Easter ka long kaba bakla bad ka bym ïahab satia bad kaei kaba jia namar ula kynnoh ba ka jingthum jong u ym ban wan da ka lynti ka kaba bha hynrei u don ka jingthmu kaba sniew ban pynklumar ha kane ka jinglehkmen Holi.U la kynnoh ruh ba ki don kumba saw ngut kiba sdang ban rah kti ïa uwei u samla pule da ki tiar pynmynsaw katba ki dang ïalehkmen bad kynnoh ruh ba ki la don jingthmu lypa naduh nyngkong ban pynmih jingïahuri hura ha katei ka jingïalehkmen.
title: Da ka bai mynraiñ khmat byrngem ka ABVP ïa u Vice President ka NEHUSU lada ym lah ban pynshisha

content: Shillong, Lber 25: Ki artylli ki seng saiñ pyrthei ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi-ka National People’s Party (NPP) bad ka National Democratic Progressive Party (NDPP) ha ka sngi Nyngkong ki la ïasnohkti lang hapoh ka jylla Nagaland ban phah ïa ka khubor sha ki Liang Pyrshah ïa ka jingïatylli ka kynhun synrop National Democratic Alliance (NDA) ha kane ka ilekshon Lok Sabha ban wan.U National President ka NPP bad Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ula ïakynduh ha ka sngi Nyngkong ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Nagalang Neiphiu Rio, ban tyrwa ïa ka jingkyrshan ïa ka NDPP ha kane ka ilekshon Lok Sabha, ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik ïaïong.Ka BJP kala rai ban ym sei kyrtong satia ha Nagaland bad Meghalaya ban ai ka jingkyrshan ïa la ki jong ki paralok ba ïatreilang ha ka NDA. Ha Kohima, Nagaland ka la rai ban kyrshan ïa kyrtong ka NDPP bad ha Tura-Shillong Lok Sabha seat kan kyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ka NPP.Namar kane, ka NPP ruh ka la budlang ïa ka sienjam jong ka BJP da kaba rai ban nym sei kyrtong ban ïakhun ha Nagaland.Haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u President jong ka NPP bad u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Meghlaya u Conrad K Sangma ha Kohima u la ong, “Ka State Committee jong ngi (NPP) ha Nagaland ka la ïakynduh hynne ka sngi bad ka la rai ban kyrshan ïa u kyrtong ka NDPP bad ruh ban ai ka jingkyrshan kum ka mynsiem shiparalok hapoh ka NDA.”Na ka liang jong u la ong ba baroh ki paralok ha ka NDA kila ïatylli kawei ha kaban kyrshan kawei ïa kawei pat kum ka mynsiem shi paralok ba ïatreilang ha ka NDA.U President ka NPP u la bynrap ruh da kaba ong, “Kumba phi tip, ki paralok ha ka NDA ki la pynpaw ïa kajuh ka jingkyrshan ïa ki seng saiñ pyrthei bapher bapher jong ka NDA kiba la buh ïa ki kyrtong ha ki konstituensi bapher bapher ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi. Kum ka nuksa, ki paralok ka NDA kila kyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ka NPP ha Meghalaya, ha Arunachal Pradesh ki paralok ka NDA kila kyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ka BJP bad ha Outer Manipur seat ngin ai ka jingkyrshan ïa kyrtong ka NPF.”Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ka NPP ka dei ka party kaba don haduh 5 ngut ki MLA ha Nagaland, kaba tam ïa ka Liang Pyrshah Nagaland People’s Front kaba don 2 ngut ki MLA bad ka Congress-1.Ha kane ka jingkyrshan ka NPP ha ki 5 konstituensi, ka BJP kaba don 12 ngut ki MLA bad ka NDPP kaba don 25 ngut ki MLA ha ka ïingdorbar kaba don 60 ngut ki MLA, ka dei kaba la khmih lypa kum ka jingjop ïa ka kynhun synrop wat hashwa ban sdang ka jingïakhun.
title: ïatrei lang u Conrad bad Rio ban pynïatylli ïa ka NDA ha kane ka thaiñ ha ka election MP Lok Sabha

content: Shillong, Lber 25 : U Bah Peter Shallam uwei na ki kyrtong khlem seng lane independent ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon MP Lok Sabha na Shillong Parliamentary Seat, u la kyntu ïaki paidbah ba kin jied bad ailad ïa u ban long kum u MP khnang ba un ïoh ïasaid na ka bynta ki jingeh jong ka Jaitbynriew hapoh Parliament.U Bah Peter Shallam haba ïakren bad u Mawphor ha ka ïing sah ka jong u kaba don ha Laitkor Nongdaneng da kaba pan jingkyrshan na ki paidbah, u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban die ïa ka vote jong ki lane ka vote jong ki kan shah thied noh namar ka long kumba ki die ïa ka pateng ban wan.”Kum uwei na ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ïa kane ka elekshon Lok Sabha nga da kyntu jur ïa phi ki paidbah ba phim dei ban die ïa ka vote jong phi namar lada phi la die ïa ka vote kamut phi die ïa ka pateng ban wan. Pyndonkam hok ïa ka vote jong phi kumba ka riti synshar ka la aibor haphi,” ong u Bah Peter.U Bah Peter u la ong ruh ba lada ki paidbah ki la ngop ha ka jingshah pynbiej lyngba da ka pisa, uno uno u kyrtong uba jop un ym lah shuh ban ai ka jingshakri kaba khuid ba suba. “Lada phi pyndonkam hok ïa ka, phin ïoh ïa ki nongsynshar kiba hok kiba khuid hynrei lada phi la die noh ïa ka vote ba kordor, lada u ne ka briew ki jop kin ym lah shuh ban ai ka jingshakri kaba khuid ba suba bad phin ym lah shuh ban kren eiei hynrei tang ki jingbabe.”U Bah Peter u la kynthoh ruh ïa ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba pher bapher kiba leit sha u paidbah ban ïalap elekshon da kaba ïakawang ktieh para ma ki. “Kam dei shuh ka juk lane ka por ban ïakawang ktieh namar u paidbah hi u la kham stad ïano ban jied, hynrei kum ki nongmihkhmat ki la dei ban wanrah ïa ki jingïakren ban tei ïa ka ri bad ka Jaitbynriew ym ban ïakawang ktieh.“Ki mat kiba u Bah Peter Shallam un ïakren hapoh Dorbar Parliament lada ki paidbah ki jied ïa u kum u MP, ki kynthup naduh ka jingdawa pyntreikam ïa ka ILP, ka jingpynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi hapoh ka khyrnit kaba phra, ka jingïapynbeit pud, ban wanrah ïa ka roi ka par, ban dawa pyntreikam ïa ki policy tih maw tih shyiap katkum ka juk stad science nalor kiwei kiwei ki mat.U Bah Peter Shallam uba dei ruh u nongsaid aiñ, u la dep ban thep kyrteng ïalade ha u Returning Officer ha ophis DC EKH myn ha ka 22 tarik Lber bad jied ïa ka shap jong u Mawlynnai na ka bynta ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon MP kaban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Ïaiong 2024.
title: “Wat die ïa ka vote namar phi die ïa ka pateng ban wan” : Pan jingkyrshan u Bah Peter Shallam na ki paidbah

content: Shillong, Lber 24 : Da ki spah ngut ki nongïalam jong ki samla Congress na kylleng ki bynta jong ka Mylliem Constituency ki la phet noh na ka party kaba ki don baroh shi katta ban leit pynïasoh noh sha ka National People’s Party (NPP) ha ka jingïalang kaba long ha Nongkseh ha kane ka sngi Nyngkong.Ïa kine ki samla la pdiang burom da ki nongïalam ka party hapoh ka jingïalam jong ki Working President kynthup ïa u Bah Wailadmiki Shylla bad Bah Hamlet Dohling, nangta u Nongai Ktien ka party Bah HM Shangpliang, Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh MLA, Bah Daniel Thangkhiew, Bah Kitborlang Nongrem, Bah Bajop Pyngrope bad kiwei kiwei.Shwa kane, uwei na ki nongïalam jong ki samla Congress, samla Kerlang Thangkhiew u la ïathuh ba ka daw kaba ki samla Congress ki phaikhmat noh sha ka NPP kadei namar ki ïohi ba lada neh ha ka Congress ka kam bad ka ktien kam poi shaei shaei ruh wat hadien shisnem ba la jop.“Ka jingmih jongngi kam dei ba ngi ïathut bad u MLA, Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh hynrei ka thong ba ngi rung ka long ban ïarap ïa kiba duk ba suk namar mynta la shisnem ka kam bad ka ktien kam pat urlong,” u la ong.Na ka liang u Bah Wailad haba pdiang sngewbha ïa kine kine ki samla u ong ba ka Mylliem ka long kaba donbok haduh katta katta namar watla ka khlem pynjop ïa u Bah Hamlet Dohling kum u MLA pynban ka don pat haduh arngut ki radbah kiba don ha syndah jong u Myntri Rangbah ba kynthup ïa u Bah Daniel Thangkhiew bad Bah Hamlet.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong pat ba ka rai ba kitei ki samla ki shim kadei kaba paka namar ba mynta ka Congress ha ka ri ka la nang hiar arsut.Nalorkata, u ong ruh ba ka jingkam ieid jaidbynriew da ki katto katne ki nongïalam kam dei pat ban ïalam bakla ïa ki samla. “Haba ieid jaidbynriew kam dei ban ïalam ïa ki samla sha surok,” u la ong.U Bah Hamlet pat u la ong ba watla u shah rem ha ka elekshon ba la dep hynrei ka mynsiem jong u ban shakri ïa ki paidbah kam pat shah rem satia. U la pynkynmaw ruh ba dei ma u ryngkat ka sorkar MDA kaba la weng ïa ka jingkyntur pud ka MUDA ban pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ shna iing, kaba dei ka ishu kaba ki paidbah baroh ki la tieng bha ha kito ki por.“Ha kito ki por nga khlem lum ïa ki paidbah ban leit tur sha Secretariat hynrei lai snem ngi la ïa trei borbah ban weng noh ïa ka MUDA bad aiti noh ha ki District Council ban pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ shna iing. Kane ka la pynmyntoi ym tang ïa ki nong Mylliem hynrei wat ïa kiwei kiwei ki shnong ruh,” u la ong.U MLA ka Mawkynrew, Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh haba bynrap lang u la ong ba ki sngewkmen ban ïohi ba ka NPP ha Mylliem watla kam shym la jop ha ka elekshon MLA ba la dep hynrei ka ïoh pat ban khring na kiwei pat ki party khamtam ha kane ka por ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka elekshon MP.Na ka liang u President ka NPYF, Bah Kitborlang Nongrem u la pynpaw ïa ka jingbym sngewlah ngeit ba ki don ki nongïalam seng sainpyrthei kiba nud ba kynnoh ïa ki nongïalam sengbhalang haduh ki nongïalam niam ha ki rynsan ïalap elekshon.“Kumta ha kane ka elekshon MP kaba don hakhmat mynta ngi kyrmen ba ki samla kin ym shah pynbiej hynrei ban trei borbah na ka bynta ban pynjop ïa ka kyrtong jong ka party, Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh,” u la ong.U Bah Bajop Pyngrope pat ha ka jngkren jong u, u la ong ba lymda dei na ka jingtuklar jong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Conrad K Sangma katta ka jylla kan ym lait na ka CAA.“Ngi la lait na ka CAA da ka jingtuklar jong u Myntri Rangbah, kiwei pat ki party kin shim kabu ban pynkhihwin ïa kane ka ishu,” u la ong.Shwa kane, u nongbat ïa ka pla tyngka jongka party, Bah Daniel Thangkhiew u la ïathuh ba ka jingïakren bad kitei ki samla Congress kadei kaba la neh slem bad kumta hadien ba ki la sngewthuh ïa ka thong kaba kum ki samla ki thrang ban trei na ka bynta ka imlang sahlang, da ka mynsiem kaba kylluid ki la rai ban pdiang ïa ki sha ka sem NPP.
title: Phum pra ka Congress ha Mylliem, da ki spah mih ki samla ban pynïasoh sha ka NPP

content: Shillong, Lber 25: Uwei u nongshong shnong ka shnong Kyndong Tuber West Jaiñtia Hills (WJH) u la phah ïa ka jingujor ba ha ka 22 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024, u la thied ïa kawei ka trok kaba don u nombar ML-06-4626 na kawei ka kong kaba kyrteng ka Dakaemi Sumer. Hynrei ha ka 12 tarik u bnai Lber, uwei u briew uba kyrteng u Winchestere Rymbai u la kam ba udei u trai jong katei ka trok.Kham hadien utei uba la ujor u la lap ïa ka kyrteng ba shisha jong ka kong Dakaemi Sumer kadei kaba kyrteng ka kong Dani Wanki Pala bad u la sngewthuh ruh ba u la shah thok ha ka.
title: Shah thok u Rangbah ba thied trok

content: Shillong, Lber, 25: U Vice President ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU) u samla Estherson Sohtun u la shah ktah kti bad shah shoh ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ki briew ki bym dei ki trai jylla kiba lehkmen Holi hajan ka pung kaba don ha phyllaw jong ka skulbah NEHU, Shillong. Mar mar hadien kane ka jingjia, u Vice President ka NEHUSU u la ujor da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit jong ka Mawkynroh Out Post ba kin pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor kane bad ba kin kem ïa kiba donkti.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la dep leh ïa ka Medical Check-up ha Civil Hospital, Shillong une u nongïalam ka NEHUSU u la ïathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka por 12:30 baje mynsngi.U la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïashoh, u la mong na ki bynta ki kti bad ka met bad nalor kata wat ka sopti phong jong u ruh ka la kad.“Nga sah beit ha (Hostel) NEHU bad nga dei ruh u Vice President ka NEHUSU. Dang step tang shu khie u telephone u nonghikai bad leit ai khublei Holi ïa u. Tang dep nangta nga wan nga ïohi ba don hajan ka pung ha NEHU ba don ka jingleh kmen bad ba wah ïa ka Banner lehkmen Holi. Ngim don jingujor eiei ïa ka jinglehniam Holi jongno re jongno, ka ri India dei ka ri ba ai laitluid ïa ka jingmane Blei, ki bun ki jaitbynriew lane ki niam ki bapher bapher bad ki jinglehniam jongno jongno ngim ju pyrshah,” ong u samla Sohtun.“Hynrei haba ngi leit peit hangto hajan pung ngi ïohi ba don katto katne ki bym dei ki khynnah pule ha NEHU khamtam ki don katto katne ngut kiba dei ki nongïalam jong ka Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP). Ngi khlem leit da ka bor bad ngi khot da ki Security incharge ba kin leit ïakren ban ym leh politik ha NEHU lyngba kine ki jinglehkmen,” u la ong.“Katba ngi dang leit ïakren, u ong pynban ba ki Khasi ki pyrshah ïa ka Holi, ki kwah ban shna ishu ha ka jingïapher jaitbynriew hapdeng ki Khasi bad kiba na Rithor bad don kiba ring video ban pynheh ïa kane ka ishu nga knieh ïa ka mobile phone jong u khynnah. Hadien ba nga knieh ïa ka mobile phone ki thombor ïa nga,” la ïathuh u samla Sohtun bad ong da kaba ïathuh shuh shuh ba ka la mih ruh ka jingïapyni bor hapdeng jong u bad ki nongïalam ka ABVP na NEHU.“ïa kiba pule ha NEHU ngim don kano kano ka jingujor bad baroh ki lah ban rakhe ïa kano kano ka jinglehniam hynrei ki briew hi kiba wan nabar ban leh politik ha NEHU ngim ailad daleilei. Ngi khlem leit ban pynsangeh ïoh ka jia ka jingkulmar,” ula ong.“Ban ïashad ïa lehkmen ngim don jingujor hynrei ban leh trai da ki briew kiba nabar hapoh kane ka ri ka muluk jong ngi ngin ym ailad,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ngim pyrshah ïa kano kano ka seminar na ka NEHUSU hynrei kumba la leit ha kato ka sngi da ki nongïalam ka HYC ki pyrshah ïa ka jingwan jong ka RSS.Haba kylli u la ïathuh ruh u la jer kyrteng ha ka ejahar ïa ki briew kiba donkti ban ktah kti ïa u.
title: Shah shoh u Vice President ka NEHU ha ki briew ba ïaleh kmen Holi ha NEHU

content: Nongpoh, Lber 25: Ka party National People’s Party (NPP) hapoh ka jylla katba dang mih ki sngi shuwa ban poi noh sha ka sngi ban jied ïa kita ki nongmihkhmat na ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat sha ka Dorbar thaw aiñ ha Lok Sabha ka la dang ioh bor ioh bor na ki bynta jong ka them Ri Bhoi bad ïa kane la sakhi mynta ka sngi ba bun ki nongïalam na kiwei ki seng saiñ pyrthei ki la wan ban pynïasoh sha ka National People Party (NPLP) kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Umsning.Kane ka jingioh bor ka party NPP ha Ri Bhoi kum shi bynta ban pynkhlaiñ bor na ka bynta ka election MP sha Long Sabha, ka dei ruh mynta ka sngi ba ki nongïalam bad ki nongkitkam na ka party UDP bad Congress ryngkat ki nongkyrshan ka VPP party ki la wan ban pynïasoh ïa lade sha ka party NPP.Kitei ki nongïalam ka UDP bad Congress kiba la wan ban pynïasoh sha ka NPP mynta ka sngi ki kynthup ïa u Bah Watson Kharkrang, Youth President ka UDP Youth Wing Umsning Circle, u Bah Rangkynsai Makdoh, Chief Adviser ka UDP Umsnig Circle, Delnes Pale, Vice President ka UDP Umsning Circle bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam bad ki nongïalam ka Congress pat ki kynthup ïa ki nongkyrshan ka Congress ha ka jingïalam u bah Shanbor Lyngdoh bad ka Kong Indaker Tariang.Kumba la paw pyrthei kiba kham bun hi kiba la wan ban pynïasoh sha ka NPP ki dei ki nongïalam ka UDP nalor ki nongïalam bad ki nongkyrshan ka Congress bad VPP.La pdiang burom ruh ïa kitei ki nongïalam bad ki nongkyrshan na ka party UDP bad Congress sha ka party NPP da u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem, Working President ka NPP ba dei ruh u CEM ka KHADC, u Bah Himalayan Shangpliang, Spokesperson ka NPP, u Bah Samlin Malngiang, Secretary Incharge ka NPP Ri Bhoi District, Bah Kitbor Nongrum State President ka NPYF, U Bah Clement Mawlong, President ka NPP Ri Bhoi, u Bah Jason S. Mawlong, President ka NPP Umsning, ka Kong Magdalene S Mawlong, MDC na ka NPP nalor kiwei kiwei kiba la mihkhmat na ka party NPP.Haba ïa jingkren ha kane ka sngi, u Working President ka State NPP bad uba dei ruh u CEM Ka KHADC, u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem, u la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ba ki nongïalam ka UDP, Congress bad VPP ki la wan ban pynïasoh sha ka NPP party namar ka thong jong ka NPP party ka dei ban ai ka jingshakri na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ki paidbah hapoh ka jylla.U la ong ruh ba ki paidbah kim dei ban shah ïalam bakla ha kaba bun ki nongïalam sain pyrthei kiba um kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng ki ju kynnoh ba ka NPP ka dei ka party kaba bamsap, hynrei kaba sngewlyngngoh ka long ba kim nud pat ban pynshisha ne ban ujor lada lap ba ka NPP Party ka bamsap ha kaba baroh ka dei tang ban ïalam bakla ïa u paidbah ka jylla.U la ong ruh kumba ki la kynnoh ba ka NPP ka dei kaba bamsap bad ka jingbam sap kaba kham ma shuh shuh ka dei ka jingbamsam ban pynïalam bakla ïa ki jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki paidbah ha ka jylla bad kum ka party NPP kan nym sngap ïa kita ki ñia kai bad ka bteng ban shakri na ka bynta ban wan rah ka jingkylla hapoh ka jylla.Shuh shuh, u la kyrpad ruh ïa ki paidbah ka jylla ba kim dei ban shah ïalam bakla bad ki dei ban ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka NPP party namar ka thong jong ka NPP party ka dei ban shakri sha ki paidbah bad ym ban shu ïa kawang ktieh ïa kiwei da kaba ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah ha kaba haduh mynta ka NPP kam sngap ïano ïano ruh ba ka trei la kam ban wan rah kata ka jingkylla hapoh ka jylla hi baroh kawei, u la bynrap.
title: Da ki spah ngut pynïasoh ki nongïalam UDP sha ka NPP kynthup na Congress bad VPP ha Umsning

content: Shillong, Lber 25: Na ka daw jong ka jingpyrkhing hadien ba la pynbna ïa ka Model Code of Conduct na ka bynta ka jingpynlong ïa ki ilekshon sha ka Lok Sabha na ka liang jong kiba khmih bad nongpeit pyrman kiba dei ki briew jong ka tnat ilekshon jong ka sorkar jylla ki la pynlong ïa ka jingap ktem ha kylleng ki jaka ban talasi ïa ki nongleit nongwan ban pynthikna ba ki briew kim dei ban rah pisa palat ïa kaba la buh kyndon da ka tnat Election of India kaba la pynbna dangshen.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ki briew jong ka tnat ilekshon jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ki la pynlong ïa ka jingap ktem hakhmat ka ophis jong Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ban pynthikna ba kan ym don ka jingrah pisa palat kumba la bthah da ka tnat ECI.Na ka liang jong ka tnat ilekshon jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka la pyntreikam ïa baroh ki kyndon kiba la bthah ban pynthikna ba kane ka ilekshon kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei bad ba kan long kaba suk kaba saiñ bad kaba shong shngaiñ.Ha ka sngi nyngkong la ïohi ba kawei ka kynhun Static Surveillance Team ka la ïeng hajan ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner ha kane ka General Election sha ka ïing dorbar ka Ri India ka Lok Sabha 2024 ka ban sa sdang shen.
title: Sdang ka jingtalasi ka tnat Ilekshon ïa kiba leit ba wan kumba la bthah ka ECI

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 25: Ka South West Khasi District Congress Committee (SWKHDCC) mynta ka sngi ka la pynlong ka jingïalang ïa ki nongkyrshan jong ka Indian National Congress (INC) hapoh ka Community Hall Mawkyrwat ha kaba u kyrtong sha ka Lok Sabha na ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat, u Ma Vencent H. Pala u la donlang.U Ma Vencent H. Pala haba kren ha ka jingïalang u la ong ba ki paidbah ki la tip kaei ka NPP ne ka National Peoples Party namar mynta lei lei kane ka party ka la tih lypa ïa ka thliew ban pynap ïa ka jaidbynriew da ka jingïarap jong ka BJP ne ka Bharatiya Janata Party bad ka long kaba ma bha bad ka pynap ruh ba ïano yn tep ha kata ka thliew. ‘Baroh ki tip ïa ka jinglong jong ka NPP bad ka BPJ ki long kumno, hynrei ki nongïalam jong ngi pat tang ban myntoi shimet ki ïa mareh shimiet shimiet ban leit snoh sha ka”, ong u Ma Pala kumba ka la jia.U la ong ruh ba mynta ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ka leit ban kyrshan ïa ka National Peoples Party (NPP) hynrei ki nongthep vote pat ki wan sha ka Indian National Congress (INC) ban pynïasnoh. Namarkata, ka kam MP ka dei kawei na ki kam bad kit ïa ka khia ka shong jong ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew bad wat ong ruh ka Congress kam jop mynta hynrei bun ki paidbah na kylleng ki jaka ki la sngewthuh ba kane ka party mynta ka dei ban wan biang ha ka bor ban ïoh laitluid ha kiei kiei khamtam eh ha ka jingmane Blei, ong u Ma Pala.Shuh shuh ha ka jingkren jong u, u ong ba ka Congress kan sa kiew biang namar ha kiwei de ki jaka jong ka Ri India ka BJP kan sa nangduna ka jingïoh vote. Kumta ka jingpynbiej jong ka BJP ban ïoh 370 ne 2 na ka 3 bynta khnang ban ïoh ban pynkylla ïa ka konstitushon jong ka Ri India, bad lada kane ka wan jia kata ka ktien “Secularism” kan sa duh noh bad hangta la hap ban don tang kawei ka ktien, kawei ka niam bad kawei ka dustur. Kumta u la kyntu ïa ki nongkyrshan ba kawei pa kawei ka seat ryngkat kawei ka vote ka long kaba donkam ba kin jied da kaba sngewthuh.Ha kane ka sngi u Ma Pala u la pynsngew ruh ïa ki mat bad ki jingthmu ha kane ka MP ilekshon 2024 kita ki long ban phai khmat nyngkong eh sha ki nongrep lyngba ka rep ka riang kaba biang, ban ïarap ïa ki longkmie, ban ïarap ïa ki samla, bad kiwei de.Ym tang ba ki dong tang ki jingïakren ne ïa phylliew jingmut, hynrei ha kane ka jingïalang ka la don ruh ka jingjied bad pynskhem ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka South West Khasi District Congress Committee (SWKHDCC), Mahila District Congress Committee bad District Youth Congress Committee.Shuh shuh ka la don ruh ka jingpdiang sngewbha ïa kiba wan ai jingkyrshan ïa u kyrtong jong ka Indian National Congress (INC) kata kiba wan na ka HSPDP, TMC, BJP, bad PDF.Kiba la ai jingkren lyngkot ki long u bah Gabriel Wahlang MLA, Nongstoiñ Constituency, u bah V. Thyrniang, Chief Adviser, Mawkyrwat Block Congress, u bah Phrin Wanniang, Adviser MBCC, u bah K. Lyngkhoi, Vice President ka MPCC bad kiwei de.La pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u bah Kynphamlin V. Kharlyngdoh, Convenor, South West Khasi Hills District Congress Committee bad uba la ai ruh ka jingkren khublei.
title: Da ka jingïarap jong ka BJP, ka NPP ka la tih thliew kaba ma ïa ka lawei ka jaitbynriew: Vincent H. Pala

content: Shillong, Lber, 25: Ki lama thok ba la shna ha ka dur jong ka seng saiñ pyrthei Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka bym don satia wat tang ïa ka shab jong u Prah ba shu thoh da u Marker Pen la teh da ki briew bym lah ban tip ha ka kynroh jong ka Civil Hospital Shillong.ïa kine ki lama thok ba shu shna tang ban pynthohbria ïa ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ba la teh ha kynroh kane ka hospital, hadien ba la treikam ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC), la lap ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei katba u nonglum khubor u dang ïaid lynti nakhmat ka Civil Hospital, Shillong.ïa kine ki lama thok la lap ba la weng noh da ki bor synshar district tang hapoh katto katne por.U Nongaiktien jong ka VPP Dr. Batskhem Myrboh ha ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la pynshai, ba kine ki lama thok kim dei satia kiba la phah teh da ka VPP bad ong ba kane ka dei ka jingleh jong ki briew kiba ka party kam lah satia ban tip.U la ong ruh, halor kane ka VPP kan sa ujor sha ki bor pynïaid jong ka tnat ilekshon ka jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyrshang jong ki briew ban pynthohbria ïa ka party khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) ka dang treikam ha baroh kawei ka ri India namar ka jingdon jong ka ilekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik ïaïong, 2024.
title: Her ki lama thok ka VPP ha kynroh ka Civil Hospital, Shillong

content: Shillong, Lber 25: Hapdeng ka jingrisa jong ki hajar ngut ki paidbah ha ka jingialang ha ka Voice of the People Party(VPP) ha Mawkriah u President ka Voice of the People Party u Bah Ardent Basaiawmoit, u la kob ia ka Regional Party Alliance(RDA) ba lada ka dei shisha ka seng saiñ pyrthei riewlum ba nylla ba ka dei ban weng noh na ka lympung iakhun MP na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency namar u paidbah u la phai khmat sha ka VPP.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang paidbah hapdeng ki hajar ngut ki paidbah ha ka jingïalap elekshon ha Mawkriah u Bah Ardent u la ong ba ka kumba long mynta ka rai ka BJP ban kyrshan ïa ka NPP ha ka elekshon MP ka la dei ka jubab kaba shai kdar ba ka NPP ka dei tang ka bula ka BJP ha ka jylla.“”Kaei kaba ka BJP ka rai ka pynshisha ba ka jingong jong ngi ba ka NPP ka dei tang ka snieh langbrot jong ka BJP ka la shai kdar mynta”, u la ong.“U Bah Ardent u la ong ruh ba kumba long mynta lada ïaid sha baroh kawei ka ri Khasi-Jaintia u paidbah uba bun hi u la rai ban kyrshan ïa ka VPP ha ka elekshon MP “bad ngi kwah ba ong ong ko RDA lada phi dei shisha kita ki seng riewlum ba nylla ka jylla weng noh na ka jingïakhun MP hynrei kyrshan noh ïa ka VPP namar u paidbah uba bun u la rai kumta hynrei lada phim leh kumta kane ruh kan paw shai ba phi dei tang ka bula ka BJP bad NPP,” ong u Bah Ardent.U la ong ruh ba ka jingïatreilang ka UDP bad HSPDP bad NPP ha ka MDA ka long ka mat kaba u paidbah u hap ban buh jingkylli, “namar ha ka sorkar phi ïa bang eh ban ïatreilang hynrei tang shu wan ka elekshon phi la leit ban kynthoh mar kylliang bad kane hi ka dei tang ka jingpyrshang ban pynbieit ïa u paidbah”, u la bynrap.“Haba kren sa ha kawei pat ka jingïalang ïalap elekshon ha Tyrsad u Bah Ardent u la ther kylla ïa u Bah Prestone uba la ong ba ka TMC ka la rai bad kyrshan ïa ka VPP ha kane ka elekshon MP, “mynno ka TMC ka rai ban kyrshan ïa ka VPP ko Maduh Prestone hynrei to tip ba ka TMC na Nongthymmai ba la mihkhmat da u MLA ba dei ruh u President ka TMC ha Meghalaya ka la rai ban kyrshan ïa ka NPP bad sngewbha kum u riewrangbah shuwa ban kren da wad jingtip ym ban shu padiah katba shem,” u la ai jingmut ïa u Bah Prestone.Haba kren ban pan jingkyrshan na u paidbah u kyrtong MP ka VPP u Dr Ricky AJ Syngkon u la ong ba kumba u la ju kren naduh ka sngi kaba sdang hi ka rai ban rung sha ka jylli ka saiñ hima sima ka daw ka dei namar ka jingsngewkhia ïa ka long ka man ha ka jylla, “Phin peit ïa ka ïohkam ïohjam ne ka koit ka khiah ne ka pule puthi bad ha jan baroh ki liang ngi bat beit ïa ki kyrdan kiba sha trai eh ha ka ri bad lada ngi wad ïa ki daw tynrai phin shem ba ka dei beit na ka synshar khadar na kata ka daw ban weng ïa kane phi donkam ban ai ka jingshaniah kaba skem ha ngi ka party namar ym tang ba ngi don ïa ka thong hynrei ngi don ruh ka jingïohi jngai na bynta ka laiphew bad ki sawphew snem ban wan jong ka jylla namar ka ri kaba ym don ïa ka jingïohi jngai ka dei ka ri kaban sa jah rngai”.U la ong ba lada ki paidbah kin aiti ïa ka jingshaniah ha ka VPP kan ïalam ha ka lynti kaba don ka jingkyrmen ïa ki longdien.
title: Ko RDA lada phi dei shisha ka Seng Riewlum, weng noh na ka jingïakhun: Ardent

content: Shillong, Lber, 25: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong uba dei ruh u State President jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) u la buh jingkylli ïa kito kiba ju kynthoh da kaba ong, “Hato naduh ba ka National Peoples Party ka la bat ïa u la kam synshar hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya naduh u snem 2018 haduh mynta u snem 2024 ka la ju don ne em ka jingpynthud bad ka jingkhang ban mane Blei laitluid hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.”Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u Bah Prestone u la ong ruh ba ka nongrim jong ka NPP ka long ban ïada ïa ki ritpaid bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka riti ka dustur, ka jingngeit bad ka niam ka rukom.Kane ka jingpynshai jong u Bah Prestone ka long hadien ba ka la mih ka jingkynnoh ba ka BJP bad ka NPP ki dei hi kajuh ka party tang hadien ar sngi eiei ba ka High Command jong ka BJP ka la shim ïa ka rai ban ym pynïeng kyrtong satia ha Meghalaya hynrei ban kyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ba la pynïeng da ka NPP ba kynthup ïa ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka ban ïakhun na Shillong Parliamentary Seat bad ka Agatha Sangma na Tura Parliamentary Seat.“Ka jingkynnoh ba ka BJP ka dei ka NPP bad ka NPP ka dei hi ka BJP kam dei shuh kaba dang mynta hynrei ka dei kaba la jia mynta la bun tylli ki snem. Naduh u snem 2018 ha ka por ba ka NPP ka la sdang ban khie rasong bun bah ki jingpyntieng pynsmiej ba wat thep ïa ka NPP namarba ka NPP ka dei hi ka BJP bad ynda ki la jop bad khamtam ynda ki ïoh ban synshar ïa ka Sorkar kin khang wat ïa ki ingmane ruh bad kin ym shah wat ban pynlong ïa ka jingmane Blei,” la kynthoh u Bah Prestone.“Kata ka dei ka jingkynnoh ha kato ka por. Hynrei lada phi phai kaei kaei kaba jia, u Blei uba stad, namar hadien ba ngi la ïoh ban synshar naduh u 2018 haduh u 2023 nga kwah ban kylli ïa kito ki nongkynnoh hato don mo ka por ba hapoh ka jingïalam ka NPP ïa ka Sorkar ka don mo kata ka jingpyrkhing, ka jingkhang, ka jingpynwit, ka jingpynthud ïa ka jingmane Blei,” la buh jingkylli u State President ka NPP.“Ngi ïeng ha ka nongrim ba ngin ïada ïa ki ritpaid bad ngi kwah ban pynneh pynsah ïa la ka jong ka riti ka dustur, ka jingngeit bad ka niam ka rukom. Mynta ka kynti ka jingkynthoh jong ki babun balang ka long ba ka NPP ka mut ka BJP, ka BJP ka mut ka NPP hana namarba ka High Command jong ka BJP mynshi sngi ka la rai ban kyrshan ïa ka NPP ha Shillong bad ha Tura Parliamentary Constituency,” u la ong.“Ngi pdiang sngewbha ïa ka jingkyrshan ïa ki kyrtong ka NPP ka bym don ruh ka jingbuh kyndon hangno hangno ruh. Ngi lyngngoh hapoh ka Jylla namarba ma ki (kyrtong) ruh ki la pan tiket na Shillong bad na Tura bad ngi nang pyrkhat ba la kumno kumno ruh ka BJP kan ïaleh beit,” ong u Bah Prestone bad bynrap, “ïa kata ngi ieh ha ka jingstad jong ki (BJP) lehse ka jingpyrkhat jong ka High Command (ka BJP) ka long kaba bha tam namarba ka NPP ka ïatreilang hapoh ka National Democratic Alliance (ba la ïalam da ka BJP).“Ha North East, lada phi ong ha Manipur ngi kyrshan ïa ka MNF bad ha Nagaland ngi kyrshan ïa ka NDPP ba ïalam da u Neiphu Rio namarba ki don lang hapoh ka NDA,” la pynshai u Bah Prestone.“Ngim dei ban sngewthuh bakla haba ngi ai jingkyrshan ba ka riti treikam jong ka party ba ngin weng noh ïa ka, em. Kane ka nongrim jong ngi, kane ka tien phira jong ngi, ki agenda jong ka party NPP ka long ban ïada, ban pynneh, ban pynsah ïa ka riti dustur, ïa ka niam ka rukom, naduh ka jingngeit bad ka jingmane Blei ki ritpaid ym tang ha Meghalaya hynrei ha baroh kawei ka ri India,” la bynrap shuh shuh u Bah Prestone.U ong ruh ba kum kine ki jingkynnoh ki ju jia bha ha ki por ilekshon. “Nga kyrpad ïa ki paidbah nongthep vote ba ki dei ban pynshong nongrim bad kim dei ban shu ngeit ïa kum kine ki jait jingkynnoh kiba mih tang ha ki por ilekshon,” la kyrpad u State President ka NPP.
title: U Blei uba stad ba naduh u 2018 haduh 2023 ba synshar ka NPP kam don ka jingkhang mane Blei: Prestone Tynsong

content: Shillong, Lber 25 : Ka kyrtong jongka NPP na kane ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency kaba dei ruh ka Myntri Sorkar jylla ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka BJP ka wan ai jingkyrshan hi ïa ka NPP ha kane ka election ym dei ba khot ka NPP. Kane ka pynpaw ba ki nongïalam ka BJP na Delhi ki la dep wat jingtip bniah bha shaphang jongki kata ïa I Dr Ampareen bad Agatha Sangma kiba dei ki kyrtong NDA ba ki sa shim ïa kane ka rai ban kyrshan beit ïa ki.I la ong “ Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewtynnad ba naduh Delhi ki la ithuh ïa ki kum ki kyrtong ka NDA bad kane ka dei ka rai jong ki nongïalam ba hakhlieh duh ka BJP ha Delhi. Namar na ka liang ka BJP hangne ha Meghalaya ka la phah ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong kiba pan tiket kata san ngut na kane ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency bad hynriew ngut na Tura Parliamentary Constituency hynrei ki nongïalam ha Delhi hadien ba ki la bishar bniah bad lehse ioh jingtip kaba bniah shaphang jong ki kum ki kyrtong ka NDA ba ka sa shim ïa kane ka rai ban kyrshan beit ïa baroh arngut ki kyrtong ka NPP”.“Kane ka pynpaw ruh ba ka saiñ pyrthei ka la ih bha ha kane ka jylla ba ka BJP ka sa shim ïa kane ka rai. Nga sngew ba kane ka long ka jingjop ïa ngi namar kaba kum kane kam pat ju jia ba ka BJP kan ai ka jingithuh ïa ki kyrtong ka NDA ha ka jylla. Baroh shi katta ka BJP ka pynïakhun beit la ki jong ki kyrtong ha man la ka election hynrei mynta lehse ba ki nongïalam ki kwah ba ka NDA kan poi sha ka thong ba la buh ban ïoh synshar biang ba ki sa ai ka jingkyrshan ia ki kyrtong ka NDA ym tang hangne ha Meghalaya hynrei kum ha Nagaland bad ha kiwei kiwei ki jylla ruh”.“ Kane ka jingshim rai ki nongialam ka BJP na Delhi ka la pynkyndit thret ym tang ïa ki nongïalam bad nongkyrshan ka NPP hynrei wat ïa ki nongïalam bad nongkyrshan ka BJP ruh namar ym shym poi pyrkhat ba kan long kumne. Kane ka jingïoh jingithuh ha ki nongïalam ka BJP na Delhi ka long ruh kum ka jingphah khubor sha ki paidbah lyngba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ba ki ruh kin hap ban sngap bad ban pyntreikam ïa kiei ki mat jingdawa ba sahteng na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka sorkar kaba khlaiñ ha Delhi” ong biang ka Dr Ampareen.Halor ki jingkynnoh ba mynta la paw shai ba ka NPP ka dei ka BJP I Dr Ampareen i la ong “ Kito kiba pyrshah bad ki bym thep vote sha ka NPP kin kren bunjait bun skher kin kynnoh beit da kumne kumtai. Phi la ïohi kumno ki jingkynnoh ba laiphewjait phew rukom ki mih ha ki social media. Hynrei nga kwah ban ong ba ym dei ban don jingartatien. Ha nga hi nga sngew ba kane ka jingleh jong ka BJP ka biang namar ha ka jaka ban ïaleh makynti bad duh ei ïa ki seat hangne ha jylla ka bha namar lashai la shisngi ynda ngi la jop bad leit sha Parliament ngi la ïoh lypa ka jingithuh kum kita ki MP na Meghalaya bad kane ka dei namar ka jingstad jong ki nongïalam ka BJP ban shim rai. Kane ka jingleh ka long kum kata ka jingpynithuh lypa ïa ngi sha Delhi” ong biang ka kyrtong ka NPP.I la pynshai ruh ba in ym leit pynïasoh satia sha ka BJP. “ Namar lada nga kwah ban pynïasoh nga la dei ban pynïasoh naduh ka election MLA 2023 hynrei ngam treh namar nga ïohi ba ki don katto katne ki mat treikam ka BJP kiba long pyrshah ïa ki trai ri trai muluk”.“ Lada phi kynnoh ba ka NPP ka dei ka BJP nga kwah ban buh ki jingkylli ïa kita kiba kynnoh hato ha u 2023 ha ka election MLA ka BJP ka pynïakhun la ki jong ki kyrtong ne ka kyrshan bad ïatrei lang bad ka NPP. Nalor kata u symbol ka BJP u dei u Lotus bad ka NPP ka dei ka Kot. Ka BJP ka don la ka jong ka Riti Synshar ( Constitution) kaba ïapher bak-ly-bak na ka Riti Synshar ka NPP. Tangba ha kawei pat ka liang ngi ki trai ri trai muluk na kane ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi ngi donbok ba ka BJP ka dang ithuh ïa ngi bad ka dang theh ki jingïarap ha ki kam pynroi pynpar ruh. Kumta ai kita kiba kynnoh kin ïai kynnoh namar lada ym don kum kine ki jingkynnoh ruh kumno heit kin pynksan nia ha ka election hynrei tang kawei ki paid nongkyrshan kiba kyrshan ïa ngi kin ym sheptieng bad kyiuh bad artatien namar kin ïeng skhem beit ha ka nongrim ban wanrah ka jingjop ba don burom”.I la ong ba ka HSPDP ruh ka ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka UDP bad ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka NPP kane kam mut ba ka HSPDP ka la duh bad don sa tang ka UDP. Ki don ha kajuh ka shatri ka RDA bad kane kam mut ba ka HSPDP kam don shuh. Nalor kata tang namar ba ki ïatrei lang ha kane ka election MP ka mut ba ka sorkar MDA 2 kan pra noh hynrei em namar ka don ka jingïaburom mar kylliang.I la ong ruh ba ka seng saiñ pyrthei hapoh ka jylla ki dei ban ïoh jinghikai na ki seng saiñ pyrthei na shabar ka jylla. “ Nga tharai kane ka la long ka jinghikai ba la pyni da ki seng saiñ pyrthei na shabar ka jylla kumno ban ïalehkai politik. Namar ban jin da la ïatylli lang ha ka election 2023 bad kiar noh na kaba pharia bad thaw bun ki seng saiñ pyrthei katta la ïoh ïa ka sorkar kaba khlaiñ, kumta phi lah ban ong bad kynnoh kumno kumno ruh kane ka long ka jinghikai nangne shakhmat”.I la ïathuh ruh ba na ka liang jong i shwa ba ka BJP kan ai jingkyrshan ruh ma i shimet i la dep ïakren bad pan jingkyrshan na ki nongïalam ka BJP, Congress, UDP, HSPDP, KHNAM bad TMC ruh kumjuh. “ Nga la pyrshang lut bad pan ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh na ki paralok MLA kiba rim ruh nga khlem ap tad haduh ban da pynbna namar na lade shimet nga la pan lypa ka jingkyrshan na baroh”.“ Nga la ïakynduh ruh ïa ki nongkyrshan ka TMC ha ki katto katne ki constituency bad ki la pynpaw ba kin ai ka jingkryshan ïa nga namar kat haduh mynta ki nongïalam jongki kim ong satia shano kin kyrshan. Kane ka jingpan jingkyrshan jong nga kam mut ba ka NPP ka dei ruh ka TMC hynrei nga kwah ba baroh la ki dei na kano kano ka party ruh kin wan ban kyrshan ïa nga kum ka kyrtong jongka NPP ban ïoh ïa ka jingjop don burom”.
title: Ka BJP ka ai jingkyrshan hi ym dei ba khot ka NPP, dei ka jingithuh ïa ki kyrtong NDA : Dr Ampareen

content: BDWS
title: BDWS

content: Shillong, Lber 26 : Ka Syntung Sports & Cultural Club lyngba ka jingkyrshan pisa da ka Yess Meghalaya, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taïew ba dang su dep ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa kiba bun ki prokram na ka bynta ki heprit, ki samla bad ki longkmie longkpa jong ka shnong, ba kynthup ka jingpynmareh marathon, ka jingïalehkai kynjat bol, bad ka jingïakop pyni sap ïa kaba la tip kum ka Open To All Variety Talent Show 2024.Ha ka 22 tarik Lber 2024 ha por mynstep la ïoh ban pynlong da ka Marathon ïa kaba la kaweh ïa ka lama da u Bah Tympang Pohshna uba dei u Chairman ka Block Mawkynrew kum u Kongsan.Ha ka 23 tarik Lber ha ka por mynstep la pynlong ka jingpynïalehkai kynjat bol bad khatduh ha ka por janmiet la pynlong pat ïa ka jingïakop sei la ki sap ki phong lane ka Talent Show ba la ïashim bynta shitrhem naduh ki heprit, ki samla bad ki longkmie longkpa.Ïa kane ka Talent Show la wan ban plie da u Sordar ka Shnong Syntung u Bah R. Pale kum u Kongsan, ha ka jingïadonlang u Bah Tympang Pohsna kum u Symbud Kongsan, Bah K Mukhim President ka Club, Bah S. Surong Secretary, la pynïaid ïa katei ka prokram da ka Kong S Dkhar.Kiba ïashim bynta ha ka marathon ki don 298 ngut shynrang bad kynthei ïa kaba la phiah ha ki ar tylli ki group ka -U-12 bad ka U-15, ha ka phutbol ki don saw tylli ki team ba kynthup ka Ardong Combined United Football Club, ka N. N. N Football Club, ka Nongmukhim SC bad ka Ïatyllilang FC.Ka N. N. N FC ka la long ka nongjop da kaba pynliem lyngba ka tie breaker da 5-4 kol pyrshah ïa ka Ardong Combined United FC. Ha ka Marathon, ïa ka nam jop ba nyngkong ha ka U-15 la ïohrah da u Fredison Dkhar, ba wan ba ar u Plieshai Nongrum bad ba lai la ïoh da u Mebaaibiang Lynshiang.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïakop pyni sap, ïa ka nam ba nyngkong la jop da ka Syntung V.O Group kaba pyni ïa ka sap rwai, ba ar la ïoh rah da u Phim Dkhar uba tem bad rwai bad ïa ka nam ba lai la ïoh rah da ka Sweety Mynsong kaba pyni ïa ka sap shad.Ha kaba kut jong kane ka jingpynïakop pyni sap, la sam ïa ki khusnam sha baroh ki nongjop naduh ka jingpynïamareh marathon, ka jingïalehkai kynjat bol bad ka talent show. Ïa kane kaTalent Show la wan ban bishar da u samla Welbon Mynsong uba dei u tyngshop ïa uba la tip paidbah da u Paheh bad ka samla P. Syngkrem.Ha kane ka sngi, ka prokram ka la long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih bad kaba shongshit bha da ka jingwan ai mynsiem jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ba kynthup naduh ki longkmie longkpa, ki samla kynthei bad shynrang haduh ki hep kiba rit.Kane kadei ruh ka sien kaba nyngkong kaba ki paidbah jong katei ka shnong ki ïoh ban sakhi ïa ki sap ki phong ba ki para shnong ki la pynpaw pyrthei.La ïadonlang ruh ha kane ka sngi, ki nongkitkam ka Syntung Sports & Cultural Club, ki nongkitkam Shnong, Bah Hansing Suting uba dei u samla rangbah jong ka thaiñ Mawkynrew bad uba la pynbit pynbiang ïa baroh ki jingdonkam ha kaban pynlong ïa kitei ki prokram ba la bei tyngka da ka Yess Meghalaya.
title: Pynlong ka Syntung S&CC ïa ka jingïakop mareh, ïalehkai kynjatbol bad ka jingïakop pyni sap

content: Shillong, Lber 26 : Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Rangdajied United FC ka la ïoh ban pynliem noh da 3-2 kol ïa ka Sawmer SC ha ka jingïakhun kaba mar ïa biang bor bha ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka SSA Shillong Premier League Division 2023-24 kaba long ha madan SSA Stadium.Haba phai sha ka jingïalehkai ka Rangdajied ka la ïoh ban thep ïa ka kol kaba nyngkong tang ha ka minit kaba 11 jong ka kylla step lyngba u Enestar Malngiang bad tang ha ka minit kaba 25 u la ïoh biang sa shi kol na u Ieitlamg Syiemlieh.Watla ka jingïalehkai ka long kaba mar biang bor hynrei tad haduh ban da kut ka kylla step dei ka Rangdajied kaba ïoh ban lamkhmat da 2-0 kol.Dei tad ynda la poi ka jylla miet ba ka rukom ïalehkai ka la sdang ban kylla bad dei da kaneka rukom ïalehkai ba ka Sawmer ka la ïoh lad ban pynphai lang ar kol tang ha ki 10 minit.Ïa kitei baroh ar tylli ki kol la ïoh ban thep da uMark Austin Wanswett ha ka minit kaba 55 bad kumjuh ha ka minit kaba 65 jong ka kylla miet.Ka jingïalehkai ka la neh ha ka jingïakhaid a mar 2-2 kol haduh ka minit kaba 80. Dei ha ka minit kaba 82 ba ka Rangdajied ka la ïoh ban thep ïa ka kol jop na u Stephan Pale kaba pyntikna ïa ka kynhun ban khur suk ïa ki lai point na kane ka jingïakhun.Ka jingïakhun ha kane ka sngi Balang pat kan long hapdeng ka Ryntih SC pyrshah ïa ka Shillong Lajong FC ha ka por 3:00 baje mynsngi.
title: Pynliem ka Rangdajied FC ïa ka Sawmer SC ha ka Shillong Premier League da 3-2 kol

content: M an la kawei pa kawei ka jaidbynriew kaba im ha kane ka snieh pyrthei ka im , ka roi ka man ka par namar ka ktien jongka ka ïai im bad ka hiar na kawei ka pateng ha kawei pat, da kumta ka jaidbynriew kaba nang bad ban niew kor ïala ka jong ka ktien, kiba pyndonkam hok shisha ïa ka, ym tang ba ka ïai im hynrei ka kylla long ka ri kaba khraw.Haba ia phai sha la ka jong ka jylla, lehse ka kyntien Khasi kam dei satia kaba duk haduh katta, ym ba ka da riewspah, pynban lah ban ong baka shu long pdeng, namar ba ia ka ktien ka jong ka dang ïa kren ïa khana dang ïa thoh ïa tar ïa ka tad haduh kine ki sngi kiba mynta.Pynban ka jingsdang ban kham ring sdot jong ka kyntien Khasi lah ban ong ba dei na ka jingbym ia kit khia lem da baroh baroh, khamtam lei lei na ki riew stad pule ba la pynjanai ïala ka kyrdan pule hala ka jong ka ktien. Ka mat kaba juh ia pur bad iakren ha kiba bun bah ki jingïalang ban pynriew spah ïala ka jong ka ktien, kam don ïa ka jubab kaba paka ban ai balei ba ka ktien Khasi ka nang ring sdot, hato kiei eh ki daw kiba pynlong ia ka ba kan long kumba ka long ha kane ka juk kaba mynta.Ki mat kiba lehse kiba lah ban shu ïa pashat lyngba kane ka kolom ka long ba man la ki skul khamtam lei lei ki skul phareng haba don la ki jong ki khynnah, dei beit ha kaban sdang nak abynta ban pynshlur ia ki khynnah ba kin hap ba kin shim iaka sobjek Khasi kum kawei na ki kot pule ka jong ki, ne lada ka kham sngewlong kaba laitlan ne bym da mon ban ia shim kyllum da baroh ki khynnah, lehse lah ruh ban rai ba kan dei kum kawei na ki sobjek ba kyrpang (compulsory subject) tang naka bynta ki khynnah Khasi, khnang ba ka ktien ka jong ka kan iai im.Ka jingeh kiba bun ki khynnah shong skul ka long ba ki kham salia bha ban shim ïa ka sobjek Khasi ha ki skul, namar ba ha ki, la plie lad ba ki lah ban jied da kiwei pat ki sobjek kum ka Alternative English kaba shiban ka kylla long ka dieng pynkiang bah ia ka ktien Khasi ba kan ioh ba kan rung ha man la ki jingmut jong ki khynnah. La bun bun tylli ki snem ba ia kum kane lad ban shim bujli ia ka sobjek Khasi da kiwei pat ki sobjek ka la hiar la bun bun pateng, kaba mynta pat ka kylla long kawei na ki mat kaba la ia sdang ban ia lyngba bad pisa ba ka ktien hi ka la nang lam sha ka lynti ba imat ka sdang ba kan duhjait.Pynban hapdeng ka jingeh ba ka ktien Khasi ka don ha ka jingjah lynti, ki lad pathai khubor lehse ki la shim ïa la ka jong ka kamram ban bah ia ka lyngkor kaba khia naka bynta ban iai pynim ïa ka ktien lajong. Halor kane ka mat, sngew ban ai burom kaba khraw ia ki nongseng ia ki kot khubor, kiba hapdeng ka jingeh ba ki ia kynduh, ki iai pynmih kawei hadien kawei, ban pyrshang katba lah ha kaban pynim iala ka jong ka ktien da ki jingthoh kum ki khubor, ki artikle, ki khubor ka pyrthei ba pynwan sha ka ktien lajong bad kumta ter ter.Hynrei hapdeng ka jingpyrshang naka bynta ban pynneh ïala ka ktien lajong, mih ka ishu jong ka jingbym beit ne bym biang pura ïa ki dak thoh ba pyndonkam hala ka ktien lajong, ne don ruh ki jait jingmut jong ki kyntien kiba dei kiba dang shu kha shen ia ki bad kaba eh shisha ha kaban pynwandur sha la ka jong ka ktien. Hangne la shem ba ka daw hi baroh ka long ba ki samla pule ba la kham pule bha ia ki kyrdan ba kham shalor ia ka sobjek Khasi, ki tyngkan eh iala ka buit ka bor ban iarap ha kaban sei ia ki kynja jingthoh ba ki la ngam jylliew naka bynta ban iarap lem ia ki lad pathai khubor ba kin sdang ban pynsaphriang lem ia ki kyntien ba thymmai sha ki paidbah nongpule salonsar.Shuh shuh ka jingeh ia ka ktien Khasi ba kam lah ba kan kiew shakhmat, namar ba ki khynnah pule ha ki skul haba kim shim ia ka sobjek, ki la sdang ruh ban da klet syndon wat ha kaban kren ia ka ha la iing ha la sem. Ki kmie ki kpa ruh ki ailad iala kai khun ban kren noh da ki ktien nongwei, namar ba jur pat ka jingsarong ba hana ki khun kidei kiba la nang bad pnah bha ha kabna kren ia ka kyntien ki nongwei wat hala iing ha la sem. Phewse haba mih pat shabar nala ka jong ka jylla, haba iashem ba dia kynduh ia kiwei pat ki para jaidbynriew haba kylli ia ka tynrai wna long briew, kam te kam ba dei naka jaidbynriew Khasi, hynrei haba kren pat wat tang shi kyntien ruh ym nang shuh ban lait. Da kumta kiba bun na ki jaidbynriew kiba shem bad ia kynduh ki sdang ban shim pynban da kawei ka jingmut bad katta hi ka long ba pleng ba la shu bna satang kum ki khana pateng ba don teng katta ka jaidbynriew Khasi, kaba ka ktien ka jong ka la duh jait.
title: Ka Ktien ka pynkhlaiñ bad pynskhem ïa ka nongrim ka jaidbynriew

content: Nongpoh, Lber 26: Uwei na u samla na Ri Bhoi District, u Samla Alber Maring na ka shnong Umdap u la kyntu ia ki khun samla ka Ri Bhoi bad ka jylla hi baroh kawei ba ngim dei ban don jingsngew la ngi trei ia kano kano ka kam.Une u samla u la mih shakhmat ban kren halor ki kam ki jam, ka dei hadien ba bun ki khun samla jong ka District bad ka jylla hi baroh kawei ki ju kren shaphang ka jingkyrduh kam kyrduh jam bad katba kiwei pat ki nongwei ki wan ban trei ban ktah ha kane ka jylla namar ba kim don ka jingsngewpher ban trei ia kano kano ka kam.Kum u wei na u samla u la pynpaw ruh ba ki samla jongngi kim dei ban sngewpoh ban trei ia kano kano ka kam, la ka dei ka kam rep ka kam riang, ka kam misteri, ka khapsniuh ka kam bylla sngi ne kiwei kiwei ki kam ha kaba bun ki samla ki khmih lynti beit ban ioh tang ki kam sorkar bad kiwei pat ki nongwei ki wan na kiwie ki jylla ban trei beit ia kano kano ka kam namar ba haba ki trei ia ka kam ki ioh ia ka bainong.Shuh shuh, u la kyntu ruh ia ki samla jong ka bri u Hynñiewtrep ba kim dei ban sngewpoh ia kano kano ka kam la ka long kano kano ka jaid kam lait noh na ki kam thok ki kam shukor bad lada kum ki samla kin iai neh ban trei hok ia ka kam, ka kam hi kan sa ai buro ia ki, u la bynrap.
title: Kyntu u Samla na Ri Bhoi ba ngim dei ban leh rain ban trei ia kano kano kam

content: Nongpoh, Lber 26: Ka ophis jong ka District Tuberculosis Officer Ri-Bhoi District mynta ka sngi kala rakhe ïaka sngi jong ka jingpang TB ne ka World TB Day kaba la ju rakhe haka 24 tarik Lber ha baroh kawei ka pyrthei bad ïa katei ka jingrakhe la pynlong ha Auditorium Hall jong ka Nongpoh Parish.Ïa katei ka jingrakhe ïaka World TB Day la wan ban shim bynta da u Prof GD Sharma Vice Chancellor ka skul bah USTM, Dr SK Baruah na Purno A Sangma International Medical College USTM, G Burgohain WHO Consultant NTEP, Dr. TS Momin DMHO ka Ri-Bhoi, Dr. E. Kalwing District Tuberculosis Officer Ri-Bhoi, ki ophisar naka tnad ka koit ka khiah, ki nongmihkhmat naka Piramal Foundation ki khynnah skul bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah.Naka liang ka ophis DTO ryngkat bad ka Piramal Foundation kum ka jingpynphriang khubor bad ai mynsiem ïakiba don bynta ban rat diengkhong ïaka jingpang TB kala pynkup burom ruh ïaki jaka sumar, ki nongthoh khubor naka district, ka shnong ba lait naka jingpang TB bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi naka liang u Prof GD Sharma kum u kongsan u la ai ka jingïaroh ïaka tnad ka koit ka khiah lyngba ka National Tuberculosis Elimination Programme kaba la ïakhun tyngeh ban rat diengkhong ïaka jingpang TB bad buh thong ruh ban pynduhjait ïaka jingpang TB shuwa u snem 2025.U la ong ruh ba baroh u briew u don la ka jong ka rukom bam ka rukom dih bad ka jingkhlaiñ ka met ba ka jingpang ka lah ban khyrwit ha kano kano ka por hynrei kum ki paidbah ki dei ban phikir bad husiar ban bam ki jingbam ba tei ban lait na kano kano ka jait jingpang bad khamtam haba ki don kano kano ka jingsngew pher haka met ba kin leit phah test sha ki jaka sumar ba hajan.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba kine ki jait prokram ki long kiba kongsan ban pynphriang ka khubor shaphang ka jingpang TB ba ki paidbah kin tip ïaki dak ki shin jong ka jingpang ban ai mynsiem ruh ïaki paidbah ba kim dei ban ibeiñ lane ñiewbeiñ ïa kiba ioh ïaka jingpang TB hynrei ban ai mynsiem ïaki ban dih tista ïaki dawai bad ban bam ki jingbam tei met ban lait na katei ka jingpang.
title: Angnud ban rat diengkhong ïaka jingpang TB shuwa u snem 2025

content: Khliehriat, Lber 26: Ka Ophis ka District Tuberculosis Officer, East Jaiñtia Hills District hynne ka sngi ba Ar ka la rakhe ïa ka “World Tuberculosis Day” halor ka mat “Yes! We can end TB” ha ka jingïalang ba la pynlong hapoh Khliehriat West Community Hall, Khliehriat ha ka jingïadon ryngkat lang u Deputy Commissioner ka District u A. Baranwal, IAS kum u Kongsan nalor ka District Tuberculosis Officer (DTO), Jaiñtia Hills, ka Dr. E.B.V. Laloo, District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO), East Jaiñtia Hills District, Dr. D. Shylla lem bad kiwei pat ki heh ka Tnat ka koit ka khiah, ki ASHA, nonghikai, ki khynnah skul bad kiwei kiwei.Haba aijingkren kum u Kongsan ha ka jingïalang, u Deputy Commissioner u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa ki heh ka Tnat ka koit ka khiah halor ka jingpyrshang borbah ka jong ki ban pynlong ïa kiba kum kine ki prokram hapoh ka district ka ban iarap shibun ban pynshai sha ki paidbah halor ka jingma na ka jingshah ktah ha ka jingpang TB.U Baranwal u la kdew ruh halor ka jingdonkam ban lap kham kloi ïa ka jingpang TB bad halor ka jingdonkam ban leit chekup barabor khnang ban pynlah ïa ki tnat ba dei khmih ba kin rat diengkhong ïa kane ka jingpang TB napoh ka district.Nalor kata u la kyntu ruh ïa kiba wan ïashim bynta ha ka jingialang ba kin ialap sha la ki jong kiba haïing hasem bad ki shnong ki thaw ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingpang TB namar kam dei ka jait jingpang kaba ki briew kin shu leh klet.Nalor kata u la pynpaw ruh halor ka jingdonkam ïa ka jingiashim bynta lang jong ki nongshong shnong khnang ban pynlah ïa ki tnat treikam ba dei khmih ba kin lah ban rat diengkhong ïa ka jingpang TB na ka Jylla bad ka Ri hi baroh kawei.Katba na ka laing ka District Tuberculosis Officer, Jaiñtia Hills, ka Dr. E.B.V. Laloo ha ka jingkren ka la kdew halor katei mat jong ka ‘Tuberculosis Day,’ kata kaba ong “Yes! We can end TB” da ka jingiasnohkti lang ki dkhot hapoh ka imlang sahlang ban iakhun pyrshah ïa kane ka jingpang.Nalor kata ka la ai ruh ka jingmynjur ha kaba iadei bad ka jingai jingshakri ba la tyrwa da ka Nikshay Mitras jong ka district kaba la iarap lem ha kaba iadei bad ki kam aijingiarap sha kito kiba pang TB hapoh ka district lyngba ka jingsam ia ki jingbam ba tei bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam.Kiwei pat ki bynt jong ka prokram ki kynthup halor ka jingai khusnam ïa ka shnong Shyrwang bad Tlangmoi kiba hap hapoh Saipung C&RD Block namar ka jingshah pynkup kum ki shnong kiba la lait na ka jingpang TB.
title: La rakhe ïa ka ‘World Tuberculosis Day’ ha East Jaiñtia Hills District

content: Jowai, Lber 25: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) Laskeiñ Block Circle mynta ka sngi kala leit ban ïa kynduh ïa ka Branch Manager jong ka Meghalaya Rural Bank, Mookaïaw Branch West Jaiñtia Hills District.Kane ka jingleit kynduh jong ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam u samla Khiejoit Niang uba dei ruh u President ka seng, ka long halor ka nongrim ban dawa jur na katei ka Branch ban buh noh ïaka kor ATM ha katei ka Bank khnang ba kan pynsuk ïa ki paidbah kiba donkam ban sei pisa.Shuh shuh ka seng kala ïathuh naka por sha ka por kila ïoh ka jingujor halor ka jingshem shitom jong ki paidbah kiba donkam pisa haduh 2000/- tyngka da kaba ki hap ban ap baroh shi sngi.Halor kane ka seng HITO kala ong lada long kumno kumno dei ban buh noh ïa ka ATM ha katei ka Bank, khnang ba ki paidbah kin khamsuk, ym tang kiba na katei ka shnong hynrei ïa ki shnong ba marjan jong ka thaiñ kumjuh.
title: Dawa ka HITO Laskeiñ Block Circle ban buh kor ATM ha MRB Mookaïaw Branch

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 26: Ka ophis jong u District Transportation Officer (DTO), South West Khasi Hills District ha ryngkat ki nongñiah kali ki la rakhe ïa sngi kyrpang ban tehlakam na ki jingjia takhuh kali ne ka Road and Safety Month/Week 2024 kaba ka phang ka dei, “Be a Road Safety Hero”, ba la pynlong ha ophis treikam jong u DTO, South West Khasi Hills District.Ka jingthmu jong kane ka prokram ka long ban ai jinghikai ïa ki nongñiah kali bad ki paidbah ba kin long kiba phikir ha kaba ñiah kali bad kumjuh ruh ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ki khnang ban pynduna ïa ki jingjia ba sngewsih bad ki jingjia takhuh kali.Ki nongkren kiba la ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi ki la ban jur ba haba ñiah kali la ka long ki kali kamai ne kali shimet dei ban long kiba ïa burom lem mar kylliang lyngba ka jingpyni jong ki ïa ka jinglong jem nud, long phikir bad pynduna ïa ka jingñiah stet namar da kaba leh kumta kan pyllait na shibun ki jingjia ba sngewsih.U bah S.I. Laso, Assistant Executive Engineer jong ka PWD (Roads) Mawkyrwat Division ha ka jingkren u la pynkynmaw ïa ki katto katne ki dak thoh ne ki sign ba la buh ha ki surok kum ki jingthoh ba ïa dei bad ka jingpynïaid stet ïa ka kali (Speed Limit), ki jaka bym dei ban ai horn kum ki jaka ba don hajan ki skul, jaka sumar bad jan ïingname, ki jaka ba don u speed breaker, ki jaka ba long khun ne turning bad kiwei de ba ki nongñiah kali ki dei ban bud ryntih bad ïatreilang.U bah Shangdiar, Staff Nurse napoh ka ophis u District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO), South West Khasi Hills District u la pynkynmaw ïa kiba ïa dei bad ki katto katne ki bynta lada ki don ki jingjia-takhuh kali bad don jingmynsaw jong u ne ka briew ba haba ki lada lap ïa kiba kum kine ki khep dei ban ïarap mar mar ryngkat ka jingai jingtip hapoh hapoh ka tnad ka koit ka khiah lyngba ka 108 bad kumjuh ruh sha ka tnad pulit.U bah R. Rymbai, SI Mawkyrwat Traffic Police Station u la pynkynmaw ïa ki bynta ba ki paidbah ki dei ban leh da kaba kin peit ïa kali bniah shwa ban sei ïa ka kali bad haba ki la ïaid ha surok ruh kin long kiba kohnguh bad burom ïa ki kyndon ba ka bthah kum kaba deng ïa u seat belt, ki nongñiah ar shaka ruh kin deng ïa ka jingda khlieh ne helmet jong ki la ka long u nongñiah bad uba shong hadien khhnang ban lait na ka jingmynsaw bad kiwei de ki jingbthah.U bah P.K. Muttyent, Enforcement Inspector ha ka jingkren jong u u la pynkynmaw ïa ki katto katne ki kyndon ne jingbthah bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka jingdon jong ki jingjia takhuh kali hapoh jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ha u snem 2022 ki don haduh 157 tylli bad ki jingïap pat ki don 98 tylli. “Ban lait na ki jingjia ba sngewsih, kum ki nongñiah kali ki dei ban bud pyrkhing bha ïa ki kyndon”, u la ong.U la pynkynmaw ruh ba katkum ka jinglap ha ka jinglum thup naduh u snem 2017 haduh u 2019 bun ka jingïap jong ki briew ha ki jingjia takhuh kali dei kito kiba ñiah ki ar shaka namar kim ju pyndonkam jingdakhlieh. Namarkata, u la buh ka jingkyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin long kiba husiar bad phikir bha ha kaba ïa dei bad ka rukom ñiah kali ne ki ar shaka.Ha kane sngi la donlang naduh u bah W. Makdoh, District Transportation Officer (DTO), South West Khasi Hills District kum u nongpynïaid bad uba la lamphrang ïa ki jingthmu jong ka jingïalangjingïalang bad ka kong M. Lyngdoh ka la ai ki kyntien jingkhublei.
title: Rakhe ka ophis u DTO ïa ka sngi kyrpang ban long phikir ne ïada na ka jingjia takhuh kali

content: Mawkyrwat, Lber 26: U Commissioner (Excise) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat u la pynbna ba 29 tarik u Lber, 2024 kan dei ka sngi tyrkhong kyiad ha baroh kawei ka South West Khasi Hills District kum shibynta jong ka jingrakhe ïa ka “Sngi Thohdieng ba bha ne ‘Good Friday’. Namarkata, baroh ki dukan kyiad ba kynthep ïa ki IMFL shops/Bars/Hotels/C.A. Bars/C.S. Shops bad kiba jur die madan kin khang lut ha katei ka sngi kumba la dep pynbna. Kino kino kiba ïaleh pyrshah shah pynshitom hapoh jong ka Excise Rules and Acts.
title: Pynbna sngi tyrkhong kyiad ha baroh ka South West Khasi Hills District

content: Shillong, Lber, 26: Ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la ai jingmut ïa ka Airports Authority of India (AAI) ban pynher liengsuiñ na Shillong sha Bhopal tang ha ki sngi Thohdieng bad ha ki sngi u Blei.Ka Ingbishar ka la ai jingmut, na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka ri, ka AAI ka dei ban pynthikna ba ka jingpynher liengsuiñ sha Bhopal na kiwei kiwei ki jylla kiba heh kum ka Chennai, Kerala, Kolkata, Guwahati, bad Shillong ha kine ki sngi.Kane ka jingai jingmut ka long hadien ka jingpynsngew jong ki Nongbishar kiba ju leit khah khah sha Bhopal na ka bynta ki kam ki jam jong ka National Judicial Academy. Na ka jingbym don ka liengsuiñ, ki nongbishar bad ki ophisar ki hap ban leit na Guwahati sha Delhi bad kane ka pynslem kai tang ïa ka por leit por wan. Ka ingbishar ka la kdew, naduh ba la pyntreikam ïa ki liengsuiñ barit kaba kit 96 ngut ki nongleit jingleit kaba lah ban her na Shillong sha Delhi, kam dei ban don jingeh ban pyntreikam da kine kine kijuh ki liengsuin na ki jylla baheh lyngba ka Bhopal. Ka Ingbishar ka la kdew ruh ka jingdonkam jong ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha Shillong bad ai jingmut ruh ba ka jingpynbun ïa ki liengsuiñ barit kan kyntiew ïa ki kam jngohkai pyrthei.“Ka Bhopal ka dei ka nongbah jong ka Madhya Pradesh kaba long ka pdeng jong ka ri India. Sngewsih ba kam don ka liengsuiñ kaba pynher sha Bhopal. Kum ban shu ai nuksan, manla ka taiew ki Sitting Judge bad ki Judicial Officer ki hap ban leit sha Bhopal ban ïashim bynta ha ki kam jong ka National Judicial Academy bad ki jingïalang ki ju long manla ka sngi Saitjaiñ bad ha ka sngi u Blei,” ong ka Division Bench jong u Chief Justice S. Vaidyanathan bad u Justice W. Diengdoh.Ka Ingbishr High Court ïa mynta ka la shong bishar ruh ïa ka jingujor ba ïadei bad ka jingpynheh ïa ka kad liengsuin Shillong Airport, kaba jngai tang shi kynta na nongbah Shillong. Ki nongbishar dang shen ki la leit jurip ïa ka jaka pynher liengsuiñ jong ka kad liengsuiñ Shillong Airport bad lap ba la donkam ban pynheh shuh shuh khnang ba yn dup lah ban pynher ïa ki leingsuiñ kiba heh kiba lah ban kit ïa ki nongleit jingleit ba palat 200 ngut.Ki nongbishar ki la thmu ruh ban leit jngoh ïa kiwei pat ki liengsuiñ ha Bhutan, Leh bad ha Andaman and Nicobar Islands, ban lum jingtip shuh shuh halor ka rukom pynher liengsuiñ kaba lah ban leh ruh kumjuh ïa ka Shillong airport.Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynpaw ïa ka mon ban bei ïa ka jinglut na ka bynta kane namarba ka kwah ban don ïa ka kad liengsuiñ kaba heh ha ka jylla ban khring ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei.Ka Ingbishar ka ong ba ka khmihlynti ïa ka AAI ba kan shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pan jingmynjur na ka Ministry of Civil Aviation, New Delhi bad ban ïakren ruh bad ka Sorkar Bhutan khang ba ki nongbishar kin dup lah ban leit jngoh ïa ka Paro International Airport.
title: Ai jingmut ka HC ïa ka AAI ban pynher liengsuiñ na Shillong sha Bhopal

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 26: Ka jingithuh jong ka sorkar ïa u synsar kum u mar rep, ka la long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ym tang ïa ki paitbah nongrep. Hynrei wat ïa ki nongkhaïi kiba dei ki trai jylla kiba ju shalan synsar da ki phew kali man u snem.U Bah R.Kharsyntriew uwei na ki nongkhaïi synsar na West Khasi hills haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba ha ki snem ba mynshuwa mynba ka sorkar kam pat ithuh ïa u synsar kum u mar rep, haba leit die synsar ha Shillong wat lada u kiew dor katno katno ruh ym ju kham ïohnong bun.Ka daw ka dei namar ka jinglut ha kaba siew khajna ha ki khyrdop kiba dei ki khyrdop lum khajna jong ki hima Syiem, Sirdar bad ki khyrdop lum khajna jong ka District Council ka long kaba bun bha. Teng teng tang ka jingsiew ha ki khyrdop lum khajna haduh ban da poi ha Shillong, ka la poi palat phew hajar nalor ka jinglut ha ka bai permit, namar u dei u mar khlaw nangta sa ka bai thep bad ka bai kali kam dei shuh ka jinglut kaba rit.U la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong u um lah khlem da ai khublei ïa u bah H.M.Shangpliang MLA ka Mawsynram, u ba la pynsngew sha ka sorkar ba kan ithuh noh ïa u synsar kum u mar rep, ha kaba ka sorkar ka la sngap bad ka la leh ïa kata na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paitbah nongrep.U bah Kharsyntiew u la ong ruh ba hadien ba ka sorkar ka la ithuh ïa u synsar kum u mar rep ruh, ka dang don ka jing shah khrong khajna haman la ki jaka. Hynrei dei tad hadien ba u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh u ba dei u Myntri ba peit ïa ka rep ka riang, u la shimkhia bad bthah ba kim dei shuh ban shim khajna ïa u synsar, kata naduh u bnai Naitung jong u snem 2019, ba baroh ki khyrdop lum khajna kim shym la khrong pisa shuh ïa ki kali kiba kit synsar.Kumta na ka liang jong u u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew nguh kaba khraw bad u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, na ka bynta ka jingshim khia jong u na ka bynta ki paitbah nongrep ha ka jylla.Nalor kata u la ong ba mynta u snem wat la ka ïew synsar kam da thikna bha, namar ka dor ka poi tang san phew haduh hynriew phew tyngka shi kilo, hynrei ka ma da duh nong than namar ba ka jinglut jingsep ha lynti kam don shuh kumba long mynshuwa.
title: La lait ki Nongrep synsar na ka jingshah khrong khajna, tangba ym don ïew

content: Shillong, Lber, 26: U President jong ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) Bah KP Pangniang ha ka sngi Baar ula ong ba ïa ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) la thaw hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President barim ka UDP (L) Dr Donkupar Roy bad u President barim ka HSPDP u Ardent M. Basaïawmoit, uba ïalam mynta ïa ka VPP ka party kaba thymmai ha ka jylla.“Phi dei ban kylli ïa u Bah Ardent halor ka nongrim ba la pynkha ïa ka RDA ha u snem 2017,” ong u Bah Pangniang haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U la ong, ka RDA ka kwah ban wanrah ïa ka jingïatylli hapdeng ki sengsaiñ pyrthei riewlum bad ban ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan na ki paidbah ka jylla. “Da kaba buh jingmut ïa kane, ngi la rai ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka RDA,” u la bynrap.Haba pynpaw ba ki paidbah ka jylla ruh ki shaniah ïa ka UDP bad ïa ka HSPDP, u Bah Pangniang u la ong, “baroh ar tylli ki party ki don ïa ka jingïoh vote kaba palat 3.35 lak bad ngi ngeit ba kane ka pyni shisha ba ki paidbah ki kwah ïa ngi ba ngin ïatreilang.”“Ngi kyrmen ruh ba ki paidbah kin dang ïai bteng ban kyrshan ïa ka RDA (ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha) kumba ki la leh ha u snem 2023,” ula bynrap.Shwa kane, u President ka UDP Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kiba ïatreilang hapoh ka lama jong ka RDA ki don ka jingngeit skhem ban jop na Shillong Seat.“Ngin dang ïatrei shitom shuh shuh ha ki taiew ban sa wan shwa ka sngi thep vote. Ngi long kawei bad ka HSPDP bad ngi don ha kajuh ka rynsan ha kaba ngi ïatreilang na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah bad na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ki ar tylli ki party ki ïasam ïa kajuh ka jingkitkhlieh ha ki rynsan ïalap elekshon na ka bynta u kyrtong ka RDA Bah Robert June Kharjahrin.Haba kylli, u Bah Lyngdoh u ong, ym don ba lah ban kynto ïa ka RDA ba kan sangeh noh ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon MP.“Ym don mano mano ruh ba lah ban ong ïa ngi weng noh na ka jingïakhun. Kano kano ka rai kaba ngi shim, ka dei beit na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong iwei pa iwei,” u la bynrap.
title: Ïa ka RDA la thaw da u Dr. Donkupar Roy bad u Bah Ardent; ong u Bah Pangniang

content: Shillong, Lber 26 : U Bah Process T Sawkmie, MLA barim u la pynpaw ba ka jingkob jong u President ka Voice of People Party (VPP), u bah Ardent Basaiamoit, kaba u la ong ba u la jop lypa ka dei tang ka jingphoh sniew ha ka por mynsngi.“Ka jingkob jong u president ka VPP, u bah Ardent Basaiamoit, kaba u la ong ba u la jop lypa, ka dei tang ka jingphohsniew ha ka por mynsngi,” ong u bah PT Sawkmie haba kren sha u nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.U Bah Sawkmie u la bynrap, ba ka kam ilekshon ka long kaba eh than ban ong ba la jop lypa, kumba ong u President ka VPP ha kane ka ilekshon MP kaba mynta u snem.U ong ruh, “Lada ka long kumta kam myntoi ban don ilekshon, la shu ai jop beit ïa kiba kam ba ki la jop lypa. Kumba long mynta ka ilekshon ka dang jngai palat, tang hadien saw san sngi ki paidbah ki la kylla lut, kumba long ka ilekshon MLA ba la dep ha u 2023.“Ngam ïohi ba ka VPP ka don ka vision document kaba biang ïa ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei,” ong shuh shuh u bah Sawkmie.U la ong ba ïa kane la pynshisha ha ki constituency ba ki MLA VPP ki mihkhmat.,“Namar la shi snem, ym pat sdang bad ïohi ïa ki kam pynroi (development) ha ki constituency jongki, kumta ka jingkob ban wanrah ka jingkylla ka dei tang ka ktien pynbiej paidbah namar ki jur tang ka ktien khlem ka kam. ” pynkut u bah Sawkmie.
title: Ka jingkob ka VPP ba la jop lypa, ka dei tang ka jingphohsniew : Bah PT Sawkmie

content: Shillong, Lber 26 : U kyrtong shimet na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency u Prof Lakhon Kma mynta ka Sngi Ba Ar hadien ba la thep kyrteng u la ong ba ka jingshong shngaiñ jongka ri ka don ha ka jingma na ka jingpyntreikam jongka sorkar NDA ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA).Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Prof Kma u la ong “Nga don shibun kiei kiei pyrshah halor ka CAA hynrei ka la ïoh noh ka jingmynjur ha u snem 2019 bad ïa ki kyndon aiñ la pynmih dang mynta shwa kane ka election.Ki don ar tylli kiei kiei, kaba nyngkong ka long ba kane ka aiñ kan knieh lut ïa baroh ki hok ïoh kam ïoh jam jong ki trai ri bad kiwei kiwei ruh ki jait kam. Namar la wanrah ïa kita ki mynder ri na Afghanistan, Pakistan bad Bangladesh halor kata ka nongrim ba ki shah pynshitom ha ki paid Muslim ha kitei ki ri”.“ Hynrei kaba kham ma ka long ba ngi la ïalehkai bad ka jingshong shngaiñ jongka Ri. Namar khlem pep ngin kut ha ka jingwan tuid ki mynder ri, ki lehnoh sha kne ka ri bad long ki riewshet kylla ban sa ai jingtip pat sha kiwei ki lehnoh da kaba leh mynleh kum kita ki Hindu, ki Khristan, ki Jain, Sikh lane Budhist” ong u Prof Kma. “ Nga sngew khuslai namar kane ka ri ka tlot palat ha ki kam ban bud dien bad syntiat kumta ha ka ri kaba kum ka jong ngi ha kaba ki nongsyntiat ki tlot bor bha phi la shah ba ki mynder ri kiba lah ban dei ki lehnoh bad wan rieh tngen sha kane ka ri bad kane ka la buh ïa ka ri ha ka jingma kaba khraw” ong biang u Prof Kma.Haba kylli halor ka ILP ha kane ka jylla, u Prof Kma u la ong ka donkam ban da ïa thir da ïa woh bha halor kane ka mat.“ Kane ka mat ka la dei ban jah noh lada ym dei ba ka sorkar pdeng ka ai ïa ka ILP sha ka Manipur ha u 2020 da kaba kular ruh ba wanrah ïa ngi ha ka bor ngin ai ïa phi ka ILP. Shwa katei nga thikna ym don ba pyrkhat ban ïoh ïa ka ILP hynrei mynta pat ki la ïalehkai politik da kane ka ILP.Nga tip ba ki Seng Bhalang bad ki Seng ki samla pule ki don ka hok ban dawa namar ka sorkar pdeng ka la ïalehkai politik bad ka ILP bad ngi tip shai ruh ba ïa ka ILP ym lah ban ai da ka sorkar jylla lait noh tang da ka sorkar pdeng. Nga kwah ban ong ba kane ka mat ka long kaba jwat bha bad ngim dei ban shu kynthih kyrkieh bad ong hooid ngi kwah lane ngim kwah ruh. Ngam kwah ban ai kano kano ka jingkynthoh ïa mynta namar ngi hap ban da thew da woh da bishar bniah bha khamtam ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla kaba kiwei ki jylla ki hap ban ïaid lyngba kum ka Assam haba ka leit sha ki bynta ba shathie ka Assam nangta ka Tripura. Kumta kumno yn lah ban peit bad pyntreikam ïa kane ka bynta”.U la ong namar ba ka sorkar pdeng ka la leh politik ïa ka ILP ha Manipur kumta ka la mih biang kane ka jingdawa ILP ha kane ka jylla ruh.“ Ngan ym poi sha kaba kut, hynrei ha nga hi tharai hap ban da ïa shong pyrkhat sani bha bad baroh bad lada ka long kaba ai jingmyntoi ïa ka jylla nga ruh ngan pdiang ïa kata hynrei lada kam long kumta nga pyrshah ïa kata” ong u Prof Kma.U la ther ruh ïa ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba shim kabu ïa ka kyntien Jaidbynriew. ïa kane ka kyntien la kheiñ dewthala namar la shu pyndonkam bakla ïa ka barobor. Ki kynmaw Jaidbynriew tang ynda la poi ka election MDC, MLA, MP bad hadien ba ki la jop bad poi ha ka bor phin ïohi ba kim patiaw shuh ïa kata ka Jaidbynriew bad na kata ka daw kaei kaba nga pyrshang ban ong lada nga jop ne nga rem ruh ha nga hi ka jaidbynriew ka long kaba kongsan tam.Lada phi jied ïa nga kum u MP jong phi ngan sa pyni ïa phi kaei ka jingmut jongka Jaidbynriew. Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshakri Blei ba laitluid, u Prof Kma u la ong kane ruh ka don ha ka jingma namar kane ka sorkar ba mynta ka noh tang sha kawei ka niam.“ Ngam kwah ba ka ri jong ngi kan long ka Hindi, Hindu ne Hindustan kane ka dei kawei kaba ngan ïai pyrshah jur bad kumta nga kwah ba ki paidbah kin kyndit bynriew bad phah ïa nga sha Delhi. Nga kwah ban kren ïa kane hakhmat u Modi ba ym dei ban ïalehkai bad ka Riti Synshar ka ri namar lada ïalehkai bad ka Riti Synshar ka ri phin pharia ïa ka ri lyngkhot lyngkhai. Katba ka Riti Synshar ka ri ka dang long skhem ngin long kawei ka ri kum ki nongshong shnong . Ngi ieit ïa ka ri kumba ngi ieit ïa ka Riti Synhar ka ri. Hynrei ha kata ka khyllipmat ba phin ïalehkai bad ka Riti Synshar ka ri, ngam don jingartatien ba kane ka ri kan sa pra lyngkhot lyngkhai” maham u Prof Kma.
title: Ka jingshong shngaiñ ka Ri ha ka jingma ba pyntreikam ïa ka CAA: Lakhon Kma

content: Nongpoh, Lber 26: Ka ophis u District Election Officer, Ri Bhoi District, Nongpoh u la pyntip sha baroh ki nongthep vote jong ka District shaphang ka ‘Home Voting Facility’ lane ka lad ban thep vote ha iing. Ka Election Commissioner of India (ECI) ka la pynmih ïa kane ka lad na ka bynta ki nongthep vote kiba don ïa ka card thep vote (EPIC), kiba la kynjoh ïa ka rta 85 snem shaneng bad ruh na ka bynta kito kiba don ka jingduna ha ka dkhot met 40% ha ryngkat ka Disability Certificate bad kiba la dep ithuh ha ka Electoral Roll.Ki lah ban ioh ïa kane ka lad da kaba apply lyngba ka FORM 12D bad la bthah ruh ïa baroh ki Booth Level Officer (BLO) jong ki shnong baroh ban pynpoi ïa kine ki form sha ki nongthep vote ki ba dei hok ban ioh ïa kane ka lad bad ban pynpoi pat sha ka ophis jong u District Election Officer.
title: Ka lad ban thep vote na iing ïa kiba palat 85 snem bad kiba duna dkhot met

content: Nongpoh, Lber 26: Ki nongshong dukan na Ri Bhoi kiba ju pynbiang bam man la ba don ka election jied nongmihkhmat la ka dei ka election MDC, MLA ne election MP mynta ka sngi ki la leit syndon ban kynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingshah pynduh ban shalan bam ha kane ka election MP katba ïa ka kam shalan bam la ai sha u bar jylla na Shillong katba ki trai district kiba la ju ai ka jingshakri baroh shi katta ki shah kyntait lut ha ka tender ba ki la dep thep sha ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi.Kane ka jingleit kynduh kitei ki nongshong dukan kiba ju pynbiang bam man ba don ka election ka dei hadien ba ki la bitar ba ka tender kaba ki thep ban ioh shalan bam ha kane ka election MP ki la shah kyntait bad la ioh pynban da u bar jylla na Shillong na ka bynta ban pynbiang bam ha kane ka election MP jong u snem 2024.Kum ki nongshong dukan kiba ju pynbiang bam ha ka election bapher bapher na Ri Bhoi, shwa ban leit kynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi ki la leit ruh ban jurip ïa ka Circuit House ha kaba la ai kyrpang ïa ka jaka ïa u bar jylla ha Circuit house ba un shet un tiew bad ban pynbiang ïa ka mar bam ha kane ka election MP.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, ki Longkmie kiba shong dukan bad kiba ju pynbiang beit ïa ka bam ha ka por election, ki la pynrem bad ther tyngeh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi ba u la pynduh ïa ka tender ban shalan bam ha kane ka election MP bad u la ailad pynban ïa ki bar jylla kiba wan naduh Shillong na ka bynta ban pynbiang bam ha kane ka election da kaba pynbiang ruh ïa ka jaka, ban pynbiang umbam bad kumjuh ruh ka bording iletkrik katba ha ka por ba ki shalan bam ma ki pat ki la hap ban shna ne pynbiang nadong hadong.Ki la ïathuh ruh ha ka por ba ki thep ïa ka tender na ka bynta ban ioh shong dukan ha kane ka election MP ki don tang kumba 13 ngut ki trai muluk na Ri Bhoi bad kaba sngewlyngnoh pat ka long ba la mih pynban da ka kyrteng utei u bar jylla uba la ioh lad ban shalan bam ha kane ka election MP.Ki la ong ruh ba kum ki nongshong dukan kiba la ju leh ïa kane ka kam baroh shi katta shuwa ban phah ka tender ruh ki la pynbiang lypa naduh ka GST bad ruh ban leh ïa ki test bapher bapher na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah bad ki la btah ruh ban pynbiang ïa ka jingbam ba khluit kumba la btah lyngba ka Foot Safety kaba ki la pyndep lut ïa ki kyndon bad phewse ha kaba khatduh ioh pynban da ki bar jylla kiba ym dei satia ki trai district.Kitei ki nongshong dukan ki la pynpaw ruh ba kim lah satia ban pdiang ïa kane ka jingleh u DC da kab ai daw da kumne kumtei da kaba kynnoh ruh halor ka dor ka mur bad kane baroh ka dei ka jingbym burom ïa ki trai district kiba la ai ka jingshkri ban pynbaing baroh shi katta ha ki election bapher bapher.Shuh shuh, kine ki nongshong dukan ki la dawa tyngeh na u DC ba u dei ban bhah lem ïa ki nongshong dukan bam kumba ju long man ba don ka election bad ki la dawa ruh ban siew noh ïa ka
