bai bam ba dang sahteng jong ka election MLA ba la dep ha ryngkat ka sut bad lada kam don ka jingkhein burom ïa ki nongshong dukan kiba dei na District kim banse ban ïaid da kawei ka lynti ban ïa pyrshah jur la ka long da kano kano ka lynti.Ha kawei ka bvynta, ki nongïalam ka RBYWO ki la pynpaw ba kin ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ïa kane ka jingdawa ki nongshong dukan ba ki dei ban ioh ïa ka hok ban ioh buh dukan bam kumba ju long ha ki phew snem mynshwa bad ruh ban pynduh noh ïa ka tender ba la dep ai sha u bar jylla ba na nongbah Shillong lym kumta na ka lïang ka seng ruh kam banse ban leh da kaba tyngeh.
title: Kynduh ki nongshong dukan ïa u DC ka Ri Bhoi naba ym ioh pynbiang bam ha ka election MP

content: Shillong, Lber 26: Ka North Eastern Hill University Students’ Union (NEHUSU) ka pynrem jur ïa ki briew jong ka RSS bad ABVP ha ryngkat ka jingkynnoh ba ki la thombor ïa u Vice President ka NEHUSU u Samla Easterson Sohtun haka 25 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka kyrwoh na u secretary ka NEHUSU u samla B Riang ka kdew ba haka por 12:15- 12:45 nohphai sngi ki katto katne ki dkhot ka ABVP bad RSS ki la rung ha phyllaw ka skulbah NEHU da ka ba kam ban lehkmen Holi ban wanrah ka jingïasngew pher jaidbynriew da ka jinglehkmen Holi.“Ngi dawa na ki bor pynïaid ka NEHU ban pynshai mano ba ai jingbit ïa ki (ABVP bad RSS) ban rung sha phyllaw ka Skulbah. Hadien ba u Vice President ula ïohi ïa kane ka jinglehkmen holi haka por ba u dang leit ïaid lynti ula khot ïa ki nongpahara ban bthah ïa ki samla pule na bar ban mih noh na phyllaw namar ka lah ban wanrah ka jingbym sngew shngaiñ ïa ki samla khynthei kiba lehkmen Holi. Hynrei ha kane ka jingleit kyrpad u vice president ula ngat haka jingshah shoh haki dkhot ka RSS bad ABVP” la ong u samla B Riang.U samla B Riang ula ïathuh ba ha NEHU la ju rakhe ïa ki jait jinglehkmen kum ka Christmas,Eid, Holi man u snem hynrei ka long kaei kaei sngewsih ba ki kynhun kum ka RSS bad ABVP ki pyrshang ban wanrah ka jingïasngew pher jaidbynriew ka ban ktah ïa ka suk ka saiñ hapoh ka skulbah.“Ngi naka NEHUSU ngi kyntu ïa ki bor pynïaid ka skulbah ban shim ki sienjam ba tyngeh ïa kino kino kiba shah ïa ki dkhot ka RSS bad ABVP ban rung shapoh ka phyllaw bad kyntu ruh ïa ki bor Pulit ban kem ïa kiba donkti” ula ong.Ka NEHUSU ka kyntu ruh ïa ki samla Pule ka NEHU ban long kiba peitngor ban nym ngop ha ki kynhun kiba pyrshang ban wanrah ka jingïasngew jaidbynriew da ka jingïa ktah kti.
title: Pynshitom ïa kiba ailad ban rung ka ABVP bad RSS ha NEHU Campus; dawa ka NEHUSU

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 26: Ka West Khasi Hills District Boxing Association ka phah ïa u kyrwoh sngew lem sha ki ba haïing hasem jong u samla (L) Dajiedlang Mawsor, u ba dei u khlur ïa kura ba paw jong ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills bad jong ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Ka WKHBA ka dap da ka jingsngewsih kthang ïa ka jingduh noh ïa u khlur ïa kura jong ka thaiñ, u ba la wanrah ïa ka nam ka burom ïa ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills District lyngba ki lympung jingïakop ïa kura ha ka jylla kum ha ka 3rd Meghalaya game 2019-2020 kaba la dep pynlong ha Shillong.Kumban pynkynmaw ba ha katei ka jingïakop u (L) Dajiedlang Mawsor, u la khur ha ka kyrdan kaba lai (bronze medal) bad kane kadei ka jingsah jingkynmaw ha ki jingïathuh khana bad ha ka pateng ka ban wan jong ka kynhun, ha kaba utei u samla u la wanrah nam wanrah burom.Ka WKHBA ka phah ka khubor sngew lem sha kiba haïing hasem u (L) Dajiedlang Mawsor ha ka jingkhlad ba kyndit jong utei u khun dap shynrang. Ai ba ka mynsiem ba kordor jong kan shong jahthait ha ka jingsuk. To ai u Blei nongbuh nongthaw un pyntngen ïa ka ïing ka sem baroh kawei, pynkut ka kyrwoh sngewlem na u samla D.Sun President WKHBA.
title: Khlad kyndit u nongïakura ba pawnam na West Khasi Hills

content: Shillong, Lber, 26: U Kyrtong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Dr Ricky AJ Syngkon ha ka sngi Baar u la kyntait war ba ka party ka dei kaba pyrshah ïa ka ktien Hindi.“Ngim pat ju pyrshah ïa ka jingkren Hindi. Kane ka jingkynnoh ka dei tang ka buit saiñpyrthei da kiwei pat ki seng saiñpyrthei bad ngi pynrem jur kum ïa kine ki jingkynnoh,” ong u Dr. Syngkon haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien baladep thep kyrteng na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka VPP ka ieng ruh na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong bym dei riewlum kiba dei ki nongshong shnong bapura ka Meghalaya, u Dr. Syngkon u la ong, ba u don ka jingsngew skhem ba kine ki nongshong shnong ka jylla kin kyrshan ïa ka party ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha.“Ngi burom ïa ka jingnoh synniang jong kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew ki bym dei ki Khsi kiba la noh synniang shikatdei eh sha ka Jylla bad ki donkam ruh ka jingïada bad ka party kan pynthikna ruh ba yn ïada ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki bad ha kajuh ka por ngi hap ban ïada ïa ka Jylla na ki briew kiba leh beaiñ, na ki briew kiba wan rung beaiñ. Kum ka party ngi sngewkhia wat halor ki hok jong ki briew ki bym dei ki Khasi,” u la ong.Haba pynpaw ba u don ka thong ban jop ha ka elekshon, u Dr. Syngkon u la ong ba ka party ka la pynkhreh bha ban ïakhun ha ka elekshon. Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka party ka la leit sha baroh ki 36 tylli ki constituency ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.“Ma nga bad ka party ngin don ka jingkyrmen ban jop ïa ka elekshon namarba kat shaba ngi leit ngi ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan kaba khlaiñ na ki paidbah bad ngi don ruh ka jingshaniah ha ki paidbah jong ki 36 tylli ki Constituency,” u la ong.U la kyntiat ruh ba ka party ka shim kabu ïa ka jaidbynriew. “Ngim pat ju ong ïa kata, hynrei haba ngi leit sha u paidbah ngi kren kumno ban wanrah ïa ka synshar ka khadar kaba khuid ha ka jylla bad ban pynthikna ba ka hok kan ieng rasong, ban weng ïa ka jingduk jingkyrduh bad ki ishu kiba ngi ju ïakren nalor kaba ïada ïa ka hok jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla,” u la ong shuh shuh.U Dr. Syngkon u la ong ba ka rai jong ka BJP ban kyrshan ïa ka NPP ka la pynpaw ïa ka dur ba shisha jong ki ar tylli ki party hynrei ki ieh pat ha ka jingstad jong ki paidbah ban shim ïa ka rai halor kane.
title: Kyntait u Dr. Ricky AJ. Syngkon ba ka VPP ka dei kaba pyrshah ïa ka ktien Hindi

content: Shillong, Lber, 26: Ki Pulit ka Rani Border Outpost ha ka sngi Baar ha ka por kumba 9:30 mynstep ki la ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki runar kiba kieng atiar hajan ka shnong Ranibari.Tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, u In-Charge jong ka Rani Border Outpost ryngkat ki nongtrei jong u mar mar ki la leit kthong ïa kine ki runar. Tang shu ïohi ïa ki Pulit, ki runar ki la synreit kuli hynrei na ka liang jong ki Pulit kim shym la pynphai kylla namarba ki don ki khynnah bad ki kynthei hajan kane ka khlaw.Ha ka jingbeh thong, ki Pulit ki la ïohkem ïa ki arngut ki runar kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Ajit Rabha uba la 18 snem ka rta bad ka Kavita Rabha kaba la 18 snem ka rta.Ha ka jingtohkit, kine ki arngut ki la phla ba ki dei kiba ju donkti ha ki kam runar ba la pyntbit bha ïalade ha ka kam tuh kam thiem, kynthup ruh ban ot tuh ïa ki Dieng Sal, ban tuh ïa ki thuk thuk ar shaka bad ban tuh ïa u kwai na ki bri ki bsah. Nalor kata, ki Pulit ki la lap ksai ruh ba u nongïalam jong kane ka kynhun ki runar u dei u Panah jong u Ajit Rabha, ïa uba la tip kyrteng kum u Rudra Rabha.Ki Pulit ki la ïoh ban kurup ruh ïa kawei ka suloi SBML bad u gunpowder ha ka jingkhynra ïa ka ingsah jong u Ajit Rabha.Ki Pulit jong ka Ri-Bhoi haduh mynta ki dang pynlong ka jingkhynra ha kane ka khlaw hajan ka shnong Ranibari ban ïohkem ïa ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun ki mentuh.Ka khubor ba la ïohlum na ki Pulit la ong ruh ba ha ka jingleit khynra bad buddien ïa kitei ki runar la ioh ruh ban pynpulom ïa ka jaka rieh tngen jong ki bad la ioh ruh ban kurup ïa kawei ka Motor Bike.Shuh shuh, u Superintendeng of Police ka Ri Bhoi Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la ïathuh ruh ba ka jingtohkit bad ka jingbuddien halor kane ka kam beaiñ ka dang ïaid shaphrang bad na ka liang ki Pulit ki la dep ruh ban register case ïa kitei ki runar ha Khanapara Police station ban leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: Hadien ba ïasiat ïoh kem ki pulit 2 ki snar nongtuh ba dang 18 snem kynthup ka kynthei ha Ranibari

content: Shillong, Lber, 26: U kyrtong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) Bah Robertjune Kharjarin ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba dei tang ki seng saiñ pyrthei riewlum kiba lah ban kren ïa ki mat ki jura jong ki paidbah jong ka jylla ha ka rukom kaba dei.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ladep thep kyrteng u Bah Kharjahrin u la ong ba un sa kren ïa ka mat ba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit, ka jingpynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi-Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India, ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahara ha shilynter ka khappud India-Bangla bad ha khappud ka Meghalaya-Assam bad kiwei kiwei de ki mat kiba hakhmat eh jong ka jaidbynriew.U Bah Kharjarin u la ong ba ka UDP kaba la ïatreilang bad ka Hill State People Democratic Party ka la ïoh bun ka vote ha ka elekshon Lok sabha ba ladep ha rilum Khasi. U la pynkynmaw bad pynpaw ruh ka jingkyrmen ba kane kan urlong biang mynta ka kynti khnang ba un ïoh ïa ka jingjop.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshim rai jong ka BJP ban kyrshan ïa ka NPP, u Bah Kharjahrin u la ong, “ngin kren beit da kaba shai, ki la ïatreilang ha Parliament la bun snem, ki la kyrshan lang ïa ka CAB, ki la leh lang bun ki kam, bad ngam sngew phylla ruh ba kin don ka jingïatreilang. Ai ba ki paidbah kin sa shim rai halor kata.
title: Tang ki party riewlum kiba kren ïa ki mat ki jura ki paidbah ka jylla : Robertjune

content: Shillong, Lber, 26: U Bah Vincent H. Pala uba long u nongïalam jong ka seng Congress bad uba dei ruh u sitting MP ka Shillong Seat ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba ka BJP kan ym jop palat ïa ka 200 Seat ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long.U la kynnoh, lada ka BJP ka ïoh 370 Seat, kan pynkylla ïa ka Riti Synshar jong ka ri da kaba weng noh ïa ka kyntien ‘secularism’ khnang ban pynurlong ïa ka jingphohsniew ban pynlong ri Hindu ïa ka India.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ladep thep kyrteng, u Bah Pala u la ong, “kumba ka long mynta, ki (BJP) khlem pynbna ïa ka thup kyrteng basaw. Balei? Namarba bun ki jingïashrut hapoh ka party. Namarkata, ban ong ba kin jop palat 200 Seats ka long kum u dak jingkylli uba heh na ka bynta jong namarba kim don kyrtong ha ki jylla kum ha Meghalaya bad ha North East. Kumno phin khmihlynti ba kin jop? Ka dei tang ka buit ban pynbiej ïa ki paidbah.”U la ong ba ka BJP ka ïoh 303 ngut ki MP ha ka elekshon ba ladep bad mynta ka kynti ka BJP kan hiar bha ha Maharashtra, Karnataka, Delhi, Bihar, Punjab, UP, Himachal Pradesh bad ha kiwei kiwei ki jylla. U la ong, “ha South India, palat 130 ngut ki MP bad mynta ka kynti, ka Congress kan ïoh kham bun ki Seat (na South).”Haba pynpaw ba ka jingbuh thong jong ka BJP ban jop haduh 400 Seat ka dei tang ka jingpyrta ban ai dak ïa ki paidbah ka ri India, u Bah Pala u la ong, “ngi don 540 ngut ki MP. Ban pynkylla ïa ka riti synshar jong ka ri India ka BJP ka donkam 362 ngut haduh 370 ngut, na kata ka daw ki pynbna 370. Hato ki thmu aiu da kaba ong 370, 370 ki la aidak lypa ban maham ïa ki paidbah ka ri India lada ngi ïoh 370, kin pynkylla ïa ka riti synshar jong ka ri? Ka kyntien “secularism” kin weng na ka riti synshar jong ka ri India.Lada la weng ïa ka kyntien “secularism” na ka riti synshar kan long kum ka Pakistan. Ka Pakistan ka dei ka ri Muslim, ka Bangladesh ka dei ka ri Muslim, ka Iran ka dei ka ri Muslim, ngin sa long kum ka Pakistan, kino kino kiba ngeit ha kiwei kiwei ki jait niam kan long beaiñ. Kane ka dei ka jingthmu jong ka jingpyrta 370-400. Ki tip ba kin ym ïoh hynrei ki shu kwah tang ban pynpaw pyrthei, kin leh beit ïa kane, kin pynkylla ïa ka India sha ka ri Hindu bad kane ka dei ka jingphohsniew jong ka BJP, la ong shuh shuh u Bah Pala.“Nga la thikna ba bun na phi ki dei ki Hindu, bun na ki paralok jong ngi ki dei ki Hindu bad ngi kwah ai ka ri kaba shongsuk shongsaiñ, ngi kwah ïa ka ri kaba lait na ki jingshah thombor, ngi kwah ïa ka ri kaba lait na ki jingeh kumba la mad da ka Pakistan, Bangladesh bad kiwei kiwei,” u la bynrap.Haba kynnoh ba ka jingïashrut hapoh ka BJP kan jur bha ha kane ka kynti u Bah Pala u la ong, “ki diaw mynsiem mynta ka kynti. Phi ïohi ba bun na ki MP ba la kham rangbah, ki shah pynduh tiket bad wat ïa kiba bun ki MLA ruh kim ailad satia. Lada phi peit ha Maharashtra, ha Madhya Pradesh bad Rajasthan, phin ïohi ba ïa ki nongïalam ba la rangbah ki la shah bret shabar, ki wanrah da ki nongïalam ba thymmai.”Haba kynthoh ruh ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u Bah Pala u la ong, “sa kawei pat kaba kham kongsan ka dei kaba jarjar, phi tip lada ngi tei ïa ka Ingmane, uno uno u rangbah niam u hap ban pynkyntang hynrei mynta u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri India tang ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ka Ram Mandir ha ka jaka ban ailad ïa ki Sadhu ba kin leh ïa ka kamram, ki politishian ki leh ïa ka kam jong ki. Ka jingthylli hapdeng ki Hindu, ka jingthylli hapdeng ka BJP bad kito ki briew kiba dei ban leh ïa ka kamram ka la nang ïa jngai. Ka BJP haba peit na ka liang ka niam, ki la leh bakla, na ka liang ka saiñpyrthei ki la leh bakla bad kin ym ïoh hi ruh wat 200 seat.”Da kaba pynpaw ban dang jop na Shillong seat, u Bah Pala u la ïathuh ïa ki jingjop jong ka Congress ha ki 15 snem ba la leit noh. U la ong ba ki don bun ki jingdonkam ba dang dei ban leh khamtam ha Meghalaya kaba dang donkam ïa ka kad liengsuin ba thymmai.“Ka Congress ka la lehbha ha ka liang ka pule ka puthi, ka jingpynïasoh ïa ki surok, ka khaii ka pateng, ka jingsam marbiang ïa ka ïoh ka kot. Ka polisi ba ka Congress ka la leh mynshwa, bad ka polisi jong ka sorkar ba mynta ki ïapher baklybak.“Nga dei tang ma nga u MP, uba la shah pynwit ha ka BJP bad kiwei kiwei ki MP la ka long ha Assam, ha Arunachal Pradesh, bun kiba la leit noh ruh balei namarba ki la shah pynbiej ne shah byrngem, ki la phah tynruh ïa nga da ka ED, ka IT ruh kumjuh hynrei nga shaniah bad nga ieid ïa ki paidbah ka Meghalaya. Nga don mynta hangne na ka bynta ki paidbah bad ki paidbah hi kin shaniah bad kin ai vote ïa nga,” u la ong.
title: Ka BJP kan ym jop palat 200 seat ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha, kam u Bah Vincent Pala

content: Shillong, Rymphang 26 : Mynta ka sngi ka Agatha Sangma bad u Saleng Sangma ki la leit ban thep kyrteng na ka bynta ban ïa khun ïa kane ka election MP Lok Sabha 2024 ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong.Ka Agatha kaba dei ruh ka MP jongka NPP ka la leit ban thep kyrteng hapoh ka jingsynran lang u hymmen jongka uba dei ruh u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla bad u Natinal President ka NPP u Conrad K Sangma, U President ka NPP ha kane ka jylla bad Myntri ka tnad kam pohïing ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong, kiwei kiwei ki myntri sorkar, u Symbud Lamphang ka jylla u Timothy D Shira, ka kmie, u hymmen u James P.K Sangma, bad ki paid nongkyrshan.U Saleng pat uba thep kum u kyrtong ka Congress la ïohi ba la synran ïa u da ki nongïalam ka Congress ha ri lum Garo, kiba haïing hasem lem bad ki paid nongkyrshan.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ka Agatha ka la ong “ Nga don ka jingkyrmen ban jop ïa ka election namar ki paidbah ki la ïohi ïa ka jingsynshar jongka NPP ha kine ki hynriew snem ba ka la wanrah ïa ka roi ka par hapoh ka jylla bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka jingshong suk shongsaiñ bad da kane hi nga sngewthikna ba ki paidbah kin ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ïa nga namar ki paidbah ki ieit bad pdiang ïa ka NPP kum ka party jongki ”.
title: Ha ki 6 snem ka NPP ka la wanrah ïa ka roi ka par hapohka jylla : Agatha

content: Shillong, Lber 27: Ka kynhun ki khynnah ïalehkai na ki synjuk (Association) bapher bapher hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Pynshai Mawrie u ba dei u dkhot jong ka Meghalaya School of Martial Arts, ki la wan shakhmat ban ïakynduh ïa ki lad pathai khubor hynne ka nohphaisngi jong ka Sngi Balang, ban kren ïa ki mat ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar ban sam ïa ki khusnam pisa sha ki samla ïalehkai kiba la jop takma ha ki rynsan ïakop bapher bapher na bynta u snem 2022-23.Haba ïakren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang jong u Bah Pynshai u la ïathuh ba kitei ki samla ïalehkai ki bym pat shym la ïohpdiang ïa ka song khusnam ki dei kiba mihkhmat ha ka kick boxing, muthai, arm wrestling, Jeet Kune Do bad kiwei kiwei, da kaba bynrap ba ka jingpynslem jong ka sorkar ban pyllait ïa ka khusnam pisa kan khanglad bad pynduh mynsiem ruh ïa ki khynnah ban dang leit ïashimbynta ha ki rynsan ïakop shabar.“Ka jingpynsah ban pyllait ïa ka song khusnam ka long ka jingduhnong ïa ki khynnah naba bun ki khynnah ïalehkai ki wan na ka longïing kiba duna ha ka ïoh ka kot bad lada khlem ki lad jingïarap kan long ka jingeh ïa ki ba kin leit ïashimbynta ha ki lympung shabar,” la ong u Bah Pynshai.Nalor kane, u Bah Pynshai u la kyntu ruh ïa ka tnat ïalehkai ba ka dei ban bhah mar katjuh ka song khusnam ïa baroh ki kyrdan, la ka dei ha ka Junior, Sub-Junior bad kiwei kiwei namar ka jinglut hi ka long mar katjuh ïa ki khynnah ne ïa kiba rangbah lada ki leit ïashimbynta shabar.Barabor kumba long ha ki snem ba ladep, ha ka National Level jong ki Seior ka tnat ïalehkai jong ka Sorkar Jylla Meghalaya ka la bhah 60 hajar na bynta ki khynnah ba khur takma ksiar, 45 hajar-takma rupa bad 30 hajar kiba jop takma rnong, bad ka dang duna haba nujor bad ki Junior, sub- Junior bad kumta ter ter.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingpynsah teng jong ka tnat Sports ban pyllait ïa ka khusnam pisa kaba la ïaid mynta la shi snem, na ka liang jong ka kynhun ka la ïoh ban leit ïakynduh ïa ka Director jong ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs ka Sorkar jylla kaba la jubab ba ïa kane ka khusnam pisa na ka liang jong ka Sorkar ka dang pynkhreh ban pyllait bad sam noh sha ki.Shuh shuh, u Bah Pynshai u la pynpaw ba ki don ki synjuk kiba shah tharai sniew ruh wat ha ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah ïalehkai namar ka jingbymlong ryntih ban bynta khusnam pisa sha ki khynnah ïalehkai.“Wat hapdeng ki khynnah ba mih madan ha kajuh ka rynsan ïalehkai….ki don kiba ïoh ki don ruh ki bym ïoh kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingtharai sniew wat ha ki kmie ki kpa ïa ki nongïalam jong ki synjuk bapher bapher,” la bynrap u Bah Pynshai.
title: Bynñiaw ki khynnah ïalehkai ka jylla ba pynslem ka Sorkar ban pyllait ïa ka khusnam pisa

content: Laitdom, Mairang: U MLA jong ka Mawlai, u Bah Brighstarwell Marbañiang haba kren ha ka jingïalang ïalap elekshon ha Laitdom, kaba hap ha Mairang Constituency, u la ong ba borabor la ju ïoh sngew ba ki nongïalam na ki Nationalk Party ne ki Seng na rithor, kiba ju beiñ ïa ki Seng Riewlum ba ki kut tang ha Khanapara, hynrei da ka jingmih ka VPP ban pyrshah ïa ka jingkren Hindi jong u Lat ha Assembly, kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka ri India ki la tip lut ïa ki Seng Riewlum, khamtam ïa ka VPP.U Bah Bright, ula ong ba ha ka Workshop jong ki MLA ka ri India kaba la long ha Mumbai, haba u la ïakynduh ïa ki MLA na ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi bad ïa ki MLA na South India, kiba bun ki la kylli shaphang ka Seng VPP kaba la ïeng pyshah ïa ka jingkren Hindi u Lat.Mynta ba ki National Party ki kren beiñ ba ki Seng Riewlum kut tang ha Khanapara, ka VPP ryngkat ka jingkyrshan jong u paidbah kan pynkut noh pat ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki tang ha Khanapara. “Ngin synshar dalade ïalade ïa la ka jong ka jylla”, u la ong.Shuh shuh u MLA ka Mawlai, u la ong ba da ka jingkyshan ka BJP ïa ka NPP ki paidbah ki la ïohi shai ïa ka dur ba shisha jong ka NPP kaba dei tang ka dur bula jong ka BJP. Nakata daw ka ki paidbah kidei ban long kiba sian bad kiba bishar bha, ïoh ba ka ri ka shah tyllep ha ki mynder lyngba kine ki dur bula. U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ym tang ka NPP kaba dei ka dur bula, hynrei kiwei pat ki Seng Riewlum kum ka UDP bad ka HSPDP ruh kidei lang ki dur bula ka BJP namar ba ki ïatreilang ha ka sorkar MDA I bad ka MDA II. “Lada phi kwah ban ïoh ïa ka Seng Riewlum kaba nylla jied beit ïa ka VPP kaba dang khuid dang thymmai bad ym pat ïakyrsum badno badno ruh”, u la ong.
title: Phi beiñ ba ngi kut tang ha Khanapara, ngi ruh ngin pynkut ïa ki National Party tang ha Khanapara: Bright

content: Shillong, Lber, 26: San ngut ki kyrtong kiba aireng ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Seat ki la thep kyrteng ha ka sngi Baar.Kine ki saw ngut ki long u Sitting MP ka Shillong Seat u Bah Vincent H. Pala na ka Congress, u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin uba ïakhun kum u kyrtong monlang ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA), u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka VPP bad u Prof. Lakhon Kma uba ïakhun kum u Kyrtong Shimet.Kan long ruh ka kynti kaba u Bah Vincent H. Pala un ïakhun ban shah jied biang kum u MP ka Shillong Seat hadien ba u la mihkhmat la lai samoi kynthih naduh u snem 2009.Haduh mynta, ka jingthep kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ha Shillong Seat ka la kynjoh haduh san ngut kynthup ïa ka kyrtong ka NPP ka Dr. Amparen Lyngdoh kaba la thep kyrteng ha ka taiew baladep.Ha ki kynta ba kitei ki saw ngut ki kyrtong ki la thep kyrteng la sakhi ba kim shym la wan ïalam satia ïa ki nongkyrshan kumba ju long ha ki snem baladep namarba ka wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur ha nongbah Shillong.Ïa u Bah Pala la synran lang da ki nongïalam ba hakhmat ka Party kynthup ruh ki nongïalam jong ka Mahila Congress. Ïa u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin la synran lang da u President ka UDP Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, President ka HSPDP Bah KP Pangniang, ki MLA ka UDP bad katto katne ngut ki nongïalam bahakhmat.Ïa u Dr. Ricky la synran da ki MLA ka party ba kynthup ïa u Bah Adelbert Nongrum, Bah Brighstarwell Marbaniang, Bah Heavingstone Kharpran bad katto katne ngut ki nongïalam, katba ïa u Prof. Lakhon Kma la synran da ki nongkyrshan bad ki bahaing hasem.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Returning Officer ka Shillong Seat, ka Seng Congress ka la phah thep kyrteng ruh u Bah Manuel Badwar kum u Stand-by Candidate.
title: Thep kyrteng u Bah Pala, Dr. Ricky, Prof. Kma bad u Bah Robert June

content: Mairang, Lber, 27: Ka jingïohpang jong kawei ka longïing na ka shnong Riangmang, Eastern West Khasi Hills District hadien ba ki la bam ïa ka doh sniang ba ki la thied na uwei u nongdie doh uba ju die doh hapoh shnong ka la pynlong ïa ka shnong Riangmang ba kan tait shnong ïa une u nongdie doh hadien ba ka Dorbar ka la rai pynrem ïa u kum u nong aibih.Katkum ka jingïathuh u Bah Khotkupar Lyngdoh Nongum ha ka jingïakynduh bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien khyndiat kynta ba u la ujor da ka ejahar ha ka ophis u Superintendent of Police ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District pyrshah ïa ka shnong Riangmang, u la ong, ba ka jingïohpang jong ki briew kiba bam ïa ka doh ba u die ka dei naduh ka 28 tarik, Rymphang 2024 bad hadien ka jingkem pang ki la leit shim dawai na Mairang bad ki doktor ki la ïathuh ba ka jingpang ka dei na ka bam hynrei kine ki briew hadien kata ki leit shim dawai sa na u kobiraij.U Bah Khotkupar ula ïathuh ba ha ka jingleit ïa kynduh ïa ki, kine ki briew kim shym la kynnoh ba u dei uba ai bih hynrei kyndit kynsan ha ka 22 tarik u Lber 2024 ka shnong Riangmang ka la tait shnong ïa u.U Bah Khotkupar u la ong ruh ba u shaniah ha ki bor jong ka aiñ ba kan ai ïa ka jingbishar kaba hok namarba u khlem leh kumba u la shah pharep ha ka shnong Riangmang ba u dei u nong aibih, u nong ai ksuid bad kiwei kiwei ki jingshah kynnoh.
title: Tait shnong ka Riangmang ïa u nongdie doh sniang ba shah kynnoh ai bih

content: Shillong, Lber, 27: U MLA jong ka North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka sngi Baar u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba khmih ïa ka tnat Pynroi Sor Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar bad sha u Myntri ka tnat PHE u Marcuise N. Marak da ka jingkyrpad ba kin wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban weng ïa ka jingkyrduh um ha ki shnong kiba dang hap hapoh ka North Shillong Constituency.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha ki arngut ki Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla, u Bah Nongrum u la ïathuh ba kum u Nongmihkhmat paidbah u la ïoh ka jingujor na ka Dorbar Shnong Jaïaw Pyllun, ka Riatsamthiah, Wahingdoh bad na kiwei kiwei de ki shnong kiba la mad ïa ka jingkyrduh um ha kane ki sngi.“Nga kyrpad ïa ka tnat PHE bad ïa ka tnat Urban Affairs ba kin ïatreilang khnang ba ki paidbah nongshnong kin ym mad ïa ki jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyrduh ka umbam umdih ha kum kane ka aiom ba rang tyrkhong ka bneng,” u la ong.U la kyntu ruh ba kin phah ïa ki nongtrei ban wad ïa ka daw tynrai halor ka jingkyrduh um bad ong ruh ba ki don ki jaka ba ka um ka shu shlei kai katba ki don pat ki jaka kiba mih duna bha ka um bad mad ruh ïa ka jingtyrkhong.
title: Jur ka jingkyrduh um ha North Shillong, pynsngew u MLA sha ka Sorkar Jylla

content: Shillong, Lber 27 : Ki la don baroh hynriew ngut ki kyrtong kiba thep kyrteng na Shillong Parliamentary seat bad saw ngut na Tura seat na bynta ka elekshon MP kaban long ha ka 19tarik Ïaiong mynta u snem hadien ba ka jingthep kyrteng ka la kut noh ha kane ka sngi Balang, ka 27tarik Lber.Haba phai sha ka Shillong seat ym shym la don shuh kiba thep kyrteng ha kane ka sngi khatduh katba na Tura pat dei u MLA barim ka TMC u Zenith Sangma uba la pyndep ïa ka jingthep kyrteng ha kane ka sngi ba khatduh.Kumba ka long hi, na Shillong kiba mih ban thep kyrteng ki kynthup ïa u MP ba mynta ba dei ruh u kyrtong ka Congress Bah Vincent H Pala, nangta kyrtong ka NPP ba dei ruh ka Myntri Sorkar Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, kyrtong ka RDA Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin bad u kyrtong ka VPP Dr. Ricky J Syngkon.Nalor kine la don ruh arngut ki kyrtong shimet kata u Bah Peter Shallam bad u Prof Lakhon Kma.Ha Tura pat kiba thep kyrteng ki kynthup ïa ka MP ba mynta bad kyrtong ka NPP ka Agatha Sangma, nangta u kyrtong ka Congress u Saleng A Sangma, kyrtong ka TMC u Zenith Sangma bad ruh u kyrtong shimet u Laben Ch Marak.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne ba ka jingbishar bniah ïa ki kot ki sla jong ki kyrtong kan long ha kane ka sngi Palei, ka 28tarik u Lber, 2024.Ka tarik ba ki kyrtong ki lah ban weng kyrteng noh ïalade na ka jingïakhun kan dei ha ka 30tarik Lber, 2024.Lah ruh ban kdew ba ka Meghalaya kaba hap lang ha ka Phase – 1 kan thep vote ha ka 19tarik Ïaiong mynta u snem katba ka jingniew vote pat kan long ha ka 04 tarik u Jylliew, 2024.
title: Poi 6 ngut ban aireng ha Shillong seat bad 4 ngut ha Tura seat

content: Shillong, Lber, 27: Ar tylli ki metiap jong bar jylla la lap ha ka sngi Balang ha ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda kaba hap hapoh ka Shella Police Station, East Khasi Hills District.Kane ka la jia ryngkat ha kane ka sngi ba ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) bad kiwei ki seng bhalang katei ka thain ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha ka por mynsngi ban pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rule, 2024.La suba ba ki runar ki la shim kabu ha kane kajuh ka sngi ban dkhat jubor ka jingim jong ki arngut ki bar jylla.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi, ki arngut ki bar jylla ba la suba shah pynïap ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Esan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta. Ïa ka met ïap jong kine ki arngut la lap na ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda.U SP u la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad ïa ka Post -mortem ym pat leh satia.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ka Sohra bad Shella bad kynthup ruh ki Pulit na Shillong ki la hiar sha ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda kiba don ha khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahara bad ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.Kumba ka long mynta, ka jinglong jingman ha ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda ka la pynsyier mynsiem ïa ki nongshong shnong khamtam ïa ki bar jylla.Namar ka jingdon jong ka elekshon Lok Sabha, ki bor synshar ka Sohra Civil Sub-division ki lah ban pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ban tem ïa kino ki jingïakulmar bad ban pyrkhing ïa ka leit ka wan, ka jingïalum briew shi jaka bad ka jingrah ïa ki tiar pynmynsaw.Shuh shuh na ka liang ka Tnad Pulit ka jylla , ka la phah ïa ki kali Bullet Proof jong ki Special Operation Team (SOT) lem bad ka kynhun Crime Scene Unit sha Ichamati, Shella, ban ïarap ïa ki Pulit na Shella Police Station ha ka ban tehlakam ïa ka jinglong jingman hapoh ka thaiñ.Ka jinglong jingman ha Ichamati kala shongsyier bha bad ka jingïaumsnam ka lah ban khie ha kane ka thaiñ hadien ka jingshah bom iap kitei ki arngut ki bar jylla hynne ka janmiet.Ka jingbthah kala mih na ka Tnad Pulit sha u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills, ba un hukum ïa baroh ki field unit ba kin pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingïaid pahara da ka kjat bad kali ruh khamtam mynta ka miet kumjuh ban pyni ïa ka jingdon ki Pulit ha katei ka thaiñ.La bthah ruh ba ki Pulit ki dei ban rah lang ïa ki riot gear, tyndong lyer pynsat khmat, ki lathi, ki shield bad kiwei kiwei bad ban leh tyngeh ïa ki nongpynkular shnong namar kane ka jingjia, ka lah ban lam sha ka jingiaumsnam pher Jaidbynriew.Kane ka jingbthah na ka Tnad kala kren ruh ïa ka jingdonkam ban pynlong ia ka jingïalang wanrah jingsuk lashai ka sngi ha Ichamati.
title: Lap ar tylli ki metïap bar jylla ha Ichamati, jia ryngkhat ha ka sngi pyrshah CAA ka KSU

content: Shillong, Lber, 27: Khnang ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha khapud jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam namar ka jingdon jong ka Elekshon Lok Sabha, u Chief Secretary ka Jylla Bah Donald P. Wahlang, ha ka sngi Balang u la lum ka jingïalang bad u Additional Chief Secretary ka tnat Home (Police) Dr. Shakil P. Ahammed, u Director General of Police Dr. Lajja Ram Bishnoi, u Commissioner and Secretary, ka tnat ERTS Sanjay Goyal, u Chief Electoral Officer Dr. B.D.R. Tiwari, bad ïa ki ophisar jong ka tnat Election, u Secretary ka tnat Home (Police), u Inspector General (IG) ka Frontier Headquarters, BSF Meghalaya bad ïa ki State Police Nodal Officer ba kynthup ïa u M.K. Singh.Ha kane ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Main Secretariat, Shillong, u Chief Secretary u la pan jingtip halor ki jinglong jingman ha khappud shwa ban wan ka elekshon Lok Sabha.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Joint Chief Electoral Officer ka Sorkar Jylla u la pyntip ba u DGP Dr. Lajja Ram Bishnoi u la pynsngew halor ka jingteh lam ïa ka shongsuk shongsain ha ka jylla bad ha ki jaka khappud.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka don ka jingïatreilang kaba jan bad ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha khappud.La pyntip ruh ba ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka la buh sngi ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang Inter-State Border Meeting ha ka 3 tarik,Ïaiong, 2024 bad ka Jylla Assam.“La ïakren ruh halor ki lad ki lynti kumno ban peitngor ïa ka jinglong jingman ha khappud, ban ïada, ban kem ïa ki nongthaw jingkulmar, ban khang ïa ki khyrdop rung bad mih bad ïa ki jaka khappud ba dang long laitlan, ban pynbna ïa ka sngi tyrkhong kiad bad ka sngi shuti ba hap siew bainong, ka jingpyntreikam ïa ki NBW bad kiwei kiwei,” la pyntip u Joint Chief Electoral Officer ka Sorkar Jylla.
title: Bthah u Chief Secretary ïa ki Pulit ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk ha khappud Megh-Assam

content: Shillong, Lber 29: Ka kynhun ïalehkai kriket jong ka Langsning Xl ka la khur jingjop hadien ba pynliem da 3 wicket ïa ka Spartan CC hynnin ka sngi ha ka lympung lehkai jong ka Shillong Cricket League kyrdan Super Division 2024.ïa ka toss la jop da ka Langsning Xl kaba la jied ban bol nyngkong, na ka liang jong ka Spartan ka la lah ban tied 190 ron shuwa ba baroh 10 ngut ki wicket kin shah pynhap hadien 43.3 over.Napdeng ki rangtied ka Spartan kiba la seisoh ki kynthup ïa u Mani Bhusan (42 ron naki 77 bol) bad u Trinayan Dutta (30 ron naki 49 bol), haba phai pat sha ki rangkawangbol ka liang pyrshah, u Steve Syiemlieh u la pyndep 8.3 over, ailad tang 29 ron bad khur 4 wicket, katba u Riboklang Hynniewta u la kawang 9 over, shah tied 26 ron bad khur 2 wicket.Haba shimti ban beh ïa ka thong ba la buh, ka Langsning Xl ka la tied tam da 191 ron, shah pynhap 7 wicket naki 41.2 over kaba la biang ïa ka kynhun ban khur ïa ka jingjop da 3 wicket. U Rijied Marbaniang u la khyrwit 46 ron naki 49 bol, katba u Javed Jyrwa u la kamai 33 ron naki 48 bol.ïa ka nam rangïalehkai ba kynsai tam ha kane ka jingïakhun lane Player of the Match la khur da u Steve syiemlieh u ba la seisoh bha ha ka bol ban khur haduh 4 wicket bad tied 19 ron.
title: Shillong Cricket League Super Division 2024: Jop ka Langsning Xl

content: Shillong, Lber 29: Ki ar tylli ki jingïakhun ka lympung 3rd District League T20 Cricket Tournament 2024 ba la pynïaid da ka East Khasi Hills Cricket Association ba la long hynnin ka Sngi Palei ki la kut ha kaba ki ar kynhun ba kynthup ïa ka Thangsning bad ka Hurdles ki la khur ïa ka jingjop.Haba phai sha ka jingïalehkai kaba nyngkong, ka Thangsning CC ka la jop da ka said ïa ka Mawphlang CC, kata da tang 1 ron.Ka Thangsning CC ka la jied ban tied nyngkong hadien ba jop ïa ka toss, bad kane ka kynhun ka la buh ïa ka thong da 116 ron, shah pynhap 5 ngut naki 15 Over. U Briketstar Kharumnuid u la tied 30 ron naki 29 bol, katba u Mawlynnai Kharumnuid rangkawangbol ka liang pyrshah, u la khur 1/19 naki 3 Over.Haba pyrshang ban beh ïa katei ka thong ba la buh, ka Mawphlang CC ka la duna da tang shi ron ban ïakhaid hadien ba tied 115 ron, shah pynhap 9 ngut shuwa ban kut ka 15 Over.Na ka liang jong u Pynshongdor u la lah ban ïarap 30 ron (24) hynrei kane kam pat shym la lah ban pyllait ïa ka kynhun na ka namrem.U Kitlyngkor Nongkhlaw rangkawangbol ka Thangsning u la ïoh ban khur 4/12 naki 3 over bad ban khur syndon ïa ka nam Player of the Match kaba la ïarap ïa ka kynhun ban jop ïa ka jingïalehkai da shi ron.Haba phai sha ka jingïalehkai kaba ar, ka kynhun Hurdles CC ka la jop suk ïa ka Thynroit CC da 9 wicket. Ha ka jingkynting (Toss) la jop da ka Hurdles CC, kaba la jied ban bol nyngkong.Haba shimti ban tied nyngkong, ka kynhun Thynroit CC ka la ïohlad ban kamai tang 51 ron hadien ba baroh 10 ngut ki rangtied ka kynhun ki la shah pynkhyllem noh tang hadien ba la ïaid 15.2 Over. Dei tang u Mandari Dkhar u ba la kynjoh sha ka phew ron, kata da 12 ron naki 31 bol.U Shrimonto Hajong, rangkawangbol ka kynhun Hurdles CC u la ïoh ban khur haduh 4 wicket da kaba ailad tang 7 ron ban shah tied naki 4 Over.Ka Hurdles CC ka donkam tang 5 over ban tied pyndep ïa ka 52 ron bad shah pynhap tang uwei . U Sandy Kharshandi u la tied 22 ron naki 14 bol. Dei tang u Osric Herbert Wanswett u ba la ïoh ban khur wicket (1/38 naki 3 Over) napdeng ki rangkawangbol ka Thynroit.Ka Hurdles CC ka la khur ïa ka jingjop kaba suk da 9 wicket bad ïa ka nam Player of the Match la khur da u Shrimonto Hajong, u ba la pynkhyllem saw ngut ha ka bol na bynta ka kynhun.
title: 3rd District League T20: Jop ka Thangsning bad ka Hurdles

content: Shillong, Lber 29: Ka lahduh jong ka samoi ba ladep, ka Mawlai SC ka la ïoh ban khur ïa ka jingjop kaba nyngkong mynta ka samoi ha ka jingïalehkai ka lympung Shillong Premier League Division 2023-24 jong ka SSA hadien ba ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Langsning FC da tang 1 kol hynnin ka Sngi Palei, ha madan SSA Ground, Polo.Kumban shu pynkynmaw, baroh arliang, ka Langsning FC bad ka Mawlai SC shuwa ba kin jam sha kane ka jingïakhun, kim pat shym la ïoh khur jingjop, ha kaba ka Langsning ka la shah rem ha ka jingïakhun kaba nyngkong hakhmat ka Lajong katba ka Mawlai ka la ïakhaid bad ka Ryntih.Haba phai sha ka jingïakhun hapdeng ka Langsning FC bad ka Mawlai SC, ka jingïalehkai ka long kaba mar ïaryngkatbor bad baroh arliang ki la sei la ki jong ki sap ban thawlad da kumno ban ïoh pynkhihjar bad ka Mawlai SC ka la lah ban pynurlong tang hadien 10 minit ba la ïaid ka por lyngba ka kol ba la thep da u Dajiedlang Wanshnong.Kane ka shi kol na u Dajiedlang Wanshnong ka la ïeng skhem haduh kaba kut jong ka kylla step. Ha ka kylla miet, ka Mawlai ka la lah ban kyrshan skhem shadien ban nym ailad satia ïa ka liang pyrshah ban ïoh pynphai bad ka jingskhem jong ki bak ka la seisoh haduh kaba kut jong ka por kaba la pynïoh ïa ka Mawlai SC ban khur pura ïa ki lai point.Katba ïa ka Langsning SC ka la mad namrem ha baroh ar sien lynter ki jingïalehkai kiba ladep jong ka mynta ka samoi jong ka lympung SPL.
title: Lyngba u Dajiedlang khur ka Mawlai ïa ka jingjop ba nyngkong ha ka SPL 2023-24

content: Ki samla ha kane ka juk ba mynta ki la shah lyngsdhop ha kiba bun ki jingma bad jingpynshoi kiba bam kruiñ ïa ka jingim jongki, kat shaba ki phai ki shu shah rong noh kata ka jingim samla kaba kordor ka jong ki, kampher la dei kynthei ne shynrang, kine shu hai hai, la shu im sngi ha ka sngewbha ka sngewmiat, ki klet la ïing ki klet la sem, thik la kum kito ki kulai set sem, wei ba la lait ym thikna lano ba kin wanphai biang noh sha la jong ka sem.Ka jingeh kaba man la ki thliew ïing ki mad bad ki shem ka long ba ki khun samla da lei lei kim kloi ban shong ban ïa syllok bad la ka jong ka ïing ka sem, to sdang ban kren ïa kaei kaei kaba bha, ki samla, kin sngap da ka kor kyllut bad kin khang tala ïa la ka jong ka bor jabieng ba kan nym ïoh satia ban rung ki tien sneng ki tien kraw, kane ka pynkthang bha ïaka mynsiem jong ki longïing ki longsem, namar kat kaba kren, ki samla, ki pyrshang ban pynïeng ïala ka jong ki ñia ki jutang ka jong ki, kaba teng teng da jngan shisha ban jubab haba ki buh ïa ka jingkylli.Ki seng ñiam ruh ki mad lem ïa kum kane ka juh ka jingeh, kam pher wat ba ki la pyrshang ban shim ïa la ka kamram ban long ki nongsneng ki nongkraw, khang ban im ban beit hok da kaba biang ka jingim long samla kaba pura. Wat haba la pyrshang ban pynlong ïa ki prokram ïa-lum lang, ki samla kiba poi, lehse ki la shu leit tang ban shu leit ban pyndep rukom, ne ba don palat kata ka jingshah pynbor kaba kim lah ba kin khih shuh, dei ha ki jingleit kiba kum kine, haka jaka ban tei ïa ka nongrim long briew kaba skhem shah ber bih pynban ha kiwei pat ki para samla, da kumta kane ka ïai bteng tad haduh ba ka jylla mynta ka don ha ka khim khait bad bym nang shuh ban batai da kumno ban lah ban tem ïa kum kane ka jingim long samla ki khun ba mynta.Kum ka jylla, kiei kiei kiba ka juk shai ka don mynta, ki khun samla, kim phai ïala ki khmat sha ki kam kiba bha, hynrei ki da tlot ka mynsiem bad ka bor pyrkhat ka jong ki, da kaba ki shu shah patan la kum ki blang ki masi sha ki ahor jong ka jingsniew, kaba kane nabar ka thaba ka da phyrnai khlek khlek, ka pynshoh biej da ki har rukom ki rong ki rup, ka pyn matlah jubor ïa ki khmat bad ka da pynking ïaka janor ki khun samla, ba ïa ka ba bha kin kiar rai maw raidieng, hynrei ïa kaba sinew, ba kin kloi ba kin kdup ba kin piam hala ka jong ka kut shadem. Haba ki la sdang ba kin ngop ban kren ban khana ïa ki ruh da hap ban pyrkhat arsien, namar haba ki la shah pynngop, ki klet syndon ïala ka jong ka raiñ ka rem, kim tip la tymmen ne la rangbah, pynban ki ktien ba kin kren, ka da pynïamrem shisha ïa ki ba la heh la san bad kaba kut la shu shah kynnoh ei ka ïing ka sem baroh kawei.Kumta lada ki khun samla ki ïai bteng ban im ha kum kne ka jinglong kaba mynta, ka jingma kaba wan ba kan ap kadei ïa laka jong ka jaidbynriew, namar lada ki khun samla, ki la shong synjor, u nongwei u nongar u ap hi kmang satang lano ba kin kyllon bad hadien kane un sa ïoh ban kurup bad ban sdang ban lam khmat ha kiba bun ki liang.Tang kum ka nuksa ïa kawei na ki jylla kiba marjan, ba u trai ri u trai muluk u kylla long u rit paid, haba u ïeng ban dawa ïala ka jong ka hok ka nongkynti ba la buh bad sam bynta ki longshwa ki manshwa, ki shah ñion bad shah thom da ka bor, namar ba ka jinglong ba rit paid ka dei ka dak kaba kim lah shuh ban khie la ka jong ka khlieh naka bynta ban kamai ka nongkynti ba dei hok ka jong ki.Kumta ki khun samla jong kane ka jylla, kin hap ban ïeng ban kyndit bynriew sa shisien pat, kin plied la ki jong ki khmat bad ba kin pynïar noh ïala ka jingmut ka jingpyrkhat ba ka por ka la dei shisha ïa ki ba kin kyndit bynriew, namar ba ki sngi kim slem shuh ba lada ïai bteng sah ban im kum kane ka jingim kaba mynta, yn kylla long mraw shisha hala ka jong ka ri, kaba ki longdien hi kin mad ïaka jingeh bad ka jaidbynriew ka lah ba kan shah rong noh na kine ki er-lang-thari kiba wan ban lyngshop ha kane ka juk kaba mynta. U riew tymmen u la dep ban ïohi lypa ïa kane ka juk kaba mynta, bad u la shim khia ba un maham lypa lyngba ki khana puriskam, ha ki phawar bad kumjuh ha ki sur jingrwai, namar u tip ba dei tang kine ki kam, kiba lah ban tabah ha ka met ka longrynïeng jong ki khun samla, ba kin kynmmaw ban im sngi ban sharia ïala ka jong ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew, ba kin long ki nongïada kiba peitngor ban im sngi naka bynta ban pynneh ïala ka jong ka riti ka dustur, ïa la ka ñiam ka rukom bad ruh ban long ki nongpahara khnang ba kin longdien kin ïoh ban diang ti ïaka nongkynti kaba dei hok kat kum ba la buh la seng da ki longshwa ki manshwa.
title: Ko ki samla to kyndit bynriew ban lait na ki jingma bad jingpynshoi

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 29: Ka jingithuh jong ka sorkar ïa u synsar kum u mar rep, ka la long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ym tang ïa ki paitbah nongrep. Hynrei wat ïa ki nongkhaïi kiba dei ki trai jylla kiba ju shalan synsar da ki phew kali man u snem.U bah R.Kharsyntriew uwei na ki nongkhaïi synsar na West Khasi hills haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba ha ki snem ba mynshuwa mynba ka sorkar kam pat ithuh ïa u synsar kum u mar rep, haba leit die synsar ha Shillong wat lada u kiew dor katno katno ruh ym ju kham ïohnong bun.Ka daw ka dei namar ka jinglut ha kaba siew khajna ha ki khyrdop kiba dei ki khyrdop lum khajna jong ki hima Syiem, Sirdar bad ki khyrdop lum khajna jong ka District Council ka long kaba bun bha. Teng teng tang ka jingsiew ha ki khyrdop lum khajna haduh ban da poi ha Shillong, ka la poi palat phew hajar nalor ka jinglut ha ka bai permit, namar u dei u mar khlaw nangta sa ka bai thep bad ka bai kali kam dei shuh ka jinglut kaba rit.U la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong u um lah khlem da ai khublei ïa u bah H.M.Shangpliang MLA ka Mawsynram, u ba la pynsngew sha ka sorkar ba kan ithuh noh ïa u synsar kum u mar rep, ha kaba ka sorkar ka la sngap bad ka la leh ïa kata na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paitbah nongrep.U bah Kharsyntiew u la ong ruh ba hadien ba ka sorkar ka la ithuh ïa u synsar kum u mar rep ruh, ka dang don ka jing shah khrong khajna haman la ki jaka. Hynrei dei tad hadien ba u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh u ba dei u Myntri ba peit ïa ka rep ka riang, u la shimkhia bad bthah ba kim dei shuh ban shim khajna ïa u synsar, kata naduh u bnai Naitung jong u snem 2019, ba baroh ki khyrdop lum khajna kim shym la khrong pisa shuh ïa ki kali kiba kit synsar.U la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew nguh kaba khraw bad u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, na ka bynta ka jingshim khia jong u na ka bynta ki paitbah nongrep ha ka jylla.Nalor kata u la ong ba mynta u snem wat la ka ïew synsar kam da thikna bha, namar ka dor ka poi tang san phew haduh hynriew phew tyngka shi kilo, hynrei ka ma da duh nong than namar ba ka jinglut jingsep ha lynti kam don shuh kumba long mynshuwa.
title: Ngi la lait ka jingshah khrong khajna, tangba ym don ïew u synsar: Bah R.Kharsyntiew

content: Jowai, Lber 29: Ka Sengkhihlang kumba ka ju pynlong ïa ka Lympung jong ka manla u snem hapoh ka bri u hynñiew trep hynñiew skum te mynta u snem ka Sengkhihlang kan pynlong ïa ka Lympung ba 34 jong ka ha ka Seiñ Raij Wahiajer (Raij along) West Jaiñtia Hills District naduh ka sngi 19, 20 bad 21 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 ha ka por 10 :00 baje mynstep.Ka jing jngai na Shillong haduh Wahiajer ka long 60 Kilometer bad na ka Nongbah Jowai ka long 19 km.Kumta ka Sengkhihlang ka khot ka wer ia ki khun ka bri u hynniew trep hynniew skum kiba dang bat dang ksoh ïa ka jing ngeit ha ka ñiam Thynrai ba phi sngewbha ban ïawan sha kane ka Lympung ba lai sngi jong ka Sengkhihlang, ka Sengkhihlang ka kyrpad ïa ki Tnad Sengkhasi bad Seiñ Raij bapher bapher ba kin sngewbha ban shim ba kane ka long kum ka jing pynbna paidbah ïa ka Lympung ba 34 ka Sengkhilang.Ïa u Mawbynna Sahnam jong kane ka Lympung ba 34 jong ka Sengkhihlang yn wanrah ïa u na ka Sengkhasi Shaid Shaid Umoit kaba hap hapoh ka Hima Maharam Syiem Ship. Kane ka long katkum ka jingpyllait khubor u Rgh, S. Sari Publicity Secretary ka Sengkhihlang.
title: Ka Lympung Seng Khihlang ka Seiñ Raij Wahïajer

content: Nongstoiñ, Lber 29: Ki nongïalam ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia & Garo People Kyrshai Area Unit, ki la pynpaw ba ka por ka la dei eh ba ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, kan kyntiew kyrdan noh ia ka Kyrshai Sub Health Centre.Ka seng halor kane ka bynta ka la dep ban ïakynduh ruh ïa u District Medical & Health Officer jong ka West Khasi Hills, ban ïakren halor ka jingdonkam jong ki paidbah ïa ki lad jingsumar kiba paka ha katei ka thain.U Samla Francis Sohshang President bad u samla Probin Snar Secretary ka seng, la ong ba ka shnong Kyrshai kaba hap hapoh ka Nongstoiñ C&RD Block, kaba jngai kumba 70 kilomitar na Nongstoiñ lada ïaid lyngba ka Rambrai bad ka don ha khappud bad ka Assam.Ki don kumba 15 tylli ki shnong kiba hap ha katei ka area ba kynthup ïa ka Mawpun, Nongspung, Ukiam, Borkhuli, Doledonga, Warigro, Umdiengsiar, Hasem, Umthli Umdiengphiang, Talimara, Mawdiangkop, Dariphang, Umbah, Umkhamdor bad Patharphlang, kiba ka jingnang roi ki nongshong shnong ka la kiew man ka por. Kumta ka donkam kyrkieh ban pynbiang ki lad jingsumar kiba kham bha katkum ka jingdonkam jong ki paidbah kiba la nang roi na ka por sha ka por.Shuh shuh, ha katei ka thaiñ, ka jingpang malaria ka jur bha namar ka dei ka jaka kaba shit bad wat ki khunlung kiba dang hapoh san snem ruh bun kiba ïoh jingpang malaria. Hynrei na ka daw jong ka jingbym don ka jaka sumar kaba biang, kiba ïoh pang malaria ki hap ban shu shaniah beit ha ki doctor kobiraj ne ki doctor jakoit.La ong ruh ba kito ki longïing kiba kham ïoh kham kot, ki lah ban leit haduh Boko CHC kaba don ha Kamrup District kaba jngai kumba 50 kilomitar na katei ka thaiñ bad don ruh kiba leit haduh Guwahati. Hynrei kito ki bym biang ka kamai kajih ki la shem shitom haduh katta katta.Ki nongïalam ka seng ki la ong ruh ba ha katei ka thaiñ, ka don tang kawei ka Sub Health Centre ha Kyrshai, hynrei kam lah pat ban ai ka jingshakri kaba paka katkum ka jingdonkam jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Kumta halor katei ka jingeh kim banse ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban dawa na ka sorkar lyngba ka District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO) West Khasi Hills, ba ka sorkar ka dei ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïa katei ka Sub Health Centre ha Kyrshai sha ka Primary Health Centre khnang ba ki paidbah kin ïoh ïa ka jingsumar kaba biang.Ki nongïalam ka seng ki la kyrpad ruh ïa u MLA bah R.G Momin, ba un shimkhia lem ban pynsngew ha ka sorkar halor katei ka jingdawa jong ki, khnang ba kiba pang ba shitom kin ïoh ïa ka jingïarap kaba biang.
title: Kyntu ka FKJGP ïa u MLA Bah R.G Momin ban kyntiew ïa ka Kyrshai Sub Centre

content: Jowai, Lber 27: U Prof. Lakhon Kma, u kyrtong shimet ban ïa aireng sha ka Lok Sabha Election 2024 na ka Shillong seat, mynta ka sngi Palei 28 tarik u Lber uba wan hiar ha Jowai bad ha Phramer West Jaiñtia Hills District ban pynsngew ïa ki mat treikam jong u kiba un leh lada un wan ha jingjop don burom.Utei u kyrtong shimet ula don ïa ka Motto kaba ong “Ban Trei sha ka Jingïasanlang Ka Meghalaya” ha kaba ula don shibun ki mat treikam ne ki Mission kaba kynthup naduh ka pule ka puthi ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher, ka koit ka khiah, ki lad ïohkam ïoh jam, ban pynbeit ïa ka jingïa khajia khappud kaba la sah teng la 52 snem mynta, nalor kiwei kiwei de ki mat.U la buh hakhamt khamtam ïa ka lad ïoh kam ïoh jam jong ki trai ri trai mukul kata ban wanrah ïa ki karkhana shapoh ka jylla khlem da don kano kano ka jingktah ïa ka mariang kum ki Pharmaceuticals, Food processing, ai dawai kynbat bad kiwei de.U la pynsngew ba ka sorkar ka la dei ban ithuh noh ïa ka ktien Khasi hapoh ka khyrnit kaba phra jong ka Constitution, bad ula ong kum u kyrtong jong u paidbah u kwah ban don ka jingtrei kaba khuid bad kaba suba khlem ka jingshah shilliang la ha ki jaka sor bad ha ki jaka nongkyndong.Ha ka jingïalang ha Jowai la pynlong ha Stad Ummulong Iawmusiang katba ha Phramer ha ka por janmiet ula pynlong ha madan ïalehkai phutbol jong ka shnong.Na ka liang u Prof. Lakhon Kma kum u kyrtong ba thymmai ual pynsngew ka jingmih madan ban ïakhun ïa kane ka Election mynta ka kynti ka dei lyngba ka jingpasiaw ha u namar ka jingtlod palat ka rukom treikam mynta jong ki nongmihkhmat jong ki kynhun seng siañ hima sima bad kim long shuh kiba ïadei dur na ka bynta u paidbah.Kumta u khot ïa ki paidbah ba kin pynjop don burom ïa u ha kane ka kynti, da kaba un trei shitom na ka bynta ki Hynñiew (7) tylli ki District jong ka jylla, kum u briew uba la ïaid kylleng sawdong ka pyrthei lyngba ki ri bapher bapher bad kum u nonghikai skul bah (NEHU) u thrang eh ban ai ka jingshakri kaba bha tam, kata “ban kynkiew ka jylla ha baroh ki liang kumba long kiwei ki jylla ba paw hapoh ka Ri India” da kaba ïasaid hapoh ka dorbar Parliament.Ha kaba ïadei bad ki rukom treikam jong u Prof. Lakhon Kma na ka bynta ka jingtip ki paidbah ula buh ruh ïa ka Website: www.lakhonkma.com bad ka YouTube Channel: @lakhonkma.
title: Ha Jowai bad ha Phramer hiar ïalap election u Prof. Lakhon Kma

content: Shillong, Lber 29: Ka seng Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Assistant General Secretary u Bah Wyraiwai Sohtun bad kiwei ki dkhot ki la leit ban khang tala ïa ka Incom Tax bad ka ophis Custom bad ki la phah ruh ïa baroh ki nongtrei kiba la wan sha kitei ki ophis treikam.Kane ka jingleit khang jong katei ka sengbhalang ka la long namar kitei ki ophis treikam kim burom ïa ka sngi kyntang ki Khristan ne ka Good Friday kaba ju long manla ka snem ha une u bnai.Na ka liang ka seng HANM ka la phah mih noh ruh ïa u Joint Commissioner ka Income Tax bad ïa u Chief Account Ophisar ka tnat Custom bad kiwei ki heh ophisar.Ki nongtrei kitei ki ophis ki la kam ruh ba ka jingphah wan trei kadei ka jingbthah jong ki heh jong ka ophis.Kumta na ka liang ka seng ka la leit ban khang hi noh ïa kitei ki ophis bad phah mih noh ruh ïa baroh ki nongtrei kiba dang bun kam ban trei la ka kam.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Bah Sohtun nongïalam ka HANM u la ong ba hadien ba la ïoh jingtip ba kine ki ophis ki treikam bad khlem burom wat ïa ka jingrakhe jong kiba long Khristan ïa ka Good Friday ki la leit ban pynsangeh ban khang ïa kitei ki jaka treikam.Nalor kane na ka liang ka seng ka la lap ruh ba ha kine ki ophis treikam ki nongtrei kiba bun dei hi ki bar jylla bad ki khasi ki don tang khyndiat ngut.
title: Leit khang ka HANM ïa 2 tylli ki ophis Sorkar ba plie ha ka sngi Good Friday
